user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Negarin M.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWxeUy-Xe_jayEIGVpEAlI4LhYQPS9Sz5v-TLupFMZ2neFkExO8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place was brilliant. The atmosphere was amazing and I journaled there for a couple of hours. I tried the cappuccino and double espresso (both really good). The espresso definitely ranks high in my hunt for the best espresso in Vancouver. The pumpkin spice pastry was also really delicious! The staff were extremely nice and helpful as well. This is a very cozy place if you wanna journal or get some writing done.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPmzo4DEUktYEgXeksrvUdPuG51GWYo4SeSdRq4&fid=0x0:0x206898104101e730"],"When":"2024-12-16"},{"Name":"Derek Shek","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWP9Pjija1abf8rOsOgAPBkesWOZ8sALAjyQJKt0I-DTaykDkHV=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Gave East Cafe a shot after reading some promising reviews on Google, and it didn’t disappoint!

Although it was a rainy day and we couldn’t enjoy their famed rooftop area, the indoor ambiance made up for it. I tried their Spanish latte and an iced Americano, where you can choose between light or dark roast beans—a rare find and a sign of a true coffee connoisseur’s spot. Both coffees were above average, with the Spanish latte being particularly noteworthy. The chicken bacon club sandwich was a tasty complement to the beverages.

The overall environment, vibe, and music were welcoming and pleasant. Can’t wait to return on a sunny day to experience the rooftop and enjoy a relaxed afternoon amidst the hustle of Hastings.

Highly recommend for coffee lovers and those seeking a cozy nook in the city!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM84NIeUEH9z78eNTs2cyzYzKovFm7wmbIiOzC1&fid=0x0:0x206898104101e730"],"When":"2024-11-24"},{"Name":"Jennifer Bullis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJJIZgqzlZtkN9Tdc7Ih-y7aryMLksKqFC3u7JMS1k3E8JUdA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is a great place for a relaxing coffee on a busy day. It has a community vibe that this neighborhood used to have. There was a book club going on, lots of people of all ages just relaxing and enjoying their Saturday morning. Staff is amazing - they know their regulars by name (and there are a lot of those). Service was perfect, helpful and friendly. And my god, that latte I got was hand crafted, beautifully balanced and clearly made with care. I got a breakfast wrap that was awesome. Definitely made with care and worth the price.

Basicallly, there is kindness and care in everything here. It’s a lovely place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMhVoWPFeKEHNiK2BswjgWo-gKAquWh72LqGx9J&fid=0x0:0x206898104101e730"],"When":"2024-12-21"},{"Name":"Juan Betancur","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWNjCkTn843vsNHVQ4S_HBJiQ6uiL-YZPPARm2T9dNE2K5N_EdF=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It is difficult for me to describe the importance of East Café or how much it means to me.
It is a place where I feel like I am with my family. It allows me to feel at home. The service is unique because everyone who works there is attentive to ensure that everything you try and do, no matter how simple, becomes an exceptional experience.
East Café offers a variety of events and meetings that seek to connect with the community. I love The Open Mic (every Thursday from 7:00 p.m.) and the Whiskey Jams (subject to programming). These two events are attended by artists who, from my perspective, have nothing to envy of an international one.
Another aspect that I find lovely is the generous spirit of the owner of the Café because, with the funds raised at the Open Mic, donations are made to a program known as City Smiles, which seeks to impact the vulnerable community in the sector.
Some moments and situations mark your life forever. In my case, East Café is and will always be a place that I will carry in my heart because it opened its doors to me when I needed it most.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOcxFbbrXZ9ZooGLjZCrjmB9fzpBJ8sT8pORhhQ&fid=0x0:0x206898104101e730"],"When":"2024-10-16"},{"Name":"Deborah Heberle","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJVzuBbElDa_mmgmRwUF2uTQqU8aINsj024nBWLmqwYehih3g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the cutest cafés I’ve ever been, in Vancouver! Exceptional service, delicious coffee and the atmosphere got me pleasantly surprised! I love how the decor is so simple and made this space so cozy and inviting. Combined with the nice piano jazz in the background, this is the perfect place for relaxing and enjoying a cup of coffee. I need to get some work done but all I want to do is look around while I sip my latte. Nice work, folks!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOpxKBQw54aKYG2CIxvaySQJqAyNhZTYYdd5Meq&fid=0x0:0x206898104101e730"],"When":"2024-10-8"},{"Name":"Inci Karaduman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKuz90-BI8mkfIOCTJg-bbQh6j_O7R3GEg8I_bf94fV6-m5KQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the best coffee places in vancouver. Here is so cosy amd feels like home. Their pastry is so good and also they have sandwich too. Americano is very tasty and a little strong but in a good way. I really like it every time. The stuff is sooo friendly. They are saying goodbye everytime somebody leave the door. I will always come here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPn_V3htW_adEC5HLEx7Vgp--FfKu3A0mpNDEBR&fid=0x0:0x206898104101e730"],"When":"2024-10-24"},{"Name":"bostondave2011","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJQ29WGaoD_9B2iWKTU_0MybzF34sQLBfRb670IKxURo-btEg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolute hidden gem! In the heart of sunrise Hastings. Great music as you sit and enjoy 1 of 3 roasts that will quickly become your favorite.
Josh is passionate about his beverage offering and it shows!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN0f1NAdleY59Te7uAHQ3yk32M9F-hX9rHLeRGI&fid=0x0:0x206898104101e730"],"When":"2024-10-4"},{"Name":"Michelle Amsing","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocITR09cCZ3f3VhftreBA3dmNpJnmweYOO63Zd9xChwn7xyKnA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love the East Café - it’s one of my favorite cafés in Vancouver. The atmosphere and service are always great and tranquil, and their coffee is delicious. It’s an amazing place to come & work or study, especially if you sit at the desk at the far end corner of the shop (best seat in the establishment) ;)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNNK6ry78d9oWv9EHa4ZbU4vm3W1I_43GD57uwA&fid=0x0:0x206898104101e730"],"When":"2024-11-20"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"anahita hatami","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLQ-o6gwcAXOjCJCdPLpBMeXB6iHThpttDoU6zj03rQHgYevw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The store From outside it doesn’t look good or doesn’t have an eye catching interior design but they have the BEST BAKLAVA in whole BC. I tried their Baklava and it was the most amazing the most delicious like the BEST sweet I have ever tasted. I bout two pack to go one small one medium, It was a bit pricy but worth it I would say.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPf60IcXDW-T1XoBUTOuz5VwZSAtjpBhCh2pMrV&fid=0x0:0x7dd1a230462a0e4d"],"When":"2024-12-26"},{"Name":"Heyam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVQm9BhjOHMjC7GcWrHn68t1cIzjRHFnDfgXZNgHLdz2uOG85st=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I came here with my date to try Baklava. They have very fresh baklavas, lokim, and baked goods. The Turkish coffee is very good. I really liked the Turkish tea.
Staff are extremely friendly and nice people.  I recommend this place to hang out with friends or family.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOVNjCZhCBhOwqRWefwKeDdeKgOwmw-ZKePyf6J&fid=0x0:0x7dd1a230462a0e4d"],"When":"2024-8-21"},{"Name":"Sathiyaseelan Suhashini","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWGCDhZwAvUF3Q8iMEpEx8TQCvKbwiXzYFJN0uOrenEt7v0wxGX=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Loved the varieties in Baklava that I have never seen anywhere in Vancouver.

They had dry, more juicy and less sweet baklavas.

They had cold baklava that was unique and delicious overloaded.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPKQsVnaHrPlaARnSV9OZb9YxRK6KOOe6BmecKq&fid=0x0:0x7dd1a230462a0e4d"],"When":"2024-10-28"},{"Name":"Hassan Mk","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUn8XljJKUWtM5hZCcrws3Ntw3dFgRbwi5l6-83UHe5aX-z7xYA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our visit was nothing short of a delight. On a sunny weekend, my family and I ventured in, eager to indulge in the array of baklava offerings. From the classic to the exotic, every bite was a journey through Turkish confectionery craftsmanship. Each piece, meticulously layered with nuts and honey, offered a symphony of flavors and textures that left us craving for more. The variety on offer catered to every palate, ensuring there was something for everyone to savor.

Accompanying our sweet treats was the quintessential Turkish tea, a delightful complement to the richness of the baklava. Served with warmth and hospitality, it added an extra layer of authenticity to our culinary experience.

The staff, with their warm smiles and attentive service, elevated our visit to another level. Their genuine hospitality made us feel right at home, contributing to the overall pleasant atmosphere of the place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNzbes_aknZotcmJM4h5pq-zsHe1XOFT-MQ_2v4&fid=0x0:0x7dd1a230462a0e4d"],"When":"2024-5-26"},{"Name":"Atena Razmpoush","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWDTwnpwsyCMQv83dsdwlkz2BAvureQHzZZxo2_BIzfjtUBCR_R=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Tasty products, friendly people, clean place, good price.
I will definitely go back there with my other friends!

The pistachio baklava wasn’t too sweet which I loved! And the aroma of the turkish coffee was fascinating 🫠 they make the coffee in a traditional style using hot sand!

These guys make everything from scratch in the shop, super authentic and delicious!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPnGWyQ-ZWmhdYwrxLfIKod5LOc_tZq3oLS5cU-&fid=0x0:0x7dd1a230462a0e4d"],"When":"2024-5-19"},{"Name":"Jamie Coo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWMtT8SYH3ODglSdZyhsIz5N_cesns6jNpwE2VJCXq0WPBgF9EA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time here so we had no idea what anything is, so we asked a lot of questions and the staff was really nice and patient and answered everything. The baklavas were super delicious and we really enjoyed it! The place is very spacious and clean as well. Will definitely come back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOSRhQkNQOFTNXjZGIgolw0sW2yXqpKzEK4RocI&fid=0x0:0x7dd1a230462a0e4d"],"When":"2024-9-18"},{"Name":"Hakim E","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKh-iMj-_rDGQN3VCbzbu_kiuv0nHkHesY5lkxIxZFiLe004Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great service, very friendly. The baklava is fresh and sweet. I have tried Turkish coffee the last time I was here. This time I tried the Turkish Affogato, which is a Turkish coffee with ice cream. Big thanks to the owner and the great staff.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMCgA4Ozc_PqtPRi4j2vBGeOV90aTl0ioUKfeQI&fid=0x0:0x7dd1a230462a0e4d"],"When":"2024-12-19"},{"Name":"M K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbi6LJtKWW_2rjs9UHr5Hby-WcnZyGuhY2NPvJWMqZ_P0zVpzO=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Haven’t had chance to have anything savoury here yet but Baklavas are authentic Turkish. No honey in them like what our lovely neighbour Persians make. So, if you are Turkish and homesick or want some good Baklava, this IS the place to stop by! Best part is you can order by piece or bulk if you talk with store owner. Overall, you won’t regret it!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOqzPLyRYb1vddccFaG7TklxvTR6S0HoxJ5yhbh&fid=0x0:0x7dd1a230462a0e4d"],"When":"2024-5-31"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Anni Downs","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVcfWkAqJehKI2sN-hPODcyqk-KwzjOCilajHUYvEYRNpHko64=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Outstanding customer service and top quality products.\nHaving returned home to Vancouver Island I noticed I was one chocolate short, I rang Cocoa Leaf Cafe and they post not only one, but two chocolates over to me. Exceptional. Thank you","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Allan Campbell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJTWhaPEWqqGHqAReVyg4vwgJYOK8WyM4V1rO2AWQ5nwchAhck=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great vibe and friendly staff. The Coca Mocha Loca was delicious  and quite invigorating. Definitely worth the trip.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNn1LioKYa4aSw-EWujoPbARTtRpz2gncuRSQPr\u0026fid=0x0:0xc0591ce1e9aef9f0"],"When":"2024-5-19"},{"Name":"Mat Short","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLMkYD70RcRba6srLTc1mnWmveRdxzh5VVs30pe7DON0lBsaA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Purchased 222 ug (microgram) lsd tab, 10 grams of red Bali kratom and 3.5 grams enigma mushrooms. I used the kratom first. The Kratom worked it kept my symptoms at bay ( not elaborating ) it might have been what it's supposed to be. Other than it managing my symptoms it did nothing more. I took enough for it to be a recreational dose. I ate two grams of the enigma mushrooms the following day and my vision barely got distorted at all colours were shifting a small amount that's it. So I took the 1.5 i had left a few hours later but it seemed I had already metabolized most of what I took earlier no change really. I'm sensitive to mushrooms I usually trip hard. The lsd I took all at once the whole supposed 222 micrograms and basicly got a similar effect of the mushrooms but a bit more euphoria and a nice tingling feeling colours were changing and I got a bit of a glow around things and stuff was in my perceived reality changing size a bit back and forth but nothing major. 222 micrograms is a good sized recreational dose and when I've took 1 small tab in the past it was way more powerful than this. I've taken a quarter tab and got higher than I did with this supposed 222 micrograms. The mushrooms and the lsd was I'd say 4 times the price of street stuff and way less powerful. If I had the option I'd buy it on the blackmarket but I didn't I was traveling I don't on the lower mainland. The people working there were very nice, polite and professional and the place was clean inside. It was nice just wish their products were stronger and cheaper maybe I got the wrong variety of shroom but I asked him what the strongest was and he said enigma. They sucked and lisergic acid doesn't have species so it just plain sucked can't get the wrong kind there. The kratom I have no complaints I don't know enough about it and it's the only time I've used it but if I had to guess I'd say that it wasn't powerful either. Oh and the owner makes condescending and defensive remarks when you give bad reviews. They always have an excuse for why the costumer is wrong somehow. Like when the drink sucks they lay the blame on something like you not adding enough sugar or cream to your Americano after lol. I think people know how they like to drink their coffee and added the appropriate amount of whatever additives they prefer. The customers always wrong here if you say something wasn't right, underdosed, disgusting or you didn't like it then it's you not them lol. Get off your high horse crap dispensary owner. I gave two stars before I saw his or her comments to people's reviews","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Cole","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXLgf-qRr8rii4hPcqBKHm2w7r7O7LoohfkwzsLDvpIYyaBrPK9=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had a wonderful time. We were a little nervous going in but the staff were open and friendly but most of all very professional. They offered non judgemental information, and were happy to educate. Canada needs more places like this!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lina Huine","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXTc90UClGdW5-vlLdRudv0nYQ1eUmIsZfcJ8sj-8pxZav3xZGO=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love this cafe, the brewed tea is my favourite. Great selection of reading material. Super friendly as well.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP-xNwPEoBypkiC9-8gsTWv-p8ZtRsJ_pM6C9zH\u0026fid=0x0:0xc0591ce1e9aef9f0"],"When":"2024-3-17"},{"Name":"Earth Explorer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXx9WbpYHoWti2M8dulDcVEiSwzq2Is9YdecFV0_EjsI1gR2sUT=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Journey to Peru right here in Vancouver! 🇨🇦 🇵🇪. What a variety of coca products, tea and other goodies. This is so unique and a must try for adventures souls.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPzuS41HH9Q6DNC5IqH2bM4qsfnXIJe59mBvJXE\u0026fid=0x0:0xc0591ce1e9aef9f0"],"When":"2024-5-23"},{"Name":"Vincent Parker","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWkB-rmO0gcaNvE7vRZTSkPj6Ytljan4mFearBNeOXoCT1b6j1v=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the single best places I can recommend for anyone visiting Vancouver. Great products. Nicest staff. Great information. I only wish there were more locations with a bar like they have. Such a huge fan. And Dana Larsen is a freaking hero","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Breanne Grant","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX4qcvOf5GPuRyewKzu3cRwBzQDuyVGGrI1WME2O2jFWBTe2NU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Not sure how to describe that the staff here seem a little bit annoyed at you, but they always have helpful suggestions and the products are excellent. about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Onsite services","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true},{"name":"Delivery","enabled":false}]},{"id":"highlights","name":"Highlights","options":[{"name":"Great tea selection","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair accessible seating","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible parking lot","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible washroom","enabled":true}]},{"id":"parking","name":"Parking","options":[{"name":"Free street parking","enabled":true},{"name":"Paid street parking","enabled":true}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Derek Shek","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWP9Pjija1abf8rOsOgAPBkesWOZ8sALAjyQJKt0I-DTaykDkHV=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Secret Garden Tea Company offers a delightful slice of tranquility with its charming English tea house vibes.

Celebrating its 29th year, this tea house is beautifully decorated with an array of teacups, creating a quaint and cozy atmosphere. It’s the perfect venue for special occasions like birthdays or bridal showers.

The selection of teas is extensive and impressive, ensuring there’s something for every palate. While the tomato soup was comforting, the scones stole the show despite not being the traditional British style—they were heart-shaped with a sprinkle of sugar on top, adding a whimsical Canadian twist. Absolutely a perfect spot for a relaxing afternoon filled with great conversation and even better tea.

Highly recommended for a girls’ day out!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPzhlOxcWIrVQ9IwYiUga9bS5zEOvj6MuyIsJC_&fid=0x0:0x73f17d78660aae3c"],"When":"2024-11-23"},{"Name":"Sherri Motohashi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIvRir-qiHqz1peJ0G4WMMQ0hlpOVVItbdXigQEOIAYuIWjUA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Charming decor, and i genuinely loved everything I ate! I just have a couple personal preferences that would make it even better for me...1) I found it a bit chilly inside 2) the scones sadly were too sweet and on top of that they were covered in a thick granulated sugar. Other than that, I fully recommend and will go again for sure!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNjhzyJJgQvxp-6V88nI1fVrb_mZofj42Z_8AJJ&fid=0x0:0x73f17d78660aae3c"],"When":"2024-11-1"},{"Name":"Lucy Animator","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVY7brXamElnS01fAQfTXCPF3JSbsNMYZuWBhl1ILRqSsdPDqE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I really enjoy trying new places for Afternoon tea, and even when Secret Garden didn’t make it to my top list, was a nice experience. It’s a little pricy and the food is just ok. The service, on the other had, is really good and the staff lovely. I like the decoration and how the teapots wear cute clothes.

Another highlight is the tea, we can order different kinds included within the price. I specially enjoyed the Peach one, and their signature blend.
The experience was good overall. 🙂","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOO54v3jhurud8RXPj5LdhYNRnbl1v6I2eTGlQ&fid=0x0:0x73f17d78660aae3c"],"When":"2024-7-16"},{"Name":"Clarissa Chang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVr7dmfW3DobMJyEWvg3_sJJkb8e9B-9LKRI5Rw6FsVvA9ks30j=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The atmosphere is super cute, the decor and tea cups are exactly what I imagine what I think of high tea. The finger sandwiches were delicious but the desserts are very mid. Pretty expensive for the amount of food you get (over $100 for what’s in the photo) but I suppose if it’s for a special occasion it’s more justified. Would have rated higher if the service was better. The server looked like she didn’t want to be there- wasn’t rude but wasn’t friendly either.
Overall 3/5.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOkeBNsDlVHIBDYrtzgaBpDWiN40UI66p1HQdiO&fid=0x0:0x73f17d78660aae3c"],"When":"2024-9-9"},{"Name":"Manda Chambers","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWFohUKYgZGmZEj6lUoEvwO4ebz26UsSIZe6Q3u3tamO6X6hfWxNw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"First time here and really enjoyed it with a friend. They provided unlimited tea and you can try other teas at no additional charge. The pastries were nice and fresh. My favorite were the scones. The ambiance was adorable with the Christmas theme.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM1usVSSllWtNHnyB1EaM78U9oXuZRCyekVyBDu&fid=0x0:0x73f17d78660aae3c"],"When":"2024-12-8"},{"Name":"Clinton Large","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI3XxS0rHb5EQDNpn1Bi69Rgdxqapx3WvYAx0MWmqfySqKLvQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’ve only been here twice, but every time I’m blown away. Getting a scone and a tea is so amazing here. I love the vibe and Jessica our server was so fun and kind. I will be back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMI0Cc5eje5N3uLKPsH9OVjVn9ne2USdGeYkJs-&fid=0x0:0x73f17d78660aae3c"],"When":"2024-10-23"},{"Name":"Lin Natalie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVqJfDRGhG3ZPhfEnz7_KEBsD0OoRIt3yNrzph8bSHnSOFgZoPg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It’s my first time to have this kind of afternoon tea with my bestie in Vancouver! We really love the vibe and food! The whole interior is so photogenic ~ the service worth a five star review! We really love the tea in the adorable tea pot!! That makes me really miss my grandma🥹","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNLdt9B0WEmULx9ECHERkL7QqO_HnytD8whye0B&fid=0x0:0x73f17d78660aae3c"],"When":"2024-8-15"},{"Name":"Fei B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUCSPR4b-Aju_3xzgvNmgK79_SKNPWkqhiQHmMJksqE4GdZMXE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lovely high tea locations, great for special occasions. Definitely make a reservation before - there were a lotttttt of people waiting when I arrived for my 1.30pm reservation on a Sunday.
Great little sandwiches and pasties, and each person in your party gets to pick their own flavour of tea and gets their own individual pot.
Price reflects the experience, in my opinion. It is about $50-60/person but this is cheaper than other high teas in the area.
Will comment that parking is very limited, as it is paid street parking. Parking directly in front of the restaurant is much more expensive than parking around the corner. Not sure why.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNmk1r9eqLubdKRbKz7xxBC_bs6-6i8CdRT3CJZ&fid=0x0:0x73f17d78660aae3c"],"When":"2024-6-10"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Tonya Karmin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIa4v8_sUBYybVqai4SujT1rhuKW3FWYDpu3Xsyu3UwKRc-Qw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the best coffee shops on Hastings! The service is great, special shoutout to Kristine, she is super kind and welcoming and is passionate about what she does. She recommended the cinnamon bun which was delicious, and I even got a fresh cookie straight out of the oven. 10/10 will be returning.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNQToBwqlY2oiGV5pQAwXUsuezFXr3LQ5WJVjzv&fid=0x0:0xfdad2638dbc6e179"],"When":"2024-11-26"},{"Name":"Hay Leigh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU3lw-VM_9NiDkl3P2xmDBrgW_mHw454nMiYrvTPrl44QLhjbc7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is the best coffee shop in the Hastings-sunrise area! The staff are very friendly and welcoming, the eats are great YOU MUST try the carrot cake!! I think the best thing about this place is that ITS DOG FRIENDLY!  Highly recommend getting your coffee near me here. ;)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN1G4hLpFQpL1tB024AUYgfsXpPeS73n9ZEPslX&fid=0x0:0xfdad2638dbc6e179"],"When":"2024-8-14"},{"Name":"Katerina Pilipyuk","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV_rNS0CyHd_IEV1y92ZYANM-bIuvdf37y5HxszoT6ogkhFGV5DQg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"So happy to have these guys just across the street. They are soulful, cool, authentic, warm, with good coffee, food and music. I just came to the city, just got a local card, just connected it to Apple Pay a night before, and came down to have a coffee and a cookie. I tried my local card in Apple Pay, it was denied. I tried physical card, it was denied. I tried my cards from Ukraine and Belgium — denied. The ladies in the cafe just told me to have the coffee and pay later. That’s was super nice! When I figured out what happened to my local card (national Canada band — NOT recommended btw), I came back to pay. They seemed so pleasantly surprised I did it that they gave me another cookie for free. That was sweet and authentic! Grateful for this place, Canada and its people in general!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Winnie So","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXyynzyslbrlBtQSD6Mo4wtiqwipQfd2u4afkq6TQ0HU4eh1lXVzA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best place to have coffee and cinnamon bun in the neighbourhood. Friendly service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOY-g-dkYklGblfUm5dxrHxo9vtkjU6Q9p1UcaX&fid=0x0:0xfdad2638dbc6e179"],"When":"2024-12-19"},{"Name":"Psychotic Percy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXVsjDaDMHM8gu5JUPj4jr9yj_WWACZUxN-aM_e48PfNQ5bTKZ54w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Super friendly sever everytime i'm here. Cute place too.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP7SoKuYRw9XAPRRjGIfg3huKTKlPPIfcok_n2q&fid=0x0:0xfdad2638dbc6e179"],"When":"2024-11-10"},{"Name":"Claudia Nobauer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWIqUK5qTy3Jjw7bQg9KjXKCIQZRPlXidVBV8n5BocIgr90lLs=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love this cafe and here's why. The other day I was working and there was this older lady sitting next to me. It seemed like she was flustered. Eventually the owner of the bean sat down with her and helped fixed her eyeliner, which had smudged.

I've worked in a lot of coffee shops around this city. At the bean it's a community, they seem to really see you and it's lovely.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Izumi Hance","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUJ2wAlel21p5oIiZOAqKNp8e_nv22gHnbnV_KYA5omY4TTAB8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love this place! All the staff have a high energy, and they always make us smile which is amazing!!
Baked goods were very tasty, and I love their Canadiano. I always look forward to see their sandwich board where has humorous joke on it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPWccr_-wo_CenuUaExcrLRvR7_9Gsvv8rgS6Wq&fid=0x0:0xfdad2638dbc6e179"],"When":"2021-9-11"},{"Name":"Jenn P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLysrdL-CZHAPB7-wghIqWMENktG37AFePaB208RGKj7hzYrg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The coffee is good, my daughter said the ham and cheese croissant was tasty.
Everyone was great except the older Caucasian lady. She was only nice to regulars and kinda rude to new customers","Images":null,"When":""}]

They sell instant noodles, cake, macaroons and other snacks too!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOC9Wo19GZDRBIKJKQjwct0AeOC4w6QeNlJnLUA&fid=0x0:0xc2d705cfbf54583"],"When":"2024-10-16"},{"Name":"kawaii hatchiko","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWLtom4JJghW2UnkOsI7GKr-J96yxZfSX4SBdkTaAQaNBfKVBVT=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Cute little bubble tea shop. Nice promo 2 bubble teas for 9.99. Will come again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN3BaGucPHdEUcAWmb1bpYX6jQnJ9-y2mDiLrdC&fid=0x0:0xc2d705cfbf54583"],"When":"2024-10-31"},{"Name":"Jiwon Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJVO9CNC3DzN-rVpntVK_l5Jwv9ew0e1J5rfs9oQXQcwT7dUxA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The staff here is so friendly! 💛 Even their mango slush and strawberry ice-cream slush taste so lovely as well! This shop will definitely be my go-to!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOpiKwvPLYHznHjp_9bbI6AATDQpHBwadhr4lya&fid=0x0:0xc2d705cfbf54583"],"When":"2024-12-9"},{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great bubble tea! There are options to choose fresh, real fruit drinks as well as the classic powdered flavours. There are so many flavours to choose from. Tried the milky red bean slush with real red beans and less sugar and it was just right with lots of red bean flavour. Would go back :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPPeV9FhGYk2oUlIeofqqNOeFSEjrwyrwUGmQzX&fid=0x0:0xc2d705cfbf54583"],"When":"2024-2-4"},{"Name":"Wayne Liang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLAqbnATehdCB6LG2128EjISBhwi6X8sr56Ci-l1ZepcZmpvg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Drink are so watery no flavour at all. Also the Pearls are rock hard for sure from the night or few nights before. I want my refund or contacting BBB.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNr-F8_qYJYkvlVht9bGaghiVdLEI91QIYz-wK8&fid=0x0:0xc2d705cfbf54583"],"When":"2024-12-7"},{"Name":"David Cho","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVfA-kOU7xliddqeq24f50pbZSzEpPCzW3VfNrEQUVJkz4Qd9Fp=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wonderful and delicious experience ar Blue Moon. The shop was extremely clean and inviting. The restroom in particular was pleasant as the restrooms in that neighbourhood is always troubling.

The bubble tea was nothing short of yummy. I had the milky strawberry oreo slush. The service was kind and welcoming. Will be coming back again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNl2Zx-zSHj-ZqDwui3RZCpkZIUzR3UHV9HyoIz&fid=0x0:0xc2d705cfbf54583"],"When":"2023-4-9"},{"Name":"Zay R","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIrcv0nbceihjzzaPr2LIIin5v_Tj9YhzMv8cvDTNxNVU0GSA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Very friendly staff, fast service, and a nice vibe.

We got mango milk tea and mango milky slush. The milk tea tasted a bit too artificial in flavour, but the slush was yummy.

I also tried strawberry yogurt cheesecake, and it was DELICIOUS and very light 😋","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOFzrU9JmnJU-SwJVlP5h8wqP7MmJ7dm6qGOdDV&fid=0x0:0xc2d705cfbf54583"],"When":"2023-5-22"},{"Name":"Teresa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWXJzjPvZuazZPaiDpvZUIEnQ8SaqmnckUx-GRckef8lha6d56D=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My sisters and I love this place so much! There’s not a lot of customization in terms of drink size, sweetness or ice levels but the drinks are really good for the price and there’s a wide variety you can choose from. They recently raised their prices; you can get a slush with pearls for around $7. For the same size and order, it’d probably be a $1-2 extra at Chatime.

The owner(?), Jay, is so nice and even greets me when we run by each other outside :’) There’s also free wifi!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOwxFU9-T6XQVvqnB_84s64o6h1a6X5l6Zmilme&fid=0x0:0xc2d705cfbf54583"],"When":"2023-9-18"}]

SO thoughtful!! I cannot wait to try it! Thank you and I will continue to order from you and tell my Vancouver friends about your awesome little shop with exceptional tea!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Charles","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXDPG1qK6kgMgeIRhB0Xcxchs_x57APfg42UgeNj6DZPwgyjeY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Small but elegant cafe nested in the market. try ice latte to match up with the blueberry I bought in market. user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Milangic","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVopPvYZNMyoMCZnSPr3vsLdqdKB7J9OKjxv4He0cY0RManHvU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A comfy and great place to enjoy a delicious cup of coffee. Good selection of bakery items. New maple pecan latte and carrot cake is so so good. If you love matcha this place is to go for, its delicious. Service is spectacular. Always felt welcoming. Little quote on the mirror to fall cushion covers to tiny Halloween candles during Halloween season. Worth checking out the cup and bun cafe. ☕️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMerqDL5Fun32SXcK5IpIftBhXXoOUsheqd1dVN&fid=0x0:0x1295592475bcc5a4"],"When":"2024-11-22"},{"Name":"Farzam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIooZPCPPfH5D4G1f5pX_06Fqf4UZb5reyqU1DQAFjZqgdcZ04=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely love Cup and Bun Cafe! The atmosphere is cozy and inviting, making it the perfect spot to relax or catch up with friends. The service is exceptional, and staff are friendly and attentive, ensuring a delightful experience every time. Their coffee is top-notch, rich, and perfectly brewed, and the pastries are simply divine. Every bite is fresh and flavorful. This cafe is a true gem, and I can't recommend it enough!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPt1qN1BG3FpU7VwWED2euVA17apyHCaU-hd_hA&fid=0x0:0x1295592475bcc5a4"],"When":"2024-9-2"},{"Name":"Hassan Mk","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUn8XljJKUWtM5hZCcrws3Ntw3dFgRbwi5l6-83UHe5aX-z7xYA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I recently visited with my family for a quick walking break, enticed by the promise of aromatic coffee and sweet treats. Our order comprised an Americana, a cappuccino, a lemon cake, and an apricot jam roll.

The coffee and pastries were decent but nothing extraordinary. The cakes seemed a bit overcooked and past their prime, which was a bit disappointing. However, the staff's warmth and friendliness more than made up for it. Their welcoming attitude added a pleasant touch to our visit and made us feel right at home.

The atmosphere of the coffee shop was inviting, with tasteful decorations that added to the overall ambiance. Despite the minor shortcomings in the food, the overall experience was enjoyable, thanks to the cozy environment and the lovely staff.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNDtPhcoFMVMKqz4bQaUvvZp6YQbwKeHIqYUrjr&fid=0x0:0x1295592475bcc5a4"],"When":"2024-6-1"},{"Name":"Phyllis Tee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXtHTl5JLpAHiaGIa8m_bWtHrZ84dJMWFq9MtMaT4ZwV6hFBwY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Chicken pesto sandwich was good. Happy with the side salad - made it a balanced dish. Tuna melt was an interesting one - loaded with pickled flavour, which sort of overpowered the tuna taste. Overall, nice little stop for a quick bite.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNDRXU-RI9XUweIlPu9xwP3JLaK0VejGRNJHRel&fid=0x0:0x1295592475bcc5a4"],"When":"2024-9-17"},{"Name":"Maria M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXmuhUB-INQ3XCbE2M9HT-MdzILSuqxW6ls6tLvy0JgUoxl1f3wCQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lovely place, quiet on a Sunday afternoon. Great atmosphere, very bright with comfortable seats. Good options of snacks and pastries. Coffee beans are from Agro. I’m yet to find a coffee shop that doesn’t have a monstera in it somewhere hahaha I guess they bring good luck or something.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMH9c5WUSWHRbUPl5GU16JSLF2-fXDnQQU99hS3&fid=0x0:0x1295592475bcc5a4"],"When":"2024-7-17"},{"Name":"Ishant Mithrani","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXhOwijOlZKDgzqi0RziPmIhKNCbsPTT_D_03xMnvfxtbc8X3nk=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing place, perfect brews and warm ambiance. Don’t skip the pastries, especially the croissant and the cake slices. It’s a cozy spot for coffee lovers who appreciate quality and a friendly atmosphere. Highly recommended for a top-notch coffee experience!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOnaLLXyrehKJEhrPDxyNpOoJrSuVJkdGYn0fc5&fid=0x0:0x1295592475bcc5a4"],"When":"2024-8-3"},{"Name":"Ryan M. Rad","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWfBUNblWOkfhuZ7eOom2I6QeDxjIPkmldUrIixQCHkYaA3j6L-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The atmosphere and the variety of seating options is great and the staff is friendly. Prices are reasonable too and you have quite some options form pastries to sandwiches. The food and drinks although are decent but nothing really special. Overall, we will be back for sure and I’d rate this as a 4.5/5!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO0IFIFaftvdFn-GJ2O0pwOSxNwgTPdxipdyYGy&fid=0x0:0x1295592475bcc5a4"],"When":"2024-7-20"},{"Name":"Maya Florey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXWsd7ZlvUoZqLpY-itDvhiZhkJ33_uzwGASGl_tvJHxJbLky4r=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Incredibly high quality house made baked goods, sandwiches and traditional coffee! Had a salmon sandwich and a Macchiato, the sourdough bread was fresh and soft and the salad and salmon was very flavourful and lemony. The coffee was very smooth, rich and fruity, with notes of pomegranate and sage. I didn’t try any of their baked goods, but wish I had! They looked incredible and handcrafted, unlike a lot of cafes that resell from Costco! My only complaint is that we went on Sunday afternoon and it was so busy that we could not find a seat! Staff were very helpful and friendly! Seems like a really wonderful community hub!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Dayna Khan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXdTXsRCng8gkDyx2catnV4K6fzDuqTRgvYofYTuKX7ZeCSb9QP=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Stumbled upon this cute breakfast nook today and was pleasantly surprised.

I walked in and it smelled clean, the bathroom was also well taken care of and cleanly.

The menu has a ton of great options and decently priced, the food tasted wonderful.

We are from out of town, but would definitely come back if we were in the neighbourhood.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOYuLuujylWp_zdiQjFM9NFhd0VbkjxVbiKhYI9&fid=0x0:0x53d888b350705520"],"When":"2024-11-28"},{"Name":"Nasrin Moradinik","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX3Kk8XG4lRXLDtLDJApv5hA6eMxp6DW5P1QuWyvqwc8cZF38O7Xw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Well, a local and friendly spot. Good for kids to enjoy their favorite waffles.  The lady at the counter (probably the owner) is very sociable and nice.
The service is quite good.
There were number of rules which were funny!
There was a map hanging on the wall showing each customer's nationality.
Overall, nice experience!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO_4A1JvblaFIMqRGTrFg9quwJg6mSoW7Z9EQOL&fid=0x0:0x53d888b350705520"],"When":"2022-10-13"},{"Name":"ab mmm","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJHzw184Ql0kVbik_CHon4BqqpRO4zCONgSafgBk5QdOByjLw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It's a cozy place with delicious food. Their waffles are so good! My personal favorites are as follows

Sweet waffles: Nutella Waffle(I know, so basic), it's so delicious!
Blueberry whip waffles! It's light and sweet.

Savory waffles: The tomato asparagus one! It's a beautiful blend of sweet and savory.

Pro tip: Get Hollandaise on the side too, you got a pretty sizeable amount to relish.

And you get to sit with Goldie, the stuffed bear!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNiqWDGdN8zTOApXyt7R2FdGa3Hy-bfpLQ5lVK8&fid=0x0:0x53d888b350705520"],"When":"2024-6-22"},{"Name":"Marcus Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVpW5Leh6_TllyZ2Ih33Q7ftm5wDxHHa4rTFHqr8FR8KCSYSyz9=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Don’t come. Soggy waffles. Way too sweet.

Some red flags: we don’t see waffle station in the kitchen making fresh waffles, constant microwave beep and door open/close, what we got does not look like the pictures hung on the wall

We ordered the BBQ pulled pork waffle and egg/ham waffle.

BBQ pulled pork - The bbq sauce was overly sweet and the waffle was soggy. I ate less than half and couldn’t finish it bc it was way too sweet. The oil and sauce just oozes out when you start to cut into it.

Egg/ham waffle - also very sweet bc they put syrup on the waffle under the ham.The egg looks and tastes like it was cooked via the microwave.

$20 per waffle, not worth it

They probably changed owners bc someone in our group came once before and said it used to be good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNJ3OQ5WNu7EpiKX11t7zZw4oTBMRu1G1AWXFL0&fid=0x0:0x53d888b350705520"],"When":"2023-8-13"},{"Name":"Matt Erikson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLMKn5KCXOg3X5LUx5FGZnbbAJU0DW2_9e7xGzYhjkbq7Y8CA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fantastic spot, the waffles were the best I've ever had, and overall the food didn't miss. Wish they had a chicken option but still would give this place a try if you're more into savory stuff because the waffles are that good. My girlfriend loved her Reeses waffle as well, they had tons of great options to choose from. Thanks, we will be back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMBWjpzWhM6Z_J6lfZzLHxHYx5jQJ9z_8UKuTvq&fid=0x0:0x53d888b350705520"],"When":"2024-3-7"},{"Name":"Jeffrey Thi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLnSLNTuZqg5C19sBhKr3KiKOUrYvcysFQt67sFfcfA4TLq1Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My friend and I enjoyed our food a lot!  The two owners were very friendly and welcoming.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMIuX_-zhSPaqEUO9VEUV9ure7Vc54FEUVbwUol&fid=0x0:0x53d888b350705520"],"When":"2024-8-18"},{"Name":"Katherine Little","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJARlCc9eZ_pvZlbMjSF1DUXj8hYQuuLPd9Hri2zDliLYt6vA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely delicious waffles at a great price. They have a range of sweet and savoury waffles that everyone would enjoy.

Kathy the owner is such a lovely person, and we loved talking to her. Also, a big thank you to the chef, Calvin Klein, and his wife’s secret waffle recipe. Yum! 💫","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN_F1i5h9INno5jI35xyCQshi12rhVsV68MdZ8M&fid=0x0:0x53d888b350705520"],"When":"2022-9-2"},{"Name":"Jennifer Mitchell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWy1ZZDXmAG4WrTzNLZ1xrQOsdN_NITfq87CfzHsLfncyqL2oNV=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food was AMAZING. Small business atmosphere with a very welcoming atmosphere. Absolutely worth going.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMiXzSby4oJvWi0VYfl_y8GcXBGKsCtlce-NFuk&fid=0x0:0x53d888b350705520"],"When":"2024-11-10"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Mahdiar Gh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVbIxetRDVxb-C_GJjhEaYdS4D5EVIHHK34qHyMTyC2jHR7z4zAiA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our cute little local cafe! Great coffee, tasty matcha drinks, and fresh pastries. They offer a variety of delicious pastries (donuts, croissants, scones, etc.) all made in house and taste with a perfect balance of flavors.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOl6yuvU6_EtqMNA81fziux6TgjSRA90jLuHZl1&fid=0x0:0x33de46bc8ae34156"],"When":"2024-10-14"},{"Name":"dhara sheth","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWux95rDd0ISs4pgNRpL-VH2xRtpmrr_-LiHCEtzqithAkJeZAqHw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Doe Coffee truly delivers on both quality and ambiance.
We ordered mocha with oat and almond milk, which was rich, velvety, and beautifully balanced. We also tried the Avocado Green Goddess, which was fresh, flavorful, and wonderfully creamy, adding a nice healthy option to the menu. The highlight was the matcha croissant which was light, flaky, and just the right touch of sweetness with that unique matcha flavor.
Overall, a delightful experience with friendly service and a cozy atmosphere.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipME-8pE3fpu8VZ0Erd0_lKOt6XtbBHOz83Cgws1&fid=0x0:0x33de46bc8ae34156"],"When":"2024-11-9"},{"Name":"Kenny Poon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWCkKTuOESfGudPEm0-BDzQVkIamalgjsSUzE_II9VRplB0iEEX=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cozy coffee spot with a good range of bakery items.
Went to this nicely curated coffee shop in mid July 2024, had both iced and hot milk coffee (iced Latte & Cortado). Tried the stuffed Green Tea croissant (a bit too sweet) but overall a good experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNOD387ZLoiQj1jkfZPLnZ1JMTisWzsm3yOK4YO&fid=0x0:0x33de46bc8ae34156"],"When":"2024-7-23"},{"Name":"Parm Poustchi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVUzuL6uQgOVPirf2JhL5jowm8hzjHya32BsOdNPYYmPw5Whog8oA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went there for the first time yesterday, and absolutely loved the iced oat matcha latte and iced hazelnut oat latte that we got! Pastries looked decent as well, glad to have found another great local coffee shop! Will be back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNomJb8UxgtHtzPic5mHd9PDlZxRL_CXRga9zZL&fid=0x0:0x33de46bc8ae34156"],"When":"2024-7-12"},{"Name":"Sydney","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXyAhXVXZiWUhybm01Jw9wnjnGadWPr_46iTxBSnjtGmOUbEvm8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Easily one of the best cafes I've been to in Van! I went a couple times and the coffee was perfect each time, and had their matcha croissant which was unreal & bursting with such perfectly crafted matcha filling as well as their turkey feta sandwich which was a very generous size. A new favorite!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMycL-thS_cbL1DJ7D0-FjohAGX72w6s_gRG_Bd&fid=0x0:0x33de46bc8ae34156"],"When":"2024-6-30"},{"Name":"Odessa C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVyBzvNpUWM6Nz96FiGhdupOQhAps0naHsh5WhBmhkCLue6BbKbcg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great coffee and food, though baked goods are pricier compared to other neighborhood cafes they are also better. I find the cookies too sweet, but the croissants are amazing.
Unfortunately, I don't go here often despite it being one of the closest cafes to where I live because I get my drinks to stay the atmosphere is a bit stark (concrete floors, boxes stacked at the back) and nothing to dampen noise so when someone starts chatting with the baristas it fills the whole space. It wouldn't take much to improve the atmosphere. I hope they do, because the products are quality and the staff are friendly.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Alan Zheng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL-QmMYfw75kgf5vonVt_7RAAdUJRl5hAF6Ijht6iC6ZE8aPQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A nice little spot for studying or catch up with a friend. The matcha drinks are very yummy as I believe their blend is from paragon tea (my fave)

The rotation of pastries are also quite yummy and worth trying","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN3uwtfoCSMjD1vnjR1pkjeEIXYR9zQGaWwBvya&fid=0x0:0x33de46bc8ae34156"],"When":"2024-8-25"},{"Name":"Monica Demers","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXWRL8Zg1N1mT6tD1GI63HQt-nGtljg8SGrZ9a-vgtg2OPcpN0=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Was pretty disappointed getting the double baked almond croissant. It seemed overly baked and on the verge of burning. Biting into the croissant, it was very crunchy and hard, as if it was deep fried. Then, the croissant was very hollow throughout. I was expecting a real croissant texture but couldn’t find it in this one. With the high pricing, I would not recommend getting this croissant. I recommend you to check if your baked item is not over baked if you’re getting anything from here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPW1MX4SuZJRZymFEcSpG-w0eBAN9n3SjXSB6hG&fid=0x0:0x33de46bc8ae34156"],"When":"2024-5-18"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Michelle Siaril","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVvNHVR_L-5eCK2usU0kQoT055SV9vB2qDNPyrA7CmG9QXO2IM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A nice surprise find in East Hastings area. Lots of green plants, mini art pieces, and a section dedicated to a cute artisanal shop. Really great ambiance to chill and catch up with friends. We had just eaten so just got some tea and chai latte. I wish the chai latte was stronger but this was definitely more a Western style take on the drink.

Apparently they can also accommodate special events so check them put if you are planning something!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNCh4axVe0RllISK3rU5kOKGvqopVobi92EFVI&fid=0x0:0xcb1f27ee3a5c6db0"],"When":"2024-7-31"},{"Name":"PTTN","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIVXQhrf96EsaD027m51yX-Uvc0Kdpt5n8uGLLy_w4vgEoUTTPd=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great depth of flavour in the matcha latte. The grizzly chai latte was beautifully spiced, highly recommend both. Also got a chocolate chip cookie. Cakey, but good flavour. Will definitely return to try other items.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP0GSREsXltdvQAyRQCdH0AMNzAjj57Ai9SvnsH&fid=0x0:0xcb1f27ee3a5c6db0"],"When":"2024-10-20"},{"Name":"Xanthe Hodge","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK6tpxKJO0m7g4ijB2m-MlSq5Jg3bxBUoWLmUv-IoporPrQ9r8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The Garden is one of the best places to visit in Strathcona. The cozy atmosphere and friendly service makes me feel right at home.

I’m a huge fan of their kale caesar salad, mushroom bowl, and delicious baked goods. Their menu is created with fresh, sustainably sourced ingredients which makes me love them even more.

If you’re looking for a cafe to enjoy tasty drinks and healthy food options, this is the place for you!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM9254c7NmIvSPyRtlChj4dzDlfUVbEgry_SAWK&fid=0x0:0xcb1f27ee3a5c6db0"],"When":"2024-6-20"},{"Name":"Dana Sullivan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWQIw-0oOUNgoyniYugTscGkgpKJS8tpx4V0tAajn3ZGkNIfqEk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A hidden oasis on E Hastings. Plants abound in the industrial but cozy interior. A corner is dedicated to a small craft and plant market. The tables have a 1 hour time limit when it's busy. The food menu focuses on local and organic ingredients. The menu is almost entirely vegetarian save for a ham and cheese sandwich, and within those vegetarian options, many are vegan or can be made vegan.
I ordered the 'chiken' salad sandwich ('chiken' made from soy curls), an oatmeal chocolate cookie, and a Hoochy Booch bellini kombucha on tap. The sandwich was great! The finely chopped soy curls in the salad had a great texture, and I loved the flavour pop from the cranberries. The sourdough bread was also excellent. The cookie was good - it was made with shredded coconut in addition to oats which made it crunchy and which I wasn't expecting, so it wasn't exactly what I hoped for, but if you like that texture, this would be great.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMiN1LqGDIXWdmdet6ZhTCfrlwXIENtQOMUVo8O&fid=0x0:0xcb1f27ee3a5c6db0"],"When":"2024-11-10"},{"Name":"Charles Danyliuk","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV23IS4l_cNSx-eIUSbrr8gyghcWLset3QVnU7RKhh5NT4DIvlm=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"absolutely lovely place that I stopped into for lunch. a little on the pricy side, but absolutely delicious. the rose cardamom latte is to die for and this place has a potato salad I actually like! definitely will bring friends here again","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNiN_KNKBvnRJE99I4qr-VLUgRUr3pNtAiTAkAD&fid=0x0:0xcb1f27ee3a5c6db0"],"When":"2024-4-20"},{"Name":"No MSG No Garlic Foodie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX-PVOn6GcWxsKb-qqVJDTqvJ5rfua5QVuFocwcMF-ZRwuEIPLm=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This was in my list of 'Want to Go' places. We were pleasantly surprised by the peaceful and comfortable atmosphere at The Garden. Being used to Yaletown Coffee shops which are typically high-energy places, it is nice to know that a tranquil coffee place exists not that far from Yaletown. They have a sitting room area with lots of plants arranged around a couch, a coffee table and a couple of chairs. Even though we didn't get to sit there, it is within our view at table 3, and we felt as though we were part of that space. Another thing I appreciated is the fact that they assign tables when you order the drinks – rather than the usual mad scramble for a seat in other crowded coffee shops. We were there for lunch, and it appears that the option for no garlic was quite limited. After consultation with the kitchen, the host offered a couple of options, one of which was a kale salad with custom vinaigrette, plus chicken if I preferred. That's what I ordered. It was a very delicious salad, and I would certainly go all the way there again just to have that salad again. We also ordered the breakfast sandwich which comes with potato salad. The espresso drinks were very well made, made with Agro Espresso, and very enjoyable. We will visit again! In fact, we did go back again the next week. I ordered the same salad and was surprised to find the chicken missing, so I asked for a side of chicken, and since I seemed to have no reaction previously, I thought it might be OK. But apparently, the chicken had been brined in garlic. Yuk. And because I did not have an oat latte before the food arrived, the garlic hit was kind strong enough that I decided we better go home instead of ordering coffee drinks, just to be safe. My partner ordered the lentil soup which contains garlic strong enough that he will probably not order it again. I was disappointed with the chicken the second time around because it was chewy and dry, not like the first time. Well, the hosts are very caring and lovely people, and it looks like lots of patrons are regulars and really enjoy their food. So, we hope that this place will flourish!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNUzQAXRYt1DbBalbVx6ne1ggARRTwJswWsGeuE&fid=0x0:0xcb1f27ee3a5c6db0"],"When":"2023-12-4"},{"Name":"Julia D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKWGHgIRg6UZB2wR1x2csycbI6ACHnuk_Z9bgnuPPHXuO-zSw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love the vibe, the atmosphere and plants in every corner that make me feel so relax and comfortable. Highly recommend to try vegan chocolate ( it tastes so real with coconut flakes inside) with some tea or salted chocochip cookie. Wish they have more seats in the future.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNm5yIVpRgRi2eaq5VhAaffrKW61C1afuGIx7Bu&fid=0x0:0xcb1f27ee3a5c6db0"],"When":"2024-3-13"},{"Name":"Kelly Hrelja","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUVWh8qmVdPEfqahFaQ6ox93SOukCBaQIQqwS9jEApuOOnHfC4ZzQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place has such a great atmosphere! It's very green, lush, and calming. The servers were incredibly kind as well. Well worth going out of your way for.

I appreciated all of the fresh and healthy food options offered. I got a green smoothie and their daily frittata on this visit, and will definitely be back to try more!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMkuMfCz3RqotNbPWFwr43qmGp_sGv7VD5iKimB&fid=0x0:0xcb1f27ee3a5c6db0"],"When":"2023-12-18"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Sim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU013h56BWbSQR2BVcwTIAyp30f7d3_77spZTgxKR0SWt3HMOLM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came for the bubble tea but was also really pleasantly surprised by their tea ice creams! And they have melon pan ice cream sandwiches too. Haven’t seen these unique offerings anywhere else!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPaSSA46gVQc1vW9mnAMmYaeuGGSWojI31IL2pS&fid=0x0:0x80e674875295adf"],"When":"2024-10-7"},{"Name":"Maureen Zheng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJveuMK98eNTFiH47Fc3q63NS_Ymf2pm_8GByP3XP5IYJAxNQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We are super lucky to have a bubble tea shop of this quality and price point in Burnaby. They use their own brand of microground tea powders and it makes a huge difference. Hands down my fave bubble tea shop. Don't skip out on their daily deals, especially the $5 milk tea ice cream floats on Wednesdays. I also enjoy all their fruit tea lattes (e.g. matcha strawberry, matcha guava). I get oat milk - it's an upcharge but worth it. I don't adjust the sweetness levels in any of the drinks - they're the perfect amount of sweetness for me and my kids (we usually get half sweet at regular chain bbt stores).","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOobSe-t59YeERxwFBfezSnrGhgcTY8zhpnssfJ&fid=0x0:0x80e674875295adf"],"When":"2024-7-18"},{"Name":"Mina Go","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUjQGl-uPkA5TdD-5LQLwibR14sOPPqEz16J3m81TNE6ThpOxW_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Omg I have been living nearby for 5 years, but we just noticed this awesome milk tea place.. after we found this place, we keep saying, i want to drink that milk tea 🧋  lol. Best milk tea place in my life!!! Highly recommended!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMGrP2r8t1mPsSctSSFit2rMLYXX0obNed7YKAE&fid=0x0:0x80e674875295adf"],"When":"2024-9-7"},{"Name":"Amy Yu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW0vY_bbxBdOXTgSKqd-VBiokRu7okdrNGfRrGXrd_XTN8ia1bz=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Teaspoons is my go-to spot for amazing drinks! Their bubble tea is delicious, and the Japanese stone-milled tea is so unique and flavorful. Highly recommend for any tea lover!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO5GFfAuRTsvxQdg_uy3N75eNnJqcqaAn6Sy0f2&fid=0x0:0x80e674875295adf"],"When":"2024-11-29"},{"Name":"Jonny","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJShSgCHbmme6GLETHZczdb6MWGsJKCwpKUqZlkj3SXYWukfA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Teaspoons & Co. started off selling DIY bubble tea kits. Besides BBT, they also have ice cream, melon pans and milled tea. The inside is cute but only two tables (four chairs). Drinks are in the $6.25 to $6.95 range.

- Guava matcha ($6.70) - subbed for oat milk ($0.70). Way too much ice. Guava was prominent, balanced well with the matcha.
- Hojicha milk tea latte ($6.40) - roasted note was nice, but again too much ice.
- Strawberry jasmine ($6.70) - not much jasmine flavour. Our least favourite.
- Oasis slush ($6.70) with pearls ($0.70) and lychee jelly ($0.70) - standard fruit slush but on the sweet side. Would get half sweet.

Decent BBT at T&C. 3.5 stars.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMlYQrXMC3639wnvorM7iHAxwu0LfE0er7pjC_i&fid=0x0:0x80e674875295adf"],"When":"2024-6-7"},{"Name":"Cynthia S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIxcChp-HWyxv_b0AyWqKEdRXph6ely8kALSP_Ith1JqQIJkdHT=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of my fav bubble tea spots in the city! The drinks are always fresh and staff is super friendly! My fav drink to get in the summer is the passion mango ❤️ looking forward to trying some of their new mochis!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMXx1d9h_IgaagRU3ATDC2_P3rlnGxvTWJN3Qjh&fid=0x0:0x80e674875295adf"],"When":"2024-9-9"},{"Name":"Alan Zheng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL-QmMYfw75kgf5vonVt_7RAAdUJRl5hAF6Ijht6iC6ZE8aPQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cute little hole in the wall bubble tea place on Hastings. The have their own branded matcha powders and their drinks overall are quite yummy as well.

They are currently doing $5 drink deals as well :) so a good time to give them a try","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMnvhNsHioPB14A_2xrQbxnuIZA8xIykZW6reTI&fid=0x0:0x80e674875295adf"],"When":"2024-7-20"},{"Name":"flip fast","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLTSYHcuTmWXErziueLsgjxb7Z3l6hZoJoKKROlb6SZnYqA5w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The only place in Metro Vancouver that gives me the authentic bubble fruit tea flavor. I love it and highly recommend it, always satisfying with every visit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipONKma3OUir2X1AuZDWpCKNofcBgfsiDXgdzSr7&fid=0x0:0x80e674875295adf"],"When":"2024-9-27"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Karen Lo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWVy7IKDgoBu5-GpgCOSD4cGeZrgQ2WNTZ5s54ZY-vysf5NoRKzIQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Their Japanese curry bun is the best, eat it warm! The crust is crunchy and airy, the filling is very flavourful, I don’t think there’s any other place in Vancouver that does it like this or as good.

Houjicha latte is worth it — I got it to go and it was perfect at the 25% sweet 😋","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMgDn2M6am_k2jlUk-TIhPie_rwU5cX3FGeUEMx&fid=0x0:0x14cff9d0fad4f508"],"When":"2024-11-16"},{"Name":"Philip Raymond Lim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5EIBAgpBLsauhPMdjXym7mJ4fA8mtryDtWQIJCZfJxYXxupU8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Kanadell Japanese Bakery was kawaii and delicious! I enjoyed their adorable food and drinks, which were as tasty as how the cute these guys look. I usually don’t like Nanaimo bars because they’re too sweet, but theirs was an exception—perfectly balanced and enjoyable. Good price too.

I would recommend you to give it a try! 🙂👍","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNZlplCIynb06R_TQ72ltQfORgd7XuxRLo6hAth&fid=0x0:0x14cff9d0fad4f508"],"When":"2024-10-13"},{"Name":"Jimmie Mitchell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVXR6wUm0lgZgvSi7C1j6GOl0shdaQgFTP7c5sE96BI6AUiQT_P=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The beef bun was so crunchy and fresh. One of best I’ve had. Iced latte was good too.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP-v9ViOsPAhvTZbBSSqOpqEM2sYFMeE2Y2VD3w&fid=0x0:0x14cff9d0fad4f508"],"When":"2024-12-19"},{"Name":"A.J. Canadian","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU0mITu_1OR_MuXzhVIkPjHjZnimy2Y-mI64r72OA1Zbucah6-N=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love popping my head into Kanadell Japanese Bakery when I have time. I love the warm and fresh curry buns (curry pan) when available, they sell out fast! They have many delicious bakery items and offer interesting products. They have a comfortable seating area, always clean and have friendly attentive staff. A must visit if in the area, recommended.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPmroGuYoH2O2ZiGu_kThZrti9Y4DOYGN9owj5_&fid=0x0:0x14cff9d0fad4f508"],"When":"2024-4-14"},{"Name":"Andrew Chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJNZ_pvkQlgvJLQf8OH0R8SwU4mnsFF1lvTcdlboJ-4DK-Pr7bb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Kanadell Japanese Bakery on Hastings is a wonderful place to indulge in delicious Japanese treats. The bakery offers a wide variety of pastries, all made with the highest quality ingredients. From their fluffy and perfectly baked melon pan to their creamy and flavorful matcha cream puffs, every bite is a delight. The staff is friendly and attentive, providing excellent customer service. The bakery's cozy atmosphere and inviting decor make it a pleasant place to enjoy a pastry and a cup of tea. Whether you're a fan of traditional Japanese sweets or looking to try something new, Kanadell Japanese Bakery is definitely worth a visit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMMRVxFlkUS1-gqQCOfhh0nmufJw4IYu2_8g7x3&fid=0x0:0x14cff9d0fad4f508"],"When":"2024-1-21"},{"Name":"Joanne Shih","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXximxdR2J0MX38SMpQXvX83o69PGyHXNObNbbK0mDK-tz8T9Z6=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Went in around early afternoon. There was a small line up in the store, but everyone was patient, waiting for the two staff helping each customer. There’s a calm and tranquil atmosphere. Staff were a little slow yet friendly, kind and attentive.

Got some pastries to-go and had it at home. It’s the taste that reminds me of authentic Asian bakeries😋","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPQY1XXRhGTAXdhkkP7ov1s-Wxf3LJ-5g6j6mf7&fid=0x0:0x14cff9d0fad4f508"],"When":"2024-3-13"},{"Name":"Lovely S.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX7xoM1zT9WiqfQxKv2Onh75nMfS-FrL-b_Frj5CutzGfpczw8q5w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of my favourite cafe serving baked goods and meals.  I've had a lot of their menu items and I've never been disappointed.  The curry bun was amazing and my favourite.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMIUiBTBrEl4q_wlmqmqb1F96FUbjl7wG1IkCKo&fid=0x0:0x14cff9d0fad4f508"],"When":"2024-4-22"},{"Name":"May Zhagro","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU9KviWdU_UGm6yjKPv-6aFaljm1EC_ecrxYhnt_LO3duiyBNho=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Small bakery specializing the Japanese bakery items. There are a few areas for seating and the whole cafe is well decorated. We tried the Japanese curry pan and the melon pan and both were so delicious. The Japanese curry pan was deep fried on the outside with warm Japanese curry on the inside. The melon pan was sweet on the outside and soft on the inside. We bought our two items and sat in the bakery to eat them both. There are street parking all around this area.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOJPoanebVpYGZ8mhJnX3XUVWfhNb5Nh_RCXcBL&fid=0x0:0x14cff9d0fad4f508"],"When":"2023-7-23"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Linda Huynh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJULBJVa4IqPnZaoD2l1RctTtz9hoxAr_VwxVSsCLAJ5ScENQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good bubble tea shop with fun toppings/korean flavours. We tried more classic options. I just happen to have noticed a Hong Kong Style milk tea and it was the daily special $5 - not too strong, 50% sweet, it was perfect! Added boba $0.50, it was a good pick. Genmaicha latte was good too, but I liked the hot HK milk tea again. Focus on the taste, they seem to no longer have the custom branded cups (or run out). The small sitting area is still pretty cute.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP5x-07xcYic6plxwHdve4RhIBp2gTM6J-VSMpB\u0026fid=0x0:0x2231c9d9e0f076d5"],"When":"2024-10-26"},{"Name":"tikki","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWzV_Y6bQFjodBKC8anq5nBVFmCTC7hA6Nh7xklFQuKGefK40A_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"One of my favourite bubble tea shops in town. The quality is decent and the service is always great as well. I recently fell in love with the summer special - peach matcha latte and it is refreshing and not overly sweet.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNgQJV-q6rAcbT8HZRm7z9kGh8EaXOhY8VMyLyA\u0026fid=0x0:0x2231c9d9e0f076d5"],"When":"2024-7-2"},{"Name":"Sofia Kingsley","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVscMfV773tiAinmQb8EmCQe8fupb_zckAC6DxPMjzxzAvwQEER=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"very cute! unique drinks. the hojicha latte was very good, and the regular boba complemented the taste. tried the strawberry matcha latte and it was good but not anything special. Crystal boba wasn’t for me as it was very hard but chewy at the same time. It sucks that they cannot do no ice with the drinks as well, just less ice. BAKD cookies were great- recommend the peanut butter chocolate!\n\nTLDR: recommend hojicha latte w regular boba. strawberry matcha was mid, crystal boba was mid. they can’t do no ice. recommend peanut butter cookie from BAKD","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMDjfTpIvvNSOkqSepymY_lmYfNIVwnZoSTHkof\u0026fid=0x0:0x2231c9d9e0f076d5"],"When":"2024-7-9"},{"Name":"Rhodes Family","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVUlN1n3pAekvjp51e2hLJxijqWk6fkyD3R5wi0vtHWK6uqt4ItsQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Yummy boba drinks. They have vegan and vegetarian drinks which is helpful. The employees were friendly and helpful since I had never been there before.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNI4iJ5_-6C1I7PosZjnZ2aUGklJU6w-r6UqGSg\u0026fid=0x0:0x2231c9d9e0f076d5"],"When":"2024-11-17"},{"Name":"Audrey T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVt7NSeCmrDxjN6eGFiHdOku-giePvd1JuUbLyAEp6odBtHY6vv=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Lovely spot for the classic strawberry matcha. Be sure to give it a good stir. There’s some seating but it can get quite tight. Be sure to check out their daily specials for $5! I’ll be back to check out some other teas.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMluaNXNA8yNp4MGIWQmdUB2VqdwHoBXjHs1N1M\u0026fid=0x0:0x2231c9d9e0f076d5"],"When":"2024-6-20"},{"Name":"M T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLLOGJkEWBSLVUKV8HLY3_F7YgBHHAdxVPV1lwnZP4eGc5c_HYP=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This bubble tea shop is so cute and the drinks are delicious. It is accessible by transit. Parking is a little bit difficult near this location so I would revoking parking elsewhere and walking over. I tried the jolly Polly shake and it was amazing. I would definitely be coming back when it’s warmer. I am excited to see what other new drinks they introduce. The interior is also very cute.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOnvSPhJLeGke_KLLLyingFxWz8dezFw-zq0SKt\u0026fid=0x0:0x2231c9d9e0f076d5"],"When":"2022-4-6"},{"Name":"Mars","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWHtjcjaWQzqHOLzQxnithsAhAEbGsw7p50S0nVK1aNY3FFQevV=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hands down one of my favourite bubble tea shops in vancouver, love coming here, i always get their dalgona latte but today i tried their strawberry matcha, it didn’t disappoint. loving coming here!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMRSxhDy_c4XOHkPnExZ0g_ic-btZoTQjtdpyvM\u0026fid=0x0:0x2231c9d9e0f076d5"],"When":"2024-8-4"},{"Name":"May Zhagro","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU9KviWdU_UGm6yjKPv-6aFaljm1EC_ecrxYhnt_LO3duiyBNho=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Cute shop with Instagram worthy drinks. There is a big menu board on the wall but more drinks are listed in their menu. We got the assam tea with pearls with 25% sugar as our standard bubble tea beverage. The tea taste wasn’t as strong and the beverage was more watery than milky. A little bit disappointed based on how pretty the drink looked. The pearls were good, soft and chewy with some sweetness. Easy to pass when walking by so make sure to look out for the signage at the front.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPH5rPm1KaAiSX5eDfXIRhrON0UC7dBzDNXjSBa\u0026fid=0x0:0x2231c9d9e0f076d5"],"When":"2023-12-10"}]
