user_reviews:
[{"Name":"C T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUgS9_N3RvGRzjGP4q0CjRyk4CzxkTzB4cNEPmyEXeU-p7IBoH2mQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This matcha shop is an absolute gem! If you’re a fan of matcha or hojicha, this place will blow your mind. I popped in when they were featuring a black sesame latte (yes, it was as dreamy as it sounds), and it quickly became my go-to drink—smooth, rich, and just the right balance of flavors.

Now, let’s talk about the hojicha mochi bubble waffle. OMG, it was perfection! The hojicha flavor was subtle yet distinct, and not too sweet, which I loved. It’s seriously one of the best bubble waffles I’ve ever had—crispy on the outside, chewy mochi on the inside, and full of flavor.

The shop itself? Adorable! It’s got that cute, cozy vibe that makes you want to stay forever. The minimalist interior is super welcoming—whether you’re chilling with friends, enjoying some “me time,” or bringing your laptop to get some work done, it’s the perfect spot. And can we talk about the customer service? They’re so patient and friendly, always ready to walk you through their menu and make sure you get exactly what you’re craving.

It’s become my must-visit whenever I’m in Vancouver, and trust me, you’ll want to keep coming back too!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNEHA6YJVhoceFj6end3lccfCIjcq2JsFKRrlrP&fid=0x0:0x2e91688a80857f54"],"When":"2024-10-1"},{"Name":"Clare Wang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXk8vaI8odicOm4apSk77_C5_lBI2gd1LxngMFranmQFokEsPvD-w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The fall special hojicha with the black sesame/salt (?) rim was nice. I liked the hojicha itself though next time probably will forgo the salt rim as this was quite heavy. Will be back to try more of their drinks!

Also bought a bag their dark roast hojicha and the flavor profile definitely came through when i brewed jt at home. Strong and chocolatety on its own hence their recommendation to add milk.

Not much seating though inside","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPPdzNU1O5C31s8OqpzflonWlwAs807-kgMBNDR&fid=0x0:0x2e91688a80857f54"],"When":"2024-11-12"},{"Name":"CHAN256 Family","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLNqzBCXUvFYQA3YSmfJ_Vr7L6z3p03v_VYUa3Nh9nZ5zWGdQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Can’t find same quality tea latte elsewhere. The genmaicha tea latte + jasmine jelly was so good! Bubble waffles were super good too, even better than most I could find in Hong Kong. I tried chocolate chip & cheese mochi and they were gone within minutes. Hope we can try all other flavors next time!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOzhYyGImC_w-Ch6lP8HDzZTR38n2e-POnmmFRr&fid=0x0:0x2e91688a80857f54"],"When":"2024-10-10"},{"Name":"Eugene Cheng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUmM27LVAwUnjsRBLpVGHAAi1QmWt1PlTco9Nls_u7lduyoXIjq=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Authentic no frills matcha shop. I got both the matcha latte and mango hojicha and both were made to order with the utmost care. Drinking both you could tell the quality of the matcha power and hojicha are top notch. Both had oat milk as the default, tastes great! Some tea shops that have oat milk result in the oat overpowering the tea but this was definitely not the case here. Worth a visit if around the area!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPqrRu0ATLHsKBGoM1QXHHPgcE7cGHk2MQhHP5x&fid=0x0:0x2e91688a80857f54"],"When":"2024-10-30"},{"Name":"grace","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXclLzFOZebBq0D1P6DXbTNuAdCFzeYlMZFVvgi1A5VbWvym50Z=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"saw this beautiful store on tiktok a while ago and always wanted to check it out. I've never had hojicha oat tea before, so I didn't know what to expect but it was amazing! the flavor was perfect; not overly sweet, yet it had a very nice flavor. the pearls were also perfectly chewy!  we also got the matcha chocolate, and it was delicious.
another thing about this place that I love is how beautiful and aesthetic the interior is inside, and how nice the overall presentation of their food is!!
i love this place, it's definitely worth coming back :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMKykzQkyK1LglVH4_8XgmdKtOxFCbTYI24LaKn&fid=0x0:0x2e91688a80857f54"],"When":"2024-6-30"},{"Name":"Ting-Yu Cheng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXlodVKIQ8_dmfGPXSY9bPBrYe1KhcRgWKeM1WOBzrhDpGlDdnb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My go-to tea place😍here’s my top 3
1. Thai Tea Oat (cold)
Best Thai milk tea I’ve had, usually it tastes more milky, but this one has strong tea flavor! I asked for 3 pumps of sugar only.
2. Hojicha Oat (hot)
Not many places in Canada has hojicha. You can find it here. Hot hojicha tastes stronger than cold one.
3. Matcha Oat (cold)
It tastes good but standard.

I personally don’t recommend to get pearls, they’re too soft. Also don’t get the croissants if you don’t like too sweet. Thought their bubble waffles with mochi are worth to get🥰","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipONGFVJntsSTaPXCr6yZM2SsxOzNe8-ofLO2zh8&fid=0x0:0x2e91688a80857f54"],"When":"2023-7-6"},{"Name":"Chloe Chloe","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIb0YSa6wZyDpN6F0vZFHOWjsTJMmhw-oInA8MulhfzrZVG9A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"this is my go to place whenever I have a crave for matcha latte. wish they had an option for dairy milk bc I'm not quite a fan of matcha with oat/soy milk. maybe they do, I was just lazy to ask🤷🏻‍♀️ I personally prefer their iced matcha than the hot one.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOwlQRsNe2kvoJW88K7ECTF5mi7LD_75VtqNxWh&fid=0x0:0x2e91688a80857f54"],"When":"2024-12-6"},{"Name":"Dahlia Thomas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJuQgMiJgQQUWXUpX_vLBTDbbMkB1XyhSnpGj8rW2JxPqajVg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I got the Thai oat milk tea with pearls and the black sesame mochi bubble waffle. Very yummy! I don't see many places that have Thai tea so as soon as I saw it I had to get it. The flavor was great and the pearls were good. I got less sweet and less ice which is nice to have adjustments. The waffle was crispy and then the chewy mochi. But not too crispy or chewy, a nice balance of both that was not overwhelming. The black sesame was also good.

Staff are super friendly and not long to wait at all. Atmosphere is cute, limited seating but cozy. I will come back here again to try their matcha!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOq5fyMbAH7jv4KHKkTSPwO-UL-HekI-viQNK2e&fid=0x0:0x2e91688a80857f54"],"When":"2024-7-19"}]

[{"Name":"Caylynne T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJhtKbMuZFwZMdF29KT4KMNzbKtEHm6REfXS3AyCFDXyexdKw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Got our passport pictures taken here as well as some bubble tea — amazing photos and delicious tea! He let us look at the photos before printing & print quality was great! Very knowledgeable about all the photo requirements & great set up — come here over London Drugs 👍","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOX7J8EzjqlaYTG0b_ikaE_XisJyLafjHPbr5Pn&fid=0x0:0xe10b9cc8169eeb1b"],"When":"2024-12-22"},{"Name":"Dobes Vandermeer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWdxx-6tVvFNMG36x6sOKb384Q1VwkvP5g0ML4FNsgVyZMtmEdo8g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Bubble tea was tasty.  It would be nice to have fresh milk available.  Exterior looks more like a photo store than a cafe, but when you get inside it's okay.  Definitely a place that's more about grab and go than hanging out inside.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ryan walton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocItcZAMnnkHbucOR2tsRSsmA4ppeef2axkKQYhkRm6j4Nr30A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We needed to get a passport photo for our baby boy. First we went to London Drugs, but they said "ahhh he's pretty small. You guys should go to Angelove Photo Studio." And I'm glad we did!

The owner was super helpful and patient. He spent several minutes trying to get a good photo of our 2 week old boy because he was sleepy and didn't want to wake up. But the owner was determined and had a great attitude and in the end--we got a nice photo!

After that, I got a bubble tea and it was delicious! I'd give Angelove Photo Studio 10 stars if I could!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMVZR1U5zDwlLsF4Cs8ubCqcVmC2R9HfDjvWKjU&fid=0x0:0xe10b9cc8169eeb1b"],"When":"2023-9-23"},{"Name":"hvtaske","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUv_N8euyWMS5DW5TfoIGxKBK7YRReohAKKxGkVYGUU6cD-9us=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Incredibly nice owner! Got my photo here done and I was not sure if I want a copy of electronic ones, he suggested me not to waste my money on something might not come in handy...
Sad I didn't have any bubble tea this time, but I'll definitely come back just for it!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Dan van der Ster","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVHjqF4kYsN-vh0CQt_uPms0hqJRg1Zbuxo22HB7x0LZqQm8ieFgw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Shhh, this is the secret spot for the best bubble tea, slushes, smoothies, and passport photos in the city.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM8E2hkZmG6TL51GXitKc5wCLVUQ-mrIjzQWDXc&fid=0x0:0xe10b9cc8169eeb1b"],"When":"2024-7-19"},{"Name":"Vinci Lai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ3l2uKjezJ_f6jmMGKxzu7GoSKVlmFCO2r3Q1p8d4IjrOja8TF=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love this bbt tea shop! It’s a classic mom and pop shop that’s attached to a photography shop as well. The owner is very attentive, friendly, and professional! He makes sure to fill up your cup to perfection which is awesome. I got the fresh mango bbt which he makes right in front of you! Will definitely be coming back here to support this local business especially since their rent keeps getting upped :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOxgij6aA9ryhOY1gQo5kG3h6rFfSigFji5Hcsl&fid=0x0:0xe10b9cc8169eeb1b"],"When":"2022-11-24"},{"Name":"Walker Adair","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIoO7KX6SUH-0EBCAh5pjurNMUDV3URb3rypWxu3DEpbWpiLA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious mango milk slush bubble tea and very friendly owner. Definitely a wonderful little gem","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNRj0cuZA7ucmHQ9paELlFMOxfi7qpEW1sWT-pL&fid=0x0:0xe10b9cc8169eeb1b"],"When":"2024-9-22"},{"Name":"Melisa Pizzolato","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKDkvIMn4xQ3KMPjL5eNN3ZV25JpzOgkJebSaH32FJVu5iR59xT=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Got my 7 week old daughter’s passport photos done here and the owner was awesome!! He was sooo good with her, got all kinds of shots and the final picture was just perfect.
Highly recommend here for your passport photos and bubble tea! Quick turn around and awesome to support a local business.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Leslie Ngo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWy4prG9zC06GQVwfW5XW99I_e-35MyO4tIy1Trq9RLD0fbMwOv=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We occasionally visit this location on Saturdays so the review is based on that date. The atmosphere is lively and busy, with a variety of goods and drinks at reasonable prices. There are doughnuts, cake pieces, coffee, sandwiches and cookies. The staff behind the counter greeted and provided quick service. They usually take people's orders and send the food or drinks to the pay area while someone in front of the line is making a transaction. However, during busy times, there may not be available seating as knowing how popular Breka is, seating is limited. The ambience can also get loud so if you want a quiet place, this won't be it. There is also Rapid Bus in front of the bakery too.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNYMvkW4dpIqXVK4uctNpqrtfKFaj0W2osYPDL4&fid=0x0:0x13969b44901a3b7c"],"When":"2024-11-26"},{"Name":"Dvir M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUxK6vUXIZPF_mBYpyYRstLoQm3iHWCiUkMzdVCeCCrurOmcIbk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love Breka! But this new location…. They took it to the next level. Everything is so clean (like in the other locations), super organized and spacious. I do really love the design of this place. I was parking on the street pay parking so easily 1/2 a block away. To me it’s the closet location which makes my life super easy. The stuff was super nice and efficient. Definitely my new favourite location. The food is so consistent.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP3Fuxi_6xffw6NkINqpECJKz4_z2bOprKO50U3&fid=0x0:0x13969b44901a3b7c"],"When":"2024-12-7"},{"Name":"Ryan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWCDMUY42ah4aAgta84ssT2DYa3PFsR3r4fbxhBdcs3AXShIgTOYw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Super friendly and attentive staff and great selection. Very reasonable prices for today’s cafe scene. We bought 3 desserts to bring home but will definitely come back here on my next work-from-home day. Lots of seating and tables.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOnMrpg0BCty88a1o-EFwY4ssdUCQlIFnFeuzCo&fid=0x0:0x13969b44901a3b7c"],"When":"2024-12-14"},{"Name":"Heather Chatterton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL7IfedKSn_eOIC8drcusP2ZP2fmQV5HK2K0Y50okRIFlF0Xg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ohhhh geeez‼️‼️This place IS absolutely fantastic‼️‼️😲✅️✅️ OPEN 24 hrs!! There WILL be lineups outside SOON at THIS bakery location which is newer here on Hastings-but we have been several times to the location on Main St where the lineups are out the doors -and it IS just as FANTASTIC here↘️⬇️↙️. The pictures I have taken of here will SHOW you their beautiful, VERY fresh offerings- and LARGE selection-whether it is baked sweet goods, cookies, breads, sandwiches, wraps, cakes, doughnuts, etc, etc! Craveable-OH MY✅️✅️‼️‼️🤯  NOT at ALL like those other fake, crunchy sugar, empty foam-like, spongy airy cakes- with greasy icing- like so many other places. GREAT tasting deli-type items are fresh daily- and tasty too! Great Quality ALL- in everything they offer! It is SO CLEAN here too, and has a happy friendly, bright vibe/atmosphere, with pleasant staff! NO BULL! PLEASE TRY THIS place yourself 😍🤩!  Their coffee as well is SO good-AND  they also have some great other types of drinks! The prices are VERY fair also! 👏🙌🫶 Hands down- THE best bakery around❤️!  Kids welcome too! It is in a "friendly shopping village" like area..LOVE it folks!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM6_Y0ibtwDk-IngSDoiP6sdFOs6YG_kHVKoQis&fid=0x0:0x13969b44901a3b7c"],"When":"2024-10-21"},{"Name":"Ghazal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWUxPjakfUDfUlOphLX0NHrhY3j03bOfl1WB2qtK88VIEBoxSUc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lots of options for sweets and sandwiches.
Cozy seating area to get some work done or to hang out with friends.
Both the hot chocolate and the London fog were good and the sandwiches were delicious.
It’s a 24/7 cafe so you’ll have a place to go anytime!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO_-32OJUFbbf8vVUogq2SDFNDS9QHhKqi98qQK&fid=0x0:0x13969b44901a3b7c"],"When":"2024-9-8"},{"Name":"Ryan Bailey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWPHNuIcNmK_Kd-CxIkh2Y_W_BDUCa9OBLtfuE0M4coI1tPvHXD=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"They opened this location about six months ago. I have been maybe four or five times because I am happier with and would prefer to give my money to the the real cafés throughout  Hastings-Sunrise. The only reason that I have gone to this business is because sometimes I get off work late and would like to order something to eat…over the months that I have gone both the service and the quality of the food have dropped off significantly.

The staff seems super burned out. The food has become worse and worse. Today they were out of soup and the grilled sandwich that I opted for was ice cold. Also, there are flavors on my sandwich that should not even be there which leads me to believe that they don’t even scrape their sandwich press (or change gloves/wash hands) in between orders. I do not eat pork or beef. My sandwich that I ordered should not taste like pork. I wish they would’ve steered clear of my consciousness neighborhood instead of blowing up the scene

The photo I’ve shared shows a tuna “melt”.  It’s stodgy and gross and cold. I threw it out. I’ve never been to a Breka before they opened this location, but my mouth is forever soured and I will never spend money there again. Been a few times too many, I’ll never ever be back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP9e7CNIhxA134XYSlxgIuG_CL_3nF46iQ8Uyex&fid=0x0:0x13969b44901a3b7c"],"When":"2024-11-10"},{"Name":"TS OS","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIrxJ8Fjd3bGSI8mWbF186RbFWyg_DW73VTS3OIkFaxPfXFBEQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fairly good location, larger than DT locations, bit more seatings and spaces. Coffee here are fairly priced and so are the bakeries. Of course it isn’t easy to find seatings as a lot of laptop people occupy seats but still should be better than other locations as it offers bit more seatings.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNiS-kmkTtOn4Os4fbmy4jvvRtyKT6MNnESMW3u&fid=0x0:0x13969b44901a3b7c"],"When":"2024-11-10"},{"Name":"Helen Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUl7PCZ3rGLZXnZXZwilHTvUsPqLoQnegEvnEU_BSqqnkOh_Dy-Zg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We ordered the turkey sandwich, spinach and artichoke croissant and the breakfast croissant.  We asked to have it heated and everything was burnt. First time to Breka will be our last","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPEkZLaZGc-YBKq8Le3Nbz54j3oP2skuexZHvmj&fid=0x0:0x13969b44901a3b7c"],"When":"2024-10-16"}]

I bought a couple of drinks and needed to drive back right away. Unfortunately, the lid was just so tight and couldn't get the lip pout off and even tried it with my hand. It was just a very annoying situation. It was not their fault as it was the cup manufacturing. I hope they also test their stuff.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNxNLrqZUAXd8TgE-5hcXC5G5eaSnWtM3ZjHUlX&fid=0x0:0x51896215569cc3c5"],"When":"2024-10-16"},{"Name":"smile crafts","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVIb7zN2G_KSOloZj9rsHowXaCMuAaWaFQLau7K9JNwnF7Xa0hO=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the cutest cafe I've seen in Vancouver. Will visit again 💕💕🌷","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNLYmzHDxvSnOTqfjLnqN1GCCdvojoXSmqrg8Y0&fid=0x0:0x51896215569cc3c5"],"When":"2024-11-15"},{"Name":"Morgan Ayres","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLxO4EwpFEc6oER6-aSyHbs6PPgq8pSRPD-T1lJEBH4lqu1Gw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Every time I visit the service is so sweet and genuine! I love this amazing cute community cafe with delicious coffee, bubble tea and you must try the baos!  So good!  Visit this cute, local cafe and you will not be disappointed!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO-oOd6AQ4HltdDzWuEXhqeb4zRTn9cytSAQ9VA&fid=0x0:0x51896215569cc3c5"],"When":"2024-10-16"},{"Name":"Coco Mok","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKrIfzty64fVqj_ciVECKf3eDJkcYnnD1NaQ8ugSybIV2RUAQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cran-ky turkey sandwich was made fresh-to-order and may be in my top 10 sandwiches","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNzx7cHvsx48bN4s1ZymQm966poJqoYvxXxhHoW&fid=0x0:0x51896215569cc3c5"],"When":"2024-8-20"},{"Name":"Scotty Stewart","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWMUugFeNJnOCHS7GuzAIcIwn2cZ5jV0Gjg-YeP62bQ6HjIjxTT=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"what a cute little cafe hidden in plain sight on corner of  commercial drive and Commercial ST. ( Victoria st)

Blue Horizon smoothie saved my day.

very chill friendly vibe.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPLm9hA0SdQ4knRNH_cELwIX-zbASig04V5Ny52&fid=0x0:0x51896215569cc3c5"],"When":"2024-7-30"},{"Name":"Morgan Ayres","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVB7WHX0qGMkLmXSQOKzZfGez1sTkCruYe-_rIQq4DI7GwDNTNeIg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing local cute Café with the friendliest staff and so many delicious drinks! We loved the Vietnamese coffee and the mango milt bubble too. So good!  Don't forget the delicious (and addictive) boas and croissant (we tried almond and it was the best we've ever had!)  Highly recommend and shop local!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPx4RODX5ZBEl9bMfvwnMp6ZDzptM2PtyvwbsnX&fid=0x0:0x51896215569cc3c5"],"When":"2023-9-24"},{"Name":"Navdeep Kaur","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW1mt9v0urs5P-lIPYhgEMlB-0kY68AN2-2yW0XIWmoysUIQsYJ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I always go there when I need to study or catch up with my friend. Service is amazing, they are so good at recognizing their customers and remember what they order along with that the music is so soothing, seating area is sweet. They have big windows where u can sit near and enjoy the view.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Darell Mcbride","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXDgM3LB_6bUb8Sdl0lKMDB_UD_d6-KkNR6UEBsbycRC1rvk08=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Very expensive bad filtered coffee that took a really long time. Update: After seeing the fantastic response by management and their pledge to address quality issues, I revisited on may 13. Good coffee and speedy service. user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Dr. Tse","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX1c97-meBhhJqxDvPj4fmZwUaEh_PPmcuc2SOSOUOWDAGqU11h8w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My first time at Adonia salon was perfect and I was celebrating my birthday with a High English Tea! Adorable place, super attentive staff, high quality and fresh finger food! I and my friend ordered the Mini tea which is quite satisfactory, for lunch time. When you call to reserve a table tell the staff if you want the lunch from the menu or the high tea. Recommended.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMiNDhqYxP5beeqiMuNJIE46Y1gOXqS2n6gg6Gl&fid=0x0:0x9663a4eb1eadadb6"],"When":"2024-11-5"},{"Name":"Nansey Sinclaire","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU3tQn_fA_BNKIwh3-MYhB8_lgEBNsRFHsENg2dPmK_6vab97g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fabulous! Absolutely Fabulous!
My daughter and I came to Vancouver for a few days as a summer vacation from Vancouver Island.
We researched the options in advance to go have High Tea somewhere.
We booked reservations and inquired if they were wheelchair accessible.

It was a little tricky to get in the door to the table that had been reserved for us because of the size of her power chair.

They were helpful and over the top accommodating to figure out how to get into the space in a stress free manner so that nothing got broken or knocked over as we had to move the table and chairs.

Our server was as sweet as could be, friendly, kind and courteous.

We indulged in the mini tea service which included 8 servings of various sandwiches and treats.

We wouldn’t have had room in our tummies had we ordered 12!

The food was beyond delicious!

The tea delectable. There are an incredible selection of teas.

It would be a fun to take an order to go and pop it into a picnic basket and head to the beach or your favourite park.

Except you would miss the fun of the individual tea pots and the tea cups.

It’s been the highlight of our day and we highly recommend it.

We will come back again on our next excursion to the big city!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM12tOisXgHRrm4ZdGMNsp7QVRr-JZOPgXhXZ8D&fid=0x0:0x9663a4eb1eadadb6"],"When":"2024-8-16"},{"Name":"Kiran S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXlL8MVaLkTsfsq-e3DjECHREsgUgRlVDc_sZT22tRm2fUnodY0XA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very cute little tea house that’s totally worth the price. We had a baby sprinkle here for about 16 ladies and they were super accommodating! I had people cancel last minute and they didn’t charge me. The food is delicious and it’s better than most high tea spots here in Vancouver! You get a decent amount of food that will keep you full and the teas are great!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOR5dj2dJEiNJ7M7yEUlXPLPA7LfhPpzZ67zJea&fid=0x0:0x9663a4eb1eadadb6"],"When":"2024-9-9"},{"Name":"Randy Carter","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVReTX3XeSLnmc9YYkKql6ca8nWIdmGUOutTRsu-4F9V-50ASsJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My wife and I discovered Adonia by searching for afternoon tea in Vancouver after realizing that another tea house was closed on Mondays. It was an unexpected fortune!

A call was placed just after they opened to ensure space was available and seating time would be sufficient to comfortably anjoy the experience. Not only did they quickly answer our questions but they asked dietary concerns and offered a gluten free scone option. Entirely gluten free service requires at least one day notice.

The service was great with frequent but  nonintrusive checks. Tea was served in glass pots that my wife loved as it allows you to see the tea itself. Savoury and sweet treats were delicious.

Staff surprised us at the end with loose tea to take home with a bag for steeping saying "Happy anniversary!"

We will be sharing Adonia with friends and likely come out from Richmond again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO6B5cAdQRDAJ5bZ5YDsEe2oxOT4qGijLb6T2H4&fid=0x0:0x9663a4eb1eadadb6"],"When":"2024-11-4"},{"Name":"lena","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJnjpv3iXOfYAv2h46Q5Ve_MH2ad6Z_t-LQhDjXjQfKFLQawg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"loved the place, its tiny place, very quiet atmosphere, wide variety of tea options, and their serving portions are more than enough. the staff were very friendly and attentive. overall wonderful experience will definitely go back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNa3MxuzPX7pqZ6ik3JGg-QsVIYllfQLjYO2CVC&fid=0x0:0x9663a4eb1eadadb6"],"When":"2024-10-22"},{"Name":"Harveer kaur","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWWDBonurxs4oY3OU6nJ9JRlCCUpUp6X1EWWSDYTMnl0a18gr23=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cutest tea house in Vancouver so far I have been to. I ordered there mini high tea which had 8 sweet and savoury items with one pot of tea of choice and free refills. You have to book a reservation a day before you go so that they have plenty of time to prepare food for you. Service was fast and very fairytale environment.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOciNmrn7pFsv12WoFhBg4IVr5aIblR7ZhQeMxF&fid=0x0:0x9663a4eb1eadadb6"],"When":"2024-7-15"},{"Name":"Sandy Fergusson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXfDR_AQiytJEEjeH41OivhqNGxMWgwTyp8GpVdTJxjHYb1fdKp=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've only been to a few high teas in New Zealand, so this was my first high tea experience in Vancouver! I found this place via Instagram and did not expect to have my own high tea set. The food was lovely, the staff checked on us a few times to refill tea, and they met my friends dietary/allergies and replaced her dessert due to that. I would definitely re-visit in future and recommend if you have always wanted to try a high tea.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM-t9ogSl4it_14mfyNEEtwOW1jdFYkkuYhOxiD&fid=0x0:0x9663a4eb1eadadb6"],"When":"2024-9-14"},{"Name":"Josephine Ma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW4ctBP8R2rm9S8Aa5NyuULMapTvyTQYakS6AvI9Cd025oSy86H=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Adonia Tea House has been around for over 20 years. How has it taken me this long to visit this place? This has got to be one of my favourite tea houses in Vancouver now!

What I love about this place is the variety of options they offer. There are options for omnivores, vegetarians and vegans at this place. Not only do they cater to different dietary restrictions but if you're wanting to spend a little less, or eat a little less they offer Mini Afternoon Tea sets! Regular Afternoon Tea sets are $55 per person and Mini Afternoon Tea sets are $38 per person. Oh, and  you can even order off a regular a la carte menu if Afternoon Tea fare isn't your thing.

The food here was excellent. Quality ingredients were used for our food and they didn't skimp on anything either. While 3 of us had Afternoon Tea, my husband decided to order from the a la carte menu. He had a lobster bisque and a sandwich. One of the best lobster bisques he's ever had. Possibly even the best!

It's a popular place so I do recommend reserving well in advance to get a good table. We reserved only one day in advance and were put on a couch with two very small tables in front of us, and a side table on our left. It took quite a bit of maneuvering to fit our food and drinks on the small tables provided, and I had to turn to my left to pick up the very heavy teapot every time I wanted to pour some more tea for any of us. The lady who took my reservation over the phone did warn in advance that it would be a tight spot. I don't think I realized just how tight it was going to be. Wouldn't take this seat again, but with a bigger table I would absolutely come back to this Tea House sometime!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNGepJ-3zwdqTsikLOpbLpdiYS7ml8NzTpTATdO&fid=0x0:0x9663a4eb1eadadb6"],"When":"2024-5-8"}]

title: Chatime Bubble Tea
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"highlights","name":"Highlights","options":[{"name":"Great tea selection","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair accessible seating","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible parking lot","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible washroom","enabled":true}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"V P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIxj8yENCKwdvGgfIR4uDA0bh65erhq2TGJESneOu_P2sA-HA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I ordered 2 Grass Jelly Roasted Milk tea through DoorDash. Neither had sugar and one looked and tasted like they used water. Just disgusting!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMBbhyeqhf-0HQAIBgeojvjYZt2HzCcSVGNNOiV&fid=0x0:0xbd21794f7fc07a8f"],"When":"2024-11-17"},{"Name":"Roshni Sarath","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU_Mhsw0X5KywwYv3vY8x0c2kA5Hbqo3Y1IIXwrT4V3UMjYiKgr=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"UPDATE [Aug 29,2024] : The Manager / Owner , Hugh reached out  to me . Hugh seems to be very sensible person . He collected all the information and acted on it and assured staffs will be re trained on customer service. They gave me a refund for the affected drinks. This gives me a hope that they might not kill the experience for another customer next time. I understand how google reviews affect business. Based on Hugh's response and action , I am updating the rating to 3 starts from 1.

[ORIGINAL REVIEW , AUG 25 ] : Service is way below average! They messed up 2 out  of my 4 orders.

They missed out on an add on for me in my drink, despite taking the order correctly and confirming on it.
I realized something was off right after I took a sip of the drink outside the store.
I went back and informed the staff that it appears that they missed an add on in my drink.

I got no response.Customer service is simply unacceptable!
One of the girls just took my drink , transferred to another cup, put the missing add on, giggled something in their language and put the cup in front of me. No apology/ acknowledgment, nothing!
Very rude staff.

This time they missed adding ice. Which when I pointed out, I got a stare from one of the girls and she said it is there.
I could not stand this attitude and decided to just leave the store.
I stepped out and opened the drink and there was no ice !

The second instance is I ordered for a mango smoothie for my daughter and they gave her a mango slushie!

Staffs are rude and kills the experience of going to this store again!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ads","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVwDyuvQtXP_VygmU1rNXhUJ0mc48E4h1QtDkdEfrlXmuS-mYhL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I am a regular customer of Chatime and was pretty stoked about seeing this new branch open so close to home, but I was kinda skeptical about visiting when I saw its a newly established joint and the reviews showed the quality wasn't good because of the lack of experience etc. Unfortunately its true, this is the worst bubble tea I have ever had and will not be visiting here again and really put off Chatime now.
I feel awful for saying this as it's clearly a new chain and the staff are in training. However, I don't think staff should be training on the fly and surely they could organize some offline training and tasting sessions or something surely?..
I ordered my go to Large Matcha Roasted Milk Tea which tasted like bath water with the smallest hint of matcha, it was so gross and I felt sick so I couldn't even finish it.
As all Chatime branches, they do offer Oat milk alternatives which is great and the regular menu although I don't trust ordering any drinks from here.
Also the restrooms are not available at this time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMv-V2k95ovDIWdRsOELP226v5CpvXG9RYHXrsn&fid=0x0:0xbd21794f7fc07a8f"],"When":"2021-3-29"},{"Name":"Alan Zheng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL-QmMYfw75kgf5vonVt_7RAAdUJRl5hAF6Ijht6iC6ZE8aPQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Chatime for me for the most part has been hit and miss. However my experience at this specific location has been great and consistent. The owner is kind and genuinely tries to accommodate customer requests.

Quality- ordered their new limited time TRIO cup drink (dragon fruit bits with grape in one part of the cup, mango peach in the other and the last part of the cup was guava) the flavours overall were refreshing. Although I did not have toppings, I'd definitely grab it again next time but with coconut jelly.

Service- the owner is super helpful and was very nice to my wife and my kid. The staff looks like they are still in training but they were still nice during our interactions.

Cleanliness - although the dining room is still not yet open, the space it self is quite clean, they have plexi glass up and PPE worn by staff.

Overall a good experience and will definitely return if I am ever craving chatime.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP3J-EMWiATDtkk_ce88yc7ceU1-eutvMYiMovl&fid=0x0:0xbd21794f7fc07a8f"],"When":"2021-6-19"},{"Name":"Ashley","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU5kCzc7eRb4jfW7949WUTBpVquxs5hCBGMbV9VKX7WizSYJao=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had a great experience at this Chatime location. It wasn’t busy when I visited as I was the only customer inside. The staff was patient with me while I was deciding what drinks to get.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOQJ3UeoNt_Eb4VSBqSkCdPQCl5RTmtGE8rhK30&fid=0x0:0xbd21794f7fc07a8f"],"When":"2021-4-20"},{"Name":"Jemma Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWXCHgsvEOda8Euj2F1UAraubpKMT6WV7yVIZRrlelmuyGL9zw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Expensive just for the regular size which is smaller than a standard regular size bubble tea elsewhere. They are lacking milky slush options. But the flavours are good :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMtKrs8uJoc2ybxiHJgsyaehcg1pMk_m0ZDt_Xk&fid=0x0:0xbd21794f7fc07a8f"],"When":"2022-6-12"},{"Name":"Bob Seymour","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK0fRtxv4CszHn4EcW7G0G4cbSaQfULwvKaBFoESMUbanu_Vg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great environment, staff and quality milk tea. Same owner as previous Zenq. I was not familiar with new selections and the owner was very patient to introduce the new drinks to me.

Will be coming back for sure.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPb1L34NkBnO4FqfgHhh5Gr1gvKgy5DlI218yw6&fid=0x0:0xbd21794f7fc07a8f"],"When":"2021-3-14"},{"Name":"Jess Kwan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWDBzh8dbkC1LzSd7XrpM8gWZ5VmXx8K9kvQQxVQanMubn1WEvT3g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great staff and good tasting drinks (better tasting than the chatime closer to my home). Clean and nice looking inside and hope one day after Covid people can come inside to enjoy the space","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOXZFoMiwiBJ7VM83GX2yUVqz3VMh_eq_LJ1qaP&fid=0x0:0xbd21794f7fc07a8f"],"When":"2021-3-9"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"TS OS","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIrxJ8Fjd3bGSI8mWbF186RbFWyg_DW73VTS3OIkFaxPfXFBEQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food are solid. The price is about the same as other similarly popular cafes.  Coffee tasted pretty good and barista was friendly and informative. Only complaint I have is cleanliness of washroom when I was there. Plenty of seats and fancy lightings provide welcoming vibe for a small sized cafe.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMab82X-Q0gOXATGt2iYsoGPS9QlEejoF8ZuU12&fid=0x0:0x529a45d5bbfbcdfb"],"When":"2024-11-30"},{"Name":"Jordana","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLJvxqFr8nGL8vok-SCRwxhp2_EJmOiFDFc3qAUH70xw1rrHg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food is great. Had the Ham and Cheese Criossant and Japanese Hot Dog, and both were delicious. The dough wad flakey and baked just right, and the price was reasonable for what you get. The Rooibos Latte is delectable, highly recommend if you are a tea drinker. The only thing I didnt like is that it was busy but only 1 person behind the counter taking orders and making the orders, so we had to wait quite a bit, otherwise, lovely place. Clean and cozy, great place to catch up with friends and hang out over coffee.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMSx2yuz7LPmqpdYXNlzXTgK4YAfZ5YQVxoAvxD&fid=0x0:0x529a45d5bbfbcdfb"],"When":"2024-12-19"},{"Name":"Angelica Gonzalez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXs8Rl6i0PRUB6_vIudko9K2nv_lt0A7oW9FSvOVZiLCVaSWMgL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Nice cafe with a large variety of baked goods. Their staff is always so kind and the ambiance is nice. I enjoyed my matcha, I just wish they didn’t charge so much for oat milk when dairy is a dietary restriction for many people.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNHDm0mjUXAu8QYUpecGd-bswC6Z9U0ZUEp85cL&fid=0x0:0x529a45d5bbfbcdfb"],"When":"2024-11-22"},{"Name":"Naved Quaiyumi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXfaJqW_7xDMkt7owQPld9jTBvQCckh2hsX_7RQEdqPvMD2bHPc=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Jonathan and Rona both provided great service to us. We ordered the cake n coffee ( Spanish latte). Coffee was the best I have tasted in Vancouver however the cafe need to work on its ambience more ...it's not fitting to it's delicious pastries cakes n coffee...","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPatezFk2kKnvNs6A9euxNrLACMRHN1XF5NdeFb&fid=0x0:0x529a45d5bbfbcdfb"],"When":"2024-10-9"},{"Name":"Madison G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVtZsEld-Yz5a2Swm5LesjF83lo03ZXPGgujeQvQiLn6WLaIuGx=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Cute little cafe, gets pretty busy in the evenings because of the icecream/ gelato they carry which is cute. I wanted to try a few drinks but they were out of so many options which was pretty disappointing. So I just went with a latte (which tasted like a straight espresso shot ) and my friend had a green tea latte! Which was very delicious. I tried their Nutella swirl and it was also very delicious! Highly recommend! Next time I think I’ll asked for it warmed up though so it melts more in your mouth ! Will definitely come back to try out the gelato","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN2_97X8nACU7-mm8sElw4ea4VFrYs3podIWTih&fid=0x0:0x529a45d5bbfbcdfb"],"When":"2024-8-29"},{"Name":"Jackie Fiedler","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXrH5-QVsgBWyB1jTrOwnjnmXPjBownlPqvtu2BmzJx6OHq1yuItQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Charming bakery with a ton of options!

The sausage croissant was fantastic - buttery and flakey croissant was delicious warmed.

The chocolate supreme croissant wasn’t my favorite - very heavily filled and the dough was a little tough.

The mango royal croissant was also heavily filled, but tasty and the dough was excellent.

Friendly service!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOCimW-EJ95TwikSqB8QYmW8j_ChmO0u_H2Px53&fid=0x0:0x529a45d5bbfbcdfb"],"When":"2024-6-8"},{"Name":"Melinda W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUqFa91nGQX9-WVxFZ-rAUul10GF70bhWZFQZe97ymoPVUZrvFxnA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Both my husband and I love this cafe. Their baked good are fantastics in taste and great in variety. The downside of it is that it makes us very difficult to choose (joking!)
There is a see-through bakery area. I was sitting next to it and really enjoyed watching the chef working on the dough.
The vibes are very chill there. We just love everything about this cafe.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO4tXVMtR9mDLcEsPaQFSIY2kyY9ZWQqHPaoOsw&fid=0x0:0x529a45d5bbfbcdfb"],"When":"2024-5-2"},{"Name":"Lạc","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUpO8370_7RDhjsqnPt6c35t5mMarMGN54u0eeSrhk9ZwWK5CU=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love Fior De Latte. They have a crazy pastry selection. Their drinks are decent. All the time I’ve been there, it’s always so busy so sometimes you can’t find a seat. But it’s a very nice cafe and it’s local.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPNO-QvZDaTUmIXk-xywn3dL1_WnkUBB7lYh3Ry&fid=0x0:0x529a45d5bbfbcdfb"],"When":"2024-11-28"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Remia Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWmpY-11b6uW1ElYcP-MQ3nN5fllulzAmTZx7kDqDgJ0KRRYIkH=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A very nice and warm welcoming cafe. The lady working here was very nice and gave me a wonderful cozy vibe.  As if you’re visiting a caring relative. She was very kind and made sure we all found a drink we would enjoy.

The drinks are very delicious and I was very pleased. They use real fruits for some of their drinks and they were very refreshing.

We got 20% off our drinks. The lady told us for the winter months there is 20% off for the season.

I will definitely be back!

I recommend either of the two drinks we got or something made with real fruits!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPhCAL-p93nFT6zGlEASc8nJwztaVAIkamNqQpF&fid=0x0:0x25dcc58228ed4dbf"],"When":"2024-11-10"},{"Name":"Sam Shop","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL00zVIViQ27vvP18FEhx25H0o_EIIlmqibePozX8gFaroS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Our bubble waffles were nice. Sweet, decent whip cream, but very little fruits. Strawberry was served frozen. Would have been nice if the lady had defrosted it.

Service took a long time even though we were the only ones there.

Taro bbt used jasmine tea so tasted very different. Because she blended the ice, the bubbles became super hard.

Ambiance is not great. It feels like an order to-go place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMOF-ZblyBJML0kbOI_6gMjBjqumGsN1NkG2iw&fid=0x0:0x25dcc58228ed4dbf"],"When":"2024-10-13"},{"Name":"Allan lin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLeLeKCCWzGG31UN4u7PVDpcD5nilEIt_OcjsD3MjiLwJogDA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have been a frequent customer at Gathering Cafe. They offer a wide selection of high quality drinks (lattes, milk tea) that are made organically on the spot. The owner uses fresh fruits and ingredients instead of syrup for their drinks, and still maintain a very, very good price. I highly recommend a honeycomb coffee latte and pumpkin latte as they warm you up on a cold day.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPPE36rzNNT4PbPMRrUYuDUO6HrBpsXCehI019O&fid=0x0:0x25dcc58228ed4dbf"],"When":"2024-10-24"},{"Name":"April Dong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK-EJWeyLZl-J46LDopap4-qjdQdaukUBxAWy4qdIzEb8Hgrg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very cute and cozy place to sit and enjoy. The lady is warm and welcoming, just tell her what you want and she can recommend to you. All drinks and food are come in great portion, that are good enough to feed you up. I highly recommend the iced fruit tea and green tea with salty cream cheese foam. They are fresh and delightful.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMQRU2smTJTxvrDc9phK0e0GiWFbp_tFmL1e0Rq&fid=0x0:0x25dcc58228ed4dbf"],"When":"2024-4-4"},{"Name":"Samantha Newbery","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVMwh1oZxhiPpLD2ehTemDe8UpvHDKim9u6YzgoLrrEJoQrabZz=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"So glad we stumbled across this super cute cafe while our car was being serviced nearby. It was the perfect place to hang out for an hour. The chocolate bubble waffle and blueberry smoothie with salt milk cover were both freshly made and delicious, and so affordable!
We will definitely be back if we are ever in the area. We were impressed and there are lots of things on the menu we want to try.
Cute place to study or for a quiet hang out with friends.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ryan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWCDMUY42ah4aAgta84ssT2DYa3PFsR3r4fbxhBdcs3AXShIgTOYw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Came here for bbt and they definitely have affordable options 6-7 dollars for a bbt. Facilities are extremely old - the building interior had an unpleasant smell to it. As for the drinks themselves, pearls were extremely soft as if they’d been sitting around for days. I would not recommend coming here. Sun Tea within the Safeway complex is a much better experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMswmdei6UWklCfmLwISBSmrU2S9MU-u9BJWa9l&fid=0x0:0x25dcc58228ed4dbf"],"When":"2024-9-13"},{"Name":"Su Linn Myint","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJEH0QETeDUsAuNdaL-G3MXThYHvHFGOtEiMjaO_gQ0TBWXgz0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I wanted to try this cafe for a while and finally tried it. I tired the egg and bacon crepe which is really good and full of fillings.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPAs-LRfmD0Y5j2m7dqt4WZOsm0T3qGmlHwlgvr&fid=0x0:0x25dcc58228ed4dbf"],"When":"2024-7-16"},{"Name":"Lucian Nedelcu (Teddy)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVQWs20vZVv-WjmKExQoFbz4NhIegHkfZEv7UasxD9lUs_8TMWcoQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lovely place, quaint, low-key. The food is very tasty and reasonably-priced. They have an interesting selection of both, food and drink, but nothing crazy.

The wifi is 10/10

If you want a quiet afternoon to study this unassuming place is perfect.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNfJwwFyQocbbMRpw8TK2wUpj1agA2qrP1o5yuj&fid=0x0:0x25dcc58228ed4dbf"],"When":"2023-6-24"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Melinda W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUqFa91nGQX9-WVxFZ-rAUul10GF70bhWZFQZe97ymoPVUZrvFxnA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I fell in love with this cafe the moment I stepped into it. It was so nicely decorated and made me feel like I was in the Harry Potter movie. The owl, the clock and many other tiny things are so magical.

We had ordered two muffins, bacon and turkey respectively, an Americano and a latte. OMG... My husband finally found his favorite coffee in the city. Though I'm not really a coffee person but I like it too. The beans they use, Stumptown, are actually from Portland. We bought one bag on the spot.

I found that they have a little garden at the back. Next time I'll bring a book and sit in the garden.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPPq2AXAszHLx80-riB9otFIyRNKp9FChQkbrLZ&fid=0x0:0xe19663a4fc154216"],"When":"2024-10-23"},{"Name":"Madison G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVtZsEld-Yz5a2Swm5LesjF83lo03ZXPGgujeQvQiLn6WLaIuGx=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I love the theme they have, such a cute little idea ! The service was friendly and nice and quick. I ordered a scone and asked for it to be warmed but it came to me still pretty cold. And the butter I was given is rock hard frozen, so not very spreadable. The latte was delicious though, and presentation was great. For having only two staff members making the coffees and serving the food , they kept up with the pace of the customers very well. I wish they had a bit more coffee options","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPw5SaflWiXpSJ4Z20Hlk8oHwRXa81vjSPgkYMY&fid=0x0:0xe19663a4fc154216"],"When":"2024-4-8"},{"Name":"Jamie L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWIsaaODpzZi62wV-93lE__3OFGYxafaFgdJgxMDBfyIfS_ESBX0w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Beautiful cafe, cozy and old train station-themed place with great drinks. Their panini pressed sandwich was great! I tried their tuna melt and loved it. It wasn't too greasy.
Red velvet latte was too cinnamony for my partner's taste, but I enjoyed it. Come for great coffee and relaxed atmosphere. There was small space that was children-friendly, and a nice cute garden space at the back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMsszauM5qaulWR60hC6g3Asx4PNLZx9SsMWP-T&fid=0x0:0xe19663a4fc154216"],"When":"2022-5-19"},{"Name":"Cindy Miller","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL3qLIzpeTgfjQPEPrMaTdDT3ZZOdvv6WEmD61EdJ35_QjyvA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Typically a great place but today I stopped to buy one of their small mugs. The staff couldn’t find one in the back and was unable to get one of the two or three in the display case as the owner has the only key. The owner is in on Sunday. Seems like both poor business practice as well as poor relationships with employees if the employer can’t trust them.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kai Sing Ng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWNLrphD1rxxnOFIe_FOn2NQjA48QxUDAdbVN6rAp9DxrPGpMM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The ice shaken strawberry guava tea was awesome! Not sweet, tastes very refreshing. Great place to work with decent wifi. Staff were friendly. Love the old train station vibes. Will come back next time to hang out at the patio","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPxDHOMI3l8UpWUM7aM-5EENlmI5JERgLYfehFp&fid=0x0:0xe19663a4fc154216"],"When":"2023-9-2"},{"Name":"L Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLvB0Gyeziw6PIK38nbfJ3Wzs4vx58FrLOPejkEItEQy5a-jhr_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Randomly walked in and found this cool place. I think their concept is train station and almost like harry potter themed. They have actual train station furnitures like high top shoe shine chairs converted into bar tops and the owl from harry potter. I personally liked the wooden seating by the wall. Ordered velvet cookie, it was soft and very sweet.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPhsolmV1r8EYbM7LdI_Ifl6DmCyFZIs0rh0T2R&fid=0x0:0xe19663a4fc154216"],"When":"2022-5-29"},{"Name":"Amanda Lim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXhS70pshVMDUN6BfY4C_gYgTjP4NnLsVrfCP2WWqDXVu_f1JvI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We came here to do one of Kunie's latte art classes and it was so great! Shes patient, knowledgeable and helpful. It was a great experience and I think it's a good reflection of Platform 7. They have great staff, awesome coffee and they know their stuff. Would highly recommend taking a class or just going in for coffee.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNvUdXxOhB1HjTjhEA7DTLK-mwNnEcU3sWO5Wpo&fid=0x0:0xe19663a4fc154216"],"When":"2019-3-20"},{"Name":"Chef Menajem Peretz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWFHHucZwQOsfB8-8SKRbUjhOVQd_5RL6RbAdEZcnLC3uuqNK4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time at this place I fall in love, is a great record and ambiance, very good products and coffee and the service with a smiling. Witch is not always a common thing in coffee shops. Good background music. Definitely the place to have a meeting, read a book or work from the comer table. Place to try","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNOu9ypTP2OmiSAstElv-apDe1caj5gs3STQUE&fid=0x0:0xe19663a4fc154216"],"When":"2018-8-7"}]

title: Chatime Bubble Tea
address: 2740 E Hastings St, Vancouver, BC V5K 1Z9
descriptions: Modern, casual Taiwanese bubble-tea outlet specializing in milk teas, fresh juices & smoothies.
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"highlights","name":"Highlights","options":[{"name":"Great tea selection","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair accessible seating","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible parking lot","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible washroom","enabled":true}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Laurie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVP32EmmLA7sbp2akuOTnRFXkpvW1Ws_zHiyJT6aKu5oVq7fkbx=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I’ve been here a few times and the staff have been consistently unwelcoming with bad customer service. The first time the girl got my order wrong. Then she refused to correct my drink and instead insisted that I ordered it. I left unhappy and none of the staff seemed to care.
Yesterday we decided to try it out again. Arrived and there was a BIG sign right in front of the till that said “After school special, 2 large drinks for $10”. So I ordered two of the golden aged milk tea with pearls. The lady said ok and asked what level of sugar and ice I wanted. She tried to enter it into the till. She had troubles applying the special deal and then asked her colleague. They spoke in their own language and tried to figure out how to input the deal. They could not figure it out and looked confused. Then a few minutes later she looks at me and says “The special is no longer available!”. I asked her why would you advertise something on a huge sign that is not available and then told her to take the sign away so as not to confuse customers. She made no eye contact and didn't apologize at all about their false advertising. She should have honoured the deal and then removed the sign. Customer service here is definitely not their priority and their drinks are average at best. Will not be returning as there are many other  bubble tea places around.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tricia C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIS8jxdORXKJaAWhct8yqQ3gE8qhWdlJFJL5jsz8u98jLVDfw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"This bubble tea chain offers a variety of flavours.

Drink:
I had the Jasmine jade green milk tea with grass jelly. The grass jelly had a smooth light texture and there was a lot of it in the cup.

Food:
The lemon macron looked cute but was a bit stale and tasted like it was sitting in the fridge for a while. The lemon jelly filling was on the sweet side so I would not order it again.

Venue:
There is plenty of seating inside the shop at 5pm on a weekday.

Parking:
There a few select spots available in the plaza parking lot and on the street.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPTjkTEARfe4j-yLcgxmBl3UTqr57hkSpc6-303&fid=0x0:0xed68a550f03ac54c"],"When":"2024-5-1"},{"Name":"Ads","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVwDyuvQtXP_VygmU1rNXhUJ0mc48E4h1QtDkdEfrlXmuS-mYhL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Pretty yummy bubble tea as always from Chatime, AKA the OG, Grass Jelly Roasted Oat Milk Tea with Pudding is great value for money and a dope refreshing dessert for a warm summers afternoon in Van!
First time at this location, a nice chilled out, laid back and cosy vibed joint with plenty of seating. Staff initially made our order wrong, I was quite displeased being dairy intolerant and making the order pretty clear. Nonetheless, a nice BBT bar with minimalistic and comfy decor.
Chatime is awesome that it offers both a good rewards scheme and plant-based milk alternatives which keeps me a regular visitor.
Don't forget to signup for the rewards to save on them slurps! Also, please try bring your own straws and cups so we can reduce single use plastics to save our beautiful earth and save money whilst doing so!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOpjPkimIYGpVM2YwQFbv7cj5ydyxSSnG8XByLp&fid=0x0:0xed68a550f03ac54c"],"When":"2022-8-9"},{"Name":"brin078","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIjEjudHGDD4lF9sPHMxKJzE0189aq1kMJyUhe37AF1FCoGdg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Ordered all 6 bubbles in total and can’t believe not even one is tasty.

I have these drinks in Taiwan and also in Vancouver in different stores . I am never dissatisfied and disappointed with these drinks .

I ordered two roasted milk tea and they taste just like water with pearl and not much of either milk tea and can’t taste tea flavor.

I ordered two milk made of fresh milk for my kinds . They normally would fight over for more . Both of them refused to drink more and ended up in garbage bin. I had a sip and it tasted like water plus water with not so chewy pearls . Also not sure why there’s a tea taste when I ordered fresh milk from Uber .

I ordered grapefruit green tea without sugar. All I can taste is this cheap grapefruit syrup and I can barely taste any green tea .

Don’t usually leave a review especially when bubble tea was invented where I was from . This is such a shame to call yourself bubble tea from Taiwan .

Taste awful !","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPpUKG22g1LkfysakMlg3JBqOG_LS5GHsmqSQBe&fid=0x0:0xed68a550f03ac54c"],"When":"2023-8-29"},{"Name":"George Zhang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXsF_25d7mK9wyvvDectasCJYgS7vh1fkq2W_Bc1m35m5Gb6bO8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"The male reception on the afternoon of May 4th is extremely rude. He refused to answer my wife’s question about Lychee drinks ingredient and ignored my son saying “thank you” for the macaroon. Drink was good but very disappointed with the service attitude.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPtRHcw1Vj4ZARDfcwnUonjHmRgxV_LgM24x_t9&fid=0x0:0xed68a550f03ac54c"],"When":"2024-5-4"},{"Name":"Triet Nguyen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXI_HV5MYzTiE_dsokfD8KSRZk7T4sv1leRq6UAQatC8bgBn6SCWw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love the tea here. The drinks are fresh, even though is quite more expensive than my hometown. Still enjoy it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOlZ25oeD677Ey94Jov5cQdoDIX3foysLtkyLzT&fid=0x0:0xed68a550f03ac54c"],"When":"2023-9-17"},{"Name":"Diana L.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIW2kdRGGLj1j8iotZR8u_6cJvN47azaqWmh-dWmP_2e6mQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I really like this location. Easy to find parking. Only thing is the inside seems a bit run down. Same with the quality in the drinks. It was not the same Chatime I’m used to. It didn’t seem the same but we only had two drinks. One was better than the other so perhaps the consistency is not the same. Would come again but prefer others although lots of space to sit unlike Broadway/Granville.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipODnBPUy0-x27K1szeeeeiqDK4PbH7vmDV3oi0&fid=0x0:0xed68a550f03ac54c"],"When":"2018-4-24"},{"Name":"Carlos Farias","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUHRKsSyrR8qrmWHf6dYiB33HYZ-07e_MC5PJLBl0ZM169UE9Ma=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Atmosphere, music and very nice location, on the other hand, the attitude of the staff by other hand so deplorable, with a really gross attitude.
So sad because it’s my 2- time here and it didn’t feel welcoming or any empathy, they just protect that they don’t wanna be there and as a costumer it’s very uncomfortable…
Hopefully this not happens to another costumer
Date: 05/08/2024 time: 22:31","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"ALFRED CHEUNG","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUIT2FfsIYlcMtZMfx5S50jtyBU4f02MMH3fvMct4kX_yli8F6e5A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have curry chicken rice today and Green tea latte. The food is good, the price is reasonable. Just because it is a semi self-serve style, not really tell how good the service is. Overall it is a good place to hangout with the other half but there is only a big long table. If you are a small group, expect to share the table with others.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMZa2WkVV3Bq12RC1ho3cwIkKxsc2bslCGbTNYo&fid=0x0:0xa741bf6dbfa4f3f0"],"When":"2024-11-26"},{"Name":"D Co","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJmifL_HRXnM61p1nc56e2B9Sw_s7HBMYBYMY0MdOP8HEQF4Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Was excited to see Nana's Green Tea opening at my neighborhood.  They have 3 touch screen ordering machines and it was easy to use, with pictures of the different menu items.  We got the matcha green tea and beef dashi chazuke.  We got the green tea after a few minutes and got seated to wait for our other order.
We waited and waited for our rice order and it did not come, until finally after 30 minutes, we followed up. Turns out they were not aware of our order.  So we wasted half an hour waiting on nothing!

Then, when the food arrived, it was underwhelming.  The price you pay ($19) does not commensurate with the amount of food that you get.  There was only a few pieces of beef.

I will still try the other dessert items here, but honestly if they do not improve the quality and quantity of serving, it'll be hard for consumers to justify the price point. They just opened so I hope they are still adjusting and can make it more worthwhile for consumers to go back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMh1o1w4xqmfrYLqXlu1d7yN8yoUimhtYNT0iPK&fid=0x0:0xa741bf6dbfa4f3f0"],"When":"2024-10-12"},{"Name":"Fuzzy Nemo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWMhjGNDhI-RZYgIiVRXnRDEQCiyyP-dsVjb7EhBkcymNr9MvYi0A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This was my go to matcha soft serve place when they were in Kerrisdale.  I would go out of my way, just for good matcha ice cream.

I was there on the weekend, there was a sign for $10 for 1 drink and 1 dessert from Oct 10 - 31, but I went back today (Oct 15), the sign is gone.  As per other posts, this deal is only for 8PM - 1130PM which was never on the sign.

Matcha Latte was not very good, but Matcha Soft Serve was VERY good.  They didn't have a display of cakes like they did before, and you have to place your order at the machines when you walk in the door.

The service wasn't great.   They were not welcoming or friendly at all.  Seemed like they weren't used to this new place yet.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNKWcwfeKxypzME-TeZcaWTpukltnlETFJ-AEVD&fid=0x0:0xa741bf6dbfa4f3f0"],"When":"2024-10-15"},{"Name":"hungry dog","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUU9eKcRttu0wNDyfzMLCM37gn5w1HsQy-g0S0eoiVV9Pp_bIA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"the matcha parfait was quite rich- but the vanilla ice cream on it was way to sweet and the jello at the bottom tasted like absolutely nothing. the chocolate truffles were quite lacking in moisture but the cereal gave it nice contrasting texture. the red bean paste was also too sweet. overall nice flavor but too sweet.
the hochija parfait was quire lacking- the syrup on the top was too sweet, and the fragrance of the hochija just wasnt there- it wasnt quite enough. the mochi was quite avrg, and the jello at the bottom was quite tasteless but had a nice aftertaste, still with not enough hochija flavor. the ice cream once again too sweet, and this parfait was just not well balanced enough, i wouldnt get this again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN2nynedvGOR-AdC6UoBpsb9197wLvPC7GqznL0&fid=0x0:0xa741bf6dbfa4f3f0"],"When":"2024-12-11"},{"Name":"Beezer333 Beezer333","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX3wo1m-4sufmg5069NtcuAFRSIVJ6amfyY9UrEO5NtVtv3Asyw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Huge place compared to the one in Kerrisdale - and it comes with huge price hike 😉

Clean washroom.

Ordering is super easy with three machines. Two employees preparing the items in an open kitchen.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMXTr_0WuabQTc5s4DG6j0F6nDqifElpR_P1_S2&fid=0x0:0xa741bf6dbfa4f3f0"],"When":"2024-10-15"},{"Name":"Huang Recca","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIDF647f8wTC9xYKRRSNQV8CPkQJrc1Y81nFNPZerRiknh_jw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Food tasted decent. Portion sizing was smaller than expected. Ordered Large and it felt like a small. No service. You self serve via machine, Wait for your name to be called and return your own tray and machine also has a tip option (and we did not know that we tipped them for us to be the server)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMZa-lHmtxC37eCr8ExzYVhPGRiztGhbVPz694z&fid=0x0:0xa741bf6dbfa4f3f0"],"When":"2024-11-11"},{"Name":"Kenji","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUTh9tYrdm-pVeC5oDKqoEmijUDCVNHBi2lpvbetKfolH1XQv3F1A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've always been a big fan of Nana’s Green Tea since they first opened in Kerrisdale! I visited the new location today, and as expected, the food and drinks were still amazing! I tried the beef sukiyaki donburi and paired it with a hot ujicha - delicious! I didn't have room for dessert this time, but I'll definitely indulge next time, especially since it's so close to my study spot! If I had one small suggestion, it would be to have more electrical outlets available.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNZWc6gKT-82VWlVAOwpr_lrTDGZ-7oWmapa0Vk&fid=0x0:0xa741bf6dbfa4f3f0"],"When":"2024-10-13"},{"Name":"Ryan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWCDMUY42ah4aAgta84ssT2DYa3PFsR3r4fbxhBdcs3AXShIgTOYw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Lots of matcha and hojicha drinks, parfaits and desserts available. Seating can be tricky. The staff was a bit questionable on our visit in terms of being attentive. Be ready to shell out $15-20 for a parfait, which might be a wallet buster for some. Worth a try, but not sure it’s a regular visit for me.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPBuzDFl2Un-mzUzRqwnE-1ckqx31niT4X9hL3A&fid=0x0:0xa741bf6dbfa4f3f0"],"When":"2024-8-20"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Danyel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIUE5ZF8OphBDpmDCDFc5cI0TUnyedNGB1AE1LhAU_kO9h3rA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Expensive. Lovely to have a Chinese tea house amidst so many bubble tea and high tea shops. The atmosphere and music were very nice and the host was very sweet.

What to expect:
The tea menu offers tea by the pot, and yes, the less expensive teas are sold out. You can expect several steepings and a to-go tea if you like. The host also served some tasty Chinese crackers. Plan to sit in for an hour at a minimum.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN32Z7iBfMoDnhsmc7QrZuPDk-tWZMO8Swa2DOd&fid=0x0:0x1d66d5a0cdac0e35"],"When":"2024-12-27"},{"Name":"Sharzi BD","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW288MzwFkWlfN4-hmCJwoI28tpVq0hWMFg6JZzbb5p0qpMwt_I=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the coziest spot in downtown vancouver to have a tea and get be relaxing with the atmosphere and the music 🧘🏻‍♀️😍
I met Chuyi there ! She was so nice and friendly. I will definitely go here again 😊","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPsGCQPjsxWYJuzJ2LjetEO85OVV2nZytQnuLes&fid=0x0:0x1d66d5a0cdac0e35"],"When":"2024-1-5"},{"Name":"Rebekkah Niles","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV_FS2XEzJu4lb584_OFzkrv2x8Yu3ieHmbHJLdfxhsy-snNvXt=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A Vancouver must-do if you're a lover of Chinese teas. Try to a pot of premium tea from 1000-year-old trees to savor the complex, woody notes of Old Growth Imperial, or sip the smooth beauty of a raw aged pu-erh. Some of the best tea I've ever had! It's a tea bar, so you can order it by the pot, and re-steep for as long as you like. You can also buy a brick to take home with you, or a part of brick if you can't afford a whole one. We met two of the owners, and they were both friendly and passionate about tea, and about making premium tea accessible.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNCNVUcWpWUAgkWL947MhqKdh2iIbyIkrOmoYen&fid=0x0:0x1d66d5a0cdac0e35"],"When":"2017-7-12"},{"Name":"Rose Sun","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVh18Pw8wJ2KXFkFYsNvV4pzNF85xbDxwmLxO1DyxHOePQuNMZV6w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"As a tea lover I’ve always enjoyed discovering places that respects the culture and knowledge of tea. After my experience at Van Cha I can tell you that this place does neither.

First of all the tea is very overpriced you can only order by pot ( but the volume is more of a cup)  and the most affordable are ~ $20+ and those are marked as sold out to up sell you. They set the minimum spending and will try to push you to get food. The dessert cookies are tiny and tastes stale. There was minimal explanation for the tea or attempt at showing you the brewing or sharing knowledge about the tea other than saying “this is good tea, it’s expensive”.

Then the argument is that you are here for the ambience , well not so much. When I was there I overheard the tea brewer talking loudly about indigestion, bowel movements and Chinese politics with a friend. Thinking that I didn’t understand Chinese they then started to complaint that another customer who had just been in had only purchased a small bag of tea.

I’m sorry if this is peoples introduction to tea culture and should not be representative of the experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNFnocE0rsfb6qKnAF1O0T6ne9sCtFOjT9FXGui&fid=0x0:0x1d66d5a0cdac0e35"],"When":"2022-10-27"},{"Name":"Melanie Brideau","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW9hjJgXbahlVsP8ZY7GFes8UBJd9LfBUNeeSVDO-BiFKAd2yYTLg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very much enjoyed my authentic Chinese Tea Ceremony! Had a lovely time chatting with lovely Doris who shared her tea expertise with me.
I definitely recommend you try it! Cheers","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO3eWSUCPzUuEs7d3kNjA923DeV02y7KbsEw0v9&fid=0x0:0x1d66d5a0cdac0e35"],"When":"2021-10-31"},{"Name":"James Wu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLRasAxQzLh23oYUjtUmT5l_rd2dW_rjeg4kQBz1_n6lstQJg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently visited Vancha Downtown Shop and was thoroughly impressed by the experience. From the moment I walked in, the aromatic scent of freshly brewed tea enveloped me, instantly transporting me to a serene oasis. The staff were incredibly knowledgeable and took the time to explain the nuances of each tea variety, ensuring I made the perfect selection. I settled on a cup of their signature black tea “Fei Zi Xiao”, and it was nothing short of exquisite. The ambiance of the shop, with its traditional decor and soft background music, made for a perfect escape from the hustle and bustle of the city. I highly recommend Vancha tea house to anyone looking for a genuine tea experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOBlsfskTNjBh0le475sxvd83jrGkzeoYM71Z1t&fid=0x0:0x1d66d5a0cdac0e35"],"When":"2023-10-28"},{"Name":"Sheen Betty","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVzRO-WAm7OV-yGGTTTJ_K3T3KNUDXe-YgHbtHDsPhgi4N_oGcMUg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was really an excellent experience for tasting traditional Chinese tea in here. Just a few minutes walk for the Canada conference center! The clerk in here was really nice, they explained so detail about the difference between each teas category! Recommend to everyone visit here experience the wonderful tea in China!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO0OAaKGZVq7YOWQ1udNIJEYZBbCOUiwGO2-NmF&fid=0x0:0x1d66d5a0cdac0e35"],"When":"2018-8-23"},{"Name":"Emilie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWjZdu1A0N35H5fUqnmDCaNzhdw_Q5xQR_-D4kYpezyNJMOvV05Ow=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lovely tea shop with a great variety of unique teas. We went with a pu'er and pineapple desserts, everything was great. Very attentive service. I would absolutely come back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOrNYdUEEUG3m6Pv9VD5j0Ek_VZXNk1QF4YrNed&fid=0x0:0x1d66d5a0cdac0e35"],"When":"2023-12-16"}]

title: Nemesis Coffee Gastown
address: 302 W Hastings St, Vancouver, BC V6B 2N4
