descriptions: Hip, light-filled coffeehouse with artisanal pastries & all-day brunch, plus coffee, tea & kombucha.
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Outdoor seating","enabled":true},{"name":"Onsite services","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true},{"name":"Delivery","enabled":false}]},{"id":"highlights","name":"Highlights","options":[{"name":"Great tea selection","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair accessible seating","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible washroom","enabled":true}]},{"id":"offerings","name":"Offerings","options":[{"name":"Alcohol","enabled":true},{"name":"Beer","enabled":true},{"name":"Cocktails","enabled":true},{"name":"Coffee","enabled":true},{"name":"Healthy options","enabled":true},{"name":"Vegetarian options","enabled":true}]},{"id":"dining_options","name":"Dining options","options":[{"name":"Breakfast","enabled":true},{"name":"Brunch","enabled":true},{"name":"Lunch","enabled":true},{"name":"Catering","enabled":true},{"name":"Dessert","enabled":true},{"name":"Seating","enabled":true}]},{"id":"amenities","name":"Amenities","options":[{"name":"Washroom","enabled":true}]},{"id":"atmosphere","name":"Atmosphere","options":[{"name":"Casual","enabled":true},{"name":"Cozy","enabled":true}]},{"id":"crowd","name":"Crowd","options":[{"name":"Groups","enabled":true}]},{"id":"planning","name":"Planning","options":[{"name":"Accepts reservations","enabled":false}]},{"id":"payments","name":"Payments","options":[{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"Debit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"NFC mobile payments","enabled":true},{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":false}]},{"id":"parking","name":"Parking","options":[{"name":"Paid street parking","enabled":true},{"name":"Parking","enabled":false}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Philip Raymond Lim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5EIBAgpBLsauhPMdjXym7mJ4fA8mtryDtWQIJCZfJxYXxupU8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cafe Nemesis is one of my top 5 favorite coffee shops in Vancouver. The one in Mount Pleasant wins in terms of ambiance, but this one on Hastings champions overall because of service, convenience, and the line is not as crazy as on Mount Pleasant.

I already had a dose of coffee from Elysian today, but after lunch, I was tempted to have an another round when I passed by this cafe—I just couldn’t resist. I had a mocha and paired it with a pistachio swirl.

This is one of the few cafes where I can easily get a great coffee, and an amazing pastry which leaves you confused about which one to choose, plus a nice atmosphere- the vibe, music, etc.. The service at this location is honestly better than the other Nemesis Cafe locations. The man who took my order also went around and served a glass of water. Little things like that make a difference, especially with so many good cafes around Vancouver. Making an extra effort like this really helps the place stand out.

I always come to visit this cafe when I’m in the area as I always have good memories here which tempts me to stop by and take a quick pause.

Truly a 5 star.🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM_s3PmpuiHytr8hS3eS6LtM6s2s3sY6VWFkuta&fid=0x0:0x2b3f9d8745c9118a"],"When":"2024-9-26"},{"Name":"Christian","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKwJCSuefQuhTBQUYaa2mMf-JpGrvPi_Ii2RZnC-5fS34SqZZA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The best breakfast sandwich ever (get the Mortadella Supreme)! It was perfect, the drinks were delicious and the service friendly. We’ve done brunch at dozens of places across the world and the sandwich was the best. There are only 4 booths or so, other than that you’ll likely have to share a table. We went on a Sunday and the lineup was hours long but not bad on Monday if you get there before 10:00. The eggs bene were overcooked so make sure you tell them how you like it. The drinks were also excellent but not very hot. Knowing those things and telling them up front will probably make it better but we’ll definitely be going back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN_AxNv4VY8oa4NHVfEHKxnR7GgEQxK5BQUVy33&fid=0x0:0x2b3f9d8745c9118a"],"When":"2024-12-11"},{"Name":"Darlin Valentine","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVoOxw0ZtcdPohFmHQrCtE3Y67b5ZkP6XPcLCNMmVTVMJWXLyE8gw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Been seeing this place in people's reviews, especially their Mortadella Sandwich. To be honest, it tastes so so good. Love the taste and the crunchy side of this.

But I can't say the same for the coffee. The coffee temp is waaaay too hot so we only taste bitter. Service was just questionable but when we told them the coffee's too hot, they just shrugged and walked off. Same goes with the pour over, it's over-heat.

I would come back just for the sandwich, not the coffee though.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOd_wI2vHZ3SkAuncNQX5Fno9zvFT0mmqJX1el0&fid=0x0:0x2b3f9d8745c9118a"],"When":"2024-12-21"},{"Name":"Erick Sánchez Flores","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXzVKzjHilh9t3I257LDML9uW-zHTKhyZnJyrtV6XkfAnKQO1mI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We came to this place for its mortadella supreme croissant sandwich, and it turned out to be a true master piece. Even if you are not a fan of fried eggs, you will love them in this sandwich.
We also tried their Bircher muesli with strawberry compote and it was so good.
Everything else was just delicious. People was very kind and friendly.
You have to try this place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN8x1box7c7YeRPWcm8EW1AAatxABZhJkyYPihD&fid=0x0:0x2b3f9d8745c9118a"],"When":"2024-11-16"},{"Name":"Avelino Santos","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXEJHSk1R5pWN_LtlgS7dTbTqtWxg-jslaGz3nEyqXOxs6pQY3P=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nemesis has been for a while, one of my favorite places for coffee in Vancouver.

It’s great that they do have multiple locations which makes it super easy and accessible .

The coffee is carefully crafted and great quality with the use of premium ingredients .
You can tell they put a lot of effort into their coffee roasting blends.

Service is always on point, personally I go more often to the Hastings location, very well managed with Tim leading the team.

Atmosphere is always great. It is relaxing in there. It is clean and seems very organized. The music is always with a good tone.

Highly suggested👍🏼","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNknpW8oIdt-rvh8Epb-srorVByO2Ugag4DNv3G&fid=0x0:0x2b3f9d8745c9118a"],"When":"2024-8-11"},{"Name":"AnooChi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX724gIupKTCShWzyZdsap_cJn15icjlO94DUGjIkT_Iy-gyYiV=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nemesis Coffee - East Hastings, Vancouver

I stopped by Nemesis Coffee on East Hastings for a quick bite and was not disappointed. The croissants were buttery and perfectly flaky, and the mocha I had was rich and full of flavor. The vibe of the place really stood out to me—it's one of those spots that makes you want to stay longer just to soak in the atmosphere. Whether you're here for a quick coffee or to relax, Nemesis Coffee does not disappoint!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPA5akedqfJGzGQ2rCNNXe-4Y67xwPzcZFOdWf9&fid=0x0:0x2b3f9d8745c9118a"],"When":"2024-9-10"},{"Name":"P McP","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWrQ6CttgKbtYxpcsiXxD6tGBZWfDx9Q3w2GsGbU04YnaRRNmYD=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One time my mom recommended this place for us to visit while in Vancouver. Now when I travel to Vancouver, I always stop by.

This is the most delicious coffee shop in the area, from the pastries to the drinks everything is phenomenal. The menu blows my mind every time I visit, I highly recommend trying any of the pastries, especially the croissant because it really is just as good as it looks and definitely the mortadella supreme because oh brother, this is the one.

If you’re in the area, take a moment to visit, you really won’t regret it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMXiW3K0JUAV33q0NpdLCFTFbHB26uNJnpau03B&fid=0x0:0x2b3f9d8745c9118a"],"When":"2024-11-8"},{"Name":"Sahar Moafi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWTqWdG-XMqyRanP5iA9WlzQgByKMZDFF8ssUsrkU5tt89Zd2NoxA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We got there around 10 am on Sunday, not much of a line up, only a couple of people ahead of us, but by the time we finished our food around 10:30, there was a long line up. We ordered the latte, which was delicious with a rich flavor. For food, we tried the Mortadella and the Bodega Sando. Between the two, I preferred the Mortadella because of the croissant—it was perfectly crispy on the outside and soft and chewy on the inside. Their mustard aioli had a subtle tangy kick that paired beautifully with the avocado and egg.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP6jm5QZPl9dI039aIIJQnEaEebvJgn_m3IUBN6&fid=0x0:0x2b3f9d8745c9118a"],"When":"2024-12-15"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Aubry Dodge-Fry","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX5GpwMgI28AGzEZZsw866qXTv-VGnPMYDWCrNy0s5MMaLyiJHZgg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Exactly what I was looking for. This was my favorite coffee shop in Vancouver. My boy had the espresso and I had an Americano with a hint of caramel and a chocolate croissant. The coffee was delicious and the croissant was the best I’ve had! The chocolate on the inside was perfectly creamy, not a chunk. The bread was buttery and flaky and soft. Mouthwatering. And vibe of the Prado Cafe is cool and kind of boho. Staff are very kind and helpful:) If I lived here I would visit often for sure!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPUqyGfBW6H0EathL3jEHguVHD3Fc1KAFDqo9FL&fid=0x0:0xb38c1b3f9b92803c"],"When":"2024-10-12"},{"Name":"Glenn P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVPb_SuGHZXNdEXK_LTQ_uoaEUBTSlAJguk1wuR4TDZp7YSkYA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"It was just ok.  Everyone was friendly-ish.  I’m thinking just tired.  Hot chocolate was fine and standard croissant was tasty.  Maybe a tad on the higher price side.   Atmosphere,  at least when I came in at 9am,  there was none. It was just very very quiet. Overall did it stand out. No.  Which was unfortunate as it was recommended by another cafe which didn’t have any pastries at the time","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMJuXV_F4l1yVsEU4-5ZffnuyC734SJhc2-ck2F&fid=0x0:0xb38c1b3f9b92803c"],"When":"2024-11-14"},{"Name":"P RD","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLHXwxfJtX4K-lVHITV53Mf4iCw6WMWYEJ3bUzaKlUwzCPjyQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Visiting from Ontario and stopped for a coffee which was delicious and rich (Americano).  Also tried the grilled cheese and the cheddar and chive scone that were to die for.  Great spot as an alternative to the usual big chains.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN85cfXMTkQs2ujqHUiO9AL7gK1aQobb-HBCCaw&fid=0x0:0xb38c1b3f9b92803c"],"When":"2024-10-8"},{"Name":"serena chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX2uOZq0xjwJQhHv7Pgli00LQzFMq63cG0ZxJ-W38f36Xi1Tf6g4w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I live near so I do go here often, but i’ll have to say they are pretty inconsistent with the quality. I usually get a matcha latte and a turkey club sandwich. I ordered online today but they didn’t make it until I arrived, but I completely understand. But my sandwich came with no turkey or any arugula so I was a little disappointed. The matcha does hit sometimes and is really nice though!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNKCNcPqFc-YYB5zOBjosN1XFJtMa5XRJUVO2p0&fid=0x0:0xb38c1b3f9b92803c"],"When":"2024-8-5"},{"Name":"Hye","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjULQQSi1mhNFty7n8ZPesKkMpD31jiIGazltx_wRmE-swaOwr4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This cafe is a great spot to sit and work on my laptop. I enjoyed a Cheddar chive scone today, which was very filling for a dessert haha. The only downside for me is that the long chair along the window is a bit too high for the table, causing my neck to tire easily.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPEn7ifIpuP-xU5ay8uZiB9pBGGfpI0pVcTZFY&fid=0x0:0xb38c1b3f9b92803c"],"When":"2024-4-23"},{"Name":"Kelly Hrelja","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUVWh8qmVdPEfqahFaQ6ox93SOukCBaQIQqwS9jEApuOOnHfC4ZzQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Pretty cute little cafe. They had a couple seasonal drinks on the menu and a nice selection of snacks, but I wasn't blown away by the (autumn spice) latte or cookie (with no name).

Great atmosphere and very friendly staff though! Would come back to sit and work on my laptop.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNt9w4sKHwhADopHFWAvURJACxShMPS_77JLCMJ&fid=0x0:0xb38c1b3f9b92803c"],"When":"2023-10-23"},{"Name":"Dylan Field","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXntP862Q0yfkZlq6_cUal59cdYPliPcu-WApwGe01w11JxuFNP=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I ordered a cappuccino. Terrible choice. $5 for something the size of my palm, overly acidic & bitter, unsmooth. The cafe was empty (Friday 11am) and the owner was walking, sometimes standing in the middle of the floor berating staff. Go out the back! She is beyond unacceptable, the staff are lovely. The owner killed the vibe, disappointing because the space with the  high glass windows and original floors could really be something great. If not for the evil queen owner lady sucking the life out of the place. Free wifi but go somewhere else.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM3c3tDG9qwyTH4WKYNuVmDisFlaRdcIU9T8Yc&fid=0x0:0xb38c1b3f9b92803c"],"When":"2024-7-19"},{"Name":"Ads","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVwDyuvQtXP_VygmU1rNXhUJ0mc48E4h1QtDkdEfrlXmuS-mYhL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"This is the second time I visited a Prado branch and the second time I was served luke-warm bland coffee. My Soy Cortado was massively dull, unimpressive and a disappointment.
I hate to bash on this joint and local businesses as it seems a sweet coffee house.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMLDawcQvXtR-hi8EKJiFK_2oozr1eURcpWW3WI&fid=0x0:0xb38c1b3f9b92803c"],"When":"2023-9-19"}]

title: Mink Chocolates Cafe
address: 863 W Hastings St, Vancouver, BC V6C 3N9
descriptions: Cocoa specialist offering handmade chocolates plus tea, coffee, dessert & chocolate drinks.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Anjana Ramesh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX_u2BnNG3bLDugh5sSEw9Wh8vzwOrNIoCcKHn7L3I4N1E2ifrPEg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you're a hot chocolate lover, do not waste a minute after you read this review. Grab their DRINKING CHOCOLATE. It is out of the world. We were in Vancouver for a week and we visited this cafe 5 times. It was so rich and good.  I also tried their almond croissant, it was soft and fresh, and a little too sweet. Their service is incredible too, and they're open from 7.30am, and have free Wi-Fi. So you can also choose to work from there. It's an amazing, cute cafe! DO NOT MISS THE drinking chocolate. Yummm!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN8P8yWUILSKZhsJ_01LZG0LpdrReLVYkBjZ6vy&fid=0x0:0x13db2de9757b65d8"],"When":"2024-12-4"},{"Name":"A J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVPhePqx3luHjibd-BPEgI8NyZ2WH8jzx573tqMLS47tXb93JNe=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Staff is great and so was my mocha! I hope they add a lot more vegan options because right now it’s just one. The chocolate quality was superb though. If you have no restrictions, you’ll enjoy the chocolate choices.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPPTrM_g1zNUIJl-FwRkd1ibJ-nP1GZN-JNdUmU&fid=0x0:0x13db2de9757b65d8"],"When":"2024-7-30"},{"Name":"Chris Istace","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWCbRgyKhn0iP5wKS-k8NPKcMUcmr3FoAGrn0ATm2OV_TfMev9LYg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I was here yesterday and tried a milk chocolate mocha. Well, it’s the next day and I’m back as this is the smoothest and best tasting mocha I have ever had. I let the barista know and she said it’s because they use a chocolate ganache and it’s made fresh each day. My simple last words are that this mocha and cafe are now on my permanent downtown Vancouver radar. (Also awesome location with a beautiful courtyard patio public space right out front)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOKokzts-pRsVcFcWUvvvRG2juyVTcktOdun1Ub&fid=0x0:0x13db2de9757b65d8"],"When":"2024-9-18"},{"Name":"May Zhagro","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU9KviWdU_UGm6yjKPv-6aFaljm1EC_ecrxYhnt_LO3duiyBNho=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Mink Chocolates Cafe is located in a great location right near the waterfront. They serve a variety of chocolate beverages as well as they have chocolates for purchase. It took a while for me to order my drink because the ladies in front of me were picking eating chocolates and there was only one man working behind the counter. I ordered the iced chocolate and sat outside to drink it. The iced chocolate was very average, more milk than chocolate. It was more of a milk shake than an iced chocolate and it was quite disappointing. There are seatings both within and outside of the cafe.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPCOGMaunM9z_kFJG3EMqTdvRRMtkj2nH2pVLtJ&fid=0x0:0x13db2de9757b65d8"],"When":"2023-12-27"},{"Name":"Pat Agca","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJk_rzfou5jjEUU_yg-gbEh1fy8FnBio7xc7o0f-Us14ZYegw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Update: 22:16 Sunday Jan14,
The owner requested that I remove the photo I had uploaded featuring the staff. I complied, deleting it and uploading an edited version. The owner is aware of the particular staff member who provided poor service to my daughter and me. Will they take action? Probably not. Will I return to that place? Definitely not. Despite being regular customers, my daughter and I will not be going back due to the unpleasant experience with that staff member.

Original review:
My daughter and I rushed to get here (Hastings Downtown location) before they closed at 5pm on a Sunday. Looking forward to the Hot Chocolate Festival specials they got. Made it at 4:35pm.  Ordered and last told us she can't serve us the special anymore since it was half hour until closing.  I'm like what?  It's a long time from now. What's the difference?  We came all the way here for that and she denied us the special drink.  She looked really unhappy and unenthusiastic to serve us.  So disappointed!  No customer service skills at all!  The person that served us is shown in the pictures.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN3W1Ce2TGNy8LFC_oU8d3UJ0B4sqkgbba8B3Eu&fid=0x0:0x13db2de9757b65d8"],"When":"2024-1-15"},{"Name":"Molly Janz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJs_ygTS4Tj0gDGVvjCKhzCcoxB1gwYV-VIfu70OHKGNlsp5A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Everything here was perfect and I can confidently say this place was absolutely worth taking the SkyTrain from Coquitlam for","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOQzSgIqMcERxOs30-neDbyNu5VRGr7pnksoOQA&fid=0x0:0x13db2de9757b65d8"],"When":"2024-11-19"},{"Name":"Beezer333 Beezer333","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX3wo1m-4sufmg5069NtcuAFRSIVJ6amfyY9UrEO5NtVtv3Asyw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nice atmosphere close to the water

Staff are good - they were able to make a recommendation on a drink with caffeine 😀","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMK0GO0oESvzZDpIZwF4T_wCw2LcwWYvP-c5ho8&fid=0x0:0x13db2de9757b65d8"],"When":"2024-9-7"},{"Name":"Bluebell S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLthGAS8je9lEkTa4oEibbDB6WfJ3_nx_JDmZoHAiDhSEkVag=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"It and was quite disappointed with my experience. Despite the cafe not being busy, my order was completely forgotten. I had to remind the staff about it, and when she finally acknowledged it, there was no apology for the oversight. Additionally, she forgot to include the chocolate that was supposed to come with my drink. Overall, the service was lacking, and it really took away from what could have been a nice visit. I hope they can improve their attention to detail in the future.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Michelle Jacomille","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUUEKPRwAMpphG-FoTUHkbGj7S73-r76qHl9ZSJbCpwKwcmI_Fv=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nice service. Friendly staff. I was asking if their desserts are nut-free as I have suspected allergy to nuts but they are not sure what options they can give me. I appreciated she’s trying to help me choose the dessert. It’s a good place to stop by before going to a meeting or appointment.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP4JA4GUNVauUKOFJpaAmctkirVa8cUtMZg2eiR&fid=0x0:0x28c9045f922c78de"],"When":"2023-11-3"},{"Name":"Jamie McConomy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUZu4P2gF5MqHYIk8ZaCtJjT5d38hHjvJtT_6HAiCbAzdz1deM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"One of the highlights of Cultured Coffee & Tea is their commitment to using fresh and organic ingredients. This attention to quality is evident in every sip, whether it's a classic espresso or a more elaborate tea-infused beverage. The staff at Cultured Coffee & Tea are knowledgeable and friendly, always ready to offer recommendations or share insights about their brews","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOy5u0IxSrMqEibqEwQF7lWUHXLxOW67h5qsGIo&fid=0x0:0x28c9045f922c78de"],"When":"2024-1-2"},{"Name":"Jacob Tremblay","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUs7OYgHiXuL0GxarPnd34Lvk7KU74TB1XepxSuGhUQH2iWe1c=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"What sets Cultured Coffee & Tea Cafe apart is their commitment to sustainability, evident in their use of biodegradable cups and ethically sourced beans and leaves. This Eco-friendly approach, combined with their exceptional drinks and warm service, makes it a cafe worth visiting and revisiting.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM71wJ_2zmtntCiWdwTr0Eyxy1WujgTl2In7ISt&fid=0x0:0x28c9045f922c78de"],"When":"2024-1-4"},{"Name":"Colin Yeung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUmj6MhtlSuchjt0rwIhDLL-gfFLCSzn9JjmAgaVo0OShSgXKYS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Was waiting for my appointment so decided to take a break at this location and decided to give their drinks a try. Ordered the Chai tea latte and I would have to say it's the best Chai latte I've ordered compared to other coffee shops!

I even ordered from Starbucks yesterday to compare with this one and it doesn't compete with this one. The drink is super hot (which is my preference), and it wasn't too sweet either. I would definitely come back, I do wish it was in a more convenient location for me to drop by once in awhile (kind of like the other chain coffee shops), but if I'm around, I would come back here again.

The price is decent, not too expensive either (at least compared to other coffee shops that is).","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMTeQe9h9TAeHFBc2EUxMjSoCH2HgPDAs0uoKhw&fid=0x0:0x28c9045f922c78de"],"When":"2023-2-7"},{"Name":"Chef Menajem Peretz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWFHHucZwQOsfB8-8SKRbUjhOVQd_5RL6RbAdEZcnLC3uuqNK4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Inside City Square, nice local and down to earth coffee shop with good selection of teas and coffees, sweet and savoury. It is a great location with a nice view, special on the Vancouver raining days, this place has so much light. Quick coffee or afternoon reading... love this location","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPGFMYw3XA9QzJIPk24BjsT-UiL30cNkeMXrSo&fid=0x0:0x28c9045f922c78de"],"When":"2021-1-18"},{"Name":"Alex Kwok","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX3a3eM7HA4sjUvw6eFlNEvqOnyxwyahVrT2iU09Asc6ovCtnc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The Cultured Coffee definitely owns up to its name. Located on the upper level at the City Square Mall. The coffee and pastries are good. The service is excellent and friendly. Its a small and cozy place to get a quick bite.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOWVPaGzXVqfHl9wgKOJpMsgabvC__1kDJd-WU&fid=0x0:0x28c9045f922c78de"],"When":"2021-2-3"},{"Name":"Erica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJiBiehVBMqDRcQQk3J28lEnqLVQ-p5tIOA0Zlj3wvs65IUmg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Café that has been opened for 10+ years, located on the upper level of City Square Shopping Centre (right above the escalators, it’s hard to miss). They have a wide variety of coffees, cold drinks, pastries, sandwiches, soups and more. When I went, they had a combo deal going on for a free soup with any purchase of a sandwich and drink. Prices are quite reasonable as well. Currently only take-out or delivery. Friendly staff and quick service.

My order:
Dark Chocolate Peanut Butter Ball ($3.70): highly recommend this one! It’s basically a large Reece cup in a ball shape. Dark chocolate coated peanut butter ball, with chunks of real peanuts sprinkled in as well. It’s surprisingly not too sweet, but it’s quite rich so I’d recommend getting just one for the perfect after meal dessert (or pack a few for the road).

Frappe Caramello ($6+): subtle caramel flavour, but it isn’t too sweet overall and is a great iced drink to cool down on a hot day. Most drinks come in small, medium, or large size.

Frappe Mochalatto ($6+): It is more chocolate-y, so it’s perfect for people who don’t like strong coffee drinks. Slightly sweeter than the caramel frappe.

Beef Sausage Roll ($3.70): flaky pastry dough, and they heat it up for you. Nice and filling snack.

Turkey Panini (~$9): they heat this up on a panini grill for you. Comes with cheddar cheese, sundried tomato, pesto, spinach, and mayo on a house-made ciabatta bun. I like the sweet-tart flavour that the sundried tomato adds to the sandwich. Easy hot meal to take to-go.

Macaroon Madness (~$3): I liked the oatmeal and coconut crumble on top, it adds a good texture and taste. There’s also a caramel drizzle on top. It has a soft mushy texture, but was a bit too sweet for my personal preference.

Cinnamon Twist: house-made as well, with a nice caramelized crunchy cinnamon top.  I microwaved it at home with a bit of butter and it is very delicious.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPYjM5sfP9N7GtW7SGuCi0_BscSH3yC4FiiIKx2&fid=0x0:0x28c9045f922c78de"],"When":"2021-5-9"},{"Name":"Lumpylee76","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX1h1H1cRa5LcrFMLGPemzo6wPlL6JhJATVLMV0njRjjh-wKaz4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Very friendly people great service but the food was not fresh got a cinnamon roll and it was very stale, the cheese croissant wasn’t flaky more like a Pillsbury croissant dough like, and the sausage roll wasn’t flavourful at all but the coffee was good. Don’t know what happened to the food here as I remember it to be so good.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Nicolas Martinez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVxCKAreGx67VSJZEieVsVD3BEZWX5PIEfeqAwrDtBfWBdP92qotg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've been on a quest for kebab and shawarma for a long time as Vancouver is seriously underwhelming in that regard compared to Europe. Their kebab lunch wrap was delicious. Plenty of tasty meat (grilled beef kubideh I believe), spices, herbs (basil) and veg (some dried and fresh tomatoes mix, onions) and white sauce.

It is only served on Fridays and certain seasons it seems (they didn't have it on the menu during summer) so may want to call in to check but they will kindly offer to keep one on the side got you.

Note the photo is half portion as I sliced it to share with my partner. Single portion feeds one hungry person and I found it of great value at $12.55 after tax.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN6NK7j93g5Uki08OlDqt1dB4hcaEQJQ1C48cn-&fid=0x0:0x28a7795e1b801e03"],"When":"2024-9-20"},{"Name":"Tar Charbonneau","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXZL7yEQCp4O0ejPBMW64W8Uhlp8ANbA-sDOefxgfFQ2VpV-cc=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is awesome! The staff were a bit overwhelmed by volume, but were cool and friendly. The beet salad is amazing - would give it 10 stars if I could. Lots of flavour and a great balance between lemony/vinegary goodness, seedy crunchiness, and cheesy creaminess. Latte is excellent, too. Muffins are to die for. Support these folks! Great place to grab a coffee, work (lots of outlets and they seem laptop-friendly - just take up single spaces if possible (bars in the windows)), or hang out with friends.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"candy L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXgq2OgnXFRsC1icGye-CTgUf_6kEV0cPoOgzI7ANMes5eDT-Xz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is really a hidden gem and it's my new discovery and newfound love. Although it's quite far away from where I live, I have already come here three days in a row. The place is small but has a great vibe. The music, green plants, and colorful walls make it come alive. Especially the staff, who are all friendly. Their shrimp sandwiches are my favorite. The shrimp is fresh, and the smooth avocados and crispy grilled sourdough make a great combination for every bite. I'll try their salads and breakfast next time. It's worth traveling far to be here.
* updated:Yesterday, I came here around 3:30 pm and discovered that all the salads had been sold out. Today, I arrived earlier, at around 12:30 pm, but encountered a long line, and once again found that the salads had sold out. However, I'm grateful that one of the male staff members was willing to ask the chef to prepare a salad for me. He also informed me that I could call ahead to reserve a salad. So, if you're planning to visit, make sure to arrive early or call ahead since the place is quite popular and busy during lunch hours.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOAeXthvgQ894tCayifD-p3zXZf-msP-BsVmklU&fid=0x0:0x28a7795e1b801e03"],"When":"2023-5-4"},{"Name":"Brian B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX7EgUPUwwc_O6sMMCdoF3PX68Oqbpl3CtqtRX2GaFa2ySFFqJBSQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A hidden coffee shop for anyone who loves coffee. I had the decaf Spanish latte and fell in love with it. The subtle sweetness and creamy taste are just perfect for this Fall season. My coworker also recommends the Chai drink as it's one of the best around here. I would definitely recommend to drop by if you are in the neighborhood. Parking here can be difficult as they have street parking and paid around the corner. Also the area around this shop has improved but stay safe.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMpMu2A8K4Kkdjum8V2GNjK8r-oJh5Wid51tS5w&fid=0x0:0x28a7795e1b801e03"],"When":"2023-10-27"},{"Name":"Javier DH","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJp-cu-FtAi0TgFdHJ-Lc0G9EH85KkYKaUWCHJHPfSk9m4lcA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My best moments are in this beautiful cafeteria, their food is delicious: the salads, the sandwiches, the cookies, the desserts, the drinks deserve a lot of applause. Also, the staff that serves you is the most beautiful thing.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kyle Ü","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUNsxywOgLvfNXpSWng32uUXIJuvFLKgNgV6F7XYrEUdvtbk_UF0A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My friend recommended this cafe to me when I just started working in the neighborhood. I love their Iced Spanish Latte and great sandwiches (grilled cheese and chicken ... ). Good customer services too.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNIUtKeD0MII9rBovHGsTncmEtdql2Y4pssaZmw&fid=0x0:0x28a7795e1b801e03"],"When":"2023-4-14"},{"Name":"Lana Putnam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU7e34fH_N3czRwyzg5K1VO6e44JurTCIBEtAVZGidz8btFjeI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It is my Pleasure to write this Review. I was out on business in the area,  and unbeknownst to me I stumbled across the most amazing Treasure!!
Coffee - the Absolute BEST!! I had a Latte !! Mmmmmm - taste-texture-temperature!!  Delicious and the most perfect size!! Like Arnold says “i’ll be back!!” :: to show your support! Very clean and fresh and genuine 🙏🏻","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMGr3dA338PH0yz5L9XKxUtZSuZd8eDfWIcR6Yv&fid=0x0:0x28a7795e1b801e03"],"When":"2023-7-31"},{"Name":"Ryan Flanigan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJqGhcpsdXVBJTBK2sr2rVv6lC8P1epbRLd8_537o2Q6QeDpQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Friendly staff, veggie wrap was amazing and latte was great. Also it was busy and everything came out in good time. What more could you ask for!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Olivia Keady","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWQC_nHb1kVdBOZqP-ImTwJWUS_WroM_kMH6tQwiBqObZ23cHz-=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had a great experience here. The staff member that I spoke to was extremely friendly and helpful. They helped myself and my partner choose some new teas to try. The tea itself is also really lovely, and I have yet to try one that I didn't like. We came back to buy Christmas gifts here as their smallest available size if perfect for gifting.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Heather Chatterton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL7IfedKSn_eOIC8drcusP2ZP2fmQV5HK2K0Y50okRIFlF0Xg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"👍‼️✅️✅️ABSOLUTELY EXCELLENT tea -plus much more store🔆- EVERYthing related to enjoying an exceptional cup of tea can be found at this little store!  After different teas searches over many years- THIS is a GEM that we have been to a few times now-and-right HERE in Vancouver! You WILL find 100's of super quality teas-green, black, Irish, Scottish, English, herbal, soothing, healing, wonderful scents, and flavours-NO doubts✅️✅️ We met 4 great staff-Sabrina-owner, Fionn, Rachel and Nathan- ALL had WONDERful, immediate products knowledge for us, and gave us great tips on flavours,  steeping suggestions, etc. (Instructions ARE written on packaging labels too-in case you forget!) We've tasted about 50 teas by now! They have EVERYthing you could likely want 😳- tea strainers, pots, mugs, cozies, aprons, slippers, gifts, honeys-etc!🤗 😄🔆✅️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMqk9DbYVk0JcxLoCftlEOVjLdsfLPYkFlj3QAF\u0026fid=0x0:0x77376cc7f686e6d"],"When":"2024-1-21"},{"Name":"cynthia skabar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU8a-K1qdeyxgtw8uBKLSpMQWqTmuezqjReFU290PjW9LudkBXo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a great place to shop for teas.  I found it when I was looking for the perfect tea cup for tea leaf reading and I've been going back ever since.  The young lady who works there is always happy to help and very positive with the patrons.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Evan Chartrand","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVqoqzDslov5SpBh68kAWpcDecGlsKfDoP8Kv8vJJ_e0oNKITvaPA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Go to loose-leaf tea shop, always very friendly staff. Tea's are good quality too, I recommend white chocolate pistachio rooibos and razzleberry oolong","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Karen McMullen - Human Design \u0026 Channeled Guidance","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWtCvpBcpsSuRmaGZnyvfX1IiAyiaLPU9qyBFwpHwkDcCv9hYRK=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have been buying tea from Bayswater Tea Co. since I lived in Vancouver in 2008! Wherever I go in the world, I still order from Sabrina and have her mail me my tea. I haven't found anything that is the same quality with the same value. I LOVE ~ Ganesh, Superstar, Jade Blossom Green (I think that's what it's called), Cream of Earl Grey Rooibos, Indian Chai Rooibos. Get the biggest size.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Scarlett Sergeant","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXWsc3dzYi-pWPuyNxdTZzIGAvx_Pze71CgZy-yAbPupxfZPDQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The employee who helped me was so kind and helpful, and my tea is phenomenal! I don’t know much about tea but they really helped me make a great choice. I will 100% be returning.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Anne Easton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocICJh22sEEyUy0hwFiBZiCgjX4liV5YWYK025j4qZ-BNx_oXQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love love love this place! Amazing selection of every imaginable tea. No artificial flavours here. The staff are so knowledgeable. They can help you find the perfect tea for any occasion. I have been buying tea here for many years and never been disappointed.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Alisa Manion","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLCM2h7JUzf8q3U7C5ruabxr0XJM1JkpG0DFxkArTxR5qlJ8w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My favourite tea store! Great selection!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Calvin Liu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ5Mit-RWhfYjdblIfRdGphjR6DeeMI5rlC_N1eKGe7_JgzWQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"NUT CREAM IS SO GOOD!! I have no idea how they achieve such creamy, velvety textures but the taste is heavenly.

The strawberry tea with nut cream was my favourite. The Earl gray with chocolate nut cream was also delicious. There's a slight powdery taste in the milk tea with pearls, probably from the nuts.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOp7HfBZa3bxiQ5lRFyYDi8aJYqc6r9i5zyazfE&fid=0x0:0x23e3b303b0f9f9a5"],"When":"2024-8-27"},{"Name":"tikki","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWzV_Y6bQFjodBKC8anq5nBVFmCTC7hA6Nh7xklFQuKGefK40A_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very lovely vegan tea shop in Kits. The drinks are yummy and healthy but not overly sweet or heavy. The original nut cream was really impressive and I would definitely recommend getting the drink with that cream!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMj5cT9AAikGiOmIKxqgnkl0oFzGqwp9_Uu5mut&fid=0x0:0x23e3b303b0f9f9a5"],"When":"2024-8-11"},{"Name":"Kimia Abtahi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ2CE2uN5zYA5-Ne2mDlfB8HQlAxJSeFJKc2I3kIPxW8BoK=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I recently visited NUTTEA Cafe with a friend. Since I have a nut allergy, I was limited in options, but the staff were friendly and helped me choose a strawberry iced tea made with fresh fruit—a refreshing blend of tea and smoothie. My friend ordered the chocolate hazelnut nut "milky," which was creamy and enjoyable, though not groundbreaking. Overall, it’s a nice spot for those who enjoy nut-based drinks!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNvUAtWGuqLQWXDb18EzeYoDf6RRZRZS8_qWqY&fid=0x0:0x23e3b303b0f9f9a5"],"When":"2024-11-13"},{"Name":"Cece Ch","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUbcgZ6qX05fbBNbrTAirE6Cx1wU1NBdo2me25Ptstplqs3q_0V=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love love love how they are completely vegan so I didn’t have to pay extra $$$ for a dairy-free option.

I tried their Biscoff coffee with nut cream - loved it!

Their lid design is pretty sweet - love the idea of scooping the cream to taste before sipping the coffee itself!

Need more cafes like this!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN4eeMg1P4bGkUlglDBoxicmkc01iL33SP431YC&fid=0x0:0x23e3b303b0f9f9a5"],"When":"2024-6-13"},{"Name":"Pearl Rose von Euw","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWBzQjzzGHsxkUQyewt440jrpJ1s9xIXESPk355K3n1sZzmjq2Suw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Wonderful all-vegan cafe with a long list of drink options, warm and cold! They make their nut milk in-house and you can tell they do everything with passion.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNOkmmUxK1ilp7GYjtzTOBsX8rzs2YBbqXaupkD&fid=0x0:0x23e3b303b0f9f9a5"],"When":"2024-12-7"},{"Name":"Utopia Colores","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXo2REOlk2i3P7yOu4CYS2_AUDNwJlgIS0nFPTIUjVHsatiCHGe=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time in this place and will definitely come back. I love bubble tea and i can’t believe I didn’t try this place before! i always struggle to find good dairy free milk tea options, let alone one with cream! Loved to see they also have To Live For and Bonus Bakery baked goods. My non-vegan boyfriend usually doesn’t love the flavour of plant-based milk but loved his drink too.

Nuttea offers fresh tapioca pearls and real fruit in the smoothies, smooth slightly savory plant-based cream, amazing overall flavour and excellent service. 5/5 for me 🫰🏻","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPT2bjYwqUx-o182Wmcrjb2-BDOuMuqbw3sE0Vv&fid=0x0:0x23e3b303b0f9f9a5"],"When":"2024-3-14"},{"Name":"Chloe Rachel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWgExGuK1W-XgQc1tPnrQlqQkWxCTaNhdz977uVTTY3zjpsAzs-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Finally got a chance to visit NUTTEA thanks to my Plant Curious coupon book (which did save me $7). I had the Black Sesame Nut Mylk and added tapioca pearls. It had a strong nutty flavour in combination with the nut mylk. I really enjoyed it! The pearls had good texture and were quite sweet, so they balanced out the black sesame well. My friend had the Hunny Dream (their entry in Vancouver Foodster's Spring Drink Challenge). Nice flavours between the earl grey, honey and nut cream. We liked how thick the nut cream was as it held well in transit, along with the "hunny crumbs" and almonds. It was $10.20, which is a similar specialty pricing to Hot Chocolate Festival drinks.

Customers can adjust ice and sugar levels in their drinks. It's wonderful to have a "mylk" tea shop focused on vegan options. Unfortunately, it's quite pricey as my nut mylk with pearls is regular $9.45 (before tax). I'm not in the Kitsilano area often and wouldn't make a special trip out, but I'd return if in the area for a treat! The staff were friendly, and they also sell plant-based snacks and small gift items. Limited seating for four inside at the high counter, and a couple of tables outside by the sidewalk.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM21361cJFC7MDDV0TDUCuZgpW3K0GB3BA1QAMF&fid=0x0:0x23e3b303b0f9f9a5"],"When":"2024-4-29"},{"Name":"Mia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIm8SG257WZ07l_06tkhi14cSVPOrh1C0B6QdOhlbeT-Zu2_w4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is amazing! The owner and staffs are so nice!

I found out about NutTea in Toronto first and was so happy that they have a location in Vancouver! I was able to recommend to my friends who live in Vancouver and all of them love it! They're so unique compared to the regular bubble tea stores! Their nut cream is so creamy, fresh and so addicting, and the sweetness level is perfect! Highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP_7LfWNnb6dO8p5qwjIljBJLMDiv2gGZH4gIBl&fid=0x0:0x23e3b303b0f9f9a5"],"When":"2023-12-29"}]

title: SunTea 新作の茶 Hastings
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Onsite services","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"highlights","name":"Highlights","options":[{"name":"Great tea selection","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible parking lot","enabled":true}]},{"id":"parking","name":"Parking","options":[{"name":"Free parking lot","enabled":true}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Hiep Nguyen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWMRHHZ7t798igHqhwEObqqiXXBYRe7_vTRRS3-gXG7fOgZlXSH=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Was craving for some bbt at 9pm Sunday night so my wife and I went to Sun Tea on Hastings near SFU. I got the peach oolong tea with pearls and my wife got the tofu pudding with pearls and some white jelly balls. Total came to $9.50. My pearls clumped together and was hard to get it through the straw. Maybe the ice was too cold? 🤷‍♂️. My drink was OK. They had alot of selections. My fave is matcha, but didn't see anything on the menu with it. Gotta try something else next time, hope it would be better.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNDzmwl9IWn50gjLrAZk9dFFOWATZKOttgeBKhb&fid=0x0:0x63c57ab14b0c9757"],"When":"2024-9-2"},{"Name":"Kaman Kwok","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVTfY1lFx7N7LsexryuKa9Q76pyfiBSBOSe4KZKmNeoZtDKwC8s=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"We tried their signature and #1 favorite Fleshy Mango Slush with coconut milk. It has some real mango pieces - not as many as the amount of grapefruit they put in the cup. Cannot taste any coconut milk at all. Yes the drink looks very yellow (mango) but it tastes more like a grapefruit slush. We ordered both no sugar and half sugar - we all feel no sugar is too sour half sugar is slightly too sweet. Unfortunately they don’t have 1/3 sugar option.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMmq7K9cZ6wf4J3Ks4JpursOHz-zFtHK8xRWvWN&fid=0x0:0x63c57ab14b0c9757"],"When":"2024-4-22"},{"Name":"Caitlyn Mah","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU23oPs6bp630i4HnRsvlmDM8OHCc6tCmjkktp0TTzRYVRaKdEDRg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Ordered the 1L mango slush drink! Tasted pretty good but in comparison to other mango drink places, it was average. Love that they offer this option though, and being a mango lover I am not complaining. Would consider returning for another mango fix in the future 🫡","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNs-a2ny5StYRTwi9ut51iAda6zqFxYx-hCPqN6&fid=0x0:0x63c57ab14b0c9757"],"When":"2024-7-2"},{"Name":"Zahara Lufar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIkU0pVrhQmHvgXA7-Qr0g5qJ8e93XJpntiGvRs3OWVhwWGJLU=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Waste of money. Ordered a honeydew slush and yes slush has ice, but this is literally just water and ice and barely any fruit $8, for just crushed ice, don’t buy slushes from here it’s a scam. Overly priced for what they offer ! Disappointed","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP8p3FiVWqLNjoRKBnp31K_dV3f1JYVCOVQ9Y3y&fid=0x0:0x63c57ab14b0c9757"],"When":"2024-10-28"},{"Name":"Lạc","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUpO8370_7RDhjsqnPt6c35t5mMarMGN54u0eeSrhk9ZwWK5CU=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The drinks here are amazing. I only went there twice but every time I was always 100% satisfied. My favorite order so far is probably the brulee taro coconut milk tea. It’s insanely good. I’ll definitely try out their entire menu.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"AdrianLee263","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXXAhMYzY2_PZAqB1pKWjI7kxSq9mPV0Ra40Vu_zkWmXxnpaX4kiQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Ordered through Buy 1 Get 1 Uber Eat, Brown Sugar Pearl Milk Tea & The Oranges.
Tastes so so, prefer Milk Tea from Coco.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPFTKLDgsUGNQMGJoEZii5nH7huCpGkL1HbV6uX&fid=0x0:0x63c57ab14b0c9757"],"When":"2024-9-20"},{"Name":"Elizabeth Pederson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWxtwQ0gCdIoJG5048luM-MNrVVVP8u7RPRu6zX3jFifFtX120fjA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Stopped here on a Saturday afternoon to get my daughter a bubble tea. I ordered a simple mango slush for her and was told the only size I could order was a large. The total came to $8 and when I asked why the only size available was a large I was ignored by the staff.
Drink tasted like mango, but there were barely any fresh mango chunks or white pearls.
Rude service and overpriced for what you get.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Haohan Xu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX2OF2IvtaHPmIv02p13h4xBl3tQ_RzeoVJbqB1gazhcLJJ-0uq=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I recently visited this bubble tea shop and ordered a milk tea for $8.20, specifying that I wanted it with 50% ice. Unfortunately, my request was not honored as the tea I received was nearly 70% filled with ice. This not only diluted the flavor of the milk tea but also reduced the overall value for the price paid. I am quite disappointed with this experience and feel let down by the shop's disregard for customer preferences. Their inability to follow simple instructions has significantly impacted my satisfaction, and I find it difficult to recommend this place to others seeking a quality bubble tea experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNL6If7Dm8ex0a6p3fZnzLRpinrT0gfH5aIBxZy&fid=0x0:0x63c57ab14b0c9757"],"When":"2023-12-5"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Laury Herubel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIFlD8o6TxHk4zpB8Nv_uM91Dzqj-imQ7m0MinsW4RFyM5ngg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I passed by this little tea shop a few times and finally went in when I was on the lookout for a birthday present for my little sister. I bought the matcha tools kit and she loved it! The matcha latte is delicious and I tried their coconut grilled buns. So good! I had to go back a few days ago to get another one! Little neighborhood tea shop vibe in a big city like Vancouver, one of those little gems you wish you'd know for longer! The owner is so nice, and always makes you feel welcome. 100% recommend - so many drinks variety, I better go back soon to try them all","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tim of Hyrule","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWKhQx5DgDRHuneXvgl_mg9DT905r3ul9i7Xc7TnPl2l8HLorHW=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The best tea in the city! Great value too. I‘ve been coming here almost every week for almost four years now (see my photo collection). Wilson is the friendliest business owner I know and goes out of his way for his customers. Whatever tea you want, if he has the ingredients, he will brew it just the way you like it. His signature cold blaster tea is a great choice for the rainy season (or hangovers!), although I personally like the latteas the best. Consider getting your matcha latte here next time - it’s made with actual matcha and you support a local business!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOGYJfpZLBEDn3YjqIrfO4mYacrjSRf5Sr9_Phm\u0026fid=0x0:0xf53d0a0b5c05ca85"],"When":"2023-4-16"},{"Name":"dumplings","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWFLXClH0CFikhUCvmd0aRYsXAWQA-oABTFf40_8wa7kV5M1UB0=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"i don’t know how this place isn’t more popular. i always passed by but i never went in so i decided to give the matcha latte a shot today and it was delicious! i had a very informative and sweet conversation with the owner who seems super passionate about his business and the tea industry and is very kind. 10/10 recommend this place. will be coming back soon:)","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Claudia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUjEw_nqIcO4cRuEN8WGAsHCbXvvYq8QdrIYJgq68v1kJBXwjTIpQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"After declining being treated to a cup of tea today (I don’t like tea), I was convinced to try one from here. I was given a Cold Blaster tea  and oh my goshhhhh was it ‘out of this world’ amazing!!!! It was soooooo good!! I’m 100% coming back. I have a new obsession.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kieran Dhaliwal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVCdskN_dRX2qKBCjex39_s7MByNj1N7yfIz0FafWXMQEF9DTq9=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love love love!!! The cold blaster is a gift to humanity! Best service also like visiting a friend every time I go in. Do yourself a favor and go!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ilarya Ochab","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWDYDbVMhbjBbWUmsdPuAetuvHh_5HvVGVln4T5C65_dy21l1ip=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing tea! The cold blaster is a life saver and the selection of other teas is unreal. Everyone is always super friendly.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Michelle Andrea Macapagal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWxAQptd8Kj0oWbBb1bevUie71NLcQR9KvFk8OAMNBKEj6We1YEIQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The matcha was excellent, the service was fantastic, and a special shoutout to Wilson for that! I even got to smell the chai leaves, which were bursting with flavor. I’m excited to try the chai next time!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Franco Jonas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVsw7Y5LTbLyxBCNsFNfwZwlBQoVU_E3LsxlCIjIHdrWemthYMf=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I stopped by to try the place out, and it was a total success. I ordered a Tuna Salad Sandwich and Soup Combo; it was completely amazing, the Sandwich was a generous size as was the soup, and the owner's treatment was even better. I work in a Cafeteria that is a few meters down the same sidewalk, I honestly prefer to support independent places, with a proposal that has not become \"fast\" of a chain. I will definitely be back. ✌🏼","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Alicia HA","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUunuTgLZIKX7YTiVQZwD37mGwfp0HWAIS3R1uQfpUDTYgdfZEB=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Immaculate vibes!!
One of my fav cafes in Vancouver, it does have the perfect atmosphere and the sandwiches are Ah-mazing.
Love stopping by for lunch
Pear sandwich is a MUST!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOZmfvvBniw7_1YSTfvbEeDhxdyu43aQ6dG0_ba&fid=0x0:0x845a024c4e13013d"],"When":"2024-8-16"},{"Name":"Skin Collector","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVdxuEFvnwk0GfbcLYmVX6syKNGrbv_iCfAOJiiMLY2ESpPGzM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I highly recommend hopping over for the pear blue cheese prosciutto baguette :)
The sandwich was so packed with ingredients, they literally kept on falling out hahaha. But make sure not to waste them cause they are really great quality!
I was very positively surprised by the quality of their walnuts, i usually find them overly dry or slightly bitter in other restaurants.
And theirs reminded me of my grandmothers walnut trees 😊

I would definitely take this sandwich again and again","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOgGJ5In0_hhdowWPtbdsE8bZS3f-MYaymeVKiW&fid=0x0:0x845a024c4e13013d"],"When":"2024-8-6"},{"Name":"Kayla Castillo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX5gK1crZosTQu1HO_xkoA7NvS1Ly6m2fStNaldyoq-C9kEvP9F=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Tried Finch’s for the first time today and it did not disappoint! I’ve been eyeing the pear sandwich for quite some time now since I first heard about Finch’s and it was so delicious! The ingredients were super fresh and the pear really balanced the saltiness of the prosciutto. My friend got the prosciutto sandwich and he really enjoyed it as well!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPHQCg2ih3wmm0oE8sGLFbGabVtXt8SWTtdZyk6&fid=0x0:0x845a024c4e13013d"],"When":"2024-8-15"},{"Name":"Linda B (She/Her)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX8_L4ISfQl630Mo6UvKiuMMo0pJGaC-K-8ud-Fhb5jEVG43GdN4w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a great experience. The sandwiches were fantastic - the bread was perfect, and the ingredients were top-notch. We both ordered the walnut, pear, and blue brie sandwiches. The sandwich comes with prosciutto, too. When we asked for one without prosciutto, they asked if I'd like to substitute something else (I chose grapes).
The best sandwich I've had Vancouver, hands down. I recommend this little gem 💯!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOF7lWmGF4IkFTIyx13XWi1R8Gnx7J2E9G7FNtL&fid=0x0:0x845a024c4e13013d"],"When":"2024-6-10"},{"Name":"Yuppie House","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI1A5hseK-WSYTGqvo0HcrGrK53NeVSiAd8pNNwTPnJbfT4RQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My first time to visit. loved the atmosphere and staff are friendly. the pear, brie sandwich was great taste. all ingredients are fresh and satisfied!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNHWzlHYuQ2pcs1ekS62I3j0c8lKsNnjlp21mjm&fid=0x0:0x845a024c4e13013d"],"When":"2024-12-5"},{"Name":"ゆき","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU_yxP1qBYGp4rvm_RLcuLoOwclbNNOhk_L0OlmRNYpQ_qujFfoSQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is my favorite café in Vancouver. It’s a space where I feel safe and relaxed, and the staff are incredibly kind and wonderful. I’ve been searching for a café like this in Vancouver, so I’m truly happy to have found it! I ordered a chai tea, and I could choose between regular milk and oat milk. It was so delicious, and I had a great time. Next time, I’m planning to come for breakfast :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPsLEG5eyx13IhLn8vEVcGC_Hgz-OqMm7jxzSD-&fid=0x0:0x845a024c4e13013d"],"When":"2024-11-29"},{"Name":"Mehr Poulad","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKnMmsASCmXLOvaFhR1RoQ03vxNx7oVUBdwy_npEYvb7k7uZA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing. You must try their sandwiches. So good and flavourful. Will go back and have other items. My one criticism is that the coffee isn't the best, please improve.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN_17qPg3vefIqtf7ml3tyRGJYeYZjO54DobYJs&fid=0x0:0x845a024c4e13013d"],"When":"2024-6-7"},{"Name":"Gav","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLw3fW9NxSPo82MK8MdrPuA3co62_uPPOfCMT5g8G6GUW74qcsv=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Simple but delicious sandwiches made with thoughtfully chosen ingredients. Located in a beautiful old building with a lovely atmosphere.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOgoIwLvZ0Dq8Xietjd8IhPTp9Mi8B52H1RrgPH&fid=0x0:0x845a024c4e13013d"],"When":"2024-7-21"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Alyssa Becker","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXY6yLOJC8FHbZyNnvdB9FRJMHiXeHs1u8gK7cue0KwMXsHcu5wBg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We went here because of husband was in search of some quality Chinese teas.  We met Ricky who was delightful and gave us an amazing education in a variety of teas and preparation methods.  We learned so much from him and came home with a whole selection of things my husband is so excited to try and enjoy.  We also ordered iced and hot tea lattes - which were excellent.  My husband will definitely be back for more, and to take their tea class.  Highly recommend!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMJ9znNi98CW0-Wd6gfPO1uq2vU-X5y6kjIDN66&fid=0x0:0x5a9c23a5d2cec749"],"When":"2024-12-1"},{"Name":"篠原亜水","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJquPmIm4pbQNtlYA9YbslyFQmG9lWW0q3sPZFQZCqcvd9a2w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely the best place to have tea. I loved all experiences there. Staffs are professional, teas are stunning. I got a take-away tea and also tea bags because I'm obsessed with their products. Will definitely come back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNZ4GhexxWKBPbYBA4pBSmaQ_DA0_zbQOgSZS5T&fid=0x0:0x5a9c23a5d2cec749"],"When":"2024-7-13"},{"Name":"Barry Ip","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU-JZ1QWSNFJAARgwQ7VG53cTZbQKHDexEcGh_DHIdE-zfYbrm5Pg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Modernized traditional tea house with a large variety of tea and teaware accessories, knowledgeable and friendly staff.  Try their champagne jasmine tea which was refreshing in summer and the organic pu erh tea offered a strong flavour and smooth.  Definitely beat the bubble tea😁","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPlMa1Ph3OZT3eP7wu3BGMLCFh-j4LMB_hNXISl&fid=0x0:0x5a9c23a5d2cec749"],"When":"2024-7-25"},{"Name":"Audrey T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVt7NSeCmrDxjN6eGFiHdOku-giePvd1JuUbLyAEp6odBtHY6vv=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Really tasty iced tea in Chinatown. Good flavor and tea strength. Very cute store and great service. On the pricier side - the iced tea was $8.25.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN2oge1WodCnxSiUTICB__Mgnlp0h8kiCFakwv_&fid=0x0:0x5a9c23a5d2cec749"],"When":"2024-9-5"},{"Name":"Janus Weng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW4OXwlePVztH7-vNwsh_4LdoR6Z8sdyIFmJk8qcHLKQJpOOd9T=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"U went to get a Champaign jasmine green tea at this place.  And I was glad I did.  The jasmine tea blends well with the citrus juice.  The tea is of course of premium quality.  I will definitely go back there and try other options.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP2ngE7RuuWGpU8vxqCvaV5Ysv7-v3CpfCBagYY&fid=0x0:0x5a9c23a5d2cec749"],"When":"2024-8-19"},{"Name":"Amanda Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXuYzvPWvmkeEv9s-u7Ewr6jDCZcRwNgCNnVC1whoGA9R4Xxxq9=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had a lovely anniversary celebration here. My partner is vegetarian and they were able to accommodate with this delicious vegan cake. Olivia was knowledgeable and really did a great job explaining the different varieties of tea and how they’re infused. We left with a few samples and a new teapot to try brewing at home. We had a delicious oolong and pu’erh. We will definitely be back to try more!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOg5Wc3dHpFATlVo5OwOtOo9NzUuyOovmv7RSS2&fid=0x0:0x5a9c23a5d2cec749"],"When":"2023-10-21"},{"Name":"Ananda Enkhtur","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVkkmVVa6j0bCuttopPInRikVrpr7LXYSHoZtWk3dhng__J_lZi=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Loved this place so much!!
They have many varieties for the tea selections and all displayed in a very organized way. I loved how they let you taste 3 different kind of teas before purchasing and there’s also a small seating area where you could enjoy your tea or the beverages that’s offered on the menu. The staff were very kind to explain everything in detail and eager to help you with any questions you have. 10/10 recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP1CojiLhQ70IHTqi8JQkjrEZkjCLBsmsKUDGzJ&fid=0x0:0x5a9c23a5d2cec749"],"When":"2024-2-20"},{"Name":"Johan Ding","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUJvpOSzIOW7C7G54a1KvWemwblOiuOfnZnkMoyRG6uoTImnQM0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Traditional Chinese decorations are selected and placed neatly in a limited space they have. When I was there, they were providing tea brewing sessions to a small tour group.

I ordered the "Green Dragon", and it tasted so good. The tea was not too strong, not too light, and it was lightly sweetened from lychee and gojiberry.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNbww16cTf3n7bVVLCZnDv1gXSg4GfIsSmggU-3&fid=0x0:0x5a9c23a5d2cec749"],"When":"2023-8-3"}]
