user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Tay Cun","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVISvV4V-lNqhgBJaNaxP5l32SM4_qpYYBDmmefTcVji7eDYTQz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"They have a wide variety of sweet and savory pastries along with a huge selection of sliced bread loaves. They have monster size cookies, a drink menu of coffee and refreshing fruit drinks as well as sandwiches and wraps.
They sell packaged pasta, pasta sauces and dressings also.
They offer dine in with a great ambiance and music selection.
Great prices selection I highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNde5BX6Xo5MshvpvodfvVoUcvNDPNtmACJfCp2&fid=0x0:0x1ff546b1c9d234d4"],"When":"2024-9-20"},{"Name":"Clara Maciel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW4b5Abd3tC3N9rIIBm3dUKSy_ctp2nxdB7bk_nh8CmTu0UfbOHvw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is by far THE BEST and most underrated bakery in East Van. Their food is delicious, the people are the nicest and the place is always clean and bright. It's great to go on your own, for a remote work day, or for a coffee date. It is never crowded and it is usually quiet. Their breads and pastries are delicious and always fresh. I personally recommend the chocolate and caramel biscotti they usually display near the cashier. It is absolutely fantastic!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tara-Lynn Bell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL19nQ-LA_sucZ7vTVEnL2Vozv81uqTzI28BbMSYEuVLTcZ_g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I ordered a croissant and it was a bit hard - perhaps over baked or a day old. The sandwich was pretty good.

I will come back to try out this place again to give it a second chance, as they have a lovely assortment of goods and I like to support local.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Gracie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUXyUagBRjQdH3hR5A4HxuJ_48T2JqfQqO_LA7uEFrdnOBJZbo8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I visited the cafe for the first time one morning on my way to work on Thursday. Excellent pastries and coffee. Yes, I brought 4 different pastries and I absolutely loved their cheese scones. Price fair decent. Will be back for other yummy goodies.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"M Morell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW2Ex2TG6PRoKvX610mzdS5DNp7KMHtq5UAhxZtHGpIjFfyRwM_=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing bakery run by a great couple. I had a lemon scone and it was amazing and fresh plus ordered a latte and an apple hand pie to go. Will be back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMyxY7bT5IPeCq2-0udwaSr5rFa9FNwy4GlsPCd&fid=0x0:0x1ff546b1c9d234d4"],"When":"2024-3-11"},{"Name":"Leila Haddadi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW28uWNGMoLexX0ykMLvdhO-gxPcZLcuE9qH3Pa05tjs33XIc4g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cookies and sweet were perfect 🤩 amazing taste and fresh!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMp-UqgT5CTK0-8e1OchMtHxyl7DyWRBgDrTsZJ&fid=0x0:0x1ff546b1c9d234d4"],"When":"2024-11-20"},{"Name":"Kerri Carter","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWyd1968zbaqfOY0E9-I8F3-w-rXBcTc5CtbLTOkgw4AYR22IUTqg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very good mix of items and the rice krispie my kids got was massive! Lovely breads and the herb focaccia was soooo good","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPjAy4Vtd8gx1Q8L-9_z3nT8daRKyZ2smNtC797&fid=0x0:0x1ff546b1c9d234d4"],"When":"2024-11-6"},{"Name":"Myron Huen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV4uIfOrMoDcvq12FRQjG2MS9lqodKRX_HEiSjaKmPdITZiJjF-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fresh airy bread and delicious pastries. We received three bags of bread and pretty much a week's  worth of pastries from their participation in the too good to go app, and their baked goods and breads are truly too good to go to waste! Their apple strudel was fantastic!","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: The Chinese Tea Shop
address: 101 E Pender St, Vancouver, BC V6A 2R8
open_hours: {"Friday":["1:30–6 p.m."],"Monday":["Closed"],"Saturday":["1:30–6 p.m."],"Sunday":["1:30–6 p.m."],"Thursday":["1:30–6 p.m."],"Tuesday":["Closed"],"Wednesday":["Closed"]}
descriptions: Popular store offering a curated selection of imported Chinese teas & traditional teaware.
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"In-store shopping","enabled":true},{"name":"Onsite services","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true}]},{"id":"amenities","name":"Amenities","options":[{"name":"Wi-Fi","enabled":true},{"name":"Wi-Fi","enabled":false}]},{"id":"payments","name":"Payments","options":[{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"Debit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"NFC mobile payments","enabled":true},{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":false}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"T Win","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUE523iUugu4Frj62or1RATeuad-YLK9cHE68nwXn5xae4CuG55=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Daniel was very nice, patient, and knowledgeable about the craft of tea brewing, practices, rituals etc.  I’m so honoured to have experienced his shop. There’s so many different varieties of tea leaves and tea ware. Definitely a must-visit for tea enthusiasts.
The hours of operation are just limited to part of the week, however, so there’s a chance that the shop won’t be open if just stumbling upon unplanned.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipObieuYvTkiW_66Cv_1YDhih4J_JUIZru-isO9n&fid=0x0:0x9629492942b05ee8"],"When":"2024-10-4"},{"Name":"Genia Hale","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIhLuN5YZwW2aYvdo2I1QEquqwn-y0bmJfl_5dqemT-cpiFUak=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I am loving my tea!!! 🫖 💫 While in Vancouver for the day, The Chinese Tea shop was recommended by one of the workers from the Chinese Garden. So thrilled for this recommendation because the teas are incredible! 🙌🏾 The service was impeccable because we got a thorough breakdown of the different teas with recommended pairing. I learned I’m not supposed to brew green tea in piping hot water! Mind blown 🤯! We had a little tea tasting that was a fun experience. Highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP6xk5cv8SLaI0Aj5w4ahYYiK_yuZAOhS5PDD8a&fid=0x0:0x9629492942b05ee8"],"When":"2024-4-29"},{"Name":"Judy Yu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWLLblt9FP1kW6-gH79Dzgjdf8znNJow5R8aEhHAMhwBCXSmt0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Gongfu style tea tasting with Daniel was a highlight of our Vancouver visit! He was so generous in sharing his knowledge, experience and passion for Chinese tea and culture. We tried some delicious black (red) tea as well as a premium cliff tea that Daniel introduced us to after getting a sense for our preferences. I ended up needing a second carryon to bring home the tea and teaware I bought in his shop :)

Highly recommend! Will be back for sure the next time we’re in Vancouver.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOYG-p_FhmPwE-U8ul-o0KU1Jx6cwIABy87iCDA&fid=0x0:0x9629492942b05ee8"],"When":"2024-9-16"},{"Name":"Tommy Byun","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXQhlW94B8T2fhww-HWh0iFh-RYIvFitfF4mjJX2E5t_heAv3Lb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Personal best tea shop so far in Vancouver ♡ Daniel, the owner, is very knowledgeable about Chinese tea, and he is especially passionate about Pu'er tea. It is always fun listening to him going on and on about his tea stories!

If you are a regular visitor to his shop, you can contact him in advance to set up a time to sit and have some tea with him (no charge), which is an amazing experience. He does not sell tea to make much money, he wants to educate people about tea & allow people to experience the tea culture, and I appreciate that very much.

Strongly recommended to check it out for some good Pu'er & other Asian tea, Daniel will give you good recommendations :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMUjw7_RaXtf_u3XyFShlBfgU_F9iGmB-0Si4_-&fid=0x0:0x9629492942b05ee8"],"When":"2023-11-17"},{"Name":"Wendy mah","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLtsnkWXZC3txwdlZ0lgGQPJMT2uOIscr-eE_vP2Coj5cQ3sIg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Purchased a Chinese rock stamp with my granddaughter’s Chinese astrological animal carved on the top. Daniel carved her Chinese name into the bottom for the stamp. He was kind enough to stay past his closing time in order to finish it for me today instead of the next day. This will be a  wonderful keepsake so my granddaughter can cherish her heritage.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPbqPUdVc4syvQHB1Nc5BrqHckmRq-lTDbuP6n5&fid=0x0:0x9629492942b05ee8"],"When":"2024-8-4"},{"Name":"Bethany Brown","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW5DhTYiCnMU1_9vhsoo_GcjZ-idjdU-NphAq2yRY-eDai3r2ru=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My partner and I had the most AMAZING experience at this authentic traditional Chinese tea shop! We highly recommend visiting this shop and spending some time talking to the owner. He is friendly, kind and just an overall lovley person to talk to. He is an exceptionally talented man. He taught and showed us skills for beginner Gongfu tea making. He also shared an array of knowledge about the different types of tea, the equipment, and the styles of making tea. This shop carries all you need to get into the art of traditional Chinese tea.
Thank you so much for your time and expertise. We will remember the time we got to spend with you and all that you taught us.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kitty-Rose Smith","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVyLU2GxuIwwsWwXfYCsxmlLriPsXKufBZexWpSjYCKP5TinNU=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My husband and I have been long time patrons of this shop.  I had the opportunity to bring my two best friends here, after years of raving about it to them. They were not disappointed.  Daniel was extremely kind to all of us and graciously sat and talked with us about tea, Chinese tea culture, and the finer points of how to make and serve it.  My friends were delighted and I was, once again, reminded of why I love this place so much.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kelly Mitchell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIVlaDATtxldsLw0qMVWbZQdDgF-y6VzugcsJNOc70eRxoc=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a great experience.  There is SO MUCH I did not know about proper tea preparation, and how the Chinese have perfected it.  As wine lovers we found many similarities between wine and tea.  Daniel was an excellent host, in a unique shop with some delightful tea.","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: ETEA cafe
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"highlights","name":"Highlights","options":[{"name":"Great tea selection","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair accessible seating","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible washroom","enabled":true}]},{"id":"offerings","name":"Offerings","options":[{"name":"Coffee","enabled":true},{"name":"Late-night food","enabled":true},{"name":"Small plates","enabled":true}]},{"id":"dining_options","name":"Dining options","options":[{"name":"Lunch","enabled":true},{"name":"Dinner","enabled":true},{"name":"Dessert","enabled":true},{"name":"Seating","enabled":true}]},{"id":"amenities","name":"Amenities","options":[{"name":"Washroom","enabled":true}]},{"id":"atmosphere","name":"Atmosphere","options":[{"name":"Casual","enabled":true},{"name":"Cozy","enabled":true}]},{"id":"crowd","name":"Crowd","options":[{"name":"Groups","enabled":true}]},{"id":"payments","name":"Payments","options":[{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"Debit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"NFC mobile payments","enabled":true},{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":false}]},{"id":"children","name":"Children","options":[{"name":"Good for kids","enabled":true},{"name":"High chairs","enabled":true}]},{"id":"parking","name":"Parking","options":[{"name":"Free parking lot","enabled":true},{"name":"Free street parking","enabled":true},{"name":"Parking","enabled":false}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"minnie li","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKRoQOlIxvrw__7xun_s22_XplGfNg8u2NALefXOOF5MWkjHg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I stopped by this cafe for their lunch set, which is pretty affordable at $18. One thing I liked is that you can get a Taiwanese milk tea included, even if it’s cold, without any extra charge.

The food was alright overall, though I had a few issues. The Taiwanese fried chicken was a bit too dry for my taste, and the sandwich I ordered came out burnt—the toast was way too dark. On the bright side, the Singapore fried noodles were really good. The shrimp, in particular, were bigger than what I’ve seen at other places, which was a nice surprise.

In the end, I’d say the café is okay for a quick meal, but they could definitely improve in a few areas.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM6EkDES0_2Bo5ZMQZWyk5SM7cqqHQmGv8J-XH9&fid=0x0:0xfc24dd68724c7091"],"When":"2024-9-11"},{"Name":"Hiep Nguyen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWMRHHZ7t798igHqhwEObqqiXXBYRe7_vTRRS3-gXG7fOgZlXSH=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My middle daughter told me about a deal for back to school. $6.50 for 900ml bubble T plus pearls for extra 50 cents. Got the Mango slush and it's amazing. Perfect for sharing because of the size. I used to go here quite often for lunch and dinner sometimes pre covid.  And then the old plaza got torn down and a new mix use building got developed, I haven't had the chance to eat here. No plaza parking deterred me from coming.

Finally made time to come here for lunch with my partner and we really enjoyed it. Their combo includes a drink. Total bill came to $43 after tax + Tip.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM4tmZeW9lCCPxGvdaVpUujpVZGlJBk15RVPmaP&fid=0x0:0xfc24dd68724c7091"],"When":"2024-9-9"},{"Name":"Winnie Fong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocINVHs0fVRiN-0d7zGSqSrnNpRByXZrpp5kLwZJOApEHbaWww=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here for lunch with my family. Nice bright atmosphere. We enjoyed the food, especially the deep fried squid. The prices are good and portions are big. If you get one of the meals, it comes with a cold drink! Finished off with dessert for the kids which they really enjoyed.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMn42DWwiF9bvE0JHvx1PmYR79lD255FqZMaNxh&fid=0x0:0xfc24dd68724c7091"],"When":"2024-9-14"},{"Name":"Francesca Flores","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXqFaunME8eO-WTATDIi7j8aUrmEsiM36P0yCe7j-y7U1Adiq3KVg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This has officially become our favourite comfort food spot! We easily crave this on a weekly basis. Their menu selection is incredibly. Can’t recommend their pearl milk tea and mango paradise bbts, so soooo good! 🤤","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPI7lSEi1-2JgxMw4aKre8-WQC14U1JboI7MCYh&fid=0x0:0xfc24dd68724c7091"],"When":"2024-10-7"},{"Name":"Dustin Nikko","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUT2m3xWph2o7UaISkK1ZsQyhoCtJGnztHj5w5825o0qNd12sb7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I really like the overall atmosphere of the restaurant. The staff is very helpful and attentive.

They have variety of food and drink options. Their prices are reasonable and great portions for most dishes.

Can’t wait to try more dishes from ETEA!

**RECOMMENDED Dishes and Drinks:
-Thai Chicken Fried Rice
-Deep Fried Squid Tentacles
-Popcorn Chicken
-Shanghai Fried Udon
-Mango Slush / Mango Paradise
-Hong Kong Style Milk Tea","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMxMKH5ooqNBuAZUinvKVbAXwew_Jy0oyMis1pr&fid=0x0:0xfc24dd68724c7091"],"When":"2023-11-8"},{"Name":"Alison Sun","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVxhjwnoe6YlgwQpLcRVCMJxcpg3KuJyKjgUT2iseiNYBySRxgw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"After rebuild the whole building, the cafe looks very bright and comfortable! Same staffs and cooks :) I always come here since high school, and it has been more than 10 years already.
Love their Thai chicken fried rice and rice noodle. New menu has more dishes and new drinks available. We had the mango paradise, and it came with an adorable bear shape tea cube. Ofc, the taste is 10/10. Highly recommended.
Thanks again for all the delicious food and the service is always great.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN-0-i_vC8NEzLPHPqu0Ni9kqzak7n4qvt-zFsb&fid=0x0:0xfc24dd68724c7091"],"When":"2023-3-16"},{"Name":"Kiana L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX8B1t6eqS5aov_gnGfP3I8Vpy_cJd-Di2Fn8rnrEnvnWxyK6Z8ZA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"So good, portions big enough to share, really good quality of cooking too.

Got the Black bean chicken stone pot and popcorn chicken fried rice","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMYc4RpnycTAqWnhAFtGK_6ezwITnRzZYRZwMKf&fid=0x0:0xfc24dd68724c7091"],"When":"2024-9-14"},{"Name":"Jayne Zhu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVrBDvenlTf8YZz9zlg_3kyFiB6VT-4HD5XqGdf6Ja0I32jQJk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently received a $100 gift card for filling out a survey for my company, so I chose to share my winnings with my team. Although prices at another bubble tea establishment were lower online, I called ETea with my request for 16 bubble teas (a mix of fresh fruit slushies and milk teas) and asked if there was a way they could help me bring the total as close to $100 as possible. ETea was able to throw in a discount so the drinks came out to just under $100, the drinks were ready at the time I was picking up, and my entire team greatly enjoyed the afternoon treat! Thank you for accommodating my team and making all of our bubble tea dreams come true, ETea! 😊

Additionally, we live in the neighborhood and really enjoy going to ETea for snacks or a meal. The staff are friendly and the restaurant is clean. Our kids usually order the popcorn chicken rice or chicken wings, and the adults usually get the garlic scallop fried rice (ask for their hot oil sauce!), laksa, or curry. Their fresh fruit slush bubble teas are refreshing, and when we ask for the toppings on the side (when we dine in), the staff are always happy to accommodate us and bring us extra cups and little spoons for our kids to pick and scoop the various toppings into their individual cups. ETea is a GREAT space for families and friends to gather!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNr-zi_uuavqCiSg5tPzaBdArNLfrMBUxMkdXU&fid=0x0:0xfc24dd68724c7091"],"When":"2024-5-24"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jing Lu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXuz0mx7RL8gVW6U7jpgfIAUzS6yO7KvxixnpVRQ62Yu-O3CkJF=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Aidan's Cafe is an incredible spot with a wide range of lunch options, from fresh salads to hearty rice bowls. My absolute favorite is the Crispy Chicken Sandwich—so zesty, juicy, and full of flavor! The owner, Aidan, clearly takes pride in creating a welcoming space, and store manager Sophie adds a personal touch by knowing customers by name. Whether you're looking for a coffee chat or a productive work lunch, this place is a must-visit. Highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMlYgx3LVkjofn1N7qeifjOazkftD5-uIu62rDn&fid=0x0:0x56c6a6a8f622866c"],"When":"2024-12-19"},{"Name":"brett wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWxcD0-Y--4p7lXJmzGWyMy7QZFuhG_CSU2HEA8kvCZHd6QfmEi=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ordered an iced americano and the three-cup chicken to go. Service was amazing, the gentleman behind the counter had such uplifting positivity- it really brightened my mood. After a short wait with my coffee, my meal was ready and the staff member behind the counter informed me that they still had many baked goods from this morning left over (it was 1:30pm) he asked if I would like anything. The doughnuts looked quite tasty so I said that I would have one of those and took out my wallet. He said he wanted to give it to me for free and would not accept my money. I felt bad as I had not tipped for take out. I will definitely return and tip next time to return the favour. Amazing establishment would give it more than five stars if it were possible.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipORPiwNtc1acwF07kE-clpXW-KdncKIFzatbZLE&fid=0x0:0x56c6a6a8f622866c"],"When":"2024-9-24"},{"Name":"Eric Fan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ4zf8cyI2d_WYRNh04hQZAIiIkDF6R6ohT4OemO4QcMAhFbQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My Favorite Cafe!

Aidan’s Cafe is my go-to spot! The latte is always amazing, and their lunch options are fantastic. My favorite is the kimchi pork on rice. It’s so flavorful and perfect for a quick meal. Sophie usually serves me, and she’s always so friendly and welcoming. I’ll definitely keep coming back!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Zihan Cai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV4Ut067-Y4XZEaVE-xFH4OWUrh1CLwo-4BsxmOFRLnal8um9L4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The half sweet mocha is great. Super cute decor. No complaints","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM4WJMDQg0Amoh7XuNh0oHRvW1VwhffmBsbt-o4&fid=0x0:0x56c6a6a8f622866c"],"When":"2024-12-12"},{"Name":"Sharon Z","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXQ_-IhUJKb_m-zPxyht_SB0HXMCm9Pdtk3hSVzuHbYBvc9ljqh=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A fulfilling breakfast could last me a whole day! Glad I found this chill cafe. They now have brekki combo with any brekki option +$1 house brew coffee.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMLXOstzMz8KAhFbKbNUOu6Vp1AvHW24i0Kr-02&fid=0x0:0x56c6a6a8f622866c"],"When":"2024-7-10"},{"Name":"James M.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUiczhgkC7hROk_XdkpbtDTMRN7OcF3fKEB1mEuqNFronJPB5s=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had a breakfast sandwich and a coffee. The coffee was good and the sandwich was excellent! Very impressed with the quality they are able to deliver from such a compact space. Will definitely be going back.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sarah B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVXZU4gw6jDGoxeMAgqcmN5aGFL_6aL2AUDoVVMXiVR_5GzwZjV=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cute cafe tucked inside the Guinness tower. It had some good reviews so I had to check it out. I ordered the brekkie sandwich and an iced Americano beverage. The sandwich itself was delicious although I thought the bread would have been toasted a bit more? The place itself is really small and there might have been only 1 or 2 people in the kitchen as the wait for the food was a really long time and the line was only getting longer at 8:30am.

I still recommended it to my colleagues though!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM2xucF600ie8G5Suy-E6Vf9zyYoJX1r9VP9-wR&fid=0x0:0x56c6a6a8f622866c"],"When":"2022-8-10"},{"Name":"Yiqing Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJiY-OvPJyrD-JSNpNqlwSr_kmmUqy_Kq1E00nY_UgFqVjifQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The coffee was exceptional, with rich flavors and perfect brewing. We tried two meals in lunch menu and both were excellent. The atmosphere was warm and inviting, making it a great spot to relax or get some work done. The staff were friendly and attentive, adding to the overall enjoyable visit. I highly recommend this cafe to anyone in Vancouver!","Images":null,"When":""}]

[{"Name":"Zilla 37 (Zilla)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWwRrg5HpVGtarSSrgBGRknBN3WAX8ZvgmmNLI0ZsDkeMrvhB-o=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I picked up a To Good To Go bag that has a value of $21. In it was a rock hard pastry and a box of individual coffee packets. Website says the coffee is $10.99 so does that make the pastry $10 in value? I feel like I paid full price. No deal hear very disappointed, please do not advertise one thing then give the customer something else.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tania Flores","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU4V0kN4-kgDRjEyM0crKMaIaPMR1zd0kjh1jeoqVvGAkeAMSwX=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Unbelievable good, fresh, creamy, organic best coffee you can find in town. I always buy their products in groceries stores but since their products were sold out, I came straight here and it was a great experience to have a fresh cup of coffee in here. Their coffee beans have the best quality in town. I’ve been drinking their coffee for years and I won’t change it for sure. My preference: sweet espresso (Mexican coffee beans) or bold.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMiO65loJxSKdprhmQOcqG_uRzkITCWDHFQhEaZ&fid=0x0:0xba46bf49f60c7437"],"When":"2022-10-21"},{"Name":"Max Park","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjULgOZzqeiky1aGAYXubAckvL9DYguTp3RlXixIngHtnQL45SUf4w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Enjoyed the interior and food options here. The coffee was decent but the espresso based beverages were much more noteworthy. Low seating and not really in a neighbour hood that suggests a long stay.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMXR_wfBQ7PC63X4shikzjDaaWLe_bOthWTsq31&fid=0x0:0xba46bf49f60c7437"],"When":"2018-9-12"},{"Name":"Vancouverite111","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVjCLNB8OHposl1jn_syPr10S-VZ7DlTNmaTgV5nPF1IIbSNwkU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The coffee shop is unique
Has some special characters
Warm and cozy

Liked their location where they are hidden between offices as a refuge for workers","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN1lkoWcJmjUQbipl_o6jvM5eLC90GKtv5xShk-&fid=0x0:0xba46bf49f60c7437"],"When":"2023-7-11"},{"Name":"Joel Beckmann","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUbYUv9_hI2vBMsmqST4O0olAJCflE6UGJPpnVqlMzh3YyZSGyP=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Love coming here as it is quiet and central but ….cell service isn’t great in that location for whatever reasons …. and your guest wifi is worse.  Sometimes I try to use the wifi for 20 mins for work and I can’t get anything done.  Perhaps you prefer it that way ?","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Vincent Yoshida","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX7cM1qbVyioY8uLiwNz5LmbmzyTjjuzmsiY2gl9Lew-rfkoSFZ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The ice coffee I had was excellent! Staff was very nice, will definitely come back here!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sarah Grace","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX0P_FT3n0HZdmLMDEJ6UcRFNPyHbE7QJ8GW3gOL-SGGTFh-sFdQw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing coffee, local baked goods and wraps. Nice, calm environment with lovely staff.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMEced80GLPsvm9IWc2v-l6zRPOZqvK_gQnk1Vc&fid=0x0:0xba46bf49f60c7437"],"When":"2018-11-16"},{"Name":"Liz W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJyZ6cw3Es_uJbIkHufrRL9z2CdbTl7AYZR2AfYrDQKiRtC=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Coffee shop service was friendly but the space feels a bit lacking in character and feels like ancillary to their roasting business.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Andrea Petryshyn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWNkU50M1JvQbMNyvOzJRv2eKLD7hkxZc_h3xNVke2eByCzCkyz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Probably the best vegan bakery in the rain city! It’s one of those places that you want to come back to over and over again, despite the distance from your home. Bread and pastries are really yummy! The last one that i had was a cube croissant with peanut butter cream/mousse which i found delightful, not too sweet as i like it. Coffee was great too and pizza fluffy and delicious. Staff very friendly and the place itself, even though a bit small, is welcoming and bright. What to say.. love it! Couldn’t recommend it more!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNFI28fB3T4CjDd1rHGjT1T5Tg9_Z7WPYHUXu9A&fid=0x0:0x8b0b5f644e6d9eb7"],"When":"2024-11-8"},{"Name":"Ray Jang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX3wj8Ne3ngI4eg9ouEU6zPmvERlQuudbckz4ma4Vg6pfYrsWM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Vegan bakery with exceptional coffee and delicious baked goods. I am not vegan but appreciate the concept and couldn’t differentiate between non-vegan with the lack of dairy, honey, or egg products in their baked items or my flat white. Lively atmosphere, casual stool seating in a bright airy environment. Kids will find it welcoming as well with a small “kids table” and kid friendly snacks.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMvZN9t_QcKAcoqqA6LM13xzJVNeZr4jhsv5KVX&fid=0x0:0x8b0b5f644e6d9eb7"],"When":"2024-12-7"},{"Name":"Kenny Poon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWCkKTuOESfGudPEm0-BDzQVkIamalgjsSUzE_II9VRplB0iEEX=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Visited this vegetarian coffee shop / bakery in mid October 2024.
Ordered an iced latte, hot latte, a regular croissant and a cubed cheesecake croissant.
Coffees were brewed freshly with oat milk as a default choice.

Nutty latte can be expected, with a hint of almond amd honey flavour.

Croissants were slightly stiffer than the others, as that might be a result of non-animal fat being used in baking. Still having good layers though.

Cubed cheesecake croissant is also a surprise.

Overall, a boutique shop that's worth trying.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNpvFFjvI79YzJ90Gt_GzpK7iFGzu6rx7dpmYx2&fid=0x0:0x8b0b5f644e6d9eb7"],"When":"2024-10-8"},{"Name":"M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUhXzzWkuF4S25g93vjX_RFqOzkupeYmsJQAgoBdUkmE5ucHHOQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Quite a nice selection of pastries, loafs, and drinks! We stopped in twice during our week long vacation in Vancouver.

The breakfast sandwiches were flavorful, I am a ketchup heavy person, so I thought it was dry in between bites. However, the cheese made up for it 🤷‍♀️ The stuffed cube croissant was the item I was most looking forward to having seen it on IG. Very hardy bite, cream cheese filling was delightful. I found the pumpkin loaf to be claggy or super moist, depending on how one likes their bread. Pumpkin spice latte was served just warm, not hot. The flavor was pleasantly natural, not sweet or artificially strong. I appreciate that they seemed to make the syrup/mix in house. We also got some yummy cookies.

Being a well traveled vegan (20+ yrs) and California native (LA+SF), I acknowledge that my expectations may be higher than the average person. That said, I do recommend saving this cafe to your list of "good food by good people" and checking it out.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMZDIeoF4m0a4MhX6fGOPdOmjzcPagoo3TKoQjq&fid=0x0:0x8b0b5f644e6d9eb7"],"When":"2024-10-22"},{"Name":"Christine Pothier","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKop8cx8R7hLZOcHwcJ6BPimW-YsZwpb29lZejMj9hiJKW9AA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This all plant based bakery is a must on your list! Everything is delicious and inventive. Some highlights include the breakfast sandwiches, salted caramel cake, featured croissants, peanut butter cup cube… You can’t go wrong with any choice.
Excited to try the new Miso Caramel Sauce.
Highly recommend ❤️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMZfyWMBJ0k4I8wPm-W20fHEJDoQr4dDf6PHrsw&fid=0x0:0x8b0b5f644e6d9eb7"],"When":"2024-10-22"},{"Name":"Hye","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjULQQSi1mhNFty7n8ZPesKkMpD31jiIGazltx_wRmE-swaOwr4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I didn't realize this bakery was vegan until I checked their website and understood why their baked items taste a bit different from other bakeries. I've already tried their banana bread and lemon loaf at other cafes, and on this day, we tried the salted double chocolate cookie and almond croissant. The cookie had a very chewy texture and wasn't too sweet, which I liked. To be honest, we thought the almond croissant wasn't too good, but the taste makes sense now. I found their lemon loaf a bit too sweet for me though.

The place doesn't have a lot of capacity, but it's spacious and has great natural lighting. There were some items that looked pretty yummy and interesting, so I highly recommend giving this place a try.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOdyOsBwAYLVPKbsKc50uJbJZ1pWTuHjeCkpGE&fid=0x0:0x8b0b5f644e6d9eb7"],"When":"2024-8-7"},{"Name":"Nicole Desy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV1nD03vjKF_TMKRwAcAK9O7uZychWUTTjgSKxnysdi2_iKGi5X=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have wanted to try this bakery since it opened and finally made it there yesterday!  I ordered the iced pumpkin spice latte, flatbread pizza, a blueberry scone, cube croissant and a regular croissant. There were so many things I wanted to try that it was hard to narrow it down. Everything I had was delicious with my favourite definitely being the iced latte. The flavours were very authentic and didn’t have that artificial taste that some lattes have. The staff was super friendly and welcoming and chatted with me as if they knew who I was. I was fortunate to meet the owner, Erin Ireland, who was so gracious and who spent time chatting with me at my table. The atmosphere was so welcoming that I didn’t want to leave! Will definitely be back and will be bringing some friends with me next time!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN3S1Cm1B2EG_5VUpZXsRtUkx1Ec9GqocNB7IGc&fid=0x0:0x8b0b5f644e6d9eb7"],"When":"2024-9-8"},{"Name":"No MSG No Garlic Foodie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX-PVOn6GcWxsKb-qqVJDTqvJ5rfua5QVuFocwcMF-ZRwuEIPLm=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Sausage and egg muffin is one of my favourite breakfast snacks. It's actually quite hard to find a coffee shop that makes a decent sausage patty. With a vegan diet, I didn't expect to be able to ever again satisfy my craving until we stopped at this bakery to check out their vegan carrot cake. There, we saw a row of pictures advertising different kinds of breakfast sandwiches with 'SOLD OUT' signs on them. Understandable, it was after lunch on a Sunday. Of course, we came back a few days later for the sausage and egg muffin. For my first bite, I didn't like the 'muffin' bun. The sausage patty was very delicious though, very spicy without any hint of garlic (yay!), and I couldn't even tell that it was vegan. The egg tasted like egg, and because the cheese is also vegan, we didn't have to order this without cheese! After a few more bites of the sandwich, I started to enjoy the muffin bun as well, and on reflection, it is definitely better than the typical dried out English muffin you get at Starbucks. We also purchased croissants. The gold standard of croissants for us is Angus T's brioche dough butter croissants. But because that contains eggs and dairy, that's off my list as well. These croissants are very edible compared to an Angus T.  They lack the butter taste of an Angus T, but the texture inside is excellent, moist and chewy, and outside, it is crusty without being dried out. The third test was to compare the carrot cake with our favourite carrot cake from Milano Coffee made by Caffé de Medici, this was too sweet and I can taste the baking powder. I've known about To Live For Bakery for a while as their banana bread is sold in a lot of coffee shops and health food retail outlets. But since we are now on a low sugar diet, the VEGAN breakfast sausage and egg sandwiches and VEGAN croissants are already great finds for us, and I am sure we will drop by more often. We're not really keen on the sweet stuff. 5 stars for the breakfast sandwich and croissants. The bakery opens at 7 am. The breakfast sandwiches apparently start selling around 8 and can be sold out a couple of hours before closing. But twice now, we’ve been able to get them! Actually, I am getting addicted…","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNwAKG0-_YwdHdcSH63M08MakKvBXPSWX4SpSfZ&fid=0x0:0x8b0b5f644e6d9eb7"],"When":"2024-8-20"}]

title: Neverland Tea Salon Vancouver
open_hours: {"Friday":["11 a.m.–5 p.m."],"Monday":["11 a.m.–5 p.m."],"Saturday":["11 a.m.–5 p.m."],"Sunday":["11 a.m.–5 p.m."],"Thursday":["11 a.m.–5 p.m."],"Tuesday":["Closed"],"Wednesday":["Closed"]}
descriptions: Salon with a big tea list serving high tea, pastries, sandwiches & cocktails amid fanciful decor.
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true},{"name":"Delivery","enabled":false}]},{"id":"highlights","name":"Highlights","options":[{"name":"Great tea selection","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair accessible seating","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible washroom","enabled":true}]},{"id":"parking","name":"Parking","options":[{"name":"Free street parking","enabled":true},{"name":"Paid street parking","enabled":true}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Scott West","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJhGT1_orycVoF4jqLWxKP4q9TwkGenf-4wlet08fT68DEVaQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I went with my daughter today, and I must say, the experience was truly excellent! We just relaxed in a wonderful atmosphere for over 2 hours, enjoying an endless variety of teas, eating cute little sandwiches, and an assortment of very good desserts! We chatted and enjoyed the treats and had the most relaxing visit. Quality time with family.  It doesn't get better than this!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMI9qUmbrgwyIyzxIjTNSFjGRKyOEpZAz1F5Enn&fid=0x0:0xda28c3280cbe4ac6"],"When":"2024-10-18"},{"Name":"Sofia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU3DifFwDMTB58GBwUcG7HSGccjUCVlplE2gzWFv3JhMyR4mjDT=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"UPDATE:

Neverland's high tea experience was truly enchanting from start to finish.

I have to update my previous review with more photos and better comments.

The management, under the leadership of Roxanne, demonstrated exceptional attention to detail, ensuring that every guest felt welcomed and attended to with warmth and professionalism. The entire team also contributed to making the experience feel personalized with their tea recommendations. The waitresses may need to work on their soft skills but they were doing an amazing job in a busy time!

From delicate pastries to savory sandwiches, every bite demonstrated the chef's culinary expertise.

Moreover, the atmosphere transported guests to a world of elegance and charm, enhancing the overall experience.

In summary, Neverland's high tea experience is nothing short of magical.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPXNN1QzGSp8rk60kc5lbQka4INzXYY8GNhKtkn&fid=0x0:0xda28c3280cbe4ac6"],"When":"2024-12-12"},{"Name":"Lee Van","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUkdc0b5WROtpnJCruJpetIegq6Snt_2bGm0A5pSa9cqY1SCXL5=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I enjoyed high tea here a few years ago and was keen to come back with my partner. The interior is beautiful and I love the attention to detail. There is a wide selection of tea to choose from and I enjoyed the Mumbai chai. I was surprised to see our teapot arrived with no tea bag or tea leaves inside. I don't order tea often but when I do, the tea is left to brew which is great for those of us who enjoy a stronger cup of tea.

I ordered the vegetarian high tea and my partner had the standard. There was little difference between the two. His arrived with one chicken sandwich and my alternative was a tofu sandwich which unfortunately I didn't enjoy. The sweets were good but again, for the most part, my partner and I did not enjoy them. I appreciate that this is about individual taste rather than the actual quality of the sweets. It is not possible to order anything else from the menu on the weekend other than high tea.

The website lists a spring and a summer high tea amongst others. When our bill arrived, I was under the impression, given that we are still in spring, we would be charged for the spring high tea however this was not the case. When I asked, I was informed that the spring high tea menu ended on mother's day and that they are on the summer high tea menu. This surprised me as we are still very much in spring.

Over the years I've tried several different high tea options both here in Canada and overseas and unfortunately this high tea wasn't as enjoyable as I had hoped.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOG-IuC0ze63cWkMnbZ8VLCG7_Jjxi5E8-xq15M&fid=0x0:0xda28c3280cbe4ac6"],"When":"2024-5-29"},{"Name":"Andrea Smith","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLpuVBU8Cr4kuXCWAkWLm8v5JbEFLyz07AUAoxz_KpO9adA0u7P=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went to the Wicked themed high tea and it was fantastic! Treats looked and tasted delicious. Well worth the money","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPW-ATvIhqz3ZHDhfxn3nbZU3ajBS6rihgtIysw&fid=0x0:0xda28c3280cbe4ac6"],"When":"2024-12-16"},{"Name":"Michelle Siaril","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVvNHVR_L-5eCK2usU0kQoT055SV9vB2qDNPyrA7CmG9QXO2IM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"My first high tea in Vancouver. Very nice ambience and cute decor, way too noisy to chat with your friends though. Honestly food was so-so but they were pretty generous with the sizes (we had to pack some for leftovers).  Taste wise honestly they were pretty dry and felt like something you got from grocery store.

I’m also feeling torn about the tea. On one hand I’m happy they have so many varieties (not quite TWG level but more than 50 for sure), however upon talking to the team I realised the teas were pre-made and not brewed fresh for you. I understand it from business perspective in terms of being efficient, but it does reduce the authentic experience of the afternoon tea a bit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPcayYaa6OB6odZFhiqU0Ecsl3yaKV_cIwmLFc&fid=0x0:0xda28c3280cbe4ac6"],"When":"2024-7-11"},{"Name":"Alexandra","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX11ANDfpnFU7GmCeaVtU5cBwuWRqquWAK3F9_AUyciKpah0H5L=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"There are a handful of High Tea salons around town, and they all share the same exorbitant prices. Upwards of $60 for a three tiered delight of sweets and savouries, you are paying for the "experience".

This includes being surrounded by a medley of disparate but charming decor that somehow manages to look like it all belongs together, the use of fine china dishes, delicate teacups, and usually an actual bowl of sugar complete with a tiny metal spoon. A rounded pot filled with aromatic loose leaf tea rounds out this teaparty, a decidedly more adult affair than the one we used to have as kids using stuffies as guests.

High Tea is a luxury to be sure, not an everyday event. The Secret Garden was my go to, but I was persuaded to try Neverland. I wasn't expecting anything different in terms of the novelty, but I was pleasantly surprised at how much better the service and overall encounter was.

At Secret Garden, you choose one tea and are stuck with it for the duration of your stay. It is also up to you to steep it for however long you see fit. Neverland is unique in that you are encouraged to try different teas after each teapot is drained. I think that I sampled at least four. Not only that, but they actually brew and steep the tea for you so that the guesswork is taken out of the equation. A great marketing strategy on their part, as if you happen to fall in love with a particular tea, it is available for purchase.

Foodwise, the items at Secret Garden are laughably smaller than Neverland's. And the famed lemon tart and egg salad on a pink bun
that are constant fixtures on the Secret Garden High Tea menu have long since lost their appeal.

I am a carnivore at heart and usually give vegetarian items a hard pass, but I found myself tentatively nibbling on the vegan savouries and finding them to be surprisingly delicious. That alone has ingratiated Neverland to me, because trust me, I'm the first one to decline any vegetable that crosses my path.

Our server at Neverland was constantly checking up on us and ensuring that our table always had a steady stream of filled teapots for my party and I to mix and match. Once the server delivers your three tiered meal at Secret Garden they seem to disappear and only reappear to hand you the bill.

Suffice to say you never need to settle for a merely passable High Tea service again. Head over to Neverland for a few hours of enchantment, where everyone is indeed mad as their sign implies, but in the best way possible.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOTxNHm8VjDgHJRg-xkfdnVcN0KjdEhoJI3GqBo&fid=0x0:0xda28c3280cbe4ac6"],"When":"2024-5-14"},{"Name":"W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVijg2B2FKhHEO0daffmmkqtpWCzt3aDQdnZOIHflF7afjJd1G7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"2023: Mad Hatter's high tea. Desserts whimsical. Scone and breads ultra fresh, still warm. Sandwiches creative. Love the inclusion of the coronation sandwich, though my fave was the apple cheddar croissant. Service super fast and friendly. Mad Hatter decor fun.

2024: Holiday high tea. Excellent mushroom mini quiche, turkey sandwich, fig brie croissant, cranberry chocolate tart, london fog chou, holiday scone with candied fruit, amuse bouche herbed butter on toasted bread thins. Meh: stuffing scone, beet marscapone sandwich, apple cake, chocolate cake.

Fun, festive, happy atmosphere with fabulous decor. Still $55 after one year. Thanks!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOCuBFDR7JLeZe3qNpSA9tsRdy2fehxLoaXiuXH&fid=0x0:0xda28c3280cbe4ac6"],"When":"2023-10-8"},{"Name":"Ghazal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWUxPjakfUDfUlOphLX0NHrhY3j03bOfl1WB2qtK88VIEBoxSUc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Cute and cozy salon. Very busy but still functional. Every item on the menu was delicious. You can try unlimited teas. We got three each and all of them were good.

As everyone else mentioned, the time is limited to 1:30 hours which feels rushed. They come check on you every now and then and in the last 30 minutes they’ll let you know so that you can get your last round of tea. By the end of 1:30 hours you should leave the table so that they can accommodate the next group.

Overall it was a good experience but next time we’ll probably go somewhere with a more relaxed schedule.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM1JxBYnbxI4VKpZS2YgwzzuhTmZNwjDSEJShRm&fid=0x0:0xda28c3280cbe4ac6"],"When":"2024-3-3"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Kirk Dewhurst","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVWWTLFQ830oasJBU8cAmsmabRT-5Ij0YE9AHz876EMH7X8r5Y3nA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The sandwiches and desserts are awesome.  My wife and I had the  Ruben and Mediterranean sandwiches. Then we enjoyed the Banoffee Tart and Earl Grey cream puff.  Our food was take out so no comment on the bakery location but what we got was tasty and of good quality. One day we will visit the bakery.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNtQ4l8K43v3ATiGxvyR_BLipY7fH_A3SXix0vB&fid=0x0:0x95534d2ac2dc2dd0"],"When":"2024-9-2"},{"Name":"Shereen Hijazi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUKIFshCkDEAVPTr1YLjyQdFyGQ-A6d8v0ne62iSHEMOIFcmWu6=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First impression of this place was amazing🤩. The atmosphere of the place is lively and inviting, and the decoration is spectacular. They have a sizable assortment of various cakes and drinks🥤 . The service is good and put us with our various visits for water🤣

The washroom was not very sanitary and clean, but a bit more attention would fix the problem.

We had coffee, red velvet cake 🍰, eclair, tuxedo, and a brownie cheesecake🍫🧀. Everything was good except the brownie cheesecake based upon multiple peoples opinions it was sour and the combo did not go well together. But other than that it was an absolutely fantastic experience, would recommend anyone to come here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP3KYSvYImehNsvYYyrWua6oUFV58VCWfuXqQrs&fid=0x0:0x95534d2ac2dc2dd0"],"When":"2024-7-16"},{"Name":"Rebecca Peters","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU0gHF18J3Ime6kTPm2yKeqHbZrYoz0bcO0n_npz5sOUy3HQe7Y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Whether it’s 2pm or 4am, if you’re looking for quality desserts, the answer is Breka. I love the desserts especially during the midnight cravings! The staff was super sweet at this particular branch & the decorations for Halloween were fun to see! Also please bring back Blackberry Limospourine <3","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPgzkTMgAwsQMAZnhEsdjPgRuRr3iKziWdm1bpW&fid=0x0:0x95534d2ac2dc2dd0"],"When":"2024-11-26"},{"Name":"Alaleh - FoodyTO","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWVEfHfJMFN2ZvtuomGiiFlKlFmQ-YD5GQlOXtxg4V8yyZ1BsB4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The biggest perks of this bakery is that they’re open 24/7 and the second one is that they have so many sweet and savory treats that you can enjoy. And the third one is that the taste and quality of the treats are very good.

We came here on an evening and ordered coffee with some delicious desserts and enjoyed them. Then we ordered some breakfast sandwiches and croissants for takeout.

I strongly recommend “Ham & Cheese Melt” and “Chocolate & Almond Croissant”.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPqD3mCWsH1OezLsotZDyHTVBsRo9iy1x2FdEwR&fid=0x0:0x95534d2ac2dc2dd0"],"When":"2024-6-21"},{"Name":"Hakan Guzgan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUA_W8rhFsh5vl3N-SwOXx9x2M4aBXN2TS01V15E4k2zvHSImaORA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Breka Bakery & Café in the heart of Downtown Vancouver is a gem, especially for those dealing with jet lag after an overseas flight. Its 24-hour service is a lifesaver, and despite being quite busy at 2 AM, there were still available seats.

We ordered the Mediterranean Chicken Sandwiches, Earl Grey tea, and an Americano with steamed oat milk. The sandwiches were flavorful and satisfying, priced at $11.50 each, while the drinks were a reasonable $3.00 each. The café also offers a wide selection of desserts and other sandwich options, making it a great spot for a quick bite and drink.

Breka’s convenient hours and tasty offerings make it a must-visit for night owls or anyone seeking a casual, reliable café experience in Vancouver. Highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMXmJDNvmFdqAkMUyyBkl-k9V6GnYz2jRDcZz50&fid=0x0:0x95534d2ac2dc2dd0"],"When":"2024-12-9"},{"Name":"Claire_Blue_Skies Galaxy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLGGTOtimllUE3NdIjxKqf8bZSGIsT45SwhIK1D9ltC7LYrHA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I was given a gift card to Breka. I've never been to or ordered from one, so I wasn't sure what to expect. When I walked up to look at the display case, I was immediately asked what I wanted but I hadn't decided. So service was quick. I had a chicken apricot sandwich and decaf. Everything went smoothly until I went to look for a seat. For some reason there were a ton of crumbs on the bench. It was weird since there was clearly a person wiping down tables...perhaps they wiped it onto the bench? Other than that the decaf was much better than I had expected and the chicken apricot sandwich was delicious.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPnpJfOihbwqNzsAjOv2H8QrGEmfqS8gB16cHMo&fid=0x0:0x95534d2ac2dc2dd0"],"When":"2024-10-12"},{"Name":"Farnoosh Oa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUfrQUrJXA--Ptn7DzZdOePAPUpMXhfDw-TT3wQzcdlbkLmrzV4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Breka Café is the perfect spot whether you’re looking to grab a quick bite or relax with a coffee, morning or night. We stayed at a hotel nearby, so I had the chance to try nearly every sandwich and pastry, and I can confidently say each one was fantastic. The chicken sandwich with apricot filling may sound unusual, but it was surprisingly delicious. Highly recommend this place!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOK6f4YN9VeLQ6Qk5Rp-ZGic0kLtNnEZJOAgzJG&fid=0x0:0x95534d2ac2dc2dd0"],"When":"2024-11-12"},{"Name":"jennifer p","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXHo6KkOmgnWBi7EYGNOHrLC8rlPKOuQ6DrHrusCEFoCQ3OftGM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love that this place exists. It’s open 24 hours a day which is perfect for people traveling and needing something at any time. I’ve been here several times in multiple trips and it’s very good. Where else can you get a flat white after a Taylor Swift concert at midnight? The pastries are excellent, great coffee drinks, quick service and online ordering makes pick up very easy. I do wish they had more traditional breakfast options like bagel and cream cheese or something similar that wasn’t a pastry. Will be back next time in town!","Images":null,"When":""}]

[{"Name":"Ellys Rain Jover","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV0hJlp6qT1Ztha6Ak5u4Cz8qGTeD2COc81d_ht507t2q81doM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great atmosphere! So cozy, clean, and spacious. Staff were very nice and accommodating. Very friendly and bright people. As for the drinks, I personally liked their iced mocha. They also gave us samples of their food, both were very good and tasty. Interesting textures and flavors; it’s also made freshly in-house. Prices are also reasonable. Definitely recommend! Pay them a visit. ᰔ","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOy0sYIMgdVpNtF2PtcDysq7LVPAYF0t_OvyU8&fid=0x0:0xd78d99d8299d4944"],"When":"2024-12-18"},{"Name":"Justinne R","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUZjbTHqnhTEqvuFrCtYLoF9AmLZMjLOJibp7hjfoPSm6kaAw9H_A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Loved this space -- enjoyed our desserts and tea. Friendly service, cozy atmosphere, and great location!  Will definitely recommend for folks looking for desserts in downtown after dinner. Can't wait to check this out again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPXopOckyL8kw4qVvyu6ft3eobbYt-IZfincWz3&fid=0x0:0xd78d99d8299d4944"],"When":"2024-12-22"},{"Name":"Sara S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIy--5oFW8niPcBxqugUIbJZjdBNRThih92LLLZdAvRn_blI8o=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We visited this café and had a lovely experience overall. The atmosphere was great, the barista was exceptionally polite, and the latte art was impressive. The San Sebastian cheesecake was delightful, but the Kunafa was disappointing—it didn’t feel authentic. On the bright side, both the Karak tea and Arabic coffee were excellent, leaving a positive impression despite the mixed results.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOQJ7_PuTgteJyT7Bq5Xlm4YlEqP9kuTAkxdGA0&fid=0x0:0xd78d99d8299d4944"],"When":"2024-11-21"},{"Name":"יוסרא אבו נסרה אלעובידי","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJpfVQJ8M0NP5LN8XcpTKX1UvZ19G_BZJmXNqYGgvc6qfN-WA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing small coffee shop in downtown
Very testy kunafa  and pudding and great coffee and the investment so incredible
Feeling lovely and warming place the staff so nice and friendly. High recommended to have new sweets
I’m going to back very soon","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPuRVA6pz8D7bu0AH5A413dqIHpAehEZvthjJpK&fid=0x0:0xd78d99d8299d4944"],"When":"2024-12-24"},{"Name":"Arielle Lok","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWtizUZyTvP27ebSmpanVv0Z9tQujmr--1qEE7rOUgWFj5vvv5i=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"this did not miss. i love love loved the chocolate baklava. I’ll dream of her. the basbosa was heavenly. the pistachio cheesecake was so decadent and not too sweet - like Greek yogurt but 20x better. the regular pistachio is better than most other places in Vancouver, but I think everything else was just S-tier so it’s hard for me to say much beyond that. wowowowowow. got persian tea to share and wash it down and awesome seating with comfortable benches.

note that the baklavas come in pairs of 2 only. you can’t just get one square, so best to come with someone or come with a big appetite.

thanks!!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNM2jVmlg0FRrNMQaqe5StJ3O0S23cEUXFS-R4I&fid=0x0:0xd78d99d8299d4944"],"When":"2024-9-4"},{"Name":"HLam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWa4JKHp2wkhu4ZvuDyznaC1kJJ48e0F2T7oIoQYrBxf5_GFCA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Nice little spot for a break doing Xmas shopping. Have never tried a (Mini) Kunafa.  Found it warm, not too sweet and initially drier than I expected but paired surprising well with hot coffee or I suspect any of the Middle Eastern teas.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNosJ2SCBpmEBmzzZbrnC4xsCYb1c771oAsPRlE&fid=0x0:0xd78d99d8299d4944"],"When":"2024-12-12"},{"Name":"A. Mutya","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK79oYeq_OvmduVZIDJda7fpkLxY29bBY36W4GxoUKmbyPo2A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Nice little medditerenean cafe. We ordered the turkish coffee and mini kunafa. It wasnt the same kunafa we had in Jordan. We got there at 0730pm and the server was still nice and attentive despite almost closing time. Love the ambience. The kunafa was a little pricey too but other than that great place to hang out. It is only open 2pm-8pm","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNcy0Mj4KtjvDOyA3YKyhxF3hMF6OqsoasKOHFL&fid=0x0:0xd78d99d8299d4944"],"When":"2024-9-4"},{"Name":"Anahita","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXZdkXvOrK37Ooa5ldvQ5MOjlrEw13Lne0IfWfaO4Qo2r2uf3ac=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I recently visited Pistachio Sweetery Cafe and was very disappointed with my experience. I ordered a 6-inch Kunafa, Iraqi tea, and Turkish coffee.

The Kunafa was a major letdown. It was supposed to be a traditional Turkish dessert, but it fell far short of expectations. The cheese was thick and tasted more like pizza than Kunafa. When I complained to the staff, they were dismissive and offered no apology or resolution. They basically said "it is what it is."

The Iraqi tea and Turkish coffee were also mediocre, especially considering the price. They were nothing special and not worth what I paid.

Overall, I was very disappointed with my experience at Pistachio Sweetery Cafe. The Kunafa was inauthentic and the drinks were overpriced and average. The staff was also unhelpful when I complained about the Kunafa. I would not recommend this cafe to others.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPVfMJmkwi8P4FTcPd1n3mLFe_KfBioY6PVgpp3&fid=0x0:0xd78d99d8299d4944"],"When":"2024-7-7"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Kaitlyn Jung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU3Z8RTVAtMfrX6uG6JFFOYzsyTXI7YKgjW6WLd73YQIb_urJDkYQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"We ordered the grass jelly milk tea and a bubble waffle combo (taro slush with pearls and the original waffle). The waffle was pretty good! We did come right when they opened and there was a surprising morning rush so the guy might’ve been swamped but the drinks were very watered down. Slightly disappointing but we’ll come back and give it one more shot.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPM7q9yQTXzoH8nWRLbGRsw1cnW3YWVQn0Q7EiL&fid=0x0:0xd8ced3e093250f93"],"When":"2024-8-7"},{"Name":"Evon Tsang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJvHujww9uFxgsiZ71CuzdL-Kn-UTJtwb3Erm1KkKgV_QrVSA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Owner please read - this is very important! Ordered from Ding Tea a couple of times through Ubereats, and wondered why it always tasted so sweet although we put none or slight for sugar. Seems like either the options were reversed on the Ubereats platform or the person at the store made a mistake when entering the order. It happened to 2 out of 3 of the drinks we ordered. For example, we ordered dalgona coffee milk tea 0% sugar and less ice. The drink came out with 0% ice and 70% sugar.

Please kindly look into it and fix as it may affect your business 🥹. Please refer to photo. Thank you x 3.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNnc19Rrpmrb1s3-R4n1GqWOn4tsoM5uodSUjnI&fid=0x0:0xd8ced3e093250f93"],"When":"2024-11-24"},{"Name":"deez nutz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKeCzTIsutyS5EuSpAo0k_OKxLoKU06V1lPPDCgh4a1-0M0pQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Been coming here getting bubble tea everyday for the summer and has been my new go to when I’m in the area! Passion fruit all the way! My new lemon ice tea! Love the owners and every one that work here! Free wifi with lots of tables, darts, and old school games to play!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOtpKhA6BA9ddE7W-GzNzfVuCtqvFPiqQ-90yVQ&fid=0x0:0xd8ced3e093250f93"],"When":"2024-7-7"},{"Name":"An Le","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXF01TBYc3PKsxbdTmX6Nyb3k8CUa16dz0pehTu-KrjeP5-RXU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Ding Tea offers a wide variety of flavors, and the shop is clean. I tried the milk tea, and it was delicious. I also appreciated the option for clear boba. Plus, they have electric dart games for added fun. recommended","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN_zgSIjjmRkkO4rk_kTWVApxBvJuuIIT4PPg8&fid=0x0:0xd8ced3e093250f93"],"When":"2023-10-17"},{"Name":"Jinchen Cai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVAkTaGuIBaKsnqPWu-_2v9e15t_xkadDsddRx-i0U3GTJUait-Fw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Quality bubble tea for decent price🧋

I forgot to take photos of my drink and those my friends got, but we enjoyed the interior and hang out space quite a bit. There's 2 darts stations, but Covid so we didn't consider it. 🎯 Other than that, there's plenty of distancing and space to host about 8-10 customers.

Definately worth a try if you're in the area and wanna support individual shops instead of chains!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPDsgIkjyBADT3PYBQpN_YhPtBYj-Ofv79tkFo7&fid=0x0:0xd8ced3e093250f93"],"When":"2022-2-9"},{"Name":"Nina T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLt5aVZEBWTwlB9YebMs663-2gJr0YQ1k-gEzpUGQcK_QpWyg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Tried their Kiwi Aloe Vera Juice and Bubble Milk Tea. Both were not bad. I ordered mine with Golden pearls and they were nice and chewy. There weren’t any people when we went so it’s a nice quiet place to go to. We didn’t get to try playing but they also had a darts game area there if you’re interested.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO7Lcd2gGzG0tKP_a2HlS01-Z5mUkt1WCEld1PM&fid=0x0:0xd8ced3e093250f93"],"When":"2022-1-9"},{"Name":"Luke Weng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXn1tdfwXfRnZVszKV8bZBNwooyRqfHv0VT8T0EAQWyUrqTrrO6aQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love ding tea! I saw that this place had a "top 10 BBT" award in 2018, so we dropped by on the way to spanish banks.

The price was ridiculous cheap, but we realized that everything was from syrup. You get what you pay for lol. But my family rarely sees such BBT places like this nowadays.

Reminds me of the older BBT shops that were around 15~ years ago. The staff were very polite (and speaking Vietnamese 😮) and the interior was beautiful. There were dart boards in the back too.

They had exotic flavors and toppings like green apple / mango stars too. If I'm in the area I will defs come back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPNdVNHOUG0cBdRM_wLRsdSm817wRqiOEHb4QJb&fid=0x0:0xd8ced3e093250f93"],"When":"2022-7-27"},{"Name":"Colleen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLpCCMNp7XzGiCebjsb15h00nLI_s4EZ5DhOTvOot51o9xB6w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Looks like I was not the only person who had a bad experience with the male server in the evening - if you don't want to work then just quit.

I did nothing to instigate. The moment I walked in, he did not say hi and just looked miserable and angry. Not expecting a greeting but nobody wants to look at someone who's angry for no apparently reason. He was hostile and passive aggressive when interacting with him, when I had just ordered a normal bubble tea...

Absolutely embarassing and I will never be coming back to this store.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Neha Sharma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVOAFVq8Z0ZGxqdcHyQUNR3mUQfrl34aqa6y4TgqK9UdFHM4ko3=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great customer service, staff was polite. Excellent menu potions. Mango ice cream was good. I cant stop myself to recommend banana chocolate ice cream drink with complimentary coconut jellies. It was delicious and filling.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNakhEZLCLBX6QzqZizFpgZOnJStrnBMrqJal2n&fid=0x0:0x97925fa58174cc94"],"When":"2024-12-15"},{"Name":"Qiongyu Chong Huang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWssGm9ujB4PRrGeL3vqwFdAgcQ2HleVBiKNDuYibWaXLNdm2Dr=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is such a neighborhood gem! We had avocado , red bean and mango milkshake, made with fresh ingredient, really tasty and not too sweet , we love it. They also have food options and open until midnight , such a good spot for after dinner desert/drink.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOyJrNHIzOXr8koDqOnyHGJlvxl11kqm1rNE1jR&fid=0x0:0x97925fa58174cc94"],"When":"2024-11-24"},{"Name":"AH","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUbSDTBRb0i5Z-O9Llx_f4jUDvaC36Rpc_Ai8VCzOt_tM08rlqM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of my favorite bubble tea places in Vancouver along with Hot Cha Cafe. They usually have special drinks which are pretty good. Prices are very cheap and their pearls are great. Service could be improved, as sometimes the people behind the counter seem annoyed. However, the quality and price make up for it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP2NjbH7GR9YR3b3dmh1WYl7ZWOX99OxH_ZQpfP&fid=0x0:0x97925fa58174cc94"],"When":"2024-6-16"},{"Name":"eddy wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX8Fjpj3y8teHQ4LqbC4PHR8whbU4-XOrTXEwklI9bGRqZLRD20=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The owners are very very hard working. They rarely take a day off and I've been a loyal customer since I was 16 at their original location on Fraser street across from John Oliver high school. They raised 2 kids and work long hours everyday. They also own the laundry mat next door.

They have daily specials posted on their chalk board outside that attracts crowds daily, even during the winter months. But if you’re a fan of ice cream or cheese cake bubble teas this is the place. My personal favourite is their green tea ice cream with coconut jelly.

They have a small dine in area and tv. You’ll see a lot of young students here.
Cash or debit only. Pay cash and get 5% off.
I just noticed they do e-transfer now.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNvdZFC-jqLLx2zkvPUw8bXN-MjLewcSBBGmkBP&fid=0x0:0x97925fa58174cc94"],"When":"2024-9-20"},{"Name":"Alick Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKUqZ-BRlpWhxpGIkligB7NDQbnz-lNKkuIZsGRSdDfseOKcvE5=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Been going to this place for years, but tonight I went to grab a drink with a friend  and a snack. The drinks are pretty casual as always. but something caught my eyes on the food menu tonight and   I had to try it!
The creamy durian balls aka “golden durian mochi ball”
I didn’t even know they had it, it’s a must try!
😍explosion of creamy durian on the inside and a light crispy outer shell with a soft mochi middle layer! The sauce top it off and gives it just the right amount of sweetness!
It was perfect the durians treat that hit the spot

definitely going to get them again next time
thank you👍👍

it’s not for the everyone, but for the durian lovers out there it’s definitely going to give you a durian tasty time!🤪","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPWoO1aWj3rVXJ7tQTtH88tEkOTFDWX5GrKBkrb&fid=0x0:0x97925fa58174cc94"],"When":"2024-5-14"},{"Name":"Bryan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWgQOyucobzp1WHcgAwkWVFUg6T8jAN7HsnzLG69-m-S2SOVkUy=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The bubble tea was great. The atmosphere is as expected for an older cafe. It's fine but come for the tea not the atmosphere. My only complaint was they didn't take MasterCard. Without Visa, cash or debit. You are stuck.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Alex Bennet","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXvYdpdn1NxF637i3RhyQP9PtiVF9jOCdDNyEHmcaA9tMpwkZI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Milk & Sugar Cafe offers a delightful experience for anyone looking for a cozy spot to enjoy a great cup of coffee or a delicious light meal. The cafe's atmosphere is warm and inviting, with a charming decor that blends rustic and modern elements. Their coffee, sourced from high-quality beans, is rich and flavourful, perfect for coffee connoisseurs. The menu, though not extensive, includes a variety of pastries, sandwiches, and salads, all freshly prepared. The standout is their signature vanilla latte and the avocado toast, which is a must-try.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPSmT3cMxbNrRVm7PyYF2tut6c8D_9L9TMCzbB5&fid=0x0:0x97925fa58174cc94"],"When":"2024-1-3"},{"Name":"Liam Rider","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWPX4DDrtiUNyDL1r03MV7uHEDVU-v1k00_ry1glHtcrJFAttnq=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Worst fried chicken I've had in my entire life. And it was 14 bucks for 2 drumsticks and 2 thighs!!!!! Beware. I'm sure their bubble tea is great but stay away from the fried chicken.","Images":null,"When":""}]
