user_reviews:
[{"Name":"C P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXAGCCMklukvE3teAPF7iaf0kkjEAg5vM85Zot3rUzh1z1N-P7Z=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This was recommended to us by one of my Mexican friends and it did not disappoint! Was hoping for a Torta Ahogada but thats only on the lunch menu. Instead I settled with the Cochinita Benedict which was delicious. Not as good as my wife’s chilaquiles though!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPJsz3RIWOpCOJ5UOtaLp5TuGvYQH3x7t0plKHE&fid=0x0:0x105adea0b6311592"],"When":"2024-10-12"},{"Name":"Jesse Jardine","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXCzDR0nQseDX-YvbnsmT8LhszGtAEvY7TAlWdNB93j2elpLTP1=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is the best brunch place. Bennies are 10/10 best in the city. I've been everywhere around the drive trying every Benny and nothing touches this. Salmon Benny is amazing. Go here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOp_A3TczPJpITrhJJq1BM3rTe_JhUMm5HN9BR5&fid=0x0:0x105adea0b6311592"],"When":"2024-10-19"},{"Name":"Lee Van","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUkdc0b5WROtpnJCruJpetIegq6Snt_2bGm0A5pSa9cqY1SCXL5=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"My friend and I headed here for brunch Sunday morning. We agreed to sit at the bar given there were no other tables available and we didn't really want to wait. The atmosphere is lovely, a little cramped perhaps and a little loud at times. That said, the food was good. My friend and I both got the eggs benedict and avocado which was yummy. I would come here again. We both managed to find parking on Hastings Street, no problem.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO97qYwp0UeKlKXXuIF-0HOPOEYh_pgkzeqptHR&fid=0x0:0x105adea0b6311592"],"When":"2024-3-27"},{"Name":"i trasgu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLj3xDN63RHMh2Uktz1CJgwXYEeitjUUjFguEsiThcfmzVO2g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If I could give Café El Roundel more than five stars I would!

This is one of those restaurants where you wished you had a bigger stomach so you could eat more! The food is amazing, authentic, and delicious; prepared in an immaculate kitchen with traditional ingredients but with the modern ingenuity that you can only find in Mexico City or Guadalajara. Simply the best Mexican food in the lower mainland.

The atmosphere is modern but welcoming and comfortable; our server Eileen made us feel at home and made great recommendations for our first time. We're planning to become regulars because this is one of those places that you can eat exceedingly well without ever feeling uncomfortable; ingredients are fresh, top-quality, and dishes are healthy but oh so satisfying.

For instance, nowhere in BC will you ever find chayote (pear squash) salad, aguachile (like a ceviche), or tortas ahogadas (typical subs from Guadalajara with Livia bread) because this kitchen is miles ahead of the cookie-cutter Mexican food that we're used to here, offering us vegetarians and meat eaters sophistication and deliciousness at great prices.

The drinks are another refreshing (lit) feature: cocktails prepared with care in vintage glasses or wonderful brews, and a fun zero-proof selection like Jamaica (sorel).

As if that wasn't enough, they have a great playlist that had us grooving and vibing for the whole time! I can't wait to try the whole menu because every dish and drink our party order was scrumptious, satisfying, and prepared with care. We were so happy here!

We have officially tried all items in the menu including breakfast/brunch! YUM!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNlf8cTc-b0nF-yNIKysBj3RSL8Lki_AxFoF6P0&fid=0x0:0x105adea0b6311592"],"When":"2023-11-22"},{"Name":"Fatemeh Sayadi (Tisha)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUT0iXGjcmugjaf-sxnw_j5g7IpzISbK9kqKoWSQpUn_JCfvpEr=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Definitely recommended. We had cappuccino and mocha I loved it. For meals we ordered basic breakfast, quinoa bowl, and black bean Benedict. The eggs were poached really well, the cubed potatoes were seasoned perfectly. The staff were nice and friendly, the waiting time was only 5 minutes.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP7zD5RWhxljCel363sxw4ntCIUXRzMqD-i1aHm&fid=0x0:0x105adea0b6311592"],"When":"2022-4-9"},{"Name":"Chucho Godinez (GasparIlom)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUcjzn0qHBMp7jO9n6NwwgcfJ8Iqqx_He8Ip146cN1pYA36rR9T4A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The good: The food is amazing, I had the huevos bañados and my wife had the chilaquiles, both with nice presentation, full of flavour. My wife is kind of a Coffee snob, very picky but she insisted I mentioned in my review that the coffee was very good, smooth and bold. We were meeting old tenants of ours we keep in touch with and we had a long chat, we were never disturbed or rushed to vacate the table. I like the inside even though is a small place.
The not so good: Don't come here very hungry because the servings are on the small side, however I see that everywhere we go this days, Restaurant owners reducing the size of servings to compensate the high cost of ingredients, labour, rent, etc. So I get that part and I don't fault or give a bad review because of that. At the time to pay the bill, the machine handed to you comes with the tip screen and the lowest is 18%, I mean you can customize it, but I think everyone is doing that. The service was worth of a tip and it was earned.
So: Overall a great experience, will definately go back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipONlOFXshLPhGGdiAyqKUS9VRrZ_Zy3LKuBbjaS&fid=0x0:0x105adea0b6311592"],"When":"2024-2-25"},{"Name":"Matt Moya","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX6Dd2-qLoxdQ0V-pcqlJ4XGtTWjvUlfICq4eppY1oKocACDwTq=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A breakfast joint down the street was full, so we came here. This place is our new go to! Absolutely awesome brunch/breakfast in a charming little diner setting. The staff was exceptional, and very attentive. Their standards for cleanliness was top notch. A safe and clean environment with exquisite food. If you find yourself in the area, this place is an absolute must visit. Can’t wait until my next visit here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMflkVGevJANORmyempc9_765vamYssnh3P1tQg&fid=0x0:0x105adea0b6311592"],"When":"2021-1-30"},{"Name":"adam Miller","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUtRBMp_7sreO5jr6GK1rc0vTPe6S_2b-2RKMSbLp6gu5A7HI6Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I’ve been here a handful of times and it’s just a very inconsistent place.
Came here yesterday on the weekend and it was busy. Not a great welcome just told to put a name on this list but there was no pen and he left before I could say anything. I ended up putting together a couple seats at the bar. All good, they’re busy.
It’s one of those places that are so small that if you pick up bad energy from staff, it kinda sets the room you know? The servers both just seemed like they didn’t want to be there and ours was nice and everything but she seemed sad, maybe cause her coworker looked kinda cold and miserable .. I don’t know I can imagine if you’re working with people that aren’t in any way fun it would be kinda sad.
I ordered the black bean Benny and my egg was overcooked and my husband got French toast and it was burnt on one side. The place was busy and I didn’t want to tell the waitress cause i knew if they remade it, it would take another 30 minutes and I was hungry. 😞

I feel like if they had better music that was a tad louder.. maybe some sort of beat.. funk.. or something? Something to pick up the vibe in there a little cause it currently has mopy vibes,  happier friendly service would make a huge difference

I don’t think I’m going to be back after yesterday though, it was just off in there and not worth the money","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Patisserie Fur Elise
descriptions: French pastries & other desserts along with afternoon tea in a Victorian house from 1893.
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true}]},{"id":"dining_options","name":"Dining options","options":[{"name":"Dessert","enabled":true}]},{"id":"payments","name":"Payments","options":[{"name":"Debit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"NFC mobile payments","enabled":true},{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":false}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Just Me Traveling","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX18amg9WNM9rF8Fs9axj8FE9tNtrVpXPgaMIl0yMbfuZ56ahzt=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Went here with a friend in a weekend. It was a nice experience. The place was not that big but it was cozy and nicely decorated for a tea time atmosphere. The service was great and the staff were really nice. I enjoyed the selection of the tea time items both sweet and savory. Initially I thought it will not be enough but we ended up taking home few pieces as we weren’t able to finish it.My favorite among all the items is the panacotta. It was so smooth and creamy, the panacotta that I’ve tried so far.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNYH34p3QsdjlvDK-acGyCkQFQnrfQtYPLkArM_&fid=0x0:0x489f7e1dfa0d0bdf"],"When":"2024-6-15"},{"Name":"Lucy Animator","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVY7brXamElnS01fAQfTXCPF3JSbsNMYZuWBhl1ILRqSsdPDqE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Omg! I can’t with the beauty of this place!! We had the high tea experience and it was amazing! The food is delicious -everything so tasty-all of it!-, the decoration is perfect, the atmosphere so enjoyable and the staff do a great job! I really have an incredible and dreamy, amazing day with my friend. The music is pleasant and at great volume for a conversation. We enjoyed the downstairs store as well, everything is so pretty!!! 😍
I’m in love and definitely will be back again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNmdY1jFbLnA_1y63RI44_okSEwhX9KcYA5mZc&fid=0x0:0x489f7e1dfa0d0bdf"],"When":"2024-5-30"},{"Name":"leesa tran","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUWsWaHyhzcw7kKPh9V3HkvTK5TTa81TdmCDp9IylYllx4puXIy=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Cute little place to come for high tea. Love the exterior of the building as this restaurant is basically located in a house.

Overall the food quality was decent for the price as it is cheaper than other places. I liked the teacup pots as well. The peach tea was my favourite.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMYCHI_Ln4imSRzm47Xen3BHj7iBlS8K1NaP_Ih&fid=0x0:0x489f7e1dfa0d0bdf"],"When":"2024-4-16"},{"Name":"Kwong Tang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVRNhrcdIOQyhkpCbdjoUSwC0OqkPEp5C09o-KZX9pyAsIQioX9=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"🍰☕ Enchanted Afternoon Tea at Patisserie Fur Elise with Family 🌸👨‍👩‍👧‍👧

🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟 Our family's weekend afternoon tea at Patisserie Fur Elise was like stepping into a storybook. The Victorian ambiance, paired with exquisite pastries and teas, made for a magical escape in downtown Vancouver. Each treat, from the delicate sandwiches to the sumptuous sweets, was a delight to the senses. The kids were enchanted by the elegant setting and the delicious selections tailored just for them. It was a memorable experience that blended sophistication with a warm, family-friendly atmosphere. A perfect blend of culinary excellence and ambiance that we'll treasure. 🍴💖","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO5OpGh-Q-O2VsOAsybvKAsddu1fiZqSEuYMOBz&fid=0x0:0x489f7e1dfa0d0bdf"],"When":"2024-2-19"},{"Name":"Juliet D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUnoiyKu2IE_QmMxqN8laqTB256R_5tMjahRejoR1AKjSVbkXHS9g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A very aesthetically pleasing place to visit for afternoon tea! An oasis of Europe surrounded by high-rise buildings of a busy city.
Good service, good tea, delicious food. Not like a luxury high tea experience from London but more like a cozy afternoon tea with your grandma.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMn_jhtqS54pV8SdhFNEX2aAyrO3T9LDfD9c3tf&fid=0x0:0x489f7e1dfa0d0bdf"],"When":"2024-5-7"},{"Name":"G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKy_RY7OyFpWDMGpBPfEcNdhNvd_Bt7gU5qWs4wH5XumgCFAw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Cute little gem of a place. Food was good, not amazing as other high tea places I’ve been to but not bad by any means. Service is lacking for sure. I’d definitely focus on that sore spot.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN9yH3CvLCkxI5RVd3r14sF1t5LBQbjWhP15FPl&fid=0x0:0x489f7e1dfa0d0bdf"],"When":"2023-11-30"},{"Name":"Ananda Enkhtur","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVkkmVVa6j0bCuttopPInRikVrpr7LXYSHoZtWk3dhng__J_lZi=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Incredibly disappointing experience, even giving 1 star is generous!
We had high expectations for this place from the pictures but everyone in our group collectively agreed with how bad of an experience it was. The lack of decent customer service and hostility is a start. The lady with her hair tied back was very passive aggressive and rude with us, almost as if she wanted us to leave the moment we entered the place, which made us really uncomfortable! The atmosphere and the interior is nothing too special, there are other high tea places in Vancouver that are far better than this one. The tray that is shown in the picture is shared between 3 people but is 60$ after the mandatory service fee and taxes. You’d be expecting a lot more for the price you’re paying but sadly the tray only included 1 sandwich per person that doesn’t even taste good and the sweets were either too sour or too sweet. First and last time coming to this place!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOcVdOrQNlM_2uKWafjxgLu-J5wDwi2Bnahdsb7&fid=0x0:0x489f7e1dfa0d0bdf"],"When":"2024-2-20"},{"Name":"D D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVn-HmKGkiEXpPYEJdaFnX-Wk9npBuMky8Sv8ZSJcapzQOOPiN3=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cute and charming afternoon tea in a heritage building with gorgeous decor. 1pm on a weekday we were the only people there.  Food was delicious.  Service was a bit of a miss this visit ... the first server was lovely but the second server was not attentive at all.  After 2 hours we struggled to get her attention to pay for our meal as she was on the phone with someone trying to plan a large gathering.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO2OxlfzKkRS5I_bv3f5wczsc2eIOij2B0R5L6w&fid=0x0:0x489f7e1dfa0d0bdf"],"When":"2023-4-11"}]

title: Macao Imperial Tea (Bubble Tea Cafe)
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"No-contact delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Kasun Silva","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWfV5LiScyjiTWsqvmgOUNqoYGL2Xz6DohZeevs-p5Nfp6nMrw3Vg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I stumbled upon this adorable bubble tea shop and I'm so glad I did! The moment I walked in, I was greeted with a warm and welcoming atmosphere that made me feel right at home. The decor was modern and sleek, with a fun and colorful vibe that matched the playful vibe of the bubble tea itself.

The service was top-notch - the staff were friendly, attentive, and knowledgeable about the menu. I ordered the a samosa, a pearl milk tea and a latte and was blown away by the generous serving size and the perfect balance of tea and milk. The boba was cooked to perfection and added just the right amount of sweetness and chewiness to the drink.

What really stood out to me, however, was the attention to detail and the care that went into crafting each drink. From the precision-cut ice to the carefully arranged toppings, it was clear that the team was dedicated to providing an exceptional experience for every customer.

Overall, I'm so impressed with this new bubble tea shop and can't wait to go back and try more flavors! If you're a bubble tea lover like me, do yourself a favor and check it out. You won't be disappointed!

Recommendation: Try cheese cake series and don't forget to ask about the daily specials and promotions.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOTSuqhqSP64bM9VJizZAFBR_0SYT9OCMw0ROK1&fid=0x0:0xd304b3e8d4b8d703"],"When":"2024-10-12"},{"Name":"Kathryn J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUiz7XgftLV-StPwmNsPVCeG1p0cQRQFo2PNjm2NGPW038WAxU3=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Was passing by, I happen to notice this place. When entering, the owner was very kind and welcoming. The atmosphere is also vibrant and inviting. It’s also a nice location. As for the drinks they have a lot of variety. I tried the “For You” strawberry, it is refreshing, yummy and a bit creamy and the bonus is the nice cute bottle. Really recommend you to try it out! I will for sure be coming here again! :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNJTZ3lGRohi17c1RZQEi45pffhlAl2mPABGfOE&fid=0x0:0xd304b3e8d4b8d703"],"When":"2024-10-23"},{"Name":"Arti lathwal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU--XjevGPRolwkrLKvJrLYMTai0d1QjDH_H4G8_ZLMIxMczlM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently visited this place and was blown away by their Cheesecake Milk Tea! It’s creamy, smooth, and has the perfect blend of sweetness and rich cheesecake flavor. The tapioca pearls were perfectly chewy, adding a nice texture to the drink. The staff was friendly, and the service was quick. Definitely a must-try spot for bubble tea lovers!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNGwamh0vlHpQUhxOHpNM-pLYMcp6Bsw6R9flXE&fid=0x0:0xd304b3e8d4b8d703"],"When":"2024-10-12"},{"Name":"Amy Clee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWdrnA0XEPTvfYwIwYticlB6IqenaxatqfrM6PPEGHAiL0x9KNY=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cute little spot on Granville! They have a great menu! I got the Garden Mix Samosa with chutney - so yum! And the Biscoff Latte - not too sweet, just right! Received very kind and welcoming service. She was very kind to answer all my many questions 😅 Lot’s of seating for such a tiny space! I’ll definitely be back to try more!

EDIT: I recently made a Skip order for the Chai Masala Combo, which states it comes with the Chai + two crispy samosa’s. I unfortunately only received 1 samosa with the combo. That being said, it was very delicious and I will still come back for more. The masala is to DIE for! And I wish the Skip app showed options for the Samosa? Cause I know they have a few options in store. Perhaps your Skip menu requires an update if indeed the combo only comes with 1 samosa. Thank you :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNUkuYBfwZPcfP-MOEfWwwLgnT2HNphB809nxlT&fid=0x0:0xd304b3e8d4b8d703"],"When":"2024-10-17"},{"Name":"Mist","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX2hjBp4IqLNPm6_5rJBQVAZP4JBqrbkhwZD_TDaTQT0bsQTjA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cute bubble tea cafe!!!
I went with the sago milk tea, and the sweetness was perfect. The drinks tasted so refreshing and the barista was the sweetest.

They even have a connect 4 on the table😎

Thank you for the amazing drink 😊","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNhtntEj1QXLKt8CavFhfCvVX8Lo1osINJXhwPb&fid=0x0:0xd304b3e8d4b8d703"],"When":"2024-11-12"},{"Name":"Andrea T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUbwfYu8plSMhZ4WQV_p40HDjZ9hTy4153yT6-BFgVSQXUKo6l5=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ordered twice in the past week after discovering this place on UberEats. :) The tea is strong and very flavourful. I love the Original Milk Tea with Cheesecake Cream. The Taho and Sago toppings are also really good. A new favourite spot for sure!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNLiwyGYQayTbNsiPvDgbTWPJCJnezMj_ZFeg8I&fid=0x0:0xd304b3e8d4b8d703"],"When":"2024-12-10"},{"Name":"Aoom Adirayk","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWO7C2Zbr7A1GoayHHishlQY73r-WwTMUcMzG1PJIWVOM3sGYnp=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Milk tea is delicious, and I really enjoy pairing it with cheese.
It would be perfect if the packaging for delivery could be improved. The teacup cover doesn’t seem very secure or tightly sealed.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMIEzTIqi4OuHjc12X_z5eSIROPI8B10ck1EYev&fid=0x0:0xd304b3e8d4b8d703"],"When":"2024-11-30"},{"Name":"Star Fish (Patrick)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXYO6NpfOVAT7KXZQr6X8Pm_lQ0ZiSUrfnpdmfKSPczCM9CY2h4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Friendly staff, yummy drinks and samosas at a great price! Definitely gotta come here whenever you’re in South Granville/Fairview area. I got a ginger tea and a samosa for $8 after tipping 10%. Also, they have BTS cup sleeves and cute seasonal decor for taking photos and videos.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPl_xVX31z-AbCnnNZM_ck2A0rgDnwTsJchnKw1&fid=0x0:0xd304b3e8d4b8d703"],"When":"2024-11-26"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jane Doe","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIG6ivj47xS2HhBWyL7Nhqkjx3ByYqnQdgrN9qpq1CDdbnzpQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very similar decor as their predecessor Halfday Tea. Great prices, great tea selection, popular spot but volume isn’t too loud and it’s a calm place.
There is a huge selection of teas, some common and some with an ambiguous name but no description. You can ask a worker for a recommendation and she will ask your tastes and knows the teas so well!
Tried their cream cheese olive pastry, it was good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMGNQu-ir3sKYAO3_9CygoJslQopvos5qSlOG_w&fid=0x0:0xe090bd4ec771576b"],"When":"2024-10-25"},{"Name":"Live By Faith","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV6_fk3WMDxKtu_o24BvAgUdyirIHRkePj_tVXCTsla3RkWyrqg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First of all, the owner is very kind. He seems like he knows how to make his customers happy. There are many types of tea, so it's nice to be able to try different flavours. Also, the location is close to the Broadway/City Hall Canada Line Skytrain station, so it's easy to get to by public transportation. The overall atmosphere is nice and comfortable. Highly recommended. :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOmJHR-3MxKkwgAHPjGBR_GGL_NXeaIAQxRL7mn&fid=0x0:0xe090bd4ec771576b"],"When":"2024-9-20"},{"Name":"Vivian Chai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXQqnRJnC-86n3hOI2gsAuTKoTPZtScLBsr3uh3r0XA7fmkLEA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Quite disappointed with the matcha and hojicha lattes as they came with high reviews. We ordered both hot, no sugar and with oat milk and both have weak colors and flavor, and too much air foam on top. For a 12 oz latte, they use 1 tsp of tea powder (which is, I believe, equivalent to approximately 1.5g - most quality matcha latte places would use 4g give or take for a 10-12 oz drink). Almond croissant was so so.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN0KeKmKlxK1kgdyHn39P4ZP9FYsKauMyRGd5Zj&fid=0x0:0xe090bd4ec771576b"],"When":"2024-11-11"},{"Name":"hy _y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUMUS-EFxlpfyJHElLEzul8Ef3QPJuOsPk4NHOslxTR7aGnuU8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We ordered tea and coffee, and both were great!! 🩷 The ambience is quiet and warm, and the service is excellent. We highly recommend this place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNtgGZZ_wyxoogGbhInh8zS8XWSH9xndyOOIHEU&fid=0x0:0xe090bd4ec771576b"],"When":"2024-8-10"},{"Name":"Oleksandra Storozhuk","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXRdXrsvvw47T02U5WZEWxpUfnmRoUN8GmjGKAgAWZ1wSE0zQKc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The barista lady made tasty cappuccino ( with balance roast and correct milk temperature)! This place has a calming vibe and teddy bear to cuddle 🥰 I wish there are more such places in Vancouver ☺️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOuPKPNsv2cJPsp05XUYzXiCvG0ZeQysPm49IHN&fid=0x0:0xe090bd4ec771576b"],"When":"2024-8-17"},{"Name":"きさ","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVEcahiwKXPqkmRzezx7cdAmVBzGvINRO4PaV3fPah7RZHlKFPM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The matcha latte here is really delicious.The taste is strong and similar to Japanese matcha latte I drink in Japan. The staff are very friendly and nice, the atmosphere is really  good :) There are many different types of tea so you can enjoy a variety of things!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMmEAzx3M1O-23iqfZvO3OHaENhil3TFQGKRtQ&fid=0x0:0xe090bd4ec771576b"],"When":"2024-6-6"},{"Name":"Ksenia Zhilyakova","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX2t7-sAXVjQoIVJHtb1hbNxYFUiv-Kw_b8IYKnqb5WEHslCgnY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lovely cafe! Just near to China Application Center, environment is so cool! Ppl are sitting and working on laptops. They have some stylish sofas and chairs. It’s clean. Coffee and almond croissant was good. Didn’t have anything to eat much, but it’s a cafe anyway:) I found a free parking somewhere nearby down the road and walked toward the place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNO9DYZGW98O5VNYaHjJIUUGJl1430LgeXlEbrS&fid=0x0:0xe090bd4ec771576b"],"When":"2024-6-12"},{"Name":"Athena","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXvcHYZ9C3U9WsCVWuvPpPPrR6DNL7Ywhr5D3WdUVxhk1FF9arkwQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love this cute cafe! Lovely drinks and pastries and perfect for studying or chatting.

I highly recommend the London Fog! One of the best ones I had and it's so rich and fragrant. It was a little too sweet so I would ask for less sugar next time. The matcha latte was not bad but the matcha wasn't strong enough. It has chargers, free wifi, chairs, tables and sofas and the interior is beautiful! I love how there is sunlight too and the music was calm. Service is also good!

Overall, hidden gem and would recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMqzUycDAIAhKvBJahf0S4HWHTTwOvLFz4ETVM6&fid=0x0:0xe090bd4ec771576b"],"When":"2024-1-18"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Mary Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJiKKbpCTVhcz_y_fNyQu-j4XW7z41NJ68114jnZUzxHfn-OA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Can't believe I never reviewed the Granville island Tea Company since I have been shopping there for tea for ages!  A nice, no nonsense tea place.   Tea leaves of many flavors and varieties.  Great quality and very reasonably priced.  It is a fraction of the price of say David's tea.  The staff is always friendly.  Last weekend the lady there recommended Ice Wine black tea and it was wonderful!  Some of my favorites are rose tea, Christmas blend, apricot and peach, and lavender earl grey.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPxr1Tbb6a5YzoSj-_76gpUcY63ck2_xBJ9MfrX&fid=0x0:0x115e94efc36441d2"],"When":"2024-9-7"},{"Name":"y sa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXFngQqa2F90OIpbxkUL3vQVcASx5xoE2gyFjE4kMR1ydjk_2M=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I ordered an Assam tea latte, and it tasted amazing ( especially on a cold day!). There are so many types of tea to choose from that I always have a hard time deciding, but they all taste good. However, the store tried to separate the lines for those ordering tea to go and those buying loose leaf tea, but the staff stayed behind the counter, so the lines ended up being a bit chaotic...","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMvd3QQyR-Eao0oMJfWuPqPKdoEsZAkGfEVNCIa&fid=0x0:0x115e94efc36441d2"],"When":"2024-10-20"},{"Name":"Joshua Ding","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVZPE1MNTiSYW266d26gwdTqL4M0B5bgmlpc2q-RY2uO7CjIFtW=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"December 2024

Wonderful tea selections in the market. Great job featuring different teas.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPWwQBxLLZUj0I92YOsvBgFXQYr44B_9IRTcCLd&fid=0x0:0x115e94efc36441d2"],"When":"2024-12-25"},{"Name":"Ruth-Ann Reich","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXNuIp4IGKm_eGnDIlRJWk90ZMo4fRS0hKtWlmUF6MNYuWBpF9w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The team at Granville Island Tea is one of the best! They’re always friendly, inviting, and go above and beyond to serve their customers. I really can’t say enough good things about the customer service here.
Some of my fav teas are Fruit Basket and Double Cream of Earl Grey.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ina Z","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUqIKozAx8ntjuj5oZw4droqBVtaUlTOcOyWdmvwutABHppGwO0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We didn’t wait that long to get accommodated. They have tons of options but I’ve opted with my usual Genmaicha. The look of their shop looks good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMYo3WJjeag_NI_nYMRWtc2KVob6vCY1WiLH55q&fid=0x0:0x115e94efc36441d2"],"When":"2024-12-6"},{"Name":"Justbeing Sam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWM9hiJK-AfVP-qSHlK2ogC-KKU9aHv9jB-f8Zpy8fNkox9PG5e=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Absolutely loved my visit to the Granville Island Tea Company! The raspberry and peach teas were delightful and bursting with flavor. The customer service was incredibly friendly and welcoming. A must-visit for tea lovers!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPAzm0UBko9poJKS1oC34ATjigwr9W03vvYbsMk&fid=0x0:0x115e94efc36441d2"],"When":"2024-5-29"},{"Name":"Simon Reed","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKqDrptZk5K8r7cAAASAK3dUxXTVH7GnPDIaXKpcuAnggfA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing selection, staff know what is and isn’t in stock which is impressive considering the stock. Great menu to pick tees while you are waiting in line. If you don’t like crowds get there as soon as the open because they get busy very fast.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMQKWA6mcFFXH6GK_4xbDGG0MQU7qnhZC0OJiw&fid=0x0:0x115e94efc36441d2"],"When":"2024-9-28"},{"Name":"Kwong Tang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVRNhrcdIOQyhkpCbdjoUSwC0OqkPEp5C09o-KZX9pyAsIQioX9=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"🍵 Steeped in Delight: A Cozy Cup at Granville Island Tea Company! 🌿

🌤️ On a bright Vancouver day, I wandered into Granville Island and discovered the charming Granville Island Tea Company. Nestled amidst the bustling market, its quaint and inviting atmosphere offered a peaceful retreat. 🏞️

☕ The extensive selection of teas, from aromatic masala chai to unique blends, was truly impressive. Opting for a creamy, perfectly balanced masala chai, I was delighted by its warmth and rich flavor. The staff's knowledge and friendliness enhanced the experience, making it not just a visit but a journey into the world of tea. 🍃

📚 The shop's setup, reminiscent of a cozy library with teas lined up like books, added to its enchanting ambiance. I appreciated the chance to sample different teas, each brewed to perfection, allowing for a personalized adventure for my taste buds. 📖

💼 Whether you're a tea aficionado or a curious newcomer, Granville Island Tea Company offers a welcoming space to explore an impressive range of teas. It's a must-visit for anyone seeking a serene sip in the heart of Granville Island. 🌟","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMLU5cAHvnlFZBHN1b_gDm3wbNOVnHancIgqo99&fid=0x0:0x115e94efc36441d2"],"When":"2024-3-14"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Earth Explorer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXx9WbpYHoWti2M8dulDcVEiSwzq2Is9YdecFV0_EjsI1gR2sUT=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wonderful Japanese tea house. Great selection of green,  black,  fermented,  matcha, and other teas. It's rare to find an authentic tea house that isn't an English style  serving high tea with carb loaded biscuits and dessert. 05 Tea is strictly premium tea, although they do have tea infused ice cream. Comfortable, limited seating with low light. Wi-Fi is available and they don't mind if you work. But be cortious and either keep ordering or move out if it gets full. Kitsilano is lucky to have this place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNzld1a32bIuxJbSk_qGGOkOT4aB_y7WKYINqCA&fid=0x0:0xa9a265daf8eaa0dc"],"When":"2024-6-1"},{"Name":"mickey grace","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW2koY7ZFfBdWpziRjPP5TFVjsrz4r1zt6MPtsM4mBH9nhU6uE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It offers such a relaxing atmosphere—sipping tea, enjoying desserts, and chatting with friends feels so delightful!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNnweX_Z_b9jjKr21twA9S8lD64r26f8fZ393Yp&fid=0x0:0xa9a265daf8eaa0dc"],"When":"2024-11-30"},{"Name":"Alvin Pang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVHzcspRq9zYs02sQw-GRlpcEtcdrsvpnBrdgmJYnEInlXCURVIiw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the best tea bars I’ve been to anywhere in the world, with well-curated selections of delicious rarities from across Asia, including the Himalayas.  Sample portions are lovingly brewed for tasting (including second steeps).  A refined experience.

I got thrown off by haste and the payment interface, and ended up not leaving a tip, but they deserved one: will make up for it at the next visit!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ally T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJYgwifZ-PRcY7JBtPSHUPq5OLYhF1GutmOI1fystgfTM-U9g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely wonderful experience here -- so glad my husband and I stopped in on a whim. The atmosphere is tranquil and seems to transport you to another time and place. The teas were excellent, and the staff were so friendly, warm, and knowledgeable. I'm trying to learn more about tea and they took the time to answer all my questions and suggest new teas to try. Will definitely be back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM1VhZHNmdyhePRPwKXaHK6JIObq6jFKkIURtfi&fid=0x0:0xa9a265daf8eaa0dc"],"When":"2023-3-28"},{"Name":"Lori","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIm53ImkpPw8OPxMf1q_PC5P_lZsAyuK0vCta5T0Kos7d9pSVe-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had a tea tasting with the "Off the Beaten Path" option to try new types of teas! The tearistas were very knowledgeable and we were able to learn a lot from them. We really enjoyed the stick and tundra tea, as they were really thought provoking as to the possibilities of tea!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP4toVkybzV9Q4FAMdpXNL6KcHgKSBpvPra2FMs&fid=0x0:0xa9a265daf8eaa0dc"],"When":"2023-10-29"},{"Name":"R L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXDo--fdptHZ71prIhGQPJ7FahkbWrF05rgkw3OmUDlyk4sGVAj=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good tea, great experience. I think the pricing is fair compared to other coffee & tea places, especially considering this is more unique. It's cute that they serve each steep in a chahai, although a bit awkward to constantly ask for more steeps (you pay for the leaves, not per steep, and green tea can be steeped at least three times).
I do wish this place was more accessible - the staff are frequently busy and don't greet you on entering, and the menu is confusing as a first timer since you can't tell what the difference is between the options. It might help to include a few details such as tasting notes. The staff do give recommendations, as their entire stock of teas is available for serving.
I'd love to see a menu for special drinks such as the iced matcha featured on their Instagram!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPgiHZW-qecdQUDRZQakIvrTv6RFHkzzuBjtn4d&fid=0x0:0xa9a265daf8eaa0dc"],"When":"2023-6-1"},{"Name":"farzod darzi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU6S_yag_YL4YiZjd4sFjFB-maQTEZb8UDuM1Z0oL02xjRA8mT7AA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've been here once and I fell in love with it. The tea selection is great and the tea bartenders are knowledgeable and friendly. If you are new to tea I would recommend going with the flights so you can explore the selection. The interface on the tablets is user-friendly and easy to navigate. They also have a good selection of kombucha which you can try and buy cups/growlers.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMc7XshiyWu3BjjMrSF_mfQszjvpIcj5TFRQ69B&fid=0x0:0xa9a265daf8eaa0dc"],"When":"2020-2-7"},{"Name":"Shahab Mansouri","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWfNsKFTuisHdEjpZevCagGP1uYVxkb9Cy86brACCwv2fvrZR8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had a great time here. Excellent personnel, wonderful tea selections, and a really peaceful setting. Along with Pu-Reh, we ordered Cherry Leaf tea. Both were truly fantastic.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOEzCb81KPBlIpWuSuP4QeWHRUjrW0oG-qA4S0&fid=0x0:0xa9a265daf8eaa0dc"],"When":"2023-7-3"}]

title: CHUN FUN HOW Vancouver
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Onsite services","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"highlights","name":"Highlights","options":[{"name":"Great tea selection","enabled":true}]},{"id":"parking","name":"Parking","options":[{"name":"Free parking lot","enabled":true}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Arda Altinay","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXAbfrlgm3hTWel_DR5NfVRDeqcXm5zDZTUqB4HEYpYcJ8uAP83=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great dine in experience. They have really nice cups. I would say it’s one of the best bubble tea cups I have seen. They open till late time. I went there at midnight and still very safe and nice environment. They were open till 12:30. No public washrooms unfortunately at late time. Our milk tea with pearls was pretty good and we also got cheese tarts. I will give their bubble tea 8 out of 10. Tart was amazing I will give at least 9 out of 10. It was very fresh I would recommend trying their tart. My experience was very good overall. Good place to stop by late night.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOBJ-1nAu3VFfVng2rRSjoEOEDTj8ZLO7BNdNiW&fid=0x0:0x9f9643c9a63b5e18"],"When":"2024-11-12"},{"Name":"Fuzzy Nemo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWMhjGNDhI-RZYgIiVRXnRDEQCiyyP-dsVjb7EhBkcymNr9MvYi0A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Very cute little place hidden away.  This place was not that big and only a few tables.   When I was there it was that busy, just a lot of delivery drivers coming through,  but a few students with their laptops opened.

We had a Guava Lychee Green Tea, I completely understand why this was thier most popular, it was very refreshing.   The hot Oolong Milk Tea, not so much.   Pretty bland, but okay.

They have a variety of cups that they use.  From the display of cups, they were all very cute.  Worth the time to collect all of them.

Parking was not easy, due to the construction, but some paid street parking.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipONNTCVT4kwECVor43BNoluVrTVTNwqk3hendv-&fid=0x0:0x9f9643c9a63b5e18"],"When":"2024-11-12"},{"Name":"Janet T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLXCrGq47vkAWnRpVNpOadr6ZVp8spFpFcmz741MHGY4BZCi763=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’m so happy I stumbled onto this place while visiting my friend at VGH. Come here if you want real brewed jasmine tea with fresh, soft, chewy and perfectly made boba without paying a bomb. It was pretty late so there was only one lady serving but she was super friendly, fast and even brought our drinks to our table with an apology for the wait. (She was actually much faster than most places with three servers! )

The shop is spacious inside with ample seating and beautiful floral murals. Even the cups are gorgeous. I liked it so much I went back the day after!  I’ll have to try their freshly baked cheese tarts.

They have free parking in the rear and their sign card says they’re open until 2:30am. (just note their back entrance is only open until 9:30pm for safety reasons.)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPjyM_lybIprmUJaz1O5Ws5-_Woo4zyKzHC0JaO&fid=0x0:0x9f9643c9a63b5e18"],"When":"2024-7-2"},{"Name":"Philip Raymond Lim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5EIBAgpBLsauhPMdjXym7mJ4fA8mtryDtWQIJCZfJxYXxupU8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of my favourite milk tea places in Vancouver. The quality of the tea is good, plus if you get the fruit drinks, they use real fruit. Boba quality is good too. This time I got brown sugar milk tea, lychee jade tea with aloe, and fruit tea. As always, this place never failed me. Dibs: buy 3 drinks, you get free playing cards.

Calling all night owl boba and fruit tea lovers! There’s a spot for us in town that’s open til midnight to satisfy those cravings!

Have a FUN Chun How!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPNaogoU1kztsqcl63TtGKDPn02odFMaEDhW45i&fid=0x0:0x9f9643c9a63b5e18"],"When":"2024-12-5"},{"Name":"Danna","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXAZFtd_aumYl_zfM1RkgU8a1j62YPb7vkvOp3q8cwidgkVfTg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Affordable bubble tea in super cute cup designs! I’m obsessed! I only paid $5.50 for my drink. You can order through a kiosk in the store and the staff will just bring you your drink. Definitely a place to check out!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOGeffpmQNfy6bcuGjd9V33JzO7Sp0QEwbOLG7P&fid=0x0:0x9f9643c9a63b5e18"],"When":"2024-6-22"},{"Name":"Dance Horizons","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWnPsuPG0w6kAPSVBz0-dmSSjrKo76ZpzXPg0l7y34UbY8TmzBW=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Was able to provide us drinks for our event very conveniently! Bulk order was handed well and we were able to host a very successful event, and everyone enjoyed the drinks very much!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOAFf1hlmYsAFtqQCA5CVtV8OjtDPQRy36e4TJ0&fid=0x0:0x9f9643c9a63b5e18"],"When":"2024-9-21"},{"Name":"Khánh Phạm","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ1biHaUpxMVeDKTjqyRR0SSifJ90fdW4MGgosAKXVPRiIGoA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very impressed with there drinks, everything so fresh. I love the tea they using for all types of drinks, taste so good and the smell is amazing 🤩 . Plus the cups design are unique and beautiful 💕 will definitely come back 💪🏻.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMMdXrWH4vjZAc2K5tpffQw0aNDxQH3733i6ETe&fid=0x0:0x9f9643c9a63b5e18"],"When":"2024-9-20"},{"Name":"Tram Ngu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX-Z1aOKxyIrnOo6QnxbdxnINJLdWjoOL3zaimP0-g4KhdiicSk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Guava Lychee Green Tea & Pearl Oolong Milk Tea are my favorites 🫶🏻🤍 The tea is rich!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOYFyZ1u_chVSIlMfcVx8OXrHujwVBJrGZ0kKyB&fid=0x0:0x9f9643c9a63b5e18"],"When":"2024-10-16"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Al May","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjURsEKydI6yFDWfeEuJUm_zojUlbRJUnS2y7j3NZKmrARii_3iYLg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have been to La Petite Cuillere several times over the years. I remember celebrating my birthday there years ago and taking my son for his first afternoon tea at this place 7 years ago.
This is the first time I've been back in years and it's still lovely. I really love the ambience and the
food is still very good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPSBkM9lHHh7JcgYraFpFbtrpulk1cglQUgcUr9&fid=0x0:0xd1e1341f6684dfa5"],"When":"2024-12-23"},{"Name":"Ryan Lei","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKCc8AUdlVdPZRul5WdYMX0FHqSeVWMZHmY7WxBkqZjkr2adg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Everything was fabulous!

I went during the Halloween set menu and it was fantastic! The atmosphere, food and service was all amazing. Their savories were the best part.Definitely give them a visit when you get the chance!             10/10 would recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO1qUzI-3feJer8pcRRyTtZ5dCG4ZSoQUy5MonD&fid=0x0:0xd1e1341f6684dfa5"],"When":"2024-10-27"},{"Name":"Bruno Gruber","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV-dXASD-k95RxwlhV03ax1ONlYu6ZaXcUmqZGggyQpD3tmAHVCUQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I recently visited this tea house and left feeling pretty disappointed. The food presentation looked okay at first glance, but the actual bites were low quality. Everything was dry and the portions were really small. The scone was a big letdown—it was hard and crumbly, not the soft and fluffy scone you'd expect.

The prices were outrageous for what we got. I don't mind paying more for quality, but this just wasn't worth it. The spreads were unappealing and uninteresting, barely enough for one person, let alone two. And all this for $60 per person!

The place didn't feel upscale at all, which was a bit of a letdown. I still enjoyed my date, and we made the best of it, but unfortunately, we won't be coming back here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNlSTE1njvS4fOOkSFxS2n-JnL63FMcxLu180zD&fid=0x0:0xd1e1341f6684dfa5"],"When":"2024-11-29"},{"Name":"Maria P.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK4fjVYjLKf-V4y0mClB_UwNulNo1KWm7xJbjYqt_1PAhQO3g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lovely spot for afternoon tea.  Beautiful decor and atmosphere.  Great place  for girls of all ages to celebrate something special.  The food is delicious and wonderful selection of teas.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO94ae2hhXlq3UTlCg2qtMp2QyuHv_GlECk-4Yu&fid=0x0:0xd1e1341f6684dfa5"],"When":"2024-11-11"},{"Name":"Jodi Malboeuf","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKpNIdYJI-CsW764O9qNJKlGtObByszOrMk_Z4Cm5EklW0QuA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently ordered two afternoon tea sets/kits for a Bridgerton watch party. I contacted them to see about needing advance notice to prepare. I was pleasantly surprised with 24hrs where other places I had inquired with were asking for 48hrs notice. I dealt with a lovely young lady when ordering and she was very knowledgeable in answering my questions and when I originally was ordering I was asking for only one set thinking it would be enough for two. She recommended getting the two sets/kits which I am very grateful for her advice! When I picked up a very friendly gentleman was the one to help me. He was great as well made sure to give me transportation instructions. Everything arrived safely and perfect! All the treats were beautiful and delicious! Was extremely pleased with the experience from start to finish. Will be a return customer for sure.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMGM4sidBCAiCco_TyR7y-3MHEvrPqG1SeI2_F2&fid=0x0:0xd1e1341f6684dfa5"],"When":"2024-5-26"},{"Name":"Lee Van","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUkdc0b5WROtpnJCruJpetIegq6Snt_2bGm0A5pSa9cqY1SCXL5=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"My friend and I came here for tea and we both had a marvelous time. This place opens at 11am which is the time we arrived so it wasn't busy. The tea was lovely and we also had 2 scones each. Looking forward to coming back and enjoying afternoon tea here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO_RfTkX4LSQ3NLoaOAguIwF9saJdKs6e9Whj3y&fid=0x0:0xd1e1341f6684dfa5"],"When":"2023-12-10"},{"Name":"Me La Vu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUZ1-8-I-z4R031HZdfPzYgrLhxbAwfB9XBPkPZgTq5LEnthXv6=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Service needs a lot of work. The place was empty as we were the first customers. We stood at the door for almost 10 mins. We had reservations. Server was friendly but never explained the menu and did not return after we received our food. Food was nothing special or memorable and did not taste fresh. Desserts were just okay. It took us another 30 minutes to call someone from the back so we can pay for our bill. The place is definitely instagrammable but it’s not tasteful or classy. I would not return for the price we paid. Many other options with better food and service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPu-mgyTk66MCE_S0AZrCvUjvSFsJYGSCaoEg-6&fid=0x0:0xd1e1341f6684dfa5"],"When":"2022-6-29"},{"Name":"Roxanne Wiseman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXFIJ74eTrTnhe7Ium_k1WXcLBcruZVZIeQchnthR_K87jlM2De=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We really enjoyed our high tea it was beautiful and the atmosphere a hidden surprise! Love the bright pink booths too!
Parking is available underground FYI signage is a bit hard to spot and the price a bit high but they let us take our time and we truly enjoyed it!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPw0nPfhUXjIdYvZSSf_fR84pxrBB_Afs1fiSX6&fid=0x0:0xd1e1341f6684dfa5"],"When":"2024-2-1"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Khrys Burden","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVLZn9q35VDgCHOO8Jp2vSx9zNhESZQLmPGDnMXvFiAf8ERA2-v=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The place is cute and intimate, with very friendly staff. A little bit on the pricey side and portions are a bit small but it is good quality.

I got a ham and cheese croissant with an iced latte for lunch. Both were okay. Then later on for dessert I got the matcha tiramisu latte which is really pretty and tasty.

They also have free wifi and the music they play vibed with me.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP5lBBEj9bTCKR9mOBIYirAwM3lmeJjTUNbCEFU&fid=0x0:0x50320fab6ae7c8d6"],"When":"2024-9-18"},{"Name":"Kevin Wang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXJHPwaxMv2e6KU1d2Tkew4xgORneOSl524NN8DBbdadmBS774l=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Highly recommend!! This is the second time I ordered from their catering menu for my group of 10 people. Salmon bagels were prepared to its perfection, from the ingredients, texture, flavor, to the presentation! Almond croissants were amazingly rich but balanced very well and a perfect pair with coffee or tea. Ham & Cheese croissants are my all-time favorite; simple yet very satisfactory. All food were thoughtfully packed. My last experience with their catering was really good, and this time was even better! I can see the owner's dedication to their food & service. Bravo!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP_ke_4iHhjuUMYv5f4AF2vLBsTKG22w-hXdyCy&fid=0x0:0x50320fab6ae7c8d6"],"When":"2024-3-1"},{"Name":"Lotus Chong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIWPtxD2Kc8rbjnrSVGI_wPDwDNkxutNH95oMBLgNIiPM5bvw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Cute little cafe with speedy internet and good vibes all around!

We got a chance to try:
- Matcha Latte - 5/5 not too sweet which I always appreciate, also not overpowering in matcha, just the right amount!
- Caramel macchiato 5/5 also not too sweet, they got it just right.
- Tuna Bagel 5/5 both the bagel and tuna filling were super yummy!

Entrance is not very noticeable. Down a side street. Inside, they have about 20-ish seats. Plugs are easy to access if you plan on working / studying here. No outdoor seating area.

Wifi password is cafeandlife (all lowercase)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPzM9KlBl3nppgQw-FTb7IFZUKrcWRVW7bZfqaa&fid=0x0:0x50320fab6ae7c8d6"],"When":"2024-4-18"},{"Name":"OLOLT","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVu_RWB6zHhJzTHdv4P6A5Lsj-qE3AnK058ZHvLFqL5UIldljcA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A charming coffee and dessert shop that I absolutely adore! The aesthetic appeal of their dessert is top- notch, and it’s a perfect place to meet up with friends for a delightful afternoon tea. They offer a wide variety of baked goods and beverages, with an extensive selection of croissants and a range of flavours for their Tiramisu, including strawberry, matcha, black sesame and original flavour. The menu is regularly updated, and I am currently obsessed with their new and stunning waffle series. The waffles are light, fluffy and deliciously sweet. My friends particularly love the Oreo waffle flavour. Their signature summer drinks like Lychee Oasis, Flamingo Fizz are refreshing and aesthetically pleasing, perfect for the summer season. The array of vibrant colours brings out my inner joy!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOT2NJ6gBuBZ825p50ixZvvAHzH1biqxR3f65Hg&fid=0x0:0x50320fab6ae7c8d6"],"When":"2023-6-27"},{"Name":"Julia Lin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU_iVu1N99kfLkezKoIKLkVHqlQDOslIn2cL0oKOVUeXcRxuJTu7w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great variety of drinks and baked goods. The breakfast sandwiches are also incredible. Service is always great - one of the best cafes in the neighbourhood for sure.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPctig_w0T1ekTRY1klF5GaaQAl8fYoCvAqb-jn&fid=0x0:0x50320fab6ae7c8d6"],"When":"2024-9-2"},{"Name":"Tianqi Li","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ6oHkKYEc4f8lk2-BSf5CXZWlczGEAYEMSD-V5a94VT9Nn-Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"☕️🌳I recently visited Richmond Cafe & Life Co. and was immediately drawn to their beautiful store. The ambiance was so welcoming that I decided to check out their original location on W7th. It's a smaller, cozier spot that feels really neighborhood-friendly, but still carries the same positive, uplifting vibe!

🥐🦆🐟While the W7th location doesn’t offer as many brunch options, their best-sellers—like the salmon bagel and smoky duck croissant—are absolutely worth it. Both are packed with flavor and always hit the spot! The coffee is consistently great, with a rich, nutty taste that pairs perfectly with their delicious pastries.

💛If you're looking for a cozy café with a friendly atmosphere and tasty food, this is definitely a place to check out!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kevin Wang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWXuTEeZZm647Op9rCHmTHB9pFIF0gopKGVVRf8xaygKYnC00Y=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had a salmon bagel catered from this cafe at a friend’s event. It was delicious! Few days later I went to the cafe and had an egg salad croissant, and it was very fresh and tasty. The croissant is among the best I have had. The cafe is cozy and staff were very friendly. Just got to know the owner Angela and really admired her dedication in the cafe and the coffee/food. Angela offered me to try their matcha tiramisu and oh my it is to die for! I will come back again to try other menu items as they look so good!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNw00yPE_VL2TvJEMi4LzdqGBDGud36XPo1aLdo&fid=0x0:0x50320fab6ae7c8d6"],"When":"2023-12-8"},{"Name":"Fernanda Sant' Ana","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX5IBTYtLjoy1EiLJFqdgOlYs7X03sw_CnxfsECsFmSwutdRSP9=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"cute atmosphere, good space to study (although they have a sign to stay up to 1h during rush hours).
the coffee was strong, the croissant was the best one Ive had EVER, seriously soooo good, buttery, soft yet crunchy, simply perfect. the tiramisu was basically not a tiramisu, but a very yummy cake if you like soft cake. I liked it, yet I didnt taste coffee on it.
good place! i recommend. also they have wifi!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPsos7Rmp_Hr8uuUo5lbUobLH7OecYnNeN99jw&fid=0x0:0x50320fab6ae7c8d6"],"When":"2023-9-18"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Leah Huang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWxA3fk78DTixsa2GNxRzxdmxfNnAgtWa3seQ34xLZfQcTiayg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food here is delicious and the staffs are so nice! My favorite is the mini croissant and their afternoon tea set which comes with so many varieties of dessert and your choice of tea. Highly recommend this place for gatherings or if you just want to enjoy some quality time with yourself.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOeZOn5ceWad94zjGNefMffDpwnHii1ee2TNt_f&fid=0x0:0x801e13625dfedffe"],"When":"2024-7-21"},{"Name":"Yueqian Xin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIG8vTpUsS3l3PPYuLUDCGUGEM08f8m7HojlWux8pz_O4W_-Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It is a very cozy place to have some tea and desserts. The store is quit small but the atmosphere is very enjoyable. It offers delicious afternoon tea set, which is seldomly offered by stores here. I would recommend to try it!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPxGD40YEH50pSbIRoplKe9nmKjOkBapked-2mQ&fid=0x0:0x801e13625dfedffe"],"When":"2024-7-21"},{"Name":"Stephanie Lovell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXiAuWxiEyuBMkWuTmllufZPwFBpSSXad76pQcjpkZsIs3jyq3y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I took my mother to partake in the Royal Afternoon Tea experience at Tea Thyme on Main St. Reservations for the tea experience are required but the cafe has a fantastic variety of other drinks and treats on offer.

We each had our own pot of tea - there were a number of types to choose from. I chose the Rose Black Tea which was floral and fragrant. Service was excellent; bringing additional cream for scones and refilling our tea when the pots were getting low.

Onto the food, the Royal Tea is a three tiered tower. Savoury sandwiches and bites at the bottom, fruit scones with cream and jam in the middle, and sweet desserts on top.

My favourites from the savoury were the tuna salad cone and the egg salad sandwich. The scones were warm and delicious. From the sweets, my favourite was the mango tart which had fresh mango on it.

It is definitely an afternoon tea experience that I would recommend to others and one that I thoroughly enjoyed.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMeQ6rscu09Pj4nauX8PxrxAEmUNQsV8QWQnN8c&fid=0x0:0x801e13625dfedffe"],"When":"2023-6-24"},{"Name":"Selena L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXP-t5NiwFC9qHJDY9Z6EjmH1kzmKROMi98tMSbtHNAkxsUfvrn2A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The owner used to own the place in metrotown called Audrey's moment. I used to love that place! But now he moved to Vancouver and I'm so happy he's still around!  This place is so food friendly, I have a food allergy and I'm also vegetarian. He makes great arrangements for me! In addition, the food is very fresh, he makes it fresh and the smell of the scones is just amazing! I brought my friends here and we all loved it. I absolutely recommend to come here. It's very scrumptious and a lovely experience. They also sell coffees and teas and sandwiches.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPAlBVrCS8bxuKi32ZlE8LYUdJBlMq3G8v9fTe0&fid=0x0:0x801e13625dfedffe"],"When":"2023-12-21"},{"Name":"Martina Yu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJMHF3DTuf7rbIaauRnzokwjW2P7BkE6zs_bAJoatCwLtSubQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is one of the best afternoon tea place I have been to! The decoration and ambience is cozy and cute. I love the mermaid tea set. We ordered the 3 tier afternoon tea set. The food is exceptional and nicely presented. My favourite is the scones. It is slightly caramelized and crunchy on the outside. Soft and buttery on the inside. The server goes above and beyond. One of my friends has a strict dietary restriction. They explained each item thoroughly, and made changes to accommodate my friend. I will highly recommend this place!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mars","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWHtjcjaWQzqHOLzQxnithsAhAEbGsw7p50S0nVK1aNY3FFQevV=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here to have a girls day with my bestie, she picked out the place and i had a very pleasant experience, we had the high tea set and ordered two different types of tea, although the portions were small each bite was very tasty, the tea was wonderful and fragrant full of floral notes. Had a great time, i’ll take my boyfriend here someday","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOdjAWHW6Is3AjVVcVFOD2iqcvS6XTjz7i7Tnh-&fid=0x0:0x801e13625dfedffe"],"When":"2024-8-4"},{"Name":"Terri Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWdHMQamP6ntk6cmD8m9VHj4cLgJWNXVSwfy5Jk1_ks8LpnASP1=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I had a great time with my girlfriends while enjoying high tea at Tea Thyme. I suggest make a reservation ahead of time! All the treats were so delicious and the scones were freshly baked so it was piping hot! We ordered a full size afternoon tea for a 8 yo and the server even offered to swap out the tea for any other drinks on the menu to accommodate the kid. Next time I'll need to try their banana 🍌 waffle in a very cute packaging 👍","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOTqsoPuy7H-aWb7upo-xpDhO2PXqZue8Pdazc4&fid=0x0:0x801e13625dfedffe"],"When":"2023-9-19"},{"Name":"Cecil Wright","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK-QP7BlCg3Vs84FHfHDUZQY7WWKE9GJOsg9lAeRSwCwSMRig=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I went here with my partner for the Royal Tea and had a wonderful experience! The tea itself was really excellent and was clearly steeped exactly the right amount of time before they brought it out to us. We didn't think to try two different pots but the Cloud 9 Rooibos we tried had a lot of depth of flavor. Every food item was something you really wanted to enjoy and savor- I especially appreciated how light and fresh some of the sweeter offerings were, like the mango tart and strawberry puff pastry, because we were pretty full by the time we got to the top of that tower! There's great ambience in the cafe, and lots of attention to detail, the chairs and seashell tea cups in particular are very curated design choices. Probably a terrific place to take photos for Instagram if you're into that. Overall highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMqG38Tk_MQnYDQcpmttc83bQhk7nFaylTK5_hw&fid=0x0:0x801e13625dfedffe"],"When":"2023-7-10"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Shirley Yang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW8yZGI1hlD67-tNjRaUXimLs7zrPQNQGavehIZ4uM3wi9hd2w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Beautiful interior design and comfortable seating, I would totally come here with friends or just to study/work by myself! The patio upstairs is also a great place to enjoy some sunshine and breeze, very calming.
The gelato was delicious, very rich flavours where you can taste the fresh ingredients, nothing artificial. And there’s such an amazing selection of desserts to choose from!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMMx1rkCNwPrSuxNUpehVvmUvxWlcE5LZfnOA-5&fid=0x0:0xa6178b4b8465f420"],"When":"2024-8-4"},{"Name":"tikki","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWzV_Y6bQFjodBKC8anq5nBVFmCTC7hA6Nh7xklFQuKGefK40A_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great cafe located near Granville Island. It has a wide selection of pastries and breakfast items as well as some high quality gelato. They also have a hidden patio on the second floor with some great view so I would definitely recommend visiting on a sunny day!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNxZ_JOf5ED4QOEKXGU_307NNVY5UpnSC6Fj_QE&fid=0x0:0xa6178b4b8465f420"],"When":"2024-7-29"},{"Name":"Adam Waldron","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUdLLAfwRYrf7JHLiTPQLcDwzmsIsysgqDa1N9kHoTySoVzcS1c=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Dropped in for a quick coffee and croissant, fantastic decision. One of the best almond croissants I’ve ever had!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOyQa_Hl1ft_xfgbO8DwOGyIODdEP1lPaqJnj2J&fid=0x0:0xa6178b4b8465f420"],"When":"2024-12-24"},{"Name":"candy L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXgq2OgnXFRsC1icGye-CTgUf_6kEV0cPoOgzI7ANMes5eDT-Xz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Today's weather wasn’t too hot, so I took my dog for a walk to Granville Island. On the way, we passed by this coffee shop that had water specifically prepared for dogs at the entrance. That's when I decided to let my dog rest for a while, while I enjoyed a cup of coffee. The interior design of the shop was beautiful, and it felt very comfortable. The pastries looked appeared very fresh. Additionally, there were bottles of different flavors of overnight oats, with detailed ingredient lists that seemed very healthy. I ordered an Overnight Oats blueberry flavor and a cup of coffee. After a few sips, the coffee was good and the blueberry oats was not too sweet. My dog and I sat under the shade of the umbrella outside, enjoying the comfortable atmosphere before continuing our journey.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPH5D00edUjdBouUMWlMSzZPRDHm4SF8BWgjtJ_&fid=0x0:0xa6178b4b8465f420"],"When":"2023-7-5"},{"Name":"Brianna LePiane","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW50qMF8cbgmxflsQelbp2-n0ZlBva_Wf-frFZSkJf_yo3UIGed=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Beautiful place!  The furnishings and fixtures are stunning and the food and coffee is delicious.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMDY8OLiQq3iLscvp29YhtTDm5Ed1J_puhZQrzf&fid=0x0:0xa6178b4b8465f420"],"When":"2024-7-25"},{"Name":"Ivan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKiF-G-9XlqLIhY3IPbM5qe_kO8_wF-QPvmQfQLgT-Q4-OaKWg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I work across the street and everyday for lunch I come here. So far EVERY SINGLE ITEM I ORDERED was very delicious! Californian breakfast sandwich/salmon breakpppppfast sandwich were both very yummy, as well as curry soup and blueberry/mango/mixed fruit scone!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"TheHonestReviewer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXzwcxJQ5VWkGuWiqJWElGZHkrwnROv1gK7qB86AREb3DW1jtb2=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"lovely new cafe!

the croissants and incredible and the service is extremely fast / friendly. they have such a wonderful selection of sweets and treats. will definitely be returning ☺️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMyxrLijL8MRUBQhh8WiqEgm1Cc5Jwe3Ma_OPxX&fid=0x0:0xa6178b4b8465f420"],"When":"2022-8-25"},{"Name":"Erika Dueñas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJtIBhEfMmA2elgRIY78GFARs7b1GbvC0xtTeN5FV6PhxbDsQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I came here for a quick breakfast.  I got a cortado, corn bread egg bite, and chick pea miso soup. The espresso drink was perfect, but I was disappointed in the food. Both food items were bland. The soup could have had a finish of aged balsamic vinegar to add some good flavor.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPTRVRtnaJPD3mWw1ioFmmF0IRYUDlwl-4Hq_hU&fid=0x0:0xa6178b4b8465f420"],"When":"2023-3-10"}]
