user_reviews: [{"Name":"Steve M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUT3Zpb1gl5d7K1CGrprsXGt1H14HUe-GC2y1z_i4AN8Z1tiTg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very friendly,wonderful teas , we ordered and it arrived within a two days. They followed up to make sure I received everything and was happily with my purchase. I am extremely happy thank you thank you thank you. I will definitely purchase more teas .","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP4_RwVwbCrUtTfBNGRzhbfuVKktv67zVywcfiC\u0026fid=0x0:0x115ffb7c22f37f02"],"When":"2022-12-14"},{"Name":"Tomoko Lotus Shibuya","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWDurAC6H-DcgDkthMZ_barIMvcPtBolR571Zu3UUMVPfY-p84A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Their customer service is friendly and polite. Smooth communication with details. I got a gift for my best friend. Tea leaves are well vacuumed sealed bags for freshness to keep the delicate fragrance of such high-end teas and original tea leaves' shape. I am glad that I could find great quality tea.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Wendy Moreland","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLL60FeqGcUuB1Molge9tEI0Qg7COu4CJmkZBp2ZgDhrK0f7w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing quality tea, great customer service and quick next day delivery.   Definitely looking forward to trying their other teas. 😊\n\nWendy","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Aninu T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKasp4dC5SzOg9Ssl4aWDuDzbXafAy1ytBN4YACQHf-qKv8JA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Really like Taiwanese high mountain tea and am very fortunate to find this Lugu store… great customer service and next day delivery… this is my 2nd oolong purchase from them… and just got their newly arrived matcha yesterday...  very happy. Will definitely get more…","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nick Herman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWd8MZgVKJPN2KtYKOAqgW04JlfZ7uDTdv5-i21xmEj3cV9p2m1=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Never even replied to my email.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jane Lin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLwTKVz-vXmVBsLW0am-qBg-h6KY9-YVC3w58C9ssubZFJt=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The Shan Ling Xi Oolong Tea was amazing,  it's my favorite one of all.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Aasim Saied","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIY7pIFmKPLO37nvQCTxrXYIbqB3bbvKJtkwQmb9xuzVgAo_g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The tea was high quality and customer service was amazing.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jenny Chung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIvOB8zh6o9FSknH17wphGgArZx6qLOUibTJ18UBZNpqxUC6rMC=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good product and service, trustworthy business to get good tea!","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Hot Cha Cafe
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Onsite services","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"highlights","name":"Highlights","options":[{"name":"Great tea selection","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair accessible seating","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jack Z","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXSQORBe2N1KJjwuhiwhOCB1mFbSdq4Lq0eofmJ7XHwdlbzBSdr=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Recently moved to Cambie and found this lost gem. Tried their original bubble tea and the roasted milk tea in my last two trips. Drinks taste very authentic and I can immediately tell they are made of quality material. Has strong milk and tea flavour, FAR BETTER than any chain store such as Chatime YET PRICED ONLY 70%. The owners are super nice people, when I was getting my drink I saw the owner chased a customer to give back their forgotten backpack. Looking forward to try more items on their menu.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOKzfktSLdZhAnIrNHrBa6pS9ytgYoobJ4MO0w-&fid=0x0:0xd370dbee0cf8cd6a"],"When":"2024-10-16"},{"Name":"Debbie Nguyen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIlndJtbtpyqE5-YaDH0tSXC3HP-GAu_ZLvYT2e6cNz0dz0lw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Dropped in for a quick drink! The tea is very strong and not sweet. They all come with free bubbles and very light ice. Highly recommend, looks family run! Has a chalkboard menu and only a couple tables for sitting inside. Very fast service, went in on a Saturday afternoon and there was no line, drinks came out 2 minutes after we ordered. Would definitely come back! Their drinks and food are so reasonably priced and I’d love to try their bubble waffles next.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMYIxejHWyf4pcjZBaaZrKOUnqBAg9hYpBCpvIf&fid=0x0:0xd370dbee0cf8cd6a"],"When":"2024-7-20"},{"Name":"Cameron Reid","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWvS-f-O0MRuLC2BOzMXh4HEsp_g5tfJImUPaBHRf9jM766L6620A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is my go to spot for bubble tea in Vancouver, overall best value and quality in the city, full stop. It is family owned and operated and they take pride and care in delivering an no frills experience of the highest quality. The fresh fruit is consistently delicious, the bubbles are perfect, the weekly specials are inventive and always A great deal.

I love this place. I’ve been coming here for years and hope to keep coming for many more.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"AH","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUbSDTBRb0i5Z-O9Llx_f4jUDvaC36Rpc_Ai8VCzOt_tM08rlqM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of my favorite bubble tea places in Vancouver. Prices are reasonable and the drinks are delicious. They have lots of flavors too! I love their pineapple guava and avocado cheesecake.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM5Q1P64t_LUtGcZbZ-P3Ctbuhw7uyCPvIOgxsw&fid=0x0:0xd370dbee0cf8cd6a"],"When":"2024-5-3"},{"Name":"Adrian Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJRz_uEV8AM70-EugybmCMjVZLIi0OfMP3My2LKS1PidWwGuA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best deal on bubble tea we've found so far in Vancouver.  Friendly, fast service. Taste is good and bubbles and jelly are included. Not much seating inside, more of a takeout place. Want to try the durian drink one day and the desserts look good. Meter parking on Cambie.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMLsOULEaNyKYPaQfTQPawUK_AweK_BUylALRkA&fid=0x0:0xd370dbee0cf8cd6a"],"When":"2023-5-26"},{"Name":"Nathan Abiera","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWPsjm5J9PkxvHiAQvYUFr9pA2ulSuhHUJXsVOag1muhJy_aQAH=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I got the Oreo Taro cheesecake, loved it. Pearls chewy, service fast and friendly. This was my first time going and will probably be first of many. I also bought my wife a drink too and it came under 11$ (1 small and 1 large) pearls free. Give them a try if you’re in the area!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO_cM_Kuzli4wn48ufO_8rbgJHba0VPqgZ_UKJ9&fid=0x0:0xd370dbee0cf8cd6a"],"When":"2024-5-18"},{"Name":"Andy Chiang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU6Ytd6jvLjiUIKjc2DLdidLuwgHbgPUD4GPhFuPOLEoqlZ2vbh=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This has been my go-to bubble tea place for the last while for a few reasons:
1) the incredible value, their weekly specials range anywhere from $0.50 off to $2+ depending on what you get
2) their expansive menu
3) they take credit card

They are a family run business and sometimes it takes a while to get your drink and sometimes it’s super quick. They have a small seating area with a few board games, but I usually just get take out.

They also offer a variety of food, but I haven’t tried it - so can’t speak to that.

Tip: if you’re ordering on ubereats, consider going in person as their pearls are free in person.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMqdkq7umvr7zZjP4et1_PlL5YVFr9634NgCVaX&fid=0x0:0xd370dbee0cf8cd6a"],"When":"2023-6-18"},{"Name":"Lucy Lei","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUWqMDQPy8Rdj2ck6AFqBEF6oKEHn-aaEjadtV4H6wI1nduavxw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"An absolute hidden gem! Great prices, delicious drinks and unique flavours. They even have fresh durian as one of the options!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM4LwUkAQQsRDKvIkwmNhNfjruwUUaJ0kT-E_HF&fid=0x0:0xd370dbee0cf8cd6a"],"When":"2024-7-15"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Ina Z","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUqIKozAx8ntjuj5oZw4droqBVtaUlTOcOyWdmvwutABHppGwO0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The smell lured us in! This is probably one of my favorite local shops—it smells so good and they have beautiful products that aren’t even pricey!

The store’s so beautiful as well. I just love this store so much. Their customer service is so good. They share their knowledge and try to help you as much as they can.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipONL2IWMl-xYMpJiFbrLm7B82x6AGizFZcj7Rae&fid=0x0:0xd698e4dfab07236f"],"When":"2024-12-6"},{"Name":"Fen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKJIpfet_3yhvKjW39LwWksWHvtxdc_x2U3KTFWs7SGmrsKtDg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is hands-down the most professional lavender essential oil store I’ve visited. Lavender is often known for its soothing effects on skin, relief for migraines, and calming properties, but Provence en Couleur elevates it by extracting oils based on specific lavender varieties. Each bottle has its own targeted effect, and you can test this through sampling – each variety brings out a uniquely different lavender scent, which is quite remarkable.

The lavender-themed decor creates an instantly relaxing atmosphere, and the staff are incredibly welcoming, enthusiastically guiding me through the options. This shop is truly one of the most memorable places I’ve found in Vancouver. I’d love to see them expand internationally or offer shipping to Europe and Asia!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMpOXFi8U66y8YxBatlhKpAE-3l9hQvfUJwtTpD&fid=0x0:0xd698e4dfab07236f"],"When":"2024-10-25"},{"Name":"Lilia Spieler","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJFh0flyBLDhiVYxJhmsVLexJaVNGeMladGYyxXRSxZAqWfqQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Loved the lavender decorations! I also bought a face oil for my dry, sensitive skin and because of it my skin has gotten a lot less dry (without having any irritations) ☺️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO7gMdQybBwIP2qfyezX1gUJpns-WBuAYM3BKxn&fid=0x0:0xd698e4dfab07236f"],"When":"2024-11-18"},{"Name":"Mory M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUPs8avgpY6Oe_Ytsg4rqTPRpKj-6YZ9I59NE5Wd6hmPPMEz98=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A few days ago, my son and I had the pleasure of visiting your shop, and we were truly amazed by the unique set up you have. The moment we stepped in, we knew we had stumbled upon something special.

We couldn't resist purchasing a few items, and I must say, we are absolutely delighted with the quality of the bath bombs and the lavender soap. The attention to detail and the exquisite craftsmanship really shine through.

In addition to the fantastic products, I wanted to express our gratitude towards your staff. They were incredibly kind and helpful throughout our visit, making our experience all the more enjoyable.

Thank you for creating such a wonderful shopping experience. We look forward to returning and discovering more of the treasures your shop has to offer.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP0DRUTIQjUjKlxazBXZaEO04vr9mflB7eS1_Q&fid=0x0:0xd698e4dfab07236f"],"When":"2023-6-14"},{"Name":"For a Whale","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW-cTfUA5JBJ4hR1wpe8dpL4JdFOXm9hQIvDN1B2StFNy3uPW9xcg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Exquisite shop, all the lavender products, handmade soap, essential oil, mist, love the deco. Take you the south France to you.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPLqETYKtCud4sJKtCN1d2iz8XceINQIvntyLRN&fid=0x0:0xd698e4dfab07236f"],"When":"2024-8-25"},{"Name":"Fabienne MacMartin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIOecQP21xrTEl3u8pIK1eo22faS6eHsGYjL7cT0FiD5qMgGA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you want amazing french soaps this is the place.   Every time I visit Vancouver I make sure I go and stock up on my french soaps.  I am always greeted with a smile by the staff. The french music brings me back to my childhood when I lived in France.  It is also artfully decorated. If you want to buy dried bouquets of lavender you will have lots to choose from.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPQkw-pXq0X3iFdPWsmZiL3hQTxnHYvdZ4TfEsf&fid=0x0:0xd698e4dfab07236f"],"When":"2024-5-1"},{"Name":"Reva Bhargava","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVExWCsnG86XNhVekesxgTm9HGSq-0OdJQ-KH5ldRY1HXl-KV0s=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Visited from Seattle! Loved the candles and lotion would highly recommend!! The fragrance is divine and the quality is really good at amazing prices.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP9OfdZnFX015gq1YZ9r0OWuzCGliUBOmAtQv1r&fid=0x0:0xd698e4dfab07236f"],"When":"2024-4-30"},{"Name":"HJ Marshall","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX_gcI3vW3uepTT3i_wt2Vk_IaBu140gLQwAD0ak9Ec_xFAMNhXbw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you love lavender, this is a trap for you. They got lavender soups, oils and… I’m no expert. I only knew I had to leave my partner alone in the shop and returned a hour later and she was still shopping.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNkTUHgVUNNDrXzta8G0vlCJ2ZAm9BHmSmT-ohq&fid=0x0:0xd698e4dfab07236f"],"When":"2023-10-9"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Anna M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU48hiBvIFSAsXdHntyHjnNKeVE_TyzARTji1gSS_WwcZ2us3xN=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Many of the teas have artificial flavour but it isn't clear in the store. When I tasted the teas at home it was noticeable (peach rooibos tastes like fake candy) and found on the website that artificial flavour was listed as an ingredient, very disappointing. The all-natural teas from here are good but make sure to ask about the ingredients before you buy. Good tea should speak for itself and not need to rely on off-putting fake flavour.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"GundamPriest","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWH0Fv4ruJmCwa3Ie25f9xveBGpCuoas0vl_mhNEeQ13MV0MEFs=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Stopped in to check this place out after leaving the bookstore across the street and was pleasantly surprised!

A cute nook of a tea shop selling dish towels, tea sets, cups/saucers, taste samples (boxes of 10 tea bags), loose leaf as well as larger assortments of teas.

They had a lovely Yuzu black tea on taste when we came in. Sadly only loose leaf at the time but tasty nonetheless!

Made a couple of purchases and had a nice chat with both the cashier/tea connoisseur behind the counter and a local customer who gave me some recommendations for the area based on personal interests.

A very warm and welcoming shop with prices you’d expect for a specialty tea shop (with delicious teas - tried the ones I’ve purchased and all of them are so good! Lemon and Noir, second selection was the Canadian West Coast blend).

Highly recommend a visit to this shop and their knowledgable staff. 🥰

(A blueberry and lemon biscotti from the shop pictured with my review - these were so delicious with my Lemon and Noir tea). ☕️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNO465WMfQGUm-XRNBwDWgNEgVs8HvxsYtCsEio&fid=0x0:0x52102297bf8eaf38"],"When":"2024-3-16"},{"Name":"J G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJo6mqpgXqGRdRRzZjYx2mcFdlLVZ3SJzS6e99Xh6_16KhNIg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I visited Murchies this afternoon looking for a tea themed gift. Despite being an avid tea drinker Murchies has such a vast selection that I would have found it rather intimidating, that is if it wasn’t for the employee who helped me. Susan calmly talked me through their options and helped me craft my own bundle. She knew things about all of the teas that they had, their strengths and flavour profiles. She gave me a sample of their earl grey tea and let me smell countless others. Whilst Murchie’s has a well deserved reputation of great tea it was Susan’s knowledge and attentiveness what made this visit a memorable one! She is a fantastic ambassador for the company. I am sure to return! Thanks","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOA4CkbFbMvN2s_CiMZt88r4jETfWlmI5BVYTs6&fid=0x0:0x52102297bf8eaf38"],"When":"2023-9-11"},{"Name":"Patrick Rmeily","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKuoyPX1eipgRnmgoTTomQfDArfFIPbrqENrLKXHHpR2lyA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My co-favorite tea place in Vancouver. Such a wide selection and am yet to be disappointed by something I have tried there. The black teas are amazing, love their peppermint herbal tea. And they have many cute teapots and mugs made of fine bone china!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"KK","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIGysH_xbsdewKy7VY7NbphumTPkqAe4-bpnwD3iZ3YYrzAfQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Dropped by to pick up a gift during my lunch break. The person who assisted me (receipt says Auphan) was so helpful - she recommended some of her favorite teas and was so knowledgeable about their selections. I ended up picking something up for myself as well. Will definitely be going back!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"cherie booker","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUiykqRb4CoJ9h9tK3rGpPsp87bYY1klyn6wFcMRDg5rP1omzS3=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Smells wonderful in here! Staff was very knowledgeable and friendly","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jennifer McKay","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXgKq-7O6PkoUuMNyUcE3Y6EjSlJPGWDKtNmUC11J-hR2ztZoo4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good service, excellent black teas, and love trying the samples in store. The seasonal white cranberry was super delicious. We are constant consumers of their 1894 Orange pekoe, so we go here often. I also just tried their chai and it was smooth and spicy. Yum.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mary D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKchaUbF_sXau0NH_NVJD_-nSH_NlJn-hSrZdLFeoNk0uPMdQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Been here twice so far. Love the teas! High quality, fragrant, and tastes wonderful. Customer service was great too. Auphan (name on the receipt) was really friendly. Can't wait to come back for more!","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: L & G Bubble Tea
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"highlights","name":"Highlights","options":[{"name":"Great tea selection","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair accessible seating","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true}]},{"id":"parking","name":"Parking","options":[{"name":"Free parking lot","enabled":true},{"name":"Free street parking","enabled":true},{"name":"Paid street parking","enabled":true}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Philip Raymond Lim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5EIBAgpBLsauhPMdjXym7mJ4fA8mtryDtWQIJCZfJxYXxupU8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This milk tea shop is a charming mom-and-pop operation, which really moves me—seeing a senior couple running it together is heartwarming, and I love supporting them. I got a honey green tea and a mango slush with cream. While the drinks might not be the best-tasting, they offer incredible value for money. Seriously, how can you still find a $3.99 freshly brewed tea in Vancouver these days?

The honey green tea was light and refreshing, and the mango slush was creamy and satisfying. It’s not a trendy spot, but there’s something nostalgic and special about its simplicity. For the price and the heart behind it, I’d definitely come back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPw6-Oiwtp1xHyo1wqI-inXe_fVa5EK3Ylnwt_z&fid=0x0:0x2f39c5fdd4d902c3"],"When":"2024-10-18"},{"Name":"Q","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWZLT69rehlvFvDm5qWpfEuJbJS_vlr2aPoBKjZZPBXujTC8I-X=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Yummy and not overly sweet mango sago. Seems to be made from real fruit with real mango slices. We also enjoyed the ovaltine drink. Prices are also a huge plus. They also accept credit card now with the ordering machines!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPfca0UulGs3nvnOHJEdYtb4f--toaY_sEKU5OA&fid=0x0:0x2f39c5fdd4d902c3"],"When":"2024-12-24"},{"Name":"J P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJPNOwczxQeYq8Qup51h2PTCgzkWZZqiOeXeOFsoHWK1IWAROM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Polite and efficient service. The place is run by an older couple that have managed to keep their product and service at a high level and compete with the other trendy boba shops in the city.

Prices are very fair and there is so much variety on the menu. The menu can get a little confusing with how many different specials there are around the shop but once you start visiting you get the hang of it.

Please support this business, we need more such small businesses instead of large chains selling lower quality for higher prices.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"coshie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUegksSFSk6aD9N3xXU-M2Ou_AwYoRzhwMcgZUzXVtY7LJD9KFQBA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Never fails. Cheap, good quality, and big juicy pearls. Fresh fruit too. I grew up near L&G , nostalgic spot. My go to if I am in the area! Love love love. I always get a classic mango, or a lemon black tea.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Molly B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLm5KbLVpGbrM2G2az1MZy7UnO2cuwsGdfIHWeNxvhZd253hQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Is definitely cheap but the pearl is too soft the mango ice cream taste is soso might try other product next time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO9e96sngY3QGkaDnPue0yFpyJ-fXm4MuixWdK8&fid=0x0:0x2f39c5fdd4d902c3"],"When":"2024-11-6"},{"Name":"Rico Cheung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUMAKmssaUA2iZOXyj4aulrsLzUe1i1SbfcTWdTokBf0poU2y2h=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of my favourite bubble tea places. It's a small mom and pop shop. They have a wide range of flavours and their prices are low compared to the rest in the market. The taste is also really good although they dont do specialty flavours","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Esther MacKenzie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIud9syQrTrnWdMexjoZOq_NbYrpXfcvCV97-KR5NRTb4BMiG1M=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Huge selection of endlessly customizable drinks. I heard the person after my order three: fresh dragon fruit, fresh coconut, and jack fruit all with milk and 3/4 sweet slush with pearls. I don’t think the staff said no to any requested combination of flavours.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMVtNBZAvYP40UzjXQ_fPEz7yowzooiyExt3fmA&fid=0x0:0x2f39c5fdd4d902c3"],"When":"2023-9-4"},{"Name":"Darlene M. Lee (Tennis Sportygal)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUmLkBHFJ4SGra12cNbnLdRIWMLV5DEnaNDRU428eEqQabSn13K=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Recommended Mango 🥭 Lychee, Strawberry 🍓 Lychee or make your own, lots of options at a great price 🧋🤤 all fresh fruit 🍉🍓🍍🥭🫐 Raspberry Mango Lychee slush was very tasty 😋 $5.25 with tax, awesome deal 🤤❤️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPkJA30XyrE4py0quGsXSv7FkkK5Tjvk-MPov4M&fid=0x0:0x2f39c5fdd4d902c3"],"When":"2024-8-4"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Tony Wu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUXc90aCqGfybQjMtalVDUPiMHQBVUCO3Sk-HudR9HLYHT15iJK=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Discovered this store in Dec 2021. 3 years past and still consistent good quality. Better than other franchises. Only choice for tea shop in Vancouver.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Brenda Ng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJgB2uI7h7ia9TEwd76GKYpXlHoFO-6BuwCg5WaStCsq1dLXQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I don't understand how this place got any good reviews. The drinks are mediocre, ordered the peach slush with yogurt, taste like just a yogurt drink with syrup. also ordered taro mochi, the mochi is not smooth and texture is like it's not fresh. tons of other bubble tea places have way better drinks. got scammed","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"William","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjURvDqn4h0VQTFi8f--ERfGmtXi6j7M0wy9rsyzir1PtOucQNGg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The momono slush was amazing! Chose less sugar on both drinks but they were just enough for us. Would love to try their other drinks too! Haven't had anything quite like these drinks here in Vancouver. Would recommend! Their shop is also nicely decorated too!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOufCxSbeooxiV26zWzp6zv5EHXwq7adZkV3qKX&fid=0x0:0x431f9055759212b7"],"When":"2021-7-19"},{"Name":"Josephine Ma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW4ctBP8R2rm9S8Aa5NyuULMapTvyTQYakS6AvI9Cd025oSy86H=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Momono Tea Shop serves a variety of unique Bubble Tea flavors ranging from simple slush drinks to more sophisticated drinks such as Milk tea topped with Creme Brulee. I ordered Creme Brulee Milk Tea, Sweater of Winter and Grape Jasmine Tea.

Creme Brulee: I was bringing these drinks home for my family so I didn't try this Creme Brulee drink until I got home. One thing I'll say for this drink is that I was impressed with how solid the big chunk of Creme Brulee sitting on top of the drink was. For reasons beyond my control, I didn't make it home for another 3 hours. By the time I got home, I was afraid the Creme Brulee might have completely dissolved into the drink. To my surprise, the Creme Brulee was still in tact!

Sweater of Winter: This drink had a big swirl of whipping cream on top with lots of crunchy little chocolate balls dispersed throughout the whipping cream. It came with a lid that had a sliding window on it. The little kid inside me fell in love with this lid. The mini chocolate balls were fun to crunch on as well!

Grape Jasmine Tea: Grape flavoured Jasmine Tea with a couple slices of lime, white pearls and some kind of white jelly at the bottom. The Grape flavor was delicious and I enjoyed the texture of the white pearls and jelly.

My daughter wants me to bring her to Momono Tea Shop so she can try the drinks right away next time. I enjoyed the drinks from Momono Tea Shop so I will be very happy to grant her request!

Thank you Eric and Momono Tea Shop for a unique experience that had "fun" and "yum" all rolled into one!

Service: Good
Parking: Paid parking on Granville St.; free parking off Granville St. but make sure to heed the time restrictions on the parking signs.
Location: 3010 Granville St., between 14th and 15th Ave.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNSoGpfLWm7bfTmZm6sfCYK4IDRGjd42f8LVwM9&fid=0x0:0x431f9055759212b7"],"When":"2023-1-31"},{"Name":"Joel Lau","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXUfAEdzikN4KnruRBVXiiAAknuHWPT8Shf2wOdQSd5PONn8wss=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A small locally owned shop, delicious drinks, and recently started selling these small cakes, which are also phenomenal.

Been back here many times now. They’ve been introducing new drinks depending on the season and availability of ingredients. Every single one has always been a 10/10. For me though Momono, their signature drink is the must try.

Wait times could be longer for orders depending on the day and time, as it’s currently only run by the couple/owners themselves. But they are starting to hire extra staff given the growth and popularity!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMwtrqUfE1GNqMZbE3U1D23B7Jsd92u1QihiEck&fid=0x0:0x431f9055759212b7"],"When":"2023-1-15"},{"Name":"Amy Wu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKvtm7hBqZHDYxXgP_oxkelx2FGhwfW-EuwTv9rdyjxo-_-_8Nq=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I was blown away by the artistry of my drink! I got the purple yam soy milk. The owner carefully decorates the inside of the cup with purple yam paste, it was mesmerizing to watch. Drink was yummy too!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN1TFMvyWu_hMMa1yS1aFBFUA-qZJ8icegxhxEk&fid=0x0:0x431f9055759212b7"],"When":"2022-4-26"},{"Name":"Max Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVuLGOuETFmfg4RN5329HUMcHH0JD-OApDMnBCQDkIFIzVsuVDKjA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"mango carnival is a very unique drink. happily, it doesn’t fall victim to many common pitfalls of boba-ish drinks, such as too sweet, or gets diluted with time, or wrong-textured boba. highly recommend — cheers from someone who took a 30 min bus ride out of the way to come back here.
cute stickers too!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Leon Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWPOnBvlGz2k_WzxOhCiURR3aRaAE5ffHXfUBJJ4GP7GBC5Wn8K=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The cups are really creative! You’re able to open the lids, and you’re able to scoop the whipping cream or ice cream inside! But to be honest, the taste is just alright, nothing spectacular. The shop is a very cute, and their menu has some overall fantastic options for people with different taste buds :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMNcFWo9jC5kKumCHTNLeqZbOonBlqh8wzwv8Yz&fid=0x0:0x431f9055759212b7"],"When":"2023-5-1"}]

title: MACU TEA - Robson

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Danial Emamhosseini","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW5yG-bMHoqbxyxcViS4vlLPGdzC7_8fQszfYP-souswf40xgFM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The place is small but unlike Richmond, they have chairs and tables here. On the other hand, the place’s energy and respectful staff are great. I’m a huge fan of this brand in Richmond because of their quality in products, and packaging and I was never disappointed. They truly care about their customers in any way possible and the price is good for this quality.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO9LSnxJ5PLZo2WHiZF2KYEjXT7dz9DFXDzHbMV&fid=0x0:0x343547843181c605"],"When":"2024-12-10"},{"Name":"Samuel Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWOJNELl1kUhPGHI1W_PTrRyFjwn9ca4EnjvojnkN9cU_Oesg4A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a must try for mango lovers! I got the king of mango smoothie and you can really taste the mango. The blend was light and tasty but be warned, if you are expecting bubble tea this is quite different!

Also I will mention that drinks here are "premium" so be prepared to pay more than a regular BBT joint, the bill was $15  for two king of mango smoothies.

The to-go cups are reusable though!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPZ2urNvsc8gyZMl_hslhyOSf5_IimxndIPIqcE&fid=0x0:0x343547843181c605"],"When":"2024-7-30"},{"Name":"Atlac Mdzh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVmp8pn6U1S_KsOxdPvVN179SqKOQPaim2AxrOd-rorYkvJMKVF=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very busy, just recently opened so there is a line up but it is worth it! One the best fruit drinks i ve had recently! I tried their mango famous drink was amazing so fresh and unique! Not really a bubble tea and you cant add to it but they offer other bubble tea drinks for sure will go back, you should def give it a try if specially you  are a mango lover ! Price is also fair , TY for hosting us","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMk3O31SELdhr2Y4Vj-yRtzOQweWTd2DerDGs3B&fid=0x0:0x343547843181c605"],"When":"2024-7-29"},{"Name":"candy L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXgq2OgnXFRsC1icGye-CTgUf_6kEV0cPoOgzI7ANMes5eDT-Xz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I’ve always loved bubble milk tea, but even without added sugar, a large cup packs a lot of calories because the pearls are cooked with sugar. So I usually hold back from having it too often. Today, though, a friend told me about a new shop in town, and like many people, I was tempted to check it out. While others flocked to line up right when it opened, I decided to go in the evening when it would be less crowded.
The shop is bright and stylish, with a few seating areas inside and some by the entrance. I ordered a warm Tieguanyin Oolong Milk Tea with boba and no added sugar. I wanted to swap the milk for oat milk, but unfortunately, they didn’t have it. My drink was ready quickly, and after a few sips, I found the pearls to be perfectly chewy and surprisingly not too sweet. However, the tea flavor was somewhat muted, possibly due to the milk-to-tea ratio. The temperature was exactly right, as advertised on their wall: ‘perfect temperature.’
As I was leaving, I noticed fresh strawberries and grapes displayed in a glass case. Next time, I might try one of their fresh fruit teas!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMA8__SDq8fMdBHoUltpvA3pGzmk0uIfMK4cAp3&fid=0x0:0x343547843181c605"],"When":"2024-11-9"},{"Name":"Kaitlyn Jung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU3Z8RTVAtMfrX6uG6JFFOYzsyTXI7YKgjW6WLd73YQIb_urJDkYQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Omg thank god this place opened. I was looking for a mango bbt place that’s not in Richmond and this place is just great. No exaggeration. The mango is so fresh and the drinks are amazing. We got the Bo-Bo Mango Smoothie and the King of Mango Smoothie and both actually tasted different and were great! Highly recommend. They also have seating 👌🏼","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMe2gn6keUNiCMOU8jj8BcTtRPF5swTuKPEs1FF&fid=0x0:0x343547843181c605"],"When":"2024-7-12"},{"Name":"Oyinlola Akinwusi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUrph5ObC50ye3Lxx2ruD40bYCIEeyN7WJAFBU8QJiBNlP1nPBR=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love the atmosphere here! When you walk in, it’s the smell of fresh strawberries that first signals what you can expect.

Whether you love, smoothies, fruit teas or milk tea, there’s something for everyone here. I’m so looking forward to trying out the rest of their drinks.

The mango smoothie was delicious and well balanced in sweetness. My next drink to conquer is their strawberry tiramisu. I can’t wait 😋","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM7XTmzjOHmHwThHbeSlMMfX_Kl-71zDI0j8UpK&fid=0x0:0x343547843181c605"],"When":"2024-6-23"},{"Name":"Drenusha Myha","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKSVUfH5lLUOUA-7nQmJUce_F1RlX49OECAaudCupHHLsAwqg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A friend of mine took me there a few days ago as I am visiting Vancouver, and I couldn't wait to go back the next day. I got the chi-chi strawberry smoothie and it was so refreshing and delicious. I want to try the chi-chi grape next, because it sounds like it will have a unique taste (in a good way).","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNbm4qeoe6KUdu5h8LD8viWz6kFF0KXh9NFt5H4&fid=0x0:0x343547843181c605"],"When":"2024-11-25"},{"Name":"Carson Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVWB430w62bFPTEZXoRAFb2iqMY2c0nwvkpP2CAmsSSFBBs5JRl=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A bit disappointed that their mango season only lasts until September but wonderfully surprised that their grape drinks are also absolute bangers (so good that we got it twice!) We got the chi chi grape smoothie which was an iced grape drink loaded with grape jelly and fresh cut grapes topped with a heaping of cheese foam. Sipping this drink is like sipping grape ambrosia with a creamy cheese accent at the end. You must get this drink while you're in Vancouver (and for only $8 it's a pretty good deal for the size and amount of toppings you get!) Be prepared to wait ~10min during peak hours and that there isn't a lot of seating in the shop, but still highly recommend this shop for their dessert drinks!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPlEWdBiQI_0MVBxcwiEdMRfnN9pxipGLRswKS9&fid=0x0:0x343547843181c605"],"When":"2024-9-16"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Dimitri N","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU24jh74ZiUg1dAklw3veSwWoy_zI99LhP7dKxEri0LC-iBVLVuBw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cultivate Tea is definitely a hidden gem! I travelled to Vancouver, to enjoy all the food, and also explore its tea scene. I didn't originally have Cultivate Tea on my list, but happened to step in and was blown away!

1 phrase to describe Cultivate Tea is high quality! The quality of their tea, the quality of the porcelain and wares they source, and the quality of their service.

I would highly recommend having a tea tasting, but it's worth coming just for a cup. Also do yourself a favour and have a look at their beautiful wares. I particularly all the work by Wang Xingua to be stunning!

Thank you Jude and Gerrard for the amazing experience!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOOiS-ZycJWHwAJ9lU6cP87lwN_IxJBnsm1PuOP&fid=0x0:0x5fa3e6a5f696cfa3"],"When":"2024-9-23"},{"Name":"Amy Watt","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXtFx0Lt1_G_UCsXyvg1o5eSDevhehAM8wUiop0lPf09tXNft4k=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This store is beautiful and relaxing, with incredible attention to detail. It’s a hidden gem and an essential part of Vancouver’s food scene! A truly special place to treat yourself ! They've clearly put a lot of effort into sourcing their teas, which drew us in after hearing they supply Cowdog matcha. After too many disappointing matcha lattes in Vancouver, I wanted to start making my own—one that's not bitter or clumpy. We opted for the matcha latte tasting menu, where we sampled three matchas and learned about their flavors and origins.

The tasting was enjoyable, but we wished they had shared more about matcha's history, how it's made, and other aspects of the tea. Despite the class mentioning an introduction, we found ourselves asking a lot of questions. Still, it was a wonderful experience, and I left with my new favorite matcha—delicious, perfectly balanced, and a vibrant green. I'll definitely be buying all my matcha here going forward. We also picked up some tools to start getting serious about making matcha at home. I highly recommend visiting this place and taking one of their classes. It’s a fantastic addition to Main Street and truly offers something special. Definitely worth checking out!

I'd love to attend more events in the future. Just a heads-up—the shop is quite pricey, and some items are certainly overpriced, but overall, it was still a great experience and well worth the visit especially if you want to treat yourself! The place feels very luxurious and adds a special touch to Main Street, so we are looking forward to going back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNQewtvBdplbe_tjO6SiyCUG55cPV8BJ5HI6b7R&fid=0x0:0x5fa3e6a5f696cfa3"],"When":"2024-10-14"},{"Name":"Dani Sidloski","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKAabOPqxtNpuwUTLAwOawk1So9GIwqvgJ8KsTFkpvQCa83IA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My partner and I have been buying tea at Cultivate for years, since around the time they opened their first location. Honestly, this place is one of the biggest reasons why our love for tea has grown in the ways it has over the years. Cultivate is far from just a retail store. They make sure that you are reminded of the deep cultural history of tea, every time you walk in. Their selection is curated with such care and such intention, and you can feel it when you taste the products they carry. I love that this business is run with a social and environmental conscience at its core, and that as a customer I feel more like a piece of a community than just a client. The owners go above and beyond every time I visit, to make sure that I get exactly the tea that I'm sure to love, and that's within my budget. The space is serene, cozy, and warm. I feel a strong sense of nostalgia every time I walk in and smell the magic that is brewing here. I'm a lifetime customer. Cultivate is an important part of our city and I recommend that all tea lovers in this city and beyond make sure to visit.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tommy Byun","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXQhlW94B8T2fhww-HWh0iFh-RYIvFitfF4mjJX2E5t_heAv3Lb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Small, cozy & peaceful tea shop where you can do tea tasting with wide variety of tea from Asia. They also have some teawares for sale.

My partner and I went in for a regular tea tasting session ($60/person) led by Jude on a weekend afternoon. We tried 4 different types of tea (some of them we picked, others recommended) to try. Jude was very knowledgeable and friendly, and the teas were quite good & interesting. However, Jude was by himself, and he got super busy with dealing with other customers during our tea session, so we ended up pouring & drinking tea ourselves when he was busy. Of couse, he was apologetic ahout it, several times for not being able to take care of us. Overall, the tea tasting itself was good, but took way longer than an hour, and the session ended up being not as intimate as we hoped. I would not necessarily do another tea tasting for $60, but would gladly come again for a cup of tea, which is about $15.

There are only 3 tables where customers can sit (max. of 10 people total in the shop), so I would only recommend this place for a group of 4 or less if you would like to sit down for some tea.

Strongly recommended for a cup of tea & tea tasting session on a quiet day!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPWO9Wjr7JyHnbOSGbHvecOx3m_nhGPdSNgoQ1Q&fid=0x0:0x5fa3e6a5f696cfa3"],"When":"2023-11-17"},{"Name":"Heqian Liu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVjk3zJ-agdd8QLGaNN7T-5S56_61__GOES0fU2Ai5ENSuV7nM0=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My fiancé discovered this place and brought me there as a surprise. It turned out to be a delightful experience. We tasted the Citrus Pu'er and Anji Baicha teas, each offering a unique flavor profile - the aged richness of the 13-year Pu'er and the unmistakable freshness of the first-harvest Anji Baicha.

The owner provided excellent service. The shop was quite busy at the time and he still managed to take care of us. He refill our tea once we finish our current cup. The ambiance of the establishment added to the overall enjoyment, creating a cozy space to savor our tea.

We also decided to take home a bag of their Green Peony. They do have an exceptional good quality of their tea leaves. We also ordered a bottole of the kombucha that they self-made in the shop.

In summary, our visit left us thoroughly satisfied. This place is definitely going to be our go to place in the future for teas. They provide way better quality of tea leaves than any other places we have been to in Vancouver. You don't have to worry about getting those bad tea leaves that you get from supermarket. You also don't need to worry about being not familiar with the tea culture as the owner was really good at introducing the teas in English. It was an amazing experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNTbEkvLhJ2aNVhyE9cJ5lIv9ZcmmWtRWnAT8xy&fid=0x0:0x5fa3e6a5f696cfa3"],"When":"2023-10-22"},{"Name":"Ann","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXDKjKTHECoaht4HP4XrYp1WFDA1eoQQxjSJF-xBv7pPcljL8ZFgw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cultivate tea is a truly special place. This was me and my friend's first time and it was transformative. I truly recommend visiting this tea shop.

The moment you step into the space you feel transported to a calm, warm environment with the most tranquil music and calming aromas. The interior is designed by the owners and every aspect of the space is custom made. The meticulous eye for quality and taste shows in every piece of the store and extends into the tea themselves.

My friend booked us a tea tasting as a birthday gift to me and were met by one of the owners, Jude. He was extremely welcoming and kind to us. He started by explaining the process of tasting, including the temperatures and order. Jude thoughtfully arranged our tea choices into a tasting journey. Throughout the tasting we learned more about the sourcing of the tea, Jude's inspirations and life. I recommend you ask about the tea and business when you visit! Jude is a multitalented and kind individual with a lot of dedication to his teas. His happiness and love of tea is contagious.

The teas themselves are impeccable. We tried the new Pu'erh Fountain of the Forest tea, some Yuzu black tea, gold osmanthus tea, and the Gardenia Bird's Tongue. Never have I had such amazing tea. We were encouraged to smell and engage with each tea presented. We left with a bag of almost every tea we had tried because we loved them so much! I even bought a gaiwan early this week so I could enjoy the tea to its fullest. The tea tasting session is an amazing gift to give to others, it was one of the best gifts I have ever received.

We will definitely be coming back. Thanks again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN7gdDFS_YIKyYFOfYe15VHMVv8Z6DiRwBy1fod&fid=0x0:0x5fa3e6a5f696cfa3"],"When":"2023-10-21"},{"Name":"Rosie Jeon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIUkGhcmzwi5qMh_QdnZXu7aPU1Mw9NAFT31D8DiYI56LOJhw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I initially went in search of the quality gift sets I found on their online site and walked away with a great experience.
Very serene interior, great curated tea selection and custom ceramic pieces on display.
Owner is reserved, yet personable and knowledgeable as well.
FYI They have limited seating that is catered towards a more intimate tea service offered (nice date idea for sure).","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOevfWMaHynMnlTs_0rUcLrL_2Y0Z574AC4D-z-&fid=0x0:0x5fa3e6a5f696cfa3"],"When":"2022-10-28"},{"Name":"Todd Smith","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUiXcMTSDZA4aIoxo196hclYDubt_gmB83SB11MvlaMUPYCmQSP=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"So good! Jude & Lynn are well-versed in teas and tea preparation. I originally visited their old location on South main years ago. The space is a serene and beautifully designed hangout, just off the bustling street.

Go in and watch time slow down, get lost in conversation with someone in your bubble, or chill out with a good book. Both the tea and kombucha selection are extensive. The commissary space has all of the teas and ceramics you could need, and their rotating snack menu always has great small bites.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNZGuL2fP0j5mc6c2yjlIuQPOpuoIJD3hv44H6G&fid=0x0:0x5fa3e6a5f696cfa3"],"When":"2020-11-29"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Tara","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJB-1_2VNLYargt8nz4qU9oMdl-BqqVo7bNbvndKQwCwjrbbA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Food was nice. Bubble tea originally seemed not sweet enough despite putting 100% sugar and 70% ice, but pearls are sweet, not usual but were very nice. Lychee sunset was also very nice. Added coconut jelly and that was good too.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNvZP8oh5nu131AOR1CBo4ihzRoK5YT15f-HraK&fid=0x0:0x64e09d0b8dcd3430"],"When":"2024-8-14"},{"Name":"Alina","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI-faWBzPvLmr7ZSEOg_zjvHB2G-1qmSoitQjfy8Y6988qLxg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Quite place with lounge music. Tasty drinks.
One of our favourite places.
Guys, now you can definitely add one more greeting on your board, in Ukrainian 🇺🇦 WELCOME = Ласкаво просимо! 😉","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOwTcSDnVGJfy-Dl-uFHXtB4Js1SKl7tEjOOY8_&fid=0x0:0x64e09d0b8dcd3430"],"When":"2024-8-17"},{"Name":"May Zhagro","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU9KviWdU_UGm6yjKPv-6aFaljm1EC_ecrxYhnt_LO3duiyBNho=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The interior of this location is half filled with bikes, so the atmosphere isn’t great. Other than that, it does have a few seating and have the standard menu of many bubble tea chains. Cups came in small, medium, and large, and the medium itself was a skinny tall cup which can be a large in some places. We ordered the brown sugar pearls with milk, full ice, and 30% sugar. It was mostly milk and we realized the mistake when we got it and unfortunately being lactose sensitive, it wasn’t my cup of bubble tea. Located in a busy area near all the bike rentals.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMx4qyZcZTrRvbJhCV2eVRJbbrTkk_UFyz-5pla&fid=0x0:0x64e09d0b8dcd3430"],"When":"2024-4-25"},{"Name":"Vidit Sharma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIUxInRtHPyypXPV_FzcyJaiYKGyDDbV2dBPnqIZj_jGhaoDg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was good spent quality time with my friends. Nice place to hangout. Definitely worth visiting and enjoying various types of bubble tea.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOInKAU8kqo7NZe3EVKEUB1NUDg-c5G89SvRaBB&fid=0x0:0x64e09d0b8dcd3430"],"When":"2024-12-4"},{"Name":"Mansimar Singh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX36cTMp6xMAFuZdJ-vqVGeoPyAoWV57a5b_lMsLQt2nRyOQgD-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best Thai Milk Tea in town. Never tasted something as delicious as that before. Very kind staff. Looking forward to come back next time!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOihoIEbPMQCgWuUnyO8WdggyOk54pAFNFHkjrS&fid=0x0:0x64e09d0b8dcd3430"],"When":"2024-9-17"},{"Name":"Ricky","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXoQWgjYXZrfEBVeMpRbRXkleW5Q-WKYuXIoKSFrlY-z-zrKBnUsQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Pretty good bubble tea, u got some of them with my friends, we all liked it! My favourite part is Thai milk tea with pearls 😘. They also have e bikes, we can rent and have a drink for the drive 😂. I liked the concept man! It near to beach, and good for rentals for a drive in Stanley park. Recommended spot.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNX7vnuAp3nJSL034ARJQsc62yq7iH7s-vQx8FH&fid=0x0:0x64e09d0b8dcd3430"],"When":"2023-4-14"},{"Name":"Sherman T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjULZm37Q-LBlxZuwln9sKAZ75cGrLXoWseqeU2ZrDxjc-bpmGI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"They have big selection of drinks. There should be one that will fit your mood. They even have milk substitutes.  Ordered their Uji-Matcha Latte with pearls and oat milk 50% sugar, ice was default at 30%. Matcha was not skimped at all. Rich flavour and very satisfying. I feel that at any more than 50% sugar would be too much. Pearls were perfect in texture and sweetness.
We also tried the Lychee paradise. This was really good and refreshing. My nephew who does not really like bubble tea loved it.
Service was very friendly and efficient.
Prices were average which seems to be a little expensive these days. But I consider it as a treat.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP6BPm2scXM2FkxUPthciQ525BjJoVKo5XDiIb1&fid=0x0:0x64e09d0b8dcd3430"],"When":"2024-5-10"},{"Name":"Karen Cheung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXchMPPAN3zqOoag_ixABnvIJMH6A1alhdVdwJdZOdnJvvZotnpUg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I am so happy that my favorite bbt in Vancouver has a second location and it’s in downtown!

I love the taro oat milk bbt at Baroness! The taro are made fresh daily and the person who made it did a really good job!

My favourite thing about Baroness is the pearls. The texture of the pearls has a nice consistency and the brown sugar has a super cane taste to it which makes it super yummy!

The service was really amazing as well! The two ladies were friendly and although it’s near closing, they still had a smile on their face. 🙂

I took my friend there and they already went back a second time.

If you are in downtown, this is bbt place to go!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNtm92Tr5xw4XGIPZ_dACErS2YIuuEaGDXlYUxb&fid=0x0:0x64e09d0b8dcd3430"],"When":"2023-8-22"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Robb Powell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU9heUGkD-4v_KQ0m5_mY9x-RwO5pOHdOBgmWpvRFKYI7lKhqNR=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is delightful. The owner has picked her staff well, and she is growing her business the right way.

They offer coffee, but tea is the soul of the enterprise. They even catered to my palate, which tends to the dark and strong end of the spectrum.

I have often thought of offering a review, but now I am going to do it.

This spot is a small treasure.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN1RP7j7_rH3jZ3i9sWfFVaM5gOFQ-PO08yaSs&fid=0x0:0x39dd4ab0aef017bd"],"When":"2024-5-18"},{"Name":"Ed Reay","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ9ZBQawKTUe9-yn6hWqCQqbew-TfC-grXoeVD1kRWHhQFN5g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I live in the area and has the pleasure of discovering this hidden gem. I visited a few times before getting to meet the owner Joellen who is incredible.

The staff are incredibly well trained and friendly and helpful. They always have a smile on their face and the customers often strike up conversations with each other.

In a cold city (both socially and in temperature) the warmth at Steam is a breath of fresh air.

Definitely visit. And tell them Ed sent you!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Elton Chung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU_SVkVqkNe3SvSFwaZ1xrBYHObNVkTiTTXXYykf58guqGIk3qy=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This tea house in my neighbourhood near to the W 41st Avenue serves nice tea for here and to go. They have limited space but the interior is nicely decorated. When I entered the tea house I was warmly welcomed by the staff member with genuine smile. This made me feel better for the day.

I ordered a matcha latte for my first time here. They offered sweetened (with honey) or unsweetened. The tea latte was mildly sweet and silky that you want an encore.

This is a nice place for a cup of tea and in fact they also offer coffee also. They don’t sell foods but customers are welcomed to bring their own bread or cake.

I will come back again to try their other gourmet tea.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNHaXui-g3bozOovHTp4LSgV3vs35tIgmxhCUs&fid=0x0:0x39dd4ab0aef017bd"],"When":"2023-10-25"},{"Name":"Ryan N","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWc09CpTqeEHY-0yOCnZ70KsZtu9LFqb42KvozWvuu9415IRt4iRQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent and delicious cappuccinos, lattes and tea.  Strong, high quality, and perfectly crafted espresso drinks. the tea is great too...after dark is so good. Also has great staff and the best owner ;).","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOZ8dW_ouDcylZrVocM3GFJnp3jS-V9T-G-6wsd&fid=0x0:0x39dd4ab0aef017bd"],"When":"2024-8-11"},{"Name":"Kalahne Serpanchy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVFGEDSbxuRXcDV4BiTngAhOvvEpzmvZq7HRiLNLWnKNG1vmF0uRA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Staff are sweet and seem well-trained, but the teas are sub-par. Bought some hei cha coins, which were super tightly pressed and ended up being entirely small, broken leaf particulate - the coins dump their flavour quickly and don't have a lot of complexity. I didn't purchase anything else because most of their other teas are blends that smell strongly of aromatic oils. Not where I would go for high-quality tea, but the price reflects this, so it's still worth it if you're on a budget.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sarah Brar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXNyHpX5rLv1TWsk2XUhzVvwH17t-EnjrJcSrl7rB9sbxwrgR0O=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a gem for tea lovers. In a world full proliferating chains, it is nice to stumble upon a local quality operation. The tea variety and quality cannot be matched and at a fair price. Service is personal and professional. I love that supporting a local store tastes so good. Ordering online is fast and easy!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mason Rhone Mantonlorn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJDkHinsk5ViSHoPOdM0_tNERMmq109JO6jyybqwGJqF6dMOw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Steam Teahouse & Cafe is by far my favourite cafe, I'm there at least every second day, since I work nearby to it; but, honestly, even if I didn't work nearby, I would probably still frequent the cafe, since I've come to like it so much over the past 1.25 years since I discovered it. Fully five stars all the way for this place, in every category. For instance, besides having an excellent quality and range of beverages, Steam has a trendy/artistic feel to it, a great atmosphere, and as an emerging writer and actor, I have always really felt at home there. Because their personnel's people skills are so good, I've additionally become friends with the owner and the staff, and so I wrote them this poem of appreciation:

TEA IN EACH N EVERY SEASON

Mercury Rhone

Steam is the exhaled breath from expedited daydreams: about a small n secret corner parlour to rest n pause for an hour.

I’m a permanent regular here cause cafes just don’t get any better. About places I like I’m very particular. And I’ve been to them all but still Steam I prefer. Considering that this beverage atelier exists on a different level of coffee mug comfort it’s Steam my sensibilities want.

Independent company logos on sleeves around takeout cups please. I want the graphic from this sweet zarf on a chocolate hued T shirt sized just right for me: I swear I’ll wear that garment right out.

And more notes of praise to decorate the cosmic latte coloured wall that asserts hey I think I like certain hot drinks. Enough to partake of them daily. I do you see: it’s a socially healthy habit I pursue. Since I only work two blocks away lucky me.

The folks at the office thank me kindly when I bring them back on cardboard carrier chariot the nicest liquid treats from Steam’s umber brown wooden counter.

Because the products of the West 43rd Avenue n East Boulevard shop are those the community’s customers continue to consume. When they need to feel welcome and return to the world all palate renewed.

So sit here meditating urban patrons n drink tea in each n every season. Until the entire city seems calm n friendly much like a café does.

On a day in May I came across a one room tea boutique born at the bottom of a building w imposing stone architecture I admire. And I never left again I basically live here okay it’s true.

Yes it’s a tiny commercial tea chest in the best possible location for chic popularity: tea steam salon that it is. Coffee couturier. I feel quite fancy when I’m there so I’m never far away.

But I also sense I’m like a friend n neighbour: every single staff member remembers my name n my drink of choice. Steam’s team is the very picture of courtesy.

Sales in a steady stream are ushered into Steam by the wind and then the sun when they agree. The coffee bar’s clients must be sure to order lots of brewed mocha elixir if the sainted steeped tea is not enough to soothe the week’s fatigue.

And also on offer hot chocolate with heart shaped vapour
on top. My heated favourite when the afternoon is an effort. Schedules can be arduous but a drop of peace on the clock is a joyous oasis.

Because while infinity’s business is an unstoppable train it can still always be seen: floating up from the engine of absolutely everyone’s continuum is steam.

For my friends at Steam Teahouse & Café, Kerrisdale,
Vancouver; from Mercury (Mason Mercury Rhone Mantonlorn); September 2024","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sarah Lysakowski","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU6GFCJSJe72DIAfLmtXyi6c4UVvVSXnN7809_G1NUBF64_Kk08=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Such a little gem off the main track of Kerrisdale. The staff are so kind and friendly and the tea is delicious! I always get the cold blaster when I'm getting sick, it's so gingery and amazing. Thank you!","Images":null,"When":""}]

[{"Name":"Bharat Chadha","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXq3HINTQ2yHOyqSGXaae3K6V0WQB5ncUKESdzd1m-TavNYZt1t=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Yashvi at this Chatime is simply amazing! Despite being overburdened with work, she serves with a positive outlook and makes you feel like you're the only guest in the store. Exceptional service like hers makes every visit a delightful experience!
Highly recommend!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sarah Anne Ryan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKKNd3bhZnkNqx_a8YdM6hXlmj9ig_rLMC42ORfgREwDg0mQw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This was my first time ever ordering Boba. Gagan was extremely helpful and made me the most delicious drink. Can’t wait to come back and order more!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM0wR3t6t53aTNuzJeMw-RwXjs_73O4drnHA2F_&fid=0x0:0xfda80eb264ea642b"],"When":"2024-12-7"},{"Name":"D D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIYXoqsWj7BAnxcfln1ECb_yzIu9MAiI51-9zC7NkifQ2M2Ow=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This was unfortunately the worst location I've been to. The pearls were completely hard from being undercooked in my brown sugar boba. I ended up having to throw it out, as I didn't taste it before leaving the location.

I've never had pearls like this at any boba shop before, I'm honestly so shocked and the lack of effort put into preparing an $8 beverage.

Edit: After posting my review, the owner of this location looked up my name, found my LinkedIn and called my place of employment to talk to me about my review. I felt this was extremely inappropriate and would have preferred if they commented on my review, to which I would been more receptive.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNt_gb2lF8j0ngTgNI3hACYrDITSc5tcJfUljdG&fid=0x0:0xfda80eb264ea642b"],"When":"2024-8-28"},{"Name":"Rashneet Mor","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX2Qj4yZ2RJ9_z04Oy2Ic27BT40oHT9tm-oxPodBEqCe3k-01kg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Have purchased mango slush bubble tea, couple of times in last 3 weeks. Consistently low quantity of mango/syrup - contains more ice than required which further worsens the quality. Secondly the pricing is higher than other competitive bubble tea shops nearby. Appears its been opened to rip-off one-timer tourists.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP0pct0n-ITs9kVffCXLWsk6qDDu7NLTYNr5Zl2&fid=0x0:0xfda80eb264ea642b"],"When":"2024-7-6"},{"Name":"Harpreet Gill","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLXyTmXrkD-sft6EpO3FqEwBOwJX8S_OHWZ8sdQSzu0T8TylA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"That sounds like a delightful experience! The Caramel Gingerbread flavour is perfect for the season. Yash seems to have left a great impression with excellent service!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jyot Sihrakaur","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKECmhkq8RsY3JZ1vmO_wzPtVGTnSt-614t2K7QY7Xy8XbOEFE=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Yashvi at cha time was very soft spoken n sweet, she made delicious mango slush, carry on yashvi !!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOMYAmsSv69T9T_r2Mb3FpiettZCHea3fGEiWAp&fid=0x0:0xfda80eb264ea642b"],"When":"2024-12-23"},{"Name":"Mankaran Singh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL4tjbquyU-Pom1gAKkQ8Qf4jmYFzuRJezNmGJ7n8AQaPU3fLYd=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best bubble tea store in Vancouver. It’s my first time and don’t know what to order so one of the employee Yashvi recommended me pearl milk tea. Drink was too good and she was really helpful & friendly towards every customer.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nate G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUvOoZNnZh5yQe1Jb9qaKRvEofrnVZBF8kKsqXxx32eEp7HRLQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Like other Chatime stores, this one is great, but what makes it stand out is an exceptional employee named Yashvi. user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Rana Minab","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU8osZbV1VtasJDtJxiKFG30x1VvN7FT221sOkNz7n1clpPWain=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a wonderful, family run tea shop. They are very knowledgeable and friendly and have fair prices. Lots of different options for teas that make great gifts as well. I’m excited to go back and get more tea once these run out.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Timothy Yu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLM6BteENFFjJECr5q4XM115MILipARHB_TqdKJGOZYMglXRg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The owners really know their stuff! They have a wide range of oolongs and puerhs. I went in not knowing what I wanted and came out with high mountain Taiwanese oolong

Thanks Dominique for guiding our tea tasting","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMmPgKstYO3LHXsWVf0uNknO2UrMuNOeUcdSwLf&fid=0x0:0xa60da8233fb802ab"],"When":"2024-12-8"},{"Name":"Hannah R","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUfnAphU1SUXdC5G6gX2NYm214dsxQptJ3YH3z68mmnXkQweKUMHQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Aroma Tea House is a hidden gem that offers an unforgettable tea experience. During our visit, we tried the Jasmine tea and the Da Hong Pao, both of which were exquisite. The highlight of our visit was undoubtedly the exceptional service provided by Dominique Yan. Dominique was not only personable and funny but also an outstanding host who made our visit truly special. He served our tea at the perfect temperature, ensuring that every sip was enjoyable. His Chinese tea etiquette was impeccable, adding an authentic touch to our experience. If you're looking for a place that combines great tea with excellent service, Aroma Tea House is a must-visit. Highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMCBSPG37DZ5J_6-AIExsyboq40ojhQqPKU6TFn&fid=0x0:0xa60da8233fb802ab"],"When":"2024-6-18"},{"Name":"Disha","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLehHjACGHxXk84KqsAE08mF0CnzmfwwLWI49W69Yp6LKS-FA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I walked into the store, most often having drank bagged tea, coffee and milky drinks from Starbucks. With very limited exposure to loose leaf teas, I did not really know where to begin. But Dominique's attunement with tea helped me discover teas that were *just* right for my palette. It was in my first sip of the first tea that Dominique introduced me to where I had that Aha! moment. Drinking tea with Dominique was more than the act itself, it was a glimpse of a lifestyle, which was truly refreshing for the spirit!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Bianca Ng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVjlIiSla_YfmuKaJiceOLXQVdHyC1ne2upZrkSAFv7b4f4CX5J=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Short version: This is an amazing family-owned authentic tea shop. They have over 200 types of teas and they have another family-owned shop based in HK. Ask about their speciality teas because they are truly tea experts. Don’t just get the basic stuff!! They accept all types of payment. You MUST come visit if you’re in the Vancouver area and you like tea.
—
I grew up drinking tea with my Uncle as a kid in China so I’ve been a fan of Chinese teas for a long time now. As an adult, I’ve been learning more, but shops like these intimidate me because my Cantonese/Mandarin isn’t great. When I came here, I was greeted kindly by the shop owners’ son. He was so welcoming and let me try all kinds of new teas. He explained the story and history behind the teas, his family’s shop, and gave me tips about Vancouver too. I learned so much and it felt like chatting with a friend. Later, his mom stopped by and she was super nice. They love sharing their knowledge and letting you try new teas.

I’m sad I don’t live in Vancouver, but I will purchase their tea online from now on. I will be back the next time I visit this city!! This made we feel welcomed in Vancouver as a visitor.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOH61IKMFdbY_SChWEa60KFJech4HanryxNi2KB&fid=0x0:0xa60da8233fb802ab"],"When":"2023-9-24"},{"Name":"Kenneth Xu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWkHG-YZJT1A0e2r160McuRKbbS6ZTSYWzOKOG27DL3MM_qD5au=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of my favorite experiences at a tea shop. The selection of tea was very wide and at a fair price. Dominique also provided excellent service, allowing me to try out several teas while at the same time teaching me about them. Although I am not local, I look forward to ordering from their online store.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Simon L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWC0zQL6UZOSMX25id4oWvss3Ml7IDzVRG0Otr-hJf-87BjawWQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"As someone new to Pu-erh tea and from Toronto, I wasn’t sure where to start, but Eliza was incredibly helpful! She took the time to ask about my preferences and guided me to Bulang Mountain Raw Pu-erh, which turned out to be perfect. You don’t find this type of personalized service in the city, and it made my experience that much better. Highly recommend both the tea and the exceptional help!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Fabiola García","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWCUCLEe1zYZQS5kprWcaPTt_To3IXLv1rv1lztD1OaGm2aBcnR=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I traveled to Vancouver from Mexico and I had the opportunity to try this exquisite tea. I have to say that I used to be a coffee person but after trying different teas and because of the patience and knowledge of Dominique to offer exactly what I needed, I’ve become a tea person. I can’t wait to travel again to Vancouver and try new types of tea from this place!!! Strongly recommended!","Images":null,"When":""}]
