user_reviews: [{"Name":"Andrew Duan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVit6zVjwxurhHTfyzlmVHdf7tPh6i4TT5a66FGA0zwI2xss4dz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I ordered winter melon green tea today  on Uber Eats and it was all good until I saw ant in my drink. Although this is high protein and I appreciate it but the food safety shall be my concern. Otherwise, if there were no ant in the melon, I would have offered 5 stars.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNm2yU2zGDUFGTlaKcjMFNKXQT_EM9geo9pW4iO\u0026fid=0x0:0xc38b5c23434d1860"],"When":"2024-7-21"},{"Name":"Adison Zhang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJUHVKg_GuRcd0GLUjYbIBqjNX1GBuhBeVgfya2PM_BI6NlqQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Have been going to this place for 5 years ever since it opened and I'm honestly so disappointed by how it gets worse and worse. When it first opened, it absolutely amazed me and was the best bubble tea I've ever tried. Now it smells disgusting like body odour, my bubble tea tasted like that too with the new menu BBQ smell and couldn't even drink half of it. The sausage I got was overly greasy and had the same disgusting smell. The employee was sweet but smelled awful to be honest and I question the sanitation of this place. It's honestly so sad to see how a business I loved for 5 years starts going downhill. I genuinely hope that they get better, as the smell there was absolutely unacceptable to me. They started becoming understaffed and started hiring people that doesn't care about their job the past 2 years. Some staffs were rude and looked so tired too. Wouldn't come back here.. sadly.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mark Brentder","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK4hezav1-a18tiDoracxGbcq8BLzAdvjbg0jUqMthsWoFNyA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The most recent review for this branch said their drink tasted of BBQ flavor. I ordered a drink in person and can comment further on this “BBQ” flavor. It was very stuffy in the store and there was a pungent odour (I can best describe as BAD body odour). I think the BBQ flavor may be due to the odor in the store. Interesting.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Alice Tsoi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUjK-h6HO-zXPRddS9fWuYsYaoGVdqcrCFofehKc0XYHiMcTF4j=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My friends and I visited this shop last Sunday, we ordered different kind of drinks. It is unexpected good and delicious. We have chit chat with their staff and learned that they are new opening recently. They have provided variety of HK, Taiwan and local drinks, we like the HK style of drinks, maybe we have home sick reason. Thanks for this special moment and let us go back to our beautiful memories!\nSurely we will visit again!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Leo Szeto","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL4WeGgwEN0IZuYCpT599WylmEIY2FNQ7VxOA_ev7sDQIQ1YA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We ordered hot drink, it came cold with ice. When my wife politely told them and asking for replacement.. the girl said they couldn’t remove the ice. This makes zero sense, and we will never go back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNyHOD3jkenuPwavG3Y62Z_9k_JcLxjE6Pqewlt\u0026fid=0x0:0xc38b5c23434d1860"],"When":"2024-5-3"},{"Name":"Josephine Huang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX8UejeGdlCBXmq9iCj4KAfMFg31koNGe0fK1qhNtiuUpMoa3TL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"There weren't any people at the shop, so we were able to order very quickly. The girl at the cashier told us the pancakes would take 5-7 minutes, which was nice since it prepared us for the wait. I ordered the fruit tea without ice and 30% sugar, and it was very good and not too sweet. It was also filled to the top.\nI also ordered the custard pancakes, and they taste exactly like 雞蛋糕 in Taiwan. One of them had a tiny bit of filling (much less compared to the other 4 pieces), but overall it was tasty.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM3rGYenel7_s9o8YIDwsjsDFlPK6kANVlk1ave\u0026fid=0x0:0xc38b5c23434d1860"],"When":"2023-2-25"},{"Name":"Eric Yau","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL8L6_A7LwJGZKpWE2QTnsVC62O_YH8z58Eji0eiYKwzkoFJA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This bubble tea place changed hands from the old Yifang store. Went in for a hot red date tea. Waited 15 minutes and when asked they said need another 5 mins. Which I might have believed if not for the very poor and unfriendly service. Walked out. Sad. Won’t be going back but luckily a new place open up a block away on 10th.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Vincent Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKyHRPyJDPuqHML_1-dD1g7vOygOgIyYWRNiStCJaPoVI6QVw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Ordered Mango Pomelo Sage Slush. Not enough mango flavour and mango cubes, if any. Sago was undercooked.","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Bubble World
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"No-contact delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Onsite services","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"highlights","name":"Highlights","options":[{"name":"Great tea selection","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair accessible seating","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible washroom","enabled":true}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"لجين علي عبدالله","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJknstfVQBYVOicM756T8lGplERKL0_UBI-91D2Lx8i3wQBxzk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This is my second time here, I am obsessed with their bubble tea flavours and how chewy and fresh the pearls.

I am a big fan of classic pearls, cooked well, chewy and normal size. On top of that, they have many fun and refreshing flavours to choose from.

It’s not very busy place and pretty quiet. It has a strong cooking oil smell which personally bothers me so I always order on the go. But they never disappoint!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP_YlC-DXdxBuMzu6SoEaEfNEOxVt-oTJW0PDvm&fid=0x0:0x41b9bc7fd49ca240"],"When":"2024-8-24"},{"Name":"Terrence Guo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW7DQjijPvIqmc7yOMWbIJub7yjFDLTRVYTlyl2v7gr8EgVlK-g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"affordable & delicious! cute packaging asw, and the music taste is 🔥 (they played brat)

i ordered the milk tea 50% sugar 50% ice w/ tapioca pearls. it was $5.25","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM824XC-VLnTvBlccsYadxHA6LX8wrI_yW0ZBBx&fid=0x0:0x41b9bc7fd49ca240"],"When":"2024-12-23"},{"Name":"Joe Z","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXJQxoAgemC8mqDEJmhV6DFhdApZ0qhDAEQjf8xaSJlbCgSL2h0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Don’t let the no-frills decor fool you - this place serves up what my wife (of Taiwanese heritage and has lived in Taiwan) described as “the best Taiwanese beef noodles I’ve ever had”.

I myself ordered the plain noodles with meat sauce and egg (pictured). Home style noodle soup, Clear yet flavourful, doesn’t leave your lips sticky or throat parched. Really hit the spot.

Also has a mini retro gaming arcade which was a cool quirky little addition.

If I’m ever in Canada again we’re definitely coming back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMoS8I6-WfnvO_12uDBbG-Re8xJ78g9yH9_Y5t0&fid=0x0:0x41b9bc7fd49ca240"],"When":"2024-8-14"},{"Name":"Sahil Mittal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWwkVhd8rgCMzYgSBpJTttM13cFtsyZiFPKJQvy_ngxzy_fne7_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have been here multiple times as it being opened till late helped me in past when i worked late night shifts to have food and drink that i don't need to cook. I have had multiple of drinks here with different combinations but i think today they just nailed it.

I got Hokkaido milk tea with mango popping boba and it's just bomb. Its so good and tasty and creamy and now all i wanna know is if they make it with rich milk or ice cream. Cause i have had this drink in the past from other places where they used ice cream but switched to rich milk cause of the price difference instead of increasing the price.

This is best","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPceL1d8K8oo3T5thOYlOqBpxGt2kF81pqdeeUg&fid=0x0:0x41b9bc7fd49ca240"],"When":"2024-12-9"},{"Name":"Rina","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWayp5mtVlKRh6InRQCbQYjw706HsH5Eq56jECnqkzp_irarHRw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Tried it for the first time and really liked the pearls and popping bubbles. The staff was nice. Our cup burst while trying to insert the straw, spilling the entire drink, but the ladies replaced it right away🧋","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP42FEIkJO_1dfgU5a58rc3B2fhz6POV8EN2XfY&fid=0x0:0x41b9bc7fd49ca240"],"When":"2024-12-2"},{"Name":"John S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWXqytpKEY7-f7JKKymx1Tg8fiqmA_aam7d7ntMC60_o7ieUTQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Bubble World on Robson Street in Vancouver is hands down my favorite spot for bubble tea in Vancouver! Every time I visit, I’m blown away by how delicious their drinks are. If you’re a fan of sweet bubble tea with pearls, this is the place to go. The pearls are always perfectly chewy, and the sweetness level is just right without being overpowering. There are tons of flavors, and they never disappoint! The staff is friendly and the service is quick, even when the store is busy. Highly recommend Bubble World if you’re craving a tasty, refreshing bubble tea. I can’t wait for my next visit. Amazing Bubble Tea Experience!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNJXnRDCWizRxlSuZ-AYr5J3fcEMDhPB2ws4_qb&fid=0x0:0x41b9bc7fd49ca240"],"When":"2024-10-13"},{"Name":"Benjamin Britton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWLtHKkx7iBHvDWTADVb6C1NU9F5rDinAmndKtIsahPrt1y3JKN=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The best Okinawa milk tea in the entirety of the world. I have been to all seven continents and have yet to find a better milk tea than the Okinawa milk tea from bubble world. If it was possible to go to multiple universes I am sure bubble worlds Okinawa milk would still be the best. It’s not just a drink—it’s an experience. The moment you take that first sip, the velvety richness of the tea, perfectly balanced with the deep, caramel-like sweetness of Okinawan brown sugar, takes you to another dimension. The kokuto sugar isn’t just sweet; it’s layered, earthy, and luxurious, adding a warmth that wraps around your soul. It’s perfect for anyone wanting a sweet treat. They make it 4/5 times perfectly sweet. Best sweet treat ever!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Forest Bai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXnsc43J-1KhrgIRu2_gBgTWm3XJatUIeZr4gH72IhutnZbobMk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The menu was very extensive with snacks, meals, and numerous drink options. There were also many toppings available for the drinks and we chose mango stars which we’ve never seen before (they were really good). The workers were very kind and made our orders quickly. The drinks were alright but weren’t the best we had. We ordered the mango milk tea and the brown rice matcha milk tea both with mango stars. A stronger tea flavour would have been better but for the price, it was worth.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOjcImZVX_P5kuGlgemt7MWz7XEUtWwp0v3MaIg&fid=0x0:0x41b9bc7fd49ca240"],"When":"2023-12-26"}]

title: Green Leaf Bubble Tea

Great variety of flavors but most important is the boba is a nice and soft consistency.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPF4roDHDCUMtH3ONUO-iYDfQWi9ew4tc_AVEU9\u0026fid=0x0:0x53f3aa660ca74130"],"When":"2019-6-1"},{"Name":"J B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVAwkGdHptp4NSG8jB1yPnzY78ZK3uNzq5DBh4dOU1f3ajFAto=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Mom n' pop bubble tea shop! Best bubble tea on Fraser.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Barbara Mead","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLCVzrkFr3sg_X2TBIbvgMb5-l4OZbko6IBwBSo7-AAS5CVoQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Simply, Amazing! None better for allergy support.

I ordered the Benifuuki Green Tea in December, 2023 and began consuming it faithfully well before the start of the spring allergy season 2024. I followed the packet instructions to a "T", as well.
Virginia's spring allergy season commences by mid-March and extends into early May. I have had no allergy related issues since then and have not used any OTC products normally consumed for the allergy season. I would definitely encourage anyone to give this tea a try and toss the meds. Besides feeling better. I have been able to get outdoors and enjoy living without any allergic response.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"S C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIm9HxJ37wilz9ge7Te1vj6T-_GYphzD4N1tij2LBnIDcETcA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have been a very avid tea drinker since I visited Japan in 1998, so I was very excited when I discovered Chado Tea House around 2015. Since then I have made a purchase on average once a month, and in that time I have never been disappointed. The consistent quality, freshness, and value of these Japanese teas has been second to none. And the diverse selection and wonderful service is what keeps me going back for more!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Deviprasad Zy*","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX0Mxxg2xUV3a0Vxi7NYDc-1iIBMwlOMLK29dz4yyeHXpkVp3g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The selection of teas at Chado Tea House is really extensive.  They have many organic offerings, which is great.  The team is very knowledgeable and customer service is always friendly and informative.  They are also happy to recommend teas to the novice tea enthusiast, and they are patient with any questions.  So glad we found this company!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Newton Siao","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLQlNbdU35it-opgiD_Q7WlZYgaRWH1ssEVX2yV1624J3MCAw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I really enjoyed the delicious Gyokuro Yame Gokujyo!   Chado TeaHouse was very professional and timely in responding to my queries about Japanese Gyokuro.   I also appreciate the sample on Winter Sencha which is equally delicious!  Arigatou Gozaimasu Chado Tea House!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"agnesstreet","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW1-p0tIh2anA1EWIqyxsqxFBLf2cQSGkYncaU1ZjwvmIl7zDov=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I can get all my favorite teas from Chado, always prompt and good service. Fumi knows her teas and she always is open with advice.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Adam Brown","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIbsht9S19PNHQOYrdpPZN-8IGjh9JGTzMGvYGRSx_Pq-OaAg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have been buying tea online from them for many years and it is always good. They also stock some of their teas at honey shop so that is handy if you are having a walk around main street area in vancouver","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Margaux Seeley","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKjL6p7iPq_cnFJrej61Zfj551Vrv_AFUBEwEywonVWorznnw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Chado’s tea arrives quickly, is beautifully packaged, and always fresh.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ann Cannon-Brown","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLzd88hw_Bo3BeJETZlkBJL-4gUrM1O_3FjXCJn-WSIXL7aUA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Chado sales support and tea knowledge is top notch!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Pearobearo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWJytlYP3krNLbRwHHThbPHsotJR7HIGvSdTdRI-mBoQ7I0EO4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Perhaps this is more of an Uber Eats delivery issue, but the fact remained... The cup they used is super thin and they were not packed properly. Plus, 2 of my drinks came with coconut jelly instead of agar jelly with no notice.

My drink came spilled, and delivery guy tried to hide it. Left a sticky trail of dripping drinks from the lobby all the way to my floor where he dropped it off. Uber Eats offered no solution for the delivery guy's mistake.

Bad experience. Some drinks were good, some... Not so much.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM7FoN8aEEaBz-beG_97YAoBT9JDeC7JSKiezBz&fid=0x0:0xe1efdd370173ad76"],"When":"2024-12-26"},{"Name":"Cynthia Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXPSqb87NWW9U9vNp7BatMApz_3TKACtlL1RPxbq3QfEtMMfypj2g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"i love it here. good bubble tea of course, but also because the smell of the brewing tea is very nostalgic to me and it makes me happy. also i love the pomegranate red tea and this is the last location that still has it on the menu! <3","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUM0NG2rdM5FTL346xGle9zS2WbwQUigAi7xJC2J_LnOvbQvOL_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I think the experience has to do with the food u order. I was here another time and it wasn’t as pleasant. Glad I gave it a second chance . I’m going to stick to ordering the same thing when I return.

The dishes in the attached photo:
Spicy beef noodles
Squid tentacles (ask for a dipping sauce)
Taro slush with coconut jelly
Passionfruit green tea

The male server gave really good service too. Not sure if it’s because it wasn’t too busy but he was really attentive and didn’t rush us out. We ended up tipping 20% which is considerably high for a casual bubble tea establishment.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOkpj6VdMdhOJASVLO9diB9b2Ihfd_mwRQChqLw&fid=0x0:0xe1efdd370173ad76"],"When":"2024-1-7"},{"Name":"Kevin Vu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWzHltFaQvZtrPvmv3rpbBqLHG5pCvlOShvTu15wxVa49ieH8ms=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I would die for this place. Kidding, it is probably the best bubble tea shop in all of BC, and I drink a lot of it. Highly recommend their slush series, no one else comes close to their flavor and quality.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ellen Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWOLwp1YuZHFAfe5TfBAETM7Gfw006WNpu6CMM0hXfmB4HVpR97=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"One of the few places that was still open late night. They have an extensive drink menu and soft, fluffy bubble waffle. They don't have a lot of fancy flavour options for the waffle as they did for the drinks. Friendly service. Decent prices. Parking can be a little tricky to find. Solid 4.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNnRRXsyF9B0_DuyEAOqrPA6AmmAsYgV6mDM14S&fid=0x0:0xe1efdd370173ad76"],"When":"2020-9-23"},{"Name":"Iris Chau","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVlK29O_nQ58eC1py16m6iNxjxEdSTgZskn8dzbtfBYgNE1bk2Ecg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Came here for late night bubble tea around 11:30pm on a Friday night! We were a group of eight people, and we got a table right away. It wasn’t too busy at all. Overall the vibe is very casual and easy going, not a bad place to socialize with friends!

The menu is very extensive. Everything from milk teas to fruit slushes, and at reasonable prices, especially compared with other places. I ordered the papaya fresh fruit slush. However, I was a disappointed by it - it was much too icy for my liking. I could taste the texture of the individual it’s of ice. It needed to be blended for longer or have more liquid added to it. I was also disappointed by the pearls. They were a great texture and a generous amount, but there was absolutely no flavor to them. Usually, pearls have a subtle sweetness because they’re marinating in sugar before serving. The pearls in my drink were tasteless.

I would come back to try again as this might have been a one-off. Will update when I do!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOieOPobBBaFsBuXfr0uJaJUERjF8PD8383j82D&fid=0x0:0xe1efdd370173ad76"],"When":"2023-2-25"},{"Name":"Sally & Jason Leong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIZWOBASSZ71Gx8qO6J40A_hsS5D44pxDmq8grdtU9PC_PxUw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Been coming here for years and generally receive quality drinks, today however both drinks were garbage and tossed. Milk tea tasted like nothing as if there was no tea used, and the taro was flavourless.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"S R","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX0G5Bpx4zVI6jPA_JKyUBwmv39PC32FXcmhRAzW_ft6o5s9Jadjg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Bought a bbt & bubble waffle.After going so many years was disappointed with my bbt.Not sure if they changed the recipe but wasn’t great.Waffle was nothing special.I thought everyone had the same basic recipe.","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Cha Yuan Bubble Tea Yaletown Vancouver
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"No-contact delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Onsite services","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"highlights","name":"Highlights","options":[{"name":"Great tea selection","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Zihan Cai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV4Ut067-Y4XZEaVE-xFH4OWUrh1CLwo-4BsxmOFRLnal8um9L4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I thought the bubble tea was amazing. There were pieces of fresh fruit or something in it which made it taste great and not fake or syrupy.

I deducted one star because I asked for less ice but I felt like 60% of the cup was ice","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPZpz-lv4s_ux1u-Tfj-F_fK6pWvY_kmc71etsK&fid=0x0:0x99205c1bc045e7e5"],"When":"2024-12-11"},{"Name":"Makena Wiens","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLEqdjC_bLoDMK-tyPJm4398PRpq1Wg_L0IDvMgQ6y6D7k8xw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It's so pretty and design with art. The workers are so nice and social. They have so many different options for lactose intolerant individuals. The bubble tea is made with lots of care and is to die for🧋","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN15rhIdvYjrgwe7Of63f3hyPuKQw43nUZmx8iG&fid=0x0:0x99205c1bc045e7e5"],"When":"2024-10-24"},{"Name":"Lucy Lei","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUWqMDQPy8Rdj2ck6AFqBEF6oKEHn-aaEjadtV4H6wI1nduavxw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We got their original bubble waffle, Ali Shan Oolong Milk Tea with pearls, and Blueberry slush. I love the texture of their bubble waffles, soft and fluffy yet slightly crispy on the outside. The blueberry slush is addictive and refreshing. The only issue is the oolong milk tea which tasted like water, the flavour’s extremely mild.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPFpAigF0ELKv8t85OXM1xzk1ni6E5hVB5nuuMW&fid=0x0:0x99205c1bc045e7e5"],"When":"2024-7-15"},{"Name":"Michelle W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW6tNY8LO-QtQJ_R3rutBRZjHuvLbh5erCPRhIIR0T3kxt4zQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cha Yuan is my cup of (bubble) tea!

It’s a little shop with a wide selection of drinks (milk teas, lattes, fruit teas, slushes, and brewed teas), as well as bubble waffles and gelatos. The tea flavour is quite delicate, with options to substitute the milk with oat milk (for free!) and adjust the ice and sugar levels for certain drinks. Further, some drinks are caffeine free and available hot. It looks like there is only one size for drinks though. If you do opt for pearls, Cha Yuan’s have a nice chew/QQ to them. My favourite drinks so far have been Matcha Latte ($6.50) with Coffee Jelly (+$0.75), Hojicha Milk Tea ($6) with Grass Jelly (+$0.75), and Brown Sugar Pearl Latte ($6), all substituted with oat milk.

Cha Yuan is more of a grab and go, but there is some bar seating by the window should you choose to stay longer. Usually, there is only one staff member - at times, two - attending to both the till and the drinks, so there may be a slight wait. That said, the service is great, as is the quality of the drinks. Get a stamp card because you will be back for more!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMyP0uRcHw2Lu2K1Cw1QWr9MNs6Dn-Z1ZJq8Sk&fid=0x0:0x99205c1bc045e7e5"],"When":"2024-3-6"},{"Name":"Riddhi Loladia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocImighxSgff1MIlyfN936r-Mh_X7KdPqBsiGSGe2mNqIfWWBYg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I got the matcha mango green tea.
Paid over 8 dollars for a small portion of tea with water.
Didn't find much value for money and service was okay 👍🏻
However, I will come back and try something better as I am a matcha lover. I am sure they would have other options to try from but prices are a bit on the higher side for teas.
I also added popping mango bubbles with lychee jellies and they tasted really really good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMYwWoo3hcyJ2wZ3EdBXHeRjhlWONGbQFlzZEqY&fid=0x0:0x99205c1bc045e7e5"],"When":"2024-2-22"},{"Name":"Joel Adimathra","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJxHzzeQJJ66qCtCXCCBdGS-ea24Wx8K4rOdAX0-DkdfOwhZA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My wife and I went here after the Diwali celebration at the roundhouse center. I had a Hojicha latte, and my wife had bubble tea. Really great, the bubble waffle was nice and warm, and the lattes hit the spot. It added to the beautiful day yesterday where we got to sit at the park and enjoy the sunset.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lily Riri","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIPJZvsHFDJu0elELChXyK76s1fn8wP1E32imuV9wrnB829ag=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love this place! Their regular milk tea has its own strong, unique flavor, and is delicious. I'll sometimes come to Yaletown just to get their tea. The service is excellent; they're very kind! Good pricing as well.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Leo Poon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV85YDglYa0dqJZBoHypSMWRJhkQh84yAItH6UCoC2VEFpBBkAY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fantastic BBT gem in the neighborhood, found this place via a friend's recommendation.

Taro milk tea is fresh, there is no typical powder tasting.

The shop is clean and cozy, perfect spot to hang out with couple friends after grabbing your drink.

The background music is not loud

Staffs are friendly and patient, they ask good questions  and make good suggestions when my friend had difficulty choosing what she wanted.

Conclusion: will recommend this shop and visit again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMgZWXnLASr2ZTaeX57JFi3gfr-rC4Ilk0gLLgK&fid=0x0:0x99205c1bc045e7e5"],"When":"2022-7-22"}]

descriptions: Casual patisserie & cafe for croissants and other French-style baked goods.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Mark Metz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXyoVLB7bkNJLBFo3oRCjZrYVNKcyodhJkm4mGNA7Rkt3cOK6Nv=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Friendly staff and delicious pastries! They are the French bakery to stop at while in Vancouver.

The pistachio croissant was better than most European treats I've tried.

The Noel croissant was beautifully decorated for the holidays.

The savory cheese scone was deceptively fluffy with a crunchy crust 😋","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPCFIt5FTIOcCE1Ggxof_LL_sKmkJB0F2yRkcwf&fid=0x0:0xe077ab2a4d1689c8"],"When":"2024-12-6"},{"Name":"Philip Raymond Lim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5EIBAgpBLsauhPMdjXym7mJ4fA8mtryDtWQIJCZfJxYXxupU8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Stepping into Beaucoup Bakery feels like being transported to Paris. I used to come here frequently when I worked nearby, drawn by their incredible croissants, dessert, cookies, and chocolates. While the coffee isn’t my favorite, it’s still above par by my standards. Their croissant, however, is easily one of my favourite in Vancouver. There’s so much to choose from. Today, I was craving it, so I made the drive back and paired it with a large mocha. The experience was pure nostalgia.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOyZGVUp6Td3Z1Yfrsk6oUkDmRkUygjvQLAC1QK&fid=0x0:0xe077ab2a4d1689c8"],"When":"2024-10-27"},{"Name":"Sue L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXsEebCCdWwckVfTM1qnKLu7GVeqpvYJHly9b3TLM-GxkVO6hY=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Beaucoup Bakery makes the wonderfully delicious pastry. The team members are so friendly and very helpful. We ordered Vanilla Latte, Hawaii Scone, Onion Bacon Scroll, Pepperoni Scroll, Ham & Cheese Scroll, Almond Double Baked Croissant, and Chocolate Almond Double Baked Croissant. They are super yummy. We definitely will go back again!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPvmc56AMWYKZsYpRM2lfRq6dkGPN3nv64XWkZb&fid=0x0:0xe077ab2a4d1689c8"],"When":"2024-10-17"},{"Name":"Fuzzy Nemo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWMhjGNDhI-RZYgIiVRXnRDEQCiyyP-dsVjb7EhBkcymNr9MvYi0A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This has been a place that I wanted to try for a while, but it was mostly out of the way for me.  I went for the ice cream festival, so it was something to look forward to.  Their ice cream sandwich for the Vancouver Ice Cream Festival  was proven to  be a hit.  Although I had to wait for the second half of the festival to come,  because the menu was more interesting for my preference.   People there were very nice.   They got my order wrong and rectified it immediately.   There was a vast variation of pastries and all looked delicious.

Parking was very east, even in the mid afternoon on a weekend, so that was a plus.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOhlAZwBHDs25i4Aq8lMKniE53s7GjcXzkJzXxs&fid=0x0:0xe077ab2a4d1689c8"],"When":"2024-7-24"},{"Name":"Erica Ngan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXxiFAMX-8U6Hf7I7ySV2AT1mYgYdeBidCPp2cDYnZKccTLsR17eg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Tried this place because we got a gift card, there's another location in downtown. Cute, cozy place for baked goods and tea or coffee, they sell other Japanese jam. There's a pass it forward system for showing kindness to the community.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPzAO40JcmG4DtuZ6CtBxcTec19Xa0DyCj7knyt&fid=0x0:0xe077ab2a4d1689c8"],"When":"2024-10-8"},{"Name":"Jhk 727","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXRlpzpCG0lmTiswrjxl92nKs9mapw2VnKHEXcy00upiXVnodNCJA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time at Beaucoup and thoroughly enjoyed the cappuccino! Pan aux raison was tasty as well. Came to about 10 dollars together and I think that is reasonable for a gourmet place like this. Will come again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPUsS7l0QE6C7Qb4F8PDxc99l_YOPmUqKs_a-X_&fid=0x0:0xe077ab2a4d1689c8"],"When":"2024-8-24"},{"Name":"Mayuri Ramesh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK_xnb33zMkeiL3VRDPTBY4OmJOosK6Vr3W3pLUYIoY069Ftg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing pastries 🥐 I loved the Pistachio Croissant. Everyone on the team loved their pastries. Definitely recommend a visit. I will definitely revisit when travel back to Vancouver","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOxshu1fI9VjJbT7OHWvbg5inykIxnAQ5pswkiY&fid=0x0:0xe077ab2a4d1689c8"],"When":"2024-9-30"},{"Name":"Abhay Verma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVrV_6i4dbcDuraV7ft63f2m_fuGbXlt4ooiSAA_Az5gxTkAzw0Lg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love this bakery and all of their branches. I love the fact that they use premium chocolate (Valrhona) in all their chocolate creations, including their mocha.

Have tried their brownie before and really enjoyed that too. I wish more people knew about their offerings, they create such beautiful and creative pastries.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMYD5-ohCjt0wPGG5Kl-ELLhgtMtDuPJkgsZm2-&fid=0x0:0xe077ab2a4d1689c8"],"When":"2024-5-7"}]

title: The Bubble Tea Shop
descriptions: Quaint venue specializing in fruit & milk bubble teas, plus egg waffles with a variety of toppings.
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"highlights","name":"Highlights","options":[{"name":"Great tea selection","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true}]},{"id":"parking","name":"Parking","options":[{"name":"Paid street parking","enabled":true}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Ana A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXzFLRx430WP_zCLshyOG7fdQIMQ7GepNLw5bm9JYjQyBt38x1m=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"They have a good variety of products and most of them are really good. The reason why I removed 2 stars is because the floor is always sticky and is full of things wherever you look at, signs, boxes, toys and other type of things that are not related with bubble tea, which makes you want to get out of the place instead of wanting to enjoy your beverage right there. Also it is always messy (garbage on the floor) in front of the local and they take a lot of time with orders.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOeJc7zQKxtMtMWQ8Dk_Rk9BvylzZAenbPOf98c&fid=0x0:0x5bac1ea60f90b0ac"],"When":"2024-9-7"},{"Name":"Angela Jeffery","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUtGyld6d4wIU2Lb7oe7xsoiq4r77iaBdF6nkFQ8ek01eF1q7c=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"There are a lot of flavour and type combinations, and that's just the bubble tea. I had the mango halo-halo; it was refreshing and quite filling.

It's disappointing that they don't have plastic recycling. There were lots of plastic lids and cups in the garbage.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNf12NiunH-WNvm_nMQN-9nqiPOGboRXU4DXsLU&fid=0x0:0x5bac1ea60f90b0ac"],"When":"2024-8-16"},{"Name":"May Zhagro","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU9KviWdU_UGm6yjKPv-6aFaljm1EC_ecrxYhnt_LO3duiyBNho=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A little shop serving bubble tea, other non-alcoholic beverages, and egg waffles. The interior of the shop has limited high chair seating as well as display cases full of different types of cutesy and anime merchandise you can purchase. There are so many different beverages you can get and there are lots of photos at the counter you can take a look at to make your choice. We ordered the mango sago drink which came out to a whopping almost $10, which was shocking. Taste was good but value wasn’t really there due to how the sago tasted like it just came out of the fridge. Only one person working so if there are multiple customers ahead, it can be a bit of a wait.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNvXO5qU7PAN7PsE2bKUi3msR75zGvIfR8b9moX&fid=0x0:0x5bac1ea60f90b0ac"],"When":"2024-5-5"},{"Name":"Jesse Antoine","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXdGhTUBCVHFnQeQc85HWbL65IY57E1kGiynvEbk878RDQxdDk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is my go to bubble tea place. The only place I’ve tried so far where the mango slush actually tastes like real fruit and not that artificial mango flavor. Although the service is extremely slow I’m always happy when I get my bubble tea or waffles.

My wife had the taro bubbletea and it was good as well. I wish they had more locations downtown and closer to a sky train.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOQF1f48qsHJMvRZZio5arrfgYarCjMQO82CzGZ&fid=0x0:0x5bac1ea60f90b0ac"],"When":"2024-5-14"},{"Name":"Zaki Agraraharja","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUwVH6JKy2nGN6a3-bU_a5-_1kyYzGCQtqW1nnBxpjTMvAklDBW=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Was rating all 5 before because usually I have no problem, but given the not so good experience on my last visit, I need to edit my rating. If you see people lining, and there's only 1 staff working, better find other options as there's a chance they'll get the orders wrong with too long wait time. It's not really acceptable as the menus aren't cheap.
Worth mentioning though, if you get your drinks right, it's good!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ron Kurian Roy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXg9YqQAw3hRT-pO_2TMKLEYHY8CWT5t6Nkfp_Il4u1JRL81-aH=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The chocolate boba with pearls was really good, perfect with the right consistency.
However, the frozen tea latte was a little bit bad.

Special mention for the barista that worked on Monday closing. She was so kind and let us stay until closing 8pm.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOtPF_jSalC08yNMueYR3SfbdlV1HkmGupJErAg&fid=0x0:0x5bac1ea60f90b0ac"],"When":"2023-6-22"},{"Name":"Agnes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXyqJcbJDbElC-RwU1sBP46by6tVeVGdJmv6s9B0kjpjwDghjdVVw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here for their BTS event today. Happy Army Day my fellow armies!

It was so cool. The decor was awesome. Lots of photo ops and special BTS drink and bubble waffle flavours for the event.

I got the My Universe Bubble waffle. Delicious. Love the BTS freebies that came with it. Thank you so much for hosting this!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPLPdZsEdZO11F_Rb3BY0rnSBsrnauNn_ADYgzs&fid=0x0:0x5bac1ea60f90b0ac"],"When":"2023-7-9"},{"Name":"Anthony Szeto","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIOIfBQIJIjsWRooBTLTPXU967iECEki_cy7Je7AAbxzMbCMw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Make sure you give yourself 40-60 mins if you're planning to order here. Although you might be better off commuting to another bubble tea franchise as you're likely to still get your drink faster.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipObHMWHp2OsQr90KnOwcTddmK2QjLGI5HJ8IBGu&fid=0x0:0x5bac1ea60f90b0ac"],"When":"2024-6-10"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Luke Weng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXn1tdfwXfRnZVszKV8bZBNwooyRqfHv0VT8T0EAQWyUrqTrrO6aQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"It's actually my first time trying BBT at this onezo branch. The other one was always sold out of pearls.

The staff were very nice, especially Stephanie. She spent a few minutes explaining the menu to me from the most popular drinks to just small chat. Chill.

The drinks and food took quite a while. I was waiting for over 5 minutes, and was late for my personal appointments.

The quality of the food and drink was quite frankly subpar. It was very expensive for what I was getting too. Even worse, I forgot to try the handmade pearls so I can't write a review about that yet. On the bright side, the drinks themselves weren't sweet. I ordered 50% sweet and it had no sugar at all.

I'd like to try this place a few more times and raise the rating if my first impression wasn't correct.

At the very least, Stephanie did a great job in making me feel like a welcome customer.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNjf5H9Cv416TtQnROgKMh6wzqWW0VejQxvO2e0&fid=0x0:0xdfc42c9bf058ee73"],"When":"2024-10-11"},{"Name":"Clarence Choy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL4ubf8sP7uQKlJ2tiEfgdz8Zt5nBRl1PkKvBsr3Lqx4Cev-20=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Tried the matcha flavored bubble waffle today: taste was pretty good, but the texture was just average - not crispy. (too much batter, stove was likely not hot enough)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOCZIt2HBvuHGmXmanl7RzmwaZkwYkJDbBQwss0&fid=0x0:0xdfc42c9bf058ee73"],"When":"2024-5-7"},{"Name":"Ada","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK_tT85lO7aZKFfq17wWpo8ldgI_n0GJFJfBhG1nWiEa2zXCQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Good: Onezo tapioca apparently means mix of all kinds of pearls including black sesame pearls which was a pleasant surprise as I would not have tried it on my own.

Average/bad: I only finished half the bubble waffle and half the bbt. It just wasn't good enough to finish the rest. I feel like I would only come back if I was absolutely desperate for a bbt or else I would choose another franchise","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNgxQWThx39Qb5f6mbxwqmxNUVhQxqxsC2pEOT_&fid=0x0:0xdfc42c9bf058ee73"],"When":"2024-4-20"},{"Name":"Tayler R","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUyftMbMHk1Uwb8qbPE3Uf5ifaLPhxve_h3BvKA6jkPFLPvBny4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I came in for my free birthday drink from the app, and I was pleasantly surprised there were dairy free soy milk options for some drinks. I tried the Oolong Brown Sugar Milk Tea with soy milk. Even though it is listed as being only 25% sweet, the brown sugar syrup is very sweet and delicious. I tried to ask for sweeter without knowing so, but they let me know 25% sweet is the only sweetness level the brown sugar drinks come in. The flavour was very smooth and not overpowering at all, I would gladly order it again. The fresh tapioca was fantastic as well, the pearls are not as large as some other places, but they have great flavour, mouthfeel, and chewyness. I just wished I had a bigger cup so I could get more! I also ordered a bubble waffle while I was here. My only gripe was that they did not serve it to me hot, but instead cooled it down in front of a fan so that it was not quite warm when handed to me. I also thought they may have browned it for too long, but it might have just been the sugar content in the batter that turned it dark, because it tasted very good even if it was cool.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Annie Vo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKlRehj8w3lb3TLvOkaFmtSslVabJxE4i1pJPr0ZgPJV2viQg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love the boba and the drinks! They are always generous with the toppings and the pearls are made fresh in the store from scratch. They have some seating spaces as well.  The girl who was working with the bangs and braids today did a great job with my drink.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNd5kXVCikiI5v4w1_Qo6QTtVTtNKzHGto6nNj2&fid=0x0:0xdfc42c9bf058ee73"],"When":"2024-3-31"},{"Name":"Sheila W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIO5qdSp1Vn38HxOKA48ldYD9M_n5EW2p2xBoCaTHmTocB-ug=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The best pearls in Vancouver and my favorite drink at Onezo is the strawberry niuniu. I miss the Burnaby branch which was much more central with free parking. The staff at Burnaby was also a lot nicer than this location. Owner is great though! Sign up for their rewards system cause they have tons of coupons","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Benedict Santos","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW6PoqDB0s0FZ-wOoleDfCsv0mfJt9Lh41GYqE5v8-k2M8tAauT=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Order the taro drink and it was amazing. Honestly one of my favorite taro drinks out there. Unfortunately, customer service needs massive improvement. I don’t know if it was me asking questions (there were two types of taro drink) or if I were interrupting their lunch break (it was after 12), but there is absolutely no excuse for them to raise their voice at me. I’m not the sensitive type and I usually shrugged it off. But unless they are really busy, they shouldn’t act that way to customers. This is also coming from a former barista with over 2 years experience.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Saskia Eveline","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVSbfRksUkCYwtlXvG_RBbpVABzHoDK8k-xSR5ImSFSzQtyMXQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The taro bubble tea I had from here was delicious! The shape of the cups are also cute.
I really liked the different flavour options they have on their menu, so I’ll definitely be back.
Also for anyone reading this, I find some of the low star reviews for this shop nitpicking and not worthy of a 1 star. Give this place a try!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOvUBROV4tOprRp8CKxQ1XuaTtouB1hSGw5nesL&fid=0x0:0xdfc42c9bf058ee73"],"When":"2023-11-21"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Mahsa Safari","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUchvWzR219vkKaIpFisPaWM7tup-Txwsp5Pxmxgha5rfxN9fROgg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We visited the Teahouse Restaurant in Stanley Park to celebrate my birthday, and it was a wonderful experience. The location is beautiful, with stunning views that made the day even more special. The food was delicious, and the staff were so friendly and attentive, which added to the celebration. It’s a perfect spot for a memorable occasion!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMyzOPwTwjqkt5B7nXIQpicupwOJDd_2x5_Ys17&fid=0x0:0x2b75ad5919d9b28b"],"When":"2024-12-24"},{"Name":"Kate Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIr0wyxbETF1OIwtaRI7q7gqmb4Gyi3lrLYLvt0zWijOigiOvk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is not actually a tea house. It is a higher-end café with delicious options for meals and desserts. The service was outstanding. I called ahead as my group was going to celebrate a special event, and the staff provided us with great indoor seating with a beautiful view the water just outside. They also served a complimentary raspberry centered chocolate mousse cake. It was delicious and very kind and thoughtful of the restaurant.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOdb2mmVSbHa8etcjeiB_h0z08wyuncuiR4hbi2&fid=0x0:0x2b75ad5919d9b28b"],"When":"2024-8-17"},{"Name":"Minu Ak","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKpx6V6dzD6tisu6tWSZcHe3Ev1skK55mygxtuEg2Ryek5VqA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I wrote this review based on the prestige and class this restaurant claims and the service and quality we experienced.

The host at the front desk was neither friendly nor welcoming, and he didn’t even offer a smile. Other staff members didn’t seem as professional as those in similar jobs.

The table was set for four people, but in my opinion, it was more suited for two. The waitress walked heavily in heels, causing the floor to shake, which made the people around feel unsteady and left me quite nervous.it was like earth quake.

The mint and lemon garnish on our drinks was wilted and rotten , as shown in the photo.

We ordered the duck and steak. While we enjoyed the steak, the duck was overly salty and had an unpleasant smell, making it far less enjoyable than similar dishes at other restaurants which I experienced before,

A few hours after our meal, I experienced stomach discomfort, which suggests that the vegetables might not have been fresh or properly cleaned. Based on this experience, I wouldn’t recommend this place to friends.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPOhpZw-3A5kzvdBqvjX3WvYvQvDXoE7YjvAPL9&fid=0x0:0x2b75ad5919d9b28b"],"When":"2024-11-3"},{"Name":"Mahshad","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV0WdFZCPDIr9KNIGcPuLDEypkHoHqcCGEG09122Ny-BVJmiU2c=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We hosted our Christmas party at [Tea House and couldn’t be happier with the experience. From our very first email, their team was incredibly responsive and welcoming, making the planning process seamless. The venue itself is beautiful, with a warm and inviting atmosphere, and the pricing was very reasonable. The food was absolutely delicious and exceeded our expectations. Highly recommend for any special occasion!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOQ0VfcRtzgFHN3MvEkijjUB0ti3ObeKai8ljlU&fid=0x0:0x2b75ad5919d9b28b"],"When":"2024-12-10"},{"Name":"Min T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKHBCvyhMdMuGm8ISXRxIPWaPtZa7hX9LVxvDW4OOAn-tBBWA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The atmosphere at the Tea House in Stanley Park is amazing—such a perfect setting surrounded by nature. The food was delicious, with a great selection of dishes, and the service was excellent. The staff was friendly and attentive, making the whole experience really enjoyable. Whether you're a local or just visiting, it's a great spot for a memorable meal.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMyshT0c3zcXyEiab20u5NumkuEiCRa_7rzu8hd&fid=0x0:0x2b75ad5919d9b28b"],"When":"2024-10-25"},{"Name":"Sonja Efford (Efford)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWN7pKl5pIStrEkRXfGklOo3Rs-t2EaOTN-YGTqDWjvvwBWLv4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We enjoyed a family dinner to celebrate one of our children’s graduation from UBC. The location, the quality of the food and service were excellent. I highly recommend to others. A great backdrop for photos too. Friendly service.
No pressure tactics to buy alcohol was much appreciated by us. Meals took a little longer than we expected, but when food arrived it was perfectly cooked, plates warm, fish cooked to perfection. Well worth the small wait time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNBzkVTaJHwBG-op1U4t5ilbnisxm7VK0Ko8MSD&fid=0x0:0x2b75ad5919d9b28b"],"When":"2024-6-3"},{"Name":"mina zabihi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVg7Hs1MSdAQleivSWHBilOyl40wKe7OklAWfSx6WyV4KEGppQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We celebrated his birthday, and what a night it was! 🥰 The food was good, and even though it was my first time there, it felt like I had been there before. The atmosphere was warm and inviting, and the server was kind and attentive.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMYdkyZjIbQH_Tc8p75KJiIn4dpJyL5-JSsW3hJ&fid=0x0:0x2b75ad5919d9b28b"],"When":"2024-10-1"},{"Name":"Martin Cloutier","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXewEsd3TfPjzrJK0iNaYLhE5rKZi6pAlrotmYuVQXV_5m15Fs=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing experience. I mean... Look at the pictures! The ambiance was perfect. Food was fantastic. Highly recommended. Make reservations though as my may not get in otherwise.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPdQmjxMOOsmtfp77VdSpJ9U0mnGaytt7rkVPe7&fid=0x0:0x2b75ad5919d9b28b"],"When":"2024-10-5"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Stephanie L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLM4RTU2gMWqRRPljtU9drAwlF8GiFXSr0iZqs-iAa7h_9AfX7W=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The 2 item breakfast combo is very filling. You’ll likely need to pack some leftovers (3 out of 4 of us had leftovers) so bring a container unless you want to pay for yet another takeout container to add to your ever-growing stash.

The salted egg yolk custard bun is not something offered on many other HK cafe breakfast menus so it’s worth a try. Service was pleasant and quick.

Cash or debit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN-kuIiUQiv-8up5r01DeMmbFob6vHagYcLINL5&fid=0x0:0x4aacacc8d111cb1b"],"When":"2024-12-1"},{"Name":"Frank mtrc","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXmR4z6cBCvsVbm02ClRfUN2pWF2ylGMe9Mjzez8HtBtfrFIpB0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious dishes and reasonable price.

High efficient services (Hong Kong  style 😄) in terms of table setup and food production.

We have an appropriate reaction😂 to empty the bowl of the daily soup (霸王花，紅蘿蔔煲[多]豬骨湯😋) .","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNkKsRHCqQNOhJBhnYjqoWbYbbzgHnY2GYNcEs&fid=0x0:0x4aacacc8d111cb1b"],"When":"2024-5-12"},{"Name":"James Kwok","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV3dZyNZwwn2bgVt-Xa9iDAC2YxhzhlYZ37ZgUsshLxACOu5uFSYg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hong Kong Cafe type restaurant. One of the best in Vancouver with average prices but large portions. Quick and fast delivery. You can finish within an hour. Make sure you do not order more, in fact you can share 1 for 2, specially if you are seniors with less appetite.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP7THUr8Vk3WY0DWTGCiba7ADcC36_R2ks2m1PM&fid=0x0:0x4aacacc8d111cb1b"],"When":"2024-6-19"},{"Name":"Larry YVR","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXuTv093wbMx-W_HREHfZgp4qwBRPVQElu44Abax3eT7gG680u3=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Nothing memorable.. not that good to be honest. Bland .. 3 cup chicken does not taste like it. Wonton is blah.. better HK style at other places ..","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP4FaZG-6Hf0OKl2WULgr3JCLf96D6JpRmTeJXw&fid=0x0:0x4aacacc8d111cb1b"],"When":"2024-7-14"},{"Name":"Ben dee B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLsJ5lA6n0f86f2tMUXbZpfhRXSQb-rgXy8qNq78Xk8QKTYwQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Ordered Lobster special with 4 dishes ($145) + 3 entrees for dinner for 12 people. = $224 + tax. Affordable pricing, honoured our reservation and good basic Chinese food. Nothing fancy. I also go to Van tea for lunch and afternoon drink special.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMxIceToaniFPy7p92vouyMZ-fTI58nHBftcdRT&fid=0x0:0x4aacacc8d111cb1b"],"When":"2024-6-17"},{"Name":"Ian V","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVUKl62suL92ETQ2xE2ilXV00Y9UbZgyGA4Db4IHqq6MbUQip4w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great Western breakfast and chow mein. Love the variety of combo options. Good Hong Kong style coffee too, thanks!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMp0CjUTPF42XK6HiFefyfP4L3UIJcdUehrDwvE&fid=0x0:0x4aacacc8d111cb1b"],"When":"2024-11-26"},{"Name":"Justin Tan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWdx52Kikwc0qLXVIQ56I9QgSYzQs4FktHZQJNeWk16LhVxDTSZ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Weekend lunch with the wifey, we wanted to go to the one in Richmond, because we like the food there, but we ended up in Vancouver

We got a table right away, ordered food and they came relatively fast.

The crispy seafood noodles was crispy but the sauce on top were not flavourful, and not much seafood, it just ok.

The laksa was not very smooth, and the chicken was over cooked, we won’t be ordering that again

We also ordered the Portuguese chicken baked rice, the chicken was well marinated, but the sauce was bland, overall it just ok.

We hope this is just a one off or just not the dishes that they are good at. Hope when we go there next time they will be better","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNMfYKkDcPQ4nD8xJInpELlEIqNxs36nlihLyAI&fid=0x0:0x4aacacc8d111cb1b"],"When":"2024-2-23"},{"Name":"Sandra Chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUS3d7aZA4lMhkB4lrjOTrDjB_p6PvngmeWQeM0VFHPfzqli2Uc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We had a family dinner mid-week in their more private room off to the side with 4 large round tables. Only one other table was occupied, so when they left, we had a private room. It was  good Cantonese cuisine, perfect dish sizes for 9 adults with no leftovers. We had 3-cup chicken; Malay sauce lobster - the sauce was so delicious we mopped it all up with white rice; stir fried pea shoots; curry crab; Hainanese chicken (firm, but juicy); deep fried halibut; spicy green beans with eggplant; beef with mushrooms; and finger-licking good citron honey spareribs. Service was very good, too. All-in-all a very satisfying meal.

We lunched here on Sunday and I ordered one of the clay pots that takes 15-20 minutes make; it took 30 minutes! My husband had finished his meal when mine finally arrived. It wasn’t as tasty as I remembered, so won’t be waiting around for it again. My husband’s egg swirl and shrimp over flat rice noodles was good. This would be a 3-star review.

Back for a Sunday night meal. They ran out of Hainanese chicken; a couple of us were very disappointed. However, the salty egg yolk spareribs, spicy Malay curry lamb briskets and fried rice noodles with prawns and scrambled eggs were really good. This would be a 4 star review.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMe73ZdV2-YqSKyLOgGyHpN5RpqvoU7VzRHNEdJ&fid=0x0:0x4aacacc8d111cb1b"],"When":"2022-10-27"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"snows el","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIqxBNrA9LbKTxoPN07ZgheoT-yVOZanHxfhAd4goYPPOY0Cg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Ordered two slices of crepe cake…both taste horribly artificial. The crepe itself is also wet and mushy, the tell-tale signs of a defrosted, not fresh cake.

For the price, there are so many better options out there that actually serve fresh crepe cakes.

0/5 do not recommend","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP--GUPRRPgjV2_y9M--QCEtepFBD24oAmy67kd&fid=0x0:0x3ac93e2b8ca6b1fc"],"When":"2024-10-28"},{"Name":"Sammy Luk","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXtHRF9ODs4qmjij-nwE2W4JPk3js-iI6zvuPuPAXto1uFDS3g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"dessert is really good , we can the milk pudding , the matcha red bean latte and chocolate bubble waffles. service can be better , since we never get the water that we ask for , it isn't like she is really busy since we are the only new table when we sit down .","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOeWeH6WlTfbH74s6nnW3Mfm77fN5_oO1tXHgCT&fid=0x0:0x3ac93e2b8ca6b1fc"],"When":"2024-12-1"},{"Name":"M Siu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWUeV_SXiAfmnubcz7tUJEexjK2eB55Yr_AtAEW9aZCByYTq62E=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Some opening week bugs but so glad they have reopened, same block, new shop. Drinks on sweeter side but I didn't customize. Quality of fruit and toppings was great. Tea was strong.

Looking forward to visiting again for shaved ice and bubble waffles and hot sweet soups and more desserts that I've had before.
Welcome back!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Phil Nguyen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU6d6rUE6JmHq4R98-chWVPZtkKc_NizMd-gxsqTb2wZk9i1k0T=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Soybean powder and red bean, mochi shaved ice is so good. Must try. They also have some hot desserts as well","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPEa-gedbYRqM2TZYsdFHf0kgepN8gv9pR421sf&fid=0x0:0x3ac93e2b8ca6b1fc"],"When":"2024-9-29"},{"Name":"Denny Hui","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXuGFgsc9U61TCKDV21ZHXILH-aGrlI-hjZswBeAYg3LhKf97Y3=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went out for dessert this Saturday night. Tried 17C on Kingsway for the first time. Place is bright, clean but limited seating.

Staff is very friendly and dessert dishes were good. We had the fruit bowl and forget what the other bowl was called but both hit the spot. Fruits were fresh.

Great place and we'll worth eating g in than doing take out!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNZtKb3iEQIM3yIWT7gqFcXlNL54Mg_AdqZP-Sc&fid=0x0:0x3ac93e2b8ca6b1fc"],"When":"2023-7-23"},{"Name":"Edgar Ignacio","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV7oexz4qXoBKr6ujKuYxwMvlf16ckv-ovFMKFmC4nzUqeMSoelFA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"They were closing when we came but they were so kind to still accommodate us with our orders. Their bubble tea is very good and refreshing, it is one of the best tasting boba that I've tasted. I will come back whenever I am in the area. I love this place. Come check them out.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMfCMk-6WB1qIH-OLDfFp75gzcDfnW_52y7iUhn&fid=0x0:0x3ac93e2b8ca6b1fc"],"When":"2023-7-31"},{"Name":"Gurv","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXhwceJhFcjYo11eH0UjktVpbt4vgW7SS5aHechrSipNjogSGM7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"We visited this spot today, and while everything looks really cool and is insta worthy, the cost seems very high for the quality of the product.  The Oreo ice pot, which is a unique dish that uses shaved ice and ice cream, looked amazing but I wouldn’t recommend it based on the taste being disappointing. The waffles were  good, but the ice cream wasn’t great.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNWnJoKM2ddmUBtL7C9ix2j7cEoiruRCyu_eC34&fid=0x0:0x3ac93e2b8ca6b1fc"],"When":"2021-8-11"},{"Name":"Elizabeth Gasson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUykzRPOFzGW8G82y28v3uT9o4DUgfX9E8zJDn0MbdAUo7Y_M0=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is the best. I've been going here for many years, about 5 to be exact. And I can definitely say it's the home to the best bubble tea and desserts I've ever had. The costumer service is great and the store has a very nice atmosphere. They take costumers orders into account and adjust their menu to the people's preferences, and take care in making sure their costumers are happy! I'm so excited for their new store to open, and when it does, go visit it.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Bridgette H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWRuBIdlotS2aMsoe_Jizf_DQ_CDwtpvFqL7RgLCIsvMlK4drGqfw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a fabulous Bubble Tea place to celebrate kpop and different kpop groups! The drinks were  tasty, and the drink names were so cute. This location even had a \"Draw TinyTan workshops\" for people to attend. I enjoyed my Love Letter drink, meeting more kpop fans, and enjoying the different types of merchandise you can buy of your favorite member (Suga ❤️). I definitely recommend this place because the owners are very friendly and attentive, I've never met such nice owners until coming here! Definitely check it out, I will be back! Thank you!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMVUNhFwLL1Bs6PwQTS-xJYbXcQNWYkSU5koTd7\u0026fid=0x0:0x7e38f7cd955faa42"],"When":"2024-9-27"},{"Name":"Ananya Ganguli","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVjiw3IStZFPmsvz7lWeBHDuLLWteB1GY36TEB5CjIpTpVRo6KLYg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great place for bubble tea, meeting more folks who love k-pop, or simply meeting new people. The owners are amazing people who are kind, warm and super welcoming. I have made some really great friends here!! Highly recommend a visit here, especially during one of their special cup sleeve events. The activities are super fun!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO_PCJz4EB8HnVbbki8hPcmzmx0DAWgpcL78FW3\u0026fid=0x0:0x7e38f7cd955faa42"],"When":"2024-7-20"},{"Name":"Ricca lorraine","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKdxC64NIk4pwSQkRh22dNWBLtlGhl52MzXJT_5uKEI1Ghxmw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"As an Army, I feel really welcome! Delicious good and drinks. Very nice people. Doesn’t take too long for drinks to be prepared. The owners are very kind to allow us attend our online classes in their shop. We really enjoyed the event! Will surely come back. Many freebies too!! Affordable drinks","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN3NeTjBdt0aUbrXMD5ZCXbi6wwaWTrdUP8Zj1u\u0026fid=0x0:0x7e38f7cd955faa42"],"When":"2024-7-14"},{"Name":"Lucy Lei","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUWqMDQPy8Rdj2ck6AFqBEF6oKEHn-aaEjadtV4H6wI1nduavxw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lovely owners running this cute shop! We were pleasantly surprised by the k-pop decors and themed-drinks. We got the fresh peach slush with agar pearls and it was delicious!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOLxA-siQc3VWVVeAnKcQamMoPYyV9RzydtcNIm\u0026fid=0x0:0x7e38f7cd955faa42"],"When":"2024-7-15"},{"Name":"Dee Dee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJDibdoqzPqSAOO5o2CHGhWRvYBKUw4cYIh69IhKASqhxbJnQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My absolute FAVOURITE place for my bubble tea fix! There are always new flavour combinations to go with the different feature events that are hosted! The owners are AMAZING!! They are super warm and welcoming and make you feel like you’re family. Butterfly is a spot I appreciate especially because of the efforts put into fostering a community. The owners are beyond generous and I would highly recommend visiting!! Chances are it’ll become a second home like it’s been for me and my family.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMIB-IzvtmSfGwe4x-OplTXE1sheh0wr0OyGWlk\u0026fid=0x0:0x7e38f7cd955faa42"],"When":"2024-7-14"},{"Name":"Maya “LeeFelixBbokAri” K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLYBnEsSq1HexhyCxFWK00eZtS7dYSP5VDiGKWsfPAOPV24urw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"GUYS 😭😭😭 this is literally the best boba place I’ve ever been to it’s not even funny. I left the shop giggling and jumping up and down I was so excited and happy especially since the whole place was K-POP THEMED!! 🙈 I was there right before they closed and the staff was so sweet they even gave us an extra drink which was very delectable. I got a BTS magnet, a Jungkook photo card, and a BTS photo for free. They had this really cute spot in the shop where you can take pictures with BTS props and a background I loved it SO MUCH. Stray Kids is my favorite K-pop group and the owner said that they were going to have a Stray Kids event in a few days and I was absolutely heartbroken that I couldn’t go because I’d love to see it. Also, I felt really welcome there and I felt like I already knew the staff because they were so kindhearted and lovely. For the drinks, I got a passionfruit black tea with mango popping boba and coconut jelly lychee (WHICH WAS THE BEST BOBA DRINK I EVER HAD), a passionfruit black tea with mango popping boba and mango stars (really delicious and cute stars), a passionfruit green tea with mango popping boba, and two mango smoothies. Everything was so yummy. Also, the staff is really generous with the amount of toppings they give which is 5-STAR (Stray Kids reference) behavior right there and that’s one of the reasons why I love them. I’m gonna be honest I never write reviews, but I loved this place so much that I just had to. By the way, they had LE SSERAFIM, TXT, BTS, ITZY, seventeen, and other K-pop group themed things. It was so cozy and adorable🫶🏻🫶🏻. All I have to say is that I COMPLETELY RECOMMEND THIS BOBA PLACE BECAUSE ITS THE BEST ONE EVER!!!! 😘😘 this place makes me want to live in Vancouver 😛","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMDPoJ_UbLHHm9n5q97c0bkyvmDKPpsZ2uTDQjH\u0026fid=0x0:0x7e38f7cd955faa42"],"When":"2024-7-18"},{"Name":"Moses Anderson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVqP9o2Mxh1TbUgGeu8SzUgOoEYSltQvoNI1vKtAa_4jpobxCL5=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great bubble tea spot!! The owners were lovely, drinks fresh and delicious, and lots of comfortable seating. My girlfriend and I loved getting the specialty drinks 😄 Can't wait to come back and try new boba drinks!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPk7c17C0Ar84BlU9HcTGfFUqkaNJrmrXiijnSf\u0026fid=0x0:0x7e38f7cd955faa42"],"When":"2024-8-28"},{"Name":"JP MSanchez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVwCsyCTngmvgtII5Vy6yHPjOAaFbc6157t7tjFNjsLT68PH67uRA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a cute place, came here for a BTS event.  Loved the story from the owners why they have this shop.  I love family small businesses.  Loved the special drinks for the event.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPOVYHulaGJMQAnrMDjRgB1_vNzdBhnU2D5BvCh\u0026fid=0x0:0x7e38f7cd955faa42"],"When":"2024-6-15"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Teresa Le","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU7-lXcJ0oGwGmWUti9zI1w1UEIEORUR365nlesFkUSnO2t8bT1=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Visited on a weekday during fall and tried their passionfruit green tea. It was nice and fruity, just what I needed. I also ordered their roasted milk tea but it wasn't as good. I definitely recommend their fruity teas.
Inside the store was tidy and there were cute plushies on display. It was close to Halloween so they had a spooky skeleton guy on a candy bowl. Very cute, in-season, and kid-friendly.
I can 100% see myself trying another fruit tea from them in the future!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPk6GPWvKU5JUwEmZu2JSrgkGXflLQbF6ShsYhW&fid=0x0:0x856a3bd029bed924"],"When":"2024-10-25"},{"Name":"لجين علي عبدالله","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJknstfVQBYVOicM756T8lGplERKL0_UBI-91D2Lx8i3wQBxzk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I needed a drink after along walk and the place was on my list. I ordered the classic brown sugar milk tea pearl drink and it was a bit disappointing. The flavor was blunt and not as refreshing. The service was good and the atmosphere was okay nothing too fancy. I would clean up the hallway from the produce to give a great view for the customers as they walk in. Overall it was okay but probably wont try again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOs_ZazwtCqkRddmfIh_BBP2HSOAhp64WXuZqS6&fid=0x0:0x856a3bd029bed924"],"When":"2024-7-8"},{"Name":"kexin Xue","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJjrn2rDoRYsgsmPycGa9-aQjkyKTPMUYrkL0XrQzueH5Pqqw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"While enjoying my Mango Pomelo Sago, I was horrified to discovered a piece of plastic in my drink. This incident is completely unacceptable and raises serious concerns about the hygiene and safety practices in your establishment. Finding plastic in my beverage not only ruined my experience but also left me feeling anxious about the potential health risks. As a paying customer, I expect a certain standard of safety and quality, and this experience has shattered my trust in your brand. Definitely not returning to your store.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMkT9UhMSKWJFYHcUIfohZh-8o0zyZhcs4qo2aS&fid=0x0:0x856a3bd029bed924"],"When":"2024-10-29"},{"Name":"Jenny Huynh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUqkoT5sfDVKDZ-BHePsf_OfUDYIgRLocHC3PpojvGZ5Zo3KNvV=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Small but super cute shop! I had the recommended taro & sweet potato w fresh milk and the pearls were nice and chewy! Service was also fast, I didn't have to wait long for my order (: there was also these fun keychains that you can get in exchange for a review!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOhy3Gjp-t3_wb6NOwGldJIXGAMu-9epajTd8Bx&fid=0x0:0x856a3bd029bed924"],"When":"2024-7-25"},{"Name":"Tracy Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWhBensmnpf-FHl7luyDrwUXP4TYK7apG5ioqQTWAlPRDb_4ki1TQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My son loves to get a snack at Happy Lemon.  It’s conveniently located so you can shop and stop for a snack.  He orders the original Bubble Waffle and a Mango Green Tea with Lychee Jelly.

The Bubble Waffle comes to you hot and with a crispy outside.  The drink is just right for him with 70% ice and 70% sugar.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOhnKGqNK2hESAMkzIaTxKG-oTf96ku-TLjQJxF&fid=0x0:0x856a3bd029bed924"],"When":"2024-7-15"},{"Name":"Ray","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXGVd5s-06Fr3JDo-bYWWNiziS7uiGN7g2hEorOk1Vp-qtDK_-cTg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The drinks here are a sensation for your tastebuds. We come here every chance we get. Highly recommend the strawberry shortcake with pudding and salted cheese foam. That foam was the creme de la creme.

Not cheap but the drinks here are so unique and exciting and full of flavors.

I also enjoyed the purple sweet potato milk and the mochi peach yogurt drink; server informed us that it's like a smoothie-- we found it delicious with the perfect kick of yogurt.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOZ9WwBem0-K_DuTFeMvVb8CdnU94FVJCGPZQtg&fid=0x0:0x856a3bd029bed924"],"When":"2024-7-14"},{"Name":"Sunam Ellis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV9sQffDmdxkUYtisQ0SG19eiQgYuMEX5Paa7ZCnE-jb-nF5Uc=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"It’s a light Thai Milk Tea, which makes it refreshing during the hot weather. The pearls are fresh. The people were great as I figured out the new drinks (very different than the options I have in Seattle!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNVXa8yy0xKYeMWLvSuNPoPTXwMLTD21Iu_EPmj&fid=0x0:0x856a3bd029bed924"],"When":"2024-7-18"},{"Name":"Johnny Kell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV_B8Y2zmgwCg3Vi6X3tnZV8gtnjUrlqP82UX-HmSfUD8wrnwtp-g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Some of the best bubble waffle I have ever had probably the best bubble waffle in Vancouver.
