user_reviews: [{"Name":"Flora Zhou","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWNs7etU0kW9GGBfwVoaBiTm6FX8c0FLo0Qg-rOeDW1bMeuJ0kA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Ben Gong has a lot of unique flavours and their tea cube topping isn’t something I’ve seen anywhere else. I tried the passion fruit tea; it was not bad, but quite pricy as is most of the menu. Waited around 20 minutes for two drinks even though there was only one person in front of us.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOxm4D6gj9rKEKnxrDH0TRzNR-R2SIKXOe7LOjE\u0026fid=0x0:0xccdb27f8c01c2f46"],"When":"2022-2-21"},{"Name":"May H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIkmbwTMj2rjBvdcAxUeGNl04-SkWREKHjV-Ua8W22gHFSvgw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I came here for the first time because a friend recommended the place to me. All the staff that I interacted with were really welcoming and helpful. I ordered a Mango and Coconut Pudding Milk Tea which tasted absolutely fantastic. It had a great fresh mango sweetness that mixed perfectly with a rich coconut milk flavour, and there were tons of pieces of freeze dried mango, coconut pudding, and mini tapioca pearls all throughout the drink, so they don't cheap out on their ingredient portions and you definitely get bang for your buck. My drink was ready really quickly too, it took less than 2 minutes for me to be in and out! I'll be ordering it again next time I come here. The price was a little high at almost $10 for the drink after taxes and tipping but I think it's worth it as an occasional treat. It was overall a great experience and drink!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Bill","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIRhMbP-U-8COzjxHf-2dKFKKgrmjf0WYy5QpKyMHBzYfaa5w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"It had been pretty annoying that they keep messing up the sugar level of my drinks.It happens to me more than 50% of the time and I feel like it’s completely unacceptable for a bubble place to repeat this mistake.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPkvVy46d5Yjjc9SIE3HucUi2aY-181sbTdV2tJ\u0026fid=0x0:0xccdb27f8c01c2f46"],"When":"2022-8-11"},{"Name":"john jiang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLIV-uf1sv2gLESAVXHcy5zyUXz6-qjdp0BxFK6_lG5Fno7=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Unfortunately, my recent visit to this bubble tea shop left me quite dissatisfied. Despite purchasing an expansive bubble tea on UberEats, the reality was far from expectations. The staff exhibited impatience and a bad temper, making the overall atmosphere unpleasant. To add to the disappointment, the bubble tea itself did not match the description provided on UberEats. Avoid if you can.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Felix Yu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUWxNDDut6mhalKwU58YSTtvqDjyHtbqzHXAbb-YdyZMlVVTEWNdw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Ordered the Dahongpao tea yesterday with my gf but unfortunately the pearls were significantly undercooked as they were hard to chew.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPJN0gcYMUmhYvdxv23U6ygy45XnPz8ncF8SFHH\u0026fid=0x0:0xccdb27f8c01c2f46"],"When":"2021-5-27"},{"Name":"W Shaw","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVqK9MwJHN8M3Ktw6U_7FA-gldy2i2nhRT2sRl8XnPz2e9Jvs0=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Shame on you. Bad service. High price but no flexibility. Default toppings are not indicated. It’s easy and cheap to change or refill if they do a wrong one but they just don’t want to. Don’t call yourselves a Chinese brand.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Anna","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW61VLEof_7tdYdBPJGWcCbuBW1EBf1hehye9bn1kVuFcyTOdw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Brown sugar milk tea =no brown sugar at all and undercooked pearls. title: Chatime Bubble Tea
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Onsite services","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"highlights","name":"Highlights","options":[{"name":"Great tea selection","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair accessible seating","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible washroom","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible parking lot","enabled":false}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"RonNand 604RSXdriver","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocImm8mHmyEWriDtBoZINz_7OMtbKOCj_JvKFAezHbkXbmsxPg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently visited Chatime on West Broadway. The staff were incredibly friendly and patient while I took my time deciding from their selection of bubble teas.
The teas are rich in flavour and they also have fresh ingredients which is nice. What really stood out was how they catered to my preferences. I could adjust the sweetness and ice level, which made the drink feel totally customized to my taste. It’s those little touches that make Chatime such a delightful place to visit.

Whether you're a bubble tea lover or trying it for the first time, Chatime on West Broadway is definitely worth a visit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOWI0dbVbCDPyBVymxIXpwxQYYOrTYQU_v_8ewo&fid=0x0:0x25545696b710b4c2"],"When":"2024-10-13"},{"Name":"Axa Mhd","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJJrioiZDCrdnCrhogCH-Sg_fXDDtiUEme164ouQOOF43ySdQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Feedback on Service and Drink Quality at Chatime 1545 W Broadway

Dear Chatime Team,

I hope this message finds you well. I am writing to share my experience during my recent visit to your store located at 1545 W Broadway on December 12th, at approximately 6:30 PM.

I have been a loyal Chatime customer for over three years, and my go-to drink has always been the Pearl Milk Tea. Unfortunately, on this occasion, the drink I was served was disappointing. The staff member who prepared it seemed rushed, completing the order in less than a minute, and the drink did not meet your usual high standards. The taste was subpar, and the preparation appeared to lack care, as even the ice was not added properly.

I value Chatime for its consistent quality and great service, which is why this experience stood out to me. I kindly request that you ensure your staff are following the recipes and preparation standards that make Chatime so well-loved.

Thank you for taking the time to address this matter. I look forward to enjoying better experiences in the future.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kathy Chow","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWddTeAuazMJInNjb2HsiotRZJFsPy-OuiLxKXlV9XR9EJ53Clw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had a fantastic experience at Broadway Chatime! Alex's warm welcome added to the pleasant atmosphere. The staff's friendliness and the delicious drinks make it a must-visit spot. A well deserved 5- star review!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNWXcAgbF_utuCHksrv95ehHUA77IZonNXvX1Nd&fid=0x0:0x25545696b710b4c2"],"When":"2023-11-12"},{"Name":"Alan Cheng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVKoShggvBpcuAkAu7S_U37mkl6ymrFC9M8qUSstBI7uS4mNqlSVg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our visit to Chatime at Broadway was truly delightful! I indulged in the signature milk tea, while my coworkers savored the Mango QQ and Mango Juice with Pearls and Coconut. Every sip was bursting with flavor, and the tapioca pearls added an extra dimension of delight. The friendly service and welcoming ambiance made our experience even more enjoyable. If you're in the mood for delicious and refreshing beverages, Chatime is the place to go! Highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNs0PDSoJvJRf2siiaV51qOZ9LMV2B4WtIdgfPE&fid=0x0:0x25545696b710b4c2"],"When":"2024-2-27"},{"Name":"Ads","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVwDyuvQtXP_VygmU1rNXhUJ0mc48E4h1QtDkdEfrlXmuS-mYhL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Pretty sweet BBT!
I love Chatime, a great franchise with super yummy drinks menu with plenty of variety and the best part is they offer diary free milk alternatives! (Oat at this store)
Very friendly staff here with great efficient service. As always, a nice cozy joint with modern, clean and minimalistic aesthetics and furniture. I think surely this long after COVID, they should be looking to allow indoor seating now surely?
I got a Matcha Smoothie with Sago and Passion Fruit Jelly, discovered my new go-to topping in Sago, super yum!
My only request for Chatime would be to start offering Red Bean toppings as I always get matcha and Red Bean is the ultimate one-two punch to my matcha fix!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMNiK5pduut_k0l4uwjgs_gVEKypH6qgvrDU0-Q&fid=0x0:0x25545696b710b4c2"],"When":"2022-1-23"},{"Name":"shivam garg","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVqwcEM1BiqXjr-zeOy8Wvcvq2Y87wYkAidpyVlkBzOL67Ke2A4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This store owner Alex is very kind man. He really went above and beyond for a pickup order. Some dude stole a very expensive order and the store made it twice while getting paid only once.
He even offered me a free drink. I have not seen such a generous and loving person in vancouver for a long time.
Really appreciate you brother, take care.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Beth Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUglsmF-XfB2p6YnhxHme4HyxNrG4EOMdbK7L9IhWisng6dG008=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"They always run out pearls everytime i visit. I wonder if this is bubble tea place. Staffs have bad customer service.  They don't open on time what Google work hour. This didn't happend all at once. I am leaving this review after I've been visiting multiple times here.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lexx Lungull","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUMZy3E1XzGfEFEoPAiostFFciOlRIfZtGxhXtnRn1PpKPfJqY=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best Chatime in the city.

The service is great, the workers are always friendly and, quick with getting my order ready for me!

I would definitely recommend coming to this location!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"G Mahal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLvFTkSDtLGjzny_XtQktfw-44IAXLf84UZSEI-EBqWZvF6hA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a nice family owned Boba place. The atmosphere inside was so cute. There was wonderful art on the walls and a cute little wall of greenery for photo ops. The girl who took my order was super friendly and kind, and it seemed like the man making the drinks was her father (but I didn’t ask). I ordered the mango sago and it tasted great along with the 4 other drinks I got my family members. We will definitely be back again 😊","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOvK6toYBZQtvFWnbNCQYUZOLUmj-0tFVykJOA3&fid=0x0:0xbf2ab07439e0e9ed"],"When":"2024-6-9"},{"Name":"Philip Raymond Lim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5EIBAgpBLsauhPMdjXym7mJ4fA8mtryDtWQIJCZfJxYXxupU8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"It’s like 3.5 * for me. This place is pretty much average. Had a boba milk tea and Oreo shake. I don’t see the value of driving back here again as it’s quite far from my place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNGZpKMb7QCoZf3HpMceyiI-MUdMGe4D2SG33_M&fid=0x0:0xbf2ab07439e0e9ed"],"When":"2024-10-18"},{"Name":"Sindhura Vani Koduri","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXwgJ1E29ykg5-DTPEKmW08UpJazylTRes3YPcgsB1HF5F58y6D=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I found this is best and economical. I just loved the cream cold brew monster. Here they’ll add both pearls and jelly’s and taste lasts for long. They deliver it within 10mins after placing the order.  Car parking is not available infront of the store as bus terminal is right infront it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOAuTcxz_v3_1buADS1WRH_Vsq_T2Y_nm26GXXu&fid=0x0:0xbf2ab07439e0e9ed"],"When":"2023-4-8"},{"Name":"Frankie Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKSLibH64K1eD7GG9OpDraparNa0B3N4Z4PBefTBcWTJ-VgoQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Super friendly and delicious BBT. The owner Sun is really nice. I really like their Hokkaido milk tea with grass jelly. The mango sago is a wonderful summer dessert in a cup. Totally recommend.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Asia Chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUMgt1eRqzFMluSr1SNCNzIbWExgyU1b11eO0CVOwxzLzi5lyOs=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Really mediocre bubble tea place. Not much tea flavour and very sweet even though it was 50% - enough to give me a sugar headache. The interior was quite messy with lots of boxes just laying around. Not sure if they do better with their fruit drinks but their house special - Boba Monster Milk Tea was not it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPmxz8PuUfnnXTybgXXJYd6qCQdz7RzwHLpoQhx&fid=0x0:0xbf2ab07439e0e9ed"],"When":"2024-4-7"},{"Name":"Ads","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVwDyuvQtXP_VygmU1rNXhUJ0mc48E4h1QtDkdEfrlXmuS-mYhL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A super quaint and cute bubble tea joint with a real homey, down to earth and locally ran vibe. This place offers a relaxed and chilled out place to slurp and enjoy your BBT at your leisurely comfort.
I got a Matcha Slush with Sago which tasted awesome, super yummy and tasted like a good strong grade of matcha with a real authentic flavor. Paired with trying with Sago for the first time, did not disappoint! This joint has one of the best, creative and gnarliest looking bubble tea menus I have seen out of Vancouver, as well as the fact they offer multiple non-dairy fresh milk alternatives made it a must for me. This place is rad and I will definitely be revisiting and wouldn't hesitate to recommend! Drink prices with size are also well competitive compared to other businesses.
They also have a loyalty rewards so worth signing up in hopes of some free boba!
Please try bring/use your own reusable boba straw to help cut down on single-use plastic to help save our beautiful planet.
Support local businesses!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipODo1A7c9c2agmfKBsJ5YbEkNW-Svh-PAgnMlAF&fid=0x0:0xbf2ab07439e0e9ed"],"When":"2022-1-11"},{"Name":"Nachi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXQjPUt3VfAKQw9Gkb8nf6jQ0Vu_n6-VPH7bizj-1QFLkSagw1J=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Although atm it seems a bit cluttered with the boxes at the corner, don’t ignore the fact the bubble tea is amazing here! I am quite pick with my bbt since prices have gone crazy expensive, but this place had reasonable prices. As for the flavour itself, you can have an option to customize it yourself! I got myself a slush taro with no toppings and it definitely hit the spot. Not too sweet nor too milky! The next time I come back I would like to try other drinks. that are on display :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMugb1yvg3hUtej5FLsIVXPDKyAv3JvPLQMgtP2&fid=0x0:0xbf2ab07439e0e9ed"],"When":"2024-5-10"},{"Name":"Miss Asia Canada Vancouver, BC Patty C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUVvGXqNWoYaCyfXFYAejHk320OBSpPOuBn3M8eruqJH-qPLIRx=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I was just walking about and saw this bubble tea place. I got the matcha and regular milk tea with pearls. It was pretty refreshing and the usual taste of what bubble tea should taste like. I did like that the matcha came with whip cream on top. That finishing touch made it seem more original compared to other places I've been. The seating area is quite small so there isn't much room to sit and I did see some shelves with board games and cards but it looked like someone had raided it as it was strewn all over. -- Definitely not an area you'd want to play games in. I wouldn't mind coming here again if I am in the area however to pick up the tea.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO-v_SeT635ONjUBEiWvSU15RvPax-KEMfX4oDP&fid=0x0:0xbf2ab07439e0e9ed"],"When":"2023-8-27"}]

title: Sharetea UBC
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"highlights","name":"Highlights","options":[{"name":"Great tea selection","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible washroom","enabled":true}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Anya","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX55iUXJ4bcYecYgVMaFXZD8TXtdUhK1-WPf-TY-EVD-OkIhGRj=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Sharetea UBC makes pretty good boba, but there is room for improvement in terms of service. It took 20 minutes for two staff to make only two teas, and there was nobody else in line. Seemingly, there weren't online orders they were working on, either; the delay was really confusing. I got the wintermelon half sugar with boba, and my friend got brown sugar with boba. Both were delicious, and the boba was great in texture. It's a decent spot to get a bubble tea on campus if you're not in a rush!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPo5nLWvlstYyHL_EwRqj8fGunA4YvR_cyHUXpN&fid=0x0:0x706f1e599f8463a8"],"When":"2024-8-29"},{"Name":"Madhawa Dhasanayaka","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWYGCUJvy1u-WFY6bfAvJmUDj3j4Ei0hF57SRiactGWxVFGBkdG=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Sharetea Bubble Drink at UBC: A Tantalizing Bubble Tea Experience

If you're a bubble tea enthusiast like me, then Sharetea Bubble Drink at the University of British Columbia is an absolute must-visit. From its clean and modern ambiance to the wide array of delectable beverage options, this place has firmly secured its spot as one of my favorite spots on campus.

Upon stepping into Sharetea, you're greeted with a vibrant atmosphere that effortlessly blends contemporary aesthetics with an inviting charm. The place is always bustling with activity, a testament to its popularity among students and tea aficionados alike. Despite the constant influx of customers, the staff here is remarkably efficient, working diligently to serve you your coveted cup of bubble tea in a timely manner.

While there might be instances where you find yourself waiting for a brief period, the tantalizing drinks that await you are certainly worth the patience. Sharetea boasts an extensive menu that will leave you spoiled for choice. Whether you're in the mood for a classic milk tea or seeking a burst of fruity flavors with a vibrant fruit tea, this place has it all. Each drink is crafted with care and precision, ensuring a delightful and refreshing experience with every sip.

What sets Sharetea apart is its commitment to quality. Each beverage is meticulously prepared using premium ingredients, resulting in a remarkable balance of flavors. The pearls, or boba, are consistently cooked to perfection, boasting a delightful chewiness that adds a textural element to every sip. Whether you prefer your pearls to be sweet, caramel-infused, or bursting with fruity flavors, Sharetea has got you covered.

While Sharetea focuses solely on beverages, its dedication to perfecting the art of bubble tea shines through. The absence of food options, even as snacks, may seem like a limitation to some, but it only reinforces their commitment to providing an exceptional beverage experience. After all, it's all about the tea here, and Sharetea certainly excels in that regard.

To fellow tea enthusiasts, I cannot recommend Sharetea Bubble Drink at UBC enough. It's a haven for bubble tea lovers, offering a clean and modern space, prompt service, and an array of mouthwatering drink options. So, if you find yourself on campus and craving a delightful bubble tea experience, head over to Sharetea and let your taste buds embark on an extraordinary journey of flavors.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPPnxrML75hCtgIyxLvPFtciYusAAPbYMoAAHP8&fid=0x0:0x706f1e599f8463a8"],"When":"2023-7-13"},{"Name":"Deborah Aiko Insook Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWkrXzRxO3A2OGqiLyPY_PlsYk2B44E-xgPkg6UAgy-1KwY7fkT=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great place for milk tea lover!
I found this place in UBC before and got a chance to sit in!
COVID-19 makes so much different for everythings. I missed sit and sip time.
They keep opend the main door for ventilation.
It was cold but Enjoyable with yummy hot bubble tea named Hokkaido honey milk tea with pearl.. maybe.
Those greeny lovely and transparent chairs are cool. Love it! The staff was friendly and explained well about menu.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOw5wsmapGdPjnNkjlpP8BX1omkVbEw7pjz0qnK&fid=0x0:0x706f1e599f8463a8"],"When":"2021-1-20"},{"Name":"Anna Li","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJsXGHcBwKZ7LzutjdU3JfHu1sY9JHEaxdHCPEavcWWvq1qrCI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The Wintermelon Tea tastes like beef. Don’t order unless you’re vegan and want to taste meat again. Everything else is good, I would recommend the Classic Bubble Tea. The staff are friendly and patient.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNekmQ54c9gCksT9QrFPgWO3MCEy_qfDcuGVXHS&fid=0x0:0x706f1e599f8463a8"],"When":"2023-8-8"},{"Name":"Kiana s","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX_GxZFISX_5n0C9rZ4zbfyU7eK-sTgszmwiet1ZSVqoL-Gtt4Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I ordered mango match tea with pearls…the taste was awful!! Like I was drinking medicine!! And it was pricy! The only thing that I liked was the spot that you can work and study! Otherwise it’s not worthy!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMbPiTupwUSFBeGXNVO_oxDmhPt71aaBKtbzvEA&fid=0x0:0x706f1e599f8463a8"],"When":"2023-5-11"},{"Name":"T Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKdvbh0bNj4D0S4JOT3PpDBSQStiyf41cRaQTOVpvUVdYmsIw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Both two person work there were very friendly. However, we waited for nearly 15 minutes to get our order. Our milk tea didn’t taste as good as we had hoped, and they were watery.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMLf5oJC9762Bg5jDg6VXjeE12aiobTif6YzSfq&fid=0x0:0x706f1e599f8463a8"],"When":"2021-9-26"},{"Name":"w","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVECjtzjKwGGU2yagM5sH2sMNpUPFv0VdGQBZqvehtzvpFlyVDi=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Good drinks, recommend the peach slush with lychee jelly. Nice atmosphere. Friendly staff. A little on the pricier side.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMyjmb8mMtnHTYegBTqc4UQRB6ACtYtiw2Vzqiy&fid=0x0:0x706f1e599f8463a8"],"When":"2022-12-6"},{"Name":"Yang William","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJx3Zwq88wQ7uhMTvOovjs2Weq1xAQwd1T8wKsieTXd12EF=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Asked for less pearls. But 1/3 of the bottle is pearls. And I asked for half sugar. But it is so freaking sweet. I doubt it is half sugar. Because it is my go to drink at share tea. It is NOT half sugar. I always leave a note to my order for less pearls. 1/5 times they can remember that. Please teach your staff what is half sugar.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOfckq9r5frDnESY8wxQ7XJ0EUjwb77Ps7M8qQ&fid=0x0:0x706f1e599f8463a8"],"When":"2021-4-20"}]

[{"Name":"mickey grace","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW2koY7ZFfBdWpziRjPP5TFVjsrz4r1zt6MPtsM4mBH9nhU6uE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"There were a lot of people at the time, but the food was served quickly and tasted better than I expected! The staff were friendly, the portions generous, and it reminded me of home. Highly recommended! I would love to visit again!"","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO0hqq4SC8chLs-fB8kpMAnqapJBr3cPr2UouNb&fid=0x0:0x75d3ada8db9b9434"],"When":"2024-8-10"},{"Name":"J V","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIXubf4BA64V16YiH2FLbFkz0cA-ymFySyrMyQMYlXsSONYar4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food:  The Rose Milk Tea and the Chicken Nuggets on Rice were very good, juicy, and fresh.  They were delicious.

Service:  the staff was super friendly and nice.  The person read my mind and gave me the bill right away.

Atmosphere:  the restaurant had a modern decor.  Very spacey and comfortable.  A minor one:  I thought the table can be a tiny bit cleaner.  Overall, it’s a relaxing place to enjoy a meal.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMAZNvavBitPZol4xAn2EW6MMziQ-_VOqmAuYe5&fid=0x0:0x75d3ada8db9b9434"],"When":"2023-11-12"},{"Name":"JONAH GUTIERREZ","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXDJwsIZcuDpklb2lVoiSHQ3b7_XVq-kzor7O41ogu-0WkvLRqB=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I've ordered seafoods kimchi and tofu hotpot but they gave me a bowl of noodles with pork. I really want to give them a very bad review but the girl who served me is extra nice. I just hope they'll be mindful of their costumer's order next time. I don't eat pork, just really sad.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOQvLfA98x1jx3ujuF7pYCk1XRCXx0JSuiRKxE&fid=0x0:0x75d3ada8db9b9434"],"When":"2023-6-24"},{"Name":"Sofia Ramírez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW5Gv7GhQKTr6wIjsWDgsoxRB5sy8n2zAZsaCjVl9YxsZj8o9GFeA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ferrero milkshake and they also sell food, not only bubble tea. This store is great. If you see this on a business way, this idea is better than Starbucks, drink, plus food , plus wifi, plus good location.
I loved it","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMitaibHCWIPfygQ_5aYhnf3WcKEwZIehoCKatw&fid=0x0:0x75d3ada8db9b9434"],"When":"2024-4-30"},{"Name":"Sarah Ho","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKe0APUXV93EJQca1UpRUMwngl2-lSt01aqybSz84a0JT9R9dEW=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Ordered takeout from here through door dash and on the whole really enjoyed the food. We had Braised Ground Pork in Dry Noodles, Braised Beef Noodles with Soup  Fried Rice with Chicken Nuggets, Deep Fried Fish Cake and Wonton in Chilli Sauce. I really enjoyed all the mains which were tasty and arrived piping hot. The fish cake was a bit soggy and not my favorite though still tasty and the wonton was just in a chilli oil rather than an actual sauce like I'm used to. I think it may have been my husband's first time he had Taiwanese food but he was blown away by all the flavors. I'll definitely order again from here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP_rdHL5JvVHoK_N7tlp-E_Dn5-EEO5jZxsqUXD&fid=0x0:0x75d3ada8db9b9434"],"When":"2021-11-26"},{"Name":"Simran Kaur","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU8ILWpRNeXGYCVSODIG3nTCRBlxFnf26BAMx24kaLkmFG9uTPU9A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is my all time go to place since the location is easily accessible from transit. I consider stopping by after work/school after a rough day. Good service and affordable yet yummy food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOohBphWszUmsDkaVFY0GPIcNVczzdcbKbh47AN&fid=0x0:0x75d3ada8db9b9434"],"When":"2023-2-26"},{"Name":"Fox Winlock","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIUXAJ_U7YSM_Ywasu0W86kzahBA8FqafORdPpVgzgSi0x-GA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"A wonton soup with 3 soggy wontons. Filling was miniscule. Like a seriously tiny amount of meat filling, noodle wrapping literally falling apart. Bland broth filled with sloppy soggy lettuce/cabbage to give the illusion of being more than just tasteless broth and tiny, gross wontons.

General tsos chicken that tasted like western family frozen from the grocery store. This is not worth 20+ dollars. Seriously what the crap is this?

Won't order again. Can't believe I paid 40 dollars for this trash. Should have cheked the reviews here first.

What a disappointment of 'food'. Save your time, stay away. In an area with so much choice for Asian food, spend your money on something good. Or passable or even just okay. This is none of those.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"hf Tsui","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV9xTKZmfnh-XclN78dqRTs_xaWhMEitHXFTfVULprsEwaO2dHjuA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The three-cup chicken here was disappointing.  Traditionally three-cup chicken must have sesame-oil and basil leaves fried with garlic.
However there's none, the friend ain't deep-fried with skin, and mostly importantly the sauce was too salty.
I was disappointed for this price with such quality.

Fried chicken is ok.","Images":null,"When":""}]

I had the Taro Creamy, which tasted just like how it sound:  whipped cream inside the drink and on top to make the drink extra creamy that melts in your mouth. There’s also a mini flower wall by the window which is great for pictures, although the downtown Robson location has a larger flower wall. Very friendly staff as well.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO8pbezuOU9vyI094TIU3mAyFsoPrXaRkNC04Qw&fid=0x0:0x74bd107564d0fb66"],"When":"2020-10-29"},{"Name":"E. yan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbpcnN8fJHzAPQ3FFmYM1RRxeN1TvUXbo_qz6b3sU2S83bjms=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The interiors are really nice here and their fruit teas are fantastic. The teas are blended fresh and taste as much. The take out packaging was very secure with a cup holder inside a paper bag. We got the strawberry princess and grapefruit jasmine green tea. The pearls also have a very satisfying brown sugar taste. 5/5 for the packaging, freshness, and taste.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"super trash compactor","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIqO0aVm1QpNb0tPCtP5KHXeMvjHmRJPIAhcVpAAYzqSx1w2g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Told them we were lactose intolerant and they said they have almond or soy milk (yay!) but they recommended the dirty boba. Not knowing what is in there we went ahead with their recommendation and specified we wanted almond milk.
Firstly it's supposed to be creme brule, which it wasn't.
Secondly it tastes like milk.
Thirdly they put cream in it!
So a trip the bathroom later we won't be coming back here.
Other than that yeah their nothing special and not worth the price.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"R L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWEEdWb0Ylc6NNxuSdXn8slOyXa12QmizNShug2C9qxvRk1DiE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"went there because of dealuse ad, I went in and the only store clerk just remained seated and was eating her food. I called her and she got up, without putting her mask back up and told me their dealuse machine isn't working, and told me to buy the coupon from another platform, she said all these while chewing her food. As a customer, I felt disgusted, and as a businessman, I felt bad for dealuse. I'm glad that I wasn't able to buy a drink that day, probably would have gotten sick","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nicole Liang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLqYMMVZLkCtNyUqU-RttrHScct11FPAKPMbUBzMlQm-4_I=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I buy coupon from dealuse.com. I visited three times within 7 days.
First time(06/10): server said the system has not set up yet, they cannot scan coupon. Second time(06/14): store closed on Monday ( my bad, I did not check store business time. Third times(06/16,1:00 Pm): STORE CLOSED( NO REASON, business time posted outside door  is 12:00PM -6:45PM). I cannot believe your store is so so so special. I DO NOT RECOMMAND TO MY colleague and my friend.  I am prefer to go to CHUN FUN HOW. At least the store is open according to google.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Yuen Tso","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLGxQe3CGkaLkRsj4mn2zb12RFye96G7s1qoZk2obkll8HdPJM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"refreshing fruit tea","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOaA0EavXHDbyFD6Xz4-p2WVbSgCm4cl1QrUeXa&fid=0x0:0x74bd107564d0fb66"],"When":"2021-2-5"},{"Name":"Jim ST","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXUiuSF5HfAepfnO5grGc3WGFcI3PLjOFi0BLNhgwfeHeG6qpEo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"服务超级好 super nice，也很好喝。","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"kevin Luo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLeJMWYS7PxNny1EwxOj4bJQcWnv8gjVya9fjsIcJ9JU0fOIg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"","Images":null,"When":""}]

[{"Name":"Kal H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWg0T9Dm25DyoGPq0klBDFGunO6KyhuEtE0HxE6FHqy7DOxmZEJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"After my dental appointment (irony here) I walked past and made a mental note next time I was downtown I’d try their stunning looking croissants.

I did just that. I bought the Pistachio-Raspberry croissant. It was beyond excellent! It was so good, I wish I had bought more than just one!
The croissant is expertly crafted, the combination of flavours sublime and not sickly sweet as things are in North America. Super light buttery croissant and I cannot wait to return to Angus T Bakery Cafe.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMYgfBBHb8ehbsK1L9xDkA74wXseJYcTZ4y_Heh&fid=0x0:0xcace748450213ef9"],"When":"2024-10-25"},{"Name":"Hornson C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVmdCOdf2WkxshuYZj4HJ9-vQ7jEjZprqyHTmAPfOUXSG3SYvc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"《 🥐 BUTTERY FLAKY GOODNESS 🥐 》

- earl grey croissant = $6.25 -
- matcha croissant = $6.25 -

I had been talking about Angus T Bakery's croissants for the longest time. Imagine my surprise when I got home one night and saw a box waiting on the kitchen counter.

These croissants were amazing. I definitely see why they're so popular! Even after sitting for a few hours, the croissants were still super flaky and soft. The matcha and earl grey flavours were strong, but not too sweet. 🍵I gotta go back soon and try out the rest of their menu!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPn3rSp_Hbo3spPhJtqjwipoAWsHOK3UCTPY-aW&fid=0x0:0xcace748450213ef9"],"When":"2024-10-29"},{"Name":"Danilo Teodoro","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU_rV4_xok36vIezJ6uAhpzSfyECA8ogmjA4ehyXVTr4dBqIAFv=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A great variety of croissants, the ones I tried were all good! Coffee was good. There are not many tables inside. After having breakfast here we took a walk around the neighborhood, which was quite entertaining.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMT6uiBKj_E0l2D9MSPelaeIkSYGJYHkntPesRz&fid=0x0:0xcace748450213ef9"],"When":"2024-10-12"},{"Name":"Anj S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXqc6Qk6ZPVGaDCNS9MIwNWBRPHLg6ObcnkgbolZEp2_WZQOFbRXg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Pros: the best croissants - flaky, buttery, perfect lamination, really fresh, lovely ambience and service, lots of flavorful varieties. Probably the best I’ve had outside of a little shop in Paris.
Cons/considerations: on the pricier side, two croissants and a coffee were close to 20 bucks","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM9inOHlwgcluY4g53njTKFEzuPuWNajMu2HHpA&fid=0x0:0xcace748450213ef9"],"When":"2024-9-22"},{"Name":"AmirAli","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUGi954Mvdi227xfnBWYHOekvcs6FpJwO3pcbHf2GhDrd3_BYKY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The best croissant in town is right here at Angus T Bakery & Café! Oh my god, it’s absolutely incredible—flaky, buttery, and perfection in every bite. A must-visit for pastry lovers!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNlFR4P7XpW6XwkPP5CvzMnYjymlEs_d9z5dr9u&fid=0x0:0xcace748450213ef9"],"When":"2024-12-22"},{"Name":"A. H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI_CLrJdgEfyKwQ6HHs46Odi_BxrF8EYRX4QUMbcSTXgwhjwg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I discovered this place on the first day I went to Vancouver for a short trip, and have been back every day until I left. This is how good this place is.

They have a variety of sweet and savoury pastries, and everything I have tried was excellent (pistachio, dark chocolate raspberry, three cheese, tuna and corn, chicken and sundried tomatoes, double baked almond).

The service is top notch, the manager (Justin) and the staff are excellent and friendly, and despite the fact that they get busy in the mornings, I was served promptly every time. Even the packaging for takeout orders is done purposely to preserve the pastries (excellent attention to detail). Every team member I have dealt with was great and knowledgable and was able to answer any question I had about the different flavours and ingredients.

Whatever management is doing there is working because everything from product to service to the whole experience was outstanding. My only regret is that I live thousands of kilometres away and won't be able to enjoy their delicious croissants until I am back in Vancouver.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNYYS4nOE997kiUtqMboKUIjFbxGJbGiYIv8J84&fid=0x0:0xcace748450213ef9"],"When":"2024-7-16"},{"Name":"王亭","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUH30bH86c6O2TsUgYmY-PCJYcPOhyaIWT9HsqrEqmWiSrYWJsV=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The raspberry pistachio croissant is the best croissant I’ve ever eaten. And the barista Anita is so nice! We really enjoyed a good morning there. ❤️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP19CeEl498RAA91ypSaVEiGVSyTLxLFcfUqk8N&fid=0x0:0xcace748450213ef9"],"When":"2024-10-24"},{"Name":"Mahsa Haghjoo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXRSnT0Wip7Pbg6Z8m0cglGHkWd61YfkTkUIlG6b0IkPWIUcJi2=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our go to place for the past two years. Croissants here are super delicious . Hands down one of the best in Vancouver. Their latte and matcha also taste great too. Must try this and as a bonus they have a card you can stamp it and get a free bakery item after 12 purchases .","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN-UYnIGmK28yMn10cC--pS_GOJUh5dz8I2YTAq&fid=0x0:0xcace748450213ef9"],"When":"2024-9-26"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Larry YVR","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXuTv093wbMx-W_HREHfZgp4qwBRPVQElu44Abax3eT7gG680u3=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently revisited this cafe and had a good experience! I ordered an ice Americano and a cinnamon bun with lemon cream cheese icing—both were absolutely delicious. The coffee was perfectly roasted to my liking, and the cinnamon bun was a delightful blend of sweet and tangy flavours with cream cheese icing.

The staff were incredibly friendly and welcoming, making the visit even more enjoyable. The atmosphere was relaxing, perfect for unwinding or catching up with friends. The display of tempting sweets was irresistible, as you can see in my video. I can't wait to come back and try some of the savory options next time!

Highly recommend this spot for a wonderful cafe experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO4R9_bLtYMb1kSQyAzgm_m-186FaTTYx1OYUY3&fid=0x0:0x139f115321274627"],"When":"2024-7-20"},{"Name":"Mighty Brown Mouse","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKGIuoP6N4PQ_e2zFBpnqnYEqrEdrV1E8AjuNUPBegdeehijQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Located in a cavernous converted warehouse, Small Victory serves beautiful beautiful Melbourne style coffee (what more can I ask??) and have great choice of pastries.

Love the fitout, the atmosphere and most important of all the coffee!!! It ticks all the right boxes!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPXI0RQN1PItyj_-vPND1N1M0ea11nHei6e8qDV&fid=0x0:0x139f115321274627"],"When":"2024-10-19"},{"Name":"Lorain Miranda","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW3ZRSaUsyTt1j-_ISQneay-whGb8LKAlPof8HGQ983-2_CmBjW9w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Pastries, cakes especially the coffee are superb, worth every 💲! Staff are so accommodating and attentive, special mention to their manager Isay who works non stop at the store and makes sure everything is in order! Deyna - you are amazing, thanks for making sure we are okay!

All in all - definitely a must try and should be at the list of your favorites!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP3gZX544wKD1IRZjO0zBFmEkL0RETbwn6jrOb_&fid=0x0:0x139f115321274627"],"When":"2024-11-11"},{"Name":"Alireza Mahdian","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW0UiNNVRyZjtmU8TuMFZWagjDEpOucA4a-KVpCiuYYILJ-rcBw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Small Victory Bakery is a cozy spot with good coffee and a comfortable vibe, perfect for a quick break. The coffee is well-prepared, making it a reliable choice for caffeine lovers. As for the pastries, they’re acceptable—fresh and tasty, though they may not stand out as extraordinary. Overall, it’s a pleasant place to relax and enjoy a decent coffee and snack.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPobX6dmO0DozGWiNH3kUggL8DhhBL1jTy_w1Po&fid=0x0:0x139f115321274627"],"When":"2024-11-1"},{"Name":"Maria Laura Guarnieri Brasi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUOLjtY_F5UTE_NIOSPetIP31U3BU0O-5xQJouylgxDhGd2Xmk=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I went to this place after an instagram recommendation and I can definitely say that I’m happy with my decision. They have a big space, with a nice environment. The food was really delicious, I got a quiche and was absolutely fantastic. My boyfriend had an avocado and mascarpone toast and he says was one of the best he ever had. For coffee we had biscoff latte and a mocha, both are a must try, but biscoff had my heart.
Would definitely recommend this place! :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPGUDl1pFe8pW9jBEkgSbCTkDDu0wMJN7yT4eHH&fid=0x0:0x139f115321274627"],"When":"2024-11-4"},{"Name":"Aria Bak","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW_R9J8OWkuW2gky6kqyST6LCrnDbnnamwQqIu-e9d9NKg_MGrgUg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I've been a regular here for a long time, and I really appreciate the quality of their croissants and baguettes. Though it is not always consistent. In general the desserts and pastries have been good.  However, I feel the service could be improved. Since it's a self-service setup, tipping might not feel essential. Additionally, while the quality is great, prices are on the higher side.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"brittany robbins","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLXvEJtgGI9SkncmLSzi--8GYC_M5_19_8lNFYel5kb2KKI4A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This café is adorable inside. Love the seating area. My favourite is the almond croissant heated. Lots of great drinks including London fog tea latte. The lemon tart was also amazing. Would definitely suggest checking this place out if you haven’t.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOswrLEtwDxtD40am1lJHmH5f7gI-bmQEeDKF3k&fid=0x0:0x139f115321274627"],"When":"2024-6-26"},{"Name":"Lucy Willder","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKv_vLVYhmcdpNXLcjW5knQ9eBcL4VoqGWcIcoVAY-4-P2cxg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We visited Small Victory Bakery in June.  We chose the Croissant Donut with Pistachio Cream.  The pasty was divine and donut oozed with the light pistachio filling .  This matched perfectly with the refreshing strawberry lemonade.  My husband thoroughly enjoyed his coffee too.

I also spotted people eating sandwiches, which looked pretty amazing too.

From this visit, I would highly recommend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMX8587E661dO72__P7vFiP7Z4_F6DCs4htZGIP&fid=0x0:0x139f115321274627"],"When":"2023-9-5"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Marcus Hantla","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXwI4ZAS_JiQ5mXHk8uNlkSA6yWACFO4MfAwwYDczv9PSuaSOUc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"High tea at Ladurée in Vancouver was an absolutely magical experience! From the moment we stepped into the elegant, Parisian-inspired salon, we felt transported to a world of sophistication and charm. The attention to detail was impeccable—from the beautifully presented tiered trays of delicate pastries and finger sandwiches to the fragrant teas served in exquisite china. Every bite was a masterpiece, especially their signature macarons, which melted in our mouths with a perfect balance of texture and flavor. The staff was warm, attentive, and made us feel pampered throughout. It’s the perfect place for a luxurious afternoon escape. Five stars!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPV98KYSMHO6LEgGLhAjgUHjPg1h0fxvpk4dp2Z&fid=0x0:0x3d85f06925a755bb"],"When":"2024-12-20"},{"Name":"Stephen Khouri","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW5UawlGtA9rWBFK0r-VX3nz6V0UG7OH6l4ktt4nYw7u_NTVx0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Enjoyed afternoon tea for two.  The Melange Special was well balanced and perfect with chocolate and fruit with cream.  The Jardin Bleu Royale was delicately fruity and perfect with the fruit/rose desserts.

The Eugenie were fantastic.  I was disappointed that they had sold out of the pistachio.  My favorite was the Marie Antoinette.  Be warned the Rose is very forward so only get it if you really like that flavour.  I did.

The madeleines were Dickens-ian.  One was dry and slightly stale.  The other was moist and fresh.

The vol-au-vents were excellent, but I found the blue cheese too salty.  The tarts were very well executed with perfect structure and appearance but would have preferred a bit more richness in the shell.

The ispahan was delicious, as was the noire.  The service was great, and the atmosphere perhaps a bit over-curated but nice.  The cutlery and tableware were perfect.

Expensive, but I would recommend a single visit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPi_ViSG6uEY1myoMwBgnK4WpLDsn98w1IjYmOY&fid=0x0:0x3d85f06925a755bb"],"When":"2024-11-23"},{"Name":"John Coleman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ0NKBQAsVCjOX8qUTBKPnMOPQvMKorrIK6TBsU7EQNtedVMfk_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Dreamy macaron and tea salon. Thought I walked into England. Very friendly staff and delicious macarons, especially the ice cream macaron options!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNiCgcrQqz6u_q9Sly_xl76j3ukhnlQXinNPZeW&fid=0x0:0x3d85f06925a755bb"],"When":"2024-10-20"},{"Name":"Yui K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUp3HCV4DpRLjcnqAeASD3s3A4WGKgCnNbyVQ4WVfzXV-fapuB-FA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"They offer a wide variety of macarons and beautifully crafted cakes that are as delicious as they are pretty. The elegant atmosphere makes it the perfect spot for a sweet treat or a relaxing afternoon. A must-visit for dessert lovers!

#ContestEntry","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMW7sppDWNAvKiD-Fi6pSBetUfMwSnLH0UhNshe&fid=0x0:0x3d85f06925a755bb"],"When":"2024-11-24"},{"Name":"Ohr Thgil","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLN2i4qCmXPoC9W5_zouVHNlKbN4SGyK6orGgQY-tDPsxtYPQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Visually beautiful, but very overpriced, even when accounting for its location (smack dab in the middle of downtown), especially considering the quality.

First, the price: $22+ for a mille feuille and 2 macarons. Plus they want tip before you're even seated... it's strange (isn't tip defined as payment for waiting/service?)
I get this is an Instagram hot place and the "best place to get gifts for your significant other", but the cost nears extortion.

Second, the flavour: The Marie Antoinette macaron lacked taste. Could be because the rose macaron was extremely sweet and made the other macaron taste relatively bland.
The mille feuille must have been out for a while because it was soggy and almost warm.

Third, the atmosphere: Out of the many empty tables including the ones close to the counter, we were seated right by the washroom (...thanks?). The cutlery and plates were dirty (or perhaps they were going for an antique theme), and not once did any of the staff come to check if everything was ok (but perhaps they don't do that to any customers).

Overall 2 stars because I reserve 1 stars for truly repulsive places. This one was just subpar. Twas a good first and last experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOs-u3OKstmGCm_jv516JgAbW83HGZwoGF_5Hod&fid=0x0:0x3d85f06925a755bb"],"When":"2024-10-4"},{"Name":"Juliana Cesaro","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXkdrIeKJYHH922AjIX16zC5EbNa_9dxwemvHzY_MSTEqYU92Y=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love the macaron here, rose and Marie Antoinette being my favourite flavor. But I mostly go for the Rose ice cream. They seem to do that flavor better than any other place and I’ve tried in the world.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMVMeAQxWiIU8dGaXguFd-p7_VK9gsWdCDLnFUl&fid=0x0:0x3d85f06925a755bb"],"When":"2024-9-24"},{"Name":"Bon Bahar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVYxxmNBMITdTodddc7qtpvtfgOqgeiqQs8kgnCKdfy963lA74=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Cute little Parisian style café on Robson st. Asked for an Oat Latte and Almond Latte but it all arrived separately? Lol! Had to pour the almond into the coffee cup myself. Never had that before?? The chocolate croissants were super delicious, soft on the outside and not too much chocolate inside. Just perfect! Exactly what it tasted like in Paris! The girls serving us seemed kinda stressed. Maybe short staffed but not many customers. Anyway they did do their best. Beautiful Parisian atmosphere and cute seatings outside also!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMl7t1Lr2pRuY2E60l87CcFmrMlAA5mXFe--Og&fid=0x0:0x3d85f06925a755bb"],"When":"2024-5-2"},{"Name":"Luna Roberts","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXFdREthGNUa7V7aHSTTmFamtLO8USwafpCoRYFmsW6aPM0iyM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The vibes. The fancy, cute, quaint atmosphere. The delicious, delicate pastries. While pricy, it was a fun experience, to sip expensive coffee and try different macaron flavours.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOLwwtRLY6SSObzjtinZGAy12lvuIiDUSbYS6vx&fid=0x0:0x3d85f06925a755bb"],"When":"2024-7-6"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Robert Monroe","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWg9DGuuqs1J12VHJ2upNOFXp1UusbARxPCrTtQ7yFMcG1BAls=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our favourite bubble tea place downtown. The staff are kind and friendly. The selection is highly varied, and substitutions are possible based on allergy or preference. They also have a loyalty card system so you can save up stamps to eventually get a free bubble tea!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Gabriel C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUu8OeUarJaPOMHbrOjB4FX58EsefXHkZGBeafjTsuN3yCQzDc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love this place! Found out they were open from Angus T. Loved the mojito and I come back for that Hawaii punch. Staff are so friendly and kind. Clean and fresh store. They are so thoughtful as I'm usually carrying a bunch of stuff in my hands and always offer bags and or help. Not only is sharetea my favourite brand. This is by far my favourite store in all of Vancouver and surrounding areas.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO8M49nlnjlz0Fxw0BA_YWjSqfbFaq6aZ1ZbcUx&fid=0x0:0x45c158a3588cf158"],"When":"2021-11-6"},{"Name":"Diane (Dineoutwithdee)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVJfHVJSjIKAcPEXNIfUcWAtOeYHaXavqJYPtVJZ3lhCbCbpeo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had a nice first visit at this new ShareTea location. The 2 staff that I spoke with were very kind and friendly. The space is small but cute! I enjoyed my Okinawa milk tea with pearls and am glad that another ShareTea has opened near me, especially since the one on Seymour has been closed for quite some time.

If you’re in Yaletown area and in search of bubble tea, you can check this place out!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMoVf66f1A-MnHtwlJIJySJWQa2WpDllxIHVes2&fid=0x0:0x45c158a3588cf158"],"When":"2022-1-14"},{"Name":"Keshaw K. Sinha","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJDoOPSI2yFkI0sHiu8VOg5OiOXgAwfZLpM7j-53c7OnIWc2sc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love this place for my favorite classic pearl milk tea. Just love the taste.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN4vUo_KZvvl38KJyBrzbeeFuLx5TI_KH9LkopH&fid=0x0:0x45c158a3588cf158"],"When":"2023-3-24"},{"Name":"Run Ride Record","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV9kvYh-hADFfCZ3Qah1zSw0BEaRst6CfDLy0ZfSk2lwFTz3ki4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Congrats on the Grand opening! I got the mango passionfruit with less ice and half sugar.  Very refreshing.  Enjoyed it at nearby False Creek.  ♥️Keep it up!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOdnPIWg5aWWGPTNrtU5uJOrC152TqrpKttidDV&fid=0x0:0x45c158a3588cf158"],"When":"2022-5-24"},{"Name":"Anastasia Zhbannikova","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLwwG7sFgMAfqTEg981gcH_PNnyjw99tEpGL5U8MeCS6Uraew=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Overall, I felt very rushed when I started to order the drink, even though there were no other customers. I was given not what I ordered. Most likely, the worker wanted me to leave faster, so they didn't listen, and by the time I noticed it was too late. The tapioca is tasteless and rubbery, I'm quite disappointed as I usually experience kind staff at this location.
( order 006, 9-nov, 13:42 , classic pearl milk tea) I tried to order the Hokkaido crema tea, I was interrupted multiple times during my order","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Rachel Xie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKmBJQHnp4H3OmPQ8sXTJ66K-xPcBogeYYFx6JVtLVGy_AT3A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First visit. Great experience. I have ordered the classic milk tea with less sugar(50%) and less ice. I’m very pleased with the taste. Most bubble tea places I went to, with the order of less sugar less ice were still too sweet and too much ice. Sharetea Yaletown just made it perfect. I really enjoy my drink.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Henry Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVcTlx45tkivdnVyW4B38kXt4WHZXtLMp6yRttTlIFdf-1gou8R=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good bubble tea! My daughter even got some yummy cookie from the staff!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM8GGe9n2NXbPyeypy-sVflilFJxQV4rg5NA5VP&fid=0x0:0x45c158a3588cf158"],"When":"2023-12-22"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Amy Watt","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXtFx0Lt1_G_UCsXyvg1o5eSDevhehAM8wUiop0lPf09tXNft4k=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I'm not quite sure how I feel about David's Tea. On one hand, I love that it’s a Canadian brand and has become a national favorite. On the other hand, I’m less impressed with the use of ingredients like 'natural flavoring' instead of truly natural, healthy options. They also rely heavily on plastic in their packaging, which could easily be minimized by offering more sustainable alternatives that would still preserve the in-store experience. All in all, I think David's Tea has a lot of potential, but the heavy use of plastic and questionable ingredients show there's still room for improvement.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMmIcOYBaT6iTfEBHB1wRI5aRi3yO_ZS7Xi4QKT&fid=0x0:0xe25f659e39d9789a"],"When":"2024-12-15"},{"Name":"Joey Lam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIncJBLfbVzRO24PRdfxE4-hovZn6C_s4RV_vqsGslULP8YEA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The shop looks bright and clean. It is also beautiful filled with the colors of their products. The staff are very nice and informative. I am always tempted to buy their tea samples and matcha tea bottles. Today, I ordered a hot matcha latte. The staff put a lot of effort into it, see the video. I also liked the flavor as it was not sweetened like Starbucks. However, it was not hot but only lukewarm.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNf4fmrvY5alqjBrpuGwlQdQmcr6W1lx5nLLUqq&fid=0x0:0xe25f659e39d9789a"],"When":"2024-6-27"},{"Name":"The Carters","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJZ0o2xxEcb_g3OF-4-AK0EfZDm5z7TzJCkSrsjhzEnCbrsUg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The staff were excellent at suggesting products for me. Especially Sayda, she helped me from new products, to suggestions, to my favorite products, to checkout. She was patient, knowledgeable, friendly, and professional. I believe she is not only an asset to the company, but a delight to have helping me. I appreciate her kindness and patience. Thank you David’s Tea for having such an amazing staff!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOVwFqFi9qLgTfajdkSA0ce6AyQvJYbrw28YToe&fid=0x0:0xe25f659e39d9789a"],"When":"2024-8-2"},{"Name":"Sasha Proctor","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUQiG0pWdctkCD3bZlE7J3gQ9WtsdNzayo6t6K_2z-OJl5vGFln=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Never again will I buy their tea bags. Each bag is in a plastic wrapping and the tea bag its self is made of plastic. As if we really need more plastic in this world. Plenty of really good tea options out there in paper packaging and biodegradable tea bags.

The tea it’s self is nice.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Aryanne Secara","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKSQsULJaQTI_VLXug0W8WlpBdId2vm4mMbq5RoYWGGcjFggg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"2 stars because I like the tea and products.
But Customer Service is NON EXISTENT.
Do not buy online. Would not recommend and would warn others.
I made an order on Nov 29th..I have had no updates on my order. Had to look into it and FedEx seem so have it. But the order has been stuck since Dec 5th with "Label Created" in Mont Royal, QC.
I reached out to Customer Service through a Shopify Form which I got an automated response "I reached an inbox that is no longer active". So I found another Customer Service Email: forms@davidstea.com and have had no response from them either. So I reached out to their Instagram page and after 3 days, they responded and asked for my order # to forward to Customer Service! What a joke.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Aurora","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWAE7Q3YKdAB0a1ncvRPhh9ctNfKcipnBi86PwCr0uwHxBVB20iaA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love David's tea, specially forever nuts blend. The beverages in the store are really good they let you smell the blends. All the cups and thermos that I bought are amazing, and last a lot. The large bags cost around 35 cad (cost less in Costco) and the small ones they charge me 9 cad each even when it supossed to be less (that is the only problem that I have).","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMD_pPgWu2ZVA0ACoDLobdviYO01WIezZKoTtHx&fid=0x0:0xe25f659e39d9789a"],"When":"2024-1-25"},{"Name":"Jacqueline Cullimore","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXKlnPRH8cwIyO0tDI7b2JbyvIMYvQaXVBDyRqRUXJ448GXIrQ9xw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We absolutely love this DAVIDsTEA for their amazing selection of matcha and their take home drink mixes. The store is always very clean and the staff are always very kind! They craft their teas well and are very knowledgeable about the different kinds on offer. A nice change from the regular coffee places downtown. Recommend!

#contestentry","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Supushpitha Atapattu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIOddZv4IYDeznDp_QWvwmufur_5FOckQlZEOOQ78iERQiUmQDE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Friendly and helpful staff. Decent selection of teas. They give you samples of different varieties to try. It makes selecting that much easier.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipONBWr3auLSfewqgGo8vzlPLlJZXLlu-UJW2Wf2&fid=0x0:0xe25f659e39d9789a"],"When":"2024-8-25"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Kenny Ho","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKlzvF48j-GIh-hwUwWh_vInPHWI2JrtQXPC33F27zyHv_L_Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Spacious and nicely decorated for Holiday season. Good variety of menu options. Food was well prepared.  We had the private (secret bookcase room) excellent for private parties. Would come back again. Parking at hotel lot was easy, across from drop off entrance (suggest using credit card at entrance vs using app).","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMt1eWXT7T3kkRHzMsOdMTbG26qbA3EHRGDCLA&fid=0x0:0x630ef77a3b6e5f20"],"When":"2024-12-24"},{"Name":"Clara Chau","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIoMWRC0cDGP4nCpQ1_Zdm86daXS0A0KJbVAa9QczqqbfD7fWIZ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was mine and my husband's first time at Notch8 for high tea (we came last month but my review wasn't uploading) and we agreed we would love to come again to experience the next theme! I booked our wedding anniversary celebration here and we both had a wonderful time. You enter through a bookcase door and get transported into a beautiful autumn themed room. The food was delicious and very filling. I mentioned to our server that I am pregnant and he made sure the kitchen knew to adjust the items on the menu as needed. The tea selection was great: we ordered the sencha and maple peach to go with our meal. I enjoyed the maple peach the most as the maple lingers on your tongue. The scones were warm and fluffy and the savoury tier was so satisfying. Thank you so much for the cute celebration dessert as well - it made our day extra special!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMmvUIx97gb0H_Y-l3ti2DpcCmtsO03gElHVS6r&fid=0x0:0x630ef77a3b6e5f20"],"When":"2024-10-19"},{"Name":"M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK2J3ao6IJrAbN6i3h_H5455jztzSO8G_T6TPgdOvT3oEXDpg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It is quite challenging to secure a reservation here, as it is always bustling with activity, yet I believe it was truly worth it.
I fell in love with the ambiance and the exquisite design. The hidden door, cleverly disguised as a bookshelf, captivated me with its aura of mystery and intrigue. The charm of the place was undeniable.
The tableware was elegant and refined—precisely the kind of delicate, miniature porcelain I adore. The ceiling evoked a deep sense of nostalgia, transporting me back to my childhood. The frosted patterns of the glass reminded me of the windows in my childhood home, a memory both tender and vivid.
I thoroughly enjoyed the experience. The service was impeccable, attentive, and warm. While the flavors of the food were pleasant, they did not rise to extraordinary levels. The taste was fairly ordinary, yet the presentation was immaculate and thoughtfully crafted.
Despite the average quality of the bites, I found the sheer delight of being in such a beautifully curated space more than compensating. It was an experience so unique and enchanting that I cannot bring myself to deduct even a single star.
With this in mind, I wholeheartedly recommend this stunning venue to anyone seeking an unforgettable experience.❤️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNtiA7gw57Oa-Xvx8d8wkipBfJcCm52PtFbcf6O&fid=0x0:0x630ef77a3b6e5f20"],"When":"2024-12-20"},{"Name":"Arsalan Abdollahi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLdIo57Pz5gxOC-snQgVWoUETftCuNRnpwxL6CC9ZoRLh5ReCc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We came in to celebrate a birthday and had an overall wonderful experience. We ordered the prime rib, pork chops, service bread, tiramisu and house wine. The service bread was pretty good but it was very filling and it left us little room to finish the main dishes. The prime rib was absolutely fantastic and highly recommended.

The service was great, and the atmosphere was lively. We went on a Saturday night to enjoy the live music. We will definitely come back in the future.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNkBza-CQdqqHqD7zi_NOeP25BDYvMMQWoyyx8u&fid=0x0:0x630ef77a3b6e5f20"],"When":"2024-11-28"},{"Name":"Chelsey N","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVPay8d1T07GhxCrccjVUp-mGg6QHso3PuIVnDImvKESZ_822o=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Step behind the bookcase and into the hidden world of the Autumn Harvest Afternoon Tea!

My family and I decided to stop by for tea at Notch8 and it was exceptional. I've done High Tea at the Empress in Victoria (and elsewhere), and I am quite certain I enjoyed the experience at Notch8 the most. The décor was lovely, and the whole place was so charming and intimate. It felt like we were there on our own, even though it was quite full.

Our server, Estella, was exceptional and noted that we were celebrating a birthday on her own, and brought over a lovely treat to enjoy. Thank you, Estella! I don't get to see my family often, so your kindness and attentiveness were so appreciated.

Not only was the selection of teas perfect (plenty to choose from, and fewer options than the Empress, but none of which were disappointing—opt for the Maple Peach if you enjoy fruit-flavored teas and thank me later—but the food was delicious and there was so much of it.

From perfectly baked scones (with mascarpone tea cream and jam) to absolutely divine roasted turkey sandwiches, to sweet potato meringue tarts, everything was autumn-themed, delicious, and way more than we could possibly eat (we took plenty home with us). And at the end, the whole experience is even topped off with delicious macrons.

We also indulged in the cocktail offerings, and while all three were delicious, my preference was for the Pumpkin Spice Latte (my first of the season hah). This was such a lovely experience that we cannot wait to come back and try it again.

If you’re looking for a high tea experience like no other, then opt for high tea at Notch8!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPc-D5ARa_DzcYwrE2mV2C35U31iUJJe48xdzc&fid=0x0:0x630ef77a3b6e5f20"],"When":"2024-10-14"},{"Name":"Steph N","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW-MJ4aq6rM8HEFO69oDw_npyeGHVzOuuaTAl9vMmfIrw-VaMbiCw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Booked out space for a high-tea team building experience. Lovely space with fitting decor to match the current "Into the Forest" theme. The selection of tea was broad to meet a variety of tastes and everything on the menu was enjoyable - really appreciated the attention to details. Accomodating and attentive staff and our large group was well taken care of.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPEa5Fo7jumq5p-ILcUP5ye-8pL1c7ZFjVOZLJy&fid=0x0:0x630ef77a3b6e5f20"],"When":"2024-8-15"},{"Name":"Daniela Stockfleth-Menis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWIWZtlWRc94a-RgWumRMFLVkdZZRdfNafIzSFl4ncQ6OBpT9gK=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"On Friday, July 12, 2024 we had the pleasure of experiencing high tea at Notch8, and it was an occasion to remember, thanks to our outstanding waiter, Christine. Her delightful personality and attentive service truly made our visit special. Christine went above and beyond, ensuring we were comfortable and well cared for throughout our stay. Despite it being past her time, she graciously let us linger and enjoy our celebration. To top it all off, she surprised me with a cake and a candle when she found out it was my birthday, adding a personal and memorable touch to the experience.

The food was a culinary delight, especially the first two layers. We particularly enjoyed the exquisite fish and the delectable chicken sandwich on the middle layer; they were our absolute favourites. However, the sweet treats were not impressive and detracted from the overall experience. The only delicious sweet was my piece of chocolate birthday cake.

The room itself is a masterpiece, beautifully decorated to create an elegant and inviting atmosphere. The concept of high tea in collaboration with the art gallery is a fantastic idea. However, we were confused and a bit saddened to find that it did not include an entrance to the gallery. We had anticipated this as part of the experience and felt it would have added significant value.
Despite these minor disappointments, Christine's exceptional service made our experience worthwhile. Her warmth and dedication ensured that we left with fond memories of our time at Notch8. Thank you, Christine, for making our day special!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNLoUrtWW2n-vlT31JmeZRc4CEmQsvkEQ-wx6QK&fid=0x0:0x630ef77a3b6e5f20"],"When":"2024-7-13"},{"Name":"Michi Song","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUyOrUffao0E0zmQusTlzqDl7kydxPWRviHbO10MxhVoFhPlpKG=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I went to the Lady In Red Speakeasy. Everything was really amazing. Drinks were so tasty plus the truffle fries were a nice par with it. The server was so professional and kind! He even took a photo of us with a digital camera.
Thank you Fairmont Hotel for this experience<3","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNWcOk1zhM4IVzGbiUgv10rhSkkyu1zogqwli7_&fid=0x0:0x630ef77a3b6e5f20"],"When":"2024-11-25"}]

title: East Van Tea Company
about: [{"id":"payments","name":"Payments","options":[{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":true}]}]
user_reviews: [{"Name":"Jacob Eggleton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXKglmLD5rXwOjc8AHPEPB6gAEwPhBhb__7HRJ9SZ8w4UTzGyNa=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This tea is blessed from the Gods. Amazing flavours and I can’t even explain how good they smell. Perfect for a snowy winter day or anytime of the year.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPcGCoT_nQ4wha5x4US6A1JVRkZOPBrgSFJ2ivc\u0026fid=0x0:0x82e274b3484a6823"],"When":"2022-12-19"},{"Name":"Janet T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLXCrGq47vkAWnRpVNpOadr6ZVp8spFpFcmz741MHGY4BZCi763=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I ordered an assortment of teas online for my friends and neighbors back home and of course a little something for me. They commented on how much they loved all of the flavours. My personal faves are Salted Caramel Honey Spice Chai and Powell Street Poetry. The leaves are so flavourful so you don't need that much to brew a great pot. Tanya was super helpful in prepping the package in time for a safe and efficient pickup.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Abby Randazzo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV11FSW0leYM2rJ5jq7FAkJc8aJ9_GvjttGjGSFsd4o-qRClN0WvQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Their tea is delicious! Tangerine Winter Dream is my favorite - perfect for crisp mornings. I never knew I would prefer tea over coffee, but I do now! Great stuff.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ess Jay","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLd810XSc93Avkv_XR7QBj2qRHZpH1Lf69mKYblhmqP6CUAUQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The best tea around! They know their teas.  I can't recommend it enough-you will gain a new appreciation of tea!  Super easy to order online too.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Onozawa Yumi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKse2eBBO4uq9ko8svkaTWR4TsDM15aXmmyFxrE_Lz3_03bEA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"","Images":null,"When":""}]
