user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Raymond Lai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVBtAhCSFPuyjlYh4wgzIFHrrE1L_iXwYw4jFuh-6uGxOYES5H32w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This local coffee shop is a gem with excellent coffee, delicious pastries, and a warm inviting atmosphere. The service is friendly, and the muffins are an absolute standout. The baristas has the skills to create some impressive latte art, as shown in my photos. Highly recommended for a relaxing and satisfying coffee experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMTSJ6rRInrnAOQslWadS_iXTBYQN8ueVsMvV-d&fid=0x0:0x133b860ecc0333a7"],"When":"2024-12-21"},{"Name":"arisa matsu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIaSF9gEhNzSCNkgXVpzjmjZIZUnCzzuvbpGiJKKSrnOQ9HWA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a cafe I've wanted to go to since I was in Japan! Yes, this Tom&Jerry cheesecake is so cute! It was only $7 and the taste was delicious and satisfying. They also sell bread and accessories, so it's a lot of fun.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMD2qeyNNQB2EbiozR2jf8POKxR36V8or78PckI&fid=0x0:0x133b860ecc0333a7"],"When":"2024-11-14"},{"Name":"Thad Hughes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV3z7DA4Baa7APKJviu93Zr-EQZ4c15KdbdnsbujLCFzd6ccqoMVA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I am so excited to find this neighborhood gem!  The ambiance is incredible and unexpected given the location, and the staff are so friendly!  They even had some delicious free samples!  Some of the food was less amazing than I could have imagined, but other things ("Winnie the Pooh jar ") were fantastic!  Very creative place!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipObJkf278siL09XAnPYxZTnqC4AvesFODxptZFv&fid=0x0:0x133b860ecc0333a7"],"When":"2024-9-21"},{"Name":"Sandy Y. (CameraGourmet)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJQ9J8ig1HwUQBJbXRdKDIwR0OrTw3YtQtyHDEaRuCN8XnUDg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We just visited Wicked Cafe's new second location near UBC in West Point Grey (Dunbar and 16th Avenue), and it's filled with exciting treats you don't want to miss!

This location is more spacious.  The vibe is similar to their first location.

They have a gorgeous display stocked with the yummiest fresh pastries. Their desserts and to-go latte drinks cabinet are a showstopper. We are always impressed by the level of detail in their latte art. It was so cute and detailed. Their staff is incredibly talented.

💓💓  NEW ITEMS 💓💓
𝐅𝐥𝐨𝐫𝐢𝐝𝐚 𝐁𝐞𝐚𝐜𝐡 𝐓𝐚𝐫𝐭 – Crème brûlée tart with London fog custard and a cute white chocolate duck!  Super cute and delicious!
Cannelé Crème Brûlée – Orange custardy in a cannele!!  Irresistibly crispy and caramelized exterior, along with a moist and custardy center!  Love it!
𝐂𝐫𝐞𝐚𝐦 𝐒𝐨𝐝𝐚 𝐈𝐠𝐥𝐨𝐨 – Japanese-style cream soda jelly with tropical fruits – gluten friendly!
𝐌𝐨𝐜𝐡𝐚 𝐃𝐮𝐜𝐤 𝐋𝐚𝐭𝐭𝐞 – Adorable latte art and delicious mocha!  Must have!
𝐑𝐚𝐬𝐩𝐛𝐞𝐫𝐫𝐲 𝐈𝐜𝐞 𝐀𝐝𝐞 – A refreshing raspberry beverage.  It’s not only delicious, but colorful too!

💓💓💓 Signature Dessert
Tom & Jerry Cheesecake – Light, fluffy, and lemony!  Very artistic and super delicious!

This cozy and spacious spot has became one of our dessert and coffee shop!

📝📝
Food: 🍯🍯🍯🍯🍯Must Try!
Service: 👩‍🍳👩‍🍳👩‍🍳👩‍🍳👩‍🍳
Kids: 👶👶👶👶 Yay!
Presentation: 📷📷📷 📷
Parking: Street parking available in the neighbourhood
Tips:
📝 always have unique seasonal items.  Check their IG for details.
📝 check out the local artwork available for purchase.  Support local talent!
📝 recommend this place for meet-ups or friend gatherings.
📝 If you’re in a hurry, their fresh pastries are perfect for a quick snack or breakfast on the go.
Would I Return: Yes 🙋‍♀️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNbIFYwmlrRgje5PVc4zS8llM10jjaamxCevNPo&fid=0x0:0x133b860ecc0333a7"],"When":"2024-9-17"},{"Name":"Just Me Traveling","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX18amg9WNM9rF8Fs9axj8FE9tNtrVpXPgaMIl0yMbfuZ56ahzt=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Cozy place to hangout for light breakfasts or snack. I got the cube croissant and matcha latte. The croissant was huge compared to what you get in other places. The cafe has a very rustic vibe . Nice and welcoming staff and interesting pastries.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPAJxbQky7PH9LU1lkO88IHwAUvN1QmyyY9pupP&fid=0x0:0x133b860ecc0333a7"],"When":"2024-6-20"},{"Name":"Trizia L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJhxzhonm3qVeCOQcq-t7TzmKLLrW8NLdygNCoB-IEawWTxrQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently visited this charming cafe and had a great experience! The customer service was top-notch - the staff were friendly, and helpful.  I love the variety of desserts they offer!  I enjoyed the cream soda igloo cake and refreshing raspberry ade drink as well. And to top it all off, the atmosphere was lovely - cozy, inviting, and filled with plants !  Highly recommend a visit here :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNp8lFnHvEijCDbHthTOuEjFuyKMq-sbIoFYoQh&fid=0x0:0x133b860ecc0333a7"],"When":"2024-8-6"},{"Name":"Daisy Moo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWFBTE38F06aaQH6cIJ5aLlxVoKYsKABHcMk8z7C4Ohs9wAx04=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best spot for a coffee and a good chat with a friend, this Cafe is really spacious and has great AC also love the vibe
The Canele are so yummy!!! And I love a good sweet bun~♡

-⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️Latte","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMEpWhCDTGJURdKRWpc39eUo-8q_79hO_HZKbKD&fid=0x0:0x133b860ecc0333a7"],"When":"2024-10-28"},{"Name":"Florina Rogers","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWlrf88eW-UBK10MnvJTTdFdhoxqS_NfwmtSgs5B5_wB9XwERQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wicked magic moments: mint tea and tiramisu cookie for me. Loved the decor and atmosphere, can't wait to return! Thank you!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNMpdBY-2LvQuMpDrv-RET6qA8Sj15I5QDIv2l3&fid=0x0:0x133b860ecc0333a7"],"When":"2024-11-17"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Gurv","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXhwceJhFcjYo11eH0UjktVpbt4vgW7SS5aHechrSipNjogSGM7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Lovely little gem in Point Grey Village. I wouldn’t describe the staff as friendly, but they provided quick and efficient service. They make a nice Americano and Flat White. Some of the baked goods looked good, but others not so much. Would definitely return for the coffee if in the area.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOpB7J9xGl1HHbkNvSpEymW6nButX3TBUtjKJzj&fid=0x0:0xb3728cfaa795dfff"],"When":"2024-11-24"},{"Name":"Jude Khuolle","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKoOHsX0iuK1n0aE-f67hr1zD0b0vnhNBHspZWpfxn9d0qbPA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Such a pleasure to stop by Little Umbrella whenever I am in the neighbourhood! Berry scone deserves a 10x ⭐️, the natural berry flavor is to die for! Americano is always on the point, too!!! The staff are always so friendly and the atmosphere is super cozy! Miss you already & see ya soon, Little Umbrella!

PS. Cleanest washroom as always ❤️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNMgcjy9vJIPZpQZ_8ks6A4lSqlPx7HUcms5Wb9&fid=0x0:0xb3728cfaa795dfff"],"When":"2024-10-26"},{"Name":"Nick","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV8i6aZWX5wFrYB9tM2WdmFdLgNXisODy2uyMR7VD7WXU3hwANM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cute little shop with wonderful staff, a calm, clean, and welcoming interior and atmosphere, and good food and coffee. The Montreal smoked meat sandwich was tasty and reasonably priced, and the drip coffee (they serve West End's "Glory" roast) was well prepared and included a free refill.

I'd be happy to come back anytime.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOYHnpFyVPz7y4LVJbBFURGluA_CxDuHN7i61G4&fid=0x0:0xb3728cfaa795dfff"],"When":"2023-8-13"},{"Name":"Maria M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXmuhUB-INQ3XCbE2M9HT-MdzILSuqxW6ls6tLvy0JgUoxl1f3wCQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cute spot with delicious coffee and great merchandise for sale. I love that they have items from Noisette by Olivia, she’s a wonderful baker!! I had a butterscotch bar suggested by the barista and absolutely loved it. They also carry To Live For pastries and the art on the wall is also for sale. Great service, only con is that I don’t think they have AC/fans because it was really hot inside and it wasn’t even a super hot day.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMfqcxP0MUXpDF_Nw9wn9t2lPhfGHBjiZIv36wd&fid=0x0:0xb3728cfaa795dfff"],"When":"2023-5-23"},{"Name":"Stephanie MacGregor","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV6iDyNJYlsf4acWsidQ9p0E-E45bd1RfXQPnZh35vVbEYXxh-MRg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Beautiful little find!! Happened upon this place and looked at the reviews before heading in. They were true to form. Great food, service and ambiance. I ordered the turkey avocado sandwich which they grilled and brought to my table. From the yellow umbrella outside to the little flowers on the table, it was delightful. Lots of tables inside and outside.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPGS_SSAd7vAC1PTk6JyKAvMX2J0yDLBen5xxNR&fid=0x0:0xb3728cfaa795dfff"],"When":"2023-9-6"},{"Name":"John","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVApY3ektBPRfZW2J3RUtKhyASUO4UjQUPM3VVmW2mKx6AuUi6H=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing new Vancouver Coffee Shop! DELICIOUS food, baked goods and coffee - a must try! Their breakfast sandwiches and croissants are all baked and made in-house and served warm. Coffee and drinks are very good quality and made with love. Delicious tumeric and matcha latés as well. If you're lucky, you might meet the two owners who are the cutest! This place is worth going out of your way for.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMFCmM3gqCHrvbiw0Y6Peoy_Kpq9qPy5syeYS0&fid=0x0:0xb3728cfaa795dfff"],"When":"2022-1-27"},{"Name":"Cindy Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK2q6mI5NXD0NfPn7rC15t72Xbiv55pqS8UIWeJfqxK5mpsPg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"New cafe on the block. Super cute interior and amazing London Fog made with loose leaf tea! Egg sandwich was delicious too, buns were soft and eggs fluffy, perfect to start off the day. Will definitely return!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPOD5ug-2QEZLhnNl_aPP-Y0CJZjWLX9dwnJN3-&fid=0x0:0xb3728cfaa795dfff"],"When":"2022-1-31"},{"Name":"Telia Hsieh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXtd0Xm1h6e7k_Pq-4DSP4RPfoZHWf_DTfY-q84mZApVXVDvO43Ug=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"So excited to see this new cafe in my neighbourhood! It has a great selection of pastries and sandwiches. I ordered an unsweetened oat milk matcha latte and it was delicious! I also stole a few bites of the potato bun breakfast sandwich my partner ordered and it was so good! Next time I'll order my own! 😉","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMtY-EIMmm9qF4WSpUi7DNUGTxH6A_ZHSkY_j7O&fid=0x0:0xb3728cfaa795dfff"],"When":"2022-1-27"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Chantal Beaulne","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV4iPSaOoxa5N-aIK7WYR6cb4u_gJpd1PU2Smc4K3gtzFxK0ufA4Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Danoo has come under new management and it’s a massive improvement. The new owner is a very kind, conversational guy, but he can also make a mean crêpe. He’s very open to suggestions or requests, and will make things to order with no fuss - he even encourages it. I’ve had nothing but perfect meals every time I go there, which is becoming more and more frequently. It’s a pretty quiet place, which is a shame, because the food is great - but until people figure out this is a hidden gem, it also means it’s the place to go to avoid the line ups for coffee and smoothies at the coffee shops down the road. If you want to skip the lines, this place could sure use the business, and it’s also a nicer, quieter start to the day.

And again - such good, good crêpes.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipORwmNCmYRq22_aiOP3gN4-QX47KkuqBSEPWksP&fid=0x0:0x609c14887d4cda4d"],"When":"2024-10-25"},{"Name":"Sora Al-Hamami","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUufDXjw0049Bx2obDd_iYK0L-bYgOmyPWCsMDtEUPuYn2HkSs=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Really good food, fabulous taste I couldn’t wait to take a pic had to take a bite before and enjoy while I write this review. Really recommend this place, their service is excellent and a great place very tasty. Egg benedict with bulgogi beef is a must try.

Also the nutella latte super delicious. Bobby is the owner and the chef, he’s s super sweet and i cant wait till I’m back in town to come back again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMuotvUMuZLyBa26ZsiQ-BqXYP6TYHhUq-X_aee&fid=0x0:0x609c14887d4cda4d"],"When":"2024-9-22"},{"Name":"Patty M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLzYB8hXGPbayx7tpEViMXV_lLAqxSi21QGr_7rvQmRSA0nxQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently stumbled upon this hidden gem of a restaurant and had the pleasure of trying their savory crepes, which were some of the best I've ever had. I’m already looking forward to returning to try the sweet crepes next time. The owner is also incredibly friendly. Highly recommend this place!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sisi Yang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ1XrEfjoHB25JyI9GWmLk55v02rjLSr5ozV1st76zzH4jcJA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I went to Danoo cafe this morning .  ordered strawberry banana waffle and pork belly Benedict. It was so tasty. The pork belly  with kimchi is perfect! Big size and fresh. The bubble tea it was fantastic ！The stuff so nice. The place looks great . I’ll repeat !","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMGla15dWkMdkjE9gYeDyR9YnH-mt2aqewugNAi&fid=0x0:0x609c14887d4cda4d"],"When":"2024-5-16"},{"Name":"Lauren Young","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIJszv0xvV6CI-zOUXF-nhKFDvG9-7fmIllym2j0ztH9HQcBiI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The owner and staff are so friendly and accommodating! We came in with a large party and they were so welcoming. The food was great, and my friends and I had such a great time. Thank you so much for the wonderful experience. Definitely check them out!! Prices are also super reasonable!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jade Tsui","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI07p4-rPZUOm_gnTxt2eAgnoM7i2sWDKs4vgzQql1WtXuZKnM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"In love with this place - the food is beyond amazing - the crepe and masala fries are so special and delicious. The owner was also so nice to us when we are there - he even gave us a free crepe. Because the owner works alone, the service is not the fastest but that's not a problem at all since he communicated that to us. I appreciate this cafe a lot and will come right back.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Pratyaksha Awasthi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXb8pZrx3au1RiFFbUjGwbeRctpxFQb6HrhRWGP45hkfSL3vUis=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ordered the crepes and waffles and loved them. There was a huge portion, and the food was jist delicious!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOZnIJRDDGdrS2-g0A0QqqbBRQdbq4bnR-oQ86K&fid=0x0:0x609c14887d4cda4d"],"When":"2024-9-1"},{"Name":"Hannah Mahdavi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKW609cpHMDUeU_kbmbpUWNSK7-McNV11sgKr04S0ay7NDPYg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the best local brunch spots you can go to! They have a variety of crepes and they all hit the spot! Flavour is on point, portion size huge and the best thing is that they have really good prices. Overall AMAZING and a must try.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Michael campbell-burns","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIDPBAidU9FRFvpmC284KU-E44ysTTOYUU_Scey6OKBMLaciw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a great coffee location , parking is never a problem , they do great coffee and good food selection I have been coming here for years  and the staff are really friendly and it has a good atmosphere  especially when the shop is decorated for the occasion","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNUvjMw_geZXzfbMtkePRE0hQ00VoePsBraEHqk&fid=0x0:0xd40bd2085e92d2e0"],"When":"2024-10-26"},{"Name":"M J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI2LYxcOtpibAnE2jJ8m-Qt3_jq-46pRpXjSzbtMIQ9YCQ_UQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great little cafe. I like that there are several no laptop tables. It helps separate work from pleasure. Food looks lovely, I did not try any though.

Nice vibes and tasty coffee.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPrz5Al_EU_Xh77VHOu_fV9o5atwYtxwj3ilw9E&fid=0x0:0xd40bd2085e92d2e0"],"When":"2024-12-8"},{"Name":"tavers","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVC7ILtSlxfdDxb6V9J462gwa1fPiceOnM23OIRkX4ftST7PlY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Looking for the best caramel macchiato?? Look no further. Large portion size and perfect balance of flavors.
Not the best pistachio chocolate croissant but the coffee and service is unbeatable.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN-WH74hggMT5unc-fKZolYgMDt6PYp4h8cLrqx&fid=0x0:0xd40bd2085e92d2e0"],"When":"2024-11-17"},{"Name":"Dana Sullivan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWQIw-0oOUNgoyniYugTscGkgpKJS8tpx4V0tAajn3ZGkNIfqEk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I like all the Bean Around the Worlds, but the owner/manager(?) of this one is so nice and is always eager to talk about the drinks and food every time I see him, which makes this location in particular feel special to me. The aesthetic and atmosphere of the place is rustic and very cozy.
I really like all their food, the sandwiches/wraps and the baked goods. There’s interesting choices including good vegetarian and vegan options, and they're well-made. The baked goods have this rustic quality that I love. And the drinks are just as good - they can do a nice strong tea latte here and last summer they had a really nice decaf cold brew!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO8kWB6YuA3y2IHJ-19wsZ2H1jKrSB0JRvaRey1&fid=0x0:0xd40bd2085e92d2e0"],"When":"2021-5-20"},{"Name":"kyle Kiriakidis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWblL9BGeLkTVbBdk7CG2BFnF9_ImfdtW0awWjyxf6V1daanRk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Bean Around the World on West 10th is hands down one of my favourite coffee spots! The atmosphere here is absolutely amazing—cozy, welcoming, and perfect for a coffee break or catching up with friends. Their coffee is incredible, consistently brewed to perfection every single time. I love it so much that I sometimes travel all the way from White Rock just to visit. The staff are incredibly friendly and make every visit feel special. On top of that, they have an awesome selection of grocer items, which I always stock up on and store in my deep freeze. It's like a mini treasure trove of quality foods! Highly recommend this place to anyone who loves great coffee and a fantastic local vibe. Bean Around the World truly lives up to its name!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Neil Towers","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJDfJWK_79YehnGCnedetr0qRVolhBdPBIr-JFSRZ2iVUoeKw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Was waiting at the counter for 5 mins with no one in line ahead of me.. the staff didn't even acknowledge my existence, let alone have the basic intelligence to take my order. As soon as someone else walked into the store they were immediately greeted and asked what the person would like to order. I spent my teenage years frequenting this business but after today I will never return. If you want to feel welcome at a coffee shop avoid this location like the plague. The owners should be more diligent in their hiring practices and hire more welcoming staff. If I could zero stars I would.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Talia Fay","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVfTvAKnm2zhq6jRs8tu8fqq8iSEMldevMZTY8mioBNaeg5Hg8I2w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"i am bean around the world's biggest fan <3 every single time i go i have the most pleasant encounters with the wonderful staff. it also has the loveliest atmosphere and is so well decorated, and also has a lot of seating which is so hard to find these days for some reason. also, fantastic coffee and food!!! would give six stars if i could.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kimberly Lenny","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLeLp1S51-aAhqe_7Ho7JqzWSxMCLyeUT6_h-kr8BmbpcqFEA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fantastic service! The man working the till was so friendly and sweet. Made me feel right at home. The Halloween decorations are on point too. And the food and drink are excellent. My new favorite coffee shop!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Gulbahar Mammetgurbanova","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUZ2P8So5Ugwt-BVdno0AmONX9eDtlEXZfmfVOG_zT8VLu6eNVt=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"4 stars because the tapioca balls are not included in the price for the milk tea. You have to add it for extra charge. Not a big deal but disappointing because it’s already over $7.

I got brown sugar milk tea. It was pretty good.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Danny","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIdhbBpTkOv74ci93qcEvgCD2Hodx5IfLP2_6VrOW2BSTnVeQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I was very unsatisfied with the atmosphere, they seemed to have staff who were off work drinking and making a ruckus at a table WHILE customers were ordering.

Their drinks are great, but it’s disturbing that they have a lack of respect for customers and the space, even if they are off shift.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tanya Gelli","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL9CtTzxWeKcY-rhYJP54Vs-3mhJ7odpgXdFeE4OARdAq7_6g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We ordered strawberry taro milky smoothie and Taro milk smoothie, both with boba. The strawberry taro milk smoothie was absolutely delicious. Never had that flavour before. The taro milk smoothie was good too.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPSkk19xeAZ_7Mx2t52tKoBsDc4wsSAzN_GAjIH&fid=0x0:0xe98afd0d44b0948b"],"When":"2023-10-28"},{"Name":"Kelly Hrelja","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUVWh8qmVdPEfqahFaQ6ox93SOukCBaQIQqwS9jEApuOOnHfC4ZzQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Pearl Fever is a good spot to get your basic bubble tea flavours. They also have a great reward program, which is why I go there the most when I'm at UBC.

With the app/reward program you get a free drink every time you load $40 into the app as well as a free birthday drink. But you also earn points when you spend with your app balance, which can be used to earn MORE free drinks!

My favourite drinks here are the honeydew smoothie with lychee jelly (very sweet) and the Japanese roasted tea/milk tea with pearls.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOd2aBwApOagMfyLOmRgGIbhBkhSigTOsK_X_TY&fid=0x0:0xe98afd0d44b0948b"],"When":"2023-10-19"},{"Name":"H W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKiEtu-Pfzzd7vMmnC1lRzmwYGQeuaGu_8hpE004heAd4NBbg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Good flavours and plenty of seating. Service is quick and efficient, and the place is quite clean and well maintained. Great spot to grab bubble tea nearby UBC.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM0w4oetl7zFuG88AdcBkChwgQCXXJtU6PvG5KI&fid=0x0:0xe98afd0d44b0948b"],"When":"2020-3-21"},{"Name":"EBR","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXmrgdwHuyw1ojCeFCceHLN9Nahnn19P5GWJ7wJ4iez2uufrprq=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"The music was too loud, they wouldn’t let my girlfriend use the restroom to wash her hands, the prices are kind of high, but the tables were clean. We came because of the high rating, but just weren’t that impressed :/","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOKhvxA19ZD5oRZyDx31GsLGg-lBBwWbGadOejq&fid=0x0:0xe98afd0d44b0948b"],"When":"2022-8-5"},{"Name":"Haneul Park","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUSq2DJZGftDd3sBTZ69kYQvP1-9moqG7usfppuTx3bDANtugQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The bubble tea doesn’t taste too sweet or anything the pearls are a little weird but overall amazing!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOyPUHmlMmAldhknU25GFF2mLme4uokyj2PSBt2&fid=0x0:0xe98afd0d44b0948b"],"When":"2024-4-14"},{"Name":"Vineeth Shankar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVyOR0ZUg5adKb4NBcG6CMMRzOEoTL5qRb5vz1uynXMGYsDtHmw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very good boba tea place. For the uninitiated, they have a very simple short menu (easy to choose) containing the options and the sequence to order. I had the roasted japanese tea with milk and pearls. Ice and sugar were exactly as I expected. I will definitely go again when I am in the area next time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN4qhQj8vqdNeEmft2ArzSTumOfZx5pn_CP_gXP&fid=0x0:0xe98afd0d44b0948b"],"When":"2021-10-31"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Philip Raymond Lim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5EIBAgpBLsauhPMdjXym7mJ4fA8mtryDtWQIJCZfJxYXxupU8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the best cinnamon buns ever! Soft, warm, and creamy icing on top. You can feel that the spice, sweetness, and sweet cinnamon layer is very well balanced. Since my friend introduced this place to me a year ago, I’ve been a frequent to this place and the other one on Commercial drive specially on Christmas time. Tried almost all of the coffee here as well and they are all great. Highly recommend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM81sakuvLjhVdKiX0fSkET9vYP3iJc3VEX9Et8&fid=0x0:0x877e94a2b43ec506"],"When":"2024-11-4"},{"Name":"eddy wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX8Fjpj3y8teHQ4LqbC4PHR8whbU4-XOrTXEwklI9bGRqZLRD20=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I’m a foodie person but I never scream for an excellent cinnamon bun. I never crave for one. But after trying these I must say. It’s moist. It’s not overpowering in sweetness. You can taste the cinnamon coming through.

This is not your typical store bought cinnamon bun boys and girls. Give it a try.
I heard they do a pumpkin one in the fall. I’ll be back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP20NJB6rUKp7Mx3iYzbAzjtp0gZ_gHtqPZJqrT&fid=0x0:0x877e94a2b43ec506"],"When":"2024-9-15"},{"Name":"Julia Svozil","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKY6CQrDAWg5j6EoL2aNEqFIUoZ5HwG6liN1XokWzQdNqKFug=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It's the place for cinnamon buns. I just had coffee and a bun. Nothing else. No need the cinnamon bun is the best I've ever had. In fact, I believe there's not even a competition. Freshly baked. Simply fantastic","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"S K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVA8crG_Kej_AlW0Buxi8inYMaqvIWjPmeH973uES3cM0V9rLnd=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Like everyone, I came for the cinnamon buns. They were moist, well baked, the right level of sweetness, and HUGE. I was most impressed with the hygiene and service--staff were in gloves, gowns, and hairnets, and packaged items up with care.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPUf4nJDpZtZpjUM9WYzJZ9cOr8vPNG6N0JrOK5&fid=0x0:0x877e94a2b43ec506"],"When":"2024-11-19"},{"Name":"Sharzi BD","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW288MzwFkWlfN4-hmCJwoI28tpVq0hWMFg6JZzbb5p0qpMwt_I=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I’ve heard they make wonderful cinnamon buns! But it was terrible! It was not soft and was so sweet!
I’ve got a terrible stomach after I had a bunch of!
Te coffee was ok! I don’t like the atmosphere! Not clean and also was small!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOuBh1HcV4PtSeeYqAPwja_7fQWDT55OnWIxwIg&fid=0x0:0x877e94a2b43ec506"],"When":"2024-5-1"},{"Name":"tavers","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVC7ILtSlxfdDxb6V9J462gwa1fPiceOnM23OIRkX4ftST7PlY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Really good cappuccino, both quality and quantity. No doubt the cinnamon rolls are the best. The place is generally full and because it's at a busy spot, the service can feel underwhelming.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMfYuq1ibmA1DIzs-Z1_GLEcTnxFVyWA-gpHytf&fid=0x0:0x877e94a2b43ec506"],"When":"2024-11-10"},{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Their Cinnamon Buns with icing here are a solid treat and reliably delicious. They are not the sweetest cinnamon buns and are not the gooey kind but instead are more light and bready. They pair well with coffee and tea.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP8B35u0OjiN0jqFGh19Nt_mM15a4zxIgafpESb&fid=0x0:0x877e94a2b43ec506"],"When":"2024-5-7"},{"Name":"Claudio Pastore","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVMnL2vG2_aMHCiMx64yrrnchA9xMs3sNaT90H6Hb36sIN8LX4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Told the server I wanted 4 cinnamon rolls, 2 on a separate box. When he hands me the one box I asked him is this just 2 rolls? And he goes to say "they're around the corner" pointing to the other side of the counter. Maybe he thought I was asking for napkins or something??
So I said, I guess the 4 rolls are in one box?? He said yes and I left not happy, I get home to actually separate the 2 rolls that I was gifting to somebody else to find that 2 of them have no icing.
How could've he made that mistake??
You guys are lucky these are the best cinnamon rolls in town. Still not happy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOWvYL3Y3ufoV5C1XAU01jkDPbx5EISKX9Yxub1&fid=0x0:0x877e94a2b43ec506"],"When":"2024-7-27"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Ushio Taguchi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXn7l4NbJzCWQH_7WmanMiCCWpDIjcIoAZAoK4g1w5NCWkD4yhI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Generous size for the price!
Ordered a Matcha Latte and a Lavender Tea Latte. The drinks were lukewarm which I think is right temperature for scented tea. I thought they could be a little stronger but considering the size it was ok, to finish all it’s just the right strength!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM9q5-U1seQ4l8TJFcuTP01R4IU1L6looK4nLww&fid=0x0:0x33cf414bfb0ab6e5"],"When":"2024-12-20"},{"Name":"Sayana Imash","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLDCBgZik19ttSGpMnatio_KhPNR9KbECplNW1pRvvThgwPKg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Fist of all, thus place does not have WIFI which i find so ridiculous

Second, food was not great. I ordered coffee with sea salt and pearls and it cost me 8$. It was not worth it at all, it did not taste like good coffee at all. I also got breakfast sandwich. It was so moist that it felt like they took it out pf the freezer and heated up in the microwave…. Oh they also gave us paper plate for our lemon loaf…. Lemon loaf was good tho

Overall, would not recommend this place at all..","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM_1ITA_TSB2-Uq5gQNPIUnEE6sBepm17jy3V1-&fid=0x0:0x33cf414bfb0ab6e5"],"When":"2024-8-9"},{"Name":"Henry Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVcTlx45tkivdnVyW4B38kXt4WHZXtLMp6yRttTlIFdf-1gou8R=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We were here a couple of years ago, it was a cute little cafe in the neighborhood with nice drinks and friendly service.

Came here again today, they have brand new drinks, we just love it. Nice and cute interior, also has a small private room for gathering.

Overall a very good experience here, would come back again for the drinks!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNPaoJ2LJfBffnrp15BVFUYKy6_4DmKcaEPqAqd&fid=0x0:0x33cf414bfb0ab6e5"],"When":"2023-4-21"},{"Name":"Kelly Hrelja","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUVWh8qmVdPEfqahFaQ6ox93SOukCBaQIQqwS9jEApuOOnHfC4ZzQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great bubble tea but also great avocado toast!

The interior was clean, quiet and spacious. Perfect for getting some laptop work done!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPKlcHUtGBii0iCc6Kp6y0dQ9CKaXgFm4q-FKw7&fid=0x0:0x33cf414bfb0ab6e5"],"When":"2024-6-26"},{"Name":"Kris C.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKreAKn4vn2wDsLPPbr1-Tyj8LLPhAalhXSg1Lriconwhw0GQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Spacious cafe with spread out seats. Service is quick, the staff is kind, and if the drink isn't as expected, they're happy to help adjust it to your liking.

They have some interesting latte flavours. Overall, it's a good place for a break.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMJFG7st_vz-AV45hDX6GNIx_3bI2Oaw3n9O8Wc&fid=0x0:0x33cf414bfb0ab6e5"],"When":"2024-5-6"},{"Name":"Perseus Thebes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWwXGul4l1Ra3TTgn8LuZef06Zx_laaWjZ7glwixZjcITyNqd0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"FANTASTIC coffee and super super cute interior. Calm environment & definitely get the coffee to go and stroll through the beautiful neighbourhood.

Extra 5 stars for being open all weekend throughout the whole day!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOB3KwGlU0uITR3jUumswwnmIdZawnxcf-n7iv6&fid=0x0:0x33cf414bfb0ab6e5"],"When":"2023-9-24"},{"Name":"Beth","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWTMPkRFElqUitdtcwe033BTODM-WOG8I4TG0nsejsi3_wWMLTjpQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Particular cafe in van!
Came here for brunch and their waffle, breakfast sandwich, avo toast all tasted great!
For coffee I felt it was slightly too bitter for myself but I very much enjoyed the cafe vibe/food.
I think the waffle goes very well with maple syrup better than other toppers so it would be awesome if maple syrup was complementary.
Lastly, I loved how they have separate cans for recycling 👍🏻
Will return for more food later on!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM2CoXQ2bMT3dzLLF5k_jJq975-ArKQDglsQqBX&fid=0x0:0x33cf414bfb0ab6e5"],"When":"2021-1-24"},{"Name":"Teresa Liu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUCUamqyW1RJhSopzVx8RzU4rpP6BUBhd0GBoxf2E97S_Hm4Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Perchance is located at Dunbar & 17th Ave. I used to live in this neighbourhood, but I have never been here before. I love its refreshing style internal decoration. It is perfect for brunch in weekend or having afternoon tea with friends.

I ordered the featured strawberry matcha with pearls and I would give it a 9 out of 10. I can taste the real strawberry and strong matcha flavour in this drink, which gives it a balance of sweetness and sourness. Pearls are warm and soft, which is a big plus to me.

Staff here are all very kind and helpful. Such an amazing experience!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO2yf5hjgWKC7gEKpTa5cHSQ7n5J3HKT-5R1sg&fid=0x0:0x33cf414bfb0ab6e5"],"When":"2021-2-23"}]

title: Chatime Kerrisdale
descriptions: Bright bubble tea counter-serve chain offering hot & cold drinks, including coffee & slushes.
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Onsite services","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"highlights","name":"Highlights","options":[{"name":"Great tea selection","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair accessible seating","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible washroom","enabled":true}]},{"id":"amenities","name":"Amenities","options":[{"name":"Gender-neutral washroom","enabled":true}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"XING GAO","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV-aXd3rBRjAEyFKHaF6yrBXLMvd3CKCnmejcyhGQOMh0Dz3IDu=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I’m not even sure if this is the authentic ‘Chatime Milk Tea.’ I ordered the exact same item from both Richmond Centre and Cambie St locations, but this place had several inconsistencies. First, they used cups without the logo, which I haven’t seen at other locations. They also didn’t allow me to adjust the brown sugar level (other locations do, and even the app offers that option). Additionally, they didn’t add the sea salt caramel foam on top as expected (they don’t even offer this option) What’s more, when I tried ordering for pickup online and through the app, I couldn’t find this store, which was very strange to me. The taste was noticeably different as well. I’ve had the same milk tea three times this week, and this one tasted off compared to the others. I’ve attached pictures—it’s obvious to see the differences between the three bottles purchased from different places.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOfErjOPh1o21-ixDcDqbLX6PmDPfwatUdlTWXG&fid=0x0:0x2b51fbafc18cdc0f"],"When":"2024-9-29"},{"Name":"Tony flader","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLEtGSpd-g_4J52pjNsyQ8WpUB7kC2XcKAyR0i2PDrQRQ4-pw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Had a rather unpleasant experience. We ordered two milk tea and the worker immediately turned the payment machine to us without asking for sugar or ice levels. We had to stop him in the middle of making the first drink to ask if it could be less sweet but he had already made 1 and didn't seem at all willing to fix that. The drinks also did not have pearls, which I understand we should have specified but in general other places have either asked us or just included pearls in the first place. When we asked if we could have pearls he responded rudely and didn't even pretend to want to rectify the problem. I'm also pretty sure he did not give us the roasted milk tea but just the regular.
The place was not close to closing and there was no one else there so I don't understand why we were treated so poorly.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Leyla Bauman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWMG36BCv18_nRTljzT7_zjx-vL1Ztw6e2zV35y6TEqZmB8CHA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Today all I wanted was a mango slush from chatime and I pull on the door and it’s locked. First, it says online it closes at 10pm then I see a paper towel sign say closed at 5:00. My phone says 4:48, so I’m confused. I look at the worker who’s on her phone with her AirPods in and I point to my clock. She just shakes her head and shuts the light off so she’s sitting in the dark to signal that they’re closed even tho it’s 12 mins before they’re unofficial closing time. I also went on Tuesday and my friend got a regular milk tea with Boba. The worker who wasn’t even behind the counter initially seals the drink before putting in boba so my friend says wait can I have boba (because the drink literally already comes with boba) he sighs super aggressively and then chucks the whole drink in the sink wasting it and making a mess. He then makes a new drink, correctly this time, with boba in it. Then I ask for my freaking mango slush and he goes we don’t have slush because we didn’t make any since there was no one here so you have to wait 30 mins. I just said no thanks and left. Bro 2 times I couldn’t get my mango slush that’s all I want!! I’m not going to this chatime ever again. Go to the one on Cambie they’re so nice and has all the updates stuff.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Z","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW95NS8ZtQZIfFu4y7DMgmikPaSCEKMFt91J4-1E4AigeNBIb9T=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The lady completely forgot about my order and served the drinks for customers after me. Another dude cut also cut the line to have his drink remade before mine...

When I approached her about my drink status she asked if I wanted to order...I had to reminder her I already did.

The store layout is poorly designed: cash register in front of the door makes a awkward experience for the customers to line up tightly together at the entrance.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"th","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU_W93m3j10_VokjdPJxPae0lrou0_dkBiP7E4vMceD7b5ybsx1PA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We ordered our drinks and the employee working at the time made them without saying anything or making eye contact with us. After receiving my drink i quickly realized mine was way sweeter than normal. We headed back and politely asked for the drink to be remade. The employee began yelling at us, saying that we should’ve specified our desired sweetness level and that it was our fault that the drink was not made correctly. I often visit different chatime locations and each time the workers ask what sugar and ice level i would like, as people frequently forget to include it in their order. However, as mentioned before, this worker did not even look at us. He began to escalate the situation and would yell over us when we tried to reason with him. This situation may have been more understandable if the cafe was crowded and he was busy making other drinks however IT WAS EMPTY. Eventually we asked for a refund for the drink as we were not satisfied. to that he said no and walked away, returning to his seat in the back of the cafe on his phone. this situation could’ve easily been avoided had he just remade the drink like we asked. I can only describe his appearance, as he would not disclose his name (for obvious reasons), as a tall asian with glasses and a mask. Never have i ever had such a terrible experience at a chatime location. People that lack the maturity to deal with a simple situation such as mine, should not think they are ready to work.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Amanda","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ6ZQMGalUBpISrwp_oyTcrGIRXmBUf9r45mqPXrT-ymOGKKA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best bubble tea! All the kids from my child’s school love going to Chatime Kerrisdale, it’s everyone’s favourite. Taiwan Mango QQ is always a winner but we enjoy ordering everything on the menu. If you want something  yummy, definitely go to Chatime Kerrisdale","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Andrea Chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLzpBdSmRiI3ZxpN1-pjbXisXyngc-RRdlSQByeoUWVEPHbjQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Ordered roasted milk tea w/ pearls and was very pleasantly surprised. I drink lots of Chatime roasted milk teas & sometimes they’re not strong in flavour. This one however was very strong and the roasted flavour was delicious. Not sure what they did differently than other Chatimes, but I hope other can take note!

Although, I did get 50% sugar my drink was quite sweet & my friend who also ordered half sugar noticed her drink overly sweet as well. Would suggest other ppl to go down an extra sugar level if you’re more sensitive to sugar.

Will say that the interior itself could be better well maintained but I got take-out so I didn’t mind. Probably not somewhere I’d dine-in but worth a to-go trip for the roasted milk tea.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Seamus Bailey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJHG4qLeeKof8pI_eFuQU9xZ02dCCWJY2wdFfMYbwc2JA6IdA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"0 stars if I could. agree with other commenters on the man on the corner in his phone. he was rude, did not ask for any specifications of the drink. refused to make a hot drink saying that "that wasn't available today", what happened? did his hot water break lol? don't think so....","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Mory M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUPs8avgpY6Oe_Ytsg4rqTPRpKj-6YZ9I59NE5Wd6hmPPMEz98=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have made a few purchases from this shop and never been disappointed with the quality of the lose tea.\n\nThe customer service is very good, and I love getting their specialty ice tea every year.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOyvlGHIIPcvXoPzgrb61gEiaRQcHaScYgOEPc\u0026fid=0x0:0x9283ed45c900c7c0"],"When":"2022-8-31"},{"Name":"Aaron Vose","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWWTVpRZR1WgeMzHZ2gPpx_cj-v0X5nykmYZAscIs92L807lzg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great tea shop with a decent selection and helpful staff. I was very happy with the Earl Grey I purchased here. A+","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Charles Yuet","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL-JHe3-GWR5bhpwlPP24WZ3EFbKKrsE2SnajklVsaIYBhykA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I have no doubt the tea is great but if you serve coffee, you should have cream and restrooms available.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Wāsé Young","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUEcx4qA_VgpB8_HoZOohC-moE-RYt8BF5k0tegNyjHXGU4vAE=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent selection of fine teas and even better customer service from the staff.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Stephen Rees","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXyCRehnCWoXXFZlk1NaMMbKSLvHFnHFaeqlBP6ZMvJqjvc0u-HPw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Murchie's sells tea - and coffee - and all the supporting hardware that goes with it. They also serve drinks on the premises. Most of these sales must be \"to go\" as the seating is very limited. Just two chairs and a table inside, one chair and a small table outside. That being said the service is excellent, very friendly and the tea is freshly made. Only served in paper cups. Very large choice of teas. I noted on the side board where they keep the sweetners, stir sticks and so on that they also offered free tasting of one iced tea. The music chosen on this occasion was delightful - swing or jazz from the 1920's \u0026 30's I think. Altogether a much nicer experience than the nearby Blenz.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Hui Jia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLnQMF6uwlziMp_BE2yF-cGDNKEcnwhzn7TlWEwdbR4P38MaQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Very disappointed with my purchase! I bought two sets of tea cups and sauces as birthday gifts for my friend and both of them are defected: one has a stain inside and the other has a bump inside which might hurt your figure when you wash it. I found this out after going back home already. I called in advance to ask whether they can do exchange for the same good ones and she said yes so I brought them back for exchange. However, when I arrived at the store, the same person said there were no extra ones. I asked whether they could order for me, and she said even if they order, the new ones will be the same and the quality of this set is not good! I was shocked! Do make sure to check carefully before you buy. That’s the lesson I learned here. Thought I will not come back again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Meanz K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVY0jWG64amHDW1jLvV-CYOmueC-E7s6g2ECaE3ZqOo7kVzQvbTiQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fine selection of teas for reasonable price ($14.95 for one box of 50 teabags) and the shop has a very classy ambiance.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Robert F.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXtFYCDfsbGLTBrHBdAOFPq9ieS5xeDUTgkNHPj9m8YsVJyo9RC=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Quiet place to purchase different types of tea, both bagged and loose.  Friendly service.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Dana Sullivan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWQIw-0oOUNgoyniYugTscGkgpKJS8tpx4V0tAajn3ZGkNIfqEk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lots to love here: an abundant selection of delicious pastries and lunches, friendly staff that seem genuinely happy to be there, and a warm, rustic environment. It feels very at home in this neighbourhood.
I’ve been a few times and I love the food here; the baking tastes homemade in the best way. So far I have tried the veggie galette, the sour cream coffee cake, and morning glory muffin. They also did a great job on my London fog!
There is a big selection of sweet and savoury baked goods, including single serve things like muffins, scones, cookies, and pie slices, and multi-serving items like whole loaves of bread, bags of small cookies, and I think whole cakes/pies. There are also some sandwiches in addition to the baked goods.
Reasonable prices.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOtzFOdXyfnq5alQUuAT51L5j__mkJDOe_yuYSi&fid=0x0:0x387a465d37bfec0c"],"When":"2024-4-8"},{"Name":"Rai Roofing Ltd","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKzJTVg3fYzQJDNybnj31YP64HLOn1bsoS4OUjGwOwGX9xwHQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Incredible food and a wonderful atmosphere make it a perfect spot to get some work done. The owners are fantastic and very welcoming. Be sure to visit and support this family-owned and operated business!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mina","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJMUQOWy6JQtFoAkI3UpOnkbp_ZwSLaymyR5f4QckQ1gaFV1k8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A great local bakery. Freshly baked items. The coffee cake and hot chocolate were amazingly delicious. The staff were friendly and the service was fast.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMSl6BVcVpZ4HsmgDlbV28vW4Poe3NnOn7_O2hM&fid=0x0:0x387a465d37bfec0c"],"When":"2022-11-10"},{"Name":"Abed Bd","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXUqEneSVx460jzz-2h-xDCXsYCivIKJVNOkacYgdkisql7rxQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Inaccurate opening hours. Bakery closed at 3 PM on Sunday instead of the listed 4 PM time. Bought a dozen of cookies that were slightly stale and overpriced. Coffee was good and freshly prepared.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Meghan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWoCH7TjsWdi8L4bEoQS6okrekQ6ztRraGLcNfBL9TNpmHW5N-d=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Stopped by this morning to pick up bread and they had a great variety available, much to my surprise, given it was 10am. It wasn't overly packed or busy, so I was served promptly and without an issue. We opted to try the sunflower wheat bread (~$7), and they offered to slice it, which was great. For good measure, I also added in a chocolate chip cookie, also well done. Worth it!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN3H9ZUF4-Rpo-gH184BdjwlRuwTv-STUWSCvKT&fid=0x0:0x387a465d37bfec0c"],"When":"2021-8-20"},{"Name":"Jina Estrada","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVjz4Dd1aF85Wxta5MB_gJChlVEvd-lxhjIye7x6GqkBOMB08sy=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fantastic service! Super delicious & fresh breads. Their sandwiches were amazing. Totally recommend everyone!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOA0B_6vQ7oy0Wy6p7FnAMC4-5CFwNP4Z1xdWZJ&fid=0x0:0x387a465d37bfec0c"],"When":"2021-3-31"},{"Name":"Rebecca Victoria","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUNq5lAavlJQS8GmnVcucmTSm0yUrSzvdfPPF8yN5ySlSSNDUap=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Da best!!!
I really enjoyed the place (it has this  enchanting ambience that makes it super cozy) and the food... 💕
Just to let you know that you have a new fan coming from Joyce-Collingwood","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP0neIH8eX1lUTWBq_CKUH5MVumefMkJ0Ll63M0&fid=0x0:0x387a465d37bfec0c"],"When":"2024-1-19"},{"Name":"mike vulgaris","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWLUi98VqrF5wYFANUXFmY4nPcITByDNHHmDoQyKs6nwpDLU48=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A big shout out and thank you to Jas (owner/operator) of Mix Bakery and the helpful staff who put together a delicious assortment of pastries for the teachers and support staff of Moberly Elementary School.  So Grateful!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPpPjt4UGoocBSdjoMJgrbTMiOiReNLnrbMWD3V&fid=0x0:0x387a465d37bfec0c"],"When":"2024-4-5"}]

title: Teadot

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Kayla Ok","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU2ZPW-HOTvhKWxZVs_tiGZng-PPQOf1u70Mg0ytQnqF8DWQ4ac=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Ordered the ube Thai milk tea (50% sugar\u0026ice) and sparkling butterfly (50% sugar and ice). The ube Thai milk tea was still very sweet so I recommend getting 30% sugar but the sparkling butterfly is very good. I believe it is made with one slice of lemon, butterfly pea tea, and sparkling water. Overall good! Would come back to try again if I’m ever in the area!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPtv4dD7YYI5XGldYpKp3ei90BKFBJs5wKpaJKr\u0026fid=0x0:0x9e4fd0b17760f6f"],"When":"2024-5-7"},{"Name":"Jessie Z","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV7rY5GXYrgnFWWGhclB7nRZyXnC6KBTjFUnyAMrKowsAQmSrk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The service here is excellent and very prompt. I absolutely love their variety of fruit teas, which contain real fresh fruits. Every time I visit, there's always a line of students, and I often see Teadot cups in classrooms, indicating its popularity and great taste. I always opt for a half-sweetness fruit tea when passing by; it's not overly sweet, which makes me feel healthier. Next time, I'm excited to try their coconut and milk tea series. Can't wait!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNCF0u8PwYmpU3XGGjDs9trdwX0gT0-RPqaPQlf\u0026fid=0x0:0x9e4fd0b17760f6f"],"When":"2024-2-10"},{"Name":"Mariena Bui","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU6Nw1jeBXne8haJacgZytBHrMEqU2gmOMAF3l5QWK0CwO3rXPJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I ordered a Thai milk tea with oat milk and pearls. The drink was really good, although the pearls weren’t terrible, they definitely weren’t as fresh as they should be. The service was just average… the young lady there had a resting b**** face and seemed like she was just annoyed with customers. Something I want to mention is that I paid almost $8 for the large Thai milk tea which make sense with todays inflation, but just a heads up in case some people aren’t willing to pay that much. Overall I will still give it a 4 star because the milk tea was delicious and it wasn’t that the lady said something rude it’s just more the way she looked at people!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNGj1OEWdArCgSPachUqgGo2erqW601ArCmPaC5\u0026fid=0x0:0x9e4fd0b17760f6f"],"When":"2024-2-25"},{"Name":"r Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXb4SBG5_lbtiUh3LaeK2KSrEoMrsyS9788E4VMzVO1x9E6x1Bxsw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The amount of waiting is absolutely horrendous. Half an hour???? It's bubble tea, not fine dining. Even the wait time for the appetizer at a steak house is shorter than this. Also made a 50% sugar drink a no sugar drink. Absolutely would highly recommend steering away from this place, unless you are comfortable drinking a no sugar bubble tea with no tapioca and have plenty of time sitting around, which I imagine is quite uncommon in a university environment.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Melanie S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJuTvnujTiuCld6dzTIrNj0n-AZw6u2CPxxw_mM9poKt-FaeQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Service was good. It wasn't busy, and I was able to order and receive my drink quickly. And lots of unique drinks available. However, the drink I ordered was mediocre and on the expensive side. I ordered a Thai milk tea, half ice \u0026 sugar. At most BBT places, half ice \u0026 sugar is a good spot for me. Their Thai milk tea was very bland, with a slight grassy note. No creaminess that would be expected from Thai milk tea.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMkplwCMysftEjlCLPKtP_e66i9X1drxPxjaRiM\u0026fid=0x0:0x9e4fd0b17760f6f"],"When":"2023-8-14"},{"Name":"Grace","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVpyR6lW9JHiyXGuG73lo5A19PTb1WXFzVLCnrO84Gv3hfeDE5c=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Love their strawberry milk tea! I got it at 75% sweetness, which is the perfect amount of sweetness for me. The strawberry flavour doesn’t taste artificial, and the taste kind of resembles oat milk? Sadly, the pearls have always been somewhat hard the few time I’ve gotten them. I also like their matcha latte!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM0JmmKS9pDDYI2w8OFq_pD-DLFeg9WS9RK5UFS\u0026fid=0x0:0x9e4fd0b17760f6f"],"When":"2023-2-8"},{"Name":"Christopher Tan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU6fVhlEYcalwgBboNF8Es3eO0zqfV0XvoR9EcQMcIntJOA4ThM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I'm not sure why this place is rated so low. They balanced the flavours really well, and they had offerings that I've never seen in other bubble tea places.\n\nWe got the Thai Pumpkin Tea, and it was a unique combination of flavours that made sense.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOYXoQ0_umjTpUvyK7psO_kFf1WUYOD9Je5VUHX\u0026fid=0x0:0x9e4fd0b17760f6f"],"When":"2023-7-8"},{"Name":"AJ R","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLo4tIvUrcwNXdNPm8MhPpZgzsQXb-_lGpW8MEceFXJ5buZ1dI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great bubble tea and excellent customer service. I got the matcha strawberry.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPAHsQuRNbVpgsz2N_OGwdTQgZ7GUF6ouFIMz2W\u0026fid=0x0:0x9e4fd0b17760f6f"],"When":"2024-10-11"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Hao Jia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU3YE00Cf_hNepOiOv4jHg3HYs0vD2d00Cy-FC6WMGXrNKVOOU=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I paid for a triple with extra grass jelly and pearl. But they didn't give pudding that should have been in the triple. That means I paid more but got less.

Also, service is bad, no one served for the order in the front for a long time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNGUKRQXUT_yNaZsXjBctXme3fHaXwcICUxOD6J&fid=0x0:0xeb5779b857c58aa6"],"When":"2024-8-29"},{"Name":"Tony Li","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWPKcy0N8L_e03kCanD-kbqBYJvghgec1_Wu16Qs-S8YjI-PLg2nw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Busy, busy place filled with students on smartphones. Ordered a regular sized taro smoothie at the counter and didn't get a receipt nor a number. Waited to hear my order but never understood what was said. Instead I waited for a regular sized purple drink and there it was. Drink was tasty. Very creamy and lots of pearls too.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kyle","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWs053GhYARIlZkEUQOzBj0A9VuWxX9cJbEhTrAv-JU0tcleb_DSQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I ordered the Mango Tango, it was delicious and refreshing would highly reccommend! It was a little sweet with even 80% sugar so I would definitely reccommend half sugar or less from someone that even has a sweet tooth.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPKx1lUMjJwmG1oMrZHk2IZV6NFYNNiEeP__qTm&fid=0x0:0xeb5779b857c58aa6"],"When":"2022-6-20"},{"Name":"Herbert Camat","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVKXSkcN5npL56jCqrImwFWlxlBsiSCmQ0Pl7fUB01TSYknRkt_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I ordered the Jasmine Jade milk tea with sago! The drink was great, sweet and aromatic! So I definitely enjoyed the drink, the only downside is the wait time but other than that, great place for bubble tea!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNL7WQBv714nyzZl5I5h7Kc1reVFdhfdoe-leUX&fid=0x0:0xeb5779b857c58aa6"],"When":"2022-2-22"},{"Name":"Zay R","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIrcv0nbceihjzzaPr2LIIin5v_Tj9YhzMv8cvDTNxNVU0GSA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It’s my favorite bubbletea store! Offers a variety of tasty and delicious flavors, hazelnut milk tea is one of my favorites. I always have a pleasant experience at this specific location because of the staff (I wish i asked for his name. if I do in the future, I’ll edit my review and mention him). He’s very friendly and always brings up new suggestions for us to try. Love the place and drinks, and their amazing service.

Side note: i did enjoy their Christmas spirit during holiday times, they well demonstrated it in their new style cups for holiday season .","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMcMG4H31gSZAOcpPkCz25EROggdTN7eQc0kNBK&fid=0x0:0xeb5779b857c58aa6"],"When":"2021-2-21"},{"Name":"Tina","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUAKiC5J1ql1LsLTTfBwgvAj6sVGUusHXghumDKVG9ZTQ8QjcD_1w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Really great service but my problem is with Chatime’s drink quality.
There used to be a time when Chatime was good.. The drinks are just increasing in pricing and the taste is nothing more than sugary water.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNQD9IyDo6USwPjt6o1nT0xC6ZSmzkSXZGSMqSP&fid=0x0:0xeb5779b857c58aa6"],"When":"2023-6-1"},{"Name":"akshata desai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXXSK9iNd207mUVBJGLtYtpHF529ifcV5IYuMFcALsPhtvoF8-jKg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great place! But the chatime employee who was serving us wasn’t in a good mood n kind of rude to us.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOgL_2fOMj5dFQTyPPraBEAsDAzNB-ALQiPhBH-&fid=0x0:0xeb5779b857c58aa6"],"When":"2023-8-8"},{"Name":"Zoe Yang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVugLihQu1sa-lPZqQchAx0C3ALlzOLQQDQW7ea7J6LENsNiUE=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Made me wait for more than 20 minutes and get my order wrong. I ordered 100% sugar, they gave me 30% , and the tea tasted weird. I worried about their hygienic problem.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMSWYYqmfXdpZbUs2R9a0_3NwRqz7iy1hXxGq4e&fid=0x0:0xeb5779b857c58aa6"],"When":"2022-3-25"}]

title: Baroness Bubble Tea Broadway

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Grace","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVpyR6lW9JHiyXGuG73lo5A19PTb1WXFzVLCnrO84Gv3hfeDE5c=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I got a milo brown sugar with milk. The drinks here are a bit more expensive than other places, but their brown sugar pearls are delicious! They’re perfectly chewy and actually taste like brown sugar. I drink a lot of bubble tea, and the pearls here really stood out to me.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPBm8TY9qmY7Qe5Vwv1g7HRonoFg6lfHiEQH7_o&fid=0x0:0x1585ce54e1cae9a2"],"When":"2024-11-12"},{"Name":"Colin White","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLq4fQ6OQE4y0UWwm8Nz3Hk1VEbVJKSzASUf5e871C8_HK2ng=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I went back and discussed the different options with staff. They were really helpful and I decided to try the milk Earl Grey, it is delicious, best I've ever had. They wanted to do whatever they could to make it right. I will leave the original review below for context.

Thank you!

Original:
I just got the brown sugar winter melon tea with 50% ice and sugar. I've never had a more gross drink in my life, in the first sip I got a big bunch of crunchy sugar in my mouth and almost threw up 🤢🤢🤢. Honestly, still trying to get my appetite back. I lied and said that I liked it and gave it to my gf to try, also couldn't drink more than a few sips. We're both sitting here grossed out and with no appetite. Going to have to dump it out or something, the pearls were tasty so maybe I'll eat those.

I have no idea if it was made wrong or if I just don't like it. The colour was black like Pepsi. I normally like bubble tea and this place has such good reviews I might try again with something else. I'll try to remember to post an update if I do.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP_7yo7pCSjn-TvspmWZcWyJe8TqfVQJirlRosz&fid=0x0:0x1585ce54e1cae9a2"],"When":"2024-11-14"},{"Name":"Sophia H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJj7J89gHLVylfj7eNtEAHc3P50FouTDBLmVYxgTpUzNqmzNA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Baroness is great - I come here all the time! The bubble tea always tastes fresh, the pearls are always the right texture, and the employees are always friendly and nice. Plus, they have a discount for UBC students which is a HUGE plus!! I personally recommend the Thai style or anything from the brown sugar series, but their cheese foam is seriously the best in town. You really can’t go wrong with anything you order from here :)

Pictured is the Thai style organic milk tea (large) and the white peach oolong tea with coconut jelly (medium).","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOSNN03QrlsyCSmH1Ktf2Xk1rsmY7a9q07fOyJd&fid=0x0:0x1585ce54e1cae9a2"],"When":"2024-6-9"},{"Name":"Philip Raymond Lim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5EIBAgpBLsauhPMdjXym7mJ4fA8mtryDtWQIJCZfJxYXxupU8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"After having tried more milk tea options around the town, I’d like to say that this place stands out for their boba pearls, which are perfectly chewy and well-made. I ordered the fresh taro boba again, and  the peach oolong where I love the strength of the tea flavor which was also a highlight for me.

However, I’d take two stars away because I realized that my taste preferences have changed over time preferring to order things fresh. The flavors here rely solely on syrups with no fresh fruits, which was a bit disappointing. The shop is also hard to find I just realized, though the free parking and friendly staff make up for some of the inconvenience.

Overall, it’s worth a visit if you’re craving good-quality boba, but I hope they consider incorporating fresh ingredients in the future!
—————————————————————————————

The milk tea for me is average but what makes it 5* is the price. :)Taste is 4*. But Id give it 5* because in an expensive place like Vancouver, we also need affordable choices.

Peach Oolong- 4* Price 5*
Milk Tea- 4*
Yam OAt Milk Tea- 5*","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMSOkw6pTdaH7sGBz6WZYw-Dr3QHmWyGhXZbtUR&fid=0x0:0x1585ce54e1cae9a2"],"When":"2021-10-17"},{"Name":"Marlae Vermeer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIco1A-6wqSzJ846FbayaW04F9rZIRgZeT1Uu8XZpglkfTm6A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The homemade taro for the taro milk tea was delicious! The roasted oolong milk tea is so good as well! I recommend 30% sweet.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lauren G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLxuzD4dNBcnsFwfMfkGF5frTb1vGOSS2zVwisDrkV_gL4jEfjs=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I got the black tea with brown sugar pearls. It was really good, the pearls are a little softer than other places. I personally prefer firmer pearls but the softer ones were still good. I liked the atmosphere and decoration. Seating is limited to 3 tables so might need to wait a while if you plan to stay","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO69BPsLMBwAThZjrBNhpBFvbU5FWlWt5EpsG26&fid=0x0:0x1585ce54e1cae9a2"],"When":"2024-3-1"},{"Name":"Chris","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWi1Zb2rb8WzmDHm25mO97vMZyNiDlolkhi4GyV70rFgpDH76zt=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A cozy bubble tea spot located on the bustling West Broadway, offering a wide variety of flavorful options. While the drinks are excellent, seating is very limited, and there’s often a wait. It’s best to grab your drink to go and enjoy it on the move!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"leesa tran","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUWsWaHyhzcw7kKPh9V3HkvTK5TTa81TdmCDp9IylYllx4puXIy=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Small little bubble tea shop along broadway. The presentation of the lychee paradise drink was really pretty, I just wish it tasted more like lychee rather than lemon.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPthD2Xnrzz7oKOjHNBOSH0JA_gECUPF1h-TAkL&fid=0x0:0x1585ce54e1cae9a2"],"When":"2024-6-24"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Moses Anderson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVqP9o2Mxh1TbUgGeu8SzUgOoEYSltQvoNI1vKtAa_4jpobxCL5=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing baked goods! I am very impressed that the vegan and GF muffins are large, have good texture, and lots of flavours to choose from 👍 Also, even my cat seems to like the scones.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMbx7PB-wr1q7IhJ04-Yt0yTK7qPtHQNSMcLR9W&fid=0x0:0x58f47ab4d39c9e95"],"When":"2024-9-12"},{"Name":"Coline","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLbX_QKuaEf6ecbnocWzjer3WudYneLMe_JJVgbs8i0ijFAVg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love their sandwiches! The atmosphere is great, they have a mini bonfire outdoor sitting which I love. It does get packed during school term tho. The drinks are ok.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOS_Zq_evUK07fQpAswcFGj_GtmlHZX4AUnVmz_&fid=0x0:0x58f47ab4d39c9e95"],"When":"2024-7-3"},{"Name":"Jamie Glennon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWLOjs5-jqgyQWUX_yOuzgUG9TpUgCo3VZBWVH5vnxr8HdflLs=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great spot close to Chan Centre and Gage Towers for a high quality coffee and baked good in the morning.

Much better than the chain coffee shops!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOWllLnH-9j6g8HteXdulm-5IuO4DeupNnsxwGs&fid=0x0:0x58f47ab4d39c9e95"],"When":"2024-11-29"},{"Name":"Justbeing Sam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWM9hiJK-AfVP-qSHlK2ogC-KKU9aHv9jB-f8Zpy8fNkox9PG5e=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Nestled in a cozy corner, this cafe is a warm embrace of delicious coffee and friendly vibes in UBC . Baristas greet you with smiles, crafting your perfect cup with care. Vintage decor and irresistible pastries add to the charm, making it the perfect spot to unwind and connect.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOIzHKWJ5uIM5OYLtmxcD6VblvJoIt7iesMyagS&fid=0x0:0x58f47ab4d39c9e95"],"When":"2024-3-22"},{"Name":"Eden","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXgHIQ66Jm9chZEYySFVv8p0ryPQbWvKkG3vS_9dnDINf-CKCV_ZQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This beautiful cafe is highly suggested if you ever decide to staycation or study at UBC.

It is a pet-friendly cafe and offers quality products of fresh sandwiches, espressos, delicious homemade pastries [ with options of gluten-free], and spacious atmosphere with an outdoor fireplace! The staff were so welcoming, friendly, and excellent counter-costumer service.

Their business hours may not meet your needs nor expectations but they'll be opening early and close late once school starts in September.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOyppoj0m0i95g6EEpfFj7iN4tIukn51d2QckpU&fid=0x0:0x58f47ab4d39c9e95"],"When":"2021-8-8"},{"Name":"Jessica Lu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUTqZgPj0eXg_JYgAnVgUcTOilpA24BvBnkompjw1nEkEUn2g3_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Only been here once and ordered a matcha latte. It sucks. Tastes like milk and the matcha flavour is absent. My mistake for ordering drinks when this place is known for their sandwiches. The latte art was cute.

Staff are very kind and efficient especially because this place gets super busy.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tario Sultan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVs5egw4ytTDIua69pxGET59kVTaWgbfGJaRgqyQl37e1dCXZiC=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great Dane Coffee shop located towards the north side of UBC campus.

The staff is super friendly and helpful. Pretty good quality coffee, the price is definitely reasonable.

Highly recommended!

Keep it up guys.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNYAsbfa3t9q9Juj68FHljEPh0OO5hRwXWah_gi&fid=0x0:0x58f47ab4d39c9e95"],"When":"2022-12-14"},{"Name":"Dana Sullivan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWQIw-0oOUNgoyniYugTscGkgpKJS8tpx4V0tAajn3ZGkNIfqEk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Iconic coffee shop at UBC. The staff is really chill and friendly so the vibe is great, and the food/drink is good all around. In particular they have some of my favourite scones around. Their veggie sandwich is very very good (as long as you're prepared for your hands to smell like focaccia for the rest of the day). Except for during the summer, they have a daily soup which is always very tasty. The regular dessert pastries (brownie, cookies, dessert bars) are all good but not stand-out good, but they sometimes have fancier cakes which are amazing.
For their drinks, it is also really hard to go wrong. The masala chai latte is amazing - it's sweet but also richly flavoured with spices. The London fog is also very good. Both of these tea lattes use stone ground tea instead of brewed tea which I think contributes to the intensity. They do a great job with the matcha latte too - it's never clumpy at all. I used to be not the biggest fan of their coffee, but it's grown on me a lot. It's a bit on the acidic side, but if you don't mind that, then the flavour is pretty nice. I really like their mocha too (especially the peppermint mocha available in winter) - this is actually the only place where I really get mochas!
They have pizza nights now (7-10 Wed-Fri) where you can get a flatbread pizza big enough to feed two for less than $15. Only the very basic flavours available (margherita, bianca, or pepperoni), but super tasty (and cheesy).
The seating inside is limited and the space is so narrow that I find it very hard to be comfortable inside unless you go during a rare quiet hour, but I love the patio, which is huge and mostly covered. They sometimes turn the fireplace on during the cold season.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPWhxuY6zE3pvpsEAp5I-7RS-wKJgHl_8B7qvR0&fid=0x0:0x58f47ab4d39c9e95"],"When":"2020-10-24"}]
