user_reviews:
[{"Name":"El Styles","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXrrii3J8F9-5asxwPQAFrEFqNgl8kKXITZ3zJga8KlqLQjMRtjbw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"This is tough because I have always loved Pink Elephant  through the years at all the different locations I have been to that are no longer open. This seems to be the last remaining one. The food is so good (esp pad kee mao, red curry and spring rolls) although they have made some changes over the years I don't like as much. I always find the service to be good, especially at lunch - they can get you fed and out of there on time! It just reeeeaaaaally bugs me when a restaurant's online menu is out of date and prices are higher when you get there. Fix that and I will give 5⭐","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNTQ5-9Y5nbRxm8k5VaU9EGNMDHCdn7ZqX33r71&fid=0x0:0xd602003b05d77f34"],"When":"2024-9-5"},{"Name":"Herman Ma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUNkiZiWTHH4AMcQS5P0e7HeuuBX0dNeXwCFqQ9w2c9ob5i37E=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came in for dinner after golfing and enjoyed some very good dishes.  Pork Jowl Salad, Chili Basil Wings, Oxtail Curry, and Black Cod.  The dishes were very flavorful and authentic.  This location has a cafe side and a restaurant side.  Food and Service was excellent, will return to try more dishes that they offer.  Plenty of street parking available as well.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOwmMwLPKhUFJmHuelAesUg6Rl-SYZwIIR7L46X&fid=0x0:0xd602003b05d77f34"],"When":"2023-7-2"},{"Name":"Patrick Chin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXfqQ576ERK8XNZqdO6FJ9KfO2oF9cxNCzwYsLRqB9EpPQi40PiZw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is no ordinary ice coffee… ask for Donut and she’ll make you Thai ice coffee that will remind you of Asia!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP_zorBClxoQqwF0zVqRBIK1btFaGvE3UfNbABr&fid=0x0:0xd602003b05d77f34"],"When":"2024-12-7"},{"Name":"Meghna Lohia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXDKr_p1LlgcuGuLVIbh3NBjokSxaSc0Kjo7j56Mx18FfR4wRsK=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love coming here! They have affordable and good drinks, specials throughout the week, good thai food for dinner. It’s a vibe! I would say maybe they could improve upon their food options at the coffee counter, because they clearly can make some good stuff, so show it off in the baking too! Otherwise, it’s a great local place and I’m glad it’s here, cuz I need coffee.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Catherine Byrdy (Byrd)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV8uqMGqbkqGknJWQpYOqYnRycihvurvs3aDaz_7RfiDzMksAc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is adorable!!! We were hungry, had 25minutes to spare; I saw a cafe and demanded, “stop here”. I love pink and elephants, but I had no idea. You can tell the owners really care about their business, as every detail has intention. And the the best part, the food was amazing and they had wine, even one of my favourites. Absolutely divine.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO7tqtRolI1L_dEwKAVks10zF30i325sQD4NNA&fid=0x0:0xd602003b05d77f34"],"When":"2021-9-29"},{"Name":"Allan Jarczak","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI5lii5x3jzHsbgojd__n6bk0jrQByqDlslPIHHRDBGzpD6SQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Really nice, family run vibe.
The coffee is remarkably good at a fair price.
Hidden gem in the neighborhood.
Strongly recommended.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Alex C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLkNUhTMtqSiLd95lbrM29L1ejA76QLgpiRpQaZl_2nkhTdsw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Delicious, and awesome coffee. I’m so thrilled that they opened a cafe version of Pink Elephant in this neighborhood.

Also helps that you can do takeout in a jiffy as they have a cold section and a hot foods/dine in option!

Update: I changed my review due to the measly portions for takeaway containers. No way they should be 17.99. Other places down in Kerrisdale is 11.99 for a full sized meal.

Edit: Improved to 4 stars. They now have a lunch menu starting at 13.50 per. MUCH more reasonable. If they can enhance their soup noodles and offerings, they are a 5 star","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM4-sU9ZopsXOEtMpZQt24YT0EO-g2T0tEB9Uxi&fid=0x0:0xd602003b05d77f34"],"When":"2021-8-6"},{"Name":"chenying wang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVohyi9laAnJ1eV4iDaY0BV1V6uumpi-oh9eNd3Ad2B5FmchvmW=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"very nice and warm place to hang out. It's beyond what I expected (especially after reading the negative comments). Thai chicken wrap is fairly good and their chai tea latte is really great. don't know why but their 16oz drink is a bit larger than any 16oz drink I have ever seen in the U.S.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMMI55-nSYW8-zuCG2YEF1bmSH8mPO_-fdIIHld&fid=0x0:0xd602003b05d77f34"],"When":"2018-9-1"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Alexis Hara","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLtTZCCJcMYHqK35OHV2lSV26p3C6dtEPNpqu1lKu0sXCRkIg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nice place for smoothies, they don’t put added sugar in them. I had a Horchata which was good but a little warm. Could have used some ice but the top was already sealed so I couldn’t add any in. Cute little seating area if you want to stay and have your drink there.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMNj8cv-5kkRRF4y4p8kI3vvyzxFDhDzkQF0aUY&fid=0x0:0x3f872d79db0c9752"],"When":"2024-8-28"},{"Name":"Ines Hui","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXO6tO3ObSJOaBDiurPV4CNOj-yN1JdR7NXgGjY24t7x4qWWu6J=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Super tasty & healthy juice and smoothies! We got the Mango Mint and Apple Kiwi 🥝 All juices have no sugar added :) They also have boba options if you want to go for something sweet!!🧋 Vegan options for sweet treats when in stock 😋
Friendly service and really great quality fresh fruits 🌟☺️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMCPrhA-oBsuPeBN-sm-tOysUloZz9yIN3dgsPk&fid=0x0:0x3f872d79db0c9752"],"When":"2024-10-6"},{"Name":"Jonah Escarcha","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWzy3suS860vzgayjvhesytv3SGq1QtefuNIw-0KHPvl0gR0l3h=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had a great experience at Vita Villa! Very welcoming & friendly staff which made for a pleasant experience. Had the Thai Iced Tea and it was refreshing and delicious. Will go again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPtH1APUVq2X-ev5Jq7ZAgBaDSX84qioGTyEAx2&fid=0x0:0x3f872d79db0c9752"],"When":"2024-10-4"},{"Name":"Michelle Huang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVWMT44Sh3ucTXtud55_nHzbs7v5b_DEZ5qcZ7OaBh1ddZrXfoihQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The shop changed owners and most of the good reviews are from under the old business. The bubble tea used to be amazing, with high quality ingredients and very soft chewy pearls. Now the pearls are hard, the milk is not as fresh, and the whole drink is too sweet, even at 50% sweetness. Unfortunately, I won’t be returning even though I live just up the block.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Emelia Blakeman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV7vWvQlEB0pkhr_7-d5b3tYIUiiEaU9Tqp_BAh3oJT1VDVT2FE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This has become my favorite bubble tea spot! I usually get the Fresh Taro Sago Coconut drink which is so flavourful and delicious. The bubble waffle is tasty too and there are 3 options to choose from. I love how they also offer the traditional milk tea, or fresh fruit smoothies. It's really the perfect place for anyone craving a yummy drink. The owner is lovely and very generous. I would recommend coming here next time you're in the area!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM8ZXcxfe2ZBPZ0JiAvULerE-R_ZxhEgaEG4zB_&fid=0x0:0x3f872d79db0c9752"],"When":"2022-4-13"},{"Name":"May Zhagro","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU9KviWdU_UGm6yjKPv-6aFaljm1EC_ecrxYhnt_LO3duiyBNho=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Got the pearl milk tea, you can customize sugar and ice levels. The drink tasted a bit different from the other chairs and the pearls were not as soft and chewy. Very clean shop with looks to be the two owners working behind the counter. They have a small shelf of other products like plushies that are sold.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOeMX1gEFCCRckCN6QCe8KdCp65qq3r1k4pLAKn&fid=0x0:0x3f872d79db0c9752"],"When":"2023-5-27"},{"Name":"Krystelle Cadorna","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK2lAIsPz0t-dq2mRFJk_7KJ3V99ewOwgcsd_pq7elOQ-foOw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"i love coming here. My go to is always a mango slushie but there are so many drinks. because i come here often, i try to get as many different drinks. overall very cute store and friendly environment would definitely recommend trying out","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"HL","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWgp3lTtRvzt0uvoLCm5kwsadkBWr8JSOeZkeyMBYgn0uJ1UtE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"📷: @heidieatnbbt (Instagram)
The biggest temptation in my life: BUBBLETEA 🧋

Found this rather new small business in Kits awhile ago. Tried their milk teas and fruit slushes. Slushes are still the best in my opinion ( ; ›ω‹ )

Their pearls are never disappointing as well; strong flavor of black sugar and chewy!!

Their thai milk tea isn’t that sweet but the milk has stronger flavor than the thai tea.

🧋: lychee mango slush & thai milk tea

Still recommended to everyone!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMX8X3-PLPo7BZtID-x5q011u3uTdItEbPGLnlt&fid=0x0:0x3f872d79db0c9752"],"When":"2021-7-29"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Chris Charles","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVrISq9W73HrjlGADtJWok_5lo7jNqrkaquC2lVl_FVv-ialwI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Wonderful local family run resto!   The large won ton soup is awesome and a very delicious and decent size for dinner.  Love the all day breakfast option — fantastic!   I love small family run restaurants like this and will absolutely be back often.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMzzpSsvSo9NdUejT5ceu-n91Jgxo6do63p05xS&fid=0x0:0xc26c4c2ecf810fe2"],"When":"2024-12-14"},{"Name":"rinatchalove","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVuO1rntC2oQZoKUtOqm6IaTQ4wBM26jAlbbqW4w8YxelmhLiM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"They’ve got breakfast items and lunch and dinner combos. We’ve tried sandwiches and deep fried wontons, the breakfast is really good too. Prices are cheap considering vancouver overall is expensive. They have costco fries :D

Edit:
Still coming here regularly after 8 months. Quality is still great. I like breakfast and chicken tendies, as well as their rice combos. Lovely spot with good food and friendly staff still ^^","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMasAZEciCJlAAJVdg4WhKsLiizCJJKSXydJ9Ow&fid=0x0:0xc26c4c2ecf810fe2"],"When":"2024-2-21"},{"Name":"Debbie Balcome","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV9KngEkP8KTFTuqBLjtR3bj1gNln8qnW3C_-ZgV6tuowAstno=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I happened to just be walking by and saw the menu board and went in to enjoy the all-day breakfast.
Quick and friendly service and the classic breakfast was very good. Coffee cup never went empty and the waitress stopped by many times to check on me. Just like the name, it is a cozy place to relax, and eat.
I will be coming back to try some of the other items on the menu.
Recommend coming here.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ana A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJXCLLTMKr_q6IUgwiu229L_cM6d_QE5kGh7lAcBlAVSPAo2A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We stopped by for some breakfast yesterday and the food was delicious. I ordered a breakfast plate and my husband ordered an omelette. Both were tasty and the portions were generous. The staff is nice and very welcoming. Highly recommend if you’re in the area.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jace Ma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU6iNFPvDEXTVIULjm5RfvZXUjlocXVp54Tk1rzIk2I62Y_kF3j9Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had the Wor Won Ton soup with noodles. Very generous portions. Delicious! We'll be back, for sure. I really appreciate a family diner-like atmosphere. The menu says this one is 3rd generation owned, over 40 years in the family.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMC7CO0vIN4hYxroYXcgVjzm5StOihuXy4N70Kx&fid=0x0:0xc26c4c2ecf810fe2"],"When":"2023-9-9"},{"Name":"Caro line","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKyk6aC3nH307XHlAqQJVf_vaUzCfdM2xqbfqnQUmwb5Nnp=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We went there for breakfast and it was really good. And generous. The orange juice and hot chocolate were really good too. And the waitress was nice. We would definitely comeback if in the neighborhood again. Thanks","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"joel ornoy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJT4n_Mzmgzme-NDWj4uUh4TcrddwOdCp8EzdT81WLkg7rM7A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Ordered a large wonton soup for takeout this afternoon. There were no other customers at the time. I came home to find the cover was loosely fitted and soup has spilled out into the bag. Very fortunate, that I wasn't burnt by it or that my new car's seat wasn't damaged.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sartaj Singh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU1doLfhIpPIdYO53EoD_63mHYE3jrQc1kxM-CAvFcju93a6Z1xPA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The name is an apt description of the atmosphere. The aroma of coffee lingers in the air as a result of the unlimited refills and the very kind staff. The food is fantastic to top it all off. Highly recommend dining in rather than take out, the ambience is an essential component of your experience here!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMCvuz51uH9cXVHenuTviHtA1xFzZBYTjcKUiV3&fid=0x0:0xc26c4c2ecf810fe2"],"When":"2021-6-1"}]

title: Hey I am Yogost
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"highlights","name":"Highlights","options":[{"name":"Great tea selection","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Dandelion","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKJnCBjURentcv9M9kwiAVaqUv0Oa3dVNRRwy7Ho9_RdQY7=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"**(READ THIS)**
Terrible location to go for yogurt drinks!

I ordered a mango mochi yogurt drink, being one of my go to drinks from this franchise. After receiving it and bringing it home I was questioning where the color (yellow) and mango was from my drink. After taking a sip I was extremely disappointed that there was no taste of mango and only the taste of yogurt.

This location deceive it's customers from their advertisement of the drink and one can clearly compare my drink (from the photo) to those online that they are cheating their ratios.

Having spoken to the employee working that day, they informed me their manager refuses to replace my drink and that if I wanted more mango I should just order their fresh mango drink next time. The audacity from this manager to fail to realize how his response and actions will lead me and future consumers to steer clear of this place!

Thank you for reading~","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPaFd0HbWDWDtOEYiZ_RubecW7iEq9lQXqLPDI&fid=0x0:0x8ca921a39666f870"],"When":"2024-10-17"},{"Name":"Lucy Li","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVuwCjTEBDQem6hcfmmxSA0I0nNlJPkS88N0KyjwlMUZAjI_Jdm8w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The drinks here are pricy but tastes good! My go to is the peach mochi yogurt. It doesn’t taste artificial at all and the mochi topping is super yummy. Their mochi drinks are all pretty good imo. It’s ~$10 for a medium sized drink which is on the expensive side but it’s worth trying if you’re in the area :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOmKKc2fGNTPg3wxdo1g_tDNbnGLvrPt1WTAdNW&fid=0x0:0x8ca921a39666f870"],"When":"2024-10-18"},{"Name":"R L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXDo--fdptHZ71prIhGQPJ7FahkbWrF05rgkw3OmUDlyk4sGVAj=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Expensive, but tasty. Good for an occasional treat! I like mochi a lot. It is a bit of a choking hazard though if you suck on the straw too hard trying to get at the last bits of the drink stuck at the bottom of the cup 😂","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOD2pf229CNiNpQmprs7f5ET_1V172wt1ZZ5tHn&fid=0x0:0x8ca921a39666f870"],"When":"2024-10-10"},{"Name":"Ivy Shen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIONvP8egk-4bEJDED-Vu9Sw_ux-5P6BgSu_ZjFPiWdI5ywpA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My friends and I always come here for a sweet treat. Mike and Cynthia are the friendliest yogurt-ristas , they make the yogurt experience extra special!🤩","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNiE5b_FqsWssENPXrqam85UXicyIO0Mr3sqXGz&fid=0x0:0x8ca921a39666f870"],"When":"2024-11-18"},{"Name":"Jalal Khouhak","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVclqVH87OZmLXh208eHQQGPnJIjocfhvuF158JR0_LSB-gls0t=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I got mango mochi yogurt! It was awful! It was a waste of money!
If you do not like your job, close it!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOzbwr8CNwWI_SpaCkbw8RyU5uMGSXr1OThIwRk&fid=0x0:0x8ca921a39666f870"],"When":"2024-10-5"},{"Name":"Daniel Cheng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWrVd67d7uU974eU_qTUE2z9HO_CgJZEmwGwQZmsR3nz_Sy-AdO=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Average yogurt drink, honestly it tastes okay for its price. I paid CAD 6.83 for its classic drink on the top 10 menu, I felt like the recipe can be easily found in google😂

So 1 star for the drink… 2 star for the friendly staff, clean and comfortable seating area which is good for chatting and relaxing for a day

They got courtesy umbrella for customer on rainy day☔️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMlyj8sVuZ251jBE4XXYA47dYykO3JvP8zxGz1d&fid=0x0:0x8ca921a39666f870"],"When":"2023-1-15"},{"Name":"Stephanie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJBV5KRG75WlxmWo1wuDhWSQhlZCOao4V2_9kFkOn0OqRNe45TP=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I got the peach and strawberry yogurt and the peach yogurt. Would recommend the peach yogurt slush because it has this delicious jasmine tea jellies inside. Very refreshing and would be good in the summer. The strawberry yogurt slush was not bad I liked the strawberry preservative at the bottom. Both drinks didn't have a lot of yogurt inside. Would have preferred it if there was more yogurt inside. It helps keep the drink from watering down from the ice. I got both drinks at 100% sweet but would most likely recommend 50% sweet if you like your drinks less sweet.
If you go, get the peach yogurt slush","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN7bIolH6g5uMTYZStg_TixDpnqy-8N03ADoW99&fid=0x0:0x8ca921a39666f870"],"When":"2022-3-23"},{"Name":"Lena Nguyen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKFF2YVIEHma8hK6QvMsy_X0DpvMJIi5mqAiebn1SeUxYRpKg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"So delicious! Amazing customer service. Have returned twice this week and always delicious drinks! Got the mango and strawberry rice yogurt 🤗 thanks Mike for the yummy suggestions!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO6RM8kIIfKP4R7TQnyuNbdpgbdhyohz_sv_206&fid=0x0:0x8ca921a39666f870"],"When":"2024-4-10"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Dvir M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUxK6vUXIZPF_mBYpyYRstLoQm3iHWCiUkMzdVCeCCrurOmcIbk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Today’s lunch break was here.
Plenty of free parking around here. So don’t be stressed on finishing your break/date fast. This is a very busy place. I love the selection of their food. So consistent every time I come here. This business it’s an oiled machine. They get orders so fast and efficient. Nice atmosphere.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP_1McRcKZnMjrGV8RHJuMJGcAaAVyHMeDbHBvh&fid=0x0:0xf44e9b99dda06cdd"],"When":"2024-11-8"},{"Name":"Anas El-Aneed","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVlQ9-9X_Ve-n29FTeSernlhjnhGb-3U9yFLZsMUHalU5l4CfNoZQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Nice coffee shop with seating areas for those wanting to use the computer and another area for socializing with friends (no computers allowed).

The food was very good for the sandwich and superb for the éclair 😋  the passion fruit pistachio tart was not good at all, a sugar bomb!

The Americano was excellent 👌","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP2I1LDQbrmDaa5HgHNidYcchzR0sTemn-00xYB&fid=0x0:0xf44e9b99dda06cdd"],"When":"2024-8-19"},{"Name":"Grace Fletcher","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKcreOCIakX64kQhwGj1oW27JbDmKtnam7shxhFJKTYEnVQKA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here because it was the only bakery open so early and wasn’t really expecting much, but I was absolutely blown away at how delicious everything was! It was the highlight of my entire trip. We had the earl grey cream puff, a chocolate banana muffin, and a London fog. Everything was amazing. Highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOh614sKNLtayIdKDPlqMuUQpdwChUFBFEQ5r8u&fid=0x0:0xf44e9b99dda06cdd"],"When":"2024-11-29"},{"Name":"Kate MacMillan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIiOn4CRGx0W_zSOwBbarfyqFWSHlevsQZQeL5cK3AEIglcjA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"After a bad interaction at a pie shop close by I decided to come to Breka instead.

I ordered their Kaluha mouse cake (gf) and a dark hot chocolate. The cake is so rich and the texture is very perfectly airy. Compared to other mouse’s I’ve had in the city, this rates best. The quality is just 😙🤌🏻

I also ordered donuts for my
Husband to go: Apple fritter, pistachio crème, and lavender earl grey. They are well priced and husband rated them all at 10/10

The staff are also so welcoming and helpful! Despite the huge crowds, things are kept clean!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMJyJxr5JwiDGnwamj5E7iGLIG_Btotr9gucAjG&fid=0x0:0xf44e9b99dda06cdd"],"When":"2024-10-12"},{"Name":"GOZDE Kilic","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUywfFev2T_aNUd3Hhof86yAL56zOfCSebLsolBAv89xxXYh-lE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We bought 4 different cakes 3 teas and 1 white chocolate mocha. The employee who prepared the cakes was angry. The coffee was cold and the person who prepared it spilled it outside and it was cold. The cashier did not understand the order of 3 teas and this delayed us. It was a very bad experience. The prices are normal. I will never come here again","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMXmpTyC30FVPs1Tr3DgGmQ0HyqWEhWBIvtQDea&fid=0x0:0xf44e9b99dda06cdd"],"When":"2024-7-24"},{"Name":"Elise","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUAYP2G-alnjSorwzyfQ69qNocljtP4M-bSThdIupRh68-TjGY1=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great place! The Dark Chocolate Mocha is so good, the caramel macchiato also. Taste great, not too sweet. I would highly recommend this place. We had a lovely time, the atmosphere and the service were fantastic.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNjBa_mi8WfIkC-UYnEjOYCzeq0L4Zf_IB45m2i&fid=0x0:0xf44e9b99dda06cdd"],"When":"2024-9-19"},{"Name":"Jenny N","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUaxdBwctNYeHtF6FNDIm_BbIZLLsF3RQfHtKR-LN2ouCWLjKjv=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The food was okay with plenty of choices, though not everything on the menu was great. However, the quality matches the price, making Breka really good value for money. Being open 24/7 is a huge bonus. If you find yourself wanting to head out late at night in this city, Breka is probably your only option.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM8rygVLz6a1Rhk3AmSYSQQFsi0R77WL1EqigDI&fid=0x0:0xf44e9b99dda06cdd"],"When":"2024-2-13"},{"Name":"Herbert Camat","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVKXSkcN5npL56jCqrImwFWlxlBsiSCmQ0Pl7fUB01TSYknRkt_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Breka… Love this cafe! The service was fast and efficient. I loved the plethora of baked goods! My personal favourite was the Earl Grey Cream Puff! It was sweet, flavourful and a good price! I loved the atmosphere that Breka had to offer!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOmSaPCI-kP6Cww2LQRb3cYGfiJ67CQwIWKnnSv&fid=0x0:0xf44e9b99dda06cdd"],"When":"2024-2-24"}]

I ended up getting tieguanyin milk tea with pearls 70/70. Super good! The pearls had a great chewy texture that was soft on the outside.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMYCMadobQHGVICouGy7zcLnV7SKKRPv_LsqHbQ\u0026fid=0x0:0x1778b9d80950428d"],"When":"2020-2-18"},{"Name":"Salome Lau","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXR9ltIssQMvZOid-YcE08R1f-Q8M5P7GycdYA9tRY02youh3mu=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Staff were really nice!! I went here for the Seokjin birthday event and it was a really cozy place 🥺 I got a matcha float but the combination of sweet (honey) and bitter (matcha flavor) didn't sit well with me. But I really enjoyed my experience here, especially with the event 😍💜","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNjpGKjtl_joHYpCddMXJ8Sx5N5qyNRLIxgROxg\u0026fid=0x0:0x1778b9d80950428d"],"When":"2019-12-4"},{"Name":"Tai Huynh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWksg4fkjyu9DNzFBfMuCZVhTi9ySnlu8PK_BvWmALLmOLfujWsog=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Probably one of the best bubble tea in town, went to other places and the pearls just not good comparing to this place. The pearls were soft but still chewy. Love that they use honey to sweet their drink!!! The staff were friendly.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM6p_RgCUoS4IysQjWy98oSCe3wm6PhwTilKOgt\u0026fid=0x0:0x1778b9d80950428d"],"When":"2021-7-22"},{"Name":"Charlotte Lemon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUBGEksaK_7VlfIeUHqqUdPTDBm8PDWvF3I80rQuP83-CAXkjelIw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Kung Fu tea serves average bubble tea with very friendly service in a comfortable and clean environment. Drinks overall are on the pricey side, but that's worth it if you enjoy your drink here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNS_4wFfcmfrxiLy7l2eqPpaNKSFBlH3oNQXTAR\u0026fid=0x0:0x1778b9d80950428d"],"When":"2019-3-26"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Annika Ho","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWafHtiGp2TwoPK-PZJyXay0PsTEdDPlGVGezx0h-nFEdeXZFI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a fabulous spot for coffee!!

Really glad we happened to stumble across this place, super charming and cozy and tucked away so it's quiet. Didn't have a chance to get any of their food items off their menu, but the scone we had was delicious and so was the coffee. All the pastries in the case looked amazing too!

If you're a big coffee enthusiast, this is the place to be.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNCLvDs5ndMSa5qVeowYk3kbK9iYFvzLPHXL7Jn&fid=0x0:0xcc5a332a54148826"],"When":"2024-12-9"},{"Name":"jack T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL_GOBdyl7EqqVLlou-CpPk_lYwmgCQUnJRzDDfvPW7vbD_VA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"La Cuisson (French, the cooking)
We are a regular here for the last year+. Sometimes 2-3 times a week.
This is very cozy, enjoyable, and clean Café for lunch or an afternoon tea and dessert with friendly staff. Nice tables and comfortable chairs. Even the restroom is exceptional and very clean.  We sure enjoy the peace and quiet here.

The owner, Jason once ran a coffee school in Richmond. My dad was one of his students.

Check lacuissoncafe.com for their menu.
We like their Croissants, salmon or ham. Panini and quiche are delicious too.
For the coffee, everyone's preferences may vary.
If you have tasted their coffee, you’re likely not willing to return to 7-Eleven or Starbucks.

My mom loves Latte. I had their regular Americano, Colombian, Santos, Kenya, Mandheling, Antigua, some Ethiopia and Java.. etc. or I just told Jason(or his staff) to make whatever you like to surprise me. Never disappointed. No idea what Blue Mountain tastes like since it's expensive.

All the homemade desserts were made by the owner's wife, Tina. You can see her on Saturday. I like their cheesecake.

Parking: you may park on the street or underground parking at London Drugs that is free for the plaza customers including those visiting this café.

Btw, it’s a small business and they do have a minimum service charge. If you rate them a one-star solely due to the cafe policy rather than their food or atmosphere, that's not a genuine review. You could have easily walked away after the staff explained it to you.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPzmKIUOGgIYi5wST7MH3YEqUb8Pe-X3yRpEPPT&fid=0x0:0xcc5a332a54148826"],"When":"2024-9-19"},{"Name":"Matthew Leung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLYuIVApLKMPjt9zu1GefK44gyZMe6R8I0BhVEPTJXFXxzdaC6x=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Jason is very knowledgeable about coffee! His passion shows as he let me try different kinds and explains the different types of beans. They roast the coffee in-store.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMGJNFvvYDqXzKwncufLxcBKWoayi7cZlI1mVic&fid=0x0:0xcc5a332a54148826"],"When":"2024-12-20"},{"Name":"Jack Lu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUeZBEbanlSUPS99_D34851mHldfWNp5oFnLuljymA4fa-ULRqL=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A friend of mine recommended I can come here and enjoy my time with great coffee.
I’m glad that I did and met Jason and king.
They were so friendly and sharing a lot of coffee flavors, taste and coffee processing. highly recommed!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNLiuzVbJ3E2cFfHmrc128RwdiXDmA6VIPgkG8n&fid=0x0:0xcc5a332a54148826"],"When":"2024-10-30"},{"Name":"P S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKrlIUkf9-8ai951RwUCSGqhhYaXUNSSv7B1ujqMWgalt0mcA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had a wonderful coffee experience here. Greatly appreciate the hospitality and professionalism of the owner. The taste of the coffee is distinct and pleasant, and the cake is delicious as well! I will definitely visit again. :D","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN2e2bKKcuQycaNW5UrSRGAoFCl6eX3SLr-XX4&fid=0x0:0xcc5a332a54148826"],"When":"2024-8-10"},{"Name":"lucas waldin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX-3jEDhjciFm99brS90U0_2JaKli8LWWnfUJDxbQksYo-i9qTy=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolute best coffee. Super service, and the brew process is a special experience. Off the beaten path a bit but worth it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM2EcU7Eqsy8mvaVNRkE0qb1WqBN0hKqInLxQl9&fid=0x0:0xcc5a332a54148826"],"When":"2024-11-1"},{"Name":"Tom Liao","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIUlM-NuMyJlyslSzeH9HUkxz3V2ZHQcCUCZJ4vvNEjL6HPew=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The best coffee place in town! The owner Jason is a coffee master. He is so knowledgeable in coffee and can teach every customer how to enjoy a cup of coffee without adding any cream or sugar. Their dessert are all made in house. If you want to taste high quality coffee, this is the place to go. You won’t regret it!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOcqqCitb0rpUcLgvkS2EBeARmNi71F_De7CjJl&fid=0x0:0xcc5a332a54148826"],"When":"2023-8-2"},{"Name":"Linda Pham","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW5DHUj43BXss3jnyDMHckZXqctmxN50LsLdAl9md4ANwi6dsfR=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A must visit! With the saturated market of coffee shops, La Cuisson is unique in its quaint, vintage style feel, artistry and craftsmanship into creating the perfect cup of coffee, and the most delicious cakes that pair perfectly.

The owner is extremely knowledgeable and provided unique blend of drinks. If you’re a coffee nerd, you’ll definitely appreciate the qualities and work to bring the aromatics and taste of each brew.

I got the yirgacheffe that was recommended. I wasn’t sure if I’d like it as I like a kick and bitterness to my coffee but wow was this incredible and different! They also use a syphon to brew the coffee, a style I never had seen which was like a cool chemistry contraption. It definitely brings out a more enhanced coffee flavour and experience.

The hazelnut coffee cake texture pairs perfectly with all types of coffee and it’s crunch and sweetness level is perfect.

All in all, if you have a deep appreciation for coffee this is a must visit shop! And if you just enjoy coffee for the taste, check it out anyway. It’s totally worth the experience!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNTdF_taZZpoxn1XayZGec9qLSGACIvF-t1uvQl&fid=0x0:0xcc5a332a54148826"],"When":"2023-10-28"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"tavers","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVC7ILtSlxfdDxb6V9J462gwa1fPiceOnM23OIRkX4ftST7PlY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Service and ambience are top notch. The Flat white was very good. Fresh taste with great milk texture. I was a bit skeptical of the food but they proved to deliver well in all aspects. Would highly recommend it as a great indoor spot to hangout with friends!! Or to grab a coffee and work.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNhSYehv2wq07htac850vd5ow0w9eKc9qtlQJSn&fid=0x0:0xfa30b951a6612dbd"],"When":"2024-12-15"},{"Name":"Matthew","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKkMlSnDr2JBrkgtoRYPWQqQ_MvSVSbxSghkJ3-rQNN-gD9ulw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"spacious cafe, cozy ambience, great pastry selection that you need to come back, the latte i had was well made and even better was that oatmilk is free of charge. this is cafe is my new favourite spot. will have to try to come back at night as a wine bar.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOrr9FXIuZ2Bwo41I52EJRXr69MhskRJQTJj9uf&fid=0x0:0xfa30b951a6612dbd"],"When":"2024-11-25"},{"Name":"Michael Moriarity","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWNhkYaB9zjlkkl74OBPcplO2QslT6bqh419yvto-fc4bLKxsqAKQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"this cafe has created a very warm and cozy atmosphere and the interior provides  a cafe by day and a wine bar in the evenings…the staff are authentic in their greeting and their hospitality…our Classic Brekkie breakfast order met and exceeded our expectations, each bite was very tasty and the Cafe Misto has become our unique favourite coffee to order…","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM-Zb_jR7awczBBJ0E5WnjoYja5n0TxwihaNQZi&fid=0x0:0xfa30b951a6612dbd"],"When":"2024-12-3"},{"Name":"C T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUgS9_N3RvGRzjGP4q0CjRyk4CzxkTzB4cNEPmyEXeU-p7IBoH2mQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My recent visit to ‘Just Another’ was a delightful experience, perfect for date night. The restaurant exudes a romantic ambiance with its subtle lighting and soft music, setting the stage for a memorable evening.

The wine selection impressed us with its variety, catering to both classic and adventurous palates. Each recommendation from the staff was spot on, complementing our meal wonderfully.

As for the food, it was nothing short of spectacular. Every dish, from appetizers to entrees, was beautifully presented and bursting with flavor. The menu’s diversity ensures that there’s something for every taste, and the quality of the ingredients shines through in every bite.

Service at ‘Just Another’ was impeccable. The staff were attentive, knowledgeable, and added to the overall positive experience with their professionalism.

In summary, ‘Just Another’ is the ideal spot for anyone looking for a romantic setting with top-notch food and wine. It’s definitely a place to return to, and I highly recommend it for a special evening out.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMImc0FCFOFDIdSLNAgWTtqc9jBWdI2KY1HFYPP&fid=0x0:0xfa30b951a6612dbd"],"When":"2024-2-1"},{"Name":"tikki","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWzV_Y6bQFjodBKC8anq5nBVFmCTC7hA6Nh7xklFQuKGefK40A_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of my favourite brunch spots & coffee shops on West Broadway! The brunch items are always great and the pastries are amazing as well! The patio seating was just so comfortable as well!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNtSBpcoaJ05I69guEjuXyxxNrAhYo2c7X5iane&fid=0x0:0xfa30b951a6612dbd"],"When":"2024-6-23"},{"Name":"Camila Ramos","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXNulqN_8TZcYcx9LLqa82kxwnVqBPBqyHKAiyPKufDy432TawP=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We tried Brightside for the first time this weekend for brunch, and really enjoyed it! The space is well designed and the food and the pastries were delicious. They have fresh pressed orange juice and their coffee was not above and beyond but still good.
We had the shashuka eggs and the brisket and they were both incredible.
We will for sure be back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNLZyU3Y4FUE5s2Ydu6WBM4CY-sAur77dVnq-ec&fid=0x0:0xfa30b951a6612dbd"],"When":"2023-2-28"},{"Name":"Gregory Kehm","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVHwkFiN0ZimbmFXnCj5WuXUxSGZEVmb7k1zQTV7nSvkB1lvAhheQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My first time enjoying Just Another. The name is far from the truth. There is brilliance in the business plan and skill in its application. A mixed concept of cafe, wine bar, dinner spot with a culinary lift that make this a unique place for many occasions.

I tried the breakfast egg Sammy with salad and shared a berry tart. Loved the varied flavours and care in its preparation. The tart pastry was light and easy to enjoy after the egg Sammy which was well proportioned for one person and yummy all around. My complaint for most variants of the breakfast Sammy is they can be bland or just heavy to eat. Not this one and the salad brings a freshness and balance to the meal.

The chai latte is made with in-house chai syrup and fun spices. Well worth trying.

The staff are very patient and courteous (not to mention good humoured and helpful). The wine selection is interesting and varies from different regions (e.g. Greece, Italy, BC).","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNwaM3qQdP5pw5vS-LG8IzOBxwW3d6tRJ-b46V3&fid=0x0:0xfa30b951a6612dbd"],"When":"2024-6-16"},{"Name":"Sharzi BD","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW288MzwFkWlfN4-hmCJwoI28tpVq0hWMFg6JZzbb5p0qpMwt_I=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Nice cafe with beautiful decor. They have a variety of pastries 🥐
They also serve alcohol which is good.
The staff are friendly!
The taste of the cafe is a bit sour but its fine!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMjniSOAjnkIpvl68mCJJF9VmQXrWK3-yC1CED-&fid=0x0:0xfa30b951a6612dbd"],"When":"2024-3-15"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Robert Kent DesRochers","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVhO7BC5YXmNAY6c7xl78-QcmZsR2FN7-Tg15vFet65LpjE5GRXGw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I do enjoy the atmosphere/seating environment and the service was friendly, however my Americano misto was incredibly weak in coffee flavour and the turkey egg white wrap was tasteless and dry, you definitely have to add salsa and hot sauce. $$","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPpCyiLiWTPgfTdcLG1C7Zasv6L4MGBgEBcFjpb\u0026fid=0x0:0xa2ea419592e3ee20"],"When":"2024-12-17"},{"Name":"Jeff Downer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXl3HQ-1C4N-_a7ykvhIi5aM883AB-cDQVYb1xeenCY7zekayvZ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The best drip coffee (black) on campus. I was surprised! I will start to go here on the daily for drip coffee (the only type of coffee I drink). Now I didn’t order any food because it looks very factory-mass produced like Starbucks, and that isn’t how I eat.\nBut their drip coffee is good and strong!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nat","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXkGSEuf6PDdheenjSv-NIhieax6GFriF75nZvrGLeK2gpgWHN-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The salmon chowder was good, but since the soups are on rotation, I can't guarantee it'll ever come back. The sausage roll would be a lot better if it was toasted and not microwaved. The London Fog was good. Smoothies are really expensive so I haven't tried it despite being interested. Overall, everything is pretty okay.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Olivia Swift","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK-SeQZUY7qvSibih4ttwWe4CuqWMPXAlqlu0zYPrrHauhH7Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"You ever walk into a coffee shop and think to yourself \"oh boy, you know what would be REALLY funny? A holiday themed fat joke because I believe being fat is funny and something people should feel bad about! Merry Christmas!!\", and then you look up and see that someone with a brain brimming with even more comedic brilliance than yours has already thought of it?? Well I did, and if I hadn't of been so busy laughing at this knee slapper I might have been upset I didn't think of it first! LOL someone give whoever thought up this incredibly smart idea a RAISE!! I hope that everyone accessing the Djavad Mowafaghian Centre for Brain Health gets a chance to come through this cafe and laugh at the concept of being fat before their appointments! Except if they're fat HA HA HA","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipODMs_6n2xE9LiVFnTSFsQdaSqrH1y3pAlR4pN7\u0026fid=0x0:0xa2ea419592e3ee20"],"When":"2023-12-5"},{"Name":"Aleksandra Likhtarova","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUba4q37-uz8qlj_v1ywGlvVHBA3z0f_KJsAFrm8Ap7bd3Blo2p2A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The coffee was… fine. The service was probably some of the worst I’ve ever received? No “hello”, no “what can I get for you”. Literally the only words the barista said were “$3.85”. I’m not usually one to write bad reviews and I get people have bad days but this was… abysmal as far as customer service goes","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Cool Kid","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVuY9NtDPj5M_k6uxzRLl4iPPwaMxSJl4_ZN8HpS-1XCp5YiqPP=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love coming here for a quick pick me up! The barista Fateh has amazing customer service and was so helpful . I was able to order and get my drink fast even though it was busy.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"S P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWQfiRq--cXc5Qe3L3kaa2Sl9Ph9g-bf-6JqihGhGPM8ht8OJwr=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Service was brisk but polite. Unfortunately the coffee was just not good. There's plenty of significantly better cafes very close by, unless you're having something with a lot of syrups to mask the coffee you'll be much better off walking to them.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Doris Costa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJNhvH2iCYnapoTic4omIPTWtkrwSVrlzhm6tOqto9XbXtWyhs=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Had a cappachino and a chocolate Crossan,  that was good but I was very, very disappointed with the service. I cannot even write down how I really felt after the bad knews I got today. Sorry!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMkwukDaD7xZzN9OxB4MxW0FA3ETysUVRenm2IE\u0026fid=0x0:0xa2ea419592e3ee20"],"When":"2018-12-19"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKf1RSg3_-AU0iu6cewVgjwGYoJmZNxdRNJCv62pXrCH7QK-w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Mediocore food and drinks. I had a matcha which was so sweet you wouldn't even know there was matcha in it!

As for chicken quesadilla; rather wet and unsatisfying. Rather rubbery.

As for the desserts, they are good-but that's because they are brought in and resold. You can get them from most places.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOmdZOt6kMO8FH8WJvzWwNR4frXqIJl8W-J3SyT&fid=0x0:0x32f1bd75c1e55e93"],"When":"2024-11-22"},{"Name":"Michelle Leung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIOiPVex-Jfh36Tz58YAbdAIUagazBiDCq0PbpvXRd-1o8a9w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I came here two years ago for the rose tteokbokki and I was so impressed by it. I moved to Langley after so I decided to pay a visit again for this dish (because I can't find one that's as good as this place outside). After first bite we find it not spicy at all and the flavor seems off. The owner came and unfortunately, we got blamed by him for taking the wrong order (original flavor) and he was angry when walking off. We did offer our name to the server to confirm before taking it. Instead of requesting for an exchange/refund, I asked if we should continue eating the order we have. We were hoping he will offer to exchange because our correct order was just sitting behind the counter. He only replied: "yes, just eat it." Basically asking us to just suck it up. It's unfortunate, because I actually made my way from Langley just so I can eat their rose tteokbokki again but ended with the service they chose to provide - and because I know how good it will taste, it made me more sad :(","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ghia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIPRRZjnTb685rKh-fCajTMo04j-DEIRBLRtCbPE-GMZiZUzAE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This was the first time I tried rose tteokbokki and it tasted absolutely amazing!! I tried to find other places for tteokbokki but so far, this is definitely my go to place. It's also a really great place to study and not too crowded (every time I've gone).

The only downside is that when I tried to order for take out, I found the packaging not really too great, as it was in a thin plastic container with a un-resealable plastic cover. If you're unable to finish or hope to get take out, I suggest bringing your own tupperware!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNIj4lg1cBBja47A9Y3GQHggg1TlK23bgNyNaYM&fid=0x0:0x32f1bd75c1e55e93"],"When":"2024-3-10"},{"Name":"Maria M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXmuhUB-INQ3XCbE2M9HT-MdzILSuqxW6ls6tLvy0JgUoxl1f3wCQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Amazing carrot cake, maybe just a bit too much icing. Ordered a cappuccino and I definitely didn’t get one… the size was massive and well it was just a latte honestly… great options for a bite to eat, lots of tables…","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM5OtJtdqWQK5kn-GfZnTpRbKwG0_npbUKnRw_H&fid=0x0:0x32f1bd75c1e55e93"],"When":"2023-5-8"},{"Name":"Haleh Magnus","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUZGl2rvHWlqbzuuFKZ9pHQfQXwlTmRHH4ep4A1K4mjlsDM4dQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Super cute little cafe. It has frozen section (Korean foods) , ice cream, coke vending machine. Good enough space for people to study or hang out. They are playing pleasant much. Right inside the Fairview res area in UBC. It’s also close by none UBC student area so you see mix of crowed. Prices are reasonable and they were fast in preparing your order.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP6vH-OqpejrNRJB_iusLygszOpr9uL_n-VATg&fid=0x0:0x32f1bd75c1e55e93"],"When":"2022-9-20"},{"Name":"Mark Bebawy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXZ9uTGzuYBMyfmw_N6QlBcBKn-RQEVyRS8vymn314qceJQbfw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great food, great service. It always feels like you went to grandma's house for  lunch when u are there.its quiet, so you can work or study there. And it doesnt hurt to have a beautiful surrounding area for the coffee shop. One minor flaw is the parking, which is a bit of a walk from the place. But overall, really recommended to go!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOpNe0fXCy_cEvSPHuOzZZNniz8qRbNXZ5rbhEg&fid=0x0:0x32f1bd75c1e55e93"],"When":"2018-7-26"},{"Name":"Diddy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW7ZDJfCFB5UyExNSIn1iDaHoCtumG4xMPGPQN4jXS1wk8dVyE=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I was absolutely appalled by the behavior of the Korean male manager/waiter during my recent visit. Instead of aggressively YELLING at a customer who mistakenly took the wrong order, perhaps training your staff better would be a more effective solution. There is no excuse for YELLING and CURSING at customers—it’s UNPROFESSIONAL, especially when it was an honest mistake and no one deserved to be blamed like that. I expect a lot more respect and basic customer service from any establishment.”","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ads","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVwDyuvQtXP_VygmU1rNXhUJ0mc48E4h1QtDkdEfrlXmuS-mYhL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Awesomely surprised at how super dope this little coffee joint is! We stopped by for a couple of thanksgiving Soy Cappucinos after only having to veer off a couple of minutes from the Salish trail. A perfect retreat to stay cozy with a warm drink whilst watching the beautiful fall colors outside.
An honest, laid back and cozy vibe inside and great area to study with a yummy selection of drinks and baked snacks and clearly shows as the local go-to on campus for students and families in the area. The coffee actually tasted great, a cappucino whipped to perfection in which they also use the good brand plant-based milks (Silk and Earths Own).
They also have cute outdoor patio furniture and a large outdoor area to chill.
Support local businesses!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOsj032cAjm2fSL0g1sV5QkbPhR_2ImSBFDZafZ&fid=0x0:0x32f1bd75c1e55e93"],"When":"2021-10-12"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Sadaf Shabanian","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWfeDm3sYiZ-8L_f5E8KD-zkqC_wweoCrMp0O727sns0f6yH5bX=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was our first time here. The owner was very friendly and welcoming. We ordered cafe latte, butter and pistachio croissant. The croissants were fresh and delicious. We had a great time with our friends there.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNoPGgtj5TGTRMF5NDFjKGYl0vSOQfYtUOCT4BY&fid=0x0:0x719f5750ba1384ce"],"When":"2024-12-23"},{"Name":"Negin Rahimi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV4DUUoCWRf2VeIHKqwIhVGBDp6aPH06WL8KyLGIL_eC6FWBXb5=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have visited this place multiple times and it has quickly become one of my favorite spots. It has a charming and cozy atmosphere that is perfect for spending hours working or simply minding your own business. The background music, usually jazz, adds to the quiet ambiance. The food is absolutely delicious, especially the desserts. I highly recommend the creme brulee and cheesecake, as they are my personal favorites. If you are looking for a peaceful place to relax and enjoy a long stay at a cafe, this is the perfect choice.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMDIq-4gs_T4vRUUW32J7KPx66m1902qfzwzlYN&fid=0x0:0x719f5750ba1384ce"],"When":"2024-6-11"},{"Name":"D Milburn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKYTJuyYJNW23XEIhyxDTO5WvOME5ipvEjz0dpndmARnqjZMtDf=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Wow! First time here and this is the worst latte I’ve had in Vancouver in 5.5 years. A 7-Eleven or gas station latte would be better, and I’m not kidding. I paid $9 for it. It seems like there must be new owners. I hope the owner sees this and improves the quality; otherwise, this business won’t last long. It’s sad because the five-star reviews don’t reflect the current experience anymore.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMZwzv0H_--vVA4BMIdtc4dLTxVmjn39l3pR6mC&fid=0x0:0x719f5750ba1384ce"],"When":"2024-12-8"},{"Name":"Yuan Yuan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL7X3xP7Ou3gRvpDa-P2YKUxbTDwwii8fNhejN-6J_YBXehPA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"So thankful this place is open until 11 pm - we stopped in for a late night dessert, and it was absolutely perfect. We ordered a chai latte, a London Fog, and the signature Royal Waffle, which was a bubble waffle smothered in strawberry, banana, Nutella, whipped cream, matcha gelato and chocolate chips. It tasted fresh, rich (that matcha gelato), not too sweet and completely delicious. The owner treated us well, and the atmosphere was calming, clean and sophisticated after a long day.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOeLIvp5pdvHg2qsGRkBQWgMwHMkqHzGHzycIeb&fid=0x0:0x719f5750ba1384ce"],"When":"2024-7-1"},{"Name":"Lina Khandaker","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKSMu10NqrDmU7dlE-C2sqCrRlUHaNbk5IzOdMHGNGJOhdfEA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love coming to this place. I live right up the street and it’s always a relaxing place to read and hang out. Most people come here to study and do work. The couches are comfy and the food and drinks are wonderful. The staff are super friendly too!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sam Amiri Zadeh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKl3Vw7rYxAZmQVK_aj_BR-yfnRWD-eAzLVXxHrIeVlJ3qwMw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The espresso is rich, with a good balance of bitterness and undertones of sweetness.
The pastry was delicious with quality ingredients.
Relaxing atmosphere and friendly staff.
I’ll definitely be returning for more delicious pastries and espresso.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOlTvgdTw5mur9jhUHGsmO1IFnQotUU4i9r9sFZ&fid=0x0:0x719f5750ba1384ce"],"When":"2023-8-28"},{"Name":"Biidaasige Zappia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWOu08XRykLaZV2Qbl4q0qt04FrFPSowVBv1KfQrOiXWsjXsCQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I really enjoyed the coffee here! The sandwiches also looked good there were just ingredients I couldn’t eat in them. A friend had said the sandwich was good though! I got a latte and really liked it, the art on it was very cute as well, I would definitely recommend this spot to people, it’s a very good place to study as well and is in a cute area.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMqPytmnrlSLQXhU4cDq0BUxbUidGWMFBR4EGHn&fid=0x0:0x719f5750ba1384ce"],"When":"2023-11-5"},{"Name":"AH","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUbSDTBRb0i5Z-O9Llx_f4jUDvaC36Rpc_Ai8VCzOt_tM08rlqM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nice and quiet cafe great for studying or working. I really liked their banana loaf, and the barista took his time to redo my London fog because it wasn’t too hot. I was only expecting that he would heat it in the microwave but appreciated that he went to a great length for customers! Highly recommend this place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPf_PrDVSmuG2_PihSBoqUvK6LeOhVTwvo1-Alc&fid=0x0:0x719f5750ba1384ce"],"When":"2024-2-22"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Little Journey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUlNkzOJynLpgqJCrPnrmAAn5viwim-B3Uir-26DOWxIzwcnZ0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Nice to have a small cafe in a grocery store, but their crunchy and dry croissant with bland flat white 😑 aren't really my cup of tea 🫤","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN-EzZS-X7Pq3X6uCBfY4aAR7CQtqWpqXFYyYOX&fid=0x0:0xe4aee50d86d57496"],"When":"2024-2-3"},{"Name":"Rishabh Kumar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUuXBJLv1yI3bFL4nOPGZ3kbAHNGO8ILwW4V0x72EHmDSUhLqlH=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The Caffe Artigiano at the Stong’s Market in Dunbar is a rather unique collaboration between two well known Vancouver based food service businesses. Both of their commitments to providing excellent quality in both product and service makes even the prospect of a partnership of this sort exciting.

As someone who was rather unbeknownst to coffee and its intricacies, I was very impressed by the Baristas and their enthusiasm in providing me an avenue to learn about the different types of coffee and their makeup. Over the past couple of weeks I’ve gone through every coffee on the menu, and I believe I have a fairly good understanding of what’s on offer here.

Starting with the atmosphere, it's rather slow in the mornings but ends up picking drastically as noon draws closer and closer. With it being located alongside a grocery store, it makes the day to day ambience rather chaotic, but I would say it's the good type of chaos, one that invigorates rather than debilitates. Options for seating include both outside patio seating with table, chairs and umbrellas included. Whilst the inside has both tables and chairs along with bar style seating. The whole vibe is rather casual, which is fine. Although if I was to give a critique, it lacks any special piece of decor that gives it true character or a distinct theme.

The quality of coffee is rather nice, the Cardamom Latte, Marrochino and French press are some of my personal favourites. The manager herself however, was quick to tell me that better coffee can be found elsewhere (not very supportive of the brand it seems…). That being said, I think it's certainly a spot worth exploring. Cost is what you’d expect with most coffee shops in Vancouver, 5 to 6 dollars for a regular coffee and up to 7 or 8 if you really go for something fancy. Not ideal but that’s the economy we’re currently in.

Service in my opinion, is unparalleled. There isn’t a day where the baristas aren’t responsive and friendly, although some credit can go to my natural charm in this regard. Coffee is delivered quickly with a small helping of cookies that you can nibble on. A small nitpick on the service side would be that the number of cookies provided seems to vary from 1 to 3, the factors that affect this variability are still unknown to me. Additionally, there is a tendency for a small contingent of the baristas to get excessively invested into a conversation. These however are small nitpicks to an ultimately exceptional service, for which all credit goes to the baristas and their manager.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"J.J. LaRocque","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVs1wnHH1wE-6ehYO1ShgkgKN3A6ZFemN0kZy8RwdiX8HwJ30lb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Nice little spot to check out after grabbing some groceries at Stongs Market. The coffee was good, but service was a little slow. Unfortunately the girl af the front wasn't the best with communication and was frustrating when ordering.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOz3QY5TsP-IZHnCM7svDFChYPm7k7gIHre308C&fid=0x0:0xe4aee50d86d57496"],"When":"2020-8-4"},{"Name":"Jianguo Wang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK0SdZEksUxpk08US4i51HRc88nO4MnpBGgQuQwh0u4q9YDYA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Located in a stongs but pretty decent place to grab a coffee after my morning grocery run","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Carol Xie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLBQ6_PPSs9owJWWUg4B_uFdIJxY_B7vc8xCJ237BHNCb68aA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Honestly I wish they hire someone who understands coffee. I ordered  a half sweet caramel macchiato but the barista gave me a drink that’s full of syrup at the bottom of the cup, she asked me to stir it by myself. The drink was too sweet to drink so I have to ask her to make it right for me. She just poured half of the drink into another cup and added some milk and passed back to me with an attitude, which really disappointed me. It used to be one of my favourite spots in Dunbar area, but after today’s visit, I don’t think I will go again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Paula Hlavacek","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXUEHsTUDREBV0VNUK6UGtTRNbBuCTOdBVYyLeZYC7hO1QTx25MLQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"The coffee was great however I wish they hired someone who can speak English. I had to repeat myself several times and they still got my order wrong..","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOrBR517u955Cc28t0wc0z9AuzUWe8x7smSx6sq&fid=0x0:0xe4aee50d86d57496"],"When":"2020-8-4"},{"Name":"Jack Gru","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK6PX-kkjePRoM-yW_cwozTOaN0bjFJmdxD8FNRQ05ie7kADA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Surprisingly good coffee from a bar in an excellent grocery store. Lots of well-prepared drinks to choose from and very nice staff.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Alamjot Singh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL0L8TLrXJk9PrhC5jHSjiSZDc0b-q1OOANw5hWQRdawQMdeA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"No experienced barista, wrost coffee ever taste.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"N “Minaoka” N","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVLM29oukNuw0VGmRupQYbXCWQVv9sqfg5h3FP5AbyXShl2bASQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Cafe with cool furnitures, all the tables and chair are quite aesthetic. Many tables and seating so they are trying to maximise the seats, which make the space less vibe. Coffee ok, croffles were good.  Place is a bit unorganised and staffs seem to be under training. Apparently they are transitioning to new ownwers.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP6JrTG54u9l5JLgPoZPLNdo2B4r7f8J-sirsBz&fid=0x0:0x919eb0dc8147b132"],"When":"2024-12-17"},{"Name":"Madeline Kam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVpk6Vux-KZ276SHSgtsoa9YbbByLpXdFWBO-biQ8KXP9MZVJYZxw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We went on a rainy day and it was super busy. It was also extremely warm but that may have been due to the influx of customers. There are nice large tables for studying but barely any outlets so if you’re planning on studying make sure everything is charged. I ordered a blueberry scone which was decent (a bit cold), but still a bit pricey for what it was. Overall nice cafe with a good amount of seating.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNq7uHffJ9vtUfih8RJDxFPsrO4jbAkjlRxKnCT&fid=0x0:0x919eb0dc8147b132"],"When":"2024-10-22"},{"Name":"tikki","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWzV_Y6bQFjodBKC8anq5nBVFmCTC7hA6Nh7xklFQuKGefK40A_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A pretty urban garden styled cafe on West Broadway. The airy space has many tables which makes it a perfect place to study, read, or just sit down and enjoy a cup of coffee. Personally not a big fan of the drinks but the pastries are not bad!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP-hmcgsJHu3_MXiNDmDmOEho9ZhRoQXwUyzvLr&fid=0x0:0x919eb0dc8147b132"],"When":"2024-7-2"},{"Name":"Kelly Hrelja","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUVWh8qmVdPEfqahFaQ6ox93SOukCBaQIQqwS9jEApuOOnHfC4ZzQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Super cute and spacious cafe! Love the vibe and tons of natural light. Great for getting some work done.

The spinach feta croissant was buttery and flaky and so delicious! The espresso (in an iced Americano with a splash of milk) was okay.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOLz2ilUHd3NlWfH1Zr10XpJ4VIQcJ6K1-uC-SZ&fid=0x0:0x919eb0dc8147b132"],"When":"2024-2-13"},{"Name":"Rox Ortega","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWkUL9-cUrc1IAVugY6nVrUBRia3eXMBadJsQlS4avQYHladfx0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I usually love this place, I'm even a regular. However, there's this barista who gives the coffees half empty. If I'm paying $7+ dollars for a latte, you better fill that thing to the brim. See the pictures, I didn't have a single drop of my coffee when I took those pictures. That's how little she served me (and keep in mind that there's foam, so whatever is in those pictures is actually less).
The other baristas don't do that. They actually serve you the whole thing, but this girl just refuses to do it. I asked her many times to fill it to the brim and she insists that that's how it's supposed to be but, I used to be a barista and that's NOT how it's supposed to be. The proof is that her coworkers don't do it, and other coffee shops don't do it either.
I think that I'll just avoid this place if I see her working, I'm done paying for more than what I'm getting.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNstRnhf2wm2LZyqn9nOAOVSueBcYnNzpKwg82l&fid=0x0:0x919eb0dc8147b132"],"When":"2024-11-8"},{"Name":"Mahsa Haghjoo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXRSnT0Wip7Pbg6Z8m0cglGHkWd61YfkTkUIlG6b0IkPWIUcJi2=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Lots of sitting, good for one or two people max at a time. Free and paid parking spaces available near by.
Most people are working on their laptops.
The chocolate almond croissant was crispy and not too sweet. Matcha latte was a bit sweet but totally made good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM5kPJcRD4ROy4ac8rCyF2cZ2MFplcXhtj2VOqO&fid=0x0:0x919eb0dc8147b132"],"When":"2024-5-18"},{"Name":"Yuhyun Hwang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIR9giK6SEo9FzWpOvv3gd3EcULBkWtXPtilb3gfVBlpEb2EA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The grilled cheese and flat croissant were amazing! I fall in love with this cafe. 👏","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMrSrqY9LSfBePYZC9nnYA9xKzfozms89P9xlAN&fid=0x0:0x919eb0dc8147b132"],"When":"2024-9-10"},{"Name":"Hamid","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWZeCAMeEgy6nfEH_q_cdx_kw6M9nQkJXu6z624ESesXG758gNKQQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"This delightful coffee shop is perfectly situated, offering plenty of cozy seating. Our almond lattes, though, came as a sweet surprise. We found out that the almond milk they use contains 8 grams of sugar per 240 ml which we didn’t expect!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNC4Ks3Lj4z8McCTDImm9HZTJvSGdCksOC0VM7Y&fid=0x0:0x919eb0dc8147b132"],"When":"2023-9-3"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Madeline Kam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVpk6Vux-KZ276SHSgtsoa9YbbByLpXdFWBO-biQ8KXP9MZVJYZxw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Cute spot, has a mix of small and big tables which is nice if you want to study or just talk. I ordered a pumpkin spice latte which was pretty good. Prices are average for most things and a bit expensive for other items. We also ordered the avocado toast which I thought was a bit expensive for not having any protein on it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOerAQl19vbc2tkk0ZuHq4GS8ic78OqAmLr6kug&fid=0x0:0xfbbe767569e40f17"],"When":"2024-10-21"},{"Name":"Kelly Hrelja","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUVWh8qmVdPEfqahFaQ6ox93SOukCBaQIQqwS9jEApuOOnHfC4ZzQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Spacious and sunny cafe with a variety of menu items to choice from.

I liked that they had a number of different matcha drinks and avo toasts to choose from. Both were delicious!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMwcAqaBQT8_49Q99to2N2QK0fAy4dJmrTMo0SD&fid=0x0:0xfbbe767569e40f17"],"When":"2024-6-26"},{"Name":"Cynthia Edmonds","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKbXkjUCiyuVBxspIW7EbqnhGOYuH3wYn-fpzD_7VSNP-hyYA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Charming coffee shop with fantastic looking food. We didn't try anything this visit as we had just eaten, but the breakfast and brunch items looked great.

We got an Iced tea and a green smoothie. They freshly steep the tea and let us know in advance that it would take five minutes.

Very friendly customer service. Airy, charming g setting with an outdoor patio. Restroom available.

We'll be back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNUDdaSGtwCFNRGLQ37uPEXoU1OVRlgvBJ-NM9k&fid=0x0:0xfbbe767569e40f17"],"When":"2022-8-23"},{"Name":"DABIN CHOI (DARBY)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWjZo1idjNES3czq0C5Rl0wkFr814_Jr7cw4QMXVnYTdobd2CIU=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The Kimchi Jalapeño scone is really tasty!!!! It reminds me a bit of a Korean dish called nokdu kimchi jeon. The outside of the scone is crispy, similar to the kimchi jeon (pancake), and the inside is soft. Combining kimchi with a scone was a great idea!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMrALA3D6rDmTOQy60cu6jbyB2A5XMG-n12t4qv&fid=0x0:0xfbbe767569e40f17"],"When":"2024-9-10"},{"Name":"Jenny","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJyTFcpSz6JPixvkphO6OfxmxC53KBhOck83mpfH2UcSUqbng=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Storm City has been my beloved local café since it opened. I've been a fan of their scones, their packaged cookies, and their muffins. But something has changed! The mushroom scones are heavy and doughy, the cookies are too sweet. The coffee is as excellent as ever but the baked goods . . . oh dear.

5 stars because they're my local.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Shaun Olafson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVzfM1op1eJzozCm2l8YqiFq2UcZtb9NitLiLmj0GjnUrEsoold=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Quite like the food and atmosphere. I have a pet peeve where places say they’re open until a certain time, but don’t serve their menus until that time. I think it’s reasonable to have a buffer before closing, but it’s happened to me more than once now where I arrive close to two hours before closing and can’t order food. They also often change their closing hours without updating online. It’s a free country and they are of course welcome to serve when and how they wish - I just personally value consistency and clear communication, so that bias is reflected in my review.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Büşra Temizyürek","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL9ADfFSsjYkGIGylZcriXNipdTy7-vcIjdm9zVJwWyaGri6A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I love this place! Employees are always kind. It’s a perfect spot to work. Also parking is easy. I guess sometimes air condition is not working properly so heavy food smell might disturb.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"YuJin Song","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXsFBf8ELnYCmTBNwaFhiA6Nr-ywAaP4n4Asr1MEY4aj1JtbEApYA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Delicious cream puffs!!! I got the strawberry (seasonal flavor). Clean and seems like they are following Covid precautions carefully, which I appreciate! My only wish - longer hours please!!! Otherwise, a great cafe with great food options!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOoscw0J3cZ595JKMs4YUsjSp9hv1zcS8-_uaw1&fid=0x0:0xfbbe767569e40f17"],"When":"2021-8-12"}]
