user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Y S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWTmtWUtCZcs7qDdNKdjVbtcx5f5BcDfDU3YRp4zcFsXHKu1_WS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a great place for dates and causal coffee. The decor is retro and cute. Service is wonderful and quick. I ordered the almond croissant. It’s very big and I feel stuffed after eating it. Also ordered the Hario pour over. They make it when you order and the flavour is good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPcAMphGbB-_Pa-9Nve_J-x0KibZJ8D6zILPnZn&fid=0x0:0x18abc16513fc887b"],"When":"2024-8-17"},{"Name":"Immanuel M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjURCHQQ_gUlRsGGjwdJWcNj1pi4KH38rEIuyGH3UdE60vvwMfQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Super fun little coffee shop! Top quality espressos, and delightful, funky atmosphere. Highly recommend! I got a cortado (two of them, if you must know) and they were both spot on.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNE7XymZ9xHTUfoJudkUu1qYEI1y-I-eNje8pa7&fid=0x0:0x18abc16513fc887b"],"When":"2024-8-21"},{"Name":"Mahi Mohammadi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXqC-rZuQ76AwKkD3oY9lIbbPffPrvfajyPTndb0NlfbHCj4Y4W=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Here's a short review for Platform 7 Café:

I had a fantastic experience at Platform 7 Café! The unique taste of their drinks really stands out, and as a coffee lover, I truly enjoyed every sip. The atmosphere is cozy, making it a great spot to relax or catch up with friends. Highly recommend for anyone seeking a special coffee experience!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMq7Qv22S1Hb2iC0yCnOtFel62zclFTyvfq7ic5&fid=0x0:0x18abc16513fc887b"],"When":"2024-9-29"},{"Name":"Dana Sullivan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWQIw-0oOUNgoyniYugTscGkgpKJS8tpx4V0tAajn3ZGkNIfqEk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I was drawn in here by the cool interior! I especially love the sky on the ceiling. Lots of little details give it a magical feel! The staff were also very nice, so the atmosphere was overall pleasant.
The food was really good too. I had the veggie, avocado & feta sandwich, a red velvet cookie, and a cheeky lemon kombucha (on tap). The sandwich was really well-balanced - exactly the perfect amount of filling and balsamic reduction dressing. The cookie was a very soft, cakey cookie. I liked the soft but chewy texture and that it wasn't too sweet. It had a true, slightly tangy red velvet flavour, not just a chocolate cookie coloured red. Good kombucha too, pretty light in taste but refreshing for summer. I always enjoy being able to get kombucha on tap. The total price ($22) was fair.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPr9tkDhZzBzJ1XQqEziAwokQYpf28AUIa1bhvF&fid=0x0:0x18abc16513fc887b"],"When":"2024-7-21"},{"Name":"Eva Zia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUJp1CScTOq-jdIBVBA-K4f_r74TZU-kRd9MclConVIiSCPfy3Y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":""I went to this café, had a latte with a croissant. It wasn’t bad, but their prices are higher compared to cafés at this level, even a bit higher than those that are slightly better. I won’t go back, but if you like, you can try it once. They did have a delicious croissant."","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMyhWPu7zdA0RrCImLkD9U22PTs5-QeJ0psD6kU&fid=0x0:0x18abc16513fc887b"],"When":"2024-8-27"},{"Name":"Julien Salomoni","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjViaO6gVJkm-aDsrcz_NkNmy8tx1NR_WPh1jW1IEU3WF2qJs0Sk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had a great time over Platform 7 Coffee, the warming of a delicate sweet little location It’s like entering a room full of energy. I’ve been welcome by a nice server. She explained the Guatemalan coffee from the siphon concept. It was delightful, light, not bitter strong but more like the appealing call of a delicate coffee “tea” feeling :) interesting then I got myself the deluxe ham breakfast sandwich, same it was really good 🙏🏻 thank you again, I highly recommend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPM0R0-0IlajABFmz56SSY_xMhPcozvSCU7O484&fid=0x0:0x18abc16513fc887b"],"When":"2024-2-20"},{"Name":"Earth Explorer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXx9WbpYHoWti2M8dulDcVEiSwzq2Is9YdecFV0_EjsI1gR2sUT=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Top notch coffee shop with single origin beans and pourover methods. Incredible gluten free pastries and cookies. The Wi-Fi is only 5/1 but seating is excellent although arrive early and fully charged. This is a super popular cafe so please be sure to order every hour to show appreciation for the fact they have Wi-Fi","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOm4pLKL6lRvvEwUSBzvyXQvb_a3gOMXho47K3G&fid=0x0:0x18abc16513fc887b"],"When":"2024-5-12"},{"Name":"Michelle Siaril","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVvNHVR_L-5eCK2usU0kQoT055SV9vB2qDNPyrA7CmG9QXO2IM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Finally ticked this place off my wish. As far as I know, this is the only place serving syphon coffee in Vancouver. Bonus for the interiors having a Harry Potter kind of vibe. The ceiling also looks like a lit up night sky.

As a coffee fan, I really appreciate the huge variety of rotating and seasonal beans available. They also have lots of brewing method. My syphon was lovely and I really enjoyed my cup of coffee. I noticed they also have a loyalty card system for regular customers.

Atmosphere is also quite chill with jazz I guess you could try working or studying here, but honestly the seats are not that comfortable. The place is always busy as well so I would say this is more suitable for hanging out with friends.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM7BK5sgpwlIPikFyqJYhc7T48njoGaLiUBz6k&fid=0x0:0x18abc16513fc887b"],"When":"2023-12-30"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Michele Maxted","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXmv-KsuiycRgUuyuLOXQ20ADA1fyd0uYmUa-SbKG_zP_hLPAzB=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My first time there - they were kind enough to check with their supplier and to order for me several of 1 item that I was looking for. While there I looked around and was impressed with the freshness of their produce and to my amazement found a product that doesn't have garlic so my garlic sensitive husband could eat it! They were also very friendly - will definitely shop there again. (Also I loved their music)  :)","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Hassan K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXNmheNMWpWqInLczllHEWDmiimoP43RBvw3r4hNz069zHtySI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"They serve the neighborhood with fresh produce at decent prices. The main attraction is not their produce though, it is Mr Mickey, the pictured tomcat who often basks on the boxes outside.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPVGnlwPIwUvTNkoh2StrkyEwSKcz95VvfSclhE&fid=0x0:0xc8344d2e033ae5de"],"When":"2024-7-5"},{"Name":"John Crawford","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLfUZoa2KXbjDsG2Z__3qD-4lp6mshdEaAylPoiKlcmuD-H3w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the best independent groceries in Vancouver.  Excellent selection. Reasonable prices.  Awesome music.  Love shopping here the selection for it's size is remarkable.  5 star+","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Malik Salamatian","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU410SWBd17GBSi2PYTClSjx1Z7OAU9C1fhuMY6thL_PS7CFSms=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great place to get groceries. It’s a decent sized grocer with good produce, and I especially love the Asian goods section that has items harder to find elsewhere in the city. Prices are a bit high but that’s to be expected with a smaller high end grocer in a nice area. Not going to make it my every day stop for groceries, but will definitely go back when making certain Asian dishes and if I need something quick in the area.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"FRAZ","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXQucRznlgHrZSFIjkxkBB07meQLitjQrkHCgk2j7_95qJl-AYw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"If you want to pay $20 for mayonnaise like I just did because it has avocado oil in it, feel free to shop here.  Chosen Foods Classic Mayonnaise... $18.99 at Top 10.  Its $8.95 (Canadian) at Walmart.  I don't mind paying independent grocers more - 2-3 bucks more...whatever.  But if you price gouge me over a barrel I start to get angry.  Also my receipt came to $39.95 & the stoned cashier charged me $40.  Nice.  I'm out.   👎","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Shailaja Yasmine Das","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV2lXj-6-jovkx-sMlfYozFzfn4s0-v4KQ2WKhbzCpi1-nOu0sO=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"2.5
The good:
Great selection of items and incredibly nice staff. Good playlist. Cute cat adds to the cozy vibe.

The not so good:
The prices are a little high. And most items do not have the price labelled.
My biggest personal issue is that I have been overcharged several times. I have been charged for an item I didn’t purchase or charged higher for an item I did purchase. The staff have rectified it when I asked them to but it is rather annoying that it happens repeatedly.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Michael Moriarity","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWNhkYaB9zjlkkl74OBPcplO2QslT6bqh419yvto-fc4bLKxsqAKQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"one of our favorite produce stores is Top Ten Produce on 10th Ave W in the West Point Grey Neighborhood…we frequently prochase their fruit and vegetables as they are fresh and delicious..the prices are good..","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOkc_lYhPnf3rVe1iyEBKHxMz7-oeOoDPwLSbVx&fid=0x0:0xc8344d2e033ae5de"],"When":"2022-12-23"},{"Name":"Kenley Raye","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV4ZvkLz_xlQ7sPf8VmH-4Rfqtwqe1qYmK-OBYVAtLcPy9Abwf6=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"5 stars for Mickey only 🐱🐈‍⬛🖤
Careful ! He does not like to be pet TOO much. Just enough. 🙏🏼","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPn-WFP_WlG5e94I--I61qNK0meljn2mXuW-Wy7&fid=0x0:0xc8344d2e033ae5de"],"When":"2024-7-31"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Je Stra","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUTy8tiSY9mvY5iJinnrCY84O-96uFMMLsNd7YgfsYUf_GhEKem=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is the best bubble tea place downtown. I had the milk tea 50% sweet and no ice, my partner had the milk tea with brown sugar 50% and no ice. My partner and myself both agreed the drinks were very tasty and plan to come back. I also liked how the menu wasnt filled with a million items, which could lead to analysis paralysis. Just the basics which they did very well.
Place was also clean. Would recommend","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNEr3Q1aLc9ll0SzJQKN6vHJiCHTL37lqnMT5RL&fid=0x0:0xae3bcb85e011772d"],"When":"2024-10-7"},{"Name":"Karen Lo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWVy7IKDgoBu5-GpgCOSD4cGeZrgQ2WNTZ5s54ZY-vysf5NoRKzIQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The mango bingsoo is so really good, lots of mango chunks that pair well with the bingsoo. This is the large size, good to share between 2 or 3 people. I will come back to get other things.

The snack size is good if you can’t decide on 1 flavour so you can just get 2 different ones!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN2LS-WzHNovUjcDvkjxqPkAxaAG9YDKb_IXv66&fid=0x0:0xae3bcb85e011772d"],"When":"2024-7-11"},{"Name":"Hande","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKP9N2AyeBX9W2s_3LoXlHQjAtQ5IYF4Cvhf7QwCaFxI1yr8A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time trying bingsu! Very light desert! Tried their mango Bingsu. Full of shaved ice, at the bottom Kellogg crispy, mango at the top with one scoop ice cream, it also comes with creamy/milky syrup that you pour on top which makes it more delicious. You must try! Before we ordered asked a young gentleman at the cashier if mango cheesecake bingsu has gelatin (which is probably pork based), he asked inside and said the cheesecake may have gelatin. We eat halal so did not order the cheesecake. Something to keep in mind. Thanks for being clear about that. Appreciate it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP8VaiSTPQDM15EOXjOs8NTqtMU82icciweXJuU&fid=0x0:0xae3bcb85e011772d"],"When":"2024-7-24"},{"Name":"Andrea Lin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXXt9uYTdY9IO4EWVBg6pjVvgyEZ8nakMj1rRqkuyNN6wn6NXo37A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Got the mango bingsu and mango slush with mango poppers, half sugar.  Loved the bingsu, great mango flavor.  Half-sweet mango slush was less sweet than expected, will order full next time.  Shop is nice and bright and cool!  Just one person working so it takes a few minutes to get your order.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMerW9qJenhG95RwQhVVcFx2xTbnT6qwSZMa-Xc&fid=0x0:0xae3bcb85e011772d"],"When":"2024-7-10"},{"Name":"Philip Raymond Lim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5EIBAgpBLsauhPMdjXym7mJ4fA8mtryDtWQIJCZfJxYXxupU8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Winter Bear on Denman St. has quickly become one of our favorite spots for snow-shaved Bingsu in Downtown. Before discovering this place, we used to make the drive all the way to Richmond, as we weren’t too impressed with the sulbings we had tried elsewhere.

After dinner, we stopped by and luckily found a spot right away. They offer a variety of treats, including tanghulu, slushies, milk tea, and Bingsu. We tried the cookies and cream Bingsu, and the serving was generous, flavorful, and seriously delicious. The strawberry tanghulu was also fresh and incredibly tasty.

We’ll definitely be coming back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPhYQQxtNlgYCzQTlyzCoDeRlUWn7sqUFL9hzFA&fid=0x0:0xae3bcb85e011772d"],"When":"2024-9-23"},{"Name":"Paulina Pedrero Miranda","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXoiOld2vaC2Dv18bWNi8EDRiykD7MSCRsU3RK7RESh6xQghXxb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The place is cozy, the staff is very friendly!, all the menu options look so yummy!, this time we tried the cheesecake mango bingsu and it was amazingly good!!, the best we had tried in a while!, the mango was fresh and on point!, the portion is great to share with 2 and even 3 people, is was delicious and the sweetness was excellent, this place definitely had become in my favorite bingsu spot!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNUtqM66YRHLzRmwqxrP3fd4-RbgRwZS9OiBRfn&fid=0x0:0xae3bcb85e011772d"],"When":"2024-9-19"},{"Name":"Omar H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWdilgSZgjxnu0x7kpqbjNxvfjsgWYBartuMzyZoMWKygs7WTzC=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great shaved ice spot in English Bay  however limited seating. Had the cookies and cream bingsu and it was worth it. Also had the sugar glazed strawberries 🍓 😋 all in all 4.5 out of 5.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM5l8bKuYglBq0n9VSJsX7ihWVcPvKWL9LL4g3p&fid=0x0:0xae3bcb85e011772d"],"When":"2024-8-15"},{"Name":"Sol H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXIr46CLRmUOyOlI2lKETto7NsthtEnMWmvVbfwetPuVR-12cJuTA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"They have really good mango bingsu. We tried a few others in the area, and Winter Bear is top on our list. We prefer the snow ice shavings, not the chunky ice that other places have. Also, the mango is sweet and fresh; they don't use sour mangoes.

Definitely recommended!​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​ :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPL04mFcZYxxyCgYjLLWm02txrMWLEFnUTEk7M8&fid=0x0:0xae3bcb85e011772d"],"When":"2024-7-7"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Julien Salomoni","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjViaO6gVJkm-aDsrcz_NkNmy8tx1NR_WPh1jW1IEU3WF2qJs0Sk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was my first time coming to the Artistry Coffee Shop and I’m glad I did. The team was really nice and welcoming. I got myself the BLT bagels breakfast sandwich and a slice of the Vegan Lemon pound cake with poppy seed. 🌱 It was delightfully delicious, the bagels heated was really good, but such a great experience I had with the 🍋 Lemon Pound Cake 🍋 I’m a huge fan of lemon cake but that one guys is one the best I ever ate in my life, big time 🍋🍋🍋 thank you 🙏🏻 The location, the coffee shop is so cute, I loved the decoration, I loved the authentic look which give sense of being at home. I loved all the canvas at the wall, and such a pleasure to be served rapidly. I strongly recommend the Artistry Coffee Shop to anyone living in kitsilano :)
Guys, thank you so much again 🙏🏻🌸🩷","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPK09Jnp2mU6JitDwGh6kk61di8fdJ4QXQ4yBKz&fid=0x0:0x9c9157300d8792ca"],"When":"2024-4-2"},{"Name":"Eric Bissonnette","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIH78S5i1KTls33222MLrc1yZs8y94iEFJhECC8OmVXl3KDPA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"My initial fascination with the style and decor of the location, unfortunately dwindled rapidly with the presentation of food.

The salmon croissant had a paper thin strip of salmon, and little else.  It can be noted that although being unusually small, the croissant was light and flakey.

The BLT egg cheese sandwich lacked substance of ingredients and was a little soggy, presumably from microwave heating, but had reasonable flavour.

The soup (pictured) sadly, was my real disappointment.  As a real lover of soups, I was very excited about the apple, squash soup.  It was thin rather than creamy, the flavour was masked by pepper, and I just couldn’t see how +$7 for less than a cup of soup that was heated by microwave.  Microwaved, artisan soup…😫

I’m not sad because it was a beautiful day with lovely company, and the coffee was good but, can’t give my recommendation.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPBwErluKQiLHTt-ieDRX8i9B3ZacN2sMwzEK7i&fid=0x0:0x9c9157300d8792ca"],"When":"2024-6-28"},{"Name":"Elton Chung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU_SVkVqkNe3SvSFwaZ1xrBYHObNVkTiTTXXYykf58guqGIk3qy=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This coffee shop at the corner is artistic. When I walk into the shop along the corridor from the entrance they are exhibiting the painting by local artist. Also the lightings are nostalgic.

I went there in a sunny afternoon and had a latte with a scone. Coffee went well and the scone tasted good. The barista was a very nice guy and very attentive.

I recommend this lovely cafe for anyone who enjoys a quiet moment in the afternoon with coffee and light foods.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP90IXEavzROxSj5lrBHJccjL8Rv0TYA42YYMk&fid=0x0:0x9c9157300d8792ca"],"When":"2023-10-18"},{"Name":"Al","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXJke_H51lEVtqmQ6Mwhj0R5MqDW7L2xLlIdf0sg4kPFJFF0D9I=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Awesome corner coffee shop, with great staff and friendly.
Lots of art for sale on the wall, make it tiny art store as well. It's nice to sit by the window and enjoy your coffee while watching people or nice a chat","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOKZ66lBOR76nOI53Ns0lMUTbInDkjta3NgFUYN&fid=0x0:0x9c9157300d8792ca"],"When":"2023-12-30"},{"Name":"Peace Walker","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWlQXleRzW33rQRXo0-N3Rawwa8C0O6n0evbJuAt9INasTkHyI-=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"No cash, no service. I went in one morning, not too early. Nobody there. Ordered a hot chocolate and got out my change purse. They don't take cash so I went down the street to another café. The barista seemed genuinely apologetic.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"No MSG No Garlic Foodie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX-PVOn6GcWxsKb-qqVJDTqvJ5rfua5QVuFocwcMF-ZRwuEIPLm=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"We had a very pleasant stop today sitting under the shade of trees, enjoying oat cappuccino and latte. The espresso was strong, but not bitter, and the foam very well made. I also had gluten free toast which was not very filling, but better than other sugared gluten-free cookies. They offer all-day-breakfast, useful to remember when I need to sit under a tree during hot summer months. The bathroom was spotless – no dirt above or under the base boards.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMS4GP-Zkp08drAs_4-oBE8bC-iwcQuDJpNAx1Z&fid=0x0:0x9c9157300d8792ca"],"When":"2022-6-1"},{"Name":"Dana Sullivan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWQIw-0oOUNgoyniYugTscGkgpKJS8tpx4V0tAajn3ZGkNIfqEk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I loved the vibe here. The style of decoration is a little old-fashioned (not outdated, just an older aesthetic) with beautiful, interesting artwork covering the walls, a nice fireplace, and plants in the windows. It felt like my grandparents’ living room. The barista was very nice too, which made it a welcoming atmosphere.
I got a tofu sandwich, a brownie, and an iced matcha latte. The sandwich had slices of tofu, slaw, spinach, and soft cheese (I think it was melted cheese, maybe it was a spread) on fig sourdough. I liked that it was something a little different and healthful, and it was delicious (especially the bread), but it had been made in advance and the dressing had really soaked into the bread. The edges of the brownie were a little dry, but the middle was so good - it was fudgy but not overly rich. The matcha latte was very clumpy and the flavour was so-so, though the weak flavour is probably not because they used low-quality matcha but because it wasn’t fully incorporated. I would not get this again.
My total was $21 which is comparable to what I’d pay for a similar meal at chain coffee shops like Blenz or Artigiano. While there are certainly better coffee shops for food, this one was better than the competition at the price point. The food had that wholesome homemade quality that the big chains lack. But ultimately the atmosphere here is so comfortable that I’d choose it over a lot of places with objectively better food, which for me is saying a Iot.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNBb_85xqOiUo96XtYvUkQhxI7QBKiIfasVOTUM&fid=0x0:0x9c9157300d8792ca"],"When":"2023-10-19"},{"Name":"Jennifer Kleinsteuber","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWSdJKAEAGQkrdxmBZy-xMdSQn4mnDTUWZ_qKjGvjulVXF1Qm-zpg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Quaint little coffee house located in Kitslano. I sat here, had an iced latte and watched people. Pretty music playing in the background with art hung on the walls. Very good feel here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMFgwlfAagOCM9pP-hXQiJRX66dmn3Y8BTf5mef&fid=0x0:0x9c9157300d8792ca"],"When":"2022-5-29"}]

title: Hululu Kerrisdale

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"w","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVECjtzjKwGGU2yagM5sH2sMNpUPFv0VdGQBZqvehtzvpFlyVDi=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"i really wish i could say i had a good experience. the ramen wall looked great and the self cooking station was cool, they had 4 free toppings, and everything tasted as packaged ramen is supposed to taste. however, my friend ordered a +$3.25 add on of spam to her ramen, which was supposed to include 5 slices of spam, and was only given 2 thin slices (third picture). when we went back and asked, we were told that this was because they were usually cut in half (obviously halving 2 slices only makes 4). not only were we given less than we paid for/was advertised, when we brought up the issue we were dismissed. save your money and use it to buy a whole pack of ramen to eat at home.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPjVCSJZHb5u_JOAquhV6QQWs-69P5mTVMBWWsK&fid=0x0:0x4b9577256b790232"],"When":"2024-7-20"},{"Name":"David Hong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUzxPrL6pmvd-nI2qKO9Mt1G5DwAt5w-zJtLE2VtTTFkprkzrGUxg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Definitely a cool and novel place for Ramen service. It’s co-located with Black Ball Taiwanese dessert shop. They have lots of customizations available to your simple pre-packaged ramen and instant noodles. Great place for solo as well as groups, and maybe fun low-key dates trying new things. I would go again to try different ramen options.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMWcbFBckCMLCsIZAWSeqLRJouoj__1A7rmaFGk&fid=0x0:0x4b9577256b790232"],"When":"2024-6-25"},{"Name":"M Mark","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJh32lM4t_7cX4VsExqacG-T8y6qepgXVVz9NQxEaNR5c4_HHo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A wall of ramen is every noodle lovers dream 😍 Fun experience where you pick your instant ramen of choice, select toppings and cook it at the self-serve stations that have preset timers to help you achieve that perfect bowl of ramen.

Current promo - 4 free toppings - fish cake, cabbage, corn and kimchi

Some of the noodles do seem expensive, but they tend to be the ones that are not as easily found in the grocery stores.

Staff were friendly but they were under-staffed the day I went and there was quite a delay between paying and cooking my ramen.

There is seating along the wall and a larger table in the back for the larger ramen parties ✌🏻","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipND4i4eycAvBw3W147S44zYf6SWwvONpJBxUO3E&fid=0x0:0x4b9577256b790232"],"When":"2024-6-28"},{"Name":"Amelia Rose","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWm-tHaBQXfVrZLKGJB2dFPsOWGGfbixJRTVnveq3dlOx3YgYo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"employee was super nice and super cute! The drinks were amazing even though it is such a basic grass jelly and milk tea boba. it was the perfect amount of flavor and the milk tea was super rich and authentic with the tea part without being bitter at all. Blackball never disappoints me. Had to order two drinks to go because it was too good. I also included images of drinks I ordered before. They were all absolutely amazing","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNcQfDQhBA6SX1GpmnfxxsYO61Y5SGMqTe85r7C&fid=0x0:0x4b9577256b790232"],"When":"2023-9-6"},{"Name":"bokoboko","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLlfKWeRkF5IRQPdQeAZs8me0XJaZ1LoOU_ZAomBGPlLl2qoQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It’s really good place for dessert! 🍨 they have a lot of desserts and instant noodles. The price is fair","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNlkBUnsrwRhzhIhOaqSdsy2x49sjOOlP_9jnZ9&fid=0x0:0x4b9577256b790232"],"When":"2024-11-17"},{"Name":"Hit the bull’s eye","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIRMZkCve-c-r8NQJrg9rpfr9LJLs3DFZRjruV4ejSniKfVUg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"That’s small size shaved ice, very good. And the people are super nice","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMxos59CF0lMG9lI9AjwgrydY9Vbbnp2HlDQT5t&fid=0x0:0x4b9577256b790232"],"When":"2024-12-20"},{"Name":"A.J. Canadian","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU0mITu_1OR_MuXzhVIkPjHjZnimy2Y-mI64r72OA1Zbucah6-N=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A great self cook personal noodle bowl restaurant in Kerrisdale. A new concept from Asia I had to try. Clean restaurant and friendly staff.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNjOQx9Oo08NUy2ni5S1PR6oRuFA9xAk0vrZyU3&fid=0x0:0x4b9577256b790232"],"When":"2024-6-29"},{"Name":"Dorothy Chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXXRt8sX_UR1ngxkg96Fe6vdtGe8V_E-XolCaH-RW0s6joKuQc=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"We ordered at 1:35pm and get the uncooked noodle after 20 minutes   I am very surprised I need to wait for that long to get a non cook noodle in a bowl. The shop is not busy. After waiting for 20 minutes , I can cook the noodle in 3 minutes lol.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMz2jjKgEmeX_23yQGNse14-J2eL3ILbbfYIS1h&fid=0x0:0x4b9577256b790232"],"When":"2024-7-27"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Hornson C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVmdCOdf2WkxshuYZj4HJ9-vQ7jEjZprqyHTmAPfOUXSG3SYvc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"《 ☕ LUMIERE CAFE NEW LOCATION ☕ 》

- toffee crunch oat latte -
- pistachio cloud iced latte
- pistachio or chocolate donut latte -
- honeycomb latte -
- mini pistachio croissant -

Lumiere Cafe prides themselves in quality service and quality ingredients. The coffee beans they use are roasted in-house, and each flavour note is carefully dialed in to produce the perfect cup of coffee, every time. ☕ If you're lucky, you might even get a chance to see their electric roaster in action!

I was lucky enough to try their new Fall 🍁 seasonal drinks and they were all so good. My personal favourite had to be the toffee crunch oat latte. I really appreciated the subtle sweetness the toffee added to the drink as it dissolved away. Plus, if you're impatient like me, you can take out a piece or two and just eat them as a snack! 🤤

Usually, I don't like pistachio flavoured drinks because they have such a strange after taste. This is not an issue at Lumiere because they use high quality pistachio paste as the foundation of each drink. The roasted nuttiness really shines through, plus the presentation? Come on! How creative is that "donut" latte?! 🤯

#media","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPp3enDiqMLkLzNm45Ht4EmS8JAIWLyZJrJqibR&fid=0x0:0x2267a3e37b908323"],"When":"2024-10-29"},{"Name":"Nick Pizza","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL114bQXHf3a_h8gJNY-tEDWzrjQunnag5OLmzCXjNSLErHVg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely splendid cafe. The attention to detail on these specialty lattes are amazing. Friendly staff and really neat dumbwaiter for the coffees to be delivered if you’re sitting upstairs , smart!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMuHPBdmv7oDQo3CJA2A5LXt2PEm1WBMKDX9oFu&fid=0x0:0x2267a3e37b908323"],"When":"2024-10-26"},{"Name":"tavers","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVC7ILtSlxfdDxb6V9J462gwa1fPiceOnM23OIRkX4ftST7PlY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best customer service! Very creative coffee ideas. Highly recommend the pistachio drinks.
Easily accessible at Broadway MacDonald intersection, right in front of bus no. 14 stop. You won't regret taking a detour","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM9ThJMk2I8RKMPCZVMbjAWFRuUW8WPNq_n5q3C&fid=0x0:0x2267a3e37b908323"],"When":"2024-10-20"},{"Name":"Priscilla Yip","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJl3bn5G8NS35bs-ANa90rLmgtf3hjQOsbIo_KxdoMVlLPP2A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have been to both locations and the quality in both food, service and atmosphere are equally amazing. They have new drink specials every season and they are done with so much care.

I recently tried their new pistachio based drinks including the cloud latte and the donut latte. Both are beautiful and with a delicate pistachio flavour. The toffee latte and honeycomb lattes were equally aesthetic without being too sweet.

The service is what I would like to highlight as every experience I have had has been kind, courteous, willing to accommodate dietary preferences and clearly passionate for what they do.

I will definitely be recommending this place to others!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Katie Carreon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIdc0N9wsWSkrWJ9sSpukDqXnb0j2vVLRssqAvk6gzaQLTmHw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Just came for a visit!! was delighted by such a friendly and kind staff. drinks were SO GOOD - we had the strawberry matcha and chai tea latte. 100% will be back. Thank you so much!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ariana Debreuil","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXGCxAUC32gjiufp6W_wsUVFLhtZWBz-i6KzFBcE-fkUFtI7Z5wIQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"10/10 experience! Great staff, calm vibes, delicious drinks!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipODWs1ZPZKCXJz15RXuU8awm6M9LGP0uk5fO57Z&fid=0x0:0x2267a3e37b908323"],"When":"2024-10-26"},{"Name":"Sarah E","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVXZ2OZnzDG_4HBce7A12vCJMkm468dp_CKyjT-0CBCDyM_N4c=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"So so so nice, my friend spilled all her drink on the floor, and they cleaned it up and offered to give her a new drink for free and when she said that she couldn’t take it because she had to go to class they said she could just come in and get the drink later at a different day","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ashleigh Fasken","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWeAKP5lmg88l-nRYCwOjYJuvWKjlxzm0qwzaOz6qkylj7DfBBhgQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great Honey Comb latte - comes with a big piece of honey comb! 10/10","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Norman Farrell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWOKauCUm-k2P6JXZbVaCjI514xmAUd8cPqhMzakFQdELGnjKWj0g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"According to National Geographic, the world’s most consumed beverage —not counting water — is tea. At this North Vancouver store, we find near endless varieties of tea, along with expert advice about the products. Tea is a drink that is simple to prepare, yet complex through subtle differences. It may take a little time to change, but if you add sugar, milk or cream, stop now. Purchase different types of loose leaf tea, prepare as directed and enjoy real tea.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM0dR0rFO55JS6ZvcuFsJBkEXGwe2j6WJb9THkz&fid=0x0:0xfa1000cdf1291984"],"When":"2022-4-19"},{"Name":"Kim Mackie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLeVdlbfDKQt3kcslmQrkT_7u5zGzWjfIaIvrigj1U5nbvACg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Beautiful porcelain mug and teacups- so many wonderful choices. Excellent customer service. I chose vintage cars mug but there is an incredible selection of porcelain mugs, cups and teapots.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOLuURO9V8R2TBMWlZ8M5pYP6GLV0S97SCJFFGi&fid=0x0:0xfa1000cdf1291984"],"When":"2021-12-19"},{"Name":"Shiri n","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLwFrt4mUEIDDEY5MPvb_KsdhJh5wAncUIcJhIV-mFwTmGrqw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"There's tea, then there's tea! This shop carries the highest quality tea and has close relationships with their suppliers all over the world. I've bought delicious milk oolong from them, pu-er tea (they have various ages and cakes/bricks), as well as their green, black and fruity teas. They have some herbal teas too (linden flower, passion flower) and almost anything you may be looking for. The family that runs it is knowledgeable, generous and passionate about tea. Highly recommend.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Joyce Jeon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIC0eL5Va8QDK5y3FLp4FEnMuX0cXrM3S-2DLLu8O1N6eSypQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My husband and I have been going there for more than a decade to get the best quality tea leaves. I've experienced many upgrades in the variety and the quality of their tea. They seem to test different flavor of natural tea from many tea harvesters from all over the world. My favorites are Himalayan green tea and organic earl grey tea!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Amin Bahrami","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU5wtkH32bM34vMKvejv5WCaBMIB2MYOGJC8UbOjhfIeIbtGPbC=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Awful store I have ever been to.
I bought a teapot which does not fit on my electric kettle, so I called on the same day with a 10-minute delay from leaving the store to ask for a return because it's useless for me, but the manager didn't answer the phone and said we don't have any return or exchange.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mehdi Mehrzad","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJUpew5aGhg17apBioCGmLWgptxvB6hbgS-DgJVQwkT7ekHoA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fantastic place, the best tea shop I've been to. the owner is very polite and extremely knowledgeable.  Introduced me to Chocolate tea and Earl Grey Cream which are both marvellous. He gave me free sample since it was my first visit and bought the best tea infuser I've come across. be returning regularly. cheers.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Dyanne Jack","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU-meIQzg3D-cdiC-O48Yh2rJIphbQGwsXE3B8W-p-q0h9hBeM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love this little store, which I only discovered as I was gifted a lovely bag of Earl Grey Cream. The best Earl Grey Cream tea I’ve ever tasted. I would highly recommend Tea Time to everyone. Wonderful kind service and customer care. They even have great gift ideas for Christmas or birthdays or wedding showers. Fine Bone China cups from England and Glass Teapots from Germany. But I can’t say enough about the teas. So fresh and delicious. So happy for this gem of a store.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nicole O'Young","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIAs6l8AgqDtT_0eDXA6TVNnwPnq9L1AmkgUTXiMrljbKkKDw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a wonderful shop.
Amazing, high quality plain and flavoured teas.
Super friendly and knowledgeable service.
Just found out they even have underground parking.
I wish I could give more stars.","Images":null,"When":""}]

[{"Name":"Beatrice Sebastian","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUUwek93RSRQI7WTfEuNcqVL7HGmZluvzKeumWSk0H6j-wxN_r7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"So many options and all of them good! I had the spicy veggie and avocado frittata, while my partner had the one with sausages in it! Packed with lots of flavour, and spicy enough where it’s not overpowering, but there is still a kick. We also had the chai latte and the Thai milk tea, the latter being my choice. The prices are very reasonable as well, and I left with extra","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMrV7r33OaiAb880nhUGDColmaJCXMDk_5rTOI&fid=0x0:0x235021b24bb8028f"],"When":"2024-9-10"},{"Name":"Felipe Nardini Semedo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjURszN0SB5gfUgG15JRA2VZnMKg9saOc8VB56_o8u8YD-YjWkyM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The place is very nice that is for sure, and the food was pretty good. The employees were kind and friendly. Though, it is quite expensive. Paid 15 dollars for this:","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPUve_LEC5JMNxUojeXyKD3s4aLHWVChffsvrbP&fid=0x0:0x235021b24bb8028f"],"When":"2024-10-28"},{"Name":"Rebecca Crean","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJffXx9jAHNGss4kYu6c34jLTh2TEgTCsOy2Ri5WTEPdAkIcg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I can not recommend this restaurant enough. Staff are always so welcoming and friendly. My personal favorite from the menu is the spicy egg ciabatta with bacon and avocado, with hasbrowns. It has to be the best lunch spot in UBC for sure!! Also, I have tried many of their Indian dishes, and they are so tasty and authentic. Butter chicken is amazing!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMR-lz9EE8USNUNZ7pDTmoKSZKRdbDkLAxGw5xW&fid=0x0:0x235021b24bb8028f"],"When":"2024-10-8"},{"Name":"Ethaniel Chou","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVfW0x1CC0hsJlAWDv_pkaw3wzcOBSIvaLMpmRqZz5EHutkyWNl=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went in a few minutes AFTER closing without realizing that they were closed. They were so kind and offered to make eggs Benedict for me anyways, even though it was after closing time! The food was delicious.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMjgRxG3YdMn_U7cN7A3ThxuqiOpgxyGanjrio1&fid=0x0:0x235021b24bb8028f"],"When":"2024-9-20"},{"Name":"Iman Sh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWY_It5dFbhJ3ahD3y8wnnvsyYECBdVwU0ipYiueTLf-0IgvGbE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We ordered two sandwiches. The turkey melt was nicely filled with turkey hams, cheese, and tomatoes, and it wasn't skimpy at all. For the pesto chicken and cheese sandwich, we chose the spicy version, but it was too spicy for our tastes, and not in a pleasant way. They serve frozen fries, which were unremarkable, so I might skip those next time. The portions were good for the price. Overall, we enjoyed our meal and plan to try other items in the future.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNjuWCCjG3bKAaRvShSvmkeAFyJhhm5ItRN4pFj&fid=0x0:0x235021b24bb8028f"],"When":"2024-4-20"},{"Name":"Suha Khan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocINzwRxo4T3JStfrT3enCk3zn4WB4wfUp-_mi52cxtbb_WFgNA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I really enjoy this small cafe along my campus quite a bit! The food is so authentic and quite flavourful. I’m from Mumbai so the Indian menu here definitely reminds me of home and the environment itself is absolutely friendly! The owner, Mr. Arwan is such a nice person, and he always greets me and asks me about my day and if the food was to my liking. If you’re looking for a unique, yet quiet place, this is definitely it! The food comes under 5 minutes to your table, and the amount is impressive. Worth every penny!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Zaayer Nasib","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVkh0fpj6mvCROx8j1Ux0TdNtszR1GgFfGTRvlt6JMDCheOJwvK=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Ratings Scale 0 - 10
Variety: 8
Service or Product: 7
Customer Service: 6
Environment: 6
Cleaning: 6
Washroom: 6
Cost: 4

While the food itself was decent, 2 factors made me give this page a 2 star rating:

Price: its too expensive! For a simple 2 person breakfast with tea, it cost us $42!!

Service: The service from the waitress and counter person were fine but another rude guy ruined the experience. I simply wanted to know ingredients of the cheese they use for my dietary restrictions. Instead of listening to me properly and guiding me he said he doesn't know. I asked if I could see the packaging and he said he threw the packaging out and then proceeded to leave without listening further. Pathetic. Will never visit again even though the food was decent.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMq2SIcp5YKM2nN8KcchNCIq7FwbYOyHNtJ3iQV&fid=0x0:0x235021b24bb8028f"],"When":"2019-3-12"},{"Name":"Dana Sullivan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWQIw-0oOUNgoyniYugTscGkgpKJS8tpx4V0tAajn3ZGkNIfqEk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Five years living at UBC and I have been sleeping on this place. Finally stopped in to try their Indian food for lunch and was very pleasantly surprised. I had the Kadhi Onion Pakora Chawal and it was so good. Nothing too fancy, but just excellent Indian comfort food. I’m not in a place to say whether Indian food is “authentic” or not, but this was not the relatively bland take on Indian food that you might expect from this unassuming brunch place, it was pleasantly rich. And the paratha was so soft and flaky! The portion was also very filling, so good value for your money. I like that the Indian section of the menu has so many (vegetarian) breakfast dishes that most Indian lunch/dinner restaurants don’t serve. I’m kind of curious about the Western brunch menu too, but will definitely be back to try more of the Indian food if nothing else.
I had a Piña Colada smoothie too. It wasn’t bad, but it didn’t really do anything for me. They called this a “fruit smoothie” but it was so sweet and tasted closer to a flavoured slush to me. I'd skip the smoothie next time since the main meal was enough.
The atmosphere is totally bare-bones, it’s not sketchy or anything, there’s just absolutely no ambiance to speak of. The staff was nice enough though, especially the person taking orders at the front. It’s not a hip brunch place at all, but a great place for some no-fuss good eats. Although I can’t speak for the Western brunch stuff, I can definitely recommend you check them out for the Indian dishes if you live around UBC.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOGkL616_ijo3iJGYtqCaMmv43q99ohyD-11woA&fid=0x0:0x235021b24bb8028f"],"When":"2022-9-11"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"unicreative.ca优你创意","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVEYf4zsDGDgp84WfiOFqfp2G2V4VnbOA-NVTN129QeM4e3gm4_=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Bad review: I ordered an venti oat latte and paid the same money, and I gave a tip too, but I got a Grande, After my inquiry, the waiter only changed a cup, the capacity is completely insufficient.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNns_zeldWvTJT_AeRGfSL0nVSWXAAtE9Xr5b8Y\u0026fid=0x0:0x961175c42c3e722e"],"When":"2024-11-25"},{"Name":"Felipe Nardini Semedo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjURszN0SB5gfUgG15JRA2VZnMKg9saOc8VB56_o8u8YD-YjWkyM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"25 cents for the water? First starbucks location ever to charge me for tap water. Cannot believe it.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Rukshan Vidana Gamage","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWR0f3Iws8zOiKOUCapodza0acqA8sjuI1E8Plqct6HCkUiu8eX=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Mess anything but not a person's morning coffee. Please take orders more seriously, give a value to the money we pay.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNDYyK7qkWLmGgtEWFR4j8aCJLK3evBW3Lnh-2_\u0026fid=0x0:0x961175c42c3e722e"],"When":"2023-7-14"},{"Name":"Josephine Huang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX8UejeGdlCBXmq9iCj4KAfMFg31koNGe0fK1qhNtiuUpMoa3TL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I ordered the Matcha Creme Frappuccucino, and it was really good. Everyone that works here deserves a raise!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Taha Keyvani","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKVhC0LSNT0mB1MrmEMkFwdnNV47jd3SKWjJEPXv79k9mJFoA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Drip coffee used to be $3 max, starbucks is now using rip off strategy to help their numbers, random added numbers like “other” aside, default tip Amount is 22% and lowest in 20%. If you ask a question about the products, they become extremely upset, as if we have done something wrong by not doing our homework. If you ask a second question, they frown intensely. Everyone (except for one young Russian girl) behaves as if they have been trained to create stress for the customers.\"","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"ϟ","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVcq-of5kOnIo_kYHbAsSknHCpOgSDhE2G7CTSk6S7gUn8WvpQ2=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I bought samples of Masala Chai and Orange Tea respectively, as well as the white chocolate cranberry biscotti and the 300g coffee! Once I taste all of them I'll have to update this review! Overall the ambience was very nice, employees were patient and store was nicely arranged. Location is a bit obscured as not many people expect a tea shop so close to Sportchek, would recommend! There are tables if you want to sit outside the store too.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"natalie shay","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKl1aTr1bGCE4FmoAvfyok9vdM_DMqdaq8CpF1pOBiTs2GWbg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Gave me old burnt coffee. It was cold when I went back they didn’t offer me my money back and I didn’t have time for them to brew a fresh pot. Horrible service coffee was disgusting.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Elyas Mottaghian","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWnwaRKYD66KZz8_b7wIw6ewVzcGk06lDhfbPr194ERygUlCftB=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Visited the store to purchase a Christmas present.  I selected a basket priced 49.99.  on paying I noticed the cashier charged me 69.99.  when I asked about the discrepancy and if they could honour their price tag, the cashier replied \"*they* must have updated the price in the system.  I just work here sorry\".  Since when is that the customers problem? There was no attempt made to honour the price tag presented to the customer.  I will not return and advise you check pricing on everything before making a purchase.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"MI Five","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLZi1fK9PY_Std4pWKlA4wB5FGwAfzK3fBWWun3AP-JTbLqelBi=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Murchies in West Van Library has a very nice calm longtime owner who serves fresh food and drinks just how I like it with no fuss or attitude. [{"Name":"Byron Sheardown","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXNqxb0c_42J36yKVRNJaOWQgsDJlMUDs94sxLG_b3F9RGXTQ_D=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Cute place. Coffee (espresso) is typical Vancouver bitter. There’s cute things to buy. Unusual for coffee shop. The sandwiches and pastries are wrapped in plastic so hard to say if fresh or old.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMrn6VHH9toh3fsJiFgUXB5oK4trge3YQR1pU3e&fid=0x0:0x9d7ce57a2cef44f5"],"When":"2024-11-14"},{"Name":"Kim Lishman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWoLip5cDVmyG9tqCTLI4iijakhf4W2VYZg3aEWyBWtOfnKc61HDQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A small but bright coffee shop with breakfast, lunch and treat options. The atmosphere in here is quite calm, perhaps as most of the tables just seat 2/3 people so it wouldn't attract large groups. It's the perfect spot to come solo or catch up with a friend. I was a big fan of the iced matcha latte and the cinnamon bun (warmed!).","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPIuxwZyAvDMcBVmGUx3upRX0X5HZzS-0ZgcxeS&fid=0x0:0x9d7ce57a2cef44f5"],"When":"2024-4-24"},{"Name":"S.C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLMkAUs3I6U0iebk5QdUadgPAnrwUo1l-GLBlpzIIfmtybAnA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Truly the best coffee taste in Vancouver I’ve found so far. They also have great healthy salads and the owner are very friendly! Highly recommend","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMZk5JqNylY3-k2M8hohuadJYBIhn4ulYHFDDYN&fid=0x0:0x9d7ce57a2cef44f5"],"When":"2024-7-11"},{"Name":"Charley McCormack","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU0SioKBXIyyp9aPm8dE262i6QZMRLn98PDHF12AKk0gAitzj8lbA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"They are so lovely here.  I don't come in that often but they always remember my order!  Plus their ginger cookies are delicious and  coffee on point.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Marcos Alejandro Badra","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXTLtd9nTY-LLq4HPTmhq6AheFYUM0AowvvUad4ue9KcNlgdemgnA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A Gem of a Cafe! I recently visited this cafe, and it exceeded all my expectations. The food was absolutely fantastic, and the service was impeccable. The decor was charming and inviting, creating a cozy atmosphere that made my visit even more enjoyable.

I must say, the Americano was the best I've ever had, with a rich and smooth flavor that I can't stop thinking about. The air quality was fresh, and the background music added a perfect touch to the ambiance.To top it off, the washroom was spotlessly clean, which is always a big plus in my book.

This cafe has it all—great food, excellent service, and a wonderful atmosphere. Highly recommend it to anyone looking for a top-notch cafe experience.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Joe Yeung Wai Chui","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI_KRunk9AiLiL1s3eFVboH0veN8HcPHzhwWlZLgx_zthUfDA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Their croissant is airy, coffee is good. But that salmon toast is a huge 5 stars. Portion not big but makes you appreciate every bite even more.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN3XKXYr8Z43DXFo40crr1Hy5dco9KOAnNtkMHo&fid=0x0:0x9d7ce57a2cef44f5"],"When":"2018-11-3"},{"Name":"Betul Ezgi Kula","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXMQvBY-m8AiDM_J3UjbM1DOYnJZb8MU61nHDNCe4lq8Jd2u6iP=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Small, cozy and pretty cafe. We spent a whole afternoon hanging out and drinking coffee, it’s a nice place to do some people watching. Also, you HAVE to try the Persian vegetable sandwich, it’s delish! It has flavor and I just loved that they put lots of pickles in it. 10/10 would recommend!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Glaiza","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXiNtq8K-0KxH9o2JYlQKaJ9doqAzDde_6vgqOTvH82fCR9y0eMQQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Such a beautiful cafe! And I loved the peppermint mocha 💖","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMEMKnx-5mFRB7i2t181xrbSwvFjJhuIrVryvRe\u0026fid=0x0:0xf54561a51d776e9d"],"When":"2024-12-14"},{"Name":"Kelvin Fong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWYlOJ0ZWKycRqx5ZOzHhnjusnD1vSd-Gno_8IQ4mNi6hmtCYtiSA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Livni Café \u0026 Bakery offers a cozy atmosphere paired with a decent cup of coffee. While the coffee is okay, their in-house baked goods steal the show. The special coffee combo for $5, featuring a small coffee with a choice of muffin or brownie, is a delightful deal. The café's small size adds to its charm, providing a comfortable and clean space for a pleasant visit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP-VI8_ChRP6Y9y-z3eYKPf2xB2YgTbHX-onvBz\u0026fid=0x0:0xf54561a51d776e9d"],"When":"2023-11-30"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Lily Ucok","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW5bzD67Klzn0mRaVAwgkUp1kaai9QEqUXWFBCsHsC3oXbajXg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love this tea shop in North Shore! It’s one of my favorites, and I’ve been going there for years. They have a great selection of teas. This year, I’m trying their Tea Advent Calendar, and I’m really enjoying the flavors. If you’re in Lonsdale Quay, be sure to check out this little gem!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Julie Vaxevanis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJh8Tlrps2PoqyRHHxZ4H5h7Z-4vrG-pSgVL-8xJYLnuLwHTK_7=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The Blue Teapot is the best tea store ever, we’ve been buying our teas from them for years! Extremely kind owners with an expansive selection of amazing teas (so many Rooibos teas, our favourite). Well worth the drive to visit the Quay, but when we can’t make it to North Van from Langley the free local delivery they offer is so convenient.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nadir Zulqernain (Broker Nadir)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWhEJmar-xPGvkChLjdSk0W2wzn9BfvbU7Rx_M524YyfDxob5mQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Blue Teapot At The Quay is on the main floor inside the Lonsdale Quay. It is a very quaint shop. They sell all things Tea. We regularly purchase English Breakfast tea from the. We buy enough to last about six months. This is the best English Breakfast tea that I have tasted–––and I have tasted a variety from around the world.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPtKKlKVqpgM96tPngfR9HycorGrb1udiwLNeVH\u0026fid=0x0:0x387ea51389d10cda"],"When":"2023-5-7"},{"Name":"Patricia Fantillo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWpSRpiBU0ZFMSvbwUVCK2PTfTZ4BIV4z0ukERgEti9rzTXyy5q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Been to the store quite some time ago and recently ordered a fairly large order of teas online last week. Got my order today. SO happy! There was a little “Thank you” note and a small complimentary size of masala chai.\nThank YOU, Blue Teapot! It’s little things like this that show how much a company appreciates their customers. Much love!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNadh2qWtaTgyEF_4CruIVxuHIAjHSXxtVX3RJC\u0026fid=0x0:0x387ea51389d10cda"],"When":"2022-10-18"},{"Name":"Joshua Ji","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbxtbf01bFxPNvY_fFS4tse0M94tnEm8IicZkW0JzUkJKMWT8ICA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great tea selection, very helpful employees. Loved being able to smell all the different teas before committing to one. Lots of different types of containers available for purchase. Good vibes.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPAHzMZJXbOfQ7aQuopiySX8-bhrKI9vVPZ9hLy\u0026fid=0x0:0x387ea51389d10cda"],"When":"2023-4-27"},{"Name":"Tiffany Wun","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXS5YVNgJdfLlXr513CShiIo_prlAVW6badcfVlfKYXPA40a3xELg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The owner is very kind and the prices are a good deal, especially for some of the teapots and teacups. My friends (who aren't tea drinkers) and I all ended up purchasing something from this store. Highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP8Mdk7ll_gdEapylDWZuyoRP_QHnxsURmJM3KH\u0026fid=0x0:0x387ea51389d10cda"],"When":"2019-3-10"},{"Name":"Robyn Pinkerton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL_U5ngF5tbpaT-zKqGh6YGftzBcxCKICZfT9gIjl-1kW9TGw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My friend and I came across the Blue Tea Pot a couple weeks ago. Wow, what an amazing selection of teas. We returned there this past weekend to enjoy a hot tea of our pick from an extensive menu. My friend purchased an assortment of teas as well. Zophie was extremely helpful. This place is a gem if your a tea drinker.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Torrie De Danann","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIrGhNZZpN4lpsnt-2tEdLsU8EBg7FRguFydoBmA9F76LKTxA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very cute shop with lots of lovely products at the Lonsdale Quay market. I had to order online due to quarantine and it was an easy, fast, great experience. I really appreciated the $5 local shipping fee and was able to get some of their beautiful blooming teas as Christmas gifts. Customer service was excellent and they did an awesome job of staying in touch the whole time, helping to make sure the delivery time was convenient for me. Will definitely be shopping here again. Thanks Karolina and The Blue Teapot!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Dana Sullivan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWQIw-0oOUNgoyniYugTscGkgpKJS8tpx4V0tAajn3ZGkNIfqEk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I really liked this place... I visited two days in a row because I was really charmed. Good atmosphere, lots of natural light with one of those big windows that could roll up (even though it was closed, it still gave the place a more open feel), lots of seating, two levels which is interesting. Calming music. Mostly clean, but there were some flies in the bathroom - not a lot that I was seriously put off but enough that I noticed.
The baristas were very polite. The barista on my first visit very patient with all the customizations I was making on my drink. On my second visit, they messed up my order and made me something with a similar name but when I explained, they were nice about replacing it and even made a bigger size.
The drink menu is huge - they have bubble tea and unique drinks along with basic coffee and tea, a variety of pastries, and some light food. The bubble tea drinks are made "from scratch" with real brewed tea instead of powders or concentrates so you can customize with nondairy milk. I got:
Guacamole toast: Pretty simple, but good, like homemade food. Everything tasted very fresh. I think there was a little sprinkle of pepper which was subtle but made a difference in making it taste like a dish and not some stuff thrown together on bread. The price ($9) is a little steep for the small portion.
Carrot walnut muffin: Standard carrot muffin. Soft and light.
Pistachio cookie: Very soft cookie with little dollops of frosting, a pistachio paste drizzle, and a sprinkling of pistachio pieces. Not too sweet. The pistachio paste drizzle was kind of skimpy but the small amount of frosting like a garnish was actually perfect - it was a very nice cookie by itself and more frosting would have been excessive.
Sakura oolong tea latte w/ red bean popping pearls: The tea was very good. I kind of expected a sweet sakura flavour but it wasn't sweet at all, which highlighted the fragrance of the tea itself. The red bean popping pearls were super interesting - not red bean-flavoured popping pearls but pearls with whole red beans inside. It was a cool and enjoyable texture with the combination of the pop and the chewy beans.
Osmanthus Oolong Tea Latte: Very calming drink. Topped with a little sprinkle of flower buds which was a nice touch.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMvyZ14W2uAbHtlG0xwni5AGRSAtRkTDIHOj_WN&fid=0x0:0x684db3f1d401c62d"],"When":"2024-9-27"},{"Name":"zhang suze","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJMbn6vhNsBATdFig31WbHDZHd0LojYkgikCq4zwgcBxJy5AA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Stopped by here on a Sunday morning. The place is very clean and well designed.

We were greeted immediately and ordered an iced Premium Coconut Latte and a hot Osmanthus Oat Latte. Both were extremely tasty and exceeded our expectations!

The coconut latte had a well balanced combination of coffee and coconut flavor. Make sure to mix it well before drinking. The osmanthus latte had a strong osmanthus flavor with a hint of sweetness.

Highly recommended to try out these two drinks if this is the first time of your visit!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOIOZJj4X1xZGOqdDf_kaUaGQr7PSaiHqvfHJ17&fid=0x0:0x684db3f1d401c62d"],"When":"2024-6-23"},{"Name":"Sweets Fanatic","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVKT4q9vq4bFnKURKLo-IuFZkNgSUZrYyHCHwVq7PvVTaTofHHc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lovely interior design, great quiet music that set off a cute and romantic atmosphere. Love the marble tables and interior design. Gives a classy and clean vibe.

Service was so good~ the staff were constantly providing their best and made us very comfortable in asking for other utensils.

The food was amazing- order a taro drink and the taro was so apparent despite asking for zero sugar.

The lavander earl grey crossiant was mind baffling. Perfect sweetness of early grey in the cream and the lavender smells so well with the tra flavour. Crispy on the outside, creamy on the inside.

Def recommended for dates and casual cafe hopping~

Food: 4.8/5
Atmosphere: 5/5
Price: $.$ (10-20$ per person)

Comeback rate: 100%","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO5YY697stcoeRQ5SD3Gj4ZV5cgpZFgqaci0qRX&fid=0x0:0x684db3f1d401c62d"],"When":"2024-5-22"},{"Name":"Quinn Middleton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVY2QdQYVqfpGNwtjggHktblvZSmbHIJsZC9kLsVLJDUcmOUHKb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I tried 3 items: The shake mango green tea w/ passion fruit poppy boba, donut late, and spinach & feta pastry.

The shaken mango green tea was very tasty and refreshing. The popping boba was nice, though a little tough to pop. Their donut late is a nice (new to me) take on a late! It has chocolate powder and a dash of cinnamon on top of the extra frothed foam which is poured right on top! The pastry was tasty albeit nothing special which to me is always good as it meabs it's worth getting again.

Their staff are very friendly and chatty, chairs are comfortable with plenty of different views to choose from, and the cafe itself is very bright and modern. Great place to either stay in with a little book or to study, or to grab and go for a walk around the park directly around the corner!

Looking forward to trying more drinks and tasty treats!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNpHNZd-DDqBgYm1jJLktXD8C0twNIU9kGQgmVZ&fid=0x0:0x684db3f1d401c62d"],"When":"2024-5-19"},{"Name":"Steph Z","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUZd526s1JdRE1ltoPXfNh_VX4hc97V1Ex5l1KYr732VgAXgoak=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The interior is clean and very aesthetic, and the staff were sooo sweet! They have nice seating near the back of the cafe which I was pleasantly surprised by, and the drinks we ordered were really yummy too! Definitely recommend going for amazing service and lovely atmosphere :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN5AvyWcEbevGDgTtHNcm2AnbMzyTDa8l7N6wDN&fid=0x0:0x684db3f1d401c62d"],"When":"2024-5-17"},{"Name":"DDAN","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIkFr_7zsHE5864tvRM_fkRh9JiAqv4ddL-XKkFkudYgK12kg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had a Black Forest cake and an Americano. The coffee was really good, and the cake wasn’t too sweet, with a rich chocolate flavor—it was absolutely delicious. I’ll definitely be coming back!🥹","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOO6rXxJ3cXx09XnXUvm_A_p3XfpQJQHr5vz_7E&fid=0x0:0x684db3f1d401c62d"],"When":"2024-10-22"},{"Name":"Farhana Ibrahim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWgudyYgo-CjcGBSWiKojs3SxApoapXSUsuUWN3d1QzT5DZ3GTs=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Stopped by here on a hot Sunday afternoon and we were truly impress by the food and drinks - we got the donut latte, iced coconut latte, cranberry chicken sandwich and a carrot muffin. Will definitely come back and try their other variety drinks and food 😊","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOeeDGVjvpJ_etGWL56ELhXxgXS4cg61_2fAYpq&fid=0x0:0x684db3f1d401c62d"],"When":"2024-6-30"},{"Name":"Yin Kei Ho","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLALd2hZERByH9cEuLJN7H1p6rxD302sVvnT-66q5HBIEwfYA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"There are plenty of tables, bright light, electric outlet wifi and food. I asked for less syrup osmathus oolong tea, 4/5 good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNG3fyuJvbRvihm2rid8JyrppVTW-TLpD7GLqwR&fid=0x0:0x684db3f1d401c62d"],"When":"2024-11-27"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Melanie Dekker","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVZWOVby0mjxg_a0S6eqeAGCK2KQNcgM-5_mfCOxgIdTCNbKSq_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"6 minutes…and a hot fresh super tasty sandwich!! I could not have imagined anything better. Masala Veg sandwich! Size, quality, texture and delightful people and owners here. Just into the last quarter of the sandwich I thought to take a photo knowing I had to rave online! First visit and it won’t be my last! *Maybe they could place photos of the sandwiches in the food display area as there is nothing there… and at first I wasn’t sure what they served…","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMtw2KTDUmSpf8R2Mj-S-SJpzdS8vDbM78pCzmh&fid=0x0:0x321a8a14608de224"],"When":"2024-10-2"},{"Name":"Dana Sullivan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWQIw-0oOUNgoyniYugTscGkgpKJS8tpx4V0tAajn3ZGkNIfqEk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wonderful! Place2be Cafe took over from Yet’s Cafe a little less than a year ago. This is an Indian cafe with lunch food like sandwiches and samosa and occasionally specials like chana and roti or idli vada, and chai, but they still have a small bubble tea menu.
I tried the paneer masala sandwich, which is apparently the most recommended veg item, and a ginger chai. The presentation of the sandwich was very nice, topped with sev and with some ketchup for dipping on the side. It had melted cheese in addition to the paneer, so this is definitely one for cheese fans. Anyway, it was delicious - not really spicy, but with the intense masala flavour that I love and some green chutney to add some brightness. The chai was also great. I prefer mine without sugar so I was glad that they made it unsweetened and checked if I wanted sugar added. Together this was only about $10, making it one of the most affordable meals I've gotten downtown!
As lovely as the food was, it was equally nice to talk with the owner! We had a great conversation and I learned more about the cafe and his family. They seem like very nice people. I admire their goal of promoting their cafe through word of mouth rather than investing in social media campaigns... I would recommend giving them a try!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO2RQK9uOMoE8S9XzJtoCYUP12b7bXsNIMd2paF&fid=0x0:0x321a8a14608de224"],"When":"2024-7-30"},{"Name":"Nikhil","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJlx82z5ikRHdHu41y354FO2Osc41ctSIkQ65Ti7t1aShEmNw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Loved my visit to Place2be Cafe! Their bubble tea is refreshing, masala chai is authentic, and the smoothies are super fresh. The samosas are crispy and flavorful, and the Indian style sandwich is a must-try. Don’t miss their South Indian specials! Highly recommend this family-run gem.

#FamilyRunCafe #BubbleTea #Chai #Smoothies #Samosa #IndianSandwich #SouthIndianSpecial #HiddenGem","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPzda3_7YkACRuXSbn8g6hFJ9YpI_fU797XuVEu&fid=0x0:0x321a8a14608de224"],"When":"2024-7-20"},{"Name":"Siddhant Purohit","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVwwRftWrOnizmqcK0-eHcNfOD2bFb_mGSuFX5WZ56m-a16Ap-9uw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I am just so amazed by the whole experience of this place, as soon as I walked in I could sense the love and care put into every corner of the cafe. I was welcomed by the owner and the team, felt right at home. The menu prices are very reasonable and for the quality of the food they serve, I would not mind paying a few dollars extra. I can assure you that I am not affiliated with them in any way, today was my first time and I could not wait to leave a review so more people can find out this little gem that’s right in downtown. Especially if you are from India, you will know exactly what I am talking about - it’s your aunty cooking her favourite recipes with all her heart, poured right into the plate. It’s quite lovely <3. I have tried their signature sandwich: the Spicy Chicken grilled sandwich and Oh my god, the spices are on point, its like a whole carnival in your mouth, and its just so filling. Big fan of their chai too, its my go to for starting the morning right. I am a very picky eater, especially when it comes to Indian cuisine, because my mum is a great chef too. The Chef here, her name is Lovely, she took me right back to my mother’s kitchen.

I am excited to try every dish in the menu. You will know that I am not overselling them once you experience it yourself. I am sure you will run into me if you drop by sometime in the afternoon :)","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jules Feng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL3QsTxYZ61y3X5xjGGgeqFdF8RF0qbftPsxlID-RFDrH-dE2w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Affordable iced chai for under $4! Staff is super friendly and kind. Free wifi available,","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM8eXNEaOiiee_3LOos1Q0rI2ZDDTvkG3zv4JZk&fid=0x0:0x321a8a14608de224"],"When":"2024-8-5"},{"Name":"Babal Preet Singh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUkaMI91BroCYUypbME1o4k2AwFvt5nIiYQLcek0wiUo7cQELXh=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had a wonderful experience with their chai and samosa! The chai was rich and soothing, while the samosas were crispy and deliciously spiced. Perfect for a quick snack. Highly recommend this spot!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"jaba babu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUhLHA5DsJT1Sydxpm2XN75_wAbKTclOV0POE4H9Ob5dyglGKNy=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nyc place to have an infusion of Indian food. Their spicy chicken and pesto chicken sandwich are top notch with a Indian flavor.  More veggie options are also available with daily special dishes. And love their service...so nyc people....♥️","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Angel Mathew","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVTtrXwR1OTUtBUyHUFBZMHiRLxzzZ2aDkVZQ2yOTBdRP5GBQM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best experience I ever had. Had the best hospitality and customer service. The owners were so sweet and heartwarming and the food is just as Good. I’ve tried almost everything at the cafe and the taste is just outstanding. Their paneer and spicy chicken sandwich is def something one shouldn’t miss. They recently rebranded their name to Place2Be and that is so perfect because it is the PLACE TO BE!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPacDNx9T6vct25jpJFiNya_DavffG3dRwb6aKL&fid=0x0:0x321a8a14608de224"],"When":"2024-4-16"}]
