user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Mara Berezniak","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWrbZkcvYMdkiDVrigEHRs_Pae3nKeX8cZouJOJV9xl5iVjqkd7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely the best bakery in town! Their New York cheesecake is a slice of heaven—rich, creamy, and perfectly balanced with just the right amount of sweetness. The strawberry shortcake is an absolute dream, with layers of moist cake, fresh whipped cream, and juicy strawberries that taste like they were picked at their peak. Every bite feels like a celebration. The staff is incredibly friendly and welcoming, making you feel right at home the moment you walk in. The aroma of freshly baked goods fills the air, tempting you to try everything. Highly recommend for any dessert lover—this place is a gem!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNfdVEnVKBJLYnCPAISkoFJMGYPHZ6cOnG1WEsT&fid=0x0:0xcbff5f49a3fea948"],"When":"2024-11-30"},{"Name":"seung hee lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIdeHwh8rx5ExYyvgt4E-DBwXe5eTEnFVG5vh2OmFdqlK0wSQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"It’s been a while back here since I visited.
Because the food I tried a few times was so salty  so,this disappointing experience made me not back Palate for a while. However, my friend want to have brunch at Palate so, I tried this brunch restaurant yesterday.

I ordered Mushroom truffle toast and adds on half full of avocado on the side. I’m glad that it taste is not salty. actually it is good but it is not easy to cut the sourdough as a bite-sized and not convenience to eat holding toast due to salad that is on the toast. My friend had Palate breakfast, I think the combinations are good as brunch.

However, hibiscus lemonade was so bland, hard to tell the taste is what lemonade supposed to be.

The service was excellent! The server provided mini french toast? for celebrating my friend bday. Actually it looks better than my thought ( the server said it will be small dessert ) and tasty. We wanted to have coffee time right after meal. We ordered flat white and mini hot cakes.

Mini hot cakes… I think they need to try and change the recipe. I assumed that they put extra baking powder to make fluffy hot cakes but the only flavor I can taste is baking powder. I determined I won’t go back here for brunch and dessert.
If I need a place where I can read a book or do own my work, I would go here after 2pm like going cafe but not for food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOLM6Il-DS_oymeWAMHPMoFtIJXQMfAU3kgz972&fid=0x0:0xcbff5f49a3fea948"],"When":"2024-11-6"},{"Name":"Arash Vajdi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW0TiROs4Mt_OqKViE5UvL_GJf_u83kT9g78uEP_JRpSPPE_8iL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I got the beef brisket sandwich but it was not good. The meat was too dry, and there was not much else in the sandwich (+a pickle on the side).
We also ordered the Fjord toast, which was tasty and well presented.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPCvseolgt49TocKvCzYkER0WZaST1rjITZAtWa&fid=0x0:0xcbff5f49a3fea948"],"When":"2024-12-16"},{"Name":"Haruna Sears","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVGIkE6Nfj052yTYrjFAlyysfJ1WL6eiqTuik1R5wpdkkpyPLo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wow!! Our server, Silvia, was truly amazing. She made us feel so welcome and was so friendly. The food was also delicious!

We shared the French toast, which was so good. Perfect crispness and just the right amount of syrup. Loved the berries too!

I tried the Kefta Skillet and it was very flavourful. My friends tried their eggs Benedict and said it was delicious, accompanied with the perfect breakfast potatoes. The Fjord toast was beautifully presented as well! Will definitely be back.

I also had an oat milk latte which was both smooth and aromatic. Thank you Silvia, for giving great service. Highly recommend!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOjcXLGMNPhtmQf71ziqraOwiiK-R7h2rZ1m3Yd&fid=0x0:0xcbff5f49a3fea948"],"When":"2024-9-8"},{"Name":"Milad Oshaghi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWvjtK7IvidFs0Ikmi5NW5qOuRhfrOD033R1ZNMTBgJLfFCI1WQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Palate Kitchen offers a delightful brunch experience that impresses on multiple fronts. The portion sizes are generous, and every dish we tried was flavorful and well-prepared. The atmosphere is spacious, with plenty of seating options that allow for a sense of privacy at each table, making it perfect for both small and larger groups.

The service was exceptional; the servers were friendly, attentive, and respectful, adding to the overall positive experience. If you're looking for a brunch spot that combines great food with a welcoming ambiance, Palate Kitchen is definitely worth a visit. For brunch at Palate Kitchen, we tried the espresso martini, which was fantastic—rich and perfectly balanced. Our plates included the egg benedict, lamb bistro toast, and halloumi, all of which were delicious and beautifully presented. Each dish was bursting with flavor, making it hard to pick a favorite. The combination of great drinks and mouthwatering food really elevated our experience. Highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipObb0Imh5MqwpMK6NpkQAZgz6vBB4QVf5s_ru-E&fid=0x0:0xcbff5f49a3fea948"],"When":"2024-10-28"},{"Name":"Jake Zimmer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJgPeMjh1zKcHe5LHi5XEhCHMllPm6i6SrWVeSh-J9cnYQoRg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Unreal breakfast. Usually when we travel to an area we try to go to different places but after eating here we looked forward to breakfast everyday. The presentation quality and even value when you consider the portions are top notch. French toast was the best I’ve ever had. The palate breakfast is great with familiar favorites prepared with care, and the lamb toast and brisket and eggs are all wonderful. We even got pastry from the front of store one day. And of course the coffee and mimosas are next level. Do not hesitate to go here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPfpTSnq6KpvlDP2SMWErDjhoKSbjJgS1c0dtEM&fid=0x0:0xcbff5f49a3fea948"],"When":"2024-8-25"},{"Name":"Jazmin N","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUqbQgtXBNP-0QYCzuWS71VM_aM0xjmrt_SQVoJ5CaYVXURtsLM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Looking for a place in google to have brunch and this place had good reviews. Food was good, although meat balls sauce had too much cumin. Service was decent but there were times where it felt a little lacking. Restaurant had a nice open feeling to it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM6XMvEYq04efPOidVJ989OXE1_sIRforI73yaN&fid=0x0:0xcbff5f49a3fea948"],"When":"2024-8-17"},{"Name":"Liz Kitura","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXp89k0W4BukjgygkT9TfQtqMs-pWbqIa1J4s3xVyQuCKAbBe_a=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great food! and a convenient location if you’re downtown. The service was quick and friendly, even with how busy it was, and the restaurant itself had a nice atmosphere. I definitely suggest a reservation on the weekends.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO8C13ohf6ljVovy-taiv0_kAT4HivqbqW936PY&fid=0x0:0xcbff5f49a3fea948"],"When":"2024-10-22"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Alexandra","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX11ANDfpnFU7GmCeaVtU5cBwuWRqquWAK3F9_AUyciKpah0H5L=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Arriving on the already oversaturated bbt market, Limegee is purpoted to offer something that no other store has: hand punched lime tea.

Now, if by hand punched, they mean that someone maneuvers a lever, which does the actual punching, then great. But if you were expecting manual labor in the form of someone literally punching limes with their fists to extract lime juice, then you're out of luck. Either way, it's a form of citrus abuse, is it not?

But I digress. They seem to have a steady rotation of seasonal drinks, which is always welcome. And of course, their prized Thai Lime Tea, which is a permanent fixture on their menu. At the height of Summer, they literally ran out of limes to make this drink, so that should tell you something.

Indeed, this is without a doubt the best lime drink that I have ever had anywhere. Not that many bubble tea places offer lime drinks to begin with. However, considering the word "lime" is literally in their storefront name, they'd better be able to back it up with the goods. And thankfully, they do deliver as promised.

Their Thai Lime Tea is a gorgeous emerald representation of the perfect blend of sweet and tart. If Summer could be turned into a delectable drink, this would be it. I like to flair it up with their Lychee Popping Boba, one of their 9 topping add~ons. Their Peach Black Tea is also really refreshing if limes aren't your cup of tea.

For a refreshing change of pace from the usual Passionfruit Green Tea, head over to Limegee and order something off their fixed menu. This place is in the limelight for a reason.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMS9R4i56yQJ-GZ98eUHt8q8jyKWjRynZx-_YTi&fid=0x0:0x4a571cb4cb860102"],"When":"2024-11-14"},{"Name":"Karen Cheung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXchMPPAN3zqOoag_ixABnvIJMH6A1alhdVdwJdZOdnJvvZotnpUg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I saw this on social media about the hand punch lemon tea and was excited that it’s how available in Vancouver!

I got the Thai lime tea and I loved it!! It was refreshing and the fragrant was very unique.

The owner was super friendly and passionate about the drinks he has and the staff were all super friendly.

For a limited time, they have a buy one large drink and you get a free roast milk tea with pearls!

They are also available on Uber eats.

It’s a new place so they are still getting the hang of things but definitely will be trying their other drinks!

Pricing is pretty decent for the location is downtown so give it a try 🙆🏻‍♀️🙆🏻‍♀️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOfZz7mUns1q-ndwRodVbuBZOts9D1cYnRol8KA&fid=0x0:0x4a571cb4cb860102"],"When":"2024-6-27"},{"Name":"William Deng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUDUP4ug3_SsYDYmTEMvBD8XwHsuxVIAXLKeICY7kNIuHpb0egzew=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hidden gem of Vancouver downtown. One of the best iced lemon tea there is. Similar to the taste of the traditional HK iced lemon tea, it has a good balance of sweet, sour, and earthy. The tea overall tastes great with lots of fresh lime slices inside, well worth the price. Must try! Healthy alternative compared to the traditional bubble tea!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOcGZRQnEh2xNEmZ-OjOpOx2l7kHob9g8yr-gzg&fid=0x0:0x4a571cb4cb860102"],"When":"2024-7-11"},{"Name":"Ke","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV3f-RibhrMATDXVLe_FOnl-0gkyacwrfyNw5dPFyLwWWtnUhs=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Vancouver finally has a hand-punched lime tea shop! My favorite is the Fragrant Oolong Lime Tea. The hand-punched technique fully brings out the citrus aroma of the lime, blending perfectly with the fresh tea fragrance, making it incredibly cooling! The Thai Lime Tea is also quite unique, with a strong Thai green tea flavor. The Roasted Milk Tea is another one worth trying—it's not overly sweet, with a rich roasted taste and chewy pearls. The staff are very friendly and provide excellent service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN4q_myjUS5coXc6WzYz2UxfM-hb5p9D4fZPeDf&fid=0x0:0x4a571cb4cb860102"],"When":"2024-7-6"},{"Name":"Kaitlyn Jung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU3Z8RTVAtMfrX6uG6JFFOYzsyTXI7YKgjW6WLd73YQIb_urJDkYQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We came during opening week and got the mango slush and a free small milk tea. The mango slush was good,m. The Geegee roasted milk tea with pearls was a little watered down but it might’ve just been because it was a hot day and made the ice melt faster. Either way it’s a cute spot and has a bit of indoor seating so you can sit as you wait for your drink.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP9d55SUgX6hYyE0z8B-4_Mk2WzI2gPng6lzVhl&fid=0x0:0x4a571cb4cb860102"],"When":"2024-7-23"},{"Name":"Tricia C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIS8jxdORXKJaAWhct8yqQ3gE8qhWdlJFJL5jsz8u98jLVDfw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Stopped in this new tea store for their grand opening celebration. The lime drink varieties all looked very refreshing. I ordered the hand punched Ctc Oolong lime tea and it quenched my thirst with its tang.
There are slush, fruit and milk tea options with topping options.

For their grand opening from Jun 25-July 9, 2024, they are offering a complimentary regular sized Geegee roasted milk tea with pearls when a purchase of a large drink is made.

Drink review:
The taste of the two drinks I ordered were good overall.
The lime drink series are set for their ice and sugar levels so there are no options to adjust. Despite this, the drink was not overly sweet.
Modifications can be made to their milk tea drinks. I did find the pearls a bit on the hard side during this visit.

Hours:
Operating hours are seven days a week 11am to 8pm.

Come check it out!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOgwNU8TvfTdH-i9Ia2mQEU112zEz8g_TEpzz-C&fid=0x0:0x4a571cb4cb860102"],"When":"2024-6-27"},{"Name":"Addi L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKTnlR5MICiGE73IqW2NSDmuc0wN6jbCQTqUiu6siIFiacFuw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I ordered a Large Hand Punched Jade Lime Tea. Incredibly refreshing on the first day of summer. If you're a fan of fruit teas, and in particular, the citrus ones, I would recommend checking this place out! Prices are what you would expect for a bubble tea in downtown Vancouver.

The service was quick, despite going shortly after opening, the single staff member who was there was effective. They even provide a extra cover to prevent spillage.

I will definitely be back to try their other milk tea drinks and try their topping offerings.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOSwe0E2y_mflsB4qXckr5cOEpPjxo1jF7Noi56&fid=0x0:0x4a571cb4cb860102"],"When":"2024-6-20"},{"Name":"mochi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWFJ3YzQy4Ek7Uv6iuvuDDt8SDrpfRq8OqiVFgoo79K5l16GqzX4Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Update: Self order kiosk is here and is really handy! Recommend the thai lime tea it's so refreshing 😋

Understaffed on a weekday. 1:26pm there are 4 people waiting for drinks. The one staff is busy making drinks so they cannot readily take orders. Suggest implementing self-order kiosk or QR code system. Edit: Another person, who seems to be the owner came in to help.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPFwpk5LrhKlIDO6lAU2AywyLTLKYSSNL6ABsEe&fid=0x0:0x4a571cb4cb860102"],"When":"2024-9-5"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Law Rence H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWX-gD_1eapEh74OqyTe0YNfW1L_Xu19R2dfxMN8tNFSt7HowTh1A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"“Holt’s Café serves exceptional coffee with rich, bold flavors and a smooth finish. The cozy ambiance and friendly staff make it a perfect spot to relax or catch up with friends. Highly recommended!”","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN_4FNCb3TvhG_MFe4hetIpIDE3P1lQIwF-V2t-&fid=0x0:0x92c4157456f803c1"],"When":"2024-9-3"},{"Name":"H Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL14_eieHE5S7G1H3NTSFMfeMwHdmVc0Pomxn9NAWXtHfvo6Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had a great time at the Holts Cafe enjoying Mother's Day Afternoon Tea special. Our server was Max, and he was amazing presenting tea samples, addressing special dietary needs, and always attending to our table and checking if we needed anything. He was really kind and helpful! We were able to really enjoy our time and felt very comfortable here.
We also each received perfume samples in a cute bag as a gift. Very thoughtful touch for the mother's day.
Convenient location, clean, food was good and very nice service. Will definitely come back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMcXDzzh81Ph6E29pawAdLe_Dv_rYl0noxYrimD&fid=0x0:0x92c4157456f803c1"],"When":"2024-5-15"},{"Name":"Ryan Mark","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU-8gTPutAprYAFgA5zkcbXP0HUJcGjXs78lAmbmJUW2gOGY-oj=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Holt’s Cafe in Vancouver offers a chic and sophisticated dining experience, perfectly complementing its upscale location. The menu features a delightful array of contemporary dishes, each crafted with high-quality ingredients and exquisite attention to detail. The elegant decor and attentive service add to the overall ambiance, making it an ideal spot for both casual lunches and special occasions. Holt’s Cafe is a must-visit for those seeking a refined and memorable dining experience in the heart of the city.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMQVg34AmxTZGmP-cYzX3ZXcuskBJXlaLC7uXR8&fid=0x0:0x92c4157456f803c1"],"When":"2024-6-10"},{"Name":"Nami N","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXXQ_y1xehjFRc7k4ZOGcjk1ejvy4aZNfXrVMDCBHrcQzc-GiZ2=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I came to Holt Renfrew and ate lunch few times in Holt Cafe. It's a nice atmosphere inside the H Cafe and great services.
I had a group meeting here and ordered different meals. I ate Holt Benedict for breakfast, Powder bowl for lunch, Steak Tartare and Seafood tower for dinner. Meals are 3 stars.
Steak Tartare was tough beef, I wish more smooth texture and more taste. Good ingredients for Powder bowl but unluckily less taste. Seafood tower was ok. All staff are very nice and good service. I gave 4 stars. I will be back...","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOanNhjts_oK12ZNsBrXUUconvrAaB4B2oBbpSL&fid=0x0:0x92c4157456f803c1"],"When":"2023-6-28"},{"Name":"A C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVnyUT5qR1q83BkWB2zCwnsqdLsc_SBXOjVUzSTlxYzil0MFcNy=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Would not recommend the Jo Malone high tea as there are cheaper alternatives that provide a beautiful and memorable experience for their guests.

Their regular dining experience may be better, but I would steer clear from their Jo Malone high tea set.

The cafe’s interior was adorable and I wanted to love my experience here, but I was let down.

The server checked up on us late, followed up once to drop off the food and described the selection for the menu, and only checked in on us once to refill our tea with hot water. After that - there were no check-ins, water refills, tea refills, etc. Our tea was actually cold for an hour or two, no one seemed to care to check in, and we had to flag down the servers on multiple occasions.

There was no tea timer as advertised by videos online. The food was mediocre at best, and the presentation + service did not seem like a good representation of Holt Renfrew or Jo Malone’s overall luxurious experience.

Also, don’t expect much from the gift. You can get the same thing at Sephora or a Jo Malone store, just ask for any perfume sample.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPKBNXOrKpH53Rk5BEbLr3-j7b0fpYN_gcYnev1&fid=0x0:0x92c4157456f803c1"],"When":"2023-12-3"},{"Name":"Shulamie Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUtB81aCg4AAdMLOwFvnHlpdLkbB43qZuPbkeepGzXQ192dANwppA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"We came for the Jo Malone tea experience and found it to be okay. The Jo Malone pairing and gift bag was simply a perfume sample and a Holt Renfrew shopping bag. The afternoon tea itself was, again, just okay. Some sandwiches were too salty and some of the desserts too sweet, though the macaron texture was perfect and we enjoyed our teas (Holts Blend and Oolong Cream). Will not be back, unfortunately.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNEJcYSbo7w2qa9eo4LUmwzTqVcaO6kBTxz4P1V&fid=0x0:0x92c4157456f803c1"],"When":"2023-12-29"},{"Name":"Kyna Ng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWeAn18U7f9LuHN2nbEK91_Xr_RYuaJ54cNr9CH_ah-OcrfCgjwPQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A decent eggs benedict with avocado. My friends had the chicken sandwich, tartine, and chicken and waffles, and enjoyed their dishes. Good portions for lunch. The ambience is stunning, simple, elegant and the color scheme was really classy. The service was attentive too. Tucked away in Holt Renfrew, this is a bit of a hidden gem. I would like to come back and try more of their other dishes.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPO4N0SYiY2s-2qJuvaJp0eQg4DEX0x0UE2IyhY&fid=0x0:0x92c4157456f803c1"],"When":"2022-7-4"},{"Name":"Stephanie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJBV5KRG75WlxmWo1wuDhWSQhlZCOao4V2_9kFkOn0OqRNe45TP=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We came here for lunch on a Monday. They get pretty busy during lunch so make sure you make a reservations ahead of time to ensure you get a spot.

Our server was super friendly and organized. He was attentive and made sure everything was always full.

I had the Saigon steak salad and the fried chicken sandwich and switched the fries to truffle fries (for extra 2$ charge). The Saigon steak salad was really we seasoned. Very good balance of sweet, sour and savoury. Lots of veggies and the steak was tender but the vermicelli was too hard for me. I wish it had been cooked a bit longer so it wasn't so hard.

The fried chicken sandwich was nice and hearty. The fried chicken was crispy but the bun didn't go well with it. It couldn't hold the crispy chicken. If you like truffles, switch the fries to truffle fries. They are crispy and have just enough truffle flavour.

We were also celebrating a birthday. They had the option of $12 birthday dessert platter and we got that. It comes with a candle and was very cute.

Overall I would come back to try other items on their menu.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipODgGXHsZg_CXQgfIAScnZSOGRlI6xgQ7MSWNrO&fid=0x0:0x92c4157456f803c1"],"When":"2022-12-24"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Stephanie Schalm","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIB-Aq2GJmFKTyQJQlvM2C66DIqRynfpWZiDbTtpv7Fb4KQvQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Trying to understand where the low ratings from this place are coming from but I suppose some people have different standards and experiences? My friend and I stopped here twice on our trip to Vancouver. I enjoyed a delicious flat white both times, a ham/egg croissant for breakfast that was buttery and savoury, a praline macaron and their Christmas Pastry that was one of the best pastries I’ve ever tasted. Everything was exceptional; the staff were pleasant and quick, it has a cute intimate atmosphere, and we were comfortable with our sit in experience. Will definitely return on our next trip to Vancouver!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMbwgS4YbmZgkdEQSVcQzgZQtqymUFkFWxWnKB1&fid=0x0:0x9247a8621132bb39"],"When":"2024-12-4"},{"Name":"Michelle Siaril","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVvNHVR_L-5eCK2usU0kQoT055SV9vB2qDNPyrA7CmG9QXO2IM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Went to a Fauborg prior to a nice seawall walk with my friends. I got pistachio chocolate croissant ($7.4) and a crookie ($4.5).

In theory the pistachio and chocolate would make a good combo, unfortunately I felt like the ratio of chocolate completely overwhelmed the pistachio. I prefer the crookie since imo it has a more balanced profile between the sweet and salty from cookie dough and chocolate chips. Pastry texture was a bit dry and too crunchy for my taste.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOvQzk98hnbxjXnSMt3rsUpLk777xEC8xvq7PE&fid=0x0:0x9247a8621132bb39"],"When":"2024-7-24"},{"Name":"ping zh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWxY6AuuMtAAQXSLOG2D0ZM0xEiwhNQcfLuEryNFVt5LMLm124LCQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Small and nice place. have a cup of  coffee with croissant.  I like the quiet cafe shop. Peaceful and relaxing morning.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNt_CiBdBTybwGxwMhPGK__4HFMJCUYXV6a5A_O&fid=0x0:0x9247a8621132bb39"],"When":"2024-11-9"},{"Name":"Pamela Bechta Kok","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUyegHGxbs8C8q1jT3LEJ7SSAkZIxSoY4-IMSMJcVr93ffzZPFz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I came here with my husband and son for coffee, tea, and a cookie on our way back to our hotel from the sky train, and I was quite shocked that all of us received our beverages in paper cups. I went up to ask the girl for a cup for my tea, and she remarked in an unprofessional manner saying that they would be closing in 30 minutes.
I will not be coming back to this cafe, and I would not recommend this place to anyone.
With the number of great cafes in the area, customer service is a priority, and our experience unfortunately was not a very pleasant one.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPQozRe7ZbcXCIkx-X0iH5ckeRFm8g-DwgFFvPG&fid=0x0:0x9247a8621132bb39"],"When":"2024-9-23"},{"Name":"Sahar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUBY-Z-iMI6PMaZxLg89SnfqLn30XBbCcxC3R7JCsX8LYBddmXi=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Craving a croissant fix with a side of jazz? Faubourg's got you covered! This charming bakery boasted a delightful selection of sandwiches and pastries, all under the melody of smooth jazz. ☕️ Coffee was top-notch, and the friendly staff had me in and out in a jiffy (even with two baristas hustling). ⚡️

Perfect for a relaxing solo breakfast or a catch-up with a friend. They even have a couple of cute outdoor tables for soaking up the Vancouver sunshine. ☀️ ☕️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMKV2_IeRKTMvgXa2LE_pb0M9e7sj9A_e2JBi2N&fid=0x0:0x9247a8621132bb39"],"When":"2024-4-20"},{"Name":"Al S.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUzpO_2raYasdSS4G1lMplfncv4utQXA2LD4VXBIrx1deG8eEwC=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A cozy corner location for Faubourg.

Coffee is always fresh and good. Matcha lattes are a little inconsistent. Excellent pastries. This is my go-to when I’m craving crepes. Their savoury crepe comes with either a side salad or fruit bowl. The fruit bowl is huge! Most places just give you like a couple of pieces but this one had variety and like a cup and a half of fresh fruit. I also requested to add spinach in my ham and cheese and they did so with no extra charge.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jennifer Chang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXuIXJvUSIQ7Dj9KWr0NsrkTfuKEjBZsjSJ60Ixb0DVwi3k8VTwVQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Update- changed the rating from one star to three stars. It looks like the flies have mostly died, as I only saw one on this visit.

Friendly service, nice jazz music in the background.  Unfortunately, I'm rating them 1 star as there were too many flies. The food had flies 🪰 on them. The wall was littered with flies. I found it difficult to enjoy our coffee with all the flies circling. And I couldn't stomach eating the baguette knowing where they had landed. No intervention was noted that the staff was doing anything about the infestation. This could be a nice spot if they cleaned up the flies. Ew.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN0k6S4GCvcgaMPxHIjo41VXlg179XaDuwPOAil&fid=0x0:0x9247a8621132bb39"],"When":"2024-3-2"},{"Name":"Zahra Tejpar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL1CTlu2lI8PQ8gnAmixjyIsCtSXmQKDl1rHjt5y812Oda0Ww=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I’ve been wanting to try this place for a while now and finally did over the weekend. Super cute location but small with some seating area. Very bright and has very french feeling to it which I love. The pastries and drinks: AMAZING! I didn’t find it to be over powering in flavour especially because we got a lavender flavoured pastry (these can sometimes be over powering). Will be back for more!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Daithí Kilcourse","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXpB0OmItsLBGGhpfNEcY_0lXbdAla_7jQ1ZQyMfHX5aboK6jFV=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First coffee shop we went to in Vancouver. The lady serving was very nice. The coffees were great. We will be back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN707nvzyCLBDwrTF1HugBfG-jGzWsQknLJFVcX&fid=0x0:0x97310163c7b245d3"],"When":"2024-12-21"},{"Name":"Nargiza Toshpulatova","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXrTxZGmD3E6u0PngELzmCjBKQaSCBPAN9-GFbTPCK7PLRko53H=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I tried the Tora Latte at Trees Coffee for the first time, and it was fantastic! The flavor was smooth, rich, and perfectly balanced—definitely a unique twist on the traditional latte. The coffee shop itself has a cozy, welcoming vibe, and the staff were friendly and attentive. I’ll definitely be coming back to enjoy this drink again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPKNcxbplQtCp8fUPc577lmHC1VvgLMuNQQ1C_-&fid=0x0:0x97310163c7b245d3"],"When":"2024-12-10"},{"Name":"Zac A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUKH0x18-boXvRQW3CKdXmlcw9Ga4TtlIUfrKNoZCIhPCuaptVz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Nice staff formerly folks. Clean location, delicious cheesecake. True to their name. Enjoyed the tiramisu slice, next time will try the other options.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPTEbr2OpzOAD7kYMM2abl9raHjaW9foWmjVVGC&fid=0x0:0x97310163c7b245d3"],"When":"2024-9-14"},{"Name":"Karnika Sharma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVi6W8gqIEwXa9NWEvLhvNe0yuDu-KVagj1kdm-Z6tMlJwdFydnng=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Very disappointed with the blueberry cheesecake. Went there to specifically try their cheesecake because of all the hype but must say there are places serving much better cheesecake. This one had such a dry top and lacked the creamy texture. Won’t recommend at least for blueberry cheesecake.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPI-X49cbuPFZwjHJq5-t1ixhj-sDDI2ofIjLm9&fid=0x0:0x97310163c7b245d3"],"When":"2024-11-26"},{"Name":"samira","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIwkQGMre8jgbaip4E0o2r4QwZ6hsRUFGFhUhbAr4O--khz6Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I got the New York cheesecake and Tiramisu cheesecake and I loved them both. Also got an americano and a black coffee which were pretty good. The atmosphere is alright, it’s not super cozy or warm though.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNBNs6JwiSzNr5VWmi_ELvd_JRDiH3b7jgSCA1A&fid=0x0:0x97310163c7b245d3"],"When":"2024-10-19"},{"Name":"Sobhan Jahangiri","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUMBffo1eeVN9M9OOiD94bdNiEya-eY_A95gqPjUlrIG3ZffhFqzg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Trees Organic Coffee on Granville Street is a haven for coffee lovers and seekers of cozy warmth amidst the city’s bustle. This little gem exudes character, with its inviting brick walls, soft lighting, and the comforting aroma of freshly brewed coffee that greets you the moment you walk in. The atmosphere here is both lively and serene, making it the perfect escape for an early morning ritual or an afternoon retreat.

The coffee at Trees is nothing short of exceptional, each cup crafted with care and a dedication to quality that’s palpable. Rich, robust, and smooth, every sip tells of the beans’ journey from farm to cup, with a depth of flavor that awakens the senses. But it’s their cheesecake that truly sets Trees apart—velvety, rich, and offered in an array of flavors that delight both the eyes and the palate. Each slice is a moment of indulgence, a balance of creamy texture and subtle sweetness that melts in your mouth and lingers, inviting you to savor every bite.

Whether you’re meeting friends, diving into a good book, or just taking a moment to pause, Trees Organic Coffee creates a space for connection and calm. The staff is warm and welcoming, always happy to recommend a favorite roast or cheesecake flavor. It’s more than just a coffee shop; it’s a little sanctuary in the heart of Vancouver, a place to recharge, find inspiration, or simply enjoy the art of a perfectly brewed coffee. Trees Organic Coffee is a treasure, where each visit feels like a treat and every cup brings a little joy.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"M Skinner","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVmvh_HGga4b-iIPuR9aCMeZ9msWmar_iZtXQBNZasuXFEdUwU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Nice (but not brilliant) coffee, good pastry and a quiet ambience. Plenty of cheesecakes in the fridge too, that looked delectable!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOGH-rRx-VMa_FDtWrFTn24jxTg7rT7rkJFqECe&fid=0x0:0x97310163c7b245d3"],"When":"2024-7-23"},{"Name":"rahul kashyap","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW5a2EQW89AwiZuzqtXR7I0O_jl0QUttecmSH6JRPMitqDyRu-X=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Well I was last minute entry when store going off so no complaints but ladies who r closing were kind enough to offer me whatever list they have and out of that I had Hot chocolate and it was yummy and the ladies made it very kindly as I know the store was going to be close  but she still got sometime from her closing and served us hot hot chocolate","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNeT5mdBDvTJuGLjnIjy1U06oaXQINhad4eK30T&fid=0x0:0x97310163c7b245d3"],"When":"2024-9-16"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Hamed Soltani","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXJJZvsAhr4w9D1t84C4qF44R0bN-d5cVp4LaJ8auICZqpChXPs=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This new coffee shop opened on Robson recently and wanted to check it out.

The interior is obviously new and modern. It was not my favorite spot to sit down. It lacked character, but it seemed to be attractive for a lot of people as it was really busy.

Got a cappuccino and ammericano and tried their strawberry Danish.
The coffee was pretty good. They also sell their coffee beans, which is a good sign.

The staff was really nice and friendly and she was very helpful in helping to decide which pastry to choose.

I really liked the fact that they had some new pastries and some sandwiches and savory items that you don't see everywhere else. It was exciting, and I would like to maybe try something new again in the future.  As most of the new places that don't bake or have a kitchen, they sell the exact same items all over town, which is very boring and low quality.

I liked the Danish, and it tasted okay. There was whipped cream inside with strawberries on top but it was a bit soft, it wasn't as flaky as you'd want it, but it's understandable as it was in the fridge for a while probably.

Also, to point out, the prices seemed to be a bit better than most of the new coffee shops.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMWMKVgWPLYs-rBIURJDMERKUwIg3_O-tCHh6qZ&fid=0x0:0x24c2d55c6df8fab7"],"When":"2024-11-12"},{"Name":"비망","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV2ykasdKRT0sXrOCgSkvGod-4Q4kGLV0AZwiuLys9tdE2cWcQb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I so much love this place! I live nearby here, and when i saw their pastry, i fell in love! i wanna try their pastry all of them! I been here 3 times in a week..! i mean they have literally good mood, service, taste! It’s perfect to enjoy the coffee with pastry!

I've been here again! They have a really good quality of coffee and pastry. This is a cafe that I recommend visiting if you're staying in Vancouver. I love the fetio spot here, and it's a great place to work in a cozy and quiet atmosphere and be inspired! It's cozy and comfortable, and the staff are very friendly and lovely. Today, I tried the pastry with Nutella and it's delicious as expected. This is a cafe that everyone should experience 🫶🏻","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPHt1JIGe_5h3JV-yZNRx02MZsR1XFvhmgycdnu&fid=0x0:0x24c2d55c6df8fab7"],"When":"2024-7-28"},{"Name":"Dianne Grace Sy Isla (Grace)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXDCiVCuxDsbXTTrCNMVScy3VswJdkEYWHhYrebBjnCynWzw_Oh=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I stumbled upon this gem while walking along Robson Street, and it turned out to be the perfect stop! On a chilly evening, we ordered a decaf latte and a decaf pumpkin spice latte, both of which were excellent and reasonably priced. The danish pastry we tried was the best I've ever had!

We also sampled the pistachio and tiramisu gelato, and I can honestly say they were the best versions of those flavors I've ever tasted—creamy, flavorful, and just the right level of sweetness. The carrot cake gelato, a special fall flavor, was equally delightful.

With a lovely ambiance and friendly staff, this café has become my new favorite spot for gelato. I can’t wait to return!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMd5DfAjGweYwfGOes2IS2XplpljvIqP2yPwkEd&fid=0x0:0x24c2d55c6df8fab7"],"When":"2024-10-12"},{"Name":"No MSG No Garlic Foodie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX-PVOn6GcWxsKb-qqVJDTqvJ5rfua5QVuFocwcMF-ZRwuEIPLm=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"On the way back from Whole Foods on Robson, noticed Perfecto Cafe right across the street from Papa Roti. Since we know from past experience that Papa Roti's espresso drinks are not consistently well made, we decided to give Perfecto a try. Our Oat Milk and Matcha Lattes were well made and the micro-foam quite acceptable. Their outside seating is comfortable with chairs that are not cold metal. This might turn out to be a good spot to end up in when we walk down Robson Street. When we returned another time, the expresso drinks were still consistent and the micro-foam very good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNP19qBSi-MPVnj64epJQBTBQz01mnc4xsksdh3&fid=0x0:0x24c2d55c6df8fab7"],"When":"2024-10-12"},{"Name":"Djason Becuwe","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL2h_2-vd_sZrVM-HAyWOVaVTkVE1GCdq4fxgqBZQNzVlLEqA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Such a lovely spot! The coffee, teas, and pastries are excellent, smooth, and well-prepared.
The staff is incredibly sweet and attentive, making you feel right at home. The atmosphere is cozy and welcoming, perfect for a quiet moment alone or a chat with friends. Highly recommend this gem if you’re in the area!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN0e-7Io34EoI_uOG0Yb0QUisGhzgpGFvUuIbWl&fid=0x0:0x24c2d55c6df8fab7"],"When":"2024-11-29"},{"Name":"Allen Lin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVfQTl6a4x2zXBSidDMkwTYFvjc88AzgXUGw1vW6c46bmNUR29Z=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here for dessert and got the pistachio gelato. My only regret is that I didn’t get a second scoop. The atmosphere inside is quite nice and clean and quieter which I really liked.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOVOtqCFbWeroA69bKNA7gpAUk1Xt8o39K-ZgVf&fid=0x0:0x24c2d55c6df8fab7"],"When":"2024-8-30"},{"Name":"Milad Oshaghi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWvjtK7IvidFs0Ikmi5NW5qOuRhfrOD033R1ZNMTBgJLfFCI1WQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"nice cafe with a lot of spot to seat and chill and take your coffee,,,I got crossiant and lotus cheesecake,,,both were ordinary in compare to similar ones I tried before the coffee was ordinary again but the place is good to take your coffee and relax there","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN0X3Z9b9v1sSnNNbS1xn3qhWoaTb_ppMyx2gmP&fid=0x0:0x24c2d55c6df8fab7"],"When":"2024-10-13"},{"Name":"Roman Kozak","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUXaei_E5eRgQInxhzdn1QSNV_at7npoBUF_sdv7jvDoiE-7SM2Uw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This cafe bakery stands out for their fantastic pastries that are better than most other top rated option in the city. A newly opened and second location, in modern space and a nice part of the city.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMc8Du6Yq-9TQIz5B9mwVrI0vIzZFYyrcachVfo&fid=0x0:0x24c2d55c6df8fab7"],"When":"2024-7-25"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"TS OS","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIrxJ8Fjd3bGSI8mWbF186RbFWyg_DW73VTS3OIkFaxPfXFBEQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We liked this little coffee shop on busy road in DT near Davie street. Place feels cozy and modern, and clean as well. The servers were pleasant and prompt. Great place to open up your laptop and relax. Coffee was good with good scone. Fair pricing as well.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN0MqkfiMACc44vjqK7YuSf6K1jWF7HqMNjpnjT&fid=0x0:0x6f038c3d5f4afb07"],"When":"2024-11-9"},{"Name":"Estairia Hong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXmDLygqZ3OT1WagVoz_S7MOF1DNcLc8uEquGumaFc59ZLDHz6l=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ordered through skip the dishes and some of the items didn’t travel well probably because everything is just stuffed into bags but it was so cute of a staff member to draw a lil doodle on my bag. I thought it was so adorable! Taste wise though the two breakfast sandwiches I ordered were delish. And I was super hungry so yes I ate two of their sandwiches on my own. I would love to come in and have a dine in experience with the sandwiches freshly made.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipND6tvCQj7PLVHXf8w18BhEQ2qwpQ7pOIsjl2Dg&fid=0x0:0x6f038c3d5f4afb07"],"When":"2024-8-13"},{"Name":"Ken Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWVQ9tU0qdmGlycJdF-FuK-9AqQ48SDH430sM0Lk7agXorkgSs=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The drinks were very well made and tastes very delicious, I got the Cappucino and the Toasted Marshmallow Matcha Latte. Both drinks were made fast and the Cheese Chive Tomato Scone and the Italian Sausage sandwich were top tier for a cafe. The workers were polite and the atmosphere of the cafe was very nice and comfy. The foam designs were super cute as well. Highly reccomend Caffe Mira and would gladly come back again! 👍👍👍","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPZKkAemaZGIH2CI0nPY0HQ20b-NHGToEyXUVil&fid=0x0:0x6f038c3d5f4afb07"],"When":"2024-6-19"},{"Name":"Daniel Sung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ61DoMscspD7FnxbNGw4d3f5Af7KsUdL6bkhk3NlkyiWvRZg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Not the best I had in Vancouver but still a very very good coffee. The service was nice and definitely gives you a cozy vibe. Totally agree with the high ratings and would definitely come back","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPc0g0Bnm9GI8IDUoygfvkG5AMq8v-yhRoS80Kb&fid=0x0:0x6f038c3d5f4afb07"],"When":"2024-8-19"},{"Name":"Branden Graf","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKc445CgH-vp8nRvz11KVELEhdjFLlxctNp_32On9VCx70lOg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The pistachio and strawberry croissant was the best croissant I’ve ever had! A must try. The coffee was also delicious. The service was friendly and welcoming.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP76ZqdYXRlZMySCmH4h1aymSgkUukx3pfN9rWg&fid=0x0:0x6f038c3d5f4afb07"],"When":"2024-12-6"},{"Name":"Swapnaa Jayaraman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUFzUeiiFdwUbdl8ODvJ8Y53s0_YOycSx42O84dtd5ROyhNI__U=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The coffee here is among the best in Vancouver. The baristas are trained to perfection, making the perfect cup every time. The space is warm and welcoming, with gorgeous plants and comfortable seats. Great selection of food/snacks to pick from any time of the day.

Highly recommend this place if you want to work for a couple of hours (great wifi, lots of power outlets) enjoying amazing coffee :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMONK74Bt4Zi9UT4Fn2B0X5OuMmDWeTSzpK9W0E&fid=0x0:0x6f038c3d5f4afb07"],"When":"2024-9-11"},{"Name":"Calvin Duong (Dylan’s Diner Captures)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUMkBawKMExGt2zEDJL_gGl9AQELhCkRAyMAJjAdc-jl6aGSVyA9A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nice cafe to come by and do some work. All their drinks, pastries are worth a try and won’t be disappointed.
Suggestion - Pistachio Strawberry Croissant
- Tiramisu Latte
- Hojicha Ice Latte","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMI2vA-hV9d1Omm5nF1nUOkiSq36b2GffdzSb8e&fid=0x0:0x6f038c3d5f4afb07"],"When":"2024-7-26"},{"Name":"Kaitlyn Jung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU3Z8RTVAtMfrX6uG6JFFOYzsyTXI7YKgjW6WLd73YQIb_urJDkYQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely love the interior! The plants and live green wall is amazing and the vibes are on point. Great for a nice early morning coffee and a chill place to relax and read a book. There aren’t many outlets and the place is small so I wouldn’t suggest studying or working if you need to plug in your laptop. But if you want to relax, it’s a cute spot.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNieccFMagBrR2F4oKorbG8wbUzNXrQGDqtPUpB&fid=0x0:0x6f038c3d5f4afb07"],"When":"2024-4-18"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Wes Inaba","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUUwwZ4VAegImcr62bD4kacxFYlyzSZgIc1zK88oXY4VpDED3z7Tg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Perfecto Coffee on Davie and Seymour is packed full which is indicative of how popular but also good it is.

They have a wire variety of delicious pastries and treats. And they have some great designer drinks.

The service was great considering how extremely busy they were.

The space is super cool. Packed tight but lots of natural light and spaces for groups or individuals.

5 x ☕☕☕☕☕","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN2ZLvP9bR_HcyTCxgnSncrW4wiJ99m67q8gzcs&fid=0x0:0xcf11567a16f148c0"],"When":"2024-12-17"},{"Name":"Maddie Cruz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLYQL8qAGmTqshoOvCaBdSsq6642zngm2cAUSDTjLzVVtrLpg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"They have a good selection of drinks, pastries and ice creams. Their coffee beans seems to taste more bitter compared to other coffee shops. Their servers were nice and friendly. This place tends to get really busy despite having lots of seating available.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPKF83-yfIbWkdzKsMWVJ9jhfqmISuRTzvtUHyl&fid=0x0:0xcf11567a16f148c0"],"When":"2024-11-9"},{"Name":"Rebecca Chalon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU_VtttCEPUgTqkdYAK0hmWUL4yumbUWKqV79zOC4u9ahxBbXrS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What an amazing gem!!! Everything is made fresh in house, amazing variety for tea lovers. My new obsession! I have had the blue matcha and the mushroom latte so far and cant wait to try them all. AND they have coconut milk!!! As someone who cant have soy/oat n hates almond milk, i appreciate this hard to find option! Creamy n frothy n delicious drinks, yummy treats, good vibes and the friendliest of service!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPDlRnHr9H8b_PmhIl6Almzf-0WpPgqn4oo5D4K&fid=0x0:0xcf11567a16f148c0"],"When":"2024-10-17"},{"Name":"Wendy Hamilton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWL8tNfwIaZEpkEMphAKbiJSr-UH6_ok74K7xDiv6lnuQAJnHy8vg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Beautiful cafe with a variety of options that I haven't seen too often. It's fun when I see mushroom drinks and they actually taste good. The baked goods looked so perfect(o), the last time I was that impressed was in Tokyo, and that's saying something.

I also appreciated the living wall and prevalence of vegan/non-dairy option. Any place that illuminates and features ways of more sustainable living, and that elevate Nature to be more present and visible to people, have my appreciation and support any time :)
Thank you for the wonderful service and drinks.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPsaLCoBslIKJN1d8GX5SkXdPWDe_guq4wXbVGo&fid=0x0:0xcf11567a16f148c0"],"When":"2024-11-20"},{"Name":"tikki","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWzV_Y6bQFjodBKC8anq5nBVFmCTC7hA6Nh7xklFQuKGefK40A_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"One of the better options for coffee in DT/Yaletown area. The coffee is cool as you can make your own latte art. The desserts were also pretty impressive and they do go well with the coffee. Overall would still recommend to anyone looking for a good coffee spot in the area.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOhDctoRkDYYXCSwFMqgTDXW23iqYm6aUe8Amcw&fid=0x0:0xcf11567a16f148c0"],"When":"2024-10-17"},{"Name":"Gurv","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXhwceJhFcjYo11eH0UjktVpbt4vgW7SS5aHechrSipNjogSGM7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Visited perfecto Café with my wife this evening for some gelato. We received excellent service from Michelle. The gelato is fantastic, you can tell it’s made fresh. The quality is super high and they have a number of classic and unique flavours available. I will definitely return and would highly recommend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPC_MWiZKYaybSj3tlwExyA7GOaoX5otv8fJyey&fid=0x0:0xcf11567a16f148c0"],"When":"2024-10-5"},{"Name":"Chul Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXeLDx3gy2IRXurBocf8ISBFNqU_gPv6MLiRn1TqU2td5yG9--b8w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"In the heart of downtown, this small coffee shop is a hidden gem. As I needed to recharge, I stopped in at the nearest coffee shop and was pleasantly surprised by how good the lattes are. This place exceeded my expectations, showing just how much joy a simple latte can bring. A must-visit spot.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMlL9UwcKv26CQJVqj0VCTFcV8QzVex_LE5GYMw&fid=0x0:0xcf11567a16f148c0"],"When":"2024-8-12"},{"Name":"Paolo M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWiT5P0Q0fP5nZW8QViclCHAMMtkMMJgQAgjEdp0pnegBgCd6K2=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have been a client from day 1 and intentionally waited for a review, confirming that the quality of food and service did not faded away after the initial hype!

I have to say that this cafe is so far, one of my favourite in the area! This review is mainly about the food and services, the location speaks alone as it is well designed with great touches!

The quality of the baked items and not only is, for me, one of the best considering the mediocre-poor quality of the competition!

My fav to go with is the hazelnut double baked almond croissant! Always fresh baked, great on many levels! The toppings(almond-sugary-paste and actual almonds) are great and the filling is dark hazelnut spread which pairs perfectly overall!

However, today I tried something new, and I have to say, for someone like me that loves a generous chocolaty filling, this shift completely my prospective of things!(I am being slightly sarcastic)
I am literally in love with this new pastry, as the filling is gianduia, a rich chocolate spread made with a blend of cocoa and finely ground hazelnuts, originating from Italy's Piedmont region!

I am a pastry enthusiast especially for breakfast and definitely I will suggest to stop by Perfecto cafe to try on the big selection of great pastry they offer and the friendly environment!
I cannot stop thinking about the  fantastic service offered and also the nice environment at the cafe; the plus plus comes with one of the lady working there, definitely a supervisor, which delivery every time a  fantastic and genuine customer service based on real connections, adding to the experience, an extra touch!
I always enjoy spending time here.

P.s. a great strong unsweetened espresso is my to go when paired with the gianduia pastry or hazelnut croissant!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOK6sjGFtlF4pvuSop24cjbA8d-OOeJynkLnDpB&fid=0x0:0xcf11567a16f148c0"],"When":"2024-8-24"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Nadia B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIqx2DP0roPo0RdYt5bftJ7rPWRa-igXoRkXaqylj1xKaYvtg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a delightful little cafe! The gentleman who owns it is a really genuine guy with great customer service. My sausage and egg breakfast wrap was so good and I enjoyed the chaga tea. Very nourishing. Will definitely be back. Thank you!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Martina Ruseva","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUyesK4_2M8fzwLhHLC1efmDByyNWLk3bknTemqt48KgF9_kvGw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Loved this coffee shop with outdoor seating! It was very nice to come to on a quiet Sunday morning. Also absolutely adored their wall with doggo photos! Such a positive vibe!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMuuw76zmESRcp-TT-MZnLQnvDNPAz0yQv06kdA&fid=0x0:0x2b02e6a94c5cb36f"],"When":"2024-6-24"},{"Name":"Amanda Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXuYzvPWvmkeEv9s-u7Ewr6jDCZcRwNgCNnVC1whoGA9R4Xxxq9=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cute local coffee shop with lots of cool options and snacks. Service was friendly and very fast. Would come back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNKUINYCYBK1wwBDh_iu-BQ54reu0lghRw4bWOF&fid=0x0:0x2b02e6a94c5cb36f"],"When":"2024-6-30"},{"Name":"John Tino","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWsOJVwSwYu45aA-jPB5nalGpiQogaf0K6lGkiAIvoUCE5ms68=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing little coffee shop! Great coffee and they also offer a large selection of specialty coffee’s like bulletproof coffee, bulletproof coffee with peanut butter, blended coffee’s, coffee with collagen and teas! They hand make their sandwiches all through the day so it’s always fresh. Their breakfast sandwiches are delicious and inexpensive! They have a covered heated patio, perfect for people watching. The staff treat you like family. I would give them 6 stars if I could.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMdrU1t4ZHzMGK-fO61FnU7-EHObwSWONbRKHTD&fid=0x0:0x2b02e6a94c5cb36f"],"When":"2020-3-4"},{"Name":"Karla Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIxGYu_5UCK2J8TBqbRyrzF_c5jn6zR1IEM4Z8OtkgIAC8Z6g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I used to be a regular customer as I worked nearby before. I loved their coffees and chais, especially the golden milk. I went today as I was in the area, the lady working there was very rude. Said they were out of the golden milk so decided to try their “pumpkin” latte. Tasted just like a regular overpriced latte, no hint at all of pumpkin or spices. I work in the service industry, I understand everyone has bad days so you can’t always be super friendly, but being rude is just unacceptable.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Naomi Buell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUotaVk5VePwJw6IFKgqgBs_7nhWGabqBeoMhbLeq1jV8h0xRI6=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Actually went to a place across the street first but it was so busy that after sitting down and being ignored, I came here. The food options are wraps and baked goods but if that’s all you need, you are set. I had a Vietnamese iced coffee and it was great. I often find they are bitter or too sweet but this one was great. They also use rice straws which should be the gold standard vs paper ones that turns to sludge part way through. The straw maintained its use the whole time (weird that this even needs mentioning but here we are).

I ordered a wrap with cheese, egg and spicy sausage, it was also lovely.

Service was quick and it’s got a nice wee patio.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Paula Hlavacek","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXUEHsTUDREBV0VNUK6UGtTRNbBuCTOdBVYyLeZYC7hO1QTx25MLQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Had the  Pink chai latte with oat milk with a cookie; highly recommend the cookie it’s definition of a perfect chocolate chip. That massive chocolate in the middle was the best. The outdoor seating is super cute, reminds me of Europe, perfect spot to enjoy with your girlfriends to chat over the latest gossip. Tip: the chai IS SUPER HOT! Watch out.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO99ReT-oa7ULupVAr2pHmKtB95FE40_x_v8dUL&fid=0x0:0x2b02e6a94c5cb36f"],"When":"2020-11-17"},{"Name":"Destini Maighan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWcnRYxphGkBeNP39_5qiC21NFtV1V1gGbroPFhnyawkOvIkkYSZQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Really cute and yummy cafe. Great service and tasty food and drink options. Really great spot to get some work done right in the heart of downtown.

Only downside is that there are limited outlets to plug in your electronics, so make sure your devices are charged!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNKl-hkBywtJJZ02-mPhWaeeRfKgE-gIqGeYYOR&fid=0x0:0x2b02e6a94c5cb36f"],"When":"2023-6-8"}]

descriptions: Beverages & pastries are served in this chic coffee shop suited to lounging & people-watching.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Ellis Fong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKUfCmQy6wiVkecloOnQfDbNIGpdnQWLw3nRAbXfHltLSlgGfw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"The atmosphere of this restaurant is so cute and it feels so cozy. The furniture is so modern and the music playing sets such a cute vibe. However when my sister and I got our drinks they tasted quite watered down. The iced chai latte tasted a little more like chai but the matcha latte tasted exactly like milk. There was almost no matcha flavour. If you want to come here to study do so but note that the drinks are not as flavourful. Especially for the price of the drinks i’m a little disappointed with the taste :(","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNc1JBrmuRCrZR2F3Mp0LpW5iW6s3t9aomrUcw5&fid=0x0:0x1d2730ad4bb027d6"],"When":"2024-12-24"},{"Name":"Sharzi BD","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW288MzwFkWlfN4-hmCJwoI28tpVq0hWMFg6JZzbb5p0qpMwt_I=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nice coffee shop with beautiful atmosphere! When I got there it was raining and made it so beautiful!

Staff are nice! i had cortado which was ok and also I ordered red velvet cookie which was fluffy and fresh 😍👍🏼","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPcO8eo5KKc3tPebL4YmAmgUswswqaRTQk6195N&fid=0x0:0x1d2730ad4bb027d6"],"When":"2024-5-6"},{"Name":"Nada Hamatto","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWLDPmso6iC-byu3fJIrI7fUPho0GaHKxniqylwO9vRbMd-W-5B=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Very rude. They just want to charge you over everything, we pay we don't have any problem we can buy their entire store if we wanted to, but make you feel like you as a homeless asking for something. They don't let anyone use their bathroom even if you're a tourist and you have to pay before you use it, which makes you feeling very unwelcome.
We'll never ever visit again and we don't recommend a visit in this place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOysoMbRaApRLYALUzH-Mr0qgHrHCGWSCasJaMK&fid=0x0:0x1d2730ad4bb027d6"],"When":"2024-6-30"},{"Name":"Lyle Wagner","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJWc9BjwZECKLwhclIhZGD4IBrW6Zdz6v4lsSP4s-aqL5Xlrw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Some people who are clearly bitter with life like to give small places like this bad 1 star reviews to make themselves feel better but these reviews are not accurate. This is a nice place with nice staff. The bad reviews are highly suspect.

I come here all the time as I live next door, so was surprised to read some of these bad reviews. I've only ever had good experiences with the staff, and the coffee is good.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Hye","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjULQQSi1mhNFty7n8ZPesKkMpD31jiIGazltx_wRmE-swaOwr4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Is the oat latte here supposed to taste like this??
As far as I know, there's an optimal temperature for heating the milk and when I got my coffee, it was too hot to even sip. And considering that there are so many different tastes for coffee, it doesn't tate that good :(
I paid my coffe for almost $7 and I'd rather having Tim hortons' one.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMlC_9-Mo7dpqDtft623Rga__BP1lwD9dIIMug&fid=0x0:0x1d2730ad4bb027d6"],"When":"2024-3-21"},{"Name":"Patrícia Jaššová","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXeEQHX4ndcDu3qb3Bgz69ytqtlPJsQ7diWi4iITOCDTT0WxDly=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Life is too short to drink bad coffee.
This plase had nice interior and it is located in a nice and calm street in Gastown, but thats it. If you are looking for a well prepared and quality coffee, there are other better places to go.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPSeQGKX4YMQCgabKWioksCUSfyCqKOXLckmBjQ&fid=0x0:0x1d2730ad4bb027d6"],"When":"2024-5-28"},{"Name":"Kelly Hrelja","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUVWh8qmVdPEfqahFaQ6ox93SOukCBaQIQqwS9jEApuOOnHfC4ZzQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Spacious coffee shop with your basic drinks to choose from. I got the iced matcha latte with oat milk which was pretty tasty.

It may have been the time of day (~5pm), but it was slim pickings for food options so didn't try anything to eat.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNo2w3URhJiU3xXT6GIBjOQBaYkl2L7LZbhJeJX&fid=0x0:0x1d2730ad4bb027d6"],"When":"2023-10-14"},{"Name":"N L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV-ycs2HqCegNi0DiQULPB6sKJb9-tSFtuKencaDSMyKWqrv2qy=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Had to deal with violent staff behind the counter. Suggested a friend to walk over to Coffee Bar as we made it a day to try different coffee shops in Gastown. Coffee Bar had been one of my favourite coffee shops to go to in Gastown in the past. Today we had to deal with a screaming lunatic who worked behind the counter. Aware of the no public bathroom sign, my friend needed the bathroom and I asked the staff asked if she can use the bathroom and while I chose a food item. I have multiple food allergies so needed time to decide what didn’t have dairy or gluten as there was not a lot of food options left, only pastries. Another worker was available to help and I let her know I needed time, yet she was quite persistent multiple times keeping her eyes on me  waiting for me to make my order quickly. I was deciding between the gluten free bar or trying something else, and the other “lunatic” staff glared at me and started shouting behind the cash register what I was going to order and that I needed to order. Shocked, I said I needed more time, and she said that I needed to order because my friend was using the bathroom and that I said I would buy something. I told her that I am allowed to take time to make a decision, but from her aggression I thought of how the service was already incredibly unprofessional, and was put off by her rudeness and lack of anger management skills. My friend came out of the bathroom and had taken her wallet out and said she would buy something too. I signalled to her we needed to leave because the staff was being aggressive. As we left, the “lunatic” chased and ran after us while behind the counter and screamed at us, screaming “YOU’RE A LIAR” repeatedly. Everyone in the cafe was startled by her screaming, and people outside the cafe was watching us get yelled at by this worker since my friend had already opened the door. The other worker with the red hair didn’t bat an eye or turn her head to the altercation. The lady screamed at us for a good 20-30 seconds, and my friend and I both exited the scene. We both work in the service industry and had never experienced anything quite like this, Buro literally has employed a mentally ill, unstable, violent staff. Be weary of entering or supporting this business.","Images":null,"When":""}]

[{"Name":"Danbe Seo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW1EMjN2eOd4WZ0pelt9_7zn4kXcAJdRE16SwPyaZlAQO4JUHUo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I always come here to get my bubble tea, and it never disappoints! The prices are reasonable, and the staff are super friendly and efficient.

My favorites are the Taro Milk Tea and the Oreo Slush—they’re absolutely delicious! If you’re a bubble tea lover, I highly recommend this place.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ryan Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWJg51dkTiELfwGSC3YeGg0Cqc2FbwTcp56uR5oMbjvMxs9-kgt=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Unfortunately was a bit disappointed compared to what I usually get from here. Tried something other than the brown sugar drinks and it wasn't near the level I expected, but was still an average bubble tea. Will continue getting the brown sugar because it is always amazing","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOC153ozn2sg_8K4rzKgLYXIk-KBJ1zd_xqJQxq&fid=0x0:0x182fc7fc161a399b"],"When":"2024-11-25"},{"Name":"Robert Caron","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW_EpFhprcf3SG2KOeJLn_ZMvns4ZouCijKUxtpaECokzRyVf_o=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The signature brown sugar bubble tea was delightful—rich, creamy, super sweet, like slurping a liquid cake. The service was warm and welcoming, adding to the experience. It's a treat I'd happily indulge in again when craving something decadent and satisfying. Highly recommend for bubble tea lovers!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPpxjgi8FMyVTT5yU0x0OekwDDP1CsP2Ak4b4HH&fid=0x0:0x182fc7fc161a399b"],"When":"2024-8-29"},{"Name":"Mohammad Afsar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUs4EO_c_af-WhEcbP5EjoU4iO9cQTxGwB6-EEKx4LfguBK_zxB=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great atmosphere, amazing service, and a menu filled with irresistible options. This location is located inside the train station next to entrance of Expo line, which can be hard to find. I had the chocolate bobo milk tea with coffee foam and warm boba with brown sugar. It was absolutely delicious. Drooled at the other menu items too, hope to return for more.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMpFzto7UxFtYebt54W0EPfmIa7kJdek8qlfmr-&fid=0x0:0x182fc7fc161a399b"],"When":"2024-6-14"},{"Name":"Ma Co","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWe9a4cacGkGTRbbtk0Qr2nLqZo4qsF-biPosZlvkfnlOhzgfA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great place to try your favorite Taiwanese Milk Tea.. The location is inside the train station so kinda difficult to look for but there are signages outside so you won’t need to worry.

The place open late so please wait as perfection takes time.. The store was clean even the washroom during our time of visit. The service was fast and the boba was fresh.. Yummy!! I think everything was fresh.

There is no parking available and only limited seats available so if you want to order I also suggest doing it in Doordash or Ubereats as they are also available in those flatforms.

The Signature Brown Sugar Pearl Fresh Milk Tea is a must-try.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOpM4T3c1gAOI1KCJFmuJeQpnrFLkLzAfJ2X5s&fid=0x0:0x182fc7fc161a399b"],"When":"2024-3-12"},{"Name":"marla martinez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK30uiBudq5i71UwdCblUnJy6WZOlKdWPOyzXMZM3ACI3vkvCEy=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"You can definitely get some high quality boba here. I got the Signature Brown Sugar Pearl, and it was really good. If you don't know what to get the employees are very friendly and will help you out. My sister didn't know what to choose, and they asked her some questions to help her choose a flavor similar to her liking (of course the time I went was not busy, so they were able to go the extra step), and I believe she ended up getting a lychee black tea... Which was pretty good as well, the flavor was very concentrated, so it might not be the best choice for those who don't like a strong tea. Overall I definitely will come back and try something new.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPW4v15O-6Xly1bfThz7AtGgtlzlf0-ajmrveAR&fid=0x0:0x182fc7fc161a399b"],"When":"2023-12-20"},{"Name":"henrique noguchi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKD0ZbiSCx8b2P9z3m3FW90nxegFb_7JjrAAjRSYB_Ih20pnw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The signature brown sugar pearl milk was fantastic. The boba was probably the best I had, right amount of ice and excellent mix of flavors!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOP3Qm_UYAia8natjGF9OYQ4XnLyaYdpYZCYDZo&fid=0x0:0x182fc7fc161a399b"],"When":"2024-9-5"},{"Name":"bartika dutta","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVxjFpxrYjqtLhAuG4lm-ZcNIBbYGGduA3S5m04EChhzkLwL5L7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This clean and bright boba tea spot is inside Granville station. We had the brown sugar tea and matcha. Both were great. They were well balanced with the flavor of tea, and the sweetness was just right. The matcha was very refreshing. They make their own boba, and have a good flavor selection. Their place looked appealing , and the server was very friendly.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO9ZDiPizGkCQ6e3rGhi3Cqei5MmBOD0s1tpIOB&fid=0x0:0x182fc7fc161a399b"],"When":"2023-12-28"}]

title: Bubble King Tea House

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"PJLife","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWExxPLfiKH1wH-7GDM8WPUua0npwK45Ph-MlKP_DnWih5mHjztcQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very happy this place survived the Covid madness and still is around.
Going here, for many many years, usually before I catch a movie and buy his bubble teas.
Yes, prices are not low but they Are the Best around. Quality!
He is truly the Bubble King!!
And very friendly owner.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipObkTt4fKYyPDnrpEHVkGNl8y1wpmR0kt_xcDxR&fid=0x0:0x21c05e2e656f767c"],"When":"2024-11-12"},{"Name":"Ashley Hautala","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKy83Ij3NygvZ0nOP2ERhaxHsTla9J_XyXtMCpJppaMFGxwLA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I got the banana milkshake and it was so freaking good. There were many other flavours as well. It was creamy like a milkshake but somehow also refreshing and not super heavy. Highly recommend. My boyfriend got the green apple slush. It was good but very artificial tasting and sweet so if you’re not expecting or wanting that, don’t get that flavour but I’m sure the other flavours are great and more up your alley for traditional bubble tea.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jessica Hong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXzFnOvpUcwhwOOj8DEkjt9s25hboFYPZDKfI1r8buYxMMZzCu_qw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Decent bubble tea but not the best out there. Ordered a mango slush with pearls first time around. The pearls are soft with a good texture and the slush was creamy and didn't taste artificial. However, I ordered the watermelon slush and that was fantastic. Refreshing and surprisingly served it during this season. Bubble tea is priced very reasonably and the owner is very friendly. If you are in the area often, they have stamp cards so you can redeem a drink! Highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPQdPhHFKwDe1VcV33afGw1pi-D_zsRzOPLotH_&fid=0x0:0x21c05e2e656f767c"],"When":"2019-3-6"},{"Name":"mitchell masek","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXsjfgl_udyWxwWY-Cl4xSyUtnH3gdJQbMZFtfOpo_mMyjeR5Sd=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Been going to this place for several years. Still has the best price and quality. I love the pearls and variety of Bubble Tea.
He suggests special drinks every once in a while and it's always a great pick.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Elina Blomley","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUNRDPcz-zg8m5P2hSQ2cGaBfiUwFfN2f8XJNGzlgTj2gR4V0SqYw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"bubble king? more like bubble GOD! this guy is the best 😍 delicious flavour and you’ll be drooling at those prices… treat yourself and the whole family to an unforgettable experience. i took my dog with me and got her a little drink too, we had lots fun … a pup-ple tea if i dare say so myself 🤭🤭","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMF7NfjMvZGQ_kWTZhq6HWiqIRLr7zYVMY0aH9L&fid=0x0:0x21c05e2e656f767c"],"When":"2022-8-21"},{"Name":"Peter Sammarco","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIi9d5yGqnuJWrfXk7hydnJ_WFtEZoW5Df1wt0bfg1wVFEp-aY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The brown sugar milk tea was a bit sweet, but I liked it. Some might like it less sweet. The taro milk tea tasted great. We had the taro less sweet.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNFi4_seuxTeqbb4CZO_bW1B5zhLBSAWrsPSJJW&fid=0x0:0x21c05e2e656f767c"],"When":"2021-8-27"},{"Name":"ANewPaul","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXrUDrRUjmGkjSq41HhCbACtQ32s8hQtQ_SsBpnXJnX6AmL9lmJ0A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious taro slush. Very refreshing and tapioca tasted fresh as well. Would recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNRKZq57HztSqpCOmGM3_U-weU1Z-jmLmPIbRT2&fid=0x0:0x21c05e2e656f767c"],"When":"2021-9-21"},{"Name":"Mai Yun La","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWxDNbk8ufxWqPLezV3gjOiT2wNqqptXOzO0sezPYxDM-YgtQMAhA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Prices are a little high for tea but this is quality tea and is delicious. They have a huge selection of various kinds of tea with various ways they can prepare them.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPi9dvg19j_P_eEiamkXvQUpvNxZB-2xy2P4ze8&fid=0x0:0x21c05e2e656f767c"],"When":"2018-8-9"}]
