user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Alexandra Gaevsky","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVnjItyjfR1qVEZnY6caUOLCi6uNaCD4VjAop9J7DwgHSC2Qmwo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Pretty good coffee. The Matcha Latte was light in flavor, but the Black and White Latte was a standout—highly recommend! Service was friendly and quick, and the desserts were tasty too. The interior is nice and cozy, making it a great spot to relax. Try this cafe out if you’re in Gastown!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPGFTyaveIUgIsNcRHNS2tIdW4Q1vKvRjL7UYKq&fid=0x0:0x767208084462a371"],"When":"2024-8-13"},{"Name":"Alayne Brigitte Sanchez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVKpuHtyqN1fm-slSCVpcSr0dverX-BxcL9c1gIJWbKMKQSI55n=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It’s a beautiful café that serves delicious pastries and great coffee/tea. I love their merch and ambiance. My fave is iced strawberry matcha with oat milk.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNwvZJCYL25SFT6jSzB4V4kIg990btPaDMyh1i3&fid=0x0:0x767208084462a371"],"When":"2024-9-24"},{"Name":"Khue N.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUVhVKylYAtr_zgjEBMuypkuJBrSM3sCJT_8EE6YWBCFfnw53OL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Really cute coffee shop, however I’m not a fan of the coffee, it was a bit too watery and sweet for my liking. The barista was nice enough to remake my mocha less sweet, but it’s just weird taste. I might try other drinks in the future.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMEw-APDiE2rwVmhasDMYY0yWJdLIRQzVvCOPxu&fid=0x0:0x767208084462a371"],"When":"2024-11-6"},{"Name":"Lucie Vigneras","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUue5D6B-I0ukqQ5qeSwnmzxJpcHNCVYaQewnqbx85sTxgLzr1vTQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I loved the overall aesthetic of the place, and they were connected to their clothing store next door which I thought was a pretty neat idea. You do have to note that it is laptop and tablet free, so not ideal for students who want to study. The server was kind and helpful.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO4FwbrA7Fg-6YvlIRKhu7h8XKx-ML-ojuAV7F6&fid=0x0:0x767208084462a371"],"When":"2024-8-20"},{"Name":"V Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL-Qz_zR8NAjeqpRnuANXJcQGSLJzNuS-ETk_THk3z82H5rG6U=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Ordered latte. The two star is strictly related to the taste of the latte, which was quite underwhelming unfortunately. The staff was great and I like the interior, but I'm not sure if there's any point in getting a coffee here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNAfQSMguQHAsEbVzgrfdpFplpn1KncMcTLKEoU&fid=0x0:0x767208084462a371"],"When":"2024-8-31"},{"Name":"film by lily","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUUSiIn37gm0M4cUD38_C7-DlPW8VoGO46izDz__BjLERifsXLSAw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good drinks and pastries. Store is clean and so pretty for pictures, and the staff was so kind as well 🫶🏻🫶🏻 We’ll definitely be backkk

Recommend items: Strawberry matcha latte and matcha brioche.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNuFisWbPTluZiz-9MPpMG9jfYWIrC4O9zQNF1R&fid=0x0:0x767208084462a371"],"When":"2024-6-28"},{"Name":"Peter","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUwAJ-Ow_BrueJ87wqQekVlZN0tEIHJdEXN9wdiYB8UrUfoq0Ku=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Visited in September 2023.

When I booked my trip to Vancouver, I made sure to make a stop at Café Kitsuné. The experience definitely did not disappoint.
I ordered coffee and a pastry (both recommended by the staff) and of course the famous Kitsuné cookie. They were on the pricier side but it was delicious.
I wasn’t sure what I wanted to order so the barista helped me by giving me a bunch of recommendations.

I also went home with some merchandise. It was also on the pricier side but I knew that coming in based on the prices of their website. I was excited to pick up the Vancouver exclusive tote bag and a drinking glass with their logo on it.

The interior was gorgeously minimal and aesthetic which I like and there was a lot of seating.

You can also experience some more shopping as the Maison Kitsuné store is connected to the café.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO_azXPL1IRahGdKn4hmM1E42G8Qmj6i050-hQ3&fid=0x0:0x767208084462a371"],"When":"2024-3-28"},{"Name":"Angie H.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKdvEoJvt2iTRkho3FWkW6TNcRqOlL9GJrgZBJ6ip08rrtXlQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I heard that the place gets busy in the afternoon. In avoiding the long lineup, we went there mid-morning on the weekend. The place is quiet. We were able to enjoy some conversations over the beverages and baked good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMWhgeh4FwpaXT089VLg21yH-2leRIyRCAOIDhg&fid=0x0:0x767208084462a371"],"When":"2024-4-24"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Tim Liu music Youtuber","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUbRVHr81Z1GffGNL1fjpMBGO7NKNQL5TcaFTMvMAlvjrdA68QkNA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This is my first time visiting this bakery, and I ended up coming for three consecutive days. I was satisfied each time! The most impressive item was the cinnamon pecan cake—it was absolutely delicious! The staff are all very nice, service is quick, and even when it’s busy, the wait isn’t too long!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPYETtm5FevW533lzjGWmGqms8NY7ub5SdeDTSp&fid=0x0:0xa0247f578934fdaf"],"When":"2024-12-20"},{"Name":"Ashley","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVzAMO3uAB1eWU0k18PXzNKYX9EepvKDxXrvtDg__tiAs31DqgOMA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"There is a wide selection of pastries and desserts, and what I got was delicious. I do wish there were more options for less-fancy flavor combinations. I like more straight-forward/traditional flavors, and I found most of the options to be a little more bold - which is not bad at all, just not my preference. Everything looked delicious though, and if I had a more adventurous palate, I definitely would have tried more.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN4mBh1qMBzZjYufS9eBu2R94zLoQte3ea6aHaJ&fid=0x0:0xa0247f578934fdaf"],"When":"2024-12-13"},{"Name":"Neeta Prakash","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVKZdxeD_-IHyVmkQtv_HcH78QNhJm4IeEntjMi10eEqAWxmunC=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Ordered food and drinks. Both food and drinks tasted amazing but after repeatedly asking for extra hot latte I got a lukewarm one. I understand it was busy but call my number as soon as coffee is made.its very popular place so be prepared to wait","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNehNZQciZr2StpbnBQa2BlavInq-gnoi3cicFJ&fid=0x0:0xa0247f578934fdaf"],"When":"2024-12-26"},{"Name":"akshata desai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXXSK9iNd207mUVBJGLtYtpHF529ifcV5IYuMFcALsPhtvoF8-jKg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Just the best place in downtown Vancouver!! So much variety in sweet and savoury, cozy fun cafe. Tried their pistachio donut and coconut mango mousse. Both were super delicious! It’s one of the go to places where you get good food and peace of mind. It sounds expensive but it’s quite affordable.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN_K9ZN7MdWYxlx3Skg0mcTHGmUjzjAHr_6uzgS&fid=0x0:0xa0247f578934fdaf"],"When":"2024-7-26"},{"Name":"S. D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIXxPKiNl0OeW0nJMt7UI7DFWTL92OGFe7QGRMDi1mamkFU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Loved the ambience. I only got takeout but it felt like what a cafe should feel like. Plus it was 24hrs, so whether you went during the day or at night, service was the same and the pastries were fresh.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNHVfmoBDWvGHJ7V2G5fdAqArKX-slXl0ychco&fid=0x0:0xa0247f578934fdaf"],"When":"2024-11-10"},{"Name":"Mark V. Sinclair","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW6ve_wQQ4uxBt3cYQW8cTfAQRrRZkQ44mckIfxzATcnSTXi0wz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Central downtown location at corner of Hornby & Davie Streets, west of Yaletown.  Clean, bright, attractive interior -- with convenience of Breka 24hr operations. Very busy, so queuing to place an order is normal.

Hot and cold espresso-based coffees, smoothies, frappés.  Paninis, croissants and sandwiches are generous and super fresh, while the pastries, cakes/cookies/doughnuts & baked goods are very rich -- and definitely "taste like more"!

Opted for the chocolate marbled cheesecake, double chocolate chip cookie and caramel macchiato. Very good choices. Exponentially delicious.

My only negative remark -- and I really don't like to be critical, as the location is very busy --  would be the abrupt edge to the attitude/communication -- on this particular night.

Would definitely come back again. Overall very positive experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN8uRWQHr1m2gRK1epEDAiANFXUjxZegt-8nlsz&fid=0x0:0xa0247f578934fdaf"],"When":"2024-8-11"},{"Name":"Mrs. Leci","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWFUu7tIDGHhiFP61EOIZLCOSzvwJkGN10CXxqa6MRhYpyxpm4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I visit here very often whenever we go to our health clinic. Love their sausage roll, spinach and artichoke pocket and shepherd's pie so much I order it everytime.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO1E1bbHo2XNdNExjd16bbmIor7Dtel0rl73H0N&fid=0x0:0xa0247f578934fdaf"],"When":"2024-10-16"},{"Name":"Allen Lin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVfQTl6a4x2zXBSidDMkwTYFvjc88AzgXUGw1vW6c46bmNUR29Z=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here based on a recommendation online and it was better than expected. I ordered the eclair and in my opinion it was probably the second best eclair I’ve ever had. So good I went to another breka bakery later in the day just so I could have another one of their eclairs. Would most certainly come back again","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOP5OId1cca_p3gXldMfqMVQKExcA3iN3MspqIb&fid=0x0:0xa0247f578934fdaf"],"When":"2024-8-29"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"CHLOE CHOE","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUYaoxZqzAq00FDPn5XEAsT6bKpD_LMsLAulGgSO12YmFXWhTX2MA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We came to this restaurant right after arriving from the airport, and the experience was fantastic! The service was excellent, and the food was delicious. We were seated by the Christmas tree, which added a magical touch to our meal.

One of my favorite dishes was the lamb—it was incredibly tender and melted in my mouth. The purée was creamy and flavorful, easily one of the best I’ve tasted.

The dessert was absolutely delightful. Candy cotton was simple but joyful. It made our dinner a pleasant experience!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP2vsFMWF4BE-f3y3YTtX5koslx5rvHxOEqSv_K&fid=0x0:0xe51d75733323ba95"],"When":"2024-11-19"},{"Name":"Diva Deep","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUvCjtyqEsH7UqRlAQf_KNYaiPG_LWBZHPgx3Y75aF6FRxO-qQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My daughters and I came to the H Tasting Lounge for the Winnie the Pooh high tea . We were celebrating my daughter’s birthday. It was absolutely amazing!! A must for all fans of Winnie the Pooh!  The ambience was incredible with a violinist and harpist. They set the mood for this whimsical experience. Food was delicious, appreciated the use of honey in every dish. The best part was the service. Our server, Hailey, was attentive, personable and the simply BEST! We came on the last day of the event and would highly recommend it if it returns. ❤️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMJOcVp0qHsJ8eLyTm_Yb8cLz0hI1WKXitv1Wen&fid=0x0:0xe51d75733323ba95"],"When":"2024-11-11"},{"Name":"stacy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKeayyhsv69yJ10v0-AzuTRI3_AWKA88RoMs6Bsx9-EM85qzg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had an Amazing dinner at Winterlust dining globes , Westin Bayshore. What an experience, the presentation was top notched! From drinks served from Santa’s mailbox, others in mini sparkly roller skates. I had the lamb shank, so tender and yummy! What a lovely way to end our year! Service was impeccable! Book club ladies year end celebration.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM5dHgCVL5l3QYlZVM5lUgwvyrzrFIKmOPN_FI6&fid=0x0:0xe51d75733323ba95"],"When":"2024-12-15"},{"Name":"Kylie Ozols","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVfi1fd8B0p8oB0yiLQGEE9j9acqhgZSJi9mxDVrWSEz9fN3YZn=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I thoroughly enjoyed every second of my dinner in a dome last night! First the dome is absolutely adorable and instantly puts you in the Christmas spirit. They have a heater inside to keep you nice and warm, as well as blankets. They also provided an iPad with Spotify where you can play any music of your choice, naturally we played Xmas tunes.

Our server Curtis was amazing! He clearly knew the menu and provided wonderful service and recommendations throughout the night. He always made sure to check-in, but also let us have our privacy.

The cocktails are so fun here. They have a generic wine/beer list. But they also have a fun holiday menu with very unique surprises! I really enjoyed my drink the “Roller Skating to Church”. I’d best describe it as a boozey horchata. My friend also loved her “Santa’s Mailbox” and “Banana Tree” (think piña colada) drinks.

The food here was better than expected. I read some reviews ahead of time and was convinced I was going just for the dome experience with mediocre food, however that was not the case. I really enjoyed everything we tried, I will list below with my thoughts:

*Mushroom & Tofu Dumplings - these were absolutely delicious with tons of flavor!! I would highly recommend!

*Burrata - Very good, the burrata seemed very fresh and I loved the Chinese donut

*Matcha Soba Salad (w/ smoked tofu) - this dish was very good! Surprisingly the tofu was the star, it reminded me of smoked Gouda

*Sablefish - this is one of the best dishes I’ve had in a long time! The fish was cooked to perfection and the sauce on top was mouth watering. Even the side dishes were a star with the risotto and the chili crunch dashi eggplant. I’d come back again and again for this dish! This is an absolute must try!! ⭐️

*Sautéed garlic & herb mushrooms (side) - big side dish with lots of flavor, very good

*Maple spiced roasted vegetables (side) - again, a very generous sized serving for a side dish. These were very tasty

Overall, this was such a wonderful dinner. I would highly recommend trying out the dome experience!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPTT3kkt0758o_St7AJINH6YbPCVttXLJj5Uojq&fid=0x0:0xe51d75733323ba95"],"When":"2024-12-21"},{"Name":"Ania Kruger","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV6eVZdvhgupxaSbVxtb48imUCLhn24LHkj73VeCMkgplnIwBg6=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Was really hopeful since the location is good and the service was excellent. But the food unfortunately was a miss for me. We ordered 4 dishes and none of them we would order again. Desserts were actually very good. Drinks were pretty good. Sad that the food didn't work out... Would go back for a drink or for dessert, especially if staying at the hotel, it's perfect.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM9HNOikWgjrrqyU9d4NSN_v6LXSsPz1mB1Uo_k&fid=0x0:0xe51d75733323ba95"],"When":"2024-10-17"},{"Name":"Sarra Lyford","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVexMP5t8DxQ01KyDQFO-pEG8rVJgp_6a3ywGnokBYkcURb9eUr=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a romantic experience. I got one of the last Winterlust reservations and had an amazing meal with my partner. The food was top-notch and very fresh, and everything was presented beautifully. The staff were excellent and took care of us. We had an amazing night.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNgE95q0XVz7h0BCeCdk53TQkmm5w_dAePz52Yd&fid=0x0:0xe51d75733323ba95"],"When":"2024-11-19"},{"Name":"Dada C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLIe-vVrDq1q9yDduXGb72lhExRt4RBYsWtSebdo3EUroJ09A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had a lovely experience on my boyfriend's birthday. I’ve been to quite a few fancy restaurants in Vancouver and have often been disappointed, but this place was an exception. The service and interior were excellent, and the food was great—better than other well-known restaurants. Last but not least, our server, Shannon, was kind and professional. I loved it and will definitely visit again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNAD-dAtvlTd4fAazWx7KbjtZ7qinz-p_0dIWZi&fid=0x0:0xe51d75733323ba95"],"When":"2024-9-26"},{"Name":"Jessica Richmond","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXdiE4_qg2mndfyuFW03O42jzKgtdgSenGGz74GkphaEpWWPQDrog=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have wanted to come here for years now, and a pre birthday / festive afternoon tea celebration seemed like the perfect opportunity.
The lounge is set just off the back of the lobby, which was a busy area, but the live violin player created a separate and more calming atmosphere.
The staff were incredible throughout the experience, the food was 10/10, although a few more savoury options would have been great.
Don’t miss this festive experience, check out the images of the impressive afternoon tea ferris wheel and reindeer with a candy cane afro!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPUtBfPvSCMm-a-Gn5ypK2YmCaCWzOLrWKO7H5C&fid=0x0:0xe51d75733323ba95"],"When":"2024-12-2"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Larry YVR","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXuTv093wbMx-W_HREHfZgp4qwBRPVQElu44Abax3eT7gG680u3=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Coffee beans are ethically sourced, and you can taste the quality in each sip. The Americano I ordered had a smooth, well-balanced flavours with no bitterness; you can tell they care about quality. Also tried my partner’s matcha latte and it was excellent as well.

The only “drawback” is not much in terms of food or snack options and the area, which are not their fault.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN2DX6CcOTMNj5-lKBPTPEk_fpczqVUzHQ3q2wx&fid=0x0:0xb7ce47faaa960fd"],"When":"2024-12-16"},{"Name":"Joshua Ding","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVZPE1MNTiSYW266d26gwdTqL4M0B5bgmlpc2q-RY2uO7CjIFtW=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"December 2024

Pleasantly surprised by the Americano Coffee. Throughly fresh brew coffee not from a coffee pot. Great rich flavor coffee for my trip. Great vibe coffee place.

I will love to stop by again if I get a chance.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMZs3noIPD4jvQhBwammjYzsUe7xloqnK1TjWbm&fid=0x0:0xb7ce47faaa960fd"],"When":"2024-12-22"},{"Name":"Tiara","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXOGTnVSprrRfKnl8HxlMWqGPfK-EAnduRxsmD5lBjFitcsiWe8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My go-to coffee place. Their coffee really perks me up til the end of the day. The place has a warm vibe to it. I usually get latte with oat milk and vanilla.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOUV8ws6O_HsJTMacGYPfX8BOAlRYCgW48V1Pfl&fid=0x0:0xb7ce47faaa960fd"],"When":"2024-10-25"},{"Name":"Eric Lobdell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXCvbRN_8oqitLr91OG4rJ5fvdlXP9u95SX-wYg5d_MVlkNTzwe=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great spot. Two choices of espresso for milk drinks. Perfectly textured milk. Overall awesome. Note: this side of town is a little rough.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOlOncZ49Xp-B1AmeYBOZgj-Mkc4EQ6c9sXfoZc&fid=0x0:0xb7ce47faaa960fd"],"When":"2024-8-21"},{"Name":"Francis Le Cuisto","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKjqP8taXRQVD3DOKvGRZXFl3u7Sh46genBmpElCFGc8GmjAZ7X=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently had an incredible experience at Propaganda Bistro in Saigon. The beautiful outdoor seating provided a charming atmosphere, complemented by the eclectic decor that added a unique touch to the ambiance. The service was nothing short of amazing, with attentive staff going above and beyond to make our visit memorable. The extended menu showcased a diverse range of delicious options, and the happy hour specials were a delightful bonus. To top it off, the desserts were the perfect sweet ending to an already fantastic dining experience. I highly recommend Propaganda Bistro for a delightful blend of atmosphere, service, and delectable offerings. Five stars without a doubt!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM01cSbwJVxvYp4n20bjZIxvTnsO-IHT89Eitdv&fid=0x0:0xb7ce47faaa960fd"],"When":"2023-11-11"},{"Name":"Mars","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWHtjcjaWQzqHOLzQxnithsAhAEbGsw7p50S0nVK1aNY3FFQevV=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here to sit and eat our donuts we got from MELLO, ordered a hot latte and ice matcha, both were delicious, and the latte art was beautiful and incredible, def coming here again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPMWOYwH9yLNT1dBL22NyG1pJg52H03nKQiyNlA&fid=0x0:0xb7ce47faaa960fd"],"When":"2024-10-29"},{"Name":"Chris Saw","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXy5Bh-AO_uKSVWmdPFyd2Qw-e5jOA9R28iTB8aIMq1Fdu1hBn_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Abundant selection of coffee and tea in Vancouver’s historic Chinatown.
My only complaint is the constant dripping out of my Takeaway cup","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPuafNSfg5xCVbw6mbVmAxfGRIDu0zKIjVsIORB&fid=0x0:0xb7ce47faaa960fd"],"When":"2024-11-4"},{"Name":"Abhay Verma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVrV_6i4dbcDuraV7ft63f2m_fuGbXlt4ooiSAA_Az5gxTkAzw0Lg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Loved it, strong coffee with a great peaceful place to sit and work or have a conversation.

Clean, minimalist, great service.

I had a hazelnut latte, a cocoa butter matcha cookie, and the elderflower iced tea. The coffee was perfect, strong beans with perfectly textured milk, one of the best coffees in the city. The cookie had a really unique flavor but was as soft as I could hope, super fresh and very tasty. I hoped the iced tea had a stronger flavor but we were still happy with it.

Highly recommended.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMKhFfbuOcyFxR8wFNDhEh7ASRhSoyelZLTe1E1&fid=0x0:0xb7ce47faaa960fd"],"When":"2021-10-8"}]

[{"Name":"Sarah H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVsWh0yp-KIO34HcNYkob-1_OfKtK3Q-a159zNXnHsOIHKzfs6ndw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Popped in for a matcha as I was in the area for an appointment. I did look up cafes in the area and this one caught my eye for the unique name and space. The seating arrangement is cozy and I would definitely try some of the baked goodies next time, more specifically the carrot walnut loaf!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOID-W2wFVnWjd1mNIURvBmM1Bwr-bJSQ0_V6mn&fid=0x0:0xc2025457aa6b5134"],"When":"2024-11-20"},{"Name":"Yumi Nagahara","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ1l7716Bdm3-_SmQySMKOTNUKz4oK28vziry7XdxpvYW3NMA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I had a disappointing experience with the service during my visit. It was disheartening to see how differently we were treated compared to the people who were next in line. I always approach others with a smile and genuine appreciation for their work, so it really stings when that kindness isn’t reciprocated. Perhaps that’s why the coffee didn’t hit the spot this time. It’s a shame!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP72fY7fGj8qWLGaoZf0kMW3qArEsN8nNeJVtS5&fid=0x0:0xc2025457aa6b5134"],"When":"2024-10-29"},{"Name":"Hye","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjULQQSi1mhNFty7n8ZPesKkMpD31jiIGazltx_wRmE-swaOwr4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A small yet charming and relaxed coffee shop. Their arrangement of small tables alongside a long one was particularly appealing. While the coffee wasn’t as impressive as expected, the walnut chocolate cookie was soo yum —I couldn’t stop eating it, despite not being much of a cookie person. I would definitely recommend this place if you’re in the area.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPTZSETPU_A3Y_cgJYGt8BxczKOuBi3d2C_lpg&fid=0x0:0xc2025457aa6b5134"],"When":"2024-4-19"},{"Name":"Kwong Tang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVRNhrcdIOQyhkpCbdjoUSwC0OqkPEp5C09o-KZX9pyAsIQioX9=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cozy Vibes & Quality Brews at Timbertrain Coffee! ☕️🚂

Stepped into Timbertrain Coffee in Gastown and found a cozy haven perfect for coffee lovers. 🏠 Their attention to quality is evident in every cup, offering a unique selection of roasts. ☕️ I enjoyed a peaceful morning in their inviting space, surrounded by the subtle hum of their roasting machines and the warm aroma of freshly brewed coffee. 🌟 A must-visit spot for anyone seeking a high-quality coffee experience in a welcoming atmosphere. ❤️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNB25lkDBzsqp8XcXBUavuKVZOP7sUpTq_AYxlW&fid=0x0:0xc2025457aa6b5134"],"When":"2024-3-17"},{"Name":"River Club","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU1jN_rNfVaNHlfWt6atKt20YOuFFd_5mjs4iF2Mm9hj0VbWVU=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently tried a pour-over coffee, and it was an incredible experience from start to finish. Right away, the aroma caught my attention—a beautiful blend of floral and nutty notes that hinted at what was to come.highly recommended","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipORSRpxw9zgn7yYtUfhtBCbjv2ujntps9ni2NwB&fid=0x0:0xc2025457aa6b5134"],"When":"2024-11-13"},{"Name":"George Giannou","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW2_vHJTFm-eRFG2n-2wYoZKFc2KemMgMIz7lSTUhnpuus3WktrMg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent pour over coffee, scone is excellent also, it's this type of coffee shop that puts a smile on our face. My son loved his hot chocolate too. The open door idea is good to air things out, but it keeps things quite chilly on the inside.
Thank you and keep it up 😊","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO6uveBBE-fpf1ekePXmsSG5qGcRIZ2yCNAlK7o&fid=0x0:0xc2025457aa6b5134"],"When":"2023-11-5"},{"Name":"Daunavan Buyer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVGDFaFml_ytPZDQor4nbzzZ2wrL12JsS0AF7WcmrWsMhU0KD8HvQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great coffee with very friendly staff and the vibe of the place is amazing. Will go back for sure!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNxmz1KBbJqXWt7j06tXsAwAPU--nFAhuXK5GGZ&fid=0x0:0xc2025457aa6b5134"],"When":"2024-10-5"},{"Name":"Nada El Bouharrouti","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWjrLg7zrfDqJJrXlUz-emk-H8Ig65_WkKL-nqSL25xD0SLPvcI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very cosy and chill staff. Great coffee and great prices!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNkPO10wtU4bePjBrPnzxgyso1kbf_-io-XzZs9&fid=0x0:0xc2025457aa6b5134"],"When":"2024-12-11"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"John Kroetch","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV9ZriQY_5kscfPIHrXvfYdGx9n_pl7uxeCe99NVjU4snEQ59M=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've never had a Matcha Latte before. I liked it. It's a little sweet and bitter at the same time, with a little bit of "vegetation" taste - in a good way.

The place was down in a courtyard... a little hidden from all but one street. The service was quick. The atmosphere was nice. It was busy with many working on their laptops.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPz9oC9LpI1X9DbpoQWIS_aYMlCpMTtydDrQjsc&fid=0x0:0xd73f08f4d054e9cc"],"When":"2024-11-28"},{"Name":"Stina A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU-SKK2jCNOoCRagFEwYWokSZF3UFbRRxARFqbuMpZGrdFB0glF=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Doughnuts were amazing - super fresh and flavorful. Everything was delicious. Really liked the cappuccino blend as well! Açaí bowl was huge.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNp5bkhDhp8wfGJ9xQjbEyppvdGi2r4UFB1Xs1z&fid=0x0:0xd73f08f4d054e9cc"],"When":"2024-10-21"},{"Name":"Anj S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXqc6Qk6ZPVGaDCNS9MIwNWBRPHLg6ObcnkgbolZEp2_WZQOFbRXg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Really cute spot in the heart of downtown with a selection of hawaiin coffee and sweet treats - including ube cream cheese muffins, fruity nutty cakes, their guava chilli jam that pair so well with their coffee blends and 10% Kona. Ambience is very inviting with their patio being pet friendly which is a huge plus. Positive vibes, happy spot, must visit. Good stuff all around can’t go wrong.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN5XnQw-l8p9UzV37JMDTwkcv9rgYLMF8LeRZuo&fid=0x0:0xd73f08f4d054e9cc"],"When":"2024-11-17"},{"Name":"Danilo Teodoro","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU_rV4_xok36vIezJ6uAhpzSfyECA8ogmjA4ehyXVTr4dBqIAFv=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I tried the Honolulu Peaberry pour-over and it was ok, nothing stood out, but the drink wasn't bitter. The outside area is great to have your coffee while relaxing. The Latte was good 👍","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMa_pbY5NS7uLqdBRCTtvDwHw1bO3Yfcism9RG9&fid=0x0:0xd73f08f4d054e9cc"],"When":"2024-9-1"},{"Name":"Joey Nguyen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUM0hm5znF3r3RoHz6AjwuxVKE0rXUfmPo2LPxXdKu5rW_HEEjA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

Honolulu Coffee is an absolute gem! The moment I walked in, I was greeted by the friendliest staff, who made me feel right at home. The coffee is exceptional, rich, and flavorful, reminding me of the amazing brews I enjoyed during my time on the islands. Definitely recommend the Hawaiin Latte & croissants. It's a little slice of paradise right here in the city. Highly recommend! 🌺☕️

Also, many vegan options!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPTLlOsH7NV7w9qBebsd7Rqbr9WsrPu9DNzzhfU&fid=0x0:0xd73f08f4d054e9cc"],"When":"2024-7-28"},{"Name":"Andrea Oikawa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVxsvfl3tc1SJkElcEdPYgckVhaeXzgHHGc6dkrKzEJ-kXtc2cl=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Friendly, efficient service, delicious lattes and the chilled-out Hawaiian vibe are a few things that keep me coming back to this location. Staff always give me a smile and are helpful, even when under the pressure of busy times, and remember my order even if they've only served me a few times. Great place to sit and chat with friends after dance classes, get some writing done or work on assignments.

Just one note - please bring back the vegan spice cake, it's so delicious :)","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Zelda","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXYDa9MsXj-ICvwW_hwqh-GHSWiDMqwu8Za_3wuFz1DE9IB99aK=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Cute little spot with ample seating! The service was extremely friendly and supportive. I came in for an açaí bowl and was pretty disappointed with it - the ingredients are fresh, presentation was great and it felt nourishing. It was more of a frozen slush bowl instead of what the actual smoothie type of consistency that açaí bowls usually are, maybe this place has their own style. I wouldn’t return for it again, would love to try the coffee next time as there’s tons of reviews about it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPn31WUOkh3h_egqeIhWv099Y3yeh7Ze4wUudJI&fid=0x0:0xd73f08f4d054e9cc"],"When":"2024-9-13"},{"Name":"Erika Schreiner","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIR6wFj0GVTpIdSX3sRn4qiC_TD22pWQZZEd6UhvWO2isTHNQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This spot a little hidden gem! Great music, vibes, visuals. The Hawaiian latte was AMAZING! Coming back for that forsure. The flavors they have in the food is interesting and delicious, you just want to come back and try more of what they got !","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMBiuG0fqvUJnBpSkjbUTSyS0MB_ZVX0YSTZwty&fid=0x0:0xd73f08f4d054e9cc"],"When":"2024-9-24"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Linda Huynh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJULBJVa4IqPnZaoD2l1RctTtz9hoxAr_VwxVSsCLAJ5ScENQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I found Charisma looking on google maps for a place for a late snack or drink. I am very glad to have found this place and support local small business! The staff was very kind, he said it's family-run and he works looong hours. I wish them to have more business. I tried there Award-winning apple cheesecake and it was indeed delicious!! The back of the restaurant can be booked for events, looks nice for gathering. Quiet at night when we went, it felt comfy with the banquet sittings. Look for their deals such as happy hours drinks and snacks.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPlrxpKqJIwIfxg8rScgmkmcxfBlMeMZQGnbF5l&fid=0x0:0xf03877d70f06c9dc"],"When":"2024-10-26"},{"Name":"Keith Ver","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXVdqxLCf1LEt0AU82myo-eUqDcb2LcbdnfhupJTEW0sPAQ-qQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We were in downtown and were searching for a place to get dessert and Charisma was one of the top choices when we googled. Glad we tried checking this place! We love it! The owner is very nice and accommodating. The whole place is very spacious, clean, and organized! We tried their Signature Apple Cheesecake and it was very delicious!! No wonder they won 1st place in a cheesecake competition! Will definitely be back to try their other selections. And when we do, we will definitely get their Signature Apple Cheesecake again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOyFB5G_G6zEsI-rJvijkSy4iSTlVAoE8A6SlTR&fid=0x0:0xf03877d70f06c9dc"],"When":"2024-8-4"},{"Name":"Khánh Đoan Nguyễn Hoàng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIsi9cPAIUcGKHj0kZ6dL7krrZrE7Js4oQU47ZbOdZ7UtRIMw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Truely a hidden gem and needs more attention as it should be. Staff are super nice and friendly. We can feel the passion and love through the food which is pretty surprising cause my bf and I just randomly picked this place on gg map.

Thay have a variety of food choice from bubble tea, ice cream, waffles, cheesecakes to burgers, soups and sandwich. Highly recommend their signature Apple Cheesecake. We also tried the Oreo waffles, pull pork and chicken strips which was AMAZING. Definitely need to come back to try out more 😋","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPwB7m_W7tSFUksNz6T7U3YIifnBrbyQdHv4OT4&fid=0x0:0xf03877d70f06c9dc"],"When":"2024-11-25"},{"Name":"Melon Collins","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK3XeFwbN1XxpHFgT5BN-CAo37CgMiT6mcWDktzG0rP6xBl9A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a great surprise! We were looking for a cool little spot to have coffee and dessert. Stumbled across Charisma and had the best coffee and apple cinnamon cheesecake. Found out later that cheesecake won awards and I totally get it. And it’s a great spot for night owls like us - open until 1am. Great little late night spots like this are so rare in the city. Treat yourself to a visit!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPFEdN1quOAOyvfgo7XLbr3h3DVGyqGd2oHspMG&fid=0x0:0xf03877d70f06c9dc"],"When":"2024-10-5"},{"Name":"James Dunbar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJlI0OTueVT75aOmW0lUDNjASuOFbwImk2HOFcpXlg5njL4_nk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Found Charisma while looking for a place to get a coffee and dessert.

Very fun an unique family owned business. Food, drinks, coffee and dessert. Id reccommend checking it out.

Our order did take a little bit but it was worth it. Just something to note if you are pressed for time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPDTFj64mcGSOI0PIFEFp-x0RKjxVDK_rEPQkUq&fid=0x0:0xf03877d70f06c9dc"],"When":"2024-12-17"},{"Name":"Marley Shaw","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKWhMniLUdTz3bKSvf1XbL8S1vmoFHvJuRhPWsKPBCILSPlvQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The cheesecake tastes like heaven. Owner is very friendly and staff is calm and collected. Offer water while you wait, and are very kind. Had to go back for seconds.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOxjE1NxHJsnCCwiAQwZc46yO1dFxLAMiASe1-Y&fid=0x0:0xf03877d70f06c9dc"],"When":"2024-8-23"},{"Name":"Melissa Howell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJVDh2A_cqtNgcDS6P3slPLAMfzcDhkfpQiSKtuPCS95JidUg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place has the best cheesecake I’ve ever had. Seriously… we had the hazelnut chocolate and the New York cheesecake. Both were perfection! Amazing location and great atmosphere as well!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Aspen Calloway","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUCN_o12YsEHIpF_BDO85hIEIP7pLruborFcnC5IUkBhG-b4UE=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Consistently my fave place for a little treat. Massive selection of options for bubble tea and 10/10 cheesecakes. Very nice, friendly staff/management as well.

Seriously, try the cheesecake though.
I've being trying every business in the city that heavily features cheesecake on their menu or claims to have 'the best cheesecake in the city', but Charisma's always comes out on top. Highly recommend trying the Apple Pie Cheesecake. :)","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Mariia Myrgorodska","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXFCLcTaYXfCxXqhHVpGKGwb9IITdoYU-rkEXs02LAhzC1X0QK_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I was excited to try this place, especially since they’re open until 11 PM, which is very convenient. I sampled quite a few items, and as someone with a sweet tooth who generally loves almost everything, I was surprised to find that nothing really stood out for me. Unfortunately, I didn’t enjoy what we ordered, but I appreciate the effort they put into their menu and the extended hours. Perhaps others will have a better experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPyRokKo5AH9NUJnvGLKu55vSt-rymjxi88c_VB&fid=0x0:0xa4b1f69df3d66ab4"],"When":"2024-12-20"},{"Name":"Hansol Choi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVCPrCxbfrYH3B8f7PFoH8LkS37ogMKwkLf5dFeJUMqVUx2M5ub=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I often visit this place though, I would say "Average"

Coffee is good. Usually comes with lovely latte arts.
The Japanese and Spanish staffs are very friendly, but others are not..😅

They open til 11pm which is good.

Croissant? so so not good enough or not that bad

I've tried almost of their soups and they are all too salty. Also, bread which comes with soup is also salty😭 I thought the mushroom soup was expired because of the taste.. it was sour.... I will not try their soup anymore haha..

Overall, not bad
The coffee is good, but the other meals are hmmm bad compare to the cost","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMboN13qPY6gV6fI037EGEumP0bgXdcR25I7Fqd&fid=0x0:0xa4b1f69df3d66ab4"],"When":"2024-12-24"},{"Name":"Kalkidan Berhanu (Kali)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVwG91QfSOTlmWxrAuB_p_OYFEJGLPgwgdqAlCklQT3xXMLtELr=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Cute little cafe right in the heart of Downtown, walking distance from skytrain! I stopped by here, and the London Fog and chocolate chip/nut cookie both taste great. A tad pricey, but the cookie was massive!

I like the place overall and the staff are very friendly! The only thing is that the seating could be more comfortable.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN5H_uZdBDS4rVSynZs3vlymNqw6uhOnYjBaDxe&fid=0x0:0xa4b1f69df3d66ab4"],"When":"2024-9-3"},{"Name":"No Name","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUjGXbrUW79FX08bh-oythXVmqJYkfc66mE7ovbrdDzBnVL13UX=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The sausage roll was amazing warmed up! We also had an affogato and penutbutter cookie! Great service, amazing food, great coffee, and a beautiful space. You can't ask for more from a coffee shop/cafe!

Thanks for a great time!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPlATa76M1upnGQ6gWVE9y4M8tLXpIaOoT42x_6&fid=0x0:0xa4b1f69df3d66ab4"],"When":"2024-8-10"},{"Name":"LeWayne Ballard","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUQzNcyGYb6l-ZRwqbwQbIkgYw_7uDCrWhayHblYVZ0Z3oGaWy-Pw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Stopped by here for a light breakfast while visiting the Gastown area.  Location is conveniently located on the corner with great views of the streets.  Needed to kill an hour, so grabbed a few pastries and lattes.  They provide free internet which made it convenient to get some work done at the same time.

Service was very friendly and helpful.  There were plenty of hot & cold coffee and tea as well as smoothies.  There's also a variety of pastries, baked goods, and even gelato.  It was a cozy cafe to have small bites with a tea or coffee while relaxing in Gastown.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPyYO76V8GK2TFcQlrRVtmFBaq9TcbFwAq96nKP&fid=0x0:0xa4b1f69df3d66ab4"],"When":"2024-8-29"},{"Name":"Kaman Kwok","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVTfY1lFx7N7LsexryuKa9Q76pyfiBSBOSe4KZKmNeoZtDKwC8s=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Coffee is decent. Location is convenient at the entrance of Gas Town. It’s long weekend early Sunday morning and the cafe is quiet.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNFcXtiUt6s4BE7dQ-523VHCRdXnhKQoS7zLIRs&fid=0x0:0xa4b1f69df3d66ab4"],"When":"2024-9-5"},{"Name":"Stuart Chiu-Griffin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU0UeflrWiXPp1JpDFO5OUKsMsJ7YtjrRQXCIc6a_vjKyydHqE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The americano was superb, the pastries is average, the sausage rolls we tried were plain hot dogs rolled in puff pastries and sprinkled with seeds - stay away from them, over priced at $7.00 and I do regret ever coming in. I was told this cafe was good, but after my experience and watching the 3 guys. Whiny the counter, drooling and making comments of the 3 young ladies ahead of us, I would not recommend this place to any young women. Be safe as I don’t think this is appropriate.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOl2IxeMTYxHJWeB5Tn3BmFW41RtkURTcqBxj-q&fid=0x0:0xa4b1f69df3d66ab4"],"When":"2024-4-20"},{"Name":"HJ Marshall","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX_gcI3vW3uepTT3i_wt2Vk_IaBu140gLQwAD0ak9Ec_xFAMNhXbw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Awesome vibrant but quiet cafe on the corner of Gastown. Great coffee and food.
Ps. Cute barista too","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOowsRxu5VrmwKBAiTU_LmzWEqF2B4DDC0fYIw_&fid=0x0:0xa4b1f69df3d66ab4"],"When":"2024-11-28"}]

[{"Name":"Peter Yeung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLu0YJJe3nhlyAIPeX3ltU_n4sDFnWFsG2_v5wI3BSZDiWJuw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Actually the drink itself was really good   One of the better ones that I’ve had only Macu in Richmond makes a better strawberry drink. Negatives were Location (downtown Granville was difficult to find parking and pricey just to get a drink). Biggest negative was they decided to lie about a promotion (Snoopy). We got the tumblers at price that was advertised but the straw cap(see photo) the drink barrista decided to get sneaky and said they costed $5 in cash only   After when we got home we found out they’re given out if you buy a certain amount. We spent way over that amount  now thinking about what we spent we should of gotten a tumbler for free too. I guess the barrista got a tumbler for free at our expense  the experience left a sour taste about the company","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPLaAtXtl7DUSPyrojyt-J4VyvOUqgkDGSaigOP&fid=0x0:0x51e11e690f00c1fa"],"When":"2024-11-20"},{"Name":"MY MUU","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWj-JwJ_wQcBIEEsvmg5zFw4w-G2POd2pdNqBYLd6hOZ_j9dfWoQA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Gingerbread is soo adorable for this lovely Christmas ⛄🎁 I luv them!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMIEsTok_rJ2clZIV9S2r5q8NYwI_EAtgldm4Q0&fid=0x0:0x51e11e690f00c1fa"],"When":"2024-11-24"},{"Name":"henry lo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocICROhefo2qxIKYMaxBS2tGN3HYmLeatlMv1DzNVstA6WbeEA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently visited Gong Cha bubble tea on W Pender St and had a wonderful experience. The store had a cozy and inviting atmosphere with cute decor. The staff was incredibly friendly and took the time to explain their menu and make recommendations. I ordered a classic bubble milk tea, and it was delicious! The tea was perfectly brewed, and the boba was cooked just right. The pricing was reasonable for the size and quality of the drink. Overall, I highly recommend and can't wait to go back and try more of their drinks.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMycLDr36q85ycLJvX9TJtMCP_dvtf4zwG0eNDi&fid=0x0:0x51e11e690f00c1fa"],"When":"2023-3-28"},{"Name":"김세영","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI-K_z2t_DB6IEToXz-0ch2hkgWznuARfXXLPMcIf3TwfCe7Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love their red bean smoothie! You should add milk foam in it✨✨
They also have amazing bubble waffle
I’d like to try it next time🔥🔥🔥","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Geumheang.Cathy. Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK42kAWgBiZS8V1GMowfIINXkG_V-HKlWqJ86saBXSUipiM2w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I odered honey lemon green tea it is my favorite 😍 good flavor, nice service, good atmosphere 👍 I recommend you to come! And also they have a "buy 2 get 1 free" promotion untile Jan 20th!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOHgrlIHVzOahxpIxXzA5tDFX3jzBhq0SbW8vGz&fid=0x0:0x51e11e690f00c1fa"],"When":"2023-1-5"},{"Name":"Estairia Hong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXmDLygqZ3OT1WagVoz_S7MOF1DNcLc8uEquGumaFc59ZLDHz6l=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here to get some relief from the heat. Iced coconut coffee slush hit the spot!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPpCNYKU84N027rz2GgEw_gGK8rlYiAafBB_uJv&fid=0x0:0x51e11e690f00c1fa"],"When":"2023-8-18"},{"Name":"茶木悠生","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI7YbCac3Wa70XTv_xn6DIgih2LfWMcEy203NezrYRdXqF3U5E=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I got a matcha smooth.
It's the best drink in Vancouver.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN7nSMFy7C25TCF9fLppUBwedj2P6wslDRYSbBb&fid=0x0:0x51e11e690f00c1fa"],"When":"2024-1-7"},{"Name":"m y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJzu2GUEdBPFdtskmMpd7arQlC8G1kIia0BBY92WqvipCat=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Gong cha is good in terms of diverse menu but it's really sweet for my taste. Even at 50 percent sweetness, I jumped out of my seat as it wired me instantly.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Mahsa Salmani","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX05Z4lUr_4z97v8vMXWgyILJc20EoiKAqii8laijZOVU86-Gmu=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A very cozy and charming cafe in downtown Vancouver, just a 5-minute walk from Vancouver Convention Center! They offer a wide variety of beverages, including a special menu that adds a unique touch to their offerings. The pastries here are exceptional, especially the spiral croissant, which was one of the best I’ve ever had! The staff are incredibly warm and friendly, making the experience even more delightful. Every detail, right down to the design on the cups, is thoughtfully curated. This hidden gem is an absolute must-visit, and I’ll definitely be returning whenever I’m back in Vancouver!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPdeyCPQ8HZJiiQL9Vg2vTofeXrHHq5Ad9KGC0q&fid=0x0:0x5a7aed5514b248ab"],"When":"2024-12-15"},{"Name":"Derek Shek","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWP9Pjija1abf8rOsOgAPBkesWOZ8sALAjyQJKt0I-DTaykDkHV=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I visited Guffo Café in downtown for the first time and had a lovely experience. It’s a warm, cozy, and small coffee shop that feels welcoming. I ordered the ham and cheese croissant and an iced Americano—the coffee was above average, with a nice depth of flavor, and the croissant was delicious.

Unfortunately, I could only do takeout this time, so I missed out on enjoying the cozy ambiance inside. But I’m definitely planning to come back and stay a while next time to fully experience the atmosphere. Guffo Café is a great spot to grab quality coffee and a bite to eat, and I’m looking forward to my next visit!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM59P7zk5Th-WfjWvrYfmPt6-rsN-eg0meQGdca&fid=0x0:0x5a7aed5514b248ab"],"When":"2024-11-5"},{"Name":"Afifa Zaheer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWhdA0X-uF1ktTttOVmDlUTZeK2gl1Rqu8MTlOcHHJCeU3cRbcN=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Trying local coffee shops is always the highlight of traveling to new towns— and this coffee shop in Vancouver definitely made it to the list. I tried their chocolate croissant and maple syrup latte, absolutely amazing. The place is super cute and has the most modern setup. The staff were super friendly and made sure that our drinks were made well. I would definitely recommend this to anyone coming to Vancouver or even locals who haven’t tried it yet. Give it a shot, you will not be disappointed.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMcOCl_Z85iLVqMvVA5TErjgdqqdAlw1sD0PWXl&fid=0x0:0x5a7aed5514b248ab"],"When":"2024-10-13"},{"Name":"to Mato","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUzWyanid8Rc84iEQUoem1VKNL9JAYnAfVL17GpJ-RObLYdEqc=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I ordered flat white at this cafe.
Although the portion was a little small, it was nice. As you can see the latte art was cute and details. Japanese staff was likable, we talked a lot. Thank you☺︎","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMiFc1cIGxxsXBtv9XyZYb5ugPbU1zLyvP8Fuzd&fid=0x0:0x5a7aed5514b248ab"],"When":"2024-11-25"},{"Name":"Dagny Art","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW2COX47dK-KNIGZ0ssA2NPVlEdCudFiTSxVJ0CBcHBt-T4hpbc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The staff were friendly. Hot chocolate was good but not as thick and rich as it should be. Also they were out of whipped cream. Pistachio croissant was not too overpoweringly sweet but it could have been more fresh.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMja8P9Azy1LKYVfsV1EkrGXuACY7SkgZclu_a5&fid=0x0:0x5a7aed5514b248ab"],"When":"2024-12-24"},{"Name":"Kanako Sakurada","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKYybgPjG_d3LYq66Ui47Ocd_2PMrfkKaju5V_L0IyVTR19lQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Tiny and adorable cafe across from Sinclair centre! It’s just like their mascot Guffo the owl! Their coffee is very good and they have croissants (reg, cube, and barrel) and other baked goods as well as some lunch options.

Very hard to find a parking in the area and also expensive but tons of evo available.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMq1NjPqwfZFsWzLZeULKQMI3aA0K7BD7AWkHbR&fid=0x0:0x5a7aed5514b248ab"],"When":"2024-12-16"},{"Name":"Kimberly N","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXZNHjz5mG6S8YusNaL34QSew-cXsr9NYmtMOkEMGpb1RszZEGrMA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This was such a great experience.

I tried new drink, and I didn’t like it. I was feeling adventurous.  Which was not their fault, and they made me a new one.

10/10 customer service. Will definitely be returning.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNIEakZGt_jhztEDL5DRUmQWdbFfGiE-HXjgohv&fid=0x0:0x5a7aed5514b248ab"],"When":"2024-11-6"},{"Name":"Alex Tomasulo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWpVeBezZwU9UfofzHiqN1cTWaOepEM_l-0k-UFTB6mfu5zg3_m=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I visited Guffo Cafe in Vancouver this past March, and it has not left my mind since.

We enjoyed two chocolate croissants, which were exceptionally soft, flavorful, and FRESH. I also had an iced sweet cappuccino that was simply delightful. The atmosphere in the cafe was also charming and inviting.

However, the highlight of our visit was the owner. Although I didn’t catch his name, he was one of the kindest people I’ve ever met. He had great passion for his craft and he truly was just an inspiring guy. He even took the time to chat with us about coffee, music, and more. It was refreshing to experience such authentic human interaction in a world where everyone is so disassociated from one another. My partner and I still remember him and talk about how awesome he was from time to time!

I highly recommend that anyone visiting Vancouver support this wonderful cafe. It will definitely be our first stop when we return to the city in December! It’s so awesome here!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMve-Mwo5KjBK4aOqRcShL_Fe_ETFh9XlFqeArI&fid=0x0:0x5a7aed5514b248ab"],"When":"2024-8-22"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Michael Moriarity","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWNhkYaB9zjlkkl74OBPcplO2QslT6bqh419yvto-fc4bLKxsqAKQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I regularly park in George Wainborn Park when visiting downtown Vancouver and I frequently stip at Fresh Street Market Coffee Shop which is located along Pacific  Street and Howe Street..such a beautiful location and very high quality coffee and baked goods…","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPhzBzm0xKVhnrI2yk4fu-0fpCYyMiCILFZRz0L&fid=0x0:0xe517700937464f06"],"When":"2024-8-22"},{"Name":"Shelby McLean","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXGrJIxT_w5hI3sCYlNvQIRBmY0nhG0Y1Wwz7fnYiH39NwxA_WG=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Such a fan of this place! Came on a whim and was surprised by the prices with it being below Vancouver House. I got a lavender London fog and it was so good, $3.75 for a medium with tax and the machine didn’t prompt for a tip right away. It’s a corner cafe so it’s bright even on a rainy day like today. Lots of seating. Didn’t see many outlets though. Really friendly staff.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipProzQvKM1h7LlhzfAynD34MMorDbnPDAwIBz05&fid=0x0:0xe517700937464f06"],"When":"2023-9-27"},{"Name":"Jorge García","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWrHKGEg_TD7H7n2DJtY3gr4z7hkeEKOMELAYocutC4Hneq7T6OPw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Really good drink and food options.

Wherever we're in the area, we like to come in and enjoy a white chocolate and a sandwich from their extended variety.

Although there's always a queue, the service is fast and always friendly.

On this visit, they had the promotion of buying a small soup with a discount price from the supermarket with the purchase of a sandwich, we enjoyed having the soup with the sandwich.

It's a nice place if you're looking for a quick bite and drink.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jorge Enrique Marciales Acosta","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVs9G5ZpQ_qTBOsbd8J0VpmKWERzXHqzAq0CocOXlhPv9vZOWo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The highlight here is definitely the staff; they're incredibly friendly and always willing to help. The pastries are also exceptional, offering fresh items like scones and croissants.

However, I must note that the coffee itself falls short of expectations. While it's acceptable for those moments when you simply need a caffeine fix, it doesn't match the quality of the other offerings. Despite this, the overall experience is positive.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN8q0ED_j0fsxGumvaF0cYDOLlTE6XgLZf1qQAK&fid=0x0:0xe517700937464f06"],"When":"2024-3-25"},{"Name":"Juan Carlos “Juan Carlos Cornejo” Cornejo Alfaro","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWK4DOcCHxY1jpQnKxnbwF-UesUsqTxeScFt7XgsrdyP9nM6xIb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"It is an affordable Coffe Shop that is located next to UCW university. Ideal for students, and any one interested in buying Coffe, Latte, and so forth. The place in the mornings it is nice, not crowded, but from 11 until around 4 p.m. there is always people there! Overall 4 starts because sometimes some specific pastries such palmier are short on inventory. But, taste really good!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNbyBpY-aWIplun36F2-ry_N60rJpRAN8QQToza&fid=0x0:0xe517700937464f06"],"When":"2023-5-31"},{"Name":"Mila Nguyen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ0-BEEHIZ6OpbiIStlOE0ILSZCaWlfyUw4bby4my-gpr2Lt-4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The cookies were amazing! They were gooey and warm! I really loved the salted caramel flavor.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMH-R3jC9rcUgZlexbPr5xo9FOaBOpZrkiIcjZC&fid=0x0:0xe517700937464f06"],"When":"2024-4-16"},{"Name":"Rahul Reddy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKsoiRPdmdgS4gwBSEKNaj4ZjjTQPwn4Q-kIkZbC8hZxVKIFg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"People need to mindful about how the staff handle the food. I ordered a vegetarian sandwich and when I opened it, I found meat in it and had to discard the food. Staff need to understand that people choose vegetarian options because of the dietary restrictions and should be careful in handling the foods.

Other than the service they have good vegetarian options and Croissant is the best along with the coffees but the service is on and off.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Shierly Yolanda","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUF095OeEzpSqLbe7Rx8sJGnw-Qm4kHB3lenS6Vg0qNm0JBnwBl=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"A nice place to have quick bite. But it's not really good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOT2n3nMaWkGPk9TwCxRzMaiFZqrIp9nIlDAn2k&fid=0x0:0xe517700937464f06"],"When":"2024-2-8"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Ginzo Milani (Monckey100)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVZJAMXcJZ4Q-fVQ1hK4TmeQ5-UBO877OkkYfk78A4TFUsqJzc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Bacon Breakfast sandwich was made beautifully, amazing butter bun, the bacon was well cooked and the sandwich was super fresh and not frozen. The egg was amazing too. An unexpected surprise from a coffee shop, a well balanced delicious breakfast sandwich.

The mocha was beautifully made, the cocoa was tasteful, the heart art was cute and well made and overall the cafe has baristas who clearly care about the quality of the food being released. Of all the coffee places in the vicinity, this is definitely the best coffee shop. This is definitely within top 10 best coffee shops in Vancouver.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNAeNP_igJ0bgfhz5CQriy7svAC2Kp5h4j8pmTt&fid=0x0:0x3debb949aabdfac"],"When":"2024-12-22"},{"Name":"Ina Z","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUqIKozAx8ntjuj5oZw4droqBVtaUlTOcOyWdmvwutABHppGwO0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We ordered iced mocha and tea. The mocha was good, not bad and also not great.

The aesthetic of the place, the atmosphere was nice! There’s a few seating options so we were lucky to secure a seat. The ambiance of the place is just chill.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO0XJ3aoOpUJO9OpbY8GMT3aMz9gFqgpvpq3tQD&fid=0x0:0x3debb949aabdfac"],"When":"2024-12-6"},{"Name":"Alireza Mahdian","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW0UiNNVRyZjtmU8TuMFZWagjDEpOucA4a-KVpCiuYYILJ-rcBw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Analog Coffee in Yaletown was a bit disappointing. I ordered an Americano, but it tasted more like a regular drip coffee lacking depth and flavor. I really can’t recommend the coffee based on this experience. The pastry I tried was alright, but nothing memorable or outstanding. Overall, it’s an average café in Yaletown that doesn’t quite live up to the hype. There are better options nearby if you’re looking for a quality coffee experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNo8t-aKPe2NWhXEnWbmFXDLMqbXYZcTHqp1_rI&fid=0x0:0x3debb949aabdfac"],"When":"2024-11-11"},{"Name":"Negin Rahimi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV4DUUoCWRf2VeIHKqwIhVGBDp6aPH06WL8KyLGIL_eC6FWBXb5=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Analog Cafe in Yaletown is the ultimate spot for remote work and hanging out with friends. The vibe is super inviting, and the food is on point. You absolutely have to try their coffee! Big shoutout to the amazing staff and team—I’m totally in love with this cafe!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMQwN8Bn9opMsLMMqzLmOV3z1FeRwqJGzjjmwTH&fid=0x0:0x3debb949aabdfac"],"When":"2024-10-9"},{"Name":"Landy C.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU6PUuYB6qPPsoJXGTkTsUPOr5v0XnOMHOr3t8U-hrWb9sokpJj=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Came here at 9am to get pastries and a drink, coffee was good but pastries were very stale. Even asked if it was baked fresh and they said yes, very disappointing.

Atmosphere and decor is cute but one female barista giving the drinks was quite rude, non apologetic when order was made wrong and clueless when asked if this was our drink or not with a snarky attitude.

Not sure if I recommend coming here, was hoping for better.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOF96D4Tm6mY9UaSObucWtFY51ibaLsrW7u_UYE&fid=0x0:0x3debb949aabdfac"],"When":"2024-8-24"},{"Name":"Tiara","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXOGTnVSprrRfKnl8HxlMWqGPfK-EAnduRxsmD5lBjFitcsiWe8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Very popular spot! It had a nice ambiance, the place was very nice. They ask which roast I would like for my coffee, couldn’t taste the difference with their dark or medium roast. I expected a deeper flavor for the dark roast.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMQvF5Znyo_khUiby_0cjOkqrhZiLmoHq6yZxu0&fid=0x0:0x3debb949aabdfac"],"When":"2024-9-10"},{"Name":"Eric D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWJ2MEGmYI0aVlBihe5SoOfFnPKaLqiMvg7jFkHnLbZXuiV4hsL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The coffee was quite good (although too hot) but the Chai Latte was mediocre. The scones were probably quite old so they were dry and tasted bad. There were a lot of flies in the shop, I think the owner should find a way to reduce them 😂","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNUUNf76DFkuiG8MXrAJQThKOUQRAG8HjWeMebm&fid=0x0:0x3debb949aabdfac"],"When":"2024-7-19"},{"Name":"James Basnett","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUXM2U6QuObKCSf4ncWP3_Lv03EnxxoNEKa9VcgdHOYjL1eAjPC=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We try to come here weekly. This coffee bar has the best vibe in Vancouver with its mix of light, patio and couches. There’s a reason it is often packed. We love the Americanos here and the iced chai is excellent as well.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPPGgAzWyIV508LdM9mppfgWTvXtfPdSdERS7Gy&fid=0x0:0x3debb949aabdfac"],"When":"2024-7-28"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Arturs Mons","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVynJ4wFaO1n4O08x-FxTv1KPmlWKP1TXMDnyQPLz_hUxyhn-oQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Bahar Bakery is a gem that truly stands out for its exceptional flavors. Every item I’ve tried has been a masterpiece, bursting with freshness and perfectly balanced taste. Their pastries and cakes are not only visually stunning but also layered with flavors that are rich, delicate, and utterly satisfying. The attention to detail in their baked goods is evident in every bite, from the flakiness of their croissants to the moist, flavorful cakes. It’s clear they use high-quality ingredients and have a genuine passion for their craft. If you're a fan of desserts that taste as good as they look—or better—Bahar Bakery is a must-visit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOUmMqOw8aH0IrEz578vdZ_ETcJWZtB8eLXic0k&fid=0x0:0x86223dd105863b4d"],"When":"2024-12-6"},{"Name":"ferial mhr","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ-p87TEo9kSoaQk4Z3TBfRVR0ElvqwCozujNZbYbwrO-XvNgk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
Bahar Coffee Shop is an absolute gem! From the moment you walk in, you’re greeted with a warm, cozy atmosphere and the friendliest staff. The coffee is exceptional, with rich, full-bodied flavors that you can tell are made from high-quality beans. Their menu has a great variety of options, whether you’re in the mood for a classic cappuccino or something more unique. I highly recommend trying their pastries as well—fresh and delicious!

What really sets Bahar apart is the attention to detail. Whether it’s the perfect foam on your latte or the beautifully designed interior, every aspect of the experience feels thoughtful and welcoming. It’s the perfect spot to catch up with friends or unwind with a book. I will definitely be coming back often!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNvznJXEgEno1NBspg_NZ3Bq0sEaj8mkiJHy_nu&fid=0x0:0x86223dd105863b4d"],"When":"2024-10-21"},{"Name":"Alireza","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV39bNv1oY185Xz2BsPaT23PKh4536xOLeHPRNqKeYWTwArJD7Lkw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I visited Bahar during a week-long trip to Vancouver and was impressed by its warm and welcoming vibe. The staff greeted every guest with genuine smiles, creating a cozy, home-like atmosphere. Their bakery offers a delightful selection of artisan pastries and wraps that are both nostalgic and excellent in quality. Bahar has created an inviting corner in downtown Vancouver that’s hard to leave without a smile.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMgg3CcDIc-OpR5K4u4ZMNXDuOmcUX_GuWRmacm&fid=0x0:0x86223dd105863b4d"],"When":"2024-12-19"},{"Name":"Mehar Sawhney","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJJmV2F6bU4v24rMpdCwppwN9oDfE_UvZzyNn5CT6K28TYQJga0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"THE BEST CHOCOLATE CROISSANT I EVER HAD

After trying a ton of chocolate croissants around the city that are super heavy and don't have any of the light feeling of a french croissants, got to Bahar for breakfast in general and can I just say they have at 8 am the freshest, lightest, warm, most delicious croissant.

Baklava tastes like they used the freshest cardamom,so good!

They also have very delicious rotating desserts. I particularly loved the cardamom cupcake and the tres leches just has perfect texture.

The pastries are a bit expensive but I personally love that I can get a smaller pastry. It lets me try more variety when there's just two of us.

It seems like it's run by a very close knit group and the people are really nice. Go check out Bahar!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNjZKqsh5nRuFJJ-nmUJXi3Nv9YiOPCuD62A42s&fid=0x0:0x86223dd105863b4d"],"When":"2024-9-8"},{"Name":"Will Heo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXxT5MjFCA02DYcNMPq50pSW67aEzUVUKNG8pYBwikydiZxPhrd9Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A small bakery & cafe with a lovely atmosphere. The coffee was great, the people were all very kind and welcoming, and the beautiful ambience made me smile. Loved how they put flowers on the tables and everywhere. It reminded me of a nice cafe I went to in Iran. Would definitely visit again next time I'm in town.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMx-hTuMMC3BLAN7BaeM2nWi-Yb3si_pytHcnOj&fid=0x0:0x86223dd105863b4d"],"When":"2024-9-23"},{"Name":"Mucahit Mert Alagoz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUlZFzlr8OmJ6ReNSeqILjiXkPYOR-Wi6HlJhjaTTE_xGsRl7kohA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I really liked this charming café in the middle of this beautiful city, run by an Iranian and Turkish family. The ambiance inside, the staff's attitude, and the taste of the coffee make it a must-visit place. I highly recommend it to everyone","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOBByfO_qc8HtlloJViWe19jXAD-IVKFh3V5U0H&fid=0x0:0x86223dd105863b4d"],"When":"2024-11-22"},{"Name":"Frank Case","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXxR--52K2B6lUm4wMd_dh-86XAXDvCaL86QQ50GKTz0Aswzp3r=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely unreal. The chocolate croissant was next level amazing. So incredibly flaky without being too dry or oily. The chocolate was slightly warm and incredibly well balanced.

The shop is warm and inviting and feels like a great place for a little alone time with a book or a chat with a friend. It would be an awesome Saturday morning date destination.

Do yourself a favor and check this place out.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM31YK6EejhBLSxo4E4IaTkPmP6ZFVWyg-Poksl&fid=0x0:0x86223dd105863b4d"],"When":"2024-11-30"},{"Name":"Parisa Saat","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWcfz90YaNcxgErbtXLsTt_GU2tK45uq6Xatuhb3NTT8cno0C1p9Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The ambiance here is really nice, and the staff are super welcoming and friendly. I loved how warm they were and enjoyed chatting with them. They have a great selection of Persian sandwiches and pastries. However, the barbari-cheese-cucumber-tomato sandwich was pretty bland without salt; it could be so much better with just a little seasoning. The pistachio roll was good but could use a bit more sweetness. I enjoyed the coffee, but the hot chocolate was disappointing, it tasted like a basic powdered mix, kind of like Tim Hortons.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOAV6DrjKM3aCV0ZR2MyuwfKESOSdc3FIx0rOn_&fid=0x0:0x86223dd105863b4d"],"When":"2024-11-26"}]
