user_reviews: [{"Name":"Rosa MD","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJdQP4sczaFc0tUIRWY3-9n-Ka30Hep9X0NHrOJ8caM7ajUywM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Ordered the vanilla latte, and it was really good. It was overpriced but tasted good. The space has a very good atmosphere, newly renovated. Service was quick and efficient.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO1ch6h0MrlpukbpO9jyPNRUC4kP8Zvvhg6SNli\u0026fid=0x0:0xd44ea91d9f1d0cde"],"When":"2024-12-20"},{"Name":"Melaniia Frolova","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUV6p4hqlKGdTw6dsMNeqJGMDQ1m2S7YSemEHhl4vUCNI2W28byaw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of my favourite coffee places in Vancouver! Staff are super friendly, the coffe is AMAZING 😍 all their drinks are incredible! I especially like the cardamom latter and pumpkin spice. Every cup design is also different!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPE5lUS9wrXo0UeO5-l12m1WUmB3ekeg3hSj7kt\u0026fid=0x0:0xd44ea91d9f1d0cde"],"When":"2024-11-7"},{"Name":"Jasleen Kaur","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWnLqs1j9asRODC3FnReR_gw9W1TRHKwo4zrq8AKJI5luvP7vsC5A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time here and very cute cafe! The caramel macchiato tasted heavenly. Banana bread was good but the chocolate chip cookie was delicious. The baristas were nice and the dine in dishes are cute. The overall vibe was aesthetic. Looking forward to go again :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNuIEdd5JqQsY2TjFrsFYIjhcxtAC4nCi-bzigu\u0026fid=0x0:0xd44ea91d9f1d0cde"],"When":"2024-9-25"},{"Name":"samira","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIwkQGMre8jgbaip4E0o2r4QwZ6hsRUFGFhUhbAr4O--khz6Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Well-decorated, cute little cafe here. I got a medium matcha latte which was unfortunately not very well whisked and a bit cold. The cafe’s washroom was poorly maintained. However, the location is pretty good so I might stop by again-but this time I’ll stick to a coffee to-go.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPjQ8yprMWds_7m1RQoB5QI0C_4eEGSwwcbglGj\u0026fid=0x0:0xd44ea91d9f1d0cde"],"When":"2024-12-13"},{"Name":"Anna","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXKyodebDIWKSzMbGe-WycvfLdzuaHhoZGwmPQrf-nW1OdayOotJg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Always love going to this Artigiano on the weekends, the vibe is great, there's enough space, and the waitress is always super nice to me. The signature rosemary and vanilla latte is really good!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMvNlVXMX9CqpmwWY5SzHfsMjjXh_GD7fL47ieC\u0026fid=0x0:0xd44ea91d9f1d0cde"],"When":"2024-12-2"},{"Name":"Felipe Bautista","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXD8Ocw-BYrQmD4Za-AtjcfdB8pbtfMHowdqj-NOPSE6zWVwSI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Really impressed about the food, I came here after find out that most of Starbu…. Cafes are becoming seating less spots. I brought my 5 yo child with me for breakfast and we ordered a croissant with ham (which was charged extra for the ham) and a chicken baguette which, both of them had great taste and lil bit pricey and a large latte (3 items for $33 bucks. If the place does not have server assistance, no tip. Definitely a place to consider in the next occasions.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN8ML8MKNF_tklfV8s0gJL29y_It_Pb7ki4KVWJ\u0026fid=0x0:0xd44ea91d9f1d0cde"],"When":"2024-5-5"},{"Name":"DIEGO REYES","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXDjqvmACqDELhvBjMoIhFuESH7iAsZarKVI1MwQnwufUVs-hpH=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent coffee! Undoubtedly a nice place to escape for a moment from the movement of the city. Great service and friendly staff.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM5SUo0wFm-mB9yfQ6lT6A_d-LqQS62jFZ6TcDz\u0026fid=0x0:0xd44ea91d9f1d0cde"],"When":"2024-12-11"},{"Name":"Gokul S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU_N2Qu8huocFTVNSfZHOxYQLwEUEbS26APZ3KP8kM5G0h77ic3=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"beautifully designed mural inside this cafe. love the art. and love the coffees and pastries. some of the nicest staff in the planet. gluten free and vegan pastries/baked goods but sadly zero vegan breakfast options. kinda unfortunate but hope that they’ll fix this.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPrz7_5RNsu7o7YZQ2bwc43sJvnRUm8YpjPlK99\u0026fid=0x0:0xd44ea91d9f1d0cde"],"When":"2024-3-17"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"LeWayne Ballard","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUQzNcyGYb6l-ZRwqbwQbIkgYw_7uDCrWhayHblYVZ0Z3oGaWy-Pw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Stopped by on a Saturday morning for a light breakfast and latte while visiting downtown Calgary. Many were ordering their drinks to go, so there were plenty of tables available. There were the usual combination of hot & cold coffees, lattes, and teas.  There's also a menu of small breakfast sandwiches, bakery items, and pastries in a small case.

Ordered a few drinks, breakfast wrap, breakfast sandwich, and a few bakery items.  Service was friendly at the register when ordering.  Grabbed a small table with a view of the downtown street.  Within 5 minutes, my order was ready for pickup at the window.

Drinks were good.  Breakfast wrap and sandwich were hot and freshly made.  Bakery items were good and not overly sweet.  Good place to come for a quick, light breakfast in the downtown area.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNAbC82ugdeI1F-SoUvlt7AR3KjpayVUjvhPGIZ&fid=0x0:0x59dfa59755aa4e13"],"When":"2024-9-19"},{"Name":"Sid D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK6IVUQK9DiimCTFOmQKYegZnzq6tTr8bKj-XuR2f4zPjGLJMUJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Best things first:
1. Spacious coffee house
2. Right opposite waterfront station
3. Beautiful views

The service though prompt could be friendlier. It might also that I went way early in the morning and they are in a rush to setup the place or anything else.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNmFGvleuj9u1HWc82iIufe-Dgs8pyTtIPyTooQ&fid=0x0:0x59dfa59755aa4e13"],"When":"2024-11-27"},{"Name":"Mrs. Leci","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWFUu7tIDGHhiFP61EOIZLCOSzvwJkGN10CXxqa6MRhYpyxpm4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Pastries looks inviting. Tried a few items already and I have to say that their almond croissant is the best! Will come back again soon!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOw0iWoKVaOyhJbi_OusgXqFSqJdU1frzYdBvpI&fid=0x0:0x59dfa59755aa4e13"],"When":"2024-9-19"},{"Name":"S Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLM32VWCYR8647Io_bRUnuo9kUoWJ7r-htZ44Gz6cLsBglLk30=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delighted that I picked this coffee shop to try. It was peaceful, spacious, and bright, the perfect place to enjoy my vanilla latte and almond croissant on an early morning.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNvieZSs0ZWA0usQ1rHKeaPVd_COQH1ZzKoo7Cl&fid=0x0:0x59dfa59755aa4e13"],"When":"2024-11-5"},{"Name":"tikki","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWzV_Y6bQFjodBKC8anq5nBVFmCTC7hA6Nh7xklFQuKGefK40A_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of our favourite coffee shops in Downtown area. The coffee shop is spacious and bright with lots of seatings available as well. The coffee and the pastries were pretty impressive as well so I would recommend to anyone looking for a place to study or chill in DT.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNThO1r2NUiLPBO5uF7E1u1CK8yK3JZ-mLfJ_7V&fid=0x0:0x59dfa59755aa4e13"],"When":"2024-7-27"},{"Name":"Lauren Greaves","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLgwMb3dYWOWoWzH1qlf44621Wa6HcQtDC-RUTV9qZbIyfiqA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Perfect spot for coffee in Downtown Van! Bright, clean, well-lit. Deville Coffee has such a bright and energetic atmosphere. It's a great spot to meet with friends or sit down for a quick bit of work. Their drinks are delicious and the food is wonderful...something that can be hard to find in a coffee shop. And the location is so convenient, especially when meeting with people. 10/10 recommend!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Earl Flormata","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUHEYR5crfzT5mFZF5yY6PmVwTawXCmDPm3U8WVZUqH5mb8rOP9MA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here a little early for a meet and greet so I grabbed da drink and a wrap as suggested by the server. Very filling and tasty on the wrap side. Fantastic caramel latte.

Place was really popular so finding a place to sit was a little on the longer side but well worth it. Great coffee.

For the meeting I ordered a flat white. They nailed that as well. Would come back 100% 💯","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNpE4f770-Luv8MxsV-bBppczHpZVGFkLI4gkXA&fid=0x0:0x59dfa59755aa4e13"],"When":"2024-5-21"},{"Name":"Clay","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWWYbNuHEfUiBqKTEbq_x8mXdYNihzDUVts9ImKt5Y-xkrgi8-q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Great place to people watch and have a coffee. I feel as if I may have gotten a day old croissant tho. It tasted great and had all the proper elements of a good croissant but just wasn’t light and crispy. Still miles ahead of any $tar-bucks baked goods.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOYSP-NkLyRVirxQZxlWdRpbjeSY5qx3Cc4yoUj&fid=0x0:0x59dfa59755aa4e13"],"When":"2024-9-7"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Sara S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIy--5oFW8niPcBxqugUIbJZjdBNRThih92LLLZdAvRn_blI8o=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The atmosphere was really nice and inviting. I ordered the lemon crepe, but unfortunately, it lacked lemon flavor—just a single slice of lemon on top. However, the coffee was strong and satisfying. The smoked salmon crepe was absolutely delicious, and the pear and brie crepe was extraordinary! Prices are very reasonable, making it a great value overall. A good experience with some hits and misses!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMEo55XyDuXm-gcAyJp6ohqr1RZLXiZwVMmO3Fu&fid=0x0:0xc403a71b6e4d5100"],"When":"2024-11-15"},{"Name":"لجين علي عبدالله","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJknstfVQBYVOicM756T8lGplERKL0_UBI-91D2Lx8i3wQBxzk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I love such neighborhood cafes. Such a delightful spots, limited seats unfortunately but very nice to be at. Would love to come back more and enjoy my time there. Very nice to sit and enjoy the rain.

And to top it off, the food was fabulous, that’s the best salted caramel crepe that I have ever tasted. The coffee was spot on. Great service and all necessary ingredients for a good time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP07ALczyU1NYXJaC_ZYsNRs5WbZaArYmy559PY&fid=0x0:0xc403a71b6e4d5100"],"When":"2024-10-23"},{"Name":"Alireza Mahdian","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW0UiNNVRyZjtmU8TuMFZWagjDEpOucA4a-KVpCiuYYILJ-rcBw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Le Marché Café on St. George is a delightful hidden gem, located in a peaceful neighborhood that adds to its cozy, inviting charm. The interior design is very cute and has a vintage feel, making you feel as though you’ve stepped back in time with its antique decor and charming touches.

The coffee here, however, has room for improvement and doesn’t quite match the ambiance. Where Le Marché really excels is in its crepes. The Smoked Salmon and Goat Cheese crepe is outstanding, blending rich flavors that make it a must-try. The Roasted Pear and Brie crepe is also a great choice, offering a unique and delicious pairing. On the other hand, the Lemon Sugar crepe was a bit disappointing and could use a flavor boost.

Despite a few minor shortcomings, Le Marché Café is a lovely spot for a relaxing break, especially for those looking to enjoy a peaceful, vintage atmosphere with some standout crepes.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPmKBUlczYHKIRcSwm4W09AUhHTXEWQLHm_Q7gT&fid=0x0:0xc403a71b6e4d5100"],"When":"2024-11-1"},{"Name":"Annika","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUqr3qX1M50O5ArbNpVdPEKk0UnNz6OS4ZMEleWjA5F9QZUkxRD=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Loved the place. Nice wooden interior. Can get busy around lunch time.

However, the food was not served hot. Crepes were tough to bite and quite mediocre. Maybe if I'm near the area I'll try their croissants or pastries, and give them another shot.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPZCOmSVGKsctnzV9gSaEADyPwcIJ2Ajl_28a9d&fid=0x0:0xc403a71b6e4d5100"],"When":"2024-12-13"},{"Name":"August Sunsets","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXxT9OoEBQ5H3xOLlpqPS6VG2NxwKZzhXfFDR39VKke1PJYfxw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This my second time coming here, all the way from Kits! Their matcha tea is the absolute best! Today I’ve tried the Nutella crape and it tasted delicious! Can’t wait to come back again! It’s tight seating but it’s so worth it! Best atmosphere in town, is beautiful and the silver plates that they use are so elegant! Very well done! I can see why it’s a popular spot, for brunch or to just hang out.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOyaYCcfBBufdviS5XVrTRXMQ7CJESRJE-b2r4x&fid=0x0:0xc403a71b6e4d5100"],"When":"2024-10-28"},{"Name":"Jayanti Hunter","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXyoJdadazExRVSUdtLZfXeiC-vnYqojxLpaMyAxYs5O4jSyuni=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love this cute little neighbourhood cafe. The food is divine and the vibes are so cozy and casual. Also dog friendly seating outside. Even when it’s a little chilly, sitting outside is doable and cozy. I’m obsessed with their croissant sandwiches but their crepes are also good. Highly recommend checking this place out. Inside, there’s a lot of local goods you can buy too.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNtO9nZ74SNat7uqbMK5KghJwJ_YzJMQ8xQcC_z&fid=0x0:0xc403a71b6e4d5100"],"When":"2024-8-20"},{"Name":"Philip Raymond Lim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5EIBAgpBLsauhPMdjXym7mJ4fA8mtryDtWQIJCZfJxYXxupU8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Le Marché St. George has a charming French country vibe that I absolutely love. It’s more than just a coffee shop—they also sell cheese and a variety of organic products, which adds to the unique experience.

This is easily one of my top 5 to-go coffee shops in Vancouver. I’ve been coming here many times, usually early in the morning before heading to work where I reflect to write down my diary. My go-to order is the salted chocolate chip cookie paired with either a mocha or a cortado. If I’m hungry, I just order one of the crepe or quiche variety.

Expect lots of customers, as this place is quite popular, but the free street parking makes it convenient. If you’re looking for a cozy spot with great coffee and atmosphere, this is the place to be.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNDJ1EpiQGmttsh9y72bpKVfIZ61vC-4LHGI3Z1&fid=0x0:0xc403a71b6e4d5100"],"When":"2024-9-9"},{"Name":"Mia Duong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUPAUy0Htbh5FTHA7CrcyalmfPE1fNra4l4o1y3j6EQjpz6Sdhn=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is my second time visiting. The first time we had only drinks but this time I wanted to try their crepes: pear Brie and Turkey greens. The weather was cold and we ordered the lavender match but hot and be sure to tell them you want it more hot as ours was a bit on the tepid side.

It was super hard to find a table as it’s very popular spot so we sat outside.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPTPa0FvKFrLjMNk3L_ntBA7dIvPfKp7A7qqzI2&fid=0x0:0xc403a71b6e4d5100"],"When":"2024-7-30"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Yumyum","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU2Ps7OMRb5Woekeu-WRhO2P9H6MQ739yHSEC9SvN4CQ52rgx4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Worst dessert ever!!!!

I ordered some crape cakes as dessert, since I’m visiting some friends. But the dessert from this place is TERRIBLE! Poor packaging and all the cakes went soggy when we open it.

We bought it around 2:30pm today, kept it in the fridge from 3pm till 8:30pm before we eat.

Overall: There are 16 layers of crapes, unlike other crapes which have around 25 layers. And as you can see from the pictures the crape is very thick, the cream was extremely soggy and the entire paper container went soft!

Matcha Crape Cake: Soggy and the matcha powder on the top all went wet!

Taro Crape Cake: Artificial Taro flavoured as you can imagine

Black Tea Crape Cake: Extremely sweet and you can barely taste any tea flavour.

Chocolate Crape Cake: Taste normal, but it’s soooooo sweet, just like cheap chocolate from dollarama

Will NEVER buy from them, AVOID this cafe!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP7K995gSecVR90xBog6QjB-s91qcUl94GyHzKf&fid=0x0:0x188ccd3216a808db"],"When":"2024-8-8"},{"Name":"Andrea Paola Sarabia Gutierrez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUkAOOhumctOJOzPY5CCny8XpO3krEODw1QvEcb4CpqcVisYB0=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love homemade food :) I am very lucky to have them next door to my work place","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPQo0CneRV_HfEuzbPw5jXqlPgrB9oCSkZFzeNw&fid=0x0:0x188ccd3216a808db"],"When":"2024-12-24"},{"Name":"Keith Ver","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXVdqxLCf1LEt0AU82myo-eUqDcb2LcbdnfhupJTEW0sPAQ-qQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ordered iced desserts and beverage at Honey Cafe via UberEats to beat the heat! We ordered their strawberry and matcha bingsu and their taro and matcha milktea and they were delicious! Will definitely try their other selections soon!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO2BVU2Omgcg6v1fL8sHzk5p9K3_VVAJARELvMQ&fid=0x0:0x188ccd3216a808db"],"When":"2024-7-8"},{"Name":"Suey Chau","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXg2m_OrtSQBWu7TUsPMDlokVELYgLqPB_sDl_tj3ozxjoVEEkV=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently had the pleasure of trying out the adorable and delicious desserts at Honey Cafe, and I must say, it was an absolute treat for both the eyes and the taste buds! From the moment I stepped into this charming cafe, I was enchanted by the cozy atmosphere and the delightful aroma of freshly baked goodies.

The strawberry mousse pig was an absolute masterpiece! Not only was it visually appealing with its cute pig-shaped design, but it also had the perfect balance of sweetness and tartness. The creamy strawberry mousse melted in my mouth, leaving behind a burst of fruity flavors that were simply divine. Each bite was like a little piece of heaven.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNQ486hkTdQlvNN98S5SSlXd5GWRGe4oB0aZroU&fid=0x0:0x188ccd3216a808db"],"When":"2023-5-24"},{"Name":"Suey Chau","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW_4UJdrIyXtwecQFaeqeiGtEv6iT-8sOpcJDZBVp1sDwGu71o=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Honey Cafe is a hidden gem for dessert lovers! I recently tried their chocolate mousse dog and juice, and I was blown away. These desserts are not only adorable but also incredibly delicious. The flavors were perfectly balanced, and each bite was a delightful treat. The staff was friendly, and the presentation was impeccable. Don't miss out on this sweet paradise!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN-3SwEu3nlquh6W7PE1vwdP-UpwqJrc3k9ZNXH&fid=0x0:0x188ccd3216a808db"],"When":"2023-5-24"},{"Name":"Hoang Le","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUA6JZv8oy7kLYHtzcsV_vlG50p6ak9xnr0WvXguFOqp_Bgm85M0A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"It's a tiny little shop ran by a hard working couple. We got bubble tea and original mill crepe cake there but they serve all manners of foods as well. The drinks were good and the cake was very delicious. Service is a little slow but worth the wait.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOosHY-QJ1gCKFHCL1nvgiliMQADosam5HqPYg7&fid=0x0:0x188ccd3216a808db"],"When":"2023-7-17"},{"Name":"suey chau","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIcXpEglBZXgo4fDhDUsX2IBbsM_Xv2vV55m4Mqj-jJF8wrLg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Honey Cafe offers a delightful range of desserts that are both visually charming and incredibly delicious. I had the pleasure of trying their strawberry mousse pig, coconut mousse rabbit, and chocolate mousse dog. Each dessert was a delightful treat, beautifully presented and bursting with flavor. The staff were friendly, and the overall experience was fantastic. Honey Cafe is a hidden gem for dessert lovers. Highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipODYFhGaJW7GVL90blzWU0iT4MnAuZfT0ARyY_D&fid=0x0:0x188ccd3216a808db"],"When":"2023-5-24"},{"Name":"Hue Nguyen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKBkoi9uspbDVpbl_wVLEAp24VK07HRryVEy4wQGPsuwTwpiA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I would really skip on the cup cakes. The mango cup cake was wayyy too sweet, it was not eatable. I love sweets and desserts so that says a lot. On the other hand, I got their salmon roll, tasted average but the salon was pretty good and for the price I can’t complain.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Yomi Strawberry","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLk8BFhtZc-gw2mVyFPFt1_o2FQP5U5WUdlGYEiBk8mE1PkLg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"the place had a cute atmosphere and the prices for bingsu and drinks were really cheap. the place was clean and nicely decorated and the florist shop is really pretty. the space is cozy and a really nice spot to go to with friends! the kpop music played in the background was nice too! will definitely come back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPb1qtJJ1K6WN4fDzIYdsQk4jCGVc_i9mhJWbc_\u0026fid=0x0:0x10dc4175f8851c0f"],"When":"2024-8-14"},{"Name":"Katie Zhang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXlxCPd9sMPs9CNrQLDd6cb3Q7KnrQ2-LMzOCkkU5qWK75ov0GQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"4.5/5! Our family loves bingsu ever since we had it for the first time in Singapore. This doesn’t top the bingsu we’ve had there (or Korea) but is still really solid. You can tell how fresh the ingredients are (especially the mango!), and the texture and taste of the bingsu is pretty spot on, so it’s worth the bit of wait while your order is being made. Our favorite items were the Mango bingsu and Portuguese egg tart (unpictured). Overall, this place is a small but cute store that you shouldn’t overlook! The staff is also extremely friendly :) Go visit if you’re in the area","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM1n5BhmWx6iw4xbm1cNix_eHGE4twzWQOKkDh2\u0026fid=0x0:0x10dc4175f8851c0f"],"When":"2024-8-10"},{"Name":"Juanita Lai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWMHmQD0RZivsJyf6AQSqiMAaM6XtL65UdJjKCwZUUQoU4WnBgq=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My passion fruit green tea with pearls was delicious. Most places are more syrup forward but I could really taste the green tea in my drink which I loved. The pearls had the perfect texture. The owner was so kind to treat us with these tasty HK curry fish balls for a taste test. Definitely recommend!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM4HFvIjizSFtg_VaWfhzlZLHnKT-cPSZi_6K5n\u0026fid=0x0:0x10dc4175f8851c0f"],"When":"2024-8-23"},{"Name":"candace980021","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXjBWk0rurhU5_y2-Mn8ghmPHfI1412UyZ8TBtcFfNHczdJdF5rYw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Jasmine Green Milk Bubble Tea and Classic Milk Tea tasted really good! Must-ordered items that you wouldn’t want to miss! I was told that the bubbles were freshly made every morning and no wonder the bubbles were so chewy! Would definitely try the waffle the next time I go!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO2doMFtonH8RUStGrYVUh9D2GtrZruJPSBmyuG\u0026fid=0x0:0x10dc4175f8851c0f"],"When":"2024-2-8"},{"Name":"Margarita VS","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXZfms50dSNanb2nbX-fo0xRPCHJcX7dSTlfNRH9r3fvbCCd0MWqg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is pretty awesome. Flower shop inside the bbt place. I bought this peace lily for $10, amazing price and beautiful plant. The HK curry fish balls were amazing! The peach slush with crystal ball was yummy and refreshing. Also, a clean and safe place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPN28Ye3FV7njRbp6WeJoU6iofERjHIf4KQV0An\u0026fid=0x0:0x10dc4175f8851c0f"],"When":"2024-8-23"},{"Name":"Robert Schertzer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWOooZkH_GFwUpAxCT2hSqX_1bf1IUH3eislgxhMtYgzIEASWJG-w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Crazy good find! I just enjoyed the Mango Madness shaved ice bowl. What a wonderful coffee shop inside a flower shop.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMlzokr56rHPZUaOdAjK1rlrrvUc0ASqcUl9GfW\u0026fid=0x0:0x10dc4175f8851c0f"],"When":"2024-8-27"},{"Name":"Elva Chu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLVZXJScrAmYiG4hwJvBABaiTgp83n6BzwdwDi6OhXgD7zziA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"employees really look like they love working there, they’re so kind and helpful. the portuguese egg tart stuffed bubble waffle was bussin 10/10 and i also highly recommend the ginger milk tea it was delicious.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNvrhNd13kxClmPVrcZSCggkVoniZlKdn2KeqRG\u0026fid=0x0:0x10dc4175f8851c0f"],"When":"2024-5-2"},{"Name":"Rick DaffyD","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXYSC7JX9Ct5EwMc-AFLaG8GbYxulNAXPVH5B1oCXHpQitYzdRD=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our go-to place for refreshing drinks (means no alcohol 😁) and delicious snacks and desserts. Mmmmacha Mochi! Mmmmango Bingsu! Enjoy some nice flowers while you’re at it. Very friendly! My stamp card is almost full!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPLYCRwmTvHkmMcO4OF2HZpoCDtSvjiqAajy3YS\u0026fid=0x0:0x10dc4175f8851c0f"],"When":"2024-4-19"}]

title: Ben Gong's Tea 本宫的茶
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"highlights","name":"Highlights","options":[{"name":"Great tea selection","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true}]},{"id":"amenities","name":"Amenities","options":[{"name":"Gender-neutral washroom","enabled":true}]},{"id":"crowd","name":"Crowd","options":[{"name":"LGBTQ+ friendly","enabled":true}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"April poy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIIV0qSre45M-AYUnlhk7MwBul2hgW088gtNo1SkxRGPV_LXQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I ordered the Jasmine green milk tea from the 50% off menu.

Original level of sweetness was perfect for me when usually I prefer less sweet.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOzIc7fYuN7k0y5Arm3nJ8b6JsLT76_xeLh_FLq&fid=0x0:0x7369406194ee8b0e"],"When":"2024-11-16"},{"Name":"Dana Lu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWdK6XPqQI-udRLFPivnbcqa1DbxcyscZWWtrvf41qyfwKZqGA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The tea here is fantastic. Not too sweet, flavor is very balanced. They have a 50% off menu that makes it fun to try new flavors. When I was visiting Vancouver I came here once each day and ordered multiple bobas -- they are just that good. If you like tea, the tea jelly is very fragrant and wonderful.

When I came on the weekdays they seemed to only have 1 person running the shop, which meant if there is a queue of orders the service may take a little bit of time. The shop ambiance is nice so I didn't mind waiting a few minutes.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"AJ R","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLo4tIvUrcwNXdNPm8MhPpZgzsQXb-_lGpW8MEceFXJ5buZ1dI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Awesome bbt!! So delicious. It was my first time trying the cheese foam and I love it. Super flavourful and high quality.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPoOXq84TWQHI8cXTqg2ueiNts_KwbEv0VUhWhY&fid=0x0:0x7369406194ee8b0e"],"When":"2024-9-12"},{"Name":"Cameron Reid","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWvS-f-O0MRuLC2BOzMXh4HEsp_g5tfJImUPaBHRf9jM766L6620A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Broad selection of flavors and styles, brown sugar pearl milk tea is really well balanced, the iced fruit teas like the peach oolong are fresh and go down easy on a hot day. A bit pricy, but overall a good option.

I had to write a positive review because I just can’t a fathom how this place could have such a poor rating. Perhaps it’s just because it’s beside Hot Cha Cafe which is one of the top places for bubble tea in the city, and is a family owned and operated business?","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"R D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW7KZBqrUbL5KThGjnJb5XKXvi-GomnOCBeoDhPsE6jpmHpZZi2Tw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’ve been coming here for years and I’m baffled at all the poor reviews. I probably come here 3 times a month and have liked everything I’ve ordered. They have weekly promotions with several drinks offered at 50% off which is a fun way to try out new flavours you’re curious about trying.

I really love bubbletea (I’m on a constant mission to try out all the shops in metro Vancouver)  but more often than not I find that most shops make their drinks way too sweet—I really appreciate that most of the drinks that I’ve ordered at Ben gongs have so much flexibility in choosing how much sugar you want.

I think it’s unfair that some people are giving this place a bad review because they choose to personalize their drinks to have less sugar and then proceed to not like the drink due to the lack of sweetness.

Anyways, it’s my go-to local shop and the staff have always been polite and the service has been great.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN96OHi13yWnnGzVznMO3YlfRMH6PVLkjAsOWlF&fid=0x0:0x7369406194ee8b0e"],"When":"2024-5-16"},{"Name":"Kelly","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV7ZgTTMvehublJriEZdNACLnkg32LznpVyUa1Mj9jQF9k2XMaG=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I ordered a Large Taro Slush with Pearls.

I had to break the top seal to figure out what was going on because whatever I was drinking wouldn't uptake on the straw. I find out that 1/4 - 1/3  of the pearls were frozen and wouldn't even uptake on the straw. It was annoying to drink and make the whole drink cumbersome and not enjoyable.

Did they freeze the pearls from the day before and didn't even reboil them or something?

Also I ordered a slush, not a taro milk tea, I had thought they made my order wrong but  1/4 or 2/5 of it at most was slushy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPfaZRd_yECIdHR567UMsg42gfC_BepHLbCvELZ&fid=0x0:0x7369406194ee8b0e"],"When":"2024-3-17"},{"Name":"adcking guma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIs8NJsmMXMi-A6sMeIrzLDon2rzGnp7g1sPGjRJNUbQv3njw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Bought 2 Caramel Cheese Tea from this location on august 28, the drinks were tasteless and pearls were soggy like they had been in water for days. I bought same drinks from other location tasted phenomenal. The staff was giving me attitude because I came in around 10:20PM (40 minutes before closing) and he said that they're closing in 10 mins? I had to throw away the drinks after 2 sips to make sure my tastebud were normal.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Katie McCallum","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWPoJBZBky1FaxcZ4r3XXzr5DNFSl1o97MU0RXB-OYv0R7xjmoj=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had the mango lemon tea and it was delicious!! Not too sweet, perfect amount of tea flavour and chunks of perfectly ripe mango, so yum!!

Place could use a bit of an overall tidy as it’s a tad cluttered but a nice chill place to sit for a bit with a refreshing drink

Employee was also nice :)","Images":null,"When":""}]

I've had the pleasure of photographing her work a few times and it is immensly difficult to not want to eat the food I am photographing.

Hands down one of the more unique and definitely delicious catering options you can have for your event! You do not want to miss out!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPET1wTIkSmtZEj9FIvgZnmQKsQwU6lyDwggTSl&fid=0x0:0xefb7f2214cbf180"],"When":"2024-2-9"},{"Name":"Lee Theron","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKksZqaIQX8O0tZvvfAUHCQELFoq4DqDxTOsRdHLVal1cXox5L9=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I attended the Valley Women’s Association’s high tea event and I was really impressed. The food and presentation was wonderful!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO1Y8i2YhzBcdAJAxwSg2TkvcfpR2t5M7FFkBoG&fid=0x0:0xefb7f2214cbf180"],"When":"2024-2-4"},{"Name":"Sofia Martinez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKLOSuAgbr9hutfqR6TKXEkacVKyw3NcDrpwXJc33IOQvxqTg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My friends and I recently ordered 4 high tea boxes for a birthday celebration and we are so happy we chose Sattea! The food and tea blends were delicious, with really good portions. We also had gluten free and halal options which were fantastic!
Satbir was also super helpful and prompt to reply  as I had a couple questions. I would 100% recommend Sattea for your celebrations!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Arshdeep Dhillon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ5oVSypDySd9xTzWGjKWPJPjfQAoKPRTRIfBSqaSfdvx_8sw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had Sat cater my sister's bridal shower and it was fantastic. The tea was lovely, the food was delicious and the table wear was beautiful. Sat catered to all our dietary restrictions and was extremely professional. I look forward to using her services again in the future. Thank you Sat!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"I Barn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLlcRHC0g7N1PJ3__Yn3CDPA6BcYsNWA2nPTILQ5oyL4YzaTw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Sat went above and beyond last minute to create a speci birthday high tea for my friend. She was quick to reply to my questions. Despite her busy day, she was able to fit in my request. Would highly recommend her high tea service❤️","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ishu Kler","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLkboOb-OkstDLFOm_U6lZIpeY5lj5sSiNjzdJS4Dd5CaP2cQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely recommend Sattea for their High Tea To Go and event catering options.  I have been able to hire Satbir, and purchase her to go boxes and each and every time - they are absolutely delicious!  The food servings are great, the taste is so good - and I love how they always have different options for different diets out there!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Sophia Martin-Morice","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWW_UF8Y3raEn8mY9-W8P5pB3rMPhJo5FvcDs1tEz3iaxBC61Fa=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great shop with a warm and inviting atmosphere. I have been spending more time trying to source out good quality tea without any added sugar or chemicals and I feel happy here knowing that work has already been done for me. A mix of very classic style teas along with some more modern blends. They have wonderful flavour profiles and a little goes a long way! I love their selection of tea wares as well, it makes for a wonderful experience in the shop. I have also tried their skincare and its simple, natural and effective. Thank you!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jana Szymiczková","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXTLMj_2czu3L2dwR_72oVfkxwgmB5b1ZWxbiY8tNQHG3m_s7rmLw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Great selection of tea. We ended up buying 3kinds of great green tea. However the customer service is not that great. We felt like we are bothering the lady with our questions about the tea  and the experience wasn’t pleasant.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Janice Chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWGU-Hp7Hb4zgIec3-4jZiicsyaZhymXwfJb2t9fYhCFQCWseBWBg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This beautiful tea boutique have everything a tea lover needs. They have a great selection of organic teas, wellness blends and both traditional and contemporary tea wares. I definitely recommend paying them a visit if you are a tea enthusiast or are shopping for one.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNZMDRaIlcqKyrd0NwZNa3l38YGzsEaeyIq38lB\u0026fid=0x0:0xc98e6f6aa4a9f954"],"When":"2018-12-14"},{"Name":"Sachi Lovatt","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJCAz14L9DQi522xCoyG7kbUTYmf8PwuxQ2EG5klo97qdmadvo=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"UPDATE: The store gave me a generous discount and gift in apology for my inconvenience, and I was really satisfied with this. They really made the effort and I appreciate it.\n\nI'm sure this store is lovely, but have to let the public know not to trust the website nor the storefront sign in terms of hours open. I went to the store during business hours, and checked the website before I left to make sure it was open. The site said it was open. When I got there, the sign on the door said it was closed due to weather, but to check the website for up to date hours. Pictures attached for reference. One hand isn't speaking to the other :(","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPxYK2f7A5rhXuQxwOf9XEVDlwnzE0Wpe_GOcbb\u0026fid=0x0:0xc98e6f6aa4a9f954"],"When":"2022-1-6"},{"Name":"Athikom Vorapattanapong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVexVeskjVc5fs1ytRsdiwwwk6gyLMuFeH1dnbx76bEzct0cABHNw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing staff. Very patient, nice, and knowledgeable. Large selection of tea that will probably suit your needs. Again, knowledgeable staff if you got questions just ask.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOPhh50XDSAIqXyd9PtzqroL3FHf9uk1KZcs5js\u0026fid=0x0:0xc98e6f6aa4a9f954"],"When":"2020-7-10"},{"Name":"J S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWmlSFo79mznloj5iN9PsGl-0iiylxkVQK2cuLohn6YKOVFCqk0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I really only buy tea from here, have been doing so for years. Love that it’s locally founded and all organic. Because it’s organic, I was told the lapsang souchong doesn’t leave an acrid back of tongue taste like other brands do. One thing I think would add a lot would be improving the overall in-store experience, ie. if they had staff that were as passionate about, and loved to share info, stories, taste tests, as much as staff at other local tea stores do, rather than just an in-and-out purchasing experience. Would be nice if the smellable samples were self-serve too instead of hidden behind the counter. Because of this, I feel like I don’t fully know their whole line of teas and just keep buying my favourite three types. They were closed at one point near end of day when their Google hours said they were open, so they kindly gave me a little discount for the inconvenience. Thank you for that and for the superb tea! ☺️","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lisa P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocILCnUOVxpW23ZM4jqpQPECa62gwJnPV7El44jFUuhUka75-w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Did my shopping online. Was a little concerned about how long delivery would take. I ordered on a Friday morning, got a email Friday afternoon with a confirmation of shipment. Received my order on Sunday.🙂","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMk_Yd846T59s_Z6BNvLsA3XhEjiKLdmQ78IUKR\u0026fid=0x0:0xc98e6f6aa4a9f954"],"When":"2021-12-13"},{"Name":"Jaynene Inouye","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU_Z7fk2o8xgm5uQx11_A_tMC2-M73WjezpoPvwfNOXnSSffbFQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Staff are always friendly and helpful without being over bearing.  Love that their teas are organic and alot of my favorites are from this place.  Their refillable containers on various sizes are a huge plus as well as you don't have to take a bunch of something you may not like.  I was so excited when this location opened as I used to order online after visiting Victoria stores.  Hands down some of the best quality tea and at reasonable prices.  Join their VIP list and get ideas for tea that you not have thought of!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Dana Sullivan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWQIw-0oOUNgoyniYugTscGkgpKJS8tpx4V0tAajn3ZGkNIfqEk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Little shop for Vietnamese coffee and snacks. Inside feels like it could actually be a snack shop in Vietnam. The crate tables and plastic stools are probably not the most comfortable if you want to stay a while, but it’s a cool look.
Lots of drink choices on the menu. The person working offered to help me pick something but I had just made up my mind. I got a Thai green milktea with egg cream and a fried tofu bowl. The drink was really good, with high quality tea and a rich, not too sweet layer of egg foam. The egg foam was dusted with a little cocoa powder which also added some interest to the flavour. The fried tofu honestly would have been a little underwhelming (not that it was bad, just simple) if not for the delicious peanut sauce, which I could have and would have eaten with a spoon if I had a spoon on me. The tofu was very spongy inside, ideal for holding lots of sauce. This was pretty light, so I wouldn’t recommend if you’re really hungry, but it’s good for a light snack and not expensive.
There was a little bit of wait for the drink and a longer wait for the tofu even though I was the only person in the shop. The person at the register was very nice though. I’m glad I tried this place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNHurwszJXc1Xu6u__d3fMO_SkTGeV7L4P2H9Un&fid=0x0:0x2ebc57e52edd13e7"],"When":"2024-12-4"},{"Name":"Linh Trần","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVqDqEjoRew9yBO14L9ZlqiDAaxH-Ir5pN4poi6-KN3E2H_-b9i4A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Literally my togo place for Vietnamese coffee. They have the best coffee (in every flavors)!
The snacks are good but the portion is a bit small and they don't service in reusable utensil, just take out boxes.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPYW_Bhq-28ruJTqZQR5cCwC62BsVaX3BVMknIe&fid=0x0:0x2ebc57e52edd13e7"],"When":"2024-7-21"},{"Name":"Mimi Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJOePh1zKuAdGyvQMNGmuYBFqerlQK4tpOZFhsyleDQS5NwJw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Tried the popular egg coffee and thai milk tea and I loved both!!! Very milky and a bit sweeter on the side, gotta mix well but I strongly recommend to try the egg coffee!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMfq6oTTXmwfShZWGaB6L3s_FfTEgEgkbiqE-w&fid=0x0:0x2ebc57e52edd13e7"],"When":"2024-10-27"},{"Name":"Ng Ng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLgduCuanm-N_U3R70qNsS2rMSeTqIegCjR3PXhS9n7qjBvLg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"the place is small but ambient and cozy, with decoration that reminds me of Saigon. The cashier was so nice, she recommended me the best seller drink- strawberry matcha cheesecake and let me tell you, it is beyond amazing! Now I go here every weekend for it. I heard the coffee is great too, will be trying this week","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNNLJ-z8S-yihl4sdjcehS0sURhBSqJWUafAlac&fid=0x0:0x2ebc57e52edd13e7"],"When":"2024-5-22"},{"Name":"Stephanie De Leon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUPtSGjsqOZ_EhbXhnwXOaGVL6b_NNivonu1chio9B4-8j5GbnL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I wish the taste of the Vietnamese coffee was stronger. Cute concept of the style of the cafe.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOZP_kRKn0_SMvU7r9RSxcOGYWKhkLr87ft_PkU&fid=0x0:0x2ebc57e52edd13e7"],"When":"2024-11-29"},{"Name":"Mariam Ashraf","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXdm9Z3aKH31BAMEdQch46HgK2OKNKcqEP3WPF-lmoLHMZV7xONvw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Had a delicious hot pandan coffee, served by a lovely cashier/barista. The issues are as mentioned already in some reviews- the drink was a bit too sweet for my taste, the stuck door was jarring when I walked in, and the place looked like a hole-in-the-wall…. But not in a fun way. I wanted to love this cute little coffee shop but it’s the kind of place you come when you’re craving a sweet, unique coffee drink to go. Definitely wouldn’t sit here or bring a friend.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ray Dubs","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWv4pQtKu2wy66jann-Dj8Exe3FIdSioz5JunQZJxz8XSK1GHcjzg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Strolling down Victoria and the name on the awning caught my attention. You don’t see many Vietnamese snack and drink places around the Lower Mainland. Here’s hoping that more will pop up.

I scanned the menu and offerings and one of the first things I noticed was the Egg Coffee. I had only ever seen one other restaurant serve this in Vancouver and the steep price at this other restaurant held me back from trying it. So I was pleasantly surprised to see it priced very reasonably here at Hem377.

For those who haven’t tried it, it’s more of a dessert drink as the egg makes it quite rich and could be called custard-like in taste. This is how I remember it from the cafes in Hanoi.
The version at Hem was served cold and was kind of like a milk shake in taste and texture. I’ll like to see if I can try it hot next time.

Also tried the Butter Corn with small shrimps. The small shrimps are the preserved and dried type so be forewarned if you don’t like those.

Overall a nice first experience and looking forward to trying other menu items next time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOw2ZuI4C_ihzba-lx03lhfhgkpglQuYgzFnM6_&fid=0x0:0x2ebc57e52edd13e7"],"When":"2022-12-6"},{"Name":"Michelle Havvagoodey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLOzetGkb5sfvQ2QqVQLz6HIVsUL94CClajRGhGVUfARW0O_A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"They have non-coffee options here too! After a meal we like stopping by to grab drinks! They have Vietnamese coffee and add a variety of different flavours.

•Thai Milk Tea
•Pandan coffee (the pandan flavour is very tasty)
•Egg coffee (a nice smooth drink from the frothy egg yolk","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMqWUh_jrI6bRacdFx5wSR89lVvMhRwUVARO42y&fid=0x0:0x2ebc57e52edd13e7"],"When":"2024-5-15"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Atheena Lynn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVHcdqtceqgFM62rfczRF05jX4AALmvYQ7wQcKDO3beIwRafEOG=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My absolute favourite spot specifically for a strawberry slush! This might be because this place has been here since I was a little kid and the drink is nostalgic, BUT I’ve gotten friends to try it and they also agree it’s the best strawberry slush they’ve had so maybe I’m not being dramatic and this place actually is that good. The workers are also always so kind whenever I go so that’s a big plus!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOp83OXDZPK8CCUwf4lJ3qugEJpAdMLpYYYOJYv&fid=0x0:0xdf78aa535491cc59"],"When":"2024-9-20"},{"Name":"Angie Yu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU90ropqRseI9nmgWGmde-PsfvI6-S9yrT2M_EGufGZXh0GIjSl=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Convenient location and they've been here since I was kid, although not sure about ownership changes. The roasted oolong is quite nice but definitely go less sugar. Giving them a 5 stars for no auto tip prompt!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNwh63V2MDXceVihnIdyjxDig8kJyXOIZQK_ZBp&fid=0x0:0xdf78aa535491cc59"],"When":"2024-6-11"},{"Name":"Neha Sharma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVOAFVq8Z0ZGxqdcHyQUNR3mUQfrl34aqa6y4TgqK9UdFHM4ko3=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I have bought tea from here several times. Today, i just needed a straw since i accidentally dropped it on another floor. The attendant was not peofessional because she gave me a lame excuse that * they are currently short of straws*. I said okay and left. Deepdown, i felt bad because they should know how to attend customers being professional at the same time.
If you are short of straws just buy enough inventory. Again, i know she lied. I will never return. Anyways, i found a straw from presotea where i was welcomed. Thanks","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMbbe0aCWaUlSR_TBYh8SjZoARcZYzf5rhWVT9p&fid=0x0:0xdf78aa535491cc59"],"When":"2024-8-22"},{"Name":"Teegan Langis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXFHArCy8TRoXEj8W8PrPheFX4EiW2cF2mRsDqsUWefqQ8MKqn5NA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Ordered Thai Milk Tea today with grass jelly... and wasn't happy with the overall taste. The tea part was subpar, but the grass jelly was the downfall... it's like they watered it down and added another cup of water. It's not a great first taste.. little Tea House. It's not worth my money and I mostly won't order anything again... at least for a while....","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOBBo41UhkCQUP7RKXSpqRKywiyNHuI5_hntE0s&fid=0x0:0xdf78aa535491cc59"],"When":"2023-4-14"},{"Name":"Ads","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVwDyuvQtXP_VygmU1rNXhUJ0mc48E4h1QtDkdEfrlXmuS-mYhL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I got the Roasted Matcha Milk Tea which unfortunately was a bit of a disappointment as it was super sweet and clearly a pre-mixed powder rather than actual matcha which by itself, is how it should be as it's super good when done properly! The only recommendation I can make is to combo this with some Coffee Jelly which was pretty yummy itself and the bitterness complimented out the sweet in a nice tastebud-like balance. My partner also got the Jasmine Green Milk Tea with Grass Jelly which was also very weak tasting to be honest.
However, the staff were super friendly and kind, and they offer coconut, almond, Oat and soy milk alternatives which is awesome.
All drinks are one size, not bad value for money.
Support local businesses!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMRaRYwJjsSRQwWJxBMMHtKyIbIcJe8YwsBVROn&fid=0x0:0xdf78aa535491cc59"],"When":"2021-10-1"},{"Name":"May Zhagro","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU9KviWdU_UGm6yjKPv-6aFaljm1EC_ecrxYhnt_LO3duiyBNho=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fast and efficient service on a busy Saturday (whoever was making the drinks made drinks back to back in an orderly manner by whoever ordered the drinks first). There was a line but went by really fast. You can choose sugar and ice level of some of the drinks. I ordered the pearl milk tea and customized with 25% sugar and 50% ice. It was good as the drink was not overly sweet and the pearls were chewy. Would definitely come back again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPVmXS-10orhBJxbRtPMrxg4GGPYrnTfgdONElD&fid=0x0:0xdf78aa535491cc59"],"When":"2023-1-29"},{"Name":"Brian Shaler","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVanm_SU1M6cSuCRW78pg1T2oWnXPERDUCzn8bF70zKPszCwZw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Sigh, I don’t think you can get a good BBT at Metrotown except for the big chains. I was greeted by a lovely young lady, but it took forever to get my tea (there were others waiting and the drinks were coming out slowly one at a time) and the tea had no flavour.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMcRUrp6RmWP71ucF7J710K0jpWeRA8kl3iNwLU&fid=0x0:0xdf78aa535491cc59"],"When":"2024-3-28"},{"Name":"Alx Kingston","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJOX2C0XBFH8eRYBvN3-RcHSs4k1xMll4nwu7plEjKnL9pvXQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good 👍

My friend and I ordered two drinks (mango slush, brown sugar fresh milk) from here. Owner and staff are very friendly and nice to help us . 100% recommend here","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Linh Tran","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUbP3plInkqXVOA2XJc8czoQ80aWBGnT8WS-yMiUPgvNShtt-y90A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It's a nice coffee shop, old & simple place. Everything was right l, from the food quality to the pricing. Service was great, our waitress was nice and we didn't have to wait long for food & drink. I liked my Benny Egg and the omelette that I stole from my husband's plate was yummy too. My matcha latte is a bit plain though.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPu2sFXKljwwhFqA97nqcBSJSbyGznMnr44B7GU&fid=0x0:0x1153fae4043e7907"],"When":"2024-12-11"},{"Name":"Shawn Dang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX-YIiQlPOSReFNeT6qjGb923CSf84D0mfUae_jxylAzg3SJYVIMQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went here for breakfast with my family for Fathers Day. The place wasn’t packed  when we arrived. Steady traffic. Customer service was excellent, service was friendly and checked in frequently. For a small place like this, customer service way better than the bigger chains. The food was decent for the price. The toast was a bit too toasty, eggs Benedict was salty, hollandaise sauce was a bit too runny, but everything else checked out. Lots of parking on the side of the street 👍🏽. Will come back again and try other foods next time.  Nice touch on the complimentary butter tarts on Fathers Day 🙌🏼","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMrnOkp-Tg7nlresL3GLTR-2UcWRRiPPP5eh3dq&fid=0x0:0x1153fae4043e7907"],"When":"2024-6-15"},{"Name":"Edward Cheng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWJ5t1luJWZ0TXirubqGJZ41s6LG2QmSjyD9Fyi7Z2m-eTjmKw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Comfortable little diner serving Canadian fare.  Not the hole-in-the-wall, greasy spoon that, for some reason, I was expecting, but clean and cozy, with walls adorned with photos of, what I assume to be, the proprietor's family...

Service was efficient and friendly, but don't recall that there was any follow-up/check-in after the food was served...a minor detail.

The food (a solid 3.5 but, unfortunately, no half-star ratings, so it's rated as a 3)

My wife ordered a Denver Omelette, which had two kinds of cheese:  aged Cheddar and Jack, together with ham, onion and peppers, served with 2 slices of a nice toasted sourdough bread, and homemade hash browns.  Omelette was not too runny, nor over-cooked, and not heavy-handed with salt...so no complaints.  Wife enjoyed the sourdough toast, which is surprising, as she is rather particular about her sourdough (that being said, she is going through withdrawals, as the bakery, where she religiously used to frequent to get her sourdough bread fix, has, very recently, closed 🥺).   Hash browns, fried with some onions  (green and red) and another fresh herb, rosemary perhaps, brought me back to childhood, as my parents/uncle used to prepare their hash browns in a very similar manner, although, in my humble opinion, it could have done with a bit more time of the griddle, as my preference is to have them more crispy...but, the flavours and taste were on point.

I ordered the Eggs Benedict, 2 poached eggs served on an English muffin, with ham, topped with Hollandaise sauce, and a side of homemade hash browns.  It is one of my go-to, and favourite, breakfast dishes...cannot resist a dish which includes an English muffin, which provides a crispy, buttery base, with a Canadian bacon or ham, to add a salty, savory flavor, with a poached egg, to add a rich, creamy texture, tied together with the tangy, buttery-flavoured, gorgeous yellow hollandaise sauce...the eggs were poached perfectly, the ham was more luncheon meat style, but still tasty, but the unexpected colour of the Hollandaise was surprising...as well as the texture, a bit too runny.   The sauce was also, in my humble opinion, a bit too tangy, but still, overall, an enjoyable dish.  I don't believe I would re-order, though.

Verdict:  This is definitely worth a return visit to try some of the other offerings.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPxWDsxpglrS5nspNdmB8peSjjv1AfIihBXrj2f&fid=0x0:0x1153fae4043e7907"],"When":"2024-8-31"},{"Name":"Jennifer Nickerson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVBprpP7t61hDpnyo0fvCF1wERONJCYje2GJ3Egc9ktHWDcKVE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing little hole in the wall with extremely high quality food!  The fruit bowl is loaded with beautiful delicious berries, we started nibbling long before I remembered to pull out my phone for a photo.  The strawberry cheesecake  French toast was incredible.  It is so light & just melts in your mouth.   The chef stews some of the strawberries into a delicious glaze (yum!) & also adds fresh strawberries so you have the sweetness, sourness, freshness, & richness & depth of flavour.  Amazing.  The best thing I've eaten in Vancouver.  The portion is very generous & I could only eat three-quarters of it.  The hot cocoa is delicious & made fresh, NOT from a packet!!  My husband's bacon & sausage were both delicious & perfectly prepared.  The sausage especially had an amazing texture & paired well with the strawberry on my French toast!  Delicious!!
The staff is friendly, attentive, warm, & welcoming.  This place has heart!  The whole interior is decked out in sweet little heart stickers & there is a wall of family photos that made us feel a bit like we were in someone's home for a great meal & not just at a restaurant.

The WOMEN IN THE KITCHEN (woohoo!) were on point & teaching masterclass in great breakfast.  Thanks so much!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPTRjG4N375gbT6DwkeeyMWueCH5Y0n8qElQ_rW&fid=0x0:0x1153fae4043e7907"],"When":"2024-8-25"},{"Name":"Hannah Lau","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXa63aztS2Gtn_rlCFKvMF8Sp9WIgFVy9cS7GFb18jLdLO1NiTVjQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Food was well seasoned but lacked layers of flavor/depth. I can only describe it as very "homestyle", as in this is probably how these dishes would have turned out if I tried to make them at home. The hollandaise sauce for the benny didn't really taste how hollandaise should. Still was a pleasant experience though. Cozy spot. Friendly service; staff accommodated us as much as possible. Portions were large and filling. Iced latte was delicious and their housemade iced tea pleasantly had the "real tea flavor" component i.e. not made from an instant package or packed full of sugar.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMpaUGQSpSKO91rBUdIA0AY6W5__gTeO1e7H5zn&fid=0x0:0x1153fae4043e7907"],"When":"2024-9-16"},{"Name":"Ginny Dichoso","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW5z1yUdg1QJApYH-30ZnRrx_qRVl4U7zIig7YrwicGCVcRdtXajA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We came in a little past 11am. The place was not busy at all and we’re able to find a spot to sit down. The hostess was quick to accommodate us and take our orders. We didn’t have to wait that long for our orders. The avocado toast was served in decent portions and it was delicious. I would say that pricing was pretty decent. I would recommend this place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOU5xd0jVZQCtAbdYMpwrD4UgDG5B_YNQh57eWR&fid=0x0:0x1153fae4043e7907"],"When":"2024-8-12"},{"Name":"jason wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLAr7OPM3u3i7bBkh0r7Q9kS7_8Gu_88Crv223BgydShD66TQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Awesome food, get lots.. very small space tho, but the service and the food and service make up for it.. so there is sometime a line up out the door.. I recommend this place…","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPLcuaXz5oijvg5rL8A9hh_asv4LnZWXrs4BYx7&fid=0x0:0x1153fae4043e7907"],"When":"2024-9-2"},{"Name":"Grace Simon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbJirtT3WfZvH_9LFK-ZJQcvKxv1_blPp3FpkNQmnLiW3fGgEf=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very delicious food!
Price is standard compared to what is out there.
Great service!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMi-2l8LpY421txIzwcLy-PDK9VcjF1HDdt4NyO&fid=0x0:0x1153fae4043e7907"],"When":"2024-9-28"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Angel Pop (Angel)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU7LXvJTCePfgnAERL3EWfXii0ejddNUJAmBxkhPVsd1fn-QXa-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Such a sweet place! Usually, there is only one person working there and she's really nice and accommodating. If you are going in groups, I would try to call ahead to make it easier for her!

The desserts she made were refreshing and delicious! This is my go-to dessert place!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN7ZGFV8B7FrYpW8j5w6jXcXjprQu8228jARLg2&fid=0x0:0xf49275e768b2bdb8"],"When":"2024-3-4"},{"Name":"Tommy “Powerbuilderwannabe” Xiao","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVfDi4iFU0b7G0chKTplbE5u7vf20zgZVI66nBpazopRw9TLzij=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The tofu pudding with grass jelly and green bean topping was okay in terms of flavour. However, I do wish the green beans can be a little more savoury instead of overwhelming it with sugar. I’m my opinion it is a bit too sweet. Other than this, everything else was decent.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNdKD574Il6DfsrMsSADJIdYWMZh7eCjC96JdOA&fid=0x0:0xf49275e768b2bdb8"],"When":"2024-4-7"},{"Name":"Michael Choe","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUl7n1B025T-Jx1ihX6Z_aVhZ-bOdfbZ5RXWGMHEWqoiRS6QqFY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Not as sweet as I would have liked but still vet good. I got the strawberry honey bread. Strawberries were pretty sour and bread was a little bland. How how they cubed the bread into bite size tho. Overall pretty tasty still.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMAAFqy3OGQiuxwE6BLVMuAvbzztkJUOagPa29H&fid=0x0:0xf49275e768b2bdb8"],"When":"2023-8-7"},{"Name":"Julian Duong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXYzFIL0Dxg2sSqvCnjPC13L3zv_H9Hes2L_S1TvtyvCc78l1Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A great summer treat! Tons of customization options and simple tasting. There are other dessert options like bubble tea, crepe wraps, waffles, and toast. Who doesn't like that?

Would not recommend the plant based pudding because the graham cracker topping tasted artificial. If you removed the topping, the pudding doesn't taste so bad. Other than that, the other items on the menu tastes good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP4SI1iisVSGCTUZl-DQP6WqlEbr0YoLrS4pOw&fid=0x0:0xf49275e768b2bdb8"],"When":"2022-7-13"},{"Name":"Elsa Chung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVgBtFYCkWTkjtefII4egxADlhVRhaG7pRnzQoESC-LbjFzCviaGA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The hubs and I got some coupons online for 8 toppings, so after the movies we decided to have our "night cap" here.

Decor & atmosphere: very simple and small place for a quick dessert.

Kitchen service: Ordered at 10:31pm. Our ice came out at 10:36pm.

Taste, portion, price: We were given a bottle of condensed milk so we can pour the sweetness to our hearts content. The bowl of ice was large, the toppings are ok, but 4 lychee per topping order seemed a bit little...it is pretty simple dish - ice cream is extra.

Overall this place is ok. May or may not come back again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPXSsuUkmMv-r0CGFVyahIAqrYTS1Rq1A5F47iA&fid=0x0:0xf49275e768b2bdb8"],"When":"2017-9-30"},{"Name":"S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJFi8NUjGIjAKGAmU4BvQNO7lvH7EJ0udfkQsxzZ-7f2FSyPQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Ordered the wrong location on uber. Tofu pudding here isn’t smooth at all, worst I’ve ever tasted. Comparing to the icy bar on Boundary Rd we usually order, this location gives way less durian on durian sago dessert, also missing the chia seeds and rainbow jelly. Even for the same type of dessert, the portion is different. The mango sago dessert is full but so bland. Do not recommend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPz-OzmeW4mZPzIhf5t07ShFTqak_a_pPUZqVTq&fid=0x0:0xf49275e768b2bdb8"],"When":"2022-10-28"},{"Name":"Rachel Lin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVuqZ5E7p_-VJ7XzTg735zVggGR-gRvejAWH5JDhWT1VOgnakaV=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the bigger Icy Bars with more seating, so if you have a big group it's a better choice than Granville. I typically always get their snowy ice with two toppings, it's a great spot for an evening sweet snack.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOIY3iNAVP-ere3ie3Rm3mXy68-CJxrCEC0omv-&fid=0x0:0xf49275e768b2bdb8"],"When":"2023-11-12"},{"Name":"Pa Minnie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU0Lct4vvYrlhfVr6MMkAb8GgcM3aia8pkM5AsfIymtIZGvb3Kc=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We were very excited to finally try the mango crepe from Icy Bar Knight St branch but we were very disappointed. Firstly, as soon as we entered the restaurant, there was an overwhelming stench of cigarette mixed with what smelled like a blend of 2 or 3 perfumes. Secondly, the taste of the mango crepe we ordered were horrible. The crepe was dry. It was overfilled with whipping cream and that’s all you could taste. The mango portions were almost non existent. As you can see in the photo we provided, there is just 1 chunk of an almost ripe mango placed in the middle of the crepe. It is so disappointing for we paid almost $50 for 5 orders and this is what we got. If I were you, I will just save my money and spend it somewhere else. Thanks.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPYs9st6RBoSTH666smtSxIbOyOqnC4OIuUAHYi&fid=0x0:0xf49275e768b2bdb8"],"When":"2022-1-22"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Kelvin Fong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWYlOJ0ZWKycRqx5ZOzHhnjusnD1vSd-Gno_8IQ4mNi6hmtCYtiSA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Mishmish is a great shop! The bagels were chewy, flavorful, and satisfying. What really stood out was the spicy honey labneh. It was the kind of dip that makes you want to order extra just to keep enjoying it. I also tried their baklava-topped iced coffee, which was a delightful and indulgent treat sweet, and unique.  However the coffee itself could have been better. A light fruity roast would have complimented the rosewater baklava much better. Definitely a spot I’ll return to try the other dips and maybe a different drink.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPmvCeVr4CawpTxOaY3rp6y7-Wk_5yeZ-AF942U&fid=0x0:0xdaf25ff807c608fe"],"When":"2024-12-3"},{"Name":"Derek Shek","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWP9Pjija1abf8rOsOgAPBkesWOZ8sALAjyQJKt0I-DTaykDkHV=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Visited Mishmish today after being tempted by glowing reviews on Instagram, particularly for their bagels. The coffee—both latte and iced Americano—was average, but the bagels truly stole the show.

Served heated, they offered a delightful texture with just the right amount of crispiness on top. I was so impressed that I grabbed two more to go!

The cafe itself boasts a spacious and welcoming atmosphere with friendly staff, making it a perfect spot to unwind and savor a moody morning.

Highly recommended for bagel lovers and those looking for a cozy cafe experience!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOsdk4tZdKTIkEwMM0Tg2GA4Jy6DGOjKRlLR5st&fid=0x0:0xdaf25ff807c608fe"],"When":"2024-11-26"},{"Name":"Yusra A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJLzuTnO_E8_kERFTpMtxChx5W2QExE5lp7YgYM_ahAD4mV5Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love this place and the name, مشمش is so cute! I love the middle eastern flavours. High quality food and service. Ambiance is great and the owner Leah is really sweet. My favourite item on the menu is the egg sandwich. As well as any drink with cardamom:). Great addition to this neighbourhood and much needed. Only sad part is I won’t be living here much longer to enjoy all the new additions to the menu!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOD-Yrwqg-vJZ2wmjCxABpg5G9ByyRpTe2S1hvX&fid=0x0:0xdaf25ff807c608fe"],"When":"2024-8-2"},{"Name":"Joce Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUGrFjNBgSTeUkB5TUuTFijs7_U6G7FKJaRg-dNPU8w7lk_6hJf=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My mom was eager to try this place. Fusion Mexican and Arabic concept of baked goods and coffee shop. Clean and eclectic space. Front staff was super nice and patient.  Additionally got to meet one of the owners and she was super kind. I had ordered the Salted Caramel Latte with Oat Milk. Not too sweet, just the right amount and temperature was perfect. My mom and grams ordered the regular latte. Next up we ordered a variety of savoury dine in items and pastries to go. Everything came in a timely matter. We ordered for savoury: Egg Sandwich (on a ka'ak bagel), Fattouch Salad (my favourite- not too sour from the pomegranate dressing and sumac), Salmon board (harissa hot honey labneh was delicious), and fluffy pita on the side with herb and garlic labneh. Fluffy pita was light and paired nicely with everything we ate. We got a variety of sweets to enjoy at home with some tea. The coconut cake is my absolute favourite, not too sweet  and super moist.Twiced baked concha, halva corn flake cookie, Osmalieh (Crunchy layers of kataifi with a milky filling and finished with pistachio. Floral syrup comes on the side), and Mishmish Bar (Frangipane, apricots & a cinnamon cardamom streusel - my grams fave). Definitely will be back to try the other items on the menu!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOLhv08oLtp_cpv0lEjE6XC1tOWLELODygKHGzX&fid=0x0:0xdaf25ff807c608fe"],"When":"2024-11-9"},{"Name":"Minji Co","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW0cW7yUIGQwxewtq2t91XH-PweiJmGMnXmQUWs9lKXUa5ZbKC6vQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a treat! Love their platters and I haven’t gone through all the pastries yet.

Parking available on the street.

Service is fast, friendly, efficient.

This is my 2nd visit and I would come back to try the other pastries.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOZwfw5dbsPNU-JqYpPFXGQlEqUG7rwSLtoEPVM&fid=0x0:0xdaf25ff807c608fe"],"When":"2024-12-21"},{"Name":"tikki","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWzV_Y6bQFjodBKC8anq5nBVFmCTC7hA6Nh7xklFQuKGefK40A_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of my favourite new bakeries in town! The shop is so spacious and pretty just like an urban garden, and the food was very good as well! I tried the salmon bagel plate and the taste was just perfect. Cannot wait to come back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPZd9iaES8vTWvUex_7iC1OGm-R7P5uUQUQl4hm&fid=0x0:0xdaf25ff807c608fe"],"When":"2024-7-16"},{"Name":"Tess Dingman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVX4ImtG79ss3DSfBgaXz7HdB_sAKcfMcYkrLMz1yg1k5bOQuMI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Met a friend here for brunch, and had a great first visit! I tried the ka’ak bagels which were light & fluffy and covered in sesame. I ordered the egg plate and added halloumi and it was very filling! My flat white was also very tasty. The space is not large, but the ceilings are very high and there is a lot of light so it doesn’t feel cramped - there was even space for my friend to store her stroller out of the way! I will definitely be coming back to try more of the pastries 😋","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNJDiXdgOO6bYPQvqbBGinwaSgXuEVpGGCk2prY&fid=0x0:0xdaf25ff807c608fe"],"When":"2024-8-28"},{"Name":"Albert Chiang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU33lkY0SdfwqbUon0sZqRsbU4rHylM6twaggOeiF9CjMxSxx0K=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best bagel brunch in Vancouver. Extensive menu but essentially, choose either a bagel sandwich or a deconstructed board with bagel. Bagels are crunchy on the outside, soft on the inside. Sides are perfectly seasoned.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPTzpAQgtYusGBPsqlaohn8i0oLSTwnuf5-D82a&fid=0x0:0xdaf25ff807c608fe"],"When":"2024-11-3"}]
