user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Alan Zheng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL-QmMYfw75kgf5vonVt_7RAAdUJRl5hAF6Ijht6iC6ZE8aPQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had this brand of desserts in the USA and really enjoyed it. The offerings here is a large variety. For my visit I ordered the Halo Halo and the Avocado Smoothie

My family enjoyed the smoothie and the Halo Halo was also good. I unfortunately did not get to enjoy it fresh as it melted quite a bit by the time I got home :(

Staff was friendly and the space was clean. Not a great deal of seating but there is some patio seating outside.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOGC6oasOZhFXmsrY3ouQMiRyJdHLE9xqNLMWBw&fid=0x0:0x61c987a38a323356"],"When":"2024-7-6"},{"Name":"Fiona Bratvold","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVkKVshxGxVMEEGCFFS3gcEVu3bxn4uRZ1N7p-__IzVtiTHsl7bdw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We ordered the Pandan waffle which was very good. They have lots of different drinks in various flavors and jellies. Good for take out only. Limited bench seating.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNDIGEM9Udqkm28gTDgCKpkuxt17GMnVd-ZF3b3&fid=0x0:0x61c987a38a323356"],"When":"2024-8-19"},{"Name":"Hye","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjULQQSi1mhNFty7n8ZPesKkMpD31jiIGazltx_wRmE-swaOwr4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I like that I got to choose the sweetness level for this dessert. I chose No.3 with zero sugar, but I could still taste the right amount of sweetness for me. As someone who enjoys beans in desserts, I really enjoyed it, and it was so filling. It was much more filling than bubble tea, almost like having another meal haha","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO-Mn5kzwEvW3HGTZQZf2GIQZLgv1E5cxtj1dE&fid=0x0:0x61c987a38a323356"],"When":"2024-7-8"},{"Name":"Khay Cazenas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKdAMDU9o3gb9CVYGSXh5U5_21vaEbsLuB18TiepeOOxs1MDQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fave Vietnamese Chè place in Vancouver! Their desserts and drinks are absolutely something you will crave. Can't believe I haven't written a google review for them and we have been coming here since maybe 2017?! We got our friends and family addicted too! Fave drinks are  #10 Bambu Favourite, #5 Smashed Avocado (add Durian if you love Durian), Fruit Addict, Mango Dazzle, and Mangonada..ohh and their waffles! Don't even get me started. My list can go on but just go if you haven't!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM37-Tsl4-tlLagMpSf2Ak683_zXQ08W5opLmxN&fid=0x0:0x61c987a38a323356"],"When":"2024-7-17"},{"Name":"Joanna Wang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXVKywkcSQSTgK9g7RgoZY0axGSK_FaSWEp99fbQnc0Tq28WlTy=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"🫸🏻Durian Smoothie: asked for no sugar since I thought durian would be sweet enough. Sadly, it was p watery, not much durian taste.
🫸🏻Customized coconut water: no sugar with palm seed, taro paste, pandan jelly, grass jelly, red tapioca for my toppings. They seemed to forget about my pandan jelly tho 😕 even with no sugar in my drink, the toppings were too sweet for my liking… There was probably some issue with my order at their end and they called me to ask for my order details and I rly appreciated it.
👍🏻Pandan waffles: this is my second time trying pandan flavored dessert and imo they have the similar taste of coconut (maybe all pandan desserts are made with coconut milk?), unlike the typical waffles, it had a more chewy texture, and I enjoyed the strong aroma of butter as well!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMuTRfrKlPo0B7mt_76jYBgPCJXeMKqfkK1qadb&fid=0x0:0x61c987a38a323356"],"When":"2024-2-18"},{"Name":"Colin Tam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXITA3AdwFBJyK_NpP-1M291T__QpC1fohjxeA8bZ_qDzFaX5r8iA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"They've got a lot of amazing options here so it was hard to pick but I got the chocolate banana smoothie and the pandan waffle. The smoothie was the perfect amount of sweetness for me while not being overly heavy and the pandan waffle was a real standout with how crispy and chewy it was. The service was friendly, everything's reasonably priced, and it all tasted fresh and delicious — what's not to love? Will definitely have to come back soon to get another waffle and try out some other drinks.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOCwF724PAJ8jfYPmLFfZxjEu6RLUsZoWLc2N2r&fid=0x0:0x61c987a38a323356"],"When":"2023-9-19"},{"Name":"YeeTak","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI1dcnuIwl-rctrnLYSsRsm466V0PHuEyQS-qpP2kVMbJO8Dw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great drink options (including dairy-free ones) here although I find their drinks tend to be a bit on the sweeter side. Make sure you ask for less sugar if you don’t like it too sweet. Otherwise, it’s a cute little place with an Instagram-worthy back drop and two swings. The Vietnamese coffee is the best I’ve had so far in the city.

Update: they’ve changed their Vietnamese coffee beans and are working on perfecting the new recipe.

I love their pandan waffle. It’s the best I’ve had - crunchy on the outside and chewy on the inside. This is best enjoyed fresh from the store… or if you must wait or get it delivered, make sure you use the oven or air fryer before indulging.

And Annie is the best. She is warm, thoughtful, and super accommodating. I also find that the quality of their food and drink are quite consistent here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM7mFmpPjxA_jS3EGXfAX6cKkIrQ7FlWBtz5vnH&fid=0x0:0x61c987a38a323356"],"When":"2022-3-27"},{"Name":"Miss A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVhdpd3ejdp83C0oxMMoMw_7lDxzdlekwIWzXICA15sokV5arw5=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’m beyond impressed by the selection of drinks and add ons! All I can say is pure happiness and I’m so happy I found Bambu as I’m forever a lifelong client ! The drinks are out of this world in flavour and fun! Can’t go wrong with Bambu love you guys thanks !! 10/10**********","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPn9gIueZOzYfnczHysq4vt7B3qw17hDkRU292_&fid=0x0:0x61c987a38a323356"],"When":"2024-2-13"}]

[{"Name":"Mrs. Leci","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWFUu7tIDGHhiFP61EOIZLCOSzvwJkGN10CXxqa6MRhYpyxpm4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A very homey cafe. I love their shepherd's pie so much, I order it everytime I visit. The staff are very nice too!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNHXb9UPL_xua6s3RdaR_8ZvVy0E3vqKhTPoB5q&fid=0x0:0x5019124266f03ba4"],"When":"2024-10-16"},{"Name":"Breanna Martin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJt-mayqlKO4RyXNPGbJeQcpUlBd68apQ4FIkRuGDR4-vcajw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My favourite local place. The staff is amazing and always so so friendly. They have the best iced lattes. I became a bit of a snob after being spoiled with coffee in Italy and this place makes a good latte close to home. Their croissants are very good and I love the breakfast burritos. They are big enough for two meals. Definitely check this place out!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Cheyenne Jankola","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVpjpMq-kifp2Ixhqfy1Hq6ajmVeJ-jafHDojADg63baQMovHJy=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious coffee and baked goods, plus gluten free options! 😋","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMEkn5AYDdWj8EIaEyxiqQFwPbVJmSPjYyf__ep&fid=0x0:0x5019124266f03ba4"],"When":"2024-7-23"},{"Name":"Nathaniel A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVddlkc6_JAM9Mxfa7ITvnDm71mgYYj3wm0vJvBz9KFoTc9DPugAQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Drove from America and I was recommended to stop by the Commercial Street Cafe.

The cookie was light and delicious. The hot chocolate was really good and smooth. The sausage rolls were pretty nice as well.

The staff had a contagious smile and vibe. I felt welcomed.

Would visit again soon.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sidney Gill","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocICv3DjMWYPHTeheaLd9g--72iH0mXL-V2sDYBEGCnekyxPvA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love this spot. The staff are so wonderful and they’re always so nice to my dog when we sit outside. The food and coffee are great. Every neighborhood needs a place like this!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lindsey Ross","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWJXCnO5e14OGwdVCviVmyzDhLPrXB4A4d1jqbubY72XcC9hCGe=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Sweet little cafe with nice options for food and drinks.

The staff was quick and friendly, and the atmosphere was nice.

Our drinks were good. My meal was a little different than I anticipated from the description and it was the only fault for me. Likely better to give too much info than too little.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM-sc7ep4Tgo_xBAv3bm0PEjJVJiNCObLysnTKL&fid=0x0:0x5019124266f03ba4"],"When":"2019-9-23"},{"Name":"Katie Piper","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVKB6y_w2hHi9Xwux0TvYg9d-x2TakUTsB2Cv3cJ3QchBbMiGri=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A stellar location for a cute coffee shop. Delicious treats, delightful staff and quick service. The cafe currently has plenty of outside seating. This is a go to spot if you’re in the area!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP8H44ckTdOs5HV_8kAlXW9P-qcytqGXWGkb8s8&fid=0x0:0x5019124266f03ba4"],"When":"2021-5-8"},{"Name":"Madison B (Roxy)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVs0U11ls10cP04vWN6vGMvOF6ObFdZaN9ijSknRtXo2w3djelISQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Out of the 3 cafes on this block this one is the best. Best food,  best prices, best staff!

Whenever I go in now my favourite sandwhich, chicken chiabata, is always out of stock. Please make more as its obviously popular!
I went for a wrap instead and it was very disappointing. No flavour, soggy wrap. 😞","Images":null,"When":""}]

Never come back again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Dannon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXO32EU6KlBIyiUH-QX931QJOnGctmWuc248f60VWqVSJ2waEy7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What an amazing find!!! Home of some unique AAAAAND socially positive and responsible products. Owner and staff are super knowledgeable and friendly. If you are ever at a loss for what to buy as a gift with a story behind it .... it’s right here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMG4bS5aPaeiCnxhWrzJi1FFxOYjxxzL7cxRSjN\u0026fid=0x0:0x81f9fccf03f27714"],"When":"2019-11-23"},{"Name":"Chris J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXVCS_l2tEBg0UwqR18Bwu1Bs9SuGuJkZ8vAy0IMHtf5Cf48p-ETQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wonderful, eclectic, well-organized shop of handmade, unique items: kitchen, home, baby, soaps (like Lush but better), jewellery (really, really nice), and wood frame sunglasses. It also has bulk organic cleaning solutions, like laundry and dish soap, counter cleaner, hand and body soap, etc. Customer service was top notch. BEST PART: there is a little table and chair set with toys, puzzles, etc. for occupy your little ones while you shop! It says perfect for my toddlers. Highly recommend, I will come back, great shop for gift shopping! Free Parking.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPLp5w0anV_BkiXTq30fo-88y_gnCxZp4kRLB8Z\u0026fid=0x0:0x81f9fccf03f27714"],"When":"2018-5-13"},{"Name":"Lucia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKsjcm73r252Evf4w0S7xsMZ6DhSevJ_nBEeOhGswmHg37QRLU0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is a hidden gem that I absolutely adore. Owner is very knowledgable about every product that is in the store including the creators, its origins, materials used, etc. You will find quality products that are unique and long lasting.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNAtppDqcAY1kkDU44nIw-fx7fUJm5R3qMffVLC\u0026fid=0x0:0x81f9fccf03f27714"],"When":"2019-10-1"},{"Name":"Kerry Williams","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUzDJzzNwXYGYUFFqMdJrdl4OmXHTm_sMlwRTbuabmwMGn8sWb2=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great to see that this store is entirely focused on eco-friendly, organic products for the home. We need more socially responsible companies stores like this in the community -  Amazing selections - and Highly recommend!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Cordelia Donovan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWJ798ymNJheP2QMCCLJYz9UhPOWqVPBInVnfc6HKdVfkofsOdB1g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I'm so happy I found this place! I needed to find gifts for my teachers at the school I manage, I found everything I needed here! I was able to find affordable gifts for 26 teachers, and the lady who was working (Sevda) was incredibly knowledgeable and helpful while I emptied a few of their shelves for my massive shopping trip. I'm so happy I was able to spend my budget on local items, and I will definitely be back to do my own gift shopping. Thank you for running such a beautiful and well stocked store, highly recommend this place to anyone looking to buy local!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tiana Geukdjian","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUJO61in4eYRaVh_7xIqoJ8UHW4rsXVbVHpLonHBsTEgIDZnLz5=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Such a cute little store! Popped in here today and had such a lovely chat with the owner. They stock everything you need for sustainable home care, as well as some truly stunning blankets and Turkish towels. What a gem. 👌💎","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Rebecca L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXhGjy80CTfRvhVu68W48jKztX73xZkk29Zgnse6nPEawcoaawB=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great shopping experience. This was my first time visiting a refill store and the staff was so friendly when advising me on the available products. Will be back soon!\n\nAlso got an little housewarming gift that was made local and packaged with adorable gift wrap","Images":null,"When":""}]

Nice coffee shop on the corner of Kingsway and Knight. Good amount of seating. I like sitting by the window!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNngswecbeR6VVBOl3WWdEXdowroIGcIzCWkOlY\u0026fid=0x0:0x8130188c3dab740e"],"When":"2024-10-25"},{"Name":"Kevin Quach","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUfNa1SPYL40FQHs1DyCOwnvgu9UHvh2p9qe_2cbWiuLC4Q-RDjIQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great coffee with very friendly staff! If you become a regular, they'll definitely rememeber you. Doesn't get too loud so it's a good place to get a bit of work done on the laptop.\n\nLatte art is some of the best I've seen.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNzu2SqkbjIyNPY2Hr5U35nj0vGsxH8lAd_KhMY\u0026fid=0x0:0x8130188c3dab740e"],"When":"2024-6-13"},{"Name":"Kind Kafferep","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVXVMH9eZcFNtMSPxWqq4tXJXNHY91RnVb0IVwa1gusN2VjEi4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very nice café. Lots of coffees and pastries to chose from. Good seating wih a patio out back as well. We asked for opinions when buying a coffee blend and the employees were very insightful into what type of brew to choose. I really enjoyed my katte and found the roast to be smooth. Good café choice.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMAHy6BBkGafx0W2Hu0Qs8_NbFG7zKxiRWjDPWs\u0026fid=0x0:0x8130188c3dab740e"],"When":"2023-10-5"},{"Name":"Danilo Teodoro","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU_rV4_xok36vIezJ6uAhpzSfyECA8ogmjA4ehyXVTr4dBqIAFv=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Finally a decent espresso! Tasty, not bad aftertaste, sweet. They used a coffee variety from Ethiopia, which is usually a good option. The cappuccino and Chai latte were very good at well!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOS5_BEUb5E6Y5x_op21c6tvxi2bTFJQEcqalRg\u0026fid=0x0:0x8130188c3dab740e"],"When":"2023-9-10"},{"Name":"Kevin Prahauser","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXOBE92XHTAiZRM2JPklEOu2qGFriYzTPpPh8VcjIa61CpVGM2x=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Busy on the weekends, but this place is great. The food is FRESH and the eggs are perfect. The coffee is premium and delicious. If you’re looking for a new local caffe or a niche brunch spot, I highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMFVaFC8pYu2IUExCsSR1J_x6sehbrfgoHN_-_b\u0026fid=0x0:0x8130188c3dab740e"],"When":"2023-10-28"},{"Name":"Kyle Supapo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUP_tY-liiYEjzgL68qKDpGVb6V3nrqE41q3hHVncn3Qf0g6xS_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"cute little corner café. one of the better latte i tried in vanc.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPICLGXItIa5aa1xdaDX9bTVqaBh-_h2l5BDrPU\u0026fid=0x0:0x8130188c3dab740e"],"When":"2024-11-11"},{"Name":"Mack Benz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU3-a22DBVAppk_FXSQQwPiPXPQi0d3PCNvsjkyH7gemYeuxoDC=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Kind, considerate and easy-going staff. Not cheap but the clean aesthetic, above average quality coffee and food (for a cafe) and professionalism help justify it. Not somewhere I can afford to frequent, but definitely makes great espresso and EASILY the best breakfast sandwich in the Knight/Kingsway/Fraser neighbourhood.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMG9K26IYQE5EdDcgpp32R-WXvQ6pPA5Y2GuXRL\u0026fid=0x0:0x8130188c3dab740e"],"When":"2022-3-23"},{"Name":"Stacy Bohun","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX7qzTk0Z_bh312ltTEPQYsTQ_AchFTo1bVXqCNkOxE5OXtj0I=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Kind customer service, love the staff and the atmosphere will surely be back again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNl7xSP-emvWpwPH4mOpk2SrZbuLVqnjkE165U\u0026fid=0x0:0x8130188c3dab740e"],"When":"2024-11-2"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Gurv","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXhwceJhFcjYo11eH0UjktVpbt4vgW7SS5aHechrSipNjogSGM7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Popped into this Prado location earlier this week and found the staff to be really friendly. Lots of seating, but not the most comfortable. Pretty good coffee, but a delicious carrot cake (sorry folks who are allergic to pecans). I would pop in again for the cake.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPs0D5u9QLYmbzF-U8fwe_bjxTAbYiK_9wonZTp&fid=0x0:0x7bb3d3527935a135"],"When":"2024-11-20"},{"Name":"Fuzzy Nemo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWMhjGNDhI-RZYgIiVRXnRDEQCiyyP-dsVjb7EhBkcymNr9MvYi0A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This is one of the better branches.  We had ordered a Mocha and a London Fog.  This was one of the better London Fogs that I have had in the city.   The Mocha was also very good, but was not as outstanding as the London Fog.

Service was also great.  Very friendly and made the drinks in a very timely manner.

This place was full of people with their laptops opened, so it was very difficult to find a decent table to just sit down, enjoy my coffee and catch up.

Parking was also very easy.  Quite a bit of free street parking as well.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMR88sPPt8ZiV-uelWNCh44TedFTOFArkoag70H&fid=0x0:0x7bb3d3527935a135"],"When":"2024-11-16"},{"Name":"Thea","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWXGPmQ086LdOCC9v5CndGuf7ulCMkDn5sAxUGynrPOuwO5usM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Coffee is fine, but DO NOT ORDER FOOD here. It is absolutely shameful for the price.
I ordered a tuna melt and it was microwaved, soggy, scant on the filling and cheese almost non existent served with a side of 2 mirco pickles. Could barely eat it, it was so soggy and molten hot.
My partner ordered a chorizo burrito and it was also microwaved and it was filled with mostly undercooked, flavourless potatoes. For $11-$13 a lunch item I expect to be offered more than pre-made microwaved food with corners cut on ingredients. Yikes.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mr Ait","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVFq4eeJBkpk7Im8SY4OacP-78YpheYHNxGxIfN6_16eohPPhFaxQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Prado Cafe has quickly become my favorite coffee spot in Vancouver! Starting from a humble single location on Commercial Drive, they have impressively grown to seven branches across the city. Each neighborhood cafe exudes a warm and inviting atmosphere, clearly reflecting their dedication to both their craft and their customers.

The coffee is simply outstanding! Whether you choose to skip the line with an online order for contactless pick-up or savor it right there, you can always rely on fresh and delicious brews. Their unwavering commitment to quality is evident in every cup.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Soraya Whitethorn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUr--_MXHtf3OXPud0XQqpkbCmCqNbP8LxLLwmV3xZkNx7GgQw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Prado Cafe is a delightful coffee shop that stands out for its cozy ambiance and exceptional coffee. The cafe's decor, featuring warm, rustic elements, creates an inviting and comfortabe atmosphere. The staff is friendly and knowledgeable, always ready to recommend the perfect blend to match your taste.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPSQHqqkNr7Fbkavo89GDhx5k_ecvhHQwLdje03&fid=0x0:0x7bb3d3527935a135"],"When":"2023-12-27"},{"Name":"Azi Jahan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVoCqSGFWxXVxJxNnyUrYmJjWJKEtREeG-G0RXpmBRv8kbELxEL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I'm not sure if you can really call it a cafe. On a Sunday morning, only 2 staff members were handling everything, which seemed to be quite a heavy workload.

I had the Egg sandwich if you can call it that🫤
The coffee was excellent! 👍🏻

pS, if you need a cutlery set, be aware that they only have plastic ones that break easily, making it difficult to cut bread.

The price and quality of the food didn't match up at all, and overall, I wouldn't recommend it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMh6UkAlX3kXDYhh_4ChyzjK4gMVrXnGV9u_Uos&fid=0x0:0x7bb3d3527935a135"],"When":"2023-4-20"},{"Name":"David Dunnison","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5Xt1WYT8ga5JNkiJafW5ZrcJ4cOz3N3uoG_5YVFDRbjcjvnQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This remains a Vancouver standard.

But, a big but, it is not the leader it once was. In a way, it feels a bit like the slip of Cafe Art - but not as bad.

Everything is good, even very good, but not great. And, with its pedigree, the Vancouver consumer does and should expect great.

I really liked my mocha, and really liked my Earls Grey Scone. Donuts looked very good. In each case, though  I know there are better.

Even the 49th parallel beans are now leaning more to the darker side where the origins led the way to well extracted specialty coffee.

Floors were surprisingly dirty, even for this time of year. Windows could have benefitted from a good clean. Etc.

It doesn't have to be an upside-down Tulip, but this is a standard bearer.

I gave it 5 stars because it is still quite good, but I hope it works on being worthy of ten stars.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMlTXfNuukynW2VEFLpPmAmum1-OjAbVJFPJChC&fid=0x0:0x7bb3d3527935a135"],"When":"2022-11-26"},{"Name":"Kathy Swalotski","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL4gwtjgXU0VtQY3Djwhh4Pdw3x5QkP-vz1M2oMqGoDoi5Jhw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Always receive amazing service in here. There’s a lot of places around here now but this one’s my go to. Really friendly baristas. Love going here every time! Special mentions to Rashad and Matt. They always go above and beyond.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Mary Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKGPL3Zn-s8Rf6FTbY_URmUXwCjrLn5B3R-N7IrjgzNiPd7sQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is the second time we've returned for Gary's mango cake, it never disappoints. It's the best mango cake I've had and recommends it to anyone who seeks authentic ingredients - the mango are ripenng on a tiered shelf. Gary's team makes the mango shine, naturally sweet, complimented by soft spongy cake base. Mangos packed to the rim! We had family visiting from Asia and they agree, this is on par and better.

We were delayed by North Shore traffic on our way for pickup before closing. Gary's staff was sweet in going above and beyond for pickup. They were also on their way for delivering a wedding cake, lucky us and lucky couple!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPrmhEEw2PTiHTrJpYm4y2GlnBJnWf9HPLrMRlt&fid=0x0:0xfecfa9324dd0d371"],"When":"2024-8-18"},{"Name":"James Shu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ-X1zh_92u1cTBADC3dN2MfeBqYQzw8dQmS7J28C0kZ28jdQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great experience with Gary’s. We had previously ordered a mango cake, and it was easy to pick up and came out perfect. Girlfriend really loved the cake and says it’s her favourite cake yet.

It was so good so we decided to buy the ube yam cake for our friends birthday. Again, it was easy to order and pickup was pretty simple. The cake looked perfect and the taste was really good! Next time we might try the durian one.

One of our go to cake stores now.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOz2IL_j24IqMKv-tj8Nkg4RM9BLmfNu8x4LYeP&fid=0x0:0xfecfa9324dd0d371"],"When":"2024-7-1"},{"Name":"R L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXDo--fdptHZ71prIhGQPJ7FahkbWrF05rgkw3OmUDlyk4sGVAj=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The mung bean and pandan cake was delicious! It rivals chestnut filling. The bean filling is a good consistency, not overly dense at all. The piping on top is well done, and I was really impressed that the cream almost entirely did not stick to the plastic around the cake, so the shape was preserved when it was removed. The cake itself is on the dense side, but very moist in a good way. In comparison, Maxim's is much lighter (both are good), while T&T's are too dry (bad).

But I do have some feedback for improvement: the green colouring was incredibly neon, and didn't match the website photos, which leaned more yellow and had a natural-looking shade. The cake itself was even more green than the whipped cream. Also, they did not have any bags that would fit the cake box, nor was the box tied up, so I had to carry it home like that through public transit. I'm really glad it wasn't raining! I still remember a few years ago, before the new location, the cake was too tall for the box and the lid couldn't fully close, but that time we had a car to pickup so it was ok. I'm a little baffled that the packaging situation isn't completely smooth by now. But the cakes are worth it! I need to come back next year for the mango cake, which I keep forgetting :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOiW23UoBZaQpv8Q17DpO-Uo-4vsnxITuSEwatr&fid=0x0:0xfecfa9324dd0d371"],"When":"2024-11-18"},{"Name":"Daniel Sung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ61DoMscspD7FnxbNGw4d3f5Af7KsUdL6bkhk3NlkyiWvRZg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ordered my birthday cake because I saw this store on IG. Apparently, the „best mango cake“ in Vancouver. Compared, to the supermarket version, I prefer this one much more. The mangos were fresh and the cake was nice decorated. Thank you Gary and your team for making this wonderful cake. 🎂 would love to come again","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMeByRLRr-6I79mmabzPvMVqSd45D-LKPvl5rOt&fid=0x0:0xfecfa9324dd0d371"],"When":"2024-8-19"},{"Name":"Doris Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWFpzwh4AE7_YcIgVh0A81OF-ESwUE6I3Qvm8gTnV5a_DrW6qCK=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had the 6" mango cake for mother's Day celebration. Hands down the best mango cake!! Not glazed (super fresh), piles of ripen mango slices and pieces (sweet and satisfying), just enough whipped cream and spongey sponge cakes. Online order was easy as well.

Highly recommended and will definitely order again!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNuDrn3M2CadZEr1ph2LAPoD-f-e2IFzGHT5lNl&fid=0x0:0xfecfa9324dd0d371"],"When":"2024-5-15"},{"Name":"Clarence Chiu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKc3VXdWKeF40csq7s6asSOB_YeWZaTuOw6eAwOtCt9FbEPVA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"They were able to make a fresh mango cake in short notice. It was beautifully made and staff was nice in-store. The only thing I didn't like is that the mangoes were too overripe, to the point where it has lost nearly all of its vibrancy and flavor. This happens when they've been in the fridge too long. I've lived in the Philippines and have had a lot of mangoes. It's likely hard to achieve this quality because the mangoes have to be imported.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Fuzzy Nemo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWMhjGNDhI-RZYgIiVRXnRDEQCiyyP-dsVjb7EhBkcymNr9MvYi0A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"OMG!  OMG!  Have tried the pandan cake in the past and it was delicious.   They are specialized in this fresh mango cake, so I decided to give it a go.  Absolutely blown it out of the water,  it was so good.  Definitely a hit with the kids as well.

Price is a little bit high,  but we'll worth it.  Would want to go back to try other cakes as well.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPVn6Tv7kxlxCPl4j1rsEFCl4mmcO95Vw55bMoh&fid=0x0:0xfecfa9324dd0d371"],"When":"2024-7-8"},{"Name":"Ida Keung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLFtW2KggdWZsLILI2_WbjiVGb64WwGOwMZ4v_jyLV8FT2C0Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I was so happy to be able to order a mango cake for my mom’s birthday (in Feb) which is usually difficult because the mangoes are not in season. The cake was not only beautiful, but it tasted delicious too. It wasn’t too sweet if people are worried about the sweetness! Gary was easy to reach and accommodating when I had requested for a slightly earlier pickup time. I will definitely be back to order more birthday cakes!

I got the 6” mango cake, and I also bought a jar of durian coffee cake and it was really tasty. :P","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOFHuk2zog0Fh6JOvvgwzoB2Aih_y1I1Tj2IpXb&fid=0x0:0xfecfa9324dd0d371"],"When":"2024-2-20"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Melanie E","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUR0bJcxqNkJt-i1wxCH3EaQXevncA86panZszfT__NAs_0KWRp=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We visited their newest location off knight and East 33rd.

We phoned to order two cakes for a special occasion & wanted to give our credit card over the phone but we were told to order online.

Food: 4/5 / it was my first time tasting their cakes. I bake many cakes from scratch and I rated it a 4/5 for the mixed fruit cake. The cake looked impressive but taste was good. I wasn’t wowed. I didn’t try the mango cake. I do like their almond croissant though.

Service: 3/5 - they need to work on their customer service skills

Ambiance: 5/5 - beautiful inside as they recently opened.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN9NMQqYXtV7Bc8vHokkIVDJ7QFxLMOO2pUiTfz&fid=0x0:0xbfe118ef585dcf5"],"When":"2024-9-6"},{"Name":"eddy wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX8Fjpj3y8teHQ4LqbC4PHR8whbU4-XOrTXEwklI9bGRqZLRD20=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’m really happy that this corner has something to pride about, other than a gas station and 7-11.

This location has the lobster rolls. They are delicious. It’s very spacious and has a few tables inside.

If you enjoy Black Forest cakes, you should try theirs. Madly in love haha.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO84A-gYAIEs2vUSlhm_KRnq5_SS47_jH5qdttd&fid=0x0:0xbfe118ef585dcf5"],"When":"2024-4-1"},{"Name":"Mack Benz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU3-a22DBVAppk_FXSQQwPiPXPQi0d3PCNvsjkyH7gemYeuxoDC=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great little bakery... That somehow has the most delicious lobster rolls and meat packed baked goods. Very fair and reasonable prices. Wonderful non meat naked goods, milk teas, and lots of goodies make for a great afternoon snack/lunch and some treats for afterward.

Definitely a spot you need to check out. $16 bucks for a lobster roll that may seem small but the amount of meat is downright stacked for the price. Good quality lobster, perfectly soft bun/roll. Lightly buttered and a hint of orange made the meat stand out and take centre stage, unlike their competitors.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM9vupH8d-GDYky9NFNSmbpN5yvIMgp9Z6ISqQU&fid=0x0:0xbfe118ef585dcf5"],"When":"2023-4-9"},{"Name":"Andrew Chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJNZ_pvkQlgvJLQf8OH0R8SwU4mnsFF1lvTcdlboJ-4DK-Pr7bb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Saint Germain Bakery on East 33rd Avenue in Vancouver is a fantastic bakery. The pastries are delicious and always fresh. The staff is friendly and provides excellent customer service. The bakery has a cozy atmosphere and is always clean. I highly recommend trying their croissants and cakes. Overall, a great bakery that is definitely worth a visit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNgk-y6EM4YecIGTiXCUVAN8OGHmC61k6cxJAco&fid=0x0:0xbfe118ef585dcf5"],"When":"2023-12-25"},{"Name":"Ngoc Thao Le Nguyen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXDOxxJF0M1OKJGLKgV7_qMmCYt9IFuku7Japik8XW6eC19eTo=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I have ordered birthday cake in the evening. I have bad traffic and try to call them i will be late in 10mins. They said “oh okay asap ok” and when we came to pick up the cake they did open the door for me to pick up. The guy in here said it’s closed but i said i know but i have my order already. The man just said with this girl in the picture. And still dont open the door for us. So poor service. Its have 0 star I with take that not even 1 star. Never came back again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOlEo1i2TbGAUbElK_T52GBxIOG0eSQn5qIMRKL&fid=0x0:0xbfe118ef585dcf5"],"When":"2024-9-13"},{"Name":"Herous Yuinn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWvDeJOa3zqyTmARIM0c7e9AHZurgODTGzzNTQvmWoOMl7Iz6I_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It's a cute and reasonably big bakery, always roll by a Saint Germain, but now I've been into one. Definitely a place to check out and buy pastries, both sweet and savoury types. The lobster roll is cute and midling, at best slightly above average, however, still yummy and I'm not the one to make it so I can enjoy it myself.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNcwnGr1mjqVYris-2AA1_SxV68-ceewDxkn5lj&fid=0x0:0xbfe118ef585dcf5"],"When":"2023-4-11"},{"Name":"Leslie Holth","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUPdd81pe-gP6faJCWEx3Qqyfb6dL8IQwAkmHqk4TwcCEziq7jq_A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best Portuguese egg tart (Pastel de nata) outside of Lisbon! BBQ pork bun was also outstanding.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMzbAWe_oeVJyJGwbkeBCie_zcdwjoLhNaZV23w&fid=0x0:0xbfe118ef585dcf5"],"When":"2024-9-25"},{"Name":"Kelvin Fong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWYlOJ0ZWKycRqx5ZOzHhnjusnD1vSd-Gno_8IQ4mNi6hmtCYtiSA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is incredible! I absolutely love their unique selection of baked goods that you won't find at their other locations. The lobster roll was amazing, generously slathered with delicious butter. And the drinks? They were surprisingly refreshing and absolutely scrumptious.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP40eKx8g1qVaw0xCKwhlibvgQ97sp31M0Ql8xV&fid=0x0:0xbfe118ef585dcf5"],"When":"2023-5-19"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Salma Dehaybi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUeBzrAyxy8TsPtlfyLy95iExOCgDCfc_1AtHCrTNKtTVaqFeiV=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had the original matcha with a pumpkin cheesecake croissant. I must say the croissant was huge and insane, and matcha tea was very flavorful and nice on such a cold day. Since I have no photos of my food, I decided to share some snaps from the coffee place!
Highly recommend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOM9a8_Hg1jcTvjO0gjePBTGR5B_TC5etVLaOdI&fid=0x0:0x6eed343327c5a389"],"When":"2024-10-27"},{"Name":"Larry YVR","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXuTv093wbMx-W_HREHfZgp4qwBRPVQElu44Abax3eT7gG680u3=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Good green onion & cheddar scone. Crowded with notebook users. To be honest, they should have a time limit for those that sit there and work. Or charge them $15 an hour over an hour or ban them.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNyARIrLhH_FgOIzhymnpgPei_tP_cxv0Elx6j4&fid=0x0:0x6eed343327c5a389"],"When":"2024-8-6"},{"Name":"Steven Nguyen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXsWaCI_beeMPnsFgb-_hng6jyhVLEhMwQzN5IP1RaraLrP6Mr8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"so lovely coffee shop in town, I wake up early to walk around and enjoy a cappuccino cup. good taste, good smell and happy with service","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOThrc5uN-mblyM6Uu6Q1_eRGuUGs8KGUhu76wL&fid=0x0:0x6eed343327c5a389"],"When":"2024-7-11"},{"Name":"Mariam Ashraf","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXdm9Z3aKH31BAMEdQch46HgK2OKNKcqEP3WPF-lmoLHMZV7xONvw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I really enjoyed the classic breakfast sandwich (for dinner!) and walnut cookie. The best part was the tea and coffee selection- high quality and interesting options. I had the oolong “wu long” tea… a little overpriced but a really nice floral tea so I felt it was worth it. Also there was plenty of comfortable seating so I was able to relax there for a while and enjoyed good wifi and a laid back atmosphere.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPfO6Ov1IUkES40PnU-zik6KI0wkK6i7vTrrU3r&fid=0x0:0x6eed343327c5a389"],"When":"2024-11-7"},{"Name":"Dana Sullivan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWQIw-0oOUNgoyniYugTscGkgpKJS8tpx4V0tAajn3ZGkNIfqEk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very inviting shop (lots of seating and appealing, earthy design) with friendly baristas. I visited once years ago and remember having a delicious lunch. Today I tried the lemon raspberry muffin and an iced horchata latte (seasonal). The muffin was fantastic: fresh, warm and soft. The latte was also good; the horchata syrup definitely evoked the cinnamon-y horchata flavour without being too sweet and the drink was very smooth.
It's great that they're open early every day!
I've also been to the location in Yaletown and had good experiences.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMF1x_buJLeTBUTuT0ksMqmG8HIWERfjkqg5Fhp&fid=0x0:0x6eed343327c5a389"],"When":"2024-5-12"},{"Name":"Luis Hernandez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVxRRHJN89UewIElM4xFad1q-lpDXOkN3C_YBqw68s4jjDWCZYA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is the best coffee shop in the area if you want to feel cozy during those winter months. You can work from here very stable internet. There are some power sockets but they are not always available. The staff is amazing, kind and friendly I come here almost every day 100% recommended.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Natalia S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLTQnXohKz8Fzt5iIAlRc79gUqRPgB2OdJ6GKopvR8pJEOz_A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I was there only one time, and don't plan to come back.
I ordered a latte and a scone. The price for the coffee was the same as at Starbucks, but the taste of what they call a latte was so unlike the overpriced coffee that you could not imagine.
I tried to sugar it to make it less not tasty (you have to go to the far side of the cafe, to the exit to do so: you will have two open jars of stevia and white sugar, and some honey - table spoons for everything, so you will have to stir with a finger (I used a paper straw))).
Coffee was tepid after I received it (the same minute I was called), and after walking for sugar and back to my table it was cold already, and still not tasty. The scone was the same (cold and not tasty)).
I recommend that the staff serve hot coffee and notify the customers about the sugar when they pick up their orders.
Prices are too high for this.
People who work they were nice and friendly. The only thing I liked, alas.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Veronica Zayas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVk1-w2Raq2PcAb5iN95y_5LwlmQ-l2AwWPcR8t9HUeNOqcdoFw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I entered here just to make time and I discover a really cool place.
The hot chocolate was delicious, warm and so pretty.
The bread was freshly baked and crunchy a bit sweet if you’re not used to eating a lot of sugar. But there are other options for you to choose.
The staff is really nice and friendly.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMY86xMzmUvSxB8W1DslyGQSdrvWBq2Jw3S7AkJ&fid=0x0:0x6eed343327c5a389"],"When":"2023-5-25"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Ben K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIkChymkBEqoHC-DSLY-BlpEm3X8tgGaeAvEy7G17xjM-zfjw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Bought a 20oz cold brew this afternoon for under $5, takeout.
The donuts looked pretty fancy, and I’ll have to come back for one next time.
Service was good, quick, no problems.

They have bar seating downstairs with enough room to work on a laptop. Upstairs seating and more isolated into individual pairs or quads of seats, some very dark (almost pitch black like coders’ cubicles). Could be alright to work in, if you needed, but most of the table heights aren’t particularly suited to laptop work.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNI4qmEtB4N21oAzMs9tywfzjWAbycBO8paChkg&fid=0x0:0xf0b2db8921115ce5"],"When":"2024-7-25"},{"Name":"S. Em","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWvU9E4vn1Q9Po0cgEsgrGFBEAIwH-1YuABimdecViWHQsIkbflqg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"JJ bean is great for students needing a coffee and affordable snack.  But they really need to learn to up their pars on the most popular items. It's a campus with  construction crew everywhere and I often find they are out of the best muffins for example. Any other cafe would make more and set it up for times they are busy (lunch hour/4:00) but not this place. Often sold out of the best buy 11:15. Please consider this and upping your pars- esp on the jalapeno cheddar muffin!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Rohini Mettu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXFejkZ-30wz8Qnk6MZsgaXoKAmWI61rSnOugKhzDrxDe076MC43A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Im not local to Vancouver, but this coffeeshop feels like home away from home (Seattle)!! Wonderful atmosphere, I love the upstairs seating area for coffee chats and study time. They have a great selection of pastries as well - as a scone fan I would recommend trying the cheddar and chive scone 10/10. I got a London fog and my friend got a latte here - the coffee bean itself is not my favorite but I loved the tea!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNNUYTZB1LOgf332fOOJr259GPFIis9sTbcIoDG&fid=0x0:0xf0b2db8921115ce5"],"When":"2023-8-21"},{"Name":"Bay Color","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJI1k4Sgd0aWDCqtosK7do8Vp3VfqEkz0STA2XewyBkbsa6hw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I ordered one butter croissant and a medium cup of  cappuccinom. The taste is not bad，but the staff provided a smaller croissant than one that showed in the display cabinet. Because I hurried up to go other place, I forgot to take a picture.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Dana Sullivan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWQIw-0oOUNgoyniYugTscGkgpKJS8tpx4V0tAajn3ZGkNIfqEk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"JJ Bean has a nice selection of food ranging from snacks to full meals, and always delivers on flavour. Delicious jumbo muffins. They have a full range of espresso drinks and their coffee/espresso is nice and smooth. They also do a dreamy London fog. The one drink I wouldn't recommend is the matcha latte - the quality isn't super consistent. Usually it's passable with only a bit of clumping but I've also gotten just frothed almond milk with green clumps floating around. You can get a better matcha latte at any UBC coffee shop and the other drinks here are all worth your money so I would skip the matcha.
Staff is always nice and smiley. The cafe is very clean and there’s two levels with lots of seating inside and out.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPsyO6sCRzWquS6GzgViOyhgOixxNiSPBtapTmn&fid=0x0:0xf0b2db8921115ce5"],"When":"2020-10-15"},{"Name":"Komal _","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVe79YhMUnOs_CFq3VFFDZdsazH62kTyKFLVqsc0aMpMFY3ysgM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Food and service is good; I'd come for that often. But, the seating, however, is very uncomfortable. Upstairs: all chairs, sofas and other sitting surfaces are hard and very right angled at the back -- which is not particularly comfortable to sit and work from. None of the tables are at a good height respective of the seat. The shop should throw in some cushions on the seats to make the space actually cozy and comfortable.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Alexandra Rousseau","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWCc1VRoWPX9lI6oLLlSyZp1wtcpy95ye2Jq395pgPsfvG22Z41=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"JJ Bean serves the BEST chocolate chunk cookies you can find in Vancouver. They’re actually magical - most of the time, they’re so fresh that the chocolate is still melty!

The vibes in the cafe are cozy, and I love finding a comfy study space on the second floor. I’m also a big fan of the gender neutral washrooms: it’s a welcoming space for everyone :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMFjlPNj2axjHSTKksdL9AqkhEsCZXg_I5LH-ga&fid=0x0:0xf0b2db8921115ce5"],"When":"2023-3-15"},{"Name":"Michelle Lam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUrZc4FOCz7AcGuorZE4SGdMyBNzLpAyMERBSqnXndHoxWZ5T_e=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"JJ bean has a lot of stores around BC.  Itusually has a long line with people buying coffee and baked gooods.

What did I get?
⭐️Cold brew
⭐️Chocolate zucchini muffin
⭐️Chocolate croissant

Everything is very fresh. The muffin is gigantic (swipe to see). It’s even larger than my hand!! And it tastes absolutely delicious. The zucchini crunch adds texture and blends really well with the chocolate ( you don’t taste the zucchini). No wonder it’s one of the poplar muffins in the shop.
Chocolate croissant is very fresh and crunchy. It has a decent chocolate filling that we adore.
Cold brew is decent. I like the flavour. I’m down to try other coffee there. I also love that I can use reusable cup there.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNIsurmTJeHjqxBofZQgY141lMiAS23FkE4SsPk&fid=0x0:0xf0b2db8921115ce5"],"When":"2021-12-28"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Nicole Mikala","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU9-sQpCIummTlVei96F9DBEsf2ucCQ0zihjdv8bA_E_BSPeLc=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Can’t say enough good things about this place and its people. I just finished my first fostering experience and the staff here (especially Cathy!) made each step so seamless and supported. They were so responsive when I had questions about cat care or needed more supplies and when I had an emotional time bringing my foster cat back to be adopted, they let me come to the back room to say goodbye privately and ask the many questions I had about the next steps for her. Such an incredible organization all around and you can really tell the staff’s hearts are in the right place ❤️ I’ve attached photos of the cat I fostered (Pookie). She will be up for adoption soon and you can fill out an application online if you’re interested in her! She loves humans, watching water drip from faucets and best of all, cuddling.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM1oQ8UX5BD6HLbxDEA3KjoZYPkN-GEWsiuF8Q&fid=0x0:0xba110e09d43f2ecb"],"When":"2024-12-20"},{"Name":"Shaianne Casasis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVflTGm8iJItU5OIi2vvnAmt0aeNAsLE9-Rruq437_EqjqkFaHH=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place was adorable!

The staff were incredibly friendly and welcoming right from the start. The matcha milk tea I ordered was both earthy and sweet, a delightful surprise since choosing matcha can often be hit or miss. Interacting with the cats was an equally enjoyable experience. We were given 50 minutes to spend with them, which was just the right amount of time to form a connection. The cafe provided a lot of toys to engage the cats, who were well-behaved and seemed comfortable around people. Although I was disappointed that we were prohibited from picking up them up, I understood the policy. It's crucial to respect the cats' boundaries, particularly since they interact with so many visitors. I especially appreciated that the cafe make these cats available for adoption, what an amazing cause!

I visited with a group of friends, but coming alone would also offer a relaxing and enjoyable experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO0SHOCCU5_84mya7Q_eJad3ySjKXBNBonrecSq&fid=0x0:0xba110e09d43f2ecb"],"When":"2024-12-23"},{"Name":"Millie M.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUbgVgG7y1vXzJWbGfSEOa036_6RjAXc-9l1V2WIiMOzdOw4p9w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very friendly staff and great drinks. Your experience may vary depending on the energy levels and personalities of the cats during your visit. The hostess did a great job letting us know about the boundaries of certain cats to prevent potential issues from arising. Remember to book an appointment online before coming to ensure your spot.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPEA-mLLlWsSwn1i_i2defjiQvTDpl5MMgvpPmn&fid=0x0:0xba110e09d43f2ecb"],"When":"2024-11-7"},{"Name":"Ty Cho","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKAO5U8OHwAnh8bcZTB480vSjlXl5NvH31tn3332IZ8xFuvUA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Simply a place to heal your hurt soul and rejuvenate tired mind from modern era 3 jobs life. We recently started loving cats as we took in a stray cat that followed us home. We wanted to see and experience cat cafe for many different reasons and we are very glad to have visited this place. Staff were amazing and I really hope this place will thrive even though there is a rumor they are having financial hardship. $18 per person entrance fee is there to support their cause so don’t be surprised but be glad to help little fur buddies and good people. Also their coffees are pretty good. Parking at the back is alright but ensure to talk to staff about it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOoCX69FsS3Sum8Wht4R_BT01bfeRHsKASKm2hq&fid=0x0:0xba110e09d43f2ecb"],"When":"2024-8-4"},{"Name":"M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLKkBlKKXEwS-T751TiRoLz_-TL1CGLDpwuYQ-xuShSj_g_N54=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went with my friend and we had a blast! The bubble tea is delicious and the cats are sweet! They are almost celebrating their 5 year anniversary and have rescued over 1500 cats! Seemed extremely clean and you can tell the staff are knowledgeable and love the furry friends :) Thank you guys for what you do 🫶","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM4vRHRHE_8QAw1_lBRLdYLA7-_7Q1cHnzYdIND&fid=0x0:0xba110e09d43f2ecb"],"When":"2024-7-25"},{"Name":"Karen Cheung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXchMPPAN3zqOoag_ixABnvIJMH6A1alhdVdwJdZOdnJvvZotnpUg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went there for my birthday and loved it!

They have a very clean and safe space for people who want to spend some time with the cats. The staff there are super friendly and during the time in Catoro cafe, you can play with the cats and enjoy a nice drink.

They have sanitize toys that you can interact with the cats and all of the cats are super social and super cute.

They have drinks that you can purchase along with various cat supplies and accessories.

I really enjoyed my time at the catoro cafe and would recommend people who are cat lovers to visit this place.

The only one thing is to be careful of the street parking.

It’s 7 am to 3 pm for Monday to Friday so be careful. My car got towed but the staff was super empathetic and told me there is parking in the back.

The cats are also up for adoption so if you are interested, the staff will tell you more about it.

They have","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP1UeKVnckpesPcsX8spcyteuBrpkuDjQq_sX2b&fid=0x0:0xba110e09d43f2ecb"],"When":"2024-4-27"},{"Name":"AH","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUbSDTBRb0i5Z-O9Llx_f4jUDvaC36Rpc_Ai8VCzOt_tM08rlqM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Such a cute place! I loved petting and playing with all the cats. The staff is helpful and friendly and their bubble tea is really good. Looking forward to hopefully adopt a cat from here in the future!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM7GjiSO9gkQM2lGbRQqGapQqut63f7iOjWqDE7&fid=0x0:0xba110e09d43f2ecb"],"When":"2024-7-22"},{"Name":"Jessica Lopez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV_vJ7q2VJwIbq0MdshHqmVydDqsY_25HANFhltPuhhebZvxeo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Super great place. The bubble tea is amazing! I love that all the cats are adoptable and the money you spend goes to help them. Would recommend going in the morning because that's when the cats are more active. Always new cats Everytime. The staff is very friendly.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM66FfOc4n78fCxiNHKuptFcQ-_ymo-QabxjIA&fid=0x0:0xba110e09d43f2ecb"],"When":"2023-8-4"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Emily Ashford","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU7LB4yOHF_72ma5pIKSuDxDxmiYN96TzjjxiXBwBwIs2QedNQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We just had them cater our wedding, and it was amazing! They went way above and beyond--the dishware was beautiful and they even brought decorations to make everything look gorgeous! They were very communicative, checking in just the right amount to make sure that they were giving us what we wanted. And their food is such an incredible taste; our guests ate it up and gave us so many compliments about how beautiful it looked and how good it tasted. Would absolutely recommend to anyone who's planning an event!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOGQdyaYeyIlWYtaubLrtL-K5kQO6AK760e6IqV\u0026fid=0x0:0xd9ed25f6686248b5"],"When":"2024-7-7"},{"Name":"Erika Marumoto","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVcHNwQOGV9AoUyHloKogKSxG21mHHw4DIAuDC5f0ObFNTR5ys=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had an excellent afternoon tea with all the Sistas!  This would not have been possible without the excellent tea service provided by Kevin and crew of Bon Moment Bakeshop and catering on Still Creek!  Kevin made my Mom’s day seeing all her girls together.  Thank you!\nErika","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNRpfPRVfPtdiekxfUakf39JMwsY-Za1a-FFZy3\u0026fid=0x0:0xd9ed25f6686248b5"],"When":"2024-12-9"},{"Name":"Alicia Wu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJcQ3bYtGzlCdQM8jft4p1gqPYLE_q603xIMevrU64nqOGlqA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wonderful!  The chef was kindly able to accommodate our order at the last minute for Mother's Day.  We were able to have a lovely little picnic in our backyard.  Everything was very tasty and enjoyable.  We loved the tea pairings as well.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPY-4H3MhLaGYBPA5ucJp_rJs5RKjle2WLOrDez\u0026fid=0x0:0xd9ed25f6686248b5"],"When":"2024-5-12"},{"Name":"E Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLtIzjFTdoaBecBrdLqu7u1u8o7N_0B_jWw-7NnI18wW81cww=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I was delighted when I had my first bite. The pastries were delicate and very tasty. The mint Minted Melon Tisane tea was the perfect pairing with my savory and sweet treats. I had preordered this high tea to go set to celebrate my birthday. The white chocolate waffle was incredible! Kevin was awesome, he checked on us beforehand. Must try for all occasions! I will definitely order from Bon Moment again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNxrB8RlW3NfbzjgqGD2NIeNT-lTKaatm05HOkO\u0026fid=0x0:0xd9ed25f6686248b5"],"When":"2023-2-24"},{"Name":"tyna m","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX8WTU2xhplv4UtFc5OQC3-N-EsLVWAjLEZMUsxOTzvKTbxKGFjGw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have had a 'few' of the Afternoon Tea sets + thoroughly enjoy them all! The deserts were amazing with so much care a detail to each item from visually to taste. My fav this time was the salmon!\nIt's is a pleasure taste explosion along with excellent + responsive service! Highly recommend this experience! Support local!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOtMa-DMqIxJg-UwEUfUy4Oe7U8s6qkNb-jBo78\u0026fid=0x0:0xd9ed25f6686248b5"],"When":"2023-5-3"},{"Name":"Dani Yu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV4h6JdtCVeOdxz7DDBNVjw1TdjvNFX4DTcchsVkt24wNvi34k=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing afternoon tea prepared with love by red seal chef, Kevin. Hotel quality with the most affordable price you can find in Vancouver. High quality ingredients like caviar and foie gras are used in each set and items get changed out frequently so you won’t get bored. Highly highly recommend - I’ve ordered from them 3 times already and it never disappoints!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPH9DupfzNvmKz0wfUscLQtqDXVRO8kBkFtqa79\u0026fid=0x0:0xd9ed25f6686248b5"],"When":"2023-3-4"},{"Name":"V P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWdwSFMB2Ew_keK6StwkYO1dELAFHt7DlEJLkOucELkeS8ABe4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I ordered an afternoon tea set to enjoy with my family over Thanksgiving weekend, the set was very nicely presented with a handwritten card from Kevin, which is very thoughtful in my opinion. The set has both savoury and sweet items, for someone who is not crazy about dessert, this is great! The price is reasonable and I like having the option of having high tea at home. Definitely give it a try :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPAVrJjt-egNHE_pUJ9t1ALLtlKfHc36LKac3yA\u0026fid=0x0:0xd9ed25f6686248b5"],"When":"2022-10-25"},{"Name":"Howie Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXYIL_jR4p0ikBve6Ikrj7MV5upiolZVMtwy7HE-V6FNibaCuNd=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Bon Moment has highest quality of the dessert you can get in the greater Vancouver. The dessert is delicious and unique. Their menu changes frequently. I always try to order every 2 months to enjoy different type of food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMtUJBK5NyTDHRr8RyI6rhqvcHvPtG1gAZCbdku\u0026fid=0x0:0xd9ed25f6686248b5"],"When":"2022-11-8"}]
