user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Elton Chung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU_SVkVqkNe3SvSFwaZ1xrBYHObNVkTiTTXXYykf58guqGIk3qy=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have visited this bakery cafe a few times. The quality of the foods is stable and promising. I ordered their Pate and tomato soup this afternoon. Pate with salad and pickle was nice. The tomato soup was satisfying. I should have ordered a full size one.

Their servers were welcoming and polite. The ambiance was cozy and you can slow down and enjoy a moment in life by the window.

Their breads are authentic and good to get some for breakfast.

Overall it has been a great experience in enjoying meals here!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPB8cYqv4HbjnzwjS2hlJBHV0tW4gOTsPzTjgA&fid=0x0:0x94d3acfe7a9a3a79"],"When":"2024-11-23"},{"Name":"Byron Sheardown","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXNqxb0c_42J36yKVRNJaOWQgsDJlMUDs94sxLG_b3F9RGXTQ_D=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Like walking into a cafe in France. Comfortable vibe. Some larger tables that are shareable by guests (build community. Meet new people). Coffee was bitter however. Typical Vancouver espresso so disappointing. But the pastries 🥐 are good. Lots of things to buy like oils and takeaway goods.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOZj41j8wLt_AdyWexLYO3-bmCRpL7brthk3Txe&fid=0x0:0x94d3acfe7a9a3a79"],"When":"2024-10-10"},{"Name":"Kaitlyn Inkster","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLH8OjPPZ1c7c4I2z-6338c9L82rnX69t_z4fuUg8ZSQ3TcZQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was quite busy on a Thursday morning at 10:30. We were lucky to snag a seat! The chocolate croissant and almond croissant were beyond flakey and delectable! The latte was creamy and perfect. A nice place for a treat but be prepared if you have to take it to go as it’s busy!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMInwmSWSMrO8uO5aMZFw0h3icKOnzCQdh58U3l&fid=0x0:0x94d3acfe7a9a3a79"],"When":"2024-11-22"},{"Name":"V Young","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUYjt2t2irlYJyY5z1fhrtfd1ctNs_6QWnoKsHL8R7AsffonDpp=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time at this beautiful bakery. Enjoyed the Batard croissant, French onion soup and vanilla latte. All so delicious but the French Onion soup was the most joy! Went to meet friends on a mid-Saturday morning so huge lineup, took awhile to get our order but fortunate enough to get a table to seat 5.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPolqlJW5J2hq88sBIL5u5tffmuKhI0Rr2eAypj&fid=0x0:0x94d3acfe7a9a3a79"],"When":"2024-11-20"},{"Name":"Philip Raymond Lim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5EIBAgpBLsauhPMdjXym7mJ4fA8mtryDtWQIJCZfJxYXxupU8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had the pleasure of visiting Batard Boulangerie today, and the experience transported me straight to a quaint French café—authentic even amidst Vancouver’s modern charm. Few places can deliver this kind of atmosphere, and Batard absolutely nails it.

I ordered an Americano, which was beautifully crafted with a thin, delicate crema that lingered on top which probably is coming from the oil of the freshly roasted coffee. The aroma was robust yet balanced, a true hallmark of expertly roasted beans. It was smooth, with no bitterness, making each sip incredibly enjoyable.

To complement the coffee, I tried the Apricot Vanilla Galette. Its crispy, buttery layers were perfectly baked, and the balance between the tangy apricot and subtle vanilla sweetness made it a treat worth savoring.

I also took home a Salmon Coulibiac, which was phenomenal. The sockeye salmon, paired with mushroom ragout and a hard-boiled egg, was all wrapped in a golden croissant dough—a dish both indulgent and satisfying. Every bite felt like a harmonious blend of textures and flavors.

I first got to know Batard because a friend gifted us a box of their pastries. While I initially found those selections too sweet for my palette, today I was delighted to discover a wide variety of offerings, catering to different tastes. The exterior of the boulangerie was so inviting, like stepping into Paris, and I’m thrilled I gave it another chance.

There’s so much more to explore here, and I’m already planning my next visit to try more of their unique creations since I pass through Fraser every time I’m on my way to work. Batard is a gem for anyone who appreciates fine pastry and excellent coffee!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMUF8jd6HIjZCV-vJUBwvXTCTPdez-P4t640-0e&fid=0x0:0x94d3acfe7a9a3a79"],"When":"2024-11-19"},{"Name":"P G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX0fCU2Qc0a_c6EyAnrC9oWHMXOLKbAIpYaZPyN9xTdV9lbUoGm=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely stellar every single time. Welcoming people & space, delicious food, especially the daily quiche and pretty much any of their baked goods. Coffee is o-k. Small space, so either cosy up & share a table with friendly strangers, or grab a takeaway, but don’t miss it!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMcxrqk2Bwf_KReXCiqySw74jKsNoV0q4Df6o9B&fid=0x0:0x94d3acfe7a9a3a79"],"When":"2024-7-25"},{"Name":"Dana Sullivan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWQIw-0oOUNgoyniYugTscGkgpKJS8tpx4V0tAajn3ZGkNIfqEk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"French bakery cafe and gourmet market, very nicely decorated. Although I've never been to France, the atmosphere felt authentic to me. There's a decent amount of seating inside and it was still packed while I was there, about 2:30-3:30 on a Saturday. There are a few tables outside, which are under an awning but don't quite give you total coverage in the rain, so not ideal if it's raining... but I sat out there anyway because I was determined to eat there and didn't have a plan B, and didn't really mind getting a little wet.
I got an eggplant parm croissant, a slice of pumpkin espresso bundt cake, and an iced ginger green tea. The croissant had buttery flavour but wasn't greasy to the touch, beautiful flaky layers, and the eggplant filling was delicious. The cake slice was huge - I cut it in half and took half home, but it was so good and not too heavy, I probably could've just eaten the whole thing if I hadn't put that second half away before I started. The flavour was perfect. The iced tea was also nice and refreshing.
The 2 pastries and tea came out to about $15, around $5 each, which I thought was a great price for this because it was all top quality and as mentioned the slice of cake was fully two servings.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPClSdq2XZL8APXIHsr-se-3XO4KogRSUlUfvyO&fid=0x0:0x94d3acfe7a9a3a79"],"When":"2024-10-20"},{"Name":"Shonnah","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVryghpg_5X3Yv-cncwU7OGN26KCAvVhjXajvFLZ6BLUMNFRgyF=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’ve heard many great things about this bakery and finally managed to visit. Upon entering, I was surprised to see how many consumer goods they sell - it’s a mix of their own products, local venders and specialty items. I came around Sunday noon and the place was pretty packed, but the line-up moved relatively quickly.

We dropped by for a quick snack - we ordered the raspberry cheesecake danish and the cheese tomato galette. Honestly, they were both great. The danish was flakey and buttery as it should be, yet the cheesecake part wasn’t overwhelmingly heavy or sweet. It had a mild creamy taste, where most danishes I have typically use custard. The fresh raspberries made it a bit more refreshing as well. It’s definitely a light treat for someone who doesn’t pastries that are indulgent, rich and too sweet, similar to myself. As for the galette, the dough was much simpler and the tomato was the game changer. Without it, it’s an average cheese bun (lack of a better word), however the slice of tomato that was baked in it made it similar to a grilled cheese with tomato soup in bun form - a great combo.

Overall, I had a great experience here and would definitely come back to try their brunch and coffee. I can definitely see why this place is a hit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN_ZRZXV89Q_0UfrIOg-p2U7U-0HYts7_vsQjaz&fid=0x0:0x94d3acfe7a9a3a79"],"When":"2024-8-27"}]

title: 101 BOBA
address: V5V 3R3, British Columbia, Vancouver, Main St, 101 BOBA
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Curbside pickup","enabled":true},{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Onsite services","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Spike Luk","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVljR41LewaD1cz5kVqUD3bmc9ybJSH00GIF-DrHusS8cKNejJe=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"101BOBA is an excellent addition along Main St.  The drinks were yummy.  I love being able to walk in with the pup!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOHb1z7XBcFpLG2I-AFSm9FULZdZEEUYjXXduKw&fid=0x0:0xf18be1a7c9bcf4a6"],"When":"2024-8-5"},{"Name":"Yuchen Zhang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU1xDu3WTWzwx4BqALzlFxFQazrSLJr1-VButkOWeYUgtHQOyPo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Came here after a long walk in the cold and I was really craving a hot beverage. I asked if they made their bubble tea hot and they showed me their selection. I had the taro and it really was disappointing. I feel like they just popped their taro tea into the microwave and zapped it for a few minutes. The tea was not hot and it was slightly colder than Luke warm so it did not do the trick for me at all. The taro was also fresh taro (as opposed to powder) so I had chunks of it on the bottom which I feel like they could've warned me about when I ordered it with boba because I would not recommend trying to suck taro and boba with a straw at the same time. Honestly, the drink was just pretty bad in general.

It's a quick walk up counter with no seating so it's definitely just to go.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Bryan DT Nguyen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXNe2hAYWMTtzyO8D3S_X9xEjHixoZG657P5lP2YxJHJy8i8eht=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I  take my kids to 101 Boba about  1 or 2 time a week.  They  love it. The drink so good. The servers  so friendly. I remember 1 of them, her name Trang, Vietnamese like me. She remember my kids name, talking so nice to them, make them feel comfortable when we come there. We ♥it","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Dung Nguyễn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXwQS1wmNU315eHMnztZ8bQmO6xbm8bIoq9BIM78xFre6px9uo=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My favorite bubble tea in Vancouver. The boba here is always fresh and chewy. Good service customer and store is clean. I will come there frequently.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP_JvUPgNqWp9Ffoc2LXylXLC1Jc02bOk5GINCt&fid=0x0:0xf18be1a7c9bcf4a6"],"When":"2024-4-2"},{"Name":"Beezer333 Beezer333","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX3wo1m-4sufmg5069NtcuAFRSIVJ6amfyY9UrEO5NtVtv3Asyw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It is good but sometimes the boba pearls are hard / not consistent.

Service was good / ok.

But will come again !","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNSa_kh3_lm2fCa9FB7-thrz9980qqEo1Ewb78K&fid=0x0:0xf18be1a7c9bcf4a6"],"When":"2024-5-20"},{"Name":"Maria Royston","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWgHSXaJkRQNp35lJs9KlhvvEggLPnEW1FHKO1CWe0ebS6lQ-0bDw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The ice cream black tea bubble tea is super good. The mixed size pearl/boba is also fun, would recommend","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Michelle P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJzyvldEqh4Rzu1UT2llOktuyG_aYwWjeQ9_B8KLv8jLorgkA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love this bubble tea place. I love the oolong tea macchiato drink. And the girl Trang has the best service and she made the best one.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Bella Liu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJyi85N3tpeaYmkpz6AM-Q0QLPN4KWDRVD_ylJ5AJQQh_j8dQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Passion fruit black tea is good as green one. Black tea is awesome. Service is also good. Recommend","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Ngon Cafe Vancouver
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Onsite services","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true}]},{"id":"offerings","name":"Offerings","options":[{"name":"Coffee","enabled":true},{"name":"Healthy options","enabled":true}]},{"id":"dining_options","name":"Dining options","options":[{"name":"Lunch","enabled":true},{"name":"Dessert","enabled":true}]},{"id":"amenities","name":"Amenities","options":[{"name":"Washroom","enabled":true}]},{"id":"atmosphere","name":"Atmosphere","options":[{"name":"Casual","enabled":true}]},{"id":"crowd","name":"Crowd","options":[{"name":"Family-friendly","enabled":true}]},{"id":"planning","name":"Planning","options":[{"name":"Accepts reservations","enabled":false}]},{"id":"payments","name":"Payments","options":[{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"Debit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"NFC mobile payments","enabled":true},{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":false}]},{"id":"parking","name":"Parking","options":[{"name":"Free street parking","enabled":true},{"name":"Parking","enabled":false}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Kate Choi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIjE4MSAa0c4Uqc8iOt1LfqIkJDL1ULa2Z17gRh4YDWMExQ1A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I tried their newly opened location in burnaby and thought it was good. Came to try the Vancouver location and was quite disappointed. The banh mi did not have much in there. The pate is a small smear and the ingredients don't go to the end. Even if you don't put a lot of meat, at least fill it up with pickled diakon and carrot. There was just a single strand of cilantro.

-edit-
The manager reached out to me to issue a refund. I have changed the rating to reflect this proactive-ness. I hope that they review what happened and maintain consistency throughout their stores.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM06pr1dfMfOaikcyHhOTXWGsyFQTds3N3rsG5i&fid=0x0:0x5dce88a1b4dc0bef"],"When":"2024-11-12"},{"Name":"Toan Trieu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKxVYQ4OkNgiCmeVUFywANdvOkV1LHVNIddPLKQVrnEiWLH9w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best Vietnamese banhmi and coffee in Vancouver so far . I have tried 4 others in Vancouver but this is still my most favorite ❤️

I would highly recommend the “Ngon special” banhmi and the salted cream coffee to anyone. Also recommend to bring a plastic straw because theirs is paper straw and it’s just simply disgusting. There’s dollar store and T&T nearby to get the straw if you need.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOwtfEHpZ7FAI9PYNdpaXy1P296MYZmrFsZ6Fzu&fid=0x0:0x5dce88a1b4dc0bef"],"When":"2024-11-17"},{"Name":"Sayani Chowdhury","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWjD34o3DB1ZpRQF82FIyI7sLdx6aLu5umEaHn-Fepbek1_K2P0gQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Heard a lot of positive reviews about Ngon so decided to check it out. Ordered the Braised Chicken Banh Mi and my friend ordered the Grilled Beef Banh Mi. My Banh Mi was flavourful and all the ingredients went really well with each other. I wish they had put more sauce in my Banh Mi. I also personally didn’t like the bread as much and thought it was too crispy and prefer O Banh Mi’s bread more. If you’re in the area, make sure to check out both the Banh Mi shops as they have similar menus and prices. I will definitely be coming back to try their Ngon Special Banh Mi.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO3nDgwiQpAwu7tT6Z9trm5OeS-12o86TWPOKJ1&fid=0x0:0x5dce88a1b4dc0bef"],"When":"2023-8-10"},{"Name":"Kenrick Li","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV4Qlr-7avGGG_gw-sdMVAbZ5vTLZXDpwcJ4A7g2sjiGekUnOtm=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious banh mi and dessert from this small local shop. Enjoyed a casual and non-rushed lunch with colleagues here. Highly recommended. Staff were very friendly also.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNv8VM9FMOK2I58Vdp2r9gxbExl5pq7PdHldwa1&fid=0x0:0x5dce88a1b4dc0bef"],"When":"2024-5-15"},{"Name":"Tony Zhang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU18KRJxmMKRBmU5_ES8ZFbbgqf4OuONhGSOOlegq9h7rJZlRU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've heard of Ngon Cafe from many of my colleagues, the Banh Mi sandwiches were a flavor explosion—premium meats and fresh veggies that were very unique! And let's talk about that creamy avocado smoothie—it's a game-changer. But what truly made the experience unforgettable was the service. The staff went above and beyond, making me feel like part of the family. And the atmosphere of the restaurant was also very cozy and inviting, perfect for catching up with friends or enjoying a solo meal. Make sure to check out this cafe, it's a culinary journey you won't want to miss. The owners are extremely friendly as well.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNWc-d_iPlU5p2-mFHTZiCPf5jspIrIJ4nClDRM&fid=0x0:0x5dce88a1b4dc0bef"],"When":"2024-5-5"},{"Name":"Grace A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUkMvQgyr-1fI73G6-ZuxaL5s6M9KcEomZ9lrRC-ucxbXxJp0Bs=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I ordered BBQ Pork on Vermicelli with Spring Rolls and it’s really good! They have lots of choices for Banh Mi too so I would try that next time. I also liked the Jasmine Green Milk Tea. It’s mild and not too sweet. The restaurant ambiance is so calming and staff is really nice too [thanks for asking if I like my milk tea with cheese foam or not! :) ]","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPes08DlHaNwICcI5g__lvulaLemEO2E3kU7BbS&fid=0x0:0x5dce88a1b4dc0bef"],"When":"2023-9-10"},{"Name":"Anthony Plaxen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW0TosyGAQWTqM_XvTHaXfq2jDGHv6ifKWBgTGcJKYnap3ceipL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Always going to be one of my go to places to getting good banh mi sandwiches in Vancouver. I’d recommend the cold cut banh mi with moderate spicyness, it’s delicious. Also the tropical mango drink with pearls is a good drink to have on the side.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNaxdpfjFq2v3oT_MLumK3S1CsYX_vXYBr76fwh&fid=0x0:0x5dce88a1b4dc0bef"],"When":"2023-8-27"},{"Name":"Rose G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUKDwlTg2rtyurAM8WQtr4NK4V44fAmJVe7LxKXdf1jfgqc7-GfIg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Nice setting but small. I am not sure what type of food it is but it is not Vietnamese. Fish sauce was mostly sugar no garlic or lime. Sandwich had some weird cold cut which wasn’t regular Vietnamese ham. Spring rolls was cooked in old oil. Not much taste in any of the food.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Tsefaye","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX9_bYpSdhjpz4lYg1SrE13c-2XpCw8S4HWp05XREWZ8D5MC8md=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Jeya Brothers is a great store! Huge selection, clean \u0026 such great service from the cashier. You can tell he works hard and is very helpful.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNJBVKhjKQPxzh0bT5jhf9qioQCtzV_k9xJaGmS\u0026fid=0x0:0xfafcb63cf7ca0f7e"],"When":"2024-12-4"},{"Name":"Sharon Raj","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUe0ZlMCLofzjzLsmyDXM30A1Ozme5EU_xTZIURAMVpzSdVNltT=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I don’t believe it but I contracted COVID and needed to make booster shots for immunity and speedy recovery. I usually buy Amla for this store in-person. I called today inquiring if they had some and that I was sick, they told me the current stock wasn’t good enough and provided a new restock time. I followed up, was able to get a fresh bag of amla, get it delivered by uber connect and waited till I received it. I appreciate the support and extra steps they’ve taken to provide service since I couldn’t leave home. They usually don’t provide this type of service. 🙌🏽","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMGI-Z7ApJOBfs3btvNhmA9G3W5bsMCDGcz_KrW\u0026fid=0x0:0xfafcb63cf7ca0f7e"],"When":"2024-6-16"},{"Name":"NAVNEET KAUR","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLcdDqL5lEWgimA7HkKQSUO6iJgH1KKM9PLiD9KrzvjKSWNBA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Grear Authentic Indian grocery store. Staff is attentive and nice. Welcome with smile and happy to help.Thanks Jaspreet for help us finding stuff. See you again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOl_vCR1fMK6TQ-sI5Xbvl8Kyh-FPKXCew6-yxA\u0026fid=0x0:0xfafcb63cf7ca0f7e"],"When":"2024-8-4"},{"Name":"Simranjeet Kaur","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUJtp1XqQt_hVnGbsSVtEt5kSt4jZ8pcO5l_6yEJCv89HDl7VcM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Overall place was good … bought lot of Indian stuff which was too are liking but … spent $5-6 on whole bag of garlic and to my surprise it has started to get moldy…. Even their is no air conditioning at the place maybe due to lot of heat garlic went bad:(","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sathya V","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKzLEzrPLkUyVwQj0sU-bQ1I_aD8aV9E_ylJWEkqKByjUuXE8OV=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very good store for all South Indians in Vancouver. Only place where you will very specific items used in Tamil cooking for example. Monthly visit is a routine :)","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"arosha liny","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWuI-2oeMAfW6-dYWu35dmJWwdGfUr1weVavNvWSDtoxAiTGqpP=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Definitely best South Indian store! Don’t miss the extremely delicious fresh homemade snacks, meals and rolls. Also very friendly store and always find amazing food choices!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Michael Rahul","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXPsPvPRPneY42ba7ypZvc4Uz7lns-oqC1lVRxEUXkQxCb86yGq=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the best Indian Stores in Vancouver where one new person from India can get everything in affordable prices., they have everything of India which is less available in other places. The ambience \u0026 customer service also is great, reminds of India. Worth visit store for Indians living in Vancouver.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"nikhil sarwate","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV8fOViVffp6DsHFSVAh-Gv7kh3R0ZSe0p6L8wpcN8PiXSKr8Wy=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A good Indian grocery store. We shop all our items (regulars \u0026 festival) from this place and it never disappoints","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Naveen Sivasankar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVD85c8-gPz6lah-8hC6Wc52PIW1l9gF6x2wQmy27iEI7TaAflN=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Nice little cafe with a great selection and lots of places to sit, but it gets busy very quickly.

I was able to come in and quickly order a hot chocolate and a cookie, which was ready without much need to wait.

I found a spot to sit near the window, which was made from a fairly rough block of wood. I was a little concerned about splinters, but fortunately there were no such issues there.

The hot chocolate and cookie were both delicious, but quite sweet. The combination was a bit much for me, although this is partially my fault for choosing two sweet items.

I look forward to coming back and trying their cinnamon buns!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMKU2WUbhu3bxZFUyrfGdxbN-wEmjePLzDtmoWx&fid=0x0:0xb59623907ed6ec75"],"When":"2024-12-22"},{"Name":"tikki","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWzV_Y6bQFjodBKC8anq5nBVFmCTC7hA6Nh7xklFQuKGefK40A_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The BEST cinnamon buns in Vancouver!! I don't usually eat cinnamon buns because many of them are sweet and greasy but the buns from Grounds are just beyond amazing. The texture, the taste, the sweetness, and the icing..everything is just perfect! Tried the apple buns this time and it went really well with the new pumpkin spice latte!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP91WwKX0e8IX-Pjb1VoGam0HRCsegDE8WS-z6D&fid=0x0:0xb59623907ed6ec75"],"When":"2024-9-15"},{"Name":"MJ","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUlm_XRYtoUIMsDe0r0YhYfxDQnj37a3FGprKGl2_zxeQCNP_XX=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The other people in the reviews were absolutely right about the cinnamon buns, because - THEY ARE DELICIOUS❤️✨.

And I’ll be coming back for more, hehe.

But seriously, you must try the cinnamon buns here. Unfortunately, they don’t have many gluten-friendly options at this cafe. We got a lemon muffin (GF), but it was very mid.

The lattes were also pretty good!

Definitely will be back :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMjlsqy1Peol94P95VRasW7UeophctgjdlDiCRt&fid=0x0:0xb59623907ed6ec75"],"When":"2024-12-7"},{"Name":"Lotus Chong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIWPtxD2Kc8rbjnrSVGI_wPDwDNkxutNH95oMBLgNIiPM5bvw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Cute little cafe, but holy smokes it gets really busy in here. Wifi is a bit slow and weird.

- Matcha Latte was good, but too creamy.
- Iced caramel macchiato, also too creamy
-  Lemon bomb so with it!
-Cinnamon bun - had it cold, probably would’ve been better if it was hot.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPDra5FrUso2O637b-sxpdtq4-rqRWgcXhbuPDm&fid=0x0:0xb59623907ed6ec75"],"When":"2024-10-24"},{"Name":"katelynn c","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVoqcwb_gcSeJsQp6Fk0xxFfLaz6Ca58KOlakGeP011yHdUWdF9=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"i don’t usually like cinnamon buns, but i quite enjoyed this ! it did get a little bit sweet at the end though","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM20nElrrOUFMp3InMVWfID7HPjLF_NdcVaBM9B&fid=0x0:0xb59623907ed6ec75"],"When":"2024-12-24"},{"Name":"Sadie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX4edrPgNMFABkQGYq1FTScLcPnZweF3s-QqNHxWaaDMDg94ba7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I got recommended this place when we were in the neighborhood. The aesthetic is very cozy, its clean, and it smells nice. The person who helped me was very nice and quick. I got a regular cinnamon bun/cream cheese frosting cinnamon bun. Took it home and warmed it up. 10/10 would get either one again. The cream cheese frosted one was better by far but I loved both.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Philip Raymond Lim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5EIBAgpBLsauhPMdjXym7mJ4fA8mtryDtWQIJCZfJxYXxupU8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Grounds for Coffee is one of the best coffee shops in Vancouver. They’re famous for their cinnamon buns. Love them specially on Christmas.

Coffee is on spot. Today, I just got myself a mocha and a cookie— less guilt mode haha.

Staff here is friendly. Ambiance is good with some artworks around to enjoy. Will be back between this and the one on Alma. Whichever is closer.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOj88CZO-JCf1diQqwsL48WkvV4i2znMUuCd0t8&fid=0x0:0xb59623907ed6ec75"],"When":"2024-7-11"},{"Name":"Peter Cross","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUHmBXMXmX9-43PxxMc-vQWx8OaX3r8ByLsfhp1pyyCEQpdxmTkCA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fantastic Cinnamon Buns!
Great service and decent coffee. Clean hip and bright space with good music.  What more could you want?   My only concern is the way the line works. There ends up being a crowd at the till and it is confusing to know who is waiting and who is waiting to order.  No biggie, the staff works hard to get people served as quick as they can.  You won’t wait long.  Good to send someone to save the table.  Seating is scare because of the volume of people who are enjoying their food.  If you haven’t been, then go!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMH-TDjQwtKovNNKyln2RIxEeLUq_PmSgmg383s&fid=0x0:0xb59623907ed6ec75"],"When":"2024-1-14"}]

title: Gong Cha
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Onsite services","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"highlights","name":"Highlights","options":[{"name":"Great tea selection","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair accessible seating","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true}]}]
user_reviews: [{"Name":"Chi Blondin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK0T7dZ-0dEx5oey45aUetEMF0DNqP-Lwf2ytZokXg5H3EK6A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love bubble tea and generally i don't go to gongcha (in my city) because i find they're too sweet but this store is very different. The staff are very attentive, listened to my concern regarding the sweetness level and created a drink that i really  enjoyed. The store is very spacious, well decorated with amble seating. I will try to come back before we leave Vancouver. Good job, team Gongcha Renfrew!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOzjvLfBAFBuaWbUmUY00KfIJfzrxV0Iu8td-EH\u0026fid=0x0:0xc90657d6985cd2bf"],"When":"2024-10-9"},{"Name":"JungHyun Son","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIwmkNOsWHm7T535R6elqJDQ-hxe7u7CN4op8pbm4rQWQW5kw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best Gong Cha ever. I come here quite often after my work around 9:45 and I have never felt any annoyance even though I come here often right before closing. Their drink and snack options are also the best among other Gong Cha as well. Thanks team! Y'all are amazing :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOqZK4-mjtoBFoqFEM9zTqt-84yIbiAC1JNaKeA\u0026fid=0x0:0xc90657d6985cd2bf"],"When":"2024-7-23"},{"Name":"S L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWV3dRExUU6CcyKh7lSLVNfnclkZ3QvSxHjyu6gjmW4Ii5hPUY7lg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I was eagerly anticipating trying Gong Cha in Canada, but unfortunately, my expectations were far too high. The waffle I ordered was disappointingly chewy and doughy, and it lacked the distinct matcha flavor I had been hoping for. Similarly, the drinks failed to impress—I couldn't find anything extraordinary about them either.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNuZZJw6aH-xsOHRVZB2BhpjAsOTag-sDyhRird\u0026fid=0x0:0xc90657d6985cd2bf"],"When":"2024-4-14"},{"Name":"Sunshine Jack Lau","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLLLdP2YGEJQHgdsXaSHpigz5iDbNRq0Tyea10Md89vMwdxNQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The bubble tea that I had ordered. It’s not true with what I told to seller. I told him that I wanna order a strawberry milk tea size Large with 30% ice and 50% sugar, but he made a cup full of 70% ice. Moreover, he didn’t giving me napkins as well, so I just want to give this store 1 star. The service is still lacking experience. I hope it will not be  happened again in the next time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP3iRal_LPmBRcu6ABrzQ1YFX6xFKcH-WJCqmHr\u0026fid=0x0:0xc90657d6985cd2bf"],"When":"2024-7-3"},{"Name":"Mark Daniel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV2WtosayPHUWwqfQ-R1f5-iJLYN9Dkvq9kxsgsAUud7w-NIMAg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"One of my go to bubble tea spots. They house a good variety of flavors and drink options. I never had an issue with my order and the consistency of the drinks have always been good. All in all a reliable location for me and my friends","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Olivia P.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX75JodHR8GJUAnqjrVp_u84CMWHywgc77IJwKEgE4isGX_V1M=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Visited here yesterday afternoon, even though I try to avoid coming here as it’s always a 10+ minute wait after ordering. (They must get a lot of online orders.) But I really wanted their white pearls so I committed to the wait. Was disappointed to realize after I had driven away that I didn’t receive my white pearls. (Low points for service, but they do get points for having ample seating.)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOPH4tB4mFrFQ4C8501hXiYKuYRsmgf0McaiM4U\u0026fid=0x0:0xc90657d6985cd2bf"],"When":"2024-6-19"},{"Name":"Moon Phan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWl0M2WJobQfiIF5oT9ii9dNx_rt6oHEk7tJoCdsGVxBDOqTB5i=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I ordered it through Uber Eats. I have no problem with the food, it’s good. But the service is not. Firstly, when the app show “ready to pick up”, I enter the shop and they’re still doing the cake. If you’re not finish it yet, just don’t hit the button. Secondly, the order include 2 drinks, 2 waffles, 1 crepe and 1 coin waffle. I ordered same things many times with Uber delivery. They always came with 2 bags, one for the drinks and one for the foods. The waffles have their own bags and one bigger outside. This time I ordered for pick up and they only gave me 1 bag for the drinks and they stapled the waffles bags together. The bags are quite thin and it’s raining so hard. When I came home, one of the bags almost  broken. A male staff comment that “it’s cruel to staple like that” but the girl who’s doing my order ignore that. Thirdly, the staffs here speak their own language about the order in front of the customer. I don’t think that’s an appropriate behavior for doing customer service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOTDWFTdwGHR2w8az3zgOcCUs0l-zmYVZJ-N5qo\u0026fid=0x0:0xc90657d6985cd2bf"],"When":"2024-1-28"},{"Name":"Le Duy Tan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWyyngicJbx_TjA2crextS6LYQLm8V-BQWVEJOYOdEPgeu7K9cb=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently tried the best bubble tea ever! I ordered the Brown Sugar Pearl Milk Tea and the signature Milk Foam Black Tea. Both drinks were increadibly tasty, I feel comfortable and peaceful in mind. Service is also a plus, they are friendly and professional. I'll definitely be coming back for more whenever I get the chance.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNf8o3Z4cX5cJsePAJRM2wpVorcglF5h9A6SIi2\u0026fid=0x0:0xc90657d6985cd2bf"],"When":"2024-4-13"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Hye","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjULQQSi1mhNFty7n8ZPesKkMpD31jiIGazltx_wRmE-swaOwr4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Their latte is pretty mild, which makes it taste kind of ‘milky.’ I’m just not a big fan of this style, but I really enjoyed all the desserts I’ve tried here! I’d love to come back just for the desserts, haha. And it would be even better if they had more spacious seating","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMWEgAVT1iao4m6uDrC-Hh2DzlAg-fRK-nTgwg\u0026fid=0x0:0xb6c108d0f95535b1"],"When":"2024-12-19"},{"Name":"Lucy Li","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVuwCjTEBDQem6hcfmmxSA0I0nNlJPkS88N0KyjwlMUZAjI_Jdm8w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A coffee with cute vibes and many stores nearby! I love mount pleasant and decided to stop here to try the iced coffee. The coffee itself was okay but the service was good! They also had a lot of pottery kitchen pieces for sale as well!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM4B7uDCAfw7dZXp5qvpawH3qvN8kYAYXX3Biz_\u0026fid=0x0:0xb6c108d0f95535b1"],"When":"2024-9-26"},{"Name":"Darcy 윤 (Darcy)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLLnEF5OV6iD9AB53ZnOIyfZ2cHb4kR4zuaRNWlNBAvaSh7MA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The atmosphere of the store is unique and pretty, so I think it's a great place to take pictures. There is plenty of outdoor seating, so it's great to take a break while shopping. The focaccia with burrata cheese was really good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM-FGyiWDQd_M2btsXvw0MJ-C57zn4hz8YLUGei\u0026fid=0x0:0xb6c108d0f95535b1"],"When":"2024-11-12"},{"Name":"Amy Wu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKvtm7hBqZHDYxXgP_oxkelx2FGhwfW-EuwTv9rdyjxo-_-_8Nq=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Loove this cafe and vibe. It has a home goods shop inside, as well as a cafe and pastries. Nice area outside to hangout too in the summer. We got the pistachio citrus semolina cake and it was AMAZING.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOgCvg_ZAQzjP-P-bKXtIaHBkduRvbnZvyzhD79\u0026fid=0x0:0xb6c108d0f95535b1"],"When":"2024-8-5"},{"Name":"Jenny Park","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV_GjI972b_2nzpRMecAkdD4CG6ddhB3tb_g4fB-VAcKYD4mDM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Food was good, coffee was also good, and the vibe was good. but the people who work there are too busy because they keep talking to each other or their friends! I asked for a cup of water, the barista said okay, then she kept talking to her co-workers and totally forgot about what I asked 😊 what a great CS they have!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPwypfU3TlMy9ATo1qBb8n6LE-XAdZrTNLS1q0b\u0026fid=0x0:0xb6c108d0f95535b1"],"When":"2024-9-9"},{"Name":"H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWqEC6aveVGkKSD1jdzwGnL7ItBSJTEGrRropworslexga5YgE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Good coffee, AMAZING snacks/treats. Nice atmosphere but unfortunately hardly any indoor seating (window benches, no indoor tables) but lots of seating outside which is lovely when the weather is good. NOT an ideal study spot but it’s great for babying coffee and a snack in the outdoor seating on a nice day. great selection of high end housewares too like taper candles, linen tea towels, locally made ceramics (mugs, bowls, etc), candle holders, candles, lots of stuff! Good spot to pick up a fancy home/kitchen  gift and delicious treat 😊","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMIcBDcSVeYcuPj0wzcCOTyoS6lPZoVCRaC6Gdf\u0026fid=0x0:0xb6c108d0f95535b1"],"When":"2024-4-28"},{"Name":"Karima Chellouf","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU0x3GYAkULxSLcIJZQYrNcSZ55njx-ABUCaRku0RNpxiQ5_-A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Their selection of homewares is so dreamy for kitchen nerds (lots of candles, nice tea towels, huge selection of beautiful pottery/dishes from Tunisian artisans). Nice high quality dry ingredients too (tinned tomatoes, oils, pastas). Their baked goods look so nice, and on weekends they serve slices of a super rich chocolate (TRUNCHBULL) cake like the one from that iconic children’s movie, Matilda.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN0pdKMQyFNW001J--IekmR52ulA4-ZtO3PuVkA\u0026fid=0x0:0xb6c108d0f95535b1"],"When":"2024-10-21"},{"Name":"Kanako Sakurada","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKYybgPjG_d3LYq66Ui47Ocd_2PMrfkKaju5V_L0IyVTR19lQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Chic and bright cafe/ ceramicware store! All the baked goods I tried were excellent! I particularly liked their savoury scone. It was softer than expected but very flavourful.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOcYea1_jm52Ex3NVLF5HU8i7f4NNGhcfO2mUnc\u0026fid=0x0:0xb6c108d0f95535b1"],"When":"2024-1-3"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Juan Carlos “Juan Carlos Cornejo” Cornejo Alfaro","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWK4DOcCHxY1jpQnKxnbwF-UesUsqTxeScFt7XgsrdyP9nM6xIb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good latte taste! Good inside environment and the place is so nice and comfortable. Ideal to have a meeting, come with friends, your couple and so on! Like it! I just came like 5 minutes, and bought a latte, but I love it. There is a small area where you can buy staff from them.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPv7QWNvUTSFjJCydQNgUm3flNSOkpONrPM_X2c&fid=0x0:0x6855b76b5ce59d1c"],"When":"2024-12-24"},{"Name":"Alex MZ","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWFAZ3nTWliK_VtSenzw4uXoch_XcB3H6HxxbxlrUtcPTBIKY4A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I liked the vibe of the place, latte was good, the tables are too close to the next one. I was surprised when someone just wanted to take my plate off without asking me anything, except that, I can say, a good place for meeting up with friends.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPyBBffWRlZiMue0cdOvYNuZTN94LVsH5nRww57&fid=0x0:0x6855b76b5ce59d1c"],"When":"2024-12-4"},{"Name":"Mrs. Leci","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWFUu7tIDGHhiFP61EOIZLCOSzvwJkGN10CXxqa6MRhYpyxpm4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Nice place to have tea...or coffee. (They don't serve coffee at the time we were there, was a bit late. But, still..I thought that for as long as they're open, they should.) So, 1 star less for that.

Love their Maritossi so much, though! Delightful.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOx68EtSLlXTYhVnlXG5NfPmOp0wqBfKQCoRLmw&fid=0x0:0x6855b76b5ce59d1c"],"When":"2024-8-10"},{"Name":"Eva Zia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUJp1CScTOq-jdIBVBA-K4f_r74TZU-kRd9MclConVIiSCPfy3Y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"We went here to get some coffee and pastry. However, they hadn't taken down the café menu and didn't inform us that the coffee bar was closed. After waiting for 10 minutes to place an order, they told us they don't serve coffee and that it's pizza night today, only serving from the pizza menu. We had to go to another café, but the place had a very nice atmosphere with organic products.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOi5tztdqSPhUXwn6mDUbgVI4TDVvjKTgQg7nYf&fid=0x0:0x6855b76b5ce59d1c"],"When":"2024-7-26"},{"Name":"Hye","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjULQQSi1mhNFty7n8ZPesKkMpD31jiIGazltx_wRmE-swaOwr4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Their 'best ever chocolate chip cookie' has been one of my favorite cookies in Van🍪 Also, I recently tried their pain au chocolat, and it was so flaky and delicious. The place’s vibe is already enough to make the visit worthwhile.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMPKhnCy2kmi8RhgzCU6ustOIsO_8_XfTEhB7A&fid=0x0:0x6855b76b5ce59d1c"],"When":"2024-6-28"},{"Name":"Marie Alcantar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWN8i0z6CUazWznWT2TPQyzq5l18orB5z4F3gqQDMI3i6qDqdE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great location, nice seating outside and inside. Beautiful simple interior design with cookbooks to read. Good vibes - went for Mother's Day treat. Had a veggie sandwich - was quite messy to eat with "slippery sauce", but good chunks of veggies and flavors.

Wasn't impressed with a muffin or a cookie. Pretty dry without much of a "ahhh so good" factor. Bland...I understand they are baking with a freshly milled flour and heritage grains - which might affect the texture.
They sell their flour there too (spelt, red spring wheat, red fife, marquis)..for an inexperienced baker might be a challenge. (Speaking from many of my failed attempts - blaming my oven..ha,haa). However - they hold classes to learn!
Price is steep (4 stars).
I wouldn't mind paying $7-8 for a toast, but $11 for beans on toast or $10 for avocado toast seems overpriced. For that money I would rather go next door to Kokomo for more balanced meal.
Coffee is good though. And they sell sourdough starter if you need:)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNN-tWeTkWGC8aa9oFuoIJpld_q2LJOb86P4Yg6&fid=0x0:0x6855b76b5ce59d1c"],"When":"2024-6-9"},{"Name":"Gurv","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXhwceJhFcjYo11eH0UjktVpbt4vgW7SS5aHechrSipNjogSGM7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Visited Flourist Bakery to grab a coffee and some treats, and had a nice experience. The staff are friendly and they have lovely baked goods. Pricey spot, but they offer high quality products.

Update:
My wife and I visited again last week; and had a disappointing experience. I tried the avo toast and it wasn’t great. Even some salt and pepper would have improved the dish. The grilled cheese was tasty though and had a lovely chimichurri.

Recommend visiting if you’re in the area, but careful with what you order!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOP70Kpqvb-px1uKZD6cBFdTQUxhenWgWveIF8_&fid=0x0:0x6855b76b5ce59d1c"],"When":"2022-7-25"},{"Name":"Maria M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXmuhUB-INQ3XCbE2M9HT-MdzILSuqxW6ls6tLvy0JgUoxl1f3wCQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Edit 2024: Overpriced like everywhere in this city, but really good quality, lovely spot to have brunch with friends, great options on the menu.

Edit 2023 May: Been there recently and found everything very overpriced. It’s good quality but don’t expect people to tip on top of already high prices.

I loved this place, one of the best oat milk cappuccinos and cold latte we’ve ever had. A shame they still haven’t opened the store… but there’s tables outside and the vibe of the staff is very nice. The cookies are delicious BUT the chocolate chip is not the best ever hahaha.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO1MlrynUYOuE7u7DWM9JPdMVGIWR-dgnqW8tHU&fid=0x0:0x6855b76b5ce59d1c"],"When":"2021-9-26"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Mandeep Kaur","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUxZUEb8HcwwME3Z5rPCcF4yjVhcYRtAzdEBWjyAcHSYNtnaedo=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was first time I visited this cafe and I absolutely loved this cafe! The atmosphere is cozy and inviting, making it the perfect spot to spend the day working. The food is delicious, and the service is always top-notch. I felt comfortable sitting there all day, thanks to the peaceful environment and excellent cleanliness.

It's a must-visit for anyone looking to work quietly or for couples seeking a charming place to enjoy good conversation. If you're in the area, don’t miss out on this gem!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPR6dxKOxW4W7AEj9l9czX-aANt9xDXwgOfeEyB&fid=0x0:0x66911adf5b91ce18"],"When":"2024-10-24"},{"Name":"Montserrat Man","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUYOQ5MkfC1RifyP_aPSn-sFLkFRMCCEemioK7_hwT03w_z5gqm=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Although the service leaves something to be desired, the food is delicious.

If you are looking for just coffee options, this may be another option like any other cafe in Vancouver.

I was surprised to see the size of the coffee, we ordered a MEDIUM and it seemed to be a SMALL.

If you like to work on a computer, this may be a quiet place to do so.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM_oDA_8P4LEa2PDlEnFn9VYPQndgP6zxkzMk_M&fid=0x0:0x66911adf5b91ce18"],"When":"2024-9-4"},{"Name":"Najm Chaarani","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUxxjmAsUttKs_eh_HZC7DG-01lC-uSY4MnDLiz_SlvlZ4eS6_W=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Good coffee, nice to find a place that serves dark roast. Limited non dairy food options. The vegan wrap was passable but a little sad and kind of gas inducing. The cookies put a huge smile on our faces.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMEdtAio5ms89s8PkRKDv8Sc44bvGmW6wjdBDQ&fid=0x0:0x66911adf5b91ce18"],"When":"2023-3-11"},{"Name":"Kate T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUPT4SQtP18-GWWxWErD9XZ5Cxp_5oqSRnCDRJqj3isCsriJMDX=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Foods good, coffee is good, employees are lovely. but there's not nearly enough seats and not a single outlet for people to work, which is half the purpose of a coffee shop.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"roland szabó","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXTWYHYCETYQLHZLAN5f8yLCZSWd9D7UuuxmS6kVQLTDEruOnZ-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"a little bit expensive but the best coffee:)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP3r2whzmGg2NPL43IcpuG-Qat4_e2amAE1o7Pj&fid=0x0:0x66911adf5b91ce18"],"When":"2024-10-5"},{"Name":"K ZM","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLbQQH12gwY2goqP6VKtbLbGoabpUsQzHxFXsEZVAeSh-CWDw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Not as nice as the Burnaby Heights or the downtown ones but for the area, it’ll do.

Nice patio seating outdoors.

Spacious washroom, give it that.

Shiver chocolate in the way to go!

Lots of parking.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"S.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ118Fvo1iX1UWG7HUFvCFD0djGVobr9ccF7_1Z5qVX7a7j4w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Can’t comment on the drinks since I’m not a coffee person, but I absolutely enjoyed the raspberry earl grey scone here! Could really taste each component.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPtvqw-K2qpZYiukfRpFPWKlARzMz4nA5D-Mn9D&fid=0x0:0x66911adf5b91ce18"],"When":"2022-7-9"},{"Name":"Ken Mau","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXqHSCzXa-frztuoG2L2xRBBHj6ut00tNxNr3llxaruAfbIkSS2=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Almond croissant was ok, not really memorable. But the Raspberry Earl Grey scone was great! You can really taste the rich tea and fruity flavour in every bite.

Cold Brew was refreshing.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPt5JS0GryjAieZnSNgky5pdxaR63iSBPAjqIRZ&fid=0x0:0x66911adf5b91ce18"],"When":"2022-7-17"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Leigh White","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKxH4R_fpBsBWsJVNbs72-Zmju2MxQGFSGp23FeQSI9HWgdfGo=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"For the past 2 years, this has been my go-to shop, not just for the great product selection but for the truly amazing—always happy—staff! The displays are so pretty, and they even deliver! 10/10 would recommend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOmzOJiyruxrEzxx24g14LretC66wErANSilRo-&fid=0x0:0x8521a3e0e15b344c"],"When":"2024-10-7"},{"Name":"Joey Carter","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVVxJhmegLxZTiNK1kFjGHgDdGo3bbkfdT-9_i2VmsPV6_ZjTD9=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This morning I brought my best friend to the shop to discuss the medicinal benefits of using CBD Oil as an alternative Cancer treatment.. The Woman who served Us was very knowledgeable and gave us excellent direction.
This store has a wide variety of locally grown buds and the prices are very reasonable.
The atmosphere is very soothing and clean.
And that Little Frenchy mascot is so Awesomely adorable friendly and stubborn.
I'm adding my experience with Big-Bag-O-Buds Combo-Oz.
I got 1/2 Ounce of Pink Kush Mints
And 1/2 Ounce of Key Fuel Pre.
Great Smooth breath.
Great head high.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNCkPaA298bW1kdVdpTysm9Og_Xh31YUBW8U3cz&fid=0x0:0x8521a3e0e15b344c"],"When":"2024-8-4"},{"Name":"j c","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI0fJ6s6Cl8mEuPsbdUBc1NZ9AblbR4ks79oeZgRGxFBLfcUQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I rarely write reviews, but feel very compelled to write about Local. I ordered from them earlier in the week for delivery, very friendly and accommodating staff and delivery was a breeze. Their selection is fantastic, you can tell that they curate their products with utmost care. Price is very competitive as well. Highly recommend!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Randy Zive","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKgiMf0Q5PN0FUPHvPjrbhdnOpprOYmKVtBuMhH9MbPhOascQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First of all, I’ve been searching for months to find a dispensary that carries Royal Harvest products. To my surprise and delight, I found Local Cannabis last night and placed an order at 8:30am this morning. Literally three hours later, voila, the cannabis I’ve been looking for arrived at my door. I’m ecstatic. Now I also need to tell you how helpful and friendly the staff are at Local. They answered all my questions promptly and completely. The person who delivered my order was also very friendly. I tend to only buy craft cannabis which is what Local specializes in, which is great. Based on my first experience, I plan to make further purchases from Local and I advise you to do the same, especially if you’re a cannabis enthusiast or connoisseur. Thank you very much Local for making me very happy and very pleased with my order. Take care and all the best!
Update: Nov 15/24
I just had to add something. You have to know how incredibly fantastic Local really is. I have been purchasing from Dispensaries in Vancouver and area ever since the very 1st dispensary opened many moons ago. Local by far, is the very best you will find! Courteous, friendly, knowledgeable and helpful beyond belief, especially these days. This place is awesome. I sincerely mean that. Thank you, thank you, thank you. I love you guys!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOlPhFkWpu63H-XOTnn9UTFiZvidd9sw7B4jZ_A&fid=0x0:0x8521a3e0e15b344c"],"When":"2024-6-26"},{"Name":"Yael Petel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVDYfCaDVsWnlmEl9ZQ6MlvrozI9P2c-F9MS-hfyZon6Iapuma-8g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"An awesome delivery experience. Tali was quick to arrive and very knowledgeable! Helped me get started with the machine and also gave awesome tips and recommendations!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jack Johnson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIetFSR0uEJMESrOPTYoQ7buE0hcPT7BwNo4UqVMbeMM6jrHQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great section, always fresh! The guys always help and know what they are talking about! One downside is they ask for a tip but they are not pushy about it! Other than that I drive to this store from Surrey so it’s worth it!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"J A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIfkdfQeauhci2fiM6sKV54sjIzTjIlOCwi_-fbOALibQEmkI0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is my new favourite dispensary. They carry such a great selection of craft flower, and always have great customer service. 10/10","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Clayton Robertson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUYYtsoZ4f2Mdi2szTOUXeCSLehGEr4GPUM3FgZQ2wnJ9rbVB9i=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great store to buy legal cannabis. The staff members Tali & Marcus were super helpful and had lots of knowledge on the different strains of marijuana. There was lots of choices and very reasonable prices","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Christopher Springstead","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIOdPHmBksd5KIaExDn1_JzFnZs67PypslJKZzJMSyAAKcMuA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love this little shop. There aren't many Portuguese stores around Vancouver and this one feels authentic. It's run by a sweet older woman and I worry what will happen to the store should she retire. Amazing pastries and a good place to get some groceries you may not be able to get elsewhere.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"jorge medina","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW94ivTcnx6KAGm0YEQ8Ghty4bqKnNze2lX-C21cHhPAYeg6-MM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent tasting coffee, a place with a very familiar atmosphere. Very good prices, 100% recommended.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Danika Dvorak","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW5k1152wnT7wD14_LbQwJuE6FgutKRQJlCoYcDeRy5W8m5usZw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We stopped in on a whim and were pleasantly surprised at the selection. One of the ladies made us a great coffee and some Pastel de Nata.. better than the ones we tried in Portugal! We will definitely be back for her baking.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mara Lanzarote","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLfAQvN_0JEIjE2lUyMMEBqJ2quFbmr0iT7mAC0aisV8rqW-g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing service, great coffee and it's super cheap. Coffee and pastry only $2. Everyone is so friendly. Great experience!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMAdKm0sj3bwoWoYet0sRknSW0qQtnCc6tcYUPN&fid=0x0:0xa8fc001870dd2c6d"],"When":"2023-12-15"},{"Name":"Alex Pinto","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVlP_BuXJDA9j4pDjEcPswdJyWnYxChzDC6GZ7ITdk6_nOjyNmd=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Been looking all over for cured salted codfish until I came across this place. Good variety of items overall, the ladies who take care of the shop are very friendly and treat you like if you’re home.

Will be coming back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM4uYRIadYVYAVb4jktC7vjKYYkW6AdxRrceVCg&fid=0x0:0xa8fc001870dd2c6d"],"When":"2022-10-11"},{"Name":"Andre Lopes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWyH-RzPTcxvkSMLFJtsmnB4vgwB1eq2OdjcmhdEXz9VID33MjOzw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The best spot for buying cured salted codfish in Vancouver.
It's a little outdated inside but the owner is a very nice old lady who sometimes offers you a pastry and coffee for free. Pretty cool","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Niamh O'Donnell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWyS2_nJ17-zn7zQmTVxf_ydZTAPaaKru-350i8CE1ixIWCJXwl=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"$2 Coffee and Pastry. A very chill cafe, everyone is friendly and very welcoming. Great service!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Arthur Kao","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXsRs-dkMNRZ_-4WylCAqhtEbbVMaCP3DRrekwqULLpwoOnvzsy=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The only place i could find sumol in vancouver.  their pastéis de nata are pretty good and it’s relatively cheap compared to other places $1.50 each.  most other places (i could only find them in asian bakeries) sell at $2 each.  Guaraná is a bit pricey but its worth it.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"N “Minaoka” N","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVLM29oukNuw0VGmRupQYbXCWQVv9sqfg5h3FP5AbyXShl2bASQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The place is new and aesthetic. Very nice branding. The pastries werent as good as advertised, I had the canele. Probably because they just started opening, I ll come back and update my review later","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPYmEBnmMp-OGI2Hw7Z3uydUnb_DD8uOKSYZYSe\u0026fid=0x0:0x41cadcefc3b9f6c2"],"When":"2024-12-22"},{"Name":"Kevin Quach","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUfNa1SPYL40FQHs1DyCOwnvgu9UHvh2p9qe_2cbWiuLC4Q-RDjIQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great little Cafe with a mom and pop vibe! The coffee is fantastic","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPRzIvwCPMco3nGMuLgifiKu0zLAfKm4nd0qy-3\u0026fid=0x0:0x41cadcefc3b9f6c2"],"When":"2024-12-25"},{"Name":"Jose Rivero","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWCqrIIcuZDM-NysRVxLfxeVKGlH3-R4ywN3Ly4g8fG8hg9dPiq=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I visited this place during a weekend trip to Vancouver and had an amazing experience. I ordered the Cachitos and an Americano, and both were absolutely delicious. The food was fresh, the coffee was rich and flavorful, and the service was great. They also offered me a sample of their chocolates, which were so irresistible that I ended up taking some home. This spot is a gem—I highly recommend it!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOkioleT7AHRBQeVSe8kMIy1UQS3rfK_CiiCuhO\u0026fid=0x0:0x41cadcefc3b9f6c2"],"When":"2024-12-9"},{"Name":"Oriana Campos","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKaGonP7YGpMywqtgwwsr_jlDSVzzfGe1x-2fX_Hu0xJB-IaQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What an amazing place! The food was absolutely divine, and the coffee was simply delicious. I had been looking for a spot where I could enjoy both, and I finally found it. This place won me over from the very first visit. Plus, the staff is wonderful, and they also speak Spanish. 100% recommended!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Vancouver-BC BC","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX8lAlslWeaSLuiM5sLB9FYfPO6bcFKxtmhmQhAzsZd9EmFoLQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"So excited to see new bakery opening in the west side of Vancouver. Boutique cafe/bakery with bright orange color brings cheer to people’s life. I ordered expresso drink ( little sour to my tasting) and chocolate croissant (5/5 tasting and good balance of melt chocolate and butter - remind me the time spent in Paris ). I also ordered some pastries to take away ( mello bun, egg tart, and raisin bun). Would definitely come back. Wish there are more seating/ space.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNDpP_7CeRRwY5wAmE0LwrJsSTh1qVmnPK53Z0d\u0026fid=0x0:0x41cadcefc3b9f6c2"],"When":"2024-12-14"},{"Name":"Sélim Dahmane","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJWVOw2tTg0MA3v_ECciHgObS-h5DbfVMAnlSe9ZLZakygGXQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"So happy about that new place , pastries are the best in town or some of the best for sure !\nGood job !","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOQMiLhVLt3pOj2sOTHX5KmfS0HSeQQAA_CPZal\u0026fid=0x0:0x41cadcefc3b9f6c2"],"When":"2024-12-19"},{"Name":"Ryan Lowe","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjViOjF0AezRrfkrkYyLyUHdhVhrpwpa_vmgYX9e21AZzyKDtGx9=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very friendly staff and fun atmosphere. Coffee is delicious and the pastries even better. We had their chocolate chip cookie and eclairs, which were both delicious. We ate them so fast we didn’t manage to snap any photos. Great place to meet friends for coffee and pastries.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Amanda Ko","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWnoBiadi8Y4Ay8TjJnDI__o3dlELgJ5bYdoxDn1cNkJXeZFeH5=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We visit Toña for the first time with friends and It was a lovely experience! The atmosphere is cozy and fun, coffee and pastries were tasty and the best part was the friendly staff! Super recommended! Also their caramels, chocolate cookie and the eclairs are delicious!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"L S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV7Fs9Zln1Mi6KJj1r9xT5ZY-1fXZdBRHpZUBGr97nnpUmsTNiyFQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had the best waiter! He was so friendly and had the best stories. Just made the whole experience pleasant. We came for drinks and snacks. The holiday cocktails were nicely made and tasty. We shared some appetizers which were perfect for sharing and tasty. Meatballs and chicken thighs. Then had a dessert sampler with chocolate and cookies. All were fabulous!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOQyUbb25j34Wie5PJdXjiytsC0l1FPALnZ5FP5&fid=0x0:0xa630a9701b4ea29f"],"When":"2024-12-18"},{"Name":"Al M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWo-incBfSHjwmKyWBdSZ_wuLeNHaFB7XqG2xDb_TAG-n4UXzI1Sw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great Service and Food!

Bacchus Restaurant & Bar in Vancouver is a true culinary delight! My partner and I enjoyed a memorable dinner for two in this beautiful establishment. The ambiance is simply stunning, with dim lighting that exudes warmth and an old-school charm enhanced by white linen tablecloths. It's the perfect setting for a special evening.

The service was impeccable from start to finish. The staff was polished, friendly, and incredibly well-versed in the menu, ensuring we were well taken care of throughout our meal. They constantly replenished our fresh bread and water, and the dishes were promptly cleared after each course, allowing us to fully enjoy every moment.

Now, onto the food! We indulged in the rack of lamb, which was cooked to perfection, and the lobster tartare, a delightful treat bursting with flavor. The herb-crusted fish was another standout, showcasing the kitchen's expertise. Each dish was beautifully presented and incredibly delicious.

While Bacchus is on the pricier side, the quality of the food and the overall dining experience make it worth every penny. If you're looking for a fancy night out with exquisite cuisine in a charming atmosphere, Bacchus is the place to be. We can’t wait to return!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPZ-5J6bGjKwHNdCISYvrmQOhdZhgATzAJWDwi1&fid=0x0:0xa630a9701b4ea29f"],"When":"2024-12-9"},{"Name":"Ben M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLY7-DFsqx-InW5CnlXpJd6DWvP1u6nfShJnLWMiHPMX_9EZw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Lovely ambiance and excellent service. The food overall meets the high standards you'd expect from a restaurant of this caliber. The duck liver parfait was really good and mashed potato was so velvety. One slight disappointment was with the burger's beef patty—it was a bit dry.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP0ajo3KOMmKFcizPPwpfh3KY5Nb4RT7eEylHfJ&fid=0x0:0xa630a9701b4ea29f"],"When":"2024-11-15"},{"Name":"M L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLxO8c0aAiGxJLyxeIsd1MD52-njpdQjgsru6Gv20k0345G6tST=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We had the most awful experience. The receptionist and the waitress who served us had terrible attitude. The food and ambiance are great but the service was disappointing. The server and the receptionist on duty on Christmas Eve around 8:30pm were just awful, they were snobby and haughty. The service that we received from the receptionist (the one who had her hair down on duty during Christmas Eve 2024) and the waitress who served us that evening were just horrible and not at par with the service that other five star restaurants we go to like Le Crocodile, Giardino, Five Sails and Blue Water provides. Please change your servers and receptionist. Horrible! Just read the other review from Mr. Rowe. We had the same horrible experience from the staff — haughty, snobby, zero service skills! We are not after freebies. We just want the owner to know this. Please read other reviews. Even the doormen have attitude. The Filipino doorman/guy has an attitude. The other Caucasian guy on duty during Christmas Eve December 24 at 8:30pm also has bad attitude. Please train them better or hire others who are more service oriented. The food and ambiance are great but the service is just awful. I wrote an email to Ms. Jackson. She needs to know this.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNuwq7v0ZmID2-CeM4-Qp99R91kXcyQhtLXQBN2&fid=0x0:0xa630a9701b4ea29f"],"When":"2024-12-25"},{"Name":"Mike Morotti (NY Mike)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV0Qj3mb4C6bbX8hdTF36qYbJmEzYXUUfhpxW92Tud8c0y1KuzW2w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The first time that I ate, here was in 1998 and I took my wife on a date here from California. Last night and tonight were the latest visits since 1998 and when I say a restaurant is flawless, I don’t mess around. Bacchus is flawless! From the second you walk into the restaurant until the last step, this place is enchanting, and the menu is extra extraordinary. Come here! You will ❤️❤️❤️ it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNGmMzGMjex9WS-QNfUM-xXa5e7GBjBMiPO1AVU&fid=0x0:0xa630a9701b4ea29f"],"When":"2024-11-22"},{"Name":"j j","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLTj8g_qHxOz6WVfoo2V3zYfnPe-lr6f-x_YpoHV1wWHxmXQfVw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"10pm, we walked in for two, the hostess asked if we were in for drinks.

I said that we were here for the seafood platter (I was especially excited for the crab roll).

The hostess seemed a bit apprehensive as she looked down at our clothing and shoes. But she walked us in and sat us down.

Two drinks, a seafood platter adorned with extra oysters to make up for their crab rolls that had run out (which they did not mention until we asked about it), a tiramisu, and $200 later...

It's 3am ... My partner had to call an ambulance for me as I cried in pain because of my stomach hurting and vomiting after eating the seafood platter.. it felt like I was going to die.
Fortunately, I started feeling better before the ambulance came so it was cancelled.
I may have to go to the hospital if things take a turn for the worse again but I am hoping I can stay home and not have Christmas day ruined..

Do not order the oysters this season.

At least the ambience was nice and service was efficient.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOqofwEGlJPAarqhdUY3Iw16xjJjtVD1fkSjcKZ&fid=0x0:0xa630a9701b4ea29f"],"When":"2024-12-25"},{"Name":"Katie Robinson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX5S4ouLKz5vC6vKpWcpjau2tS55tbcB0048TfJTPPu-S1u1G8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lots of amazing Bavarian options on the menu, authentic and delicious with beautiful plating. I love the warming atmosphere of the dark woods and red velvet. Dining calm and mellow, I could easily spend all day here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN54Ipr365vd22Jhz0RbvpZJClULR0YFj_E35AT&fid=0x0:0xa630a9701b4ea29f"],"When":"2024-10-22"},{"Name":"Eric Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWCImIE_-9GPSHLVqKt90NBhKhoRiGYVchzi6NNRDKBw2Xvo7Rq=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I stayed here for one night, unfortunately, I was able to come only after dinner. Service was excellent. Cocktails were tasty and it oysters and curry board were excellent. Nothing less than what I expected","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP94neX274MogMXqv3unBqaWWTWkLHMmfcX5Sg&fid=0x0:0xa630a9701b4ea29f"],"When":"2024-12-1"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"P G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX0fCU2Qc0a_c6EyAnrC9oWHMXOLKbAIpYaZPyN9xTdV9lbUoGm=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Happy for a Prado in Dunbar and they probably serve the best coffee on the street, but the acoustics are awful so conversations can be challenging, staff were bored & it felt they didn’t care, and premade sandwiches were totally overheated. Early days, sure the kinks will get ironed out…","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOo9cAp1YPwdE-vdYuy3RZqVX8fZgejwgIlm7Y7&fid=0x0:0xef8c4a447b99af9e"],"When":"2024-8-22"},{"Name":"Earth Explorer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXx9WbpYHoWti2M8dulDcVEiSwzq2Is9YdecFV0_EjsI1gR2sUT=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Loved the espresso tonic! ❤️💯. Th turmeric latte is also delicious 😋.  The seating is comfortable and there's lots of natural light. The Wi-Fi is pathetic at 5/1. 😞","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNWB82crVSsYnqF_DuuhidGdF20epsUwSm48xr1&fid=0x0:0xef8c4a447b99af9e"],"When":"2024-6-19"},{"Name":"Kelvin Fong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWYlOJ0ZWKycRqx5ZOzHhnjusnD1vSd-Gno_8IQ4mNi6hmtCYtiSA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The store is stunning and the baked goods are satisfactory. I like the friendly service. However, I found the Americano lacking in flavor; it seemed a bit acidic, possibly the beans used. Despite not typically enjoying carrot cake, I found theirs decent because of the complementing buttercream. The no-name cookie was delightful, packed with ingredients, although a few more marshmallows would enhance its appeal.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMcs4Ro-zBSF4elgWlll6VKYK58dDHAQVEoV6_G&fid=0x0:0xef8c4a447b99af9e"],"When":"2024-4-17"},{"Name":"Paul A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI1XgMvkF8Q2Oz6Ki6OrOozEwm9dkJa2u2eB-NrRKPWSPr3ZQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The flat white with oat milk is one of the best coffee’s I ever had.  Staff is super friendly.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOzF0NzfYE4Kmb9Xi9EsF5_OEdKKHRTudrCefjy&fid=0x0:0xef8c4a447b99af9e"],"When":"2024-10-6"},{"Name":"Guy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX9w8mPeeDgR-y-Xsp0_bkkNJXeesqjbJcHcEL1Pv_DeQrU23I=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Incredibly expensive, coffee is alright but not worth how much it costs, and the food is super pricey as well…I’d expect bigger portions too, considering a grilled cheese is tiny and like $10…But I will admit that their sandwiches are very tasty!

Staff was very friendly and professional though. The atmosphere is kind of sterile, it lacks of charm and personality in my opinion.

Overall a good coffee shop, but very expensive and not necessarily the best place around.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"P Catala","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUfHKEXeUg1oFvjn52-9sibOm1oYY6OBZ6FhrbO8Uon2N5g9oqX=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I've been a long time fan of Prado on Fir so I was so happy to see the new dunbar location.  Sadly not the same standard at all. I ordered a cappuccino but got a latte. Zero foam and the staff didn't seem to know the difference between a cappuccino and a latte. The coffee was bitter and burnt and I couldn't drink it at all. Train your staff. The pain au Chocolat and the Croissant were good. But the coffee here is not at all the Prado coffee that I have enjoyed at your other locations. It was undrinkable.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Will Anderson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX5Hm6AjeO740qFyk5mKC2aWhtCN4pycpwipcFsZ-XhQKSlGf26PQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great coffee shop open in Dunbar.  The inside is bright and spacious and the coffee and snacks great","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO4gG2MTy4ycbwF0fSPzu5uKmmlqoDc2KRjhkuM&fid=0x0:0xef8c4a447b99af9e"],"When":"2024-4-23"},{"Name":"Catherine Holmen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVHslBQZw39vwCjier_xQLehf-7LOI55ccOnYGt24Qm8fYOYys=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Expensive - Dunbar! Good vibe. I was there very shortly after opening, and the table had dried coffee stains on it.. left from the day before? The bathroom also wasn't super clean.","Images":null,"When":""}]
