user_reviews:
[{"Name":"J. Woolery","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKTsAub2Ez4gu3OGuXqSvpCQxUCrNo7G_9J1SZLHRsIyqK_Ug=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A wonderful and much needed replacement for the Starbucks. The prices are very reasonable and the portion sizes were quite fair. A good range of sandwich options, looking forward to trying out the baked goods next time. Tea was the perfect temperature and sandwich was warm and crispy. They are also peanut-free! What I loved most was the attentive staff, they made great recommendations and hand-delivered our orders to the table. Will definitely be back in the future 😊","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOVPlOrsLchhBKOmmzZwVP0DqVTiP0FZg6leZN4&fid=0x0:0xea6c012d591acdde"],"When":"2024-7-25"},{"Name":"Cody","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWa9Q1OwaGw1xfYg0Za_Uq1MjH16Q3CFdsnAfmOdBTYvijBaj4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best subs at the best price. Great quality and the owner is super cool. I don't even bother going to subway or Quiznos anymore. Good spot to hit before you head to the beach","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM9Z-1nFL0C8t3XpMwrjhcuYmq-tGP3F2RDHlC2&fid=0x0:0xea6c012d591acdde"],"When":"2024-8-1"},{"Name":"Nuriya Azamatova","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXwXADyL9kFlN-5nq1DdjSk2r0DlE_GZZoM2LGXGpgFJMtY2Mw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"the owner/barista is so welcoming! They have very decently priced coffees, and currently they have a promo — 50% off all coffees for students until the end of October.

i got this large iced latte with caramel syrup for $3.7 and the owner gave me 1.5 pumps of caramel syrup to make it more flavorful :) i don’t know where else in vancouver you’d find a large ice latte for $3.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPU_VrhNpBM_dstxD9mRW8UJHFG0lOVMwH6En93&fid=0x0:0xea6c012d591acdde"],"When":"2024-10-13"},{"Name":"Ella Gladders","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUN--GPQ4rHO9A_htxdSJD2kajMZXeWYnGkgvWASwFN0fIL5guv=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"When I first went to Bynns, I thought I’d be disappointed considering it replaced the Starbucks, but I was more than pleasantly surprised. I’ve tried many of the refreshers on the menu, and not only are they affordable, but they are so good and made with great ingredients. I appreciate that they actually serve you a nice and full drink rather than filling the entire cup with ice. I wouldn’t ask for anything else to replace the Starbucks. I also received a complementary refresher while I was doing shopping in the stores around Bynns which made my day. It’s nice to know that there’s still these kinds of stores that make Dunbar a warm and friendly neighborhood. The owners and staff are very nice and personable people. I’m very happy with the new implementation of Bynns and am super excited to see what they come out with next!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"June Ang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKJP5yl8i7K22hs1ifUDS_dkFzkW6Tzf01nDChdS5OW-D97HA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Popped by a couple of times for breakfast, coffee and sandwich. Was greeted with warmly, utmost professionalism, the person in-charged explained in details on the choices, they have also revamped their menus which is tidier. The cafe was clean, cosy and warm. For today's visit, which is my third time there, he remembered my coffee preference. Will definitely visit again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Cyrus Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXVBJc74NURHRvcURHoFDrSI4BSVXlco0GQ4wiQloF4fQKg9qM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"As per other reviews, the sandwiches are subway style. The quality of bread and ingredients is much higher, but they are pretty skimpy with their meat and veg. Service was friendly,  but rather slow and odd. Coffee was okay.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Matt Halliday","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKWQWDrPh_csHvdV5_dEwnBSFqvsryByMjJ5Uqpk65EzCcZ4w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Worst sub I've had anywhere, even mr.sub better. Was under filled and tasteless. Very disappointing.  Subway way better for price paid. Got a "jumbo"6" and there were 2 pieces of thin sliced deli ham and roast beef. How is that jumbo?! When I opened the wrapper, you couldn't tell there was topping on the bread without opening there were so little. Wanted something better for a change bit $ and profit margins are more important than return customers I guess. Sad. Tried to support local","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Peng-Ying Ho","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKvn0Zq6CUNz-M1aiW8-Mqg2sDYKFSMykm5-l89yhQWqF8kSA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"So happy there are more delicious and healthy options for this neighborhood!!!
Definitely will come back and also will put it in my to go list during the free cooking day.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO7ZYGpulHNyfCTDGaCVcpL28P8ht48UPCgFIFv&fid=0x0:0xea6c012d591acdde"],"When":"2024-5-13"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Parker Pratt","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXJU0WC7BNhoquaNZ7TyZKhVt3dPGzFKMGuxVDDqWMVqqdm8QUp9A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Service is great and the atmosphere is VERY cozy. Front area is well kept and clean, but the back could use some work(not entirely their fault, the building is clearly old). The food was good but not great. We got a couple of different crepes, some hot cocoa and a slice of lemon cake. I'm personally not a huge fan of buckwheat so if it's possible to get white flour for the savory options I recommend that.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOWLxyITN1V472cwwASIQVMH7ZsGX-A5KqPJw04&fid=0x0:0xace99864f8090dad"],"When":"2024-6-23"},{"Name":"Greg Mattson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUFrbttlbDAMTrqcEYaEoNGgTXaMwtarCi6C54s9mUz7zEh6gC-iw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The best thing going for this place is the location, close to 41st ave & Dunbar - pretty much the only cafe in the area, unless you go much further east into Kerrisdale itself. My cappuccino was delivered to my table (!) quickly, so that was impressive. The coffee itself was OK. Besides that, there’s some concerns here: 1)display cases which at 2:00 in the afternoon were almost bare, 2)dirty dish return area that is definitely  not as clean as it should be, 3)the entire cafe needs some ventilation/fresh air, and 4)seating is comfortable but chair/table combinations are much more suitable for conversation than using a laptop.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNRarfiYmgJ-q1gvXlXqH8bHs1VvzgFWTifpJnF&fid=0x0:0xace99864f8090dad"],"When":"2024-4-26"},{"Name":"Earth Explorer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXx9WbpYHoWti2M8dulDcVEiSwzq2Is9YdecFV0_EjsI1gR2sUT=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a quiet and comfortable place for breakfast or lunch and to do some work. The crepes with eggs were delicious and they have a very nice selection of tea. They offered some gluten-free pastries. The Wi-Fi was 5/1.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipND3MZzy6BrRmvXm3B8cUX11GPtpL_t6D7hNVb7&fid=0x0:0xace99864f8090dad"],"When":"2024-6-20"},{"Name":"Quinn Middleton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVY2QdQYVqfpGNwtjggHktblvZSmbHIJsZC9kLsVLJDUcmOUHKb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"From the outside, you would think it's just a generic cafe that serves 'meh' food, but Crepe Cafe surprised me...

It's a family run cafe and the staff are very friendly and welcoming. I have only tried their sandwiches, but they are made fresh to order rather than being taken out of their display like other places. The espresso drinks are about average, but not horrible.

If you're in Dunbar, give this place a try👌","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNHomGOF9USnTuxcIaFF03EZPIORc2-l_r7qor2&fid=0x0:0xace99864f8090dad"],"When":"2023-9-27"},{"Name":"Katie Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVIjMysay4-FQVEPUnU2iivCs6D7x1kzSWlLVk1hwpWr3ttr5es=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Cozy neighborhood cafe. Service was great. Ordered a mocha latte but it tasted like hot chocolate-- I frankly didn't even taste the coffee 😅 Stuff are really sweet here-- I'm not a fan of sweet things but I was in a good mood and didn't really mind too much.

Crepe was good but wish they sold them plain with jam/Nutella on the side or something. The sweet options are too sweet. Maybe it was possible but I didn't ask.

Overall, a decent cafe stop if you're in the neighborhood but not a place I'd make a trip for.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP1QYsaox0VwlHZND1laNGmTM-yhEhAArzbY4VV&fid=0x0:0xace99864f8090dad"],"When":"2023-8-30"},{"Name":"A singh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKhcpKZ1cLXYaxugzfB2P8fOQWU_fMxCyyERFq-nMAdFuUTUwXJ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A very ry well managed cafe. The staff is very welcoming and polite. The owner is an amazing personality.
A must visit cafe and I would truly recommend the place.
You must visit it to actually feel the warmth and aura of the cafe.
The food is amazing. The place actually deserves more than a 5 star rating 👏","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"William Lau","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVmQdctlbM12t5Occdf84xI_X4OatAdUnoO7Mf5nuujaBWYasmgPA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Not the same cafe. I visited many years ago.  The chicken crepe used butter chicken pieces rather than plain chicken and the daily special is butter chicken with naan bread.

The girl behind the counter was not the French ethnicity that I've seen here before but rather of that ethnicity.

The egg and spinach crepe she made was decent and fresh.  Nothing special to say as it was typical egg and spinach crepe that was decently seasoned.

The chicken crepe had butter chicken pieces, red onion and tomatoes. Temperature of filling very cool so I originally thought this was made first and the other made after but the crepe was a little drying and seemed pulling apart around the filling area so it might have been premade and reheated. Taste was ok, but would have rather had freshly made one from scratch, even if with plain chicken.

Was there early so room was empty.  Plenty of residential street parking if need to park more than the 1hr that the 41st Ave. street offers.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMTZVrgWlV-reEfTRBxo8KkMO8Pq-Lsk3Xe_r_Q&fid=0x0:0xace99864f8090dad"],"When":"2019-8-24"},{"Name":"Marc Harris","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ0-_fHdw6dI5UTCDSShdCSvLGyTKZoaiMYMpD52alAaa7n_Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Crêpe & Café has a great Parisian style artistic atmosphere for the best coffee break, away from the distractions of the city, is close to the unique area of Kerrisdale, Vancouver, and the food and desserts are delicious!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Natalie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUJmL09ft8ERyx9NXdKmSsxwjef42P4_e8q1aaW7Ph8UiLpmYQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"We’ve been to the store a few times. Recently we came in as our in laws (from England, live small town Northern BC) were visiting, and we wanted to surprise them with some treats. They were excited when they saw everything we found. Then later when they tasted a few of them, realized they were stale. We then checked the expiry dates, all were expired, some going back to as far as almost a year prior. Incredibly disappointing.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ken Yu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUJPuCA8mJu95EySoCYbF2CXIYVmEp__3RtzfkIHSes82IHK8k8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I often come here to buy UK soft drinks, bath liquid soap, tea bags and their UK classic cartoon Mr.men little miss picture books.

The shop owner and team members are always helpful and friendly to serve me even though English isn't my native language.

As I grew up in British Hong Kong, my mom's friend always gave us PG tips teabags for a gift.  Although I didn't drink hot tea, I did like this tea after I became an adult.

British Expats should make a trip to visit if you are looking for British grocery and connect with British people.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPPVAUhD7NPs9P_QaDO4eSBw2K5rGhqirGPSd_W&fid=0x0:0xb1d5a989f5da8590"],"When":"2021-5-21"},{"Name":"Tom Bromwich","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWlLUrDsM_gZK7NYlNtF4OjBb87mcZzQmMyuhFgI75My_21FhM8hw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"A great selection of food and supplies from confectionery through to personal care. The baked goods are great and nice to have a taste of home.

Whilst I appreciate the cost of importing the goods, the prices are significantly higher than other ex-pat stores within the GV area.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"M Vince","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocINswVKcv_7HP6hXe_zVU1zoGZNgim_-GL6O41VCeXNWV7WGg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We found this looking for a Pineapple Jam online, the person who answered the phone was friendly. When we arrived, the counter lady was very nice and even told me which pineapple jam she likes.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Peter O'Neill","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI5Xmtz2Fd9iXvHrb42BP6r4V6OIXbSuRJiRsI3zYaLGEFugw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The real deal. Can’t believe it took me so long to find out about this place. Great spot for British and Irish sweets and teas. I went in for a browse and bought so much. What a way to get some of your favourite foods from the motherland.
I was very surprised by the black pudding and Wiltshire rashers.
Recommend this place to ex pats.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMyqRna83WssP2CV2QX5wLgxtBYqZQheruc2S5F&fid=0x0:0xb1d5a989f5da8590"],"When":"2020-7-3"},{"Name":"Lisa Kreut","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXIZYklgyurmSdbnznHbPjeTvNvzSOZAF-SWLAr5Ml2tWTNfjyf=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Was craving haggis and someone suggested this shop. They didn't have it frozen when I went, but I managed to get it in a can, which I'm sure will taste delicious on toast with cheese. They also had a large selection of frozen meats, sausage (including black pudding), and meat pies, as well as deserts, candies, curries, cheeses, canned goods and condiments. The staff was very friendly and helpful as well. I will definitely return the next time I'm craving British food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO-3HfAXwKCURIYh2sxEBk8OcF6muaV83KYtX7T&fid=0x0:0xb1d5a989f5da8590"],"When":"2021-5-4"},{"Name":"sharon amrolia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL1exoEGg4XrWDitaCR1l6fvp9CRIChYFxapcaYkz7_sY2bbg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing British fare.  All your favorite stuff from across the pond.  Not cheap but worth it if your craving it.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Felix Howe","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJKNf7P0FLE1eaJGWpD9vqsWrPiKLlUF7EcGrD8AsD26Ysil5w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great selection, and I appreciated all the little explanatory notes about "we tried to import this thing/other flavour but couldn't because [various import restrictions]".

Also, the cash register makes old-school Mario noises when the item you chose is discounted.

We will likely go here again on future Vancouver trips.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Tom Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIRz4ZyYHXz0vvLIUynyDSEmxenykwH4MdSiAt7cDjJvsMetg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a wonderful bakery for the Dunbar area. The alluring scent of fresh baked bread carried down the block! The plum and apricots danishes were the best that I had in Vancouver. They had that flaky crunch and fresh fruit taste with balanced sweetness. Cappuccino is made perfectly.
What a feel good experience, through and through!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipODj1JKWN-aFxTc8TlN_TAN2MuFr40l49ewu79i&fid=0x0:0x65ef0a0c02aa6676"],"When":"2024-9-1"},{"Name":"Erica Cha","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLeb92ylkbgDh3rIjwOGssTfqQNgE5N3hUSn3ObihteDe9J4Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"“Amazing bakery! The bread at Bread Culture is absolutely delicious, with a wide variety of options that are both fresh and flavorful. The quality of the ingredients really stands out. The staff are incredibly friendly and provide excellent service, making the whole experience even better. I highly recommend this place to anyone looking for great bread and a warm atmosphere! Definitely I will come back again “","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNAvmom1arfTGgRTfYtZWi1eKFvevs7I6kb6s3F&fid=0x0:0x65ef0a0c02aa6676"],"When":"2024-10-5"},{"Name":"Alex H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVMMmWRarleLyywOwnxPwbfQq6xAoY4s2Wh7-8aJA04-aa-P0Az=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Okay, admittedly we've been to plenty of bakeries but this takes the cake! (Pun intended) Get the Pumpkin pie croissant, super amazing! I think it is a "marquee" item. Definitely a one of a kind pastry! Another fav of ours was the savory pretzel! I think we have definitely found a favourite bakery now!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNdGh87L2iVuOhnmAoo67K-6oL9AruO9hM0-TEP&fid=0x0:0x65ef0a0c02aa6676"],"When":"2024-10-20"},{"Name":"tikki","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWzV_Y6bQFjodBKC8anq5nBVFmCTC7hA6Nh7xklFQuKGefK40A_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I'm so glad Bread Culture chose Vancouver as the new start! Although we went early in the morning on the opening day they still had a wide selection of perfectly baked pastries. The space was so lovely and the pastries were just beyond amazing! Can't wait to come back to try more treats next time!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM6HZMDNx938HGcrp5jgvbmI2ajWU7q0y4nw1Jc&fid=0x0:0x65ef0a0c02aa6676"],"When":"2024-8-9"},{"Name":"Angela Gao","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXDJy-lonAKo3LixnkXOILfm_Adr5IVu5s0MJGODgQ0qOhBeVw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The bakery is fantastic! Their savoury buns and croissants are incredibly delicious. I highly recommend giving them a try!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOOuYPi9oXgO29Ys-YmboqTjiUBBZwn3VFj8ieh&fid=0x0:0x65ef0a0c02aa6676"],"When":"2024-11-18"},{"Name":"Djihane Damoo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX6Bw39FbPE2iSCOOlu8H9a_mX9tmRiWxstSp4aYfPtZPYrPw1Rvw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best pastries I ever tried. So fresh and some of the pastries were still warm. Well executed and simple","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNlakbEuSQDVNHzi6KBKhHjPZYHn7GcrxHQP_M2&fid=0x0:0x65ef0a0c02aa6676"],"When":"2024-10-31"},{"Name":"Y H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXRgZ54FUj8E_JCiah_1bac8pFar4A2MDBVpaB0kUH7Lgj4DrUq=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very friendly people and high quality breads & coffee are waiting for you! I live an hour away from Bread Culture but visit them every weekends!! The best and my favorite bakery😍 Highly highly recommended!!!!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP-U5JQ5IykjJyAiHLYoeMRh0YnQHVtjLILRHCH&fid=0x0:0x65ef0a0c02aa6676"],"When":"2024-8-17"},{"Name":"Eats Fats","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocItV650t9DDgibTra58Cbd1r2q6GlDEKN8Y8slOupBVkx3C6Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Excellent pastries & good coffee. This is a very small place with a good variety of bread & pastries. All done very well.
Service is what you expect, just take your order and deliver it.
The place is small & tight, but very clean & nicely decorated.

*** PRO TIP : All you people with the laptops open up and "working", please be considerate and go work elsewhere during the busy periods ***
This is not your office, you're not looking "cool" by hanging out here and spreading yourself out in this small place. You want to work at a coffee shop, try Starbucks. We also have free public libraries with free WiFi nearby.

Other than the inconsiderate guests, no complaint about this place. Highly recommended and will definitely return.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Fuzzy Nemo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWMhjGNDhI-RZYgIiVRXnRDEQCiyyP-dsVjb7EhBkcymNr9MvYi0A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"This is a cute little bakery.  The decor is quite cute as well, but the croissants we had for the croissant crawl was okay, but not great.  We had the deal of the 3 mini croissants with 2 small drinks for $25.

The service was good, but there was not many tables and when we found a table,  they were quite critical of how we were blocking their kitchen and we needed to move.  They it was a big isle, they couldn't walk around their customers?  When there is only 3 people at the table?","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNHzBG_6UEkIPL42qylXxqiDm54646d24gdPX10&fid=0x0:0x250039c19223889"],"When":"2024-11-16"},{"Name":"Adnan Chowdhury","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV9XiuGqzKxBQPBe8Gz4BppmdUWUjyP3mXZzcD-IXhWxZEDTsEj=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We went for coffee to this quant cafe on the corner. Lots of wonderful baked food, sandwiches and pies. We ordered coffee, croissant and a salmon bagel. Food was very good. Coffee piping hot, the way we like it.
Service was very nice.
I recommend anyone in the area to stop by.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMtbQ3FbT4KuFd_9onIDDj1dpJnI3l9rVC6J5Uu&fid=0x0:0x250039c19223889"],"When":"2024-12-13"},{"Name":"arisa matsu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIaSF9gEhNzSCNkgXVpzjmjZIZUnCzzuvbpGiJKKSrnOQ9HWA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"So lovely cafe.
There are many pop candies and cookies.
I could have a seat outside.
It's matcha latte $4.95.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMyp6Tz3ZZAQqb6sjckcgkimlMHGLrW2A4ckhfX&fid=0x0:0x250039c19223889"],"When":"2024-11-14"},{"Name":"Sam Roberts","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUXpXbzE9AC3l7jmS_xUklhu18SrxuwuR8fvLmP7d0nz41l9XkPQw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Stopped by for the croissant crawl flavours and was deeply disappointed that they're charging $6 for tiny two-bite croissants with sickly sweet filling and topping. Was genuinely excited to try them but didn't even finish the pastry.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOg1StG7Kx11SGeunIWrYEG-FoIcGjDdOujl6h4&fid=0x0:0x250039c19223889"],"When":"2024-11-9"},{"Name":"Jane Doe","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIG6ivj47xS2HhBWyL7Nhqkjx3ByYqnQdgrN9qpq1CDdbnzpQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have come here several times now and absolutely Adore this spot!!
The first time I came was when they marketed their afternoon tea last year, which I absolutely loved! I was able to snag a reservation for afternoon tea for my birthday, and it did not disappoint. It was packed full of very delicious treats that me and my friend both enjoyed. The tea selection was also really amazing and super delicious. Unfortunately you can’t tell from their website anymore but they do seem to have decided to do the afternoon tea offering each spring only! This year is already completely reserved and the spots do tend to fill up fast so I will anticipate being much quicker about it next year. I’ve also had the pleasure of tasting several of their pastries aside from afternoon tea, and it is extremely delicious. They have a really lovely lunch offering selection that I plan on taking advantage of one day seeing as how the sandwiches from last year’s afternoon tea were very flavorful. Absolutely nothing was disappointing.
Pecan bar so delicious! Tried also the coconut cupcake and it was good.
The entire place is gorgeous.
Lunch: tried their quiche and potatoe leek soup. Excellent!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOm0ihZU4ZLz7O1mnaBXPYOq6YbkhazeDkrq5tB&fid=0x0:0x250039c19223889"],"When":"2023-4-30"},{"Name":"Ashley T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIDn9KLfPhlmHCT7hVkEwnqSRn0YplOryEKnbhVrYg09jRvyw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Rosie at Butter Baked Goods and her team made our wildest wedding cake dreams come true! I found wedding cake shopping challenging as we just wanted simple, great tasting cake and all the artisan cake shops seemed to charge an arm and a leg (understandably, cakes can be artwork). Rosie's cakes were reasonably priced and she took our creative cake vision to the next level. She helped us plan for the number of guests perfectly and the cakes were customized and absolutly beautiful. We can't wait to have Rosie make our next special occasion cake!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMj_QAVdD-z55LFCYsBhRhsyiXv615MfBys6qZM&fid=0x0:0x250039c19223889"],"When":"2019-11-24"},{"Name":"Herbert Camat","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVKXSkcN5npL56jCqrImwFWlxlBsiSCmQ0Pl7fUB01TSYknRkt_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Butter Baked Good and Cafe is so cute! I love the interior, it felt like I was living in a tea party! It felt as if I was at a tea party in real life! The iced London fog was delicious! Cute spot in this quaint neighborhood in Vancouver!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP7-m33XnkasrktNe6O8ut6BvvBDfiPcfT4JSxk&fid=0x0:0x250039c19223889"],"When":"2024-2-24"},{"Name":"J X","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIFKGXvrRdpPYblBIKOgqPq7hhjib8sXZ-wrvsqRzOqYWtgAYte=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Super cute little bakery/cafe. The goodies are delicious much like the setting. Staff is super friendly and courteous.

Some little things:
- Cupcakes from the display case are a bit too hard. Seems not as fresh or moist due to the temp. Taste decadent still.
- the invisible plexiglass barriers prevent easy access to plates and napkins thus requiring staff intervention
- wished they had longer hours. Would be amazing to come and grab a coffee at night.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN85HpSi-NClPOLWBf3RSWYyF_ox6AFg-DWfajg&fid=0x0:0x250039c19223889"],"When":"2022-10-10"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Tom Joa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLW4lh2qkjA_Dypmxars27Ta428fa5Drh40CPoISqg9ftZ4UQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you want regular and boring run of the mill floral bouquets - do not go here.  If you want something stunning - you must see the brilliant florists at Stongs.  They are passionate and can curate arrangements for any occasion. Price was reasonable too.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMY92twSd0I_svRhInHM7TeT8XXG49i7ccFfFjm&fid=0x0:0xec73647ea13eaced"],"When":"2024-8-18"},{"Name":"Ànita Singh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKO6qfvJ-XI9uD9Aazkn6DpXcfAA9lMsg-qkr1XoqXsBQqzxA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Yesterday i phoned the customer service at this store to find out the priced of extra virgin olive oil and a girl with an Indian acent told me the price was $64.99.  Today when I went to pick up the oil the price was $66.99. I knew right away that this person quoted me the wrong price because the oil next  to this oil was$64.99. So when I approached to cashier I mentioned this to her. The cashier was very polite and helpful and needed and override so called for assistance. This Indian girl shows up and said this store changes prices everyday yesterday the price was $64.99 and today it's $$66.99. so I can't offer you the $2 off. I said really, I shop at Safeway a lot I don't see them changing the price everyday. Certain items yes if they have a huge stock but olive oil when it's so expensive I don't think so. She said I will go and speak to my manager and she came back and told me that she can't off me the $2 off. I said that's fine . I bought the oil for $66.99.

I am NEVER going back to this store. They should train their employees a bit better not these international students who has no manners or customs service","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Oleksandr Vershynin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWzgRGRKV1hdgv5YYBluXBU-G-7MZK2fqfbY7w_uNSdY1Nyk13c=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I always have a great experience shopping at Stong’s!

They consistently offer fresh products, and the staff is super polite and helpful.

Recently, I bought some meat, but when I got home, my wife didn’t like how it smelled, even though it seemed fine to me. I took it back to Stong’s, and they refunded my money without any questions. I bought a new one, and when we checked it at home, it was perfectly fresh and tasted great, just like all the other products we buy there.

Highly recommend Stong’s for their excellent customer service and quality products!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Julie Burtinshaw","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU8ChniwiLWjsHBgpVGp3rISF4oBL1bbjT09PdJp6yUfl-j9cT7=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I am grateful to Stongs Market for placing a PET PARKER outside their store on Dunbar Street. This has given me the freedom to shop with my pet and go inside the store while he waits in his climate controlled comfy, blue-tooth dog house. Great store made greater!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Michael","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJiCftSaB4PjQ_PaQWa0IivHesx99Aj4Arze5xgBIxTL82kYQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"For years I regularly purchased my groceries, particularly my deli products, from Stongs. But lately they have gone downhill.  The deli is not being managed properly.  More often than not when I go to the deli section around 7 PM they are sold out of chickens, the deli meats on special have empty or depleted trays, the salads, such as Greek salad are empty or depleted.   The staff seems to be focused primarily on cleaning up before closing.  Like all of us I am busy and too busy to come to the store only not be able to purchase what I was expecting to purchase.  I will switch my loyalties now to Choices which has a very good deli section.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ava","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLWEo-NqNZs2s5xV6JQwStsyM4OZSjkm2ox3b9OCb7FJwUCyA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I haven’t done much grocery shopping here but I do come often for their deli section. Their sandwiches are consistently delicious (especially when warmed up) and are offered at a decent price. Great spot to grab a quick an easy meal.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOqze1Ddzq9S4G1c4lkgal5G1bZXxBSCnYPEpqj&fid=0x0:0xec73647ea13eaced"],"When":"2023-7-25"},{"Name":"Matthew Kindrachuk","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX7IFlY4yDsSinymj9SX_qMJD5UdTHvZ4R80ygYjm9ZDr10XAbA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Stong’s has been a well-established, family-owned grocery store in Dunbar since 1955. It boasts a 22,000 sq ft space, having been built in 2016. The store also supports various local initiatives, contributing to schools, charities, and community organizations like the Dunbar Community Centre and Canuck Place. Stong’s continues to maintain its position as Vancouver’s top independent grocery stores.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Avery Gillick","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWLIHIKFwW5X3AcSQJ2m60KVfxLzO3Ch4XOv9bvbrIC1MU2ORRM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Good variety of fresh produce, poultry  , delicatessen, Meats, dairy and cheeses and some prepared food.   Store could use a facelift.
Some prices of produce and other products much higher than loblaws, Save-on and Urban Fare. Often have good deals on dairy products.
Great chicken from Heritage farms.
Staff friendly and helpful.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNAZHCGcZZlzBSDqrufmzOrLT2M9XFjExXH7-WX&fid=0x0:0xec73647ea13eaced"],"When":"2023-5-1"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Dana Sullivan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWQIw-0oOUNgoyniYugTscGkgpKJS8tpx4V0tAajn3ZGkNIfqEk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"It’s a convenient place if you are near IKB. I’ve found that the early morning staff is super sweet but the attitude of the afternoon staff is a toss-up. The convenience is the main draw. They have Upmeals entrees and UBC-issue bake goods. The Upmeals stuff is healthy and easy on the palate but interesting. In the past I’ve found that even some of the fresh baked goods somehow came out tasting stale, but this year’s iteration of UBC baking seems better. They’ve also instituted a Pearl Fever “pop-up” where you can get a limited selection bubble tea here (which is good, although I’ve only tried the jelly, which is harder to mess up than pearls) and also ice cream with taiyaki (the waffle is good, the soft serve is just okay - little icy - but it’s an accessible way to experience a fun dessert that’s a little hard to find).
My experience with the espresso drinks is - and I only drink decaf, so this may or may not be representative - it’s not awful, but it does taste a little over-roasted. Sometimes adding milk can mellow out bitter coffee but this one basically tastes the same in americano or latte form. The chai is not offensive but is made from a concentrate that’s very sweet and the London fog is also very sweet. Be careful because the hot drinks come out intensely hot. If you just need a coffee or tea, this will do the job, but definitely go somewhere else if you’re a coffee snob.
At peak studying hours, it’s crowded, but at off hours, the clean, quiet environment is very relaxing.
Good place for students/UBC-people if you want a break from heavy food or fast food, not the place I’d necessarily recommend to campus visitors.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPCIoyH-0sdLvK7eGkdXRaADKQuUnvNnYAN71NY&fid=0x0:0x38c96d30bcb01b2f"],"When":"2023-8-29"},{"Name":"Oakley Nance","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWwVuB38LSpIWv_yGP7nRej-Jw5m59HC-jukdf9PfQxIccZsQIsjA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I was the only person in line, i ordered and had to clarify my friends drink order, the bubble was literally typing as I was ordering and the lady asked if the drink was iced or hot. I was like "One sec she's just clarifying through the text," and she audibly sighed and walked away. All throughout this order I said numerous times that I needed oat milk in the drink and she never verbally responded so I repeated "yes with oat milk" every time she went over the order and she rolled her eyes at me so I figured she heard and was annoyed I was repeating myself. As I see her make it she uses regular milk so I interjected and said " Oh shoot that was supposed to have oat milk," and she was upset with me and said she didn't hear me. I was just shocked by how rude she was.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Clara Sui","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXDpfMVOFlSfYJkiY3GBxSPXynTXF_RcCUHA_sqSaVyj6n4b46n=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Love the baked goods but would love to see the hot pasta entrees back! Also the soups! - I’ve noticed a huge drop in quality since 2019. Every order is mostly just spices, salt, water, and starch. There are very little toppings and the texture is incredibly runny, especially for the split pea and ham soup. Would never recommend them. Sandwiches and salads are okay but on the bland side.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jenny Tao","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXl7qwNZdMK5UNeVm4Ss-BcTIDEv1k4P2sX-wHjGHKDHLJN9-0w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Compared with the other cafes (not residence cafeterias) on campus, Ike's has a better selection of hot entrees and overall food. I love their pasta feature and now they have this huge chicken leg/breast for $8. Hot entrees always comes with side salads too. Not a huge fan of their drinks though. Service is speedy. My favorite cafe on campus :)","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lucy T.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVKgUI8Y67OZjnaU2GTvCShItivsl_UV40o2V1eXoQZn3MU36Iw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Sometimes I would come by this cafe if I hadn't decided where to have a light lunch. I tried their beef wrap, mac& cheese, salads, and a few drinks. They're all at an average level. During summer season when there were few students, their soup seemed to be reheated for many times, not fresh at all. Once I wanted to get hot water from their dispenser, the staff member gave me an unfriendly look and behaved rudely. If you study in the IKB, and don't want to go far for food, it's a convenient spot. But do not have high expectation; it's just an ordinary cafe with standard campus food and it-depends-on-who-serves-you service quality.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nicole","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVDjZJdREKI7_BD8K9KUQFoFVw5xhXpFyRgJEI-_J1YSIYrGDdt=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Most of the staff here are friendly and I like the baked goods and salads. I've been picking up my morning coffee here as of late because the line usually moves quickly, but this morning I was charged $7.30 for a medium coffee. I went back to talk to a server (a different one from the one that charged me) and while they expressed concern by asking who had served me, the woman that served me didn't so much as apologize. I used to be a barista and I know that early morning shifts can throw you off sometimes, but I think that was quite rude. I wasn't offered a refund, but the other server told me that I can take some baked goods to even out the cost.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Daniel Z.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWQPWk1igWiScMJLvbEfOGbn_E-SvYzWdnJ-_3R9XXD4Q9XGO0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Not gonna lie, a not-so-big, leftover, expires-in-a-day breakfast wrap and a small dessert for $10 doesn't sound very good. I wouldn't say anything special about taste either. I was too lazy to buy food elsewhere while I was at IKB, and so this was the best I got. I'll spare this review from the one star because I think I picked the wrong foods. After all, this is a coffee place.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Meghan K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUfBN1bKKzFYujQ7qqMJ4sRqtV75B4nnaJOolJ96kg6M8dnXzkfdQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The worst. Please go somewhere else. Coffee tastes like cardboard, REALLY overpriced mediocre food, chicken is all fat and gristle, pasta tastes like hard crunchy paper. Your money is worth way more than what they are charging you- yes it's convenient, but it's so bad. Staff are also RUDE.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Cristal Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVKVgmGNO0nM5QsKQAT5sqSSfDi4-SXeOmE9QKCS4Yn3xevSRo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Dec 4, 2024 (~4-6pm)

I was here at this location and the staff were so nice!! There was a long line up and I could tell the staff were working hard to fulfill orders. Even with the rush the staff were so friendly and handled the line well. There were some uncleaned tables but the staff cleaned it up when it was less busy.

Seems to be a new manager? He didn’t exactly know the system but got the other staff to help him with the register. He was wearing a blue shirt at the time which is a bit different from the other workers. Anyways, he has the best customer service!!! Thank you sir :)","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Yaad Sandher","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ4VqzhtFXsN8-SkjJ6pLiBJb4rzwiahoG1EOJ8s3p2WewIRA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I want to commend the staff for their outstanding service. From the moment I walked in, I was greeted with warm smiles and a welcoming atmosphere. The team was not only efficient but also genuinely kind and attentive, ensuring every customer felt valued.

The service was prompt, even during a busy time, and the staff handled the rush with professionalism and ease.

What stood out most was Navdeep’s friendly demeanor. He went beyond just serving orders, engaging with customers and creating a sense of community. It’s rare to find such a combination of speed, accuracy, and kindness in customer service.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tom Foolery","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL2CL3907bWdn6DUj-R1WcSsdkc0ujUkJ9uj_u3cK3X0Z6Ozg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I just tried to call to leave a complaint but I got an answering machine so I’ll do it here. This location of Tim’s has the best staff by far out of all other Tim’s I frequent. However we must address the corporate level issues on the food. I just ordered 2 hash browns and they were not palatable. They tasted freezer-burned and were barely warm. Even if they were warm enough that frozen freezer burn taste would still be there. They are clearly the same hash browns we can all buy in the frozen food isle and they have that same frozen taste when we make them at home- so we know. You think this is acceptable to charge people for? Why do McDonald’s hash browns taste so amazing? And made in a way we cannot replicate at home. I ate one of my hash browns today and it was so gross, I took one bite out of the second and could not believe I was charged $2 each for this frozen tasting not edible food. I went to the counter to complain and explain but instead of hearing what I was saying they just offered me 2 more hash browns- that made me angry enough to complain in this way. Your food is unacceptable now and barely edible and when people are honest and complain about it they should get a refund- not more inedible freezer burn-tasting replacements. Customer service needs to be back to Canadian standards. You complain and they truly are too deft to understand what you are saying in order to rectify it.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Eric","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLTx21jQ3ixOeedWHFc3zDSy4yNyoRockoqEhp4ukWBqSAO1A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"UPDATE *Scroll down for original review*

They are now being extremely pushy upon taking your order that you go to google reviews at that moment and leave a five star review. They even have a sign right at the till begging customers to do so. The woman behind the till looked visibly upset when instead of pulling out my phone to do so immediately, I just looked back at her and waited for my order. For the management of this particular franchise: good reviews are supposed to come organically and a reward for proper service and good food. This is not how you pump up your google review score. Do better.

Original review:

Usually this place is decent to grab a quick bite, but when I came in today at noon on the 10th of October, I could not believe how unfriendly everyone behind the counter was. It was so bad that I nearly felt the need to apologize for merely having my presence in the store at all.

On top of that, the gentleman who was in line before me had to go at extreme lengths to convince the people behind the counter to remake his order when they made it wrong, despite very clear and easy to understand instructions. It was a little hard to watch.

Not to mention that they don't give receipts when taking orders, so when they start calling out order numbers, no one knows which one is theirs.

Ultimately, customers shouldn't feel the need to apologize when making a purchase in store as it should at least be a marginally welcoming place to be.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"priya aryan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWhujY_qvoDTSZ3DP97_yKAaQm8JxpQCMGH0Nq4gNguul5LMBRz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My second time Review.
It's been 5 years, am a regular customer  for tea.
Food is amazing.
All seasons whole team are very quick in helping with orders, friendly and very welcoming.
Store Manager  is great lady💜
I recieved  great service  from Hui, prince and other girls.
My favorite TIMMY  store,my neighborhood
Very lovely Team!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sam Jafton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLXFQ-6itxsd8z47x7lufVpEcdEYrXgfRlYBbJ56y6QBxE1Kw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have been going to this Tim Horton everyday for the past 2 years. It is nice and clean and has plenty of free parking spaces.  The staff are kind and friendly and they remember my order from previous days.  “” NITIKA “” is the young lady that often prepares my coffee and she is very polite and efficient, and so are most of the other staff there.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sandeep kaur Mann","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVRI5u9g3Mcd3GtiPbDJAMond5aU8Xn8OR7VJfKiK834BBXR7Bqpw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently visited this Tim Hortons and was impressed by the excellent service provided by the staff. The employee Nitika was friendly, efficient, and went above and beyond to ensure a pleasant experience.My order was prepared quickly and accurately, and the overall atmosphere was warm and welcoming.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"amrit singh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWTb4ib2enNCnrYgxbn_BrVDe9iyDjCwjeMAhWvnlBIUHss4hc0=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
Gagan at Tim Hortons is truly outstanding! Their friendly attitude and professionalism stand out every time I visit. Whether it’s taking orders or preparing food and drinks, everything is done perfectly and with care. Gagan’s attention to detail and genuine customer service make the experience memorable. A big thank you for always making my visits so pleasant!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Elaine S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXw0NZVlw-DYhg6yu3CwCqawu2sEc8yv_yDRJNRZHiHpXsjuXCx=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I was visiting Kerrisdale/ Dunbar area today and had a craving for Eggs Benedict - a favourite breakfast that I haven’t had in a long time. I did a quick search and found Grandmama’s Cafe and I am so happy I did!

The food was excellent, the service was great and the atmosphere beautiful! It was bright, cheerful and lovely! The owners are so nice - I was seated by the window with a beautiful view.

I loved the cookie that was given with my latte, the Eggs Benedict were perfect and the avocado in the salad was a nice treat on the side.

What a wonderful way to start the day! Thank you!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO0EEn8XsTjDUQRiXnLNUd3CXnqFbeV8ENW5TGY&fid=0x0:0x86992f8327f4cd71"],"When":"2024-7-12"},{"Name":"Michael Karpinski-Leydier","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVQmOHA7trGY5pup6kjO81fyHZlzgiXMZFMKLGFrq1r7bIQkcLcIA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is one of my favorite cafes in Vancouver. I've been coming here since they first opened. The staff is always friendly, accommodating and incredibly kind and atmosphere is very warm, relaxing and comfortable. The meals are always tasty and you can tell they really focus on quality of the food and drinks they serve. I would really recommend any of the cooked meals including the butter chicken and chicken stroganoff or the hot sandwiches such as the club sandwich or the roast beef sandwich. Grandmamas is one of those examples of a small family run, locally owned business that you don't really see a lot of these days. If you're looking for comfortable, relaxing place to eat or have a coffee, I would highly recommend you give them a try.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNh5O4t_bmGRq5Buxpqy0SAJuIh8HU2TgTAfhmo&fid=0x0:0x86992f8327f4cd71"],"When":"2024-9-16"},{"Name":"Pricilla Ibarra","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIdclR_ewyHMucZUesP623Rsl4B6ANwYqOjI6A7CpHggwxRFQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"1st time visited here yesterday, even my picky  son loved the food. Quality service and food recommended 👌 . Clean washroom and variety of food options. I tried the turmeric latte, it was good and not sweet. I love the ambiance as well very aesthetic design 😍 . We forgot to take a photo of the food cos we're too excited to dig in 😆","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNDeVCT1DyhLSppcnOPwlAqxO4QUoUhNR0FMEds&fid=0x0:0x86992f8327f4cd71"],"When":"2024-9-16"},{"Name":"Hyeon oh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXucaZYE-ea_ffHq9a7BBJzgnugMKM-Yw4IcHwRfD4KwP8Cg1w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you're a huge coffee lover, must try this place! what really sets this place apart is their Italian coffee beans. The flavour profile is very unique and stands out among other local cafes. It's very rich, smooth, and perfectly balanced with a bit of sweetness. The business owner was also a very fun person to chat with. He was so friendly and passionate about what he does. It's clear he really cares about coffees and teas.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Rita Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU1Nk6Vysk4IxJpLfI6ecY69q1TFEDqphwT8NsG_Y_4N5LYyE48YA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"St George School Class of 2024 hosted our last parents social coffee morning at Grandmama cafe.  We had a great time food are very yummy, especially Avocado toast must order.  Owners are nice, friendly lovely couple.  We definitely will come back with friends.   Highly recommend to those who never been here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPJ1-JOiAfs_RDeoCooX0g02A799FdOCwiYAJgr&fid=0x0:0x86992f8327f4cd71"],"When":"2024-4-28"},{"Name":"Anson Hardjojo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU0VRn_mW22Yyfm7rb4my7-w2UJpE4kTqzkbQHfWrPAZyzAwDeV=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love this place! Owners are very welcoming and friendly. My friends and I would hang out here after visiting Buchan's Stationery :) Will visit often whenever I'm in Kerrisdale! Thanks for the lovely food and atmosphere. Coffee is good too!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNF_p-7rXHc-mULbOK5DY8ra-4GzK-9PQZjCZnz&fid=0x0:0x86992f8327f4cd71"],"When":"2024-11-16"},{"Name":"Kundan Khullar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX8hJz1fEGgu93Ypqao6BEpLk1Y-1q0AMcsiPSRGpJh4RXoj3Q5=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Cute place, nice salmon sandwich and the fusion salad with it had some interesting flavours so enjoyed that. The cinnamon cake was light n fluffy but the icing on top was a bit extra sugary for my palate still overall nice","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"William","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVG4Vpr9BqvVOYqfPfLqGh8MBCHSIiKl0bWRN6LuDFhAgyy_dIq=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The restaurant is absolutely beautiful, with an elegant and cozy atmosphere. The owner is incredibly nice, and the brunch was delicious. Highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNLq31EMkin_ni68XuBdARk6LAH4hVsnHi8OWZC&fid=0x0:0x86992f8327f4cd71"],"When":"2024-9-15"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Hong Au","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVSlWpqKi5bttS4u4XfugC6eGRM89zjKiGxeF5hcIij0VIs4TJdSg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The cake decoration is great look really good for pictures for birthday or valentines. However, the taste is not up to expectation.  Likely a sugar taste more than anything else, it is just ok.  Ordered for pickup, service is ok, Atmosphere look good, try to go to the mall is difficult, drive around 2 times in order to get into the mall parking and the security not sure where it located.  Take sometime to find it","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM79fy3_XE3jItfDf9Mdi4IIb-t1KZsjiGcaCx2&fid=0x0:0x4d63f1669988b928"],"When":"2024-11-3"},{"Name":"Blair Ludwich","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUUeogvPIRmFegyI-BXa21az5lwdUpHMDy_tKmoIg1o-rZMMcQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cake looks and tastes delicious! So nice and light but not overly sweet. The hot chocolate was very nice too, also not too sweet. Service was great and friendly!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOPVlJ20JqDGREq1ZLgrB0K9bEcSsGjnJ7LOvpc&fid=0x0:0x4d63f1669988b928"],"When":"2024-10-3"},{"Name":"Adrienne","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKvS1YiBi1kAYmplCTkzo9NqyjbLMViYayHxaEQA-dKyQUyyA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We came here to celebrate my birthday, and we had an amazing time. Our server was very sweet and attentive! I loved the aesthetic and how pretty the dishware was. This is genuinely one of the best high teas I’ve ever had - the food was phenomenal and the desserts weren’t too sweet for me. We loved the savory items (especially the sablefish and hummus). We highly recommend coming here for high tea!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOKnwwsa9Honco3-2ul1wsD9bVObY0FKRBKaYk_&fid=0x0:0x4d63f1669988b928"],"When":"2023-9-18"},{"Name":"Yan Jie Pan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVWtJgsuhwRId0t1MOzd5ywiIXfrBfIFDTo7UODkLUu9At3EXtegw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Their cakes are super adorable🥰 I saw someone share their afternoon tea set on instagram, but when I came I realized the set and some other cakes need reservations in advance, you can call them or add them on WeChat.
We ordered the coffee flavor, rose flavor and the bear one which is dark chocolate flavor. Our favorite is the coffee bean one as it has this strong coffee flavor but at the same time the taste is balanced and doesn’t make you feel overwhelmed. The bear one looks cute but the hard chocolate shell was a bit too hard to break. And the rose one is too creamy in my opinion, it’s hard to finish one without some drinks. Overall, will recommend this store to anyone that’s interested in exploring new dessert spot in Vancouver!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMkcCbG6X9dPmPbZtvJWTcoy9Bqhp3b3wdHzkNu&fid=0x0:0x4d63f1669988b928"],"When":"2024-3-7"},{"Name":"谢俊","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV6CdwEMwT2RVqY1Tzyr92dOAx58vusrpt80kBd1F47jbZIL-xH=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What an amazing store!!
They create so cute, cozy, and beautiful cakes! And, the taste is so good!!! Thanks very much for the birthday cake!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOcnBPDBOMW2MO19jmSXTjhU-53Q1MhL1shLBSC&fid=0x0:0x4d63f1669988b928"],"When":"2024-9-9"},{"Name":"Melissa Denise","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXmPJUZyg5bbjNmbLw_9Zpw5GxBBDSB1XEPNgj4DHq-_lkoMwmALg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Super cute high tea experience that is unique from others because they serve really tasty Japanese style food along with fancy desserts and treats!

It does not look like much food but you are definitely full by the end. We were given complimentary pink sparking lemonade which was so pretty and refreshing. They also gave us a complimentary brownie ice cream bar and fruit. When the actual high tea food came out it was on a cool stand that spun in a circle.

I loved all of the savoury dishes. We had sable fish, a piece of aburi, prosciutto on a biscuit, and more.

I'm not usually a fan of sweets but I actually finished all of the sweet items that came with our high tea! I really enjoyed the mango one and even the strawberry mousse was good. You are given a choice of what flavor croissant to have and I really liked the cheese one. It paired well with the jam and creme!

The decor inside is so cute and very pink. Our server was super sweet but I had to ask her for a few things such as a spoon to stir our tea with, and a spoon to eat some of the sweet deserts with.

I do recommend trying to place out for a unique and different high tea experience. Definitely make a reservation!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPou-fDi7PD5zQpKp-eHaAir6BAcVBl03ph_YiY&fid=0x0:0x4d63f1669988b928"],"When":"2023-8-21"},{"Name":"Wai Chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVzmH5OpJoM-hhDFEjmWs5pk92KWv4KTM3Z3pPRu01cSO_3zEyz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Highly recommend them for afternoon tea.

They have 2 afternoon tea menus.
One is their signature and the other is the savory.

I think for photos, signature is best.
If you have someone who doesn't have as much of a sweet tooth the savory set comes with 2 instead of one of each Savory item along with a few less sweets.
The savory items made me think of Japanese inspired food.
The tea felt French/Japanese fusion for me.
The amount of food is not too much. My husband (who is a big guy) was hungry after, but I was happily satisfied (not overly full). It was a nice stop so that I could still try other foods after.

The shop itself was much smaller than I expected. It has an intimate atmosphere.
I'd recommend reserving the table in the back for more room if you like taking photos of your food (I do). It's next to a window and has a nice background.

I'm looking forward to going back to try their other sweets at some point. The items in the case looked stunning.

Did not check the parking situation as we got there by sky train. It's about a 10-15 minute walk I think.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO95Ma-7G8_QE1C0e7uM_o4zn5fzmBlWMkIqaY7&fid=0x0:0x4d63f1669988b928"],"When":"2022-7-12"},{"Name":"CAI GAN XIAN Lucas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUOB--sC1c57tCUxh0rJYEpOFrIBekCINyXFtQZnYPtbfYeSIxy=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was quite a surprise to discover this nice Patisserie in the neighborhood. Completely unexpected. The cakes are so nicely shaped that it feels bad to even cut or eat it. A great place to stop by, have a nice tea & cakes snack.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNRzkqDFQgocIToQK8syl6KyyHVYo40QLUGnBJi&fid=0x0:0x4d63f1669988b928"],"When":"2023-4-13"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Google Guide","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXNuhwlIn4-plqHLGD0QCOZgOCtCWh2WgE75DMJxjiWfmTWyXU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"An expanding Korean food grocery chain which has all your basic needs including some other Asian items, cosmetics, and cookware. There is a small food stall for Korean Fried Chicken. One of their smaller stores. Located in Dunbar. Free indoor 1 hour underground parking. #letsguide","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNsmo5AjtwTwoFMZJbAEXVw5Xy6MXV5WAz22d1D&fid=0x0:0x200638e1d0588cdd"],"When":"2021-1-1"},{"Name":"Donald L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWSo8xtMVmoEtOrLlTs_t_iV1wVgKCai2cbgp_qeN4-Qr2Gxyk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I like H-Mart’s prepared dishes like gimkap (kimbap), bento boxes and snacks. There is a small microwave to warmup food and a few tables to sit down and eat. Convenient location for Asian groceries near W 41st and Dunbar.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNpTYoxsolUZA5Dc50lS8WyRkxQnNsuYPGlR_Aa&fid=0x0:0x200638e1d0588cdd"],"When":"2023-11-22"},{"Name":"Alice Tang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVQIhbDEJOoryW9yTl5LjPlqqickAhA8VOcEwUFOvuHX-_74h1g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I buy my groceries here because it’s close to where I live. Catch the sales on weekends, but there is always some thing on sale every day. You can buy an assortment of seafood and meats. There’s a nice selection of Korean as well as Japanese snacks and beverages. They also have a bbq Chicken bistro behind the supermarket!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN7JtRZwIK79DRSkrm2vRFn7GxUZGK_GtPr4dFZ&fid=0x0:0x200638e1d0588cdd"],"When":"2022-12-6"},{"Name":"Daniel Naumann","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWSqHdPVDLr7nLtDUnE5vKc93YTqnTvOv5M73le5mndP1fkkVul=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We go to H-Mart in Richmond's Aberdeen Centre, and were surprised to find this one on Dunbar. Parking is underground from the rear lane.The main difference I found is this location does not have as much ready-to-eat options as Aberdeen which makes sense as it is not as big. H-Mart is interesting, being a Korean-American chain, in that it carries products made in Korea, Japan, and China. If you cannot read the symbol language, just check on the front or back for 'Made in xxx'. For example, in one of my pictures you can see Japanese Style Somen made in China. There are always some surprises especially with snacks/sweets-Peach Oolong Oreos?! I am a fan of the Kirin Kitchen drinks and H-Mart is one of the few stores I can find the Salty Lychee drink.
The proteins are very good, especially the meat. We often buy thin sliced beef for Korean and Japanese dishes. The quality and style of meat/trimming is worth the cost. The variety of kimchi is great of course-I did not know there were so many options. We buy a lot of Japanese dry food and Japanese condiments from H-Mart. They also carry beauty products/toiletries, along with small appliances.
So rule of thumb is check 'Made in xxx' before you buy, if that matters to you. You could buy each product in country-specific supermarkets but it is nice to have products all in one store.
Daniel","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOx7yx_2FEXGDKr95QOegzUQTMlqvxEtKCOKSH3&fid=0x0:0x200638e1d0588cdd"],"When":"2021-1-6"},{"Name":"Deborah Aiko Insook Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWkrXzRxO3A2OGqiLyPY_PlsYk2B44E-xgPkg6UAgy-1KwY7fkT=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This Korean mart is pretty useful place for Asian foods. They have many of promotions consistently. You can find some of great deals. But there are not enough local products but expensive... like eggs, milk, ham, pops..
That’s why I have to go the other place to get some of dairy and meat. You can get better price for Ramen, Seaweed, Ambrosia apple.
The aisles are pretty narrow and que line as well.
You can park front of building and basement for the back side.
And They selling some pre-cooked food beside of shelf. I can not say that delicious. Sorry.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM1w_4cA1h7Bb1bozKwDtOIQAONPK1LzORTMA3F&fid=0x0:0x200638e1d0588cdd"],"When":"2021-1-20"},{"Name":"Tiff","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ95joWQ-Kf5IN-_i3GhR4gU10KFz3ZQoZt5ZwqCSGHtCe4hQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The workers follow you around the store. They're so obvious they just stand near you and stare at nothing. I spent hundreds and it was so uncomfortable. Look at your cameras if you're so worried about people grocery shopping.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"TU NGUYEN","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUulTS6_cNkGGR39Y5FKJAfZrB4GvCXbAJKaRYSr2Gz3gpiZqs=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Not a big H-mart I've seen but staffs were so helpful. i had arrived when the seafood court was closed but when I ask a Korean man to help me have some live shrimps, he did it right a way with big smiles 😍.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNwfg_DpNShO2-rfJA1BON2nUPzY0fr2rcRtgnq&fid=0x0:0x200638e1d0588cdd"],"When":"2019-7-3"},{"Name":"Kdrama Junkie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUn-rCdf51aBSajmGzT1JmPq_F-4gbDQ_Aoo0cOCrDA4vxzbI4L=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Small H-mart and not exceedingly friendly, but nice produce, a decent selection of everything you'd expect, and even though the store is quite small, they still have the pre-prepared Korean foods you crave. Spiced radish was excellent! Couldn't find black sesame oil.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPHLqFjzBGXZwOtRHFMP5fmLrsiDvH4CwX2PirW&fid=0x0:0x200638e1d0588cdd"],"When":"2022-6-17"}]

They have a huge variety of snacks here and you can pretty much find anything you’re craving. The girl that greeted us, I didn’t catch her name, was so so sweet and had great energy! She made great suggestions too for future visits :) will definitely come back","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ronen S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVM8dpVaRpgLveal6Y25zsejUnmJPh6be9Z4bwqhigRuGeQ7jV8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"So infuriating that this store is not open at their posted hours. Got me hooked on the Herr's curls, real nice dude, only tries to get you hooked on the soft stuff which I don't mind.. Great selection! Always new and interesting things to try, would definitely check it out if you want to try an interesting and cool snack (\u0026 drink). Got a 7-up cocktail exotique, (oui oui) only sold in France! I've never felt more worldly.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Joy He","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV7GLiHD6w6UCWk5TFp7isnSWnWjuu2WZlVM8zX_W45E1HS2pl7tQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lots of sweets and snacks and drinks, many of which you generally can’t find in Canada (friend found the superior European version of their favourite chocolate, rare Hi-Chews) and niche limited edition lines too. Super cool and friendly owner who clearly knows a bunch of lore behind the snacks.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tyrone Gardiner","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIzRwZOCyVUS5PKWdeLYZnTiQyhwgFrPh0miEVgGye3NpjGTA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"So glad to see this open up in Dunbar! user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Rosa MD","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJdQP4sczaFc0tUIRWY3-9n-Ka30Hep9X0NHrOJ8caM7ajUywM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Ordered the spanish latte, and it was good. I still think it's overpriced. Service was good, and coffee came out promptly.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPxXbdZgSQH2R9ieWkSHiZ4QhRiAdViJWLAfltK&fid=0x0:0x6907a11959b0b8ea"],"When":"2024-12-25"},{"Name":"Tammy Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWn0N2I5STxk6Dw-kQhoKTxOlHlPrvcouHiB9OgzjAG84pt3M0D_Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"TL;dr: expensive drinks & sweets, ok place to study. Would give another visit but not for studying.

☕️ Food Quality: 5/5
I got an oat latte and it was pretty good. Strong coffee flavour for those who don’t drink much coffee. I also got an almond crossaint which was a whopping 6$. It was good but not worth the price.

📚Ambience: 4/5
It’s a bit loud but expected for coffee shops. It was also really crowded when I went. There was no where to plug in my charger unless you sit on the booths next to the wall. The tables are a bit too low to do note taking but at a perfect height for typing on a laptop.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNjF_7Y_QpdNB8tl7iYkGxR-exprYdpij4WjUQR&fid=0x0:0x6907a11959b0b8ea"],"When":"2024-9-25"},{"Name":"Lisa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWcvrwRrMlU3mo5HAPYEpsQgZoTaiuiBo-vP4V2zXl0-qYclXI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I've been to this location over the years and loved it. However,  my last experience was far from pleasant. From the moment I walked in, my presence was being monitored and clocked, as the team, led by the manager in charge, prominently enforced their 60-minute stay limit right to the dot. I absolutely understand this is their policy but the way they went about it felt targeted as the table beside (who lined up to order before me) was not even approached. It felt personal and discriminatory, leaving me feeling unwelcome and singled out.

The coffee was good (as always), but the customer service overshadowed the quality. Policies are important, but so is treating customers with respect and fairness.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Philip Raymond Lim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5EIBAgpBLsauhPMdjXym7mJ4fA8mtryDtWQIJCZfJxYXxupU8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Café Artigiano in Kerrisdale is a nice spot compared to other cafes in terms of lighting and ambiance.

The coffee is good, consistent with what you'd expect from their other locations.

As for the pastries, cookies, sandwiches, and other food, I'd give them a 3 out of 5—they fill me up when I’m hungry and they’re okay to pair with coffee, but nothing stands out in terms of how special they are.

That said, I still come here from time to time for the convenience, and I appreciate that it’s clean, seats are ok, which is great since I’m often in the Kerrisdale area. So I always come here again and again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNjcHicBw_TWBCNLBztqus5mkx8YgQUuBbMfWEE&fid=0x0:0x6907a11959b0b8ea"],"When":"2024-9-13"},{"Name":"Keira","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV9Mym_WLLod0GsobtEG7Be0_t0q704qLZpId_34rYp9CRn4m_H=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This place has a good ambiance but the workers up charged me for my drink by a whole dollar. My friend also was given the wrong drink. Secondly they didn’t tell us before paying for our beverage or coming in that there is a maximum 1 hour stay limit which is very inconvenient as a student going with the intention to study. My friend and I had great hopes but were very disappointed from the quality of our drinks and service. We will not be coming again which is a shame because otherwise seems like a great study spot.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Pradyumna Gujjar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXVHYwZPoeWTWb_r-Pj3URXZmwvjMuE8IJLkPSR4xqAVv86CR0HjQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The cafe itself is beautiful and host Apple
Seating space. Staff are friendly and attend to customers with a smile. I found the hot chocolate very plain and watery. Was defiantly a let down. The churros were soft and didn’t have above to it. I would give this cafe a try again and would revisit the review if I ave a different experience","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNw3_QtTQFOpfifphm2NVXGxUeoqml_U8Me2rpX&fid=0x0:0x6907a11959b0b8ea"],"When":"2024-2-5"},{"Name":"Azuki","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXDO580thEC_aOqQ6Ey2F5p_tJwlNUQNurFMEvymExhrUJyiE5I=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"#hotchocolatefest
Sweet, Elegant & Relaxing!

Different vibe than Honolulu Coffee just down the street. Very elegant, spacious, business casual for the older crowd.

Both hot chocolates were a tad on the sweet-er side to my liking. The extra gem of adding a cookie/churro was a bonus in value and presentation wise ...but the quality could have been fresher.

The Ham & Cheese Wrap was the spotlight!!! As you bite down on the crispness and flakiness of the wrap into the warm, soft, juiciest of the ham & egg.  It was the highlight!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPUFwVDlAZGIF1Pm8pOXScfa6jxbWXuO68R29pS&fid=0x0:0x6907a11959b0b8ea"],"When":"2024-1-21"},{"Name":"Cassandra Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIEuiSYCANIXn_gPt7YBivEPd5wIj4Rpp--f0L6NarEUVHjFA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"First time here, the atmosphere is good and I ordered a coffee but since they are closing in 30 mins, they gave me a take away cup of coffee tho I mentioned that it’s for here… umm… sorry, my 20 mins break destroyed a bit…","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNaVT9DTYQfoiVmWgeZgYrwxpf0xBdhTcT_ORPQ&fid=0x0:0x6907a11959b0b8ea"],"When":"2024-10-19"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Marina Tran-Vu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVfVtiU03SeiL3e-Ic5oNmDODXKfWsUK79bWxpgN-wBrQU_4exfaw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A great spacious place to meet friends or for sitting down and working on your laptop.  Lots of seating. It’s rare to find a cafe that’s actually warm with lots of windows! The staff are super friendly and the food is amazing! Had the breakfast focaccia, cinnamon bun and cookie!  They have a kitchen in the back so everything is actually baked themselves.  Love love love this place!!! Also free parking around the side, and plenty of washrooms.  If you have kids, you can grab a coffee and croissant and then bring your kids to the back playroom for the little ones.  Love it here!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOKNQBUjHFQr9DtlHzk03XFA-e1qQ6fzdlFZ3tE\u0026fid=0x0:0xb731885a791e5c87"],"When":"2024-11-26"},{"Name":"Christine Krysia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL_1ESCAHsWjthIDWmR_iW08ss5U0-9ZtcloFW27pUSpdcPhw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My latte was not too acidic. AND it very creamy! I stared at their cinnamon buns on the counter. I haven't had one in a few years so i decided to treat myself to one. I loved it! Just perfect. Not too sweet. This place was definitely worth the drive from Richmond:)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMbGb2Ip37BvwH24P9n03_Q8ECz-y6J9zt4Enlb\u0026fid=0x0:0xb731885a791e5c87"],"When":"2024-9-26"},{"Name":"Cade Bedford","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUhgGHHt5Yr2lnW90OxxIkwmadii07eOX8erS0SACWjBqzOV0o=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a hidden gem in Oakridge and worth a trip if your further afield. Great coffee, small menu but whatever they are cooking that day will be incredible. Staff are super friendly. Decor is simple and functional but Im happy with that because Im there for the food and drinks. People often remote work there but Ive never struggled to get a table. The eggs were awesome, it took me a couple of visits before I realised everything is vegan and the eggs are soy/chickpea based (they look and taste real).","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOBd9KqlIFgC3pIBNUF0mwWNHzuWuyMguiRnjXt\u0026fid=0x0:0xb731885a791e5c87"],"When":"2024-12-15"},{"Name":"Giuseppe Pepe","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXVgxSHkhG283IrWnBF9FhS0K63MTtIeGNbTkAm3C1_R91DMqVr=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Awesome plantbased food, great coffee, friendly staff!! Nice place to relax and have brunch… we always try something different everytime as the’re so delicious… the baked goodies are a treat… just go and try!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOL546LsNOyEpAym30Xy-RutKLXDGMeLxpl3pit\u0026fid=0x0:0xb731885a791e5c87"],"When":"2024-10-8"},{"Name":"AJ Rogers","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUBcv0wLxfFuRPa8iVOE0nNANk-cyNkzU2vt9ygAoWcZzbn4VTN=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Stopped in on my way out of town. Awesome space. Incredible service! The cinnamon bun was amazing and the breakfast croissant was the perfect way to end a little vegan vacay in Vancouver. Will definitely be stopping in again on my next trip.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNkf-reAgBw6jdruWg0Ye6juDLLPBn7yjH6CxSh\u0026fid=0x0:0xb731885a791e5c87"],"When":"2024-6-5"},{"Name":"Elisa Kazan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUfnXq79FXK6SM_3Qr0x9E7eqGAf2iM5e785pouauMfz2nICrvAIg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cute vegan cafe with a large selection of baked goods and food. The barista was super friendly.
