user_reviews:
[{"Name":"AG","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKTVyMm7SUzrWXHy5W9YTTw8RiR5u-uqKsPcACPZNBpht5PoCY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Few days ago, I came here with my friend and we tried their new Tiramisu coffee, and it was such a pleasant surprise! We also had the matcha cheese muffin, that’s one of my favorite! but due to some maintenance work, the seating was limited when we visited, so we had to wait quite a while for a table. However, the food and service were really good, so it didn’t affect the overall experience. It was a great visit that day!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPiWTphUzLwn3Gxlsro8gDZQV9SEeEBoKxV2BPE&fid=0x0:0xe7a3ff3e044ceeb7"],"When":"2024-10-28"},{"Name":"Bay Color","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJI1k4Sgd0aWDCqtosK7do8Vp3VfqEkz0STA2XewyBkbsa6hw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The location is near the busy street. But you can enjoy a quiet store, tasty special coffee and healthy food with friends. We had HAWAIIAN Bowl, Gibraltar Cafe and HAWAIIAN Latte,they are worth ordering again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN_alM1W6i0CKI-1hewbVz6dCoFMZlyhAizWl32&fid=0x0:0xe7a3ff3e044ceeb7"],"When":"2024-12-6"},{"Name":"R L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXDo--fdptHZ71prIhGQPJ7FahkbWrF05rgkw3OmUDlyk4sGVAj=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The size is on the smaller side for the price, but the tiramisu latte was great! I liked how much flavour the coffee had. It was sour in a way that the milk portion tempered very well. And of course dipping the ladyfinger was fun!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPc2sSobb_NU4NQc55cNJCoK4Ky_LDMwehiVhQd&fid=0x0:0xe7a3ff3e044ceeb7"],"When":"2024-10-28"},{"Name":"Tsui-Fang Hu (Tracy)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW_ro0txUL1mG25heVUuoyMTMpTlXMMMT4-dXmn5rgUocYrBx5y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"WOW I’ve never had an espresso like this 😧…. They served you with some sparkling water and 3 chocolate beans on the side!! How cute that was and definitely so insane 😳 For sure the coffee was good, 11 out of 10…
I like that they put the code for washrooms on their notice board so you don’t need to bother asking them every time. There were also so many interesting flyers!
The air was kinda stuffy there, but overall it was a good place to do some computer work or just hang out with friends","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN5ogP6GnN36csTKcZWa9uN5pS8j_zL1um76zns&fid=0x0:0xe7a3ff3e044ceeb7"],"When":"2024-6-19"},{"Name":"Leo Poon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV85YDglYa0dqJZBoHypSMWRJhkQh84yAItH6UCoC2VEFpBBkAY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The snowman 70% coca is super cute and delicious!

Very nice interior design and decor.

Music is soft and not too loud

Staff is friendly.

Dining environment is clean

A pretty decent cafe place.

Pricing is reasonable as well.  I saw the chicken breast salad is about $10, which is 20-30% lower than many places.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMT4ZmiIH7Ie1JauWMDhs4JpHDFEnLgRUJn22oP&fid=0x0:0xe7a3ff3e044ceeb7"],"When":"2024-1-22"},{"Name":"Jim Fong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV3tXWnX8xFhA_qZcSgIAVcjedjNVtb5Riz6aB4ltUNzTkDmgfU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our Sunday morning bike ride pit stop for the last couple of years. I’m completely hooked on their Hawaiian Cream Cold Brew. 😋😋

All their pastries are amazing. My goto snack are their amazing Matcha Breakfast cookies.

Great service and friendly staff. Spider-Man approved. 🕷️🕷️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMOxE0ZfAaQNl0vJm9YyiwQbsoMqK-wgqXYoSvP&fid=0x0:0xe7a3ff3e044ceeb7"],"When":"2023-8-22"},{"Name":"Kylie Phan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU-HRDc82hkD1eXo_STYVxLBqZ73WxWWSTVTqo6MsOZAeoUNvog=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our Matcha coffee with oat milk was lukewarm and the barista was kind enough to insist on remaking a new drink for us free of charge. [{"Name":"Steve Fernandez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXFG5V3EfrGX3d_PwKBSf2_5NjE6QyW7C3BVDFoPhElJ9xAz0xA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The employees know their stuff. They suggested a really good strain for  7 Grams, and I was satisfied. They curate to your taste depending on what mood you're in for and your budget is. I'm currently enjoying the flower I got. Can't wait to try out another one of their recommendations .","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Farhad","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIBWKX_kWfO_NjF1C0RbPL0YLUdjwj8MNJFYjQtyidsP0bn3w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"There was an issue with a credit card refund.  Sheldon was the manager on duty.  At first I was skeptical about what he said but Sheldon was very professional and told me he’d get back to me.  He did as he said and when I went back in, it was Alan who helped me out.  Sheldon not only made the refund as promised but had a bag of goodies for me.  I highly recommend this shop and Sheldon and Alan. Thanks guys 🙏🏼","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Hannah Monk","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXXE4F_wZNZv6wKeWL-J-_6kwxxlTLP7t81dB-UvRmhUFPsgcTd=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Good prices, and I like going into the store! However ordering is not the best and customer service is 50/50. My delivery would’ve been 2 hours late if I didnt cancel it. After talking to employees they indicated that their delivery system is often late and can’t actually track down the third party. I had to go back and forth with customer service and employees on how to resolve this issue which shouldn’t be an issue. Fortunately there was 1 employee that was very helpful.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Abhishek Attri","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUPawtt4_dwnw8x94uo6KQuh-2q51TFB2kxtmBGB7PS232EqEEAaQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best weed store in town, I am buying weed from them everyday and for everyday there is something new and best with prices as well. No compromise in quality as well. Ana is the one who is helping me in buying weed since day one and she is the best.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jeferson Siqueira","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXkG-wy2YaM-a5DqqPvCt-RgBGWxFYgFPYauTPPq8vt1YfwqRfg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently visited  and had an amazing experience! The budtender Ana was incredibly knowledgeable and friendly, making me feel welcome from the moment I walked in.  I highly recommend to anyone looking for high-quality products and exceptional service. I'll definitely be coming back!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Yousra B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLG7Q3ujI8mEFNFa4QFz3p3aQj2xFDanV48YBk7wOTCjJq8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Dont buy online because you have to call them to get ETA and the number on google goes straight to voicemail. I have been waiting since noon for my order. no one called me i called left multiple voicemails. fix your phone, and TEND to your delivery orders","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Michael St.Pierre","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUQQX-lS9-EmcHXV1RHm_g4jBD__FM8kM5ZtQjqBwNLaqzGX1x1=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Went in to purchase a joint. After the purchase of a supposed 1g joint I opened it to find out the joint was not 1g. ( after going home and weighing it turned out to be 0.67g) i informed the budtender that it was not 1g and I wanted it weighed or refunded and exchanged.  She proceeded to tell me that she couldn’t do that and that by default I was wrong about the size of the joint and calling me a liar in the process.  Our conversation got heated i left not after them saying I was banned .  After I left and got to the bus stop one of their customers were sent out after me.  He chased me down began to harass me and scream at me,  then proceeded to push me back with the intent to punch me.  After a few minutes of assaulting me he then ran back towards the store.  This is how they treat customers that dont adhere to their words.  Horrible customer service and will be pressing charges against the store and sueing them.  Will also be contacting the owner Raj Grover about the people he is employing.

The owner then tries to make up false information in a reply to this post saying that I refused to leave the building and was blocking the door for other customer.  Thats a complete lie I had a bus to catch home or I wasn’t getting home I was leaving the building and turned around in the doorway to respond to what their staff had said.  In no manner did they handle anything accordingly and no profanity was ever said directly to any of the employees.

Also any customers that leave your establishment saying that the girls in the building had told them to do it is also disgusting and the fact that they lie to cover it up shows their true colours.

A letter of intent to sue is being drawn up.  They never mentioned coming in to speak to the manager.  Already spoke to the owner of the company and he will be sent the same copy you will be delivered.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ju Ma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIULaTerm5xzpTc7AMwm5mA-oxZUWGxvpUsi009qFYcb79VrA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Don’t order for delivery it was supposed to arrive at 5pm 3h later still nothing ! If you ask someone by phone what’s happening with your order the only response you will have it’s to call back in one hours ! Horrible services never again !","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Jacob Eggleton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXKglmLD5rXwOjc8AHPEPB6gAEwPhBhb__7HRJ9SZ8w4UTzGyNa=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went here on a day it was pouring rain. My partner and I always try to go to new coffee places in the weekend so it was about time we went here. The seasonal drinks are always the best options I find and they had a good selection here. They also have the classics for coffee if that’s what you one. But the real star is the show is the baked goods here. You must try any of them. The customer service was polite and everything was served in a timely manner.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOCmVLvP2IW39MezxFmIxRUnhdzlskZuPx49ShL\u0026fid=0x0:0x4dfa98cbb6444e82"],"When":"2024-11-3"},{"Name":"Amy Watt","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXtFx0Lt1_G_UCsXyvg1o5eSDevhehAM8wUiop0lPf09tXNft4k=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Cool spot with a great vibe, located right next to a park with both indoor and outdoor seating. I also love the branding and the selection of crochet gifts they offer! Giving it four stars because the matcha I ordered was pretty average. They didn’t have coconut milk, so I went with oat milk, but it was bitter, lumpy, and not the best quality. It was disappointing, and I wouldn’t come back. My partner’s flat white was alright, so maybe their coffees are better but he said there are better spots.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPlw1_ET2i7bU4IgEh0CtIFfR9IB4lztdwW5rdr\u0026fid=0x0:0x4dfa98cbb6444e82"],"When":"2024-10-6"},{"Name":"Maria M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXmuhUB-INQ3XCbE2M9HT-MdzILSuqxW6ls6tLvy0JgUoxl1f3wCQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cool spot, nice vibes, good service. Lovely neighbourhood coffee shop/bakery. Saw this place being recommended everywhere, the cortado was perfect and the iced drink was really delicious. I love that they sell the crochet flowers, they make very nice gifts!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNqGk8Hp1U1xXcWEWKXU1fzWcSUvokaxETp9CY1\u0026fid=0x0:0x4dfa98cbb6444e82"],"When":"2024-10-17"},{"Name":"Shiya Zhu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVX3JrWWuktYL1jV1F5mRw8FXO7jMuQPUbVjz-MLpM-1jb2Jh5_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Mah is one of my favourite cafes in Vancouver. user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Stuart Rolland","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUB3oZ7xhkmIt07ECAm8mJGUC15fcunPIwVKs7F0P4BCrtaoo9iaQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"It's a decent enough grocery store, but they always seem to have long queues and not enough cashiers. No express till either. I have definitely found myself on occasion walking in looking at the queues and just walking back out again. We all know that the grocery business is doing quite well right now and there's no real need for this cost cutting measure","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lori Switzer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXA7bOuMyxQG48RI50kraGtVsRc4MWts_ARTCDLhJRDyKbmscH9=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Multiple pages for help up front. Plan staff breaks more efficiently please.

Also, someone in bakery was talking loudly about how it isn't her fault and things aren't being done right and other negative comments. Loud and with a couple curses.

Is this a family friendly environment? I am just glad I didn't have my kids with me to witness the negativity. That is not professional behavior.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Michael Moriarity","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWNhkYaB9zjlkkl74OBPcplO2QslT6bqh419yvto-fc4bLKxsqAKQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Save On Foods Grocery Store on 41st and Dunbar area , has a large parking area for ease of shopping..we always look at the. Weekly flyer to check out the grocery store deals..the store has wide aisles for ease of shopping..there is a shopping online and delivery options..","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPWpTL5gIahwjscoXzzgCxdulgfas-27dfss68O&fid=0x0:0xbeb7afdd4f414822"],"When":"2024-2-12"},{"Name":"Vanessa Carla De Souza Dias","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVSeWAUekz95eEyzm7t9DIAhfdvix_5rOvPCWdfNZE0iVME_pU=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"ALWAYS ASK FOR YOUR RECEIPT!! I didn’t use to check/ask mine and have been overcharged so many times. They “forget” to apply the promos constantly. It’s really unfortunate because it’s the closest grocery store but I see myself with no other alternative but to take my business elsewhere","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Alice Jones","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIemZwA7zlYxTq7Jt30I_iyWPJ2lJqg5YXu0HkEtUlKxMC0fw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This review is regarding the More Rewards Card and the policy around it.

I have recently been in touch with the More Rewards Customer Service team. According to them, a photograph of your More Rewards card is fine! These people should know, they ARE the More Rewards Customer Service team.

What I find most disappointing is the fact that the policy of how a More Rewards card is accepted is left to the discretion of the store manager and then to the cashier. In my experience, this is all decided upon by the Marketing team in the corporate head office and is completely removed form the managers hands. UNLESS the store is owner / operator, then that is a completely different story. Somehow, I don't feel this is the case in this store.  (if I'm wrong, correct me). If I'm not wrong - keep reading (if you like).

According to the store manager, a physical card is best.  This becomes one more card taking up space. While I realize this card can be loaded to Apple Wallet, I'm not crazy about this idea (am I alone?). I know I can provide my phone number, but I feel this is fringing on an invasion of privacy (perhaps this too is just me?)

The reason for the lack of acceptance of a picture? "...it is best to present a physical card at check out, as cashiers typically refrain from accepting pictures of cards due to concerns about potential fraud."

*blink...blink* Alright....this isn't saving points to cash in on a TV (Club Z). But I appreciate this program adds up to tens of thousands of dollars  in a very short period of time. If there are concerns, why offer a points system to reduce the cost of groceries?

I wonder what "fraud" they are concerned about?

If the fraud is people entering too many times on the random draws, the fastest way to cut that off at the knees: one registered number and name = one entry. Everyone with a More Rewards number gets a single shot and by random draw, someone wins. There are no benefit to multiple entries (or registered cards).

If the fraud is the accumulation of points themselves, then drop the program yesterday! Reduce the price of groceries and stand on your own merits as a chain of grocery stores: good products (I've seen produce rotting), good prices, phenomenal selection, and stellar customer service. In my opinion, these are all middling at best.

If the fraud is the sharing of numbers - If I were to give my physical number to a friend, they get the reduction in groceries, I get the points.  If anyone reading this really thinks about it, there is absolutely no difference from me going to the store with my friends shopping list, me buying their groceries, and them paying me back.  My friend still has the reduction in their groceries, I still get the points.  So really - fraud??  Sorry, but give me a break!

So, currently, at the end of the day - does it matter?  I guess it depends on which side of the coin you're on.  As a customer, I'm looking for the most convenient and easy shopping experience.  and if this means my More Rewards card happens to be a picture on my phone, and this is both convenient and easy, will I be leaving the store a happy customer? Most likely, yes.  If I'm nit-picked over a picture vs a physical card, will I be leaving the store a happy customer? Likely not.

When I worked as a cashier, my objective was to get the customer gone and leaving happy! I wasn't paid enough to argue - you have a picture? Fine. It's 1 item / customer or a limit of 6 / household and a whole family is shopping? Fine - it's one transaction, Why? I wasn't paid enough to care and it sped things up!

So, since the Dunbar location seems to leave it's policy making to their cashiers, do I feel comfortable shopping in that store? No.  Why? If policy around the More Rewards card is being left to the the cashier to interpret, a cashier could decide to stop accepting Debit cards one day. Is this extreme? Yup! But if policy around points is seemingly being left to the cashiers to determine - there is no telling what I might encounter in this store by way of what is acceptable.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOJUTkNgJA4nxmXtQwn04azXP760GO5ODjGOudz&fid=0x0:0xbeb7afdd4f414822"],"When":"2024-11-22"},{"Name":"Quinlan Wu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWXtir1TIhXtrXs42qhGyMeP1MyxlX1QlEzn4MMLzJAGFbEIMNudQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Was checking out my groceries with one of the cashiers who was a very polite Asian woman. Afterwards she calmly addressed somebody by the front counter with "excuse me?" to which her manager sternly and aggressively told her "excuse me, PLEASE," as if "excuse me" isn't already a polite way to call somebody's attention.
She said "excuse me?" once again and he belittlingly said "excuse me, PLEASE—we're in Canada you need to practice."

Needless to say, it left a bad taste in my mouth, and on top of that nobody follows up "excuse me" with "please," unless something like a command comes after it.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Josho Kamoo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ4n3iaFjoQyR1zucz1_1m7k51NtiBqRfCJcIPe2noft0FdsQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I had a good experience and staff was friendly .i was only in here temporarily but i would recommend and will be coming back .ample parking too","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOlap-9mXSdfIy0I6uomyxsTLcWccCEDlEZHE5y&fid=0x0:0xbeb7afdd4f414822"],"When":"2023-12-4"},{"Name":"priya aryan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWhujY_qvoDTSZ3DP97_yKAaQm8JxpQCMGH0Nq4gNguul5LMBRz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Living close by to this location  since 8yrs, before it's  a IGA. Best store to shop, very disappointing thing is Terrible experience with cashier.
Cashier  "Jane" she was very mean and racist.
People  from different ethnicity backgrounds  comes to shop.
She said  my accent for "Yellow " colour do not exist.
Helping customers or bullying customers???
Purchased flowers, she was very  very mean !!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Minji Co","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW0cW7yUIGQwxewtq2t91XH-PweiJmGMnXmQUWs9lKXUa5ZbKC6vQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"They have a lot of beans to choose from and the staff was kind enough to recommend one based on my preference (acidity, chocolate notes etc). It takes a while for preparation but my latte was SO GOOD! It was so smooth, exactly what I want. :) worth the wait and worth the trip.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMzTugG-hCa6NlXvRxO0ulPEK1SUsrqpVrrJ4m3&fid=0x0:0xec1e5bd4c5d7fcc2"],"When":"2024-7-19"},{"Name":"Henry Liu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW30GbzSiz_7FsJEKsd9lDOXqxRLnC29Zisa5Fit2ZcXcZ_wxE-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very friendly owner that recommends beans based on your taste profile. Had two amazing pour over cups, really recommend the Panama Altieri geisha beans. Will be returning to try other beans and refine my tastebuds 😎☕

Yuan imports various Asian coffee bean Roasters you can't easily get locally here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNuOoqri8gMNoS-0MPWevtmCTWbNCDOHDTcvghI&fid=0x0:0xec1e5bd4c5d7fcc2"],"When":"2024-9-15"},{"Name":"廖宏瑩","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX1BeT52kxWrdl3A1ytDdoq6U3h8ONlJGmGLrbzEx7D2evnFSLR=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Awesome coffee shop in East Van. Very knowledgeable baristas with great service. They have over 20 beans selection from roasters from Japan, South Korean and Taiwan. We orderd pourover and matcha latte, everything was delicious! Will definitely visiting again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMfrdgJvriyXv2KdEV2Y-g-MAB2kDQJNVHH8erG&fid=0x0:0xec1e5bd4c5d7fcc2"],"When":"2024-7-18"},{"Name":"Will Li","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLGDD7brNtaOWSPrb4kG9HB25Ge1x-VU_HZtlpi-qzw-EVvrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great new addition to the Vancouver coffee scene. My wife coworker recommend this shop. The owner and staff are super friend and will even recommend which beans to suit your taste or mood.

I tried this light Rwanda blend pour over and it was excellent.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMz8XjI_dD3fsN8wK6HvrZIZS9c7wBTP5jGDImW&fid=0x0:0xec1e5bd4c5d7fcc2"],"When":"2024-5-14"},{"Name":"Renee N","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIrJVEco3Jii5qFZysqIv_TrKBDpSarZGZHleJNKqcWQAoluBU=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The team are experts who love to share their coffee knowledge with you. They made great bean recommendations for our pour over and cortado. Both drinks were a delightful experience! Ambience, friendly chatter, and great drinks.

Update: When buying beans, they’ll provide instructions and sample of grind size for how you plan to make it. Ie espresso or pour over. ⚖️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPENi7HN4dkEm9wpfP3kJvPgOUxqdv5fJGfjKa1&fid=0x0:0xec1e5bd4c5d7fcc2"],"When":"2024-2-14"},{"Name":"Briany Tai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUaDpQzEuNStDRBr5hOYPbjSHf_qOdJOhQC38WblA_bsCmoKHOz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I am being bias, and yes their coffee is top notch.

It was a rainy day that I stubble into this little hipster coffee roastery. And very soon I found out that the owner is from my home city / country - Taichung, Taiwan. 🇹🇼 and they imports the coffee bean also roasted by a famous roaster in Taichung, Taiwan. Home town pride all over here!!

I had the Geisha on pour over, and just so silky smooth with fine layers of flavours.

Highly recommend, and please proof me wrong!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPc4tWQnPq5iAERvzqt7y_NKcyaUM3n2CuS3-ij&fid=0x0:0xec1e5bd4c5d7fcc2"],"When":"2024-6-14"},{"Name":"Ellise T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIPm6V1RCVQF-kZbmGdjH4TRiLMpf7DB5U0r-1fjBEf84Ngffdy=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you’re a fan of thoughtfully-made coffee and trying different coffee beans, this is the place for you. Yuán has a huge selection of beans from around the world to choose from. We’ve tried ones that have tasted like strawberry Pocky and Melona! The staff are very knowledgeable and if you ask for recommendations, they can tell you which beans to try and how to best enjoy them (e.g. pour over vs. espresso, hot vs. iced).
There’s plenty of free parking on Clark as well.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sam Lin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXW7Y3-4VNHgFf52wstLPMTtXwv5g6PJ8FaSMVqQeCS0LXJjVJT=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Awesome cafe staffed by knowledgeable baristas with great service. Tim, the owner, really takes the time to explain the different selection of beans. Whether you're just a regular coffee drinker or connoisseur, you will enjoy this space and their coffee!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNjWU0_fPlJRjRO4jppf0XbhtelGNDdZSEzcb09&fid=0x0:0xec1e5bd4c5d7fcc2"],"When":"2023-10-21"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jenny Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIyruovd3E8Tx5MBsyO8-Dd-DpYOIPX1sg-Vx1hyvwyVYuQTw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"So happy that Paragon opened another location 😊. I love their hot genmaicha oat. The matcha coconut refresher is great if you want something light especially after working out. Their tea infused baked goods are so yummy. They are collaboration with other local small businesses. The space is super cute and cozy. It can get pretty busy on the weekends but the line moves quickly.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPNfrVeRYvhR4gzIuWdocYRnXtwu_Q9Oc1RFR7v&fid=0x0:0x2a1f74f49a19358d"],"When":"2024-10-10"},{"Name":"Melinda W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUqFa91nGQX9-WVxFZ-rAUul10GF70bhWZFQZe97ymoPVUZrvFxnA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Paragon Tea Room has opened a shop in Richmond!

This new shop shares the same welcoming and warm atmosphere as the Vancouver W. shop. It also offers dine in and take out, although seats are limited inhouse. We came in a Monday late afternoon and managed to grab the two final seats.

It was absolutely pleasing to watch the lady gracefully hand-whisked the green tea to make my Matcha Black Sesame Oat. The matcha and the black sesame complemented each other so well with a good balance between each flavor and yet without losing their uniqueness. The seasalt chocolate cookie further  enhanced the taste of my drink by adding a little bit of saltiness.

I was very tempted to try their mochi muffins and bubble waffle, both of which were highly rated on Google, but I had to leave them for next time.

We will be back soon!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNmd61c1vTAYdTnMiHerNThP0V_pRGeaaYsX6yn&fid=0x0:0x2a1f74f49a19358d"],"When":"2024-10-17"},{"Name":"Nikka Adrias","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXGi6Gz_tMMFxsiHqVtyo9UQujDLj1XNHKkomkhpjbqVuxkYAZ79Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My visit to the Paragon Tea Room Richmond location was perfect! I highly recommend their Classic Matcha Oat. It's the perfect amount of earthiness and it's not too sweet. You can definitely tell it's high quality matcha. The exclusive mochi muffins at this location are a great lil' sweet treat when you're on the go.

If you're lucky enough to come across them, maybe you'll have Jasmin or Tiffany as your baristas – they were so warm and welcoming and their service was very smooth.

Will definitely be coming back for more soon!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNEbCQsvLOXYcOoDoC45FW05VPUVBgB9WAS_2_w&fid=0x0:0x2a1f74f49a19358d"],"When":"2024-10-9"},{"Name":"Aaron Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIxKZ7-UTFQni0mrdKYzhez4Ll3vvr5m_nxy9gIdPj06QAW9g8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently visited Paragon Tea Room in Richmond, and it was a wonderful experience!

The comfortable environment and convenient location makes it perfect for a quick refreshment.

The drink selection is fantastic—my favorite is the Obsidian Hojicha, rich and flavorful. They serve a variety of teas, plant-based bubble teas, and delicious bubble waffles. The staff were friendly and efficient, especially with managing the line ups, and ensuring orders came out in a timely manner.

Whether you're looking to hang out with friends or just enjoy a tasty treat, Paragon Tea Room is a must-visit while in the neighbourhood.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNH8RnzTWaAxIUPLiThqUlHZCGN9rkNFBImPPwG&fid=0x0:0x2a1f74f49a19358d"],"When":"2024-10-13"},{"Name":"Alan Zheng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL-QmMYfw75kgf5vonVt_7RAAdUJRl5hAF6Ijht6iC6ZE8aPQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excited to see they have opened up their Richmond location. Their green tea beverages and tea powders set the bar high for its competitors in the GVA.

If you have never tried, it’s worth trying","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN4J9iBTQenxjICBDqxeI3RdKXv-8kh-YfOoyAK&fid=0x0:0x2a1f74f49a19358d"],"When":"2024-12-8"},{"Name":"Henry Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVcTlx45tkivdnVyW4B38kXt4WHZXtLMp6yRttTlIFdf-1gou8R=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"As good as the Vancouver store. Interior is clean and modern. Barista is a bit slow making everything. Bubble waffle and tea drinks are good. Lots of space for parking.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN3RjHWGMP8v2hH9Vxk7OIAgFvA-MrKVfQiadED&fid=0x0:0x2a1f74f49a19358d"],"When":"2024-10-5"},{"Name":"Elton Chung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU_SVkVqkNe3SvSFwaZ1xrBYHObNVkTiTTXXYykf58guqGIk3qy=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"It was a cold morning, my wife and I needed hot beverage to warm us up. We came to this tea room as we visited their main shop in Cambie Street before.

This tea room has a similar theme of interior and there are several tables and single person seats opposite to the cashier.

We ordered matcha latte and tea misto. They both had a bold taste of tea and silky milk foam on top. The taste was satisfactorily rich.

This is one of the best tea rooms to go in Richmond.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPXODY0Mjx2P3GkHfxbOSjMgCWlzpTn4I6nmO8&fid=0x0:0x2a1f74f49a19358d"],"When":"2024-11-22"},{"Name":"Belva See","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKA0yW8ovdsF8RER5QKnV7faGXhFRY_rCpDJLu01gM6B7onuQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I like their drinks and have been a long time customer for both locations but I just want to share an experience about making sure to pay attention to their holiday hours.
I ordered their Santa shortbread collection on Dec 23 for pick up the next day on Dec 24. I remembered clearly at the time of ordering to check for their closing hours to be sure that I can pick it up on time and that they weren't closing early for X'mas (both the Google hours and their main website said at the time of ordering that their store closes at 7 pm/ regular hours so I proceeded with ordering).
When I got to the Richmond store on Dec 24th at 4:15 pm, I then realized from the sign posted outside their door that they actually closed at 4 pm. I want to thank the staff that they still opened the doors after hours when I knocked, thank you to one of the ladies who called her manager to let her know about the situation and thankfully, in the end, I was able to still pick up the order but I want to raise a few concerns here:
1) I would not have ordered from Paragon if I knew ahead of time that they were closing early or I would have arranged someone to pick up for me. I have done my due diligence to check for their holiday hours on the day of placing the order. Their holiday hours should have been posted on their main website given that they have an online ordering system on this site and they have order pick up available on xmas Eve (even until today, Dec 24th, the holiday hours aren't posted). The hours on google were not updated until the day of. The receipt also does not indicate pick up deadline. I raised this concern to the staff at pickup that their hours aren't updated and her response was that this is posted on Instagram. There shouldn't be an assumption that all their customers follow  their Instagram or that their go-to would be to check Instagram for their hours, especially when there is a store website and the Instagram account is not the first link that is attached the Google business page. I could not find a phone number to call either to give them a heads up or inquire what to do in this case.
2) It would be appreciative if the staff could have called the customers who did not pick up their orders (or even called 30 min before closing which some other stores would have done) or sent an email regarding this which will highlight more professionalism here. When asked about this, the staff answered that they have too many orders to call the customers (which is interesting because do they have many orders left behind by customers who do not pick up their order for the day they ordered for).
In summary, I still want to thank the staff for taking their time for helping me but I hope the store understands the frustration for a customer who is trying to rush from work and hoping to gift the cookies for an X'mas dinner. This could be handled with better customer service and professionalism.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPp2nBWzmJi7dbcF5UHsZFQaWmDwVsqNjavRLr3&fid=0x0:0x2a1f74f49a19358d"],"When":"2024-12-25"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jessica Joys","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWqRsI3T45tlLid0FCIwEDV2sMNVTdmM34c2N7duCgfHk2a778=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love their spicy mayo chicken rice bowl. And my boyfriend always order their beef rice bowl everytime we come to this place! Service is very good and food portion is very generous! Will definitely come back 🫶🏻","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMPNvBMotg7eBNX8nqyETVkwUXGK4WasNVP_aei&fid=0x0:0x42201e1490835b91"],"When":"2024-9-28"},{"Name":"Huini Ge","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI0abe2OULJGpsqMgZQlKmSiK9lM_KrAVIiCIZj2bpGh5Muxg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This amazing cafe is amazing! The owner and her mom are so kind and friendly :) They were so thoughtful! They saw our dog and even gave him a bowl of water. The food is so flavourful with nice presentation. ❤️ Their croissants are made in house too! We highly recommend it!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN8ICip4HSd6uOKKTVj2C9pmdY0QJvn_YFT72nf&fid=0x0:0x42201e1490835b91"],"When":"2024-8-25"},{"Name":"Kwong Tang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVRNhrcdIOQyhkpCbdjoUSwC0OqkPEp5C09o-KZX9pyAsIQioX9=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"☀️ Morning Vibes at La Luce Cafe 🌟

🥪 Hit up La Luce Cafe for breakfast and oh man, was it a treat! Scooped up a sandwich, a latte, and their Plain Croffle – talk about a breakfast of champions! Everything was super tasty and the portions? Big enough to make your belly happy.

☕ The place has this cool, laid-back atmosphere that's just perfect for those lazy mornings or when you need a cozy spot to wake up. The coffee's on point, and the menu's got a little something for everyone.

🤗 The crew at La Luce? Absolute gems! They make you feel like you're part of the fam. Whether you're a regular or just dropping by, this cafe's got the goods – great bites, awesome brews, and the friendliest vibes around. Can't wait to go back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOKSsPdUGtiLcUuDOVNe03UNqMeXet1YSr6XxMP&fid=0x0:0x42201e1490835b91"],"When":"2024-3-23"},{"Name":"Alice","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXFT049LYwu-0D3nugtanqrBVxX-ePbLZHy5NYxcc6xpk7KkClKWQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The atmosphere was incredible, the music was  nice and at a relaxing volume. The decoration and seating was splendid - very sturdy tables and chairs. The staff were super kind and helpful, adding to the amazing atmosphere of the cafe. And the food, THE FOOD AND COFFEE, was amazingly delicious. I came here just to eat but what I left with was a mind at peace, I'm so happy this place exists.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO8d3ZjgO68uZiu0b-u8ArnBckQn3MRJYDrwY3_&fid=0x0:0x42201e1490835b91"],"When":"2024-5-24"},{"Name":"Sabaah Moffedi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLMYZGpjMGxUSo7S8NsUzbwIxFK5j16UTrXLwWVjEPaT6uRDQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Clean, bright, spacious space with delicious Korean inspired food. Great work cafe with lots of plugs, food options and drinks. I wouldn’t say their speciality is coffee but it’s still 3rd wave with oat and alternative milk options. My friend is a coffee snob and he said it did the job and he’d come back. Great way to support a local family run business… definitely coming back for the Bibimbap.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNjcVBTs0pnG6Cr7ZPoEcfZaEuv-kDuxJ1FM0FM&fid=0x0:0x42201e1490835b91"],"When":"2024-3-6"},{"Name":"Angel Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUoX3iltu6xwM5SJ7a3j4tFsAhBkn1PUWPwX6GnfNtdLk_qCzdWxg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Spotted this cute cafe while waiting for my Tesla to be serviced.  Sweet cute breakfast and lunch place which offers traditional breakfast and Korean food !","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPfD4Uhx7J1b7GzF8uqYD5IdxgNFpo1Dnia2l0q&fid=0x0:0x42201e1490835b91"],"When":"2024-8-2"},{"Name":"Mikaela Maquiling","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUDC-34uEW7caMqh0Mi9j-9vRCwc7dmVB0QGfiW1sujPRuY5vB4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I always loved my visit here. The food is delicious, I especially enjoyed their tiramisu croffle! The coffees are creamy and perfect for rainy days.

I understand this cafe went through a transfer of ownership, but best be assured the new owners are just as incredibly dedicated to this place. I believe it’s run by a family, and it’s really nice seeing them all work here together.

The space is so comforting and modern, and I loved taking my work here, since plugs are found on almost every table. Highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN8igDGKvU9rOGkgug8MyJyUJXufKgpM-iO2M_X&fid=0x0:0x42201e1490835b91"],"When":"2023-2-19"},{"Name":"Danny Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX8eoyUE6az-FmQo7i2mVq5z64Ow48sgKu1EmLZc0zWWN6DMy5asw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nice little family run cafe right across from a Tesla service centre. Quaint decor and a great chicken sandwich. Second floor seating. Not sure if I’d go out of my way to come here but the service, coffee and food were all excellent.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNQ7JgsHVhdOvavpZY4HDLK0T7-9gVZ5niuZjWk&fid=0x0:0x42201e1490835b91"],"When":"2023-2-13"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Anthony Young","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJjLBVGvYMuQ_7irAafqyFenF84IHbDebi7uNt8G5dE291E5g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Food is good.
Lobster family meals are decent combos with soup and rice.
HK style cafe service. So don't expect friendly smiley servers.
Very busy on the weekends. Make a reservation.  Parking lot are usually packed as multiple restaurants in this complex.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMRW84zjO1UIBCkVKowmTQZHlH8NNSGyRUB8ja7&fid=0x0:0xba06e3709da95dff"],"When":"2024-6-19"},{"Name":"Bonnie Leung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVnEc4L_oX33x1BIdSnyu3qIy05RmcbQP1bJwBirlW_Yv38YSLczA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious hong kong style Cantonese food
Hainan chic rice👍🏻
Stir fried beef rice noodles👍🏻
2/3 Attendents only , so busy n slower than expected but hardworking enuf🫶🏻👍🏻
Comfy atmosphere
Easy parking
Reminder: Fettuccine n noodles size r large for Asian ladies 😸","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN9nQnzK_ArHkk8V-B_slQ3Cgt3trtQ1P-7ACDl&fid=0x0:0xba06e3709da95dff"],"When":"2024-8-2"},{"Name":"Fay. H.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXd4mYlouz-Pj7R6TieEfSHQNydfMYBskXJxl4xfL_hV98dHHgm=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This review is only regarding the breakfast menu as I only go for breakfast.

Prices went up a little. Serving size... Went down a tiny bit? Feels like there's less meat in my noodles.

Service is still great like always. Sometimes the kitchen mixes up how the order of eggs (eg. Scrambled VS sunny side VS fully cooked).

The place is clean and brightly lit.

The noise level is hit or miss depending on other customers.

Cost of hot drink with meal is free. Cold drink cost extra $1.50, but nothing is stopping you from bringing in a thermos with ice 😜

Will continue to visit","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPjChlAll89fJZj5h3vzzdYoeZnIT7WTd1HUSr8&fid=0x0:0xba06e3709da95dff"],"When":"2024-9-10"},{"Name":"Charmian “Lola” T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWgNIsycjAjzrvG8wivWZhPbw8cIcLPeWXd_RAmbJfEA0gUU6vQDA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"My parents brought me here to try their lobster special set … soup and rice comes with it plus free flowing tea… omg the lobster with noodles was amazing , the halibut was to die for and the spicy pork with green beans was so addictive. Let me tell you this year alone in the last six months my parents have gone back at least six times and each time being more friends and family to try every single dish on their special set menu… We’re already planning to go back and try their crab set special 😂. It’s well worth the money, we had enough food left over to have for dinner. And the staff are amazing and quick and friendly ! Just go and dig in!!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Johnny C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWMH8aFZIGB5a7CFStbNQ6JGT0sYgxOttD7xMtIebcz8N9tnSzq=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Another Hong Kong style cafe and noodle house combined.  Food was average.  I ordered curry brisket with rice.  I find the brisket to be too fat and not enough white rice.  Prices in the menu are on the higher side compare to other Hong Kong style cafe.  Personally I don’t think the value is there for the price of the food I ordered.  Parking lot is big but fills up quickly during meal times.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOJ2WDCiItljI5MNQLQEwUyMfSAAoQkXqoGkeaA&fid=0x0:0xba06e3709da95dff"],"When":"2024-6-9"},{"Name":"William Lau","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVmQdctlbM12t5Occdf84xI_X4OatAdUnoO7Mf5nuujaBWYasmgPA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Visited twice.

The first time was a really busy and crowded evening so I felt the tables might be too close together and the service seemed to suffer for it. Food that night was not as good as the Vancouver location but was alright. I heard the head cook moved to this location but maybe not by that night

This time was a less crowded breakfast so it was better. Food seemed better but then breakfast and dinner are different meals. Ordering 2 item combos is a good deal ($14) vs just 1 @ $10. Love that egg custard in their deep fried French toast. Congee was good too as seems no MSG.

Plenty of parking in their shared parking lot both times. Capstan Way street parking if the lot is full.

This is a fine location for breakfast if you are dropping someone off to the airport.

I'll visit again if in Richmond for the day and maybe I'll give more stars in the future after those visits.

Update: visited again another companion wanted to compare here with Main Street branch as she heard lots of staff moved from there to here. Still not as good, and didn't see any original serving staff from the  Main St. branch.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMFVie6NSUTF2QFafotn1WSRyhrzdSVmMC34J56&fid=0x0:0xba06e3709da95dff"],"When":"2022-12-30"},{"Name":"t l","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIIMDadAdXgjdCR9ryJtJHb7jNI1DR0yfUG8KK9xo-KtDDcIw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"At present, most likely the best Hong Kong style cafe in Richmond.   A good balance between portion, quality and price.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOMaepUwzj4bLxHQf7zqvV61qcofwz86mnrhA8d&fid=0x0:0xba06e3709da95dff"],"When":"2024-6-18"},{"Name":"Dan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV6Vpad3zmd_bRS_NRyMDg5xHn355DE6cSY0nXB1CDQJfi5a5o=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good portion for the food. Chicken patty is bigger than my hand! Average price for a HK cafe.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNArnmeZxj9tvOMEV4c9Ga4WQRH2e11cYuR5EY9&fid=0x0:0xba06e3709da95dff"],"When":"2024-6-28"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Farin --","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJSWX-m2DR4V1ZpvhinisIClxjZBDtU006AK_xnHergHu_DWQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This cafe used to be a delight but has sadly gone downhill. I ordered a jerk chicken wrap - it was more mayo and lettuce than anything. Barely a hint of jerk chicken spice and maybe a smidge of the promised mango chutney. Although it was apparently heated up, it was still ice cold in the middle. Also paid for an overpriced iced London fog. The tea was barely steeped and I was given a cup of what looked to be milk with no tea colouring. I ended up giving it back and asking for it to be redone. After a bit of arguing (!!) — they should’ve been so embarrassed to give me essentially a cup of milk in the first place — they gave me a slightly better version but again the tea was barely steeped and the London Fog was not made to standards. I ended up tossing half of it away. The whole meal was subpar and a huge disappointment. My coworkers agreed and they ordered other sandwiches. We wouldn’t recommend anyone to eat here or cater from here.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sarah-Marie R. Boerner Albertson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXuoqpX7yQorjuiJuT__r9dWO0twJeUftEiUqj6YPNkzcdSpFY2_w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Fine spot for a quick meal. Nothing fancy, but coffee is decent and has a baked good case.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP2GxrdxIgyuhQpWkTGbWn-JsJvjvuE9d9d5gtQ&fid=0x0:0x18e5f7c600ffd9d8"],"When":"2024-7-24"},{"Name":"Eddie So","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocISSdmRal6WEYNToT2BfCZQ0cdumKRhmtyRM82KD93UMkc0-g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"When I bring the coffee, tea and the muffin back to the table in the patio, my wife is upset about the paper cup and the paper bag.  She is so disappointed about the cup and plate.  She say everyone understand that the pandemic makes so many things have to change.
She is still remember that we always bring friends form overseas for the traditional English afternoon tea years ago.
All my friends say this is a really nice place for afternoon tea with a scenery garden setting.  There are still some shops and hotels offer afternoon tea in Vancouver but this is the only one with the beautiful garden.
My wife really hopes this place can bring all the good things when the situation is changing.
We hope you make this place is a memorable place for all visitors.
If you visit the garden, remember to have a lunch or drink there, you will like it.
Thank you for the staff are so nice and helpful when we visited in June 2023.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMxiQSoTvvCoak_Us3ZDeJ5QmJ98NRJKEpwO7Gu&fid=0x0:0x18e5f7c600ffd9d8"],"When":"2022-7-7"},{"Name":"Pooya Mohammadi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVEMZryWVPX5Tm2bYag-esW8MaLoN9KJ4NS1DCL9dnAcrEe61w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Well, this café could be a lot better! It doesn't look like a well-equipped café that you can find in Vancouver!

📌 Located at at the VanDusen Botanical Garden's Visitor Center, The Truffles is more good for drinking than eating. You have to order in advance before sitting. If weather is nice, you can sit in patio with a picturesque view of the garden and its lake.

⛳️ As its part of the whole VanDusen Garden, the ceiling and decoration is contingent and eye-catching.

☕️ The coffee is average, yet good to have especially with the beautiful scenery.

By the way, you might see one or some ducks 🦆 under your feet! They warn to not feed birds, but some ducks come inside and eat bread and cookie crumbs on he floor and then leave!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPhy-MokrXrdmFubwr4yhi5Ly_pFeBiWj0mR0MS&fid=0x0:0x18e5f7c600ffd9d8"],"When":"2021-7-25"},{"Name":"Heathe M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVc1WsRqXMf-kiWveW50VToGy4A5U0r7Q0Pl3M7GOaXDrG1B9RQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I give it a hundred Stars if I could. Very beautiful full over 7,500 different plant species, hummingbirds, hawks, Canadian geese, herons, butterflies and turtles oh and Koi. Although that's what the brochure says I didn't see any birds but did hear some, didn't see any Turtles and only saw one koi. It's like a lush Garden that you've never been into like The Secret Garden. Lots of beautiful flowers and I would imagine the best time to visit would probably be the springtime. There's an amazing maze there that was so much fun to go through that has 3,000 pyramid Cedars so you can't see over the top. There's a very beautiful serene and pictures small lake with waterfall and architecture with sculptures. The cost is under $10. Definitely, worth the visit to Grandville area.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMDK61ORadzZfm1ZFep_2_By8dyMQpixn6sBllY&fid=0x0:0x18e5f7c600ffd9d8"],"When":"2022-10-16"},{"Name":"Eva Kapravelou","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUzwFr0F-CA9OXUTD3mm71pNE8M2oz3lnFheK2ex5XUvva7Ttp1NQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"This could be a fantastic cafe if they were actually trained to make coffee. This in the picture was meant to be a cappuccino. The frothed milk was used and reused and reused. And to make it worse in this business you tip before you receive the service. Not cool.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMYnfFCPVVc5oVPKKoIA6IMqywHJ1HZclPupEtM&fid=0x0:0x18e5f7c600ffd9d8"],"When":"2024-6-16"},{"Name":"Subrata Chakrabarti","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ5RDAw8Aem70tR9tIzdz9rELiNgtIPePCYMQ2ARfSBfQvG1w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"We recently had lunch after our walk in the garden. The cafe was not too busy and we got a table in the outdoor patio on the garden side.

There were reasonable options for lunch. There were sandwiches and wraps and simple desserts and snacks.

Coffee was good.

But the best part was to sit outside in the fresh air on a sunny day, which has been rare in Vancouver.

We enjoyed our outing very much","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP74rWYL1mq0gbwwDN2vX_x1uYy1G2XJKSw3cu5&fid=0x0:0x18e5f7c600ffd9d8"],"When":"2022-2-27"},{"Name":"Brigid Ciganik","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJUZkFkXB00HpMCPg3qko7N4PQIjn_Va8Xe1JNXZ1p3OD2kDQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"It's hard to find many high tea experiences anymore; this was a very pleasant surprise. We found it delicious as well as a good value compared to other places & obviously the occasion was enhanced by the beautiful garden setting!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Philip Raymond Lim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5EIBAgpBLsauhPMdjXym7mJ4fA8mtryDtWQIJCZfJxYXxupU8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had a craving for Timbertrain Coffee and discovered they have another location on Grandview—what a great find! Their drip coffee and cookies are always a treat, and this spot kept up the high standards I’ve come to expect. The space is unique, and the price is reasonable.

What makes this location stand out is the spacious layout, free parking, and smaller crowd—it’s perfect for when I want a quiet moment to unwind or focus. Whether you’re here for the coffee, to chill, or both, this place is a total win. Can’t wait to come back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNK2Xxc2TqbUmMBy5P_h0wsLcRTnjV7Hujw463-&fid=0x0:0x6381b407a8ebbe6e"],"When":"2024-11-29"},{"Name":"Jim Fong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV3tXWnX8xFhA_qZcSgIAVcjedjNVtb5Riz6aB4ltUNzTkDmgfU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Found another “hidden gem” coffee shop. Literally hidden away on an East Van street between low rise apartments and businesses. All their pastries are baked on site. Coffee are roasted locally by Timbertrain.

Quiet and spacious inside. Staff is super friendly. Coffee was amazing. Will be back to try some of their other pastries.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM2yOfrl8nFCm64Thl_OLIrI4DUblnAu--R8xjm&fid=0x0:0x6381b407a8ebbe6e"],"When":"2024-12-4"},{"Name":"Angie h","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUK5-Eyg-HKdLqH6Sh0Yu5AouPT5bxsEAkZr27lVeLcEluqhYqm=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great space with lots of light but small tables, seats are mainly benches, no chairs. Staff is friendly and coffee is pretty good. I’ll be back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP7TRTgKQkGf3mKvcJDuextoqG2KSVx2mnbiO0D&fid=0x0:0x6381b407a8ebbe6e"],"When":"2024-10-6"},{"Name":"Danielle Ryan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWi2BLfRcy85qHqef_RJUVP-7fD_r6MTVDlDkBnW5ZBbzwS5hfjiQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cute and cozy East Van hidden gem. Lot's of parking in the surrounding neighbourhood. Visited on a Friday mid-day and it wasn't too busy. There is a decent amount of indoor seating. Coffee is great and the baked goods (I tried the walnut cookie) were fresh. Also, for Vancouver the prices seem very reasonable.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Maria M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXmuhUB-INQ3XCbE2M9HT-MdzILSuqxW6ls6tLvy0JgUoxl1f3wCQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I have known Timbertrain for a while… having been to the downtown location and the Port Moody one before this one. I am now rarely in downtown and the Port Moody one seems to have closed, so I came to check this one out when around the area and it’s honestly just okay. There are many coffee shops and roasters around town and it’s gotta be better than that to stand out. The walnut chocolate cookie is legit really good, my flat white was nice.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOoxEZ98P_22HS6padfNioSOo0C9DNq-ThClgOY&fid=0x0:0x6381b407a8ebbe6e"],"When":"2024-1-25"},{"Name":"Kanako Sakurada","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKYybgPjG_d3LYq66Ui47Ocd_2PMrfkKaju5V_L0IyVTR19lQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Their coffee has good balance of acidity and bitterness. My flat white was very tasty. Baked goods were ok.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMimOuXywfbraLw8Ngpu8SLs5btlRQOFKSafLQ0&fid=0x0:0x6381b407a8ebbe6e"],"When":"2024-3-11"},{"Name":"Sharzi BD","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW288MzwFkWlfN4-hmCJwoI28tpVq0hWMFg6JZzbb5p0qpMwt_I=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We came across to this cafe and wanted to grab a coffee which they serve it into cute cups 😍
Both for here and to go cups are beautiful 🤩
The taste of a coffee was good too, and also has a welcoming staff 🫶🏻
They can work on the atmosphere to make it more attractive.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP299TLyOMXnwcIO9bjtck000ykBdoO4EgFK7LJ&fid=0x0:0x6381b407a8ebbe6e"],"When":"2023-9-20"},{"Name":"Henry Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVcTlx45tkivdnVyW4B38kXt4WHZXtLMp6yRttTlIFdf-1gou8R=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Their coffee beans are surprisingly reasonably priced, much cheaper than the ones I usually buy from other cafes.
Tried the special coffee but I forgot the name lol, it was quite good.
Cool industrial interior, friendly barista, coffee is pretty good too.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPZnZtlsDgod-dpJ1IM33Tbas8QZgUNQEWvwAtk&fid=0x0:0x6381b407a8ebbe6e"],"When":"2023-9-20"}]

about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Outdoor seating","enabled":true},{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Onsite services","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"highlights","name":"Highlights","options":[{"name":"Great tea selection","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair accessible seating","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible washroom","enabled":true}]},{"id":"offerings","name":"Offerings","options":[{"name":"Coffee","enabled":true},{"name":"Prepared foods","enabled":true},{"name":"Vegetarian options","enabled":true}]},{"id":"dining_options","name":"Dining options","options":[{"name":"Breakfast","enabled":true},{"name":"Lunch","enabled":true},{"name":"Dinner","enabled":true},{"name":"Dessert","enabled":true},{"name":"Seating","enabled":true}]},{"id":"amenities","name":"Amenities","options":[{"name":"Washroom","enabled":true},{"name":"Wi-Fi","enabled":true},{"name":"Wi-Fi","enabled":false}]},{"id":"atmosphere","name":"Atmosphere","options":[{"name":"Casual","enabled":true},{"name":"Cozy","enabled":true}]},{"id":"crowd","name":"Crowd","options":[{"name":"LGBTQ+ friendly","enabled":true}]},{"id":"planning","name":"Planning","options":[{"name":"Accepts reservations","enabled":false}]},{"id":"payments","name":"Payments","options":[{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"Debit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"NFC mobile payments","enabled":true},{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":false}]},{"id":"parking","name":"Parking","options":[{"name":"Paid street parking","enabled":true}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"David 04 Make the World a Better Place","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXXmkrAyRsAwad4uDl0EKEwpsCVMLq51IOxmbley55h_iwJzGo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I truly love the coffee at all JJ Bean locations. Not only do the fragrance and taste of the coffee, pastries, and food stand out, but the atmosphere also makes me feel comfortable.

The entire experience of getting a coffee here is delightful. You feel your body craving caffeine, and you walk into this beautiful café. You are greeted by staff with warm smiles, surrounded by the antique-style interior design, and you see people enjoying their coffee happily. You place your order and wait for your coffee. Waiting becomes almost unbearable because of how much you anticipate that lovely coffee—whether it’s hot or iced, it doesn’t matter. When you finally receive your coffee, it’s almost too good to believe, so you trust your nose and taste buds to confirm it.

With this coffee in hand, you’re bound to have a happy day.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOmn9_DZxVXkKFaSNnUQLBGmO2EfCoRX-v_O2M&fid=0x0:0x213f3f2e484d802e"],"When":"2024-9-24"},{"Name":"Robin Finney","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWVbWqTE7LLBit7VgkEzgElkdJV1G-pzKpCOXT1DlVkgqr8Aaw2Ng=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’ve been buying coffee and beans from JJs for over 10 years now and over 100lb of beans in the last three years.

They provide great consistent quality. Their dark Railtown blend was my favourite for the longest time but I’m now all about their more complex Eastside blend. They also have a great revolving selection of single origin beans.

Recently I asked them if they would include an empty jute green coffee bag in my subscription order, without hesitation they sent this beautiful bag that I will transform into wall art.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPDe8wO6bQY9td8ZsKVG-nifTUrBjKCi2GZsCdI&fid=0x0:0x213f3f2e484d802e"],"When":"2024-7-15"},{"Name":"Elena Plotkina","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWY2H3vlXuZ_qNpzDHA_J3AMpmpAw1iAqdzbeIVUl1H_ANaKrc=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The most delicious hot chocolate I've ever had. And the apple cinnamon cruffin was just fantastic. Definitely love this place already","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMfGUDbq25KOgiXi-PoRz5PhX_E4EoZirX5QbtK&fid=0x0:0x213f3f2e484d802e"],"When":"2024-12-5"},{"Name":"nav","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUFbOAJbtke7joVRp0J6zZ0tGDG2B4xX6cSDTEsi0BVoJ8UH34qGw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"JJ Bean is the best bang for your buck espresso/coffee in Vancouver.  Stopped by the Powell location today, and was nicely surprised by the roasting operation you can view in until back.
My espresso was great, my wife's latte was delicious, the muffin was tasty, and my kids both enjoyed their cookie and croissant. JJ Bean will always be a stop for me whenever I visit Vancouver.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOadMFytTYaj3sGUY2aTUkTGphfM-DvniV-Jese&fid=0x0:0x213f3f2e484d802e"],"When":"2024-7-9"},{"Name":"Brent","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJj5L4PdCuQmf23ePO6vItG9NB6ydVYWNSr5K7P9J2ZsO_xFh8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"JJ: You need to change your coffee bags to better ones with a one way valve so people can store the beans properly in the bag. If you are charging 20 or 30 bucks a bag, the packaging should be much better. Look to your competition Agro Roasters just down the road. The coffee is better and the packaging is miles ahead of you.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM2YUHIXl8vhs3zz62prTHSG-9CKOS9J_wudXqf&fid=0x0:0x213f3f2e484d802e"],"When":"2024-10-14"},{"Name":"Katerina Pilipyuk","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV_rNS0CyHd_IEV1y92ZYANM-bIuvdf37y5HxszoT6ogkhFGV5DQg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Never order chai latter if you don’t want to end up in sugar coma. On the other hand, if you like that coffee and sugar induced sensation, go for it ;) their muffins and bakery are great. Not too sweet.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sandy S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKHZAINZZyfT61D_b1IKseVd00eH9TXiXWHT0rWZ2U1lht4N3sy=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The best coffee shop to hang out at on Powell, with an old world charm very unlike those boring, dimly lit places with industrial decor. Staff is warm and friendly, service is on point. Excellent coffee, baked goods and wraps. Raspberry scone and Vegan wrap with meatless sausage are our favorites.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNfRaZDx4sBJdPn46cg2hL7b0C8wAlyzqk_uV-F&fid=0x0:0x213f3f2e484d802e"],"When":"2022-6-18"},{"Name":"Jack Reed","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLFtx01Dd1tm9sWw-mb-T09Ta1Irxp4_5RtnpojhBcTkiT43w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cold brew was very tasty, flavourful so watch out if you're a baby. Iced American was good not kind blowing. Double chocolate brownie cookie was out of this world .

Nice atheistic and background music.","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: CoCo Bubble Tea（Joyce）
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"highlights","name":"Highlights","options":[{"name":"Great tea selection","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Paul Chiu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXftGFeH_N47wrw1Q8m2ouQJ1vSjhE35T9KCOBDRBZHM-SruWp2=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recommend their #1 Pearl Milk Tea with “least sugar” and ice of your choice. Their pearl is very chewy and the milk tea further enhances the taste. It was delicious.

I went at a very late time and the guy there asked if I had Uber Ears account because they were doing buy one get one only for the Pearl Milk Tea. He didn’t have to tell me this but decided to.

Rick if you’re reading this, I hope you get promoted and achieve your goals and dreams.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"F Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUBus-mkAWBw25UVerREpVqj9FDzOGL6KFSII1Jgjc0P5ooCdo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The milk tea was so watered down it tasted like water I'm not even kidding. They were also stingy with giving toppings compared to other locations and I say that even as someone who doesn't like too much toppings in their bubble tea. The lady working there is not fit for the job. No smile, no thank you, and she immediately starts chatting in Chinese with her colleague. This is the worst Coco I've been to and their low (currently 2.8) Google rating is actually reflective of their business and well deserved.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"A Z (futyh_ag)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU5cJP6wFheKfz62vSlcPb207ZDQuO80KTxeX1k1o7FblbZGcZosQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Flavour is the same from other locations. However, this location definitely provides less portions than others, especially they switched to non-transparent cups. See picture below, where this large drink is basically 10% less than the cup size.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPCdjQRecBZGp1-RwUwJIqaEa9WCarzRqewv9nm&fid=0x0:0xa2209c409d2f06b7"],"When":"2023-8-8"},{"Name":"Xinyi Wang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIakZ4frqzKyc5aGTdIFZdUpFKVlPK3WG1SFEJyIIZAZWBX=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The staff at this store are clearly racist. A short-haired female employee has repeatedly yelled at us with Asian faces, but is friendly to people of other ethnicities. I went in to order bubble tea, and just because I didn't hear her clearly, she shouted loudly at me.

This isn't the first time this has happened. Because I come often and sometimes bring my friends, we have all been treated rudely by this employee.

You should improve your ability to select employees. Do I have to tolerate this treatment when I'm spending money here? WORST Experience EVER.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Vanessa Wang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIzv4CpGtgnjdH3Spx2y778k_UgiUDbp-imf-e2OWVP0rS4YQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing customer service! Thank you to Ada and Ruby for making my night and for the wonderful experience. I was stuck because of a transit accident and my phone died but they offered to help and went above and beyond.

Drinks are consistent with other stores and honestly I found that it had more options because of their new popping boba option!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lala","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWyqbE9FvKnSnD3GY4-us3_EnzbDGoj3ofAUCboC5L1JG3nQ7Y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Pretty average drinks, mango smoothie was all milk and a tiny bit of flavour, so no actual mango. Weird to not have tables, had to sit on the floor. But overall it’s a bit tastier than some other bubble tea places. Strawberry slush was alright too.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Suki Xu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIDoPMVcWcjkmPWjQl04SNuX8CUnS3NdiCIxVuuB_ymGZFx6Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I used to be a loyal customer of Coco, but I'm giving this store my first negative review ever. The service attitude is extremely poor, and one female employee is very rude. I was given the cold shoulder for no reason, and she should not have this job.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Eleanor Quinn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXGcyX3iYCLfRPMCH3B_frvHAYv8UiP3qF-OG7f4PeH7emdgAw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Pearl milk tea was very good. Staff seem knowledgeable and professional. Drinks were quick and cold.
There’s is no seating at all, and the decor is very sterile. The opposite of cozy or welcoming. Has a washroom with a passcode.
Great for a quick stop to grab a drink at n the way somewhere, but not set up to hang out.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Maria M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXmuhUB-INQ3XCbE2M9HT-MdzILSuqxW6ls6tLvy0JgUoxl1f3wCQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lovely location, great service, lots of sitting space. Quality coffee and good options of pick me ups and baked goods. The ham & cheese croissant was delicious, my flat white was perfect. The cappuccino to go was fabulous and omg the banana bread is to die for! I’ve been to many Pallet locations and I think this is my favourite!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOFHrpW11Rik_b-Y0eae0iV4tuzGh-472IJlCDT&fid=0x0:0x48deaffe2732d8d1"],"When":"2024-10-26"},{"Name":"tikki","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWzV_Y6bQFjodBKC8anq5nBVFmCTC7hA6Nh7xklFQuKGefK40A_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Came here for the brunch menu and enjoyed every dish! This location is the prettiest amongst all Pallet and we love the wide selection of pastries as well! Definitely one of the best coffee shops in this area!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMr7AvnBAobCtdfPz1dQAYSyb9dWj3WwBra1yjd&fid=0x0:0x48deaffe2732d8d1"],"When":"2024-9-6"},{"Name":"Veronica N","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKaEZZcukGThSmHA881UMjlshS09D0BtOAEz9vsdpXKxEW84w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"One of the worst coffees I’ve ever had. I ordered an oat milk latte, but it was so watered down that there was absolutely no coffee flavor and no oat milk taste—really disappointing, especially for nearly $7. The staff that who took my order was clearly stretched thin, as she was responsible for both taking orders and making the coffee. It felt like the cafe was severely understaffed, and her rushing attitude reflected it. She seemed unprofessional, unfriendly, and definitely not happy with her job - probably due to the stress of managing multiple tasks on her own.

While the space itself is nice, the tables are packed closely together, making it hard to have a quiet moment or get work done without overhearing everyone else’s conversations. Additionally, the smell from the in-house baking was overpowering—I left smelling like butter and pastries all over my hair and clothing. Overall, not a pleasant experience, and I won’t be returning.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO7gv30FDh4-pbxDtr2LWjNWX_U851A9yxbDW44&fid=0x0:0x48deaffe2732d8d1"],"When":"2024-10-30"},{"Name":"Winnie W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXBoIPjRuUZOsdiO0wVzMCvy81ggQ1VJgwF61I1dnSDn5bs60Yg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’ve tried their earl grey muffin, strawberry chocolate scone, and almond croissant, all were very good. Coffee was good too. The only issue is that it’s very difficult to find parking on weekday mornings. Weekends were fine.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMZYh8gJgjAJLHXounlRpVp77-mG2gr7IEHXqWe&fid=0x0:0x48deaffe2732d8d1"],"When":"2024-4-10"},{"Name":"Little Journey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUlNkzOJynLpgqJCrPnrmAAn5viwim-B3Uir-26DOWxIzwcnZ0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We liked the crispy French toast. It was crispy and topped with cinnamon sugar, ice-cream and maple syrup, Definitely my comfort food for brunch. Benny and pork belly were also good. Really enjoyed the dining experience here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNcZkAbp8Kp22iGrobnwDSeYMtRaiNYB_Kp5V3h&fid=0x0:0x48deaffe2732d8d1"],"When":"2023-10-11"},{"Name":"Jessica Jaramillo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUOZWnNOy2tas3U8yY_tYDCX1PM0Qf8Ur8Iuh2BOk26QDRJmgIM6w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Their new brunch concept is incredible. Very cozy dining space, offering delicious and well-presented dishes. They also have a variety of tasty drinks, including smoothies. Excellent service. Gorgeous decor & ambiance.
Worth a visit!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOMT6Jlr1dy2_pk3k-5IcdESiC97SykPiWmfPRr&fid=0x0:0x48deaffe2732d8d1"],"When":"2023-8-15"},{"Name":"M K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVqylKDu-rB41mZcOo9USULfTEwbTIQMa9TdZbRGVbHsELPDtlDwA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"As a big matcha fan, this is one of the smoothest matcha lattes I've had in a long time. Freshly whisked and mixed with a hint of steamed milk, it was really well balanced. While coffee is obviously the speciality here, don't disregard it if you prefer non-coffee based drinks!

Great atmosphere too!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP68OOspDIk24Z0LYIR7aodxA9gMZWBsPxd-HTi&fid=0x0:0x48deaffe2732d8d1"],"When":"2024-7-5"},{"Name":"Asfand Yar Tareen (Yar)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUhfBQPXRP7ggFClpCzO1D6R9eiAOYyxzVWwHNzbjqPivPt0Ufp=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing sandwiches and coffee. Highly recommend!

The crunch and perfect seasoning stole the show for me 🤯","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPaKLi3MWPXXBIOzPTT7kx53T9eUn2GwX2K8Xnr&fid=0x0:0x48deaffe2732d8d1"],"When":"2024-11-9"}]
