user_reviews:
[{"Name":"M O","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJvF4BcqkvulDJcIWWoBXnNbnFEbA2gP6NmtYhK5MYsPQeMaw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We visited the second location of this popular Vietnamese spot known for its approved food and drinks by my Vietnamese friends. The spacious interior is designed like a street in Saigon, and we tried a couple of drinks and food. My favorite was the Vietnamese egg coffee, and my friend enjoyed the Westie SG Brown. As for the food, the buttercorn shrimp was a delightful choice. I'll definitely be coming back for more!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNZHlE3dOKWrCtT1z9c1iDswZy3bJ0ZeUxS8D0P&fid=0x0:0x49f120bbc989a0d"],"When":"2024-1-20"},{"Name":"Alan Zheng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL-QmMYfw75kgf5vonVt_7RAAdUJRl5hAF6Ijht6iC6ZE8aPQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The drinks and service at this specific location was not as great as the original one on Victoria drive.

Couldn’t explain it but everyone who had the drinks agreed as well. It was nice to see how many more seats there were here.

The cafe had a weird smell though as you walked past the counter area. It was hard to explain and I don’t wanna draw assumptions, but the original location overall just gives a more cleaner vibe.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOH0SpLMvaOKksiIH1KkjpecTAb6lQn13AQdPh5&fid=0x0:0x49f120bbc989a0d"],"When":"2024-5-19"},{"Name":"Stanley Ip","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJQqh2mSjxBEv23NDSF_ZA91P0X4fuRnEo68Af2t60AnDhVDg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"First time visiting Hem 377 and was so disappointed. The staff said the Saigon Mixed Rice Paper was the best seller, so that's what I ordered.

The rice paper was basically raw and uncooked. Felt like eating strips of plastic. I hate wasting food, but even I couldn't finish it. I was also charged an extra $0.25 for the container even though I was dining in.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOv4OZCPNKSO5tyt0eElIj1pELksIAuvn0yelDD&fid=0x0:0x49f120bbc989a0d"],"When":"2023-12-5"},{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The pandan milk here is amazing and refreshing. It’s creamy and has lots of pandan flavour. The ube latte is equally good and they have so many interesting drinks to try. Service is great and the seating is like the Asian streets. Totally the spot for Vietnamese drinks!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMaSstLsSA4vG183FONZGMtr4BVw6e2A_3j5reY&fid=0x0:0x49f120bbc989a0d"],"When":"2024-4-6"},{"Name":"Jen “Jen” A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXBB_GzpyC7ZZvaRbsYsKIVyDLd9SpfNKgV_vlRgfH_p_oHVI0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I got the Strawberry Cheesecake Matcha drink! It’s so good! The person who took my order was nice and got my order done quickly! It wasn’t busy and I got to sit down and enjoy my drink while I killed some time. I recommend coming here!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPzb1qk3oiYKNRSj5ovia7Fx3trNxh_XSWMzdA&fid=0x0:0x49f120bbc989a0d"],"When":"2024-2-26"},{"Name":"Jeffrey Luan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWtVhRYe0eO-xGlTXMwKO0uIK3QJwjuBJzAfBdLyjnMsSu9_bU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hẻm 377 is a cozy café on the drive, serving up unique Vietnamese street-style food alongside a variety of hot and cold drinks. They've put a modern twist on traditional snacks and offer everything from coffee to juices. Conveniently located across Britannia, it's surrounded by landmarks and other restaurants.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOfFM-wOdZIMnQq9hGQPuhGC2_Pv80rD1XQ31Qb&fid=0x0:0x49f120bbc989a0d"],"When":"2024-2-19"},{"Name":"Ng Ng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLgduCuanm-N_U3R70qNsS2rMSeTqIegCjR3PXhS9n7qjBvLg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"New location is more ample, the atmosphere is super nice. The drinks are still spot on as usual and i love the service the most. The employee is super niceee
My favorite to order here Strawberry Matcha Cheesecake (best seller), pandan caramel flan and bánh mì bowl","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPsEwSs6kbzG1-slmuxcdvWFk8CG0hI7UA_NV64&fid=0x0:0x49f120bbc989a0d"],"When":"2024-2-19"},{"Name":"Kristy Ip","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW3dkfugTn7vT1m8wxXgpQR59niOI3d3VcetY8H6rPa5-icmUSf=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"i love going to the original hem 377 location and have recommended it to many friends, so i was very excited to come to the grand opening of this location for the BOGO deal. however, the manager was not on site and the staff clearly did not have enough training, making it a frustrating/stressful experience for all parties.

i also tried the saigon rice paper snack for the first time and the majority of the rice paper was essentially raw and inedible. after giving notice of the situation, no remedy was provided.

the drinks were good, but were not followed to the specified ice and sugar levels.

overall, would probably not come back to this location again for a while...was especially disappointed since i came out all the way just for the grand opening of this place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPCR2CU-FVM9zn3SlY3gp0dWM9XI3XaASP-f-vv&fid=0x0:0x49f120bbc989a0d"],"When":"2023-12-5"}]

title: Coco Bubble Tea (Kingsway)
descriptions: Cheery cafe chain serving Asian bubble teas in both hot & cold versions alongside juices.
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"highlights","name":"Highlights","options":[{"name":"Great tea selection","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair accessible seating","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible parking lot","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible washroom","enabled":true}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIgIvhBRObE8mZXq0-aUB15LbKQSp2HT1oxd3erG1oXl2VtVQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Haven’t been to a CoCo in years for BBT. The inside is barren with only a few tables. Drinks come out quick (under 5 minutes). There was a constant flow of people coming in to order.

Went with a grape dream (normally $7.50, August special was 20% off) and dragon fruit coconut splash ($6.90). For the grape dream, you can’t change the sweetness (100%) or add extra toppings. It reminded me of grape soda with jellies. Didn’t love or hate it. Dragon fruit was plain, tasted more of the coconut.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNn3PlZ5iPSBMD8NFwEIRC5zaK6iOw4g0Z4U5Cs&fid=0x0:0x35f388707160a0ce"],"When":"2023-8-12"},{"Name":"Ads","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVwDyuvQtXP_VygmU1rNXhUJ0mc48E4h1QtDkdEfrlXmuS-mYhL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Awesome bubble tea joint! Coco is by far my favorite in all of Greater Vancouver!
The menu isn't huge, but a lot of professionalism is put into making and preparing your drinks and is customizable on sugar and ice for your preference.
Staff are very friendly, a nice comfy joint with a good COVID approach and therefore unfortunately no seating at present indoors.
As a vegan, I also love Coco as they also use a powdered milk and therefore does not contain dairy.
Also try the honey jelly topping on offer, it's super yummy!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNByte1VL00WKCBJWqsYCKdwNOYjceXzb92CtrE&fid=0x0:0x35f388707160a0ce"],"When":"2021-3-7"},{"Name":"Marcus","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUVpAqx3Judbzb0iuJXzx52iIPBZjNV225UkWQ26P-4HM5WbcSiFg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"This bubble tea place is okay. It's a fairly standard menu and flavor of bubble tea, the pearls are also fairly standard as well. I've been here a few times now with different friends, personally I have not found anything on the menu that I really love. That being said his face is not bad and I would recommend people to try it at least once","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN1ODVXKu9PVsM_3g_fUUpoZLZK-Vd5A-TUzL1K&fid=0x0:0x35f388707160a0ce"],"When":"2018-11-6"},{"Name":"Ben Huynh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJmgpt-ch-VVaJQP1roOkAUr3Arw7zqItEVK3OzLQ_Jg2ZxmIs=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This what mango yakult supposed to look like? This is our regular drink from coco and we have never had it look like this after sitting out let alone receive it this way. The employee offered to make a new one which turned out the same way and separated on the spot. We were then told that it was normal for the drink to separate like this. We believe the yakult was expired or the drink was made incorrectly, but there were no efforts made to figure out the issue and instead our concerns were dismissed. $8 for curdled milk…","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOfNAPr2xbygwgrsXoIxDGiLJjI6pFwHZAXf87L&fid=0x0:0x35f388707160a0ce"],"When":"2024-3-13"},{"Name":"Eric Hung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXlU-3PL5lXr0fnWYaC3MgD7YEA-M3CKuKKccWmbp_HpzGChqE_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I absolutely love Coco Bubble Tea! Their drinks are consistently fresh, flavorful, and made with high-quality ingredients. The tapioca pearls are always the perfect texture — chewy and delicious. My go-to is the classic Milk Tea with pearls, but they have a wide variety of options, including fruit teas and slushes, so there’s something for everyone.

The staff are friendly and efficient, even during busy times, and the service is quick. The shop is always clean and inviting. If you're craving bubble tea, Coco is the place to go. Highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPC9-7jgHrRnIwFsISGsFLrpStc4ELW_un-82rl&fid=0x0:0x35f388707160a0ce"],"When":"2024-12-10"},{"Name":"Soumya B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWoc36yEgTVYkCRh6_dbLdsQ5fCdh7tnVjCg_-3MefjbFmD2vU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Worst experience ever! I have ordered drinks with preferred toppings online. I got the drink with a note stating not to order that drink again. The drink was ordered half sweet, and it was made extra sweet, I had to throw the drink in one sip, never going back to any Coco bubble tea store again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPqOX2CteXrejMIwI6zZKbILu9HT6RDT5uscp2_&fid=0x0:0x35f388707160a0ce"],"When":"2023-8-6"},{"Name":"Keith Ver","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXVdqxLCf1LEt0AU82myo-eUqDcb2LcbdnfhupJTEW0sPAQ-qQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fast service and very accommodating staff! I always drop by here whenever I pass by.  Our go-to drinks are matcha and their regular milk tea!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNwhnj9pfXbw-bVOCVEJcdVwvufifR6LRhQtLp1&fid=0x0:0x35f388707160a0ce"],"When":"2024-4-21"},{"Name":"Leslie Watts","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKhVALIpKUXd2Jj9UQkNRFuMmxt7u84QrNJKcNV1wusI99Xnw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Ordered a Mango Pomelo Sago drink and it arrived containing coconut. My five year old daughter is allergic to coconut. She drank half, as none of us realized and she doesn’t know what coconut tastes like.  Her face is entirely swollen and she is crying. I can’t believe they would add coconut to a drink and not tell us!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOEJSuNDo7QTnyij_rRzXkBCVdHg81jyn9AKkE0&fid=0x0:0x35f388707160a0ce"],"When":"2023-11-24"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Desiree Schambach","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJFImyr08GuQxrmU6J8i7gIJlmefaXymCe_DLaFSDuBIFeoRQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had the best time at the bunny Cafe! Small cafe with the best drinks & pastries. Carrot cake was amazing!

I loved that all the merchandise was bunny themed (I bought a few items as souvenirs).

And of course meeting & spending time feeding the bunnies was the best part! It's a calm, quiet environment and all bunnies are available for adoption. I went for the experience & would highly recommend & return next time I'm in Vancouver.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNdjW4LftLb5TJXWGACXQ7XuGARqsLTiZSltJgg&fid=0x0:0x50e1c4c545f8b508"],"When":"2024-10-29"},{"Name":"Enrico Cipollone","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJHbo_XWJVkxe6rRaHUuf8Jg7jugkVm196DyjQiW5wNEJ-XVg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We came from Toronto to experience The Bunny Cafe and it was an amazing one. The staff was so friendly and helpful giving my girlfriend and I some pointers of rabbits as her and I are looking to get one in the future. The bunnies well kept and treated with some much respect. Thank you for the advice and the great experience!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNWrzcx_zp7Y2PsWJAkTDYV6tq60zSntJ1Dc4Kw&fid=0x0:0x50e1c4c545f8b508"],"When":"2024-12-1"},{"Name":"Lily Hughes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVbGHCuTbByE6xw-vbQWSx-OecU1x2_XNW-hcAo1mdLC8odJCb0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It’s impossible to be unhappy at this place. $8.50 for 30 mins or $15 for an hour, cup of veggies included. 3 bunnies free roam and a bunch more have their own spacious enclosed homes. They’re all so friendly, soft and well taken care of. I’m so happy that this gives them a chance to be adopted as well! There’s also the possibility of a pass for 99$ that gives you 9 visits.

They also had wonderful warm drinks and all of their drinks are dairy free.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNyG1RDGi9-QU8PCS_T1LLJ2nvGLmSYNo-qQHTU&fid=0x0:0x50e1c4c545f8b508"],"When":"2024-10-22"},{"Name":"Bárbara Gómez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVF1dIBYDjN9C28Nev0ZDijrklXk3ik2ghclEy3CQXUb60-7q8iJg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"As much warmth and love as you can imagine, it's a must visit when in Vancouver. These little cuties are looking for a forever home, but if you can't adopt them you can always go and spend some time chilling with them, they are the sweetest bunnies, it's a very therapeutic and relaxing way to spend your time and at the same time you'll be helping a good cause 💛 highly recommended 👌🏼","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOUBuyLCx2CGim_GM3v3iN5BN0RyRP0Y_KZKqZS&fid=0x0:0x50e1c4c545f8b508"],"When":"2024-12-19"},{"Name":"Stephanie Munn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVS04erqMU_iQ-IdxFgJNiC2zjBdKIVCMsaE8Ow6Nef7FGP7nw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cute Bunnies..lots of them…

❤️Enough said! 🐰

PS.  All the bunnies are from a charity, Rabbitats Rescue Society, who are given a second chance at a wonderful life here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM_rfxIHnxLNJp1ytfUX5So9RblGqKIht3ZX_Xd&fid=0x0:0x50e1c4c545f8b508"],"When":"2024-12-25"},{"Name":"cas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUml9OzwSURLinroicmKnjvDAWjHxkW9-1xpJ8piguzKtx0CFEp=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I absolutely loved going here. The staff were so friendly and shared cute/funny anecdotes about the bunny residents.—I had the strawberry lemonade which was perfect.—and they have so much cute merch. I would definitely recommend! 🐰","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMl_L9z9hp_GKLu2Eg_2JnocQfdBRar-GhYE8WM&fid=0x0:0x50e1c4c545f8b508"],"When":"2024-9-27"},{"Name":"Wynji Daquigan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWlRpa88ipzOQOc096Un2LlzrRoyPh7AJWM5wDBaB4rIx_RgacC=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The Bunny Cafe is a wonderful spot to hang out with loved ones (friends, family, colleagues). It is very cozy and calm; the bunnies are all rescue bunnies and are up for adoption. Three of my bunnies are all "alum-bunns" from the cafe.

Price-wise, it is very reasonable and worth it. All the food and drinks are great and vegan. You'll find a lot of bunny-themed items in the cafe, or, if you are a bunny parent, bunny supplies.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Quba Michalski","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW0LKqZvt5byxxCqLBYbW3CRhgu-84hljX8XedTUa50sYhSef788A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Bunnies were super cute if somewhat timid. As long as you don’t expect them to act like cats or dogs, you’re gonna have a good time. The staff made sure of bunny well-being first, which can really appreciate!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Alexandra Dealz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLqFo8vrjSp_5RL1ebpwVbQ9LF63LHd53-jYOOcmGT7zEdXvQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I walked past this place a few times and thought it looked super cute. A friend and I went here for and afternoon snack and drinks. It was horrific! We ordered the Vietnamese mum sandwich and I can’t honestly say it was the worst “sandwich” I have ever ordered. It is advertised as a lemongrass chicken sandwich with veggies and sounded really good on paper. What we received looked like scraps in a burnt piece of toast. I don’t understand how the server confidently made and served us this meal. Picture attached. It was empty in there so I struggled to find reasoning for why the sandwich was this poorly put together. Also there were fruit flies everywhere. We were constantly swatting mid conversation. The space is cute but holy. This spot needs help. Bad.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMDnUozUCBN6oTb1oLhq_4m1crteXs-cuev9BOg\u0026fid=0x0:0x431bcf34fafcfc23"],"When":"2024-12-18"},{"Name":"Julia Kuznetsova","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXEmartIB1DRbABoVaUe1Rfv6f-e8r57V_5Ft_eBmZX63ydyrY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"An interesting looking bar, next to a popular vintage shop, which actually serves coffee and food. However, I arrived for a cocktail looking for a place to sit and relax while chatting with a friend. And this is a perfect place, as you can choose from the variety of seating, from bar stools to a cozy armchair under the antique chandelier. And they do have a terrace, overlooking a park with a vibe of the area). I had a Season of Witch cocktail and it was fantastic. Thanks! I will return for more.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPkZe9wefTNH8nTTIQnIYiEXeqqr1hcirM_HFes\u0026fid=0x0:0x431bcf34fafcfc23"],"When":"2024-11-12"},{"Name":"AJ Brown","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUsu0-zLfdBIi0BMvFkmCrQ7LvpDpcqpsmyMO44b1viyR7y0ygy=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We stopped at Mum’s the Word for a drink while we were waiting for a table down the street and instantly fell in love with the place. The atmosphere is amazing. The cocktails are outstanding!\n\nThe vibes are right and the cocktails match.  Plus I would highly, highly recommend that you stop in to the washroom before you leave because it’s basically a black light dream–amazing and lets you know just how clean they keep the place, but also it’s a lot of fun.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMViVtn1OnulcUyDftf07pFNfI8tAVud3gmoju2\u0026fid=0x0:0x431bcf34fafcfc23"],"When":"2024-8-19"},{"Name":"Brittany","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWHTcuSM-4ly1uIP3q2-jgQ_2Vqi7GhBmGO9JykCcOlnN1NYOmqYg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"An eclectic little spot off Commercial Drive. Super creative and thoughtful (and delicious) house cocktails. Grab a menu, order and pickup your drink at the bar. Try to get a spot on the deck, it’s a wonderful spot.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNbdtE1d7qU0yYETEM7pz6XOkVWPyqf5DgdSPf8\u0026fid=0x0:0x431bcf34fafcfc23"],"When":"2024-8-25"},{"Name":"yoobin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWM8YtHvR-c_C8R1A9KzPZpmntmHfZ7k8mFJi6uEcygjN3eh2Btsg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Really good vibes, great patio and indoor seating, friendly barista/bartender. Iced pour over was good but a bit watery (but it’s fine since it was iced).","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNf_CKIIS8Hsawhj1WlfgPiVENC7RR8UbXM64nr\u0026fid=0x0:0x431bcf34fafcfc23"],"When":"2024-9-9"},{"Name":"Luther Trammell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJFmG9EeQKoO8DpzWhY9hTzxb7UIYQ4Lwkrjk1feSj7zBCXRQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Popped in here with friends while taking a break from the culture crawl. Only had one staff bartender for the entire bar- not only handled a reasonably packed bar solo, made us all some exceptionally well done cocktails and coffees- excellent decor somewhat reminiscent of the romper room but more comfy. Looking for a chill spot for  some drinks and snacks- his place is should be on your list. Additionally, finally found out what to do with my bottle of nocino.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNoGiVuQ-0uWrYJsX4DYHAl3KKjCbAVE4a6ICSl\u0026fid=0x0:0x431bcf34fafcfc23"],"When":"2024-11-19"},{"Name":"Meesh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL8NaCfdZ8bZ1WVJ361zaLsF6_kWSIfwIRoHnWSNK15g11w77o=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Really love the vibe here. We've been twice for after-dinner drinks. Each time, it's been one bartender deftly slinging out drinks and snacks. She's fantastic and works the counter with lots of ease. The menu is perfect, with happy hour mon-fri and Sunday (all day!!). Highly recommend for a sit-in on the cool vintage furniture.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP_sKk5EFEHZTtdbK8h9chk5JX9gHoKuBtPVY3u\u0026fid=0x0:0x431bcf34fafcfc23"],"When":"2023-7-6"},{"Name":"Elsa Nunes-Ueno","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXIUok_xyDXnUnoKpZNuNO4aGl40oV1WiVHS2Ry7T-p8P7NuK3heQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We didn't eat, just had a few drinks. There were a bunch of small insects flying around the table, we moved to a pub table for our rounds and that was better. Met a friendly stranger and chatted with him for a while. Good neighborhood bar vibes.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Lora H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWoZeNEO5L4rrMh6V21br_KmGz9H9-d_fM-TT68UCIwxe-Cga68=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is a hidden sanctuary since it is about a block away from Commercial skytrain station. If you are bored, on a budget, and want to have some human connection with locals this is the place. They have many classes and events. I was there last night for Kirtan meditation, it is by donation \u0026 suitable for all ages. They offer cushion or chairs. There’s nothing physical, just a wholesome evening of chanting and breathing exercises. It kinda feels like a mini concert !","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMBDn2nDrt4EL7HHv_hlbhXj4VbGdRB9SrmT4ao\u0026fid=0x0:0xb5899da9dd7981f5"],"When":"2019-10-13"},{"Name":"Jennifer Hoar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJPo6_yBVjeDcEepKT0k_62JAPf7Wlg2ioZAXXcuZmAYA8Fzw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I Love this studio!!! Great environment, one wall is all windows for that nature lighting and calming feel. Excellent for the summer breeze and now that winter is here I find the natural light to be essentail for beating those winter blues. The instructors are wonderful at providing guidance, encouragement and enthusiasm. They like to make sure that everyone in the class is getting what they came for and doing it safely. I really feel taken care of, refreshed and beeming with positivity after I leave. BONUS they provide yoga mats !!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"AV","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL98pQzV1k_2LDLMEmPLTRWqzFS1lk5kGqWFrhcf10Iil4eRA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This studio is what a yoga studio is supposed to be. Whereas most studios in Vancouver are set-up to get you in and out as fast as possible this studio allows you to mingle, chat and drink a wide selection of delicious in-house mixed/brewed teas, while meeting interesting, friendly yogis. The focus on yoga \"unity\" is real here. Best yoga studio in the city!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lou Meggiato","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVcRKD5SfZT2QQHKghUcg9lzP7AcRI-LpF--1WHOyAt8KCwBIzu=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I came to see Sue at her clinic and was thoroughly taken care of. It's a beautiful and calming space.  She delved carefully into the reasons for my visit and then she explained the herbs that she uses. She included me in the creations and clearly explained how to use them. I left feeling excited to get started on my journey with herbs. I highly recommend having a consultation with Sue. Her teas are so yummy too!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Elke D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK-JvWQx2EXf9YZe4SApFAcynHF7ZiW8f4YQF8O8wx16MbRvA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Unity is not only an amazing yoga studio (fantastic teachers) and teahouse (great hand blended tea selection!), it's also a lovely warm, welcoming and generous community. A great place for relaxing, healing and connecting.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Emma Goldman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLHXFtnPXwU3Zi6YKA8q0YP0_oETwSuhFiaARcC1wiU1Ix9Zg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lovely atmosphere, I really benefited from the over 50's yoga class.  They have a good range of different classes for different needs.  Such a bonus to be able to hang out afterwards and chat for a while with everyone, drinking some nice tea, before heading our separate ways.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Juniper ***","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVE6nyAKHnGFVpVkXQuZ675JCj3FbBwcpbbNcXB0k2BqBr-clw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Unity is a unique and beautiful space; it is truly a light in this city. By practicing  here, you are welcomed into a lovely community and the teachers are compassionate, knowledgeable and patient. Very grateful to have this space to cultivate my practice.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Leona Robinson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUlUc7XlsQDONAwSToucfsw588jtt_C8jI3cZX4V4QqniordP0Wdg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have known the owner of Unity Yoga, Susan for many years. She is an amazing woman with a real passion for what she does!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Elsa Chung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVgBtFYCkWTkjtefII4egxADlhVRhaG7pRnzQoESC-LbjFzCviaGA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cute little coffee shop that also sells vintage clothing in the back. The seating is minimal, so not great for working. The coffee is pretty inexpensive. We got a 12oz cappuccino for $5. The owners are super nice. Street parking is available.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP6AteNmSY5JYnaL7CpH-g-xgA74BH2Uf_EsvmK\u0026fid=0x0:0x6b25f7f64c660b4e"],"When":"2024-5-1"},{"Name":"Walk with Jonas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVjGrIqaUL1TSVOcoThKgasTvNmlkyx4yw7c9iV4ONQKLdY6u7frw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cute little place and perfect to start of the day as a traveler to Vancouver. Yummy bagel and good - not too sweet - chai latte. The chill atmosphere and interior plus the super friendly staff was what were really the star of the show. Thanks!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNcBSX0cz_HhAP5Co7LTdGpSdCHJC3dBy0grXLx\u0026fid=0x0:0x6b25f7f64c660b4e"],"When":"2023-10-26"},{"Name":"Peter Kho","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLhVCUuLPaLYmOWjHFFnrIK7o9sj1CEF9kdMucN1-aryYt50A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Cute little neighborhood cafe along Dundas/Powell area. Barista lady was very nice and courteous. Breakfast burrito was serviceable, albeit not really memorable. Baked goods were excellent - Cinnamon Roll is a must try. Coffee, however, was pretty lackluster - tasted thin, lacking complexity.  Pinball machines area adds fun, but vintage clothing area seems like an afterthought. Overall, it's an interesting space to visit, even though I felt it was a bit incoherent.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO-9zGtVAIn8uOk-9UwAw6c_aIp48PaMP-DP-a_\u0026fid=0x0:0x6b25f7f64c660b4e"],"When":"2019-8-12"},{"Name":"Bryson T. Phagura","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXfoPVWVJOv2IFjPAZN84ToS0YUJIbwsDwIjybZBwkiSbWurCAJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is Incredible! Amazing coffee, awesome atmosphere, and lovely staff. Honesty the best coffee place I've ever been to!  The also have some clothing on sale and pinball machines which is so cool!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPk_xXUM3U23n0FyfgDzKrE7TjhCky-lxZ3uFmA\u0026fid=0x0:0x6b25f7f64c660b4e"],"When":"2018-11-21"},{"Name":"J. Y.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLOt5yGED2FtDUHv5DF1177BkvzDUAcrysc-qfgmOq1-sY33g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We arrived just before closing time, and all the bread had already been put away. When the staff overheard us mentioning there was no bread for our child, she kindly explained what was left in the back and let our child choose. Then, she got the banana bread our child wanted. Our child, who usually doesn't finish a whole piece of bread, ate the entire banana bread because it was so delicious. The coffee was also fantastic. We will definitely come back again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mandy Green","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUe6BqS66-FjaSvoLVgYZezIGbMLTh_ezbTZMKR5NfbbK1AW6bu=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love this coffee shop! Owners are very friendly, it’s cute inside with vintage items, and lots of plants. Really good breakfast wraps","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"IKUMI ICHIKAWA","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJgpSdsLZPL8omtqv79UeBcg0b-VDIuxeXYy-snUijceFOMUg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It’s not only fragrant coffee but also their smile which makes your heart warm","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOYHvo7tYi1veLz2m6se-Q8G7YMZEjMi7GQEKnW\u0026fid=0x0:0x6b25f7f64c660b4e"],"When":"2024-2-18"},{"Name":"Robbie “Rob” Noble","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXoT4-G3G55rNNT2I380qwCLNCzJQMA_bSFCEGy3TZNYiUKyapb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My local coffee shop.  Hands down.  Owner operated and they are the sweetest!  My go to is the 16oz latte with the bagel and cream cheese.   Support local businesses, this place is the best!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Will Wronski","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVrMHGxT-R0w4kaqQSKnZ3b6mOavZJGwezYxbHSoPCbhPK2LO4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Waited for the server to finish on her phone for a minute before acknowledged.  No one else in the place.  Prices are high and food quality is questionable.  Tropical smoothie pretty much tasteless but the texture/look was fine.  $13 Hearty Chicken wrap looks like a chicken Caesar wrap but warmed so you get lots of nicely warm and soggy lettuce to chew on.  $3.80 for a can of Coke?  Wow.  I was going to get an Americano but $4.50 + another $1 for a milk sub?  Anyway, I would still buy if the quality matched the prices but can't say that is the case.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP2gzJ-tPjX-8IDlTrow0Jf6CEc9gKr8OPorq-L\u0026fid=0x0:0xfe9ae2e34a28993"],"When":"2024-9-4"},{"Name":"Felipe Palacios","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJExx6HmuTl1t0uJreiAaGwroT5Kktm9izbE-nQigG__FozRQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Just discovered my new lunch favorite in the area! The salmon soup was delicious, and the ham and egg wrap had the perfect toast. Absolutely loved it!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM16c95ZFvmgBSA5emSCtFUadzW8po1Gt-5NZPO\u0026fid=0x0:0xfe9ae2e34a28993"],"When":"2024-9-20"},{"Name":"Laura Cruz AFS","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKoJHTTFbPa_FlE8Cdws7Dz3eZQsmq7Qs3vBC6mfxyNXIJeBA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I tried the new yogurt parfait, and it was great! 🤤Creamy yogurt, fresh fruit, and crunchy granola made it a perfect light snack. I’d definitely have it again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP8NiMjW5kj1tmw-FzaHhjRvfyl4r8z6AqB42ol\u0026fid=0x0:0xfe9ae2e34a28993"],"When":"2024-9-27"},{"Name":"Malinga Dayananda","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKrOfCqiIf5Q2cxLMzuCZAsFwFkh13YJRQmntwIRpkm0GSgvQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I stumbled upon a coffee shop in Strathcona, and it was a delightful surprise. The coffee was delicious, and the banana muffin was both sweet and soft. I also enjoyed the quiet ambiance in the morning.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPr1O2zgevnJr4C3TqQlQ-YbORCiUW2S_u3vkdP\u0026fid=0x0:0xfe9ae2e34a28993"],"When":"2023-7-20"},{"Name":"Mayuri Wanniarachchi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWGYI4v1nWynoIORen7PxCLRtHqCBFb5IXQkBzKEeC-pJsYSyI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently tried the Ham and Cheddar Sandwich, which was really nice. I especially liked the texture of the toasted sandwich. It's hard to find a spot for a quick lunch in this area, but this store was a great find for me.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM1XB0xh2Nxh4H4buNbXrLrf3AYnA4-GGRxndPu\u0026fid=0x0:0xfe9ae2e34a28993"],"When":"2023-11-16"},{"Name":"Alonso Ahumada","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWwsAL592tMTEC-t8XXNNPBukjpDpoCJetSmhBYMpCBDK8b5TzG=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I was in a meeting nearby and needed something quick to eat. I grabbed the Turkey and Brie sandwich from this coffee shop and really liked it. I have another appointment in a few weeks and will try the pulled pork then. I hope to find the same consistency.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPBXJHhuhw5f0uG6Co6I4_auQ0YfUj3fwXxSnFF\u0026fid=0x0:0xfe9ae2e34a28993"],"When":"2023-9-21"},{"Name":"Chris Luehmann","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWOefBbLa4KVpKRg8xoK7agQR28hLCC67vCz1DOfYPECITci9KS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great coffee and sandwiches! Very convenient location as well. Friendly staff too!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNexX-B-1sWLyB5jgnfIrCQt7ZKf9j31tSSvxoa\u0026fid=0x0:0xfe9ae2e34a28993"],"When":"2024-10-3"},{"Name":"Jeyli Salazar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ6tKJ6a3WlcZpKw8mb0hyMLZ6ZYIIMV7LPU1m4Fx3PTJejIg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious coffee and desserts, incredible service and beautiful place","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP2O7VfxyVqTidiUckFtr2Wq0PIoyE1mkw3_DnA\u0026fid=0x0:0xfe9ae2e34a28993"],"When":"2024-10-3"}]

title: CoCo Bubble Tea（Downtown）
address: 655 W Pender St, Vancouver, BC V6C 1X6

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Hojjat","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXusqP0IK43ueWC_I5fU-xsgh519KNvQrAQReY663qVqYyjZQVu=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had mango pomelo 50% sugar and that was one of my best experiences.
I had crystal pearls for topping but I like softer bubbles that feels more fresh to me I don't know that's correct or no.
They had many customers but they were just perfect and amazing","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPDG3-9CPOH4IjgD-MxKJy7thCwVTo8LFi8vDAC&fid=0x0:0xc8d5e00cf70f8f0"],"When":"2024-8-30"},{"Name":"Kanika Rathee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVKRzOINfpsIc8tuQIggLmx5CaI2ik-obiJ87Kor8MLncHgHEc=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Customer service was Horrible. I went today and ordered a brown sugar pearl Tea latte and it was on 20% discount… they said we cannot modify the milk and ice, and the cup was full of ice. This was unexpected from Coco.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMc0azEdgjHJbsxPaId-ucQjGmavMJQfGFX3i4w&fid=0x0:0xc8d5e00cf70f8f0"],"When":"2024-8-12"},{"Name":"Thad Hughes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV3z7DA4Baa7APKJviu93Zr-EQZ4c15KdbdnsbujLCFzd6ccqoMVA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"2024.12.23 - Really enjoyed the rich flavor of 3 Guys!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNCnZwTO-4YU9EsaaEfv7OF5klkJiHwHn6S9ykP&fid=0x0:0xc8d5e00cf70f8f0"],"When":"2024-12-23"},{"Name":"Ramon Carfrae","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJbjvo-PB7ZluRHdv76jBuAd7OTik1mTEXOQPMPuCJOV2Ov4A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Their boba pearls are fresh and still warm. They are soft and nice to chew with the brown sugar. The service isn't the greatest but their are polite when talking to you. Drinks are really tasty though.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"L’espoirducoeur","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUXYOgTeV2_ww6s9tqNXmDRJczT1aljcVqEtrRtUoOfjdBo_zI_bg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Every time I come to the Waterfront, I always make sure to visit this place—it's like reminiscing about the taste of home. Walking around downtown just wouldn't be complete without a tempting cup of bubble tea in hand!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Karla Ortega","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXF_YdeXd-evR5PaP3s43yXCjVVe5IASQZ-QARsDQZUktZgOg7O_Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I got a bubble tea, I asked for medium size but they gave me a large. Is ok for me because the girl was in training, I know is hard when we start so I didn’t said anything. I didn’t knew that they charge extra for the bubbles 😂 it would be great if they add it first in the price. Also because is downtown please be aware to have it clean and well organized all the time","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ads","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVwDyuvQtXP_VygmU1rNXhUJ0mc48E4h1QtDkdEfrlXmuS-mYhL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This Bubble Tea joint from CoCo is awesome!! Extremely friendly and fantastically talented staff know how to make the best bubble teas on the West Coast! <3
A very comfy, cozy, clean and new feel style building with plenty of space to enjoy your super yummy drinks.
I had to stick to my one of my classic favorites, The Two Ladies Milk Tea (Zero Ice Zero Sugar with Pudding and Pearls) which was made to perfection as is the case with every single CoCo experience.
I planned to take the short walk from here to the ocean front and watch the sea planes. However, it was so good I barely made it there and had devoured my bubble tea and already dying for a second if I could give in enough to temptation!
I absolutely love the fact CoCo seems to be opening a lot more chains in BC now and stoked I don't have to travel far to visit my favourite bubble tea joint!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNMAru373X_QBmDCxyv-zTKy9726QODAh3kT2g-&fid=0x0:0xc8d5e00cf70f8f0"],"When":"2021-4-5"},{"Name":"Estairia Hong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXmDLygqZ3OT1WagVoz_S7MOF1DNcLc8uEquGumaFc59ZLDHz6l=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Been here a couple times and the drinks are made consistently the same. The wait isn’t too long but I can imagine if it gets busy you’d be waiting for a bit. They added in a table so you can sit inside now but sitting is limited. I think most people get their drink to go anyways","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP_vU_QGYGXEAortb52DUaJTSSQmlz9ynCZiCAk&fid=0x0:0xc8d5e00cf70f8f0"],"When":"2023-6-2"}]

[{"Name":"Eva Zia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUJp1CScTOq-jdIBVBA-K4f_r74TZU-kRd9MclConVIiSCPfy3Y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I was looking for a takeaway coffee on Sunday and came across this place by chance—it was terrible. First, the coffee was completely burnt and tasted awful. Then, the medium size was priced like other places, but the actual size was like a small elsewhere. I was really disappointed with myself for choosing this place because I usually try to support local businesses, but sometimes they make me regret it. I thought I should’ve just gone to Starbucks, at least I know what to expect there.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPZ8Ik9kgsDNqRJ-qDzJh6EBeTg13A7l14kRCCm&fid=0x0:0xfdbaf300e9499ed4"],"When":"2024-9-18"},{"Name":"Inci Karaduman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKuz90-BI8mkfIOCTJg-bbQh6j_O7R3GEg8I_bf94fV6-m5KQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lovely cafe, I had rush so I took to go their americano. The taste is a little bitter than other coffee shops. I will try apple cider next time and enjoy the atmosphere.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPBDTR4E7UogWeS2mwCiTM-I30vJkBK7W5j8MRY&fid=0x0:0xfdbaf300e9499ed4"],"When":"2024-10-24"},{"Name":"Travelling Daze","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK7d51ijgGftoX1gC7H0c4HYLCHvNSzmJceM6LdaaqwQoFmfQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Probably my new favourite cafe! Thrift store with 5 dollar clothes! And they also showcase local artists.
Food: chicken pesto sandwich was very flavourful and good pricing. Sooo many drink options I was overwhelmed but will be going back to try more haha
Outlets: there’s an outlet at almost every table!
Seating: comfortable and a medium/good number throughout the cafe. There are some high chairs and regular chairs as well","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN91Kpj_beb9-fKi70BcTUSDA_CIGQq1XgyjcTn&fid=0x0:0xfdbaf300e9499ed4"],"When":"2024-3-25"},{"Name":"Jun Brian Alenton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUPpv8W2b0oe2AecwiYDVqun6El4j3QKdKBuGLncJKwKkk5WT29=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The best and cutest Pikachu Pistachio Latte I have ever had, and the cafe has a lot more to offer like cookies and other baked goodies to pair with your drink. I love just hanging out there. The place itself is packed with great stuff too, if you want to do some thrift shopping on the side, the cafe is perfect. Plus, I really like Fred, he is super nice, chill and great with customers.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO0ckH1gbqqS2fy3IKEpWUwmDHUv6jhsr2uGwOa&fid=0x0:0xfdbaf300e9499ed4"],"When":"2024-5-28"},{"Name":"Loretta Avery","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJsSbalo0Bn5pWeHBr8fJ0R6PucvWoKB9ZQ8oPdwt98OsVO44B2=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"great hot chocolate and delicious carrot muffin!! super nice service :) loved the lil Squirtle on the hot chocolate","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMf2s5iGij3zd_IkXN8MXwiCXyf0CgdFc3c6njG&fid=0x0:0xfdbaf300e9499ed4"],"When":"2024-12-9"},{"Name":"Destiny Morris","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWcY114tVxNxF3WB3iaXp28tM1g0Xx0MgGnmtkPIL2krcQk_LZ6=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Loved this cafe right from day one of moving in the neighborhood few years back. The coffee and food never disappoints and the mookie is my absolute favorite! Frederick and Bacon are the best thank you two for the best comfort food, iced coffees, hot coffees and the best vibes to come into","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"JJ","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWv0snBpgvBPf2qz4qfFT4OylgeUYJtPPar7PLTM4oqEyOHGx25-A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good latte and cappuccino, the barista was awesome. Love the atmosphere.and kids friendly . They sell games , toys and clothes inside the coffeeshop which made it very unique.  Very fun coffee shop to check it out .","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMyJkuMFfhuzCqmG39QVswf3CxgXAocTArtMJZK&fid=0x0:0xfdbaf300e9499ed4"],"When":"2023-3-7"},{"Name":"Ronald Filloon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW9hoGbIW4aR6dSwzzNQpjavrmvEqzun-aYKwKYs96d4e0D6xI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Coffee was spectacular and flavorful. Cookies BLEW MY MIND WHAT!? They even heat them up for you. I'll definitely come by whenever I'm in the neighborhood.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Steve Young","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI1JvfaUNK-agC603ZAMkN6gaPPDXo0R2uh1U1ugFVA4Yw-zg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I was in your store yesterday for the first time, and loved the selection of interesting products. I picked up some Maldon smoked salt flake for a cookie recipe I am developing, never seen that anywhere else before. Also picked up a couple of USA Pans, super nice quality. I was sad to see the Global news story, the theft nowadays is disgusting and egregious. You would think that there are some common sense solutions out there to curb this type of crime. If things do not change, it's going to do two things, drive up prices to makeup for the losses, or these wonderful retail stores will not exist, they will end up online only. I prefer the old school way of shopping, in-person, engaging with the people who work there, it was definitely the highlight of my day.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMl0IWWLjSxuQBmxTwvQTL2c_5fLAgxv7VXxDgv&fid=0x0:0x6074368265c8a508"],"When":"2024-11-7"},{"Name":"Laura B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIXPDJW8YjzRlEOcAvOUEbFDXxkKXbstR9eEjXbZC1P6_bXfw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a an amazing, unique store. Basically a foodie’s paradise!  Very helpful, enthusiastic staff. Even the owner takes the time to look after you. The neighbourhood is a bit sketchy but I love this place!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOB_bO9G11N0wZs0rY-PFBAmzXiH-2l_bQECwSg&fid=0x0:0x6074368265c8a508"],"When":"2024-11-22"},{"Name":"Rian Murry","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKjRXiaQIuVXmZ_jAcXOA4CXjuPy2U0E3sRWSBY2qvYddeIGA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I was at the store on the weekend to pickup some items for the holidays. I unfortunately did not look at my receipt closely until a few days later. To my surprise I noticed that I had been double charged for a purchase. It was not a large amount but I thought I would call the store and see if they would be willing to help me rectify the issue. ( I was not holding out much hope due to the time delay)
I had the pleasure of talking with Kale on the phone and I cannot say enough about the fantastic customer experience. He got my information and a refund was issued promptly. He did an amazing job in customer service. I will highly recommend anyone to experience this outstanding business not only for the products but also for their wonderful staff.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Amy Watt","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXtFx0Lt1_G_UCsXyvg1o5eSDevhehAM8wUiop0lPf09tXNft4k=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love this store! It has everything a kitchen enthusiast could dream of. While it's a little pricey, the experience is worth it, and it’s great to see and get everything in one place. I’ve also found that their Le Creuset items are cheaper than on the official Le Creuset website, so I always choose to buy from here when needed. Plus, you get your items right away without paying extra for shipping!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP6So_3AKeF3pukyu8hyDP5FWyl7z0bCP0Ye0qK&fid=0x0:0x6074368265c8a508"],"When":"2024-9-8"},{"Name":"The JOKER","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUQuiHl5446ZqSIBmhoQY8q4NuTHDo0F4Qr2KVa1APrDHGiVv22=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great hide away shop that carries alot of international foods that other stores do not carry.
Prices are reasonable. Staff are friendly. Great place for Xmas shopping.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP-OUaLWpYsXPei4OhyhzU2JVSet0kuSNU9YViO&fid=0x0:0x6074368265c8a508"],"When":"2024-11-21"},{"Name":"Lisa Maloney","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJV8MEOzhi367-JvrroXruR0S0_FfYyPIuoz0jG_OMwfxY3wA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I LOVE this store. It is amazing!  Hubby and I got lost for over an hour discovering all sorts of must haves. Yes it’s pricey but the experience & selection is absolutely phenomenal.  Staff were super helpful too!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Leo Poon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV85YDglYa0dqJZBoHypSMWRJhkQh84yAItH6UCoC2VEFpBBkAY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Heavenly place to all culinary lovers 🤣🤣

There are so many fun gadgets and options to choose from, thousands of condiments and endless possibilities can happen in my kitchen because of this warehouse.

Pricing is a bit more expensive, but since I can get everything I want at one place, it's reasonable haha

Love this place and will continue coming here ,❤️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMDwjdnkX2EBMdY4r5hQbRT3wUZYpSUVz2w4VfM&fid=0x0:0x6074368265c8a508"],"When":"2023-11-4"},{"Name":"Ember N","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVAOVVSRZSBJ6e5O5jUUtiBAq23q-FcEx-8tVq1hmthlfDRNYcfgw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"good place to see all the wonderful upgrades you need to cook. there are other places that are cheaper but they still do have cheaper items. they have different things for cooking, baking, serving, food prep, blending, cutting, food storage, spices, pots, pans, stainless, woks, cast iron, kettles, cutting board, and etc.

we were looking for a particular wok and wanted to pay top price. for it. but it was not available but we went there anyway to check the place out. you can always call first and check your item.

there is a second floor with other things as well. staff is very helpful and knowledgeable to an extent. some of them are not experts but still helpful staff.

we would come back here again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMU5Icsize84AptRg6Z6z8DXIq0Gm9_yW5c_ztG&fid=0x0:0x6074368265c8a508"],"When":"2022-7-27"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Mel Chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUUNyCpeXLg95zSeDwxS7tH_JglLNhiOF8Oqy41j-astXnVg6V5=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Total hidden gem nothing fancy but simply delicious, fair price friendly staff i would come by every week.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMC7Ok1sDsX52NO_qSQCrGbNYzygZK-dkw10YJU\u0026fid=0x0:0x50716f36951d7a46"],"When":"2024-10-21"},{"Name":"Bo Champ","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIva_7QdWxceZGgTet-iopqeAdPOLNBJUVgtIMVBhHBO8W8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My daughter, MIL and I spend a week in Van recently and I am so happy I discovered this little gem. We ate breakfast here multiple times and always loved it! They had full, heavy meal options and also light options, which was nice because it was hot! It took one day for them to learn my name and how I liked my ice coffee. It had a real sense of community, not just a restaurant. Well done guys.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Peter Ritossa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXI4mqB5Sx9PR5V3jXwdj-I7Hsx18Jbb24aRqtHiSBc_Kz2Muil=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I was looking for a small taste of europe, and a good espresso.   Great find.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOlLVWyN2m2ayDo9SG1HOGcbKDTjT6GHosg8wLE\u0026fid=0x0:0x50716f36951d7a46"],"When":"2024-11-17"},{"Name":"Nate Tran","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWLIW8dzV5DN28GO67LKAaf2nS2FwpR9Rfumccswfittuvs9YXn=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great neighbourhood cafe and incredibly friendly staff. I had a tasty cappuccino and people watched - would recommend","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ryan Flanigan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL3qbnoAkRESEbPMOkU2wkhwbQhHbgSdPpF37PX8wki2M9CRw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great food and coffee, staff was very friendly. Seems like a good local spot","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"MG_FXV","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLiigFyUNoiwP5bHSXlNRrOpnatj6VSziAvS6zd1X48n-qBzP4n=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Real Italian coffee ☕ great food and atmosphere feels like you are in Italy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNcOM587asPxz3tjaE9Gi202VY6nxQ-CgAmuNoQ\u0026fid=0x0:0x50716f36951d7a46"],"When":"2023-6-14"},{"Name":"Helen Thornton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWU26JKb0g2OwlT81lsQW5Zf3o-FmN28IEEkNtIw4mqyL0qD24=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Giancarlo Cafe is a must-visit for anyone in the area. It's a place where the coffee is brewed to perfection, the food is delectable, and the atmosphere is just right for any occasion. A true hidden gem","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Flora","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWlzbErQLVss3kGeby9sz0OkhuOyGVQdZwSlbRUxvvwLu6nZ3c7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"My partner visited this store while walking around Commercial Drive for Italian Day. The pictures of the cannoli's outside the store looked really good but the actual product was really poor. The cannoli was the size of my pinky finger, soggy, and we suspect the filling to be expired. The \"cream\" resembled powdered parmesan cheese and crumbled when you touched. We asked for a replacement but the new cannoli were the exact same. For the same price as a cannoli from Fratelli Bakery up the street, the quality is appalling. My partner ended up throwing out the cannoli before I could even get a photo of it.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"candy L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXgq2OgnXFRsC1icGye-CTgUf_6kEV0cPoOgzI7ANMes5eDT-Xz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My friend and I were strolling along Commercial Drive when we decided to take a break and stumbled upon the perfect little pastry shop. Tucked away in a small mall, this hidden gem immediately caught our attention. My friend was especially thrilled to discover such a cozy spot.
The shop itself is quite small, with only two or three seats available, so it’s not the most comfortable place to linger. However, the pastries looked incredibly fresh and inviting. We ordered the double-baked almond croissant, the chocolate orange morning bun and a shot of espresso.
Every bite was delightful—the pastries were perfectly crisp, with just the right level of sweetness. The coffee complemented the treats beautifully, making the experience even better. Both my friend and I were thoroughly impressed and so glad we found this charming little spot. Truly a hidden gem worth discovering!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPT1EZQi1Ml0vflaBITIavh0E60_glhs5pnXWa_&fid=0x0:0x86d8327517f99ebd"],"When":"2024-12-2"},{"Name":"Hye","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjULQQSi1mhNFty7n8ZPesKkMpD31jiIGazltx_wRmE-swaOwr4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the best pain au chocolat I've tried in Vancouver. The bread has a perfect crusty exterior! And I also loved their square-shaped ciabatta. I was told it’s made with sourdough flour, and it’s perfect for sandwiches - whether plain or with seeds","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMzveUdj-RimJhtjcirjedCqGEKUkVHR7Smo08&fid=0x0:0x86d8327517f99ebd"],"When":"2024-9-18"},{"Name":"Michael Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVXoB9AHkYKW7iNUI0Fal1AlrunscS9b2xXNqen94Tm3RpICRlW=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Be warned, you will want to try everything that Bench Bakehouse has in their cute bakery. The croissants, cookies, bread, everything has been so good and fresh. Honestly can't leave with just one treat...","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOcZ1Czxu3LzJQSkj3ou--9nXZQisF2E-3gqgrQ&fid=0x0:0x86d8327517f99ebd"],"When":"2024-6-27"},{"Name":"Vic Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU-UvYUDBKN_yCw69f7e5YQW_7ZsrFUjOMLdRGzvSH3-oX5fyAd=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This French-inspired bakehouse is A+++. Interior is a vibe, staff are so sweet, and the lot has 45 mins free parking (just register at the machine). Now for the baked goods:

Kouign Amann - Always one of my favourite pastries and they sure make a good one. Due to how sweet they are these could be an acquired taste for some, but they definitely work for me.

Cinnamon Bun - Officially my #1 in Vancouver. Icing is more cream cheese-y than sweet. You can taste the 100% real butter and how lovingly this was made from scratch. Worth many return trips. PS. It didn’t just survive but THRIVED after a second day re-heat.

Pesto Scroll - Biggest surprise of the bunch! The flaky layers and fragrant pesto came together to make something truly magnificent. One of my favourite savoury pastries ever. Also ate half on the 3rd day (illegal I know) after re-heating and it was still fab.

Morning Bun - First, this thing is huge. Second, if you like the caramelized crust of a Kougin Amann but also desire the flaky butteriness of a croissant, this pastry is pretty much it. So good.

Croissant - Not the best shot but this was an absolute unit of a croissant. Exterior flakier than your average Vancouverite, interior pillowy soft, though it could have been just a HINT more buttery for me. Tied with 1-2 other bakeries for #1. Doesn’t come with icing, I accidentally lay it on the cinnamon bun lol.

Kouign Amann Crunch - These are crunchy but don’t hurt, caramelized but not bitter, sweet but not too sweet. This bakery has brought balance to the (pastry) force with this snack. 100% recommend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPYMpdPoNo0V8rrLdUQP0VE0Ay3PjDZ1zXRelyJ&fid=0x0:0x86d8327517f99ebd"],"When":"2023-4-11"},{"Name":"Kim N","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbdjDpWyXnvjc80j1Uggeb1c_m_wfTt6lOvg1Z_TeE5AinsEnY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We tried 3 items. The tiramisu was okay, a little too bitter for my taste and the white layer was too runny. The double baked almond croissant was amazing! We bought near the end of day so I put in the air frier for a minute at home before eating and it was woww! Soft inside and crunchy outside. The matcha white chocolate cookie was hard but also yummy. Definitely will come back for the croissant!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNSRSIgqoqET5cXhuyDwtTiIbS0-tR3vVAmHPeC&fid=0x0:0x86d8327517f99ebd"],"When":"2023-9-16"},{"Name":"Poppy Munpakpien","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVdxe9CFcDuSqOSyUdOynytAZFMv-fTVjCs_2wJOf7GcssEPHTm=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"All bread and pastries at The Bench Bakehouse really make me keep looking forward to the days to visit them (again and again).

I love every single thing I've tried here. The Bench become fav my routine. And now it's my go-to pastry spot in Vancouver!

☁️ Chocolate Almond Double Baked = My fav. The almond custard and their signature croissant's texture is incomparable.

☁️ Shortbread = Heavenly good with all the very very nice buttery-rich smell, perfect sweetness level and crumbly yum.

☁️ Brioche = Stock them at home and dip with their homemade chocolate hazelnut spread is really a prefect matching.

Also love their seasonal menu. The strawberry coconut cream danish (replacing the peanut butter ones) is really juicy yum as a spring treat. 🌸","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPQVZ6PQ3qwCkMmUpyAlo2j3gT7pNDwfzGr8zra&fid=0x0:0x86d8327517f99ebd"],"When":"2023-4-15"},{"Name":"Gracie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUXyUagBRjQdH3hR5A4HxuJ_48T2JqfQqO_LA7uEFrdnOBJZbo8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've been visiting multiple times. Their bakeries are just sooo delicious. I had to get some for my French colleagues. She said specially the bread was fresh and delicious.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Brian Elliot","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW5nmQDckWv_Feg-5tMfrYNL52aqQJp-RBmsekEQHclKwYnQYxK=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Have bought croissants, bread, cookies and more from The Bench and have never been disappointed. Unlike big commercial bakeries these guys do not over sugar anything. Plus they use really good ingredients so the end result is amazing and they do not overcharge. Everything is really good value. Cannot say enough good things about them.","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: The Red Wagon

descriptions: Hip local diner with an all-day menu of inventive comfort-food classics plus cocktails & beer.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Happy Sidhu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLyyMaIgDuAnw55L_QkRaEGKi8IpWnP5jyUOt9IbH6p6YbQSA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Ate in. Server was nice and food came out pretty quick . In my opinion the burger patty was a little too thick but, that's just a personal preference. Definitely good place to eat. I saw the person across from me who had ordered breakfast which looked very good. I definitely will come back and try the breakfast OR the pulled pork which also looks very good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMJcU5NYrNozPWiUn0_nUvdWKX3mZ6cEvR3pH95&fid=0x0:0x6075da54d0f16636"],"When":"2024-7-27"},{"Name":"Zach Weber","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLAafPya07Hdtw4U1vQxUISI80k0N6MITK-VDKEPnuqlNsQpQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Pretty sure that is the best breakfast I’ve ever had.

Got the Super Trucker - Pancakes + blueberries,  JD maple syrup, poached eggs, home fries, sourdough toast, pulled pork, pork belly - and Smoked Salmon Benny.

Everything made in house. House smoked and cured meats + salmon.

Free range eggs 100
Blueberry Pancakes 100
Pork Belly 100
Pulled Pork 100
Smoked Salmon 100

Blows away all of the fancy brunch spots in Van, it’s not even close.

**UPDATE: We've been back several times since my initial review, and can confirm with certainty that The Red Wagon is without a doubt the best breakfast/brunch spot in Vancouver.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNrGvao2ySoNuBty0T1LAB3F9w3Fj3gvayOK7zE&fid=0x0:0x6075da54d0f16636"],"When":"2023-10-9"},{"Name":"Amanda Lawrence","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUrm3ZMxoLF2CG9McrTgRAQudtSzxhvJWcA9JJgJsq1W-v6tmez=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Amazing food and service! We had a smoked salmon omelette and buttermilk pancakes, both were really nice. I found the coffee to taste absolutely awful though, very stale and burnt. Not worth 3.75$ so maybe avoid that. The restaurant is a bit noisy as well, it was hard to hear my partner speak. Otherwise it was good!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN0xL02yA8WOsQy0lce2IcPIGYEbdd9iInkjYhL&fid=0x0:0x6075da54d0f16636"],"When":"2024-1-29"},{"Name":"A.J. Canadian","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU0mITu_1OR_MuXzhVIkPjHjZnimy2Y-mI64r72OA1Zbucah6-N=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A great urban diner experience in East Vancouver. I love the breakfast all day idea and the urban fusion dishes are delicious. This location was easily accessible and free street parking was easy to find. Great service and clean, nice bar and a screen as well. Recommended","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMGrzH0QxhEA1nLX35uZjQwJZPLnidgtKTXIqXH&fid=0x0:0x6075da54d0f16636"],"When":"2024-3-31"},{"Name":"Miss Mayhem","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUGowE1po-uzevgz4y-llWcltZGBd0Jj1Qx_2rqJzm0bNHjXwg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The breakfast was so tasty! I didn’t want it to end. Highly recommend this place. If it’s busy you’ll have to wait outside so make sure you choose a nice day! Nice atmosphere and friendly staff.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPZt6LQ6w6dhTo2dMiuEs9yvCHHE3qNKiWrmiDR&fid=0x0:0x6075da54d0f16636"],"When":"2024-4-9"},{"Name":"Rob A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5iHCDcXnWRHfHj4-jkqdudvb5w0x1zWoPJtLQCzFoKOU9xt4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Don’t sleep on the awesome dinner menu at RED WAGON— but be warned, side effects may include post-meal dreamlike states of fluffy mashed potato and gravy delight.

We all know red wagon for breakfast, but if you haven’t gone for the dinner menu you are seriously missing out! Brad and team are serving up an amazing rotation of seasonal comfort food that will knock your socks off — skip the brunch lineup and walk right into this spot for dinner most nights of the week!

Last night we had an **amazing** in house made French-style pate/terrine, following by a Caesar salad (complete with house smoked lardon), then we shared the steak frites with brined peppercorn + the pork cheek bourguignon — the pork cheek, just added to the menu, quickly became the STAR dish to fight over when sharing.

Prior to this visit I had the smash burger and the bistro (wet) burger and both were fantastic. I will put red wagon’s burgers up against any Vancouver burger establishment (I’ve tried them all) for the WIN. My take is that they aren’t trying to copy other’s burgers styles and are just having fun bring you what they like so you can join them in burgerville.

Also a wicked cocktail and beer selection, and I haven’t even mentioned the dessert. Butterscotch custard is one of my favs but the creative assortment of milkshakes will always set you straight too.

So… go support a real local business, put your money in a real neighborhood and real local team, and be happy eating awesome food made from scratch that leaves you feeling fully satisfied and is still worth the $$ value!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM60BgUDdb6bpFd-96TeEqtBrbunM0r5CVEihsH&fid=0x0:0x6075da54d0f16636"],"When":"2024-10-19"},{"Name":"Alex Y.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKw6vbDp2wwnwGTgY3u4AHRVGKyyIunXuhDwQ_GXEbd3GqTyiat=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I finally got the chance to have breakfast here and it did not disappoint. I ordered the Super Trucker - the pork belly was succulent and went very well with the eggs and potatoes. I'll try the pulled pork next time which will be a nice excuse to come back! The pancakes were also delicious - thick and fluffy while having subtle crispy exterior.

Service was attentive as my coffee was constantly topped up. The diner's open and rustic atmosphere has a relaxing setting, especially for a wet, wintry day in the city. I look forward to my next visit!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPzn9WuurS3hu4KULmkFwOhXqwlHWy64Cy-SZVc&fid=0x0:0x6075da54d0f16636"],"When":"2023-12-1"},{"Name":"Denny Hui","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXuGFgsc9U61TCKDV21ZHXILH-aGrlI-hjZswBeAYg3LhKf97Y3=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Tried a new place for brunch. Red Wagon Cafe staff we very friendly and welcoming. Atmosphere/decor was bright, lively and very comfortable.

We ordered Eggs Bennie, the Super Trucker and Wagon Burger.  Pull pork that came with Eggs Bennie was dry but overall, it was OK.

The Super Trucker, subbed pull pork for bacon. The bacon was delicious, pancakes light and pork belly had a nice crisp to it. Overall, satisfying and filling dish. Maybe a bit too big a dish, they do have just Trucker selection, less meats.

The burger was also delicious. My son loved it!

Overall, great place to have brunch. We'll definitely be back to try out some other items.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNCRN6PjV4MklaoiTMuIkcR343hBWL2wNcGM_X7&fid=0x0:0x6075da54d0f16636"],"When":"2023-6-25"}]
