user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Aaron Peters","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWgi4oXx6TMgGpj85WjHJloyIGorO57XHrphhIiDFJW-4lXNm7Yyw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Livia is one of the top bakeries in Vancouver. They source locally. They have a passion for quality producers. They care about what they produce. Livia does everything right, and I strongly recommend doing a deep dive into their lunch menu and bread selections.

Also. They make some great Negronis.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPQoFpc-Izz0F90PJhxT2crzXQWBsuXxRQ_GGVg&fid=0x0:0x5a7826e246e7d8f7"],"When":"2024-8-11"},{"Name":"Derek Shek","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWP9Pjija1abf8rOsOgAPBkesWOZ8sALAjyQJKt0I-DTaykDkHV=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We recently visited LIVIA Forno e Vino for the first time, and it turned out to be a great spot for a relaxed and enjoyable breakfast. The decor is cozy and calming, offering a chill atmosphere that makes you feel right at home. It’s a wonderful place to stop by for a good coffee and breakfast, and the food was just as satisfying as the ambiance.

One thing to note is that seating is limited, so if you’re planning to visit during a busy time, it might be harder to find a spot. There’s also a bar table right next to the cashier, and if you end up sitting there, you might unintentionally block the cashier area. This could be a bit inconvenient for both customers and staff.

Overall, it’s a lovely, quaint place to enjoy a well-prepared meal, especially if you’re looking for a calm start to your morning.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOJBrJgTr0tUOvXJnODyp1UTPSClDUE00j1pUKw&fid=0x0:0x5a7826e246e7d8f7"],"When":"2024-10-12"},{"Name":"Philip Raymond Lim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5EIBAgpBLsauhPMdjXym7mJ4fA8mtryDtWQIJCZfJxYXxupU8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Had breakfast at Livia and enjoyed one of the best mochas I’ve had. The handcrafted mug with speckles added charm—so much so that I couldn’t tell if it was the mug or the drink that made the experience stand out. Maybe both! And I can’t stop rubbing my thumb against it.

I paired the mocha with a pear croissant, carbonara, and a breakfast sandwich. The croissant was good, though not the best I’ve had. The carbonara was saltier than expected and quite different from other versions, but the pasta was perfectly al dente. The highlight was the breakfast sandwich—it was delicious, with mozzarella that was wonderfully stretchy.

I really like the atmosphere here. Could be busy at times though. There were some other options on the menu that looked interesting. And the coffee and sandwich is worth coming back for sure!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMiqSaR-iJoR5DUiCNSq8x4AOVNuH2-vhOjh1pB&fid=0x0:0x5a7826e246e7d8f7"],"When":"2024-10-15"},{"Name":"I","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocID5MvBZIC3Y5dj8PPsmT58A3ASUHWcPoR2VdM0Qyd_94nXRw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great food, flavors are amazing. The breakfast sandwich was delicious even without the mortadella (+$4). Rigatoni was not worth it, portions are tiny for $28 (as pictured), but flavors are solid. Portions on the smaller side and food service was relaxed, but grabbed our plates as soon as we were done. Pay up front and they'll give you a number for dine in to seat yourself.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO7RExaI4CVusXDeX6OSpf70a6Cse4bbiFD9xd6&fid=0x0:0x5a7826e246e7d8f7"],"When":"2024-11-11"},{"Name":"Kwong Tang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVRNhrcdIOQyhkpCbdjoUSwC0OqkPEp5C09o-KZX9pyAsIQioX9=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"🍞 A Delightful Italian Start at LIVIA Forno e Vino! ☕

☕ Stopped by LIVIA Forno e Vino to grab a coffee and a panini, and it was a wonderful start to the day! The aroma of freshly baked bread fills the cozy space, making it feel like a little slice of Italy right on Commercial Drive. My panini was packed with flavor, and the coffee was smooth—an excellent pairing for a morning treat​.

🍅 LIVIA is more than just a café; it’s a charming bakery and wine bar that offers a delightful range of Italian treats, from fresh sourdough to homemade pasta. On our second visit, we enjoyed a Negroni Americano along with brunch and pasta—each dish was a joy to savor. Their emphasis on quality ingredients really shines through in every bite​.

🌞 The ambiance is warm and welcoming, perfect for a relaxing brunch or lunch. It’s easy to lose track of time browsing their pastry selection or chatting with the friendly staff who are always ready with a recommendation. The outdoor patio is a nice spot to enjoy some sunshine while you sip on an espresso.

🍷 Overall, LIVIA Forno e Vino offers a taste of Italy with its fresh, quality offerings and charming vibe. Whether you’re stopping by for coffee, a meal, or just a snack, it’s a must-visit. I’m definitely looking forward to coming back to try more of their menu!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMlQwy51JQaGZFowOW1AoFnye6CvnlI56D-oSzG&fid=0x0:0x5a7826e246e7d8f7"],"When":"2024-10-10"},{"Name":"Meighan Makarchuk","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVLTS13Cp5f1rT28NcitpVcCZwpRDmapwnxFRRPf24zcsNyXDKY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Beautiful spot on commercial drive for Italian  food and bakery items. Not only is the food delicious but the staff are warm and welcoming. The best pasta I have had in Vancouver! Highly recommend dining on the patio.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP3dtJyA36KwtjYeMplWuw61P9XVFQZlDNa89by&fid=0x0:0x5a7826e246e7d8f7"],"When":"2024-7-14"},{"Name":"tikki","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWzV_Y6bQFjodBKC8anq5nBVFmCTC7hA6Nh7xklFQuKGefK40A_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"My favourite brunch spot in the Little Italy. The cafe reminds me of Europe and New York and the space is bright and pretty. Dinner is available on the weekends but our favourite is the brunch. Everything we tried this time: breakfast sandwich, granola yogurt and spaghetti alla nerano was so amazing and we enjoyed every dish. Unfortunately the service is not consistent but I would still recommend to anyone looking for some real good brunch because the food is so good!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNm8fPcXjo63MPV8IpwQGCee_CIYPLuR01hHM6x&fid=0x0:0x5a7826e246e7d8f7"],"When":"2024-8-6"},{"Name":"Hornson C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVmdCOdf2WkxshuYZj4HJ9-vQ7jEjZprqyHTmAPfOUXSG3SYvc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"《🌞 SUNDAY BRUNCH 🌞 》

- breakfast sandwich w/ mortadella = $17.5 -
- livia classico = $22 -

Back on a more sunny day... We managed to catch the brunch service at Livia and had the most amazing time.

The food was fantastic! I really enjoyed the classico with sour dough toast. The poached eggs were cooked perfectly and dipping that toast into the whipped ricotta and runny egg yolks was 👌 I also really enjoyed the little bit of acidity that the pickled veggies added to the dish.

We opted to add mortadella to our breakfast sandwich and it added a nice bit of saltiness to each bite. I couldn't tell what was fluffier, the scrambled eggs or the bun!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN8uytKG6Hp7L_-N48jZ2CS6iZSUCSI1rUMroJm&fid=0x0:0x5a7826e246e7d8f7"],"When":"2024-10-29"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Dimitri Corlett","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIOQiAULVvyLieIUqXi_3BK6tGXvuEoSJMp0EyF2AOhIWm6TQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It’s great to have a convenient Starbucks in the neighbourhood! The store is super clean and staff are extremely friendly.

There’s a separate entry off of 15th Avenue or you can access through the grocery store. Although cozy, there’s still plenty of Starbucks beans and swag for sale. Seating available inside and fully covered seating outside as well!

Free parking is available in the underground parking lot which can be accessed through the back alley.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN0ZLz_VxzSLoUXmrVlDUihOkwgr8N7RhkF6IBR&fid=0x0:0xd8c7f7768d65948c"],"When":"2024-3-5"},{"Name":"Nathalie Robinson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUbM8MILCorJlbEEer5bWzEAff2LJ9StLyEiOckE-N5iqjaaUyx=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The cashier - Eunice - was really sweet but there was a blonde worker there who made my drink (Strawberry Açai Lemonade) with 90% water and claimed its "because I asked for no ice" when that never has happened at any other locations. The cashier offered to remake it, but the blonde refused when asked and kept telling me I was wrong.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Albi M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXzrXws3rIyqUSzIoazFePidI9z8QnlJXewub3UnvYgosAGL9Kk=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I never left a review in google but the blonde that works at this location it’s moody,no people skills  and wanted to charge me twice more for a steam milk with a splash of coffee meanwhile at other Starbucks isn’t a charge for splash of pike on it !
If there was an option for -5 ⭐️ I would’ve chosen it 💯 %","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Thomas Toth","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUPEhLd2gsgbJ7U30n3-Wsax6PWsjnyU3AEZORtTK56BgmDZOSg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"She gave me the wrong size,when it states grande...I got smaller chatged for the grande...not nice at all","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lam Benson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIxt9FEkB3N_wFroQ_9iWLc9rV6Mc1TtQqoG6zP9epjKxFTlA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nice","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mike Pajak","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWuJWaIehwYs-wO5TBFoo76a1EwHZ5TmWTvpkDtKyMEl_jqSQuUGw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Palvinder Singh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXk-8ShHDvrxspjIUPRQnIECMRHtZFItV8X_SIo8EGtj9ve_5264Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nicole Mundaca","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVF_JJo7Hh1xMVsCfiX6oVlS4GOjUJUxGHS1Qm01l1Dfn99x7lPhA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Mani Nassiri","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLtLhpelIwU53BLIXHIQnDo6YNGaUbsXbyti00bHpdMY6GB5A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This Starbucks location is always bustling, but the staff consistently deliver quick, high-quality service. On an especially busy day, Mehrsa prepared my order with impressive speed and care—it was clear she was putting in a lot of effort to keep things running smoothly. The atmosphere here is great, and it’s inspiring to see the team handle such a fast-paced environment so well. Overall, a fantastic spot with dedicated staff!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Assa Sabouhi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJfeBfCuHbh0lLF2ISsV69UMQXup8saVrrFSGQbZFusuqRepA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had a great experience with the service. A lady there named Sheida helped a lot with a foreign language that it makes easy to communicate about what I wanted to order. The customer service and conduct was amazing.  Thanks a lot.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Roya Mosaddegh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJY3AebPpC1wFjq93bZ7maOUpSoMwO4SpvIviaNpGdqa3slag=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The best service by a Persian lady, named Sheila , very polite, kind, and helpful.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMqWoOHqZ2OhS5IOUYOh9fdqCkFbvE4rH5TMFEG\u0026fid=0x0:0x3e1fa4bc1eb8e55d"],"When":"2024-9-7"},{"Name":"Penny C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXr5ZYZSL-Vibuqt3iFVBvzAmq3QyFEwjZdHXBZBa8nz3XUcMnF=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Came in early in the morning with no lineup asking for one of those coffee carriers and ended up waiting almost 30 minutes. Now they said “you will have to wait a few min” in a snarky tone, but a few min and 30 are a huge difference. I understand it takes time to make a bit of extra coffee, but to brew doesn’t take that long. The only reason I give 2 stars on service is bc they were good at giving extra cups, milk etc. so kudos for that. But otherwise they seems super lazy.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tyler Sutherland","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKf-IxkLBsYWmx4CoztFOMMywlqPI-F8S2fwdww51etO1hrbg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I was wondering why the in training staff seem to be struggling so hard until I interacted with the manager who was flat out rude. It quickly became clear that neither of the manager or the training staff actually knew how to make even a simple drink such as an espresso macchiato.\n\n10 ounces of steamed milk to 2 ounces of espresso is far from “Rich espresso marked with a dollop of steamed milk and foam” as there menu describes it.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Micheline Gauthier","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXU7t844KJT31_0CMbATUa0bmcNqAUPDbbrzLyTbNQqsIbw1UU=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I go to Starbucks every morning just not this location. Usually the barista fills my mug to the top but today when I asked for 3/4 of an inch more foam on top she insisted on charging me $.55 extra. Time to support another coffee chain?!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Keanu McGill","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXukpg227ySmGwPtxwOJv7LxX90Ibnk5YuQ3v8eARi_fKkJhA4e=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Served quickly and coffee is great as per usual","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM_wx_ebAXgG_oOgJOzkMzjuwEOzeRH6WRTKeUg\u0026fid=0x0:0x3e1fa4bc1eb8e55d"],"When":"2023-12-9"},{"Name":"Sarah Crawford","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIl8T6smoT-GymipuiDs9LML45zpmHWbyLEl4sV6Ls0idgmNk0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I want to preface this by saying I am a barista. I have been for years. This location's staff is rude, do not comply with food and safety (one girl was wearing multiple bracelets -breeding ground for bacteria- and I noticed that when one went between touching a customers cup she did not wash her hands before moving onto the next drink- starbucks standard calls for a handwash and baristas are not allowed to physically touch customer cups) as well as serving customers stale coffee- when the light on the coffee urn blinks its been sitting for over 30 mins. They need training for this and basic drink building.","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Nu Tea Kerrisdale
open_hours: {"Friday":["11 a.m.–9:30 p.m."],"Monday":["11 a.m.–9 p.m."],"Saturday":["11 a.m.–9:30 p.m."],"Sunday":["11 a.m.–9 p.m."],"Thursday":["11 a.m.–9 p.m."],"Tuesday":["11 a.m.–9 p.m."],"Wednesday":["Closed"]}
about: null
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Philip Raymond Lim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5EIBAgpBLsauhPMdjXym7mJ4fA8mtryDtWQIJCZfJxYXxupU8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This spot, formerly YiFang in Kerrisdale, has leveled up. The milk tea here is a standout—not overly sweet, striking that perfect balance that a good boba tea should have: rich tea flavor, milk is light which doesn’t overpower the taste, and just the right touch of sweetness. The brown sugar pearl is the highlight of the milk tea drink—soft, chewy, and perfectly cooked. They have one of the best pearls and I hope it will be consistent because we will be back.

The mango slush with cheese foam is another must-try, made with fresh mango blended with jade tea. The natural sweetness and light tea infusion make it incredibly refreshing.

Finally, the fruit tea is a masterpiece—packed with real fruit like passion fruit, pineapple, apple, and orange. Every sip bursts with a blend of vibrant flavors, with the passion fruit and pineapple shining through. It’s easily one of the best fruit teas I’ve had in town.

Good 👍","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM1YmOuvUjQKQB76PzujHhKKvjwoqcor_xL3jMF&fid=0x0:0x717426cfed8a2b6a"],"When":"2024-12-3"},{"Name":"Jayson J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWh5xePACHGFMrujGyu-HBmelU_P6fuccz4VSAVxS0935C9YQ3k=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Ordered the Mango Pomelo, it was quite weak and didn’t really taste like anything.

Staff were polite and the store had a small renovation after they changed brands, which includes a self ordering kiosk (which I found a bit weird as the staff was literally next to you)

They also have shorted their business hours.

Debit and Cash only.

I miss the Mango Pomelo Sago I used to get from Yi-Fang.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPGpvJeD3DPbjbunjFKJnm0DseCFAm7xmNFpx69&fid=0x0:0x717426cfed8a2b6a"],"When":"2024-11-29"},{"Name":"Kate","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK47j1cxgw924n3XfpLEFfg72msdeRs14XBZly8uTJ59udV2w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The store staff were so friendly and polite. I ordered mango something ( I forgot the name), and this is the best boba tea I’ve ever had! I definitely come again soon!! Nice work!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMWlEbHxESY_7fKDpVlfcWQ-2K-eDKMmaq1S3yb&fid=0x0:0x717426cfed8a2b6a"],"When":"2024-12-7"},{"Name":"Kent","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUdkkQ1yGBOQv7OFxHjY-XOwm-C1PYWYOiA3dqvwDH9Jp5Qfs06=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The mango pomelo drink (less sugar, added pearls) was so good, definitely recommend getting it, it was original and the flavors were just right. The customer service was great too, and the interior felt roomy and clean. There’s also a self order system which is really great for introverted customers.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP6kJHFnjqthBtJKSFsjyr31iE2yNpISx1FAluB&fid=0x0:0x717426cfed8a2b6a"],"When":"2024-11-10"},{"Name":"Sara Chi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUihe_UMH1TquMZF8iMRS9gx62Yghki_Wcgi6ss0kmeDulWYmUz=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Got the mango pomelo with pearls! Totally recommend with 75% sugar. Workers are really kind too! They have a self-order machine is nice too","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPjC0clr16p_Wsjj5uEJBfkpEaImzeQVdeP2WUZ&fid=0x0:0x717426cfed8a2b6a"],"When":"2024-11-10"},{"Name":"B ergs","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWLQ2wfc5iS4dmAWUJSZIOboz1heh3NpypCATQdb-dHefRW43WE6Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came with my family, staff was so helpful in making us our perfect blends. First impressions were quality Ingredients that made the overall experience that much better. I will make it my new go to when I'm around the area. Family really enjoyed mango Pomelo drink, fresh mango blended in coconut milk, so refreshing and flavorful. I had the matcha drink, it's a bit on the bitter side but that's what I like about it! 👍","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Qianhong Guo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWx9D44ViYY_bppa_D4amE0yIldIttzejaAvTDMP1Srd9Uo-90=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I tried this Grapefruit Fruit tea with half sugar and it was delicious! Refreshing and not too sweet. Shop is nice and lots of drink options 😊","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOkIyIoqWlG6XDy-MT138pGTTv4hBECBO6N_fy_&fid=0x0:0x717426cfed8a2b6a"],"When":"2024-11-10"},{"Name":"Sharon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJUG5epSPgKS621xdQH19IkUG4F5eVSg49QdPSOnDrmrTe-lW-H=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Kumquat green tea flavor was so good! Pearls were a little overcooked though and quite $$ even with 20% off.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOHMxagHrLo3sgDI5pQmuVUiI4iWdcnAmKIcNty&fid=0x0:0x717426cfed8a2b6a"],"When":"2024-11-9"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Pedram Mohammadi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUuSfP4yN2enRjsfmOWdNE9lmVkWeC9nXaOLC-G_IceJpTFFBy1xw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I recently visited the Kerrisdale Starbucks and placed an order for five coffees through the app 15 minutes in advance. When my wife picked up the order, she was only given four drinks and wasn’t informed that they were out of apple syrup for the fifth. This caused an unnecessary delay, as I had to find parking in a busy area and go back inside, which was inconvenient since we were in a rush. When I asked about the missing coffee, the staff mentioned they were planning to inform us, but this could have been communicated before we even arrived. Additionally, if certain ingredients are out of stock, it would be helpful if this were updated in the app to prevent customers from ordering items that aren’t available. I hope the team can improve their communication and app management to enhance the customer experience.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kristy Dockstader","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWqWnlW1T5EL_SEpHVAKaXdB1-zVQUsuP3y_Mc4VhYenMvNb3JY=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Stop in at this starbucks multiple times a week for my morning latte and they always get my order right! One of the baristas named Rena is particularly awesome! She always greets me by name and asks how I am with with a big smile. Will definitely continue to be a regular here. Always a great experience here!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Rachel Tran","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWqzyahGpYVl9TNKM5uQDsIQgYnpD5kXfG_HAM4KRUfbZoVE2I=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I requested extra caramel syrup in my coffee, and when received my drink it had very little of the flavouring. I believe this happened as I observed the caramel syrup they were using was near done, and the correct amount probably wasn’t used when making my drink. I understand that things like this happens during a fast paced work environment. Just next time be more aware of different ingredients amounts.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPWXSQOmi3bQ_cW-Il3rm_i2cK6nS1Da5gTDWWP&fid=0x0:0x1182d46f5decef70"],"When":"2023-8-8"},{"Name":"Aniza M.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVBYI0s07CWW05-syDWjgLIro46IGaM81VqFyVp5Znmy0L1oD97jg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A spacious one.
Interior is nice.
Lots of seating arrangements.
Baristas are very helpful.
There’s street parking 1$/hour available outside.
Pretty good one to do some work or study.
The surrounding neighborhood has lots of small eateries as well.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMQBuF4xCGCFNZWGysRTgs4FV9oujT1oShikH-7&fid=0x0:0x1182d46f5decef70"],"When":"2023-4-26"},{"Name":"Life Of Why","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXfCfiVKMEPJFYoG7RsgTupoJpqGSCfJhNDNZ769JJBEiXvVvKH=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I wanted to love this location but it wasn't meant to be. Firstly, this store needs an updated look. Oddly enough the ceiling tiles are warped and some of them are lifted on the corners which makes for an overall strange aesthetic. Much of the furnishings are worn such as the edges of tables, the table legs, wooden trim around the fireplace, the leather chairs and sofa all look dated. Outside the grounds are littered with cigarette butts despite having no smoking signs on each table. Seems people don't care, so don't be surprised if you get exposure to smoke while outside. I had retreat to my car as it happened to me. On the bright side they offer plenty of seating, washrooms, handicap accessibility in a large space. Also a friendly staff which made a good beverage.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN_X8ISI7lNd1bx5wT0YTWGth16278_Xj1KwZai&fid=0x0:0x1182d46f5decef70"],"When":"2019-3-19"},{"Name":"Christina D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIMhzIVfpp5BOVrkO0TLJV_gQhBWHKRYpSFcgzJKO6hCXZjc1Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great place to meet friends. Very friendly and warm service. The only thing that bothers me is the coffee smoke inside the store, which makes me feel lacking fresh air. Can the ventilation system work a bit more","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOU0mceXkqAzYYC6b7EzYPMjxL_X6iLtK88rDDg&fid=0x0:0x1182d46f5decef70"],"When":"2024-3-27"},{"Name":"Isabella Ravaglia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVZOhvVBKZ_Sc5ou5uEwobSjnHjPt7upcOwKs0iCUeiPkXaMHhz=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Great if you want a Starbucks drink. Bad for work—loud and lots of people who yell. Ok in the mornings and gets worse as the afternoon goes on. If you come bring noise cancelling headphones and maybe ear plugs for under them (and a sign around your neck that says “please don’t talk to me if I don’t know you”)","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Right Smith","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLEoie8FQHGh3Ee1l_u1wdX91vpY5rCYbGoya0OWfzPrem4Uw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"There are many seating, properly lightened, the toilets are clean. Bigger than  your standard starbucks","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMfOpjMBoAqJV9TKyWf_us55Qrhlf4p9fVw5iky&fid=0x0:0x1182d46f5decef70"],"When":"2024-3-9"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Wade Lees","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVpB150Ojwh3EjGE5qPRJHjTKQxumpHkfd2ppNSQ2MKVfu-tcnJKA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lovely atmosphere and decor with plenty of seating. Wifi. Coffee, while certainly not specialty grade and more medium dark roast, was acceptable and certainly priced accordingly. Gelato was tasty and service was excellent. Great spot!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPahNZMinGqaGv5VuOSxQTmWL5Rsno7lr5jMFWk&fid=0x0:0x62624fb5628c564d"],"When":"2024-8-13"},{"Name":"Shawn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWjDFHDIcbtV_DjbplKljLcAMOcHcimjCyqMXoLTCCbOhYL58Lu=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cute local coffee shop. Good high quality coffee. Some seating available inside, some outside. Alternative milk options available. Washroom available. Would come again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNeuKFLRXrgMF8ml7hGetJ0phqYzUCBR_I1fJ2J&fid=0x0:0x62624fb5628c564d"],"When":"2024-12-10"},{"Name":"Jason Serafica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWn8KZKbD1BH2WmuZrcVwQ4J5DofDktybOXnjPqYf1xACpbhSc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Sweet Barrel is a local coffee gem in Vancouver! They roasts everything in-house and offers a variety of beans. The best part? You can get a bag of freshly roasted coffee beans for just $12 – a great deal compared to the usual $20-$30 per bag.

Their delicious pastries complement the coffee perfectly, and if you're in the mood for something sweet, they also serve gelatos.

We'll definitely be back for more!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO9C9GRsKsTgn4ekXob3PJ6BqOaxkU2yqqrqwzA&fid=0x0:0x62624fb5628c564d"],"When":"2024-1-5"},{"Name":"Alex K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVfawy04vsMdJqoWsHSoGH0YUHBiyaoP1xg3yyvpcJuG_G7OAKv=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Exceptional coffee in Vancouver. Perfect temperature, excellent crema, house-roasted, and precisely measured shots. Loved it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMIVyVIHO0Y1MZQhcXm2lB75xtskVIC6b39T1bY&fid=0x0:0x62624fb5628c564d"],"When":"2024-6-30"},{"Name":"San Fan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUxJ7ChygkqnG1PICxZQDypBN0MqwRiZUQ6X4H8DveB5OZom2B5=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a nice modern coffee shop in the Arbutus/12th neighborhood.  They roast their own coffee beans and they are not shy about it as their roasting machine is right at the front of the shop for everyone to see.  The smell of coffee roasting is so wonderful and toasty especially on a cold day.

There's a big communal table in the middle of the shop and also a long counter by the window.  The shop is quite cozy with warm lighting.  It was not too busy late the afternoon so we were able to relax and enjoy our visit.

We were able to try the latte and chocolate croissant.  The latte had a nice strong kick to it and not very acidic.  We were hoping to try a mocha but didn't see it on their menu.  The chocolate croissant was indeed quite chocolatey compared to other places.

You can buy their roasted coffee beans for $12 a bag. They got quite a bit of beans to choose ranging from decaf to espresso roasts.

Oh yes, they also serve ice cream too.  We didn't get to try ice cream today as it was too cold, but when it warms up, we will certainly come back to try ice cream.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN9rwte4b97vMZi-auN3c2NwDe4SYAyOTEAWm42&fid=0x0:0x62624fb5628c564d"],"When":"2021-12-28"},{"Name":"Burt Behzadi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKIyY5CNHdbPREAe_B5d-N8a7gM8VD4aNtRuZlMJD_R3-QSGQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great location. Good coffee and pastry. Good prices.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO5co6f9ctViGnfcD4w0Ey6BtolDGCH4JD92mS7&fid=0x0:0x62624fb5628c564d"],"When":"2024-11-25"},{"Name":"J. S.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocINl-yqOKJ5u5GSHGW1EgdWfo1APCIYwskaEbWhEnagdLMSvA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"They have fantastic ice cream and coffee! My favourites are the red bean and coffee ice cream - so good! Not too sweet. The shop itself is very cute and the owner is extremely nice. Love supporting this small business!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Leo Poon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV85YDglYa0dqJZBoHypSMWRJhkQh84yAItH6UCoC2VEFpBBkAY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fantastic place to relax my Sunday afternoon!

First time coming to the cafe place, and immediately fell in love with this cozy and clean environment!

The staff are very friendly and nice, the cashiers greeted my girlfriend and I as soon as we stepped in the cafe with sunshine smiling, and did not rush us while we are thinking what to order.

One of the girls started recommending us what to order by asking questions (and it is great that they don’t make assumptions :) )

The music is at an adequate volume level, and the dessert is great !

I’ll definitely come back again as everything is just “right”~~ LoL.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNfUqKToAJBZUXDLjuPd4b_H0hv-xxm_AGI_OLc&fid=0x0:0x62624fb5628c564d"],"When":"2019-4-15"}]

title: Chatime Bubble Tea
descriptions: Casual Asian cafe chain for bubble teas alongside hot & cold drinks including coffee & slushes.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Isabela Padilla","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJiseaaPVTqUF22ybPl9wGUNgpkZUqpVkNJoV5Tz5RG5RK8fsM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Perfect for a quick stop for bubble tea near Langara Station. It is open late as well so you can stay and study as there are available outlets almost every table. The washroom is locked tho so you have to ask for the staff to give you the key. No outside food and drinks allowed too!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPqYJ7CF37D2HS31wQdkSL4NGd5DlG-hCJm5kIb&fid=0x0:0x67b5a4bb419ef08"],"When":"2024-10-10"},{"Name":"Sungyun Auh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUf4OSVw19e3uXypNbQw0XDrrCALBXTCKpaVfS-mHF5Tv3c5zM8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"love the drinks and so clean for a bubble tea shop. i come here weekly and the service and drinks never fail me. 100% recommend this chatime especially. also a whole variety of drinks for you to choose from. my most favourite drink place in vancouver!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNZD5ywsx5PXRqG7C0ETUyeUlGclqNK2FraycsH&fid=0x0:0x67b5a4bb419ef08"],"When":"2024-4-21"},{"Name":"Wheels","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVsz1Rg53Q2-m5JHAwzfaowNSrC2JEVYhO1hHp4iyxB4sDy77VI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Typical bbt place. Facilities seem clean, and staff are friendly. Has a chill vibe, a decent amount of seating inside. Like that they are open later, very convenient.  Lots of city parking in front of the building.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPnWofTrVjR5inLOK8pLXvUr_cOPP-1d8rhXw2w&fid=0x0:0x67b5a4bb419ef08"],"When":"2024-6-16"},{"Name":"Coram Deo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWZGvl471d6PmVQYnxvb_ss1CiuOpgGg6iFrrECVoQzTSoUhEgT=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Every time I come here, I always feel like they have good quality milk tea. The store is spacious and comfortable. I had a good rest today as well.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMfTAqCxZx_6D_FsQuO-4x0BDQDPv6PoNj0_W_X&fid=0x0:0x67b5a4bb419ef08"],"When":"2024-5-20"},{"Name":"Ads","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVwDyuvQtXP_VygmU1rNXhUJ0mc48E4h1QtDkdEfrlXmuS-mYhL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Credit where it's due, this is the best customer service I have received from Chatime and the nicest joint in terms of upkeep and cleanliness. I feel like Chatime have all the tools such as the loyalty rewards scheme as well as offering the Earth's Own barista style Oat milk alternative to make themselves stand out from the other Bubble tea chains on the West Coast.
However, although the staff were super friendly and approachable, each time I visit any branch the drinks are just pretty gross and tasteless (comparing the same type of drinks at other joints with the same sugar and ice levels).
I actually ended up preferring my friends Jasmine Jade Milk Tea with Oat Milk and Grass Jelly, rather than my own Matcha Latte with Oat Milk and Grass Jelly.. the matcha tastes a very poor grade or weak and had no real flavour which was really disappointing. I even make my own Matcha lattes at home with zero sugar and plant-based milk which has so much of a bolder flavor than my experience here.. maybe it works better with the dairy-free powdered creamer in roasted milk tea.
I'm just kind of put off going to Chatime as this isn't my first disappointing experience with the taste of the drinks.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP49DJ1XGt655lLtVrtT355kT9hzl-4HZ4BrhCJ&fid=0x0:0x67b5a4bb419ef08"],"When":"2021-4-14"},{"Name":"Smilemaker","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJYZWuBDQWimTG6hcFj1YWOwFsk2dYRwwZYHQvwnAMRR37MSg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It's so delicious. This is the standard milk tea. The store is very clean and nice. I highly recommend it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNQNCJBEtV5zLXr4uF_lEW7ibHAfE9dH3-K15z4&fid=0x0:0x67b5a4bb419ef08"],"When":"2024-5-20"},{"Name":"Hannah J. Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLoLMrrH6x5R20dUXHGAgIFJr4RhmebA0b3DNeB0JwIELWjrg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My favourited flavour is espresso shot, red bean, and milk tea mixed with a little bit of pearl. I like this place, with a clean kitchen and a sense of responsibility from the owner. I live in north vancouver, but I always like to stop by when I'm passing by.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNsaSP20YLzWM6YxS0Azswxh67WAKAOpod2-Yn_&fid=0x0:0x67b5a4bb419ef08"],"When":"2024-5-21"},{"Name":"Sarah Chapelas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKg3Y40xASsbZd2GafXXUVekPnJsNwy1WbQlXSN8ViiKIxWYA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I was given the wrong drink yesterday. I noticed right after leaving and I went back in to tell the cashier. She insisted that was my order, but it wasn't. I order the same drink every time. I asked for it to be fixed. The cashier was rude and didn't want to. Eventually she told another staff member to seperate the drink instead of making a new one which was really weird. They scooped some stuff out and then gave it to me. When I left I noticed they removed all of the pearls but I had ordered a full scoop of pearls and coconut jelly. I was hesitant to go back in because of the rude attitude of the staff the first time, but I paid for pearls and really wanted them. They ended up putting a little bit on top of the drink. The cashier made a comment about not charging me as if she was doing me a favor, but I told her I paid more than I should have as she got my order wrong in the first place, so they owed me some money for the difference. She was rude again and didn't want to, but a manager was there and told her to give me my change. Overall, terrible experience. I go here all the time.. I don't know why they couldn't have fixed my drink properly.","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Arbutus Coffee
descriptions: Cozy, storied coffeehouse in a historic building offering light fare, baked goods & outdoor seating.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Philip Raymond Lim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5EIBAgpBLsauhPMdjXym7mJ4fA8mtryDtWQIJCZfJxYXxupU8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is my second visit and I can’t recommend enough. I just like coffee shops with neighborhood vibes and this is one of the few ones you can find in Vancouver. Besides that, they have great coffee and tea selection plus service is spot on.

I’ll be coming back at anytime.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMN4El290d6RLFJqLtk_ABtKEfjeZsKqgpLA823&fid=0x0:0xfeda9eb500e15ae"],"When":"2024-10-10"},{"Name":"Anas El-Aneed","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVlQ9-9X_Ve-n29FTeSernlhjnhGb-3U9yFLZsMUHalU5l4CfNoZQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lovely coffee shop with homey feel to it. There are seatings inside and outside. The workers are friendly and  attentive. A highly recommended coffee shop, and did I say that their Americano is amazing.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO88wbfhlblQWp6L7LfRZBmmg5nQiNE3nCJ-K5z&fid=0x0:0xfeda9eb500e15ae"],"When":"2024-8-20"},{"Name":"Mory M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUPs8avgpY6Oe_Ytsg4rqTPRpKj-6YZ9I59NE5Wd6hmPPMEz98=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"For the second week in a row, I've dropped by this coffee shop to grab a latte to-go before my kids' weekend soccer games, and I've consistently been impressed by the coffee's quality.

My son and his friend indulged in some Banana bread right after the soccer game, and they both thoroughly enjoyed it. 😁

While I didn't have the time to stay and savor the ambiance, I must say I'm quite taken with the unique decor of this coffee shop.

I'll definitely be returning to enjoy their coffee again.

Thank you!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOiARf90AmLQbBDxfjvrQk7XcPNotRf3PXLRXo&fid=0x0:0xfeda9eb500e15ae"],"When":"2023-9-25"},{"Name":"braden","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLmkHhBVAIv-bQ9CcEjJNVsemnAq6H2pK93IEFzzVUuHcaldw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Save yourself the time and go somewhere that actually puts effort into their food.

I noticed as i looked around multiple Kirkland labels, and while there is nothing wrong with Costco i do have an issue with paying a premium for something i could have easily made my self.

My breakfast bagel was a Costco bagel with the thinnest slice of ham i’ve ever seen in my life. Not worth the price, should be $4.

Also the management should allow their staff to drink more coffee or something because they all looked so tired the guy at the cash couldn’t stop rubbing his eyes.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNIHsXv_qAgwtx5SsbPv4S-oBCTZqyolzYX8x8g&fid=0x0:0xfeda9eb500e15ae"],"When":"2023-7-24"},{"Name":"Linnea Jean","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUjnPzeRTicRVttnu_7Hdt_P85rHQl_uJFMIFJIougwnDiK_-opjw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I always enjoy this place. For the location The place lacks arrogance and doesn't have a superiority complex. The staff are consistently kind, friendly and respectful. The coffee and food are always enjoyable and the sweets are not too sweet. Even the music creates an energy that makes you feel like you are on vacation. On top of that the atmosphere feels relaxing and uplifting. If you get a chance to be there when it's not busy it is extra special having the place to yourself. Highly recommended.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ads","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVwDyuvQtXP_VygmU1rNXhUJ0mc48E4h1QtDkdEfrlXmuS-mYhL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolute hidden gem. I cycled 12km across town to check it out and it was worth every pedal. Super cute, relaxed, clean and welcoming coffee house.
Unless there was a staffing change, I honestly can't understand the negative comments about the staff as they are absolutely awesome, extremely friendly and approachable as well as keep you safe with protective COVID measures. I messed up my own order and the batista actually offered to pay for the difference herself (which I of course tipped her in return).
Everything here is deliciously tasty and a great range of vegan options. They also have a great selection of local roasters coffee and plenty of plant-based milk alternatives.
Unfortunately no current indoor seating, which cannot be helped. However, there is plenty of spaced seating outdoors which is so nice on a sunny day.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNw-ZwbBTxg5PNvynV5zcaZ4-CH1ZOUTm2jvi_T&fid=0x0:0xfeda9eb500e15ae"],"When":"2021-1-24"},{"Name":"Livia Evergreen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWFxuUr69_KT7XsJHnMUOKCYYlO3LqfOuBIeqR8So2s-C8zA6NU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Lovely little gem with a fantastic location in Kitsilano area.

The coffee was great, the service was a bit disappointing (horrible manner) with unreasonable Covid-measures. There were a bit too many signs for a small place like this to keep your mask on - Starbucks does not even have that many, and sometimes their locations are even smaller.

I would definitely drop by again if I was close by, but I would prefer supporting another small business in the area, where the service is nicer and more friendly.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNPUgVtZMGQ1botMbkhjR6KfvFFVyb0UWASK5ZA&fid=0x0:0xfeda9eb500e15ae"],"When":"2021-7-19"},{"Name":"Moj Noroozi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXugascUb1Fko0SBjm9NLiM6IJLmrr73V93pNQAUcsSq60KoCcQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I like this cute local place. The ambience is really pleasant, street side tables can be a delightful option if weather is good enough to let you sit outside.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMn0bUK8QQ-eW3KCXCyitg1iAagvmUpKJGWq762&fid=0x0:0xfeda9eb500e15ae"],"When":"2023-5-9"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Alex Yang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIuRrYZImfOrDh2r0PpvXuz77BYR15PyCmPj3NB25JiakL8ew=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"A while back I bought a Boston cream donut, but they forgot to put the cream in it (so I guess I essentially had the “Boston” donut instead). I bought another the other day in the spirit of redemption, and luckily there was cream this time! However, there was barely any compared to the size of the donut- think of a pearl in an oyster, or the pinky toe of a foot. Food quality overall has declined over the years, but I figured that at least the donuts remained reliable. It’s been twice proven to me that they are not.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNd5c9-4Zq2Qs9yNoLDuit0eSYfnbnUWmV_Xk8e&fid=0x0:0x8258ef6f5cc8da23"],"When":"2024-8-14"},{"Name":"ANIDYA RAGHAV","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW0BZ9x41PWjJx2Ef9n3miQFXMxztRqurFvJ2ZQ9yRyL98GJ5M9=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Very very disappointed with this specific tim hortons i love habenero chicken bowl and the employees just gave me smallest cup of of rice and chopped chicken lesser than a spoon for $10. The plate was half filled with leaf salad. When i asked the employees to match my plate as much as i had at the other tim hortons they said they have proper standard of filling these which im sure is not true. I had to order another wrap just to fill me up. Im never coming back to eat bowls from this restaurant l. Taging tim hortons on official twitter handle as well.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipORMC1Nw0Zn6BzatAyGKbMhypw1WiHvvTykO6d9&fid=0x0:0x8258ef6f5cc8da23"],"When":"2023-10-24"},{"Name":"Kent Goulet","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocILp6GtzWPrZOK_K5vYvqqgEh4ZYlOp8ftnH-OXHO-bLU-MAg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"overall have a great experience when I visit this Timmy's but they need to fix their accessible door. Does not work when leaving as a person with a disability it is frustrating and there are a lot of seniors that live in the area so the sooner they fix the better. It's been a long time so please fix it, thanks. I took 2 off my overall rating because I've mentioned the accessible door issue many times.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Yongjie Huang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWZFeifIHSHTDrA88n5KvdA0SlF4CeEB_qYeGCbav7nBb_7aS90=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"it seems common issue that they don't care customer. I asked my son to pick order of three sausage wraps. they don't know my name. Then I went there and stood the first at Mobile App order for 15mins. Three girls were serving other two customers. another customer came in and got serviced immediately with her online order,while I still stand there.  That's weird! I don't know what can you see?
Don't ask me to fill.any form, save my time!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Alex S.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJtVBd8k4H4FajDQdfj7btviLYlsOibxULRRE46BdVCEIMsOw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"To Whom It May Concern,

Does anyone in Senior Management actually do any quality control for the service at this location on 41 Ave W? I recently visited this location during the evening hours, from 8:00 to 10:00 PM. Just check your security cameras around if you actually care. I'm not surprised why you have such a low rating.

The staff is absolutely unprofessional. They speak to each other (yelling) in their local Indian language in front of customers.

The staff played loud Indian music on their phones, so I was unable to hear my friend at the same table.

On Aug 24, 2024 some stranger was walking inside the area with food, not in uniform. The staff just let him in (probably friend).

This is the most disgusting Tim Hortons I have visited in BC. Thanks for the great CANADIAN service. I will never visit it again!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Chase K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIyudRNu7Q54jUcD3A8CW9b00O4Tr8cv0fUOzBtG3ZaFWvnTg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Tim's has just lost me a customer. I'm done with this franchise. You guys have 1001 menu items now from fiesta bowls to steak sandwiches and your poor staff is bogged down trying to make all these obscure items, meanwhile the customers are backed up waiting. Tim's used to be about coffee and donuts. Simple & efficent. Now they suck at just about everything they offer.

Thanks Burger King, for ruining one of the few things Canadian.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Seamus Fera","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUVayIp82tBj2ec7PBrmKKVcBu0gXVhxHhuJEdjfsZbUFtHEtU=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Unfortunately this Tim Hortons has a tendency to be very slow service. I saw five staff members worked and it took over five minutes to take
My order. Also my promotion wasn't working through regularly scanning and when I showed them the promo on the app, they still wouldn't honour it. Not the end of the world but a bit odd. That being said, it is Tim Hortons so what can you expect?","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"aman kaur","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLCEvVptENiC7ZcOiuozFlaXb9V77I3e82jJTpTKKSJtMh-pA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I really miss the old manager, Manpreet, who understood customer service well. Unfortunately, the current manager (Prabh) needs serious improvement when it comes to attitude and behavior towards customers. Recently, my coworker ordered the wrong drink for me. When I returned to the store to politely explain the situation and get the correct drink (not to return the coffee, but to show proof of purchase from just a few minutes prior), the interaction was far from pleasant.

On a positive note, I’d like to highlight that trainee Daman is doing an excellent job. He always greets customers with a smile and a positive attitude, which is a refreshing change. Daman’s professionalism and customer service skills are, in fact, better than those of the current manager.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Doug P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLx6YpxAAaIZ7Cj9PSMphfRQfkkw46YLaNdEeYIQOo495lpxg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The service was amazing. Everyone was smiling and patient as we were deciding what to order. The price is a little expensive but probably equal to other gourmet donut places. The quality was outstanding. Certainly in a totally different class than Timmy's.
A friend had given us a couple of cereal milk donuts a few weeks ago. That was the catalyst for our visit. We ended up buying ten to share with our families. Total price was $52. What was a nice surprise initially was that they are extremely delicious with the perfect amount of sweetness. They didn't taste overloaded with sugar.
Because we visited on a sunny Sunday afternoon the parking was full.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN0ewCVNLTJFtcKEs1MQc8-9OSQe4hy2pZBeAlu&fid=0x0:0x43e0914caeace7f9"],"When":"2024-10-30"},{"Name":"Rachel Mc","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWAZKiCMCrm-O4vkS47_c7PcrxwGFTfQsHvTqsBXr7XVxxeuRnW8g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I assure you, Canada's best doughnuts. This is a place I want to come to three times a day. I've been to many bakeries and doughnut restaurants, but this is a restaurant of true love. ♡♡🍇🍈🍉🍊
I swear for my life. This is a really happy place. Seriously... ♡♡🍋🍍🥭🍎🍏
I'm really happy to be alive because I can eat something so delicious! ♡♡🍑🍒🍓🫐🥝🍋‍🟩
A place that makes me excited every time I eat! 🥐🥖🫓🥨🥯🥞🧇🧀","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMkKCIS2QdDKeH67JymjwS60NFgqXEn_iRU6Abi&fid=0x0:0x43e0914caeace7f9"],"When":"2024-8-13"},{"Name":"Hakan Guzgan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUA_W8rhFsh5vl3N-SwOXx9x2M4aBXN2TS01V15E4k2zvHSImaORA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time at Mello, and I really love it. There are variety choices with yummy taste. It is little pricey, but you get for your money worth. We decided to go every 2 weeks to treat ourselves 😊. Especially I like to thank to Sarah for great smile and excellent customer care.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP6KSKsaz0luqkKw0GpwDutffqzAkkwCvU33RX4&fid=0x0:0x43e0914caeace7f9"],"When":"2024-8-4"},{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Tasty and unique filled donuts. The cereal milk one was the best with a crunchy and flaky outside and a creamy inside. They are not too sweet in a good way.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO0qToRsStlRIQ9GygcFXFeaWDNgKQSmoy1GnRc&fid=0x0:0x43e0914caeace7f9"],"When":"2024-10-9"},{"Name":"Stacey L.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWnl6b8Iz1b0jhBKs1L3mqAcraHZsnzlOu1HGl-usn4nl69TYZAIw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Their donuts are so fluffy, fresh, and yummy! Their space is really nice to hang out in as well :) I wish I had had more room to try more donuts!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipONNhSGp-Nt_lftQ7xavTIlYrjmRPzopeK8xDPt&fid=0x0:0x43e0914caeace7f9"],"When":"2024-8-20"},{"Name":"Suki Pan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX6efNZzthJ5-YWPAGBPg_1vp6l2cVEF5fYwRxel83qBKTUq4pK=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"💗 If someone was looking for the best donut in the city, I’d bring them here.

DONUKIE (donut+cookie) 🍩🍪

I recently went to a local favourite donut spot for their donukie. I’ve loved the crookie (croissant + cookie) trend so I had to try this!

The dough is so soft and tastes really fresh but omg look at how GOOEY the inside is 😍🤤 it was quite sweet and a decadent treat.

🍵 I also the cold brew matcha from their summer menu which is super refreshing but pretty sweet. Their drinks tend to lean on the sweeter side.

I love the aesthetic interior and the vibey decor. A must try café in Vancouver!
.
.
.
.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Leon B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX6_n6u_4aUXz2whYnr9OD2IqUUie9VrPqDi1PMWLfHJt4aWlti=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Jitters Café is hands down my favorite spot in Vancouver! The coffee is consistently excellent, always perfectly brewed and full of flavor. The owner is such a pleasure to chat with—friendly, knowledgeable, and always creating a welcoming atmosphere. The cozy, laid-back vibe makes it the perfect place to relax or catch up with friends. Whether you're grabbing a quick cup or staying a while, Jitters never disappoints. Highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOeVZUjP74rvleK-HG24oQ1vpYTYnvB5RW2hbOy&fid=0x0:0xd4708fd27043b55a"],"When":"2024-11-6"},{"Name":"Mari Fiess","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLyc4tUqFX0BCxZIQ300Qn0TQYJPzf-YiDhyzbiQklMNrx0RQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great cozy cafe with a great ambiance! I came here on a quiet Friday afternoon and there was very little people which was great for reading. The mocha was super delicious and the barista was so friendly and nice! She even brought me my mocha to my table. The place does have a no laptop policy but was not limiting to me in any way. Would definitely come here again!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kate MacMillan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIiOn4CRGx0W_zSOwBbarfyqFWSHlevsQZQeL5cK3AEIglcjA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Come here for the atmosphere.
I like to read or write here.
No laptops allowed.
Makes for a quiet spot, in a good way.
They use Ily coffee, which if you’re a fan, you’ll seek this place out.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMiCFK2wvMJ9C5_dT4Zm-M7YXXqPI0Nk1O8cE7-&fid=0x0:0xd4708fd27043b55a"],"When":"2024-7-5"},{"Name":"Taliesin River","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXhaPHF6qKhksH072fwuL_-rk794I8SRP1ZDqMnmWLRFau79Wo_0Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Pretty good cozy and unique atmosphere, but not great service or drinks. The person working there when I arrived wasn’t super welcoming.
Ordered ham & cheese croissant and London fog - both took a while despite no one else being there - the croissant was good, but the London fog was weirdly separated into two layers, too sweet, and served very hot it a water glass with no handle (so I couldn’t even pick it up without almost burning myself for a few minutes).
They also have a no wifi/no laptops policy as well as certain tables reserved for groups only. This wouldn’t necessarily be a bad thing on its own, but in general the vibe was not very welcoming - made me feel like I was intruding, and worried what other rules I might be breaking without knowing.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNnMgWOqhUeKIOFI2zumq8rfjO2OF4J4xlhsV8g&fid=0x0:0xd4708fd27043b55a"],"When":"2024-4-9"},{"Name":"Seniha I","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUN9QEk90mEu83xhoUL2oyG9Bleyt-mPIxHE-EgJEzjpvxHi_iu=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Walked in here to get a coffee, a bite, and do some work on my computer for about 40 mins. It was completely empty except for a couple other customers sitting. I was told it’s a laptop-free cafe, so I left. I can understand enforcing such a policy on a busy day when you rightfully want incoming customers to get a chance to order and sit down, but it doesn’t make sense on a day like this. You could tell me there’s a X amount of time limit and I’d understand that too. This is just hurting your business and I’m less inclined to come back.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Adam Zambory","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJU0Xg3MRWR6Px0v7K7gMkyZXGmWs7-5QtJwUR-EyF3X_WDiA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Jitters is a staple for my wife and I. Some friends as well. We walk down to kits beach and stop in for a coffee. Sit and people watch and chat. It feels like the 90’s in there. Great vibe.

We both love the fact that there is no wifi.

To the people leaving negative reviews because of that. They have it posted all over the place. It’s very obvious that they just want us to meet up some friends for some good conversation and some laughs. Not just a bunch of pretentious people who take up an entire table to blog in public. Go elsewhere for that. Like starbucks.

Jitters embraces life before we were perpetually on the internet.

Thanks for the chill spot!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Emily Xu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV2HyeXhxgNcGR92OFfH-vuwXQDQrFui2m_FC916LicL0QfPeDY=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"do NOT get the iced matcha latte i repeat, do NOT because there’s a good chance that if they don’t make it fresh in front of you, it could be old and rancid. the last time i got one, i noticed that it was premade, poured out from a refrigerated jug and smelt slightly stinky and rancid.

i went up to the counter mentioning my issue and the tall older guy (the manager/owner?) responded in the most “meh” and uncaring way possible. he started to lecture me (i swear im not exaggerating 😭) about how there’s absolutely no way it’d be rancid and how their matcha is authentic, really good, or something along those lines. then i watched him pull out a large tin of what seems to be premade matcha mix with bright coloured packaging (looks like it’s from walmart or something) and remake it fresh.

it ended up tasting super mediocre but atleast it wasn’t rancid. had that interaction went better i would’ve considered going back coz mistakes happen but honestly i don’t feel welcome at all.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Vedrana Serdarevic","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWfRecjcyftnFEqAOjnrQ3S5TGU8wlDBXXxcfTf71y_MNpEpF1a=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What an amazing eclectic place! The ambiance and vibe reflect the owner's great taste in film, music and art in general.

The service is excellent! Besides coffee and sandwiches, Jitters offers a plate of tasty tapas to go with your alcoholic beverage beer/wine.

What is really fun and unique about this place is the sense of community and neighborly vibe whether you live on Kits or visiting for the first time.

For travelers: This is a unique gem to experience in Vancouver","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO1tVdWG9uI5P8wfEuWFNsrLCDkDfb43Fysf8D1&fid=0x0:0xd4708fd27043b55a"],"When":"2021-11-30"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Madison G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVtZsEld-Yz5a2Swm5LesjF83lo03ZXPGgujeQvQiLn6WLaIuGx=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Such a cute cafe hidden away amongst all the housing. They have a beautiful spread of fresh pastries and food ( Savoury and Sweet ) to choose from. Lots of drink options for a pretty reasonable price. They were quick and efficient, and I loved that they knew a lot of the customers by their name. Makes you feel at come. I had the blustery muffin, the breakfast sand which and Pumpkin Chai Latte and all were delicious. They also sell lots of local grocery items such as jam and hand made pottery. Not alot of seating inside , but a lot to choose from outside. Free parking on the street","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNumBzD0_BBR5Z0YRDJkKDsRfvrQi0j3yMeXv9l&fid=0x0:0x61ff804d7c269dd9"],"When":"2024-10-29"},{"Name":"Max Cli","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLO48oNpZy20ZKJ0cWruPEH7vhSStdJTg9a0QgOlZcOkI14IQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Sitting in the quiet neighbourhood of Columbia and W18th, this corner cafe is a great spot for reading or hanging out with friends. I went on a fine day and it was very relaxing to sit at the table outside.
Their blueberry muffin is not overly sweet; someone nearby ordered a vegetable quiche which was baked fresh and smelled amazing though I heard the person commented that the crust was not good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPRFI7gKbGqAYb1rCOcnYHIIQMyG7CiglxSV26v&fid=0x0:0x61ff804d7c269dd9"],"When":"2024-10-14"},{"Name":"Danilo Teodoro","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU_rV4_xok36vIezJ6uAhpzSfyECA8ogmjA4ehyXVTr4dBqIAFv=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was a warm day and I loved having our food outside. The place has a cozy environment. Multiple food options, including savory and sweet ones. The cappuccino and latte were high quality as well. As others said, the fresh cinnamon rolls are tasty!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMh7R6KjS9XJZotAnMfFcJf0XSviS7tmQqT8Ziy&fid=0x0:0x61ff804d7c269dd9"],"When":"2024-9-7"},{"Name":"L.R.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWY6Ofr3tXSQJvJgb9BZo_WTJW-MpY8lIB7644dwkuDpTMftoNG=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Beautiful place in middle of the neighborhood.
Do something nice for you and drink something in the patio on this autumn season.
The prices and food are really good.
The only detail is on the bread and pastry area there is not protections and some bugs are flying, nothing to worrie but a little concerned.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP-mzM9cGpPJI9O9GiHVqy-J549CubUUpplk0Lg&fid=0x0:0x61ff804d7c269dd9"],"When":"2024-10-10"},{"Name":"Angie h","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUK5-Eyg-HKdLqH6Sh0Yu5AouPT5bxsEAkZr27lVeLcEluqhYqm=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Super cute cafe (&market) coffee was delicious! There’s some seating inside but more tables are outside. They also sell a number of food and pantry products.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNmOESuqeesJT-DPPQsVgUrS9BqWI7_QiaskxR-&fid=0x0:0x61ff804d7c269dd9"],"When":"2024-9-28"},{"Name":"Miranda Horger","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWEV3DznchpV8imqZh0_pBPx7ux5qQveTb2rzjbCnoZjjNb3x8qhg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Oozing with British charm, we loved the neighborhood location. The cinnamon maple latte was delicious! They only serve espresso, no brewed coffee (perfect in my book), so my husband had an Americano which was also very good. 4 stars in food because even though they had vegetable options in the menu, they didn't have any available when we got there - you had to choose from what was available in the display case. We took our drinks to-go, and walked to another venue for breakfast. Would 100% go again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM3r8Cp9xDMk4MYSAEuQduxshXshP7irth14QbW&fid=0x0:0x61ff804d7c269dd9"],"When":"2024-9-14"},{"Name":"Olivia Bruyere","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLFXAXZqKhkje07wekYtmzailjZNXhEuXMPDa53kuw3F4loLw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely lovely coffee shop, great food choices from savory & sweet , also was a nice find to see hand made soaps here","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOJX3vec6dqiDXNxRHv0kQG40-1B5yaTdJXgSLl&fid=0x0:0x61ff804d7c269dd9"],"When":"2024-9-18"},{"Name":"Jesus Lopez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWqGL0jWwmhbpCtdPqSufFHKDcjAWkbRNcvdlvZac4ZkUQdvfc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We were recommended to visit this coffee shop by a lady at the Walrus Design store, and let me tell you it was such a good recommendation.

It’s not just another coffee shop, their baked goods taste like they came straight from a bakery, fresh and delicious.

The quiche was incredible! 10/10","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN8FqP015kspquUDc1z620iiGwSDOtusbRgquke&fid=0x0:0x61ff804d7c269dd9"],"When":"2024-1-7"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Zihan Cai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV4Ut067-Y4XZEaVE-xFH4OWUrh1CLwo-4BsxmOFRLnal8um9L4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Tasty. The drink are a little on the sweet side so depending on your taste you might want to lower the sugar. The person at the counter is kind","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMfzy-2bDMCzvNboQVkeNEgmL_kHdB5B5YPwEQK\u0026fid=0x0:0x11d7df73ba4f33d2"],"When":"2024-12-15"},{"Name":"Paulina Pedrero Miranda","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXoiOld2vaC2Dv18bWNi8EDRiykD7MSCRsU3RK7RESh6xQghXxb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The tea was so fresh and delicious!!, we decided to try and definitely this place surprised us!, the variety of tea and mix and match options is great!, the staff was friendly and fast!, we ordered the sunny Vancouver and it was so refreshing!, huge fruit pieces and a lot of flavor!, without a doubt this place is way better than Starbucks and the price was good as well!, they gave us a card that if you achieve 10 stamps your next tea is free!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMmNXcBY0Of-n9UI8zgrIaZFvlPphfEXYkFvSPY\u0026fid=0x0:0x11d7df73ba4f33d2"],"When":"2024-8-8"},{"Name":"Jazsmine Griffin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV8ePU6siNbwxJ23UiK_QhB5UTj9-YtaxxkcQPeGKG6KDgVLqNKuw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Mango coconut bubble tea was great! Have a few set items or you can make your own combo.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNuKtIDaNs05fKWx7X_D6fIBWO4I6DXQ2tU7kc_\u0026fid=0x0:0x11d7df73ba4f33d2"],"When":"2024-10-31"},{"Name":"Anna Truong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKDUQMJrO1pOfJObMULw0hqA1hiH0n7t0o-vRlAJF8t7GDtzw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The gentleman working here is always so polite and NICE! Great customer service.\nI think this location is the best compared to other franchise locations. Nice fruit teas,  I like to get the 1L “Sunset” and “Sunny” half-sweet , less ice. So refreshing! It comes with large pieces of fresh fruit pieces to eat too. My new fav bbt place. Can’t wait to try more flavours. Also, there’s a stamp card: buy 10 get, one free!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"B Han","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLHDEEZtW3d331AAAgc_WlP0yIopRpzXdnI1yxYjT4_tWN1mw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wonderful Tea cafe in downtown. Excellent customer service, the staff is very cheerful and welcoming. Nice ambience. Love to come here for a good bubble tea.\nHighly recommend","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Robert Caron","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW_EpFhprcf3SG2KOeJLn_ZMvns4ZouCijKUxtpaECokzRyVf_o=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very approachable place. Top-notch service and they have... wait for it... very nice teas! The cat's pajama.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMqTVvnxyprJyGyXs3olCukbTBWLrZ0NLLoKV96\u0026fid=0x0:0x11d7df73ba4f33d2"],"When":"2024-7-12"},{"Name":"Sergio Romero Glen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVsxRXUbLN4DwQb53T9rvVN4W64MVtDTb6JuT6OcUfCk8KomcgLeg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’ve tried many bubble tea places around the city and I think this is my favourite and not over priced like others, especially the quality for the price","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kat B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUOYgYrsC7lEgVar7kzkeHBFNktFXZ8d-fYmkkhr0z9ZVL2gUiV=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Finally found my perfect iced tea in Vancouver, which is not overly sweet! I would recommend lemon iced tea with no extra sugar added!","Images":null,"When":""}]
