user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Lizzie S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX5qIG1VmBASZQRSYXsIMifm6rtLhZA6xcKTGDs0bvXyJT2pXkmsA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Definitely love the homey bakery. Felt like everything was homemade with love. Quiche was decently flavorful and great portion. The prices were very reasonable. Services were friendly too.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNVrRGhaTPL4eviw3r1PawKez3E0pyPQEQv30SN&fid=0x0:0x3a2804e14fb9e8c"],"When":"2024-6-23"},{"Name":"Sol Zuckerman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW44w-9qcvApAq8RciXBYn4ZOTh40yegzNwPBV9n3beOee6cbIg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"As native Montrealers we are used to French bakeries and great pastry.
We moved to Vancouver and couldn’t believe our luck as we live are blocks away from the best French Bakery I have ever visited.
I won’t start detailing their menu because every single item is great but besides the croissants which is obvious the Quiche and the Brioche’s are mouthwatering. I go there between 4 and 5 times a week and would ask every foodie to try their pastry etc cat least once
That will be hooked forever.
Sol","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jakob Hnatiw","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUJOGS_GGeYmEuA5QzbtbegAFcmUG4ma1KEE3XjlGerbgwOszQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I visited this restaurant a month ago and was impressed by the generous portion sizes. However, on my recent visit, I noticed a significant reduction in the portion sizes, with noticeably less cheese and meat. I'm unsure if there has been a change in ownership or other factors, but the decrease in portion sizes is quite apparent.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOJ58nQRgWyX6xRf_TaLb1FZFkiQKyEsILLAQ2o&fid=0x0:0x3a2804e14fb9e8c"],"When":"2024-8-2"},{"Name":"quAckers","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUL4zGS30C-jbn2h5HtVXDqiuQy9jCoyXw-oEpVrK-qpguMO2mo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the best places to get pastries and family run.

So far, I've tried their almond, ham & cheese, and spinach & feta croissants and well as their sausage rolls. Their croissants are the perfect balance of buttery and flaky, and the savoury ones are not too salty.  They offer to heat up the sausage rolls which I greatly appreciate.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Amirhesam Yazdi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWIm2guSWDUlb6ZW_ISKZIpJyCFMYA9T8XY5GAkt6GPG8Ex2aD_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Perfect. We ordered chocolate tart, tiramisu, brioche and macaroon. Cappuccino and latte.
Everything was perfect. I highly recommend the chocolate tart.

My 3 year old always orders macaroon in cafes for their color and usually bites it once and that’s it but he ate all his and that says a lot.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMUbOGEKL5kIaUo--eOXAgsz8x6RJ2FhuGhkX59&fid=0x0:0x3a2804e14fb9e8c"],"When":"2024-3-24"},{"Name":"Jane Doe","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIG6ivj47xS2HhBWyL7Nhqkjx3ByYqnQdgrN9qpq1CDdbnzpQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Super cute little cafe with just four tables inside! Tried the cinnamon roll and it was so moist and delicious, not too sweet.
Wonderful tea selection.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP715yQjF5SpUYN_WcBM08PYtVkaV0IthTY8u82&fid=0x0:0x3a2804e14fb9e8c"],"When":"2024-1-19"},{"Name":"Mathieu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI8zcBKFJAdhxxswVwmXa7YMvImph_ATl9KzvV_BZQWJLPnffvX=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I'm from France, and I love good food. I discovered this bakery randomly.

They have delicious pastries and excellent bread! I was able to order a specific bread for the next day. Everyone is very friendly, which is a nice surprise compared to the usual French rudeness :p","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Melissa R Volle","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIQaZy5bTB4JxsdX_JoLkJWjiMcCQsTtY0nTjAoLwpcmWOhWKfm=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The best croissant in town! I love the authentic French pastries, baguettes and desserts. A must if you're in the neighborhood!","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: YiFang Taiwan Fruit Tea
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"highlights","name":"Highlights","options":[{"name":"Great tea selection","enabled":true}]}]
user_reviews: [{"Name":"Helen K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIB4_olxukNjIEddEIX_LyHsn_95sJynyDYm606MeuXtL0sUw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"1st time redeeming my bday drink. As expected, they only had a limited selection, however I didn’t expect them to put zero care and effort into the drink. I ordered a Pearl Black Tea Latte with pearls. The drink itself tasted like milk tea that been sitting out for hours and the pearls were mushy and soggy and clumped together. I didn’t realize how awful the drink tasted until I walked out of the store and was already headed to my car. Not sure if this is a one off or they just try to deter you from redeeming your free birthday drink? Do better Yifang Kerrisdale. This has never happened to me at Cha time. Will probably look for another bubble tea shop in kerrisdale moving forward.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kulisara","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXgRkeyi8SVcJb38h_m9cRjdJp-L43vcMpmhQcIExnujS5plEU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very friendly staffs. Especially the tall guy, Japanese woman and the woman with glasses. I’m impressed by their service. They always give you a big smile. Ps. The red bean slush is my all time favorite from this shop.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"snɹnɐsʎllǝ","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXjRSZ0OAoFpj0Xo3LwfHQNZKQblqJ0L82QA7oy9ybBiPCaZqaP=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I tried the Mango Passion Fruit Fruit Tea and it was pretty tasty, but the minimum ice it could have was 70% and it was 7.99, I think it is a little overpriced compared to other shops I've been to.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPwH3s7kd38NTM2aBS5U2jL43UcSHtoo5vr-w1U\u0026fid=0x0:0xd9f025d514f6c14b"],"When":"2024-6-6"},{"Name":"AH","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUbSDTBRb0i5Z-O9Llx_f4jUDvaC36Rpc_Ai8VCzOt_tM08rlqM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Ordered the mango sago slush and the pineapple oat milk. The mango slush is so good! Just the right amount of sweetness and it’s very refreshing. The pineapple oat milk tasted very sweet even though I ordered 50% sugar, and I didn’t taste the pineapple much. However, overall I think this is a good place for fruity drinks and their pearls are good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPlRqs6nPBrcgfNT5plHBrE4bTMemYP8SyUOQby\u0026fid=0x0:0xd9f025d514f6c14b"],"When":"2023-5-24"},{"Name":"Miranda Hsiao","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX_41VeD_GND42gkIRBVXwzwI1yJiQZg4SO2BtfKn_ExP50FnhU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Their signature, Yifang Fruit Tea is really good since fruit tea is their specialty. If you want sweet pearls, black sugar pearl series is the best option. Black Sugar Pearl Matcha Latte has the strongest tea (matcha) flavour comparing to the Brown Sugar Pearl Latte (black tea). Their black tea is very light. But since they use organic milk, it’s equal. If you really want to buy the classic “bubble tea” (milk tea with pearls)🧋at Yifang, Brown Sugar Pearl Latte is the better option. I tried Black Tea Latte with pearls and Pearl Black Tea Latte, both 70% ice and 70%~100% sugar, but the tea is way too light and watery.\n\nI will come to to try their other fruit teas!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPkodIe_nC9UzA8bnU6zZuEPvzbt9k9pyOWeBch\u0026fid=0x0:0xd9f025d514f6c14b"],"When":"2022-6-21"},{"Name":"Asmita Chakraborty","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVcYhS5AiWPtSeiQdsov5cU-BEY0UGKJdwUzdwKdp7HpEyUkyEx8A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I tried the pineapple yakult green tea with boba pearls here. It costs around 6.5$. One can customize the levels of sugar and ice in this store. The taste was delicious , with mild sweetness , fresh fruit flavour. I would like to try the other bubble tea flavours here in future.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOLArIvMmVN_NUxmh6siMA3tR_CBzax_Dt50JQC\u0026fid=0x0:0xd9f025d514f6c14b"],"When":"2021-8-15"},{"Name":"Justin Liou","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWFxfOVP4XpHnN780BvKs7g9isznQRyE4Ncyf0WTMd_LvAodb8o=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I really like YiFang Bubble Tea! Today I had the Brown Sugar Pearl Latte, and me and my friend enjoyed it cold! Have had YiFang before and this newly opened location is awesome! The pearls are really chewy, and I love how all their products are authentic and with no artificial flavours/colours or from concentrate and that it’s from fruits! Thanks.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMGPdwKlLMQW2ioH5d6B-B4Aq1NSG0c8F87I9ng\u0026fid=0x0:0xd9f025d514f6c14b"],"When":"2019-5-19"},{"Name":"Kelvin Fong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWYlOJ0ZWKycRqx5ZOzHhnjusnD1vSd-Gno_8IQ4mNi6hmtCYtiSA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is always good and consistent for their FRUITY teas. They say their teas are on the sweet side, but I think it’s the opposite. Perfect cold tea taste with the right touch of sweetness. Apparently my niece’s favourite place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM7cEYq4BEDXizIF-kGAV5hctw0uH5bo6NFxIzr\u0026fid=0x0:0xd9f025d514f6c14b"],"When":"2021-9-2"}]

[{"Name":"Tabitha Marie Geraghty","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW9l1bo7byb7Ucg-7YubvvEIA3WJTeAtKK5wv4tH4R1rOlNJiNsuQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I have to say I took a picture of my venti latte because it was less than a Grande.. and while the supervisor on site saw me standing there and came and poured it in. When I looked at her with confusion, she just walked away..","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOD7eN_Lv9dUFxtmz3len0kmK82fHam0xLJ5HE5&fid=0x0:0xf316c3a45489ccec"],"When":"2024-12-24"},{"Name":"Ada","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK_tT85lO7aZKFfq17wWpo8ldgI_n0GJFJfBhG1nWiEa2zXCQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I came around 645 am and it was an excellent experience. The barista greeted each incoming customer with an energetic "Good morning!" And it just made my day better as mornings are awful in the winter (as much of an early bird I am.) The seating is spaced out and clean.

Only star deducted was for a lukewarm drink that was meant to be extra hot!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Angelica Yee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIcQojzbdV9sbLoihEwt6NQe8LJ9Oux6JR_irkYfLyJU1tPYS4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Iconic location in Cambie Village that is always clean and never seems too busy. Nice service and spacious with lots of seating options. I like how they have alphabetical counter slots for mobile orders.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOwkEc2OhWQ7RKs1c7aZSbuRPpC0BOGxDP1J1R3&fid=0x0:0xf316c3a45489ccec"],"When":"2023-7-3"},{"Name":"lily bollegraf","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKtVmmFWDmIVRsVI6svR5Mi5xCn1yaiO7yHcg65SCzPNpnvqg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went in this afternoon to grab one of the new holiday drinks that just dropped, and the girl working cash was so sweet! Didn't catch her name but she was so nice and enthusiastic and made my first holiday drink of the year that much more enjoyable! <33","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Bali Body Club","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXMqnPS8MzxY0LUr2WJ3Fba9LT_DmtYrcNTzl6CsYK3rkjRRHZ7kg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The water in this place is TERRIBLE.
I asked for a cup of water, which smelled like something was rotten... 🤢🤢🤢
Hopefully, you guys don't pour this water into everyone's coffee!

Please check your tap and the quality. This is the worst water I've ever tried in my life!!! I'm not even joking.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMwVagWUFqvO779qFSFugo59m3bsQ9Mjg-OUfR1&fid=0x0:0xf316c3a45489ccec"],"When":"2024-6-18"},{"Name":"Michael Moriarity","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWNhkYaB9zjlkkl74OBPcplO2QslT6bqh419yvto-fc4bLKxsqAKQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This Starbucks coffee shop at Yew Street and 41st Avenue is located at a very busy Kerrisdale location and it is a pure delight to stop for a coffee, baked goods or sandwiches.. the staff create a very warm and comfortable atmosphere.. you look around and notice what a special place this is as there are always warm conversations happening..","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNyCkHcPmxohYwQdwoVxfITAKdqzdEQHmLPU4Eb&fid=0x0:0xf316c3a45489ccec"],"When":"2019-12-11"},{"Name":"Prettech Canada","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVK0-bRSlFJXhwUcmoFjEgfZ9XzFxBcYJAHnfse3QULvhaTMLX3oQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Starbucks is a chain that seems to do it right. I really like their Earl Grey tea with vanilla syrup it has a unique taste and it's very cost-effective under $3 for a vented. The washrooms are clean staffer always update it's one of the chains that I don't mind visiting.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNpIk3eBTk4KLL99dSyjnQOjBvj4Ff8uiYhcsrr&fid=0x0:0xf316c3a45489ccec"],"When":"2019-1-13"},{"Name":"Google Guide","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXNuhwlIn4-plqHLGD0QCOZgOCtCWh2WgE75DMJxjiWfmTWyXU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Modern medium size store with a steady stream of customers. Offers the products and service that customers come to expect of this popular chain. There is some outdoor seating. Parking is by street meter and free time limited spots; and nearby residential street spots. #Java #coffee #cambievillage #letsguide","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Leon Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWPOnBvlGz2k_WzxOhCiURR3aRaAE5ffHXfUBJJ4GP7GBC5Wn8K=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A very cute and cozy cafe in a nice and quiet neighbourhood! They've got some pretty generous portions and some very well made egg bennies! It's a bit small, so there many be a line, but it's definitely worth the wait here. I highly recommend their waffles with whipped cream :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNrbFEaO7fprbX657Xe56LRWbKAAUtd_NnWvt8e&fid=0x0:0x29a7ce96eb686a3d"],"When":"2024-8-24"},{"Name":"Penny Rusty Sophie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUkGfXMIDqwS_yD1axTk6tkHoLsnybE2ErvKrHMoMIElMJWekI_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Visited in early amay 2024. Nice location near Kits Beach. It's seat yourself and they'll eventually come to bring you water and take your order.

To be fair, I think they were short staffed when we visited and it showed as service was slow. Got the farmer`s crepe ($17) with bacon, mushrooms & mozzarella cheese. Also got the huevos tapatios ($19.5) with two over easy eggs, chorizo sausage, avocado, green onions, cilantro, feta & pico de gallo on a warm flour tortilla served with a fresh fruit cup.

The crepe didn't have much flavor in the diah and the filling just seemed to get lost inside the crepe. Perhaps a sauce would have helped. I did like the crispy hashbrowns that came with the crepe.

The huevos tapatios was difficult to eat with the tortilla underneath. I did quite enjoy the chorizo sausage tho.

Food wise, it was ok but just not sure if we got an accurate representation due to the place being short staffed.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM2tminbIXW9T8BKiQMkZ5DC9rRBOSuzfANlHW8&fid=0x0:0x29a7ce96eb686a3d"],"When":"2024-5-19"},{"Name":"Shuhei M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV8BG8ic7MtFY9sc6n50rfwPLcJDKH0wpdFqm0pcBwZXsA16C4yNA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"It’s a pretty decent place for weekend brunch. Service is quick and friendly. Food is exactly what I was expecting for brunch. Reasonably priced.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNjfSYuGR8aa165FMmjxvTc-dHhs-c4yM9Z5uej&fid=0x0:0x29a7ce96eb686a3d"],"When":"2024-9-2"},{"Name":"Azi Jahan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVoCqSGFWxXVxJxNnyUrYmJjWJKEtREeG-G0RXpmBRv8kbELxEL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The staff at this local restaurant truly shines with their exceptional service, making the dining experience a standout.

The location is convenient and easy to find, adding to the overall appeal. While the ambiance might not be the main attraction here, the warm and friendly atmosphere created by the staff more than makes up for it.

Moreover, the food is top-notch and perfectly matched with the reasonable pricing.

Whether you’re a local or a visitor, this restaurant is a hidden gem worth exploring for its great service, delicious food, and budget-friendly prices.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMTm7VHqfvHWm6xwTpYzNcpp8x4ZqbpMzwV1N_x&fid=0x0:0x29a7ce96eb686a3d"],"When":"2023-7-26"},{"Name":"C T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVA_Pys8vFJlfzC2SA3B8MbwZjF3iswDVZh-OqRS4ccB0zqnlw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My go-to neighbourhood breakfast spot! The food is fresh, simple and hits the spot. I usually opt for the classic breakfast or the French toast… or combine the two with the lumberjack if I’m feeling ambitious. The coffee is delicious in that classic diner way - I always hit my caffeine limit here lol. The staff is friendly and the atmosphere is cozy. Really enjoy their dog-friendly street patio seating in the summer too!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Herbert Camat","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVKXSkcN5npL56jCqrImwFWlxlBsiSCmQ0Pl7fUB01TSYknRkt_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Zen Cafe was delicious! I loved the poutine and the two egg Breakfast! It was awesome! The potatoes were the highlight! And I loved the grilled tomatoes more than I expected! Zen Cafe was good and extremely affordable, great option for brunch!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPRwUXY1vZfvJl5kGbkmw0xm7okBMcWcLB9T48R&fid=0x0:0x29a7ce96eb686a3d"],"When":"2024-2-25"},{"Name":"Dominique Matys","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUWZMJLtMFh5MvM_rWh3rQEmnAYMi8RxhTj-ZjrwYtjHQN60POY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The atmosphere and food at this cafe were both good. Service could use improvement though. The waitress not failed to give our party of four a menu when we asked (told us to use the QR code instead, but had no issue in giving a neighbouring table some menus?). She hardly ever checked in on us and so we had to wait next to an hour to simply request the bill.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPMlT4Zd_qT6iTDv35iVPTl6HxBDEXJBInP5fi0&fid=0x0:0x29a7ce96eb686a3d"],"When":"2024-3-29"},{"Name":"Kieran McGrath","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW0448hjwRdjU4mQH2LgbwCtcr7ptvwB-e60MMh7teGoQuCfXOSkQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Without a doubt the best breakfast I've had in 6 years in Vancouver.  I've had tastier items in other places, but this is 100% the best all rounder, and all I had was a standard 2 egg breakfast, they had much more exciting items on the menu too which I'm excited to try next time. Minimal wait time for a Sunday morning, after our order was taken food was out in about 4 minutes, and everything down to the toast was just great quality, large portion sizes, and best of all very affordable. Server (guy mid/late 20s with a moustache) was also very personable and knowledgeable. Definitely going to be our regular spot for weekend breakfast.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO0OU_RjY554rWRlnzZVr1TBXER35k1_0u3Yzhk&fid=0x0:0x29a7ce96eb686a3d"],"When":"2022-12-11"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Emma Saber","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWP7_ystXAcQdfqu2Y8u7upOcwgT9KyOgXuLgh_8JoQzogK4nDF=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Good cafe with varieties of sweets and brunch, a few things to improve: the fork was not clean and the potato’s were not cooked enough (raw inside) also the salad and fruits could have been cut smaller and more presentable","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMUV-LgUnYy0YbZkjr0HRkY7ZIMGE0q1--8nymc\u0026fid=0x0:0xe7f9c1b226cd0aa1"],"When":"2024-12-15"},{"Name":"AG","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKTVyMm7SUzrWXHy5W9YTTw8RiR5u-uqKsPcACPZNBpht5PoCY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"It’s my first time visiting this café, and the overall experience was great! As soon as I walked in, the server was very friendly. Even though we hadn’t decided what to order yet, she was really patient.And then, I ordered two lattes and an almond croissant. Everything tasted good! I’ll definitely come back again。","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP0HWxAISBsmhXjbAMby7zd_GOamMQwRgxFzxXW\u0026fid=0x0:0xe7f9c1b226cd0aa1"],"When":"2024-10-28"},{"Name":"Michael Moriarity","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWNhkYaB9zjlkkl74OBPcplO2QslT6bqh419yvto-fc4bLKxsqAKQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The Faubourg is a very special French Bakery with very fine ingredients and quality tasting patisserie and great tasting coffee…it has a very good patio area..","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO9KbFD8cDGHXq5JGIyOqMjPRLs0pdZXX6ZI2tW\u0026fid=0x0:0xe7f9c1b226cd0aa1"],"When":"2024-8-22"},{"Name":"Anmol Ratan Singh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVpbS1tkljKBfJB4b-0p2H0otsImRDVKU0w3EKQEutGlo-eaoLNuA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I really like the vibe of this cozy cafe and their crepes are really good, I tried their soup of the day- Onion soup and it is like a warm hug on chilly mornings","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOHk_8m813DtmxA4FYiO2tGvXXf5X51ttZs8dT7\u0026fid=0x0:0xe7f9c1b226cd0aa1"],"When":"2024-12-3"},{"Name":"Lennard Foster","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVPxoAfutyenw7C_TidMVnNELi5bfqzGPGMCK83Rm8hhfQWgRU=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Come quite frequently for the past few months, I can’t say enough about how incredible the staff is. Even when they’re clearly short-staffed, they stay upbeat, efficient, and always greet you with genuine kindness. It’s impressive how well they handle the rush, but they definitely need more staff to keep things running even smoother. My chocolate mocha was absolutely perfect rich and flavourful. The croissant cookie (croocie), though, was a bit disappointing this time—hard and not as fresh as it usually is. When it’s soft and fresh, it’s unbeatable! Despite that, I keep coming back for the amazing coffee and the wonderful people.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Agnes Stanley","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK-Nn9KU7NgKvhp2OIfN8Pxsy19ZpDudSNAd_TJYTFHZkdSjQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Their version of the tiramisu cake is disappointing!  You are left with a dry stale cake, which is suppose to soak up the cream and/or liquor. But there's not enough of the good stuff to soak into the cake, so your last bite is the dry stale cake. Don't waste your money.  My laziness with choosing them because of their location was a let down for a birthday.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Macho Ma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWToXpU3H3YB3xkMOp6uUKU5gePr0KH9w6w89u7rGCD3siyx0IX=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Normal coffee but I like the tiramisu","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOjH3e2bT7BLSsIyULipiI1l6KXG654qcWqFVFj\u0026fid=0x0:0xe7f9c1b226cd0aa1"],"When":"2024-11-5"},{"Name":"Kevin Tran","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLpHihF6yJ1UDvWNJi8joDQwDVlEOyjVJCWVw-Z8nghDVxn6w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Attractive decor and setup.  Their pastries are only ok.  Latte was quite disappointing (taste like it was watered down).  Perhaps their cakes and other products are better?  May be a while before I return for another try.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNTpaIsEHcIYyLJ5YyC1vzXDY9FSWDeRUDFrH0z\u0026fid=0x0:0xe7f9c1b226cd0aa1"],"When":"2021-5-28"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Kelsey Jay","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWuNS-SGBHi_pUA46Wj3qi4MNXNZ6mjGjwWV5sTSKtUK1CEq3QH=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Thai fried rice with chicken was good. Hot spice level was accurate. Also had the pad sew with beef which was hot spice level, was pretty good. Green curry with chicken was great. They were missing the spring roll in the Thai fried rice combo though :( was looking forward to trying that as everyone loves it as per reviews","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOlRoiu3IpKNSTSQcJ69luANC9rsmTZvXPyQOEH&fid=0x0:0xe2a9207bf5e23816"],"When":"2024-8-19"},{"Name":"Jim ST","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXUiuSF5HfAepfnO5grGc3WGFcI3PLjOFi0BLNhgwfeHeG6qpEo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"oh god this is awful… the place looks and smells like an 100 year old abandoned house. Dark and damp, filled with a musty smell. The tables, chairs, and floors are all old and dirty. And not surprisingly, food is awful, rock hard no flavor beef. 😣 only good thing about this place is that the staffs are friendly.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOuOa3D2l2H4mmE6phj2irOT-tpiCJlgGQ0NUYD&fid=0x0:0xe2a9207bf5e23816"],"When":"2024-7-30"},{"Name":"Evelyn W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWKN7puiWTfhN7citaJYEm02_jDInbGSRCV0vjW-pu2Y5eOb6CgTw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"HIDDEN GEM in Vancouver👍

I found this place on delivery apps and decided to give it a try. My orders: 1 Green Curry Lunch Combo 2 Pad Thai.  The lunch combo comes with a green salad and a spring roll. I absolutely love their spring rolls. Thin skin and rice vermicelli fillings. The green curry my favourite😍. Rich coconut cream, very milky and just a hint of the spice. Chicken strips and veggies are nicely cooked and soaked in the sauce. Goes so well with 🍚 rice, I finished all of them easily😁 Pad Thai tastes also good! They are sweeter than I expected, I can tell there are some tomato flavour in it. But I would not recommend to order beef in it, their beef is a bit dry. Overall, full-filling lunch with cheap price👌

📍Khao Thai by Legato Cafe
W 41st Ave, Vancouver","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMazsy-Q5noyMf2KOpG16FjLc_Vgx0Kv6xOTQ5D&fid=0x0:0xe2a9207bf5e23816"],"When":"2021-9-2"},{"Name":"Elton Chung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU_SVkVqkNe3SvSFwaZ1xrBYHObNVkTiTTXXYykf58guqGIk3qy=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Recently I have been to Legato Cafe for brekkie and lunch several times. From outside I thought it was just a cafe serving coffee, tea and cafe foods. In fact they serve Thai cuisine for their lunch menu and the quality really impressed me.

The customers in the cafe are generally the people who have been living in Kerrisdale for decades. Many of them are now over 75 years old and they are the loyal customers who visit the cafe every morning. As a new face to the people, I was warmly welcomed. The customers know each other like family members. The vibes made me feel like home there. In particular they don't play any background music - I really like it!

Regarding the foods, the super breakfast and a cup of latte are definitely the good choices for a chilly morning. In my last visit at lunch I ordered their Yellow Curry Chicken with rice. The curry was very tasty and I love it from my first bite. The taste is authentic and I must say it is better than authentic. I should have a larger portion of rice as the curry sauce went well with the jasmine rice.

This is a cafe full of nice people with stories and good foods where you can slow down and enjoy the moment.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMFv8oH_FTrdyS4SQHN8qhNb14WHlcb7eniXYI&fid=0x0:0xe2a9207bf5e23816"],"When":"2022-12-12"},{"Name":"kawaii hatchiko","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWLtom4JJghW2UnkOsI7GKr-J96yxZfSX4SBdkTaAQaNBfKVBVT=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Ordered here for the first time. The pad Thai was super dry and lacked flavour. The sauce to noodles ratio was way off. The soup was terrible. I do not recommend the soup at all. The curry was good. But I’m not sure if I would reorder.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOFZ7y225aN7c1kxCmqxMSsnz4g4klrU8cFUSWq&fid=0x0:0xe2a9207bf5e23816"],"When":"2023-4-9"},{"Name":"Penny Rusty Sophie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUkGfXMIDqwS_yD1axTk6tkHoLsnybE2ErvKrHMoMIElMJWekI_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We don’t make it out to Kerrisdale much so, whenever we’re in the neighbourhood, it’s always a chore to figure out where to eat. I noticed that there was a Thai place nearby and made a mental note to try this place out. When I finally got here, I was a bit confused because the place looked like a coffee shop (not a Thai restaurant).

As it turns out, however, they do have a full Thai menu inside the shop and we wound up ordering the Sampler Platter ($15.99) as well as Green Curry Chicken ($13.99) and Pad Thai ($12.99). This appetizer platter was really good and had all of the items that we enjoy… spring rolls, chicken satay, fish cakes, shrimp cakes, and deep-fried prawns.

The green curry chicken is exactly what you’d expect from a full Thai restaurant and had tender eggplant, bamboo shoots, red and green peppers, and Thai basil leaves. As expected, the curry sauce goes very well with a bowl of white rice.

They use tamarind sauce in their pad thai (instead of ketchup) and this version turned out pretty good.

Overall, I was pleasantly surprised at the quality of the food in this little coffee shop. Service, while adequate, was a little bit more in line with what you’d expect at a coffee shop than at a sit-down restaurant (we had to seat ourselves and also flag them down to order and get take-out containers and then pay up front at the cashier). Still, I wouldn’t hesitate coming here for Thai food if I was in the area.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOciZuMvp6lMWxtRvXN968xbSxy1vDrbgdDpVn-&fid=0x0:0xe2a9207bf5e23816"],"When":"2021-4-25"},{"Name":"Ads","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVwDyuvQtXP_VygmU1rNXhUJ0mc48E4h1QtDkdEfrlXmuS-mYhL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This joint is a cool, quirky and alternative spin on a dining experience!
I have to admit, I was a bit skeptical when ordering a Pad See Ew ผัดซีอิ๊ว and I could smell a grilled cheese being made at the same time. However, the grub was dope, real tasty with great seasoning and fantastic portion sizes including good helpings of tofu with no greasy or oily texture. This place tastes like good home-style Thai cooking and made me think of my awesome days back in Thailand. The kitchen is shared but completely separate, and they are able to offer a classic authentic Thai menu with awesome veggie selections as well as a quirky and upbeat cafe offering some pastries and cakes.
The dish also came with a small salad and one of the best deep-fried veggie spring rolls I have had in a while, an absolute gem and steal of a cheap tasty lunch. Lunch menu is from 11am-15:00pm and has a great selection of different thai cuisines.
Staff are super friendly, welcoming and accommodating.
Khob khun ka ขอบคุณค่ะ !!
Support local business!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNhJQlIF7K1u_Hc-pqJJRaHt5mLTgvEjWMYamTs&fid=0x0:0xe2a9207bf5e23816"],"When":"2022-3-7"},{"Name":"Cheling Ling","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI8tiyEVZVahH_y3WnzM4UtxHhZcWbpwbKfQUDWZZCQCiQxUA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Ordered a so call chicken curry, over watery, only spicy but no curry taste, n I see no sight of chicken pieces. This should rename as potato curry.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNwMAfQViV0MiEjs4IIz3iDEoRJokpSOq1vwMYt&fid=0x0:0xe2a9207bf5e23816"],"When":"2024-6-5"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Uendee Erea","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUJyMPDmf0XQPboRpyzFxP-huoC-FATupMVSCS-z-_31Tu7rQim=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you’re in the mood for a sweet treat, look no further than C41 Coffee. Their marshmallow chocolate drink is simply divine😍 I paired it with a delicious muffin, 🩷 and it was a match made in heaven. The staff were welcoming 🤗, and the vibe was cozy. I love this coffee shop 🧁☕️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNxn5FNkIJW67NwVpEAO5DhK4CuOGcz2t4PMJYj&fid=0x0:0x93c53e6d216b1f62"],"When":"2024-11-4"},{"Name":"Sydney Schirrmeister","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWFAgzQCrFjGhGUAwF7d6aV8O4Llrhax3jgnV4fisFH6308kujiWQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is the most wonderful cafe. They have completely stolen my heart. The owners do a fantastic job of making the atmosphere homey and welcoming, and they also have fabulous drinks and pastries. (I recommend their Matcha Latte, London Fog, the Almond Cookie-Croissant, and their Chicken Pesto Sandwich!)

I've been to the majority of the Cafes in Kits, and this is easily in my top 3. I find the ambience to be so warm and inviting, and the owners make the space so pleasant to be in. If you want a place to catch up with a friend, or to study for finals, or to enjoy a new book, C41 is the spot to do it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP4eMSrs1tNvCOYWulzMfMqzbN5i7syysk7ozVb&fid=0x0:0x93c53e6d216b1f62"],"When":"2024-4-21"},{"Name":"Letty Bishop","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX32wb-06E0d9Zsyusv2HvqFAUU6yRPcEEcChVzcyvMTvtwRfo=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is my new favourite coffee shop! Super friendly, amazing coffee and food! Best coffee shop. Love the photography!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipONTtlZowtyUMnwxzEcms5ONGyCObZWtaHrUasY&fid=0x0:0x93c53e6d216b1f62"],"When":"2024-8-8"},{"Name":"Anry Wang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV2FOGlUJE49ASqWr497NKDmNSNyq9ujX6ci6HCoS3H8qL9G9Iz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lovely neighbourhood coffee shop, the owner is super nice, I tried their croffle which was freshly made, so crispy outside and buttery inside, with the right size of a flat white in a CUTE cup, unexpectedly this coffee shop also provides 3 options for coffee beans! The price is reasonable too, 2 full size croffles only $7.50 with 3 flavours to choose from.
Will come back for sure!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN8PZu0NcwggB00YRlIKBOl1TRDEwGAj5gmUTF9&fid=0x0:0x93c53e6d216b1f62"],"When":"2024-3-23"},{"Name":"Rosie Robinson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWT-H3-8z21UXoZ3Hhj3uUjG89hhG6iEkD6d50P-7sOT1pbgIY=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We love this cafe so much! The owner is so friendly and accommodating when I come with my kiddos. The croissants and apple turnovers are to die for (and made by the owner right there) and you will be hard-pressed to find a better oat latte in Kits. Also, the atmosphere is lovely - always playing some chill piano music. 5 stars all around.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"BR","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVKvHcZB7xb4n8CF1jxejOIwoYqPKN4SdZc0qIjcZcbAYMjdkneNA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great little coffee, I got recommended the number 7 coffee blend and it did not disappoint. Make sure you stick with the number 7 blend when ordering your coffee.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO3uof0MKFqdvNkNVhfQjvi-8lCcSAvU7OMmNF6&fid=0x0:0x93c53e6d216b1f62"],"When":"2024-12-9"},{"Name":"Hasmig Bedrossian","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUB7MJQASpSohHtAFuC7saCe5WOQ2AjxBXMR_TlYPvxzmubQkzq=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Really lovely local coffee shop that opened on kits that seems to be family owned. The staff are so nice and it’s a great place to do work.

Their coffee is good and they have a variety of freshly baked pastries.

Support them!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPL_3_aUXvJILBJj723Oq8qcIVIv3y3EJKSG7I4&fid=0x0:0x93c53e6d216b1f62"],"When":"2024-2-6"},{"Name":"Grace Chiang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW-6oPHxxqNsQGyPW4J05v9OYbx1x7ctSu6op0T_83o5coAOg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you don’t want to read a long review, here’s a short summary:
Amazing coffee for coffee enthusiasts who really care about the quality of beans, brewing temperature and techniques.
It is a real quality coffee shop. Emphasis on coffee.

There are so many coffee shops in the area that are really good. Here’s what made this one stand out:
- coffee knowledge. The owner has a wealth of coffee knowledge including which competitor and which coffee farm/beans won in which year!
- pour over technique. The owner studies the competitions and try different techniques to make an amazing pour over either the right temperature.
- original espresso blend. If you are not a black coffee drinker, the latte and flat whites with beans of choice is a great option to enjoy your unique cup of coffee.

Anything less than positive?
- Pastry choice. This gets personal as if you are the type of person who usually wants a pastry or croissant with your coffee, you might not find what you are looking for. There are some cookies, muffins.

All in all, if you can taste different beans then this is going to be a treat heaven for you.
If you literally just want a coffee on the go, go to any chain coffee shop will suffice.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP4vICEc_IntK9A7Z397qWWG--UWYOhg8UNIWw&fid=0x0:0x93c53e6d216b1f62"],"When":"2024-2-24"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Sue H.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIvBtkDy7sChQrgUSbaQbtqqCrAf2D0SisH1FaTP8ES9Tr74g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I had ordered from this restaurant many times for take out order, but this time was the worst. I ordered the chicken nuggets this time to try, but once I open the small box, the chicken nuggets portion was so little. It's only half size in a box for $12.95. Completely speechless for this small portion  and that cost. With such portion I could have got from somewhere else for cheaper price too. I feel very disappointed and deceived as a customer","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNF8798hvkU_zahAWU4XB4qeChniusFrQ3HXbEh&fid=0x0:0x6db46bf4030a7238"],"When":"2024-8-16"},{"Name":"Deb M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXPrATP9E08bOlyd-Dd5lrVgbexx--OhGR-WZHHVn-fl3mHFca1NQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Met my daughter for a quick late lunch, neither of us had eaten here before. Staff is friendly, atmosphere is quaint, but the food - worse spicy hot pot soup I have ever had. I have travelled extensively and can appreciate good flavouring - this was bland, zero seasoning, and lacked spice. Sadly I will not return or recommend $60 for two bowls of hot water with a few noodles and spring rolls. Oh well perhaps it was an off day but too pricey to give another try.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"kandis wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLqRhBa2Up1c5kTR3_4Xyp4X-usl87anlLy3zvB0Lv9fePorg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A very friendly restaurant from the front to the kitchen, I have been going there for almost a year. I feel like going home with super good food without regret of keep going for my first choice in Kerrisdale.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNiu2Z3xPLu3hqJsoG2qWNMLmD7fKj4SlMpJJXq&fid=0x0:0x6db46bf4030a7238"],"When":"2023-12-17"},{"Name":"Luke Weng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXn1tdfwXfRnZVszKV8bZBNwooyRqfHv0VT8T0EAQWyUrqTrrO6aQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"When I first came across this restaurant I thought many things. "This looks like a cafe," I thought. "It must be a good place for coffee and Bubble tea".

The reviews said that some Taiwanese lady (possibly the owner?) was very nice and was super accommodating.

When I actually came in to eat, I was completely out off guard. This place was in fact indeed a Taiwanese restaurant! An actual authentic and traditional one too!!

And the lady that the reviews spoke of actually waited our table. She really was nice and took the time to explain the menu. When we needed extra utensils she grabbed them without hesitation.

The only thing I didn't like was how small and pricey of the menu. Even the appetizers menu was more expensive than some restaurants I've been to. The cheapest item was $9!! That's almost 10 bucks for a few pieces of vegetable.

Asides the price and quantity, everything else seemed pretty good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMQzJAsuVV-l7aTrYfV3korh6j_L420aima1o_l&fid=0x0:0x6db46bf4030a7238"],"When":"2019-12-4"},{"Name":"s.m. kindersley","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV47VumTpOhpzvxhFz-c_hGo06rqHrL9wuzc1BLqx--ayr95g_E=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"my friend and i came in with dietary restrictions, one vegetarian and one gluten intolerant.  with help from the friendly staff we had a delicious meal.  crunchy tasty green beans and Hai lan, back eggplant, stir fried tofu, vermicelli with veggies. pleasant light background music was playing,  the servers were attentive with tea and water and condiments. i would be happy to go back with family and friends.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOo-lWy0Bmxb74cQMZAywBc3tjORhcT_kwWf8VT&fid=0x0:0x6db46bf4030a7238"],"When":"2024-5-7"},{"Name":"Kulisara","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXgRkeyi8SVcJb38h_m9cRjdJp-L43vcMpmhQcIExnujS5plEU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My top 5 restaurant around Kerrisdale. Flying squid tentacles and lemon chicken are the best!!! They also toddler friendly. Very thoughtful they gave me cute utensils for my toddler. Customize menu to fit my toddler needs. This shop is amazing!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"C K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKzpv-PyqqKemfUW68qED6-0vJQn8fAFvFcrRLPf7-q5kdHow=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had a great experience here. Amazing service and good foods. My Taiwanese friend recommended. Not sure why such a low review. I will try again then see if I change the mind.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP05aIn7uvcfl3xOYLdRbPFZBYhDl263UFkhn94&fid=0x0:0x6db46bf4030a7238"],"When":"2023-8-29"},{"Name":"bill l","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUADAxax50DlUz5DZ920mDMlqZoQdcFwmLe637VZbXiqzWiDOMw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"We were disappointed with the portions here. Definitely not good value for your money.

Ordered a chicken with black bean sauce and vegetarian tofu which cost me $10.95 and $12.45 respectively. I'd be fine paying that if they were regular sized plates -- but these were the size of appetizers! See the attached photos. I placed a bowl beside the chicken dish for scale. And it didn't even come with rice.

We also ordered a Fish & Vegetable Noodle. That was a normal portion and cost $11.95 so that's better but still on the high side in my opinion but that's probably understandable being located in Kerrisdale.  In the end we paid over $40 (incl tax and tip) for lunch and we were still hungry.

The service was good. The food tasted ok though the tofu dish was a bit too salty. *If* I were to come back (but I don't intend to) I would stick to the noodle soup menu items. It has better value compared to the dishes.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMaHzhs-AvMgTsKsyAuzTt77zq7DsA9TYh_ggcZ&fid=0x0:0x6db46bf4030a7238"],"When":"2018-8-27"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"D. Ramirez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVtWqsrHqDZl1W0OBxe1NjbCh9HOBnh2nsPznIkdy_uO3coqMUS=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had a fantastic time at Cafe Lokal today! It’s got that perfect cozy vibe, and everything was top-notch. The London Fog? Absolute perfection. Warm, soothing, and just the right amount of sweetness. But the real surprise was the breakfast croissant with a boiled egg in it—who knew that combo would be so delicious?
Our server was super friendly and quick, which made everything even better. Oh, and don’t skip the bathroom—seriously, the sink is a bicycle! It’s one of those quirky details that makes this place even more memorable.
Definitely recommend stopping by if you’re in the area. Great food, great drinks, and a bathroom experience you won’t forget","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOJv510QKDVrqp4ZroHqLvPYSPSq9IMuoKTGWQm&fid=0x0:0x90462c0406c66c0"],"When":"2024-12-24"},{"Name":"Marina K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVwLUEpz0wJ1XVK8qod6FFxIqtNeet_oXNpQmznItHczwEGRlwi=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wow I think I found my new favorite cafe in Vancouver! The food and coffee was delicious, and the service was outstanding. Water was brought to my table without even a request and everyone was so friendly. The space itself is welcoming with the brick wall, fireplace and stacks of books. Could have easily spent hours here reading.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOtEv9pip2F-p8Bc7pfjwSN9Cn5yDd-ruQjnWJj&fid=0x0:0x90462c0406c66c0"],"When":"2024-7-16"},{"Name":"Yolanda Santa Cruz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU18-Ajeyl3IKQgPKsZ9e8wQcnZap9fTw-zmGPZPB-Qydbwx6HCyA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent choice for a brunch. Sandwiches are fresh and delicious, great coffee, tasty soup, lovely atmosphere, and very detail oriented service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNtp4quzJPWY3NEkVIqbY0rYGodp1D7mUv5JfqJ&fid=0x0:0x90462c0406c66c0"],"When":"2024-9-15"},{"Name":"Julien Salomoni","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjViaO6gVJkm-aDsrcz_NkNmy8tx1NR_WPh1jW1IEU3WF2qJs0Sk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Such a great time at the cafe Lokal, as per usual, we waited a bit, but honestly it’s always a pleasure to be seating in this cocooning cafe. The team is really welcoming, smiling and helping. The atmosphere is always warm and the customers nice. The decoration is really atypical and will make you travel in some location in France. Their tables are really original and well thought and designed. Everywhere you look at there is a specific decor who gonna attract your eyes. The food is good, the coffee and other beverages as well. Enjoyable and lovable place, I recommend strongly","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMl40zqUduI6bl3TtUXl7i1YRJip5XJZ0clqpIn&fid=0x0:0x90462c0406c66c0"],"When":"2024-1-26"},{"Name":"cedric hupin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXys5t0EWeR_-2gT68s4tTHZl5mBLGuu5mlhlwyKRWsLuaA8GrX=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Not good. The focaccia was fine, but very overpriced. It took 30 minutes to get the saddest looking avocado toast + the toast was so hard my girlfriend could barely bite through… Maybe they were having an off day but idk... Also had the turkey club sandwich with the tiniest piece of bacon…Not good. Im not a picky eater, this is just worse than airplane food. If i made this at home, I would have thrown it out.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN6lC-rnowGefHbqwKBenXzmrXTgc7kVLCaqfGi&fid=0x0:0x90462c0406c66c0"],"When":"2024-10-26"},{"Name":"Athena","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXvcHYZ9C3U9WsCVWuvPpPPrR6DNL7Ywhr5D3WdUVxhk1FF9arkwQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My friend and I came here to have brunch and chat and this was the perfect place for it! Very homey, affordable, lovely ambiance and excellent service .

The avocado toast is good but the toast was a bit hard and too crunchy. The matcha latte was pretty good and I got less sweet and such cute latte art! The london fog was also decent although is a bit on the sweet side. I'm not sure if I would get the avocado toast again for the price but everything is pretty good. I don't recommend this place for studying as it is pretty loud but it's perfect for catching up with a friend. Lovely service and their blueberry muffin is also delicious!

Overall, recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP-eEFP-fae7mf4WP6RvEDLqgutN9cs331Z6gVZ&fid=0x0:0x90462c0406c66c0"],"When":"2024-1-23"},{"Name":"N “Minaoka” N","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVLM29oukNuw0VGmRupQYbXCWQVv9sqfg5h3FP5AbyXShl2bASQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great cafe in west 4th. Always crowded and has nice patio seating for good weather. I had a special sandwich today, which is the warm ciabatta with arugula, porchetta, truffle honey, pear and pistachio. It was delicious and good portion. I just couldnt taste the honey truffle much. I would come back to try their brunch menu","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP4cl1saVJH-o2BnR4Db44217Mw7ROCHHpO8GH_&fid=0x0:0x90462c0406c66c0"],"When":"2024-4-23"},{"Name":"Jenny N","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUaxdBwctNYeHtF6FNDIm_BbIZLLsF3RQfHtKR-LN2ouCWLjKjv=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I was pretty disappointed with the coffee; it had a very burnt smell and the taste was bitter. The almond croissant was good, but the muffin was just average. The shop itself is nice and cozy, and the staff are friendly. So, 3 stars for the food but 5 stars for everything else.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMPMzRfojEeMWUOYL7XJR3GNE6u_JtVpjftOsYn&fid=0x0:0x90462c0406c66c0"],"When":"2024-2-15"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Francis Calasan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLn7SkOMYKUKBAC7MpJ-kbNbUXfaHY1J4k1bLLeOQYraOwBXQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great little coffee shop in the heart of Kitsilano. You MUST try their chocolate chip cookie, as it’s the best I’ve ever had. Sweet and salty goodness. I love that they’ve recently put up bike racks outside for my clubmates and I to hang our bikes during our quick coffee stops here. An absolute gem!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNK0RI_ZFoPgZ-hK8M7-Q9Tq-BvmlOyPGWLIpL_&fid=0x0:0xa8c145a5337d85ed"],"When":"2024-8-5"},{"Name":"Moj Noroozi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXugascUb1Fko0SBjm9NLiM6IJLmrr73V93pNQAUcsSq60KoCcQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I'm absolutely obsessed with this cafe! The ambience is beyond charming, with a super cute beach vibe that instantly transports you to a relaxed and happy place. Every corner is adorned with specific, pretty details that add to the overall aesthetic.

The coffee experience was delightful, and the smiling staff made it even better. Their friendly service added a warm touch to the visit.

Both the indoor and outdoor spaces are beautifully designed, providing options for every mood and weather.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPShZNJF_Xol6_DqTYtNgjYVM5yPi5aL_7xo_cD&fid=0x0:0xa8c145a5337d85ed"],"When":"2023-12-14"},{"Name":"Dana Sullivan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWQIw-0oOUNgoyniYugTscGkgpKJS8tpx4V0tAajn3ZGkNIfqEk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I really like the atmosphere. Very cozy and appropriately “beachy”. I thought the little learning library with books for kids and adults on nature, Indigenous history, self-improvement, and LGBTQ topics was really interesting. It’s not a very large shop but there’s a decent amount of seating between the tables and benches inside and the patio (which is mostly covered and suitable to use in the rain).
The food menu is pretty basic but they have some interesting pastries and specialty drinks. I got a pesto egg breakfast sandwich, a lemon thyme brownie, and an apple chai latte. The egg in the sandwich was a little undercooked (the white was still kind of runny in places) but otherwise it was a good sandwich, very good brioche bun. The lemon thyme brownie was great! Very rich. The thyme was very present and gave it an interesting flavour but it wasn’t TOO strong. The chai latte was SUPER strong and spicy which I really liked! Also less sweet than I was expecting but that was also a good thing, although the apple was pretty subtle.
Average value for money. The portions are a little on the small side but that was fine for my appetite.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMFBJiz8D29rLeDdVi083-mYayw57O7kgQHjfIK&fid=0x0:0xa8c145a5337d85ed"],"When":"2024-10-17"},{"Name":"Katelyn James","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXdQF-vdwWmyXtLIVPm8PvskDDQmDybv-Q675ar8mjGeg8lQjHxjw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love Kits Beach Coffee. The decor is very cute and fun - my favorite seat is the indoor swing. It always feel very cozy there. Great coffee and baked goods. I love seeing the staff singing along to whatever the current playlist is! ❤️","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"GOZDE Kilic","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUywfFev2T_aNUd3Hhof86yAL56zOfCSebLsolBAv89xxXYh-lE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The design of the place is very nice. However, the coffee was not hot enough.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMJxKy9XNRTqDyFz2OLKWaw7-p44SkR7c5QBfVW&fid=0x0:0xa8c145a5337d85ed"],"When":"2024-12-23"},{"Name":"That Raincouver Blog","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX-t882l-kovJBXYsZGdhsejNOzKqLeP2fnTfhLFRZ7ApJSADw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’m usually more of a tea drinker, but their seasonal lattes are the ultimate mid-day treat. The banana bread is also always moist and delicious, and I’m drooling all over my laptop as I write this review!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipORqx-iBkwYhATg8Wvikz01uvn4FT6hMj_yTV1q&fid=0x0:0xa8c145a5337d85ed"],"When":"2024-8-29"},{"Name":"Tiare Brea","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIrjChXO29zXyHdtDSTIGmoh4e8t7l8mSl18OnE56OW34IFXg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Just came on here to say that I had the best chocolate chip cookie Ive ever had in my life at Kits Beach Coffee. Chewy, chocolatey, and perfectly crunchy in all the right places. Please see attached of it glistening in the sun in all its glory!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOji_qxaIiAVCMXH7lOpE_6Zc5odEkUFbAFHQcQ&fid=0x0:0xa8c145a5337d85ed"],"When":"2024-4-21"},{"Name":"Alicja Biegalska","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIwswBpA3XHglSxlEfiu1tiAJfv0IU_yS6FP3i6plfV1p79Sg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Very dissatisfied.
Firt time a month ago, they made my Cappuccino with a dairy milk instead of Oat - mistakes happen that's ok but they didn't want to believe me and didn't want to redone it- I felt like someone who is cheating.
The second time, if I had forgotten my loyalty card, no one even told me I could not combine them together. When I approached today to get my free coffee, they said they couldn't connect the stamps from the different cards. I would go back home and take my card before ! No one said about their policy before , so I felt I was treated unfairly.
No for people who live close by.
Maybe for business purposes only and tourists..
Coffee is good, but that's it.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"tikki","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWzV_Y6bQFjodBKC8anq5nBVFmCTC7hA6Nh7xklFQuKGefK40A_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My one and only favourite coffee shop in Kits! Both the coffee drinks and the tea lattes are great and the double baked croissants are also one of the best options in town! The table by the window is my favourite as it is warm and bright and the vibe is just amazing!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMQCMAuXMVe5U-rlAM-QnIKaO1qNfCE_vwzkZEs&fid=0x0:0x989f77d4e856ebcf"],"When":"2024-9-26"},{"Name":"Philip Raymond Lim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5EIBAgpBLsauhPMdjXym7mJ4fA8mtryDtWQIJCZfJxYXxupU8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently visited Lumine Cafe on W4th again today and was still impressed by my experience. I ordered a flat white coffee, and it was absolutely delightful—rich, smooth, and perfectly crafted. The cookie I tried was decent, but the coffee truly stole the show. Last time I tried their mocha, flight drip, espresso, and cortado — everything was great. I’ve attached the image of the menu board for their offerings and prices.

The vibe of the cafe is fantastic, with a warm and inviting atmosphere that makes it a great spot to relax. I parked conveniently on the street along W4th, making it easy to pop in. Overall, I’d definitely recommend Lumine Cafe for coffee lovers looking for a cozy place to unwind. I’m looking forward to my next visit!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNbm3KZkmUlNKP2XDx91sSyEgvys65omU4V1O25&fid=0x0:0x989f77d4e856ebcf"],"When":"2024-10-3"},{"Name":"Michelle Siaril","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVvNHVR_L-5eCK2usU0kQoT055SV9vB2qDNPyrA7CmG9QXO2IM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"One of the few cafes that offer drip flight (at reasonable price too!). Love the wide variety of coffee they serve and imo one of the best coffee places in town. Barista was super helpful and knows how to brew good coffee.

This place does get filled up super fast by wfc people. Would recommend arriving earlier if you’d like to dine in. They do have a back patio that’s open during warmer weather though.

I also got an almond croissant ($7.5). I have slight mixed filling about this croissant. It’s very flat and thus not as flaky as I’d like them to be, however I really enjoy how rich the almond filling was. Overall, really enjoyable experience and would go back to try their banana hazelnut croissant.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPyk67FbXNTM9BVRfMWPI_pSfrGatW0t4y0KoI&fid=0x0:0x989f77d4e856ebcf"],"When":"2024-7-12"},{"Name":"cecilia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUmWwy9Xvvrt7kr_dm4Kg6fChylM-nSgAk3J5SJSnqDQ3oxx5bC=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I'm a huge fan of their matcha with some vanilla syrup (not photographed)! It's a great shade of green which is a good start and it's not overly milky tasting.

Their lattes (hot or cold) are also smooth and just to my liking!

In terms of food, I wish there were more options for savory options but apart from that, their pastries are amazing! My favourites are the Pain Au Chocolat (or chocolate croissant) that has a fair bit of chocolate spread and the Chocolate Skor Cookie that has a good mix of crunch and softness.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNr__UjKk8i2HwLmywH1Qmj8iozMCCigJBlQeIt&fid=0x0:0x989f77d4e856ebcf"],"When":"2024-11-12"},{"Name":"Thomas Dirs","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWipsf2vpfZixuMdTQutqceOUWgifHNQg1e4eyAKEXrDMFF2D0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delightful coffee in a cool part of Vancouver - worth a trip. I went for a flat white which was a double shot served in a 6oz Kinto Japanese cup. Beans were light roasted from Ethiopia and roasted locally. Lovely balance on extraction. Milk was 3.5% and beautifully textured. Faultless coffee with outside and inside seating options.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMQMdlw9Pa0oBfEg_LR_7m9vvOkwfwy3aa0sZg&fid=0x0:0x989f77d4e856ebcf"],"When":"2024-9-12"},{"Name":"winter love","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJjLihRevEzUjFV53yC14-CzglrCls5yqSsgCeoRWkXcHQpjw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cute little snug place. We tried the flight, drip coffee, pour over and espresso tonic- all tasted amazing. We were most impressed by the espresso tonic. The staff were super friendly. Our active little toddler enjoyed her crinkle cookie and chocolate chip cookies.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPH4tm1dCv3JCzezhY-aEU0-MR-k1Evx8H7vjHI&fid=0x0:0x989f77d4e856ebcf"],"When":"2024-10-11"},{"Name":"Hye","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjULQQSi1mhNFty7n8ZPesKkMpD31jiIGazltx_wRmE-swaOwr4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Loved their almond decaf latte and chocolate croissant. I also appreciate that they offer a coconut milk option and some beverages that other cafes usually don’t have. I highly recommend this place if you’re in the area and looking for a decent coffee","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPQZsH1PU5cd9yYFQ44Q2yoghfESoCRbtORJkE&fid=0x0:0x989f77d4e856ebcf"],"When":"2024-9-6"},{"Name":"Denis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLM19hR5kYT6FPDV1pUWYPPcQgfSbKj8aF7hmLDSkmqer8Wyw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lumine is hands down one of the best places in the city to get a great cup of coffee. Every brew here is top-notch, crafted with expertise and genuine passion for the art of coffee-making. And let’s talk about those desserts – they’re absolutely remarkable! The team is incredibly warm and friendly, making everyone feel welcome the moment they walk in. They really know their stuff when it comes to coffee, and it shows in every cup. Thank you, Lumine Coffee, for being such a standout spot. Keep doing what you’re doing!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"candy L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXgq2OgnXFRsC1icGye-CTgUf_6kEV0cPoOgzI7ANMes5eDT-Xz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Recently, more and more cafes have been popping up in my neighborhood. Each one has its pros and cons—some have delicious pastries but subpar coffee, others have a spacious atmosphere but lack flavor. However, this new cafe that opened recently has impressed me in every way; I haven’t found any flaws yet.
It’s a small, cozy spot, but feels warm, quiet, and stylishly simple. The selection of pastries is limited, but every item looks fresh and delicious. They also have a generous reward point system, which is a nice touch.
The staff was friendly .Before we even placed our order, he offered us a small cup of tomato soup to sample—it was aromatic and rich. We ordered an espresso, an apple danish, a spiral croissant, and a matcha latte. The spiral croissant was perfectly flaky, and the cream filling was just the right amount of sweetness. I loved the apple’s texture and balanced sweetness in the danish.
All in all, this cafe is absolutely worth a visit!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNhaj4c1WlvdVlFD79LQZQ3pNeEizTUzts0o7pq&fid=0x0:0xc02bc10764989908"],"When":"2024-11-6"},{"Name":"Jennifer Hogg","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX5MMicSBU8H9o9hzclpUM6nbNhGiz2XjAJ3rXbT6cVm6LHXnc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A friend suggested this recently opened Cafe and I absolutely recommended it now too! The Peanut Twist is delicious, and the oat milk latte was terrific. My friend had the Cruffin and said it was also very good. The server was friendly and attentive, even when it was getting fairly busy. I was really happy to see several people coming in while we sat and finished our coffee. Great new Cafe, definitely worth checking out!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMuU76Vriub1XAYgH9DTaUzJQnFpkRrn85RxubN&fid=0x0:0xc02bc10764989908"],"When":"2024-9-23"},{"Name":"Maryam Akbari","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX-eAd5hrPOKxHdjYcVS_udIPXyL_R_-31zZsqGfsMDwMJeHAE=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ravis Cafe is an absolute gem! The owner is incredibly nice and friendly, making every visit a delightful experience. For UBC students, there’s even a 20% discount, which is such a great deal!

I’ve been to this café twice now, and both visits were amazing. The first time, the owner treated us to a free tomato soup and even taught me and my friend how to make coffee and create latte art. To top it off, he gave us our coffees for free—it was such a kind and memorable experience!

The coffee, pastries, and baked goods here are out of this world—everything tastes so fresh and heavenly. The café also has a warm and cozy atmosphere, perfect for relaxing or catching up with friends.

Here are some pictures of my order from today—I highly recommend giving this place a try! You won’t regret it! 😊","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO1PnywsxxecJZRyn43jqxYOyOzRaR2LR0WNIhb&fid=0x0:0xc02bc10764989908"],"When":"2024-12-21"},{"Name":"Suzanne Laurie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLHBwRp6UpEGRLEDaeJ05lR792TSNDUA1cMLW1_Y8ckJHlFosc=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Just found this little gem (apparently it has just opened) and thought I’d try a coffee. Amazing! Smooth and perfectly poured. The baked goods and food also looked great but I’ll need to sample those another time. 😀

Loved the vibe - Ali is lovely (owner and incredible nice human being), super clean space, beautiful natural aesthetic 🌿🤍. Perfect place to sit and relax outside or grab a table inside and do a little work.

Highly recommend (almost empty cup says it all)!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOwaduZCht_sZP37EdIByKUkJyOyMOTqlzFrWOD&fid=0x0:0xc02bc10764989908"],"When":"2024-9-5"},{"Name":"yalda ghanadian","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU3MFDKo1D-JP3Qgxt-e8N0VVf8oM9iOu07gQYnJM-YgNc4saU=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":""I absolutely love this café! The atmosphere is so cozy and welcoming, and the coffee and croissants are always delicious. I find myself coming here multiple times a week because of the friendly service and the great vibe of the place 😍😍","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNUxx4NMZ_kNL0tceIx5p8iCFUh8_LlG-fejls8&fid=0x0:0xc02bc10764989908"],"When":"2024-11-7"},{"Name":"Kirsten","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJHsecm3Qw46a8DOXm2_J1oFlIpgJqQBVGb1b9e2bKF_fJF_P0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"BEST cube croissant in Vancouver! Their cube croissant is filled with creamy chocolate and raspberry jam. Other cube croissants I've had are too big and super hard to bite. Ravis cube croissant is flaky and soft. I have definitely come back for them multiple times. Their other baked goods are also delicious 😋 The staff there is super kind as well!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOtOj69dqMZ071mgAcnCvYvC7VtRm5v43jjjWzl&fid=0x0:0xc02bc10764989908"],"When":"2024-9-27"},{"Name":"Anna Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUofgUjK15OFeEpgb9H3yhtxhDc9Zlwt0nDVe6Qh2WT7S3tVC1Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lovely cafe, delicious coffee and baked goods, we love the crème & chocolate croissant muffin. (Photos taken midway through eating/drinking) I got the cortado and my partner had the Americano and they were done to perfection. Owner is super friendly and welcoming, we will be back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNTnYHzxrKXPlroDXQV_N3OestU4CLGfgwT231l&fid=0x0:0xc02bc10764989908"],"When":"2024-9-7"},{"Name":"Mika","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWy2G9VEyz5XVr8WO2m4j0r8OQSvzx2Q4sRPFSWtBVDoGQkYnyokQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ali, the owner, was fantastic. This new café has really impressed me. I tried their oat chai, which was delicious and light. Ali also offered us a sample of the tomato soup, and it was wonderfully comforting. All their pastries are baked fresh and taste incredible. They even provide a charging block, making it easy to charge devices. The seating is comfortable, with plenty of cozy couches and chairs.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPHeN6BnhkUgH7mJG2WHLK9In1Ud4gAD7lBHxq6&fid=0x0:0xc02bc10764989908"],"When":"2024-10-29"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Montserrat Man","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUYOQ5MkfC1RifyP_aPSn-sFLkFRMCCEemioK7_hwT03w_z5gqm=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Pay almost $15 for a bagel with a slice of ham, a slice of tomato, a heap of lettuce (all this chopped up with their hands and spread around the bagel), served on a paper plate?

The taste of it was too simple.

McDonald's was close and tastes better... sorry but for a bagel it's the truth.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMzDuWA-mA26Ar4v0TUDgy-4ls8SwVQQ8vgRrKL&fid=0x0:0x8c1733a32a2ef459"],"When":"2024-9-3"},{"Name":"Jason Brawn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXGJaU20iM-ZTxKU88Eh8aQ0G6FeQUBkbo4O84nuTWj3KUf3yIR=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our recent first visit to Simit Bakery was for a snack – we needed a little bite before dinner. The staff is friendly, and the place is clean and welcoming.

Despite all the yummy looking sweet treats, we opted to share a ground beef bourek – I'd never had one, but it looked good. And it was! The pastry was flakey and melt-in-your-mouth, and the ground beef filling was seasoned in an unfamiliar but absolutely delicious way.

Both Kirsten and I loved every bite, and we'll absolutely be back to try other bourek styles, as well as other Turkish treats both sweet and savoury.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMnA0H-6ts_Jt1IUMOATTTVtgpdhu7Pfj83LUre&fid=0x0:0x8c1733a32a2ef459"],"When":"2024-8-14"},{"Name":"Suyun Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUq9V6Vha9sUNbwnt9Nj3a0dWvXMRpHq5bw4GJRrWW0eKZMhis=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I got a recommendation from my acquaintance who is from Turkey! I had two different kinds of pastries they were all delicious but baklava was tooo sweet even tho I have a big sweet tooth lol","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPaJcgpkfjU_Yd4c1bc5A5tMspAdWw2_NzLUmA&fid=0x0:0x8c1733a32a2ef459"],"When":"2024-8-5"},{"Name":"Dorsa Liaghat","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJMx4Reju-nUzDf6jSgO5pCXGT2ShcYolg5O08tp_6SiJpHnw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Knowing how great Turkish hospitality is, this place is the opposite of it.
The simits were pre-made and very hard to chew on specially when needed to be cut with a knife for bite size.
The knives were very blunt and made the process of cutting even harder.
There is not much of customer service happening during the experience.
The store was clean, but you even have to clean your table at the end of the meal (please provide a tray if you want us to clean after ourselves).
I am lucky that I travel to Turkiye often enough to experience Turkish cuisine, but I hope for a better representation of this beautiful country in Vancouver.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPIdEMEevBLWExI7957GreBhHiitY-D8CeQzbq8&fid=0x0:0x8c1733a32a2ef459"],"When":"2024-5-5"},{"Name":"Nicolas Martinez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVxCKAreGx67VSJZEieVsVD3BEZWX5PIEfeqAwrDtBfWBdP92qotg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The Manti, Turkish version of pelmeni, was very tasty, with contrasting flavors from warm beef and cold yogurt sauce, and spices.
The baklava was very fresh and delicious too!

Disappointed with the cheese and spinach borek that was not crispy and actually soggy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP9m4XoS5oPA5zV_A7qT4euU2NLmNMLzt6oF37w&fid=0x0:0x8c1733a32a2ef459"],"When":"2024-8-11"},{"Name":"Irem","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLZ3ojI3ir_GqnFcraveSNRcRRKcKOxqw6LpEtY91j_qnVOqjWP=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Thank you so much for your warm hospitality and the delicious Turkish coffee! It was such a thoughtful gesture, and we truly enjoyed both the drink and the moment. Your kindness made our day, and we're grateful for the experience.

Inviting atmosphere made the experience even more enjoyable. We truly appreciated the attention to detail that made us feel so welcomed and comfortable.

Looking forward to visiting again!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Hesam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIsSWm-_6hhkE6bD94fUqhqJw4TlmFL3ou8wx1p9TCHnQ6oAo6r=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Extremely overpriced, unusually small portions, and food that is mediocre at best. I’ve eaten enough Turkish food in US to know when I’m being robbed","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOB5t2F5nuxoVWdFuhN91Plj2gVXIp0oGJ5QYTj&fid=0x0:0x8c1733a32a2ef459"],"When":"2024-9-10"},{"Name":"Moses Anderson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKhDIGiLaszkmiTA-AedbeiNVySj3wNWlVKawXR-Fh2zyZK4A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came in here on a whim because my girlfriend & I were in the area and love trying baked goods from around the world. The Turkish and Balkan treats here are amazing! Everything was fresh and smelled delicious with lots of options for savoury or sweet pastries. We're looking forward to coming back to try some brunch items (especially the vegan/vegetarian options!) and more baked goods 🤤","Images":null,"When":""}]
