user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Lissey F","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU_0h2gfDoKvqHrlczcNzuVcw6R82p4tFoqi1v6X-IZDmM6MIVL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A nice little bubble tea place tucked away at a far corner of the outlet. Steady flow of customers, but not overly overcrowded; plentg of indoor and outdoor seating for everyone.

Staff is friendly and helpful with recommendations. Price is reasonable for a outlet bubble tea shop, with most drinks selling for $5.99 to $6.99.

I got the lychee fruit tea with black tea. It's much lighter than I was expecting, and not sweet despite opting for regular sugar. Probably the equivalent of 50% sweetness for most other bubble tea places. Sadly the lychee flavour is too light that I barely tasted it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNHBkLUWUEFBLoMXfU30su9j4srHKsuIEPGL7yE&fid=0x0:0xaa8b1653cc99a15b"],"When":"2024-3-13"},{"Name":"Theresa Tsang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVXXyx0R-aYhpdkr3rO8RWtdAne-P2jLUdoemlenmpZtWZUBqF5=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"We had a honey green tea and bubble waffle here. The tea was great but the bubble waffle was kinda meh. The shell tasted a bit rough and it was a bit too sweet. I'll come back for the tea but skip the bubble waffle next time I shop at the outlet.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMDEwOLLp6rzPsYFCc8a2Og3NBMxL28pxvW7JWv&fid=0x0:0xaa8b1653cc99a15b"],"When":"2024-1-5"},{"Name":"Lauren G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLxuzD4dNBcnsFwfMfkGF5frTb1vGOSS2zVwisDrkV_gL4jEfjs=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Do NOT order the roasted milk tea unless you have tastebuds of steel. I took one sip and nearly choked bc it tasted like lukewarm motor oil (and I ordered full sugar). But- they were nice about fixing it plus we also got a taro bubble tea which was very good. Just stay away from the roasted milk tea if you know what’s good for ya","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPV-Lz5qD-QzNF_pawOu12zrzamVUYajefxIRep&fid=0x0:0xaa8b1653cc99a15b"],"When":"2024-5-28"},{"Name":"kawaii hatchiko","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWLtom4JJghW2UnkOsI7GKr-J96yxZfSX4SBdkTaAQaNBfKVBVT=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"First time trying bbt here, surprised by the reasonable price point. The employees were very professional and attentive. I did find a string of plastic in my drink. Maybe something got caught in the blender when they were making my taro frap. I was driving when took a sip and thought it was a hair at first.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNYZLgAT90di9uY8UAjLQrI2dzT1CRRqr56mqPi&fid=0x0:0xaa8b1653cc99a15b"],"When":"2024-4-7"},{"Name":"mochi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWFJ3YzQy4Ek7Uv6iuvuDDt8SDrpfRq8OqiVFgoo79K5l16GqzX4Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"[June 2023]

All round good new boba place. Fast & friendly.
Good pearls & good taste. Mango & watermelon slush are fresh fruit slushes. Bunch of random asian snacks are on the side as well.

[November 2023]

Today, we ordered the Blue Raspberry Lemonade with pearls and it tasted really bad. The pearls also had a bad, tough texture. However, service is still ok, so I'm leaving it a 3*. I probably won't be coming back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPEkVKb8gvyJGU-RIvoA23YlrvgHesEqIWD8u9x&fid=0x0:0xaa8b1653cc99a15b"],"When":"2023-6-16"},{"Name":"Ghazal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWUxPjakfUDfUlOphLX0NHrhY3j03bOfl1WB2qtK88VIEBoxSUc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"We were waiting for a very long time to get our order and the store wasn’t even that busy. I got the milk tea which I would rate 5/10. I had way better ones in other places.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOb3PmURpAa5j4zpBldaJSJscO099MqKy1MQ5SO&fid=0x0:0xaa8b1653cc99a15b"],"When":"2024-5-28"},{"Name":"Ben Moreno","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbXIQA5QNY2om_rvFeJhZDcAcErydWjpf8dpxFoZ8JJurbSZgE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nice store in the outlet mall, plenty of choices for drinks and bubble waffles, fast service,  nice outdoor seating,  very convenient for a drinks and snacks break while hunting for deals, well recommended.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPhtLakxU9Asm8keAnh3Cg0WUedQJiRkpZ8QStw&fid=0x0:0xaa8b1653cc99a15b"],"When":"2024-5-14"},{"Name":"HJ Marshall","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX_gcI3vW3uepTT3i_wt2Vk_IaBu140gLQwAD0ak9Ec_xFAMNhXbw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A nice recharging station from all the shopping at outlets. Their fruit juice is great, and they provide samples for you to try out first.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN4f_mUjfBiasGEX_-DZW0HxLDzDPB-egV2z7MA&fid=0x0:0xaa8b1653cc99a15b"],"When":"2023-10-15"}]

title: Lai Lai Tea Store (台灣茶）
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible parking lot","enabled":true}]},{"id":"payments","name":"Payments","options":[{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"Debit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":false}]}]
user_reviews: [{"Name":"Ilya Meerovich","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIMb0Yn-Fx1t0S2Qwa6f0VgKaIVigpWrYJVKpo4HmLJJcSjxg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I highly recommend this shop to anyone looking to stock up on high quality teas. The owners are fantastic, extremely knowledgeable people and were very generous with their time and energy. They made tea for us, talked to us about the various origins they sourced from, made casual recommendations, and shared their tea journey with us. Although they specialize in high mountain tea from Taiwan, they carry a range of phenomenal teas of different processes and origins. You won't regret getting tea from Lai Lai!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUEBFtu9RtLC_5Lp0UNkHEw6zxCwaNvnWzPqtgB6C34VTSCW71s=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"As a tea fanatic, as much as I’d like to gatekeep this little gem, I truly feel they deserve the 5 stars!\n\nThe quality of the tea, and their passion for conducting tea ceremonies, I would absolutely come here for all my tea refills!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Charles Liu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWe0oP7QLQzSh_KmkEjx6VsFPTio0e4zhgLebiGuPPWQ3gzIo8Z=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The best part of my experience at this shop is not the product my wife purchased (although the product quality is great!), but the educational course the shop owner gave to us about the Taiwanese green tea.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Robin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVgRJ5uh1IYhxKQwcF_9ravpC0OGUhQROQD5vMfPTkVp7-uhLh3yQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I bought green tea 🍵 from this place a week ago. Bought organic, and two other varieties of green tea. All of them are simply amazing. The quality is top class. The organic is the one with the strongest flavour. Highly recommended this tea store.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kay Ton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLv7RuNbq1M1zxBiXgtosaz92b_2WXJXwOUKiDtAhup_HQiIg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"had some tea and it was really good, very friendly staff!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kyle Franken","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJzBBKBGkBQYJkAu79TgkARo96QD5LYtuxdmOgCCRo8BkVa-A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great people. Hooked me up with allot of tea equipment and explained how tea culture worked. Enjoyed the tea they served. Spent a hour just chatting with them. If your looking for tea or tea equipment. These are the people to talk to.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Barnabas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUt0GRkD9CoDte9z1WrkzQURWEFGJ15STKYpGSP2cS57wienvvHsQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fantastic organic green tea. Very high quality, fresh and aromatic. The owner is also very friendly","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nic Jas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJQZ0xtsSsKZFV6o1hXTh9kxjrdnTUPhJJ0rdpazECofITUZA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"High Quality teas and the owners are very kind and passionate.","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Bona Market & Café
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Outdoor seating","enabled":true},{"name":"Onsite services","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true}]},{"id":"offerings","name":"Offerings","options":[{"name":"Coffee","enabled":true}]},{"id":"dining_options","name":"Dining options","options":[{"name":"Dessert","enabled":true},{"name":"Seating","enabled":true}]},{"id":"atmosphere","name":"Atmosphere","options":[{"name":"Casual","enabled":true}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Winnie So","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXyynzyslbrlBtQSD6Mo4wtiqwipQfd2u4afkq6TQ0HU4eh1lXVzA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nice market and cafe. I needed to find a place to sit down and warm up while waiting for my ride. Very good London fog and freshly made bubble waffle. Will definitely come back when I am in the area.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPWRDEHYEUqmIJNOmTkciCQitGJiGRCZuaq3feK&fid=0x0:0xbd17fbbcfa7500f8"],"When":"2024-11-12"},{"Name":"Tricia Pang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWyVqJcEWgHydzV9a14bwq4erYV5b3SuhyDmhe7hV1wLItoiVaJbw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I'm so excited that I discovered Bona! It's a cute little market with import products from Japan, from snacks to noodles, and sauces to skincare products. In addition, a corner is nicely furnished as a coffee shop with fresh made drinks from Paragon tea on Cambie St, and to go meals like sushi and onigiri. Friendly staff let me know they opened just 3 months ago, I'll definitely be back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOMT8RRpOuuFRkDWr6RjSWvyWHCj0dWetA04kaK&fid=0x0:0xbd17fbbcfa7500f8"],"When":"2024-8-9"},{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"It’s a neat market with a grocery store side and a coffee shop side. They have unique novelty Asian snacks and ready made foods including these tasty cute fruit shaped popsicles with real fruit bits in them. I tried the pineapple one and it was both cute and delicious. However, they lose a star for their ridiculous tipping culture. I literally walked into this grocery store and took a popsicle out of the freezer and went to pay and the cashier gave me a screen with minimum tipping options of 10% to 12% or something and I chose the no tip as there was literally no service but to even be asked this as a customer in a grocery store when inflation is insane and I literally did my own grocery shopping is an example of tipping culture going out of control. This, in my opinion, needs to stop.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO_dM9U3FbG5Od4G5qz56057iHb2MFvXdbX7K2U&fid=0x0:0xbd17fbbcfa7500f8"],"When":"2024-8-10"},{"Name":"Dana Sullivan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWQIw-0oOUNgoyniYugTscGkgpKJS8tpx4V0tAajn3ZGkNIfqEk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cool store with Japanese snacks, drinks, and personal care products, and a coffee shop. They make their own sorbet which you can buy in individual servings! The layout is organized and not cramped. There are some tables set up by the cafe area where you can enjoy your food and drinks. The staff was very friendly.
I got some snacks from the grocery section and then went to get a bubble waffle and drink from the cafe. I got their limited egg tart bubble waffle and the seasonal pumpkin cream iced chai latte. I was especially excited about the egg tart bubble waffle and it was so good, with bites of gooey egg custard in each bubble. Very unique! The pumpkin cream iced chai was also delicious. The cream layer wasn’t too heavy, almost like a thick foam top.
I saw that they carry sushi and sandwiches but they didn’t have any available when I was there, it was just a few bentos (pork or beef I think), roll cakes, and cheesecakes. It would be nice if the desserts came in single servings instead of only in pairs!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNJZtpwQBGY63ljGbx-ZPX45rgZVNMTkIe8bDs7&fid=0x0:0xbd17fbbcfa7500f8"],"When":"2024-10-1"},{"Name":"Shehnaz Jossan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKX6-dQdGtgjw3JhGV_Pi6Y5FwNoQsJO-Wu1rk_P7Pqzunozw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Their coffee tastes amazing and i love the bubble waffles.. i usually get my morning coffee from there as i work nearby and the staff is super friendly always greet me with a smile whenever i go there.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMQA4eRP8iRPT3RubKlwoMH43flmwFdYnZaWebN&fid=0x0:0xbd17fbbcfa7500f8"],"When":"2024-12-10"},{"Name":"Cat C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKZCNjT3XaeXiC6VnlKFy_lec5lMs-4ZK-XgYIM5Qq13e1F-g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've been excitedly waiting for this shop to open. So awesome to have a new coffeeshop in the area ! Lots of Asian snacks, desserts, and pantry items that are reasonably priced. Beautiful coffee bar and their latte was tasty. I hope there will be outdoor seating in the future! Welcome to the neighborhood:)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN4Yq0ExB-LgqLxE0e1SAD68zg6NEMm9H_d06nf&fid=0x0:0xbd17fbbcfa7500f8"],"When":"2024-4-16"},{"Name":"Alex Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWJJ7NXqeCxL6miBfuIGz1SIs5OMPzrMQN5pLVE-cUNFO3rnBLH=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A new but awesome cafe with a variety of drinks and Asian teas. They also serve some Paragon Tea Room drinks and bubble waffles.

The market also has a variety of Asian food products that can be hard to find!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Elaine Zheng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXqS2CVSxc15Rkht_jJFvygIM6-pTP-ekR_KWcLTwONCNcpwFgs=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Omg such a huge collection of goodies! Beverages snacks cooking supplies.. you name it! They even have bento boxes and sushi lunches. If you wanna grab a quick bite / snack or something for groceries this is THE PLACE!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNCf5pNAWSpKOdsQ806cnC5nTB3kz5KFkskc6lT&fid=0x0:0xbd17fbbcfa7500f8"],"When":"2024-8-20"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"kawaii hatchiko","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWLtom4JJghW2UnkOsI7GKr-J96yxZfSX4SBdkTaAQaNBfKVBVT=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Tiny bobba shop. Not much seating. Came for take out. My honeydew slush was yummy! The milk tea was dark in color but lacking in flavour.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNcwXvreKs7wG6N3uEdcMPvQdZOGawP0AuTvNq7&fid=0x0:0x31c16daa911d75a"],"When":"2024-10-15"},{"Name":"Lula","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXAeQ_Hs9cwuPyhi-73bw2Qbv72Usyy_Q6MsvDfswOfmjI1q7Wy=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I LOVE this place. I usually get fresh watermelon slush, in the winter it's not available but that's ok because they have plenty of other amazing drinks. Staff are friendly, prices are good. 100% recommend","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"leesa tran","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUWsWaHyhzcw7kKPh9V3HkvTK5TTa81TdmCDp9IylYllx4puXIy=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"One of the smallest bubble places I have ever visited. Very tight space and no room to really walk around inside. It would’ve been nice if they had a little space to take pictures of the drink since the cups are cute.

I ordered a peach slush and it was decent for a slush. Wasn’t a huge fan of the pearls.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOXwMVp00vHxw0j9NRg-z-LqWabs--nYjVloAp_&fid=0x0:0x31c16daa911d75a"],"When":"2023-12-21"},{"Name":"Pearobearo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWJytlYP3krNLbRwHHThbPHsotJR7HIGvSdTdRI-mBoQ7I0EO4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Even after covid situation improved, they didn’t bring back the seating area. It’s fine though but they blocked the place off in a way that’s not very welcoming. Pretty cramp in there now, you have to wait for the person in front of you to order and grab their drink before you can go in to order.

I only like 1 drink here, Oreo taro slush with Pearl (sometime Pearl is undercooked tho). And I like their pork wonton in chilli oil (the first time I thought they were too strong and taste kinda funny but I’ve been addicted ever since.) They taste very different than other spicy wonton and is actually spicy! Very addicting flavour!

Sis like fresh honey dew slush with milk but we learnt today that they no longer offer the fresh fruit option of this, just powder. Since cantaloupe is on recall, they recommended papaya slush and it was pretty good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOhsZ3U8OGmCIhcKWhexRbW6uykoSTBgfgXhEPm&fid=0x0:0x31c16daa911d75a"],"When":"2024-1-8"},{"Name":"Eve C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ3TRd28YHMD0xZgG9Qff6WuaVQUBD8KHHFSJUDtDhJtE0o6w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Cups are too thin!!!! When stabbing the straw, the side of the cup cracked open and milk tea exploded everywhere, and I mean everywhere. Our pants, shirt, shoes….I’ve never had this happen before. We lost more than half our milk tea, and it was too much of a hassle to go back to the cafe. We drove somewhere else to enjoy the tea, and had to go home immediately to change. We were also too afraid to stab open the other cup until we got home.

The milk tea was ok, price was cheaper than many other places. The cafe looks family owned and I wanted to give it a try and support local. Reminds me of the old bubble tea shops that used to be around Vancouver. When I walked it, I was surprised how incredibly tiny the space was. Also felt like they really didn’t care how the shop looked like to customers. The  space was covered up with mismatched plastic white boards and peeling tape, so we can’t see inside the store.

If you’re looking for cheap bubble tea, the price is great. But be careful of exploding cups 😟","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNbFZT43tfJ0iNo0i_1HOVaVLNb3oUwzuqLxWrD&fid=0x0:0x31c16daa911d75a"],"When":"2022-10-1"},{"Name":"Elena Malkova","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW602f3KiOlmq-3RVv1uCfJgeL2LrWPFJevDjC7s8eC3p665BY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"We’ve been going there for years. This place went downhill. No more seating area, just take out from the window. The place looks like a hoarder house behind the counter. An owner asked me not to take pictures inside. They have a camera pointing straight at you so every your move is well noted. I’ve never seen anything like this. Usually personnel are quite happy if you take pictures for further review.
Despite of the above, bubble tea is still ok.
Wonder if they clean their machines well.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO0adPOpryaREC0YoTKDykaClbGDLz8VQOn7T2_&fid=0x0:0x31c16daa911d75a"],"When":"2023-4-16"},{"Name":"Google Guide","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXNuhwlIn4-plqHLGD0QCOZgOCtCWh2WgE75DMJxjiWfmTWyXU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"They have an incredible amount of different drinks on their menu. Their prices are reasonable for a good drink.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPzfh63MiWgCc9QEC0uwiAWpel_aB9FASKyABD8&fid=0x0:0x31c16daa911d75a"],"When":"2024-4-2"},{"Name":"Shi Pas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjURjuQPhgJgCTjHIv1pd5c26u6-i36QWy_79xLM8rX3t7berL0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Reminds me of bubble world. Very yummy! And cute logo. I got the mango slush with mango stars and pearls. A customer; a French man we met there said he loved the food there and really recommended it, so I’ll be trying the food next!

This is just a hole in the wall; no inside seating.

The 3 stars is for the rude lady who works there. Not friendly at all. Very cold and rude. Please work on your customer service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPtgp6c2dJJlzDx-MICoe2VM-yR9jqf2W3mWJq9&fid=0x0:0x31c16daa911d75a"],"When":"2022-4-1"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Linda Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKbm_M2si7-dsNFtTgBoE8eRYCks0e8XBB8KkK-5UTqWxSb-GHz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We were looking for a unique experience and enjoy afternoon tea, and 饮茶 Secret Teahouse made our day. They charge a price per hour depending on which package you choose. We loved learning how to brew our own tea and all the home made desserts were delicious.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPUk1JTmGpismrmU0LRpdOiUJinkYmIMRaRryQr&fid=0x0:0xfe083051e82ed0bc"],"When":"2024-6-25"},{"Name":"Lori","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIm53ImkpPw8OPxMf1q_PC5P_lZsAyuK0vCta5T0Kos7d9pSVe-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The dessert, the tea, the presentation, the atmosphere 😭 everything was so good! It was only $68 pp, and we had a private room for 2.5 hours. All their desserts were carefully thought out with an appropriate tea pairing.

Their server was also very attentive, and if you need any additional service there is a bell you can ring as their private room is quiet and relaxing.

It was a bit tricky to find as it is in an office space, but they will text you with directions before your reservation, alternatively if you are commuting you can buzz their unit number at the front door to be let inside.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPV8xF8bupkU2NO93MbnWsautFdhFqV7Dh2vqel&fid=0x0:0xfe083051e82ed0bc"],"When":"2023-10-29"},{"Name":"SAM DC","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKqt6zne_OLRm_EHX9Mss54Yafr5P9qLv6FPY7uF9eD39sO3g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"my wife and i came here on a Thursday afternoon. we wanted to learn about proper tea etiquette and possibly enjoy each others company. we did get a good experience but it would have been much better if the host stayed for the first 15-20 minutes to help educate us on tea varieties and proper tea processes. the host was very kind and showed us the basics but nothing more. and then she left us. the room would be much nicer if they made it feel less like an office room. they could have put on bamboo wallpaper or painted it dark. the reception area is very impressive but unfortunately it doesn’t go all the way into the room. again…nice place but could use some improvements","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNgnlXeWS14uUC4XiXX8mz2Zn3yL1CNn0U7YaD9&fid=0x0:0xfe083051e82ed0bc"],"When":"2023-7-13"},{"Name":"私 游 乐","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVY6ioqRwFom47g_FwrX8IIeJdJBfGe0EluWv8vnka2XlT0bz_3=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing experience in Secret Teahouse! We spent hours here with friends. Filled with cultural and fine arts. Highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNOwoWGCKhabUpPlSZQvP48z6PpoVue9x31cWEs&fid=0x0:0xfe083051e82ed0bc"],"When":"2022-10-7"},{"Name":"Alvin Loong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJwpDmit_xk0xUxNZH5Vd0_hpCVPtVJcGYTyRk6fYmJ1yj2BA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Couldn't find this place after about 15 minutes.
There's a sign outside on the ground level, you drive to the 3rd floor of the parking garage, go up the stairs to 4, and need an elevator code to 5.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Dr. Shazni Thowseen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVpEfn8tcBpe5nEd6mww9vYyCNwSggls-Z6v70HvYkfGkhTWkl0=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great atmosphere and tea","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Axel Marini","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX4-B6TuGlYg4jsnb0r9hTV4Fdei0XrZK9Vzyt-ExHP8kWIP7SlTg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I'll definitely be back.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mia L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXHioAbT9uGpakKD22BXEpRWrnQkG1cp4DnXAgjFlFE5OGsE3o=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"摩登现代的写字楼中，隐藏的这一隅茶香，真的好惊喜。一进门的庭院设计，静谧恬淡的氛围感扑面而来，恍然一步踏出了尘世纷扰。古朴端庄的传统陈设，配上设计感十足的壶杯碗盏，既内敛又张扬，既写意又稳重。相较于英式下午茶，这样的中式风格与茶的气质更显相得益彰。很惊艳，很放松，值得一试。","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMFUyumw55tzwShEhO8BaobiIzoKhef4UVWakI&fid=0x0:0xfe083051e82ed0bc"],"When":"2022-10-12"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Ximena","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUayTatAEE6Z9z7xL_08iL8v1IvA-RW3jU6jIGt68yyYbPR6nqU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lovely coffee shop. Small but super spacious. Prices are fair and they have a lot of options. The atmosphere it’s super calm. Decoration is on point and the service is great. Their chocolate croissant is amazing!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO2qkPo2YBhH7kRO3LG6V3lENo4K_g9PTpyBGzl&fid=0x0:0x1290fe78e961559b"],"When":"2024-11-2"},{"Name":"Deborah Aiko Insook Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWkrXzRxO3A2OGqiLyPY_PlsYk2B44E-xgPkg6UAgy-1KwY7fkT=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I recently discovered this café by chance, and I was pleasantly surprised. The space is larger than I expected with plenty of comfortable tables. The staff were shy but very friendly, which added to the charm. The coffee was delicious, and parking was easy to find, which is always a plus. I also loved that I could pick up some Italian groceries while I was there. Overall, a great experience!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMYKLk_Qlf8T6GepzNAaT48sb9Rs8qQ1sFxVDch&fid=0x0:0x1290fe78e961559b"],"When":"2024-8-22"},{"Name":"Frank","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV32Dl3aDuecVTKkUVDILvrpBYb8ATjyfxIGWGxKJriKTeCzCiJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Stepped into this charming coffee shop today and instantly fell in love with the atmosphere. The space strikes a perfect balance between rustic and modern, with its standout wooden plank ceiling and warm, globe pendant lights casting a cozy glow throughout.

I ordered an Americano. The coffee was rich and well-balanced. My London Fog tea was equally satisfying.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNYRc_IkT_l5guJ-0vGiY96d1nL26pD0zEfR8f_&fid=0x0:0x1290fe78e961559b"],"When":"2024-11-4"},{"Name":"Jeremy Hannaford","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVJh4gJaa4fTCJIngBRIGMrmmqMdx4ZxIh5c_eHCdtOqz7VOAFhyQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lovely little coffee shop with a ton of additional items including pesto, ice tea and more.
Pretty reasonable prices as well.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOX97H4qX5Snu66LU3c8BsIlzdXpwObHCAVhztb&fid=0x0:0x1290fe78e961559b"],"When":"2024-8-27"},{"Name":"Chef Menajem Peretz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWFHHucZwQOsfB8-8SKRbUjhOVQd_5RL6RbAdEZcnLC3uuqNK4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a beautiful corner coffee shop with a totally neighborhood vibe. It is clean, modern, and inviting. Usually, I am not around this area, but what a great addition. Definitely a place for meeting, working, or just reading a book.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOnmhJ1N3pAUXy6PY5xo7bipBQ2l5x5TJhJXhs&fid=0x0:0x1290fe78e961559b"],"When":"2024-5-21"},{"Name":"Philip Raymond Lim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5EIBAgpBLsauhPMdjXym7mJ4fA8mtryDtWQIJCZfJxYXxupU8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I'm a coffee addict and I'd say the coffee bean is good. I got a mocha this time and the balanced flavour and texture is great. I'd be back to try on their pastries when I have more room for my appetite. Ambiance is not so crowded which is great. Love the simplicity and vintage atmosphere. I just based my rating in comparison to the other cafes around the town. But il definitely support this local establishment. Go local!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOZrkoK52PLY-GnOT4m1BkKgEJ4OrImHkbjfkGA&fid=0x0:0x1290fe78e961559b"],"When":"2024-4-28"},{"Name":"Jacqueline Gallant","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWG-tugujkbfadM66vrr0jPwuiRkmdZRunbCfUsNnGRHBdXsU2CkQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Such a cute little cafe tucked away in the community. It also doubles as a pantry store as well with a limited selection. The ambiance is cozy and calm, a great place to relax for a moment with a good book. I grabbed one of their breakfast sandwiches and coffee when I was last there and it was really tasty. Definitely will be coming back as often as possible.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMmthEYvsGhiNdpBJiWa1ef33ae-iqMvk4w313A&fid=0x0:0x1290fe78e961559b"],"When":"2024-2-15"},{"Name":"Cheshta Bhasin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWO9mCwmCAifgK6bkb9zTKnSUjaPLR3E7ThLyEd74l6hAiJJsMgTA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A lovely coffee shop with a big, calm space — perfect for working. The ambience is great. There aren’t many options on the menu, but whatever is offered is absolutely delicious. I had the breakfast sandwich and it was soooo good. Love this place!","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Snackshot Marpole
descriptions: Basic dessert cafe whipping up imaginative Hong Kong–style treats, along with sweet drinks.
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"In-store pickup","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true}]},{"id":"payments","name":"Payments","options":[{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"Debit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"NFC mobile payments","enabled":true}]},{"id":"parking","name":"Parking","options":[{"name":"Free street parking","enabled":true}]}]
user_reviews: [{"Name":"Erica Ngan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXxiFAMX-8U6Hf7I7ySV2AT1mYgYdeBidCPp2cDYnZKccTLsR17eg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"It's a fun place to go if you want late night and food you can take photos of. First saw this mahjong dessert at night market but found this shop here close to Richmond. They have a few fun things to try and I'll definitely return. The price was a bit high though but late night the parking is easy to find.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMHGdmL-IKBhdncXem8nYqHn1UhIPxClmergyGB\u0026fid=0x0:0x305154946bf17c18"],"When":"2024-9-2"},{"Name":"Calvin Kuah","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJqbTsBWnCBursGa27KALU0xx_nKsfLzVcv66Os3FNgNZjIgQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a really cool place to have some dessert. I got the cold coconut sago with ice cream and mochi and it was amazing. The perfect post dinner dessert on a summer night. We ordered through a web page and it was easy to use. Our dessert came quickly as well. The shop was perfect for hanging out with friends and family as well as hanging some alone time and enjoying a nice dessert. Highly recommended for Asian dessert.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOZHopPV0nonPooC2c-omnbiKWxg-UTvCIeEESv\u0026fid=0x0:0x305154946bf17c18"],"When":"2024-8-10"},{"Name":"JCVN","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXSLVtszyROwrIXO23Ocf7-_nm0i3o8Ra8Lq_5zV146VQ8GAlwgoA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"For casual-hip Hong Kong style desserts I'd highly recommend visiting a Snackshot in Vancouver. They have a couple of locations and this one is conveniently located on Granville close to the Richmond/Van border. It's casual and family friendly but at the same time a fun date destination after dinner for all age groups. Checkout their refreshing drinks. Our group loved the signature mah jong red bean coconut jelly dessert and even tried bites of the HKD and USD cash made of rice paper. Owner came out to say hey and introduce himself, he's from HK and puts his heart into the menu and atmosphere here. He's having a tonne of fun running the place you can tell. By the end of the night the place was packed!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMKU9ubRAikeOn7s1o-aYcq7pDamV4tmmhXAbL2\u0026fid=0x0:0x305154946bf17c18"],"When":"2024-7-12"},{"Name":"charles bai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVivIWOvTOamsgiucoqI5EKukhiOsZqTk7nog1iV-Y1Xav6PIczow=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Don’t think you can go wrong with any of their Asian desserts - just depends on what you’re in the mood for. The items we got had great flavor.\n\nJust stay away from the savory items… I ordered the popcorn chicken expecting Taiwanese style fried chicken - fragrant from the white pepper and basil and perfectly crunchy, chewy and juicy. Instead, I got a big Costco frozen food disappointment :(","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNAsZ9DU5rg-WSHAgWM7oFIuvdGvr-JMOWzyKUf\u0026fid=0x0:0x305154946bf17c18"],"When":"2024-4-15"},{"Name":"Auroraz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVS-aCDJklElvz2PfUhMx2uJHhCa1H4sW7TaJqX4aV6_Xjb3kaU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Snackshot in Marpole, BC, is a culinary gem that should not be missed! Their innovative take on Asian snacks is a delightful experience for the taste buds. The unique flavors and creative presentations add an exciting twist to traditional favorites.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMr34hBojxJK8dnN80cUf_cDde4oJZ5qH4Q95VR\u0026fid=0x0:0x305154946bf17c18"],"When":"2023-8-21"},{"Name":"Jenny Liu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWMGE3dR7QUUqRQ0H3D-H0cCDxLqPkeDZ7z-mFJ8SO_PBwrcc46=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The tasting platter is SO good! My friend and I liked every single dessert in the platter. We ordered the hot one and loved it. The Majong dessert (they make a limited number each day) is hilarious and so fun to take photos of. Highly recommend this place! The ambiance is nothing special but the desserts are great.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP8QJSKHZjxrwNuTnNydjhQlqQWSxQoTYmQkwKH\u0026fid=0x0:0x305154946bf17c18"],"When":"2020-1-2"},{"Name":"Kathleen Fan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJix5mk4ZA1VeIzL-nKAr68rE3O1HbNmKZEl4HB2vLCK2NNZw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"HK style desert place, famous of their platter include 9 kind of desert combination, good for more 4-6 people to try. Warm service, waiters very patient explaining the dishes, they also has created a web page for the platter so you can easily check out for the flavors. Generally good experience, will come to try other deserts next time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMTm0FEac8g0LYvgbdUoFE0o-ndGe2hj6oM4UmH\u0026fid=0x0:0x305154946bf17c18"],"When":"2021-12-2"},{"Name":"Jen Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVaL0RdeXtgs5sep6RZAPEECCWEbBdPSjyPl2-XazNd0JVBT_pLjg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The barrel tofu is lovely. Very well presented and cute. A bit on the pricy side and you'll want a friend to share. Other items seem to be good as well. The buttery sweet milk toast was great - not too sweet. Decor is cute as well. During popular times be ready for a wait.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNfviHYYW3UwvIxWvw9T1GC1EqTY7X2K8PJU-68\u0026fid=0x0:0x305154946bf17c18"],"When":"2017-10-8"}]

Well, yes it smells nice, but that's not what we are looking for. She finally sold us some teas that we asked for that, once we got home and tasted it, we definitely paid way too much for. The quality for the price was definitely not there. What a shame. They didn't seem to understand English very well, which isn't the end of the world, you can still figure things out.  However we really didn't feel welcome in the store. Very disappointing visit! We will continue our tea search and  hopefully can find a friendly, helpful vendor locally instead of having to order online.","Images":null,"When":""}]

I’d say it’s alright. Not my fav","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOHSweeaxP006BCmu_9x1LCbVx2ES-B4IcEKWhp&fid=0x0:0xbd3038a477f50c66"],"When":"2024-8-17"},{"Name":"Ly Vu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV9Rfi9YJyNXoeUcOB0q836NlpdhCZYOXnMsyIK7wwlRTMlQ2vr0A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I am absolutely delighted with my experience at CHUN FUN HOW Richmond! The tea quality is exceptional, with perfectly balanced fruity flavors that are both refreshing and satisfying. The boba is just right—chewy and full of flavor. I also love the beautiful cups they serve the drinks in. Although the shop is on the smaller side and more suited for takeaway, it’s perfect for grabbing a delicious drink on the go. Highly recommend!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"ayuu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWASytRjnB071FlOavyCkT31BSNx6IrSO_EFMs-U_nsclyPxCi8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"i don't care this place is just my favourite bubble tea shop ever. it's small, open until 12 am, has a respectable selection and complemented with the sweetest staff. i've never EVER had to wait very long for my drink, even when it was busy with a lower amount of employees. not once have i had my drink be wrong, even if i ordered with other people. the cup designs are the cutest thing,, and i do indeed value that! i got two free cups from their summer '24 event and they are cute plus work well. i typically do not have any issue with occupancy; come here both day and night. personally, i do enjoy their oolong tea VERY much. i always get it LOL, i would recommend. very much enjoy the smaller size of the store and the music is a nice touch to the place. staff are incredibly kind and always thank you for coming. it's located in a very spectacular spot as well, as i enjoy going into some other shops around the area before heading back home.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Luke Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU-nw_Hipvgt6UpenAw0abcDlQMvwpFIko8ke_8Sy_24ohAlwTK=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I am glad they opened up a location in Richmond. I love their teas. The tea flavor is always super strong and not diluted. The pearls are chewy/bouncy. Cup designs are so cute!

Love that they also have their own delivery.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipONcf5i_qaO3wvTGneKneVpS1YRAq3MXFmUdpWo&fid=0x0:0xbd3038a477f50c66"],"When":"2023-10-11"},{"Name":"Andy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLhlSS7jPz5zCaOBcdduZUQiQLkdoBrNXd3voRg2PZcAC_6HQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The teas here are really good, especially if you're looking for strong tea flavour! Their Pearl Oolong Milk Tea is my personal favourite.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPlyChgyMxNNRKxuSrssAgRJWceIunVm8PbxkpV&fid=0x0:0xbd3038a477f50c66"],"When":"2023-9-11"},{"Name":"Kelvin Fong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWYlOJ0ZWKycRqx5ZOzHhnjusnD1vSd-Gno_8IQ4mNi6hmtCYtiSA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The fragrance of the teas and fruit when you walk in the door leaves you salivating for each of their drinks.  However my wife was upset that the person working gave everyone the same cup when we had 6 orders.  (We got home and realized they got my order wrong😢 and one of my kids threw up after drinking)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOYiqcesq0_x-hnmfPvqYgHFV6Pg4aZ-zAozLts&fid=0x0:0xbd3038a477f50c66"],"When":"2023-1-15"},{"Name":"Shibe Life","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUC4Mb1DHizRVJ60Sg_sm7ibJx8EQiAVjPSsfgIJdoHWmHYbUQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I like the cups but basically that’s it.

The pearls were not that fresh. Taste imported and not handmade.not worth the extra $1

Teas taste like sugar. Tea is also brewed wrong so it is bitter. How can a drink be bitter and too sweet??? Just try this place lol","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"K L H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLQFZJuD0_NE10o4xSC-XtXQSVqtA5ZrAaHnqFaD10csHc_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the very few high quality bubble tea shops in the lower mainland that don’t doesn’t skimp on quality or portions. Rare nowadays.

Love how they don’t dilute, shove a crapload of ice when you ask for 30%, gets sweetness levels right every time, or add any crazy amounts of cheap coffee mate to the drinks. Pearls are cooked perfectly, other toppings are always fresh, and the customer service is top notch! They hand you your bubble tea directly while in store too! :) Keep up the good work!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Paulina K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKHESGuv2e44yh_7pNCkjXfHsSmzMLHqmPnws63OHRE0hDZGw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Small cafe - extremely quiet. Good selection of tea, coffee & chocolate drinks however nothing extra ordinary. Their mugs seem to be not very well washed. The cafe wasn’t busy at all yet even when there was no one waiting in line, the lady at the cafe bar didn’t take all the mass pile of dirty cups at the front so it was quite distracting to sit beside a mass amount of dirty plates & cups. Seems like a small family run business, but I do believe they can do better.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPSJwUPQJpKyXxDxamXE1PWHKX18TCVqaMScAT0&fid=0x0:0x99d5cb2d2a7625d3"],"When":"2024-11-24"},{"Name":"Samantha McColm","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVKzi-7JNrC_rSzJcOL0zetHy_k8l4rQueMj9Z8lBPXZ0Sd2r7-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing food, really enjoyed the breakfast sausage wrap. Honestly. I will dream about that wrap. They had super fresh tasty croissants and the Vanilla lavender latter was also great!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOVxtqRroB32tNK6zjlezCXpn0lUuCegOh_i6VR&fid=0x0:0x99d5cb2d2a7625d3"],"When":"2024-11-11"},{"Name":"Rishu Sachdeva","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXvTBeEbRg-SIO8iQBstzbrCDRm1m4lUsJNaOM5lAiT0XQnNdX4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cute and sweet vibe! Loved the drinks! The rose milk tea was so good! I wanted something on not so sweet side and the barista made me the perfect recommendation.....My brother has a sweet tooth and the recommended brown sugar milk tea was a perfect drink!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNqnu1yLKXY8PD9aKaPZamA6qAdae5ZQLcdl8h7&fid=0x0:0x99d5cb2d2a7625d3"],"When":"2024-5-9"},{"Name":"Liana Huang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUBd7Ss8Y7y3H5JQstWWjO4TKz3hKo9b4W72dyZfc4FSDaNq6e4-A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Small, quiet, and quaint little neighborhood cafe.  Great for picking up a quick breakfast. Enjoyed their apple peach vanilla waffle and their lemongrass chicken wrap was also good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMKmjdXLOMSUWHVdQ7lVu5EsXOb1mnIEz3lK7Rc&fid=0x0:0x99d5cb2d2a7625d3"],"When":"2023-6-13"},{"Name":"Janet","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUYX0KD6zVBb-KVfav12OTiQHpKAX44ciWjj7UwWI7eJLtEUjp_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The matcha waffles were amazing! The kids  and peach waffles were a bit too sweet for my taste. Everything was made fresh and nicely presented. The kids area was a nice bonus.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipODVqAbTf4xFZoVZYxhhAx4S4JfO6k9V8dx4Ut4&fid=0x0:0x99d5cb2d2a7625d3"],"When":"2024-1-22"},{"Name":"Joyce Szeto","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUu5pYboexWdn2AESh0M-GcEvSyoq5MoQrmjhy2r0gsnwHcEiK4XA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My go-to for some quality me-time! The food is fresh and made to order, and the drink selection  is good for those who crave caffeine and even kid-friendly options. I find the cup size to be generous for the price, something you normally wouldn't expect to see at a local café. There's a kids' place area, and my kids loved playing there after having some yummy waffles and strawberry mint milk. It's not super busy to dine-in as there's an incentive for take-out orders. I prefer dine-in so I can enjoy my drink while i read/write 😀 Fyi - they close Tuesdays!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP_U-Gy5X-x30Ejb4Ie6BAyHPNIsEknEjcYhM1k&fid=0x0:0x99d5cb2d2a7625d3"],"When":"2022-12-16"},{"Name":"Julian Tu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUccbSC4ghmImblBXURerAc5in7hUNzwjywsW9q13-eiHpFJ49c=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"First time Customer alert ⚠️ 📢

- Tried this cute small store for their waffles and drink after work.
- Had their waffle deal where you pick 2 waffles. We picked the Chocolate and Matcha Waffles 🧇
- Drink: Fairy Rose Milk Tea Cold and Vanilla Lavendar Lattee Cold
- The store was quite open concept and had decent music on.

Pros:
- Won't be a bad place to study, but it has limited seats overall. Probably roughly 10 tables 📖
- Waffle was really yummy, I personally liked the Matcha since it was nice and fluffy, and if you look at my photo, you can see the waffle texture. 🧇
- My partner liked the chocolate waffle, which had bits of chocolate pieces.
- Both waffles weren't sweet, which really made it worth it for us.👌👍
- The Fairy Rose Milk Tea, I liked it as I could taste the rose flavoring, but my partner didn't like much as it was more milky. If you like milky with rose flavoring, then give it a try ~

Improvements/comments:

- I think investing in menu per table would be better as people can sit and order. The reason for this is that guest can order whole sitting and can add onto their overall order.
Instead of paying right at the door with the TV menu.
My partner and I would have been more inclined to order another batch of waffles if we hadn't paid beforehand.
- There was only 1 person during this time, and maybe it would be hard to do this, but the likely of someone ordering more is easier than paying everything first, in my opinion.
- The chairs are okay. If you are wearing shorts, just pick another chair as it can cause lines on your back legs.

Overall, I won't mind going back again and would recommend trying the place out 😊

-J approved.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOK7RCicdjKvXr8PbNDTnjGvhu_HPvG-cR0yOHw&fid=0x0:0x99d5cb2d2a7625d3"],"When":"2023-6-12"},{"Name":"Yuen Tso","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLGxQe3CGkaLkRsj4mn2zb12RFye96G7s1qoZk2obkll8HdPJM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"It’s a shame they charge a cup fee on uber eats and door dash when it should have ended on may 1st 2023 hasn’t been fixed still . Strange the manager doesn’t read the comments here

Other than that Quiet and cute shop  . I tried their matcha waffle it’s quite dry. Maybe it taste better in store but they have a bogo on
Uber eats/door dash","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNS4Z9B2W8FBoy9V-8XGAo561Yax6CTDfy64ccY&fid=0x0:0x99d5cb2d2a7625d3"],"When":"2023-3-17"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Just Me Traveling","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX18amg9WNM9rF8Fs9axj8FE9tNtrVpXPgaMIl0yMbfuZ56ahzt=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Nice place to hangout and chill. The place was small but very cozy and clean. The staff were very nice and the service was quick.
They have a lot of selections for sundae, hot and cold tea, waffles and MORE.
I got the Oh Affogato Sundae for 8.50CAD and it was good. It wasn’t too sweet and the espresso wasn’t too strong, just perfect.
I love that I was able to stay longer and enjoy the place. They don’t rush you to leave which made it a great place to relax. Will definitely go back again in","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPAeGmy_zeCaduq3x-xgu9sPHkXSGXJVzx0mcpT&fid=0x0:0x8017c274d99daff7"],"When":"2024-9-29"},{"Name":"Maureen Zheng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJveuMK98eNTFiH47Fc3q63NS_Ymf2pm_8GByP3XP5IYJAxNQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Checked out Boketto for the first time last night. Tried their seasonal Sundae for the Mid-Autumn festival and then a jasmine/blueberry twist cone. Both were great and I especially liked the tea soft serve (strong flavour and not too sweet). The staff member working last night (9/21/2024) around 9:30pm was awesome! Super friendly and upbeat despite it being close to the end of their shift. The interior space is very nice and I could easily spend time in there catching up with a friend or reading a book. I'll definitely be back for more!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOFftQemY55f5S3C3sHOiRt5s4uvM8zxV6rwwN6&fid=0x0:0x8017c274d99daff7"],"When":"2024-9-22"},{"Name":"Eric Tan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV2IdnKl8fKDZ-IMWgaR52oHZ3J0NwXgwu79s88mK_YjvsZV68s=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Soft serve is super creamy and not too sweet. Ube had a strong coconut flavour. Dubai sundae was amazing, the topping is not very sweet and pairs well with the malt chocolate soft serve. (Picture had double scoop topping)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNegqNWlC9vVMkOzC0uVzCHfSSeOt0bviNtNaaX&fid=0x0:0x8017c274d99daff7"],"When":"2024-10-20"},{"Name":"Killer Ice Cream","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKEkNhf42d1v32h9n__BfEh6IECerWHyTl1tVwhFIDdjgUJnw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Been wanting to try this place since the summer and finally made it over! Super yummy bubble tea menu and an assortment of fresh baked goodies - the matcha cookie was so soft, fresh and chewy! I was craving a savoury snack so I had the dill cream cheese on a waffle with smoked salmon and capers - totally divine, highly recommend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPwvtSCgT2cq7FxsS613OefM4ZdNM8M31wH6_Ya&fid=0x0:0x8017c274d99daff7"],"When":"2024-12-19"},{"Name":"Jamie Coo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWMtT8SYH3ODglSdZyhsIz5N_cesns6jNpwE2VJCXq0WPBgF9EA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Ordered a Pineapple Tart Sundae - with Jasmine Tea soft serve, pineapple jam, cookie crumble, with a cookie. The tea flavour from the soft serve was pretty strong and nice, but there was not enough topping in my opinion. The cookie also didn't really have any flavour. And like many other reviews have mentioned, the sundae is hollow in the center.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOokA3Mi0IbZOTQX1bKaLacjNVZVXFc-8Na9rdL&fid=0x0:0x8017c274d99daff7"],"When":"2024-9-30"},{"Name":"Alan Zheng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL-QmMYfw75kgf5vonVt_7RAAdUJRl5hAF6Ijht6iC6ZE8aPQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Took a stroll through the river district tonight with the doggo. We drove down here specifically to try this place out. The jasmine ice cream was what gravitated us here.

Both the mid autumn sundae & jasmine twist cones were yummy. But the main highlight of the visit was the service. The girl working tonight was top notch. If she had not mentioned to me that she wasn’t the owner, I would have thought she was. She was well articulative of the menu offerings and was super friendly and smiley the entire time.

The shop was also well maintained and clean. The decor was quite nice as well.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNn5NAhtFCihXSyjRD7kexQ63Ke9Ve54CgzkJ_Q&fid=0x0:0x8017c274d99daff7"],"When":"2024-9-22"},{"Name":"Diamond Huynh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKYYVOCh_VDJbYGP5NKDNEOpUCTIK_xydhJ_9MQ64Qh_PDRXg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Ordered the malt chocolate sundae. Personally for me the dalgona honey comb was not for me. Tasted very burnt and bitter.

Giving food a 2/5 cause I don’t really appreciate the fact that the centre is hallow. $10 for this? Feels steep for such a small size already and it’s hallow in the centre? I do like that they’re open late, great for late night cravings! Their bubble tea is alright. Often tastes watered down. Overly hyped shop.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMqieWw4G9lH5dXd_t-vADzyyGUs8BmJo8-5bD4&fid=0x0:0x8017c274d99daff7"],"When":"2024-9-25"},{"Name":"Dahlia Thomas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJuQgMiJgQQUWXUpX_vLBTDbbMkB1XyhSnpGj8rW2JxPqajVg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Such a cute place. I got the smoked salmon liege waffle and the seasonal fall special matcha pistachio latte. The waffle was great, texture and consistency not too chewy or crispy. It paired well with the smoked salmon, dollops of cream cheese and the capers. The latte was also good with bits of pistachio in it which is nice for a textural component.

I have also tried their mochi mini waffles. They were yummy and toasted. And their butterfly pea lemonade was delicious! The staff are also so friendly when I visit and the interior is cute and cozy. Kinda small with not a lot of seating but has a nice atmosphere. I will come back to try many more things especially the soft serve.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipND2avwRnm2Jx9cZdXuOvDc4m9ryju0AdQMvaSo&fid=0x0:0x8017c274d99daff7"],"When":"2024-10-28"}]

about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true}]},{"id":"offerings","name":"Offerings","options":[{"name":"Coffee","enabled":true}]},{"id":"dining_options","name":"Dining options","options":[{"name":"Lunch","enabled":true}]},{"id":"amenities","name":"Amenities","options":[{"name":"Washroom","enabled":true}]},{"id":"atmosphere","name":"Atmosphere","options":[{"name":"Casual","enabled":true}]},{"id":"payments","name":"Payments","options":[{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"Debit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"NFC mobile payments","enabled":true},{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":false}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"K. I.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ2C5k2R8svkFqEEMM1XUHfVCOof034_SUPAz3hH0hIAUPnGw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"This is a review of the concession stand at Killarney Community Centre (Sixty2Sixty Eats)
Good curly fries.  Prices are fair.
Why are there two windows to line up at?  Why do some people get turned away from the side window and others don't? Confusing for customers.
Also, there is non-stop line from some of the high school students.  They just waltz right up to the front and join their friend group.  Spent 35 minutes in the line because of this. Would be nice if there were some rope barriers to contain the line up during busy times along with a sign to remind students not to cut.  Please make an effort to promote fairness and prevent line cutting.  I hope you will consider my suggestions.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Clara L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIUXQ5XquAOtj8ou1in0SN62RwmbjK3yeHB4yr-o9kjrKIXNg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Service is a bit slow. Was told an order of fries would be ready in 4-5 minutes (there was no line up and only two customers were waiting for their order) and ended up waiting for 12 minutes. Give it a three stars mainly because the portion is decent.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Brendan H.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJjNNDgJWsh2GfZQsuvKMLGV46pGw9dj-9zI7QtA-s_I0VkYEM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Brittany","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJs_km6RslliP6cTTiQcv7eI3BYv9_LkkJf-8xS0POhDRp70O4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Black milk tea with little pieces real taro was good, I’ve never had the flavour combo before and I would get it again. But not many pearls/bobas in it. And for me personally, I get bubble tea because of the pearls, and  unfortunately this did not fully satisfy my craving for,","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOKXyu5iquPj3dXWcTynnwbPxmgLjHTOqPgYxlU\u0026fid=0x0:0x892f6a43609c8618"],"When":"2024-10-4"},{"Name":"Cameron Reid","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWvS-f-O0MRuLC2BOzMXh4HEsp_g5tfJImUPaBHRf9jM766L6620A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"They put 4 bubble teas in a small paper bag.\nWho thought that’d be fine? Use a mesh bag or multiple bags. I know this is partly because of that stupid law against plastic bags but seriously I can’t even reorder because they are closed now. The tea is legitimately good, but I cannot adequately express my frustration at watching $30 of bubble tea spilled on the floor because the packaging.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPcRZ-9YIhMZJIkwSHb54mDHE_cNCxA6X8WJUqk\u0026fid=0x0:0x892f6a43609c8618"],"When":"2024-6-20"},{"Name":"Tn23","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVsGxbchcoLrkxVTBgH4SJUR2sfT2zAPoH5rGfegdO_5zjnqEz-eQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great service, friendly staff. Area is abit small however their drinks are super flavorful. Pearls are cooked to perfection. The price is pretty standard. Soft opening at the time I went but I would definitely go back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMNEab_wS2S475UyNp7Vy5c96D8hSTHAp2thtrj\u0026fid=0x0:0x892f6a43609c8618"],"When":"2020-2-23"},{"Name":"lisa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJa8ZY-xKSm63Sb_s1rnSrdBl0C33DO2cuyR_KTiTzOdnpHtQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Ordered a brown sugar Malik smoothie with pearl and grass jelly, the price in their system was different from the menu. Be aware of over charging !!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNosJ9KfZQRZB6j26cKQqYHNgMw7zpcrPa1QuGj\u0026fid=0x0:0x892f6a43609c8618"],"When":"2024-5-15"},{"Name":"Kanako Sakurada","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKYybgPjG_d3LYq66Ui47Ocd_2PMrfkKaju5V_L0IyVTR19lQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I really liked Thai milk tea slush with glass jelly I had. It had good tea flavour and good match with the jelly. Pineapple slush we also had was pretty good with lots of real fruits chunks, too.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPn-h4Q7scCv4wZnRXzJfOywyPnybbtmrBn5UA5\u0026fid=0x0:0x892f6a43609c8618"],"When":"2023-8-9"},{"Name":"Leon Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWPOnBvlGz2k_WzxOhCiURR3aRaAE5ffHXfUBJJ4GP7GBC5Wn8K=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A pretty small boba shop, with some pretty decorations. The pricing is average, and the parking is easy to come by. Their drinks are fantastic too, as their Thai tea latte is quite unique, a great twist on a classic Thai milk tea! I highly recommend it :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPUCK2MAPR3uvhkPT78hu2pyx8nU6B_O4GGoLf5\u0026fid=0x0:0x892f6a43609c8618"],"When":"2023-5-28"},{"Name":"Dan Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU_loHxFw9Mihbf9uqvgAbdxSKHHaZehD7KKAyYY-DNqnYXW4zw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Tried this last night, nice little bubble tea shop. Was recommended by a friend and was not disappointed. They made my order very fast and price seems reasonable. I tried the Thai Brown Sugar Pearl Milk Tea and it was great. The pearls are better than most other places. I look forward to trying other drinks here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMfjlneBHvz5d69Fgj0HT-cIHVclgAHoZYUOo62\u0026fid=0x0:0x892f6a43609c8618"],"When":"2021-1-15"},{"Name":"Vivian","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK5oIohR4fUBBrbBee_LLq3WUW8Q6ENGMJVFgSz8SVr8PH9Ag=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Haven't been able to visit their store physically, but using food delivery service I was able to finally try their drink. I ordered the Thai Brown Sugar Pearl Milk Tea and it was so bomb!!! The pearls tasted so delicious and chewy, I haven't have good quality of bbt for a while now. I picked 30% sugar level and it was absolutely perfect!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPhzCJZ3i_MGhh1D37zsZ0ZNo3Pa5MQdtesXNJI\u0026fid=0x0:0x892f6a43609c8618"],"When":"2020-5-27"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Ethan Choi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXsAPnfaOpBS9z7ay3QxyTtik8b98Y81qL6-S9jCM3HuOTIYFMN=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I don't recommend going to this location if you're trying to get your free Birthday drink offered by Starbucks. The barista who helped me said, 'You need to go to other locations; we're not the type of Starbucks that gives out free birthday drinks.' I guess it's because this location is inside Safeway and might be different from other regular Starbucks. Anyway, I ended up paying for my venti-sized soy milk caramel macchiato, even though it was supposed to be my birthday drink!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Daniel Danny","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUXGD6eLWLL3laKYzUjzLSWT8WqtLrT5Ki6zW9U9EfvyFm4AWNS_g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The young asian girl was very rude and giving attitude because I didn't tell her that I want grande size Frappuccino in Venti Cup for extra wipping cream. She said why I didn't do that in customization.  There is no option to do that in the order online up. I did it my name in Venti Cup... also i did custom Extra Wipped Cream.  She even put mad the wrong top lid on the Frappuccino cup... very unprofessional.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Uros Nikolic","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXqZKUGj61BfmTYu8vecdYC7cNoaJsQnfWJB3zipm50mUOPG3Y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Always a good stop for quick breakfast 👍🏼","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPmHUbNnF_0HeoORMQSThhBO85lzxZ86nK65ami&fid=0x0:0xb21dc4f22b1efcab"],"When":"2024-9-21"},{"Name":"Peter Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKNqGO8fopNAKtL8lHC_rT4bKC23EHpN4bbWpLxqSfGP5AKRg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The lady that works there on most weekdays morning/afternoon is horrible.  She shouldn't even be serving customers.  More than a few times she is just chatting with customers or her coworkers.  I don't mind if it doesn't decrease the speed when making the drinks, but it does.  Once I ordered a tall dark, after taking the order, she will spend about 30 to 40 seconds talking to her coworker and then start making the drink.  Once she was done making another customer's drink, she was still chatting with that customer.  I had to interrupt the conversation so she will serve me.  I see her making drinks, she will stop for a bit and chat, then start making the drink and then chat again.  Starbucks is paying her to make drinks and to serve customers.  Not to socialize.  Customer have to wait longer because she likes to chat is not acceptable.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Rukaya Ashour","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVOas2EeL55G-QFMTPEW4kLWN76T1PhiBdNdnTyjv0F15kKnxq7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Nice little kiosk inside Safeway, although has nice collection of Starbucks products, had the Matcha green tea 🍵 so good 😊","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM9acqBKfPAiORwgT3DzqEaoBdSZdDKTipThNsz&fid=0x0:0xb21dc4f22b1efcab"],"When":"2018-3-11"},{"Name":"jeff o","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIZbwNpC7842-sRvm15Ix6PDBobA0j5GkTHD0DPD4W71Fs-_w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"(monday march 18,2024). finished grocery shopping and wanted a coffee. time was exactly 7:50pm. walked over to the in-store starbucks to find two little, lazy punk kids behind the counter laughing & joking around. asked for a coffee and one gleefully said, 'sorry, we're closed.' [they close at 8pm.]. all wanted was a grande pike.
they werent interested in serving customers, they just wanted to get back to fooling around & waiting down the clock so they could rush home to play video games.these two kids were just that, immature kids with no work ethics. they really shouldnt be working in customer service at all.
not a good look, starbucks.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kevin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI6M4j6vZXo0XE6DvsqZ_2WsKCb898Lzn4T5CeZQ5vai7FM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I ordered drink from this place few days ago.

I asked the ice latte with light ice.

After I paid and while waiting for my drink, the lady Barista with a pony tail rudely said they will be charging me for light ice next time.

I heard starbucks in US is charging for no ice, light ice or no water for Refreshers Only as of May 9th.

I don't mind paying for light ice, but rudely telling me while waiting for drink is not really what I needed.

I will now only go to the one in Boundary& Kingsway now. This branch drinks are blend anyways. They cheap out of ingredients cause it's privately owned.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Gary Grennan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXSt3dwYn3Pp55KxTNuZpuHHemnwJ7mVpio_a4cOBQWgKAcKk2QVQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I brought in Starbucks beans from a different location. The location I bought them from had a broken grinder. This location, the manager refused to grind my Starbucks beans. She was extremely rude about it. I will not return. I am curious what their company policy is on this ...","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Doyle See","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV1Ig0KBzYtY42lFQcsMsxmDxiMe5OP0tEiA-g5TtaSKxu5K-iq=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We went in and didn't realize they were already closed as there were still a few people inside. Had they told us they were closed, we would have been fine but they gladly took our order and let us sit for a few minutes. That was a really nice gesture. And of course, the bubble tea was great! 5 stars!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lucas Liao","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXgDKwU5hBxbZ70dy_O6mHndn8smW39rhfdSkoa6fmSuIqfNaV-fw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very nice cozy environment, plenty of space and big tables, drinks were tasty and consistent. Very friendly staff, I hang out there a lot. 100% recommended for any BBT lover","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Stella Zhang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI66Qb1KXRck02CBOM4lpmICOo4nlXPTcLUMYv9Xzqw7yhQDg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Been there a few times since I work near Metrotown.

It’s recommended that you guys install a kiosk.

Relocating from 🇺🇸to🇨🇦, I usually feel tired in waiting to talk to a cashier. Also sometimes I had to rush myself in order to response to cashier, and didn’t have much time to think about the topping I want.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Gurpal Singh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUxGxCUco0HhaolWURGC9coVIw-kqGRg0PxFDMMiSmLDLjpySl86Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Jaynar is wonderful host, I went there at 10 pm which is closing time of store they clean all there containers and cups but still they go extra mile and take my order I really appreciate that when host like jaynar goes extra mile to value there customer. Great drink. My favorites are Okinawa pearl milk tea and mango green milk tea.
Loved it clean and amazing ambiance.
Sanitizer available. Over all great place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOOhu5hHJ8eEzARABagZqHAk-5Ho4qQg6b1XgHX&fid=0x0:0x708a27859e004801"],"When":"2021-3-2"},{"Name":"Robin Logan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLmErXwD9gH3DKGGGeoo_JEqme19csLmfwk5YL1f7TcGvWRMQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Really nice atmosphere with wooden tables. Friendly staff that is happy to customize drinks. Pretty good drinks, had a mango slush with vanilla ice cream and it get a thumbs up. We mainly come becauae of the nice seating here. We will be back for sure.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMx82k_ttN5HP94hbPuwnLig4JwRUOneEM5Np89&fid=0x0:0x708a27859e004801"],"When":"2019-2-18"},{"Name":"Francess Grace","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUevT2cLHewCAgAvgHJfy10N32wUoqX1ZxxHhAN4EUZp7pACuTW2A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I ordered the Okinawa Pearl Milk Tea with less sugar and it tasted like brown sugar still, unfortunately. My sister had the Taro with fresh milk but it didn't taste like taro at all either. The place is nice and pink though but it's just not my cup of tea.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM46C0yIE9H6vVSXSVaCv36e6j8zsHNE-2inKtB&fid=0x0:0x708a27859e004801"],"When":"2018-11-14"},{"Name":"Tn23","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVsGxbchcoLrkxVTBgH4SJUR2sfT2zAPoH5rGfegdO_5zjnqEz-eQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Another bubble tea joint. However this one has some very unique options and flavors. This location has great seating for  hanging out or just somewhere to browse and hang out for awhile. Nice atmosphere and very well decorated.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP7ZBaVG87TbqgF_57UFSwdI3gq3vSmxqWrfwpH&fid=0x0:0x708a27859e004801"],"When":"2018-12-25"},{"Name":"Colin Yeung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUmj6MhtlSuchjt0rwIhDLL-gfFLCSzn9JjmAgaVo0OShSgXKYS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Customer service needs A LOT of improvement!

Pros:
- Bubbletea is good and seem to be consistent with other Sharetea.

Cons:
- The workers are REALLY slow, I literally watched the new guy move his hands slow-mo, it felt like I was watching a TV show and it was a dramatic scene. I guess he's new, and lost I guess... so I pretended to look at my phone as I wait for 10 minutes for my drink... although I was the only one who ordered at the time.
- I had a free drink to redeem, but it was only for regular size, I was okay to pay the upcharge of $3 but they said cash only because they don't allow card payments at that cost cause it was too low, since I didn't have cash, they didn't allow me to get the upsize. They should have a sign that says that if that is the case.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPS1sI7brYM_6pz5FiPa6EIVw-F4-YbISrMg2Ua&fid=0x0:0x708a27859e004801"],"When":"2022-11-29"}]
