user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jaspreet Kaur","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUvQcDwkR-_0IsoUxmUeXvEiwMjsJv2A2Ew2nCwRUbkeL8wmwDM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The guy who took my order ruined this experience for me. I went to the counter and he didn’t even bother to look at me and smile, let alone say hello! I understand that he was packing another order, all he had to do was acknowledge that there’s a customer and say something like I’ll be with you shortly. Even when he was taking my order he didn’t greet with a smile. ZERO customer service skills.
The two girls seemed pretty decent, I didn’t interact with them much but they were talking in a pleasant way with other customers.
Management - kindly spend some time with your employees and teach them basic customer service🙏🏼

*** i am re rating the service cz I had a significantly better experience today. It was a different person who took my order. He was smiling, greeting customers and acknowledging their presence.
I dont know if my review was discussed and it is a result of that or that guy already has great customer service skills. Regardless, i am happy! Changing from 1 ⭐️ to 4","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sarah","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJH_ivneVTiK8RtOVK60kWUKdV83EK_BfdjujbNuUd62rAFbg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"It's a Starbucks, it is what it is. I will say the staff are generally friendly (especially compared to some other locations) and the indoor and outdoor seating areas are nice. But like just about every Starbucks on the face of the Earth, the service is so slow and inefficient. It especially creams my corn that they will make five or six mobile orders for people who aren't even there before serving the customer who is standing right in front of them.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Victor","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL_COzgv3lG-GLP7ixT_-xg4jpgwJyRBIl2n5ujL7sdIEL2YA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I recently visited this Starbucks location and observed some concerning behavior from one of the baristas. He is a male with brown skin (I couldn’t see his name tag). I noticed that he was not wearing an apron, which I understand is part of the standard uniform, and he frequently walked behind the bar to make his own drinks.

Additionally, I observed some unhygienic practices. He was often touching his hair and face without washing his hands afterward, and I saw him wiping dirt off his shirt while working. These actions raise concerns about cleanliness and hygiene, which are especially important in a food and beverage setting.

I hope this feedback can help address these issues and maintain the high standards that customers expect from Starbucks.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Johnny C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWMH8aFZIGB5a7CFStbNQ6JGT0sYgxOttD7xMtIebcz8N9tnSzq=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Typical Starbucks. Nothing spectacular.  Good customer service and friendly staff.  Lacks street parking.  It’s always full on the street and underground parking is OK but not as convenient.  Few outdoor seating available.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOTqXfY5HqLNfJqbVY37woh-HrXPkGsIDmWpHdK&fid=0x0:0x4eada9a34f661485"],"When":"2023-5-29"},{"Name":"Eamonn Marc O'Loughlin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLp0Jy4uusUGsa0ExIPnSy7ZZXPbKVU1ZwHheDXOZjN8__9YQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wonderful service by the crew there on Saturday, Nov. 30th. In particular, Caleb's prompt approach, and yet eminently friendly demeanour was most appreciated.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Amandeep Grewal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKV6z7Zxehaaz8eSyLuHONqyD3X3JEVG719Z85MSdMjdLdRsw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My experience at the Starbucks location in Riverdistrict was just amazing. Russell, Joel, Sarah, and Rekha provided exceptional service that was tailored to my needs. In fact, Russell even remembered my name from a past experience. This level of quality, customer experiences outstanding and made me feel at home in Starbucks.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ryan M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLpNmsNbgNRq9wDTSpidU7DD9uMwQFHDbYVAwIilEH-DC5Hcg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This location no matter what I order will make me wait 10 mins … blended drink 10 minutes, simple pike drip coffee 10 mins like this is the 5th time in a row it’s happened. I give up now and request an immediate refund after 5 mins","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tim Ubial","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXJ27PC8TFc3I1kLQkE9CP6f4zSsgf2QBFILTmkyq0zsLoJUpqUGg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"There's finally a coffee shop in the River District. It's beautifully decorated and feels really homey. It's going to take no time before the students come in to take every seat. There's also a nice outdoor area to hang out in as well.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipONWUgaVgaIMrYvvZKY6etPucuaX5rl38zZhOw4&fid=0x0:0x4eada9a34f661485"],"When":"2018-4-29"}]

[{"Name":"Sophia Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ4bY2iD0JxS0fCwa5g_rQEq6fllVHKQIWHE7NKHtu4g2YEgw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Ordered a grande mocha and this is what I got in a grande cup. Absolute ripoff. I thought there was a lawsuit about Starbucks not giving full cups.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPfoRXWrBFySQUwYoy61blnWjH7ZV2PRMto4-41&fid=0x0:0xbc66e39bf3893123"],"When":"2024-11-3"},{"Name":"Ryan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWCDMUY42ah4aAgta84ssT2DYa3PFsR3r4fbxhBdcs3AXShIgTOYw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Lots of seating and friendly staff at this Starbucks. Just wished they cleaned the tables down more regularly.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPMXzmgcGjbcgnQaZV39c7odlEd5HhJ_2THL1C9&fid=0x0:0xbc66e39bf3893123"],"When":"2024-12-14"},{"Name":"Jessica Chang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJnkJL6qwG4CfI9k1yI1usAMseiBpRJybper7snolYLAR1mx2c=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Tldr: 5 stars for weekend and 2 stars on weekdays. They made the drink wrong twice, 2nd being worse and gave me a weird reason for not filling a venti size cup.

I've been to this location multiple times with no issues and a beautifully blended drink in my own cup that stays blended for a while. Went to redeem birthday reward, asked for a Iced Brown Sugar Oat Shaken Espresso (menu item) with it blended (customization) using my usual cup.

Today, they forgot to blend, which I should have kept as they had to redo due to sanitation (my fault). The second drink came out and it was barely 3/4 full  and was separating. The employee told me that it's not a venti size because it's an expresso drink so it's only a little bit (but the shaken version is venti size)

I tried my drink on the road and they had forgotten the brown sugar. It was a blended iced espresso which is much too bitter for me. Disappointed to start my day like this as I get excited for the Starbucks birthday gift . I suggest only going on the weekends to this location as I've never had any issues.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMMPYLf5-n47b9gKhfbpXg1MGMN9_1biw8JK9kS&fid=0x0:0xbc66e39bf3893123"],"When":"2024-8-2"},{"Name":"Jenny Ho","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI_wIJv4r7AZVXzMLJEQ2OveUCE-ULO7wmr5tu48NWen984HDc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Have you ever encountered such a situation?I've always liked their lemon loaf,In the past, they all unpacked and put them in paper bags, but today I got them in plastic bags. I accidentally noticed that the production date turned out to be August 28, 2023. The thrill in my heart makes me feel that I have been eating, and I feel terrible. I will never eat again.It's terrible. . . .","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM6N-65WGKq0431jAm_6HmV3RCaGKGuL7paWmtg&fid=0x0:0xbc66e39bf3893123"],"When":"2024-1-30"},{"Name":"Andi Macoto Cuff","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI8nwCXpU938tDrJtBLAA7vQ7BPjAfIQpJZsxcawUuJ2UkUa_s=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I like this Starbucks because they have a lot of tables to seat and they have outlet plugs to charge my cellphone while I take a coffee.
I just hat3 that nowadays must of restaurants don't install outlet plugs, but this one does 👌","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jisoo Yun","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU1f3COi9TFk26HFxlV79lsBhA-PwgCjeIGIOyOsQo7K9IFUwEu=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Today, I experienced the worst service ever. The cashier was ok but the woman who made my coffee gave me the coffee without lid. looked mad at something. She added tap water in my coffee and the taste sucks!!! I even paid my tips!  will never visit again. good-bye!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ryan Craigie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLm0HxwsJm9GTtxdlvTSctfPXKEdPn6FPlBqiCM4B4ZwjHr4w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Slowest Starbucks ever. They make great coffees, but they take forever to do anything here. Even when it isn’t busy in the slightest. My average wait time for a normal day has been 12-18 minutes, kinda ridiculous.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Anson Li","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWSBinSkzSkffuxnpXPvxiCI4mXS3gDEDMhlZgRH6F3dyWRLOAD=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"A smaller sized Starbucks. Outdoor seating available dependent on weather. Can be a busy location.","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Bubble Waffle Cafe
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true}]},{"id":"offerings","name":"Offerings","options":[{"name":"Coffee","enabled":true}]},{"id":"atmosphere","name":"Atmosphere","options":[{"name":"Casual","enabled":true}]},{"id":"children","name":"Children","options":[{"name":"Good for kids","enabled":true}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Mel L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWrFGuGuZoTeJwGMDhPMiN1vtTGHuPijis3Yx0fde2EK4DqXXI_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Really hate to write a bad review because I usually don’t have any trouble with bubble waffle. However this location’s staff was not professional at all. I ordered online ahead of time , and I arrived 25 minutes after to find that the staff was playing on her phone and didn’t see the order at all. I waited another 15 minutes as she said she would make it now. After I got home and tasted my food, the drink only had one lemon end and was not reduced sugar as I asked for; the bubble waffle was so burnt on both sides that I couldn’t eat it. The chicken rice was okay. First time being served burnt food. Really disappointed.

*Edit: Exaggeration or not, pictures tells the truth, nothing to argue here or be mean about it. It’s not just a bit burnt. Looking at other photos posted here, I don’t think the machine makes it like that everytime. Either way, I am Just writing about my experience here and didn’t ask for anything. Instead of blaming the customers, maybe check on your machine so it won’t happen again for the next customer? Everyone is welcome to write and read about our responses. I also saw the way your reply to negative comments are pretty rude, I don’t see other successful business owners replies like that. Hope it will improve. All the best.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOehSEgkStqjvQQzG1rMzECYBIxdNZHEu9VnGqx&fid=0x0:0x8ba67402ceb7839"],"When":"2024-10-28"},{"Name":"Victor Law","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIpnZPh7heLHnvp3JcjErTq9VzUaFB6LA67FBNyLyGHNyq0kA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We ordered a few original bubble waffles. Like others have said, these bubble waffles tasted different than other franchise stores.

We found the bubble waffles to be drier and crispier. As we had bought some earlier in the year, it's not a one-time issue.

The biggest plus is being in the neighborhood and adjacent to other food stalls.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPLSdPcG720Sk9UohpBLfnvBQzPnJ6730lQ8LiF&fid=0x0:0x8ba67402ceb7839"],"When":"2024-10-18"},{"Name":"Simone McCallum","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVfpObbwKkMi9jyp4WsVqfyU4-rU_bkQIRAppIH5rrYoks1mf8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I usually come here for lunch and order the rice rolls w curry fish balls and Hong Kong milk tea with pearls. It's very reliable very yummy. I adore the worker with short hair and glasses, they are always super kind and upbeat and I am always so happy to see them.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNmiLpGMcLbkdZV24FkqGKNReVtNkpKmbLcbfdX&fid=0x0:0x8ba67402ceb7839"],"When":"2024-10-23"},{"Name":"Stephanie Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVk25TRGmGndRG8kLf9PrjxIAjGZMpeENUkk1uxyUx4iDT-UrGr=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We decided to support the new local shop, despite with all the bad reviews we have read.  We order chicken nuggets and bubble waffle.  The 2 staple items we usually order from other bubble waffle cafes.  Bubble waffle is good.  But the chicken nuggets… why are they gray in color but not golden color?  If I didn’t know that they are chicken, I thought they were deep fried oysters.  They are greasy and not crispy at all, just soggy.  We love bubble waffle cafe’s nuggets but these ones are disappointing, maybe they need a bit longer of frying time?

We are happy to see a bubble waffle place in the neighbourhood.  Understand that it’s still new and hopefully the food quality will improve.  We would love to support a local business!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOZTW3a58Gpy5HsZgQbco3CIhGAPqee4pZAM9ZH&fid=0x0:0x8ba67402ceb7839"],"When":"2024-4-13"},{"Name":"Penny Rusty Sophie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUkGfXMIDqwS_yD1axTk6tkHoLsnybE2ErvKrHMoMIElMJWekI_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Newish Bubble Waffle that opened up in Champlain Square.

Got the Hk style mixed rice roll combo with fish sui mai and curry fish ball, a mango slush, and a bubble waffle.

When "bubble waffle" is in your name, you should hope that your bubble waffle is good. Ours turned out too hard in most places. Not sure if they didn't use enough batter or just over cooked it.

The rice roll combo is not much to write home about but it was large serving (I would have preferred a smaller serving size at a lower price point). It was drenched in sauce (which isn't necessary a bad thing). Feels like the kind of food students would crave late at night when nothing else is available.

Might be still working out the kinks. Gotta come back and try some of their drinks.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMkkOpHU366LzZDXq9wCsqimNe8YnajdyQEuO3p&fid=0x0:0x8ba67402ceb7839"],"When":"2024-5-19"},{"Name":"Elizabeth Chang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXKKwbEncUrxuBhtUhOWmElmZannKHvb6K5CwxKeRcU_0khd9a20A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I wanted to order online but it was closed. When I asked the girl working here about it, she was super helpful and immediately contacted someone to get it working. I got the Hong Kong style rice roll combo. The food is fine for the price, but I love how much food I can get for under $20 (rice roll, fish ball, drink, bubble waffle). They had drink samples at the front, although I'm not sure how sanitary they are after sitting there for so long. My bubble waffle was a little softer than I would have liked, but honestly, for the price, I'm not going to complain. My milk tea had a very generous serving of toppings! Anyways. I'll definitely consider coming back here, customer service here was amazing.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Brezalyn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV43PkTmiSqT7SRjwklewaMmij4fCuWrJKrOsIQZ4vCQEoBNDN-=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love this place so much. It warms my heart to know I can get great food at a fair price! I would really recommend the salty chicken nuggets and classic bubble waffle. The salty chicken nuggets are so warm and fresh when you first get them, super crispy and tasty. The bubble waffle is absolutely tasty, So warm, fluffy, and crispy. Nice batter.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Emily Z","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVeqN8zORDBp-pzx_li7y7noypw3AIWBBN0w0qT5XxDbBAKHR0k=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Me and my friend were studying for midterms and decided to get a quick snack. The bubble waffle I ordered was freshly made and very delicious. The sides were crunchy and the inside was soft. Would definitely come back again and try more of their flavours! 🫰🫰🫰","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Lisa Young","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ3kuNbfyVzx2kaziHeqZtW_4V2cEw9sZLlzY1yKZmeSMD-fQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was my first time at EveryTe and it is such a welcoming and warm space. I can't wait to come back to try other drinks and snacks!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPlBgV5AbnQkK2CmnMsHq3eRA1uc2AxjvU0kQli\u0026fid=0x0:0xa885ff68bae0ecb8"],"When":"2024-12-24"},{"Name":"Jessica Chou","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVgprUp-WHwHAAGAEvkM3CxzYw3LdpO7tawAKKOxH9Ufro-hOK_=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"EveryTe on Fraser Street is a gem! I did a takeout order last time, but the atmosphere is so nice that I’ll definitely stay and enjoy my drink on my next visit. Highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNBLSg2AY-1TRGdW3ufOXgk23Pj65bYXzZZx4Da\u0026fid=0x0:0xa885ff68bae0ecb8"],"When":"2024-12-20"},{"Name":"Jessy Lok","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVg_83BwzgxHl-IY5llY0k9wxF0sMEfktXbUZYaKWgpYs0SpFqu=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"EveryTe Tea Room has become my go-to spot for milk tea. The staff is always friendly, and the cozy atmosphere makes it a great place to relax. Highly recommend stopping by!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMxmEsyzhP8Wd6SgW3eFvheg3wSg1xH7u2C6X23\u0026fid=0x0:0xa885ff68bae0ecb8"],"When":"2024-12-19"},{"Name":"Jaelyn Tsao","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV_URq-kMcE8oKfD7WxJjuwyExu-1JS8_Rgnlrg8AH7noi7VpQtGQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Just visited this new bubble tea shop on Fraser, and it’s fantastic! I tried the Taro Bubble Milk Tea, and it was absolutely delicious—rich, creamy, and full of flavor. They also have a great selection of small cakes and Asian-style tea egg, which make perfect snacks alongside the tea. The atmosphere is cozy, and the staff is super friendly. It’s definitely a must-visit spot for anyone who loves bubble tea and tasty treats!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMcvE1FE9g74f0LDYCkBb6yH_Jq71tD_4lGb5Qv\u0026fid=0x0:0xa885ff68bae0ecb8"],"When":"2024-11-9"},{"Name":"Tiffany Liang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUnqh6Q_y7p8aahng-gu9_qGRmBbfw6fN3V6d7GMM_GmrENLEQ9WQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently visited Every Te and was absolutely impressed! The drinks are not only refreshing but also crafted with so much care and attention to detail. The flavors are perfectly balanced, and the ingredients taste so fresh. The cozy atmosphere and friendly staff make it a great spot to relax and enjoy a treat. Highly recommend trying their express mango coco \u0026 fresh taro milk ! I’ll definitely be coming back for more.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN0e8PymECqOQawZEwLMQ4x6G5a8Xh0YTzzgMBd\u0026fid=0x0:0xa885ff68bae0ecb8"],"When":"2024-11-9"},{"Name":"Jayson J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWh5xePACHGFMrujGyu-HBmelU_P6fuccz4VSAVxS0935C9YQ3k=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Formally a Yi Fang. I tried their Shin Signature fruit tea. Nice flavour and not too overly sweet.\n\nWill return again to try out more of their drinks.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOflxEUdAFMT_OZ3AaoSiM5CazsEEnvrsCBt859\u0026fid=0x0:0xa885ff68bae0ecb8"],"When":"2024-11-10"},{"Name":"milad tahmasebi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUZUid0rIRPY9X4zLkvFP3a4YqvfaEUmUm5wH2xthKLB6mKqw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"On a rainy day, we have the chance to get a good mood from this cafe. The atmosphere is so kind and the new design is fantastic. I recommend trying Espresso Mango Late.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN51zFSA8skC81gG57ptB3fV4AXTsohBW8LVbY\u0026fid=0x0:0xa885ff68bae0ecb8"],"When":"2024-11-9"},{"Name":"Jiangge Li","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXH_J8gInjM1BE3tApr0AqyFaL_GqNw7L-d48QE-tlpKoSNwSdoqw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had the espresso mango coco, the mango surprisingly went so well with espresso, very refreshing and created a perfect balance, my honey castella cake was also a good match with the coffee. I love the relaxing and cozy space at this little community shop","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPEBU87YJgen3un9O-oXCj_qsHrpaPWBaSM76ML\u0026fid=0x0:0xa885ff68bae0ecb8"],"When":"2024-11-9"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Naveen Sivasankar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVD85c8-gPz6lah-8hC6Wc52PIW1l9gF6x2wQmy27iEI7TaAflN=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I've come here a few times and the location is quite nice! I've tried the hot chocolate and chai latte, and sampled some of their food. Everything was to my liking, but I particularly liked their cheesecakes! Trees has a good selection of options that are rich and decadent, without being too filling.

The interior is cosy, but the location is a bit awkward as it's on a busy intersection. There's also a bunch of scaffolding and construction, which gets in the way and negatively impacts the atmosphere. I hope that the construction goes away soon!

The location sometimes organizes live music nights and is open fairly light, so this makes it a great spot to go in the evening for cosy vibes and some nice food and drinks!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMHiwkKdajhod_QjBlQaRSTmUh7ooNqPKt0co5i&fid=0x0:0xade40bf17242f533"],"When":"2024-9-1"},{"Name":"Carmen P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXcfKvXSxZeHBWBuX5PpP0NGaPcfxZzxyziS3Ku-42UROgHt7Cs=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I really enjoyed the space and vibe here… spacious and bright and I will be back. The mocha had a great balance of chocolate and coffee (which is not found everywhere )…","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNZFF4zYdfVDH6d9rN8LMRaztqu-rlq-nsyGssT&fid=0x0:0xade40bf17242f533"],"When":"2024-8-29"},{"Name":"Jennifer Oleana","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLsC3xNMeS2uAIOVR6p2k0qb02_BEA47KmLJAOnw1B6I5-X2w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The drinks here are incredible, and the croissants are my favorite!  You must try the sunrise lemonade! 🍋 🌅

The place is lovely, and you can have a nice time with your friends. Don't forget to try the chocolate cheesecake, amazing! 🍫","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNkEC24Fdi8R6qn5paafpnIDmKLUskKWExEhhja&fid=0x0:0xade40bf17242f533"],"When":"2024-8-30"},{"Name":"Suki Pan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX6efNZzthJ5-YWPAGBPg_1vp6l2cVEF5fYwRxel83qBKTUq4pK=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"🍰what I ordered:
- oreo cheesecake
- strawberry cheesecake
- oat latte
- cappuccino

💗highlights:
Trees sits at the heart of the local dessert scene for me and will always feel so nostalgic. The cheesecake is made fresh in-house everyday, plus I love the variety of flavours and multiple locations. The coffee is always delicious and ground by their own roasters weekly ☕️ Don't even get me started on how talented their baristas are!

💻study space: 5/5
They have lots of seating options, the space is clean, bright, and there’s wifi.

This location in Mount Pleasant is very easily accessible by transit which is a big plus.

🌟tip: DATE NIGHT
Possibly Vancouver’s most underrated date night activity. If you’re looking for an inexpensive little date idea, don’t sleep on their live music nights for a fun, cozy, and casual (but still very interesting and cool) date night. The curated performances by local artists are always really good and you just can’t beat live music for the price of some cheesecake and coffee 🤍 you have to check out their Instagram page for the show times and locations.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO4zpvoD0mlz_gnEOpKvzu8Vundn7BFDUB7HFXl&fid=0x0:0xade40bf17242f533"],"When":"2024-7-23"},{"Name":"K C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIZBOs15_pfrbMS0N74eRTzP_tu5B0G_uHOiJzmh-9Mhzy6xQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I would give 100 stars if I could. Best cheese cake and coffee in town. It is a large and comfortable cafe with very nice staff. My friends and I enjoyed our time and ended up staying whole day in here!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNU5jX4X51ZweO5quWo94JMGXCi3mHGL4KSWQ-n&fid=0x0:0xade40bf17242f533"],"When":"2024-9-26"},{"Name":"Dana Sullivan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWQIw-0oOUNgoyniYugTscGkgpKJS8tpx4V0tAajn3ZGkNIfqEk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This new Trees just opened in Mount Pleasant in the space that was previously Our Town Cafe. They opened very suddenly, I walk by the building every day and noticed the logo had gone up on the windows, and just a few days later they were open… I guess the brand is popular enough that they can just trust people to show up! I am happy to see a Trees pop up in my neighbourhood since I really like their other cafes.
I stopped in to check them out early Wednesday morning and enjoyed a cranberry pecan muffin and matcha latte. The matcha was fine - the actual powder used is probably about average quality, but the latte was made very well. The muffin was fantastic, though, very fresh and soft with a little bit of buttery flavour. The Trees food and drinks have never failed me before so everything is as expected here.
This new location is very inviting with the interesting levelled layout (there is a ramp for accessibility). Everything was very clean (it is just-opened, of course). The two baristas were friendly. Nice to have a place open early and late.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP0XAIsfW5y12hc8-C8JdOJXlHs9ZAgvdAace_w&fid=0x0:0xade40bf17242f533"],"When":"2024-1-19"},{"Name":"Addie D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWaxRHFW1V4jqFnBa43uy2gpt8QdtRnR4Z86s0_V29MhTsUXHk=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I will always LOVE Trees Mt Pleasant! The food is always a 5/5 - not only their drinks, but also their quick meals. My all-rounder favourite is their Matcha Latte. The best part, however, is the staff! They are consistently welcoming and very friendly - chatting with them always gets my day off to a good start. The atmosphere is also great - perfect for work, studying, or meeting friends. Never too busy nor empty. Would recommend everyone to visit this branch over others!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"S A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWJOMOiZKMkVhzEB7ZORr37dwap2afh8DAG6IHDyoctwDav8XVN=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This new coffee place is amazing! The staff over here are quite friendly and so welcoming 💜

Their cheesecakes are so delicious . As today is their first day, they offered a free coffee and sample cheesecakes! Also, all their cheesecakes are of 30% off!

I had coffee , guess it’s dark roast coloumbia. And the soup , their bread is also so soft and the chocoholic cheese cake is sooo good!

They have the live music and it’s a great place to spend an evening!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPnBZmASgFJLzsGR19MqgX_ZfcXP7GVH4pFab7p&fid=0x0:0xade40bf17242f533"],"When":"2024-1-26"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Michelle Siaril","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVvNHVR_L-5eCK2usU0kQoT055SV9vB2qDNPyrA7CmG9QXO2IM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Whisk Matcha Cafe is a vegan friendly bakery that serves amazing drinks and treats. One of the only three places I would recommend for matcha in Vancouver, with bonus of having interesting seasonal menu and collaborations (loved their menu during the chocolate festival).

There is very limited seatings available so either take away or come during slow times (they have one hour time limit). I also saw that they have a corner selling a lot of matcha accessories.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOTcHQP4YOtlSNo6Hddqe5yMish2SolTwzQcgI&fid=0x0:0x7c695dfac860f6ba"],"When":"2024-8-12"},{"Name":"Regina Gentile","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIvbaxG6uArU-PM1ZGsBsjSohnDAFHUHmQJ_GJd3YgBGG5EQQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This café is amazing: everything is vegan and I couldn't be more happy!! Me and my friend have eat two different kind of toast and some desserts and all of them were delicious! As drinks we took 2 matcha latte...so good!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOjyOzw8ThfrLpIYB7xhXpgvsUZz4xmQsryNvwQ&fid=0x0:0x7c695dfac860f6ba"],"When":"2024-12-8"},{"Name":"Kenneth Lai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVaxVGYXfpPoTmAfNhLJtbs31BGbuX8DK_7Hj5GOcCBNwv8VjrvXA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Whisk Matcha Cafe is a vegan gem! Their outstanding vegan cake is a delight, moist and flavorful. The supreme simple vegan sandwich hits all the right notes, fresh and satisfying. Service is incredibly friendly, making every visit a pleasure. Don't miss their iced strawberry matcha latte—it's excellent, refreshing, and perfectly balanced. The vegan bun is very good, and the earl grey cookies are a delightful treat. Whisk Matcha Cafe is a must-visit for delicious vegan treats and warm, welcoming vibes.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOqE_CKT7tnnOyX3Z8ctB_ZG8BKD0RSpK9biHYr&fid=0x0:0x7c695dfac860f6ba"],"When":"2024-5-27"},{"Name":"Yvonne","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW6uhM8wFwM_wSUtG3iTSxN5x5ZFjdJjo7lUJf0AXHt1UnyPKLEvQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I come here to buy matcha and hojicha drinks all the time but only discovered that they had a stamp card for drinks today. So don't forget to ask for one.

Finally got a hold of the matcha and hojicha vegan ice cream in mini pints. Matcha is very rich and has some astringent aftertaste which I've never had before in ice cream.
At first the hojicha was kinda gross and tasted like bananas. But I know hojicha doesn't taste like this. I then saw they had a banana cream flavor and realized it must have been mixed in. I told the staff and they were quick to replace it. The new one tasted much better. Very creamy and rich and no gross banana taste. We actually like the holjicha more because it didn't have that bitterness.

Would definitely recommend the tea ice creams and the hojicha gold oat latte.
The sparkling yuzu matcha is great if you don't want any vegan milk. Just a fizzy refreshing matcha drink.

They also sell hojicha powder which is great to make at home.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipML444en0Yw3R_4t0PyY8ITCTvmCBbVrJ3K4gUU&fid=0x0:0x7c695dfac860f6ba"],"When":"2024-9-28"},{"Name":"Marina de Pina-Jenkins","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW6dJjg5sj27Mct4Ic2Ukiirk_L1Ouzz7FBipeMrQPmsMvJ_Ays=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Whisk Matcha and Level V bakery have been a favourite of mine for 4 years. Even though I live in Burnaby, I still make a trip to come here at least once a month. The matcha and hochija lattes are so smooth and full of flavour. The staff have great recommendations if you’re new to matcha. My husband always gets the Vietnamese coffee (vegan of course). I would say it’s the croissants that keep me coming back but I can’t help but get a matcha every time I come as well.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOCtmqt3sIcMsDzMwg_z3_iXKz8Ab772JCokBjQ&fid=0x0:0x7c695dfac860f6ba"],"When":"2024-11-10"},{"Name":"Danny Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX8eoyUE6az-FmQo7i2mVq5z64Ow48sgKu1EmLZc0zWWN6DMy5asw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"We came here to try the matcha and strawberry ice cream. Unfortunately, I have to say this is hard no for the four of us.

We felt like it tasted like some kind of playdoh. Neither the matcha nor the strawberry flavours came through.

It seems like they’ve got other things they might be known for but the ice cream was NOT a good buy.

Also, parking was a bit tricky and we had to circle around several times. There is a paid parking lot in the back (as it is adjacent the VPL).","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPL0sdaGqlED3gjgGDL3-dyKWqNtVW7xbC7nvuK&fid=0x0:0x7c695dfac860f6ba"],"When":"2024-7-18"},{"Name":"fazolli ˇvˇ","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWawi-egFTlzXEFcAhHOnskR-zaplSriQSflDp56fVhVuLSjDHD=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Well, i really LOVE their trio as a ice cream, desserts and matcha cafe, i really enjoy quality of the matcha and dessert when ice cream is my favourite in vancouver. But i feel than i really need to leave this review if i hoping to see a change.
I’m really rare client of this place and reason why is - staff.
Since first time i visited this place i didn’t feel nor welcome nor comfortable at all.
Every time i visited this place i was hoping “maybe this time they will be more welcome and nice” but i feel like it’s only gets worse.
Today it was to the point to write this review.
So i came to take a lot of deserts and try a bubble waffle with ice cream. When i started to tell what i would like to order i got a half-dead look as a “what are you doing here”. I just tried to ignore it tho it wasn’t look welcome at all. When he didn’t get clearly what i would like to order he didn’t seem to try solve the problem or recommend me something he just the same half dead face and tone “we serve it with matcha only”(i asked if i could have a twist ice cream in waffle) Ok no problem. I ordered this and i started to order other desserts, he didn’t hear what am i ordering or got confused.. i don’t know honestly but he just was looking at me around 5 second before he said that “we don’t serve any fruit tart” which was literally before me. Ok he finally find the fruit tart, which was in front of me. after what he asked me what i was ordering before because he heard nothing from ~3 my orders. Ok i just repeated it, but problem is not in incompetence, he was really like a person who wants go home or wants me to leave this place to not bother his with any orders. He had this face like, he wasn’t even look tired, it was just dead face. I had no any smile or interest to help me as a client. I work in a service and i know what i’m talking about. When you work in a service you must be interested in your production, your clients and be able to smile at least for 1%. I ordered desserts for 50$ it’s not like i took one cupcake and i wanted to have at least a little smile since i really love your food and for stuff is good if i’ll come back to buy some desserts again (if i enjoy all aspects of service) The final hit was also “dead”-tone, dead face “we are closing in 10min ” while we were talking and eating. It’s really had to explain in a text because it’s really about your tone and voice.
Honestly when i need to say it to my guests i feel very sorry for interrupting them and i trying to say it as soft as possible to not make them feel unwelcome. I really have no clue how people like him can work in a SEVICE. If you unable to find ways to talk with people just do not go work in a service.
I’m not interested in delivery so only one way is not to visit this place until they change stuff or train people how to work in service and how to make a comfortable atmosphere for guest. Not an atmosphere when you wanna drop your idea to order something in a middle of this order and want to leave as soon as possible. I never had any problem with owners, they really nice when i was able to meet them in the cafe. But stuff 🥲 Please do not consider it as an attack, i really feel that it is time to tell it after i visiting this place for a year.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM0O-8n1jOGANr8A7XnNPkSsX6SV8EFGhm0vI80&fid=0x0:0x7c695dfac860f6ba"],"When":"2024-7-23"},{"Name":"Chloe Chloe","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIb0YSa6wZyDpN6F0vZFHOWjsTJMmhw-oInA8MulhfzrZVG9A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"ordered a strawberry matcha latte. tbh it's bad, but if you don't like sweet, you may like trying their drinks. they have a condiment bar tho so you can always add more sweetness to your drink. I did with mine but it provided a very weird taste which didn't blend well","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMgq3zyFPYAce3272pPvvl_TuxALXmViSwknK71&fid=0x0:0x7c695dfac860f6ba"],"When":"2024-11-4"}]

title: Honest to Pete Coffee Roasters
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Onsite services","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true}]},{"id":"parking","name":"Parking","options":[{"name":"Free street parking","enabled":true},{"name":"Paid street parking","enabled":true}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Philip Raymond Lim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5EIBAgpBLsauhPMdjXym7mJ4fA8mtryDtWQIJCZfJxYXxupU8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Honest to Pete is an absolute gem of a coffee shop! Located in the neighbourhood of Mount Pleasant, this place is next to an art studio —it’s the perfect spot for a cozy break.

I found this place through Google and was lucky enough to be served by Pete—a kind and passionate guy who not only makes great coffee but also roasts it right there. I paired my coffee with an immaculate chocolate chip cookie that was simply unforgettable. The space is small and informal, creating a warm, inviting atmosphere where you can easily have a quick chat with him and others. I’m so grateful to have stumbled upon this spot and will definitely be back! I heard that the biscotti is great as well. I’ll definitely try it when I’m free this week.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMMNHwwWumSz6UF_Rk0_JJ19O-BTZSreMkYRHyH&fid=0x0:0x791a2ef1dfb349e2"],"When":"2024-9-19"},{"Name":"MJ","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUlm_XRYtoUIMsDe0r0YhYfxDQnj37a3FGprKGl2_zxeQCNP_XX=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"To be Honest to Pete - we’ve had better coffee but it’s a nice homey place with amazing service.

Will be back - curious to try an espresso only. Got a cortado and latte this time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO0jf7PLBsTvuJlJNESk8Yx3Xcv9rrH48Kk0mvf&fid=0x0:0x791a2ef1dfb349e2"],"When":"2024-10-14"},{"Name":"Minji Co","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW0cW7yUIGQwxewtq2t91XH-PweiJmGMnXmQUWs9lKXUa5ZbKC6vQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a nice discovery! I read about the beans so I bought a bag and had it today at home and I feel that it’s very smooth with no acidity.

I like that it has a very casual neighborhood feel too.

Come and try Pete’s for yourself.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPqHL_YnxbO6XqQpvzonc_KBgjeQPyTiAAz9NRO&fid=0x0:0x791a2ef1dfb349e2"],"When":"2024-7-17"},{"Name":"ruby chang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKi79ko5kIUX3YpE4sjTtkWgzfulRAfKnJQdZosO7tNcTGPeg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The owner is very friendly. He serves all kinds of coffee by himself. The aroma of freshly roasted coffee is the main point in this coffee shop. He also provides very yummy biscotti.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM4gh60BCBj5K4mumnHwDbFp26cgJn-HouRp4JN&fid=0x0:0x791a2ef1dfb349e2"],"When":"2024-6-29"},{"Name":"BR","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVKvHcZB7xb4n8CF1jxejOIwoYqPKN4SdZc0qIjcZcbAYMjdkneNA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A delightful coffee shop! The butter croissant is a must-try—perfectly flaky and indulgently buttery.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPPDkUOZ_jxublWL3wr66tvPHZXP5MzcF13bY7G&fid=0x0:0x791a2ef1dfb349e2"],"When":"2024-12-16"},{"Name":"A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUomFsXvYjG0EIxaT73OXulCIDZKU3_pKPaDhbaPIHNOgRf0sc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"it's great coffee! i usually drink coffee with milk and sugar because i find it yucky without any, but i didn't put any sugar in Pete's roast and it was still VERY palatable!

he seems true to his craft and focuses on the beans hardcore.

also there is a cat in this building!!!!!!!!!!!! it's a fun funky space that would be a great hang after cycling or running.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP4lYTUXxla6peEgXsDz9kKdhET9I82MByJQV9q&fid=0x0:0x791a2ef1dfb349e2"],"When":"2024-1-11"},{"Name":"Chloe Carroll","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKHcdYDVORyZ6PSbvV50gbm0YhNjMHlDv-BxvBM5tcUKxE27g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Definitely one of my new favourite cafes in the city. The staff are always up for having chats with their customers and always give treats to the dogs.
The interior is very unique and spacious as well which is uncommon for cafes.
Not to mention the cinnamon buns are to die for!😊","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Amy Rempel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW4WQ_mGYG_pYFntbKu-x9F6ks5omdb55yt_SM5kIbSmUYap9w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Adorable coffee and dessert place. 11/10 would reccomend. The owners are so friendly and the atmosphere is fantastic. The coffee and food is amazing. Their cinnamon buns are delicious. They have a cream cheese frosting with lemon and it hits the spot when you got a craving. Definitely coming back next time I'm in the city.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Dana Sullivan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWQIw-0oOUNgoyniYugTscGkgpKJS8tpx4V0tAajn3ZGkNIfqEk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Came for a pastry and coffee in the morning. The cafe is nice - it has a clean, spacious layout with some art on the walls. I came on Sunday morning around 8 and had the place to myself. The barista was really friendly. Even though this part of Broadway feels a little dead with all the construction going on, there’s a calm vibe in the shop where you can forgot that they’re tearing it up outside.
The menu has some interesting and different stuff on it right now, and the scones and muffins all looked and sounded very good so it was a tough choice, but I went with a strawberry goat cheese muffin and a rosemary vanilla latte. I also got a sample of the apple pecan power muffin! I could’ve used more pronounced flavours in both the strawberry goat cheese muffin and coffee - for my taste, they both had a little too much sweet and not quite enough substance, but the base concept was good. The apple muffin sample was less sweet. It was nice to have the strawberry muffin warmed for me. The prices are about average. I would come back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNRhhS547akoKdJkm-KB-51_CyB0elr50RCyjqE&fid=0x0:0x845463ff5132b15c"],"When":"2023-8-14"},{"Name":"Cinematic Street","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWCp2f1A-In1bpp3loogksA-Xwpv81Z3SBe1YH0vraCE77A3vdn=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have been to this Artigiano location a few times and it’s always been a good experience.  It has a nice layout, it’s bright, lots of windows, good seating, good service.  The wifi is quite good, and so are the Oatmeal Cranberry cookies which I have to stop eating because I’m low-key addicted to them.

Many Artigiano coffee shops have cool murals painted on the walls by local artists.  This particular location has murals on the outside and the inside, which is even rarer.  Artigiano has created an event around this art.  It’s called “Artigiano on the Wall.”  They’ve even made some merch with the art work.  Cups, bags, hoodies, etc.  There’s a map brochure available at the coffee shop that tells you which locations have the murals and you can go check them all out.  There are nine locations in total.  It’s kind of a cool idea and a great way to market art and coffee and the community.  Impressive.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPnCXIGFZC5He0pwLxN6U6Rf-D_rFXG87h9ACFk&fid=0x0:0x845463ff5132b15c"],"When":"2023-4-30"},{"Name":"Görkem Bostancı","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI-ya3Dos2cbXXboQb7xKGx4AiCrC9BRlRc6fCtvOImQ7-1Sg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The place is chill and bright. The tea service is better than most and the staff is very friendly. A nice table in the middle for studying/working though they could use a few more electric outlets. It's surprising that the place isn't busier.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPVoC5fP1-fWbdsprO-_jL9ZaXIOtvU1xyG3F-g&fid=0x0:0x845463ff5132b15c"],"When":"2023-8-5"},{"Name":"No Mass","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIEXW5n_pRJ4GqQTBe4S-I7Sn6hyKxg3YsPhuhwfeO9jBZGVA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time here…just passing by and we stopped for a latte and hot chocolate.  I just say I second the last review … found the store clean, cozy with great contemporary decor and a really great staffer (only on girl there with blond hair abs glasses). She was the only one working and is really good with customer service .. thanks !  May come back again.
The matcha latte and hot chocolate was a little too sweet but overall not bad !!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Chef Menajem Peretz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWFHHucZwQOsfB8-8SKRbUjhOVQd_5RL6RbAdEZcnLC3uuqNK4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very nice add to the Broadway, beautiful store with a very clean decor and excelente customer services as usual of Artigiano. Good sweets option and tables outside cover from the rain that is a good things in this times","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPEFlb2x6ZIAeFwY7NSDIsMOAm64pw_b4dD-fY&fid=0x0:0x845463ff5132b15c"],"When":"2021-5-12"},{"Name":"William Ting","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVROj5tKGe8MbrrNOhk8-59eVUA_x7_lmH6eRP-mRZLTzD9H6iPlA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Cafe has a nice atmosphere and is not busy. Good vibes. The espresso is not recommended.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPEHOBjGdXztNftSHvP5Oh0hYLLAzMMo__W58Rp&fid=0x0:0x845463ff5132b15c"],"When":"2024-4-3"},{"Name":"Rox Ortega","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWkUL9-cUrc1IAVugY6nVrUBRia3eXMBadJsQlS4avQYHladfx0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The barista is very nice but they definitely need a new employee to help with the morning rush...if you're n a rush, this is not the place for you since they take forever to get you your coffee.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Cosmo Kwan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJB4JsBwE0uCK4wKlZRN8M9a3Yh3TUSvDluKgY2A2xaYEGmCQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great place. Friendly staff ( girl ) only herself serving customers. Swamped! She did a wonderful job and in a professional, calm, friendly services with smiles. I know how that feels myself working on own ( no other help ) Owners/boss not around when its peak time or anytime. Bought the Almond Croissant, and Chocolate Croissant.","Images":null,"When":""}]

descriptions: Cozy, quirky coffee shop with sandwiches & Jamaican patties, plus homemade baked goods, beer & wine.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Shinjini M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUD-NflD4SuBnG8b2CLK4vFRUp76N2PF3vkj0rSOEFsK6cFdJ0QmA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This cafe is located in the quiet nook of a very busy main street, and it’s extremely cute and small! I love their coffee- I wanted a big tub of great coffee to sip throughout the day and I got a Large Hazelnut Latte with an extra shot of espresso and oh boy was it good! Really cute cafe, I’d love to come here and work and chill by myself if I ever want to! ☺️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM8qbN9Yz5gpsMQ6AqCjHVJJkDtMdEzmf3987kv&fid=0x0:0x68758ce5f8b95cf7"],"When":"2024-11-30"},{"Name":"Dana Sullivan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWQIw-0oOUNgoyniYugTscGkgpKJS8tpx4V0tAajn3ZGkNIfqEk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Despite the name, Kranky Cafe is staffed by the nicest, most pleasant people you will find anywhere. The environment they've created here is everything you could want from a community cafe. I was made to feel so welcome from the first time I walked in, and since then the baristas have cared enough to remember me, learn my name, ask how I'm doing/what I'm up to and follow up on it the next time I'm back, which is sometimes a month or more later. I've really never been to a coffee shop where the baristas show such genuine interest in customers. I'm not naturally very outgoing so I usually don't really get to know staff at cafes that I frequent, but it's not like I feel like these people are forcing me to converse with them, they're just really nice and it is infectious!
As wonderful as the people are, I wouldn't be coming back over and over again if the food wasn't equally as wonderful, but it absolutely is. Their baked goods are homemade and it's very evident in the quality - everything tastes so wholesome! The sandwiches and wraps are great - the Big Veg sandwich, my favourite, is a killer vegan option. And they make good drinks too. The espresso drinks are pretty standard but brewed strong (but not TOO strong), and I think all the tea drinks (including the tea lattes and just straight-up tea) are excellent.
They offer a lot of variety in the menu. It's not a vegan cafe (there are plenty of meat options) but there are some very good options for vegans: an assortment of vegan baked goods and two vegan sandwiches. They whip up new things from time to time.
It's pretty small inside but they have a lot of patio space for when the weather's decent. They have blankets you can use to keep warm. It’s colourful and cozy inside and the patio has a rustic garden feel.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMUySRpH_ueSN6bY6_vvv34SZavpRmj0zn_5SYI&fid=0x0:0x68758ce5f8b95cf7"],"When":"2024-3-23"},{"Name":"Tiara","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXOGTnVSprrRfKnl8HxlMWqGPfK-EAnduRxsmD5lBjFitcsiWe8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Small cafe that was really nice! Ordered their beef jamaican patty which was good. Wanted their sandwich but they were pre-made, all with cheese. Hard for someone lactose intolerant. I liked their dessert as well! Small place and had limited seating","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMU78aia6vJ_DpPMqwyJuTFlYN2d_7ChkEiTnAL&fid=0x0:0x68758ce5f8b95cf7"],"When":"2024-10-25"},{"Name":"Mary Pines","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV37p-YI9xKYW0wwIv_mDbEiPdDSnFo6XXXEmXbF_0fLDa76lEoYw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Divine. Was my go-to coffee shop for years when I lived across the street. Consistent excellent.

Now I pop in regularly whenever I’m in the area and it remains as absolutely fantastic as ever!

The best blueberry muffin ever! Great breakfast burritos too.

Plus wonderful coffee and lovely staff.

Plus, just a few cozy tables and some lovely decorations make for a super pleasant experience.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tony F","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX450iEbnRtincKQyQZuGEzxwDshBsKiFopLXLSJkqsuY_3RIMt0g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"*** Also reviewed on HappyCow

The service here was good, as was the food. We were a little worried that the vegan options would be limited but after a look at the cabinet and through the menu there were a few savoury and sweet vegan options.

- Jamaican pattie (kinda like a mini pastie) - nice, could use a bit more flavour though, maybe serve with a mango salsa or something?
- Vegan muffin - really tasty with yummy, melty cheese.
- Oat flat white - small cups but nice coffee
- Berry bar, sooooo good!

For other items you could possibly swap out dairy cheese for vegan cheese for a couple of dollars, just not possible in the wrap.

Definitely a nice cosy spot, with limited inside seating and a good amount of outside seating, and they're pet friendly :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipME1iKhWc3PngL66GiCRS5_GvvDpIHiE9hRkyjA&fid=0x0:0x68758ce5f8b95cf7"],"When":"2024-9-20"},{"Name":"Sabaah Moffedi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLMYZGpjMGxUSo7S8NsUzbwIxFK5j16UTrXLwWVjEPaT6uRDQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cutest little neighborhood cafe! Really cosy good vibes, great coffee and abundance of sandwiches and baked goods. I came here a while back and the service originally wasn’t the best but management made some changes and all the staff are incredibly friendly and sweet. This is my regular stop.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN2lQSWNylUczBizkdvIy3FZ93w7KUS5RqAB_nM&fid=0x0:0x68758ce5f8b95cf7"],"When":"2024-7-22"},{"Name":"Ruby E.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVTXhvN-EpNac4Qr_mgdf5IDJLY8uKSuinXxuVkhfUtlVyIdrlu=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cute little cafe with fresh selection of sandwiches and baked goods.  Bar seating for 2 plus 4 indoor tables for 2 and a patio with additional seating.  Friendly staff & great service.  Selection of merch, coffee syrups and granola available for purchase.  The Americano I ordered was good and pairs well with the espresso cookie.  They had at least 3 kinds of non-dairy milk substitutes and vegan menu items.
Bonus: they sell Jamaican patties from The Patty shop, individually & by the bag!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipON6_bgHxagLSZ6SEVEYqxLoJqZp0S96nPPuIAV&fid=0x0:0x68758ce5f8b95cf7"],"When":"2024-6-4"},{"Name":"Kaiyu Liu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJlxp5j4TTI0ivLHZShcnI7l1QtQAu_h2WivCIhHuscWa7SqA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Looovveee the interior and exterior spaces of this cafe. Very colorful, warm, and welcoming with its multitude of art, plants, and murals. The staff are so friendly and bubbly and their energy made me happy the entire time I was here. A gem!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN0K_8-rF6j63iDwhURg9z5IH5QU1YIE5uULORW&fid=0x0:0x68758ce5f8b95cf7"],"When":"2024-9-20"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Naveen Sivasankar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVD85c8-gPz6lah-8hC6Wc52PIW1l9gF6x2wQmy27iEI7TaAflN=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A great cafe and pâtisserie serving a variety of premium chocolates, cakes, and pastries! I have come here a few times with friends and enjoyed the variety of cakes they have available!

I've personally tried the chocolate mint eclair and chocolate trio cake, and both were absolutely delicious and to my liking. My friends have also said great things about the food here!

The atmosphere is gorgeous, with a sleek, modern interior that holds your attention as soon as you enter and makes you feel like you're in a fancy establishment.

Service is also good, but most of the food available is behind the display casing and ready to go so not much interaction happens with the customer when ordering.

One thing that's particularly cool is that they offer both still and sparkling water on tap. Although I don't like sparkling water myself, I know many that do and they have told me how much they appreciate this.

Definitely give this place a try! Although the prices are a bit high for a dessert place, you get what you pay for.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPIlcfRl8vGy4nSjyAGyjIh7ktxK-QNIw4QfLhw&fid=0x0:0xd1f2de1256958934"],"When":"2024-12-22"},{"Name":"Liza","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUU6psZuYm5issGPqVIywDJmiQmgvYke0cz4aCVVktU9NoaykdJkA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very pleasant experience at the cafeteria! Great dessert menu; the coffee and cakes were to my taste buds. The service was up to par and met my expectations. I strongly recommend the place!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNJLB0s4808XtWW0k_EtdN9QKN0IbqnuLTX3qeo&fid=0x0:0xd1f2de1256958934"],"When":"2024-10-7"},{"Name":"Lost in Flax Blog","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWnuEdz0exGAqoaKWuU3YZ60m50P5j2VjB_aqaZVW3VnTtNws28=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I’ve been a customer of Thierry since they first opened their doors in 2012 or 2013 (my memories are fuzzy) — I would buy their almond croissant for my mom and aunt every other weekend as a gift! Because they fell in love with Las Vegas Bellgio’s almond croissant and this was the closest thing to it in Vancouver at the time. I’m glad they opened another branch in Mount Pleasant recently. My brother-in-law loves their macarons. I am now a big fan of their trio chocolate mousse cake! The pistachio hot chocolate (to which I added a shot of decaf espresso to make it into a mocha…) had a very strong almond extract flavour which I prefer not to pair with pistachio. Their chocolate bon bons are decent, but not my favourite. Overall I would definitely recommend an afternoon tea at Thierry, and perhaps will drop in to try their Quiche Lorraine and a glass of wine one day soon.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNLGgg-4alfqhz7RDRPxWnHPlBFeP6KalR8Aidh&fid=0x0:0xd1f2de1256958934"],"When":"2024-10-16"},{"Name":"Sally Sant","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVCTy6BCeoOMzHLCaaDKS5rvGRQPOL8Olp377x0VT5SQQugVkuI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It may be overpriced but I think it is worth the price for sure. The tiramisu is not too sweet. So, it suit to my taste buds. Love it!!! Spanish Latte is also good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP70pRuWHrbETz6fbRPFJVIDHdvuNu-Luc2hNol&fid=0x0:0xd1f2de1256958934"],"When":"2024-11-14"},{"Name":"Maria Laura Guarnieri Brasi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUOLjtY_F5UTE_NIOSPetIP31U3BU0O-5xQJouylgxDhGd2Xmk=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have been in this place a couple of times and the desserts never disappoint! Really delicious and tasty. Also the coffee is very good, and the best part is that they stay open until late.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOpu2G1T9h-1rv16DUGzKbYLq6mWxIiecL_uJYc&fid=0x0:0xd1f2de1256958934"],"When":"2024-10-10"},{"Name":"Nicole Padua","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUOB3E7U0fj1_w3lU893XfvqqfUlMQqBoium6WbMjDpFK59RHiD=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I come here often and have absolutely nothing negative to say about the food, the service, and the ambience. Staff is great, and the food/drink prices are comparable to other coffee shops that are not as nice. I would recommend the quiche and any of the macaroons.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOJmCAIO30FqpZLfGgrCUygYs4l7NhKe7lgaI8X&fid=0x0:0xd1f2de1256958934"],"When":"2024-12-2"},{"Name":"Hye","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjULQQSi1mhNFty7n8ZPesKkMpD31jiIGazltx_wRmE-swaOwr4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I personally liked this branch more than the one in downtown! It's spacious, the service is friendly, and it's clean—especially the washroom, which was remarkably clean compared to other cafes in Vancouver. It was a bit cold for me, though, since the AC was on full blast. I really enjoyed their oat decaf latte and pain au chocolat :D","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPIT11O736zy0pLNVusIUCiWyJXBLYRH9UPyow&fid=0x0:0xd1f2de1256958934"],"When":"2024-7-31"},{"Name":"marlene romero","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXnFhJJj5SHzKzKtQwqDnf_jHDKkRdg6koUYP20iPxFjqyh8d-A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I ordered the Chocolate Marquise for my cousin’s birthday. The cake was decadently delicious with a good balance of sweetness, crunchiness and the  dark and nutty chocolate complemented each other. Everybody had high praises for it. It paired well with strong coffee. I would order it again. Price of the cake for 8-10 people was reasonable.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO1ciSmfzCKxeDHK8hhtgSCFE6k8J78-w8twFTK&fid=0x0:0xd1f2de1256958934"],"When":"2024-8-20"}]

[{"Name":"dhara sheth","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWux95rDd0ISs4pgNRpL-VH2xRtpmrr_-LiHCEtzqithAkJeZAqHw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had a wonderful experience at Cafe Mira! The mochas with oat milk were absolutely delicious. It’s a cute, cozy spot with friendly staff and a great variety of options.
Definitely recommend it for a relaxing coffee break!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOoLMGfB689P70DWu2ekA3htG2sQNOjnWmrHpIM&fid=0x0:0xf9445484fbf50a01"],"When":"2024-12-21"},{"Name":"Autumn_Kiko","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU1zcZdU411-b8f5Fcx7HImynMifJ7qg-_yzjSJzTLgmhJaggW_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love this little cafe which is so much better than it was before.  And the latte is so cute and the croissant unheated was nice and flaky.  Love the vibe and the staff here","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMe6LEQW7rjRSNM0KobW9k4I0_LndhQnIyX-bTv&fid=0x0:0xf9445484fbf50a01"],"When":"2024-11-30"},{"Name":"Tsui-Fang Hu (Tracy)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW_ro0txUL1mG25heVUuoyMTMpTlXMMMT4-dXmn5rgUocYrBx5y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I got iced lemon black tea and a spinach strudel and they were phenomenal 😍 Literally. Oftentimes lemon black tea wasn’t strong enough for me or just tasted like water? But this was very nice. The strudel was incredibly delicious so I even took another two home after 😂
The cafe was quite small so the seating was limited and each table might be quite close to the other.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNH3RmB-R4XMd324VI3Az_HM-kFOKJ-33nmwZP2&fid=0x0:0xf9445484fbf50a01"],"When":"2024-6-25"},{"Name":"Emma Su","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWKhwrjerWBN0KUHeUh1ErV5BZVN2rrEmcKmoKU-Qzl2tP6eCQAzg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very cute café, has lots of different drinks (e.g tiramisu latte), barista was super nice and patient + even drew a cute drawing on the cups since I told her we were getting a piercing next door. Overall 10/10 cafe!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN0DAstCx7P3MKwIhReNe2XRTByrEu7hAO_VKTB&fid=0x0:0xf9445484fbf50a01"],"When":"2024-12-14"},{"Name":"てり","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX8P9K2xQMBRkTTRfBP5rySDPM2pUtz2WZkqxVDSoYmiFAGa8i-=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The staff is friendly and the atmosphere is warm. I ordered a dark chocolate cake and an Okinawan latte from the special menu. The cake was not too sweet and the latte was soft and gentle.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOYBbQCabTyfQpkXqQd-237sOPZ4OfqoOsQsonM&fid=0x0:0xf9445484fbf50a01"],"When":"2024-12-5"},{"Name":"Jordan Cassidy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIlDDurunQUKpf7VtsTslbLHFUWsbeiGVZt6iIOYE8SZlUQQQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Really disappointing for the price. Salad was just lettuce with dressing. Panini has a tiny piece of prosciutto and a tiny piece of wilted lettuce on a baguette that was not even toasted. Went there for tiramisu but they didn’t have any. Used to love it here but it has gone downhill.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOLl6jTO7GbjZiExnou0uQD7NBC1ZUUWRYam9_A&fid=0x0:0xf9445484fbf50a01"],"When":"2024-9-21"},{"Name":"Dave","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLPZIUOsDwlBkFebhG04vj0-2yRgvhqZ8FA0OSOGGM5zHg8Nw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent Cafe. Good drinks and tasty pastries 😋.
Friendly staff. Cozy atmosphere.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM-fUcLrsH3RaKKxiM6G_Kk5OBMZGZYl-Y50Ekw&fid=0x0:0xf9445484fbf50a01"],"When":"2024-12-4"},{"Name":"Ken Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWVQ9tU0qdmGlycJdF-FuK-9AqQ48SDH430sM0Lk7agXorkgSs=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Visiting Canada from the United States, Caffe Mira stood out to my son and I while walking around the stores. The atmosphere and the vibes were super nice, the cappucinos and the matcha frappe was amazing. The crossaints are a must at Caffe Mira, they vary in different flavors, fresh and warmly toasted and they taste very good. The workers were very nice and is very fast at serving their customers. Highly reccomend this place to anyone visiting around the area. 👍👍👍","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM6ylNo_cTJmIluFI1pd6lwZJxAY5JLGSxVrcnv&fid=0x0:0xf9445484fbf50a01"],"When":"2024-6-20"}]

descriptions: Cozy, wood-hued cafe for espresso drinks, cold-brewed coffee & other beverages using its own roast.
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Outdoor seating","enabled":true},{"name":"Onsite services","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true},{"name":"Delivery","enabled":false}]},{"id":"highlights","name":"Highlights","options":[{"name":"Great tea selection","enabled":true},{"name":"Live performances","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair accessible seating","enabled":false},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":false}]},{"id":"offerings","name":"Offerings","options":[{"name":"Coffee","enabled":true},{"name":"Small plates","enabled":true},{"name":"Vegetarian options","enabled":true}]},{"id":"dining_options","name":"Dining options","options":[{"name":"Breakfast","enabled":true},{"name":"Lunch","enabled":true},{"name":"Dessert","enabled":true},{"name":"Seating","enabled":true}]},{"id":"amenities","name":"Amenities","options":[{"name":"Gender-neutral washroom","enabled":true},{"name":"Washroom","enabled":true},{"name":"Wi-Fi","enabled":true},{"name":"Wi-Fi","enabled":false}]},{"id":"atmosphere","name":"Atmosphere","options":[{"name":"Casual","enabled":true},{"name":"Cozy","enabled":true}]},{"id":"crowd","name":"Crowd","options":[{"name":"Groups","enabled":true}]},{"id":"planning","name":"Planning","options":[{"name":"Accepts reservations","enabled":false}]},{"id":"payments","name":"Payments","options":[{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"Debit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"NFC mobile payments","enabled":true},{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":false}]},{"id":"children","name":"Children","options":[{"name":"Good for kids","enabled":true}]},{"id":"parking","name":"Parking","options":[{"name":"Free street parking","enabled":true},{"name":"Paid street parking","enabled":true},{"name":"Parking","enabled":false}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"No MSG No Garlic Foodie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX-PVOn6GcWxsKb-qqVJDTqvJ5rfua5QVuFocwcMF-ZRwuEIPLm=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We've been smelling the coffee roasting for ages and finally started to come regular. Although the seating is hit and miss – sometimes, we had to go elsewhere because there were many patrons parked long term with their laptops – we always try this place first because all the staff make consistent espresso drinks with excellent micro-foam and the order takers are experienced and accurate. They have an amazing variety of sandwiches, and it was my intent to try one soon except I finally became a vegan and missed the boat because they don't have any vegan+gluten-free sandwich offerings. I used to love the carrot cake, and still do, it is not sweet and very addictive, but now that I cannot eat eggs, wheat and dairy, that's out as well. My partner continues to enjoy it though, no longer able to share it with me. Despite the fact that the space is rustic and the couches are too soft, we love that it is on the second floor and gives us a great view of Jonathan Rogers Park and Vancouver. In the winter, they don't have a canopy, so we cannot sit outside and enjoy the fresh air. I vote that they install a new rain-proof awning and replace the cold metal chairs outside!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOpiylYjM7Nu5oCXPl_phc57MNAYImze0DZLbM_&fid=0x0:0xf390b967328c5001"],"When":"2024-11-2"},{"Name":"Julia Kuznetsova","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXEmartIB1DRbABoVaUe1Rfv6f-e8r57V_5Ft_eBmZX63ydyrY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The place is nice, as you have different options for sitting - inside or outside. As well as that - a decent range of coffee drinks and pastries. As for me, I have tried matcha latte, a huge portion, by the way and a plain croissant which was pretty good, not too greasy and not sweet. Also I know that this place is really valued among local office employees, as I used to be one of them)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPehwsjt-5FhOZtA26XSpsX3oIvgvirEUFjPCz-&fid=0x0:0xf390b967328c5001"],"When":"2024-11-12"},{"Name":"Philip Raymond Lim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5EIBAgpBLsauhPMdjXym7mJ4fA8mtryDtWQIJCZfJxYXxupU8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’ve found the perfect pairing for my coffee cravings, and it’s here at Milano Coffee Roasters. I came by three times this week to test the consistency of their incredible mocha from the killer dark mocha, raspberry, and the hazelnut hedgehog mocha- it never disappoints. As a mocha fan, I can easily say this is one of the best in Vancouver.

On top of my discovery of the great mocha, I was tipped off by one of the baristas of an ideal match for it: the Hazelnut Dacquoise. It’s nutty, airy, slightly chewy, and delicately crispy—boy honestly it’s one of the best pastry and coffee pairing I’ve ever had. The topping has a delightful mix of chopped hazelnuts, and every bite brings a feeling of happiness and contentment. This slice is now on top of my list. Just the right size, making it guilt-free for health conscious people like me, plus it’s affordable.

Part of me wanted to keep this as a secret—I don’t want them to run out of Dacquoise when I’m there! But why let this discovery stay a secret when others could feel the same joy? If I’m celebrating or just rewarding myself, this combo would now be one of my default options. I’ve tried other loaf cakes here, but nothing compares. I’m thrilled to have found this little comfort that keeps me coming back, and with such fantastic service and the relaxing view facing the Rogers Park setting the vibe, it’s become a true favourite spot.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipODYKNmalk26zw7Sesv7IrDRzHhn2pQVF0Q0SIF&fid=0x0:0xf390b967328c5001"],"When":"2024-11-15"},{"Name":"Pearobearo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWJytlYP3krNLbRwHHThbPHsotJR7HIGvSdTdRI-mBoQ7I0EO4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The first time I was here the killer mocha kept me dreaming about this place.

The second visit was not as magical but it was still a really good mocha (not as fragrant). Both my sisters love their drinks as well. One drink was the daily special iced drink and the other one is the raspberry mocha.

We had lunch nearby so we didn't try any food items since we were quite full.

Service is good, very friendly and welcoming.

The space is nice and relax. There are both indoor and outdoor seatings. Nice view of the mountains.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMVg17l217spmNaTg6E4gTTa77WrwrJseTDc_wV&fid=0x0:0xf390b967328c5001"],"When":"2024-6-12"},{"Name":"Jenna Bae","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUppHJ23JmEQJdeom5LFe1Y45e9vGBTd9XJYa_fwY4qbgYTXJU6=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"THE Best Coffee Place in Vancouver.
The quality of the coffee is the top class. We always bought a whole coffee beans too.
Caramel Canelé is super tasty too!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMQ8l9Kd4FosE0FxyNb_R5sbBhSbwbRcdApkTk2&fid=0x0:0xf390b967328c5001"],"When":"2024-11-4"},{"Name":"Antonella Magaraggia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUxvpdeSE5rpTbVuEAI4JOx2TrCJse11_Sx_qyUmG6azfChGctH=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Finally I found a place with good coffee in Vancouver! This place has great ambience, amazing coffee, the staff is friendly, what else can I ask for? 😀
The goodies is tasty though way too sweet for me, like overall all in Canada when it comes to sweets, they put too much sugar on.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMlwsQv8K5nh0ZCPO2MTGsi7Bip6dfjusc7fTY6&fid=0x0:0xf390b967328c5001"],"When":"2024-9-4"},{"Name":"Julia D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKWGHgIRg6UZB2wR1x2csycbI6ACHnuk_Z9bgnuPPHXuO-zSw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A shiny place with plenty seats, a space patio looking over to the park owned by a very experienced roasters gentleman. He showed us the best way to drink oat latte and it makes us a good latte til the end.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPKOnGzez-SefkBrd165RaMkfjWmeQ9-68DYvIT&fid=0x0:0xf390b967328c5001"],"When":"2024-3-12"},{"Name":"Linh Tran","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUbP3plInkqXVOA2XJc8czoQ80aWBGnT8WS-yMiUPgvNShtt-y90A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Drinks, price, vibe are all nice. Love their cortado. It would be great to sit on their balcony on warm days looking down to the field. I wasn't impressed with the canale but will come back and try other cakes they have.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMsx2gCxQOip67XFKybq1LdNpXsrRb8nORskFUI&fid=0x0:0xf390b967328c5001"],"When":"2024-3-31"}]
