user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Cameron Mctaggart","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWk1kwvHFmsTrtEVLAcv6nV4A3LH2cqU3OqZjjJ736mYFB6lko=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is a wonderful stop from the Vancouver rain we all know. I had the elaichi chai and the paneer butter masala sandwich. The chai was warm and spiced wonderfully, and the sandwich was spiced wonderfully and complimented well with the sauce on the side. The staff were diligent and friendly as well. If you are in this section of town, it is well worth a stop.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipObGCMoEVN5QcFF8yfn8duxtTCzZHjlz5b1YNQ&fid=0x0:0x1bb662d298574ace"],"When":"2024-12-20"},{"Name":"Arivarul Arivazhagan (Ajit)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUe9jJEKClH-H2gIgpddiPqlCfXBZILAp9XdIuD9UqVJv0-eSu-EA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Definite reccomendation (everything tastes amazing here -addingfew suggestions)

1. Paneer Patties
2. Chicken Tikka Sandwich
3. 7 spice chai
4. Kulhad Chai
5. Rice Bowl

I have been following Chai Wagon for the last 4 years. This place never ceases to amaze me.

This is my to go place wherever I miss my ghar ki chai (tea from my hometown). Today was my first visit since they opened their store at Main, very glad to see this place grow with no compromise in quality.

A simple place with warm ambience and fell good vibes. The chai by Soham and the sandwiches by Roshni were extraordinarily amazing. A must recommendation for all Chai lovers who are looking forward to a wonderful chai experience in the city.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP23ee143HIeDeTyvfaDMTrSG_dV39S3MrIJU7N&fid=0x0:0x1bb662d298574ace"],"When":"2024-9-5"},{"Name":"Elliott Smart","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWB0sN8zQiBQ6HD8EfqDNaqjlDfmZECdDLpzA6-NS7MabYwMdU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I highly recommend visiting Chai Wagon! The chai is excellent here, especially the 7 Spice Chai. They have delicious food too. The Butter Chicken patties are a great creation mixing light, and flaky pastry with tasty butter chicken. I visit this place regularly as I really like the staff, and want to support this small local business.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMU07zhuT_qXg6HDn7azS8RS2Z1IRtlidbMbXgB&fid=0x0:0x1bb662d298574ace"],"When":"2024-11-9"},{"Name":"Megh Raz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXQ4q-z4LFs37HL-LH9u0JenlekZ4kvp37NW_mrc_ElfMJTIDnP=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had a wonderful experience at Chai Wagon's Vancouver outlet. The staff were incredibly welcoming, and the atmosphere was inviting. I enjoyed the samosa, vada pav, mango falooda, and chai  all were delicious. The mango falooda was a standout, rich and flavorful. The chai was perfectly spiced and refreshing. Overall, I was very satisfied with the customer service and the quality of the food. I highly recommend visiting Chai Wagon and trying their mango falooda!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPb98J0b1lXq7IrecV5Hfg_AnnRO-3dpxX6n2Nn&fid=0x0:0x1bb662d298574ace"],"When":"2024-7-16"},{"Name":"Afzal Haque","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUmbbu45rkrlyCr0Odci0RVb8x3Yd9ckph-4_mrRYlWPqmB9JE4ZQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I visited there and i ordered ginger chai and samosa chaat both are very tasty as it taste like a indian spice and i had a very good experience after visiting there. I recommend to all must visit there.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNABDG_2gFpgMhKzHJYLn9apXn7jEv2GCDTO4g4&fid=0x0:0x1bb662d298574ace"],"When":"2024-12-13"},{"Name":"Pilot Kapt","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKWzzHs8_Pl1TWPE5jIEu7a0RPJv5QfULdt9YKtAgy-uJDA8Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Finally, It seems we have an Indian 🇮🇳 taste matched in town.
Samosa - It's too good, freshly made in batches; it's a good size for the price, although there is room for reducing it in the future!
Aloo/Potato pattice/puff - Good taste and crispy freshly baked.
Ginger Tea - Well matched to Indian 🇮🇳 taste!
Shikanji - Just, wow!

Dine-in service has room to improve to take delight a mile further!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNLeyIKwHA3Yw_WcGgjnrZ1h3FcYpy7kDpBXKTu&fid=0x0:0x1bb662d298574ace"],"When":"2024-7-1"},{"Name":"Ahsan Jalil","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWq2qMQzSL-v7bGq8WtosNdsWIxT2n4gFGfq4fZePDfmobBO4UpoA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Was looking for some Indian/Pakistani breakfast in Vancouver and found this place. They didn't have much of S. E. Asian food verity but what they had was good enough.

The staff was very welcoming and friendly. They offered chai-tasting sessions for us to pick the right flavour.

A nice little place for good food!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOb1kmNS3fpnaEGOt9sCmy_ESiIlwCKIkkpHoQG&fid=0x0:0x1bb662d298574ace"],"When":"2024-7-9"},{"Name":"Lee Van","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUkdc0b5WROtpnJCruJpetIegq6Snt_2bGm0A5pSa9cqY1SCXL5=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"My friend and I made a plan to come here and get a cup of chai at 9am. We arrived and the store was closed which was surprising as the store is listed as opening for 9am. We went for a walk and came back at around 930 and it was open. We got a cup of ginger chai for $4 and we were keen to try the dholka. We got 2 pieces for $4.50. I'd heard so much about this place and I'm happy I checked it out. The chai was yummy and the dholka was okay. Looking forward to trying some of the other dishes here. There is some seating inside and there are also some tables outside. I parked my car a block away.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP0DVi4BIT_-x4lm9lZIbPRwRwvG3p5ZIjBt7XR&fid=0x0:0x1bb662d298574ace"],"When":"2024-7-8"}]

title: Melo Patisserie
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"In-store pickup","enabled":true},{"name":"In-store shopping","enabled":true},{"name":"Onsite services","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true},{"name":"Delivery","enabled":false},{"name":"Same-day delivery","enabled":false}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true}]},{"id":"offerings","name":"Offerings","options":[{"name":"Coffee","enabled":true}]},{"id":"dining_options","name":"Dining options","options":[{"name":"Breakfast","enabled":true}]},{"id":"amenities","name":"Amenities","options":[{"name":"Gender-neutral washroom","enabled":true},{"name":"Wi-Fi","enabled":true},{"name":"Wi-Fi","enabled":false}]},{"id":"crowd","name":"Crowd","options":[{"name":"LGBTQ+ friendly","enabled":true},{"name":"Transgender safe space","enabled":true}]},{"id":"payments","name":"Payments","options":[{"name":"Cash-only","enabled":true},{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"Debit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"NFC mobile payments","enabled":true},{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":false}]},{"id":"parking","name":"Parking","options":[{"name":"Paid street parking","enabled":true}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Hossein Javid","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKtir4qdD2HqB9h8slUHOVPRx4N-NlBarMDmU3Rah8sxfcxFA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Melo Patisserie Review

I had the pleasure of visiting Melo Patisserie, and it was a truly delightful experience!

The pastries were absolutely fantastic—easily 5 stars. Each bite was a testament to their craftsmanship and dedication to quality. The service was equally impressive, with the staff going above and beyond, especially when serving my kids. They brought out the cutest tea pots and cups for their hot chocolate, which made the experience extra special and memorable for the little ones.

The coffee was good, though not exceptional—I’d give it a solid 4 stars. That said, the overall ambiance of the place, combined with the thoughtful service and delicious pastries, made it an amazing experience.

This is definitely a 5-star spot for anyone looking for a charming patisserie with a warm and welcoming vibe. Highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM9V5vu4AufTTWoibDpOeSSrEUunTgyazQz1uwu&fid=0x0:0xcbe43d0aed6e61e7"],"When":"2024-11-25"},{"Name":"Mucahit Mert Alagoz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUlZFzlr8OmJ6ReNSeqILjiXkPYOR-Wi6HlJhjaTTE_xGsRl7kohA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I feel so lucky to have discovered this café! It’s incredibly stylish, clean, and thoughtfully designed. I’ll definitely be coming back. The music volume seemed a bit high, but it wasn’t bothersome at all. As for the food, it’s absolutely flawless—no complaints there. However, parking might be an issue on weekends, as there are limited paid parking spots available nearby. Overall, I was really impressed and highly recommend it!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOZzhwLhtcC3U1Qm0B_FDlhkKuy9auQeLY-HnzL&fid=0x0:0xcbe43d0aed6e61e7"],"When":"2024-12-11"},{"Name":"Pino Canada","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVNwip4Np41ja9JrCjifiuKLPTSKnhIf0wG1Hpwg9BQQ5ojxeo=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love this place. A tiny beautiful cafe near Main Street. I had a cup of London fog and small almond cake. They brought the food and drink to your table and the presentation was so pretty and taste lovely. The cafe was decorated for Christmas and atmosphere was super cute. I definitely go back there if I go to the area. They have beautiful pastries as well. This place was card only. I knew there used to be cash only places in the past. But now many places are card only 😆","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNGSiLYPLG_mIND0BmHUzM2TkFO30aVhncX1brJ&fid=0x0:0xcbe43d0aed6e61e7"],"When":"2024-12-22"},{"Name":"Philip Raymond Lim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5EIBAgpBLsauhPMdjXym7mJ4fA8mtryDtWQIJCZfJxYXxupU8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Melo Patisserie is a feast for the senses and a haven for anyone who loves French cafes. This is authentic. As you approach the entrance, the warm and elegant Christmas decor set the tone for a magical experience. Stepping inside, one will be greeted by immaculate displays of pastries, cookies, and miniature cakes.

Today, I indulged in a banana croissant and a chocolate pistachio passion fruit miniature cake, perfectly paired with a pot of organic vanilla rooibos tea. The banana crunch in the topping was so nice and crunchy complimenting the croissant and tasty banana filling. Every bite was pure comfort for the soul. The miniature cake had the element of surprise in the middle (spoiler lol) and the roobois tea was a very good quality and was elegantly in a cast iron tea pot. The nice cutlery and dinnerware are so elegant which elevated the entire experience.

The service was equally impressive—friendly and attentive, making me feel right at home. The ambiance is unmatched; I absolutely love the vibe of this charming French bistro. It has truly stolen my heart, and I’ll undoubtedly be back to savor more of their incredible offerings. Highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPqa8NK7ocbENcuM2yxwHpLOT7X6qdGNerLQ0TJ&fid=0x0:0xcbe43d0aed6e61e7"],"When":"2024-11-18"},{"Name":"Ana Medeiros","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV9IfiwCqE6nq-5eVfNQpZX_05ivuBpTgAM2uiNfXtYnuRdm-ZTQw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best French experience I have in Vancouver. Melo is part of my personal history, he did my perfect wedding cake more than 4 years ago and pretty much all the birthday cakes for our family. On top of the cozy environment, with all the special details, the food is perfect in every level: flavour, presentation, texture. The service is also friendly and warm.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOFREPxvTMMgeL4d_D1sWirORzBRA_MY1HguALG&fid=0x0:0xcbe43d0aed6e61e7"],"When":"2024-12-11"},{"Name":"candice lim hing","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL39nfEn20A4gATSxz9AjHOb_sByLfSLr5c_qQM2rzzWuP_MQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Melo Patisserie is truly a standout! Their banananuts croissant is hands down one of the best pastries I’ve ever had in a long time—delicious, flaky, and just the right amount of chocolate, banana and sweetness. Every pastry and cake I’ve tried here has been equally yummy. The service is fantastic too! The staff is always friendly and super accommodating with special requests, which makes every visit a pleasant experience. Highly recommend for anyone who loves fresh, high-quality baked goods!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMxycks4ULv6hgDHavZYjtVh6BPyULgxin9kr02&fid=0x0:0xcbe43d0aed6e61e7"],"When":"2024-9-19"},{"Name":"Ghazal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWUxPjakfUDfUlOphLX0NHrhY3j03bOfl1WB2qtK88VIEBoxSUc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This cafe is really cute!!! And they have tasty treats. We stopped by on a Saturday and it was very quiet and hot inside so we sat outside. Everything tasted good and we were happy with the quality and service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP5e0-wf7aPS_MxY9UOm241FV260iiROIkTw-Nk&fid=0x0:0xcbe43d0aed6e61e7"],"When":"2024-6-19"},{"Name":"Fung Yan Cha","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKkvziwRzvAq9OEmk5wWqKezVVBBU9ucT38EG7KsMr6XtQgeQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The scones were small with normal taste. The staff was rude and confronted us for sitting there too long. There was a sign showing 1 hr stay but we had just spent less than 30 mins including the time for choosing and buying our coffee and scones. Normal coffee and pastry with bad services. I regret that I gave them tips when buying our food and received the bad services afterwards. It is not a pleasant place to stay. You may only consider take away.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOsPeB1BtAVT1L9etRoyABUpnIN_mIXU7xjIvxp&fid=0x0:0xcbe43d0aed6e61e7"],"When":"2024-11-17"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Joey Carter","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVVxJhmegLxZTiNK1kFjGHgDdGo3bbkfdT-9_i2VmsPV6_ZjTD9=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"These workers have their service dialed in.
The service moves the crowd uniformly. The taste and quality of the food and latte that I ordered was superb.
Lots and lots of students hyping up the curriculum.
Great atmosphere in An Emporium of Knowledge.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Samira Heidari","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJxc6uQIp3S0Vr90ENSTKBMo1w0g5Nq5Ah1pZcc7hS4xfaE=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I'm a student in Langara College and go to Starbucks several times a week. In the last 10 days, whenever I asked for a Mocha, they said “sorry”!. How come they don't offer a popular drink for ten days?!?!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Zha Ji","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX1OVEf2pj1FFoqxFLngRJpml2JV0-WHzfWAVss1EfN5uRoSWg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Since this is a license store and not corporate, I don't even consider it a real Stabucks Store. In terms of work performance, this place is below average. Just looking at the counter tops they don't maintain cleanliness, barista are spending more time talking to each other rather than focusing on making beverages. The consistency when it comes to ringing in beverages and making them is, again, below average. The store manager and supervisors need to do a better job at maintain standards and remind barista why Starbucks has these standard and guidelines in place. But since they borrow the name, I don't think they care.

If you're a student and don't mind a small commute, I would go to OakRidge Starbucks.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ravjot Rakhra","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK-bBTj-fyLtK8F83cbJYvN5OEnQnAsypj9jzNs_7nDxbUU6Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This Starbucks is terrible, every morning they are missing countless items, coffees taste horrible, they don’t let you redeem stars from the app, just save your time and money and go to Tim’s.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Charles Ph","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIwdYKVCbEGrPvsTzXMRWbFF2w59f5MJtyMuv-X5dgEzR8J-Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Starbuck is just Starbuck. This one is inside Langara College at 49th","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNav1QC98TUGC5-jKSgVF96iVGDljByyAqwyLmM&fid=0x0:0xb4a807ce77c26ea9"],"When":"2024-6-26"},{"Name":"Samreet Kaur","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ689zgJQy377BboHXZnsGX8a0-DEczoaTZgs6bF6ik3ncjnA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Here employee named Simran, showed excellent customer service skills. She listened to my preferences and customized my drink to suit my taste.
I hope Starbucks recognize the employee for her outstanding performance.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Isabelle Liu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUpu9fSvCAXcYqN_pVD0yo4ffnm-LIklZfEj6TOxWXzYDjBSzKptw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The absolute worst. Whoever hired these people needs to be gone too. Can’t understand the most BASIC English or make a drink right and they even charge me more than usual. Doing a great job ripping off students here.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Brooke Head","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVXjcHs5d2qYQE41YjAxgPfdaLff8I1fj6xuPCjh2srSjvIy_DFfw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"With out fail there will be 3+ people behind the counter yet only 1 person actually serving and making drinks, expect to spend an insane amount of time just waiting to order. For a on campus coffee shop you'd think they'd have so respect for the fact that their customers have to get to classes, and can't afford to wait 20 minutes for a coffee. Drink quality is also pretty hit or miss","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Leon Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWPOnBvlGz2k_WzxOhCiURR3aRaAE5ffHXfUBJJ4GP7GBC5Wn8K=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A nice and cozy cafe at the foot of Queen Elizabeth Park! We came here for lunch before visiting the Conservatory, and it was a very nice experience. It's a very small store, but has some delicious baked goods and drinks! I highly recommend their bagel sandwiches :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM2DLA2M1jed2sc8oMBxurcySYqa_8XWfhDvKlB&fid=0x0:0xd939dc9f1b93e42f"],"When":"2024-12-25"},{"Name":"Amparo Mateos","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV16SvothmJJOYQRGsxMty8YoAogZIVE0ZZBECWpHDmh-t7XlGg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"INCREDIBLE SERVICE AND COFFEE. I went there because it was raining and I loved it. Seline, the barista was very sweet and made us feel very comfortable. In addition, the coffee was incredible and very beautiful. She is an artist!! We'll repeat","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOsiVJ-WNvYPtWRe45vXnf3pyAzMAa3UZe4HvqO&fid=0x0:0xd939dc9f1b93e42f"],"When":"2024-7-31"},{"Name":"Dee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXHNcNOPaNMwoQhd4a3MaNl6j5NagLUmPpfBNlw3ukI7k88v9FP=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lovely coffee spot with super cozy vibes and delicious coffee. Couldn’t ask for anything more than that. I was super satisfied with my flat white and pistachio macaroon.

The barista was very kind and soft spoken, I can’t wait to come back on my next visit. Thank you for the great service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPA3hsdS-wTiGJcg8UI22-4IDKrYTJpsAplLD-K&fid=0x0:0xd939dc9f1b93e42f"],"When":"2024-8-31"},{"Name":"tikki","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWzV_Y6bQFjodBKC8anq5nBVFmCTC7hA6Nh7xklFQuKGefK40A_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cute and warm coffee shop with amazing atmosphere! It is one of my favourite coffee shops to go if I am looking for a place to study or chill. The experience is always amazing and I'm glad they chose to open in this area!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO9Wwp1NthSwD_TsMIbMImFbfdAO8NvjiiU0tjH&fid=0x0:0xd939dc9f1b93e42f"],"When":"2024-6-28"},{"Name":"Kathryn Li","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW-1Yhevq8JXBDvsUM6lqdeXwiMZPZteJWG0F-X7inM86Tjx8_W=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We ordered a few coffees and to our surprise, they came with adorable latte art! This cafe has a super chill atmosphere. The barista was so friendly and talented. Make sure to stop by this lovely coffee shop if you're in the neighborhood!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMcvcB8mrRJj1dZtfZKVvIh9u7VNNCo8UkUgdIG&fid=0x0:0xd939dc9f1b93e42f"],"When":"2023-12-18"},{"Name":"Antony Heung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJZGlVOYPVMND0abTfjJ4ypvBf6NV-agWYN6VrhTbuzyOhGng=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Do not get their baked goods. Not "baked fresh in-house" as advertised. Ordered a chocolate croissant and it was stale and hard as a rock like it was baked weeks ago. See video below. I'm squeezing as hard as I can. For $6.50....save your money.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMLMhW121GTygSkkNyAky9Jq_61XaC5coWNdDA2&fid=0x0:0xd939dc9f1b93e42f"],"When":"2024-8-2"},{"Name":"Francis Nelson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUOf0TzFgcIuLOi1oXFktPBGr9H-47i0oUIKXpvUZTv0za04ek=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Simple Love Coffee Home offers a delightful and intimate coffee experience that appeals to both coffee aficionados and casual drinkers alike.  The coffee selection is impressive, featuring a range of classic and innovative blends. Each cup is brewed to perfection, showcasing the rich and nuanced flavors of their carefully sourced beans","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipORZXXzaOfnGwc0dMXXBPT9OGTpwq6KuHaI8WIS&fid=0x0:0xd939dc9f1b93e42f"],"When":"2023-12-27"},{"Name":"Elton Chung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU_SVkVqkNe3SvSFwaZ1xrBYHObNVkTiTTXXYykf58guqGIk3qy=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I came here for a light lunch in a sunny winter morning. The cafe is nearby the Cambie Street entrance of QE Park and I could park my car in a small street nearby.

The cafe has six tables. It wasn’t crowded when I were here. The room temperature was slight high as the cafe is like a greenhouse with plenty of sunlight but windows and door are not open.

I ordered Latte, London Fog, Basque Cheesecake Muffin and a chocolate croissant. The latte and London Fog were pretty good and the barista surely did a good job.

The bakery products looked nice but they were the star deducting items. The croissant was hard and so dry. The moment I poked my fork on the muffin it broke into very dry crumbles. I could see the “honeycomb” shape inside that indicated the baking powder and ingredients were not properly mixed before baking. I suspect these were the supplier quality issue. I would urge the owner to pay attention to it.

Generally the place and service are good. I would love to see the improvement to the bakery products.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOyTE1O-Pjh1eVYHnJIbEmJAxCN7Sxsrm4hJ4A&fid=0x0:0xd939dc9f1b93e42f"],"When":"2023-11-14"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"MJ","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUlm_XRYtoUIMsDe0r0YhYfxDQnj37a3FGprKGl2_zxeQCNP_XX=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Rich and balanced espresso, the latte was very rich and comforting.

Cozy environment, would make a great place to study or work.

Will definitely be back! Coffee makes my heart happy ✨","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPXTinbmGvROk6yRjBYjeeujV9-HHABR-j3Q7fH&fid=0x0:0x1384332e17fc16d1"],"When":"2024-11-13"},{"Name":"Philip Raymond Lim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5EIBAgpBLsauhPMdjXym7mJ4fA8mtryDtWQIJCZfJxYXxupU8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The coffee at Modus Coffee Roasters is excellent, at par with top names like Pallet Roasters, Kafka’s, Nemesis, and 49th Parallel. However, compared to these cafes, Modus falls slightly behind due to two factors: the limited variety of offerings and the atmosphere.

While other cafes have invested heavily in creating vibrant, artistic spaces, Modus opts for a more low-key design. It’s not a bad thing, but I personally enjoy spaces where art and ambiance elevate the experience. For these reasons, I’m deducting one star for atmosphere and one for the lack of variety.

That said, I’ll definitely return for their coffee—it’s perfect for grab-and-go moments and consistently high-quality!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPkzeH0fGtdoZF5B9E4Q84tNawA_JpdnTW7vrtg&fid=0x0:0x1384332e17fc16d1"],"When":"2024-11-18"},{"Name":"Elisa Kazan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUfnXq79FXK6SM_3Qr0x9E7eqGAf2iM5e785pouauMfz2nICrvAIg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cute coffee shop on Broadway! There are a few tables inside and wifi making it a good place to sit and work if you’re able to get a spot. Saw a few outlets as well for power.

Loved the summer seasonal drinks, espresso tonic and Thai iced tea. Will def come back!

They also have a brunch menu (before 2:00pm) and pastries.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMNQeyiUVZ33ckCnBMfReOgKLfNRZgcWpsVg0Wn&fid=0x0:0x1384332e17fc16d1"],"When":"2024-9-8"},{"Name":"enas shawa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIao6SxNZGjg3ZHlP_9mpgj0Vd_z9JRRF4y12teTY9epnA1eA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Such a lovely, homey and friendly vibe. The staff are so kind.
We went for brunch and oh my this place did not disappoint.
Food is so good. A weird combination of flavors that work exquisitely. Definitely worth visiting.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNj4NzqIVOQJ8PSKBKqwg_M4n8E6PxPcFvxJ-wb&fid=0x0:0x1384332e17fc16d1"],"When":"2024-7-21"},{"Name":"Jason Edwin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVU8vDCSxroTRr-EXNrVrdaoRDx8hD9Vmw_tM3XPDz8I4o2JG0UaQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love this hole in the wall, specialty coffee spot. Pour over and espresso was awesome. Bummer that the barista didn’t really know anything about their coffee options but it didn’t matter because all the coffee was great.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM6RW-pBDJpUfirpggG4pkSuB8_Ay2TFshXwYId&fid=0x0:0x1384332e17fc16d1"],"When":"2024-8-19"},{"Name":"pooya m","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVO2d86SdYFU_wceKMe-VnB70h8Rur-PMALZ13lz9dK9ghMpCs-oA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had my brunch here today. The Turkish tomatoes was very delicious and I enjoyed every bite of my sourdough with it. I liked the overall ambience","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPJhBWq2b4mFtcgn8-SGIw5jsKKl43Zsh2cdacW&fid=0x0:0x1384332e17fc16d1"],"When":"2024-11-18"},{"Name":"TyrellTWheeler","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIudr1Rz0upKbeKoQGP82legK8Eyi_8TrgAlzalHAg4gjPpkA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I ordered a 6 ounce Hojicha Latte for $6 bucks. It was quite good, but a buck an ounce is steep.

Awesome vibe, but my water glass tasted a little soapy.

I would likely go back if I was in the neighborhood again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPkjF-WwDYU28J5jX3w3UmFkF69A0VuN-cIluou&fid=0x0:0x1384332e17fc16d1"],"When":"2024-11-6"},{"Name":"Pomo Foods","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKtB6LNlHbrXFav1QsAqWj8IVwhzeHm7gij5nLHRFzUdx3gJQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Upon entering Modus Cafe, the first thing that strikes you is the inviting ambience, a perfect backdrop for the delightful culinary experience that awaits. The coffee, a critical staple for any cafe, is nothing short of excellent. Each cup, whether it be their robust coffee or the richly flavored mocha, is crafted with care, ensuring a consistently satisfying sip every time.
The food at Modus Cafe stands on par with their beverages. The Essential Toast is a testament to the cafe’s commitment to quality, offering a simple yet profoundly satisfying taste. Meanwhile, the Avocado Toast is a flavorful journey, with fresh ingredients that speak to the cafe’s dedication to freshness and flavor.
In summary, Modus Cafe on Broadway is a gem worth visiting, whether you’re in search of a great cup of coffee, a delicious bite, or just a serene spot to unwind.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipODpX2myB4vu9maQZJNre75kcwE_8swiff4Kv9Y&fid=0x0:0x1384332e17fc16d1"],"When":"2024-3-24"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Beata Siwinski","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXFYw89ptgGemYe_yUFrSnwTt-2pbY2DxzJx1Lq-sO2SpK9wIfT=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Beautiful spacey cafe with lots of natural light. Delicious matcha latte and one of the best choc almond croissant 🥐🤤  Very annoyed by the crowd that hangs out with laptops drinking only water. Looking at previous reviews I'm quite amazed how accepting are the cafe owners. If this was my cafe they would be booted lol so actually paying customers can get a seating :p...

They also carry amazing tea from specialty roaster in Victoria!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP_XHEnqHO9TG-14ucCzngf_AMpJ6DjY18EOIPR&fid=0x0:0x9e0d9e2f4a4d44c4"],"When":"2024-10-15"},{"Name":"Jason Tien","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX4cFjIGeRfbs9lCfLsNCqwkSVNDOg03n-Pw5g2CUXqkOIMXlw1=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a nice brunch in the neighborhood. With a cozy vibe and kids friendly zone that welcomes all the family to enjoy a cup of coffee or a warm sandwich in a sunny day in autumn. It is hard to reject such nice atmosphere in this Oct.

We were going to catch some maple leaf this weekend so decided to swing by the place. The bacon sandwich was surprising good. The first bite was ok cause I had too much bacon so it felt a bit salty. But the soft egg and fluffy English muffin was not in my expectation. After a few more bites, everything blend in together which was an amazing experience. Honestly I never enjoyed English muffin cause most of them are too dry and hard to bite. But this one changed my mind.

Wife enjoyed the pumpkin croissant but I am never a fan of pumpkin spicy so no comments on it. It was good tho don’t get me wrong.

Mocha was performing well too. Not that sweet but contains a bit of coffee tastes.

The service was great. Up to the standard to make my day going.

Overall environment was nice and lots kids were enjoying playing around. I don’t see this in the cafe a lot as it is usually pack of adults.

It would be nice to be here in the summer time to enjoy the patio. :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOsiixjW8mvhkDdiG8gEtQfYAFWkM55T4oc5z8Q&fid=0x0:0x9e0d9e2f4a4d44c4"],"When":"2024-10-6"},{"Name":"Dahlia Thomas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJuQgMiJgQQUWXUpX_vLBTDbbMkB1XyhSnpGj8rW2JxPqajVg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I went here on a weekday to study and read a book. I got the seasonal butterfly pea mint misto with oat milk and the vegan breakfast sandwich. The misto was great, love that it is naturally blue! The mint was not too overpowering and would like it more stronger mint flavor as I love mint. Good drink. The breakfast sammie was yummy with the arugula. I have also tried their summer overnight oats/chia pudding with pineapple I think which I really like but they had a different flavor this time. Their matcha is pretty good as well.

It wasn't busy when I went which was great. The two staff that was working when I was there were wonderful. They were very sweet, nice and friendly which adds to the atmosphere of the place. A modern interior with lots of light, high ceilings, and open. I will be back to try something new!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNu5hqN8PwlpY3s_6jjA-KukPfhBQmxLi-I__Sg&fid=0x0:0x9e0d9e2f4a4d44c4"],"When":"2024-12-9"},{"Name":"Meiji Ng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWqGk-Vnkp9G1pS_fYgeST0ZwKp8nb9wEb2fz6quulGMqG5NngemA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good place to drink coffee with friends, also kids friendly, they provide books and toys (just to remember to put it back).

The environment is cozy and chill, the atmosphere is relax. The cappuccino was good (you don't need to add sugar).

Definitely highly recommended.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOGUue8oKrhu_P1od80Fz3XwE0uc4Kp1CnwZWuF&fid=0x0:0x9e0d9e2f4a4d44c4"],"When":"2024-3-15"},{"Name":"Jessica Dhaliwal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXOeC5VCbc6g3HH3dxXpDS9bE993HEKMDVI3SjHX2aNdHbQOJHQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The traditional matcha made my day and was so beautifully made by a beautiful soul. He really cared to explain and customize it too. I don't think the cartems donut was that great though","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP9MAPMO0EvtJyejb4Y7HOtQP7-gz9tUcN_KdIg&fid=0x0:0x9e0d9e2f4a4d44c4"],"When":"2024-9-12"},{"Name":"Liam Page","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLwLpmOVC7lXtcW8zZxHgvux3wVVsBmiA6xbOVioO_Z-EQr0A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had a cortado and a croissant, and they tasted delicious! Would be nice to have the croissant warmed up but the clerk did not ask. Not a big deal tho I’m being nit picky. Defs will visit again if I’m in the area.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMOGl96EAgW2SGqxHZB480RTxFVFDxcvxksgHXE&fid=0x0:0x9e0d9e2f4a4d44c4"],"When":"2024-8-24"},{"Name":"Clare Wang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXk8vaI8odicOm4apSk77_C5_lBI2gd1LxngMFranmQFokEsPvD-w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Matcha is nice, grassy, and fresh.
Wish the scone was heated up but to be fair they were 5 mins to closing.

Interior is super airy with all the light wood.

Whoever is doing their marketing deserves a raise because the packaging down to the paper bag is just 🤌","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPozCCw2z6U06wVTmJhBIzK7vobrqYv0M_DG6dr&fid=0x0:0x9e0d9e2f4a4d44c4"],"When":"2024-6-30"},{"Name":"samira","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIwkQGMre8jgbaip4E0o2r4QwZ6hsRUFGFhUhbAr4O--khz6Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Unfortunately the iced cold brew was awful. Taste of coffee was way too bitter and kind of sour that I had to tell them but they didn’t bother to care. Asked them to fill up the empty cream and milk bottles so that I can add some to my cup to be able to drink it. Still no good!!
Size of a medium cup is miserably small compared to the price and other places. Sadly will never visit again although the interior is very cute.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPZkqclxJycxbMYyBDHY1bGNupp2mhKuWXXDwwv&fid=0x0:0x9e0d9e2f4a4d44c4"],"When":"2024-7-6"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Akeymjot Singh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLepiJUo0etQV-hYwl1zBMjdtenUSL_zBA6-POUR_aw0hGcQQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Hi everyone,

I always have a great experience at the Tim Hortons inside this gas station. The staff are incredibly friendly and always greet me with a happy face, which honestly makes my day every time. The service is quick, and they never miss a beat.

I usually order a steeped tea, and they make it just right—perfectly brewed and consistent every time. It’s my go-to place for a quick pick-me-up, and the welcoming atmosphere makes it even better.

Highly recommend stopping by if you're in the area!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mohammadjafar Zahedi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK1evkwPjHKEG-OyOy9w1KKyT_IZb2_YK8tHbeEDQmQOonodg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":""I love visiting Tim Hortons! The coffee is always fresh and flavorful, and the donuts and snacks are delicious. The staff are friendly and provide quick service, even during busy times. It’s the perfect spot to grab breakfast or a coffee on the go. Highly recommend!"","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Carrie M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUUYEkrsb3Cy0IJqaFWqy-gr7shaxwIgCimqo3qEt8KL6WlbY7k=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The staff here are amazing! I stop here everyday on my way to work. They have my drink ready for me as soon as I get to the till!!
Keep up the great work!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Chris L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLepBSDtiuaKnVUlsKxP-quZCxKBe1WkYaILqD4KUUgE1nZgz4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"It's always frustrating to have two customers cut in front of you in line when you have limited time.  Also the prioritization of delivery orders while being understaffed.  I just chose to walk out, having never been acknowledged.  Avoid this location.  I will NEVER be back.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"sooraj brar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJzz3A5JnL9PVvJh0yEvLlsLd3vO2aqsHPE9_XE3krvW1ghlg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I always pick my coffee from here its very clean tim horton,their service is very fast, manager thaya is great she care about the customers alot.food & coffee is always great.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sentury Sam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLX80VC7aH94N90HDVmSDds7bVCp4YTR8sCxW6x1rlzVaeL6Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have such a wonderful experience here for ladies. Here are very diligent as well as kind and I like this location even more than the restaurant locations. Keep up the good work.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jordan Fields","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXCtYhS7bJD3cZ8bnfBXRVlgazcQOIBIQ81wAMJGxYKNLs211qj=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Mobile orders are always made promptly and are ready to go everytime I arrive.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPKg6bHOlgDHip9bN4TJSengCaKof0bLId42Y8o&fid=0x0:0xdc48f1cc09975635"],"When":"2024-8-9"},{"Name":"Navjot Singh Chahal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWuo-BiFSQMAdIsDOfwYxm0lYfl4gKUL-YDdxeT3tpYYf5WGy73=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Worst location ever! They say they are always out of chicken sandwiches. I felt a bit weird couple of times. So I did a test with a friend, I went inside and asked for any chicken sandwich, they say they only have meat ones, then after 25mins I asked my friend to check if they have meat ones. And the guy at the counter said they don’t have that too. How weird? Probably lazy staff.","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Little Tea House

The owner needs to invest some time in checking the recipes.\nParking is available from the mall, the Canada line has a stop here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNwhPzAydH0A2gZzavu70xhF5QKpsZ_P4FVASeM\u0026fid=0x0:0x865a60ef7689c21b"],"When":"2017-7-29"},{"Name":"Jie Xia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIgoxEhH7neGqw6-UICbUu1UvuH5elRjnjEzHtJwhjcpab8fA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Very dirty! user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Kit Yee Yu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUy4hyLjXryzPjKJf4N3DUJBAsHtZSSuk76pvxFtVmwfHSV1Gtd=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"My friends and I had brunch here. It was our first time to try this cafe. The ambience was very nice and comfortable. The service was great. Staff here were friendly. Interior decor was exactly what a modern cafe should have.

We all ordered coffee and food. We tried latte and flat white as well as the apricot danish, ham sandwiches and sun-dried tomato danish/croissant. All of them tasted great.

I also purchased a loaf of sourdough. I wish the cafe could slice it for me. I had to do it at home instead.

There is street parking right outside the cafe on Cambie Street but if it’s full, there is some free street parking between west 42nd and 43rd. The residential areas require parking permit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMJ45rkO7Y7nO-D_dbASFisY4NkHL6KeMuEXpBR&fid=0x0:0x697debfe1b5abc43"],"When":"2024-12-2"},{"Name":"Shonnah","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVryghpg_5X3Yv-cncwU7OGN26KCAvVhjXajvFLZ6BLUMNFRgyF=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I’m a huge fan of the location because I feel we need more good coffee shops in this area. This cafe has an open space to work with your laptop by the window or lounge chairs to socialize with others. I haven’t tried anything beyond their Oat Milk flat white, but it was pretty average. A heart of something would’ve been nice for athletics, but maybe I’m being picky.

I wish they would’ve had vegan options, but their cookies looked very indulgent. They also had a food menu that I’ve like to try in the future. Prices seemed standard to most coffee shops, I liked the vibe and would return if in the area.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNqm_Cfm9BBT1X6O-yUg2qKrdjkkNG4lf5nMAma&fid=0x0:0x697debfe1b5abc43"],"When":"2024-12-18"},{"Name":"Jaspreet Rodentte","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLlmOKHgT8-1l9rKiIaQsAUPS9RBsPV0yDDyLj-5uUW1p6gkQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Stumbled upon a new coffee shop/bakery. Service was great, lots of selection for baked goods and the cappuccino was made perfectly! I tried the berries and cream croissants, it was fluffy, fresh, and light. The berries were extremely fresh and even inside the croissant! I’m excited to try out their fresh breads next time I’m in.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM4vf3XtbW_2qvCZxfEvEfap26wPfxdiJSLH-MJ&fid=0x0:0x697debfe1b5abc43"],"When":"2024-11-16"},{"Name":"Sarah K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWY-JgvN5-mznvqsAYHtcaVGAhVC2l-m6xd8sNXk8E9qqKEPNzX=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Tried their latte, blueberry earl grey loaf and almond croissant. The croissant was my favourite. Coffee tasted just okay. For similar price range, I’ve had a lot better lattes elsewhere.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMhM9iLa7umKkFdQZ_6fQ971jIzN_P9XeK9hnEB&fid=0x0:0x697debfe1b5abc43"],"When":"2024-11-21"},{"Name":"Zoe Ching Yi Ho","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKrEFs9z7jmBIZq4_UMaJz8TrH2ZwH9DR3LSa5lTDnxUcXdpQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Today was my first day visit, I JUST LOVE THIS CAFE SO MUCH because of 4 reasons! First, I used to drink black tea so I tend to like bitter coffee, their bean is just my exact taste! Second, I didn’t expect the barista could make a super duper lovely and hard pattern on my cappuccino (she made my day!) Third, I know I am picky I cannot stay for long in a cafe where is full of “baking smell”, this cafe has their own kitchen but I couldn’t smell any kitchen smell! Fourth, free street parking and relatively accessible and even it was a Sunday morning. Btw very nice Jazz music but hopefully the music could be a bit lower, it’s not a very big deal actually:)
I WILL DEFINITELY COME BACK!
P.s. just realised they close at 4pm on Sunday but we didn’t get kicked out even at 4:30pm, I am so sorry I just didn’t check the opening hours carefully!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO5hd1LhztV7qJBfzaNXS4RoO2xWSeM6-Q0xuGp&fid=0x0:0x697debfe1b5abc43"],"When":"2024-12-2"},{"Name":"Mark Lunney","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWO0sPWnzhJWrby3AWLOv5uQ4-1afBYfNsaUGaxbwugZq1OCPI3qg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nice cafe located in the newly built Alliance Francais building and open to public. Good selection of freshly baked pastries and some savoury food options (baguette sandwiches, soup, salad). Plenty of seating available in a relaxed, airy space.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPb9bvpbUEl7zGDzaG-XuM5F_Ckv11bBzo9XMDg&fid=0x0:0x697debfe1b5abc43"],"When":"2024-11-14"},{"Name":"Conan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKONP9LZ55pWz6eE6at_ESUnF8ur4lTWEh3jE_EzN3U4qQFgw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a pleasant surprise! The duck sandwich is absolutely delicious. The cozy atmosphere makes it a great spot to work. Plus, the relaxing music really adds to the vibe!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO-UCpBzpW-s92JVIFrXdseC7QbwbuLHmgLB7jO&fid=0x0:0x697debfe1b5abc43"],"When":"2024-12-13"},{"Name":"maria angelis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWWe-8SYIfT4ZxUaZjlNhTyW_PFTAs_Pv8EL2x3dwXk8C3qVYM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"You walk in this cafe and you feel welcomed right away. Crème brûlée danish is one of my favourites but everything else is delicious as well.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMNEI0EiWEErRf860lInzhisUqbIF0YnfX-vaA&fid=0x0:0x697debfe1b5abc43"],"When":"2024-11-23"}]

title: Murchie's Tea & Coffee
address: Oakridge Centre, 650 W 41st Ave, Vancouver, BC V5Z 2M9
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true}]},{"id":"payments","name":"Payments","options":[{"name":"Debit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"NFC mobile payments","enabled":true}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Ben Klein","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV9R820F28I0t3X369CmfDuA-HVVZc86vM9sktLJOY_Gt7-9IRU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Murchies is a higher end tea and coffee provider. They focus more on the product side than the service of delivering a ready made drink/food to a customer. However each store usually has a service counter. Any of their teas or coffees can be brewed individually on the spot and can be cooled to provide a summer treat. They are a gracias so individual owners can manage differently but the staff at this location are very friendly. They have baked goods as well. This location is located right beside an open seating area in Oakridge.
Parking is abundant from the mall and they are on a Canada line route.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP_j6br8jys1OTJ4uvhJjHmgkivrAuz0yeVIzWA&fid=0x0:0xacbf0f4c13ac380a"],"When":"2017-7-28"},{"Name":"Ken Yu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX1R0u3idcUmfRlZoRd_u-LFiZkwGh6CUzCiO4khfI7LsxgEbNG=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I always have a good shopping experience in Murchie's.  The staff is always friendly and helpful.  The sample tea is always fair and tea tastes very fresh. It's very refreshing after I have a 2-3 cups a day.  It is a Vancouver brand with 125 years history.  I would recommend here if you are looking for Vancouver souvenirs for your friends and families.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Aeiman Siddiqui","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLd3uqppTbnoPTJNHu05JyLhBTYMfEOexLiGxp3wbyAUNtASg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A very calm place. I enjoyed their vast selection of teas. They're very decently priced, albeit on the higher side. The cashier was a very nice Asian woman who was more than delighted to share her tea drinking experiences with us. 😊","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Hinako Kogano","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKDp0Idg_FZikOEgJRn1cQp2Qt3yVRwcWAL1-S675oiGtUpHQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I dropped in right before the end of thir hour but they weren't bothered helping me choose gifts for my people. They are very friendly and they know about their products very well. Of course, tea from Murchie's testes very refined, pleasing scent, and highly recommended!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ridhwaan Murad","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXZ01NrIJq-bXx2O0TQQ_Nlv3d1BmJDfMG1zJNirVKOrJxl9RtiBQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My favorite coffee shop in this city. Coffee in my opinion is the best compared to any other. Its too bad that the Oakridge location is closing  really liked coming here. They are opening a new location in Langley at Willowbrook mall and have other locations in North Vancouver and Park Royal mall and in Vancouver. Try them out!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Paul Parungao","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX15JFNf9GpgY3d5q_6tHaj3dpFNKqHQK-EBi-xabwT9TN5IWXE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Ever since the death of my doctor, Murchie's Tea is the only reason why I would even bother stopping at Oakridge. 4/5 is only because this store doesn't compare to the decor and pastry selection of its Victoria store. Tea quality and service are about the same (5/5).","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Subrata Chakrabarti","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ5RDAw8Aem70tR9tIzdz9rELiNgtIPePCYMQ2ARfSBfQvG1w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good place to try different types of coffee and tea.

Marchie's is one of the most well known coffee and tea retailers.

You can buy loose tea. They sell good Darjeeling tea. Also, tea and coffee pots. They are quite knowledgeable and can give information about tea and coffee.

They have asmall coffee shop in the store, where you can get coffee and snacks.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Janelle Bomans","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLBWsI9c6XxGW3GhPgxtnXznCAiYPP5i7isHg_IspnLruYiqw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Great to visit with grandma. Cute teacups and saucers, fun tea towels and gift ready tea or coffee selection. Grab and go style counter with huge scones or muffins. I got the rasberry and white chocolate scone and it was ok, flavour wasnt great.","Images":null,"When":""}]

[{"Name":"Julian Worker","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUAIihGJ0nPhywlzeoQHsSyAq_fnDLU-MalhW0uRd0ukHQ1yOrY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a bit of a luxury item for me, but I do enjoy their tisane mixes and new products that come out on a regular basis. I believe regular teas might be better bought elsewhere as the prices are high.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jessica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLeTJ0Eiuy1B4kMeJTHhrZw-eG8kffCZqowVNlo8wvNkWBoDD4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This location does not provide the DAVIDsTEA experience they are known for.  I'm uncertain if the company changed or if it's the staff.

I redeemed 50g of matcha here and there was no eye contact or verbal communication.  I was not offered a bag or even a "bye".  The girl handed me my tea and walked off.

What a shame.  I used to be such a big fan of the company.  It's gone downhill from what it used to be a few years ago.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"kim young","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL8L2ChPwCos6rPXBFZaoypp0ahop5jzvOx8FxMmdP3eppAcQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The lady working the day I went was fantastic, taught me a few new things about the teas and was ever so helpful","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Brian Salo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVyewP0c08HcaN7t3AZyJHo4EKWhLs4yvqMxJYHqgRJJ42WXcmKzg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good selection of teas and accessories, staff was very accomodating and even recommended where I could get a product they did not sell.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Eric Tam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVBDHvJLJK8yYClCre44266hW3usStnZNK4KZNYN40XfPXehrI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best teas. Sparkling sangria is really good. Friendly staffs.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Stephen Berger","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWgtS-B2kSWZqQPtXBXUfX9M5ahyA-bdXkWbwl-g6iCUtsRD2RsyA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Helpful people who took care of all my special needs and requests.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nicholas Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWjmtRcIBNuTWuXkQPpjxys6thAPr9FcyFnork00nCTvNzSWd10jA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great staff - very friendly and always helpful.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Fiona McInnes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWyUcNABCOJr3Pv9mWBEGW0KJGYVnZ_I0LoXLoLpc7ZeDoK-LUo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Good selection for Christmas. user_reviews: [{"Name":"Alym Amlani","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWGCS7cfdRd9yppSIvIAypDkWBSXz0qghmJF3r1Qs4AKnQ6BCK-zQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I came here after a few years and had their pho tai Bo vien - the noodles are made in house, and the service was excellent. The pho broth was tasty and the ingredients were fresh. The meat balls had a bit of a strange flavour but overall I was impressed. This hit the spot for a rainy day!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNYyTtK6xHQQm_7V4EP1TdzGowcVnmGFdqmM6OC\u0026fid=0x0:0x8384b568dc950d9e"],"When":"2024-7-31"},{"Name":"Cedric P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI_yvAraBRbTSTwcrpPJNIpQXxxo3RLi03U7AsXM_EuPoGZ7Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have to give this place 5 stars, I eat there quite often and the food is always consistently fresh and delicious. Staff is friendly as well. The chicken vermicelli bowl is my go to, but also get the Pho and summer rolls often too. Never once have i been dissapointed with the food there. Very good for a chain restaurant, also the service is quick and friendly. It could use a bit of sprucing up aesthetically in the dining room area, but you get what you pay for, the food is affordable and delicious. Highly recommend this location for fresh and delicious vietnamese food !","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Anna Tan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXCswzGMcfr3PFploo6-Xg0sgdBAzYE9DQnPhniF4acSiw4MfbH=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The drinks and food came fast, it was great service. The food was also tasty and the noodles were soft and made in house! The soup was light and not too salty. I will definitely be back again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNLy8QSnXMR0_yQ12UV0iyK_BjnZzP-jNQWGcv5\u0026fid=0x0:0x8384b568dc950d9e"],"When":"2024-3-26"},{"Name":"Kiky Kiks","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWgIvVxxSYrbvp4RuGlQoIF1h8IVgflOoKH0hZNsG2lqQIRbhkfUg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I like this place, never crazy busy, staff is friendly, food is good, menu has a few options. Don't really like the pho here, but the vermicelli noodle dishes \u0026 drinks are great 😋, especially on hot summer days.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPA7jqgsGDnLKVWcf-pd8xqNu7c6yZogfVKRXKr\u0026fid=0x0:0x8384b568dc950d9e"],"When":"2022-3-24"},{"Name":"Darren Yang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXrSJBZ4CdT3wsB_u5MiOZI_iddFsqhkqT6G8U0Mt6pp0BkgU9i=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This restaurant is really messy. Dine in in this restaurant for 1hr, no one cleans the table. To be honest with you, there are 5 in front of me and 3 behind me which is not cleaned. Napkins on the floor. The table I sit is also dirty, you can see the chilli sauce left on the table. My first and will be my last time. The standard does not look like restaurant. It looks more like you eat on the street.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNstYwgbjHNIwTqjvEEdiKuGREGDYf3sUuxSyia\u0026fid=0x0:0x8384b568dc950d9e"],"When":"2024-1-6"},{"Name":"Behzad Sh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVbuicR3lwnto2cowbVAGrO2Ml0jf5lxijtwEU93dRkChaZ9Csm=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Please don’t send cold coke with hot pho in same bag","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN-muGeneGygtZ20cg9kSItKFAvECNHXnGiRPrb\u0026fid=0x0:0x8384b568dc950d9e"],"When":"2024-12-25"},{"Name":"Paola Pitalua","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUN_PO57kDNjhFYGDREdm-uvV9_NtJZk33G9UJZWatySjz7mFhI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I order Uber eats always from here. Never disappoints me. Really good taste!! Haven’t been on the restaurant yet but as far as pick up or delivery this place is just great","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPaE9iy0twwVBOQCZpW_37guNnZa8lrvHqUExaf\u0026fid=0x0:0x8384b568dc950d9e"],"When":"2024-4-24"},{"Name":"emily m","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVAWvT1gGhXuoBobMHac0KZoN_F5UkV1DVDMdAaqpRKtr526-rf=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I ordered takeout and they served the soup in a much bigger plastic bowl than other pho places use for takeout. so really loved that, and the soup was pretty good too!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNg2ZfXxK_x58Ru5K3X2vrI0vgm-iUMv1CWDzVY\u0026fid=0x0:0x8384b568dc950d9e"],"When":"2024-2-15"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Regina","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWgugBVDLSr_x7SQEv9dWnIKWQnIS4mbi-W32cy8juhYXxf6kpC=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I initially saw all the 5 star reviews and was a bit skeptic myself. But entering the cafe, it has a cozy atmosphere with various seating (indoor and outdoor). They have a camping aesthetic which adds to the coziness. Friendly owners that will chat with you too.

I got their seasonal drink, apple cinnamon latte and it was delicious! Perfect for the fall vibes and wasn't too sweet. I easily would've drank 2 more cups if I had the time.

I got the blueberry muffin which was baked fresh, so if you come in the morning it's still warm ☺️ the interior was fluffy and light and the exterior had a nice crust with a satisfying crunch.

I was able to buy the tea bags they use for the apple cinnamon latte (tin not included, that is my own), so I am able to make it at home as well!

Overall a lovely little cafe and I will come back whenever I am in vancouver 💕","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN5MmHYDlEMD6XUGXfPNSsjgDCAQoJmbmDRtZ6P&fid=0x0:0x9569f56ef605f5b0"],"When":"2024-10-2"},{"Name":"dhara sheth","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWux95rDd0ISs4pgNRpL-VH2xRtpmrr_-LiHCEtzqithAkJeZAqHw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Comma Cafe is now our favorite weekend spot! The mocha with oat milk and almond milk was fantastic, with just the right balance of chocolate and coffee. Also the croissant was delicious, nicely baked, flaky, and fresh.
The ambiance is warm and inviting, and the staff is always welcoming.
A must visit for a relaxing coffee break :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMWMPL_Ui7bxp8iqaX-hlOEm3ww9IxE7bYqZgSf&fid=0x0:0x9569f56ef605f5b0"],"When":"2024-11-9"},{"Name":"Max Cli","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLO48oNpZy20ZKJ0cWruPEH7vhSStdJTg9a0QgOlZcOkI14IQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I had a latte and personally find the coffee on the dark / bitter side. Also had the seasonal apple cinnamon tea which was alright. Nice place to work or catch up with friends although today it got noisy after a party of three came in and began their work / project discussion.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMXUmGVbA5Wh7Dh--cl5du7ysrYebkNxvqHxLxJ&fid=0x0:0x9569f56ef605f5b0"],"When":"2024-10-16"},{"Name":"Mel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU1Jf3TfDwlW-atP0P-0tJDy_XTYemXJs4lD5eWMMTqmOOm_SBw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of my favourite places to have croissants. Plain, Chocolate, Almond and wait for it chocolate almond, it's one of these croissants that flies fast after it's put on display. I tried for the first time once beer bread and loved the savoury taste and density that I didn't expect. I am a repeat customer of over 4 times and we come from a far place to visit and now I can invite friends to meet me at Comma Cafe. The coffee is great, hot or cold. Can't wait to come again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOmHFS5eWVBWAaLBX0MlRfBnTkx8cvAWtcrr3Ft&fid=0x0:0x9569f56ef605f5b0"],"When":"2024-8-22"},{"Name":"Danilo Teodoro","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU_rV4_xok36vIezJ6uAhpzSfyECA8ogmjA4ehyXVTr4dBqIAFv=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The chocolate croissant was superb! I tried different variations of coffee, and they were above average, but somewhat bitter.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOpT_AauyfJPDnixXj3Ag8BZnb1WFETJhq1Xpo2&fid=0x0:0x9569f56ef605f5b0"],"When":"2024-10-12"},{"Name":"Saerom Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLtAwAO05KL1k3aum48TdibcDVpIegErqvAb0-KjrdIvFxAaQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Such a beautiful cafe. They have delicious coffee and amazing baked. The staff was also very friendly👍 I've Never been to such a perfect cafe. Highly recommend!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNlMk4_FfyWsmpZdMDXDWtnDNtbGafXpyJS6LJ_&fid=0x0:0x9569f56ef605f5b0"],"When":"2024-7-4"},{"Name":"Lian Konrad","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU0KsrUJw0tJD1AaN0Egr4iSt7GRuChLxrYoLtWSL6QNU0XavT9=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"easily the best coffee shop in the neighbourhood, truly nothing compares. The owner is so kind, talkative and talented. I love the coffee, especially the latte and his wife’s baking is amazing! I definitely recommend this shop, i’ve taken my boyfriend, my friends and whoever else i’m with! Super calm, quiet and peaceful study environment too, lots of outlets for charging and a very unique set up in the back: an umbrella and lounge chairs with a lego chess board! Comma Café is a truly unique, one-of-a-kind place that i couldn’t recommend more ☕️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO9mSLEWQUV27F7nekUb3X986ncPI4dZzOpqwSN&fid=0x0:0x9569f56ef605f5b0"],"When":"2024-5-18"},{"Name":"Yen-Wei Huang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXAJkgig2wy7r5wnw9iaMXJ5KmMmwwfqmcW4tda0kNL7YaHBTvk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cozy spot with great coffee, friendly staff, and cute kids for sure kkk. Perfect for a quick pick-me-up or a relaxing afternoon. 감사합니다","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMCWaHWsje-rjVdmVsLntVZbWUnVopJCNhKFvlM&fid=0x0:0x9569f56ef605f5b0"],"When":"2024-12-20"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Miyuko Chuen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWps6lQQBic4FS0-KMkRHUqdMQq4IjyLZsElHSo8yHr7jMV91aGig=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We came because of their famous egg foam drip coffee.   The taste of the egg foam is like a whipped custard,  I don’t have a preference on that. But they drip coffee was delicious,  it’s very smooth with just the right amount of sugar as we didn’t customize anything.

The bale Vietnamese sub was delicious as well.    The baguette is somehow not the ordinary version of French baguette, it feels a bit thinner on the shell,  more like crispy rice paper.   The meat smells very good,  the amount of meat was decent as well.

We asked the cashier to cut in half for us.  End up he brought it out to us in the basket.  I think it was a very good service!!    Good job!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMBM94LvaGI23mtxtCKufqbiG3_dcqOle8r0zs_&fid=0x0:0xb4cce15d2a9b10d3"],"When":"2024-11-16"},{"Name":"Shehroz Khan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKkZszH48V5USjf-2BWMp2Mj04u_TovAUPcXP24qVFBUDwLHw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely amazing coffee! With hesitation I tried the egg coffee but was pleasantly surprised!

It has an egg cream and not just egg yolk and if you ever had proper tiramisu, it tastes just like that.

My partner got a white coffee which was also amazing.

The coffee is truly authentic Vietnamese coffee and it is just as strong!

Highly recommend it even if it is on the pricier side.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMimwyNmwI1DOA9MnpcOCZsg2Jx5fkGEfQS6_AK&fid=0x0:0xb4cce15d2a9b10d3"],"When":"2024-11-26"},{"Name":"Yvonne Choy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIIFW0Q7xh-F5JcFkrPpbJKBMPEOp5MmaKK0JXfxGE2LWfIjQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Update...Great sandwiches and they let me sub a regular coffee for the matcha drink.  They are the best and I can't wait to get another sandwich.  I couldn't finish it, brought it home and my husband enjoyed it as much has i did

I absolutely love the drinks I have had from Hanoi Drip Coffee.  The sandwiches are also really good.  This is my go-to for my Vietnamese coffee, and my mom will actually say "you haven't brought thay coffee for a while".

I will eventually  try all the drinks except for the matcha, as I don't like matcha even though almost everyone in the world does!

Securing the goods and crushing the coffee.  Too bad it is only one size.

Parking in the area is tough but there are a couple of dedicated spots in the underground, if you are lucky enough to grab one.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNz9uqJ1OUVdd3rhIAWAyCmonqBEsPEnYO6KqFF&fid=0x0:0xb4cce15d2a9b10d3"],"When":"2024-11-11"},{"Name":"Lily Ma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKb4h0AClLrlDrH_b9jqKE7h0YwMex0RucgB3iUrj82CJdqhxMB=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ordered their salted cream coffee which was super tasteful, haven't tried the strawberry matcha but it looks pretty.  The server was nice enough when I ask for a recommendation, I will definitely go back again, still wanna try their ube drink.  The sub on the other hand was just so so, I asked for no cilantro twice but they still gave it to me, I would also preferred the grilled pork to have more grill mark but it was more like just boiled cooked pork, taste was alright though.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMM-rJhA0w5uxVGE31zcrJJYyyVoPfZMHvlgH5Z&fid=0x0:0xb4cce15d2a9b10d3"],"When":"2024-12-18"},{"Name":"Idil Yaktubay","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLqBo9b1WeR5S5YkIxgSFOYXmfyOoPwijfDGjPUX2huA0mVjAY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We got the famous egg foam iced coffee and the classic iced coffee, and let me tell you that these were my favorite coffee drinks I've ever had! The egg foam tasted like custard, which I loved, and the coffee itself had amazing flavor and sweetness to it. Service was also super friendly. I just wish the place had more of a "coffee shop" vibe with lots of tables and good atmosphere but it felt more like a sandwhich shop than a coffee shop, which isn't a bad thing but it's just a matter of preference. Anyway, 10/10 would recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOK_qLthh-1E_godectUxLhlkJxFAqKPWbBPNMJ&fid=0x0:0xb4cce15d2a9b10d3"],"When":"2024-11-24"},{"Name":"Kirill Volguin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXeHqroCFzssBFb_ORDyG2kZrClHw9RKSuijbkNj_wCD_qqjTye=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing sandwiches, and the coffee is REALLY good! Especially the egg coffee and Ube coconut. They’re made with what tastes like robusta beans, so expect a caffeine and flavor explosion 💥
10/10, would come again, especially since the prices are incredible for what you get.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPijb2xSt5YearWeT_mO05ab2OayO-glEhfpuV2&fid=0x0:0xb4cce15d2a9b10d3"],"When":"2024-8-29"},{"Name":"Tiffany Chui","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVtfE7noBd8Hr4DMC0rNybvvQogu9bBc1Xs6RrvX6tPUI0yisURig=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Yummy coffees (love the ube and famous egg). Sandwiches are delicious. Can get busy, and not too much sitting space esp during lunch hours but great spot. Made working more enjoyable ;)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP8pWAziBs_2N1j3fj_MFD6BX1akpW4svOxUtrS&fid=0x0:0xb4cce15d2a9b10d3"],"When":"2024-12-21"},{"Name":"Audrey T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVt7NSeCmrDxjN6eGFiHdOku-giePvd1JuUbLyAEp6odBtHY6vv=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Mmm, delicious Vietnamese coffee. Love this cute store on Rupert St - you can grab a banh mi and an iced coffee for a delicious meal. I got the Vietnamese iced coffee with the salted cream on top and it was so good. The coffee really has a kick!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPGamV9MOuyuej961VAlptO-e3gHbvwqhOBp1Ap&fid=0x0:0xb4cce15d2a9b10d3"],"When":"2024-12-4"}]
