user_reviews:
[{"Name":"HYEIN","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKUNyZrmLJeqYX_sTsyo3T3b-P6Te7oShhYK7RSRPBvIDN5QyY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love this cafe💗💗 (한국분들 산미 없고 고소한 커피 여기예요!!!) every time the boss and staff are always kind and coffee flavor is also perfect!! And desserts are also cheap. I ordered chicken panini, and super delicious! Please Long live the business😆","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN5J52O0AipaWkt7ZgS365fhHEQhSTM9iHMPvbE&fid=0x0:0x6c89ce2572269409"],"When":"2024-11-9"},{"Name":"ARSHDEEP BRAR","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV-1Tv9-EDl2oD-vznzqIuasHzQz2h5a_Lo9apRS2kk4M0uw8g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This my second time and again its really good place to study and have some coffee with a perfect meal. Really like the people who work here one guy and girl. They provide me the best customer service😊 thank you 😊","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMZg5XqY4sSwraBHpH4wcVJXFhIrpFi5b24IYgk&fid=0x0:0x6c89ce2572269409"],"When":"2024-10-21"},{"Name":"Tommy Byun","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXQhlW94B8T2fhww-HWh0iFh-RYIvFitfF4mjJX2E5t_heAv3Lb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I decided to check this place out on aa Saturday afternoon after a friend's recommendation & good reviews on the owner being super friendly & food being amazing. I didnt get to try the food, but just 2 drinks, so I will review on the drinks only today. Possible update on the next visit.

We ordered cold brew vanilla cream & tiramisu latte. The cream topping on both drinks were less sweet than similar drinks that you would get at starbucks, which was a plus. However, the cold brew itself was rather bland compared to other cold brews I had before. Because of that, I liked tiramisu latte more than cold brew vanilla cream.

The inside was surpringsly quiet & cozy, whereas I thought it would be pretty loud & busy located right in front of a busy street. It was quite relaxing while we were there.

I dont know who the owners are exactly, but I had a rather different experience with the service. Considering the numerous reviews commenting on their utmost service, the staff we dealt with provided just a bare minimum service we had, rather subpar. We said thank you as we left, and the lady staff barely said thank you back.

I would visit again to check out their food & other drinks, as well as to check out that their level of service lives up to others' reviews.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPC9w_hO3thKKQQlQ0jkDZgv4t6t-EPVaZ0LcwC&fid=0x0:0x6c89ce2572269409"],"When":"2024-5-26"},{"Name":"Dana Sullivan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWQIw-0oOUNgoyniYugTscGkgpKJS8tpx4V0tAajn3ZGkNIfqEk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delightful delightful place. A quiet environment with soothing music, very clean with tables wiped down after each customer. Customers were mixed in age and ranged from laptop users to families/couples chatting. The man who took my order was very kind.
A range of tempting pastries and sandwiches were on display. I chose the butter paneer wrap, a slice of strawberry NY cheesecake, and a strawberry matcha bubble tea. The wrap was huge! The filling was very flavourful, spicy but not extremely "hot". The cheesecake was very dense, which is definitely the right way to do a NY cheesecake but after the paneer wrap it was almost too much for me... that's my own fault for not thinking through what I was ordering. I really liked the strawberry topping, which tasted like homemade strawberry jam with big strawberry slices. The strawberry matcha also was great, it had a nice layer of sweet and vibrant strawberry compote on the bottom, which combined nicely with the unsweetened matcha for a balanced taste. $22 total, which was a good price for a hefty serving of quality food.
If I come back, which I'm very tempted to, I will have to try one of their housemade cookies.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN6twCj7ekvrl2jXMCKnEtyTwgvnHTGzTjzpGlX&fid=0x0:0x6c89ce2572269409"],"When":"2024-5-26"},{"Name":"Stella Oh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWvqyQ2KS_YIN6XYOMkDtQZO2ezjEJLWRODsOzNFIWuIhCYtAL-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My husband and I stopped by out of curiosity. We've only tried the iced americano, but I've got to say, they know how to make a mean iced americano! It was seriously so good! I can't wait to come back to try their other drinks.

The owners greeted us with wide smiles when we entered and walked out. That's not something you see every day. I sincerely hope their business continues to grow and flourish in this neighbourhood.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOBpDteIlLwj-mtqkTnijPeXV8IVbKK-TbCHxjk&fid=0x0:0x6c89ce2572269409"],"When":"2024-5-21"},{"Name":"Anna Armitage","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW167LDjPh-2gRccaMmZlISBWI2l2wuI5r0DAJu_qnguqLBPsLN=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fantastic first visit. Coffee was good and the apple fritter delicious. Service was excellent and super friendly. Lovely atmosphere on a Sunday afternoon. Worth returning to.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Diane (Dineoutwithdee)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVJfHVJSjIKAcPEXNIfUcWAtOeYHaXavqJYPtVJZ3lhCbCbpeo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wonderful coffee shop that serves up good coffee and tasty food! I have tried their box cakes and oat latte and really enjoyed them! The cakes are made in-house (like everything else) and make a really great treat that’s easy to take home or gift to someone!

Their menu also listed bubble tea and a bunch of other sandwiches and goodies that I must go back for. What a great addition Ruka Coffee is! If you’re looking for a new coffee shop to check out, give them a try. Their space is also nice and bright and conveniently located on E Broadway and Nanaimo!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOQwrxganVffJJFFStwWnGwpoTKEX0PotYpPqJx&fid=0x0:0x6c89ce2572269409"],"When":"2021-9-3"},{"Name":"Cathy Si","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIDlpRs03x4WI6FNSeNA-oTAUFMvmlM6SYwbJfP7MWuWEQU_hU=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I came to this cafe after summer school with my friends a few times, and it has been a great experience each time! The cafe owners are incredibly kind with their greetings, and their service is amazing. I had their earl grey cookie and their matcha latte, which were both the perfect consistency. This place is also the perfect spot for studying. My friends and I will definitely be coming back and I would love to try their matcha cookie!!!

P.S. Thanks for the free freezies on such a hot day!","Images":null,"When":""}]

[{"Name":"Louise Boilevin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUrbB57nz9izpshPwn7yH-SAdWr6iO_LJBZM25eopW2F0ZElrXPDg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Its nice  layout atmosphere of a coffee ☕️ shop ....its very chilled environment....inside & outside seating areas  .....its very popular very busy here  I could not get  a spot  .....they got besides coffee,  smoothies ,other types of drinks , pastries 🍰   ....its right arcoss the street on the north east corner  of the skytrain station 🚉","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP7Wiz5k4DcjDbH3oKGcM9KKNB46iMJ7CR63XZn&fid=0x0:0x6825d969cedc9137"],"When":"2024-10-11"},{"Name":"Cindy Hum","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWjH4N1rUDuOjyITDJwDvm4_wy9Fp9A0z3RcKXLo05agI102hxxCA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Tried the iced latte - tastes OK/good but quite expensive for its size (I got the small, with soy milk it was $5.85 before tax). Spacious seating with AC, good spot to stop by if you are in the area craving a drink.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMs-rEBrBiUXgV22n14PWB0t8eXQ4VvdmrYF7_l&fid=0x0:0x6825d969cedc9137"],"When":"2024-7-10"},{"Name":"Nikhil S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU2gro9JCPHAPqAjeRgUsgSR0xpkAH4a71xg2OWcjYsdpwFTW4o=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Quiet little place situated next to Joyce station. Perfect for a chill sunday or a rainy day.
Great coffee, and the spacious layout of the store creates rich atmosphere. The colour combination used throughout the store encourages to sit in.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMaj9IXKAF9KpUvaoLq0vHhcbb43nAZey6yLMDF&fid=0x0:0x6825d969cedc9137"],"When":"2024-10-13"},{"Name":"Catherine Dela Cruz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUL108xhKk3f1nybSeldHvpKgNzfmPacksKXzD-QTyokANrEKAf=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The tiramisu and raspberry cheesecakes are delicious. Shoutout to Amir for making our experience here in Vancouver delightful! He has awesome customer service, kheli mamnoon","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM2CPjf6iUs0JIUYwETDYOL4T1RtLULnmTaaITL&fid=0x0:0x6825d969cedc9137"],"When":"2024-12-8"},{"Name":"Da Wanderer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW6gUX2zsQKdIE8uVzYWBnKKtvYQAJfEKJppzMJqd4hE4TuUun8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"They have the best cheesecake and coffee in the area. The atmosphere is great but always full. It would be nice to have it open until midnight. It looks like people still keeps coming even closer to 10pm. I can't blame them. I love their mocha so much.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMIq8i0RjaOXB5VcofZ_UpsV3dQX1UGx5la_GSg&fid=0x0:0x6825d969cedc9137"],"When":"2023-10-22"},{"Name":"Danilo Plazas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXz7Hu6GFwqg3t3MjpVHwD4ku4DGW-33xmCihrrPbSQBzcm_yvjNA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I didn’t wanted to do this but is not the first time that happens, so … here we go.

This is the coffee shop in front of the Joyce-Collingwood bus station for the 027 bus. For a while I have bought coffee here but the past months (since around May 2024) the quality service has declined a lot.

Today I ask for a regular cappuccino very simple to do, because the bus was coming. I wait for it from 10 to 15 minutes. I’m the past I have ask for a tea, very simple and they just delay it for some reason, and I say “some reason” because you can see them, all the staff around the door of the kitchen chatting and laughing and the people waiting not necessarily in the most busy time of the day, then they come with a smirk in their faces and ask “are you waiting something?” and when you show your discomfort with your face, they lower they voices and talk about how rude you are.

I know is a random coffee shop like thousands around, but you are the only one IN FRONT of the bus stop. You have a lot of customers, and believe me, no matter how good is your cheesecake, the service should prevail about all. I thought it was me, but I have seen a couple of bad reviews as well before I make this one.

If the owner is reading this, you should ask for a better service quality.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"TS OS","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIrxJ8Fjd3bGSI8mWbF186RbFWyg_DW73VTS3OIkFaxPfXFBEQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Known for cheesecakes, indeed their cheesecake was solid and tasted good.  Place is neat and usually packed.  Good place for hangout or to study for little while.  Some power outlet avail for laptop as well.  Overall a nice place by the Joyce sky train station.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM86wWc4orijbZjxixrGp0cTqaX17wjabfkbcff&fid=0x0:0x6825d969cedc9137"],"When":"2023-10-1"},{"Name":"Keith Ver","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXVdqxLCf1LEt0AU82myo-eUqDcb2LcbdnfhupJTEW0sPAQ-qQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This branch is usually full, so I'm glad that it had some spaces when we went there this afternoon. I freakin love their Banana Cheesecake! My 2nd and 3rd faves are Oreo and Maple Walnut, respectively. The place is clean and the staff were friendly. Not to mention service was fast too!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPK0BJzzewn4FLuXdRT65Dn1zZsc69iHvpi7-Nb&fid=0x0:0x6825d969cedc9137"],"When":"2024-6-16"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Fuzzy Nemo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWMhjGNDhI-RZYgIiVRXnRDEQCiyyP-dsVjb7EhBkcymNr9MvYi0A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I wasn't too sure how they were rated so high,  but I read the reviews before I went and I was disappointed.

I had the the Banh Mi combo ($13.89) and thought it was a little pricey for what I got.  The bread was VERY good, but the proportion to the filling fell a little short.  The filling was tasty, but was not a lot compared to many banh mi places that I tried   The drink was way too sweet for my liking, but it may be gearing to a younger crowd.  Should have asked for half sweet.  So overall, I thought it was a little pricey for what I get.  This place also gave me a more fusion feel than most banh mi places as well.

Atmosphere was great.  Very clean.  Service was also awesome.  They greated us when we walked in and was super friendly.

Street parking was extremely easy as well.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMcIw1FOtxAMd0out_tBeHg4d9VpWc_seSXyDU0&fid=0x0:0x2842e0a6f4d7ef50"],"When":"2024-10-29"},{"Name":"Harmony L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX97YbJGgDhkixIysmAg7LhUzPTaejTdbO1bqSQ6PGEFlgRkbJniA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I recently stopped by Saigon Bites and, honestly, it was kind of a letdown. I got the street style beef and a ube fresh milk. The sandwich was really small, more like a snack, and there wasn't much filling inside. The little meat that was inside was a bit chewy but had good seasoning, just wish there was more of it. Maybe it would be a good idea if they cut the meat thinner? For the price, I was expecting a lot more. On the bright side, the bread was fresh and the staff were super nice, but overall, the sandwiches need to be bigger and packed with more stuff. The Ube fresh milk was only ok, the ube flavour was not strong enough and I mostly tasted milk. I hope they consider improving portion sizes and have a bit more consistency.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNSqHkVVxGE4OPmiIAQuJKYUk7tbZl4lnbAs980&fid=0x0:0x2842e0a6f4d7ef50"],"When":"2024-8-5"},{"Name":"Anthony Plaxen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW0TosyGAQWTqM_XvTHaXfq2jDGHv6ifKWBgTGcJKYnap3ceipL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Really nice interior. New place replacing the Vancouver sharetea that was once there. Came in and decided to try the deluxe banh mi sandwich. It was nice and crispy, good amount of meats and the pate was excellent on it. Really liked the pork floss on the sandwich too!

The Vietnamese coffee is pretty strong and tasty and is very sweet. I enjoyed it, I’ll definitely come back and try other Vietnamese sandwiches here and maybe some of their fruit teas like the mango one. Nice spot, cute interior and plenty of parking as well!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPN-74NdsT3XDXLQ6NDxCdhdD7FmVetDCnMhnj3&fid=0x0:0x2842e0a6f4d7ef50"],"When":"2024-7-24"},{"Name":"Alan Zheng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL-QmMYfw75kgf5vonVt_7RAAdUJRl5hAF6Ijht6iC6ZE8aPQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Congratulations to the individuals that have opened up this new location in our neighborhood. Here is a quick review based on my visit

Quality - The Banh Mi were fair in size and the flavours were good. As a personal preference I felt it was missing a bit more pickled vegetables and pate. But I’m sure others would still find it enjoyable without my suggestions. The drinks we ordered had good flavour, but I would recommend getting half sweet next time since I found the regular “mango passionfruit drink” to be a tad too sweet for me.

Service - staff were super friendly and showed a high level of excitement when greeting customers as they walked in through the door.

Cleanliness - it’s a new location so the space is very clean. It has a decent amount of seating for those who want a place to hangout or maybe even work/study

Overall if you are in the area and like Banh Mi it’s worth a try. Whether it makes your top list or not will depend on your preference of how you like your Banh Mi’s built","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPXOE_3Kk5BX7kY5ReDWyxdvwn-EUsihzcjJkGs&fid=0x0:0x2842e0a6f4d7ef50"],"When":"2024-7-17"},{"Name":"W L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK3lEbwV8e2v5in0IhnFqBGUt83IWuJaaihBPoKpdmjx1Wi-Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Ordered 3 Banh Mei; Chicken, street beef and cold cuts.  Bread is nice and crusty.  Sandwiches tasted good.  No opening special promotion or discounts.  Definitely will go back and try other items on the menu.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM1HMj2ENCCTImtuVwV3WvuhOZvMzk0s7uIyOaK&fid=0x0:0x2842e0a6f4d7ef50"],"When":"2024-7-24"},{"Name":"DAO NGUYEN","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWM6-Ah8H-aau7QbEyu1Z1isGfgI4pFJSL6QLZNAAKd95nmQtoBHA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"“Hands down, some of the best food I’ve had recently! They use the freshest ingredients and make sure each dish is done the right way. The Eggs lover breads and eggs coffee was especially memorable. Must try!”","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO31dd5XxHKytF-rkLzmdU06JTzdOVHf1ciVfPE&fid=0x0:0x2842e0a6f4d7ef50"],"When":"2024-7-12"},{"Name":"Do Nguyet Bao Tram","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXxuDdqZ-E4zojf0QfNOdvrpckyGALzVC9TcN1ddRxqZ-eUXVr07w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A Flavorful Delight at Saigon bites Renfrew

I recently had the pleasure of trying Banh Mi, Stickyrice, Salted coffee and High peach green tea, it was a surprisingly delightful experience! 😘😘😘

The Banh Mi was perfectly crispy on the outside while remaining soft and airy on the inside. The pickled carrots and daikon added a refreshing crunch and a tangy brightness that balanced the richness of the meat beautifully.

The sticky rice was a fantastic complement to the banh mi. Served warm and fragrant, it had a wonderfully chewy texture that made it incredibly satisfying.

And last but not least, you must try Salted coffee and Peach Green Tea…

The service was super friendly and attentive, adding to the welcoming atmosphere of the restaurant. I highly recommend trying both dishes if you’re looking for a delicious and satisfying meal. I can’t wait to return and explore more of their menu!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPr-HDguSkKtTfljOYOptI0RmlJtXsfoUCJvuky&fid=0x0:0x2842e0a6f4d7ef50"],"When":"2024-8-25"},{"Name":"Christy Huynh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWtUZPkXvr29k2BoCv7mKQbBDHgf459XPor6gsVOJZqCJuAXRgq=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"OMG...
A MUST TRY!!!!!
This is where you find authentic street food that tastes exactly like Saigon.
Strong creamy coffee, tasty delicious banh mi options and they have the Saigon Sticky rice with Saigon Bites signature Pâté. Soooooooo gooooooodddddddddd
Excellent service, the space is so cozy and chill.
11/10","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOnhY6j_TJUxoQTOtofYnBTHhJBO3xm3oPBw53r&fid=0x0:0x2842e0a6f4d7ef50"],"When":"2024-7-18"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Eamonn Marc O'Loughlin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLp0Jy4uusUGsa0ExIPnSy7ZZXPbKVU1ZwHheDXOZjN8__9YQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Was treated to exceptional service by the staff here; namely Jenn and Ella!
While just the two of them were zooming around dilligently fulfilling orders for others, they were both taking time to jovially answer all of my, and other customers' queries.
I asked about the flavour profile, and caffeine content of a number of drinks. Both of them not only took the time to answer these queries most thoroughly, but their conscientiousness went even further. They offered their recommendations based on their extensive experiences with the various product combinations available. I was left not only informed but also further excited to try their friendly / expert suggestions on my next visit!
I've been visiting coffee shops like this for 15 years, and I've never encountered such considerable service.
Excellent work, team.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Marlene Bince","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWOQVngnvgNZeVR9tofKG5bVHUpBDXhj67OppBcHp25yuSTM8S4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I dropped by to pick up my birthday drink and I was not given an option of sizing, I was given a medium size when I could have gotten a bigger size and the cup had no happy birthday or my name on it. To my regret this is the worst Starbucks bday drink I got for the last 24 years I’ve been a Starbucks veteran. I should have gone to another branch where there is a real customer service, I’ll not go to this branch anymore, I’m very disappointed.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ableton Limbo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIcsWSI2NpDtnvTh6bLTAXiXYlUxhlvr_aFma8We3OG6sKzFA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely the best care and attention to a sizable coffee order. On July 4th at 6:00 pm the two employees had to bustle to make it happen. Please promote them! Best service I’ve ever experienced. I’ll be happy to order again!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lister Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVWbNvO55wOzkDRxCcJ-fMoCcdWyut5hlx-H_zUreRnwso9_V0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great dragon fruit mango grande. A little wait though. Lots of seating","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMcolRGjwFCDtgk2AojWmSY71Cm0GreSrnwtE4z&fid=0x0:0x7d827727b2387f63"],"When":"2024-7-15"},{"Name":"Google Guide","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXNuhwlIn4-plqHLGD0QCOZgOCtCWh2WgE75DMJxjiWfmTWyXU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Steady stream of customers. Offers the products and service that customers come to expect of this popular chain, including. Outdoor seating on large patio. Parking is free in the Canadian Tire development; and free time limited street parking. #letsguide #covid","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMVK0Gknn0mx77psusMl3a2OsfV8_zKt7VMo05B&fid=0x0:0x7d827727b2387f63"],"When":"2023-7-8"},{"Name":"d","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJnPcGmSBR-PQvY5rr9dY_EzSJF4zDCB2mEENUDtqii8pN9Dg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I met jenn an employee there at the grandview location  she was doing a great job very personable  and helpful  i hope the manager  sees this ! Jenn is definitely a huge asset to this location and the only one who has stood out to me as being a natural at her position there! Thanks jenn  for the help!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Dani Broder","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK_Hl0gcDSJtJeVMwHFsIY9ESk-y6RdDIlHoiDMu23coICR5A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Kelly is the best barista in the city hands down! Always goes above and beyond and makes the best drinks at any Starbucks I’ve been to :)","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Penny C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXr5ZYZSL-Vibuqt3iFVBvzAmq3QyFEwjZdHXBZBa8nz3XUcMnF=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’ve been to most of the Starbucks in the area and was pleasantly surprised with the quality of this location’s presentation and taste. Their specialty drinks tasted perfect and the breakfast sandwich wasn’t squished or have its innards falling out like most others. The breakfast sandwich looked like it came out of their advertisement and tasted great! I will definitely be back again. The staff were even overly friendly which is a nice change. Thanks!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Mahima Gupta","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUHiXWFFF3Oi5iW9lt7RTeW0lR8DtRfAKfYJFDdEoFTNXdru9MraA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love their Rib eye steak eggs (very interesting fusion). It was yummy. 4 of us went in for brunch and everything was so on point other than them being so busy. Food itself tasted good but I took away one star for service because we had to ask fir basics (cutlery,sauces,water) and the table we had was a little higher than rest so I give them benefit of doubt of not seeing us and hence not checking in with us more often. But all my friends loved their burgers, my friend is a picky vegetarian even she loved the food. I particularly LOVE their Ube Lattes and go here very often for that. Even their desserts hit the spot.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP3VGvc-rSQc_42gM7ui76_Up5hatm7SvFnf3ej&fid=0x0:0xf7e0479c8fd0cac9"],"When":"2024-12-20"},{"Name":"M Vince","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocINswVKcv_7HP6hXe_zVU1zoGZNgim_-GL6O41VCeXNWV7WGg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Me and my family had my bday breakfast here, it’s our first time here and had a great experience. The friendly Filipino server (John) very attentive and always smiling. The other young Filipino too serious and not happy working at 8am, Lol. Over all the food was amazing!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPXmP2mjzK0WfcNnJ49SfzT-fuRt2TFxDNPIijg&fid=0x0:0xf7e0479c8fd0cac9"],"When":"2024-12-15"},{"Name":"April Leclair","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW8qOXvv_VFz9O28tbAgGBZmscDvFGiww6mmYiYZ2P1x6yNFbIH2g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing experience, flavors, and service! It’s rare to find a restaurant or café with such high standards, and I’m so grateful to have discovered this gem after hours of research (for ube 😂) during our trip to Vancouver! As an ube fanatic, this place was absolutely perfect. Here’s the breakdown:
1.	Waffle: Perfectly crisp on the outside, moist on the inside, with distinct ube flavors throughout. Highly recommend pairing with ube ice cream—but don’t place it directly on top to preserve the waffle’s crispness.
2.	Chicken: Golden-brown and perfectly crispy with the right temperature and thickness. Slightly salty for me, but sparkling water balanced it out beautifully.
3.	Salad: The dressing was too heavy for my mild palate, so I’d separate it next time.
4.	Fries: A few at the top had the ideal crispness and temperature. Slightly salty for my taste, but overall not bad. (Note: I’m not a big fan of steak fries, so take this with a grain of salt—pun intended!)
5.	Ube Latte: Stunning presentation, but tasted more like milk to me. I added no sugar, so that could be why. It paired perfectly with the waffle and ice cream, though, as I found the ice cream slightly sweet for my liking.
6.	Ube Bun: Loved the cream filling! A touch sweet for me, but balanced nicely with the ube latte.
7.	Service: Absolutely amazing—friendly and attentive!

If you’re an ube lover, this is a must-visit spot!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPiEz_v4YmHxJETzQ5wqBlhz4X0tU1VKFhZtSuJ&fid=0x0:0xf7e0479c8fd0cac9"],"When":"2024-12-25"},{"Name":"Ryan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWCDMUY42ah4aAgta84ssT2DYa3PFsR3r4fbxhBdcs3AXShIgTOYw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Casual cafe located just off a busy intersection of Kingsway and Boundary. Affordable prices and lots of menu options to pick from. They have free underground parking available. Staff are super friendly and attentive. Came here twice and would definitely come back again!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOqGnwOqwWmhg-wsaWNlu4RQkDIrKBI0FXV5hYh&fid=0x0:0xf7e0479c8fd0cac9"],"When":"2024-12-17"},{"Name":"V","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKPnAaaLFjZaycZQzsGkYKqDFLkgmP-Pd2h4uf4VmS2SPCnyA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We had a delicious brunch a couple weeks ago on a weekday. Located in a residential area, it is probably a busy spot with the locals. It didn’t seem very busy inside the restaurant, but the food and coffee came out slowly. Perhaps they were busy with takeout orders. Lots of menu options and was yummy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMDEuKZqkZzqjTOZFdvGqgN_Wg1EcrhoVHX7Sec&fid=0x0:0xf7e0479c8fd0cac9"],"When":"2024-10-2"},{"Name":"Annie X","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIIY0aKsdF3LNL6DZxF0791CDOZXJ3wetT_k2aNtk8nE9Sczxo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"It’s a neighborhood cafe that has pretty decent food and drinks. I loved the ube component in the dishes (ie ube waffles and ube latte) and that you can order lunch/dinner style dishes at 8am in the morning! The only qualm I had was the curtness of one of the servers but maybe I caught him on a bad day.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNtU8VdFDxmUAcAMQFAG-LZVvxOAB2arXKPxRHI&fid=0x0:0xf7e0479c8fd0cac9"],"When":"2024-12-4"},{"Name":"Diana D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK3IZJmhCCOBAZCJcU7Rs13GHMwpWoWC8_agNI5jWh8VfwaBw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had a delicious meal to celebrate my birthday at liberté café! John had amazing customer service and made it a memorable experience! Thank you for the yummy food!! (:","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPMr04fu956SUQYMsAFPHOpkMqSAmHAqN75B6GL&fid=0x0:0xf7e0479c8fd0cac9"],"When":"2024-12-17"},{"Name":"shams","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX2gzPl410bUkkl0oAVJ_Y1DTGQs2MixAYmW42QAK5ZRUtm-kl4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Walked in and was seated immediately. The waiter gave me water and a menu.
Called her over and she took my order and omg unfortunately, they were out of the truffle panini at 9 am already - must be very good.

So I ordered a chicken omelette, Tomato soap and a coffee.

The coffee came in less than 2 minutes and she also brought out ketchup and utensils.

The soup came in 15 minutes after that and looked really good. The entree came like 5 minutes after that. I loved how they spaced out the meal very nice. Also, soup was amazing.

The Chicken Omelette was delicious. The Omelette was soft and flavorful and the chicken was very crispy. The salad had a nice vinaigrette and I loved the little cranberries. The fries were normal kind of good and had a nice crunch to them.

Took half the soup to go. It was a lot of food. The price was also very reasonable for the amount of food.

Overall 8.5 / 10
Would definitely come again. The service was amazing.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPqWUg7lyPSyPdUvhSLcpYPUZe96zhTB3HuvTTu&fid=0x0:0xf7e0479c8fd0cac9"],"When":"2024-9-16"}]

[{"Name":"Brenda T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX21R_5u16kqQIHvt9qXxNqCuRkOusYkvwIs7ECZAUMv-eNNgAW=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was my first time coming here, and I was obsessed with the interior when walking in!

The place is small, but theres a lot of comfortable seating! The interior seemed very cozy and modern.

Usually, when I go to a new place, I like to order a simple vanilla latte to test out the coffee. Its quite hard to mess up a vanilla latte as well. The latte turned out amazing! It was delicious.

My friend ordered the biscoff latte cause it sounded divine. She said it was the perfect amount of sweetness and that it was pleasant.

Overall, It is definitely worth the visit! Next time I must try their baked goods, I usually buy sweets at every cafe I go to. But I didn't feel hungry this time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPQ4j5zLpjpBti6Pl5QdwHjILEdO5cfHK5DyoFx&fid=0x0:0xe6be21ee7360e5b1"],"When":"2024-12-19"},{"Name":"Amy Liao","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUu8UFRwL3Ue-zEyeA8badxTmuHVHWPsUDeOv0avYvhFiB6bGjt=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently visited Cafe Episode, it is cute and well-decorated and was really impressed! The atmosphere is cozy, with some seating available, although it can get a bit busy at times. It's conveniently located just a short walk from the Skytrain station, making it easy to stop by. I didn't get to try their specialty coffee this time, but I'll definitely be back to give it a go. Looking forward to my next visit!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMJ68GdBkBW16zniFnp12td2tL0P36wbIVYh327&fid=0x0:0xe6be21ee7360e5b1"],"When":"2024-12-14"},{"Name":"Charlotte","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWM_s0RPsBVKdsIne2DZC-eLK_Q0b3GCgjcoVSu6bwcdeEwn6IA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️☆
I visited Cafe Episode and had a strawberry cake and lotus latte. Both were delicious and beautifully presented. The ambiance of the cafe was cozy and inviting, making it a great spot to relax. Although I found the prices a bit high, the quality and overall experience made it worthwhile. Definitely recommend stopping by if you’re in the area!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMhSRHd-pmFezFgrcPh4sRveQQ8UJ2G7LGeTIlj&fid=0x0:0xe6be21ee7360e5b1"],"When":"2024-12-22"},{"Name":"0104","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWQJhihv9bLbGIJ90MQBwvhteAjP0X6gOfLW-j6zmmQIJnBTnaSNw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The strawberry latte was sweet and delicious. However, the strawberry cake was a bit disappointing. The sponge was slightly dry, and the cream had a lumpy texture that didn’t feel smooth. There were only about two strawberries in total, and adding more strawberries in the middle would have improved the texture. Also, don’t forget there’s an extra $1 charge for cake packaging. Next time, I’ll probably try a bread option without cream.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNJacRE5g0H9BEh9IH5QV5cQdSW1drB_c7s1Dj7&fid=0x0:0xe6be21ee7360e5b1"],"When":"2024-12-25"},{"Name":"sunny jeon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJk0fRF-LuUTeDrZPmHMMoFjzgrHvEwUMs7Bcoadp0Su0WfUw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It's a macarons that even my puppy wants to eat. It's so delicious. The matcha cake is tasty too. All the bread is delicious, and the coffee is great too :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPWC8VmKLKJAONagnJdNGJSlpnwFFU2sM4Otb3r&fid=0x0:0xe6be21ee7360e5b1"],"When":"2024-12-10"},{"Name":"z z","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIKZsbYR914Jg5pNEtIxJ7vY8GGI5PIavvXHTvwgd_7iUvOOQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"New hidden jam in vancouver! Everything was perfect😍🥰 Staffs are so kindly and nice, calm cozy vibe❤️I heard they make their bread everyday. I recommend all pf their bread especially almond crossiants and salty bread🤩","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNjVVlVW1-GRzueCFId6LG_ezntKKoIjgnA0P8g&fid=0x0:0xe6be21ee7360e5b1"],"When":"2024-12-10"},{"Name":"Amy Hong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWSQVPZOnsutlfrAtlg4v3QYtV8_umyf6xJAapYFUFV_KY6rcQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Their vanilla latte was pretty good. Their wi-fi is not ready yet since they opened a few days ago, but the owner said it's coming.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOM29l4MblE0LjnlByODm8tXbkIfHT5K4zi9kr1&fid=0x0:0xe6be21ee7360e5b1"],"When":"2024-12-10"},{"Name":"lala Yoon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVQb-mUd5ZhQZMkeu7EGIeTblxCvLRxXhXhbAhmcMTIIuj49Sg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Of course, the coffee is super good.
Additionally, The atmosphere was so comfy and cozy for chatting w my friends.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOb1XqdV5dPcG0Ee5xasF76NKTwE7FF3lNPOW1n&fid=0x0:0xe6be21ee7360e5b1"],"When":"2024-12-10"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"V","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKPnAaaLFjZaycZQzsGkYKqDFLkgmP-Pd2h4uf4VmS2SPCnyA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This bakery/coffee shop is the perfect little gem. If you haven’t given it a try, you definitely should. It is a bright and airy space to enjoy coffee and a special treat. On our first visit, we had coffee and flattened almond croissant. There’s a wide variety of baked goodies to choose from. I came back a second time to pick up some truffles that were nicely packaged into a gift box. The patience and service I received was excellent.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOrRie2Vjm5qOyCxSWiB9xUwO7eF6W25wOl1E7y&fid=0x0:0x37191a15d5dfe8c8"],"When":"2024-10-2"},{"Name":"Emilia Muirragui","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWVbrBdWMJwAdDmTKF2rqn3OE2f7BKVf4ff7Eui90G41UPNKe7l=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I was introduced to this cute patisserie by a dear friend of mine and it was a great experience! Their menu is full of great options, ranging from super cute mousse cakes to amazing filled croissants and both hot and cold drinks. Everything I tried was delicious.
I found the staff to be super friendly and kind, there is ample seating space and the atmosphere is quite calm and nice to sit down and catch up with friends, or relax and read a book.
What made this place even better was the fact that there is plenty of street parking, and for people like me who avoid parallel parking at all costs, there is a 2-hour free underground parking right there (accessible through the back alley).","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM5ExDZIXic6o5CF8Cyi78CaU4xv22mlqBoQ638&fid=0x0:0x37191a15d5dfe8c8"],"When":"2024-8-29"},{"Name":"Roxy Wang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIHbFHtHMGLBWWH02fDALbnMpNZExqGjM_-r8FNrN_e4-pihQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I got the chance to buy their croissants at an event before and they're also amazing in store. Their croissants and pastries are amazing, I love the fillings and they're super cute looking too. Though it is a bit pricey.

However we also got a drink and it wasn't the greatest, we had an iced lemon tea and I don't even know how to describe it and I think there was still undissolved powder at the bottom. It didn't taste like lemon or tea or anything discernable. It sort of ruined the experience hence the lower rating, but if you like fancy croissants I highly recommend this place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMUFmiQtIDFHMksPdDxFda3xyiW7OmRNhsref-A&fid=0x0:0x37191a15d5dfe8c8"],"When":"2024-10-1"},{"Name":"Fuzzy Nemo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWMhjGNDhI-RZYgIiVRXnRDEQCiyyP-dsVjb7EhBkcymNr9MvYi0A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I originally came here a few months ago for the ice cream festival and thought they were really good.  The ice cream sandwiches were SO good.

I came back here again for the fall food festival just so that I could try their flan.  It was super flaky and I would come back here to try other stuff.

Most recently I came back here for the Vancouver Croissant Crawl the Sake Peach Croissant was pretty amazing.

Throughout all the visits,  I had tried the matcha latte, which was kinda bland for me.  However, the Hojicha Latte was one of the better ones that I have had.

Would definitely come back to try more stuff.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipODJbPmJmg_VthRvCId1s_ymZnPFQoXSsKZA5km&fid=0x0:0x37191a15d5dfe8c8"],"When":"2024-11-12"},{"Name":"actionj007","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL3vSkBAqKJl0vg8_AMzQD5EEGhEVeYS2de8UbzcFClZ51w9xM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This birthday cake was ordered by my brother as preorder takeout for birthday celebration and just had to write about it.  Note the names blocked for privacy reasons...lol.

This is the Matcha Mango cake that has matcha white chocolate mousse with mango flavour.  However from the 3rd picture, you can see a layer of black sesame cake and the bottom layer was a hard pressed black sesame cookie sheet (not really sure how to describe it).

The cake was delicious as each layer had its own flavour but also mixed well with the other layers after each bite.  Highly recommend this cake and will definitely make an effort to come by this shop to try their other items.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNADnnAZMcJDwT09tT_2QOwMv4J1K6mX2ieES6G&fid=0x0:0x37191a15d5dfe8c8"],"When":"2024-12-18"},{"Name":"Miranda Sam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVOenv1E-65H2ZDMDpO1T1YaUWD4vAO-gcZQup4W5A9zdhcqCXI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Really love the croissants at this place. Even at $7+ each, they are soooo worth it. Full of cream, not too sweet. Their cakes are great too. I’d say coffee not so much. I had a flat white and it was okay.

It’s near Halloween so not sure whether the latte art was supposed to be spooky… or they just messed up.

There isn’t an abundance of seating good enough if you’re just by yourself or meeting someone. Seriously, the matcha croissants are a must! 🍵 🥐","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMJxq66s4QRZr1gxxpxmct39Cfu-0xGfpYgyvxM&fid=0x0:0x37191a15d5dfe8c8"],"When":"2024-10-26"},{"Name":"cm","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVQaHOxiacKSboShRcRp8qZum-7no7q16OHIEMmwZqf4b9pezVS-A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was my first time there and I was a little skeptical at first given the premium prices. After tasting the pastries and cakes, I'm happy to say they're worth every penny. I can tell their pastry chefs take their craft seriously. The layers of textures in the small cakes are quite incredible. The purple yam filling of the croissant was also very tasty. I'll be back for more for sure!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPJG4halMK2WXNLFWU-gXZ-MWq9db0bT43Onurd&fid=0x0:0x37191a15d5dfe8c8"],"When":"2024-8-20"},{"Name":"Shannon K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLxjI21y6OvOpQaUtVQbBMPN8zACLBZJNsUniJUWz2xEJus_A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I got the flat croissant and it was good. The only thing is the chocolate coating was very thick so it was very sweet. And I also got the cookie croissant and ice cream it was very good would recommend eating it was a few people. And the employees were very nice!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO7NG3ORr1PgbJlrbwo2SprX-tod-jTNNeP8PB9&fid=0x0:0x37191a15d5dfe8c8"],"When":"2024-8-8"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"lucy mckay","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL4TRKdfc6fHTTMbQpaWuWD2Sb01_d0yFWG46OosxLROSrkVw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"we ordered trenta
they always put too much ice
so there was a small drink
inside a trenta drink
so tired of how much ice they use
30 for 3 drinks that were there biggest
only to get liquid amount for small","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO3PRVpgXpb0qG_-NOsMtJBFuNQYDjkLyHjapaK&fid=0x0:0x7a758896e343fc06"],"When":"2024-6-23"},{"Name":"Meagan McCullagh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLej_peqaluakW0zqfBkpBSgkHXtVTCyq1bAx3MgegKDCYjwA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I ordered the Pecan Oat latte for the first time but the drink tasted mostly like milk (nothing like coffee). I told the Barista (Tombo) that I  usually get the brown sugar shaken oat which has two shots. She explained that all tall sized lattes are one shot of espresso but she graciously added another shot for me. I now know to order a double shot with any tall drinks in the future. Exceptional service!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Chloe N","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJZ-Bes6wl5KHxO2LJSsvZxCyOiiXBAEgPgbmYXfWhnmWJ2Xw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I used to come here often years ago but because I moved to the kingsway area, I rarely visited  here. Recently, I moved back to this neighborhood, so I started to come here more often.

To be honest, not every visit was pleasant. Sometimes, my coffee misses something, or it is too loud to even have conversation with friends (not starbucks'  fault). However, my today's visit was pleasant! because of the guy with black beanie. I noticed that he is friendly to every customer and very accommodating.

Long story short, he was nice","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ads","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVwDyuvQtXP_VygmU1rNXhUJ0mc48E4h1QtDkdEfrlXmuS-mYhL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Always extremely lucky being close to a Starbucks Resere! This coffee joint aesthetics, vibe and decor is awesome and a very relaxing place to grab a cup of Joe. It's also nestled within the tech center and a 2 minute walk from the skytrain which is super convenient.
I was quite disappointed to be honest, I mobile ordered a Blonde Roast Americano which they butchered with way too much milk when I only asked for a light dash, and it therefore ended up tasting very watery and not the creme experience I was expecting which you get from most other Starbucks houses.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMSukV5X5iEo4IPWCaRJadeafmZYtzv6MRsqxik&fid=0x0:0x7a758896e343fc06"],"When":"2021-5-22"},{"Name":"J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIRxgmxPhWqc3rGqP2iW5YwxmZd6lP4YUfLgXHeNFnE1V5HoJuN=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Used to come here regularly for my morning coffee however much prefer the community coffee roasters now, Starbucks drinks seem overly sweet and lack substance. However the employees here provide excellent service. Great acknowledgement, will know you by name and is prompt and efficient.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"John Ryu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWkGNLUrKdfIQAB_rKMz6yie8-FG7LpG2u-byuvEm9UumB1UR2C=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The atmosphere is lively, and outside you can hear the crisp sounds of the water fountain. It's a nice place to go to study once in a while.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"ARSHDEEP BRAR","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV-1Tv9-EDl2oD-vznzqIuasHzQz2h5a_Lo9apRS2kk4M0uw8g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had really bad periods cramps. I ordered hot chocolate. While i was drinking, my drink got cold. I asked the staff to warm my drink. But one staff maybe named Hailey made me a new drink. Thank you for much for that Hailey and other staff for great service.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Natasha Broad","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLKaZ3h_hH_qZmjP-UmO4AKCpGSaJfACrp_vlkq7pPj2KRl0w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I ordered a kids drink and was charged for an adult tall, they also didn’t put my order through . The barista did not offer an apology or any explanation as to why the kids drink was the same price or any remediation , just a blank stare as I paid for my second drink that she did not ring through.  Bummer","Images":null,"When":""}]

[{"Name":"Kevin Ao","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWkBvZ6ce_zHnWsLqA5ojfX0nMQ_CDE0WIX5k8yhZ46T8a1BLiA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing place for high quality tea. The staff is super informative and friendly. They also have a tea club for regulars. If you are looking for high end Chinese tea this is the spot.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM916_tsOJwCgf3kgxjADXxxVdied_wWtTYEzYd&fid=0x0:0xbf4ac58fedf79fef"],"When":"2021-11-26"},{"Name":"H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJxbLHTL4KvoFRumT0R3q9VBxjNMERI3C4MxPVfetncIfUu9Eg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A very nice place to try different flavors of tea, super friendly staff, very welcoming.
I'd give 6 stars If I could.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM07ewMtPtJ5FEbLAboJADVCnX488Bbf_qtLXS-&fid=0x0:0xbf4ac58fedf79fef"],"When":"2024-2-26"},{"Name":"Alex Chao","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUZIwlp7XQtjyUaePpkImtFOefBo06rszcx4qfiXJ7P7TpNC-c=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I went to your store in Richmond, the people are very nice, I took some pics of your sister store","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP9yKwhEiYlQm410bsQxUwuPW_1qXQBZIGJxISu&fid=0x0:0xbf4ac58fedf79fef"],"When":"2023-12-5"},{"Name":"Jon Ceballos","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL-22j1q4xkzyIDOSUq4N2jZTKF9fsmTv5aTRkQDHcDExYp9mg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great quality tea. Most is very expensive but they offer great buy one get one free deals. Always willing to make you a pot of tea to share. Definitely recommend Ten Ren","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPcXBrste4HvSivz1ym6ZK0URZ3rPGcGiSwmirH&fid=0x0:0xbf4ac58fedf79fef"],"When":"2019-4-3"},{"Name":"Donna Snell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUTW6tgrHj5Saaly8UaXOZ0j7oihVjrN4bn2zZ-s_NSvXz84fjD=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love my regular visits to Ten Ren. Friendly staff, good quality products at reasonable prices (LOVE the regular sale bargains). My favourite is the matcha like powder from Taiwan for less than half the price of Japanese matcha brands ... it tastes better too! Less bitter (the sweeter taste of the leaves makes it taste delicious), and it is easy to make a paste). I drink this every day for health reasons and am so glad I found it here.
Everything we have tried is of excellent quality and reasonable price for good quality tea.
Ten Ren is now my "go to", in all the Lower Mainland ( and I do NOT live close).
THANKs to all the staff and generous owner.
Looking forward to when they can host tea sampling again,
Gratefully, Donna","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Vladimir Reshetov","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX73g0NTVBUqUbdBFle8pRuS9fkrulpyMhgNAsRIeXpe1_7BkqQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I bought some Pu’er to try, and guess what!? I open the bag and it’s moldy! Moreover, it’s not even real Pu’er - tasted like absolute garbage! No surprise why it’s buy two get one free.. fake tea spotted","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Adalyn L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK6jPZ6TQVJ4g6ZK8qwhd5Ufq6dyIQEWKmb9zOx18NhSEDZNQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Come here for all your tea needs!
This green awning has been a landmark at the intersection of Main and Pender for years.

I don’t enjoy the concoctions and teas from places like David’s Tea. Ten Ren delivers good, quality teas that you may not be able to find elsewhere. Tea lovers, I highly recommend this place! The staff will go out of their way to help you find what you’re looking for.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Summer Anne","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIEh-kKVlfrpsMbbKNX80LuqPWctWtHV5rYBsVBHA2Ty1us4g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have come to this Ten Ren location for the past 10 years and the customer service is always warm and inviting. They always offer tea samples and will try to understand what you are looking for. I have noticed the quality of the tea at this location is exceptional, especially the oolongs and pu-erh teas. There are also some Vancouver exclusives that you can only get at this location, so don't be confused if you see some higher grade oolongs available that you might not find at other Ten Rens globally. This is always a spot I think of when I want to find authentic good quality teas to give as gifts.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Hannah","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLGP9Ztw8D3kG0KdchvzD1s7aRDLRQr3TSyakHCTbNh83Me6Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cutest little cafe with very friendly servers, quick food, and it’s both delicious and filling. Highly recommend getting the Waffle BLT and I think we also go the windmill special pancake. I’m so in love!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN5rnhqz64GTAcTXv9tdjIxwN1unxhyROKYDWdJ&fid=0x0:0x8df6412d5ffc40b1"],"When":"2024-12-9"},{"Name":"Michelle Siaril","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVvNHVR_L-5eCK2usU0kQoT055SV9vB2qDNPyrA7CmG9QXO2IM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Unlike many brunch places nowadays, Dutch Wooden Cafe exudes traditional and quirky decors with guests’ pictures, wooden shoes, and other Dutch home decorations.
Food portions were huge, we ordered 3 dishes for 5 people and couldn’t finish. Everything was just okay, didn’t really match my expectations.

Bali Bali Pannekoek ($16.95) 4/10
Yeah, this one didn’t quite work out the way I expected. I am usually a fan of sweet savoury combo, and coming from Indonesia, this seems like an obvious choice, but the combination was just all over the place. The truly bizarre thing was the banana, really didn’t go with anything else.

Mixed Fruits and Chocolate Pannekoek ($15.95) 6/10
Our table agreed that this one was the best out of what we ordered. They did give us a lot of fruits but the chocolate syrup tasted like it was bought straight from grocery store.

Poffertjes ($12) 5/10
Another letdown with how tough the dough was. I also saw that the poffertjes was quite burnt.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN1A79E_f31amSadHzbIABnozf8v7uZQe5cuT0&fid=0x0:0x8df6412d5ffc40b1"],"When":"2024-8-13"},{"Name":"MJ","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUlm_XRYtoUIMsDe0r0YhYfxDQnj37a3FGprKGl2_zxeQCNP_XX=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Cozy Dutch brunch restaurant; the pannekoeks were a bit soggy for my liking - otherwise service and atmosphere was amazing.

Great to see that they had gluten-free options for brunch here!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNZIeebRoz_k_2zzS4JW1bziUCZ1rkBAW2eJU7m&fid=0x0:0x8df6412d5ffc40b1"],"When":"2024-11-13"},{"Name":"Bradley Jang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVXvbQEoPbfDtKSiL1w2D8BxgpbS0wS1yngxbJzONA1mfC72Hfd=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Recently moved nearby and thought I'd try this place out. Eclectic decor and a helpful waitress who recommended some items off the menu for my friend and I. We had the boeren pannekoek, which was very tasty. I especially liked the basted/fried eggs and the pancake/crepe. Would definitely like to come back to try other items.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPCSHJ5KhHsdwjWi0BGDbM57wzFibG6HQMFp_s9&fid=0x0:0x8df6412d5ffc40b1"],"When":"2024-9-3"},{"Name":"Ginger Cat","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIJYlweOiUSNSZ-IzUX1YqE_CUJ4CQVz0WcfyGAKJxUpYgzGTM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is amazing. The food was great, tried bitter balls for the first time. The Windmill was delicious. Finished with the Poffertjes. The music was banging, service was top notch and the decor is fun and interesting.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPUECbCpneXMZryQVVP9ncerXHOfK07DVoUgr0X&fid=0x0:0x8df6412d5ffc40b1"],"When":"2024-9-25"},{"Name":"Grace Wang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI2Gi0ImD_jtFaRjI_I4TvVHE6110eG-TPY1JG8d59XQJNTtA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Food had a big portion, I ordered the omelette with beef and came with two slices of buttered bread, side salad &potato. The food was just ok, the egg Benedict was better.
I wished they had more beef, or sliced beef or actual sausage instead of chopped in the omelette.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNP41VJ5ys9N25TWXxi6kaZMsCsS4maNoJZB-3x&fid=0x0:0x8df6412d5ffc40b1"],"When":"2024-8-4"},{"Name":"Melissa L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLRQvcd8CJk3oFilDBUDb2u3m2_0FXp-hFP_LH3vY0ctbwD=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went to the Dutch Wooden Shoe for the first time today and my waiter Victoria was so helpful in recommending me what to eat! I am a very indecisive person and I really appreciated her taking the time to explain what was in each dish. She recommended one of the sweet waffles which was delicious. Can’t wait to come back! 😁","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Alicinha","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVNYLO9Mjmvom_lNi9FwvcTW_7QfoFQ4gDef2ZYR3i-KQRDhF3QBQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Dutch Wooden Shoes is an absolutely charming restaurant! The decor is cute and makes you feel like you've been transported to the Netherlands. The service was impeccable, and the food was both delicious and affordable. Highly recommend for a delightful dining experience!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNUfBiwJVU-n7n9yYi5t5Aeh1snCGDINho-NCqR&fid=0x0:0x8df6412d5ffc40b1"],"When":"2024-7-19"}]

The staff was very polite even though I told him that I was not a user and was just more curious to what is going on in that segment of the industry, they were extremely polite. They explained things to me. I had no knowledge of What a Peyote. Is etc. They went out of their way to explain to me how all of this works and I find it extremely interesting that in the future, this may be a solution for people that have mental illnesses, health, illnesses, and just want to enjoy and relax","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Julien Salomoni","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjViaO6gVJkm-aDsrcz_NkNmy8tx1NR_WPh1jW1IEU3WF2qJs0Sk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The London fog is always a must to try or a must to go with, so I went to JJ Bean Coffee Roasters then try their London fog, the team was really nice and I appreciate so much the design of the cafe, modern lines, so much light and space. Then I sat outside and enjoyed my London fog wich was at the right temperature, delightful 🩵🙏🏻🩵 thank you","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPsr3JxghoiYkuKll7lnfPIPNwpAVJABthqGMAX&fid=0x0:0x4b130ac067077d7"],"When":"2024-4-11"},{"Name":"Halle Higgins Wilson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWUWZe8Uf3XCErkJ6KsHIS31Vv4Kcxab4fCdTVazjAaDNdWPiM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I’ve gone here two days in a row and I love JJ Bean. But this location the employees don’t acknowledge you with a smile, or say thank you. Basic customer service skills are needed here. Also, I get an iced latte with honey and always ask for it to be mixed in with the espresso to make sure the honey doesn’t clump at the bottom of the cold milk. Twice in a row they continue to give me an iced latte with a whole lot of honey stuck to the bottom. This is not hard to do as I use to work at JJ myself. (Finance district)

all in all, my experience at this location was not good.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Elizabeth B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK8W3-FtbgJcbpOqNhQnd2oEoZ38gpA4FxQ7SdFA1CFZdGT=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"JJ Bean is an amazing coffee shop that’s obviously higher quality than Starbucks. I like their baked goods such as muffins and zucchini bread I love their lattes and the ambience. However, the coffee is very expensive as lattes could be 6 to 7 dollars and be with in a petite glass for coffee standards for around 6 to 8 ounces plus it isn’t the true amount because there was quite a bit of ice","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMZdEEtz8cD4_NN1Drk74d6d1iZr7Q5I5SKwIE&fid=0x0:0x4b130ac067077d7"],"When":"2024-2-12"},{"Name":"Lindsay Ellis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLwwmnkWxcrNSv1rr30sB5Ct5DBledWBfQlnSV7o9dRPycWJg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I got a decaf latte and was pleasantly surprised by how good it was (usually dislike decaf but it was after 3pm so was trying to be sensible). I also had a delicious egg, cheese and tomato bagel which was the perfect grey afternoon treat! My only qualm is that the coffee was pretty pricey for the smallest size they had available (over $6!)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMZFzE9dEFvjoeupb1RUqcscovfZsupvXur-1Gk&fid=0x0:0x4b130ac067077d7"],"When":"2023-3-12"},{"Name":"Jim Fong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV3tXWnX8xFhA_qZcSgIAVcjedjNVtb5Riz6aB4ltUNzTkDmgfU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"All the JJBean locations are fantastic. This one on Cambie is no exception.

I probably go for their Railtown blend at least 5 times a week. Their coffee and pastries are consistently GREAT 👍. My all time favourite is their gooey Butter Tarts. 😋😋

The best part of this location is the outdoor seating area on W18th ave.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOi_FeCipd1YS5AFsrGZTc0JwRJ09aVQMoqBNXJ&fid=0x0:0x4b130ac067077d7"],"When":"2023-10-11"},{"Name":"Life Of Why","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXfCfiVKMEPJFYoG7RsgTupoJpqGSCfJhNDNZ769JJBEiXvVvKH=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I ordered 8oz coffee in a 12oz cup and was handed a half full 12oz cup after paying $3.66 including tip.

I humbly inquire; is this actually 8oz worth of coffee?

While looking annoyed with me the person at the counter grabbed an 8oz cup, flled it to the brim, and poured it into the 12oz cup.

The result was much different than previously. Was basically 85% full.

I simply said thanks and removed myself, but the reaction or lack of one resembling anything remotely close to thanking me for my time and effort was missing.

Now, sipping the $3.66 regualr coffee outside, I'm asking myself what have I done other than to order a drink and pay for it with tip that I should be subjected to such a poor experience.  Adding to this, the coffee is too strong and tastes horrible.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kristy Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWEfZ2rjxNiODjhooQ3vu4wU52UFmMssx1nBEw-QrGtiP3D8nPb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love the chicken wrap that they have here, always delicious to me. Although I wouldn’t mind some guacamole to go with it. The mocha is typically very consistant and yummy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMRUe7KRubcifaUSDHp8AGLYscJRoj5YTnXedDu&fid=0x0:0x4b130ac067077d7"],"When":"2022-10-5"},{"Name":"Andrew Stibbs","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWh7pHEWLUGmZDj98Vhx5wd6myRa55_N8_qeviKoERAyM0o-3Hy=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I love JJ Bean but they must do better demand management as they are running out of food (muffins) far too early in the day.  Come on guys get with it.  Your lost sales must be enormous and I had to eat one of the less popular muffins.","Images":null,"When":""}]
