user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Hye","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjULQQSi1mhNFty7n8ZPesKkMpD31jiIGazltx_wRmE-swaOwr4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place serves a really nice matcha latte. I don’t usually like my coffee or matcha sweet, but their pistachio white chocolate matcha latte had just the right amount of sweetness—even though I didn’t ask for it to be less sweet! The oat latte was good too, though not one of the best I’ve had. The only downside is the slightly high price, but they don’t charge extra for milk alternatives or tipping. I hope they can expand the space so more people can enjoy spending time here. Oh, and their cookie is pretty good too!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMhIhq7ncHz0nw3UVWuwyd0DSlRHicpHY8jdSs&fid=0x0:0x194e917a3c7d586d"],"When":"2024-12-24"},{"Name":"An Le","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXF01TBYc3PKsxbdTmX6Nyb3k8CUa16dz0pehTu-KrjeP5-RXU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Stopped by after my run for a coffee and was genuinely impressed. The coffee was perfectly balanced and full of flavor. I also tried their cardamom bun—absolutely exceptional, like something you’d find in a top Tokyo coffee spot. The combination of outstanding coffee, delicious pastries, and friendly service makes this place a gem. Plus, the simple, no-tipping menu is a nice touch. Here’s hoping Vancouver gets more spots like this","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPzOgbN4-VDMRAr7KvVZpp7O7FNjcrgyV6ugGs&fid=0x0:0x194e917a3c7d586d"],"When":"2024-11-3"},{"Name":"Winnie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKgZ4fsLTxrpu_oZcUbMm-sl1fo5F9h0aJamED8pT1w7ioU6nOd=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A great new coffee shop in the heart of the Douglas Park Community.   A coffee shop that states no tipping as they pay their employees a sustainable wage.

Only a couple food items on the menu and various coffee/tea choices - don't expect to come to get a huge menu as simpler and less is actually better.   Their Hojicha latte was delicious when I had it.

I would be a repeat customer.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipML7ugkekSxhHuFpM45MSyaO3DGF0Dnb_CwGjnJ&fid=0x0:0x194e917a3c7d586d"],"When":"2024-11-26"},{"Name":"Mar M.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKPsU37lph3WCoUer9hGpW5esNjqO5X44hXw-f04YFWktsI5g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great strawberry matcha, and the cardamom buns did not disappoint. However, their previous location/pop-up at Dear Gus, was a lot nicer and had more room.
This new place is tiny and only has 3 or 4 tables. It’s nice inside, but very hard to secure a table on a weekend. We also didn’t love that they are not laptop-free, since it really is small in there. Some people were even reading books…while there was a long lineup.
Overall an okay experience, but don’t think we’ll be back all the way to Oak street just to pick up take out.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPKcJK-8syvjdVfJ0UP-4cIq1HZmMgBscTsoZu-&fid=0x0:0x194e917a3c7d586d"],"When":"2024-9-17"},{"Name":"Legacy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUXQg7prS8tNAl2i5P5LzyBrTTk38n6CADtOfxuAupj38ssPTEq=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Visited Cowdog last week to try their five course Fika tasting menu and it did not disappoint! The thoughtfulness put into the menu was evident through each drink/food item being carefully explained by our barista.

Everything was perfect, but the citrus madeleine dipped in matcha, cardamom buns + oat milk cortado were the highlights for me (shocked because i don’t even like matcha like that!).

Excited to come back again and try other items on the menu! Thank you to Ilesh for the amazing service and for making our first experience at Cowdog so memorable — we’ll definitely be back soon🐄🐶☕️✨","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNO7RmY-L0qwK8HDaX9rdBdXjWBk_Ca9lRNnlnd&fid=0x0:0x194e917a3c7d586d"],"When":"2024-10-23"},{"Name":"Irene","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV6K_QIzdeNMTsJcQ6rYUQDvNA1zQVLnU8yjjJ-o3cmLoND1zU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I didn't have a chance to visit them at the pop-up, but I finally got to see their new permanent location. It has a great atmosphere. The staff were amiable and explained the details of their items to me as a first-time visitor. I'll definitely come back to have more of their delicious strawberry matcha.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMZ6rbvHapoXa3wiO91ZlJ4RGpOtCgDWrK2kRMS&fid=0x0:0x194e917a3c7d586d"],"When":"2024-7-19"},{"Name":"N “Minaoka” N","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVLM29oukNuw0VGmRupQYbXCWQVv9sqfg5h3FP5AbyXShl2bASQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Super hype, went to their pop up before and now visit their cafe. The place is tiny but nice aesthetic,  pretty looking. However it is only suitable for take out because you barely can secure a table here. For me the drinks is normal and not too special, however the brand is very good at 'story telling' and does great branding / pr. Long queue on weekend. 5 stars for the flower arrangement!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMdvqtD2z-jMhtuDqyGfdwuAwQGehMhgJonBy9A&fid=0x0:0x194e917a3c7d586d"],"When":"2024-10-7"},{"Name":"grace","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXclLzFOZebBq0D1P6DXbTNuAdCFzeYlMZFVvgi1A5VbWvym50Z=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"such a beautiful aesthetic little coffee shop in downtown! i love the decor and plants that make the space so cozy and welcoming.
the strawberry matcha latte was delicious. I really liked the strawberry puree on the bottom, and I think it would be better with even more! the iced orange chai latte had a super unique, citrus-y taste that we loved.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP4pUD1Z71XVXO7Vyrs7nq9_hQ09mXRCXCrqhRL&fid=0x0:0x194e917a3c7d586d"],"When":"2024-11-24"}]

title: 101 BOBA - CAMBIE ST
address: V5Z 2V5, British Columbia, Vancouver, Cambie St, 101 BOBA - CAMBIE ST
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Sandy Y. (CameraGourmet)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJQ9J8ig1HwUQBJbXRdKDIwR0OrTw3YtQtyHDEaRuCN8XnUDg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’ve tried 101 Boba at various locations, and I hit up the Cambie store this time.

I especially love the Cambie location because it’s close to Vancouver City Hall, where I can sip my drink and spend the day at the community garden—it is the perfect spot to chill!

101 Boba on Cambie has a wide variety of flavours and toppings, so you can mix and match them to create your dream drink with just the right amount of ice and sweetness.

Our faves:
* Four Season Milk Tea with Grass Jelly
* Strawberry Smoothie with Green Tea Jelly
* Four Season with Mango Sorbetto and Coconut Jelly – We saw a lot of people ordering this one, so we gave it a try.  It’s now a new favourite!

And, of course, we couldn’t leave without trying the classic Bubble Waffle, served hot and fresh in a paper bag.  Yum!
The staff was super friendly.  We can’t wait to come back for another bubble tea run!

If you're a bubble tea lover, you definitely need to check out 101 BöBA on Cambie Street!

📝📝

Drink: 🧋🧋🧋🧋🧋 Must Try!
Service: 👩‍🍳👩‍🍳👩‍🍳👩‍🍳👩‍🍳
Kids: 👶👶👶 A-OK for kids.
Price: Range between $6-$9 for each drink
Presentation: 📷📷
Parking:  Parking can be challenged in the neighbourhood.
Tips:
📝 can download their app to earn points for free drinks.
📝 have a good selection on their menu.
📝 can check out their IG for promotions.
Would I Return: Yes 👱‍♀️🤓","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO2y2tvSb6OAroKidREofNkDMOiR4KkQuJ6Yx-X&fid=0x0:0x2e6a701058e1c2e7"],"When":"2024-7-16"},{"Name":"Martin Messah","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJZqTVTsiU7UWS9YA8Jm2g3zi_c3RMBoqxiJvMZQRN8LB_8lg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We went here during thanksgiving weekend 2024. Orders came in quickly and the wait was not long at all.

All that you expect from a bubble tea is here. You have your milk tea with toppings, fresh fruit tea, chocolate based drinks etc. you can chose how much ice you want and the sweetness level of your drinks.

We ordered the grass jelly four seasons milk tea and a fruit smoothie for the kids. They were both good and we highly recommend them!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lauren Shiu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL5ql7ebkARNN6nyaL-VdGSM9h_5cQnePgQFljadnIG6ywpJvoA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is my new favourite bubble tea place! The drinks are always so refreshing and they have a wide range of milk teas, smoothies and teas/juices. Their options feel quite unique compared to other bubble tea shops and they often have monthly 20% off promotions on select drinks. This location always has plenty of room to sit and it’s very clean.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPC6AilrgvcSE6YCNUqPXhRyl5hBtmx-49Om-5H&fid=0x0:0x2e6a701058e1c2e7"],"When":"2024-8-26"},{"Name":"Cc Ww","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJP0q9EHP94EL2cwLaPuRzE2AdbyVVCVuiEsNIB2kBAGc4ZZQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely loved the service here. They were so kind and efficient. The store itself is also quite aesthetically pleasing and spacious. Highly recommend the black tea latte with grass jelly and the watermelon slush!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOp_ovo6hamdxLmGtYU4v21ThD6hFarMSHo5UDs&fid=0x0:0x2e6a701058e1c2e7"],"When":"2024-8-13"},{"Name":"Vanfoodiepharmily","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW9aazSJPHP80D-tLZSk-Df0Z1flschyoYnMote5wNghG4jX8s=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Two selected drinks for $9.90? Here’s how! Follow @101boba_canada for details and all their future promos.

I actually got my first ever bubble tea from 50嵐 aka the Taiwanese version of 101 BoBA. I’ve always loved their boba and that is why even now, I always get a bubble tea from them the first day I’m back in Taiwan.

We got to try their boba milk tea obv. Gotta love the chewy boba! So satisfying! I got less ice and no sugar and honestly it was sweet enough for me. We also tried their ice cream strawberry black tea and Ovaltine smoothie. After a good mix, both were so refreshing and aromatic. I’ve always loved an ice cream and black tea combination, especially when the ice cream is well mixed. I enjoyed how the taste transformed as the ice cream got mixed into the drink more. Lastly, we also tried their popular roasted oolong milk tea. It was so simple yet so delicious! They have such a good variety of drinks!

We visited the Cambie location. They have plenty of seats and my friends and I have always enjoyed catching up over drinks there.

Thanks for having us! Such a treat!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMXXX0dBR4Z98iMQmrBysGMOeQtEsiTJrvYIm26&fid=0x0:0x2e6a701058e1c2e7"],"When":"2024-1-30"},{"Name":"Minnie Hi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKioPR6H4_HtFCBIc6IaNhHMwMBc0Rt6A30fs3XQmy6hHNj4g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The besy 101 boba in Van!!! Always have a lot of pearls🙆🏼‍♀️ The taste ií soo greatttt you won't be disappointed when you come here. Btw the bartender is super friendly👍👍","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM9yR9ToG36a8Q7erUG0PC48wKmj87zHSTQ4e6F&fid=0x0:0x2e6a701058e1c2e7"],"When":"2024-12-12"},{"Name":"Alvin m","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKxO0ISdL2MfR-Fsq1z1gwRrigNT-ixCOYGAsj0UrS02WrQnQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Definitely the best bubble tea I have ever had! Were choose two for 9.9 promo: four season milk tea/ jelly family & green milk tea / ultimate chew. Staff were very friendly and the service was quick!
Highly recommended!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMTcsR5V8J4XTQFo4eW-vqLVQa1A65IM3EL8lmZ&fid=0x0:0x2e6a701058e1c2e7"],"When":"2024-1-18"},{"Name":"Kaman Kwok","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVTfY1lFx7N7LsexryuKa9Q76pyfiBSBOSe4KZKmNeoZtDKwC8s=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I tried 101 Boba in various location and this time - the Cambie store. UberEats has BOGO deal so I ordered the Roasted Oolong tea with ultimate chew. Didn’t expect one of the drink did not have a closed lid, it’s almost automatic that I shake the drink before inserting the straw. Unfortunately the drink spilled all over. It messed up my clothes and my car. So annoying. The drink in the picture is the other cup. I called the store to report this incident - really do not want this embarrassing moment happens to other people, and suggested the store to shake the drink before packing. The drink itself tastes good. The 3 star is for the poor packing and spilling.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMDgaWj5rGcx1GL332K-BiRvk3_4m9CO3DHW5Zy&fid=0x0:0x2e6a701058e1c2e7"],"When":"2024-5-5"}]

title: The Golden Horn Turkish Bakery & Cafe
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"In-store pickup","enabled":true},{"name":"In-store shopping","enabled":true},{"name":"Onsite services","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible washroom","enabled":true}]},{"id":"offerings","name":"Offerings","options":[{"name":"Coffee","enabled":true}]},{"id":"amenities","name":"Amenities","options":[{"name":"Washroom","enabled":true},{"name":"Wi-Fi","enabled":true},{"name":"Wi-Fi","enabled":false}]},{"id":"payments","name":"Payments","options":[{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"Debit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"NFC mobile payments","enabled":true},{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":false}]},{"id":"parking","name":"Parking","options":[{"name":"Free street parking","enabled":true}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jim Fong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV3tXWnX8xFhA_qZcSgIAVcjedjNVtb5Riz6aB4ltUNzTkDmgfU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time here and the service and pastries were amazing. Also the first time trying Turkish Coffee with Milk and it was 😋😋😋.

My favourite of the two I had was the Coconut & Almond Baklava. Then again, what is there not to like about everything coconut. 😂

Will definitely be back to try some of their savoury pastries.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOtzZkQsF25DEIHhyaYNJ4aFqMHgJAuOnQTiEv_&fid=0x0:0x7ddd85f0e69d8756"],"When":"2024-11-20"},{"Name":"Karahan Yanik","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIVXwqlQQ61KVOptuViZ5pORN_F-jG-dHDLWj6e5orKm8buhTA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a great family owned Turkish bakery. We have tried various boreks and pides over a few visits and loved everything. They also have good coffee and baklava. The owners are very friendly and kind. We love their pastırma pide with egg and Sarıyer börek. Should definitely give it a try..","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNbbwaYTrTaZSzXw7f02M3JNLCyheHa8x4HGZWt&fid=0x0:0x7ddd85f0e69d8756"],"When":"2024-12-24"},{"Name":"Arielle Lok","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWtizUZyTvP27ebSmpanVv0Z9tQujmr--1qEE7rOUgWFj5vvv5i=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"plentiful seating, free water, great prices

im a baklava fiend and tbh! great texture and pistachio forward, but the syrup is kinda mid!! i usually like baklava with heavy rosewater/orange blossom notes and this was not it. but it was still a good baklava - but I think it can easily become great! I tried the pistachio, chocolate, and coconut-almond. the coconut almond was a pleasant surprise! id check it out","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPygpC54lGYKTe3inH6B2Nc4FzMRRe2GD-6Ji7c&fid=0x0:0x7ddd85f0e69d8756"],"When":"2024-9-3"},{"Name":"Bon Bahar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVYxxmNBMITdTodddc7qtpvtfgOqgeiqQs8kgnCKdfy963lA74=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My husband is addicted to Turkish coffee and we found this quaint little new cafe owned by the most hospitable, kind Turkish owner named Selmon. The pistachio and the chocolate baklava is to die for and so was the Turkish coffee and Turkish tea. Thank you Selmon! Your passion for your business will make this place a huge success!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipODhump5A3BuCp_Hk-KF2P9xFilT9742zCLeuc&fid=0x0:0x7ddd85f0e69d8756"],"When":"2024-9-11"},{"Name":"Pomo Foods","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKtB6LNlHbrXFav1QsAqWj8IVwhzeHm7gij5nLHRFzUdx3gJQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This charming spot offers a delightful blend of Turkish flavors and warm hospitality. The menu features perfectly cooked burek, tender turkey, and flavorful beef, along with delicious coffee. Guests can also indulge in good baklava, a sweet treat that's highly recommended. The Golden Horn is well-known for its great service and friendly staff, who are always ready to assist you with a smile. The pleasant atmosphere makes it an inviting place to enjoy your meal. Whether you're craving savory pastries or a cozy coffee break, The Golden Horn Turkish Bakery & Cafe is a heartwarming spot to visit!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMJvyV_Ou-KzUDq7Rd7WDY0utuqI5oc86XFksyR&fid=0x0:0x7ddd85f0e69d8756"],"When":"2024-6-17"},{"Name":"Shannon Ryan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJZERVht1mkBw4eudnwPMaaxNHaHF2il6AZoFRPDs5E8taxpg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"On the waterfront. Ordered the Coconut & Almond Baklava (the best) and the Pistacho Baklava. DELICIOUS! Flaky, tasty goodness.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM7FDVO9dg4rdIUp2JQkiOkI0RYcq47swAR4OA5&fid=0x0:0x7ddd85f0e69d8756"],"When":"2024-7-20"},{"Name":"Tyler Hazelman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVaOeOfMrKb93Y_IutfdRfQ5RnvS47tYfW1M-2iSLOIvO-Sl_d1=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ive been to The Golden Horn twice now. The Borek is outstanding! The Sariyer has been my favorite (Beef, Walnut, Currant) highly recommend. The chicken, spinach and feta were great as well. Baklava as a semi sweet treat afterwards was *Chefskiss, The Hazelnut is my fav. Overall: Friendly staff, wonderful service, will return 👌","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPG3v5eJPNkLuwX98DDXOUqiIPKgglnMtvaFbz-&fid=0x0:0x7ddd85f0e69d8756"],"When":"2024-6-21"},{"Name":"Dezz Graham","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW4FF_jytfP_WD2EHl7NpVDPCAp39N_rB7ZSHq9pXw_KLFXlm8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I knew this place was gunna be a 5/5 before even going in. I'm visiting from yyc and heard great things about this place so decided to come check it out and wow. The food and coffee are unbeatable (I'm a Borek fanatic and this officially became my favorite) and the service is just out of this world. It's very relaxing in there too. Definitely a place everyone must experience!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNqiakZU9f8Zj4mVkLjxF-RCk66rjm45tx8k5ff&fid=0x0:0x7ddd85f0e69d8756"],"When":"2024-9-14"}]

[{"Name":"Sinyo ganteng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVK6DhObLW3StVcJ_e9Ph42mdmAq5cSoW-d536hao-jSu7WAn8I=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Very tasty dessert, eats injeolmi snow, is very tasty and refreshing, especially during summer. they also provide self-serve lemon water.Price is quite expensive,  $21.50 for large order. Just basically slush ice, but don't get me wrong, it is good. Their place also pretty nice and very clean.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOaP4hBeqboAxzwPt8RhXaHPh2a3I7_VrlNeZMf&fid=0x0:0xd132a86362eb916c"],"When":"2024-7-22"},{"Name":"Koneko The Awesome","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWgzpQblxjwL2Ws9zNbaGcGuSPk6YiH1Kcjebrxc_Gs5AdfV_Pm=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love this place! The staff were very kind to me and my family and the food was delicious!! The vibe of the cafe is super chill, perfect for a date or family gathering.
Totally recommend the yuzu ice dessert, it's not too sweet and has a refreshing sour taste :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOwvYyiyYmhvfWobVBwe7PtrOIQBkiKM7gzuLaO&fid=0x0:0xd132a86362eb916c"],"When":"2024-9-26"},{"Name":"Yoshiko C.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKtcsZOlyd8taDwX9F7EkmkehI4-UW_WG9O9oyFRNdwVNmFnuw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"We ordered a tiramisu croffle and a chocolate croffle. They were terribly soaked in the melted cream and syrup. Not sure this is the true version of croffle but that was definitely a failure regarding the presentation, texture and taste...","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMHg-prlfVj044i5ptCNjYx9nbzgEJZW84zCd9l&fid=0x0:0xd132a86362eb916c"],"When":"2024-9-26"},{"Name":"Yunhan Liu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXdEwo742ppPtT6bm1txbk51tZSOBC7eArRtm_N38myAhcL8-ne=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Busy cafe specializing in bingsu. It was a bit pricey for the portion but the cheesecake and strawberry bingsu were tasty. The strawberry matcha latte just tasted like strawberry milk.. no matcha flavour.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNEs2WKXAR-JwKQyr4g88ybsDrgxg5Fph3WWT4B&fid=0x0:0xd132a86362eb916c"],"When":"2024-8-16"},{"Name":"Alexander Hong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK0B9Ep6D4mi_8it2GWsO199m3BVQmv0KU09aEV9oXUYgcbgA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This used to be the best bingsoo out of dozens of places we tried globally. Unfortunately this is what we were served today. Zero fresh mango, just some amputatingly sweet mush. The staff was kind enough to refund us. Second pic is what we expected.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNugStzMAfdwt6-mjkBegiqfJAT6NrfFbml_Boy&fid=0x0:0xd132a86362eb916c"],"When":"2024-7-3"},{"Name":"Stanley Lowe","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLMA0j5YPV0e_ki7txxd7xeDBLDLGeQTP8WAcMSalz9cV9eFw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Went in a Wed night from 9 pm to 10 pm closing.

Got the carrot cake and a ginger lemon loose leaf tea.

Cute desserts as the carrot cake was good.  It was not too sweet,  soft and moist at a total of around $14.

Chill environment.   There were a few tables there.  I like to use the word "cute" again.

Almost self-serve type of service with one person who did everything and you bus your own plates and cups.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ice","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWziIvs89xn_e4ahJ95DfCjQ2p7Mb3UPoaRyTfUzYIU7NJI4hC_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great place to study. Bingsoo is amazing. The burquitlam location makes theirs a little more yummy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNuHVAKkH2KB3s1AKE2z4xWXniiacmCN-RPtiqf&fid=0x0:0xd132a86362eb916c"],"When":"2024-12-9"},{"Name":"Norman Hwang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJmY9vv8n7nxlPCr6zoKISqRzmj7aby4Hw2JXG6_C_CHGWFQQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"It has been over a year since I last went and I was surprised to see how small their “large” bingsoo was now and how the quality has really gone downhill.  I ordered a large strawberry bingsoo for $22, and the portion size was nowhere close to being “large”, and the amount of actual fresh strawberries was minimal and only consisting of a few thin slices placed onto the outer surface of the bingsoo.  There are many other shaved ice shops in the lower mainland where the price and quality are more in keeping with reality and where the amount of fresh fruit topping is a lot more than the few paper thin slices that you get at Passion 8.  After this experience, I would not recommend this place and I have no desire to go to Passion 8 ever again","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Cha House
address: 701 W Georgia St, Vancouver, BC V7Y 1G5
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true}]},{"id":"offerings","name":"Offerings","options":[{"name":"Coffee","enabled":true}]},{"id":"atmosphere","name":"Atmosphere","options":[{"name":"Casual","enabled":true}]},{"id":"payments","name":"Payments","options":[{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":true}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Joey Lam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIncJBLfbVzRO24PRdfxE4-hovZn6C_s4RV_vqsGslULP8YEA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I love bubble waffles. I walked past this place one day and was curious about their bubble waffle. I had to try it.

It was quite dark. I think it might be overcooked. I heard the alarm went off but the staff was still busy with taking orders from other customers. Perhaps, the other staff was busy as well. I only saw two workers but it was fair as it was down time around 4 pm in a week day afternoon. Overall, it was ok - not good not bad either. I love bubble waffles when it was slightly crunchy outside but still sfot and chewy inside.

One good thing, though, it was fairly priced. However, would I order it again? Not too sure.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPROej5WLKGLBHtH5dYZIrISTO7onqerrn5hE5c&fid=0x0:0xad224727492034c2"],"When":"2024-6-7"},{"Name":"Selina Qi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU2z_pZ0IkPaiI0_csi0UP1lDBSj8XHgbQedX065tN3ikjsrYqu=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"REALLY REALLY BAD. i’ve never left any reviews but this one was terrible enough. first off, the deal bursted when i poked my straw in, and it did again when they resealed it. second, i ordered a strawberry matcha which i always do at any other boba places but this one is just HORRIBLE. it looks nasty, it tastes nasty, nothings good. and for $8.11?!?!?!?! TWO DOLLARS JUST TO MAKE IT TO A BIGGER CUP. chatime does it for 0.80 cents!!!!! CENTS mind you.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPzlfTf6q1AwICcqggsEAAfmtkISfYkZKA9kn4v&fid=0x0:0xad224727492034c2"],"When":"2024-6-24"},{"Name":"CARRIE MOK","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXNWaPqfYPPkHfDvLFxSq4HEnnzIlAPHLGKb4kxXtQpstWPSoQu=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The girl at the cashier was not very approachable and warm , I was standing there when they could easily have greeted me and said one moment please but they just carried on what they were doing at the till until they were ready for me. Which I had to say something to start my order(what a joke, who trained her? she should be embarrassed). The roasted milk tea was very mediocre, the pearls were extremely chewy and tasted undercooked or old and stale from the fridge... So many bubble tea shops and this one can't get it right... please leave the mall and have Cha Time take over your Cha House.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jessica Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJikFpf1GHVE4CaCnr89B_ssqlkSIjkksUZtOm_F2ilhthzOg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Ordered a brown sugar oat milk bubble tea and received a brown sugar milk with vanilla cold foam on a Saturday afternoon. Poor service ensuring the correct customer receives their order. Ordered a bubble waffle which was taken by another customer right in front of the staff without them checking their order number. When I complained that it was taken by someone else, the staff told me to go chase the other customer for my order, as if it wasn't their problem!!! If I ordered a bowl of noodles that was taken by another customer and they had started eating it, would you ask them for the bowl of noodles???!!!! Managed to get a new bubble waffle to replace the one taken, but I would not recommend this place again for their poor service. Rather go back to Xing Fu Tang nearby.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Dan shankouxi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKmlcCyG4m9bGoFajO0N829e7e26SUIQSakdKuYEI3Zw3mENQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"She put way too much pastry and it's not tasty at all. Also it's way too sweet","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNjN14lAGfMGBmWJ46Vg3qpZHAKXWJPajDn_z4e&fid=0x0:0xad224727492034c2"],"When":"2024-8-3"},{"Name":"Novel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ7ugf9JdM84Sm_05zMeEQHJkLGU5CtH0467snevff0xF78=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The shop is located in the food court of the mall. Ordered an Acai bowl. The item is not worth what it was priced at. Cost 16$ and you get a bowl of liquid and topping sinked to the bottom of the bowl. It was certainly not aesthetically pleasing to see and eat. I had to dig to the bottom to get to the good stuff. Acai bowl is meant to be eaten as a thick smoothie base, instead it was watery almost as if it can be slurped down. The staff was nice and friendly.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ahmed Ali","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLORpjDaWVkwy24qnUX8Ei_17RurmJR3VJydcrKxvp7ColSOg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Because of peggy   I am changing this review from 1 to 5. She is a real customer service person. She focuses on satisfying the customers, and that is what makes business continue.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"MIN NAN XU","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKNtuL3ZxJqG6ULPy59IzM2a_H5RC1llnyuj4nhI0wu3bWt-Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The Bubble Waffle Was Very Good I Also Ordered Watermelon Juice With Pearls And It Was Also Very Good I Will Come Back To This Shop. 4 Stars","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Ads","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVwDyuvQtXP_VygmU1rNXhUJ0mc48E4h1QtDkdEfrlXmuS-mYhL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Allegro coffee is next level and this was one of the most pleasant WFM coffee bar visits i've had and a truly awesome grub experience with some remote flexibility in a comforting and clean space.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOFHA4hz-146rogvgor-HcRfnU9iT5ZruD94U6C\u0026fid=0x0:0x925269ecacd67459"],"When":"2024-3-22"},{"Name":"Paul Rondeau","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWud2O79gqkHkgkw8XLlTly4855w4zQuECqNb6Iq_cxHMS3y4p-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"They make the best Americano coffees here! Highly recommend trying as you’ll likely enjoy the dark roast \u0026 chocolatey undertones. Service is great and usually plenty of seating.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOMC5YO5HRyl6ImNx1mreHk1FwjoqKxobMD1D3b\u0026fid=0x0:0x925269ecacd67459"],"When":"2024-3-12"},{"Name":"Sahar Moghaddam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXo8lBw_cEL-qsqh8ZVB6kcbBmct4D_mJlsXDXqtEfCCEiPfF-Y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Very convenient location being right above Whole food- Cambie. You dont get a big selection of pastries but you have Whole food on the lower floor. The coffees are ok; the after taste of the oat latte is bitter.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP8K3Yzd3zMh5BqgbkX9bf5cx38Ug2wPAp8GxRO\u0026fid=0x0:0x925269ecacd67459"],"When":"2022-7-11"},{"Name":"Evelyn Turner","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU20bckAdpeFuZG3k0zyf6j3IYNT5T8TDa2sfc_0gzVkh60vsY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Cambie Coffee Bar Shop is an inviting and cozy spot for coffee enthusiasts. The ambiance is warm and welcoming, making it a great place to relax or catch up with friends. The coffe is expertly crafted, with a variety of options to suit different preferences—whether you're a fan of rich espressos or creamy lattes. The staff is friendly and knowledgeable, adding to the overall enjoyable experience. Whether you're looking for a quick pick-me-up or a leisurely coffee break, Cambie Coffee Bar Shop is a charming destination for quality drinks and a pleasant atmosphere.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Roshan Nate","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX9teuCEDzZIhZzwKyW1qbET4Xm7wfyqOTf7oafJ-78lVoY_0c=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"coffee and baked staff are good, sitting arrangement is not very comfortable, and there is not much of plug for electronic devices,\nthese characteristics including not very clean tables make this cafe a place for grab and go or just for a quick coffee","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP_dd8UQlvbNQC_XQtu14oN5ggon5Hw8F2QJGnj\u0026fid=0x0:0x925269ecacd67459"],"When":"2020-2-16"},{"Name":"K H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVo2hR2qKHBGSuFyVVc1kqvuNnr23GVLd19IdZCsiU8tz8tbtW-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Worker was very unpleasant in the morning. Coffee was decent. They have a $3.50 special with a muffin.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPxCOxjop8sL36KaKzTvOeiErb3eyT9rwLl9ZLs\u0026fid=0x0:0x925269ecacd67459"],"When":"2023-6-27"},{"Name":"Lisa Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUAdLh8lLh1dgknOZnv6UCzExh4MzbIzW4WArERp1Dpb8mBChzG=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious custom white chocolate matcha latte. Great service and very spacious.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMeXmsr4aiyLb6YPzYdGAJKTVFleYMFy3PhaBE_\u0026fid=0x0:0x925269ecacd67459"],"When":"2020-1-19"},{"Name":"Maria T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV4-1HCKEkQG2LXAzb6Ew_vmdb8-baph0L5tIRi_Q2osirBuzA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I ordered decaf but it had a lot of caffeine in it unlike any other decaf I’d get from Starbucks or Tim hortons. I’m pregnant so it’s better to avoid, plus Caffeine gives me panic attacks. Needless to say, I had an unforgettable rest of the day…\nThere was almost no pastry on the shelves.","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Mr. Waffle Bubble Tea
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"highlights","name":"Highlights","options":[{"name":"Great tea selection","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair accessible seating","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Sandra Chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUS3d7aZA4lMhkB4lrjOTrDjB_p6PvngmeWQeM0VFHPfzqli2Uc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"There was only one worker when we stopped by for a smoothie. We were asked to wait until she was done with the other orders. It took a while, but she gave us a free smoothie to compensate. The smoothies were excellent! And we sat there for quite a while as the AC was so nice on a hot day. It’s a cute place and we overheard the other patrons praise the food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMaPnMxvFoym9VjqWoYfHnxMpG9vPs9U9uk7Em-&fid=0x0:0x75d93b96af3dca61"],"When":"2024-9-10"},{"Name":"pan B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKzk4n4h21osCemI7m4UkoG-9cA-kGzBi2X9o9JSxsyHRSI_Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We were walking by and decided to go inside to get a bubble tea and we are so glad we did because they make some of the best home cooked Persian style dishes and we did not expect that at all!!!!

Everything is SO fresh and delicious! The service is wonderful. They are so kind!

Their chicken platter and shammi beef kabab platter was delicious!

We finished it off with a yummy fresh bubble waffle.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPHd5NChUa0vHQV4Evsc4usU9-OQqV3n-91Laml&fid=0x0:0x75d93b96af3dca61"],"When":"2023-12-16"},{"Name":"Karina Sanchez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWaCfUlpQoOIXn-87k92oQ0vZDDO_5DQdE72unHOTrtEnMCu0IjXw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"owners were so nice! we just got tea (earl grey boba and lemon ginger) and both were amazing! The ginger had a strong kick and you could tell they use real tea leaves rather than tea bags for the earl grey. I want to come back to try the Donair!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO5B9lvpjJ2CHOJn5uNcG98l82nUkgD1sb5_75m&fid=0x0:0x75d93b96af3dca61"],"When":"2022-6-17"},{"Name":"Jason Yee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKlcDAv6CJm_kXRrFdGhQTwzrYjdz2cuLHqZdOpSRw78JsFng=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Mr. Waffle Bubble Tea is a great neighborhood spot for snacks and drinks!

First and foremost, the owner is really sweet, kind, and overall very pleasant and happy person! He gave off sweet and cool grandpa vibes. It was fun just chatting with him!

Second, their bubble/milk teas are really inexpensive. It's $5.25 for a standard-sized milk tea (definitely affordable!!) All the better that it's a small neighborhood shop! They also serve donairs, salads, bubble waffles, platters, smoothies, and so much more.

Ample seating. Seems like a good place to study (double check with the owner first though I would think he's ok with it). Street parking only.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMm4935t50nzAM__0ndIY6cb2CzURxEuGzWNm85&fid=0x0:0x75d93b96af3dca61"],"When":"2022-10-16"},{"Name":"Desi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIg0C91-bP54LRYpx5z0EZ9B5qwJj00TeWvoZ0oJlDdnFpLnA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My husband and I went there on a whim one night. We tried the soup, which was fantastic. We are new to Canada, so we are still unused to the big portions here. That chicken platter was good for two! Amazing and so beautiful and healthy! My husband, though he ordered the same, couldn’t keep his hands off my food for the duration of the thirty seconds he had to wait to get his portion served haha! It just looked that good! The taste didn’t disappoint at all. Manny, the owner, prepares even his own hot sauce because he cares so much about good ingredients and healthy food. The jasmine bubble tea was so fragrant, a dream! I always go for Earl Grey but this time I was so impressed with the jasmine! Great service, friendly owner and delicious food! We will be back for more!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNJdjlHK0eMRPl9UOea4w9mK4_So_W8iidKD7ZV&fid=0x0:0x75d93b96af3dca61"],"When":"2023-1-10"},{"Name":"More Memorable Events","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXO7TG6e2j2USDh9tAwo5yFcCgaOADEme16iojsIBbixC-ZHfDtxg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing!!  Real everything, real meat not processed in the donair, fruit in the slushies, home made tzatziki, home made hot sauce, fresh date squares and apple strudel warm from the oven.  Excellent personal service from the owner Manny. Good prices on natural fruit juices. Can't wait to come back to try their chai tea.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPV5dKaq7BDHK8mxvY3C2NfIIrffgfb0zWoYtpQ&fid=0x0:0x75d93b96af3dca61"],"When":"2021-1-19"},{"Name":"Evan Alexander","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUoMmS4h6BO2Jl7oYWNHAQjPdthKSvDl56hWH3I3zNIplTtYAOMNQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wonderful food and huge portion.  The falafel platter fed 2 with plenty leftovers.  The two sisters who run the shop are so lovely.  They gave us great service and a couple extra pakoras to take home with the leftovers.   Try the homemade date square 😁
Will definitely be back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPkugruUzSE3qD8xljniMhvLjtpY0RFpqNuTmh3&fid=0x0:0x75d93b96af3dca61"],"When":"2023-3-8"},{"Name":"DC W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXVBXYJ9O683rHFvg9HQFsZp-ukycy6Y7rq0Vk8noMhKPnoAu_b=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food was so great, I really like that the chicken was steamed and came with very fresh vegetables. Also, It costs only around 10 bucks, pretty cheap compared to other store. The owner was so nice, and welcoming. I highly recommend this place!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMhEW4z1CHp5HSMJYLiTdkOghSQ_DOcSamNLamC&fid=0x0:0x75d93b96af3dca61"],"When":"2023-11-27"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"zoe feng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL-wN5dY6bgoiu9eoZ6XHg3dOwmBZT1LGid5qRnzIc8q67RLw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Google shows that it open at 5:30am. We have an early scheduled start. we went to the store at 5:29am. And we wait for the store open, but the store assistant saw us waiting for it, but they aren’t open the store until 5:40am. And they known that we’re waiting for it and they still super slow to prepare everything. They even came to the door and opened the shutters, but they didn’t open the door for us, nor did they tell us that we couldn’t open the door yet and that we could go somewhere else.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"桌•TSUKUE","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIKD80wjCFY90XiZP7RKPB2oxq4LWnyFsm6MMUMy2R_Ev2KTw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Nothing wrong with the products and service inside.
Too many smokers outside of the door and almost like a poisonous zone, regularly blocking the sidewalk area. Extremely unpleasant even just walking by.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Vita Wen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKQupvMefH0LBHrvBnXjk5LQ6V32cwlAxFsAZdQPkJIPKNZ9Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"BAD EXPERIENCE!! Suspect barista purposely not adding whipped cream (which is included in my drink) because I didn’t tip for my take out!! The cup was 7/10 full leaving space for whipped cream, which was missing.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Love the Rise kombucha here. It’s a larger Starbucks location with lots of seating.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMLfhk7ordncTbL_bR8L6sVyRgmGReirBG2CMqT&fid=0x0:0xe8c2656f9048da80"],"When":"2024-7-8"},{"Name":"Deb PS","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX2JrjvxBJWPrjHCwBxV9NiRybb9V5GJpynDBuSW5sd6snYZiMa=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Quick polite service from baristas. Place was clean. Lots of parking in lot.  Usually this place is packed and you can’t get a seat.  It can also be very loud so not my favourite place to stay.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN_zJJGZMQp0KJgLPkrCLS8qU0d-s8Hwm2kPnby&fid=0x0:0xe8c2656f9048da80"],"When":"2024-2-27"},{"Name":"Yusuke","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXpvlACd7xfZKRYkmLZOjQQiiYeoKNV0yxOUwg2qRsQ3zdiU4w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Friendly baristas with nice coffee. However, this Starbucks is always occupied by a crazy noisy large group on Sat & Sun morning and you’ll never get a seat. We do need another Starbucks nearby.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPVrNGeRaksUPxPjGO3hvgjeCbn4Claw998wj62&fid=0x0:0xe8c2656f9048da80"],"When":"2024-1-14"},{"Name":"Jack Jones","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJOP0i-PabvyIkycDBJl_V__oyTZPcBvhAIuqFMbrQxKxI1mg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"So this guy never heard what's a French vanilla is! Even when I asked him you never had a French vanilla in your life from Tim Horton's? He simply said no and told me to explain him what's a French vanilla is. Then I told him to ask his colleagues and she certainly replied what a French vanilla is.

I am confused why a Starbucks hired people like this who doesn't know his job? Also he didn't ask my name when placed the order.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNqx9ySTO0UFlo52uWJWDuFT6qVDNWakeku3QzY&fid=0x0:0xe8c2656f9048da80"],"When":"2024-2-9"},{"Name":"mizu owo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVx8pQxXl8R23YNUH3vhXlsNjrzGeBJmMC62DgeW5ogPSz6NYLJ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"So far my experience from this place is pretty good except this time，maybe don't go there at peak hour ，the green tea powder in my Frappuccino is not even properly mixed .  And etc","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"J Wang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKhDPCTTDpa9A7ehd4sMLg3vJ5-8hRcp_X_qxpnHaTuAUmT9Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My go to for easy catering events. Always great for a team meeting or get together. Food is delicious and easy to communicate with the owner. Nice to find a place that offers authentic Taiwanese flavours. Definitely would recommend!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Chung Liang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW6Gu6tqOLwIdeJvJysTmH6q0QiFXXn3-RBE2iqveE_GZGfQA8C=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"There aren't many Yunan region restaurants in Vancouver and this one served delicious noodle soups and sides. The tofu side dish was complementary (perhaps a grand opening special). Price is on the average side. Will go back again to try their dry noodles.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPO6n8untgHFFUfo78WcQo7uWhcnBtWm3jgSvqv&fid=0x0:0xd1c1cbdd4c942674"],"When":"2019-11-22"},{"Name":"Jo L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUGdTkGRJS5KnWD5jRzPx9EPlxmdt8UIqQ14iV_IZSt-f_R_BD1=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Tried the cross bridge beef noodle soup. It tasted healthy and light broth which was nice.  Neat concept where a hot bowl of soup is served,  then the owner/waitress comes with a dish of ingredients and adds them into the soup at the table.  You then add your own noodles at your leisure depending on how al dente you want your noodles to be. There were 3 pieces of thinly sliced hotpot beef.  Owner is very friendly and inviting but the cost of a bowl for noodle soup isn't cheap at $14 a bowl.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOoeZQA7tJPXdML_X1fGGN3tKeAGkJcvaEJ0sV8&fid=0x0:0xd1c1cbdd4c942674"],"When":"2020-3-11"},{"Name":"Bera C.Y.C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJV7yjUwO0Gn77CKHHNMw38WSAieB1XUStpcT3I39iltAtTLQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The dine-in was not available, so we did "take-out".  The food was delightfully delicious.  Will be back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOfcdimbHC25U-huTDAJa_zrWhOnD8BUD50mvDf&fid=0x0:0xd1c1cbdd4c942674"],"When":"2023-1-9"},{"Name":"C Barry","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLy31yD-aTPXgD54gFhInTkCHTsmkOIL-K8jFd5T6c-so1VGNfm=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious and good portion.
Great for party catering.

CP直高","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOg0jm_-fXjxV4thFdcBxLfzVJhU53yeZaxTlUh&fid=0x0:0xd1c1cbdd4c942674"],"When":"2023-10-1"},{"Name":"Loretta","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLSVYIbpnQrHQsGQu2s0rKpZ53-JNXLbHLZ2DOiW3lc4Qsfrw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Does not appear to look anything to do with food from the outside except the name  said "kitchen" to suggest food.  For a long time; with much curiosity I vemture in......
They sell Taiwan style home comfort frozen food and made to order bento box; take-out only.
While inside the store you still will not think they  are selling food,  very clean and tidy with no display on any of their products,  a staff come up to help me and explane their concept and show me their frozen food products and bento box on a menu with photo. Finally, this place make sense this is a food joint.
I ordered as per the helpful lady recommand ,all are very good and does not appear to have MSG; as I am MSG allergic.  My pick are dishes with complicated cooking prep work that I will not consider making myself at home.
Here are my picks and review:-

Hot and sour soup,  good value for quality and quility incomapre to the above
average restaurant.

Taiwan style meat sauce,  good topping for rice , noodle or of your choice, meat are not minced like some resuturent,  cutting with knife to small pieces give better texture  plus they also compliment the sauce with a in store made pickle veg that highten  the whole enjoyment eperience of the dish.

Shrimp pancake, not my frav , is only personal.

Pepper, pickle veg and pig stomach soup,    this soup is not for everyone, is a ture comfort food for me, love it.

Braise pork belly with bamboo shots, big time comfort food, long prep time dish.  Cook to
point,  All thumbs up.

Went back again,  did not disappoint.  Bento box is also good value.

.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Penney Pan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIjcHC_bnaJemAcJyCCFjDhw5BOjgzzP1qVrYmfyleAP4DntQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The owner has changed in 2019 or 2020? There is no dine-in service anymore. Bought take-out food and frozen food several times. The food are amazing.
Miso Cod is soooooo good. Must order!!!
Variety of soups, and they are all tasty.
Bento boxes have many options to choose. Love them all.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"White Rabbit","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIxIMMt4FAI416fVLvy0Q2a6xHkXKqgkOfxICInErN9_7GXxg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went here for dinner.  Great family run noodle house. Ordered soup and a salad... Beef was great, the meat was perfectly done and base was just amazing.  Chicken salad was awesome and had a nice balance of spice and flavor.  Staff was attentive and very polite.  Can't wait to go back.  Great job✌😁","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Derek Shek","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWP9Pjija1abf8rOsOgAPBkesWOZ8sALAjyQJKt0I-DTaykDkHV=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We’re regulars at Fat Boy Kitchen, visiting almost every week because it’s a hit with the kids and they absolutely love it. I’m personally a fan of both their breakfast and lunch offerings, but today I decided to try something new from the menu—the spicy beef noodle.

It was a revelation! The noodles were incredibly delicious and authentically Chinese, with just the right amount of spice to elevate the dish without overwhelming it. The flavors were spot-on, and the beef was tender and perfectly seasoned. I enjoyed it so much that I finished the entire bowl and found myself still craving more.

While I’ve loved most of the dishes I’ve tried here, the spicy beef noodle has definitely taken the top spot on my list. Whether you’re a regular like us or just passing through, I highly recommend giving Fat Boy Kitchen a try, especially for the spicy beef noodle—it’s a true standout!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOCgfWBxv34CBLvcNoI4fT91a3PCQitH2XQluoy&fid=0x0:0x4e4b7bf614db82fb"],"When":"2024-11-12"},{"Name":"Winnie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVdhdAZj5kAJq7u9NvVhNxLrp7yafognrc6dJzsqDpR7yVPbJry=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Value: it’s fair, you get what you pay for.
Food: don’t expect it to be super tasty or amazing, there is a good amount of food portions BUT this curry rice I ordered was definitely NOT it. Zero taste of curry, only a hint of smell. It was more like a very diluted curry paste with lots of corn starch added
It came with 2 nice portion of deep fried chicken thighs.

Location: its parking is limited to street only. it wasn’t hard to find parking in residential street, just walk a block.

The seats were not that comfy as it is quite sunken down, the place smells like bamboo shoots.

Had the steak aswell, it was tenderized. It was a pass.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPCSs2Q2vCMIEiAIUalpUDHAjd3MX9tPJsTRccz&fid=0x0:0x4e4b7bf614db82fb"],"When":"2024-12-16"},{"Name":"Nathan McCain","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXMaTd10qU1yoxV34Ts6SnYTvzeaAiPCQDHNmqrHxF1m_kacFSH=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I’m not the thinnest boy myself, so I figured this place would be up my alley, and it mostly is, albeit with a caveat or two. Drinks are good but I wish the tea was a touch stronger, and the food is a touch less seasoned than I was expecting. I was also really craving the fried chicken and had to settle for pork katsu… bummer, but it was still very crispy and enjoyable. Satay noodles were really nice and the value is certainly there. Worth a stop.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPzUihN04F2b3QhZXP1xLyhs5qmQiIhZ9UJWvPU&fid=0x0:0x4e4b7bf614db82fb"],"When":"2024-9-22"},{"Name":"Ling To","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIlFxJCKp6bjqARUOXgwrUpHcbKAm9tBpTn_ze63uacIdbffw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Food came out quick! Noodles soup was piping hot.

The takeout utensil was overkill though when you're dining in.

Also, the tiniest washroom ever! Thought I was on a plane. Bench chair probably needs to be replaced as I sunk in (no support for your bottom).","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOXHqaQYQKP_UuDwSoKs_osIjPtVP1Gn0P2vYn3&fid=0x0:0x4e4b7bf614db82fb"],"When":"2024-9-17"},{"Name":"Markus Chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJXROvRsGKOxwBtK9XUZxhEqi9KXQ7EWM8JfBaI86dyPJTQyQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Food: 100%
Service: 90%
Atmosphere: 20%
Parking: 60%
Food tastes great! I had noodles and scrambled eggs, and the restaurant had good chefs. Fat boy’s kitchen’s chefs make good food! The service is good too! However my rating is certainly a 3 star. ⭐️ ⭐️ ⭐️. The atmosphere needs to be improved. There are only 9 tables at the restaurant, and there is a LONG queue. We had to wait 30 minutes before we got a table.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ryan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWCDMUY42ah4aAgta84ssT2DYa3PFsR3r4fbxhBdcs3AXShIgTOYw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Showed up here for breakfast not sure what we would expect and was surprised at how friendly the staff were. The breakfast special was great…and the refried beans were a unique touch to your typical HK cafe meal. We also ordered the chicken steak laksa and the soup was full of flavor. Lots of laksa soup bases at HK cafes are diluted—but not here!

The staff even offered our child a lollipop on the way out!

Our only complaint here - the front door is EXTREMELY SQUEAKY and each time someone enters or exits the restaurant, all the guests are greeted with a painful screech. Some WD-40 might do the trick

Otherwise good. Will definitely come back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPUPWeQC80Z3L-GaRLZeO1UBlhOsI-4FzIGEpha&fid=0x0:0x4e4b7bf614db82fb"],"When":"2024-8-28"},{"Name":"mikey a","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJObrIzQB7RpeiCI7iZ2YIOKHqxR2WdQ_ovLiinwMw8pWyX5Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Was really hype to go to this place for breakfast,  boy!!!!!! It was bad.not worth the money:( it's not a pork chop it's a pork loin... and a bad one at that, eggs had no salt and no butter or jam for toast .... nothing, if you are in Vancouver and looking for hk style breakfast or even meal don't waste time or money, parking is bad as well. Felt bad taking the family here. Oh well season learn","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMil4Hx5LqocvUtQoqc9uoFdIgzNhX1WGNSVXSz&fid=0x0:0x4e4b7bf614db82fb"],"When":"2024-8-8"},{"Name":"Ebony Renee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVOePN2EaDQ5Me8LlpM31hBnHkNAOa4FZ9b9Nkx3h0UwFR3kUjYfg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Searched on Google maps for a spot to grab lunch, and wanted to try due to the name of the restaurant, the reviews, and the way the food looked in the pics....this place definitely didn't disappoint!

I ordered my food to go and didn't realize how much you get! That curry sauce is perfect to dip fries and nuggets in.

I'll definitely be back to try more items!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNlkLGjrNDHytrpWa_gUWK31qxAWsH_KohT90yU&fid=0x0:0x4e4b7bf614db82fb"],"When":"2024-4-11"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"parneet Kaur","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVLyvczfF9rqQZR2oDbIiJ0kn4JkDgNdLvCbfGXddk0wADYdkxx=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Tim Hortons never disappoints! The service is incredibly fast, and the food is always delicious. Their hot coffee is the perfect way to start the day. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a quick and tasty meal","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Their timbit selection is limited here with only 4 flavours (chocolate, glazed, old fashioned, and cake). Tried the vanilla chill and couldn’t finish it as it just tasted like creamy sugar slush. The hashbrown and breakfast wrap were just okay. The food quality isn’t the greatest but I find the Tim Hortons chain lower in food quality in general. It’s edible and alright but mainly empty calories.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN-faqtwcpPI4YMuNFenWdYxMuOjPLYBOtfSuFA&fid=0x0:0x4ced66079e937eac"],"When":"2024-7-24"},{"Name":"JC Adriana","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWVCfhdkaI7AOgDnTNDdvsesQ8icy2R6P4uNP6C9EyexXUu4IVZ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"This is not a 24 hour Tim Hortons despite its busy location.

I’ve only visited here at night. The food selection is always grim.

Last night the only donut they had was a sour cream one. Nothing else ….

My drink was good. Creamy chocolate chill.

The bathroom was absolutely disgusting. I nearly threw up.

There is absolutely no excuse for this. It should be checked by staff often.

Someone had urinated all over the toilet seat, someone had pooped in the corner and had half assed attempted to wipe it up unsuccessfully.

Everything else looked like it needed to be deep cleaned and disinfected. You must use toilet paper to turn the sink taps and open the lock and door.

This is the last time I ever go to that location. Very disappointed and disgusted.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Moso","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXi8mGBTaqmjFJZGChMtm_qM9TE4WPVXyrFWhqCZdO7B8mGpS0=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I am not here to target this branch as it is the general problem of Tims nowadays😓: After I have finished my drink, I started to wonder, did I really order a cup of iced coffee, or I unconsciously asked them for a cup of ice with some drops of coffee added🤯?","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPtHMTfKYhb6_zu0MiFptQYCujib-Up4mOg6Lx_&fid=0x0:0x4ced66079e937eac"],"When":"2024-10-15"},{"Name":"Ravneet Kaur","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKw_HPs4wibvGxSGsq-kEJYxrB343NazA5OFIzfZJlb8KKLGA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fresh coffee and friendly staff! I recently picked up a Take 12 of coffee and a dozen donuts, and everything was fresh and delicious. The staff were incredibly friendly and made the experience even better. Highly recommend!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jadine Ramilo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK5ibwOMehGtEfp8ebyiOu6e_lIgnIR-ain04em5Tu9MNWr4w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fast service and fresh donuts! Tim Hortons never disappoints with their quick service and delicious, fresh donuts. The food is always great, and their pizza is a surprising delight. Highly recommend!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Elliott Brown","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXs7mipwoGgaTs2tib-6EcS7VzLDuN4TbJdQlcxJ8YnzgmF-4kE=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I live across the street from this location and have been in pretty regularly (probably twice a week) since they opened. Individual employees are doing their best to do their job well, but I feel like there’s an overall structure that falls short of them performing well. Here are some examples.

- when you place an order through the kiosk, your hot food and drink items will be completed but any pastries you ordered are totally forgotten about. It seems like it’s unclear who is responsible for packing these items or there isn’t an efficient notification system for these items.
- likewise, I’ve placed an order at the counter during busy periods when the cashier is most focused on helping everyone in the line; they don’t stop to get me my pastries and I’m left waiting with my hot items and drinks trying to flag a busy staff member to ask after my missing items.
- they appear to be chronically understaffed — I have rarely seen more than 4 staff members working at a time no matter how busy it is and that just isn’t enough people for how busy this location is. During busy periods all of the staff seem stressed and I’ve seen inaccuracies in my own orders and in other patrons as a result. I’ve routinely come into the store and seen only 1 member working during the afternoon or evening — maybe they have a coworker on break or doing cleaning/baking in the back, but that is not adequate coverage.
- this location also seems to routinely run out of necessary supplies: more than once I’ve been turned away because they’ve run out of cups— how does that happen?
- low staffing all means not enough attention is given to maintaining the dining room, bathrooms, or display cases — this is a highly trafficked location and it is always messy and chaotic on the floor

These kinds of routine, chronic problems aren’t the fault of any one staff member nor are they a product of poor work ethic on the part of customer facing staff — there is a leadership problem that needs to be resolved internally so that all staff can do their job well. I hope the staff at this location get the managerial support they deserve — they are staffed almost exclusively with young recent immigrants to Canada and I wish each of them high wages and patient customers 💛","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Outdoors & Overdrive","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJzQhqU1s2qQJ6jKpkKL8D8Cwnr__t-kEzE-hdVKhsV4XNPqA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Probably one of the better locations, service is good, restaurant is very clean. Great customer service skills. The staff is doing an excellent job. Keeping it up!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Aaron Prohaska","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWw38HzT_qbg7YcYih7pU5XRfD3VfJLd4R3SBVZ7qOt5WYahcVhTA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"3/20/2024

What a cool venue, so sleek and modern. Our drinks were tasty and we had a sushi roll as a snack, and it was so good. It was the dancing roll. Our server was very friendly and helpful, but as there wasn't much of a crowd, the server would disappear a little too long sometimes, but still very enjoyable. I didn't understand the 3.9 average rating, I think it's probably a tough location for this type of place. It was ultra clean, probably due to the white decor they need to be extra careful. I would for sure go back if we are ever in town again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNgw8YyB-gsNb-QNySDmhFAbwzgBRyBcMSEZeMA&fid=0x0:0x3348bd560c83de04"],"When":"2024-3-21"},{"Name":"Sheldon Ang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVohw_7d5XzKea59oo3omlBbhHxFO6BD9jL2Ug4no27KrKuyx4g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you're looking for an Asian twist on afternoon tea, this would be your place.

The shop welcomes you with its openness filled with cute decorations and comforting atmosphere. My friends and I went with Afternoon Tea, as well as the Crab Cake, and the selection of Tea were endless.

I went with a Milk Tea while my friends selected a Fruit Tea, but the joy of Afternoon Tea is trying all of the drinks we could handle. If you haven't filled up on Tea, then the meal itself would require you another stomach.

To be fair, Afternoon Tea consists a lot of Bread, but the fillings were hitting all the right spots. The Crab Cake was also quite good, a bit salty, but a great addition to our meal. We also prdered Sushi, which was also good, but we were so full by the end!

There was a party also happening while we were dining, so keep in mind there is not a lot of privacy in the dining area. Service was great, and hopefully next time I come, I am ready to eat.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOsbfIh6L77AtMrvetusyV4WZLvhXvZ5JiRa_P3&fid=0x0:0x3348bd560c83de04"],"When":"2024-1-8"},{"Name":"Ms. Fancy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXBQaNfblq64oqWShq2FuM-_BC-1ScwkOJu_eYkfqvQy0DjNuPb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"For the amount you pay, I feel there could  be more food. My guests and I left hungry. The fruit tea is delicious!
Service was lacking,  although friendly, our server was mostly MIA.
The glass roof is lovely but the concrete, not so welcoming, or cozy, or signature of 'high tea.'
Fair to say, we won't return or recommend. There is potential here, but there's work to be done.

Ms Fancy

[{"Name":"Evangeline Dalaya","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVh6HgPE8PXFXtsvmH2vvn1nsy3lNWAduhT_pNqcs2QaQGPNZ6E=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I was walking down the street with my family and was immediately drawn into this place. The drinks look so delicious. I ordered the halo halo and was pleased with the taste. I paid an extra $0.25 for an extra cup and thru accommodated my request to separate the order into two cups to share. I will return the next time in I'm in the area. Thank you!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPJy4zIcQuql-MPp5Cv2-FOy-oeESPVOACOJUzk&fid=0x0:0xf04a350b5f4be365"],"When":"2024-6-24"},{"Name":"Annie Yu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUMh7GPmb-fwTeblPqWA2SYP6eaRbXDOeK0rRGXojq0IfUHF2Je=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I can’t help but feel scammed lol.

1. I paid extra for a large size halo halo. The drink portion they gave is a M size. Please see the comparison in the picture

2. They skimmed out on the toppings. It’s very sad…

3. The drink was almost all ice. I just got large clumps of ice I had to bite through (please see pic) 🥲 I even specifically requested less ice too!

Very, very disappointing!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNmuHC13Q2PUzKtFF0j3aQ8z6qQEVUTfcW_-wRD&fid=0x0:0xf04a350b5f4be365"],"When":"2024-12-3"},{"Name":"AIZY A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW63HuUeCCv9sgK_rgm18cZfVwLP0r1WfmUCdIu1jqRWz_XpAFKzg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious Bubble Tea! Customize your drink according to your liking. We will try leche flan for sure.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOgHMbeqJu7fQY6Bo2r1-4waA7kcc4txceLsG1s&fid=0x0:0xf04a350b5f4be365"],"When":"2024-11-7"},{"Name":"wilson acervo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWFCDqzchDSworC8oqb-brWhNuiazhSlcl8XFI4L1T_ixGRaVYE3w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The drinks here are fantastic, but what truly made our visit special was Mary! She was incredibly helpful and made our experience delightful with her jolly and positive attitude. She went above and beyond to ensure we were satisfied with our orders, and her recommendations were spot-on. Great customer service like this makes all the difference. Highly recommend!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lucy Lei","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUWqMDQPy8Rdj2ck6AFqBEF6oKEHn-aaEjadtV4H6wI1nduavxw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious drinks inspired by the Philippines! We got the corn shake which came with icecream, sago and corn pieces. It’s perfectly sweetened and refreshing! The sweetened corn goes delightfully well with the blend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPAVvHBKhGGeHaVNuNpB6pewDmnIIPeQk7VRnUS&fid=0x0:0xf04a350b5f4be365"],"When":"2024-7-2"},{"Name":"Sindhura Vani Koduri","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXwgJ1E29ykg5-DTPEKmW08UpJazylTRes3YPcgsB1HF5F58y6D=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I opted for brown sugar pearl milk tea and Japanese roasted milk tea. I did not find much difference between these two or may be I’m not a tea person😉. But taste wise it’s good. Coming to sugar level don’t opt for 50%. Go for more than that.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNgrTPjYNqdehkuNIKppptmzN-wW-mZk9-FZkSG&fid=0x0:0xf04a350b5f4be365"],"When":"2023-4-8"},{"Name":"Liya Islam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVMUE9JiBx0C1dnbesGP56x7NJ_npuflZIiOmHcgvBgy3AcofA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I'm not a picky eater at all and I really wanted to love it, but the special taho drink was wayyy too sweet and quite watery. The drink was also lukewarm (didn't love that) which I wasn't sure if it was supposed to be, if it is then that's totally fine. The pearls were very soft and not chewy. Maybe I was just there at the wrong time but the place is definitely cute and welcoming!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Da Wanderer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW6gUX2zsQKdIE8uVzYWBnKKtvYQAJfEKJppzMJqd4hE4TuUun8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Filipino dessert goodies! I love their halo2x and leche flan so much. It makes wanna go back there even on rainy days. They also have a great bubble tea options on the menu as well which I want to try soon. The place is spotless and clean. Definitely a must try.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOgPDBDdNy2G7qoPS3hc39Vt2jncBy07z6junuX&fid=0x0:0xf04a350b5f4be365"],"When":"2020-12-20"}]

title: Reusable Bubble Tea Cup
about: [{"id":"payments","name":"Payments","options":[{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":true}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Ms. Cor","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVNgSSJZNaA8_jiIxPRKB0xTmOCHKnAgFdGig3OpUNxmjFOQ2T5=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Carrie, the owner of Reusable Bubble Tea Cup, is absolutely phenomenal! I’ve been a huge supporter of her business since 2018 and for good reason. Carrie is not only an incredible small business owner but also a true environmentalist at heart. She’s dedicated to saving the planet one reusable cup at a time, and her passion for reducing waste and repurposing items is truly inspiring.

Carrie’s commitment to sustainability is matched by her commitment to her customers. She consistently goes above and beyond, providing amazing service and even personally delivering orders on foot/transit—sometimes out of her way—without charging extra. It’s clear she genuinely cares about her community, always advocating for others and supporting local businesses herself.

Her kindness and dedication shine through in everything she does. Carrie and Derek are the perfect team, and I’m so grateful for their efforts to help us all reduce waste and make a difference. They’re not just running a business. they’ve created a movement.

If you’re in Vancouver, please support this incredible local business! Carrie is truly one of the best people you could ever meet, and her work is making a meaningful impact. Huge thanks to Carrie and Derek for everything you do, you are amazing, and I hope your business continues to thrive!

Love you both and can’t thank you enough!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPB9COR8y5ZRxango3Yd5Wql21GCEmwkjAMdyu3&fid=0x0:0x622ac1fba78c48c7"],"When":"2024-12-13"},{"Name":"Maureen Lai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ8QGLJTBDUfGUq8vegZGUVTBh001p7y6nV8ZyM6Bc2IusbTQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely adore all styles of the reusable bbt cups! Plus side, they have all styles of straws which makes it easy to have some reusable straws at home and on the go! Everything is stellar quality with amazing service. Highly recommend.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Angie Tso","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLztiPEMyYv9ISoasm_K7SqUhEqavvh4nSWokkzQLddmDUkIA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is one of my favourite local businesses in town! They are the original reusable bbt cup business before bbt really blew up and the owners have stayed true to their mission and vision ^_^. They always consider packaging and waste reduction down the supply chain (eg: order and package in plastic free packaging etc.) and it just shows their efforts to promote waste reduction! Their products are also very high quality (the bamboo lid is super pretty) and not to mention the most down to earth owners :) highly recommend!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Gregory Ma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLt1ftwKXFgmU_Yft8QWpdCjhjBZXjNtkvgj69ZPVOlKWo-XQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great products, even better goal. Reusable Bubble Tea Cup has done an excellent job at making reusability accessible in the BBT space (as well as other drink markets).","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Carlo Mangibin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXvSwR1sb9oN7ERiFsI5UGZZwh-TyqBFUWbXToYQ6nLs45EOexxfw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A great way to reduce sooo much plastics in the trash. I bought the cup and would get discounts at some BBT shops for bringing in a reusable cup. Pays for itself eventually!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jennifer Chu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVwJMs8EZHgmhHpQoMLjNB0vITp6MCkklyvyuI85MJmLMZyBu73=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"How great it is to support local just as the City of Vancouver is eliminating single use plastic. If your an avid bbt drinker, go out and support this business","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Téa J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXKJXzten6RfvojWCedKKKuTByEE3-2fr-mC7Jzsai_Uyv46Rflvg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best bubble tea cups and reusable straws! My straw is so easy to clean and so portable for whenever I need it!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jessica Chang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJnkJL6qwG4CfI9k1yI1usAMseiBpRJybper7snolYLAR1mx2c=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great customer service. The owner is friendly and patient. It's nice to support a local business with a green goal!","Images":null,"When":""}]
