user_reviews: [{"Name":"Tristen Williams","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWrkSbVmXcYVusaPhVYYSpkyMK_Z2-YeoHHoebXirjECvNYBYDw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Super sweet staff and great treats! The coffee came out so fast and they have a good selection with reasonable prices. Loved the lavender coffee cake and the coffee frappe! :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP1CRcUZ0wD05JbmyU63YqWfyCs3tn1CZID8hA2\u0026fid=0x0:0x84d7e9293b0d41f0"],"When":"2024-8-7"},{"Name":"Lucy Animator","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVY7brXamElnS01fAQfTXCPF3JSbsNMYZuWBhl1ILRqSsdPDqE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nice, cozy and small  place. Having brunch, siting at the window in a cold day is a great experience. They have some books that you can look while enjoying the goods. Also is quiet, so it's a great place to go withh friends to catch up. I love the decoration and the nice staff. Be aware that, since is small, sometimes  is hard to get a seat.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPs-5hYn5t40TsnmEk6n9Z4uYnA7ACEAbRkHpk\u0026fid=0x0:0x84d7e9293b0d41f0"],"When":"2024-1-12"},{"Name":"P. M.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXc6XJIKrTN_GesrwCTcY6Tl1yYPezIGsQEAzP7w9U1RbuQUCSY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place has been around for over 30 years and it’s my go to place whenever I’m in Vancouver. The menu offers the usual selection of breakfast and lunch favorites. It also offers gluten free options. Good coffee and excellent service combined with a laid back atmosphere of a neighborhood coffee shop.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipME3FpRHkEboFFEMzK_4hTfqW0nGv1uaJkqdT__\u0026fid=0x0:0x84d7e9293b0d41f0"],"When":"2024-7-30"},{"Name":"Pat Trinh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLGKmpoLpVi9_ZLeKCQEZPnQ-vrekua-m32_C1oTE4XYHSsT8fY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What really makes Melriches such a staple for Davie street is the mix of excellent customer service and outstanding fellow patrons. Because this is such a hot spot for the LGBTQ+ community, the people surrounding you while you sit and enjoy your cup of coffee and delightful meals, are always so friendly and vibrant.  This may not be the most 'instagrammable' experience in terms of decor, but the feeling you get that this place serves, is top notch. I would like to come back to take photos of their other menu items because I don't feel like my pics are doing this place justice.  Otherwise, I highly recommend this place if you're new to the city, are not afraid to be open minded with your company, and enjoy striking up a conversation with a stranger  ☕🍰","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPIKKFlKoNue_gKI0MtOCBHqKedG7QX8cOs2zyE\u0026fid=0x0:0x84d7e9293b0d41f0"],"When":"2023-2-3"},{"Name":"Amanda Lynch","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU7qenBp4eSmHUqQmxSaEkZgkXQ9g2nli_w7ADgCqXuGYAgDyXo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Been living in the West End for 6 years now and Melriches is still my favorite breakfast/lunch spot in all of Vancouver. It has such a chill, boho, community vibe to it. Julie, CJ and the whole gang are the absolute best people you could meet. The food is always spot on and is incredibly decent in price. Couldn't recommend any more!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO-0sx6u8HtASUqQET44O-w2j8BDxlpuXYLNJQQ\u0026fid=0x0:0x84d7e9293b0d41f0"],"When":"2024-4-20"},{"Name":"Hampus Lindahl","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ7XX2lLGTnTGJXgnAF3FQ4vkF7tL6UCQ02poKmaIp6MKZKjDQn=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Stopped by for a coffee and some \"sugar\". The carrot cake was very delicious. As a tourist in town, I got the impression this place has its local customers. The place itself had a comfy and warm vibe to it. Would I live in town and pass by reguarly, I would most likely return here. Friendly staff!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOWAI4ClOFUd0SrMeZQjrPXiiocXP63R1yKgFrm\u0026fid=0x0:0x84d7e9293b0d41f0"],"When":"2022-10-31"},{"Name":"L B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXEOX9M-JWuKpmHAvm-1bb20KmY0A8nLjsr978Gyxk_a7FLaED1Bg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The power was out recently when I shopped by and the ladies still gave excellent customer service! And drinks while awaiting the power to come back on. Very kind staff and loyal customers too. And the power being out gave a different vibe also....like an urban coffee tavern....made it feel cozy today","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOZaGld48aeaT3tRrjhaufTsW-X33gVDD96cSdu\u0026fid=0x0:0x84d7e9293b0d41f0"],"When":"2024-1-21"},{"Name":"Dana Sullivan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWQIw-0oOUNgoyniYugTscGkgpKJS8tpx4V0tAajn3ZGkNIfqEk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very friendly and down-to-earth neighbourhood coffee shop. Order and pick up drinks at the counter, but they bring your food to your table. They have a variety of baked goods, desserts, sandwiches, and quiches to choose from in addition to a drink menu with lots of seasonal choices. The menu has nice variety without being overwhelming. Food is delicious and presentation is very appealing.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOSorH1KDmfVrXpv2U5smXkih2Y6ZG05QNXjNjI\u0026fid=0x0:0x84d7e9293b0d41f0"],"When":"2020-11-22"}]

title: Café Portrait
descriptions: Cozy destination with an arty vibe offering classic breakfast options, plus Turkish coffee.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"arghavan emami","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWrFvH6_20j-ODjKTZMohaUM9WS0Enig4YXB0V3H7Lzemrk_DRh=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"The vibe was fantastic, cool drawings, and friendly people including the painter himself. However to be honest i didn't enjoy my "shakshuka" at all, the eggs had an odd taste and slightly off and the bread was simple white toasts not even sour dough or something... to be fair hazelnut latte was very delicious! Probably i wouldn't visit there again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPh_4yHQDk2cm31JNzM2p6RVRURAB7-TfeLYZtt&fid=0x0:0xc6f9206ece0cda43"],"When":"2024-12-15"},{"Name":"Nelson Mah","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXMvSq7-l8Kje4bUGcJFo_gjx31JEZujbDf7RAmASmnqxtIa8Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great atmosphere and ambiance. Portraits were very inspiring to relax by. Excellent for dates or evening snacks. This location is much better than the typical Blenz or Starbucks

Caramel and Fig & Rose tea was great. Next time, I might try the coffee too

Service was very kind. I recommend

Definitely trends on social media for a good reason","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN3WWpQGmB4-rnqwWjoEd-3Imaek_64J8B3RTy4&fid=0x0:0xc6f9206ece0cda43"],"When":"2024-12-26"},{"Name":"Kemal Baris Tan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUSIsKGKDszlU_6jzLNyEacHMDy-1e4UQLTCSOCeiLRjOqPQfQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is my favorite restaurant in the city! The food is absolutely delicious, with huge portions. The cozy ambiance makes every visit feel special, and the staff always go above and beyond. Plus, you get to admire so many beautiful portraits while enjoying your meal. I recommend this place to everyone.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNtdFpUZI4JzlWW5Bh2eisJj5RquCuU0SOe0-VG&fid=0x0:0xc6f9206ece0cda43"],"When":"2024-12-22"},{"Name":"Kameshwari Kate","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVzQ-2pZxA7gx8lBpU6gevc0ySDtt8RE4nGQh7XdhB4EuMZxKcC=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I absolutely love Cafe Portrait. Today is cold and rainy, so after being outside for three hours, I stopped into the cafe for Bailey's and coffee. It is excellent. On Monday afternoon, I stopped for brunch and had a window seat. The poached eggs, mushroom and bacon plate was excellent. Eggs were perfect. Food hot. Since I walk by regularly, I know to visit on a weekday. Weekends have lines down the street. I am not one to wait in line, but Cafe Portrait is worth the wait. Photo includes the window seat where I sat on Monday.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNliS7kSWm-uKtioZebAZzC_wiCQMVAbbvby4Kf&fid=0x0:0xc6f9206ece0cda43"],"When":"2024-12-14"},{"Name":"Z Ja","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLM-VfPPj_9cUt_naI-fYuKmLO99_oT5xKC0co1Ql2Z0dyO9w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We visited this cafe several times during our visit to Vancouver.  The ambiance is great, the waitresses are very friendly and competent, and the drinks are delicious and exactly as we ordered them. We ordered extremely hot drinks, and we got that.  Most of the times at other coffee shops we get tasteless lukewarm drinks, but not at this cafe.  Here, we got our super hot tasty drinks.  I wish they have this cafe everywhere.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOfaiyQKDKmvZjWo0gWSXLcYz9yjLfxyHUf0wyc&fid=0x0:0xc6f9206ece0cda43"],"When":"2024-11-12"},{"Name":"Noma Design","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXZtyE-3Sxq7knbbY5w4Bb1uMl87dEJ65Or2fSDhgO8Kmt1mJY=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We absolutely love Portrait Cafe! We’ve been coming here since 2020, and it’s been our favorite spot ever since.

The owners are so warm and personable—they always make you feel right at home. The cozy atmosphere, combined with the stunning and unique art created by the owners, makes it such a special place.

And let’s not forget the food—it’s absolutely delicious!

Portrait Cafe has an amazing energy that keeps us coming back. It’s truly one of a kind!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO72-ymUYsqJZDL1PdLdZgx5hvEEWvoZZkfrUkn&fid=0x0:0xc6f9206ece0cda43"],"When":"2024-11-27"},{"Name":"Maryam A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWJCbw_3nUeFYieQMOLdHNK7mcnuHxlZEJrmEtPYBJtORo2vgwr=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We visited this place on a sunny day. It was busy, but the wait to get in wasn't too long. Although it took a while for our drinks and food to arrive, it was definitely worth it.

We ordered four different dishes, and the Turkish beef ravioli was hands down the best. The flavors were amazing, and everyone loved their food.  Despite the slow service, we'll be back for more. If you're in Vancouver and craving Turkish food, this place is worth a visit!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP8SbgYFdSVSmEaG3R1NJVIpU7H7b9xqZnB6_f3&fid=0x0:0xc6f9206ece0cda43"],"When":"2024-7-7"},{"Name":"Mahdad Nour","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLq5GqpFajc0Znw8mo90PS6wome53kTdEKYoi-WehAkn2r7VA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love having brunch here, cozy and warm atmosphere. Friendly staff and great brunch. Definitely recommend it,

Newly I went there again and have been more satisfied. The menu has changed a little bit, I went there on weekend but they managed the line outside very well, we have been served with hot tea which was great in the cold, rainy morning.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMzPJeBC0NUF7y9AgBtO37ONYgwTRc7ez4-iQwB&fid=0x0:0xc6f9206ece0cda43"],"When":"2024-6-4"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"James Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL7sRNB09N_fpMKolatHKLarksq2wXJAo1JiHUwh-Tde2-6ow=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent baked goods, average~good drinks, quite pricey, slow service, small seating area, but quite cozy. Thought about what rating give for awhile.

Then again, I feel like I'm buying a piece of art rather than dessert so... what the heck, giving it a 5 😆","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPW-Tfv8R2LomqN37lVY97-y9QW7F8MvsJZbrSM&fid=0x0:0x19af8b8da0bd86c5"],"When":"2024-11-17"},{"Name":"Coline","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLbX_QKuaEf6ecbnocWzjer3WudYneLMe_JJVgbs8i0ijFAVg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Delicious strawberry chiffon cake! Out of the three pastries, this one was the best! I didn’t like the chocolate cake, the cake itself was pretty bland and had a weird aftertaste. The croissant tho was good. Pretty big in portion size but pricey as well. The matcha was ok. I ordered the large size but it seemed like medium size… it’s very busy and packed too!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNyZt0xuecCDRU2H6MUgfzF6ETU2Hoje_N_6_rM&fid=0x0:0x19af8b8da0bd86c5"],"When":"2024-11-9"},{"Name":"Jess S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUajn6XJhTvJ1iXAEzE7_WQNNONuN4fc9451txPwuJi66TUXV-V=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Lovely atmosphere with great tasting pastries. It's a very busy place, but the lineup moves quickly. I found the croissants weren't too sweet, which was a pleasant surprise.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPjoneNQSKoB1Ua8UxCH_YRESq0J1OMEFolqf2n&fid=0x0:0x19af8b8da0bd86c5"],"When":"2024-8-27"},{"Name":"Abdelrahman Khalaf","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU2jHI4KfqcSaV3xQ_vuzOHPSCzM5tStwL7T9jnOX2wCZGamqfc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is truly underrated!

I had originally planned to go to Paul, which is right next door, but changed my mind because Paul doesn't offer a decent variety of bakeries and the lines there are endless.

I was amazed by the quality and size of their baked goods, the cozy cafe environment, the peaceful ambiance you feel as soon as you step inside, the friendly staff, and the unique pastries they serve.

The Forest roll I ordered was absolutely mind-blowing!

I will certainly be returning here again and again without a doubt!!!

As a local reviewer, I rarely find a place deserving of a full 5-star rating, but this one undoubtedly earns that distinction.

Thank you, Foret!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMmd-RQxbOad2eBOzmDR_pPc13oAcpOd8cm3lvp&fid=0x0:0x19af8b8da0bd86c5"],"When":"2024-8-3"},{"Name":"Carina O","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVBF2Ha0eJqalLgxYZqBrLGuU1yMbaDQnyO-yW0G-TrvmjeU5nGTw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very nice Cafe with beautiful atmosphere, cozy and busy. The service is good and fast even when the place is full. Great presentation and large selection of patisserie and sandwiches. We tried many choices and all were delicious! Only downside, it is expensive, but worth it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPDkyK4xLqqV46Y9y7nXPaJWIFz8AJFu1bvCvGl&fid=0x0:0x19af8b8da0bd86c5"],"When":"2024-8-6"},{"Name":"S L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWV3dRExUU6CcyKh7lSLVNfnclkZ3QvSxHjyu6gjmW4Ii5hPUY7lg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"We ordered an iced matcha latte and pistachio white chocolate mousse cake. Unfortunately, the cake was too sweet for my taste and became overwhelming after a few bites. I noticed that the tables around us didn't finish their pastries either, so it might be a good idea to try something else next time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNoU3GCtAYP2L29S_kRrs_RnM64cRW3GimuOF6t&fid=0x0:0x19af8b8da0bd86c5"],"When":"2024-8-9"},{"Name":"parin saemiyan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVO8dUTsSB-_7XCZPmDVp_5YCUEVR6ikfwlgHE3u8L1At-SafU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The interior is beautiful, and the staff were friendly and helpful. They have a nice selection of desserts and drinks.

I enjoyed the desserts—they were tasty but nothing out of the ordinary and a bit too sweet for my liking.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNjZk5jy6DBhrNgkkBWJdkmZ8CzDssW5k8PjFTz&fid=0x0:0x19af8b8da0bd86c5"],"When":"2024-12-9"},{"Name":"Soujanya Bhat","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVaXr3YSUBlMj_9Yj7XQrEHN3nsId2VoH8g3HjAlnMzGIlWEqyQuA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Loved the whole experience! We had ordered pistachio croissant and blueberry croissant roll. Both were absolutely delicious. The croissants were perfectly crisp. The drinks were average. But the pastries are a must try.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOULDJnkaLXe7JNQwvPvuIvBXFetCpj2zbDD915&fid=0x0:0x19af8b8da0bd86c5"],"When":"2024-9-2"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"لجين علي عبدالله","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJknstfVQBYVOicM756T8lGplERKL0_UBI-91D2Lx8i3wQBxzk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A cozy spot in the neighbourhood. It’s a neat place with great menu options and quick service. The staff is very friendly and welcoming. The prices are very reasonable, I got a large latte and it tasted really good. The outside seating is nice, cold for the winter but great for spring and summer.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPUSPDaBsah7UmXLNzQISe5TNmVW6YB_EY78gqK\u0026fid=0x0:0x54633b595630102a"],"When":"2024-6-21"},{"Name":"Rebecca Hunter","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV1peENIUm5GemU5N7DqsvV9GotFsNUxXFnr87QXOd0r2SIVkQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"An amazing spot, truly a gem. I hope to see more unique, charming shops like this. They serve excellent coffee and a variety of Latin American essentials. The sandwiches also seem incredible, so I'll definitely return to try one","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPC2JHrBfUv17My_iPSdSHc531US-JXSptHTNy0\u0026fid=0x0:0x54633b595630102a"],"When":"2023-12-26"},{"Name":"Inci Karaduman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKuz90-BI8mkfIOCTJg-bbQh6j_O7R3GEg8I_bf94fV6-m5KQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"It was okay, as a americano lover the taste wasn't good enough for me but I love the environment.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPupwBVBjuQJ2mumqPMRT-8s-q_N-8ko6TCcBYD\u0026fid=0x0:0x54633b595630102a"],"When":"2024-8-2"},{"Name":"David Fine","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWz17hqH2XH9jNtgNJFt7y85gMGYDQoAkUMRMKE3NW7JFwVHt-1=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Such a wonderful place. A real treasure. Wish we had more small, character shops like this. Great coffee and all kinds of Latin American staples for sale too! Sandwiches look fabulous too, so will be back to try one.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNHp5p8_aap6G_JRjBf_Pm5T_5iOw-NpYGzsfXK\u0026fid=0x0:0x54633b595630102a"],"When":"2022-2-2"},{"Name":"Thomas Hong Ling","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJtp9ZbGkBNW_hdmcyVuaOsbz46mnulGSSCMfS9pAanPof9Lg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent place for a coffee and relax in a hot summer afternoon. Very friendly service and good price.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN025uLVI8BbbJdbGo6Vm6hcLiTzZ8BpHjQ_OhZ\u0026fid=0x0:0x54633b595630102a"],"When":"2024-8-25"},{"Name":"Chef Menajem Peretz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWFHHucZwQOsfB8-8SKRbUjhOVQd_5RL6RbAdEZcnLC3uuqNK4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Totally love this place, beautiful neighbourhood, cute totally unique place, a mosaic of everything Latin both to eat or take away. So go have a coffee with a side or something sweet or savoury and take some unique groceries home. Love the Argentinian alfajores.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPiUx3F5YhfNVl14YrUacavu9Kb-a9ounyEMkw\u0026fid=0x0:0x54633b595630102a"],"When":"2021-5-3"},{"Name":"Jean Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXKKtjuEOS78yExouolVRWdqzVRUPKJu8jLakw4uLFfWhh8Cm0J=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great little neighborhood cafe. Got an iced Americano which had excellent flavor. Not sour, not bitter, not watered down. It was a proper Americano. Would definitely recommend. We also had freshly baked croissants that were quite good too. The only seating was outside which on a lovely late summer/early fall morning was very pleasant.  No A/C inside and inside was really hot….felt bad for the barista but you can stand outside to wait for your drinks and she will bring them to you. Would love to come back to try the more Latino fare. 🤗","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Shana Williamson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL0cDtEB1xxQ5MtEMRX5eQj18clR4dMnU-GIX-D-3F1AmXklw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Besides choosing to spend money here, our biggest regret was not taking photos to document our experience. Let me start with saying the employee/owner/server lady was lovely. Unfortunately her personality didnt make the food or coffees, as it was all downhill from there. The Grilled cheese was a very basic, barely toasted Wonder Bread style sandwich. Accompanying tomato soup was barely lukewarm, but at least somewhat homemade taste. The croissant breakfast sandwich consisted of black charcoal on one side, completely squished down to about 1 1/2\" tall, with rubbery, formed eggs in the center. The mocha tasted like it had been blended up with a powdered mix, and the Americano undrinkable: we wouldve been happier with a tin of Nabob at home! Dumped it out and there were grounds in the bottom, not sure how that even happens. Only good part about our visit is we decided to park in the 'permit only' parking without one, and we didnt get a ticket.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Karen Barry Commercial Real Estate","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW8nt4tckeUIqm2cPxeZ1K7-gVLsocQGQx3NM-k8Q5AqH9GXDoN=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a lovely quaint coffeehouse with terrific street frontage outdoor seating and restful interiors. The food was exceptional and the service was well above average.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPqei2xToleOeh1nw6T216ETu8bN9WSigHqPwz2&fid=0x0:0x80e887aa1ed1d4ef"],"When":"2024-12-8"},{"Name":"Brandon Day","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU-49ti61d1VywTlCDUdUIW-RB-Oiem1cAViE4lEAhsRu3c1_na=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Beautifully simple rendition of a coffee shop with staying power. Espresso is darker and oilier than I prefer, milk in my Cortado was soooo close to hiding the espresso’s few shortcomings. Ambiance was clean and standing strong against modern “white shops”. Music alternated New Wave and more modern pop while I was there.  I can see how locals have supported this place for years!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNVWfdNPSqPv2g8u7h0nvtrvdosZZQm7V8buNGG&fid=0x0:0x80e887aa1ed1d4ef"],"When":"2024-6-14"},{"Name":"Abhiram Ravi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUY-77HCtRrQidfTNX3dVYaqlfVJDDO8JfmEAcQwmcBYkG2je6EhQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely loved the vibe and the coffee.
Was just walking down the road and was not thinking about coffee at all but saw this cute spot and impulsively went in. I'm glad I did!
The hustle and bustle in the cafe was nice but it might be hard to find a spot to sit. It was also very toasty inside which felt nice initially but got a bit much later.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM3WauhuW9Fdp3O7Lk8zl-167g70dtNh1B6Q6WS&fid=0x0:0x80e887aa1ed1d4ef"],"When":"2024-3-1"},{"Name":"SJ Kwak","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWWLECfVhFzw3UImajK4duWa1rotww1Cfjc1bWi3JPYgw23toMh=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"On the way back from English Bay, I stopped by a cafe with a lot of locals and both the coffee and bakery were delicious.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMGIhgicnXHJCuk05adeOMTZNvPVLaUe4YVCHyZ&fid=0x0:0x80e887aa1ed1d4ef"],"When":"2024-10-1"},{"Name":"Kaitlyn Jung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU3Z8RTVAtMfrX6uG6JFFOYzsyTXI7YKgjW6WLd73YQIb_urJDkYQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lovely coffee shop near the beach! The people were so nice and the vibes are great for a morning coffee after a walk on the sea wall. I wouldn’t suggest studying or working here though because there are no outlets but it’s great for a coffee chat with friends.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP_2eJVDzRLrNDlsYa-JoyyDegZa3iad4aMzvOS&fid=0x0:0x80e887aa1ed1d4ef"],"When":"2024-3-30"},{"Name":"Ellen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLSWdo9GshPlmEvBKXWb6gQggO2Jhy4jFykArK8TWvfHVdoSc1k=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Felt like a cozy local cafe. There's good seating areas. However the brewed coffee and blueberry ginger scone were both mediocre. The scone barely had any ginger and overall too sweet due to the thick icing.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNuu-FI9tY-jJeEzM85E6SCJUbtU0cDRdWxmZrC&fid=0x0:0x80e887aa1ed1d4ef"],"When":"2024-3-7"},{"Name":"Le ventre sur pattes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLFQRox1CyvsETQ9lWZR01kB_tj1h49eCcXK3kQ-17UlABmQw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cinnamon roll is a 10/10, same for the brownie (strong in chocolate).
The egg wrap and the chicken one were both really good. A lot of vegetables in it for only 10$, big love for the egg one.
Coffees are amazing : Cappuccino and matcha are perfect, be careful the long one is really not strong (American coffee), I preferred the cappuccino with oat milk !!
The place is cute, come early it will be less crowded.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP3AFHCi2kXuGpKOIZrGsWVHEouVx3Ckl6NSATi&fid=0x0:0x80e887aa1ed1d4ef"],"When":"2023-7-17"},{"Name":"Joanna","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUcVqDadyxu12M1cg-x0dXrkTh5jfcvF8-MwUMPPWVkRPyTe-58=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food and coffee are amazing! Their food is the only thing wakes me up in the morning 💕","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN_4yyU-oNXjXTy2WwX2IP8eIlSEUiZHaDBgjME&fid=0x0:0x80e887aa1ed1d4ef"],"When":"2024-12-10"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWGKnShjX-I9TdNE1AeWmyi_PNvJLa0g8OL3-Pn7KTjW5fMZvQA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Charming staff with mellow, homey food. The coffee jelly was a winner—light but packed with an ever so present coffee flavour. I subbed the whipped cream for ice cream, and it was just sweet enough for me; the staff mentioned that the coffee symphony parfait is sweeter, so I'm glad I stuck with the simple coffee jelly. That said, the savoury dishes were pretty underwhelming—the omelette and hamburg curry didn’t have much flavour. I’d say skip those and go for their desserts or breakfast items instead.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOXyg1nvKCvxqCekNPiFIRbIk-zyq9R4yvDQqIW&fid=0x0:0xab04244860aa873c"],"When":"2024-11-30"},{"Name":"Lucy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKqfrpxSL9wyu-jgQN0idl5E-hPLS-AQn4mD0rfnc0rng6qmCRI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a cute spot! Great ambiance, delicious food and amazing service.

This is a Japanese-style cafe in the West End. It is located next to Dollarama in the Denman Place Mall. Parking is available on Nelson between Bidwell and Denman.

I recommend their matcha latte and omurice for lunch. The latte has the perfect amount of sweetness and the omurice was flavorful and filling.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN2eOAl9ALBa3qEjck4H3A2RNMsA6iDtAVqrn4n&fid=0x0:0xab04244860aa873c"],"When":"2024-12-10"},{"Name":"Kanako Sakurada","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKYybgPjG_d3LYq66Ui47Ocd_2PMrfkKaju5V_L0IyVTR19lQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Casual Japanese cafe serving light meals such as pasta, curry rice, and pizza toast. Their serve home cooking style, everyday meal that you would be eating at home in Japan. Simple but very authentic.

Their selection of drinks/ desserts were also good. Worth it to go there just for that. We tried cheese cake (no-bake style popular in Japan, レアチーズケーキ) and it was excellent! Also saw in the menu were parfait, coffee jelly, and bread pudding.

We liked the food and felt very cozy, would love to come back for more!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPgkNrOsorcfeBXm0jO81zPQ_SlCZqalv_T-YbD&fid=0x0:0xab04244860aa873c"],"When":"2024-6-2"},{"Name":"nadchen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWhha6FiZ-__3D4kG5iBU0qFYgucasy2Rcm2OTckG5T_7FCk6GI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place was located very close to our accommodation, so we came here for coffee and tea to start our day.

Upon first glance and when we sat down, I found this place very cute. I love the design and decor. I thought this was just a cafe at first, but they also served sit down food and breakfast. I was very surprised at how large their menu was.

I ordered the Hojicha latte with oat milk and my boyfriend got the Detox tea. I loved my Hojicha, it was rich, earthy, and creamy too from the milk. It was very good. Also the Detox tea was good too. It was soothing and I really liked the faint peppermint notes. My boyfriend and I shared the whole pot, and for the price I thought it was very reasonable. Also the whole tea setup was very cute and pretty, I'm inspired to have my own tea set at home just like this lol.

Service was amazing. I felt very welcome and taken care of. Compared to other establishments, their service is one of the best I've ever received.

Next time I'd come here again to try their food and I was also interested in trying their matcha affogato. I'd also want to come back and read, journal, or study here for an afternoon. Our experience was very memorable, I hope to one day return again :) Thank you for taking care of us.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMfVH4UWSDC0s5pyxoMp3pribQJIe8tDAYki5VY&fid=0x0:0xab04244860aa873c"],"When":"2024-10-22"},{"Name":"MJ","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKFkrxLzMC4po2TzcFPsgsRTbBM7hTFc1xF3Fd36IoosgRxow=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have been to many cafe's in Dubai, Tokyo, and Vancouver. I can confidently say this is one of the best places I've been to. Authentic Japanese Cafe experience. From the ambiance, to the music, coffee, and food. The attention to detail shows. The staff is very friendly, kind, and professional. This place sets the standard. Their Mogiya drip coffee is really well made, and tastes better than drip coffee from other cafes around the area. Their breakfast selection is great. They make the best eggs I've ever had. I've been to this place three times, and I plan on being a frequent customer.

Thank you, and keep it up!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMEtLGqI7RpREk6_FcMUESYBO_WVm-pNj4aTLK1&fid=0x0:0xab04244860aa873c"],"When":"2024-6-6"},{"Name":"Jen Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVaL0RdeXtgs5sep6RZAPEECCWEbBdPSjyPl2-XazNd0JVBT_pLjg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you want higher quality matcha or hojicha than you can find in most cafes especially in the Denmann area, look no further. Traditionally prepared with bowl and whisk the teas are carefully made to order. This takes time so don't expect instant service like you would at say, a Starbucks. Staff are conscientious and lovely, very helpful. Food wise, the servings are closer to sizes you'd see in Japan but very very tasty. Everything is cooked to order as well so again, don't expect Denny's level of speed here as the menu is quite varied. The space is great so I enjoy sitting for a meal or drink and the time passed is very pleasant. Great for going solo or with a friend. Doesn't get too noisy either which is lovely.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNH89MaWjykXW6n61STkMLolx8F4d9HcRLzFW3D&fid=0x0:0xab04244860aa873c"],"When":"2024-9-1"},{"Name":"Jon N","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWje3HiKp5UbAJt2ib8BzFi4O7ca6JYvmFYYZsyeaAyNAg-DwHu9g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Very causal Japanese cafe serving some light food and snacks. Cafe is cozy, clean and spacious. Got the hojicha latte which was pretty good. The lunch was simple and filling. Consisted of fruits, salad, eggs, soup, yogurt and onigiri. I’d probably try something different on the menu as this was a bit underwhelming for me.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN_-p2GVin0TVA6MEbzjbUA0OxmJv9XhEZ7kX_9&fid=0x0:0xab04244860aa873c"],"When":"2024-8-4"},{"Name":"Mikaela Fournier-Moar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWFjXBczAoQtjcHjK6GuxgPmXN3YNeMwCBFiWowXVfCoO3zWxvj=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you are a matcha lover/snob this is the place to go! I seriously can’t get enough of their matcha! I had the seasonal iced strawberry matcha latte and the hot matcha latte. Both were impeccable. Perfect blend of sweet and umami flavours. Excellent amount of foam, no graininess, bright green colour. Seriously the best matcha I’ve ever had.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN7eGf3TfuS3k4jPluPIMsnv149sikV7dKxyoVL&fid=0x0:0xab04244860aa873c"],"When":"2024-8-22"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jane Doe","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIG6ivj47xS2HhBWyL7Nhqkjx3ByYqnQdgrN9qpq1CDdbnzpQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Cute spot, fun coffee options, great location.
Be aware the homeycomb latte will have chunks of the comb that can be fun or odd depends on your preference.
The pistachio foam latte was very good.
Awesome morning club option for people to grab a breakfast on the go.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO_bc-5UaZxxCiJvbElFT59j7i5i37GXvNDMruS&fid=0x0:0x9cc861b337d4f6be"],"When":"2024-11-13"},{"Name":"Kit Yee Yu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUy4hyLjXryzPjKJf4N3DUJBAsHtZSSuk76pvxFtVmwfHSV1Gtd=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I came here for a coffee with my friend after lunch in the neighbourhood. This cafe is highly rated so we gave it a try.

They have quite a wide variety of beverages. Now they are promoting their summer sips. I ordered one of them called mango matcha coconut. It was pretty good and very refreshing. It was sweet but not too sweet. My friend ordered an iced oat latte. She loved it so much.

The service was good. When we asked the barista questions, she answered them politely. It was our first time visit so the menus, food and beverages were so new to us that we don’t even know what to order. They have the regular latte, coffee or tea but of course we wanted to their special beverages.

The price was acceptable knowing the special beverages were on the expensive side. They were good so we felt it was worth it. We went on a Saturday but surprisingly the cafe was not too busy. Maybe they need to do some social media posts or more advertising online to get more exposure, so more people know about it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNwTwGQwcRHQOhvNOQv5IU191Wfshk3QtG75qdj&fid=0x0:0x9cc861b337d4f6be"],"When":"2024-6-29"},{"Name":"Suki Pan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX6efNZzthJ5-YWPAGBPg_1vp6l2cVEF5fYwRxel83qBKTUq4pK=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"this amazing asian-owned cafe in Vancouver serves up the most aesthetic drinks I’ve seen in the area, perfect for those who want their camera to eat first 😍

trust me when I say that you HAVE to save this place because it will be your next favourite hangout.

💗highlights:
Lumiere gives off a certain industrial aesthetic. one of my favourite things about them is their micro-roasting and high-tech coffee machines. they roast the raw coffee beans in-house daily and grind them up to ensure that you are getting the freshest possible coffee everyday. no exceptions.

🌟the cafe is right across the street from Broadway station so very transit friendly!

☕️what we tried:
- iced Vienna oat latte
- pour over tray
- pistachio croissant
- pineapple coconut bar
- mango coconut matcha (summer sips menu)
- mango coconut cloud (summer sips menu)
- nitro cold brew

I was highly surprised by how elite their foam toppings are. both the Vienna foam and the mango foam was top tier!! the only downside is that I’m probably going to crave the Vienna latte everyday now. it is a must try 🛑🤯

The pour over tray comes with a seasonal treat on the side and I highly recommend it. The coffee goes down so smooth, even for those who usually don’t like their coffee black.

we also tried some of their cold brew and nitro cold brew on tap and I loved the nitro cold brew (not pictured). This is the first cafe in the area I’ve seen with coffee on tap which was really cool.

I love that it’s on the way to UBC and PSA they’re opening a NEW location on macdonald st in the fall!

🌟tip: students get 10% off drinks

🍂they always come out with fun seasonal drinks so make sure to stay tuned for their fall sips in September!

There’s is also a loyalty account and an app to order online.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOXkbP4LToH6XPlhBVefLsVMPRkOEpF_MkZ2_kf&fid=0x0:0x9cc861b337d4f6be"],"When":"2024-8-29"},{"Name":"Stephanie De Leon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUPtSGjsqOZ_EhbXhnwXOaGVL6b_NNivonu1chio9B4-8j5GbnL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great coffee!! My partner and I tried the donut coffee and the pistachio latte, was blown away from the flavour! Best mocha I've ever had.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNwJ9jfN8e1CsIlecriXozj2iUi3Brn1l-zwpqS&fid=0x0:0x9cc861b337d4f6be"],"When":"2024-11-22"},{"Name":"Vicente Barreiros","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWXXjeDynmf81Pwbj0gtZnbrkTAQXze5uhpr2fBUeDvR8QxnMvZfQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had an amazing experience at Lumiere Café near Broadway and Cambie! I was craving a pour over with Ethiopian beans, but they were out of stock. Frank, one of the staff, went above and beyond by roasting the beans on the spot just to accommodate my request! The coffee was brewed to perfection, and the effort Frank put into it truly made my day. The ambiance of the café is cozy and welcoming, making it a perfect spot to relax and enjoy great coffee. Highly recommend this place for both the service and the quality of their coffee!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPAUatAt-dZV4LJ_X77ouHlXw7gv_UUsmF3-QIn&fid=0x0:0x9cc861b337d4f6be"],"When":"2024-9-17"},{"Name":"Shamshirinder Singh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWoIXwMNIVuA3_A304p9H0r1WWGlwJ34u9bnc8U38LJzrt4uBcGgg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I had macha latte last friday and i like it, went again today but this time it is not mixed at all. Also i asked for sparkling water and they said they charge for it, with most of the cafes if you buy latte drinks its free","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPFPhvqFSNWxtG2IdmKAax0dY4S37118foAxx2H&fid=0x0:0x9cc861b337d4f6be"],"When":"2024-10-1"},{"Name":"tavers","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVC7ILtSlxfdDxb6V9J462gwa1fPiceOnM23OIRkX4ftST7PlY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing staff!! Awesome coffee. One of the best seasonal coffee flavours in Vancouver.
Highly recommend the pistachio drinks
Very accommodating staff. Excited for the new location in Kitsilano!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPgpRkLYKleS17DO01wRhLa8jA8uWGpJboCSy1u&fid=0x0:0x9cc861b337d4f6be"],"When":"2024-10-14"},{"Name":"El Gol","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLdBZ7F8bfnQAL80-cdU5G2ULSV43eBPHR9Ee-p5a91WDDkpg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I absolutely love coming to Lumiere Coffee, and it’s all thanks to Frank! He’s always so friendly and welcoming, making my mornings so much better. His oat milk lattes are seriously the best I’ve ever had—so creamy and perfectly made every time. It’s the little things, like Frank’s great service and the amazing coffee, that keep me coming back. If you’re looking for a place with incredible coffee, this is the place to be!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Law Rence H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWX-gD_1eapEh74OqyTe0YNfW1L_Xu19R2dfxMN8tNFSt7HowTh1A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Greenhorn Cafe is a hidden gem in Vancouver! The atmosphere is cozy and welcoming, perfect for a relaxing coffee break or a casual brunch with friends. The staff are incredibly friendly and attentive, making you feel right at home from the moment you walk in.
The menu offers a great variety of options, from delicious pastries to hearty breakfast dishes. I highly recommend trying their avocado toast and the freshly baked croissants – they are simply divine! The coffee is top-notch, with a rich, smooth flavor that keeps you coming back for more.
Overall, Greenhorn Cafe is a fantastic spot with great food, excellent service, and a warm, inviting ambiance. It’s definitely worth a visit if you’re in the area!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPD2LTRvkRWBjhgCZtxKIKENNn03fzvxiRtM5wb&fid=0x0:0xe3bf33656ceb52fe"],"When":"2024-11-5"},{"Name":"Sam Mehrbod","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUn6EyX4vOM80UypJySYKQFB37PnC6qDTPKm6x79LCPYd85kK_eLA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We are a regular here but their new dish was an incredible fusion of flavors and textures. The creamy yogurt base provided a perfect balance to the rich and tender short ribs. The poached egg added a luxurious, velvety touch, and when broken, the yolk blended seamlessly with the hearty beans and savory beef. The herbs and seasonings enhanced the overall depth of flavor, and the crunchy elements added a delightful contrast. The thoughtful combination of these ingredients, from the creamy to the tender to the crispy, created an unforgettable dining experience. Highly recommend for those who appreciate a unique twist on comfort food with a gourmet flair!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPeLw5YaKnjr6ZP1tJaRqgMi3-1ROKjpc_D1Bnt&fid=0x0:0xe3bf33656ceb52fe"],"When":"2024-9-28"},{"Name":"Indira Sondhi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLgBQ0jvPpJUc_JGoJOubYywIXnWJOweR2g9DbedcZPkuz1TdZ5=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My absolute favorite cafe in Vancouver. The food it out of this world! The avocado toast is a must have, so full of flavor: they add cucumber and a type of mini bell peppers. Very nice atmosphere, always full of people but you never have to seem to wait long to get a table. They also have the most delicious waffles. If you go here I would 100% recommend trying them, they are fairly small so you can order it on the side of something else. They have the perfect soft and chewy consistency.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOPqcIjqRLSIdI383ZKrHVFYPaewInKo-HzX-8p&fid=0x0:0xe3bf33656ceb52fe"],"When":"2024-8-14"},{"Name":"S T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUBDT4t4CmjbeG1_4bxKEc3_bD87k27YAWNghrm5hK--TRj3j-l=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Good coffee. Delicious cookie--not too soft and not underbaked (hate half-baked stuff that taste like raw dough and sugar), just enough salt to make it savoury. Tasty breakfast sandwich.

Overall, good experience but will not go out of my way to return as finding parking isn't ideal since I don't live in the area. On a nice day, it was a pleasant several blocks walk from where I was parked.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOqPZz3Yz8NfoC-fENAkfTLlGZlm_TA5nW_TaBU&fid=0x0:0xe3bf33656ceb52fe"],"When":"2024-7-3"},{"Name":"Tamara Masa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWiXThVgfLXwOWxKN6zb4Q7anGWXU3QMl58s6_2lmKXvyUHxtQMBQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love this place! Never disappoints with its delicious Benny and coffees. Would recommend stopping by if you’re looking for a cozy place to have breakfast.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNE6LzHuA8uZKX2_icGLAS-Jk95iVKFOziq7oTy&fid=0x0:0xe3bf33656ceb52fe"],"When":"2024-12-12"},{"Name":"Mahdad Nour","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLq5GqpFajc0Znw8mo90PS6wome53kTdEKYoi-WehAkn2r7VA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fantastic brunch experience! The ham eggs benedit were cooked to perfection. The atmosphere is warm and welcoming. The service was quick, and the waitstaff were friendly and attentive. Definitely gonna go there again and will try other items.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMMCzQy6L0y3Ob3WVfkVMgC6rKj1Nbn-4mSp-bF&fid=0x0:0xe3bf33656ceb52fe"],"When":"2024-6-23"},{"Name":"최다운","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLcD26cJNHn_YWBSUEfNCkU3IpdZZLub9LRiHdIjtA8P3iT9A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food was extremly good and everything that we ordered was amazing. Especially the dish with tomato, it wasn't that spicy and very juicy and flavorful. The environment and vibe were also really good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNiHuMns0duGAei-KDH3mfCJ0obF6kIv6KsW_j8&fid=0x0:0xe3bf33656ceb52fe"],"When":"2024-8-22"},{"Name":"Scot Stra","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI-Z8qk7F9GFCZ6_hOrQQoW5q0mi1UkBxD0uRf7WwwcKIZ-Eg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cool hidden gem in downtown west end. I had their bacon eggs benny and it was great. The sundried tomatoes was a nice touch. Atmosphere was nice and clean service was friendly. They also sell to go items like pasta and local breads.
Suggest to go on weekday daytime as its less busy and you will get a seat right away.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPlWejY05Aye5tFkIfIDl9X5_74wOx7xIc71saW&fid=0x0:0xe3bf33656ceb52fe"],"When":"2024-11-5"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Ella MD","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXHi797pmc-SiPMeAzbfyjOZFsOe5p_JyMRESQgiikX13zy46o=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a delightful and distinctive dessert! The dessert was superb, and the hot chocolate was truly exceptional—far superior to the typical chocolate milk found elsewhere.  It was exceptionally tasty! The amiable staff further enhanced the experience. I highly recommend visiting this establishment; you will certainly not be disappointed!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOt0jM0xgfjCjA1BAPYASn9rmcEt4I00BPPRk08&fid=0x0:0x7d75232e14ccc667"],"When":"2024-12-24"},{"Name":"Jason Huang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXikEH2mnPaXMc9ILIM1Sj7nxMqRvKG1uwByjc6CAvgxtnQCSX6=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Want to try this place long  time . So  Long story short , went on a Monday BC Day , order a Supreme (Matcha),chestnut, and coffee.
Matcha supreme 5 start - very tasty, the matcha filling is smooth, not too over powering! Not too sweet , crispy out soft in !
Chestnut 3start - too sweet , one bite too heavy didn’t  want a second bite. Can’t taste what suppose to taste!
Coffee - I don’t like coffee , but if ur a coffee lover , you probably like it ! No common on this.

The chestnut drink 1 start - not recommend , wayyyyyyyy toooooo sweeeeetttttt !!!!!

They have other pastries- will try next time .

P.S. - do not recommend for take it to go , if you want it to go , tell them separate the filling ,so you can do the filling whenever you want it and keep it crispy instead soggy

Service - 5 of 5
Foods - 3.9 of 5","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMNG63lfEf-cBMUeXfPHT_YqtwgNUdKOxU2Mgce&fid=0x0:0x7d75232e14ccc667"],"When":"2024-10-15"},{"Name":"katelynn c","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVoqcwb_gcSeJsQp6Fk0xxFfLaz6Ca58KOlakGeP011yHdUWdF9=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"i came here during the vancouver croissant crawl and got the chicken supreme croissant sandwich, and it was actually LIFE CHANGING. everything was perfect — the flakiness of the croissant, the juiciness and flavour of the chicken, and the coleslaw. i wish it was a regular menu item 😕","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMv1Lxm3YyHB8an8bJ0iL2uFv2-OuJcYGswsTIV&fid=0x0:0x7d75232e14ccc667"],"When":"2024-12-25"},{"Name":"John","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJpPUu9NAmMB8ubAOwb9sNJ1MPx70zC5lOAFMI7JxTuGWpupA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Been here a few times over the course of a couple years or so. First time I gave them a break because they had crazy lines from being one of the first in Vancouver for supreme croissants.
I recall issues with their croissant dough and thought maybe it was because they were too busy and trying to meet demand.
Filling was on point but croissant portion bad.

Couple other times more recent just for coffees. Noticed a significant number of fruit flies flying on and around pastries. Not unusual but still disturbing.

Gave them another shot today. Almond supreme extremely oily. Falls apart and just oozes out fat. Trying to even hold it up for a picture was a challenge. FYI, also noticed some fruit flies today but only a couple this time.

Service today was terrible. Came to pick up my order and was told it would be ready around close. Showed staff the pick up time. They asked me to come back at 8pm when I was there after lunch. Staff told me they needed to speak to a manager before they could give me anything. After 15 mins they finally decided to give me my order. When I checked it, it was missing an item. Had to come back for the other item","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPo4xBofqfjvaE5YqA9rVKkdvqP0dwl2kCtH2EP&fid=0x0:0x7d75232e14ccc667"],"When":"2024-9-27"},{"Name":"Mr. A Winehouse","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIf8nUJx4HAWluUpSMAs7_nB3KbWBebT8e7xKk4USI1mW_wTQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hidden Gem on Robson

This charming little cafe on Robson Street is a hidden gem. The food is delicious, the coffee is expertly brewed, and the service is impeccable. Arash, the young gentleman who serves us, is incredibly friendly and attentive. A must-visit for foodies and coffee lovers alike!
⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOIGhy35OeHMndU7qCXFYfwRwuyC2ysgI2haQUg&fid=0x0:0x7d75232e14ccc667"],"When":"2024-9-5"},{"Name":"So Jeong Yoon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWnRZ8piErdqgGyTo4zHXdI1NkUSIlT7bPQBhE9RLUVZNqvmgAe=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I bought 2 pastries for to-go.
2 pastries were not fit in a box. The staff tried to close the box all the cream touch the box and his finger for sure. And he brought tape out and put it on like the photo. I can't believe how you guys make like this for almost $10(each) pastries. I got some donut in other shop at same day. That store pack so nicely and tidy(also fit). So disappointing. You guys should figure that out for your shop.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO24wBVuSlbPhafch7AugvDAAp0WuPJofTHRbOQ&fid=0x0:0x7d75232e14ccc667"],"When":"2024-8-25"},{"Name":"Allen Cann","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWrGXB4y5pnSjcJ8UcqnGMsBXAnkpzziwt3TAUuzQCdG8p3c30=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We seen this cozy place on Instagram and the I love the Mango Americano ! We had the pistachio white chocolate, biscoff and matcha. (None of those are pictured because we devoured it.
Staff: Friendly.
Service: good
Atmosphere: great bistro music
10/10 place to visit if you're traveling","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPjtLUF1bH7vhDvzdeZDIwIomLw0nkWDUVTocyT&fid=0x0:0x7d75232e14ccc667"],"When":"2024-7-26"},{"Name":"Jacinda K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV0xoGeCDSw5DVJ3YNgzQb_o4aJOLzQdAQ3syqD9WiYy7lJqCATJA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Friendly cafe serving seriously delicious treats. The supreme croissants are as yummy as they are cute! Decided on a peanut butter and jam supreme because jam and croissants is such a good combo, and this one is swirled perfectly with jam in every bite.  So good! I will be back for another supreme!

📌Tip! If you ask, they will bring it back to the kitchen and cut it in half for you properly to make it easy (and less messy) to share!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPUGGSTysPszgy0kLtpcfCC7Gv15tPPQe7lp8h7&fid=0x0:0x7d75232e14ccc667"],"When":"2023-11-5"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Dave","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLPZIUOsDwlBkFebhG04vj0-2yRgvhqZ8FA0OSOGGM5zHg8Nw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Marvelous cafe! Really good coffee and delicious pastries 😋. They also have a good selection of chocolates and macarons that make fantastic gifts. Very friendly and attentive staff.  Nice atmosphere with a small patio. Highly recommend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNEwGzkW23sE7lM5ItSfgpmiA-FskDGQuad8-6J&fid=0x0:0x3cec6a2b95b1a728"],"When":"2024-12-4"},{"Name":"Octavio Rodriguez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjULTqViu9lDQGaaJM8w5vXMYgPZ-NnCcvjO2ukbusXrWuFeXErJ3Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Thierry is well known for its pastries, cakes, macaroons, and chocolates. Not on your lower price bracket; however, the presentation, quality of ingredients, and particularly, the flavour of every item here is outstanding. A Vanilla Bean Bar together with a Pistachio Latte will take you to a happy place. Order your cakes, then head to the drinks section, next to it. Service is friendly and attentive. Highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOrIcM3aPe32qPP9CkD8-ilXK8weqb5V28609ag&fid=0x0:0x3cec6a2b95b1a728"],"When":"2024-8-20"},{"Name":"Michelle Siaril","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVvNHVR_L-5eCK2usU0kQoT055SV9vB2qDNPyrA7CmG9QXO2IM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Thierry is a very convenient place for business meeting or casual catch up with friends in downtown. Service was honestly lacklustre considering the premium vibe they are trying to convey. If anything, cleanliness could be better because the staffs didn’t really clean up the tables between guess. Pastry wise, I’ve tried their Almond Croissant ($7.45) and Hazelnut Pithivier ($7.45).

Interestingly, my experience was very different each visit. The almond croissant was very, very hefty with generous almond filling. It was very sweet but still enjoyable for me (I have a very strong sweet tooth though). The second time I went there, I got the pithivier and another almond croissant. Both pastries were super dry (even a little bit stale) and the paste was very bland. Would be good if they can be more consistent as this makes me hesitate to come back. Coffee was just alright to balance the pastry, go with their hot chocolate if you want a better beverage option.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMB0eD4fk9GMiEx8nYXQWFXOgceBw7wRExUyB0&fid=0x0:0x3cec6a2b95b1a728"],"When":"2024-7-25"},{"Name":"Aki Project","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUyXVV0jzx1wnnFVNSJxNutwu-zWDv3IijTPSCuyHS99YMZe8I=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing hours for a patisserie/cafe of this calibre. Came by around 1930 and the seating was about 80% full with decently quick turnover. You pick your dessert at the dessert counter and give your name, then head to the drinks counter to order drinks and pay.

Had the strawberry basil tart and iced mocha. The tart was so refreshing and light, felt perfect as an after-dinner dessert. The basil cream surprised me with how much I liked it, perfect level of sweetness (‘not too sweet’) with notable basil flavour, matched perfectly with the biscuit base and mildly tart strawberry. Also really enjoyed the iced mocha, smooth and full-bodied with a slight caramel flavour.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOY56pre26492GHEGn8fO4fcZFDDWQy863mod4B&fid=0x0:0x3cec6a2b95b1a728"],"When":"2024-7-12"},{"Name":"Winnie Tan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLJSPDA7hvbDV1AA9RX2IZmEZO3_VPn2Y03808b8PZeMvR3bg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Back at Thierry’s after 7y and am glad their business os till thriving!

The hot chocolate is still spectacular. The croissant - slightly lacklustre tho still well above average. I didnt have time to try the desserts tho as I recall, they are very exquisite.

Happy to be back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPrYGL4yOJsHBhB251JxdbU6QjmEhvNHvGOAF77&fid=0x0:0x3cec6a2b95b1a728"],"When":"2024-9-6"},{"Name":"애기치즈6v6","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWd43gLE1LT_i-t_sH1-4cJAnCNxHQbDIRpKps8jyu3s5ti9SOm=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I ordered hot chocolate milk. But my order was missed, and I waited longer than expected to request confirmation. My drink came out within a minute of my request, but it was very lukewarm, and there was no apology for the omission. I had good memories of other branches so I visited again but was disappointed at this branch.
Also, my friend said she had a coffee in other branches and it was good. But this place was not good. We won't visit here again, I guess.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNGGbMGN5WJyMUse8Cf3okpyO92QySsoQ2SyPD5&fid=0x0:0x3cec6a2b95b1a728"],"When":"2024-10-7"},{"Name":"Byron Sheardown","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXNqxb0c_42J36yKVRNJaOWQgsDJlMUDs94sxLG_b3F9RGXTQ_D=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Worth the lineup. Bought several desserts. I had a lemon 🍋 tart. Definitely the best I’ve EVER had. Espresso was better than Vancouver average.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOkZ-inGb0E_HoCSBD__1lTprsFhaLDVJHhN275&fid=0x0:0x3cec6a2b95b1a728"],"When":"2024-8-3"},{"Name":"Robert Caron","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW_EpFhprcf3SG2KOeJLn_ZMvns4ZouCijKUxtpaECokzRyVf_o=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"It's an experience place, not a food place. The black forest cake was good, the croissant was garbage, but the place is very nice and makes you feel jet set. Definitely I place I'll go again from time to time. Think Bisou, less good but fancier.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM3Bn_zBz0bk1sTKce8KvyXvt-rBIsErpfUfgVO&fid=0x0:0x3cec6a2b95b1a728"],"When":"2024-8-28"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Shania H-VB","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVxWd27kuJ7KSMhn8juw9jLwPyFhllOFCKxYjWal6Al8dYq2_XK=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very very busy, even at 11:30 pm. It's open 24 hours and it's so good! Best cafe I've ever been to. I was surprised at the reasonable price and portion size of the sandwich. The desserts me and my boyfriend tried were all very tasty. We got 2 large frap drinks, 4 deserts, and 2 sandwiches for only $60, including taxes. It's worth the visit for sure. ☺️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO_JheVgxxCu4W59fa9cdCOUXrrgVBpxp-i2xzu&fid=0x0:0xc7748a6170afa094"],"When":"2024-11-29"},{"Name":"Mark Metz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXyoVLB7bkNJLBFo3oRCjZrYVNKcyodhJkm4mGNA7Rkt3cOK6Nv=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Some of the best cream filled donuts I've ever had. I tried the dulce de leche and pistachio, they were both very balanced so you never got over whelmed by sweetness. Went back twice to try the London fog donut and Mango mousse, everything is incredible","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOHk_-LHIQDEqLafXg2HuO47rRPyXR5r7KN6hJk&fid=0x0:0xc7748a6170afa094"],"When":"2024-12-6"},{"Name":"Asha Talbert","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU9jksFqYLuaGUu05pgj-b8XCSY-_nIpjxC_AoFHw8FZ54_9EYREA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Awesome quality of pastries and service! Despite a very lunch hour, my order was fulfilled fast and efficiently. The seating capacity for this location is a bit limited but it was nice that they also had a tiny patio.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPTFrXGjw8LSeVYa34RY3imK6edYn1CsnnXh-Qt&fid=0x0:0xc7748a6170afa094"],"When":"2024-10-4"},{"Name":"Chloe Rachel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWgExGuK1W-XgQc1tPnrQlqQkWxCTaNhdz977uVTTY3zjpsAzs-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"First time at the Denman location, but we love Breka! Today, we had their Spinach & Artichoke Pocket (recommended by another patron in-line) and the Apricot Chicken Salad Sandwich. Both came with a pickle on the side. You can ask for free ice water at the counter when ordering. We managed to get a table around 11:30 for lunch, but it was filling up quickly. They have a mixture of single seats (counter) and tables inside and outside. The pocket was $6.75 and grilled/warmed nicely, just as cheesy as we'd hoped! The sandwich was filling for $9.25, and was on a rosemary & cheddar sourdough. Average price point but a fantastic selection.

During lunch hour, we noticed lots of students from the nearby high school fill the space. Next time, we'll be back to try more of their baked goods and donuts!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPRDwnlbTUrrX2mrpaJOzuHee38b82Qw8uiCLmA&fid=0x0:0xc7748a6170afa094"],"When":"2024-6-11"},{"Name":"Hussain Witwit","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWqRj8LIQG5KA0a4yGDLTMTTa7tTNzUesgh2_EvfRsn1jo5H0qrJA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Okay I love that it’s 24 hours! That’s just amazing! They have so many options! The chocolate cake was too heavy I find especially very late at night (unless you have a very strong sweet tooth). The shortcake was light. I wanted to try the tiramisu however it has alcohol in it. Good vibes though.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN9ryvOo0ojELcZhsGTi8MJTNrxVov1D3WGwHcS&fid=0x0:0xc7748a6170afa094"],"When":"2024-9-12"},{"Name":"Dr. Josef A. Swetz D.C.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWpIKYIp7nH6sSm-VCqFiY9yqasMHTyqbYbVBdCTIuzDbJLA9a6=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Decided to pick up some very delicious new York cheesecake from Breka - It was truly a scrumptious dessert and it was hard to not buy so many more items as there was quite the selection of treats and desserts! I can't wait to come back and try their donoughts!

Highly recommend coming here to help with your sweet tooth! 😋 Absolutely loved how many options they have here for desserts and also would like to try their sandwiches, croissants and sausage rolls someday! 😄","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOBe3tD4w_09AUH5VR3jTFWVMDQUQpNR-f35yDn&fid=0x0:0xc7748a6170afa094"],"When":"2024-6-20"},{"Name":"Sarah Kosari","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWRKJF1Yntnp-zRLmumvc9e-i3Wwazxmkif9r_MkSiD9JZJ8ngfpA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Breka Bakery & Café on Denman Street is a 24/7 spot known for its fresh baked goods, sandwiches, and coffee. Located near Stanley Park, it offers a cozy atmosphere and friendly service. I usually go there for their pastries. My favorite item is the round cake topped with almonds from Breka Bakery & Café is called Bienenstich or “Bee Sting Cake.”","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO4cwX6bdodbrR6sYH6MZz1Lk0h9HwEa_RVoO6r&fid=0x0:0xc7748a6170afa094"],"When":"2024-10-13"},{"Name":"Hanna Y.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV8LrpYG7xx4v1kQWGmot7xCcaz6evaR8tDdO0YcGQ-KC0CfLw2SQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Service was extremely disappointing. Employees spilled a drink on my friend and did not apologize, but instead were disrespectful and rude. It was almost 100% self serve, and while I understand tipping doesn’t equal good service by default, I would’ve appreciated if the staff returned our courtesy and kindness. Food wise, I had their Tiramisu which was almost not up to expectations. It was mostly just coffee-flavored cream with a very thin layer of cake at the bottom but it definitely wasn’t what Tiramisu is supposed to be. Probably won’t return here. It ruined my trip to Vancouver.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMtfv5PvLkdoWItNFCtd3SS_JGD6Zvs3rIwdwL4&fid=0x0:0xc7748a6170afa094"],"When":"2024-10-21"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Melissa Blanchard","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV9STdnkXunqBVDIFyyPKUG3NSg7zz--NvNDZdql4wS_mlUO5FKmw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’ve been meaning to write this review but was selfishly keeping this West End gem to myself.

I eat at this restaurant every chance I get. It’s my go to for breakfast in all of Vancouver. The food is perfectly delicious and consistent which is very hard to do. I’ve never had a meal or mocha that wasn’t 10/10.  I get the Deluxe breakfast almost every time, the scrambled eggs are magic and the home made sour dough is rustic, flavourful and perfectly toasted.  If you have the chance to go on a weekend the Benny is a MUST!

The best part of this place is the staff.  HANDS DOWN, the best group of people. They’re warm and welcoming, it’s like having breakfast with friends. Robyn, Ralph, Lorena, Rowan and Veda feel like old friends now. Whoever owns this little place needs to do whatever they can to keep this group of staff happy so they never leave.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM79UVfdX1RRSQuOV9SA3elG4i5chIFkZiCD7fe&fid=0x0:0x808b9369c5e0db75"],"When":"2024-10-30"},{"Name":"John Kroetch","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV9ZriQY_5kscfPIHrXvfYdGx9n_pl7uxeCe99NVjU4snEQ59M=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I chose this place because of reddit!

It was definitely an enjoyable atmosphere. Good music,  just quiet enough. It wasn't busy when I arrived, but it filled up very quickly.

I ordered the smoked salmon and avocado omelette. Honestly, for $1 more, why wouldn't you? I had the homemade sourdough toast. And a cappuccino.

The omelette was perfect. Subtle flavors, and the salmon was very present. The sourdough, although it had a nice crunch, didn't really have a strong sourdough flavor. Also,  the juice is not fresh squeezed - be aware before you order. They also couldn't provide a wedge of lemon or lime for my glass of water.

The bathroom was very clean and cozy, but not wheelchair accessible.

The service was to notch. Very friendly, and very prompt delivery of food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPJ7FzzE5xFiksgU-DqYPl2B33HgFJ3TxuuFzUe&fid=0x0:0x808b9369c5e0db75"],"When":"2024-11-28"},{"Name":"Mehrdad Movassaghi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV0R0irbm0TRdFujTm_kmih83iAGQzR4VDxHKlutJHmE5wN8Zs=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Such cozy place which bring peace to your mind. Great vibe, good service and true breakfast dishes. Chicken avocado sandwich was served with whole grain bread which was a bit greasy for me, but all ingredients specially for Meat Lovers dish were awesome. Coffee were nice and professionally prepared.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNXZjefzuNXYBox0ne74_lHazBzbALl5-y2_10&fid=0x0:0x808b9369c5e0db75"],"When":"2024-10-11"},{"Name":"Shadae Johnson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKrDE0XK8MYpe7FypdoCMzzdINynTZhVL5tTKXS_uHyiwpIQQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Not friendly to families or solo mothers.

The moment I walked in they made comments about how big my stroller is. As if my 13 month old child and 4 month old child shouldn’t be in a stroller? I mean he can’t even sit on his own, I would call this accessibility?

As a mother, a treat is going out to eat, so I don’t have to cook and clean. This saved me time and energy but not money. So it’s a special treat for me.

I didn’t find their comments necessary, as they didn’t seem to want to accommodate us. Of the 3 staff working the front only one made us feel welcomed.

The food was lovely. However idk if that enough for us to go back.

When I was paying to leave, I seen this sign at the check out. It’s support to be of humour but along side with their comments, lack of service. It was untastful.

I was disappointed because I like to support local small business. However I want to also be treated with respect and dignity.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOmlktJOMlxMHY7zpB57r8wtAxrpEDz-b-iFrW5&fid=0x0:0x808b9369c5e0db75"],"When":"2024-9-7"},{"Name":"Maddy Fletcher","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIGf2AqJPxAUCof2A6sbTn8ePlBJElKCowehSMT4sCOXEBpKQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A great little breakfast spot in Vancouver! Very tasty breakfast sandwich and BLT. Service was friendly and efficient, portion sizes for price are great, and the coffee was good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPz3DL8kJMzEj3fr9wuJLtf7BATzrDv1yYCMUo0&fid=0x0:0x808b9369c5e0db75"],"When":"2024-11-19"},{"Name":"Sarah Gregory","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWzO_jaWvXiuWA1o7JSIdMmlvIjdZQu456mwyxpcJOuh0jNNf16Pg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went for eggs Benny but they didn’t serve it for that day. Grabbed a breakfast sandwich instead and was not disappointed. Probably best breakfast sandwich I had. And the French toast was perfect. Fresh.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMsWPHksBhU_9_-mBcvVX6OitsG7nB9nr4hZdfu&fid=0x0:0x808b9369c5e0db75"],"When":"2024-10-15"},{"Name":"Angie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIyUjdZQkz0bhaDppuQsySaOzrLROWSfhKe7zzOgxtMex30Fg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Haven’t been here in several years, and the food is still up to par! The smoked salmon omelette was fluffy and creamy. Coffee was good too!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM-Kx7gHR4ZuMSuxxGbYMVAveCgIvXYE_x79p3Z&fid=0x0:0x808b9369c5e0db75"],"When":"2024-10-5"},{"Name":"Bernice Deanna","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVobmPdyGaprppNX6a3IMjWFEbtFcYfWk7PiMjNweH7XDOfhh8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Heard this place has been around a while and our dining experience showed us why.
Service is quick & warm, staff can easily recommend entrees & suggest protein pairings. Portions were hearty & quality was excellent- real sourdough, did not scrimp on butter or any condiments, freshly cooked eggs & sides. They serve the eggs Benedict on biscuits instead of muffins. Every bite melted perfectly in the mouth.
And the coffee just kept coming in. 😀
Arrive early to snag a good table.
Excellent work to the whole team!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMp-bjkxNIir_m_C1iCwU64HMhNqBULWJVAlC7t&fid=0x0:0x808b9369c5e0db75"],"When":"2024-4-21"}]
