user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jessica Dhaliwal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXOeC5VCbc6g3HH3dxXpDS9bE993HEKMDVI3SjHX2aNdHbQOJHQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best Café I've ever been to with the best menu. So lucky they were part of the Vancouver croissant crawl making it easier to discover them. The vegan chicken croissant was delicious and flavorful with a touch of refreshing lemongrass taste included too. The durian croissant had a great filling 🥐 I'm not sure why it was called moissant because it seemed like a normal croissant. The iced Ube haze latte was amazingly full of ube flavor with the perfect amount of Vietnamese coffee ☕ and best of all it was safe for a dairy sensitive person 👌🏽 The staff gave thoughtful suggestions like to try the coffee jelly dalgona drink too so would definitely try that next time. They packaged everything so nice and seemed to be with care. Totally worth coming out of your way to this place. It was cool to be able to order ahead of time through the broyecafe website too","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNkgrvROuPqP9MwOQfxMnpI5YXxcV4N7H9oqR1o&fid=0x0:0x413f53b7b34d8ffa"],"When":"2024-11-6"},{"Name":"Tam Bui","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKBT5ncDfh8bnFPF0txL6LoKmGGJNZbFO5rGsUaWCMegaQw5A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is one of my favorite coffee shop in Vancouver. I love their mango matcha latte and moissants. It’s croissant crawl today so it was quite hectic compared to normal but the limited edition items are worth the wait.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNqcQqdrw7JJhVkihEb63DqbbFZjvOro5_O3ICk&fid=0x0:0x413f53b7b34d8ffa"],"When":"2024-11-4"},{"Name":"Mrs. Leci","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWFUu7tIDGHhiFP61EOIZLCOSzvwJkGN10CXxqa6MRhYpyxpm4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had a nice dining experience on a gloomy day here at Broye. Visit their cafe for a yummy mochi buns and coffee!

Made our day!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOTn12E3cNk3WaOK_DuS7JG7ZZuHFMUYdkJ7NT_&fid=0x0:0x413f53b7b34d8ffa"],"When":"2024-10-16"},{"Name":"Tay Cun","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVISvV4V-lNqhgBJaNaxP5l32SM4_qpYYBDmmefTcVji7eDYTQz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a wonderful cafe. They offer plenty of seating and the staff very friendly.
They have plenty of delicious hot and cold drinks options
And the mochi buns are cute and tasty
They also offer Happy Hour BOGO on select items which was definitely a plus. I highly recommend the location on Fraser Street.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNX68VKFKNYCqMYirfkLtUb1_bO9dbAiD7d3dPd&fid=0x0:0x413f53b7b34d8ffa"],"When":"2024-8-8"},{"Name":"Tiara","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXOGTnVSprrRfKnl8HxlMWqGPfK-EAnduRxsmD5lBjFitcsiWe8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I got their egg coffee, which was good but I expected a more custardy taste to the egg cream. It still had a great taste to it and got me awake enough to get through the day. They had a wide variety of food and drinks that I should try next time","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMPkS67XeVinZ13d9B_OUDdrXePUEELM59-sv5G&fid=0x0:0x413f53b7b34d8ffa"],"When":"2024-8-25"},{"Name":"Tammy Hoang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW-yEBkQVFHvEWZfuLZqbeoOB7DXxgT7uhpXL_VVia-4TbHCTg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Update: we had a great experience re-visiting this place recently. Customer service was awesome. The owner even gave us the mango yuzu croissant when we were leaving 😊 the coffee was rich and had a nice fragrance.
It is a cozy and well decorated place, parking can be a bit hard to find. I'm looking forward to trying other items next time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipObq0DOElOTukyEgvy_9hXf-ngI8T-HLSLSl94&fid=0x0:0x413f53b7b34d8ffa"],"When":"2022-4-16"},{"Name":"Mariam Ashraf","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXdm9Z3aKH31BAMEdQch46HgK2OKNKcqEP3WPF-lmoLHMZV7xONvw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I read many reviews before trying this cute Vietnamese cafe… and I was pleasantly surprised! There definitely is an odd, plastic-y smell when you enter but the decor is so whimsical that the ambiance is still pleasant. I ordered a Viet coffee mochi croissant which was really nice. I wasn’t adventurous with my order due to the mixed reviews but I did try a salted Vietnamese coffee (cold) which was interesting. More ice than drink but still enjoyable.
The service was ok- I asked about mochi croissants “moissants”, if they have multiple flavours and just got a “yes”. Couldn’t see the flavour options so asked her to list them and she slowly named a few. Eventually I found the listed options but it was like pulling teeth to get the info from the cashier.
I would go back here with a friend since it’s so fun and unique but I doubt I’ll go out of my way again solo.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNiWxqS3SxmAu7fEFj6j-Sw2HnLn8STH6SX1Ldr&fid=0x0:0x413f53b7b34d8ffa"],"When":"2024-7-10"},{"Name":"Jim Fong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV3tXWnX8xFhA_qZcSgIAVcjedjNVtb5Riz6aB4ltUNzTkDmgfU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What is there not to love about this place. Everything from the sandwiches to the mochi bun were great. Will definitely be back to try their other items, YUM","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPE4TekCuGADlb0RFDxIJ8DAFB27cbRyDwfS-IP&fid=0x0:0x413f53b7b34d8ffa"],"When":"2024-8-20"}]

title: Beyond Coffee

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Dana Sullivan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWQIw-0oOUNgoyniYugTscGkgpKJS8tpx4V0tAajn3ZGkNIfqEk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had a really good lunch here! I got the caponata panini, a brownie gelato sandwich, and a cup of rooibos tea. The sandwiches are premade and sit in a case until they’re grilled, but nonetheless the focaccia was fresh and the filling of roasted veggies and cheese was great. The gelato sandwich was good - raspberry gelato between two slices of brownie. Hard to make a judgment about the quality of the gelato itself based on the brick of it in the sandwich, but it totally did the job for a sandwich and the raspberry flavour seemed natural, not overly sweet, and the brownie was nice and moist. Decent tea, nothing out of the ordinary there. My total was about $25, about average value for downtown.
The place is located under a hotel and it doesn’t have a lot of character, but it’s spacious and quiet, and the counter chairs were super comfortable, so for my taste it’s a nice relaxing spot even if it is generic. The staff were all polite.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNS2XTd5vypQ_iZM5D35TySNG-fuLcysn2a92ap&fid=0x0:0xb0a94f91a8c9aa1a"],"When":"2023-10-11"},{"Name":"Gurv","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXhwceJhFcjYo11eH0UjktVpbt4vgW7SS5aHechrSipNjogSGM7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I have stopped by at Beyond Coffee a few times, and have always observed that it’s a pretty quiet spot. It’s also quite spacious, so it would be great for a quick meeting or private conversation in a public place.

The coffee is decent, food is pre-made and nothing special, and the service is usually decent. Wouldn’t recommend for the food/coffee, but definitely for the location.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPxmiim0e5Fv-X2EwzxYTKy8NwAHgqHnUpdG8N1&fid=0x0:0xb0a94f91a8c9aa1a"],"When":"2020-1-20"},{"Name":"Leah Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI-iUo0TjlL8r7IA6YJjyo5bqm80V9dlvLXbXvthtewkiudKA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"The coffee was good. Staff were rude and didn’t ask if I wanted the bread warmed up. It was served cold, just thrown on a plate without care.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Chelsea Matias","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWeCIApzHZ6RAMx1TQu9_5QxILPrtFIOSJZPyMDTKVMMpzdVn0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The baristas are knowledgeable and passionate, always ready to recommend the perfect brew. Their selection of beans, sourced from various parts of the world, is impressive and caters to a wide range of palates. What truly sets Beyond Coffee apart is its commitment to sustainability, evident in their eco-friendly practices and support for fair trade coffe. The food menu, though limited, complements the drinks with delicious, freshly made options. The ambiance strikes a perfect balance between modern and comfortable, making it an ideal spot for both quick coffee runs and leisurely afternoons.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPlVOl1fLEo92soQ9ihohGaflR9E3T5lg4517uK&fid=0x0:0xb0a94f91a8c9aa1a"],"When":"2024-1-3"},{"Name":"Dave","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLPZIUOsDwlBkFebhG04vj0-2yRgvhqZ8FA0OSOGGM5zHg8Nw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The coffee and pastry were quite good. The place has a decent amount of seating and some TVs..They also serve other foods and ice cream.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNUtPSDETOvg9MzPzvHLVVdPhqlqmVeo2lIVpGt&fid=0x0:0xb0a94f91a8c9aa1a"],"When":"2022-12-4"},{"Name":"Michael Gerrard","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWjCa2t2PPMM4L6ZspQ0I1xWRTO21LsF4hqYYmw_oe6qMbp5qcAcQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Excellent cafe with great staff. However, one thing that was a bit off-putting, I saw one staff member placing cakes, donuts, pastries and other unwrapped food items into the glass display case without gloves or tongs. I hope this was a one off incident? All the lady staff wore gloves.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ella Perron","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV9zXCS2sCPc2n87ZjjylMzieArJK2ITRrrhcotCUN94mL0sgo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Beyond Coffee Shop is a hidden gem nestled in the heart of the city. Its eclectic ambiance and inviting decor create an ideal space to unwind and savor premium coffee blends. The menu boasts an array of artisanal beverages anddelectable pastries, catering to diverse tastes. The attentive and knowledgeable staff further elevate the experience, ensuring each visit feels personalized and welcoming. Whether you seek a tranquil morning respite or a vibrant afternoon buzz, Beyond Coffee Shop transcends the ordinary, making it a must-visit destination for coffee aficionados and a delightful escape for all.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Francesca Murray","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUixt1YYjis_TbTaBCfMPZlvHHsdbYL_Pu936RBxDeF8vdhgBjO=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We decided to have the BEST ice cream in Vancouver for dinner in waffle bowls n all  🤣😂... 3 scoops each 😱🤣😂.

They kept asking if we were sure because 3 scoops couldn't fit in the waffle bowls 🤣 We loved the flavours we tried so much we decided to EMBRACE it's joyfulness. 🤣😂.

And I chased it down with a Leak & chives pastry that was sooo yummy... Here are some picks from @BEYOND Cafe @ The Hotel on Burrard by the Hospital.

They have a delicious and amazing selection of goodies mixed with some yummy doctors & nurses too 😘😍🙏😉🤷

Enjoy","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNMRQk3w9tj4NGQzkddeMkK9r13N7XDAUxBrT-u&fid=0x0:0xb0a94f91a8c9aa1a"],"When":"2022-10-8"}]
